bible.status: Santali Common Language New Testament © Bangladesh Bible Society, 2012

chapter.verse: Jisu Mạsi do Dạudakʼ bõsren ar Dạud do Abraham bõsren hoṛe tahekana. Jisu Mạsi reakʼ bõs budạ do nonkaleka.
Abraham do Isạhak jonome emadea; Isạhak do Jakob jonome emadea, Jakob do Jihudạ jonome emadea ar uniren boehako;
Jihudạ do Phares jonome emadea ar Seroho hõ Thamar hotete; Phares do Hesrom jonome emadea; Hesrom do Aram jonome emadea;
Aram do Aminadab jonome emadea; Aminadab do Nahason jonome emadea; Nahason do Salmon jonome emadea.
Salmon do Boas jonome emadea Rahab hotete; Boas do Obed jonome emadea Rut hotete; Obed do Jisại jonome emadea;
Ar Jisại do Dạud raj jonome emadea. Dạud do Solomon jonome emadea; Uriạ rinicʼ hotete;
Solomon do Rehoboam jonome emadea; Rehoboam do Abiạ jonome emadea; Abiạ do Asaph jonome emadea;
Asaph do Josaphat jonome emadea; Josaphat do Joram jonome emadea; Joram do Usiạ jonome emadea;
Usiạ do Jotham jonome emadea; Jotham do Ahas jonome emadea; Ahas do Hiskiạ jonome emadea;
Hiskiạ do Manase jonome emadea; Manase do Amos jonome emadea; Amos do Josiạ jonome emadea;
Josiạ do Jekhoniạ jonome emadea ar uniren boehako Babel disạmte bondikate idiko jokhecʼ.
Babelte bondikate idiko tayom Jikhoniạ do Sealtiel jonome emadea; Sealtiel do Serubabel jonome emadea;
Serubabel do Abihud jonome emadea; Abihud do Eliạkim jonome emadea; Eliạkim do Asor jonome emadea;
Asor do Sadok jonome emadea; Sadok do Akhim jonome emadea; Akhim do Elihud jonome emadea;
Elihud do Eleasar jonome emadea; Eleasar do Mathan jonome emadea; Mathan do Jakob jonome emadea;
Jakob do Mạriạmren jãwãe Joseph jonome emadea; ar nui Mạriạm khonge Mạsiko metae Jisu doe janamlena.
Ado nonka leka Abraham khon Dạud hạbicʼ gelpon piṛhi; Dạud khon Babelte bondikate idiko hạbicʼ gelpon piṛhi; ar Babelte bondi idiko tayom khon Mạsi hạbicʼ gelpon piṛhi.

Jisu Mạsiakʼ janam do nonka leka hoelena. Jisuren eṅgat Mạriạm do Joseph tulucʼ baplakʼ reakʼ ṭhik akantae tahẽkana, menkhan unkin ạurikin mitʼ ṭhenokʼrege Sonot Jiu reakʼ daṛete Mạriạm doe bhạrti hoṛmoyena.
Mạriạmren jãwãe Joseph do dhorom hoṛe tahẽkante hoṛko samaṅre Mạriạm lajaore paṛao ocoye do bae khojlakʼa; onate uni do mone monete Mạriạm bạgiye reakʼe goṭakeda.

Ado Joseph noako reakʼ tinreye gunạnokʼkan tahẽkana unre Probhuren mitʼṭen goḍet do kukmũte uni ṭhen ńel ocoyenteye menkeda, “E Dạud bõsren Joseph; Mạriạm baplaye do alom botorokʼa, ente uniakʼ kukhire okoeye janam akan uni do sonot Jiu reakʼ daṛetegeye janam akana. Uniren do mitʼṭen koṛa gidrại hoyokʼtaea.
Ar am do uniakʼ ńutum Jisum dohoetaea, ente uni do acʼren hoṛko akoakʼ kại khone bańcaokoa.”
Noa joto do hoyena nạbi hotete Probhui roṛletʼakʼ katha jemon purạukʼ: enkathae,
“Mitʼṭen kũạri kuṛi doe bhạrti hoṛmokʼa, ar uniren do mitʼṭen koṛa gidrại hoyokʼtaea; ar uniakʼ ńutum do Immanuel dohokʼtaea.” Ona reakʼ mane do, Abon tulucʼ Isor.
Ado Probhuren goḍet okalekae hukumade tahẽkan, onkage Joshep do jạpitʼ khon beretʼkateye kạmikeda.
Uni do Mạriạme baplakedea, menkhan gidrạ ạuriye janame hạbicʼ bae jakʼ joṭetʼledea; ar gidrạwakʼ ńutum do Jisui dohoketʼtaea.
Jihudạ disạm reakʼ Betlehem atore Jisuakʼ janam do hoelena. Unre Herod do raje tahẽkana. Ar purub disạmren gonok ponḍetko do Jerusalemte hecʼkateko menkeda,
“Jihudikoren janam akan raj do okare menaea? Ale do uniren ipil purubrele ńelakadea ar uni sewawae lạgitʼle hecʼakana.”
Noa katha ańjomkate Herod raj ar uni sãote goṭa Jerusalemrenko doko torasena.
Herod do sanam maraṅ naekeko ar sostor baḍaeko hoho jarwakate onko ṭhene kuliyana Mạsi do okareye janamokʼa mente.
Adoko lạiadea, “Uni do Jihudạ reakʼ Betlehemreye janamokʼa, ente nạbi hotete nonkage olakana, enkathae;
‘E Jihudạ reakʼ Betlehem, am do Jihudạren ạyurko khon oka secʼte hõ bam huḍińa, ente am bhitri khon nonkan mitʼṭen ạyuricʼe oḍokokʼa, okoe do ińren Israel jạtkoe ạyurko.’ ”
Unre Herod do onko gonok ponḍetko oko okoteye hohoatʼkoa ar oka okte ipile ńellen onae kuli ṭhikketʼkoa.
Ar noa menkate Betlehemteye kolketʼkoa, “Do senkate uni gidrạ reakʼ mońjte suṭhik ạguipe. Arpe ńamle khan baḍae ocoyińpe jemon iń hõ senkateń sewa daṛeae.”

Ado rajakʼ katha ańjomkate gonok ponḍetko doko calaoena. Ar purubreko ńellede uni ipil do onko laha lahateye calao idiyena. Ar gidrạ okareye tahẽkan ona oṛakʼ coṭre seṭerkate ạuriye teṅgokʼ hạbicʼ ipil do calakʼtegeye tahẽyena.
Ar Isor do Herod ṭhen aloko ruạṛ calakʼa mente kukmũte onkoe sontorkatʼkoa. Unre onko do eṭakʼ horte akoakʼ disạmteko ruạṛ calaoena.

Gonok ponḍetkoko calaoen khan Probhuren mitʼṭen goḍet do kukmũte Joseph ṭhen ńel ocoyenteye menkeda, “Ma beretʼme, gidrạ ar eṅgattetʼ sotokʼkinte Misor disạmte dạṛme ar ạuriń metam hạbicʼ onḍege tahenme, ente Herod do gidrạ goje iạteye sendra lạgidokʼ kana.’”

Herod do gonok ponḍetkoko eṛekedea menteye baḍaeketʼ khan ạḍi ãṭe raṅgaoena. Ar onko ṭhen khone baḍaeletʼ tahẽkan okte reakʼ hisạb lekate bar bochor ar ona khon latar umerren tinạkʼ koṛa gidrạ Betlehem ar ona aḍepase jaegakoreko tahẽkan onko joto gocʼko lạgitʼe hukumkeda.
Onate Jirimiạ nạbi hotete noa roṛlenakʼ katha purạuena: enkathae,
“Ramore ãṭ aṛaṅte rakʼ ańjomokʼ kana; Rahel do acʼren gidrạko lạgitʼe rakʼeda, cetʼte hõ jiwi do baṅ raṛejokʼ kantaea, ente onko do ar bạnukʼkotaea.”
Herode gocʼen khan Probhuren mitʼṭen goḍet do Misor disạmre Joseph ṭhen kukmũte ńel ocoyenteye menkeda,
“Ma beretʼme, gidrạ ar uniren eṅgattetʼ sotokʼkinte Israel disạmte ruạṛ calakʼme. Ente gidrạ goje lạgitʼ okoeko sendrakan tahẽkan onko doko gocʼena.”
Unre Joseph doe beretʼente gidrạ ar uniren eṅgattetʼ sotokʼketʼkinte Israel disạmteye ruạṛ calaoena.

Ona jokhecʼ Jihudạre Herod tayom uniren hopon Arkhilạus do raje tahẽkana. Ar Joseph do noa kathae ańjomketʼ khan onḍe calakʼ doe botorena. Tayomte uni do kukmũte hukume ńamketʼ khan Gạlil Prodeshteye calaoena,
ar Nasaretko metakʼ mitʼṭen atore senkateye berelena. Noa do hoyena nạbiko hotete roṛlenakʼ katha jemon purạukʼ: enkathae, “Uni do Nasario menteye hoho ocokʼa.”
Onako dinre Johan bạbạptisicʼ do Jihudạ reakʼ hahaṅkar jaegakore hecʼkate nonka menkate porcare ehopʼena,
“Mon ạcurtape, ente serma raj do sorakana.”
Nui Johan reaṅge Jesaea nạbi doe roṛletʼa; enkathae, “hahaṅkarre mitʼṭen hohokạnicʼ reakʼ aṛaṅ, ‘Probhuakʼ hor tearkataepe uniakʼ konḍea horko sojhe kataepe.’ ”
Johan do ũṭ upʼ reakʼ aṅgrop ar ḍanḍare harta reakʼ paṭheakʼ tahẽkantaea. Uni do pohoko ar bir dumur rasae jometʼkan tahẽkana.
Unre Jerusalem, goṭa Jihudạ ar Jordan gaḍa dene banar secʼren hoṛko do uni ṭhen hijukʼko ehopʼena.
Ar tinre onko hoṛ do apan ạpin kạiko aṅgocketʼtakoa unre Johan do Jordan gaḍareye bạptisketʼkoa.
Ar ạḍi utạr Phạrusiko ar Sạdukiko hõ bạptisokʼ lạgitʼ acʼ ṭhen hijukʼkane ńelketʼkoa. Uni doe metatʼkoa, “Eya kạrinạṅgin hoponko, Isorakʼ daraekan sạjại khon ńirjoṅ lạgitʼ bud do okoeye ematʼpea?
Bhagegea, kại khon monpe ạcurakatʼte ona reakʼ apeakʼ jionre bhage jo ńel ocoetape.
Ar Abraham bõsren hoṛ kanape, mente monre alope hudisjoṅa. Ińiń metapekana, noako dhiri khon Isor do Abrahamren bõskoe benao daṛeakoa.
Dare gonḍarege ṭeṅgocʼ do ṭenḍar doho akana. Oka dare bhage baṅ jokʼ ona do makʼgiḍikʼte seṅgelre khadle ocokʼa.
Monpe ạcurakatʼte dakʼteń bạptisetʼpea, menkhan iń tayomte okoeye daraekan uni do iń khone daṛegea. Iń do uniakʼ panahi teweńtae lek hõń baṅkana. Uni do sonot Jiu ar seṅgelteye bạptispea.
Uniakʼ haṭakʼ do tirege menakʼtaea ar khạrại do mońjteye saphaetaea. Ar phosol do golareye jarwaea, menkhan bhusạ do tishõ baṅ ĩṛĩjokʼ seṅgelreye atar giḍikakʼa.”
Inạko oktere Jisu hõ bạptisokʼ lạgitʼ Gạlil khon Jordante Johan ṭhene hecʼena.
Menkhan Johan do noa menkateye mana manakadea, “Ińge coṅ am tite bạptis maṛaṅokʼ jạruṛtiń; ar amge cetʼ iń ṭhenem hijukʼ kana.”
Jisui menkeda, “Niạ dom do nonkage hoe ocowakʼme, ente Isorakʼ sana do nonkage purạu lek talaṅa.” Adoe aṛakʼadea.
Ado Jisu bạptiskate dakʼ khone rakapʼen sãote sãote uni samaṅre serma do jhicʼena. Ar Isorren sonot Jiu do parwa leka acʼ cetanre pheḍ hijukʼkane ńelkedea.
Unre serma khon mitʼṭen aṛaṅ ańjomena, “Nuige ińren dulạṛiạ Hopon, one unireń kusiakan.”
Inạ tayom Jisu do sonot Jiu hotete hahaṅkar jaegateye idi ocoyena Soetan ṭhen biḍạu ocokʼ lạgitʼ.
Onḍe uni do pongel siń ar pongel ńindại upạsketʼ khan reṅgecʼkedea.
Unre Soetan do hecʼkate uniye metadea, “Isorren Hopon kan khanem enḍekhan noako dhiri piṭhạ hoe ocoeme.”
Jisui roṛ ruạṛkeda, “Sonot sostorre ol menakʼa, eken piṭhạ motote manwa do jiwetʼ bako tahena, menkhan Isorakʼ moca khon oḍokokʼkan mitʼke mitʼ kathatege jiwetʼko tahena.”
Unre Soetan do sonot nagraha Jerusalemte Jisui idikedea ar mundil reakʼ cuṛạre teṅgokedeteye metadea,
“Isorren Hopon kan khanem ma nonḍe khon latarte donme, ente sonot sostorre ol menakʼa, Isor do acʼren goḍetko am reaṅe hukumakoa; onko do titeko sepeńmea, jemon dhirire jaṅga alo bajaokʼtam.”
Jisu do Soetane metadea, “Noa katha olakana, amren Probhu Isor do alom biḍạuea.”
Soetan do arhõ mitʼṭen ạḍi usul burute Jisui idikedete dhạrti reakʼ sanam rajosṭi ar onako reakʼ ṭhonok udukʼadeteye metadea,
“Noako joto do amiń emama, khạjuk ombakʼkate ińem sewawạń.”
Unre Jisu do uniye metadea, “Men ńir joṅme Soetan. Sonot sostorre ol menakʼa, am do amren Probhu Isorgem sewawaea, ar uni eskargem dewa sewawaea.”
Unre Soetan do Jisu bạgiadeteye calaoena, ar sermaren goḍetko hecʼkate uniko sapʼsoradea.
Ado Johan hajotreye bondi ocoakana menteye ańjomketʼ khan,
Jisu do Gạlilteye calaoena ar Nasaret atoe bạgiatʼe Sebulon ar Naphthạli elaka reakʼ doreão aṛe Kapharnạhum nagrahate senkateye berelena.
Noa do hoyena Jesaea nạbi hotete roṛletʼakʼ katha jemon purạukʼ; enkathae,
Sebulon ar Naphthạli elaka reakʼ, doreão secʼ, Jordan gaḍa reakʼ eṭakʼ aṛe ar boṅgan hoṛ jạtrenkoakʼ Gạlil
ar okoeko hoṛ ńutreko tahenkan, onko do maraṅ marsalko ńela. Ar okoe kaṛaṅ ńut disạmreko duṛupʼ akan, onko do marsal rakapʼakoa.
Un khon Jisu do nonka menkate porcare ehopʼena, “Kại khon mon ạcurtape, ente serma raj do sorakana.”

Jisu do Gạlil doreão aṛe aṛeteye calakʼkan tahẽkanre Simon, okoe do Patrasko metaekan ar uniren boeha Andreas tạkine ńel ńamketʼkinạ. Unkin do doreãore jhạlikin oḍaokan tahẽkana, ente unkin do jạilạkin tahẽkana.
Jisui metatʼkinạ, “Dela iń sãote hijukʼ ben, iń do hoṛ sasapʼ hoṛiń benao bena.”
Unkin do unrege jhạlikin bạgi oṭoatʼte Jisukin pańjakedea.

Ado onḍe khon lahańokʼe senen khan Jakob ar Johan ńutuman eṭakʼ bar boehae ńel ńamketʼkinạ. Unkin do Sabdaeren hoponkin tahẽkana. Unkin do ạkinren apat sãote lạukạre duṛupʼkate jhạlikin jujutkan tahẽkana. Jisu do unkin hõe hohoatʼkinạ.
Ar unrege unkin hõ lạukạ ar apattetʼ bạgikate Jisukin pańjakedea.

Jisu do Gạlil Prodesh reakʼ sanam jaegakore dãṛã dãṛãte Jihudikoakʼ sunạgogkore cetʼakoe ehopʼena. Ona chaḍa uni do serma raj reakʼ bhage sombat porcar ar hoṛkoakʼ sanam lekan rog bighin ar ruạ hasokoe bogeyetʼtako tahẽkana.

Uniakʼ katha do Siriạ disạm reakʼ sanam jaegakore pasnao idiyena. Ar hoṛko do ạḍi lekan rog bighinte sasetokʼkanko, bhut capaṛ akatʼko, mirgi ar mitʼ kaṛ gocʼ rogteko jạbun akanko Jisu ṭhenko ạguketʼkoa. Ar uni do onko sanamkoe bogeketʼkoa.
Ar Gạlil, Dikapoli, Jerusalem, Jihudạ ar Jordan gaḍa hanasakoren ạḍi gadel hoṛ do Jisuko pańja idikedea.
Jisu do ạḍi utạr hoṛe ńelketʼko khan buruteye decʼena. Are duṛupʼen khan acʼren celako hõ uni ṭhenko hecʼ sorena.
Unre uni do celako nonka menkate cetʼakoe ehopʼena:
“Monre reṅgejokʼkogeko bhạgana, ente serma raj do onkoakʼkangea.
Dukokʼkogeko bhạgana, ente onko do jiwi raṛecʼko ńama.
Mạhirkogeko bhạgana, ente dhạrti do onkogeko ạidạrijoṅa.
Mon ar ontorte Isorakʼ sanaleka calakʼkogeko bhạgana, ente onkoakʼ monejoṅakʼ do purạukʼtakoa.
Mãyãkʼkogeko bhạgana, ente onko do mãyãko ńama.
Okoeakʼ ontor khạṭigetako onkogeko bhạgana, ente onko do Isorko ńelea.
Sulukokʼkogeko bhạgana, ente onko do Isorren hoponko ńumogokʼa.
Dhorom iạte santao ar khed ocokʼkogeko bhạgana; ente serma raj do onkoakʼkangea.
“Bhạgangeape iń iạte hoṛko opoman arko santao lepere ar ạuṛiakʼte sanam lekan bạṛicʼakʼ reaṅko roṛlepere.
Ape do rạskạ ar hulạsokʼpe, ente sermare ape lạgitʼ maraṅ kuṛại menakʼa. Ente ape laha okoe nạbikoko tahẽkan onko hõ nonkageko santaoletʼkoa.
“Ape do dhạrti reakʼ buluṅ kanape, menkhan buluṅ sabakʼlen khan cekate rahamokʼa? Ona do ar okaṭakʼ kạmirege baṅ lagaokʼa. Eken bahrete giḍikakʼ ar hoṛko lebetʼakʼ lek hoyokʼa.
“Ape do dhạrti reakʼ marsal kanape. Buru coṭ reakʼ nagraha do oho danaṅ daṛelena.
Okoe hõ diuhe jeretʼkate khạclạkʼte do bako hạrupʼ esetʼkakʼa, bickom bạti dohowakʼ cetanregeko dohoea. Onate oṛakʼren sanam hoṛge marsalko ńama.
Onkage apeakʼ marsal do hoṛko samaṅre jolokʼtapema, jemon apeakʼ bhage kạmi ńelte aperen sermaren Babako sarhaoe.
“Noa do alope hudisa, Moseakʼ ạn-ạri ar nạbikoakʼ olakʼko bạtil lạgitʼ iń hecʼakana. Iń do bạtil lạgitʼ do baṅ, bickom purạu lạgitʼgeń hecʼakana.
Sạrigeń metapekana, serma ar dhạrti ạuri cabakʼ hạbicʼ, ạn-ạri reakʼ sanamakʼ kathako ạuri purạukʼ hạbicʼ ona ạn-ạri reakʼ mitʼ akhor se ṭuḍạkʼ hõ oho meṭaolena.

Onate jãhãege noa kạṭicʼ utạrakʼ hukumko modre mitʼ goṭecʼe rạpud ar onkage hoṛkoe cetʼako, uni do serma rajre huḍiń utạricʼe ńumogokʼa. Menkhan jãhãege onakoe senakʼ are cetʼako uni do serma rajre maraṅe ńum ocokʼa.
Ińiń metapekana, apeakʼ dhorom do Phạrusiko ar sostor baḍaeko khon baṅ soroslentape khan ape do serma rajre ohogepe bolo daṛelena.
“Ańjom akadape, sedaeren hoṛko ṭhen noa katha roṛlena, ‘Alom khũna’ ar okoeye khũna uni do bicạrre dạyike hoyokʼa.”

Menkhan ińiń metapekana, okoe acʼren boeha cetanreye edrekʼ, uni do bicạrre dạyike hoyokʼa. Ar okoe acʼren boehae metae, ‘Eya orlo’ uni do maraṅ bạisire dạyike hoyokʼa. Okoe acʼ boehae metae, ‘Eya dundhạ’ uni do norok seṅgelre khadle ocokʼ leke hoyokʼa.
“Onate Isor samaṅre amakʼ samaṅokʼakʼem samaṅre, am upạrte amren boehawakʼ jãhãnakʼ menakʼtaea mentem disạle khan,
amakʼ ona dan do pinḍ samaṅre bạgi oṭowakʼme. Ar senkate amren boeham tulucʼ solho maṛaṅokʼme ar inạ tayom do hecʼkate amakʼ dan samaṅme.
“Jãhãe am birudreye mamblae khan adalotte ạuri calakʼrege uni sãote samka sạṭikʼme. Ar baṅkhan uni do hạkim ṭhene soprotmea, ar hạkim do pulis ṭhen, ar pulis do hajotreye bhoraomea.
Sạrigeń metam kana, kạuḍi kạuḍi ạurim hala cabae hạbicʼ onḍe khon okalekate hõ ohogem oḍok daṛelena.
“Ańjomakadape roṛlena mente, ‘alom laṭghaṭa.’
Menkhan ińiń metapekana, jãhãe hoṛ bạṛicʼ sanate maejiue beṅgetʼae uni do unrege acʼakʼ ontorre uni tulucʼe laṭghaṭeda.”
Amakʼ jojom mẽtʼe kại ocome khan ona do hoṭor oḍokkakʼme. Amakʼ goṭa hoṛmo norokre khadlekʼ khon ona mitʼ hạṭiń bạṛicʼ ocoakʼge am lạgitʼ bhagea.
Amakʼ jojom tiye kại ocome khan ona do samakʼ giḍikakʼme. Amakʼ goṭa hoṛmo norok seṅgelre khadlekʼ khon hoṛmo reakʼ mitʼ hạṭiń nosṭo ocoakʼge am lạgitʼ bogea.
“Arhõ roṛ akana, “Jãhãe hoṛ bạhuttetʼe bạgiye khan uni do bapag dolele emaema.”
Menkhan ińiń metapekana, jãhãe hoṛ laṭghaṭ chaḍa eṭakʼ karonte bạhuttetʼe bạgiye uni doe loṭghuṭi ocoyea, ar jãhãege uni bạgi ocoyicʼ maejiue baplaye, uni hõe loṭghuṭiya.
“Arhõpe ańjomakada, ạgil hapṛamko ṭhen roṛlena, ‘eṛe eṛe alom kiriạkʼa, bickom amakʼ sanam kiriạwakʼko Probhu purạuaeme.’
Menkhan ińiń metapekana, alotetʼgepe kiriạkʼa. Serma ńutumte hõ alo, ente ona do Isorakʼ siṅghạson kana.
Dhạrti ńutumte hõ alo ente ona do uniakʼ jaṅga lebedokʼ jaega kana. Jerusalem ńutumte hõ alo, ente ona do maraṅ rajakʼ nagraha kana.
Amakʼ bohokʼte hõ alo, ente ona reakʼ mitʼṭen upʼ hõ bam ponḍ daṛeakʼa se bam hende daṛeakʼa.
Ape do, ‘Hẽ khan hẽ,’ ar ‘Baṅ khan baṅpe,’ Ar noa khon bạ̃ṛtiakʼ okaṭakʼkan, ona do Soetan ṭhen khonge hijukʼa.
“Ańjomakadape roṛlena mente, ‘Mẽtʼ hala hạli mẽtʼ ar ḍaṭa hala hạli ḍaṭa.’
Menkhan ińiń metapekana, jãhãe ape tulucʼ bạṛicʼko beohar khan onko birudre cetʼhõ alope cekaea; bickom jãhãe jojom johae thapame khan uni do eṭakʼ joha hõ thapa ocoaeme.
Jãhãe amakʼ aṅgrop hatao lạgitʼe lạlis khan uni do oyonakʼ hõ idiocoaeme.
Jãhãe acʼakʼ bojha mitʼ mail iditae lạgitʼe sapʼlem khan uni tulucʼ bar mail calakʼme.
Koyetʼmekạnicʼ do emaeme, ar okoe am ṭhen pańcae khojkan uni hõ alom dea giḍikaea.
“Ańjomakadape, roṛlena mente, ‘Am aḍepaseren hoṛem dulạṛea ar amren bạiri dom kurudaea.’
Menkhan ińiń metapekana, aperen bạiriko dulạṛkope. Ar okoe apeko santaoetʼpe onko do koeakope.
Jemon hoṛko ńelpe ape do sạrige serma Babaren hoponko kanape mente. Uni do jotoko cetanre acʼren siń candoe rakapʼ ocoyedea ar dhoromko ar bedhoromkoe dakʼako kana.
Okoe apeko dulạṛetʼpe eken onkogepe dulạṛetʼko khan enḍekhan cetʼ kuṛại menakʼtapea? Mạsul uṭhạuko hõ cetʼ bako onkayeda?
Eken apekoren hoṛgepe joharakokan khan enḍekhan eṭakʼko khon bạ̃ṛti do cetʼpe cekayeda? Boṅgan hoṛ jạtrenko hõ cetʼ bako onkayeda?
Onate aperen sermaren Baba cetʼlekae khạṭige, onkage ape hõ khạṭiko hoyokʼpe.
“Husiạrokʼpe, hoṛ ṭhen ńel ocokʼ leka do alope dhorom koroma; arpe onkae khan aperen sermaren Baba ṭhen khon jãhãn kuṛại do bape ńama.

“Onate koeyem emokʼre phạsiạra hoṛko leka do alom onkaea. Ente onko do hoṛko ṭhen sarhao ocokʼ lạgitʼ sunạgogre ar kulhikore siṅgạ oroṅate koeko emakokana. Sạrigeń metapekana, onko do akoakʼ kuṛạiko ńam horayeda.
Menkhan am do reṅgecʼ orecʼko jãhãnakʼem danakore amakʼ leṅga ti hõ aloe baḍaema jojom ti cetʼe cekayeda mente.
Jemon amakʼ dan emokʼ do okoge tahentam. Enḍekhan okoe danaṅ khon jotowakʼe ńeńelkan uni amren Baba do kuṛạiye emama.

‘‘Apepe koejoṅre phạsiạra hoṛko leka do alope onkaea, ente onko do hoṛko ṭhen ńel ocokʼ lạgitʼ sunạgog ar dobạṭiạkore teṅgokate koejoṅko kusiyakʼkana. Sạrigeń metapekana, onko do akoakʼ kuṛạiko ńam horayeda.

Menkhan amem koejoṅre bhitri oṛakʼre bolokate duạr sińme, ar amren Baba, okoe do bae ńelokʼkanre hõ hạjirge menae, uni ṭhen koejoṅme. Enḍekhan amren Baba okoe do danaṅ khon jotowakʼe ńeńel kan, unige kuṛạiye emama.
‘‘Apepe koejoṅre boṅgan hoṛ jạtrenko leka ạuṛiakʼ do alope boktaokʼa. Ente onko doko hudisa, bạ̃ṛti katha roṛle khan Isor do koejoṅe ańjomtakoa.
Onko leka do alope onkaea, ente ape ạuripe koeyerege aperen Baba do apeakʼ sanam jạruṛakʼ koe baḍaekana.
Onate ape do nonka leka koejoṅpe; E aleren sermare menam Baba, amakʼ ńutum sonotokʼ ma.
Amakʼ raj hijukʼ ma. Amakʼ sana leka hoyokʼ ma, cetʼ leka sermare, onkage otre hõ.
Aleakʼ jạruṛ jomakʼ de teheń emalem.
Ar aleakʼ kạiko ikạ katalem, cetʼ leka ale hõ ale reakʼ kạkại kole ikạ katako kan;
ar biḍạute alom aderlea, menkhan bạṛicʼ khon bańcaolem. [Ente raj ar daṛe ar ṭhonok jaejug hạbicʼ amakʼge, Amen.]
Ape do eṭakʼkoakʼ doskope ikạletako khan enḍekhan aperen sermaren Baba hõ apeakʼe ikạitapea.
Menkhan eṭakʼko bape ikạleko khan aperen Baba hõ apeakʼ ghạṭko bae ikạitapea.

‘‘Apepe upạsre phạsiạrako leka mẽtãhã do alope mirluṅtapea. Ente onko do hoṛko ṭhen udugokʼ lạgitʼko upạseda ar bohokʼ ar mẽtãhãre torocʼko ojokʼ joṅkana. Sạrigeń metapekana onko do akoakʼ kuṛạiko ńam horayeda.
Menkhan amem upạsre bohokʼre sunum ojogme ar mẽtãhã apʼ saphakʼme,
jemon eṭakʼko aloko baḍae daṛeakʼ, am dom upạsetʼ kana. Enḍekhan amren Baba okoe do bae ńelokʼkanre hõ hạjirge menae ar danaṅ khon jotowakʼe ńeńelkan unige kuṛạiye emama.
‘‘Noa dhạrtire ape lagitʼ dhon alope doho jarwa joṅa. Nonḍe do joṅ dhoraokʼte bạṛijokʼa ar tejokoko nosṭoea ar kombṛo hõ oṛakʼ bhugạkʼkateko idiya.
Menkhan sermare do joṅhõ baṅ dhoraokʼa, ar tejo hõ bako nosṭoea ar kombṛo hõ bako kombṛoea. Onate ape lạgitʼ sermare dhon jarwa joṅpe,
ente okare dhon tahen tama onḍege amakʼ mon hõ tahena.
‘‘Mẽtʼ do hoṛmo reakʼ diuhe kana. Onate amakʼ mẽtʼ nirolage khan amakʼ goṭa hoṛmo hõ marsalte perejokʼa.
Menkhan amakʼ mẽtʼ bạṛicʼ getam khan amakʼ goṭa hoṛmo hõ ńutgetama. Amre menakʼ marsal sạrige ńutgetam khan enḍekhan ona do artetʼ ńutgea!

‘‘Okoe hõ barea kisạ̃ṛ ṭhen guti ohoe khaṭao daṛelena, ente mitʼ hoṛe dulạṛea ar eṭagicʼ doe kurudaea. Mitʼ hoṛakʼe ańjomtaea ar eṭagicʼ doe neṅghaoea. Isor ṭhen ar dhon ṭhen guti do ohope khaṭao daṛelena.

‘‘Noa iạteń metapekana, bańcao tahen lạgitʼ cetʼpe joma se cetʼpe ńũiya se hoṛmo lạgitʼ cetʼpe horokʼ-bandea ona do alope dạndikʼa. Jiwi do eken jom ar ńũi lạgitʼ do baṅkana, ar hoṛmo hõ horokʼ bandekʼ lạgitʼ do baṅa.
‘‘Coṭren cẽṛẽko beṅgetʼakope; itạ hõ bako era ar ir hõ bako ira, ar golare hõ bako doho jarwaea, enrehõ aperen sermaren Baba doe jom ocoyetʼkoa. Ape do cetʼ onko khon bạ̃ṛti bape damangea?
Ape modre okoe cintạ-bhabnakate acʼakʼ jiwi mitʼ ghonṭa gan bạ̃ṛtiye doho daṛeketaea?
‘‘Horokʼ-bandekʼ lạgitʼ cedakʼpe dạndikʼ kana? Ṭạnḍire menakʼ bahako reakʼ hudispe, cetʼ lekate harakʼkana mente. Onko do bako kạmiya ar sutạm hõ bako takoea.
Menkhan ińiń metapekana, Solomon raj do unạkʼ jak jomoke tahẽkanre hõ noako reakʼ mitʼ goṭen leka hõ bae saj daṛeada.
Ado ṭạnḍi reakʼ ghãs teheń oka menakʼ, ona do gapa culhạre khadle ocokʼre hõ, Isor nonkae sajetʼkan khan E nase pạtiạuko, unre ape do cetʼ artetʼ bạ̃ṛti bae sajpea?
Onate ‘cetʼpe joma’ se ‘cetʼpe ńũiya’ ar cetʼpe horokʼ bandea ona reakʼ do alope dạndikʼa. Boṅgan hoṛ jạtrenkoge noako reaṅ doko ńam baṛayetʼkana;
Ona chaḍa aperen sermaren Baba doe baḍaegea noako sanamakʼ reakʼ jạruṛ menakʼtapea mente.
Menkhan pạhilre ape do Isorakʼ raj ar dhorom ńam maṛaṅpe. Enḍekhan ona sanamakʼpe ńama.
Gapa lạgitʼ do alope dạndikʼa; gapa reakʼ dạndi do gapage dạndi ocowaepe. Ar dintetʼ lạgitʼ do enhilokʼ reakʼ haronge ḍhera.
“Eṭakʼkoakʼ dosko alope ńam baṛaea, jemon apeakʼ dos hõ alo sabokʼtape,
ente cetʼleka eṭakʼkoakʼ doskope saba onkage apeakʼ dos hõ sabokʼtapea, ar cetʼlekape soṅakoa onkage ape lạgitʼ hõ soṅokʼa.
“Amren boehamakʼ mẽtʼre menakʼ cubạkʼgem ńeletʼkana, menkhan apnar mẽtʼre menakʼ jobra do cekate bam ńel ńameda?
Apnar mẽtʼrege jobra menakʼtam tulucʼ cekate amren boeha dom metaekana, ‘hape se amakʼ mẽtʼ khon cubạkʼ oḍok ocoạńme?’
E phạsiạra! Pạhilre amakʼ mẽtʼ reakʼ jobra oḍok giḍi maṛaṅme, enḍekhan boehamakʼ mẽtʼ khon cubạkʼ oḍokʼ lạgitʼ purṭhạm ńeńela.
“Okaṭakʼ sonotge ona do seta alope emakoa. Ar sukri samaṅre mạnik hõ alope giḍiya. Hoedaṛeakʼa onko do onakoko lebetʼ gasmanḍaoa ar ạcurkate apeko hoṭakʼ cirạpea.
“Koepe, ado emapea; ńam baṛaepe, adope ńama, duạr ṭhopʼ ṭhopʼpe, ado jhicʼapea.
Ente mitʼke mitʼ kokoyicʼ do milạuaea; ar ńam baṛayicʼ doe ńama ar ṭhopʼ ṭhopʼetʼicʼ do jhicʼaea.
Ape modre jãhãe nonkanicʼ menaea, one acʼren gidrạ piṭhại koelere dhiriye calae?
Se hakoe koelere bińe calae?
Apepe bạṛicʼgere hõ aperen gidrạko bhage bhage jinisko emakope baḍaekan khan, enḍekhan sermare menae aperen Baba do tinạkʼ artetʼ acʼ koeye kanko bhageakʼkoe emakoa!
Hoṛko ṭhen khon cetʼleka beoharpe khojkan onkage ape hõ onko tulucʼ beoharpe. Ente noa kangea Moseakʼ ạn-ạri ar nạbikoakʼ cecetʼakʼ reakʼ katha do.
“Sakṛa duạrte bolokʼpe, ente okaṭakʼ hor bạṛicʼ secʼe idipe ona reakʼ duạr do osargea ar hor hõ phaelaogea. Ar ḍher hoṛge onateko bolokʼ kana.
Menkhan okaṭakʼ hor jion secʼe ạyur idi ona reakʼ hor do sakṛagea ar duạr hõ suṛucʼgea. Ar thoṛa hoṛge noa doko sendra ńametʼkana.
“Eṛe nạbiko khon sontor akae tahenpe. Onko do bhiḍi chinte ape ṭhenko hijukʼa, menkhan bhitri bhitrite onko do jojom hunḍạr kanako.
Onkoakʼ jion reakʼ jotege onko dope orom daṛeakoa. Jạnum dare khon darkha jo se kũṛitʼ rama jhạwạ khon cetʼ loa doko godgea?
Onkage mimitʼ bhage darere do bhagege jokʼa ar bạṛicʼ darere do bạṛicʼge jokʼa.
Bhage darere bạṛicʼ jo ar bạṛicʼ darere bhage jo do baṅ jo daṛeakʼa.
Okaṭakʼ darere bhage baṅ jokʼ ona do makʼ giḍikʼte sengelre khadle ocokʼa.
Onateń mena, bhonḍ nạbikoakʼ jionre oka jo ńelokʼkan onatege onkope orom daṛeakoa.
“Okoe ‘Probhu, Probhuko’ mitạńkan onko joto do serma rajre ohoko bolo daṛelena, menkhan okoe ińren serma Babawakʼ sana leka senokʼe menjoṅ, unigeye bolo daṛeakʼa.
Enhilokʼ do ạḍi hoṛko mitạńa, ‘E Probhu, E Probhu, ale do cetʼ am ńutumte bale nạbileda? Am ńutumte cetʼ bạṛicʼ jiuko bale oḍok giḍiletʼkoa? Am ńutumte cetʼ hahaṛa kạmiko bale kạmileda?’
Unre pusṭạuteń lạiakoa, ‘ape do tis hõ bạń baḍaeletʼpea. E bedhorom kạmiko, men iń khon sahaṛokʼpe.’
“Onateń metapekana, jãhãege noako kathae ańjom ar ona lekae calakʼ uni do nonkan budan hoṛ kanae, okoe do dhiri cetanre oṛakʼe benaoketʼ.
Ado jhar jhare dakʼkeda, are hoekeda, ar ḍubạ dakʼ hecʼena ar ona oṛakʼre bajaoena; menkhan ona oṛakʼ do baṅ bhindạṛlena, ente ona do dhiri cetanre benao akan tahẽkana.
Ar okoe ińakʼ katha ańjomkate ona leka bae senakʼ uni do lelha hoṛ lekanae, one okoe do gitil cetanre oṛakʼe benaoketʼ.
Ado jhar jhare dakʼkeda, are hoekeda, ar ḍubạ dakʼ hecʼena ar ona oṛakʼre bajaoena; ar ona do lạnduṛena, ar botorge oborena.”
Jisu noako kathae mucạtʼketʼ khan gadel hoṛ do uniakʼ cecetʼakʼteko hahaṛa cabayena,
ente uni do sostor baḍaeko leka do baṅ, bickom ektiạran hoṛ lekae cetʼ akokan tahẽkana.
Jisu buru khone pheḍ hecʼen khan ạḍi utạr hoṛ do uniko pańja idikedea.
Unre mitʼṭen murhucʼ jom rog hoṛ do hecʼkate sewawadeteye menkeda “E Probhu, sanalem khanem sapha daṛeạńạ.”
Jisu do ti tiạrkate joṭetʼkedeteye metadea, “Sanań kangea, ma saphakokʼ me.” Ar unrege murhucʼ jom rog do bogeyentaea.
Ar Jisu do uniye metadea, “Men, okoe hõ alom lại baṛawakoa; bickom senkate naeke ṭhen ńel ocokʼme, ar Moseye hukum akatʼ leka dan samaṅme. Onate hoṛko ṭhenem sạbudokʼa am dom bogeakana.”
Jisu Kapharnạhum nagrahateye boloyen khan, mitʼṭen Romiạ subedar do uni ṭhen hecʼkate nehõrenteye menkeda,
“E Probhu, ińren guti do aṭetʼreye jaṛao akana. Uni do mitʼkaṛ gocʼ rogte ạḍitetʼe sasetokʼ kana.”
Jisu do uniye metadea, “Senkateń bogeyea.”
Subedar do Jisui roṛ ruạṛadea, “E Probhu, ińakʼ oṛakʼtem bolokʼ nonkan lek geń baṅkana. Eken katha moto roṛgotʼkam, ar inạtege ińren guti doe bogekʼa.

Ente iń hõ eṭakʼicʼakʼ katha leka calakʼ hoyokʼtińạ ar iń latarre hõ palṭonko menakʼkoa; iń do mitʼ hoṛ ‘calakʼ iń metae khan uni doe calakʼa, ar eṭagicʼ ‘hijukʼ iń metae khan uni doe hijukʼa; ar ińren golam iń metae khan nonkaeme uni doe onkaea.”
Jisu do noa katha ańjomkateye hahaṛayena, ar acʼ pańja edeyekankoe metatʼkoa, “Sạrigeń metapekana, Israelko modre nunạkʼ maraṅ pạtiạu do okoere hõ bạń ńelakada.
Ińiń metapekana, purub ar pạchim khon aema hoṛko hijukʼa ar Abraham, Isahak, ar Jakob sãote serma rajre jojomko duṛupʼa.
Menkhan rajosṭiren hoponko do bahre ńutreko giḍi ocokʼa. Onḍe do rakʼjoṅ ar togocʼ ḍaṭa hoyokʼa.’’
Jisu do subedare metadea, “Do calakʼme. Ar cetʼlekam pạtiạu akan onkage baṛe hoyokʼma.” Ar ṭhik unrege uniren guti doe bogeyena.
Inạ tayom Jisu do Patrasakʼ oṛakʼte senkateye ńelkeda, Patrasren hanhartetʼ doe ruạkʼkana ar uni doe giticʼ akana.
Jisu do uniakʼ tiye joṭetʼketʼtaea ar inạtege ruạ do chuṭạu gotʼentaea. Ar unre beretʼkate uni do Jisui sapʼsoradea.
Ạyupʼen khan ạḍi utạr bhut capaṛ hoṛ do uni ṭhenko ạguketʼkoa. Ar moca kathatege uni do bhutkoe oḍok giḍiketʼkoa ar okoeko ruạkʼkan tahẽkan onko hõe bogeketʼkoa.
Noa do hoyena Jesaea nạbi hotete roṛlenakʼ katha jemon purạukʼ: Uni do aboakʼ sanam nijorakʼkoe hataoketʼ tabona, ar aboakʼ rogkoe ocokʼketʼ tabona.
Ado Jisu acʼ beṛhaete ạḍi utạr hoṛkoakʼ bhiṛe ńelketʼ khan celako doreão hanasa calakʼ lạgitʼe hukumatʼkoa.
Unre mitʼṭen sostor baḍae hoṛ do Jisu ṭhen hecʼenteye menkeda, “E Guru, jãhãtegem calakʼ iń hõ onḍegeń calakʼa.”
Jisu do uniye metadea, “Toyokoakʼ do bhugạkʼ menakʼtakoa ar cẽṛẽkoakʼ hõ tukạ menakʼa, menkhan Manwa Hoponakʼ do bohokʼ dohoetae lạgitʼ jaega hõ bạnukʼtaea.”
Ado celako modren eṭagicʼ do hecʼkateye menkeda, “E Probhu, ạpuń topaye lạgitʼ sen maṛaṅ ocowạńme.”
Jisu do uniye metadea, “Gocʼkoge akoren gocʼko topa ocoakome, menkhan am do iń pańjańme.”
Ado Jisu lạukạreye decʼen khan uniren celako hõ uni sãoteko calaoena.
Ar ackage doreãore birbão hecʼgotʼena, onate lạukạ do ḍheokote uḍucʼ ḍubujokʼ ehopʼena. Menkhan Jisu doe jạpitʼ akatʼ tahẽkana.
Unre celako do uni ṭhen hecʼkate beretʼ kedeteko metadea, “E Probhu, bańcao bonme; gujukʼkana bon.”
Uni doe metatʼkoa, “E nase pạtiạukʼko, cedakʼpe botorokʼ kana?” Inạ tayom beretʼkate uni do hoe ar doreãoe dhomkaokeda. Ar unre sanamakʼ do ḍel ḍel thir hapeyena.
Noa ńelte celako do hahaṛayenteko menkeda, “Nui doe okalekan hoṛ kante, hoe hõ hoe ar doreão hõ doreãokin bataoetʼtaea!”
Inạ tayom Jisu do doreão hanasa Gadarikoakʼ elakateye calaoena. Unre bạṛicʼ jiu capaṛ akatʼkin barhoṛ do mạ̃ṛĩ poḍa khon oḍokente Jisu ṭhenkin hecʼena.

Unkin do nonkan haḍrapkin tahẽkana, ona horte okoe hõ bako parom daṛeakʼkan tahẽkana. Ado kikiạuatekin menkeda, “E Isorren Hopon, ale tulucʼ amakʼ do cetʼ? Okte ạuri hoyokʼrege sasetle lạgitʼem hecʼakana?”
Onko khon thoṛa sạṅgiń ńokʼre ạḍi utạr sukriko ạtińkan tahẽkana.
Bạṛicʼ jiuko do Jisu nehõradeteko metadea, “Oḍok giḍikalem menetʼkan khan enḍekhan onko pal sukrire kolkaleme.”
Jisui metatʼkoa, “Do calakʼpe.” Ar unrege onko doko oḍokente sukrikoreko boloyena. Onate onko sukri do daṛaṅ secʼteko ńir senente doreão dakʼreko gad gadao pheḍena arko unum gocʼena.
Ar okoekoko gupikan tahẽkan onko do atoteko ńir senente jotowakʼko lạikeda. Ḍherkaete onko do bhut capaṛ akatʼkin hoṛ reaṅko lạikeda.
Unre atoren hoṛko Jisu tulucʼ ńapamokʼ lạgitʼko oḍok hecʼena. Arko ńapamkede khan akoakʼ elaka khon senokʼ lạgitʼko nehõradea.
Inạ tayom Jisu do lạukạreye decʼena ar doreão paromkate acʼakʼ nagrahateye hecʼena.
Unre hoṛko do jaṛao akan mitʼṭen mitʼkaṛ gocʼ rog hoṛ do parkomte uni ṭhenko ạgukedea. Jisu do onko hoṛkoakʼ pạtiạu ńelte rugiye metadea, “Diljoṅ me. Amakʼ kại do ikạyen tama.”
Noa iạte sostor baḍaeko modre adom hoṛ do mone moneteko menkeda, “Nui hoṛ do Isore opomane kana.”
Jisu do onkoakʼ mon reakʼ hudisakʼkoe baḍaeketʼ khane metatʼkoa, “Mone monte bạṛicʼakʼ do cedakʼpe hudiseda?
Okaṭakʼ roṛ algawa, ‘Amakʼ kại ikạyentama,’ se ‘beretʼkate taṛamme?’
Menkhan ape jemonpe baḍae daṛeakʼ Manwa Hopon do dhạrtire kại ikạ reakʼ ektiạri menakʼtaea.” Ado noa menkate mitʼ kaṛ gocʼ rog hoṛe metadea, “Ma beretʼme, amakʼ parkom kuṭuṅtam ar oṛakʼte calakʼme.”
Unre uni doe beretʼena ar acʼakʼ oṛakʼteye calaoena.
Ar hoṛko do noa ńelte botor caṛhaoatʼkoa, ar manwa nonkan ektiạriye emakawadete Isor sarhaoeko ehopʼena.

Jisu onḍe khone calakʼkan tahẽkan jokhecʼ Mathaeko metae mitʼ hoṛ do mạsul uṭhạu oṛakʼre duṛupʼ akane ńelkedea. Jisu do uniye metadea, “Dela ińren cela hoyokʼme.” Ar unrege Mathae doe beretʼente Jisui pańjakedea.
Inạ tayom Jisu do Mathaeakʼ oṛakʼre jojome duṛupʼena. Unre ạḍi utạr mạsul uṭhạuko ar bạṛicʼ hoṛko hõ hecʼkate Jisu ar uniren celako sãote jom lạgitʼko duṛupʼ panteyena.
Ona ńelte Phạrusiko do Jisuren celakoko metatʼkoa, “Aperen Guru do mạsul uṭhạuko ar bạṛicʼ hoṛko tulucʼ cedakʼe jom ńũiyeda?”
Noa katha ańjomkate Jisui menkeda, “Boge hoṛkoakʼ do raranicʼ reakʼ jạruṛ bạnukʼtakoa, menkhan ruạkʼko lạgitʼ do jạruṛgea.
Iń do mãyãgeń kusiyakʼ kana, dãṛẽ do baṅ, sonot sostorre noa katha reakʼ mane do cetʼ kana mente ona baṛe ḍunḍhạupe. Ente dhorom hoṛ hohoako lạgitʼ do baṅ, menkhan kại hoṛko lạgitʼgeń hecʼakana.”
Tayomte Johanren celako do Jisu ṭhen hecʼkateko menkeda, “Ale ar Phạrusiko dole upạseda, menkhan amren celako do cedakʼ bako upạseda?”
Jisui metatʼkoa, “Jãwãe beṭa soṅgere tahen tulucʼ cetʼ bạriạtko doko bhabnakokʼa? Menkhan okte hijukʼ kana jãwãe beṭa do onko khone idiocokʼa. Ar unre onko doko upạsa.
“Okoe hõ mare aṅgropre nawa kicricʼ do bako tạli jalada, ente ona mare kicricʼ khon nawa tạliakʼ do oṛecʼ hijukʼa ar onate oṛecʼ do arhõ lạṭukʼa.

Mare kumkore nawa darkha rasa do bako dohoea. Arko dohoe khan kumko do oṛejokʼa ar darkha rasa do buhel giḍikʼa ar kumko hõ nosṭokʼa; Onate nawa darkha rasa do nawa kumregeko dohoea, inạ khan banarge mońj tahena.”
Jisu noakoe galmarao akokan tahẽkanre Jihudikoren mitʼṭen mukhiạ hoṛ do hecʼkate ḍobokʼadeteye metadea, “Hoponerań do ńitgeye gocʼena. Menkhan enhõ senkate capoyem, ar inạtege uni doe jiwedokʼa.”
Unre Jisu ar uniren celako do beretʼkate uni soṅgeteko calaoena.
Ona jokhecʼ mitʼṭen maejiu do tayom secʼ khon hecʼkate Jisuakʼ oyon ańcare joṭetʼketʼtaea. Ente uni do gelbar bochor khon pordhol ruạteye jạbun akan tahẽkana.
Uni do mone moneteye hudisokʼkan tahẽkana, eken uniakʼ kicricʼe joṭetʼ tiyokʼ lekhangeye boge utạrokʼa.
Jisu do ạcurente uni ńel ńamkedeteye metadea, “E mạ̃i dil joṅme. Amakʼ pạtiạugeye bogeakatʼmea.” Ar inạ ghuṛi khonge maejiu doe boge utạrena.
Inạ tayom Jisu do Jihudikoren uni mukhiạ hoṛakʼ oṛakʼteye calaoena. Onḍe do tạriạ oroṅko ar hoṛko kạuạ rạuạkʼkane ńelketʼkoa.
Onate Jisui metatʼkoa, “Ape do bahrete oḍokokʼpe. Kuṛi do bae gocʼakana, ekene jạpitʼ akada.” Noa katha ańjomkate onko doko landa dhutʼadea.
Ado hoṛkoko oḍok ocoyen khan bhitrite bolokate uni do kuṛiyakʼ tiye sapʼkeda. Ar inạtege kuṛi doe beretʼena.
Ar noa katha do ona elaka reakʼ sanam jaegare pasnao idiyena.
Ado Jisu onḍe khone calakʼkan tahẽkan jokhecʼ barea kãṛã hoṛ do unikin pańjakedea. Ar ãṭ aṛaṅte hohoatekin menkeda, “E Dạudren Hopon, mãyãwạlińme.”
Jisu oṛakʼteye boloyen khan unkin kãṛã hoṛ hõ uni ṭhenkin hecʼena. Unre Jisui metatʼkinạ, “Pạtiạukʼkangea ben, noań daṛeakʼa mente?” Unkin kin menkeda, “Hẽ Probhu.”
Uni do mẽtʼ joṭetʼketʼ tạkinteye metatʼkinạ, “Aben cetʼleka ben pạtiạu akan, onkage hoyokʼma baṛe.”
Unre unkinakʼ mẽtʼ do beṅgetʼen tạkina. Ar Jisu do sontorketʼ kinteye metatʼkinạ,
“Ńel ben, okoe ṭhen hõ alo ben lại baṛaea.” Menkhan unkin do bahrete senkate ona elaka reakʼ sanam jaegakore uniakʼ sombat kin lạikeda.
Unkin hoṛkin calakʼkan tahẽkan jokhecʼ hoṛko do bhut capaṛ akawade mitʼṭen guṅgạ hoṛ Jisu ṭhenko ạgukedea.
Jisu do bhute oḍok giḍikade khan uni hoṛ do roroṛe ehopʼena. Onate sanam hoṛ do hahaṛayenteko menkeda, “Israel disạmre nonka do ar tishõ baṅ ńelakana.”
Unre Phạrusikoko menkeda, “Bhutkoren sordar hotete uni do bhutkoe oḍok giḍiyetʼkoa.”
Jisu do nagraha nagraha ar ato ato senkate sunạgogkore cetʼako ar serma raj reakʼ bhage sombat porcarakoe ehopʼena. Ona chaḍa sanam lekan ruạ hasokoe bogeyetʼtako tahẽkana.
Uni do gadel hoṛe ńelketʼko khan mãyã hecʼadea, ente onko do gupiyicʼ begor bhiḍi leka laṅga arko asokʼ ṭayokʼ akan tahẽkana.
Unre celakoe metatʼkoa, “Phosol do ḍhergea menkhan kạmiạko doko thoṛagea.
Onate phosolren mạlik ṭhen nehõrokʼpe jemon uni do phosol samṭao lạgitʼ hoṛe kolko.”
Jisu do acʼren gelbar celakoe hohoatʼkoa ar bạṛicʼ jiu oḍok giḍikako ar sanam lekan rog bighinko bogey reakʼ ektiạriye ematʼkote onkoe kolkatʼkoa.
Onko gelbar apostolkoakʼ ńutum do nõkʼõe nonka; pạhil do Patrasko metae Simon, ar uniren boeha Andreas, Sabdaeren hopon Jakob ar uniren boeha Johan, Philip ar Bartholomae;
Thoma ar mạsul-uṭhạuicʼ Mathae; Alphaeren hopon Jakob ar Thaddae;
Moulobadi Simon ar okoe do Jisu bạiriko ṭhene soprot ocolede uni Jihudi Iskoriạt.
Jisu do onko gelbarko noa hukumatʼkoteye kolketʼkoa, “Boṅgan hoṛ jạtrenko ṭhen do alope calakʼa ar Samariạkoakʼ okaṭakʼ atote hõ alope bolokʼa,
menkhan Israel jạtren atʼakan bhiḍiko ṭhen calakʼpe.
Ar calakʼ calakʼte noa porcarpe, serma raj do sorakana.
Ona chaḍa rugiko bogekope, gocʼko jiwetʼkope, murhucʼ jom hoṛ bogekope ar bạṛicʼ jiuko oḍok giḍikope. Ape do begor damtepe ńamakada, begor damtege emakope.
Apeakʼ ḍanḍa totolakʼre sona, rupạ se tama reakʼ poesa hõ alope soṅge tora joṅa.
Horte lạgitʼ jãhã lekan thuli hõ alo, babar goṭen aṅgrop hõ alo, panahi se ṭheṅga hõ alo, ente okoeye kạmi uni do jojom ar ńũiyakʼ ńam lek kanae.
“Jãhãṭakʼ nagraha se atotepe bolokʼre onḍenicʼ mitʼṭen mukhiạ hoṛ ńamepe ar eṭakʼte ạuripe oḍokʼ calakʼ hạbicʼ uniakʼ oṛakʼrege tahenpe.
Ar ona oṛakʼtepe bolokʼre oṛakʼrenko joharakope.
Judi ona oṛakʼ lekgepe bujhạu enḍekhan apeakʼ suluk do ona oṛakʼre paṛaokʼma. Menkhan ona oṛakʼ lek leka bape bujhạu enḍekhan apeakʼ suluk do ape ṭhenge ruạṛ hijukʼma.
Jãhãe bako ataṅpe se apeakʼ kathako bako ańjom enḍekhan ona oṛakʼ se ato khonpe oḍokokʼre apeakʼ jaṅga reakʼ dhuṛi hõ koṭa giḍi oṭokakʼpe.
Sạrigeń metapekana, bicạr dinre ona nagraha reakʼ khon Sodom ar Gomora reakʼge boroṅ ḍher sahaokʼa.
“Ńelpe, iń do hunḍạrko talare bhiḍiko lekań koletʼpea. Onate biń leka husiạrokʼpe ar parwa leka soṛa hoyokʼpe.
Sontor akae tahenpe, ente maraṅ bạisiren hoṛkoakʼ tireko soprotpea ar onkoakʼ sunạgogkoreko dalpea.
Iń khạtirte disạm calaoko ar rapajko ṭhenko idipea, jemon onko ar boṅgan hoṛ jạtrenko ṭhen gohape em daṛeakʼ.
Hoṛkoko soprot lepere alope bhabnakʼa cetʼ leka se cetʼkope roṛa mente. Ente cetʼko roroṛ hoyokʼa ona do unregepe lại ocokʼa.
Ape do roroṛko dope baṅkana, menkhan aperen Baba Isorren Jiuge ape bhitrite kathae roṛa.
“Boeha do boehattetʼe soprotea gocʼ ocoye lạgitʼ ar apat do hopontetʼ, ar hoponko do go-baba upạrteko teṅgona arko gocʼ ocokoa.
Iń khạtirte sanam hoṛko hirkhạwapea, menkhan okoe mucạtʼ hạbicʼ ṭarhaoe tahen unigeye bańcaokʼa.
Mitʼ nagrahare santao arko khedlepere eṭakʼ nagrahate dạṛpe. Sạrigeń metapekana, Israel disạm reakʼ sanam nagraha ar atokore ạuripe kạmi purạurege Manwa Hopon doe hijukʼa.
“Guru khon cela do bae maraṅa, ar kisạ̃ṛ khon golam hõ baṅ.
Cela lạgitʼ do niạge ḍhera acʼren guru lekae hoyokʼ ar golam hõ acʼren kisạ̃ṛ leka. Oṛakʼren kisạ̃ṛge Beelsebulko metaekan khan gharońjrenko do tinạkʼ artetʼgeko metakoa.
“Onate alope botorakoa, ente danaṅ reakʼ sanamakʼ do sodorokʼa ar oko reakʼ joto do baḍaeokʼa.
Okaṭakʼ ńutreń lại apekan, ona do marsalre roṛpe. Ar luturte okaṭakʼpe ańjometʼkan ona do sạṛim cetan khon porcarpe.
Okoe eken hoṛmo motoko gocʼ daṛeakʼ menkhan jiwi do baṅ onko do alope botorakoa. Menkhan okoe hoṛmo ar jiwi banarge norokre marao lạgitʼ daṛe menakʼtae unige botoraepe.
Barea ghaṛwa cẽṛẽ do cetʼ thoṛa damte bạkin ạkhrińokʼ kana? Enre hõ aperen Baba Isorakʼ hukum chaḍa onko modre mitʼṭen hõ otre bae ńurokʼa;
Apeakʼ ma bohokʼ reakʼ upʼ hõ lekha akantape.
Onate alope botorokʼa. Ente aema aema ghaṛwa cẽṛẽko khon hõ apeakʼ dam do ḍher bạ̃ṛtigetapea.
“Jãhãege hoṛko samaṅre ińe aṅgociń iń hõ ińren sermare menae Baba samaṅre uniń aṅgocea.
Menkhan okoe hoṛko samaṅre ińe baṅeń iń hõ ińren sermare menae Baba samaṅre uniń baṅea.
“Dhạrtite suluk emokʼiń hecʼakana mente alope hudisa. Suluk emokʼ do bạń hecʼakana bickom tarwaṛege.
Hopon do apat birudre ar hoponera do eṅgat birudre ar bạhu kuṛi do hanhartetʼ birudre teṅgoko lạgitʼgeń hecʼakana.
Ar hoṛren bạiri do acʼ gharońjren hoṛgeko hoyokʼtaea.
“Jãhãege, gogo se baba iń khon bạ̃ṛtiye dulạṛkin uni do ińre lek doe baṅkana. Ar jãhãe acʼren gidrạko iń khon bạ̃ṛtiye dulạṛko uni hõ ińre lek doe baṅkana.
Okoe acʼakʼ krus gokʼkate bae pańjayiń uni hõ iń lek doe baṅkana.
Okoe acʼakʼ jiwi baṅcaoe menjoṅ uni do sạriakʼ reakʼ jione adtaea. Menkhan okoe iń lạgitʼ acʼakʼ jiwiye adtae uni do sạriakʼ reakʼ jione rukhiyạutaea.
“Okoe apeko ataṅpe onko do ińgeko ataṅediń kana; ar okoe ińe ataṅediń kan uni do kol akadińicʼgeye ataṅede kana.

Mitʼṭen nạbi jãhãege nạbi menteye ataṅe, enḍekhan nạbi okaṭakʼ kuṛạiye ńam, uni hõ ona kuṛạigeye ńama. Isor sewawae hoṛ jãhãege Isor sewawae hoṛ menteye ataṅe enḍekhan Isor sewawae hoṛ oka kuṛạiye ńam, uni hõ ona kuṛạigeye ńama.
Jãhãege noko kạṭicʼko modre mitʼ hoṛ ińren cela mente mitʼ bạṭi reaṛ dakʼe ńu ocoye; sạrigeń metapekana, uni do oka lekate hõ acʼakʼ kuṛại do ohoe atʼletaea.”
Jisu do acʼren gelbar celako hukumakoe mucạtʼketʼ khan, uni do ato ato cetʼako ar porcar lạgitʼ onḍe khone oḍok calaoena.
Johan do hajotre tahenrege Mạsiakʼ kạmiko reaṅe ańjomketʼ khan acʼren celako kolketʼkoteye kulikedea,
“Okoeakʼ hijukʼ reakʼ katha menakʼtae uni dom am kangea, se eṭakʼgicʼle ńel horea?”
Jisui roṛ ruạṛatʼkoa, “Okakope ńeletʼ arpe ańjometʼ onako senkate Johan lạiaepe.
Kãṛã hoṛko ńeńelkana, leḍha hoṛko taṛameda, murhucʼ jom hoṛko bogekʼkana ar kala hoṛko ańjomeda; gocʼ hoṛko jiwetʼ beredokʼkana ar reṅgecʼ orecʼko ṭhen do bhage sombat reakʼ katha lạiạgokʼ kana.
Bhạgangeae uni do okoe ińre bae tạkijokʼkan.”
Ado Johanren celakoko ruạṛ calakʼkan tahẽkanre, Jisu do gadel hoṛko Johan reaṅ lạiakoe ehopʼena, “Hahaṅkarte do cetʼ ńeńelpe oḍok senlena? Hoete hilạukʼkan chuchi?
Se, cetʼ ńeńelpe oḍok calaolena? Mońj kicricʼe horokʼ akatʼ mitʼhoṛ ńeńel? Sạrige okoe mońj kicricʼko horokʼetʼkan onko do rajakʼ oṛakʼreko tahenkana.
Se cetʼ ńeńelpe oḍok senlena? Jãhãe nạbi? Hẽ, metapekạnạń, uni do nạbi khon hõe maraṅgea.
Johan doe uni kana one okoe reaṅ sostorre olakan: Ńelme, ińren goḍet do am lahateń kolekana, uni do am lahate senkate amakʼ hore teara.
Sạrigeń metapekana, maejiuko khon janam akan modre Johan bạbạptisicʼ khon maraṅ do okoe hõ bạnukʼkoa. Menkhan serma rajre okoe do joto khone huḍińge uni hõ Johan khon doe maraṅgea.
Johan bạbạptisicʼakʼ okte khon ńit hạbicʼ serma raj doko jormoṭetʼ kana, ar okoeko jormoṭetʼkan onkoge ona doko recʼjoṅ kana.
Ente joto nạbi ar ạn do Johan hạbicʼgeko nạbileda.
Noa kathape pạtiạuakʼkan khan enḍekhan ańjompe okoeakʼ hijukʼ reakʼ katha tahẽkan uni Eliạ doe nui Johan kangea.
Ańjom lạgitʼ lutur menakʼtaeicʼ doe ańjomma.”
“Niạ piṛhiren hoṛ do okoe tulucʼ iń jurikekoa? Onko do nonkan gidrạko lekanako okoe do bajarre duṛupʼkate eṭakʼ gidrạko hohoateko metakokan,
‘ale do ape lạgitʼ tiriole oroṅkeda, menkhan bape enecʼlena; homor halaṅ kedale, ar koṛam hõ bape ceṭakʼlena.’
Johan do hecʼkate jom hõ bae jometʼ tahẽkana ar ńũ hõ bae ńũyetʼ tahẽkana, onate hoṛko meneda unire do bhut menaea.

Ar Manwa Hopon do hecʼkateye jom-ńũyetʼte hoṛkoko meneda, ‘hạni ńelepe, mitʼṭen lebṛa ar darkha rasa hoṅgoricʼ, mạsul uṭhạuko ar bạṛicʼ hoṛkoren gate.’ Menkhan ạkil je khạṭige ona reakʼ porman do acʼakʼ kạmikorege menakʼa.”
Ado Jisu okako ato ar nagrahakore ḍher hahaṛa kạmikoe kạmiletʼ onako jaegaren hoṛko do mon bako ạcurletʼtakoa. Onate uni do onako jaega nisṛạue ehopʼena,

“Hae amre, E Khorashin, hae amre E Bethsaeda! Aben talare oka hahaṛa kạmiko hoeakan, ona do Tur ar Sidon reakʼ nagrahare hoelen khan ḍher din laharege onko do gõṛẽ kicricʼ horokʼkate ar torocʼre duṛupʼkate kại khon monko ạcurketakoa.
Sạrigeń metaben kana, bicạr dinre abenakʼ khon Tur ar Sidon reakʼge boroṅ sahaokʼa.

Ar E am Kaparnạhum! Baṅ do serma hạbicʼem usul ocokokʼ? Tishõ baṅa, am do patal puri hạbicʼem ńurhạ ocokʼa. Okako hahaṛa kạmi amre hoeakan, ona Sodomre hoelen khan enḍekhan teheń hạbicʼ tahẽkokʼa honaṅ.
Sạrigeń metaben kana, bicạr dinre abenakʼ khon boroṅ Sodom reakʼge ḍher sahaokʼa.”
Ona tayom Jisui menkeda, “E Baba, ot ar sermaren Probhu. Amiń sarhaoetʼmea, ente am do ạkilan ar budanko ṭhen khon noako reaṅ dom oko dohoakada, menkhan kạṭicʼ gidrạ lekanko ṭhen dom sodor akada.
Hẽ Baba, amakʼ sana lekage noa do hoeakana.

“Ińren Baba do sanamakʼge ińakʼ tireye jimạ akada. Baba chaḍa Hopon do okoe hõ bako baḍaeyede kana ar Hopon chaḍa Baba hõ okoege bako baḍaeyedea, Hopon okoe ṭhen Baba sodoreye menjoṅkan unige uni doe baḍaeyea.
“Ape okoe do laṅga ar bojhatepe ten akan, dela iń ṭhen hijukʼpe, ińgeń jirạu ocopea.
Ińakʼ ãrãṛ gogpe ar iń ṭhen khon cetʼ joṅpe, ente iń do mạ̃hir ariń nindhạngea.
Onate ontorre jirạupe ńama, ente ińakʼ ãrãṛ do algagea ar ińakʼ bojha do rawalgea.”
Mitʼ din Jisu do phosol talateye calakʼkan tahẽkana. Ona din do jirạukʼ mãhã tahẽkana. Uniren celako do reṅgecʼetʼko tahẽkante gele hotʼkate jojomko ehopʼena.
Ona ńelte Phạrusiko do Jisuko metadea, “Ńelme, dhorom reakʼ niạm lekate jirạukʼ mãhãre okaṭakʼ lek baṅkan amren celako do onageko kạmiyeda.”
Jisui metatʼkoa, “Dạud ar uniren soṅgetenko tinre reṅgecʼletʼkoa unre onko do cetʼko cekaleda mente ona do cetʼ bape paṛhao akada? Uni ma Isorakʼ oṛakʼre bolokate samaṅ akatʼ piṭhạ coṅe jomletʼ.
Dạud ar uniren soṅgetenko do ona jojom lek baṅ tahẽkantakoa, eken naekekoge ona doko jometʼ tahẽkana.
Ona chaḍa Moseakʼ ạn-ạrikore cetʼ bape paṛhao akada, jirạukʼ mãhãre mundilren naeke do jirạukʼ mãhã reakʼ ạnko rạputʼlerehõ onkoakʼ do dos baṅ hoyokʼtakoa mente?
Ińiń metapekana, nonḍe do mundil khon hõ mitʼṭen maraṅicʼge menaea.
‘Iń do mãyãgeń kusiyakʼ kana, dãṛẽ do baṅ’ sostor reakʼ noa kathape baḍaele khan honaṅ begor dos akatʼ hoṛ do ohope doslekoa.
Baḍaekakʼpe, Manwa Hopon kangeae jirạukʼ mãhãren mạlik do.
Inạ tayom Jisu do ona jaega bạgikate onko Phạrusikoakʼ sunạgogteye boloyena.
Onḍe do mitʼṭen hoṛe tahẽkana one okoe do mitʼ ti borocʼge tahẽkantae. Phạrusiko do uniko kulikedea, “Dhorom reakʼ niạm lekate jirạukʼ mãhãre jãhãe bogeye do ganokʼgea?”
Jisui metatʼkoa, “Ape modre jãhãeren mitʼṭen bhiḍiye tahentae, ar jirạukʼ mãhãre khạ̃yũkʼreye ńurlenre uni do cetʼ bae tul rakabea?
Bhiḍi khon manwa do artetʼge cetʼ bae sorosa? Onate jirạukʼ mãhãre bhage kạmi do lek kangea.”
Ona tayom uni hoṛe metadea, “Amakʼ ti tiạrtam.” Ado tiye tiạrketʼ khan dosarakʼ lekage hoyentaea.
Unre Phạrusiko do barhete oḍok senkate Jisu goje lạgitʼ soṛojontroko dhurạuena.
Ado ona soṛojontroe baḍaeketʼ khan Jisu do onḍe khone oḍok calaoena. Unre gadel hoṛ do uniko pańja idikedea.
Ar onko modre okoe do rugiko tahẽkan onko sanamkoe bogeketʼkoa ar acʼ reaṅ alo lại baṛae lạgitʼe sontorkatʼkoa.
Noa do hoeyena Jesaea nạbi hotete roṛlenakʼ katha jemon purạukʼ:
Ńelpe, ińren guti one uniń bachao akade, unige ińren dulạṛiạ, one unireń kusi akan. Ińren Jiu do unireń dohoyea, uni do boṅgan hoṛ jạtrenko ṭhen hok reakʼ bicạre lại jạhira.
Uni do bae jhogṛakʼa ar bae kikiạukʼa; kulhikore acʼakʼ aṛaṅ bae ańjom ocoetaea.
Hok reakʼ bicạrko ạuriye jitạu ocoe hạbicʼ, uni do talga tạwạkʼ akan chuci bae rạpuda, ar ńuṛuṅ ńuṛuṅokʼkan diuhe hõ bae ĩṛĩja.
Ar porjạtrenko do uniakʼ ńutumreko bhorsakʼa.
Inạ tayom bhut capaṛ akawade mitʼṭen hoṛ do Jisu ṭhenko ạgukedea. Uni do guṅgạ ar kãṛãgeye tahẽkana. Ar Jisu do uniye bogekedea.
Onate uni hoṛ do roroṛe ehopʼena ar ńeńel daṛeye ńamkeda. Unre sanam hoṛ do hahaṛayenteko menkeda, “Nui do cetʼ Dạudren hopon kanae?”
Noa katha ańjomkate Phạrusikoko menkeda, “Nui do bhutkoren raj Beelsebul hotete bhutkoe oḍok giḍiyetʼkoa.”

Jisu do Phạrusikoakʼ mone joṅakʼkoe baḍaeketʼ khane metatʼkoa, “Okaṭakʼ rajosṭi apnar talare hạṭińokʼ ona rajosṭi do marao utạrokʼa. Ar okaṭakʼ nagraha se gharońj apnar talare hạṭińokʼ ona nagraha se gharońj hõ baṅ ṭikạukʼa.
Soetan do Soetane oḍok giḍiye khan uni do apnar bhitriregeye hạṭińokʼa. Enḍekhan uniakʼ rajosṭi do cekate ṭikạukʼtaea?
Iń do Beelsebul hotete bhutkoń oḍok giḍiyetʼko khan aperen hoṛko do okoe hoteteko oḍokketʼkoa? Onate ṭhikpe meneda se baṅ, ona do aperen hoṛgeko bicạra.
Menkhan Isorren Jiu hotete bhutkoń oḍok giḍiyetʼko khan enḍekhan Isorakʼ raj do apere hecʼakana.
“Daṛe menakʼtae hoṛ do pạhilre baṅ tol maṛaṅ lekhan uniakʼ oṛakʼre bolokate cetʼ jãhãe jiniskoe luṭ daṛeketaea? Menkhan uniye tol maṛaṅ lekhan doe daṛeakʼgea.
“Okoe iń secʼrene baṅkan uni do iń birudren kanae. Okoe iń sãote bae samṭao uni doe chiṭiạua.
Noa iạteń metapekana, manwakoakʼ joto lekan kại ar Isor birudre opoman katha do ikạkʼtaea, menkhan sonot Jiu birudre opoman katha do baṅ ikạkʼtakoa.
Manwa Hopon birudre jãhãege jãhãnakʼe roṛ ona do ikạkʼtaea, menkhan sonot Jiu birudre kathae roṛlekhan baṅ ikạkʼtaea, niạ jugre hõ baṅ ar darakan jugre hõ baṅ.
“Noa katha do aṅgocpe je, dare bhage ge khan jo hõ bhage hoyokʼa, ar dare bạṛicʼge khan jo hõ bạṛicʼge hoyokʼa; ente jotege dare do oromokʼa.
E bińren bõsko! Apepe bạṛicʼgere hõ cekate bhageakʼ kathakope roṛ daṛeakʼ kana? Ente ontorre oka sareṛokʼ, onage moca doe roṛa.
Bhage hoṛ do acʼakʼ bhageakʼ khon bhageakʼgeye oḍoka, ar bạṛicʼ hoṛ do acʼakʼ bạṛicʼ babaeakʼ khon bạṛicʼakʼgeye oḍoka.
Menkhan ińiń metapekana, okoe ạuṛi sạuṛi kathako roṛ, onko do bicạr dinre akoakʼ mimitʼ katha reakʼ lekha jokha emokʼ hoyokʼtakoa.
Amakʼ kathatege am do bin dusạnicʼ mentem ṭarhaokʼa ar amakʼ kathategem dusi ocokʼa.”
Inạ tayom adom sostor baḍaeko ar Phạrusiko do Jisuko metadea, “E Guru, ale do am ṭhen khon mitʼṭen cinhạle ńela.”
Jisui metatʼkoa, “Niạ bạṛicʼ ar laṭghaṭ piṛhirenko do cinhạko khojkana, menkhan Jona nạbiakʼ cinhạ chaḍa eṭakʼ ar cetʼ cinhạ hõ baṅ udukʼakoa.
Cetʼ leka Jona do maraṅ hako lacʼre pe siń ar pe ńindạye tahẽkan, onkage Manwa Hopon hõ pe siń ar pe ńindạ ot bhitrireye tahena.

Bicạr dinre Niniwe nagraharen hoṛko do beretʼkate noa piṛhiren hoṛkoakʼ doskoko uduga, ente Niniweren hoṛ do Jona nạbiakʼ porcarte akoakʼ kại khon monko ạcurletʼtakoa. Ar ńelpe, nonḍe do Jona khon hõ maraṅicʼge menaea.

Bicạr dinre dạkhin disạmren rạni do beretʼkate noa piṛhiren hoṛko doskoe udukʼakoa, ente Solomon rajakʼ ạkilanakʼ kathako ańjom lạgitʼ dhạrti reakʼ mucạtʼ khon uni doe hecʼlena. Ar ńelpe, nonḍe do Solomon khon hõ maraṅicʼge menaea.
“Bạṛicʼ jiu do jãhãe manwa khone oḍok calaolenre jirạu ńam lạgitʼ khaṅgoṭ jaegakoreye ạcur baṛaea.
Menkhan bae ńamle khan uni doe mena, ‘oka khoniń oḍok hecʼakan ińakʼ ona oṛakʼtegeń ruạṛ calakʼa.’ Ar ruạṛ hecʼkate ona oṛakʼ do ạjạuṛige, jokʼ cikạ̃ṛ ar sajaoakatʼe ńama.

Tayomte uni bạṛicʼ jiu do senkate acʼ khon artetʼ bạṛicʼ eae goṭen eṭakʼ jiue soṅge darajoṅa ar onḍe bolokateko mạnḍiạukʼa. Onate uni hoṛakʼ dosa do pạhil khon artetʼ bạṛicʼ hoyokʼtaea. Noa bạṛicʼ piṛhiren hoṛkoakʼ dosa hõ onkage hoyokʼtakoa.”
Jisu do tinre onko gadel hoṛe galmarao akokan tahẽkana unre ńelpe, eṅgat ar boehakotae do acʼ tulucʼ galmarao lạgitʼ bahrereko teṅgo akan tahẽkana.
Unre mitʼ hoṛ do hecʼkate uniye metadea. “Ńelme, eṅgam ar boehamteko do am tulucʼ galmarao lạgitʼ bahrereko teṅgo akana.”
Unre Jisu do uniye metadea, “Okoe kanae eṅgạń, ar okoe kanako boehań do?”
Uni do acʼren celako udukʼketʼkoteye menkeda, “Noko ńelkom, ińren eṅgạń ar boehańko do;
ente okoe sermare menae Babawakʼ mone lekako senokʼ, onkoge ińren boehań, miserań ar eṅgạń kanako.”
Enhilokʼge Jisu do oṛakʼ khon oḍok senkate doreão aṛereye duṛupʼena.
Ar acʼ ṭhen ạḍi utạr hoṛko jarwayen khan, uni do mitʼṭen lạukạre decʼkateye duṛupʼena, ar sanam hoṛ do ḍhipreko teṅgo tahẽyena.
Unre uni do phenkote ạḍi lekan sikhnạt emakoe ehopʼena.
Uni doe metatʼkoa, “Mitʼṭen casa hoṛ do itạ erokʼe oḍok calaoena. Ar erokʼ jokhecʼ adomakʼ itạ do hor aṛere ńurena ar cẽṛẽko hecʼkate onako halaṅ jomkeda. Ar adomakʼ itạ do cạṭạni hasare ńurena.
Onḍe do dạriạ hasa baṅ tahẽkana. Ar dạriạ hasa baṅ tahẽkante itạ do usạrage janam rakapʼtʼena,
menkhan siń candoe rakapʼen khan ona do tolmocʼ cabayena ar mońjte rehetʼ baṅ bạisạulente rohoṛ kạrcupʼena.
Arhõ adomakʼ itạ do jạnum jhạwạ talare ńurena. Ar jạnumko hara rakapʼen khan onakoe jhurkeda.
Ar adomakʼ itạ do bhage hasare ńurente adom do mitʼ sae doboṛ, adom do turui gel doboṛ ar adom do pegel doboṛ gele beleyena.”
Ado golpoe lại mucạtʼketʼ khan Jisui menkeda, “Ańjom lạgitʼ lutur menakʼtaeicʼ doe ańjomma.”
Tayomte celako do Jisu ṭhen hecʼsorenteko metadea, “Am do golpoko hotete hoṛko cedakʼem cetʼako kana?”
Uniye roṛ ruạṛatʼkoa, “Ape do serma raj reakʼ okoakʼkope baḍae ocoakana, menkhan onko do baṅ emakatʼkoa.
Ente okoe menakʼtae uni do arhõe em ocokʼa, onate uniakʼ do aema hoyokʼtaea. Menkhan okoeakʼ bạnukʼ uni do oka menakʼtae ona hõe recʼocokʼa.
Noa iạte golpoko hoteteń cetʼako kana, ente onko do ńeńel tulucʼ bako ńeńelkana, ańjom tulucʼ bako ańjomeda ar bujhạu hõ bako bujhạueda.
Noko hotetege Jesaea nạbiakʼ katha do purạukʼ kana: Ańjom dope ańjomgea menkhan bape bujhạua; ńeńel dope ńeńelgea menkhan baṅgepe oroma.

Noko hoṛkoakʼ ontor do goṛdho akana ar lutur hõ tepetʼakan takoa, onko do mẽtʼko jạpitʼ akada, jemon mẽtʼte aloko ńeńel, luturte aloko ańjom ar ontorte aloko bujhạu, ar bogekʼ lạgitʼ iń ṭhen aloko ruạṛ hijukʼ.
“Menkhan ape dope bhạgangea, ente apeakʼ mẽtʼ doe ńeleda, ar apeakʼ lutur doe ańjomeda.
Sạrigeń metapekana, okakope ńeletʼ ona do ạḍi utạr nạbi ar dhorom hoṛko ńeńelko gagojlena menkhan bako ńelleda, ar okakope ańjometʼkan ona hõ ańjomko gagojlena menkhan bako ańjomleda.
“Nõkʼõe enḍekhan casa hoṛakʼ golpo reakʼ bhed ańjompe.
Jãhãege serma rajosṭi reakʼ katha ańjomkatehõ bae bujhạu khan unre Soetan doe hijukʼa ar uniakʼ monre oka katha er akan onae ạtkira. Ona hor aṛere ńurlen itạ reakʼte do nonkan hoṛ reaṅge roṛ akana.
Ar cạṭạni hasare ńuren itạ reakʼte do onko reaṅ roṛ akana okoe do serma raj reakʼ katha ańjomkate unrege rạskạteko ataṅetʼkan,
menkhan onkore mońjte baṅ rehedokʼ kante thoṛa ghuṛi lạgitʼko ṭarhao tahen kana. Ar ona katha khạtirte tinre santao ar khedreko paṛaokʼkana unre onko doko pạcokʼkana.

Jạnum jhạwạre eren itạ reakʼte do nonkanko lạgitʼge roṛ akana okoe do ona kathako ańjomketʼ, menkhan gharońj reakʼ dạndi ar dhon reakʼ mãyãte ona katha doko ten dohokakʼ kana. Onate onkore jãhãn jo do baṅ hoyokʼ kana.
Ar bhage hasare ńuren itạ reakʼte do nonkanko lạgitʼ roṛakana okoe do ona katha ańjomkateko bujhạuetʼkan ar joko emokʼkan. Adom do mitʼ sae doboṛ, adom do turui gel doboṛ, ar adom do pegel doboṛ.”
Uni do cetʼako lạgitʼ arhõ mitʼṭen golpoe lạiatʼkoa. “Serma raj do nonkan mitʼṭen hoṛ lekana, okoe do acʼakʼ goḍare bhage itạye erketʼ.
Menkhan hoṛko jạpitʼ akatʼ tahẽkanre uni hoṛren bạiri doe hecʼena ar guhum talare sama ghãs reakʼ itạ er oṭokateye calaoena.
Ado guhum omonkate geleyen khan ona talare sama ghãs hõ ńelena.
Ona ńelte gutiko do hecʼkate oṛakʼ kisạ̃ṛko metadea, ‘Amakʼ goḍare cetʼ bhage itạ do bam erleda? Enḍekhan sama ghãs do oka khon hecʼena?’
‘‘Uni doe metatʼkoa, ‘jãhãe bạiriye nonka akada.’ ‘‘Gutikoko metadea, ‘enḍekhan ale do cetʼ senkate onakole totʼ giḍikakʼa?’
“Uniye metatʼkoa, alo, ‘ente sama ghãspe jarwaere guhum hõpe totʼ boteja.

Phosol belekʼ hạbicʼ mitʼ dhaote hara ocoakʼpe. Unre samṭao jokhecʼ phosol samṭaokoń metakoa, pạhilre sama ghãs jarwa maṛaṅpe ar ạṭikate begarpe seṅgelre atar giḍi lạgitʼ, menkhan guhum do ińakʼ golare ạgu jarwaepe.’ ”
Jisu do arhõ mitʼṭen phene lạiatʼkoa. “Serma raj do mitʼṭen tuṛi jaṅ lekana, one okaṭakʼ do mitʼ hoṛ idikate acʼakʼ goḍareye erketʼ.
Ona itạ do sanam itạko khon kạṭicʼgere hõ, haralen khan joto aṛakʼ sakam khon lạṭuge hoyokʼa; ar nunạkʼ lạṭu harakʼa je, coṭren cẽṛẽko hõ hecʼkate ona reakʼ dạrkore tukạya.”
Uni do arhõ mitʼṭen golpoe lạiatʼkoa: “Serma raj do khạmi lekana. Mitʼṭen maejiu do ona idikate gel irạl keji holoṅreye sipi mesalkeda. Onate joto holoṅ do khạmianakʼ hoyena.”
Jisu do golpoko hotete hoṛko noa sikhnạte ematʼkoa. Ar golpo begor okaṭakʼ cecetʼakʼ hõ uni do bae emakokan tahẽkana.
Noa do hoyena nạbi hotete roṛlenakʼ katha jemon purạukʼ: Iń do ińakʼ mocate phenkoń lạia; dhạrti etohopʼ khon okako oko tahẽkan, onań lại sodora.
Ona tayom Jisu do onko gadel hoṛkoe bạgiatʼkote oṛakʼteye boloyena. Unre acʼren celako hecʼkateko metadea, “Goḍa reaṅ ona sama ghãs reakʼ bhed baṛe bhoṅaleme.”
Jisui roṛ ruạṛatʼkoa, “Okoe bhage itạye eretʼkan uni doe Manwa Hopon kana.
Goḍa do dhạrti kana ar bhage itạ do serma rajren hoṛ kanako. Ar Soetanren hoṛ doko sama ghãs kana.
Okoe bạiri onae er oṭoletʼ uni doe Soetan kana, ar phosol samṭao okte do jug reakʼ mucạtʼ kana, ar phosol samṭaoko do sermaren goḍetko kanako.
Sama ghãs jarwakate cetʼ leka seṅgelre atar giḍikʼ, onkage jug reakʼ mucạtʼre hõ hoyokʼa. Manwa Hopon do acʼren serma goḍetkoe kolkoa.
Onko do uniakʼ rajosṭi khon sanam tạkicʼakʼ ar sanam bedhorom kạmikan hoṛko jarwa mitʼkoa ar jolokʼkan seṅgelreko khadlekoa.
Onḍe do rakʼjoṅ ar togocʼ ḍaṭa hoyokʼa.
Unre dhorom hoṛ do akoren sermaren Babawakʼ rajre siń cando lekako jhak jhakaokʼa. Ańjom lạgitʼ lutur menakʼtaeicʼ hoṛ doe ańjomma.
“Serma raj do goḍare topa okoakatʼ dhon lekana. Mitʼ hoṛ do ona ńamkate arhõe oko dohokada. Inạ tayom uni do rạskạ monteye calaoena ar acʼakʼ oka tahẽkantae ona joto ạkhrińkate ona goḍae kirińkeda.
“Arhõ serma raj do mitʼṭen bepari hoṛ lekana one okoe do bhage mạnike ńam baṛayetʼ.
Ado mitʼṭecʼ damanakʼ mạnike ńamketʼ khan senkate acʼakʼ cetʼko tahẽkantae ona joto ạkhrińkate uni do mạnike kirińkeda.
“Arhõ serma raj do nonkan mitʼṭen lạtu jhạli lekana one okaṭakʼ do doreãoreko oḍaoketʼte onare joto lekan hakoko jhạliyen.
Ado jhạli perecʼen khan ghuṭuteko or rakapʼkeda. Ar duṛupʼkate bhage hakoko bachaoketʼkote jhuṛireko dohoketʼkoa ar bạṛicʼko doko giḍikatʼkoa.
Onkage jug mucạtʼre hõ hoyokʼa. Serma goḍetko do hecʼkate dhorom hoṛ tala khon bedhoromkoko begarkoa ar jolokʼkan seṅgelreko khadlekoa.
Onḍe do rakʼjoṅ ar togocʼ ḍaṭa hoyokʼa.”
Inạ tayom Jisu do celakoe kuliketʼkoa, “Ape do cetʼ noakope bujhạuetʼkangea?” Metadeako, “Hẽ, bujhạuetʼgeale.”
Unre Jisui metatʼkoa, “Serma raj reaṅko cetʼakawan mitʼke mitʼ sostor baḍaeko do mitʼṭen oṛakʼ kisạ̃ṛ lekan kanako one okoe do acʼakʼ gola khon nawanakʼ ar mareakʼkoe oḍokketʼ.”
Ado Jisu noako golpoe lại mucạtʼketʼ khan onḍe khone uṭhạu calaoena.
Ar inạ tayom do acʼakʼ atote senkate sunạgogre cetʼakoe ehopʼena. Ar uniakʼ katha ańjomkate hoṛko do hahaṛayenteko menkeda, “Noa akel ar hahaṛa kạmiko reakʼ daṛe do oka khone ńamakada?
Nui do cetʼ kaṭmistiriren hopon doe baṅkana? Uniren eṅgat do cetʼ Mạriạm doe baṅkana? Ar uniren boehako do cetʼ Jakob, Joseph, Simon ar Jihudạ, doko baṅkana?
Uniren miserako do cetʼ abo talare bạnukʼkoa? Enḍekhan oka khon noako doe ńamana?”
Nonkate Jisu iạte hoṛko do monre tạkijokʼko ehopʼena. Unre Jisui metatʼkoa, “Nij nagraha ar nij oṛakʼ chaḍa, nạbiko do sanam jaegarege manotko ńama.”
Ar onkoakʼ bepạtiạu iạte onḍe do ḍher hahaṛa kạmiko bae kạmileda.
Onako oktere Herod do Jisu reaṅe ańjomketʼ khan acʼren kạmiạkoe metatʼkoa, “Nui doe Johan bạbạptisicʼ kana; unige gocʼko khone jiwetʼ beretʼ akana.
Ar onatege uni do noako hahaṛa kạmiye kạmikana.”
Herod do acʼren boeha Philipren bạhu Herodiạ iạte Johan tolkate hajotreye bhorao akade tahẽkana,
Ente Johan doe metade tahẽkana, “Herodiạ bạhu mentem dohoye do baṅ ganokʼtama.”
Herod do Johan gojeye menjoṅkan tahẽkana, menkhan uni do hoṛkoe botoratʼkoa, ente Johan do mitʼṭen nạbi menteko manaoede tahẽkana.
Herodakʼ janam din reakʼ rạskạre Herodiạren hoponera do jarwa akanko talareye enecʼente Herode kusi ocokedea.
Onate Herod do kuṛi jãhãnakʼgeye khoj ona emae lạgitʼe kiriạwadea.
Ar kuṛi do eṅgattetʼ ṭhene sikhạu maṛaṅ ocoyenteye menkeda, “Johan bạbạptisicʼakʼ bohokʼ nonḍe thạrire emạńme.”
Onate Herod doe bhabnayena, menkhan acʼ soṅgete jojom duṛupʼ akanko samaṅreye kiriạlen iạte ona emae lạgitʼe hukumkeda.
Uni do hoṛ kolkate hajotrege Johanakʼ bohokʼe makʼ ocoketʼtaea.
Ar thạrire uniakʼ bohokʼ ạgukate kuṛiko calade khan uni do eṅgattetʼe idiadea.
Inạ tayom Johanren celako do hecʼkate mạ̃ṛĩko idikeda arko topakatʼtaea ar senkate ona sombat do Jisuko lạiadea
Johanakʼ gujukʼ reakʼ sombate ańjomketʼ khan Jisu do eskarge onḍe khon lạukạte mitʼṭen nisun jaegateye calaoena. Ar gadel hoṛko onako ańjomketʼ khan eṭakʼ eṭakʼ atoko khon ot otte uniko pańjakedea.
Ar lạukạ khone pheḍen khan uni do gadel hoṛko ńelte mãyã hecʼadea ar onko modre tinạkʼ rugiko tahẽkan onkoe bogeketʼkoa.
Ado ạyubokʼ jokhecʼ celako do hecʼkateko metadea, “Noa jaega do nisungea ar bela hõ bạnuea. Onate hoṛko bidạkakome jemon onko do atokote senkate jomakʼko kiriń daṛeakʼ.”
Menkhan Jisui metatʼkoa, “Onkoakʼ calakʼ reakʼ jạruṛ do bạnukʼa, apege jomakʼ emakope.”
Celakoko metadea, “Abo ṭhen do eken mõṛẽ goṭen piṭhạ ar barea hako chaḍa ar cetʼge bạnukʼa.”
Uniye metatʼkoa, “Onako iń ṭhen ạguipe.”

Tayomte uni do gadel hoṛko ghãsre duṛupʼe hukumatʼkoa, ar ona mõṛẽ goṭen piṭhạ ar barea hako ataṅkate serma secʼ beṅgetʼkateye bhorada. Inạ tayom piṭhại kecakʼketʼte celakoe ematʼkoa ar celako do gadel hoṛkoko calatʼkoa. Ar sanamkoko jomkeda arko biyena.
Ado jom tayom okako kecakʼ hạricʼ pạsir ńur tahẽyen ona halaṅkate celako do gelbar phạtiạkʼko perecʼkeda.
Ar tinạkʼko jomketʼ onko modre maejiu ar kạṭicʼ gidrạ chaḍa mõṛẽ hajar herel hoponko tahẽkana.
Inạ tayom Jisu do celako lạukạre dejokʼte doreão hanasa parom lahakʼ lạgitʼe udgạu gotʼkatʼkoa, ar acʼ do hoṛko bidạkoe ehopʼena.
Ado gadel hoṛe bidạketʼko khan koejoṅ lạgitʼ acʼ eskarge buruteye rakapʼena. Ar ńuhumen khan eskarge onḍeye tahẽyena.
Unre celakoakʼ lạukạ do tala doreãore tahẽkana ar samaṅ secʼ khone hoeyetʼ tahẽkante ḍheokote lạukạ do botorge sokojokʼkan tahẽkana.
Ado maraṅ sim rakʼ okte Jisu do doreão cetan cetante taṛamate celako ṭhene hijukʼkan tahẽkana.
Ar dakʼ cetante mitʼ hoṛ taṛamate hijukʼkanko ńelkede khan celako do botorte, “Bhut, bhut” menkateko kikiạukeda.
Unre Jisui metatʼkoa,” Dil joṅpe, alope botorokʼa, ińkangeạń.”
Patrase roṛ ruạṛadea, “E Probhu, am kan khanem enḍekhan dakʼ cetante am ṭhen calakʼ hukumạńme.”
Jisui menkeda, “Dela hijukʼme.” Unre Patras do lạukạ khon pheḍkate dakʼ cetante Jisu ṭhen calakʼe ehopʼena.
Menkhan hoe ńelteye botoren khan unumokʼe ehopʼena ar kikiạuateye menkeda, “E Probhu, bańcaoiń me.”
Jisu do usạrate tiye tiạrketʼte uniye sapʼgotʼkedea are metadea, “E nase pạtiạukʼicʼ cedakʼem digdhạyena?”
Ado Jisu ar Patras lạukạrekin decʼen khan hoe do thirgotʼena.
Ar lạukạre okoeko tahẽkan onko do Jisu sewawadeteko menkeda, “Sạrige am dom Isorren Hopon kana.”
Tayomte doreão paromkate onko do Genesaret elakate hecʼkateko pheḍena.
Ar onḍenko hoṛ do Jisuko oromkede khan beṛhaeteakʼ jaegakore hoṛko kolketʼkoa.
Ar joto dukhạliạko uni ṭhen ạguketʼkoteko nehõradea jemon onko do uniakʼ kicricʼ ańcarko joṭetʼ daṛeatae; ar tinạkʼko joṭetʼketʼtae onko jotogeko bogeyena.
Unre Jerusalem khon adom Phạrusiko ar sostor baḍaeko do Jisu ṭhen hecʼkateko menkeda,
“Amren celako do cedakʼ hapṛamko khon hecʼ ạguakʼ ạn bako manaoeda? Onko do jom lahare ti bako ạbukokʼkana.”
Jisui roṛ ruạṛatʼkoa, “Oka ạri-cạli calao hijukʼkan ona iạte ape do cedakʼ Isorakʼ hukumkope bemanoteda?
Isore menakada, ‘eṅgam ạpum ganaokinme’ ar ‘okoe eṅgat se apat bạṛicʼe metakin uni do gocʼte hõ goje hoyokʼa.’
Menkhan apepe meneda, jãhãe hoṛ acʼren eṅgat se apate metae, ‘ińakʼ okaṭakʼtem porhokokʼ, ona do Isor ṭhen emakana,’
enḍekhan uni do eṅgat se apat manotkin reakʼ jạruṛ bạnukʼtaea. Apeakʼ noako ạri-cạli iạtege ape do Isorakʼ kathape mạutạ akada.
E Phạsiạrako! Jesaea nạbi do ṭhikge ape reaṅe nạbileda,
noko do mocategeko ganaoedińa, menkhan onkoakʼ ontor do iń khon sạṅgińgetakoa.
Onko do ạuṛiakʼgeko sewawạń kana, ar manwakoakʼ hukumkoge onko do dhorom sikhnạt menteko cetʼakokana.
Jisu do gadel hoṛko acʼ ṭhen hoho sorketʼkoteye metatʼkoa, “Ińakʼ kathako ańjompe ar bujhạujoṅpe.
Moca secʼte oka bolokʼkan onate manwa do bae bhõnḍokʼa, menkhan moca khon oka oḍokokʼkan onatege manwa doe bhõnḍokʼ kana.”
Unre celako hecʼkateko metadea, “Amakʼ noa kathate Phạrusikoko tạkijokʼkan dom baḍae kangea?”
Uniye roṛ ruạṛatʼkoa, “Sermaren ạpuń bae rohoe akatʼ mitʼke mitʼ poha do totʼ giḍi ocokʼa. Onate onkoakʼ katha do bạgiyakʼpe.
Onko do apnartetʼko kãṛãgere hõ kãṛã ạyurko kanako. Ar kãṛã do kãṛãye ạyure khan banarge ghaḍlakʼrekin ńurokʼa.”
Unre Patras do Jisui metadea, “Okaṭakʼ phenem lạiketʼ ona baṛe bujhạu aleme.”
Jisui metatʼkoa, “Ńit hạbicʼ hõ bebujge menakʼpea?
Cekate bape bujhạueda, moca secʼte oka bolokʼkan ona do lacʼte bolokʼkana, ar mucạtʼre do ṭanḍite oḍok giḍikʼa?
Menkhan okaṭakʼ moca khon oḍok hijukʼkan ona do ontor khonge hijukʼ kana, ar onakotege hoṛ doe bhõnḍokʼkana.
Ente ontor khonge bạṛicʼ cintạ, khũn, laṭghaṭ, kombṛo, eṛe goha, ar opomanko do oḍok hijukʼa.
Ar noakotege hoṛ doe bhõnḍokʼa, menkhan ti begor ạbukte jom lekhan manwa do bae bhõnḍokʼa.”
Ado Jisu ona jaegae bạgiatʼte Tur ar Sidon elakateye calaoena.
Ar ńelpe, Kananren mitʼṭen maejiu do oḍok hecʼkate hohoateye menkeda, “E Probhu, Dạudren Hopon, mãyãwạńme baṛe, ente hoponerań do bạṛicʼ jiue capaṛ akawadete ạḍitetʼe sasetokʼ kana.”
Menkhan Jisu do cetʼge bae roṛ ruạṛadea. Unre celako hecʼkate nehõradeteko metadea, “Uni do bidạkaeme, ente abo tayomteye hoho ạguyeda.”
Jisui roṛ ruạṛatʼkoa, “Iń do eken Israel bõsren atʼ akan bhiḍiko ṭheniń kol ocoakana.”
Menkhan maejiu do Jisu ṭhene hecʼena ar ḍobokʼadeteye menkeda, “E Probhu goṛowạńme baṛe.”
Jisui menkeda, “Gidrạkoakʼ jomakʼ hataokate setako samaṅre lebda giḍikakʼ do baṅ bhagea.”
Maejiue roṛ ruạṛkeda, “Katha do sạrikangea Probhu, enrehõ kisạ̃ṛakʼ mej khon hiricʼ pạsirakʼ ganḍa gunḍạ do setakogeko jomeda.”
Unre Jisui menkeda, “E go, sạrige amakʼ pạtiạu do ḍhergea. Amem khojkan leka baṛe hoyokʼma.” Ar unrege uniren hoponera doe bogeyena.
Ado Jisu ona jaegae bạgiatʼe Gạlil doreão aṛe aṛeteye calaoena ar mitʼṭen burure rakapʼkateye duṛupʼena.
Unre gadel hoṛ do soṅgete, leḍhako, kãṛãko, ṭhunṭạko, guṅgạko ar eṭakʼkoko ạgu daraketʼkoa. Ar uniakʼ jaṅga ṭhenko dohoketʼko khan uni doe bogeketʼkoa.
Onate guṅgạko roroṛkan, leḍhako taṛamkan, ṭhunṭạko bogekʼkan, ar kãṛãkoko ńeńelkana menteko ńelketʼko khan gadel hoṛ doko hahaṛa cabayena, ar Israelren Isorko sarhaokedea.

Inạ tayom Jisu do celako hohoatʼkoteye metatʼkoa, “Noko gadel hoṛkoreń mãyãkʼ kana, ente teheń pe mãhã hoyokʼ kana onko do iń sãote menakʼkoa, ar noko ṭhen jãhãn jomakʼge bạnukʼa. Ar reṅgecʼte bidạkako hõ baṅ sanań kana; ente hoedaṛeakʼa onko do horkoreko lorao botecʼkokʼa.”
Ado celakoko metadea, “Noa nisun jaegare nunạkʼ hoṛ jom bi ocoko lạgitʼ piṭhạ do okare bon ńamkea?”
Jisui metatʼkoa, “Tinạkʼ piṭhạ menakʼtapea?” Celakoko roṛ ruạṛadea, “Eae goṭen piṭhạ ar thoṛagan kạṭicʼ hako.”
Jisu do gadel hoṛko otre duṛubokʼe hukumatʼkote onko hako ar ona eae goṭen piṭhại ataṅkeda.
Ar Isore gun manao joharadete onakoe kecakʼketʼte celakoe calatʼkoa ar onko do gadel hoṛkoko ematʼkoa.
Ar sanam hoṛko jomkeda arko biyena, ar tinạkʼ hiricʼ pạsir ńur tahẽyen celako do onakoko halaṅ jarwaketʼ khan eae khạclạkʼko perecʼkeda.
Okoeko jomketʼ onko modre maejiu ar kạṭicʼ gidrạ chaḍa pon hajar herel hoponko tahẽkana.
Inạ tayom Jisu do gadel hoṛko bidạkate lạukạreye decʼena ar Magadan elakateye calaoena.
Phạrusiko ar Sạdukiko do Jisu bidạue lạgitʼ uni ṭhenko hecʼena ar serma khon mitʼṭen cinhạ udukʼako lạgitʼko metadea.
Jisui roṛ ruạṛatʼkoa, “Ạyupʼ jokhecʼ dope mena, ‘dhạrungeae ente serma do arakʼgea.’
Ar setakʼ jokhecʼ dope mena, ‘teheń doe hoe daga ente serma do arakʼ ar dhũndgea.’ Serma reakʼ muṭhạn papachnao dope baḍaekana, menkhan okte reakʼ cinhạko do bape bujhạu daṛeakʼ kana.
Niạ bạṛicʼ ar laṭghaṭ piṛhiren hoṛge cinhạ doko ńam baṛakana, menkhan Jona reakʼ chaḍa ar okaṭakʼ hõ onko do baṅ udukʼakoa.” Inạ tayom Jisu do onko bạgiatʼkoteye calaoena.
Doreão hanasako parom calakʼkan tahẽkanre celako do soṅgete piṭhạ iditorako hiṛińkeda.
Ado Jisui metatʼkoa, “Phạrusiko ar Sạdukikoakʼ khạmi khon sontor akan tahenpe.”
Noate celako do ako ako talare kheńjer-meńjer baṛayenteko menkeda, “Piṭhạ babon ạgutoraletʼte noa kathae metabon kana.”
Jisu onae baḍaeketʼ khan onkoe metatʼkoa, “E nase pạtiạukʼko, piṭhạ bạnukʼtapete cedakʼpe kheńjer meńjerokʼ kana?
Ape do cetʼ ńit hõ bape bujhạueda se bape disạyeda, onko mõṛẽ hajar hoṛ lạgitʼ mõṛẽ goṭen piṭhạ reakʼ katha, ar ona tayom ape do tinạkʼ khạclạkʼpe halaṅ jarwaleda?
Se pon hajar hoṛ lạgitʼ eae goṭen piṭhạ reakʼ katha, ar tinạkʼ khạclạkʼpe halaṅleda?
Piṭhạ reakʼ katha bạń metapekan do cetʼ bape bujhạueda? Menkhan Phạrusi ar Sạdukikoakʼ khạmi khon sontor akan tahenpe.”
Ado un utạrko bujhạukeda, piṭhạ reakʼ khạmi khon sontor akae do baṅ, menkhan Phạrusi ar Sạdukiko reakʼ cecetʼakʼ khon sontor tahene metako kana mente.
Jisu do Kạisạriạ Philipi reakʼ elakateye hecʼenre acʼren celakoe kuliketʼkoa, “Hoṛko do Manwa Hopon okoe kanae menteko meneda?”
Onkoko menkeda, “Adomko doko meneda am dom Johan bạbạptisicʼ kana; ar adomko doko meneda Eliạ kanam; arhõ adomko doko meneda Jirimiạ; ar baṅkhan nạbiko modren mitʼ hoṛ.”
Unre Jisui metatʼkoa, “Menkhan ape do okoe kạnạń mentepe meneda?”
Simon Patrase roṛ ruạṛkeda, “Am do Mạsi, jiwetʼ Isorren Hopon kanam.”
Jisui roṛ ruạṛadea, “Jona hopon Simon, am dom bhạgangea, ente okoe manwa hõ am ṭhen noa do bae sodorakada; menkhan ińren sermaren Babageye sodor akatʼmea.
Ińiń metam kana, am dom Patras kana, ar noa dhiri cetanrege ińakʼ manḍereń benao rakaba. Norok reakʼ oka daṛege onare bae jitạu daṛeakʼa.
Iń do serma raj reakʼ kạṭhikoń emama, ar jãhãnakʼge dhạrtirem tol ona do sermare hõ tolge tahena ar jãhãnakʼge dhạrtirem raṛae ona do sermare hõ raṛage tahena.”
Ona tayom uni do celakoe sontorkatʼkoa jemon okoe hõ aloko lại baṛaye, acʼ doe Mạsi kanae mente.

Un khonge Jisu do acʼren celako lạiakoe ehopʼena je, acʼ do Jerusalemte calakʼ hoyokʼtaea ar murubiko, maraṅ naekeko, ar sostor baḍaeko hotete ạḍi okocʼ duk jojom hoyokʼtaea. Are gocʼ ocokʼa ar pe mãhã hilokʼre gocʼko khon uni do jiwetʼ beredokʼ hoyokʼtaea.
Unre Patras do begar idikedete nisṛạueye ehopʼkeda, “E Probhu noa do am khon sahaṛokʼma. Am cetanre nonka do tisge oho hoedaṛelena.”
Jisu do ạcurente Patrase metadea, “Eya Soetan iń samaṅ khon pharakokʼme. Am do iń tạkʼkicʼicʼ kanam. Isor reakʼakʼko do bam moneakʼ kana menkhan manwa reakʼakʼkogem moneakʼ kana.”
Ona tayom Jisu do acʼren celakoe metatʼkoa, “Jãhãe ińakʼ horte hijukʼ sanayede khan uni do acʼakʼ kusi sanaleka aloe calakʼma; menkhan acʼakʼ kruse gogma ar ińe pańjańma.
Jãhãe acʼakʼ jiwi bańcao sanaye, uni doe khuạua; menkhan jãhãege iń lạgitʼ acʼakʼ jiwiye khuạu uni do onae ńama.
Jãhãege goṭa dhạrtiye hameṭte acʼakʼ jiwiye khuạutae enḍekhan cetʼ porho hoyokʼtaea? Se mitʼṭen hoṛ acʼakʼ jiwi bodolte cetʼe emkea?
Manwa Hopon do acʼren goḍetko soṅgekate apat reakʼ ṭhonokanteye hijukʼa. Ar mimitʼ hoṛ akoakʼ kạmi lekae halawakoa.
Sạrigeń metapekana, nonḍe teṅgo akanko modre adom hoṛ menakʼkoa onko do Manwa Hopon acʼakʼ rajre ạuriko ńele hạbicʼ bako gujukʼa.”
Ado niạ turui din tayom Jisu do eken Patras, Jakob ar uniren boeha Johan soṅgekate mitʼṭecʼ usul buruteye rakapʼ calaoena.

Unre Patras do Jisui metadea, “E Probhu, bhagege hoeakana ale nonḍe menakʼle iạte do. Amem khoj khan nonḍe pea kumbạ oṛakʼ iń benaoa; mitʼṭen do am lạgitʼ, mitʼṭen do Mose lạgitʼ ar mitʼṭen do Eliạ lạgitʼ.”

Ado Patras kathae roroṛkan tahẽkanrege mitʼṭen jhalkaokʼkan rimil do onkoe umul esetʼketʼkoa. Ar ona rimil khon mitʼṭen aṛaṅ ańjomena, “Nuige ińren dulạṛiạ Hopon, iń do unireń kusi akana. Ape do uniakʼ ańjomtaepe.”
Noa katha ańjomkate celako do ạḍiko botorena ar otreko taber hapeyena.
Unre Jisu do hecʼkate joṭetʼketʼkoteye metatʼkoa, “Ma beretʼpe, alope botorokʼa.”
Adoko beṅgetʼ rakapʼketʼ khan Jisu chaḍa ar okoehõ bako ńel ńamletʼkoa.
Ado buru khonko pheḍ hijukʼkan tahẽkanre uni do noae hukumatʼkoa, “Okape ńelketʼ, ona do Manwa Hopon gocʼko khon ạuriye jiwetʼ beredokʼ hạbicʼ okoe hõ alope lạiakoa.”
Celakoko kulikedea, “Cedakʼ enḍekhan sostor baḍaeko doko meneda, pạhil do Eliạge hijukʼ reakʼ jạruṛ menakʼtaea mente?”
Jisui roṛ ruạṛatʼkoa, “Sạrige Eliại hijukʼa ar sanamakʼ do lahate lekae teṅgo aroea.
Menkhan ińiń metapekana, Eliạ doe hecʼlengea ar bako ńel oromledea. Ar hoṛko cetʼleka sanaletʼko onkage uni cetanreko kạmikeda. Manwa Hopon hõ onkage hoṛko hotete duk jojom hoyokʼtaea.”
Unre celakoko bujhạukeda je, uni do Johan bạbạptisicʼ reaṅe lạiatʼkoa mente.
Jisu ar uniren celako gadel hoṛ ṭhenko ruạṛ hecʼen khan mitʼṭen hoṛ do Jisu ṭhen hecʼkate ikhṛumenteye menkeda,
“E Probhu hoponiń baṛe mãyãwaeme. Uni do mirgi rogte ạḍiye sasetokʼkana. Ente ghane uni do seṅgelre ar ghane do dakʼreye bhindạṛokʼa.
Amren celako ṭheniń ạguledea menkhan onko do bako boge daṛeadea.”
Jisui roṛ ruạṛkeda, “E bepạtiạu ar peṛta piṛhirenko! Ar tinạkʼ din ape sãoreń tahena? Ar tinạkʼ diniń sahaokatapea? Dini iń ṭhen ạguyepe.”
Ado Jisu uniye dhomkaokede khan bạṛicʼ jiu do uni khone oḍok calaoena, ar koṛa do unregeye boge utạrena.
Inạ tayom celako do hape hapete hecʼkate Jisuko metadea, “Ale do cekate bale oḍok daṛeadea?”
Jisui metatʼkoa, “Apeakʼ nase pạtiạu iạte bape daṛeada. Sạrigeń metapekana, tuṛi jaṅ inạkʼ hõ biswạs tahentape ar noa burupe metakʼ, ‘nonḍe khon hanḍe ucạṛokʼme,’ enḍekhan ona do ucạṛokʼa.
Ape lạgitʼ bin daṛeanakʼ do cetʼge bạnukʼa. Menkhan nui jạtrenko do koejoṅ ar upạs begor ohogeko oḍoklena.
Ado Gạlil Prodesh talateye parom calakʼkan tahẽkan jokhecʼ Jisu do acʼren celakoe metatʼkoa, “Manwa Hopon do hoṛkoakʼ tireko soprotea.
Ar hoṛko do uniko gojea, ar pe mãhã hilokʼre uni do gocʼko khone jiwetʼ beredokʼa.” Onate celako do ạḍiko mon dukena.
Jisu ar acʼren celako Kapharnạhum nagarahateko hecʼen khan mundil reakʼ khajna uṭhạuko do Patras ṭhen hecʼkateko kulikedea, “Aperen Guru do cetʼ mundil reakʼ khajnae emetʼkangea?”

Patras do onkoe metatʼkoa, “Hẽ, emetʼgeae.” Inạ tayom Patras oṛakʼteye boloyen khan Jisu do roṛ daramkedeteye metadea, “E Simon, am do cetʼem hudiskea? Noa dhạrtiren rapajko do okoe ṭhen khon khajnako uṭhạueda? Nij disạmren hoṛko ṭhen khon, se bidesi hoṛko ṭhen khon?”
Patrase menkeda, “Bidesi hoṛko ṭhen khon.” Jisu do uniye metadea, “Enḍekhan nij disạmren hoṛko do rehaeko ńamakada.

Menkhan alaṅ iạte jemon khajna uṭhạuko aloko tạkijokʼ onate doreãote calakʼme ar bạ̃ṛsi caḍoeme, ar pạhilre okoeṭakʼ hakom rakabe unim or cahapʼle khan mitʼṭecʼ rupạ reakʼ ṭakam ńama. Ar ona hataokate iń ar am ńutumte khajna em oṭokakʼme.”
Ona jokhecʼ celako do Jisu ṭhen hecʼkateko menkeda, “Serma rajre maraṅicʼ doe okoe kana?”
Unre Jisu do mitʼṭen kạṭicʼ gidrạ hoho sorkate onko talare teṅgo kedeteye metatʼkoa,
“Sạrigeń metapekana, mon ạcurkate kạṭicʼ gidrạko leka bape hoelen khan serma rajre ohogepe bolo daṛelena.
Onate jãhãege nui kạṭicʼ gidrạ leka acʼteye nindhạnokʼ unige serma rajre sanamko khone maraṅa.
Ar jãhãege iń ńutumte nonkan kạṭicʼ gidrại ataṅe uni do ińgeye ataṅińạ.
“Ińreko pạtiạu akan noko kạṭicʼko modren mitʼ goṭen jãhãege kại horteye idiye enḍekhan uni do hoṭokʼre jante dhiri akawaete jalapuri reakʼ khạndri dakʼre unum giḍikaege bhagekʼa.
Hae hae! Kại horte idiko lạgitʼ tinạkʼ uskạu baṅ amre menakʼ! Ente uskạu do hijukʼgea; enhõ hae uni hoṛ do, one okoe hotete uskạuko hijukʼkan!
“Amakʼ ti se jaṅga kại horteye idime khan ona do samakʼ giḍikakʼme. Banar ti ar banar jaṅga tahen tulucʼ jaejug seṅgelrem khadle ocokʼ khon ṭhunṭạ se leḍhage jionrem bolokʼge am lạgitʼ bogea.
Amak̕ mẽtʼ kại horteye idime khan ona do hoṭor totʼ giḍikakʼme. Banar mẽtʼ tahentam tulucʼ norok seṅgelrem khadle ocokʼ khon mitʼ mẽtʼante jionrem bolokʼge am lạgitʼ bogea.
“Ńelpe, noko kạṭicʼko modren mitʼ goṭen hõ alope nihạ̃tkoa; ińiń metapekana sermare onkoren goḍetko do sanam ghạṛicʼ ińren sermare menae Babawakʼ mẽtãhãko ńeleda.
“Ente Manwa Hopon do atʼakanko bańcaoko lạgitʼgeye hecʼakana. Ape do cetʼpe hudiskea?
Mitʼ hoṛren mitʼ sae bhiḍiko tahentae. Ar onko modren mitʼ goṭene chingạulen khan onko are gel are goṭen burure bạgi oṭoakote uni chingạu akanicʼ cetʼ bae ńam baṛayea?
Sạrigeń metapekana, uniye ńamlere onko bako chingạu akan are gel areko khon chingạuicʼ iạte uni do arhõ bạ̃ṛtiye rạskạkʼa.
Nonkage, aperen sermare menae Babawakʼ hõ mone bạnukʼtaea; noko kạṭicʼko mod khon mitʼ goṭene adokʼ.
‘‘Amren boeha am birudreye kại lekhan uni ṭhen senokʼme ar aben eskar tahenrege uniakʼ dosko lại bujhạuaeme. Ar amakʼ kathae ańjom khan enḍekhan amren boeham dom ńam ruạṛkedea.
Menkhan bae ańjomletam khan eṭakʼ mitʼ se bar hoṛ soṅge torajoṅme, jemon bar se pe hoṛakʼ goha do sạriakʼ mente sạbudokʼ.
Ar onkoakʼ katha hõ bae ańjomle khan enḍekhan manḍerrenko lạiakome. Ar manḍerrenkoakʼ katha hõ bae ańjom khan uni do boṅgan hoṛ jạtren se mạsul uṭhạu hoṛko leka bujhạuem.
‘‘Sạrigeń metapekana, dhạrtire okakope tola ona do sermare hõ tolge tahena, ar dhạrtire okape raṛae ona do sermare hõ raṛage tahena.
‘‘Arhõń metapekana, apeko modre bar hoṛ dhạrtire jãhãnakʼ reaṅ mitʼ montekin koe enḍekhan sermare menae Baba secʼ khon hoyokʼ getakinạ,
ente okare bar se pe hoṛ iń ńutumteko jarwakʼa, onḍege iń do onko talareń tahena.”
Unre Patras do hecʼkate Jisui metadea, “E Probhu, boehań iń birudreye kạilere tinạkʼ dhaoiń ikạitaea? Eae dhao hạbicʼ?’’
Jisui metadea, “Bạń metamkana eae dhao hạbicʼ do, menkhan eae gel doboṛ eae dhao hạbicʼ ikạyem.
“Ńelpe, serma raj do nonkan mitʼṭen raj lekana, okoe do acʼren gutiko ṭhen hisạb hataoe menwan.
Ado hisạb hataoe ehopʼen khan onko modren nonkan mitʼṭen gutiye ạgu ocoyena, one okoe do raj ṭhen lakh lakh ṭakae rin akatʼ tahẽkan.
Uniakʼ do halateakʼ cetʼ hõ baṅ tahẽkantaea. Onate kisạ̃ṛ doe hukumkeda uni ar uniren era hopon ar uniakʼ menakʼ jotowakʼko ạkhrińkate jemon paona ạdạyokʼtae.
Khange uni guti do kisạ̃ṛakʼ ti jaṅgare giḍiyenteye menkeda, ‘E Probhu, ma jiwi hataṛme, ado jotoń hala ruạṛkatama.’
Unre kisạ̃ṛ do mãyã hecʼadete uni gutiye aṛakʼkadea ar joto rin khone khalaskadea.
“Tayomte uni guti do bahrete oḍok senkate acʼ sãoten mitʼṭen gutiye ńamkedea. Uni guti do acʼ ṭhen mitʼ sae ṭakae dharao akatʼ tahẽkana. Ar uni guti limbạtʼkedeteye metadea, ‘dharaoakʼ halakạtińme.’
“Khange sãoten guti do ti jaṅgare giḍiyente nehõrenteye menkeda, ‘ma jiwi hataṛme, adoń hala ruạṛkatama.’
Menkhan uni do bae rebenlena bickom dharaoakʼ ạuriye hala cabae hạbicʼ hajotreye bhoraokadea.
“Noako ńelkate uni sãoten eṭakʼ gutiko do ạḍiko bhabnayena. Ar senkate akoren kisạ̃ṛko lạiadea
Unre kisạ̃ṛ do uni guti hoho ạgu ocokedeteye metadea, ‘Eya bạṛicʼ guti! Amem nehõradiń tahẽkante amakʼ sanam dharaoakʼ iń ikạletʼtama.
Iń cetʼlekań dayawatʼme tahẽkan onkage cetʼ uni hõ mãyãwae lek baṅ tahẽkantama?’
Khange kisạ̃ṛ doe raṅgaoente joto rin ạuriye hala ruạṛ cabae hạbicʼ hajotren hoṛko ṭhene jimạkadea.
“Onkage, ape mimitʼko aperen boehako apeakʼ ontorte bape ikạleko khan, sermare menae ińren Baba hõ apeye onkawapea.”
Noako kathae roṛ mucạtʼketʼ khan Gạlil khon uṭhạuente Jisu do Jordan gaḍa paromkate Jihudạ reakʼ simạkoteye calaoena.
Ar ạḍi utạr hoṛ do uniko pańja idikedea ar onko do onḍeye bogeketʼkoa.
Unre adom Phạrusiko Jisu biḍạue lạgitʼ uni ṭhen hecʼkateko menkeda, “Moseakʼ ạn lekate jãhãe hoṛ acʼren bạhu jãhãn karonte bạgiye do ganokʼtaea se baṅ?
Jisui roṛ ruạṛatʼkoa, “Bape paṛhao akada, Sisirjạuicʼ do pạhilre herel ar maejiue sirjạuketʼkinạ are menkeda,
‘ona iạte herel do eṅgat-apat bạgikate acʼren bạhu tulucʼ mitʼ akane tahena ar unkin do mitʼ hoṛmokin hoyokʼa?’
Ar barea dokin baṅkana, menkhan mitʼ hoṛmo kanakin. Onate Isor okae joṛao mitʼ akatʼ manwa ona aloe topagma.”
Unre Phạrusikoko metadea, “Cedakʼ enḍekhan Mose do bapag dolel olaete bạhu bạgiye reakʼ hukume emakana?”
Jisui metatʼkoa, “Apeakʼ keṭecʼ mon iạte Mose do bạhu bạgiye reakʼe aṛakʼakawatʼpea Menkhan pạhil khon nonka do baṅ tahẽkana.
Ińiń metapekana, jãhãege laṭghaṭ chaḍa eṭakʼ karonte acʼren bạhui bạgiye ar eṭakʼgicʼe baplaye uni doe loṭghuṭiya.”
Unre celako do uniko metadea, “Jãwãe ar bạhu talare nonkage hoyokʼ khan, baplakʼge baṅ bhagea.”
Jisui metatʼkoa, “Sanam hoṛ noa katha do ohoko manao daṛelea; menkhan okoeko em ocoakan eken onkogeko daṛeakʼa.

Ente adom do eṅgat kukhi khon mạ̃yạ̃ṛigeko janam akana, onate onko do bako baplakʼ kana. Ar adom do hoṛgeko mạ̃yạ̃ṛi ocoyetʼkoa, onate onko hõ bako baplakʼkana, arhõ adomko do serma rajre bolokʼ iạte baṅ baplakʼko muruk akada. Onate okoeye manao daṛeakʼ uni doe manaoma.”
Unre kạṭicʼ gidrạ Jisu ṭhenko ạguketʼkoa jemon uni do onkoe capoko are koeako. Menkhan celako do onkoko dhomkaoketʼkoa.
Jisu do onkoe metatʼkoa, “Kạṭicʼ gidrạko iń ṭhen hecʼ ocoakope, alope manakoa, ente serma raj do nonkankoakʼ kangea.”
Ado kạṭicʼ gidrạko bohokʼre capokateye bhoratʼkoa, ar onḍe khone calaoena.
Ar ńelpe, mitʼṭen juạn koṛa do hecʼkate Jisui metadea, “E Guru, jaejug jion ńam lạgitʼ bhageakʼ cetʼko cekae hoyokʼtińạ?”
Jisu do uniye metadea, “Bhageakʼ reaṅ do cedakʼem kuliyediń kana? Ente mitʼ goṭengeae bhageicʼ do. Am do jaejug jionte bolokʼem menetʼ khan enḍekhan uniakʼ sanam hukumko dohoeme.”
Uni juạn koṛa doe menkeda, “Okako hukum?” Jisui menkeda, “Alom khũna, alom laṭghaṭa, alom kombṛoea, eṛe goha alom ema,
eṅgam-ạpum ganaokinme ar am aḍepaseren hoṛ apnar leka dulạṛem.”
Uni juạn koṛa doe menkeda, “Noako joto doń manao ạguakada, ado ar cetʼko cekae hoyokʼtińạ?

Jisui menkeda, “Am do khạṭi utạrokʼem menetʼ khan enḍekhan senkate amakʼ sanam sompotti ạkhrińkate reṅgecʼ orecʼko danakome. Onate sermaere dhon hoyokʼtama. Ar ona tayom do hecʼkate ińren cela hoyokʼme.”
Noa katha ańjomkate kisạ̃ṛ juạn do ạḍi bhabnakateye calaoena, ente uni do ạḍi utạr dhon tahẽkantaea.
Unre Jisu do acʼren celakoe metatʼkoa, “Sạrigeń metapekana, kisạ̃ṛ hoṛko lạgitʼ serma rajte bolokʼ do muskilgea.
Arhõń metapekana, kisạ̃ṛ hoṛ serma rajte bolokʼ khon sui bhugạkʼte ũṭe bolo tabokʼge algawa.”
Noa katha ańjomkate celako do hahaṛayenteko menkeda, “Enḍekhan kại khon bańcao do okoeye ńam daṛekea?”
Jisu do celako beṅgetʼatʼkoteye metatʼkoa, “Manwako hotete do baṅ hoedaṛeakʼa, menkhan Isor hotete do sanamakʼge hoedaṛeakʼa.”
Unre Patras do uniye metadea, “Ńelme, sanamakʼ bạgikate amren celale hoeakana; ale do cetʼle ńama?”

Jisui metatʼkoa, “Sạrigeń metapekana, okoe ińren celape hoeakan, nawa janamokʼre Manwa Hopon tinre acʼakʼ ṭhonok reakʼ siṅghạsonreye duṛupʼa unre ape hõ gelbar siṅghạsonre duṛupʼkate Israelren gelbar khũṭkope bicạrkoa.
Ar iń iạte okoe do acʼakʼ oṛakʼ-duạr, se eṅgat-apat, se boeha-miserako, se gidrạko se ot-baṛgekoe bạgi oṭoakatʼ, uni do mitʼ sae doboṛ bạ̃ṛtiye ńama ar jaejug jion hõe ạidạri joṅa.
Menkhan lahatenko aema doko tayomokʼa, ar tayomtenko doko lahakʼa.”
“Serma raj do mitʼṭen oṛakʼ kisạ̃ṛ lekana, one okoe do acʼakʼ darkha bagwanre kạmiạko lagaoko lạgitʼ paha poho jokhecʼ bahreteye oḍok calaoen.
Uni do kạmiạko tulucʼ dinre mimitʼ Dinar kateye rikitketʼte acʼakʼ darkha bagwanteye kolkatʼkoa.
Ado baskeakʼ ber okte uni do arhõ bahreteye oḍok senena ar bajarre eṭakʼko ạuṛiakʼ teṅgo baṛa akane ńelketʼkoa.
Uni doe metatʼkoa, ‘ape hõ ińakʼ darkha bagwante kạmi calakʼpe. Iń do hok reakʼ iń emkatapea.’
Onate onko hoṛ hõ kạmi lạgitʼko calaoena. “Uni kisạ̃ṛ do arhõ tikin ar tarasiń jokhecʼ bahrete senkateye onkakeda.
