Arhõ uni do huḍiń dakʼ lo ber okte oḍok senkate eṭakʼko teṅgo akane ńamketʼko khane metatʼkoa, ‘ạuṛiakʼ cedakʼpe teṅgo akana?’
“Onko doko metadea, ‘okoe hõ kạmire bako lagaoletʼlea.’ “Uni doe metatʼkoa, ‘Do, ape hõ ińakʼ darkha bagwante senkate kạmipe.’
“Ado ạyupʼen khan darkha bagwanren mạlik do acʼren gutiye metadea, ‘kạmiạko hoho ạgukom ar tayomtenko khon ehopʼkate lahatenko hạbicʼ mimitʼ mimitʼte kuṛại emakom.’
“Khan huḍiń dakʼ lo ber oktere okoe do kạmiko dhurạu ocolen onko do hecʼkate mimitʼ Dinarkateko idikeda.
Onate okoeko pạhilre kạmiko ehopʼlen onko do bạ̃ṛtigeko ńama menteko hudiskeda, menkhan onko hõ mimitʼ Dinar kategeko ńamkeda.
Onate onko do kisạ̃ṛ upạrte karacʼ kurucʼente memenko ehopʼena,
‘Ale do goṭa din jharla jhạrli setoṅrele kạmikeda. Menkhan mucạtʼre okoe kạmireko dhurạu ocolen onko do eken mitʼ ghạṛiko kạmikeda, ar ale somangem ematʼkoa.’
“Unre mạlik do onko modren mitʼ hoṛe metadea, ‘E ho, iń ma bacoń behok akatʼme. Iń do cetʼ am tulucʼ mitʼ Dinarte bạń rikitlakʼa?
Amakʼ paona hataokate calao joṅme. Iń do am cetʼ lekań emakatʼme, onkage nui tayomicʼ hõ emayiń menjoṅkana.
Ar okaṭakʼ ińakʼ kan, ona do cetʼ ińakʼ kusileka laṛcaṛ reakʼ ektiạri bạnukʼtińạ? Se ińiń dayakʼkante mẽtʼ jolokʼkan tama?’ ”
Golpo mucạtʼre Jisui menkeda, “Onkage okoe do tayomre menakʼko onko doko lahakʼa ar lahatenko doko tayomokʼa.”
Ado Jisu Jerusalemteye rakapʼ calakʼkan tahẽkanre acʼren gelbar celako hor mitʼ aṛere hohoatʼkoteye metatʼkoa,
“Ńelpe, Jerusalemte bon calakʼkana; onḍe Manwa Hopon do maraṅ naekeko ar sostor baḍaekoakʼ tireko soprotea;

onko doko bicạrea ar gujukʼ lek kanae menteko dusi ṭarhaoea. Arko siṛogaea, arko cạbukea ar kruskae lạgitʼ boṅgan hoṛ jạtrenkoakʼ tireko soprotea; ar pe mãhã hilokʼre uni do gocʼko khone jiwetʼ beredokʼa.”
Ado Sabdae hoponkinren eṅgattetʼ do acʼren hoponkine soṅgeketʼkinte Jisu ṭhene hecʼena ar jãhãnakʼ koyea mente uniye ḍobokʼadea.
Jisu do uniye metadea, “Cetʼem khojkana?” Uni doe menkeda, “Noa hukum emokʼme, amakʼ rajre jemon nukin modre mitʼ hoṛ do amakʼ jojom secʼre ar eṭagicʼ do amakʼ leṅga secʼre kin duṛupʼ ńam.”
Jisui menkeda, “Ape cetʼpe khojkan ona do bape baḍaea. Okaṭakʼ bạṭi reakʼ iń ńũi lạgidokʼkan, ona reakʼ do cetʼ ben ńu daṛeakʼgea?” Metadeakin, “Daṛeakʼ gealiń.”
Unre Jisui metatʼkinạ, “Ińakʼ bạti reakʼ ma ben ńũige, menkhan ińakʼ jojomsa ar ińakʼ leṅgasa aṛere duṛupʼko reakʼ ektiạri do bạnukʼtińạ. Ona do ińren Baba okoe lạgitʼe dohoakatʼ onkogeko ńama.”
Noa katha ańjomkate, gel celako do unkin banar boeha upạrteko edreyena.
Unre Jisu do celako hohoatʼkoteye metatʼkoa, “Noa kathape baḍaegea baṅma, boṅgan hoṛ jạtrenko do rapajkoge onkoren Probhu kanako ar onkoren mukhiạkoge ektiạriko calaoeda.
Menkhan ape talare onka hoyokʼ do baṅ ṭhika. Ape modre jãhãe maraṅ hoyokʼe menetʼ khan uni do aperen sapʼ dapʼicʼe hoyokʼma.
Ar jãhãege pạhilicʼ hoyokʼe menetʼ khan uni do aperen golame hoyokʼma.
Manwa Hopon do sapʼsor ocokʼ do bae hecʼakana, bickom sapʼsosor lạgitʼge, ar ạḍi uṭạr hoṛko bodolte chaḍao reakʼ dam menkate acʼakʼ jiwi emokʼgeye hecʼakana.”
Jisu ar uniren celako do Jerikho nagraha khonko oḍok calakʼkan tahẽkanre gadel hoṛ do uniko pańja idikedea.
Ar ńelpe, barea kãṛã hoṛ do hor aṛerekin duṛupʼakan tahẽkana. Ado Jisu ona horteye parom calakʼkan kin ańjomketʼ khan unkin do hohoatekin menkeda, “E Probhu, Dạudren Hopon, mãyãwạlińme.”
Khange gadel hoṛ do thir hapekʼa mente unkinko dhomkaoketʼkinạ. Menkhan unkin do artetʼge ãṭ aṛaṅte hohoatekin menkeda, “E Probhu Dạudren Hopon mãyãwạlińme baṛe.”
Unre Jisu doe teṅgoyena ar hohoatʼkinteye metatʼkinạ, “Iń do aben lạgitʼ cetʼ iń cekaea?
Metadeakin, “E Probhu, mẽtʼ jhicʼkataliń me.”
Unre Jisu do mãyã hecʼadea ar unkinakʼ mẽtʼe joṭetʼketʼtạkina, ar unrege unkin do ńeńelkin ehopʼena, ar unikin pańjakedea.
Jisu ar uniren celako do Jerusalem sor Jạitun buru ṭhenakʼ Bethaphage ato ṭhenko seṭerena. Unre Jisu do barea cela noa menkateye kolketʼkinạ,
“Aben do samaṅ reakʼ atote calakʼ ben. Ar onḍe ben senlen khange hopon salakʼ mitʼṭen gadha eṅga tolakade ben ńamea. Ar unkin raṛakate iń ṭhen ben ạgukinạ.
Ar jãhãege jãhãnakʼe metaben enḍekhan metaeben, ‘Probhu do nukin reakʼ jạruṛ menakʼtaea.’ Ar unrege uni doe aṛakʼabena.”
Noa do hoyena nạbi hotete roṛlenakʼ katha jemon purạukʼ:
“Sionren hoponera metaepe, ńelme amren raj do am ṭhene darae kana; uni do mạ̃hir ar gadhare decʼakan; ar mitʼṭen gadha hopon, ladhna janwar hoponre.”
Ado Jisu cetʼlekae hukumatʼkin tahẽkan onkage unkin do senkatekin kạmikeda.
Unkin do gadha eṅga ar hoponkin ạguketʼkina ar ạkinakʼ kicricʼko unkin cetanrekin aṭetʼketʼ khan Jisu doe decʼena.
Ar gadel hoṛ do hor horte akoakʼ kicricʼkoko aṭetʼkeda. Ar eṭakʼko do dare ḍạrko hese ạguketʼte horteko aṭetʼ idikeda.
Ar Jisu laha lahate calakʼkan ar pańjayedekan gadel hoṛko do ãṭ aṛaṅte hohoate memenko ehopʼena, “Hosanna, Dạudren Hopon! Bhorangeae Probhu ńutumte hijukʼkạnicʼ do. Coṭ utạrre Hosanna!”
Ado Jisu Jerusalemteye boloyen khan goṭa nagraha do dal malaoena. Ar sanamkoge kulikʼko ehopʼena, “Okoe kanae nui do?”
Gadel hoṛko menkeda, “Nui do Gạlil reakʼ Nasaretren nạbi Jisu kanae.”
Ado Jisu mundilteye boloyen khan onḍeko kiriń-ạkhrińkan tahẽkan joto doe laga oḍokketʼkoa. Uni do ṭaka bodolkoakʼ mạciko ar parwa kiriń-ạkhirińkoakʼ duṛupʼakʼkoe ulṭạu giḍikatʼteye metatʼkoa,
“Sonot sostorte Isore menakada, ‘ińakʼ oṛakʼ do koejoṅ oṛakʼ ńumogokʼa,’ menkhan ape do ḍạkukoakʼ danderpe hoeocoakada.”
Inạ tayom kãṛã ar leḍhako mundilre Jisu ṭhenko hecʼen khan uni do onkoe bogeketʼkoa.
Ado uni okako hahaṛa kạmikoe kạmiketʼ ona do maraṅ naekeko ar sostor baḍaekoko ńelkeda. Onko do mundil bhitrire kạṭicʼ gidrạko, “Hosannawaema, Dạudren Hopon!” Hohokanko ańjomketʼkoa.

Ar noako ńelteko ạṛisente onko do Jisuko metadea, “Onko cetʼko menetʼ ona dom ańjometʼkangea?” Jisui metatʼkoa, “Hẽ, ańjometʼgeạń. Sostorre cetʼ tishõ bape paṛhaoakada: Bale gidrạko ar towa nunuko reakʼ moca khon, am do apnar lạgitʼ sarhaoem tear sạbitana?”
Inạ tayom Jisu do onkoe bạgiatʼkote nagraha bahre Bethaniạ atoteye calaoena ar onḍegeye tahẽ aṅgayena.
Dosar hilokʼ setakʼ okte Jisu do nagrahateye ruạṛokʼ tahẽkanre reṅgecʼkedea.

Uni do hor aṛere mitʼṭen loa dareye ńelketʼ khan dare ṭhene calaoena, menkhan onare sakam chaḍa ar cetʼge bae ńel ńamlakʼa. Unre uni do dareye metatʼa, “Amre ar tishõ alo jokʼma.” Ar unrege loa dare do rohoṛ gotʼena.
Ona ńelte celako doko hahaṛayente uniko metadea, “Cekate loa dare do rohoṛ gotʼena?”

Jisui roṛ ruạṛatʼkoa, “Sạrigeń metapekana, biswạs tahentape ar bape digdhạkʼ enḍekhan loa darere okań cekaketʼ ape hõ onape daṛeakʼa. Eken ona do baṅ, menkhan noa buru hõpe metakʼ, ‘uṭhạukʼte jalapurire khadlekʼme,’ enḍekhan ona hõ hoyokʼgea.
Ape do jãhãnakʼge pạtiạukatepe koe enḍekhan ona dope ńamgea.”

Jisu do arhõ mundilteye boloyena. Ar tinreye cetʼakokan tahẽkan unre maraṅ naekeko ar Jihudikoren murubiko do uni ṭhen hecʼkateko menkeda, “Cetʼ ektiạrite noako dom kạmi kana? Ar okoe noa ektiạri doe emakatʼmea?”
Jisui metatʼkoa, “Mitʼṭen kathań kulipea. Arpe lạiạń khan enḍekhan iń hõ apeń lạiapea oka ektiạrite noakoń kạmi kana mente.

Mase lạipe, Johan do bạptisma emokʼ reakʼ ektiạri oka khone ńamleda? Serma khon se manwako secʼ khon?” Unre onko do ako talare galmaraoketʼteko menkeda, “Menle khan bon ‘serma secʼ khon,’ adoe metabona, ‘cedakʼ enḍekhan Johan do bape pạtiạuadea?’
Ar bon menle khan ‘manwa secʼ khon,’ enḍekhan ma gadel hoṛ bon botorakokan, ente sanamkoge Johan do mitʼṭen nạbi menteko manaoedea.”
Onate onko do Jisuko roṛ ruạṛadea, “Ale do bale baḍaea.” Unre Jisui metatʼkoa, “Enḍekhan iń hõ bạń lạiapea oka ektiạrite noakoń kạmi kana.”
Ona tayom Jisui menkeda, cetʼlekape bujhạuekea? “Mitʼ hoṛren barea hoponkin tahẽkana. Uni do acʼren maraṅicʼ hopon ṭhen senkateye menkeda, ‘E beṭa teheń do darkha bagwante senkate kạmime.’
Hopontetʼe roṛ ruạṛkeda, ‘Iń do ohoń senlena.’ Menkhan tayomte uni do kastaoenteye calaoena.
Tayomte uni hoṛ do dosaricʼ hopon ṭhen senkate inạ kathageye menkeda. Dosaricʼ hopon doe roṛ ruạrkeda, ‘calakʼ kangeạń,’ menkhan bae senlena.

Ado nukin bar hoṛ modre okoeṭakʼ do apatakʼ sana lekakin kạmikeda?” Unre sostor baḍaekoko roṛ ruạṛadea, “Pạhilicʼge,” Jisui metatʼkoa, “Sạrigeń metapekana, mạsul uṭhạuko ar kusmbikoge ape khon lahare Isorakʼ rajreko bolokʼkana,

ente Johan do Isorakʼ sana leka calakʼ reakʼ hor udukʼape lạgitʼe hecʼlena, ar bape pạtiạuatʼtea. Menkhan mạsul uṭhạuko ar kusmbiko doko pạtiạuatʼtaea. Ona ńelte ape do mon hõ bape ạcurleda ar uniakʼ hõ bape pạtiạuatʼtaea.

“Mitʼṭen phen ańjompe. Mitʼṭen oṛakʼ kisạ̃ṛ do mitʼṭen darkha bagwane benaokeda ar ona beṛhaeteye eṭetʼ ạcurkada. Tayomte uni do ona bagwanre lelen kũnḍe la tearketʼte mitʼṭen usul pahra oṛakʼe benaokeda. Ar inạ tayom do casako ṭhen onae bạisạu oṭokatʼte acʼ do eṭakʼ disạmteye calaoena.
Ado tinre jo belekʼ reakʼ okte hoyena unre uni do acʼakʼ bhag hatao lạgitʼ casako ṭhen acʼren gutikoe kolketʼkoa.
Ar onko casako do uniren gutikoko sapʼketʼkote mitʼ doko dal urkedea, mitʼ doko gocʼkedea ar mitʼ do dhiriteko tińkedea.
Inạ tayom uni do pạhil khon arhõ saṅgeńokʼ gutikoe kolketʼkoa, menkhan casako do onko gutiko tulucʼ hõ onkageko beoharkeda.
Mucạtʼre darkha bagwanren kisạ̃ṛ do acʼren hoponge onko ṭhene kolkedea. Uni doe hudiskeda, acʼren hopon doko manotea.
Menkhan onko casa do hopontetʼko ńelkede khan akoreko menjoṅana, ‘nuige sompottiren mạlik doe hoyokʼa. Dela bon gojea,
inạ khan aboge mạlik bon hoyokʼa.’ Ar noa menkate hopontetʼko sapʼkedea ar darkha bagwan bahrete oḍok idikedeteko gocʼkedea.
Enḍekhan mase lạipe, darkha bagwanren kisạ̃ṛe hecʼlenre onko casa doe cekakoa?
Sostor baḍaekoko menkeda, “Uni do onko bạṛicʼ hoṛkoe maraokoa ar okoe casako okte nạpitre acʼakʼ jo reakʼ bhagko emae onko ṭhene bạisạu oṭokakʼa.”

Jisui metatʼkoa, “Sonot sostorkore tis hõ bape paṛhaoakada, ‘raj mistiriko okaṭakʼ dhiriko nihạ̃t giḍiletʼ, onage konac reakʼ asol dhiri hoyena; noa do Probhu khonge hoyena, ar aboakʼ mẽtʼ samaṅre do hahaṛawakʼge?’
Onateń metapekana, Isorakʼ raj do ape ṭhen khon rejogokʼa ar nonkan hoṛko ṭhen emogokʼa, one okoeakʼ jionre ona rajosṭi reakʼ jo ńelokʼkan.
Ar okoe ona dhirireye ńurokʼ uni doe gejerokʼa ar okoere ona ńurokʼ uni doe holoṅ ḍigir utạrokʼa.”
Maraṅ naekeko ar Phạrusiko do Jisuakʼ cecetʼakʼte perecʼ golpoko ańjomketʼ khan uni do ako reaṅgeye roṛeda menteko bujhạukeda.
Unre onko do Jisu sabeko menwana, menkhan gadel hoṛko botoratʼkote bako onkaleda, ente hoṛko do nạbi menteko bujhạuede kan tahẽkana.
Jisu do sostor baḍaeko cetʼako lạgitʼ arhõ mitʼṭen phene lạiatʼkoa,
“Serma raj do nonkan mitʼṭen raj lekana, one okoe do acʼren hopon lạgitʼ bapla bhoje tearketʼ.
Ado ona bhojre neota akanko hoho ạguko lạgitʼ acʼren gutikoe kolketʼkoa, menkhan neota akanko do hijukʼ bako rebenlena.
Unre uni do arhõ eṭakʼ gutiko noa menkateye kolketʼkoa, ‘ńelpe bhojiń tear akada, ar ińren daṅgra ar posaokoń gur akatʼkoa. Ar ńitokʼ do sanamakʼ sạt akana, ado dela hijukʼ tabonpe.’
“Menkhan neota akan hoṛko do gutikoakʼ katha bako hetawada; calao baṛayenako, okoe do acʼakʼ khette, okoe do acʼakʼ bạnij beparte.
Ar sarecʼko do rajren guti sapʼkateko opomanketʼkoa arko gocʼketʼkoa.
Unre raj doe raṅgaoena ar acʼren palṭonkoe kolketʼkote khũniạhikoe maraoketʼkoa ar onkoakʼ nagrahakoe jeretʼ giḍikatʼtakoa.
Ado acʼren gutikoe metatʼkoa, ‘bhoj do tear ṭhikgea, menkhan neota ocolenko do noaren lek bako tahẽkana.
Onate dobạṭiạkore calakʼpe, ar tinạkʼpe ńamko jotoge bapla bhojte hoho ạgukope.’
Unre onko gutiko do horkore oḍok senkate boge bạṛicʼ tinạkʼko ńamketʼko, jotogeko hoho ạguketʼkoa. Ar nonkate bapla oṛakʼ do onko peṛakote perecʼena.
“Inạ tayom raj do peṛa ńelko lạgitʼ bhitriteye boloyena,

ar bapla bhoj kicricʼ baṅ horokʼ akatʼ mitʼ hoṛe ńel ńamkedea. Raj do uniye kulikedea, ‘henda ho, bapla bhoj kicricʼ begorte cekate nonḍe dom boloyena?’ Khange uni doe keklesetʼena ar cetʼge bae roṛ ruạṛ daṛeada.
Unre raj do acʼren gutikoe metatʼkoa, ‘ti jaṅga toltaete bahre ńutre giḍikaepe. Onḍe do rakʼjoṅ ar togocʼ ḍaṭa hoyokʼa.’ ”
Ado mucạtʼre Jisui menkeda, “Ḍherkogeko hoho ocoakana, menkhan bachao ocoakanko doko thoṛagea.”
Unre Phạrusiko doko calaoena ar Jisu acʼakʼ kathate cekateko jhạliyea ona reakʼ sopolhako dhurạuena.

Onko do Herod secʼrenko sãote akoren celako uni ṭhenko kolketʼkoa. Onko do Jisuko metadea, “E Guru, alele baḍaea am dom sạri hoṛ kana. Ar Isorakʼ hor reaṅ sạritegem cetʼako kana. Am do okoe hõ bam hetawako kana, ente hoṛkoakʼ mẽtãhã do bam beṅgetʼakʼ kana.
Ado mase lạialeme, Moseakʼ ạn lekate Romren maharaj do cetʼ khajna emae ganokʼgea? Am do cetʼem menkea?”
Jisu do onkoakʼ monsubại baḍaeketʼ khane metatʼkoa, “E phạsiạrako, cedakʼpe biḍạuedeń kana?
Oka ṭaka khajnape em ona udukʼạńpe.” Onko do mitʼṭen Dinarko ạguadea.
Unre Jisui metatʼkoa, “Noa muṭhạn ar noa ńutum do okoeakʼ kana?
Adoko menkeda, “Romren maharajakʼ.” Jisui metatʼkoa, “Enḍekhan okaṭakʼ maharajakʼkan ona do maharajge emaepe, ar okaṭakʼ Isorakʼkan ona do Isorge emaepe.”
Noa katha ańjomkate onko doko hahaṛayena ar bạgiyadeteko calaoena.
Enhilokʼge adom Sạdukiko do Jisu ṭhenko hecʼena. Sạdukiko ṭhen do gocʼkoakʼ jiwetʼ beredokʼ reakʼ cetʼge bạnukʼa.
Onate onko do Jisuko kulikedea, “E Guru, Moseye menakada, jãhãe hoṛ ạuri gidrạ joṅreye gocʼlen khan bokottetʼ do hilit erae baplayete dadattetʼ lạgitʼ bõse teṅgokoma.
Ale nonḍe do eae boehako tahẽkana. Ar pạhilicʼ do baplakateye gocʼena ar begor gidrạwanrege acʼren oṛakʼ hoṛ do bokottetʼ ṭhene bạgi oṭoadea.
Onkage dosaricʼ, tesaricʼ, ar eaeyicʼ boeha hạbicʼ uni maejiuko baplakedea.
Ar mucạtʼre uni maejiu hõe gocʼena.
Enḍekhan gocʼkoko jiwetʼ beretʼlenre onko eae boehako modre uni maejiu do okoeṭakʼren bạhui hoyokʼa? Onko ma jotogeko doholede.”
Jisui roṛ ruạṛatʼkoa, “Bhuletʼ kanape, ente ape do sostor hõ bape baḍaea, ar Isorakʼ daṛe reaṅ hõ bape baḍaekana.
Gocʼkoko jiwetʼ beredokʼ tayom do bạhu hõ bako bạhu joṅa ar jãwãe hõ bako jãwãeokʼa; onko do sermaren goḍet lekako hoyokʼa.
Gocʼkoko jiwetʼ beredokʼ reaṅ Isor okae menakatʼ, ona do cetʼ sostorre bape paṛhao akada?
Onare olakana, ‘Ińge Abrahamren Isor, Isạhakren Isor, ar Jakobren Isor.’ Menkhan Isor do gocʼkoren Isor doe baṅkana, uni do jiwetʼkoren Isor kanae.”
Noa katha ańjomkate hoṛko do uniakʼ cecetʼakʼteko hahaṛayena.
Jisu do Sạdukikoakʼ mocae bond akatʼtakoa mente Phạrusikoko ańjomketʼ khan onko do mitʼ ṭhenko jarwayena.
Onko modren mitʼṭen ạn guru do Jisu biḍạuea menteye kulikedea,
“E Guru, Moseakʼ ạn-ạriko modre joto khon maraṅ hukum do okaṭakʼ kana?”
Jisu do uniye metadea, “Sanam khon maraṅ ar jạruṛokʼakʼ hukum do hoyokʼ kana,
‘Probhu amren Isor do, amakʼ goṭa ontorte, goṭa jiwite ar goṭa monte dulạṛem.’
Ona tayom dosarakʼ do; ‘am aḍe paseren hoṛ apnar leka dulạṛem.’
Moseakʼ ạn ar nạbikoakʼ sanam cecetʼakʼ do noa barea hukumrege ṭehãḍ menakʼa.”
Phạrusiko mitʼ ṭhenko jarwa akan tahẽkanre Jisu do onkoe kuliketʼkoa,
“Ape do Mạsi reaṅ cetʼpe bujhạueda? Uni do okoe bõsren kanae? Onkoko menkeda, “Dạud bõsren.”
Unre Jisui metatʼkoa, “Enḍekhan Dạud do cekate Mạsi do sonot Jiu reakʼ ạyurte Probhu menteye hohoade tahẽkana? Uniye menleda,
‘Probhu do ińren Probhui metadea, tin hạbicʼ amren bạiriko amakʼ jaṅga latarre ạuriń dohoko, un hạbicʼ am do ińakʼ jojomsa aṛere duṛupʼme.’
Enḍekhan Dạud do Mạsige Probhu menteye hohoade tahẽkan khan enḍekhan Mạsi do cekate Dạudren hopone hoedaṛekokʼa?”
Onko do okoege mitʼṭen katha hõ bako roṛ ruạṛ daṛeadea ar enhilokʼ khon okoege jãhãnakʼ kuliye bako dillakʼa.
Unre Jisu do gadel hoṛko ar acʼren celakoe metatʼkoae,
“Sostor baḍaeko ar Phạrusiko do ạn-ạriko cecetʼ babotre Moseakʼ jaegaregeko duṛupʼ akana.
Onate jãhãnakʼgeko metape ona kạmipe ar jãhãnakʼgeko hukumape ona senakʼpe. Menkhan onkoakʼ kạmi leka do alope kạmiya, ente onko do mocate okako roṛ kạmite ona do bako purạua.
Onko do hamal hamal bojha tolkate hoṛkoakʼ tarenreko ladea, menkhan ako do kạtupʼte hõ bako laṛao legaea.
Hoṛko ṭhen ńelocokʼ lạgitʼ onko do sanamakʼko kạmiyeda. Sonot sostor reakʼ olakʼ tạbijkoko lạṭuiya ar dhorom ńel ocokʼ lạgitʼ oyonakʼ reakʼ ańcarkore jeleń jeleńko dạsiya.
Ar bhojkore laha jaega ar sunạgogkore asol asol duṛupʼakʼre duṛupʼko kusiyakʼa.
Onko do hạṭiạ bajarkore johar ocokʼ ar hoṛko ṭhen guru men ocokʼgeko kusikʼkana.
“Ape do guru mente alope hoho ocokʼa, ente mitʼṭengeae aperen Guru do, ar ape do jotokogepe boeha kana.
Dhạrtire aperen baba mente okoe hõ alope metakoa, ente mitʼ goṭengeae aperen baba do, uni sermare menayicʼge.
Ạyurko hõ alope ńum ocokʼa, ente aperen ạyuricʼ doe mitʼ goṭengea, uni do Mạsige.
Ape modre maraṅicʼ do aperen sapʼdapʼicʼe hoyokʼma.
Okoe acʼteye usulokʼ, uni doe copotʼ ocokʼa ar okoe acʼteye copodokʼ uni doe usul ocokʼa.

“Hae, ape sostor baḍaeko, Phạrusiko ar phạsiạrako do! Ente ape do hoṛko samaṅre serma raj reakʼ duạrpe siń esetʼetʼ kana. Onare ape hõ bape bolokʼkana ar okoe bolokʼko kurumuṭukan onko hõ bape bolo ocoakokana.

“Hae, ape sostor baḍaeko, Phạrusiko ar phạsiarako do! Ape do hoṛko ṭhen ńel ocokʼ lạgitʼ jeleń jeleńpe koejoṅ kana, ar eṭakʼ secʼ do rạnḍi maejiukoakʼ oṛakʼ duạrkope jom ujạṛetʼtakoa. Onate ape do artetʼ bạ̃ṛti sạjại hoyokʼtapea.”

“Hae, ape sostor baḍaeko, Phạrusiko ar phạsiạrako do! Eken mitʼ hoṛ apeakʼ dhoromre ạguye lạgitʼ dhạrti reakʼ oka jaegare bape dãṛãn kana. Ar aperen celae hoelenre uni do ape khon hõ bạ̃ṛti norokre khadlekʼ lekpe hoeocoyede kana.

“Hae ape do! Apepe kãṛãgere hõ eṭakʼko horpe udukʼako kana. Arpe menetʼkana, jãhãe mundil ńutumteye kiriạlen khan cetʼ hõ baṅ hoyokʼtaea, menkhan mundil reakʼ sona ńutumteye kiriạlen khan uni doe dạyikokʼa.
E lelha ar kãṛãko, okaṭakʼ maraṅa? Sona, se ona mundil, one okaṭakʼ sona do Isor lạgitʼ begarge dohoakan?
Ape do arhõpe meneda, pinḍ ńutumte jãhãeye kiriạlen khan cetʼge baṅ hoyokʼa, menkhan jãhãe ona pinḍ cetanre samaṅ akan dãṛẽ ńutumteye kiriạkʼ uni do ona reakʼ dạyike hoyokʼa.
E kãṛãko, okaṭakʼ maraṅa? Ona dãṛẽ se pinḍ, one okaṭakʼ dãṛẽ do Isor lạgitʼ begar dohokʼkan?
Onate pinḍ ńutumte okoeye kiriạkʼkan uni do pinḍ ar ona cetan reakʼ jotowakʼ ńutumtegeye kiriạkʼ kana.
Okoe mundil ńutumteye kiriạkʼkan uni do mundil ar ona bhitrire tahenkạnicʼ ńutumtegeye kiriạkʼ kana.
Okoe serma ńutumteye kiriạkʼkan uni do Isorakʼ siṅghạson ar onare tahenkạnicʼ ńutumtegeye kiriạkʼkana.

“Hae, ape sostor baḍaeko, Phạrusiko ar phạsiạrako do! Ape do ṭhik lekage pudina, muhri ar jirạ reakʼ bhag do gel hạṭiń reakʼ mitʼ hạṭińge Isorpe emaekana; menkhan bicạr, mãyã, ar pạtiạr, okaṭakʼ do Moseakʼ ạn-ạriko reakʼ arhõ jạruṛanakʼ kan ona dope bạgi oṭoakada. Onate lahateakʼko são sãote tayomakʼko hõ manao lektapea.
E kãṛã ạyurko; mitʼṭen sĩkṛĩcʼ dope chakao giḍiyedea, menkhan ũṭ dope utʼgotʼkae kana.
“Hae, ape sostor baḍaeko, Phạrusiko ar phạsiạrako do! Ape do thạri bạṭi reakʼ bahretetʼgepe saphayeda, menkhan bhitritetʼ do luluṭ ar bin sambṛaoakʼte perecʼgea.
E kãṛã Phạrusiko, lahare ona reakʼ bhitritetʼ sapha maṛaṅpe, inạ khan bahre secʼ hõ saphakʼa.

“Hae, ape sostor baḍaeko, Phạrusiko ar phạsiarako do! Ape do cunte potao akatʼ topa lekanko kanape, one oka do bahre ma mońjge ńelokʼkan, menkhan bhitri do gocʼ hoṛakʼ jaṅ ar joto lekan mạilạte perecʼgea.
Onkage, ape hõ bahre do hoṛko ṭhen dhorompe ńel ocokʼkana, menkhan bhitri do bạṛicʼ ar kạite perecʼgetapea.
“Hae, ape sostor baḍaeko, Phạrusiko ar phạsiạrako do! Ape do nạbikoakʼ topa nawatepe tol aroyeda ar dhorom hoṛkoakʼ topakope sajaoeda.
Arpe meneda, ‘aboren hapṛamko bidạlrele tahẽlen khan nạbikoakʼ mãyãm joroyre onko são do ohole seletʼkokʼa.’
Onate apnar birudre gohape emeda je, ape do nạbikoko khũnletʼkoren hoponko kanape mente.
Enḍekhan aperen hapṛamko okaṭakʼko ehopʼ oṭoletʼ ona reakʼ sarecʼakʼ do apege mucạtʼ gotʼkakʼpe baṛe.
“E bińko ar bińkoren hoponko! Cekate norok reakʼ sạjại khonpe bańcaokʼa?

Onate iń do nạbiko, ạkilanko, ar sostor baḍaeko ape ṭheniń koletʼkoa. Ar ape do onko modren adomko dope gocʼkoa ar adomko dope kruskoa. Ar adomko do apeakʼ sunạgogkorepe cạbukkoa ar mitʼ nagraha khon eṭakʼ nagrahatepe laga baṛakoa.

Onate Habel reakʼ mãyãm khon Borkhiạren hopon Sakariạ reakʼ mãyãm hạbicʼ one sonot jaega ar pinḍ talarepe khũnlede, uni Sakariạ khũn hạbicʼ dhạrtiren tinạkʼ bin dusạnkoko khũn ocoakan onko sanamkoakʼ mãyãm reakʼ dạyipe hoyokʼa.
Sạrigeń metapekana, niạ bidạlren hoṛkoge ona mãyãm reakʼ dạyiko hoyokʼa.

“E Jerusalem! E Jerusalem! Am do nạbikom khũnetʼkoa ar am ṭhen kol ocokʼkanko do dhiritem tińetʼkoa. Sim eṅga cetʼleka acʼren hoponko acʼakʼ phạ̃kṛạ̃kʼ latarreye guṅgutʼko onkage iń hõ amren hoṛko hạr samṭaokoń menleda, menkhan onko do bako rebenlena.
E Jerusalemren hoṛko, apeakʼ oṛakʼ do ujạṛokʼa.
Ińiń metapekana, tin hạbicʼ ạuripe men ‘Bhorangeae Probhu ńutumte darae kanicʼ do’ un hạbicʼ ape do ar bape ńeleńa.”
Jisu mundil khone oḍok calakʼkan tahẽkanre celako do mundil reakʼ bhitko udukʼae lạgitʼ uni ṭhenko hecʼ sorena.
Unre Jisui metatʼkoa, “Ape ma noakope ńeletʼ, menkhan ińiń metapekana, nonḍe do mitʼṭen dhiri hõ eṭakʼ dhiri cetanre baṅ tahena, joto do rạputʼ giḍikʼa”

Jisu Joitun burureye duṛupʼ akan tahẽkanre celako uni ṭhen hape hapete hecʼkateko metadea, “Lạialeme, noako do tis hoyokʼa ar oka lekan cinhạko hotetele bujhạu daṛeakʼa amakʼ hijukʼ ar jug mucạdokʼ reakʼ okte do seṭer akana mente?”
Jisui roṛ ruạṛatʼkoa, “Men sontorokʼpe, okoe hõ jemon aloko bulạupe,
ente ạḍi hoṛ in ńutumte hecʼkateko mena, ‘Iń doń Mạsi kana,’ ar ạḍi hoṛko bulạukoa.
Ape do lạṛhại reakʼ saḍekope ańjomma. Menkhan sontorokʼpe! Noate alope botorokʼa, ente noako do hoyokʼgea; menkhan unre hõ mucạtʼtetʼ do ạuriakʼa.
Mitʼ jạt eṭakʼ jạt upạrte ar mitʼ rajosṭi eṭakʼ rajosṭi upạrteko lạṛhạiya. Jaega jaegakore akal hoyokʼa ar dhạrti laṛaokʼa.
Menkhan noako do eken bedon reakʼ ehopʼkana.
“Unre santaope lạgitʼko soprotʼpea arko gocʼpea. Iń iạte sanam hoṛko hirkhạwapea.
Unre ạḍi hoṛko tạkijokʼa ar mitʼ hoṛ do eṭakʼ hoṛe soprotea are hirkhạwaea.
Ạḍi utạr eṛe nạbikoko hijukʼa ar aema hoṛko bulạukoa.
Ar bedhoromge ḍherokʼte ḍher hoṛkoakʼ dulạṛ do reaṛokʼa.
Menkhan mucạtʼ hạbicʼ okoeye ṭarhao tahen uni do bańcaoe ńama.
Sanam jạtko ṭhen goha emokʼ lạgitʼ serma raj reakʼ bhage sombat do goṭa dhạrtire porcarokʼa ar ona tayom do mucạtʼ hoyokʼa.
“Daniel nạbi hotete ujạṛ reakʼ hirkhạwakʼ reaṅ oka roṛ akan ona sonot jaegare teṅgo akanpe ńellere (okoeye paṛhaoetʼkan uni doe bujhạuma),
Unre Jihudạre tahenko do buruteko dạṛma.
Ar sạṛimre menaeicʼ do oṛakʼ khon jãhãnakʼ hatao lạgitʼ latarte aloe pheḍokʼma.
Okoe khetreye tahen uni hõ acʼakʼ oyonakʼ ạgui lạgitʼ aloe ruạṛma.
Unre bhạrti hoṛmoko ar gidrạ nunuako kankore do hae hae!
Koejoṅpe jemon rabaṅ din se jirạukʼ mãhãre dạdạṛ alo hoyokʼtape.
Unre nunạkʼ bạṛicʼ kosṭo hoyokʼa one oka do dhạrti etohopʼ khon ńit hạbicʼ baṅ hoeakan ar tisge baṅ hoyokʼa.
Ona saset reakʼ dinko Isor bae khaṭo lekhan okoe hõ ohoko bańcaolena. Menkhan acʼren bachao hoṛko lạgitʼ Isor do onako dine khaṭoea.
“Unre jãhãegeko metape, ‘ńelpe, Mạsi do nonḍe menaea,’ se ‘hanḍe menaea,’ alope pạtiạuakʼa;
ente aema eṛe Mạsi ar eṛe nạbikoko hijukʼa ar maraṅ maraṅ hahaṛa kạmi ar cinhạkoko uduga jemon Isorren bachao akan hoṛkoko bulạu daṛeako.
Ńelpe, iń do laharege noakoń lại dohowatʼpea.
“Onate hoṛko metape khan, ‘ńelpe, uni do hahaṅkarre menaea,’ alope oḍok calakʼa. Se ‘uni do bhitri oṛakʼre menaea,’ alope pạtiạukʼa.
Cetʼleka bijli do purub khon oḍokokʼte pạchim hạbicʼ malkao calakʼ, onkage Manwa Hopon reakʼ seṭerokʼ hõ hoyokʼa.
Jãhãrege mạ̃ṛĩ tahen onḍege gidi hõko jarwakʼa.
“Onako din reakʼ santao tayomge siń cando doe ńutokʼa, ar ńindạ cando do bae terdeja, ipilko hõ coṭ khonko ńurokʼa ar siń cando, ńindạ cando, ar ipilko do bako ṭarhao tahena.
Unre Manwa Hopon reakʼ cinhạ do sermare ńelokʼa. Ar dhạrtiren sanam gusṭirenko dukte koṛamko ceṭagokʼa. Onko do Manwa Hopon daṛe ar ṭhonokante rimilte hijukʼkanko ńelea.
Ar murukte siṅgạ saḍekʼa ar ona são sãote Manwa Hopon do acʼren goḍetkoe kolkoa. Onko do dhạrti reakʼ mitʼ mucạtʼ khon eṭakʼ mucạtʼ hạbicʼ ar ponon secʼ khon acʼren bachao akan hoṛkoko jarwakoa.
“Loa dare ńelte cetʼjoṅpe. Ona reakʼ ḍạrko bale ruạṛkate sakam sagen len khangepe baḍae daṛeakʼ kana je setoṅ din do seṭerakana.
Onkage ape hõ noako sanamakʼpe ńellere baḍaepe, Manwa Hopon doe seṭer akana, hẽ duạr ṭhenge menaea.
Sạrigeń metapekana, tinre noako joto hoyokʼa unre niạ bidạlren thoṛa hoṛ do bańcaoko tahena.
Serma ar dhạrti do cabakʼa, menkhan ińakʼ katha do jaejug hạbicʼ tahena.
“Menkhan okoe hõ ona din ar ona okte reakʼ do bako baḍaea, sermaren goḍetko hõ baṅ, Hopon hõ baṅ, eken Babageye baḍaea.
“Noah oktere cetʼleka hoelen onkage Manwa Hopone seṭerokʼre hõ hoyokʼa.
Ente ḍubạ laha dinkore Noah do jahajre ạuriye bolokʼ hạbicʼ hoṛko doko jom ńũyetʼ tahẽkana, bạhu joṅkan tahẽkana ko arko jãwãyokʼkan tahẽkana.
Ar ḍubạ dakʼ hecʼkate sanamko ạuriye ạtu idiko hạbicʼ onko do cetʼge bako bujhạu daṛeada. Manwa Hoponakʼ hijukʼ hõ ṭhik onkage hoyokʼa.
Unre bar hoṛ do goḍarekin tahena; mitʼ hoṛ doe idiocokʼa, ar eṭagicʼ doe bạgi oṭokʼa.
Barea maejiu do jantekin riritʼa; mitʼṭen doe idi ocokʼa, ar eṭagicʼ doe bạgi oṭokʼa.
“Onate ape do jagwar akae tahenpe, ente bape baḍae hilokʼrege aperen Probhu doe hijukʼa.
Menkhan noa baḍaepe, oṛakʼ kisạ̃ṛe baḍaele khan oka pohor kombṛoe hijukʼa, enḍekhan uni do ebhengeye tahẽkokʼa, ar acʼakʼ oṛakʼ do ohogeye bhugạkʼ ocolea.
Onate ape hõ sapṛao akan tahenpe, ente bape hudisetʼkan ghuṛirege Manwa Hopon doe hijukʼa.
“Uni pạtiạricʼ ar budanicʼ guti doe okoe kana, one okoe acʼren kisạ̃ṛ do guti ar kạ̃ṛmĩko okte oktere jomakʼ emakoa mente acʼ gharońjrenko cetanreye dohokede?
Bhạgangeae uni guti do, one uni kisạ̃ṛtetʼ onkayetʼkane hecʼ ńame.
Sạrigeń metapekana, unige acʼakʼ menakʼtaeakʼ sanamakʼko cetanreye dohoyea.
Menkhan, uni bạṛicʼ golam do acʼakʼ monreye menle khan, ‘ińren kisạ̃ṛ do hijukʼe bilomeda.’
Ar acʼ sãoten gutiko dadale ehob, ar bulokʼko tulucʼe jom ńũi;
Enḍekhan guti bae ńel horakatʼ dinre ar bae baḍae akatʼ ghuṛire uni kisạ̃ṛ doe hijukʼa.
Ar unre uni doe makʼ paṛagea ar phạsiạrako tulucʼ bakhrae niṭaea. Onḍe do rakʼjoṅ ar togocʼ ḍaṭa hoyokʼa.
“Unre serma raj do nonkan gel tetre kuṛiko leka hoyokʼa one okoe do gate kuṛiren Jãwãe daram ạguye lạgitʼ diuhewante bahreteko oḍok calaoen.
Onko modre mõṛẽ goṭen do lilhi ar mõṛẽ goṭen do budanko tahẽkana.
Lilhi kuṛiko do diuheko idiletʼgea menkhan soṅgete sunum do bako idi toraleda.
Ar budan kuṛiko do akoakʼ diuhe sãote cukạkʼre sunum hõko iditorawana.
Ado Jãwãe beṭa hijukʼe bilomokʼkante onko do dudṛum sapketʼkoa ar jotogeko jạpitʼkeda.
“Khan tala ńindạ jokhecʼ hoho ańjomena, ‘hạni ńelepe, Jãwãe beṭa doe hijukʼ kana! Ma oḍokokʼpe ar ataṅ daramepe.’
Unre onko tetre kuṛi do beretʼkate diuheko jutketʼtakoa.
Ar lilhi kuṛiko do budan kuṛikoko metatʼkoa, ‘apeakʼ sunum khon den thoṛa emalepe, ente diuhe do ĩṛĩjokʼ kantalea.’
Unre budan kuṛikoko roṛ ruạṛkeda, ‘bale emokʼa, ente oka menakʼtale onate ape ar ale lạgitʼ do ohoge kulạulena. Ape do boroṅ ạkhrińko ṭhen senkate kiriń ạgujoṅpe.’

Ado onko lilhi kuṛi sunum kirińko sen akan tahẽkanrege Jãwãe beṭa doe hecʼena. Ar unre sapṛao akan tahẽkan kuṛiko do Jãwãe beṭa sãote bapla oṛakʼteko boloyena. Ar sanamkoko boloyen khan silpiń do sińena.
“Tayomte onko lilhi kuṛiko do hecʼkateko menkeda, E Probhu, E Probhu, ‘duạr jhicʼaleme.’
Unre Jãwãe beṭa doe roṛ ruạṛatʼkoa, ‘sạrigeń metapekana, iń do bạń orom akatʼpea.’”
“Onate jagwar akae tahenpe, ente ona din se ona okte reakʼ katha do bape baḍaea.”
“Serma raj do nonkan mitʼṭen hoṛ lekana, one okoe do eṭakʼ disạmte calakʼ lahare acʼren gutiko hoho jarwakate acʼakʼ sanam sompotti reakʼ bhar onkoakʼ tireye jimạ oṭokatʼ.
Uni do gutikoakʼ daṛe leka mitʼ hoṛ do mõṛẽ hajar, ar mitʼ hoṛ do bar hajar ar eṭakʼicʼ do mitʼ hajar ṭakae emadea.
Ado okoe mõṛẽ hajar ṭakae ńamletʼ uni do onateye bạnij beparketʼte arhõ mõṛẽ hajar ṭakae labkeda.
Ar okoe bar hajar ṭakae ńamletʼ uni hõ onkakate arhõ bar hajar ṭakae labkeda.
Menkhan okoe mitʼ hajar ṭaka ńamletʼ uni do senkate ote lakeda ar acʼren kisạ̃ṛakʼ ṭakae topa okokada.
“Ado ḍher din tayom kisạ̃ṛ do hecʼkate onko gutiko ṭhen khon hisạbe khojkeda.
Khange okoe mõṛẽ hajar ṭakae ńamletʼ uni do arhõ mõṛẽ hajar ṭaka ạgu darakateye menkeda, ‘E Probhu, am do mõṛẽ hajar ṭakam jimạwạdiń tahẽkana.

Ńelme, iń do arhõ mõṛẽ hajar ṭakań lab akada.’ Unre acʼren kisạ̃ṛe menkeda, ‘bes akadam. E bhage ar pạtiạr golam. Am do thoṛawakʼre pạtiạrem tahẽkante ḍher okocʼakʼko cetanreń dohokama. Ar dela hijukʼte iń sãote rạskạ seledokʼme.’
“Ar okoe bar hajar ṭakae ńamletʼ uni hõ hecʼkateye menkeda, ‘E Probhu, am do bar hajar ṭakam jimạwạdiń tahẽkana. Ar nõkʼõe ńelme, ona khon arhõ bar hajar ṭakań lab akada.’
Unre uniren kisạ̃ṛ doe menkeda, ‘bes akadam, E bhage ar pạtiạr golam. Am do thoṛawakʼre pạtiạrem tahẽkante ạḍi okocʼakʼko cetanreń dohokama. Ar dela hijukʼte, iń sãote rạskạ seledokʼme.’

“Menkhan okoe mitʼ hajar ṭakae ńamletʼ uni do hecʼkateye menkeda, ‘E Probhu, baḍae akatʼme tahẽkạnạń am dom kuṭhin hoṛ kana. Ente am do okare itạ bam erakatʼ onḍe khonem ireda ar okare bam chiṭạu akatʼ onḍe khon dom halaṅeda.
Onate iń do botorte amakʼ ṭaka otreń topa dohoakatʼ tahẽkana. Ar ńelme, amakʼ jinis do amakʼge menakʼa.’
Khange acʼren kisạ̃ṛ doe roṛ ruạṛadea, ‘E bạṛicʼ ar asaṅpoḍa golam! Baḍaekan tahẽkange com okare bạń er akatʼ onḍe khoniń ireda ar okare bạń chiṭạu akatʼ onḍe khoniń halaṅeda.
Enḍekhan ińakʼ ṭaka do cedakʼ mahajon ṭhen bam doholeda? Inạ khan hecʼkate iń do ṭaka ar ona reakʼ sud hoń ńamkea.’
Ona tayom uni do eṭakʼkoe metatʼkoa, ‘uni ṭhen khon ṭaka hataope ar okoeakʼ gel hajar ṭaka menakʼtae uni emaepe.
Ente okoeakʼ menakʼtae uni do arhõe emocokʼa ar onate uniakʼ do aema hoyokʼtaea. Menkhan okoeakʼ bạnukʼ uni do oka menakʼtae ona hõe recʼ ocokʼa.
Uni okoḍa guti do bahre ńutre gidikaepe; onḍe do rakʼjoṅ ar togocʼ ḍaṭa hoyokʼa.’
“Manwa Hopon do acʼren serma goḍetko sãote acʼakʼ ṭhonokanteye hecʼlenre uni do ṭhonok reakʼ siṅghạsonreye duṛupʼa.
Ar sanam jạtren hoṛko do uni samaṅreko jarwa ocokʼa. Cetʼleka gupiyicʼ do bhiḍi ar meromkoe begarko onkage uni do sanam hoṛkoe begarkoa.
Uni do acʼakʼ jojom secʼre bhiḍiko ar leṅga secʼre meromkoe dohokoa.
“Inạ tayom raj do acʼakʼ jojom secʼrenkoe metakoa, ‘Okoe ińren Babawakʼ bhorpe ńamakatʼ, dela hijukʼpe. Dhạrti reakʼ rehetʼ khon okaṭakʼ rajosṭiye tear akatʼpe ona baṛe ạidạrijoṅpe.
Ente reṅgecʼiń tahẽkanre jomakʼpe emadiń tahẽkana; tetaṅ ledińa arpe ńũ ocoledińa; upriạń tahẽkana arpe ataṅ sãohãledińa;
laṅgaṭiń tahẽkana arpe kicricʼledińa; ruạreń paṛaolena arpe jotonledińa; ar hajotreń tahẽkana arpe hiriledińa.’
“Unre dhoromkoko roṛ ruạṛaea, ‘E Probhu, tis baṅ reṅgecʼletʼme ńeltele jom ocoletʼme se tetaṅeletʼme ńeltele ńũ ocoletʼme?
Tis baṅ upriạm tahẽkantele ataṅ sãohãletʼme, se laṅgaṭem tahẽkantele kicricʼletʼme?
Ar tis baṅ ruạkʼ se hajotrem tahẽkanrele hiriletʼme?’
“Ado raje roṛ ruạṛakoa, ‘sạrigeń metapekana, ińren noko huḍiń utạr boehako modre jãhãe mitʼ hoṛpe nonkawade enḍekhan unre ińgepe onkawạdiń tahẽkana.’
“Tayomte uni do acʼakʼ leṅga secʼren hoṛkoe metakoa, ‘E sarapanko, iń ṭhen khon sạṅgińokʼpe. Soetan ar uniren celako lạgitʼ tearakan jaejug seṅgelre calakʼpe.
Tinre reṅgecʼledińa unre ape do jomakʼ bape emadińạ; tetaṅ ledińa ar bape ńũ ocoledińa;
Upriạń tahẽkana ar bape ataṅ sãohãledińạ; laṅgaṭiń tahẽkana ar bape kicricʼledińa; ruạ haso ar hajotreń tahẽkana ar bape hiriledińa.’
“Unreko metaea, ‘E Probhu, tis baṅ reṅgecʼletʼme, se tetaṅletʼme, se upriạ, se laṅgaṭ, se ruạ, se hajotre ńelkate bale sapʼ soratʼme?’
“Uni do roṛ ruạṛ akoteye metakoa, ‘sạrigeń metapekana, noko ińren huḍiń utạrko modre jãhãe mitʼ hoṛ tinạkʼ bape nonkawade, unạkʼge iń hõ bape onkawạdińa.’ ”
Ona tayom Jisui menkeda, “Noko hoṛ do jaejug sạjạiteko calakʼa, menkhan dhoromko do jaejug jionko ńama.”
Ado noako kathae mucạtʼketʼ khan Jisu do acʼren celakoe metatʼkoa,
“Baḍaegeape bar din tayom khange sen-parom porob do hoyokʼa, ar Manwa Hopon do kruse lạgitʼko soprotea.”
Menkhanko menkeda, “Porobre do babo onkaea; baṅkhan disạm hoṛko talare gulmal ehopʼ botejokʼa.”
Jisu do Bethaniạre murhucʼ jom rugi Simonakʼ oṛakʼreye tahẽkanre mitʼṭen maejiu do uni ṭhene hecʼena.
Ar mitʼṭen ponḍ dhiri reakʼ cukạkʼre ạḍi damanakʼ mahkaokʼ sunume ạgu darakeda. Ar Jisu tinre jojome duṛupʼ akan tahẽkan unre uni do ona mahkaokʼ sunum bohokʼreye duladea.
Ona ńelte celako do edreyenteko menkeda, “Nunạkʼ damanakʼ jinis do cedakʼ nosṭo giḍikakʼ hoyokʼ kana?
Noa ma damtege coṅ ạkhrińkokʼ ar reṅgecʼ orecʼko emkeko.”
Jisu onae baḍaeketʼ khan onkoe metatʼkoa, “Nui do cedakʼpe mon duk ocoyede kana? Uni do iń lạgitʼ bhageakʼgeye kạmi akada.
Ente reṅgecʼ orecʼkoma jaoge ape tulucʼ menakʼko, menkhan iń do jao okte bape ńameńa.
Uni do hoṛmore mahkaokʼ sunume dulạdińte topayiń lạgitʼe sapṛaoe edeńkana.
Sạrigeń metapekana, dhạrti reakʼ jãhã jaegarege bhage sombat porcarokʼ, onḍege nui maejiue kạmiakatʼ reakʼ katha hõ disại lạgitʼ lại torakʼa.”
Unre gelbar celako modren Jihudạ Iskạriotko metae cela do maraṅ naekeko ṭhen senkateye metatʼkoa,
“Apeakʼ tire Jisuń soprot lekhan cetʼpe emạńa?” Unre maraṅ naekeko do pegel rupạ ṭaka lekhawadeteko emadea.
Ona tayom khon Jihudạ do Jisu soprote lạgitʼ ạte ńam baṛayetʼ tahẽkana.
Ado bin khạmianakʼ piṭhạ porob reakʼ pạhil dinre celako do Jisu ṭhen hecʼkateko menkeda, “Sen-parom porob reakʼ bhoj do okarele tearama mentem menjoṅ kana?”
Jisui metatʼkoa, “Naṅgrahate calaokate uni hoṛ metaepe, Gurui meneda, ‘ińakʼ okte do sorakana. Iń do ińren celako tulucʼ amakʼ oṛakʼre sen-parom porobiń porobokʼa.’ ”
Onate celako do Jisui hukumatʼko tahẽkan leka sen-parom porob reakʼ bhojko tearkeda.
Ado ạyupʼen khan Jisu do onko gelbar celako tulucʼ jojome duṛupʼena.
Arko jojomkan tahẽkanre uni doe metatʼkoa, “Sạrigeń metapekana, ape modre mitʼ hoṛ bạirikoakʼ tireye soprotińạ.”
Unre celako do ạḍiko bhabnayente mimitʼ hoṛ Jisu kuliyeko ehopʼena, “Probhu uni do cetʼ iń kạnạń?”
Uniye roṛ ruạratʼkoa, “Iń tulucʼ bạṭire okoe tiye topoyetʼkan unige iń doe soprotińạ.

Manwa Hopon reaṅ sonot sostorre okaleka olakan onkage uni doe gujukʼa, menkhan uni hoṛre do hae hae, okoe bạirikoakʼ tire Manwa Hopone soprot ocoye! Uni do aloe janamlen khange honaṅ boge hoekokʼtaea.”
Ado okoe bạirikoakʼ tire Jisui soprot ocoye lạgidokʼkan tahẽkan uni Jihudại menkeda, “Guru, uni do cetʼ iń kạnạń?” Jisu do uniye metadea, “Am do ṭhikgem meneda.”
Arko jojomkan tahẽkanre, Jisu do piṭhạ halaṅkateye bhorada. Ar kecakʼkate celako ematʼkoteye menkeda, “Ne ataṅpe ar jompe, noa do ińakʼ hoṛmo kana.”
Inạ tayom bạṭi halaṅkate gun manao joharkate ematʼkoteye, metatʼkoa, “Ne, noa reakʼ ńũiype sanamko,
ente noa do bondobos reakʼ ińakʼ mãyãm kana, oka do ạḍi hoṛko ńutumte jorokʼkan kại ikạkʼ lạgitʼ.
Ińiń metapekana, ińren Babawakʼ rajosṭire ape tulucʼ nawanakʼ darkha rasa ạuriń ńũi hạbicʼ ńit khon noa do ar bạń ńũiya.”
Ado mitʼṭen sarhao sereńate onko doko oḍokente Jạitun buruteko rakapʼena.
Unre Jisui metatʼkoa, “Niạ ńindạ ape jotoge ińrepe tạkijokʼa. Sonot sostorre olakana, ‘gupiyicʼ iń gojea, enḍekhan palren bhiḍikoko chir chạturokʼa.’
Menkhan ińiń jiwetʼ beredokʼ tayom iń do ape lahate Gạlilteń calakʼa.”
Unre Patras doe roṛ ruạṛadea, “Amre jotokogeko tạkicʼlenre hõ iń do ohogeń tạkicʼlena.”
Jisu do uniye metadea, “Sạrigeń metamkana, niạ ńindạge sim sạnḍi ạuriye ragre am do pe dhaoem baṅeńa.”
Patrase menkeda, “Am saõte gujukʼ hoyokʼtińre hõ iń do ohogeń baṅlema.” Ar eṭakʼ celako hõ onka lekako menkeda.
Unre Jisu do onko tulucʼ Gethsemaneko metakʼ mitʼṭen jaegate senkate celakoe metatʼkoa, “Iń do onḍe senkate tin hạbicʼ iń koejoṅ un hạbicʼ ape do nonḍe duṛupʼ hataṛokʼpe.”
Noa menkate uni do Patras ar Sabdaeren banar hopon soṅge toraketʼkinteye calaoena. Ar bhabnate uniakʼ mon do dhak dhakaokʼ ehopʼentaea.
Uniye metatʼkoa, “Gujukʼ dạkhil jiwi lokʼkantińa. Ape do onḍege tahẽ hataṛokʼpe ar iń tulucʼ jagwar akae tahenpe.”

Khan laha ńokʼ senkate uni doe taberena ar koeketʼteye menkeda, “E Baba, hoedaṛeakʼ khan noa duk reakʼ bạṭi do iń khon pharakokʼma. Enhõ ińiń menjoṅkan leka do baṅ, bickom amakʼ sanalekage baṛe hoyokʼma.”
Inạ tayom acʼren celako ṭhene hecʼen khan jạpitʼ akatʼe ńelketʼkoa. Uni do Patrase metadea, “Iń tulucʼ cetʼ mitʼ ghonṭa hõ jagwar bape tahẽ daṛeada?
Jagwar tahenpe ar koejoṅpe jemon biḍạure alope paṛaokʼ. Jiure sana menakʼgea, menkhan hoṛmo do nijorgea.”
Uni do ruạṛ senkate dosar dhao koeketʼteye menkeda, “E Baba, noa bạṭi iń ṭhen khon baṅ pharakokʼ khan begor onań ńũite, enḍekhan amakʼ sanaleka baṛe hoyokʼma.”
Adoe ruạr hecʼen khan arhõ jạpitʼ akatʼe ńamketʼkoa, ente onko do dudṛumte ạḍiko laṅga akan tahẽkana.
Uni do arhõe bạgi oṭoatʼkote tesar dhao senkate inạ kathageye koekeda.
Ar celako ṭhen hecʼkateye metatʼkoa, “Ape do ńit hõpe jạpitʼ jirạu joṅkana? Ńelpe, okte do seṭerena; Manwa Hopon do kại hoṛkoakʼ tireko soprotea.
Ma beretʼpe, dela bon calakʼa. Ńelpe, bạirikoakʼ tire okoeye soprotiń uni doe seṭerena.”

Jisui roroṛkan tahẽkanrege, ńelpe, Jihudạ do onḍeye hecʼena. Uni do gelbar celako modren mitʼ hoṛe tahẽkana. Uni sãote ạḍi utạr hoṛ do tarwaṛe ar ṭhengawanteko hecʼena. Onko do maraṅ naekeko ar murubikoko kolakatʼko tahẽkana.
Jisu bạirikoakʼ tire okoeye sapʼ ocoye uni do onko tulucʼ mitʼṭecʼ cinhại ṭhik dohoakatʼ tahẽkana; uni doe metatʼko tahẽkana, “Jãhãeṭakʼgeń cokʼae, uni kangea, ape do unigepe sabeya.”
Onate Jihudạ do Jisu ṭhen hecʼkateye menkeda, “Johar Guru,” Ar noa menkateye cokʼadea.
Jisu do uniye metadea, “E gate, okaṭakʼ lạgitʼem hecʼakan, ma onkaeme.” Ar soṅge soṅgete onko hoṛ do hecʼkate Jisuko sapʼkedea.
Jisu soṅgete tahẽkanko modren mitʼ hoṛ do acʼakʼ tarwaṛeye oḍokkeda ar maraṅ naekeren gutiyakʼ mitʼṭen luture heseketʼtaea.
Unre Jisui metadea, “Amakʼ tarwaṛe do khapre bhoraokakʼme. Ente tarwaṛe sasapʼko jotoge tarwaṛeteko gujukʼa.
Am do cetʼ bam moneakʼ kana, ińren Babań hohoae khan ńitge hajar hajar serma goḍetko cetʼ bae kolạńạ? Enḍekhan cekate sostorko reakʼ katha do purạukʼa?
Sostorre ma coṅ olge menakʼ, noako hoyokʼ do jạruṛgea.”
Uni do gadel hoṛkoe metatʼkoa, “Iń do cetʼ ḍạku kạnạń, onate tarwaṛe ar ṭheṅgawante iń sasapʼpe hecʼakana? Iń ma coṅ jaoge mundilre duṛupʼkateń cetʼakokan tahẽkan, ar unrema bacope sapʼlediń.
Menkhan noa joto do hoyena jemon nạbiko reakʼ olakʼko purạukʼ.” Unre celako do Jisuko ńir bạgiadea.
Ado okoeko Jisuko sapʼlede onko do maraṅ naeke Kaeapha ṭhenko idikedea. Onḍe do sostor baḍaeko ar murubikoko jarwa akan tahẽkana.
Patras do pharak pharakte maraṅ naekeakʼ raca hạbicʼ Jisui pańja idikedea ar mucạtʼ hạbicʼe ńela mente bhitrite bolokate sipạhiko sãoteye duṛupʼ panteyena.
Maraṅ naekeko ar maraṅ bạisiren sanam hoṛko do Jisu goje lạgitʼ eṛe gohakoko ńam baṛayetʼko tahẽkana.
Ar aema eṛe gohako hõko hecʼlengea, menkhan onko do ṭhik leka goha bako ńamleda. Ado mucạtʼre bar hoṛ hecʼkate kin menkeda,
“Nui hoṛe menakada, Isorakʼ mundil iń dhaṅ dhasera ar pe mãhãte arhõń benao ruạṛa.”
Unre maraṅ naeke do teṅgoyente Jisui metadea, “Am do cetʼ jãhãnakʼ bam roṛ ruạṛa? Am upạrte nukin do cetʼ gohakin emeda?”
Menkhan Jisu do hapegeye tahẽyena. Maraṅ naeke do arhõe metadea, “Jiwetʼ Isorreń kiriạ ocoyetʼme kana, lại aleme, am do Mạsi, Isorren Hopon kanam se baṅ?”
Jisu do uniye metadea, “Hẽ am do ṭhikgem menakada; enḍekhan arhõń metapekana, ńit khon Manwa Hopon do sanam daṛean Isorakʼ jojomsa aṛere duṛupʼakan ar rimilte hijukʼ kanpe ńelea.”
Khange maraṅ naeke do acʼakʼ kicricʼ oṛecʼketʼteye menkeda “Nui do Isore opoman akadea. Gohako reakʼ ar cetʼ jạruṛabona? Ńitge coṅ ape hõpe ańjomketʼ, uni do Isore opomane kana.
Cetʼpe bujhạueda?” Onkoko roṛ ruạṛkeda, “Nui do gocʼ ocokʼ lek kanae.”
Unre mẽtʼãhãreko thoadea, arko kilạukedea arko thapakedea.
Adoko metadea, “E Mạsi, mase lạime, okoeye dalketʼmea?”
Unre Patras do bahre racareye duṛupʼ akan tahẽkana. Ar mitʼṭen kạ̃ṛmĩ kuṛi do hecʼkateye metadea, “Am hõ coṅ Gạlilren Jisu tulucʼem tahẽkan.”
Menkhan Patras do jotoko samaṅre baṅketʼteye menkeda, “Am cetʼem menetʼkan ona do bạń baḍaea.”
Inạ tayom Patras do duạr ṭhene oḍok senena. Uni ńelte eṭagicʼ kạ̃ṛmĩ do onḍenko hoṛkoe metatʼkoa, “Nui hoṛ hõ Nasaretren Jisu sãoteye tahẽkana.”
Unre Patras doe kiriạyena ar baṅketʼteye menkeda, “Uni hoṛ do baḍae hõ bạń baḍae akadea.”
Mitʼ ghạṛi tayom onḍe teṅgo akan tahẽkanko hõ Patras ṭhen hecʼkateko menkeda, “Khạṭige am hõ onko modren kangeam; ente amakʼ kathategem sapʼocokʼ kana.”
Unre Patras doe sarapana ar kiriạente memene ehopʼena, “Uni hoṛ do baḍae hõ bạń baḍae akadea.” Ar unrege saṭmente sim sạnḍiye rakʼgotʼkeda.
Unre Patras do Jisui metade tahẽkan kathae disạkeda, “Sim sạnḍi ạuriye ragre pe dhaoem baṅeńa.” Ar bahrete oḍok senkate uni do hũk hũke rakʼkeda.
Ado setakʼen khan maraṅ naekeko ar murubiko do Jisu goje reakʼko goṭakeda.
Onko do Jisu tolkateko idikedete disạm cakʼlaoicʼ Pilạt ṭhenko soprotkedea.
Ar bạirikoakʼ tireye soprotlede Jihudạ do Jisuko bicạr dusikede khan ạḍi ãṭe kastaoena. Uni do maraṅ naeke ar murubiko ona pegel rupạ ṭaka ruạṛatʼkoteye metatʼkoa,
“Kại akadạń, ente bin dusạnicʼ gocʼ ocoye lạgitʼ iń soprot akadea.” Onkoko metadea, “Onate aleakʼ do cetʼ? Amge ńeljoṅme.”
Unre Jihudạ do ona ṭaka mundilre capatʼ giḍi oṭokateye calaoena are pạsi gocʼena.
Ar maraṅ naekeko do ona ṭaka halaṅkateko menkeda, “Mundil reakʼ sundukre noa do doho baṅ ṭhikokʼa, ente noa do mãyãm reakʼ dam kana”
Ado solha mitʼkate ona ṭakate upriạ hoṛ topako lạgitʼ kuṅkạlakʼ mitʼṭen goḍako kirińkeda.
Onate teheń hạbicʼ ona goḍa do mãyãm reakʼ goḍako metakʼkana.
Noate Jirimiạ nạbi hotete roṛlenakʼ katha purạuena: “Onko do pegel rupạ ṭakako hataokeda. Noa ṭaka do uniakʼ dam kana. Israelko do uni lạgitʼ noa damko ṭhik dohoakatʼ tahẽkana.
Probhu cetʼlekae hukum ạdiń tahẽkan onkage onko do kuṅkạl reakʼ goḍa lạgitʼ ona ṭakako emkeda.”
Jisu do disạm cakʼlaoicʼ Pilạt samaṅreko teṅgokedea. Unre Pilạt do Jisui kulikedea, “Am do cetʼ Jihudikoren raj kanam?” Jisui roṛ ruạṛkeda, “Am do ṭhikgem meneda.”
Maraṅ naekeko ar murubiko aemako dusikedea menkhan Jisu do cetʼ hõ bae roṛ ruạṛleda.
Unre Pilạt do uniye metadea, “Tinạkʼko dusiyetʼmekan do cetʼ bam ańjomeda? Menkhan Jisu do mitʼṭen katha hõ bae roṛ ruạṛleda.
Onate disạm cakʼlaoicʼ do ạḍiye hahaṛayena.
Disạm cakʼlaoicʼ do sen-parom porobre hoṛkoakʼ kusileka jaoge mitʼṭen kạidiye aṛakʼedekan tahẽkana. Ar noage uniakʼ cạli do tahẽkana.
Ona jokhecʼ Barabbako metae mitʼṭen kạidiye tahẽkana.
Ado hoṛkoko jarwayen khan Pilạt do onkoe kuliketʼkoa, “Cetʼpe khojkana? Ape ṭhen okoeṭakʼ iń aṛagea, Barabba, se Mạsiko metae Jisu?”
Ente Pilạt doe baḍaekan tahẽkana, onko do hiskạ iạte Jisuko soprotakadea.
Ado Pilạt tinre bicạr duṛupʼakʼreye duṛupʼ akan tahẽkana unre uniren oṛakʼ hoṛ do kathae roṛgotʼkada, “Uni dhoromicʼ do jãhãnakʼ alom cekaea, ente uni iạte teheń kukmũte ạḍi duk iń ńamakada.”
Menkhan maraṅ naekeko ar murubiko do hoṛkoko rạmjạuketʼkoa jemon Barabbako khoje ar Jisu do goje reakʼ kathako roṛ.
Tayomte disạm cakʼlaoicʼ do hoṛkoe kuliketʼkoa, “Nukin bar hoṛ modre okoeṭakʼiń aṛakʼapepe khojkana? Onkoko menkeda, “Barabbage.”
Unre Pilạte metatʼkoa, “Enḍekhan Mạsiko metae Jisu doń cekaea?” Onkoko menkeda, “Kruskae me.”
Pilạte metatʼkoa, “Cedakʼ, cetʼe dos akatʼte?” Menkhan onko do arhõ ãṭ aṛaṅte hohoate memenko ehopʼena, “Uni do kruskae me.”
Pilạt do cetʼ hõ bae dhejeda bickom arhõ gulmal hoyokʼ kane ńelketʼ khan dakʼ hataokate hoṛko samaṅre ti ạbukenteye menkeda, “Nui hoṛakʼ mãyãm lạgitʼ iń do bạń dạyikokʼa; apege ńeljoṅpe.”
Sanamkoko roṛ ruạṛadea, “Ale ar aleren gidrạkoge uniakʼ mãyãm reakʼ dạyikle hoyokʼa.”
Unre Pilạt do Barabbageye aṛakʼatʼkoa, menkhan Jisu do cạbuk baṛakate kruskae lạgitʼe soprotkedea.
Unre disạm cakʼlaoicʼ Pilạtren palṭonko do oṛakʼ bhitrite Jisuko aderkedea ar goṭa palṭon dolrenko Jisu beṛhaeteko jarwaketʼkoa.
Onko do Jisuakʼ kicricʼko totʼkeda ar jeṅgetʼ arakʼ aṅgropko horokʼadea.
Ar jạnum nạ̃ṛĩ reakʼ mukuṭ galaṅkate bohokʼreko horokʼadea, ar jojom tire mitʼṭen ṭheṅgako sapʼadea. Ona tayom ikhṛumkate siṛogateko metadea, “Johar Jihudikoren raj.”
Onko do hoṛmoreko thoadea ar ona ṭheṅga hatao ruạṛkate bohokʼreko dal daladea.
Adoko siṛog baṛawade khan horokʼakʼko totʼketʼtaea ar acʼakʼ kicricʼ horokʼadete kruskae lạgitʼko idikedea.
Ado onḍe khonko oḍok hijukʼkan tahẽkanre palṭonko do Kurini nagraharen Simon ńutuman mitʼṭen hoṛko ńamkedea. Ar Jisuakʼ krus gokʼ iditae lạgitʼko sapʼ paṭetʼkedea.
Ado Jisuko kruskede khan palṭonko do gulibãṭkate uniakʼ kicricʼko hạṭińana.
Ar duṛupʼkate onḍe horhoyeko ehopʼena.
Onko do Jisuakʼ bohokʼ cetanre noa dos olakʼko bạisạukeda, “Nui do Jisu, Jihudikoren raj.”
Ar barea dạku hõ Jisu sãoteko krusketʼkinạ, mitʼ do uni jojomsa aṛere ar eṭagicʼ do leṅgasare.
Ar ona horte parom calakʼkanko do bohokʼ ruku rukute Jisu siṛogadeteko metadea,
“Eya mundil dhaṅ dhasericʼ ar pe mãhãte benaoicʼ! Enḍekhan ńitokʼ apnarte bańcaokʼme. Isorren Hopon kan khanem enḍekhan krus khon pheḍ hijukʼme.”
Maraṅ naekeko ar sostor baḍaeko ar murubiko hõ siṛogadeteko menkeda,
“Uni do eṭakʼkoe bańcaoetʼko tahẽkana; acʼ do bae bańcao daṛeakʼkana; Israelkoren raj kanae men khan, ńitokʼ krus khone pheḍ hijukʼma. Enḍekhan ale hõ unirele pạtiạukʼa.
Uni do Isorreye bhorsa akana; ńitokʼ Isor unire kusiye tahen khan enḍekhane bańcaoema. Uni ma apnarte Isorren Hopone ńumugokʼkan tahẽkana.”
Ar uni sãoteko krusletʼkin dạku hõ onkagekin siṛogadea.
Enhilokʼ tikin gelbar baja khon pe baja hạbicʼ goṭa disạm do ńutge tahẽyena.
Khan pe baja okte Jisu do ãṭ aṛaṅte hohoateye menkeda, “Eli Eli Lama Sabakthani,” metakʼme, “E ińren Isor, E ińren Isor, cedakʼem bạgi giḍiạdińa?”
Onḍe teṅgo akan tahẽkanko modren adom hoṛ do noa katha ańjomteko menkeda, “Uni do Eliại hohoae kana.”
Onko modren mitʼ hoṛ do ńir senente mitʼṭecʼ spońj hataokate sirkạreye topokeda ar ṭheṅgare gutukateye cepecʼadea.
Eṭakʼko doko menkeda, “Hape se ńellege bon, uni bańcaoe lạgitʼ Eliại hijukʼ kana se baṅ.” (Mitʼ hoṛ do borlome hataokeda ar kokhareye sobokʼkede khan dakʼ ar mãyãm oḍokena.)
Jisu do arhõ ãṭ aṛaṅteye hohokeda ar jiwi oḍokentaea.
Unre mundil reakʼ orwal do coṭ khon pheḍ hạbicʼ oṛecʼente bar hạṭińena; ar dhạrti do dal dalaoena ar lạṭu lạṭu dhiriko paṛakʼena.
Ar adomakʼ topako jhicʼenate ạḍi utạr jạpitʼ akatʼ sonot hoṛkoakʼ hoṛmo do beretʼena.
Jisu gocʼko khone jiwetʼ beretʼen khan onko do topa khon oḍokkate sonot nagrahateko boloyena. Ar ạḍi hoṛko ṭhenko ńel ocoyena.
Subedar ar uni tulucʼ Jisu horhoyedeko do dhạrti laṛao ar eṭakʼ ghoṭnako ńelkate ạḍi bạṛicʼko botorena arko menkeda, “Sạrige uni do Isorren Hopone tahẽkana.”
Onḍe do aema maejiuko hõ pharakre teṅgokate jotowakʼko ńeńelkan tahẽkana. Onko do Jisu sapʼsorae lạgitʼ Gạlil khon soṅgeteko hecʼlena.
Onko modre Magdalaren Mạriạm, Jakob ar Josephren eṅgat Mạriạm ar Sabdaeren hopon Jakob ar Johantekinren eṅgat hõe tahẽkana.
Ado ạyupʼen khan Arimạthiạren Josephko metae mitṭen kisạ̃ṛ hoṛ do onḍeye hecʼena. Uni hõ Jisuren celae hoeakan tahẽkana.
Uni do Pilạt ṭhen senkate Jisuakʼ mạ̃ṛĩye koekeda. Ar Pilạt do mạ̃ṛĩ emae lạgitʼe hukumkeda.
Joseph do Jisuakʼ mạ̃ṛĩ hataokate sapha musnạ kicricʼteye poṭomkeda,
ar cạṭạnireye kholao dohoakatʼ acʼakʼ nawa topareye baekada. Ar topa duạrre mitʼṭen maraṅ okocʼ dhiri guṛgạu idikateye esetʼ oṭokada.
Menkhan Magdalaren Mạriạm ar uni eṭagicʼ Mạriạm do ona topa samaṅregekin duṛupʼ tahẽyena.
Ado dosar hilokʼ, metakʼme sapṛaokʼ din tayom hilokʼ maraṅ naeke ar Phạrusiko do Pilạt ṭhen senkateko menkeda,
“Hujur, disạkedale, uni bulạuicʼ do jiwetʼ tahẽkanreye menleda, ‘pe mãhã khangeń jiwetʼ ruạṛokʼa.’

Onate hukum emokʼme pe mãhã hạbicʼ jemon topa do kajakte horhokʼ. Ar baṅkhan uniren celako hecʼkate uniakʼ mạ̃ṛĩko kombṛo iditaea ar hoṛkoko lạiakoa ‘Uni do gocʼko khone jiwetʼ beretʼ akana.’ Ar onka hoelen khan pạhilakʼ bulạu khon tayomakʼ bulạu do artetʼge bạṛicʼ hoyokʼa.”
Unre Pilạt do onkoe metatʼkoa, “Parhadarko idikope ar daṛeakʼ bhor horho reakʼ bebostaepe.”
Adoko calaoente dhiri cetanreko mohor chap oṭoada ar kajakte horhoe lạgitʼ pahradarkoko dohoketʼkoa.
Ado Jirạukʼ mãhã tayom, hapta reakʼ pạhil din paha poho jokhecʼ Magdalaren Mạriạm ar uni eṭakʼ Mạriạm do topa ńeńelkin calaoena.
Unre ackage dhạrti laṛaoena, ente Probhuren mitʼṭen goḍet do serma khone pheḍ hecʼena ar topa duạr khon dhiri ocokʼkate ona cetanreye duṛupʼena.
Uniakʼ muṭhạn do bijli leka ar uniakʼ kicricʼko do him leka pĩṛĩtʼ pĩṛĩtʼ ponḍ tahẽkana.
Uni botorte pahradarko do thar tharaokʼko ehopʼena ar gocʼ hoṛ baragenako.
Serma goḍet do maejiue metatʼkinạ, “Aloben botorokʼa, ente ińiń baḍaea, aben do krus ocolen Jisu ben ńam baṛayede kana.
Nonḍe do bạnuea. Uni do cetʼlekae menletʼ onkageye jiwetʼ beretʼ akana. Dela, hijukʼte oneye giticʼlen jaega ńelben.
Ar usạra senkate uniren celako lạiako ben uni do gocʼko khone jiwetʼ beretʼ akana ar onko lahate Gạlilteye calakʼ kana. Onko do onḍegeko ńelea. Ar ńelben, iń doń lại lahawatʼbena.”
Unkin do botor ar rạskạ salakʼ usạrate topa khon oḍokkate Jisuren celako noa khobor lạiako lạgitʼkin ńir calaoena.
Ar ackage unkin samaṅre Jisui hecʼenteye joharatʼkinạ. Unkin do sen sorkate jaṅgakin hạṛupʼkedea arkin sewawadea.
Jisui metatʼkinạ, “Aloben botorokʼa; aben do calaokate ińren boehako Gạlilte senokʼ metakoben. Onko do onḍegeko ńeleńa.”
Adokin calakʼkan tahẽkan jokhecʼ, ńelpe, pahradarko mod khon adomko do nagrahate senkate one hoyenakʼ joto do maraṅ naekekoko lạiatʼkoa.
Unre naekeko ar murubiko do jarwa mitʼkateko sopolhawana ar palṭonko aema ṭaka ematʼkoteko metatʼkoa,
“Ape do menpe, ‘ńindạle jạpitʼakatʼ tahẽkanre uniren celako hecʼkateko kombṛo idikedea.’
Ar noa katha disạm cakʼlaoicʼe baḍae lekhan unrele bujhạuaea ar sạjại khonle bańcaopea.”
Unre pahradarko do ṭaka hataokate cetʼlekako men ocolen onkageko lại baṛakeda. Onate teheń hạbicʼ ona katha do Jihudiko talare pasnao akana.
Ado Jisu Gạlil reakʼ okaṭakʼ burute calakʼe metatʼko tahẽkan onko gel mitʼ celako do ona buruteko calaoena.
Ar onḍe Jisuko ńelkede khan uniko sewawadea, menkhan adomko do digdhạ hecʼatʼkoa.
Unre Jisu do hecʼsorkateye metatʼkoa “Serma ar dhạrti reakʼ sanam ektiạri iń ṭhen emakana.
Onate sanam jạtren hoṛko ṭhen calakʼpe ar ińren celakope. Ar Baba, Hopon, Sonot Jiu ńutumte bạptiskope.
Ar okakoń hukum akatʼpe onako doho cetʼakope. Ńelpe, jug mucạtʼ hạbicʼ iń do ape tulucʼ minạńa.
Isorren Hopon Jisu Mạsiakʼ bisoetege bhage sombat reakʼ etohopʼ do hoeakana.
Jesaea nạbiakʼ puthire noa katha ol akana; Ńelme, ińren goḍet do am lahateń kolekana. Uni do amakʼ hore teara.
Hahaṅkarre mitʼṭen hohokạnicʼ reaṅ aṛaṅ, Probhuakʼ hor tearkataepe, Uniakʼ suṛucʼ horko sojhekataepe.
Ona katha lekage Johan bạbạptisicʼ do hahaṅkarre senkate hoṛkoe bạptisetʼko tahẽkana ar kại khon ikạ ńam lạgitʼe porcaretʼ tahẽkana jemon hoṛko do mon ạcurkate bạptismako ataṅ.
Onate Jihudạ disạm ar Jerusalem nagraharen sanamkoko oḍok hecʼente Johan ṭhen hijukʼko ehopʼena. Ar tinre akoakʼ kạikoko aṅgocketʼa unre Johan do Jordan gaḍare onkoe bạptisketʼkoa.
Johan do ũṭ upʼ reakʼ aṅgrop ar ḍanḍare harta reakʼ paṭheakʼ tahẽkantaea. Uni do pohoko ar bir dumur rasae jometʼ tahẽkana.
Ar nonka menkateye porcaretʼ tahẽkana, “Iń tayomte mitʼ hoṛe darae kana. Uni do iń khone daṛeangea. Uniakʼ panahi reakʼ phitạ eṅgotʼkate raṛaetae lek hõń baṅkana.
Iń do dakʼteń bạptisetʼpea menkhan uni do sonot Jiuteye bạptispea.”
Onako oktere Jisu do Gạlil Prodesh reakʼ Nasaret ato khone hecʼena, ar Johan do Jordan gaḍare uniye bạptiskedea.
Ar dakʼ khone rakapʼtʼen são sãote Jisu do serma oṛejokʼkan ar sonot Jiu parwa leka acʼ cetanre pheḍ hijukʼkane ńelkedea.
Unre serma khon mitʼṭen aṛaṅ ańjomena, “Amge ińren dulạṛiạ Hopon, iń do amreń kusi akana.”
Noa tayom Jisu do sonot Jiu hotete hahaṅkarteye idiocoyena.
Ar pongel din hạbicʼ Soetan do Jisu laloce udukʼadete kạire ńurhạye lạgitʼe kurumuṭukeda. Onḍe do aema bir janwarko tahẽkana, ar serma goḍetko hõ uniko sapʼsorae kan tahẽkana.
Johan hajotreye bhorao ocoyen khan Jisu do Gạlil Prodeshteye calaoena. Ar noa katha menkate uni do Isorakʼ bhage sombat porcare ehopʼena,
“Okte purạu akana, Isorakʼ raj do sorakana. Kại khon mon ạcurtape ar bhage sombatre pạtiạukʼpe.”
Mitʼ din Jisu do Gạlil doreão aṛeteye parom calakʼkan tahẽkana. Unre Simon ar uniren boeha Andreas do doreãore jhạlikin oḍaokan tahẽkana. Ente unkin do jạilạkin tahẽkana.
Jisui metatʼkinạ, “Dela iń sãote hijukʼben. Iń do hoṛ sasapʼ hoṛiń benao bena.”
Unkin do unrege jhạlikin bạgi oṭowatʼte Jisukin pańjakedea.
Ado onḍe khon laha ńokʼe sen idiyen khan Sabdaeren hopon Jakob ar Johan tạkine ńel ńamketʼkinạ. Unkin do lạukạre duṛupʼkate jhạlikin jujutkan tahẽkana.
Jisu do unkin hõe hohoatʼkinạ, ar unrege ạkinren apat Sabdae do kạmiạko sãote lạukạrekin bạgi oṭoadete Jisukin pańjakedea.
Jisu ar acʼren cela do Kapharnạhum nagrahateko calaoena. Ar jirạukʼ mãhãre uni do sunạgogre bolokate cetʼakoe ehopʼena.
Ar uniakʼ cecetʼakʼte hoṛko do ạḍiko hahaṛayena, ente sostor baḍaeko leka do baṅ, bickom ạidạri menakʼtae hoṛ lekae cetʼakokan tahẽkana.
Ona jokhecʼ sunạgogre bạṛicʼ jiu capaṛ akawade mitʼ hoṛe tahẽkana.
Uni do ãṭ aṛaṅte hohoateye menkeda, “E Nasaretren Jisu, ale tulucʼ amakʼ do cetʼ? Nosṭole lạgitʼem hecʼ akana? Baḍaegeạń am dom okoe kana; am do Isorren uni sonoticʼ kanam.”
Unre Jisu do bạṛicʼ jiu dhomkao kedeteye metadea, “Thirokʼme ar uni khon oḍok calakʼme.”
Khange bạṛicʼ jiu do uni hoṛe mocṛa mucṛikedea ar kikiạuate uni khone oḍok calaoena.

Noa ńelte hoṛko do hahaṛayente ako akore menjoṅko ehopʼena. “Noako do cetʼ kana? Ar noa ạidạrite perecʼ nawa cecetʼakʼ baṅ cetʼkan? Ente uni do bạṛicʼ jiukoe hukumako kana ar onko do uniakʼ kathako bataoetʼtaea.”
Ar noa iạte Gạlil Prodesh reakʼ joto jaegakore Jisuakʼ katha do ạḍi usạra pasnao idiyena.
Ado sunạgog khonko oḍoken khan onko do Simon ar Andreas tạkinakʼ oṛakʼteko calaoena. Onko sãote Jakob ar Johan hõkin tahẽkana.
Unre Simon hanhartetʼ do ruạ iạteye giticʼ akan tahẽkana. Ar Jisui hecʼen khan uni reaṅko lạiadea
Jisu do uni ṭhen senkate ti sapʼkedeteye beretʼkedea. Ar inạtege uniakʼ ruạ do chuṭạuentaea ar jom ocoko lạgitʼe sapʼ soratʼkoa.
Ado enhilokʼ candoe hạsuren khan ạyupʼ jokhecʼ hoṛko do joto lekan rugi ar bhut capaṛ hoṛko Jisu ṭhenko ạguketʼkoa.
Unre nagraharen hoṛ do ona oṛakʼ reakʼ duạr ṭhen hecʼkateko jarwayena.
Ar Jisu do ạḍi lekan rogte jạbun akan hoṛkoe bogeketʼkoa ar aema bhut capaṛ akatʼko hõe oḍok giḍiketʼkoa. Uni do bhutko bae roṛ ocoatʼkoa, ente onko doko baḍae akade tahẽkana acʼ doe okoe kana mente.
Dosar hilokʼ setakʼ ńut tahẽkanre Jisu doe beretʼena ar oṛakʼ bạgikate mitʼṭen nisun jaegare senkate koejoṅe ehopʼena.
Unre Simon ar uniren sãotenko do Jisu sendra baṛayeko ehopʼena.
Arko ńamkede khan uniko metadea, “Sanamkoge amko ńam baṛayetʼmea.”
Mitʼṭen murhucʼ jom rugi do Jisu ṭhen hecʼkate ikhṛumenteye menkeda, “Sanalem khanem boge daṛeạńạ.”
Jisu do uni hoṛre mãyã hecʼadea. Onate ti tiạrkate joṭetʼkedeteye metadea, “Iń hõ onkageń khojkana, ma saphakokʼme.”
Ar inạtege uniakʼ murhucʼ jom rog do boge utạrena.
Unre Jisu do uniye bidạkadea, menkhan ona lahare sontorkedeteye metadea,

“Ńelme, noa katha do okoe ṭhen hõ alom lại baṛaea. Bickom naeke ṭhen senkate ńel ocokʼme ar saphakʼ lạgitʼ Mose okaṭakʼ samaṅ reakʼ kathae menakatʼ ona samaṅme. Ar nonkate naekeko ṭhenem sạbudokʼa, am dom boge akana mente.”

Menkhan uni hoṛ do bahrete oḍok senkate sanam jaegare noa khobor lại pasnaoe ehopʼena. Onate Jisu do okaṭakʼ nagrahate hõ sodorte bae bolo daṛeada. Uni do nisun jaegakore tahen hoyentaea; ar enrehõ hoṛko do sanam jaega khon uni ṭhen hijukʼko ehopʼena.
Thoṛa din tayom Jisu do arhõ Kapharnạhum nagrahateye calaoena. Ar hoṛko do mitʼṭen oṛakʼre menaea menteko ańjomkeda.
Unre nunạkʼ hoṛko jarwayena je, duạr bahrere hõ jaega do ar baṅ tahẽlena. Ar Jisu do hoṛko ṭhen Isorakʼ kathae porcaretʼkan tahẽkana.
Ona jokhecʼ mitʼṭen mitʼkaṛ gocʼ rog hoṛ do pon hoṛte gokʼkate uni ṭhenko ạgukedea.
Menkhan bhiṛ iạte Jisu ṭhen bako idi seṭer daṛeadea. Onate onko do Jisu okareye tahẽkan ṭhik ona coṭ reakʼ calko ocokʼkeda. Ar ona phãkte parkom sudhạ uni rugi hoṛ do latarteko pheḍgotʼkadea.
Jisu do onkoakʼ pạtiạu ńelte uni hoṛe metadea, “Amakʼ kại do ikạyen tama.”
Onḍe do adom sostor baḍaekoko duṛupʼ akan tahẽkana. Onko do mone moneteko gunạnokʼkan tahẽkana,
“Nui hoṛ cedakʼ nonkan katha doe roṛeda? Nui do Isore opomane kana. Isor chaḍa ar okoe hale kại doe ikạ daṛekea?
Jisu do onkoakʼ mon reakʼ nạndi gundikʼakʼe baḍaeketʼ khane metatʼkoa, “Mone monete ona katha reakʼ do cedakʼpe hudisokʼ kana?
Nui rugi hoṛ do okaṭakʼ metae algawa, ‘amakʼ kại ikạyen tama’ se, ‘beretʼkate, amakʼ parkom kuṭuṅtam ar taṛamme?’
Menkhan ape jemonpe baḍae daṛeakʼ Manwa Hopon do dhạrtire kại ikạ reakʼ ektiạri menakʼtaea.” Ar ninạkʼ hạbicʼ roṛkate uni rugi hoṛe metadea,
“Ińiń metamkana, ma beretʼme, amakʼ parkom kuṭuṅtam ar oṛakʼte calakʼme.”
Unre uni hoṛ doe beretʼena ar acʼakʼ parkom kuṭuṅkate jotoko samaṅre bahreteye oḍok calaoena. Ar noa iạte sanamkoko hahaṛayena ar Isor sarhaokedeteko menkeda, “Nonkanakʼ do tishõ babon ńelakada.”
Jisu do arhõ Gạlil doreão aṛeteye oḍok calaoena. Unre ạḍi utạr hoṛ do uni ṭhenko hecʼena ar onko cetʼakoe ehopʼena.

Inạ tayom horteye parom calakʼkan tahẽkanre Alphaeren hopon Lewi do mạsul uṭhạu oṛakʼre duṛupʼ akane ńelkedea. Jisu do uniye metadea, “Dela hijukʼte, ińren cela hoyokʼme.” Unre Liwi doe beretʼente Jisui pańjakedea.
Tayomte Jisu do Lewi oṛakʼre jojome duṛupʼena. Unre aema mạsul uṭhạuko ar bạṛicʼ hoṛko hõ Jisu ar uniren celako sãote jom lạgitʼko duṛupʼena, ente ạḍi utạr hoṛ do Jisu sãoteko calakʼkan tahẽkana.
Ado Phạrusiko dolren sostor baḍaeko do Jisu mạsul uṭhạuko ar bạṛicʼ hoṛko tulucʼ jojomkanko ńelkede khan uniren celakoko metatʼkoa, “Uni do mạsul uṭhạuko ar bạṛicʼ hoṛko tulucʼ cedakʼe jom ńũiyeda?”

Noa katha ańjomkate Jisu do sostor baḍaekoe metatʼkoa, “Boge hoṛko lạgitʼ raranicʼ reakʼ jạruṛ do bạnukʼa, menkhan ruạkʼko lạgitʼ do jạruṛgea. Dhorom hoṛ hohoako lạgitʼ do bạń hecʼakana menkhan kại hoṛko lạgitʼgeń hecʼakana.”

Mitʼ dhao Johan bạbạptisicʼren celako ar Phạrusiko doko upạsetʼ tahẽkana. Ona ńelte adom hoṛ do hecʼkate Jisuko metadea, “Johanren cela ar Phạrusiko doko upạseda, menkhan amren cela do cedakʼ bako upạsetʼ kana?”
Jisui metatʼkoa, “Jãwãe beṭa soṅgere tahen tulucʼ cetʼ bạriạtko doko upạs daṛekea? Tinạkʼ din soṅgere Jãwãe beṭae tahen unạkʼ din onko do bako upạsa.
Menkhan okte hijukʼ kana Jãwãe beṭa tinre onko khone idiocokʼa, unre onko doko upạsa.
“Okoe hõ mare kicricʼre nawa kicricʼ do bako tạli jalada. Arko onkae khan mare kicricʼ khon nawa rokʼakʼ do oṛecʼ hijukʼa. Onate oṛecʼ do artetʼge lạṭu idikʼa.
Okoe hõ mare kumre nawa darkha rasa do bako dohoea. Arko dohoe khan nawa rasate kumko oṛejokʼa ar darkha rasa hõ nosṭokʼa. Onate nawa darkha rasa do nawa kumregeko dul dohoea.”
Mitʼ jirạukʼ mãhãre Jisu do phosol talateye parom calakʼkan tahẽkana. Ar uniren celako do calakʼ tulucʼ geleko hotʼetʼkan tahẽkana.
Ona ńelte Phạrusiko do Jisuko metadea, “Dhorom reakʼ niạm lekate jirạukʼ mãhãre oka baṅ ganokʼ ona do cedakʼko kạmi kana?”
Jisui metatʼkoa, “Abiạthar do tinre maraṅ naekeye tahẽkana unre Dạud ar uni soṅgetenko reṅgecʼletʼkore, Dạud okae cekaletʼ ona do cetʼ tishõ bape paṛhao akada?
Uni do Isorakʼ oṛakʼre bolokate samaṅ akan piṭhạ reakʼe jomkeda ar acʼ sãotenko hõe ematʼkoa. Menkhan ona jom reakʼ ạn do maraṅ naekeko chaḍa ar okoeakʼ hõ baṅ tahẽkana.”
Jisu do arhõe metatʼkoa, “Manwa lạgitʼge jirạukʼ mãhã do hoeakana, menkhan jirạukʼ mãhã lạgitʼ manwa do baṅa.
Onate Manwa Hopon do jirạukʼ mãhãren hõ mạlik kanae.”
Ona tayom Jisu do arhõ sunạgogteye boloyena. Ar onḍe do nonkan mitʼṭen hoṛe tahẽkana okoe do mitʼ ti borocʼge tahẽkantae.
Ar Phạrusiko modren adom hoṛ do Jisu dusire paṛaoe lạgitʼ ạtko ńam baṛayetʼkan tahẽkana. Ar jirạukʼ mãhãre Jisu jãhãeye bogekoa se baṅ onate bhageteko tạnkhiyede tahẽkana.
Jisu do uni borocʼ ti hoṛe metadea, “Beretʼme ar talare teṅgokʼme.”
Ona tayom Phạrusikoe kuliketʼkoa, “Jirạukʼ mãhãre bhage kạmi ganokʼa se bạṛicʼ kạmi? Jiwi bańcao se bạṛicʼ giḍikakʼ ganokʼa?” Menkhan Phạrusiko do cetʼge bako roṛ ruạṛadea.
Unre Jisu do edrete onkoe beṅgetʼatʼkoa ar onkoakʼ keṭecʼ mon iạte bhabna salakʼ uni hoṛe metadea, “Amakʼ ti tiạrtam.” Adoe tiạrketʼ khan ti do boge utạrentaea.
Unre Phạrusiko do bahrete oḍok hecʼkate Jisu cetʼlekateko gojea ona reaṅ Herod secʼrenko sãote sopolhako dhurạuena.
Inạ tayom Jisu do acʼren celako sãote doreão aṛeteye calaoena. Ar Gạlil Prodesren ạḍi utạr hoṛ do uniko pańja idikedea.
Jisu okakoe kạmi akatʼ ona reakʼ katha ańjomkate Jihudạ, Jerusalem, Edom, Jordan gaḍa hanasaren, Tur ar Sidon nagraha beṛhae secʼ khon gadel hoṛko do uni ṭhenko hecʼena.
Jisu do acʼren celako mitʼṭen huḍiń lạukạ ṭhik dohokakʼe metatʼkoa jemon bhiṛ iạte hoṛko aloko riḍạtʼ ciride.
Ar ḍher hoṛe boge akatʼko tahẽkante rugiko do uni joṭede lạgitʼko ṭhela ṭhilikʼkan tahẽkana.
Ar bạṛicʼ jiuko do uniko ńelle khange uni samaṅreko bhindạṛokʼkan tahẽkana ar kikiạuateko metaekan tahẽkana, “Am dom Isorren Hopon kana.”
Menkhan uni doe sontoretʼko tahẽkana okoe hõ jemon aloko sodore acʼ doe okoe kana mente.
Ona tayom Jisu do buruteye rakapʼena ar acʼakʼ kusileka uni do thoṛa hoṛ acʼ ṭhene hohoatʼkoa.
Arko hecʼen khan uni do gelbar hoṛko apostol hudạreye bahalketʼkoa, jemon onko do acʼ são sãoteko tahente,
bạṛicʼ jiuko oḍok giḍiko reakʼ daṛeye danakote porcar lạgitʼe kol daṛeako.
Ar okoe gelbar hoṛe bahalketʼko onko doko hoyokʼ kana, Simon, uni do Patrase bahnakedea;
Sabdaeren hopon Jakob ar Johan, (nukinakʼ ńutum do Boanergise dohoketʼ tạkina metakʼme huḍurren hoponkin);
Andreas, Philip, Bartholomae, Mathae, Thoma, Alphaeren hopon Jakob, Thaddae, ar moullobadi Simon,
ar Jihudạ Iskariot, okoe do Jisu bạiriko thene soprot ocolede.
Jisu oṛakʼteye hecʼen khan uni ṭhen arhõ nunạkʼ hoṛko jarwayena je, acʼ ar acʼren celako do cetʼge bako jom daṛeada.
Ado Jisuren peṛako noa khoborko ańjomketʼ khan oḍok ạguye lạgitʼko hecʼena. Onkoko menkeda, “Uni doe koṅka akana.”
Ar Jerusalem khonko hecʼakan tahẽkan sostor baḍaeko doko menkeda, “Unire do Beelsebul menaea. Uni do bạṛicʼ jiuren raj hotete bạṛicʼ jiukoe oḍok giḍiyetʼkoa.”
Jisu do sostor baḍaekoe hohoatʼkoa ar cetʼako lạgitʼe metatʼkoa, “Soetan do cetʼ Soetane oḍok giḍi daṛeaea?”
Jãhãṭakʼ rajosṭige apnar talare hạṭińlen khan ona rajosṭi do ohoge ṭikạu tahẽlena.
Mitʼṭen gharońj hõ hạṭińlen khan ona gharońj do baṅ ṭikạukʼa.
Onkage Soetan hõ apnar birudre teṅgokate acʼakʼ daṛeye rạpud khan uni hõ ohoe ṭikạu daṛelena ar onḍege uni doe caba utạrokʼa.
Noa katha do sạri kana je, mitʼṭen daṛean hoṛ bako tol maṛaṅ lekhan okoe hõ uniakʼ oṛakʼre bolokate jinisko ohoe luṭ daṛeletaea. Menkhane tol maṛaṅle khan doe luṭ daṛeakʼgea.
Sạrigeń metapekana, manwakoakʼ sanam kại ar Isor birudre opoman katha do ikạkʼtaea,
menkhan sonot Jiu birudre opoman katha do tisge baṅ ikạkʼtaea. Uni hoṛakʼ kại do jaejug hạbicʼ tahentaea.”
Sostor baḍaeko oneko menletʼ tahẽkan, “Unire do bạṛicʼ jiu menaea,” Onkoakʼ ona katha iạtege Jisu do noa kathae menkeda.
Inạ tayom Jisuren eṅgat ar boehako do onḍeko hecʼena ar bahrere teṅgokate Jisu hohoae lạgitʼ khoborko kolkeda.
Unre Jisu beṛhaete ạḍi utạr hoṛko duṛupʼ akan tahẽkana. Adoko metadea, “Amren eṅgam ar boeham ar misramteko bahrereko khojetʼmea.”
Jisui metatʼkoa, “Okoe kanae eṅgạń ar okoe kanako ińren boehańko do?”
Ado acʼ beṛhaete duṛupʼ akanko secʼ beṅgetʼ ạcurkateye menkeda, “Noko kangeako ińren eṅgạń ar boehańko do!
Okoe Isorakʼ sana lekako senokʼkan onkoge ińren, boeha, misera ar eṅgạń kanako.”
Jisu do arhõ Gạlil doreão aṛere hoṛko cetʼakoe ehopʼena. Ar acʼ beṛhaete ạḍi utạr hoṛko bhiṛkeda; onate uni do doreãore mitʼṭen lạukạre decʼenteye duṛupʼena ar gadel hoṛ do ghuṭureko teṅgo tahẽyena.
Uni do golpokote ạḍi okocʼakʼko reaṅ cetʼatʼkoe ehopʼena. Uni doe metatʼkoa,
“Mitʼṭen casa hoṛ do itạ erokʼ lạgitʼe oḍok calaoena.
Ado erokʼ jokhecʼ adomakʼ itạ do hor aṛere ńurena, ar cẽṛẽko hecʼkate onako halaṅ jomkeda.
Ar adomakʼ itạ do dhiri hasare ńurena. Menkhan onḍe dạriạ hasa baṅ tahẽkana. Ar dạriạ hasa baṅ tahẽkante itạ do usạrate janam rakapʼena.
Ado siń candoe rakapʼen khan onako do tolmocʼ cabayena ar mońjte baṅ rehetʼlente rohoṛ kạrcupʼena.
Adomakʼ itạ do jạnumko talare ńurena. Ar jạnumko hara idiyen khan onae jhurkeda, ar onate baṅ gele belelena.
Menkhan thoṛa itạ do bhage hasare ńurente janamkate harayena ar gele beleyena, adom do pegel doboṛ, adom do turui gel doboṛ, ar adom do mitʼ sae doboṛ phosole hoeocokeda.”
Ado mucạtʼreye menkeda, “Ańjom lạgitʼ lutur menakʼtae hoṛ doe ańjom ma.”
Ado bhiṛ komaoen khan acʼren gelbar celako ar beṛhaeten hoṛko do ona golpo reakʼ bhedko kulikedea.
Jisui metatʼkoa, “Ape do Isorakʼ raj reakʼ sạri okoakʼkope baḍae ocoakana, menkhan eṭakʼko ṭhen do golpo talate lạiạgokʼ kana,
sonot sostor reakʼ katha leka, ‘ńeńel doko ńeńelgea menkhan bako oroma, ańjom doko ańjomgea, menkhan bako bujhạua. Jemon aloko ạcurokʼ ar alo ikạkʼtako.’ ”
Ona tayom Jisui metatʼkoa, “Noa golpo reakʼ mane do cetʼ bape bujhạuleda? Enḍekhan eṭakʼ golpoko reakʼ mane do cekatepe bujhạua?
Casa hoṛ oka itại erketʼ ona itạ do Isorakʼ katha kana.
Ar hor aṛere ńuren itạte do nonkanko reaṅge roṛ akana okoe do ona kathako ańjomketʼ, menkhan Soetan hecʼkate unrege onkoakʼ ontorre erakan kathakoe halaṅ ạtkira.
Ar dhiri hasare ńuren itạte do onko reaṅge roṛ akana okoe do ona katha ańjomkate, unrege rạskạ kateko ataṅetʼkan,
menkhan onkore mońjte rehetʼ baṅ bạisạukʼ kante eken thoṛa din lạgitʼko ṭarhao tahen kana. Ente ona katha khạtirte tinre santao ar khedreko paṛaokʼ kana unre onko doko pạcokʼ kana.
Jạnumko talare erlen itạte do onko reaṅge roṛ akana okoe do ona kathako ańjomketʼ,
menkhan gharońj reakʼ dạndi, ar dhon reakʼ mãyã ar emanteakʼ laloc hecʼakokante onko do onako ten loṭomkakʼ kana;

ar onate onkore jãhãn jo do baṅ jokʼ kana. Ar bhage hasare ńuren itạte do onko reaṅge roṛ akana okoe do ona katha ańjomkateko ataṅetʼkan arko jokʼ kan. Okoe do pegel doboṛ, okoe do turui gel doboṛ, ar okoe do mitʼ sae doboṛ.”
Jisu do arhõe metatʼkoa, “Jãhãege diuhe jeretʼkate cetʼ khạclạkʼ se cạuki latarreko dohoegea? Ona do cetʼ diuhe dohowakʼ cetanre bako dohoea?
Jãhãnakʼge danaṅ tahen ona do sodorokʼ lạgitʼge danaṅ tahena; arhõ jãhãnakʼge poṭom tahen ona do oṭag lạgitʼge poṭom tahena.
Ańjom lạgitʼ lutur menakʼtae hoṛ doe ańjom ma.”
Ona tayom Jisui metatʼkoa, “Okaṭakʼpe ańjometʼkan ona reaṅ luturakʼpe. Oka sosoṅakʼtepe soṅa, inạtege ape hõ soṅapea; arko em juṭucʼapea.
Okoeakʼ menakʼtae uni do arhõe emocokʼa, menkhan okoeakʼ oka menakʼtae ona hõe recʼ ocokʼa.”
Jisu do arhõe metatʼkoa, “Isorakʼ raj do nonka lekana: one mitʼṭen hoṛ do otre itạye erketʼ.
Uni do siń ar ńindạ gitijokʼ ar beredotʼte okteye khemaokeda. Ar inạ oktere itạ do janamkate harayena, menkhan cekate hoyena uni do bae baḍaelakʼa.
Hasa do acʼtege phosole janam ocokeda, pạhil do gạchi, ona tayom gele ar gelere do danage.
Ado phosol beleyen khan uni do datrome calaokeda, ente phosol samṭao okte do hoyena.”
Ona tayom Jisui metatʼkoa, “Isorakʼ raj do cetʼ sãote bon jurikea? Oka lekan phen hotete ona doń bujhạu ocoea?
Ona raj do mitʼṭen tuṛi jaṅ lekana. One oka do joto itạko khon huḍiń utạrge.
Menkhan haralen khan do joto aṛakʼ sakamko khon napṛakʼge hoyokʼa, ar nunạkʼ maraṅ maraṅ ḍạrko hoyokʼa je, coṭren cẽṛẽko hõ ona reakʼ ḍạrkore tukạko benao joṅa.”
Nonkage Jisu do arhõ ạḍi utạr golpokote Isorakʼ kathakoe galmarao akokan tahẽkana. Ar tinạkʼ ganko bujhạu daṛeakʼkan tahẽkan inạkʼgeye lại akokan tahẽkana.
Golpo chaḍa uni do bae cetʼakokan tahẽkana, menkhan tinre celako do acʼ sãote eskarko tahena unre jotowakʼe bhoṅako kan tahẽkana.
Enhilokʼ ạyupʼen khan Jisu do acʼren celakoe metatʼkoa, “Dela, doreão hanasate bon parom calakʼa.”
Unre celako do gadel hoṛko bạgiatʼkote Jisu okaṭakʼ lạukạreye tahẽkan ona lạukạtege uniko idi torakedea. Menkhan onḍe do arhõ eṭakʼ lạukạko tahẽkana.
Ado lạukạ calakʼkan tahẽkanre mitʼṭen maraṅ birbão hecʼgotʼena ar ḍheoko nunạkʼ ãṭ chilkạu bolokʼkan tahẽkana je, lạukạ do dakʼte perejokʼ ehopʼena.
Unre Jisu do lạukạ reakʼ tayom secʼre bạlisre bohokʼateye jạpitʼ akatʼ tahẽkana. Khange celako do beretʼ kedeteko metadea, “E Guru, abo bon gujukʼkan do cetʼ bam hetawakʼ kana?”
Jisu doe beretʼena ar birbãoe dhomkaoketʼte doreãoe metatʼa, “Thirokʼme, hapekʼme,” Onate hoe do thirena ar jotowakʼ ḍel ḍel nijhumena.
Ado celakoe metatʼkoa, “Cedakʼpe botorokʼ kana? Cekate biswạs do bạnukʼtapea?”
Noate celako do ạḍi bạṛicʼko botorena ar ako ako talare memenko ehopʼena, “Nui doe okoe kante hoe hõ hoe ar doreão hõ doreãokin bataoetʼtaea?”
Inạ tayom Jisu ar acʼren celako do Gạlil doreão paromkate Gerasenikoakʼ elakateko calaoena.
Ado Jisu lạukạ khone pheḍ gotʼen khan bạṛicʼ jiu capaṛ akawade mitʼṭen hoṛ do mạ̃ṛĩ poḍa khon uni samaṅreye oḍok hecʼena.
Uni hoṛ do mạ̃ṛĩ poḍakoregeye tahẽnkan tahẽkana ar sikṛikote hõ bako tol ṭarhao daṛeaekan tahẽkana.
Ạḍi dhao biṛikote ar sikṛikoteko tolkaekan tahẽkana, menkhan uni do onae topakʼetʼ tahẽkana ar jaṅga reakʼ biṛiko hõe rạputʼetʼ tahẽkana. Ar okoege bako sambṛao daṛeaekan tahẽkana.
Uni do siń ńindạ topa danderkore ar burukoreye kikiạu baṛayetʼ tahẽkana ar dhirite acʼakʼ hoṛmoe koṭecʼ sirạ soroyetʼ tahẽkana.
Noa iạteye menkeda ente Jisu do uniye metade tahẽkana, “Bạṛicʼ jiu, nui hoṛ khon oḍok calakʼme.”
Jisu do uniye kulikedea, “Celeama ńutum do?” Uniye menkeda, “Ińakʼ ńutum do phạdạńạ, ente aema menakʼlea.”
Uni do Jisu nehõradeteye metadea ona elaka khon jemon aloe oḍok giḍikako.
Un jokhecʼ ona sor reakʼ buru dhasnare maraṅ mitʼ khạṛ sukriko ạtińkan tahẽkana.
Bạṛicʼ jiuko do Jisu nehõradeteko metadea, “Onko khạṛ sukrikore kolkaleme; ar onko bhitrire bolo ocoaleme.”

Ado Jisui hukumatʼko khan bạṛicʼ jiuko do oḍokente sukrikoreko boloyena. Onate onko sukri do daṛaṅ secʼteko ńir senente doreãoreko ńurhạyena arko unum gocʼena. Ona khạṛre bar hajar gan sukriko tahẽkana.
Ar okoe sukriko gupikan tahẽkan onko do atoteko ńir calaoena ar sanam jaegakoreko lại pasnaokeda. Unre hoṛko do cetʼ hoeakana mente ńel lạgitʼko oḍok hecʼena.
Ar Jisu ṭhenko hecʼen khan bạṛicʼ jiu capaṛ akawade tahẽkan hoṛ do kicricʼ horokʼkate duṛupʼ akan ar boge akanko ńelkedea. Noa ńelte hoṛko do botor caṛhaoatʼkoa.
Noa ghoṭna okoeko ńelletʼ onko do bạṛcʼ jiu capaṛ akawade hoṛ ar khạṛ sukriko reaṅko lại baṛakeda.
Onate hoṛko do Jisuko nehõradea jemon akoakʼ simạ khone calao joṅ.
Ado Jisu lạukạreye dejokʼkan tahẽkanre bạṛicʼ jiu capaṛ akawade tahẽkan hoṛ do uni sãote calakʼ lạgitʼe nehõradea.
Menkhan Jisu do noa menkateye bidạkadea, “Amakʼ oṛakʼte ruạṛ calakʼme ar Probhui daya akatʼme ar am lạgitʼ tinạkʼ maraṅe kạmi akatʼ ona lạiakome.”
Unre uni hoṛ doe calaoena ar Jisu acʼ lạgitʼ tinạkʼ maraṅe kạmi akatʼ ona do Dekapoli elakakore lại baṛaye ehopʼena, ar onate jotokoko hahaṛayena.
Ado Jisu lạukạte arhõ doreão hanasae paromen khan ạḍi utạr hoṛ do uni ṭhen hecʼkateko jarwayena. Menkhan uni do unhõ doreão aṛereye tahẽkana.
Unre Jihudikoakʼ sunạgogren Jaerus ńutuman mitʼṭen mukhiạ hoṛ do onḍeye hecʼena ar Jisui ńelkede khan uniakʼ jaṅgareye giḍiyena.
Uni do Jisu nehõradeteye metadea, “Ińren kuṛi do gujukʼ dạkhilre menaea. Ado senkate dela capoyem, ar inạtegeye boge utạrokʼa.”
Unre Jisu do soṅgeteye calaoena. Ar gadel hoṛ do uniko pańja idikedea ar beṛhaeteko riḍetʼ ciritʼedekan tahẽkana.
Ona bhiṛ bhitrire mitʼṭen maejiue tahẽkana okoe do gelbar bochor khon pordhol rogteye jạbun akan tahẽkan.
Uni do raranko ṭhen khon ạḍi duke ńamakatʼ tahẽkana, ar acʼakʼ oka tahekan ona saname khoroc caba akatʼ tahẽkana, menkhan boge baṅkate dinke din uni doe kạhil idikʼkan tahẽkana.
Ado Jisu reaṅe ańjomketʼ khan bhiṛ bhitrirege uni do tayom secʼte senkate Jisuakʼ oyonakʼe joṭetʼketʼtaea,
enteye monejoṅkan tahẽkana eken uniakʼ kicricʼe joṭetʼ daṛeatae khangeye bogekʼa.
Ar Jisuakʼ oyonakʼe joṭetʼketʼ são sãote mãyãm oḍokokʼ do thirentaea ar hoṛmoreye bujhạukeda rog do boge utạrena.
Unre Jisu do acʼ khon daṛe oḍokena menteye bujhạukeda. Onate beṛhaete beṅgetʼ ạcurkateye kuliyana, “Okoeye joṭetʼkedeńa?”
Unre uniren celakoko metadea, “Ńeletʼkoge com gadel hoṛko riḍạtʼ ciritʼetʼmea, ar enhõm meneda, okoeye joṭetʼ kedeńạ?”
Ado okoeṭakʼe kạmi akatʼ uni ńele lạgitʼ Jisu do beṛhaete beṅgetʼ ạcure ehopʼena.
Uni maejiu do hoeakanakʼe bujhạuketʼ khan thar tharaoate hecʼkate Jisuakʼ jaṅgareye giḍiyena ar jotowakʼe lạiadea
Jisu do uniye metadea, “E mạ̃i, amakʼ pạtiạugeye boge akatʼmea. Sulukte calao joṅme, ar amakʼ duk khon boge akae tahenme.”
Jisui roroṛkan tahẽkanrege sunạgogren mukhiạ hoṛakʼ oṛakʼ khon thoṛa hoṛ hecʼkate Jaerusko metadea, “Amren kuṛi doe gocʼena; Guru do ar alom haronea.”
Onko hoṛkoakʼ katha ańjomkate Jisu do Jaeruse metadea, “Alom botorokʼa, eken pạtiạukʼme.”
Ado Patras, Jakob, ar Johan chaḍa okoe hõ acʼ soṅgete bae sen ocoatʼkoa.
Uni do Jaerusakʼ oṛakʼteye hecʼen khan gulmal hoyokʼkane ńelkeda. Ar hoṛko do kạuạ rạuạko rakʼ homoreda.
Jisu do bhitrite bolokate hoṛkoe metatʼkoa, “Cedakʼpe rakʼreda? Kuṛi do bacoe gocʼakan, ekene jạpitʼ akada.”
Noa katha ańjomkate hoṛko do Jisuko landa dhutʼadea. Unre Jisu do oṛakʼ khon sanam hoṛ oḍokokʼe metatʼkoa. Ona tayom kuṛiren eṅgat-apat ar acʼren celako soṅgekate kuṛiye tahẽkan oṛakʼe boloyena.
Kuṛiwakʼ umer do gelbar bochor tahẽkana. Jisu do ti sapʼkedeteye menkeda; “Talitha kum.” Metakʼme “E mạ̃i metam kạnạń ma beretʼme.”
Ar inạtege kuṛi doe beretʼena ar taṛam baṛaye ehopʼena. Noa iạte onko do ạḍitetʼko hahaṛayena.
Jisu do noa ghoṭna okoe ṭhen hõ baṅ lại baṛae lạgitʼe sontorkatʼkoa; ar kuṛi do thoṛa jomakʼ emae lạgitʼe metatʼkoa.
Ona tayom Jisu do ona jaegae bạgi oṭoatʼte acʼakʼ atoteye calaoena,

ar uniren celako hõ acʼ soṅgeteko sen torayena. Ado Jirạukʼ mãhã seṭeren khan uni do sunạgogre bolokate cetʼakoe ehopʼena. Ar ḍher hoṛ uniakʼ katha ańjomkate hahaṛayente memenko ehopʼena, “Nui do oka khon noakoe ńamakada? Ar noa akele em ocoakan, noa baṅ cetʼkan? Ar hahaṛa kạmiko hõe kạmi kana.

Nui do cetʼ uni kaṭmistiri doe baṅkana? Nui do cetʼ Mạriạmren hopon doe baṅkana? Jakob, Joses, Jihudạ ar Simon takoren boeha doe baṅkana? Uniren miserako cetʼ nonḍe abo talare bạnukʼkoa?” Nonkage hoṛko do Jisu iạte monre tạkijokʼko ehopʼena.
Unre Jisui metatʼkoa, “Nij ato, nij peṛa ar nij gharońj chaḍa sanam jaegarege nạbiko do manotko ńama.”
Ona tayom thoṛagan rugikoe capoketʼkote onkoe bogeketʼkoa, menkhan onḍe do jãhãn hahaṛa kạmi bae kạmileda.
Ar hoṛko bako pạtiạuadete uni do ạḍiye hahaṛayena. Ona tayom Jisu do ato ato senkate hoṛko cetʼakoe ehopʼena.
Uni do acʼren gelbar celako acʼ ṭhene hoho sorketʼkoa ar babar hoṛkate porcar lạgitʼe kolkatʼkoa. Ar bạricʼ jiuko cetanre hõ ektiạriye ematʼkoa.
Uni do horte lạgitʼ mitʼṭen ṭheṅga chaḍa cetʼge bae idiocowatʼkoa. Piṭhạ, khuti, gạńjiạre poesa hõ iditorae baronketʼkoa.
Panahi horokʼ doe metatʼkogea, menkhan aṅgrop do mitʼṭen khon bạ̃ṛti idiye manakatʼkoa.
Uni do arhõe metatʼkoa, “Jãhãṭakʼ oṛakʼregepe bolokʼ ona ato ạuripe bạgiyakʼ hạbicʼ ona oṛakʼrege tahenpe.
Ar jãhã jaegaren hoṛ bako ataṅpe se kathako bako ańjom enḍekhan, ona jaegape bạgi oṭowakʼre apeakʼ jaṅga talka reakʼ dhuṛi hõ koṭa oṭokakʼpe jemon onage onko birudre goha hoyokʼ.”
Unre celako do senkate porcarko ehopʼena jemon hoṛko kại khon monko ạcurtako.
Onko do aema bạṛicʼ jiukoko oḍok giḍikatʼkoa ar ạḍi utạr rugikohõ bohokʼre sunumko ojokʼatʼkoteko bogeketʼkoa.

Jisuakʼ ńutum goṭa ṭạnḍi pasnao akan tahẽkante Herod raj hõ Jisuakʼ kathae ańjom tiyokʼkeda. Unre adom adom hoṛko menetʼ tahẽkana, “Nui doe Johan bạbạptisicʼ kana. Unige gocʼko khone jiwetʼ beretʼ akante hahaṛawakʼkoe kạmi kana.”
Ar adomko doko menetʼ tahẽkana, “Uni doe Eliạ kana” Arhõ adomko doko menetʼ tahẽkana, “Sedaeren nạbiko leka uni hõ mitʼgoṭen nạbi kanae.”
Noako katha ańjomkate Herode menkeda, “Uni doe Johan kana, one okoeakʼ bohokʼ iń makʼ ńur ocoletʼtae. Uni do arhõe jiwetʼ ruạṛ akana.”
Ona iạte Herodiạ do Johan cetanre ạḍi raṅgao tahẽkantaea. Ar uni do Johan gojeye menetʼ tahẽkana,

menkhan Herod do Johane botoraekan tahẽkana. Ente Johan do mitʼṭen dhorom ar sonot hoṛ menteye baḍae akade tahẽkana, ar onate uni do muskilakʼko khone rukhiạyede tahẽkana. Herod do Johanakʼ kathako ańjomkate monre jut bae ạikạuetʼ tahẽkanre hõ uniakʼ kathako ańjome kusikʼkan tahẽkana.
Mucạtʼre Herodiạ do mitʼṭen ạte ńamkeda. Herod do acʼakʼ janam dinre acʼren napṛakʼ napṛakʼ kạmiạko, subedarko, ar Gạlil Prodeshren mukhiạko lạgitʼ mitʼṭene bhojkeda.
Ar ona bhoj reakʼ rạskạre Herodiạren hoponera doe enecʼente Herod ar bhojre neota akankoe kusi ocoketʼkoa. Unre raj do kuṛiye metadea, “Jãhãnakʼgem koyeń onageń emama.”
Herod do kuṛi ṭhen kiriạenteye menkeda, “Jãhãnakʼgem koeyeń onageń emama, emon ki ińakʼ adha rajosṭi hõ.”
Kuṛi do senkate eṅgattetʼe kulikedea, “Iń do cetʼiń khoja? Uniren eṅgattetʼe menkeda, “Johan bạbạptisicʼakʼ bohokʼ koeyeme.”
Ar kuṛi do senkate raje metadea, “Johan bạbạptisicʼakʼ bohokʼ ńitge mitʼṭen thạrire imạńme.”
Noa katha ańjomkate Herod do ạḍiye bhabnayena, menkhan bhojre neota akanko samaṅreye kiriạlente kuṛi ruạṛkae bae menwana.
Ado Johanren celako noa khoborko ańjomketʼ khan hecʼkate uniakʼ mạ̃ṛĩ idikateko topakada.
Ado Jisu okoe gelbar celakoe kolletʼko onkoko ruạṛ hecʼen khan onko okakoko kạmiletʼ arko cetʼatʼko tahẽkan ona joto do uniko baḍae ocokedea.
Unre onḍe ḍher hoṛko calakʼ hijukʼkan tahẽkante celako do jom reakʼ ạtge bako ńamleda. Onate Jisui metatʼkoa, “Dela, iń tulucʼ mitʼṭen nisun jaegare hecʼkate thoṛa ghạṛicʼ jirạukʼpe.”
Ar lạukạre decʼkate onko do mitʼṭen nisun jaegateko senena.
Ado calakʼko ńelketʼko khan ḍher hoṛge onkoko oromketʼkoa ar aḍepase ato khonko ńir oḍokente onko laharege onḍeko seṭerena.
Jisu lạukạ khone pheḍen khan gadel hoṛe ńelketʼkoa. Ar hoṛkore mãyã hecʼadea, ente onko do gupiyicʼ begor bhiḍi lekako tahẽkana. Ar Jisu do ạḍi okocʼakʼko reaṅ cetʼakoe ehopʼena.
Ado ạyupʼ hijukʼkan tahẽkanre celako do hecʼkate Jisuko metadea, “Noa jaega do nisungea, ar bela hõe hạsurena.
Onate ma bidạkakome, jemon aḍe pase atote senkate jomakʼko kiriń daṛeakʼ.”
Jisui metatʼkoa, “Apege jomakʼ emakope.” Celakoko metadea, “Ale do cetʼ senkate barsae Dinarte piṭhạ kiriń ạgukate onkole jomocokoa?”
Jisui metatʼkoa, “Senkate ńelpe, tinạkʼ piṭhạ menakʼtapea?” Adoko lạiadea, “Mõṛẽ goṭen piṭhạ ar barea hako menakʼkinạ.”
Unre celakoe hukumatʼkoa jemon onko do gadel hoṛko hạriạ̃ṛ ghãsreko duṛupʼ ocoko.
Khan gadel hoṛ do sae sae, ar mõṛẽgel, mõṛẽgelkate sạr sạrteko duṛupʼena.
Jisu do mõṛẽ goṭen piṭhạ ar barea hako hataokate serma secʼ beṅgetʼ rakapʼkate Isor gun manao joharadete piṭhại kecakʼkeda ar hoṛko emako lạgitʼ celakoe calatʼkoa, ar nonkage hako hõe hạṭińatʼkoa.
Ar sanamkoko jomkeda arko biyena.
Ona tayom celako do sarecʼakʼ kaṭra kuṭrạ piṭhạ halaṅkate gelbar phạtiạkʼko perecʼkeda.
Ar tinạkʼko jomketʼ onko modre mõṛẽ hajar herel hoponko tahẽkana.
Ona tayom Jisu do celako usạrae lạgitʼe metatʼkoa, jemon onko do lạukạre decʼkate doreão hanasako paromokʼte Bethsaeda atoteko calao hataṛokʼ, ar acʼ do gadel hoṛ bidạkoe ehopʼena.
Ar gadel hoṛkoe bidạ baṛaketʼko khan koejoṅ lạgitʼ buruteye rakapʼena.
Ado ńindạyen khan celakoakʼ lạukạ do tala doreãore tahẽkana ar Jisu do eskarge ghuṭureye tahẽyena.

Jisu do celako ạḍi haronte lạukạ calaoetʼkane ńelketʼkoa, ente onko samaṅ secʼ khone hoyetʼkan tahẽkana. Ado maraṅ simrakʼ jokhecʼ Jisu do doreão cetante taṛamate celako ṭhene hecʼena ar onko paromkoe menjoṅkan tahẽkana.
Menkhan celako do doreão cetante taṛam ạguyetʼko ńelkede khan bhut hudiskedeteko kikiạukeda,
ente uni ńelte jotoge botor caṛhaoatʼkoa. Unre Jisu do celako sãoteye roṛ gotʼkeda. Metatʼkoae, “Dil joṅpe, ińkangeạń, alope botorokʼa.”
Ado Jisu lạukạreye decʼen khan hoe do thirgotʼena. Ar celako doko ṭhak utạrena,
ente niạ lahare piṭhại jom ocoletʼko reakʼ do bako bujhạu akatʼ tahẽkana; ente onkoakʼ mon do goṛdho akan tahẽkantakoa.
Jisu ar acʼren celako do doreão paromkate Genesaret elakate hecʼkate lạukạko tolkeda.
Ar lạukạ khonko pheḍen khan hoṛko do Jisuko ńel oromkedete ona elaka reakʼ sanam jaegakore ńir baṛaeko ehopʼena.
Inạ tayom jãhãrege menaea menteko baḍaeketʼ onḍege parkomkote uni ṭhen rugikoko gokʼ ạguketʼkoa.

Ar jãhã nagraha, se atoteye calakʼkan tahẽkan onḍege hoṛko do bajarkore rugikoko jarwayetʼko tahẽkana. Ar uniakʼ kicricʼ ańcar joṭetʼtae lạgitʼko nehõrae kan tahẽkana, ar tinạkʼ do uniko joṭetʼede tahẽkan onko doko bogekʼkan tahẽkana.
Ado okoeko Jerusalem khonko hecʼakan tahẽkan onko modren adom Phạrusi ar sostor baḍaeko do Jisu ṭhenko hecʼ jarwayena.
Onkoko ńelkeda, Jisuren celako modren adomko do ti begor ạbukte bhonḍ hoṛko leka jojomko duṛupʼ akana.
Phạrusiko ar sanam Jihudiko do sedaeren dhorom guruko okaṭakʼ niạmko emakan ona niạm lekate ti begor ạbukte do jom hõ bako jometʼ tahẽkana.
Ar hạṭiạ bajar khon hecʼkate hõ begor umte cetʼge bako jometʼ tahẽkana. Ona chaḍa onko do arhõ aema lekan ạri-cạliko pańjayetʼ tahẽkana, jemon loṭa, bạṭi, thạri gasao mańjao emanteakʼko reaṅ.
