Onate Phạrusiko ar sostor baḍaeko do Jisuko kulikedea, “Hapṛamko khon hecʼạgu akan ạri-cạli do amren celako cedakʼ bako manaoeda? Onko do begor ti ạbukteko jom ńuiyeda.”
Jisui roṛ ruạṛatʼkoa, “Ape dope phạsiạrako kana! Jesaea nạbi do ṭhikge ape reaṅe nạbi akada. Uniakʼ puthire olakana: noko hoṛ do mocategeko ganaoedeńa, menkhan onkoakʼ ontor do iń khon sạṅgińgetakoa.
Onko do ạuṛiakʼgeko sewawạń kana, ar manwakoakʼ hukumkoge dhorom reakʼ sikhnạt menteko cetʼako kana.
Ape do Isor emakʼ hukumko bạgikate, manwa benaoakʼ ạri-cạlikope pańjayeda.’’
Arhõe metatʼkoa, “Isorakʼ hukumko bạgikate manwakoakʼ cạliko pańja do bhagegepe baḍae kana.
Moseye menakada, ‘eṅgam ạpum ganaokinme,’ ar eṅgat se apat bạṛicʼ memenicʼ do gocʼte hõ goje hoyokʼa.
Menkhan apepe meneda, jãhãege eṅgat se apattetʼe metae iń hotete okaṭakʼem porhokokʼ ona do ‘Korban,’ metakʼme Isor ṭhen samaṅ akana.
Enḍekhan uni do eṅgat ar apat lạgitʼ cetʼge bape ceka ocoaekana.
Nonkate hecʼ ạgu akan ạri-cạlikope cetʼako kante Isorakʼ kathape ạuṛiakʼeda. Ona chaḍa noa lekanakʼ arhõ ạḍi utạrpe kạmiyeda.”
Noa tayom Jisu do hoṛko arhõ acʼ ṭhen hoho sorkateye metatʼkoa, “Jotoko ińakʼ katha ańjompe ar bujhạupe.
Inạ tayom gadel hoṛko bạgikate oṛakʼe boloyen khan celako do ona katha reakʼ bhedtetʼko kulikedea.
Jisui metatʼkoa, “Cekate nunạkʼ dope bebujgea? Ape do cetʼ bape bujhạueda, bahre khon okaṭakʼ manwa bhitrite bolokʼkan onate manwa do bae bhõnḍ daṛeaea mente?
Ente uniakʼ ontorre ona do baṅ bolokʼ kana menkhan lacʼre bolokʼkana, ar tayomte ona do hoṛmo khon oḍok giḍikʼ kana.” Ona kathate uni do joto jomakʼge saphagea menteye bujhạu ocoyeda.
Jisu do arhõe metatʼkoa, “Manwa bhitri khon okaṭakʼ oḍok hijukʼkan onatege manwa doe bhõnḍ ocokʼ kana,
ente manwa bhitri khon, metakʼme ontor khonge joto lekan bạṛicʼ hudis, laṭghaṭ, kombṛo, khũn,
laloc, dusṭạmi, eṛe, umtạ umti, mẽtʼ jolokʼ, opoman, bạḍại ar bebujko do oḍok hijukʼa.
Noako sanam bạṛicʼakʼ do manwa bhitri khonge oḍokʼ hijukʼ kana ar noatege manwa doe bhõnḍokʼa.”
Inạ tayom Jisu do ona jaega bạgikate Tur ar Sidon elakateye calaoena. Uni do mitʼṭen oṛakʼteye boloyena ar okoe hõ aloko baḍaeyea menteye menwana, menkhan bae oko tahẽ daṛeada.
Onḍe mitʼṭen maejiue tahẽkana ar uniren kuṛi do bạṛicʼ jiue capaṛ akawade tahẽkana. Ado Jisu reaṅe ańjomketʼ khan hecʼkate uniakʼ jaṅgareye giḍiyena.
Uni do Junạni maejiue tahẽkana ar Surophoenikireye janamlena. Uni do Jisui nehõradea jemon acʼren kuṛi khon bạṛicʼ jiue oḍok giḍikae.
Jisu do uniye metadea, “Gidrạkoge lacʼ bikʼ jom maṛaṅ ocoakome, ente gidrạkoakʼ jomakʼ hataokate setako samaṅre giḍikakʼ do baṅ bhagea.”
Maejiue roṛ ruạṛkeda, “E Probhu, am do ṭhikgem menakada, menkhan gidrạkoakʼ jomakʼ reakʼ ganḍa gunḍạ oka do mej latarre ńurokʼkan setako do onakogeko jomeda.”
Jisui menkeda, “Katha do bhagegem menakada, Do calakʼme; ar ńelme, bạṛicʼ jiu do hoponeram khone oḍok calao akana.’’
Ado oṛakʼe ruạṛen khan, acʼren kuṛi aṭetʼreye giticʼ akan ar bạṛicʼ jiu uni khon oḍok akane ńamkedea.
Noa tayom Jisu do Tur elakae bạgiatʼe Sidon nagraha talate Gạlil doreão sor Dekapoli elaka reakʼ atokoteye calaoena.
Onḍe do mitʼṭen kala ar guṅgạ hoṛ Jisu ṭhenko ạgukedea ar capoye lạgitʼko nehõraedea.
Jisu do bhiṛ tala khon mitʼ aṛereye idikedete uniakʼ banar luturre acʼakʼ kạṭupʼe gutukeda; ar thokate uni hoṛakʼ alaṅe joṭetʼketʼtaea.
Ona tayom serma secʼ beṅgetʼ rakapʼkate kũhrạuateye menkeda, “Ephata” mane do “Jhijokʼme.”
Ar inạtege uniakʼ lutur do jhicʼgotʼentaea, ar alaṅ reakʼ gitạtʼ hõ chaḍaoente pusṭạute katha roroṛe ehopʼena.
Unre Jisu do noa reaṅ hoṛko lại baṛaeye manakatʼkoa. Menkhan tinạkʼe manakatʼko, unạkʼge onko do ona reaṅ artetʼge lại baṛaeko ehopʼena.
Onate hoṛko do hahaṛayenteko menkeda, “Jotowakʼ tinạkʼ bhageye kạmiyeda. Uni do kalakoe ańjom ocoyetʼkoa ar guṅgạko hõ katha roṛ reakʼ daṛeye emako kana.”
Mitʼ din arhõ ạḍi utạr hoṛko jarwayena. Ar onko hoṛ ṭhen jãhãn jomakʼ baṅ tahẽkante Jisu do acʼren celako hohoatʼkoteye metatʼkoa,
“Noko hoṛkoreń mãyãkʼ kana, ente teheń pe din hoyokʼ kana iń sãote menakʼkoa; onko ṭhen do jãhãn jomakʼge bạnukʼa.
Ar niạ halotre oṛakʼiń kolkako khan horkoreko lorao botejokʼa, ente onko modren ḍherkoge ạḍi sạṅgiń khonko hecʼakana.”
Celakoko metadea, “Menkhan noa nisun jaegare noko jom ocoko lạgitʼ piṭhạ do okarele ńamkea?”
Jisui kuliketʼkoa, “Tinạkʼ piṭhạ menakʼtapea?” Menkedako, “Eae goṭen”

Uni do gadel hoṛko otre duṛubokʼe hukumatʼkoa. Ar ona eae goṭen piṭhạ hataokate Isore gun manao joharadeteye kecakʼkeda ar hoṛko emako lạgitʼ celakoakʼ tireye calatʼkoa, ar celako do gadel hoṛkoko ematʼkoa.
Celako ṭhen thoṛa thuṛi kạṭicʼ hako hõko tahẽkana. Jisu do hako hõe bhoratʼkote gadel hoṛko emako lạgitʼe metatʼkoa.
Adoko jomkeda arko biyena. Ar okako kecakʼ kaṭra kuṭrạ ńur tahẽyen celako do onakoko halaṅ jarwaketʼte eae phạtiạkʼko perecʼkeda.
Onḍe do pon hajargan herel hoponko tahẽkana.
Ona tayom gadel hoṛe bidạkatʼkote uni do celako sãote mitʼṭen lạukạre decʼkate Dalmanuthạ elakateye calaoena.
Ado onḍe Phạrusikoko oḍok hecʼen khan Jisu sãote reṭe peṭekʼko ehopʼena, ar biḍạue lạgitʼ serma khon mitʼṭen cinhạko khojkeda.
Noa iạte Jisu do kũhrạuateye menkeda, “Niạ piṛhiren hoṛko do cinhạ reakʼ cedakʼko khojkana? Ińiń metapekana, cetʼ cinhạge noko do baṅ udukʼakoa.”
Ona tayom uni do onkoe bạgiatʼkote arhõ lạukạreye decʼena ar doreão hanasae parom calaoena.
Celako soṅgete piṭhạ iditora joṅko hiṛińakatʼ tahẽkana. Ar onkoakʼ do lạukạre eken mitʼṭen piṭhạ tahẽkantakoa.
Unre Jisui metatʼkoa, “Phạrusiko ar Herodrenkoakʼ khạmi khon sontor akae tahenpe.”
Onate celako do ako akoreko menjoṅana, “Piṭhạ bạnukʼ tabonte noae metabon kana.”
Ado celakoko galmaraokan reaṅe baḍaeketʼtako khan Jisui metatʼkoa, “Cedakʼpe meneda piṭhạ bạnukʼtapea? Ape do cetʼ ńit hõ bape baḍae kana se bape bujhạueda? Apeakʼ ontor do cetʼ goṛdho akantapea?
Mẽtʼ menakʼ tulucʼ cetʼ bape ńeńelkana? Lutur tahen tulucʼ cetʼ bape ańjomeda? Disạ hõ cetʼ bape disạyeda,
mõṛẽ hajar hoṛko lạgitʼ mõṛẽ goṭen piṭhạń kecakʼletʼre ape do tinạkʼ phạtiạkʼpe halaṅ jarwaleda?” Celakoko roṛ ruạṛadea, “Gelbar phạtiạkʼ.”
Jisu do arhõe metatʼkoa, “Pon hajar hoṛko lạgitʼ eae goṭen piṭhạń kecakʼletʼre tinạkʼ phạtiạkʼpe halaṅ jarwaleda?” Adoko lạiadea, “Eae phạtiạkʼ.”
Unreye metatʼkoa, “Enḍekhan ńitokʼ hõ cetʼ bape bujhạueda?”
Jisu ar acʼren celako do Bethsaeda atoteko calaoena. Ar onḍe mitʼṭen kãṛã hoṛ Jisu ṭhenko ạgukedea ar joṭedea menteko nehõradea.
Jisu do uni kãṛã hoṛ tire sapʼkate ato bahreteye oḍok idikedea. Ona tayom mẽtʼreye thoadea ar capokedeteye kulikedea, “Jãhãnakʼem ńel ńameda?”
Uni hoṛ do beṅgetʼ rakapʼkateye menkeda, “Iń do hoṛkoń ńel ńametʼkoa; onko do ńelokʼte dare leka, arko taṛam baṛayeda.”
Jisu do arhõ uni hoṛakʼ mẽtʼe joṭetʼketʼtaea. Onate uni hoṛakʼ mẽtʼ do jhicʼentaea ar ńeńel daṛeye ńamkeda. Ar pusṭạute jotowakʼ ńeńele ehopʼena.
Ar noa menkateye kolkadea, “Bethsaeda atote do bolo hõ alom bolokʼa.”
Ona tayom Jisu ar acʼren celako do Kạisạriạ Philipi reakʼ atoteko oḍok calaoena. Uni do calakʼ jokhecʼ celakoe kuliketʼkoa, “Hoṛko do okoe kạnạń menteko meneda?”
Celakoko metadea, “Adomko doko meneda Johan bạbạptisicʼ kanam; ar adomko doko meneda Eliạ kanam arhõ adomko doko meneda nạbiko modren mitʼ hoṛ kanam.
Unre Jisui kuliketʼkoa, “Menkhan ape do okoe kạnạń mentepe meneda?” Patrase roṛ ruạradea, “Am do uni Mạsi kanam.”
Unre Jisu do onkoe sontorkatʼkoa jemon acʼ reaṅ okoe ṭhen hõ aloko lại baṛae.

Jisu do acʼren celako noa menkate cetʼakoe ehopʼena, Manwa Hopon do ạḍi okocʼ duk jojom hoyokʼtaea. Uni do murubiko, maraṅ naekeko ar sostor baḍaekoko nihạtea. Are gocʼ ocokʼa, ar pe mãhã hilokʼre uni do arhõ gocʼko khon jiwetʼ beredokʼ hoyokʼtaea.
Uni do pusṭạute noako kathae lạiatʼkoa. Unre Patras do Jisu mitʼ secʼe begar idikedete nisṛạueye ehopʼkeda.
Jisu do ạcurente celako secʼe beṅgetʼkeda ar Patras dhomkaokedeteye metadea, “Eya Soetan, iń khon pharakokʼme. Ente Isor reakʼakʼko do bam moneakʼ kana, menkhan manwa reakʼakʼkogem moneakʼ kana.”
Noa tayom celako ar gadel hoṛko acʼ ṭhen hoho sorkateye metatʼkoa, “Jãhãege ińakʼ horte hijukʼe monejoṅ uni do acʼakʼ sana leka aloe calakʼma; bickom acʼakʼ krus gokʼkateye pańjayiń ma.
Okoe acʼ lạgitʼ jiwetʼ tahene menjoṅkan uni do jiwiye khuạutaea; menkhan okoe iń ar Isorakʼ bhage sombat iạte acʼakʼ jiwiye khuạutae, uni do onae rukhiyạitaea.
Jãhãege goṭa dhạrtiye labte acʼakʼ jiwiye khuạutae enḍekhan cetʼ porho hoyokʼtaea?
Ente jiwi ńam ruạṛ lạgitʼ uniakʼ do emokʼteakʼ ar cetʼ menakʼtaea?
Niạ piṛhiren bepạtiạu ar kại hoṛko talare iń ar ińakʼ kathako iạte jãhãegeye lajaokʼ, enḍekhan Manwa Hopon hõ sonot goḍetko soṅgekate acʼren Apatakʼ ṭhonokanteye hijukʼre uni hoṛ iạteye lajaokʼa.”
Ona tayom Jisu do celakoe metatʼkoa, “Sạrigeń metapekana, nonḍe teṅgo akanko modre nonkan hoṛ menakʼkoa one onko do Isorakʼ raj daṛe salakʼ hijukʼ ạuriko ńel hạbicʼ okalekate hõ bako gujukʼa.”
Noa turui din tayom Jisu do Patras, Jakob ar Johan soṅgekate mitʼṭen usul buruteye rakapʼ calaoena. Ar onko samaṅreye eṭakʼ boronena.
Uniakʼ kicricʼko do nonka pĩṛĩtʼ pĩṛĩtʼ ponḍ hoyena je, dhạrtiren okoe dhubi hõ onka do ohoe ponḍ oco daṛekea.
Onko do Eliạ ar Mose onḍeko ńelketʼkinạ. Unkin do Jisu sãotekin galmaraokan tahẽkana.
Unre Patras do Jisui metadea, “E Guru, ale nonḍe menakʼle do, bhagege hoeakana. Nonḍe pea kumbạ oṛakʼle benaoa, mitʼṭen do am lạgitʼ, mitʼṭen do Mose lạgitʼ ar mitʼṭen do Eliạ lạgitʼ.”
Patras do cetʼe mena mente bae bujhạulakʼa, ente onko do ạḍi botor caṛhaoatʼko tahẽkana.
Ar ona jokhecʼ mitʼṭen rimil do rakapʼ hecʼente onkoe umul esetʼketʼkoa, ar ona rimil khon noa katha ańjomena, “Nuige ińren dulạṛiạ Hopon, nuiakʼ ańjomtaepe.”
Celako do beṛhaeteko beṅgetʼ ạcurketʼ khan eken Jisu eskargeko ńel ńamkedea.
Ado buru khonko pheḍ hijukʼkan tahẽkanre Jisu do onkoe hukumatʼkoa, “Okape ńelketʼ, ona do Manwa Hopon gocʼko khon ạuriye jiwetʼ beredokʼ hạbicʼ okoe hõ alope lại akoa.”
Celako do Jisuakʼ hukumko bataoketʼtaea, menkhan gocʼko khon jiwetʼ beredokʼ reakʼ mane cetʼ kana mente ona do ako akore galmaraoko ehopʼena.
Onko do Jisuko kulikedea, “Sostor baḍaeko do cekateko meneda, pạhilre Eliạ hijukʼ reakʼ jạruṛ menakʼtaea mente?

Jisui roṛ ruạṛatʼkoa, “Noa katha do sạrikangea je, pạhilre Eliại hijukʼa ar sanamakʼ do lahate lekae teṅgo aroea. Menkhan Manwa Hopon reaṅ sonot sostorre cekate baṅ olakan, uni do ạḍi okocʼ duk jojom hoyokʼtaea ar hoṛko do uniko nihạtea?
Menkhan ińiń metapekana, Eliạ reaṅ sonot sostorre okaleka olakan onkage uni doe hecʼlena, ar hoṛko do unire akoakʼ sana lekako kạmikeda.”
Jisu ar onko pea cela do eṭakʼ celako ṭhenko ruạṛ hecʼen khan, beṛhaete gadel hoṛ jarwa akan ar adom sostor baḍaeko do onko tulucʼ reṭe peṭekʼ kanko ńelketʼkoa.
Ar hoṛko do Jisuko ńelkede khan ạḍitetʼko hahaṛayena ar ńir senkateko joharadea.
Jisu do sostor baḍaekoe kuliketʼkoa, “Onko tulucʼ cetʼ reaṅpe reṭepeṭekʼ kana?”
Gadel hoṛ bhitri khon mitʼ hoṛe roṛ ruạṛkeda, “E Guru, ińren koṛa am ṭheniń ạgu akadea. Unire do mitʼṭen guṅgạ jiu menaea.
Tinreye sabea unre uni do otreye tawakʼ bhindạṛea. Ar moca do photo photokʼtaea are togocʼ ḍaṭaea. Iń do amren celako uni jiu oḍok giḍiye lạgitʼ iń metatʼkoa, menkhan bako daṛeada.”
Unre Jisui metatʼkoa, “E bepạtiạuko! Ar tinạkʼ din ape sãoteń tahena? Ar tinạkʼ iń sahaokatapea? Dini iń ṭhen ạguyepe.”
Ado uni ṭhenko ạgukedea. Unre bạṛicʼ jiu do Jisui ńelkede khan koṛaye mocṛa mucṛikedea. Ar otreye bhindạṛkedete moca do photo photoyentaea ar guṛdạukʼe ehopʼena.
Jisu do uniren apattetʼe kulikedea, “Tinạkʼ din khone nonka akana?” Uni doe menkeda, “Gidrạ khonge.
Bạṛicʼ jiu do goje lạgitʼ jaoge seṅgel ar dakʼreye khadle akadea. Ado jãhãnakʼem daṛeakʼ khan dayakate onkaeme.”
Jisui menkeda, “ ‘Daṛeakʼ khan,’ noa katha reakʼ mane do cetʼkana? Okoeye pạtiạukʼ uni lạgitʼ do jotoge hoedaṛeakʼa.”
Unre gidrạren apat do ãṭ aṛaṅateye menkeda, “Iń doń pạtiạukʼ kangea; ar ńit hõ ińre oka bepạtiạu menakʼ ona baṛe ocokʼ kạtińme.”
Ado gadel hoṛ ńir hijukʼkane ńelketʼko khan Jisu do bạṛicʼ jiu dhomkao kedeteye metadea, “E kala ar guṅgạ jiu, hukumam kạnạń uni khon oḍok calakʼme; ar tis hõ unire alom bolo ruạṛokʼa.”
Unre bạṛicʼ jiu do kikiạuate koṛae mocṛa mucṛikedea ar uni khone oḍok calaoena. Onate koṛa do gocʼicʼ lekae ńelente ḍher hoṛgeko menkeda, “Uni doe gocʼena.”
Menkhan Jisu do ti sapʼkateye beretʼkede khane teṅgoyena.
Inạ tayom Jisu do oṛakʼ bhitriteye boloyena. Unre celako do hape hapete hecʼkateko kulikedea, “Cekate ale do bale oḍok daṛeadea?”
Jisui metatʼkoa, “Nui jạtrenko do koejoṅ begor ar cetʼte hõ ohoko oḍoklena.”
Tayomte onko do ona jaegako bạgiatʼe Gạlil Prodesh talateko parom calaoena. Uni doe menjoṅkan tahẽkana okoe hõ jemon aloko baḍaeye okateye calakʼkana mente,
ente unre uni do acʼren celakoe cetʼakokan tahẽkana, are lại akokan tahẽkana, “Manwa Hopon do hoṛkoakʼ tireko soprotea. Arko gojea ar pe din hilokʼre uni do arhõe jiwetʼ beredokʼa.”
Menkhan celako do Jisuakʼ katha reakʼ mane bako bujhạu daṛeada ar kuliye hõko botorena.
Ona tayom Jisu ar acʼren celako do Kapharnạhumteko calaoena. Ar Jisu oṛakʼ bhitriteye boloyen khan celakoe kuliketʼkoa, “Horre cetʼ iạtepe reṭe peṭekʼkan tahẽkana?”
Celako do thirgeko tahẽyena, ente joto khon maraṅicʼ doe okoe kana menteko reṭe peṭekʼkan tahẽkana.
Jisu doe duṛupʼena ar onko gelbar celako acʼ ṭhen hohoatʼkoteye metatʼkoa, “Jãhãe pạhilicʼ hoyokʼe menetʼ khan uni do jotoko khon tayomre tahen hoyokʼtaea ar jotokoren sapʼdapʼicʼ hoyokʼ jạruṛtaea.”
Uni do mitʼṭen gidrạ onko samaṅreye teṅgokedea. Ar hoborkedeteye metatʼkoa,
“Jãhãege nonkan kạṭicʼ gidrạ iń ńutumteye ataṅe uni do ińgeye ataṅińạ, ar okoe ińe ataṅiń uni do eken iń do baṅ, menkhan kol akadińicʼgeye ataṅede kana.”
Johan do Jisui metadea, “E Guru, mitʼṭen hoṛ do am ńutumte bạṛicʼ jiukoe oḍok giḍikakole ńelkede khan uni dole manakadea, ente uni do abo dolrene baṅkana.”
Jisui menkeda, “Alope manayea. Jãhãege iń ńutumte hahaṛawakʼko kạmi tayom iń upạrte bạṛicʼ do ohoe roṛ daṛelea,
ente okoe abo birudrene baṅkan, uni do abo secʼren kangeae.
Sạrigeń metapekana, Mạsiren hoṛpe hoeakante jãhãege iń ńutumte mitʼ bạṭi dakʼe ńu ocope, uni do okalekate hõ acʼakʼ kuṛại ohoe atʼletaea.
“Ińreko pạtiạu akan noko kạṭicʼko modre mitʼ goṭen jãhãege kại horteye idiye enḍekhan uni do hoṭokʼre jante dhiri tolaete doreãore khadle giḍikaege uni lạgitʼ bhage hoyokʼa.
Amakʼ ti kại horteye or idime khan ona do samakʼ giḍikakʼme.
Ente banar ti tahentam tulucʼ noroktem calakʼ khon boroṅ ṭhunṭạge jionte bolokʼ do am lạgitʼ bhagea.
Ona norok reakʼ seṅgel do tishõ baṅ ĩṛĩjokʼa.
Amakʼ jaṅga kại horteye ạyur idime khan ona do samakʼ giḍikakʼme. Ente banar jaṅga tahentam tulucʼ noroktem calakʼ khon leḍhage jiontem bolokʼ do am lạgitʼ bhagea.
Amakʼ mẽtʼ kại horteye ạyur idime khan ona hõ hoṭor totʼ giḍikakʼme. Ente banar mẽtʼ tahentam tulucʼ norokte bolokʼ khon mitʼ mẽtʼante Isorakʼ rajre bolokʼge am lạgitʼ bhagea.
Ona norokre gocʼ hoṛkoakʼ jel jojom tejo do tishõ bako gujukʼa, ar onḍenakʼ seṅgel hõ baṅge ĩṛĩjokʼa.
“Ar buluṅ emakʼ leka sanamko cetanre seṅgel emocokʼa.
“Buluṅ ma bogege, menkhan sabakʼlen khan cekate ona do arhõ rahamkokʼa? Apeakʼ ontorre buluṅ tahentapema ar sanamko tulucʼ sulukte tahenpe.”
Jisu do ona jaega khon uṭhạukate Jihudạ Prodesh ar Jordan gaḍa hanasakoteye parom calaoena. Ar gadel hoṛ do arhõ uni ṭhen hecʼkateko jarwayena. Unre uni do acʼakʼ cạli leka cetʼakoe ehopʼena.
Un jokhecʼ adom Phạrusiko do hecʼkate Jisu biḍạue lạgitʼko kulikedea, “Moseakʼ ạn lekate jãhãe hoṛ rinicʼtetʼe bạgiye do ganokʼtaea se baṅ?”
Jisui metatʼkoa, “Mose do cetʼ hukume em akawatʼpea?”
Onkoko menkeda, “Bapag dolel olaete bạgiye reakʼe hukum akada.”
Jisui metatʼkoa, “Apeakʼ keṭecʼ mon iạte Mose do noa hukume olatʼpe tahẽkana.
Menkhan noa hõ ol menakʼa, sirjon reakʼ etohopʼre ‘Isor do herel ar maejiue benaoketʼkinạ.
Onate manwa do eṅgat-apat bạgikate acʼren bạhu tulucʼ mitʼakane tahena,
ar unkin do mitʼ hoṛmokin hoyokʼa.’ Onate ar barea dokin baṅkana menkhan mitʼ hoṛmo kanakin.
Onate Isor okaṭakʼe joṛao mitʼ akatʼ manwa do ona aloe topagma.”
Ona tayom oṛakʼteko boloyen khan celako do arhõ ona reaṅko kulikedea.
Unreye metatʼkoa, “Jãhãege acʼren bạhu bạgikate eṭakʼ maejiue baplaye uni do acʼren bạhuttetʼ birudreye laṭghaṭeda.
Ar bạhu hõ hereltetʼ bạgikate eṭakʼ hoṛ ṭhene jãwãelen khan enḍekhan uni hõe laṭghaṭa.”
Ado kạṭicʼ gidrạko Jisu ṭhenko ạguketʼkoa jemon uni do capokateye bhorako. Menkhan celako do onkoko dhomkaoketʼkoa.
Jisu do ona ńelkate bae kusilente celakoe metatʼkoa, “Kạṭicʼ gidrạko iń ṭhen hecʼ ocoakope, alope manakoa; ente Isorakʼ raj do nonkankoakʼ kangea.
Sạrigeń metapekana, okoe kạticʼ gidrạko leka Isorakʼ raj bae ataṅ, uni do okalekate hõ, Isorakʼ rajre bae bolo daṛeakʼa.”
Ona tayom Jisu do onko kạṭicʼ gidrạkoe hoborketʼkoa ar bohokʼre capokateye bhoratʼkoa.
Jisu do arhõ horteye oḍok calakʼ kan tahẽkanre mitʼṭen hoṛ do uni ṭhene ńir hecʼena ar ikhuṛumenteye menkeda, “E Guru, am do mitʼṭen bhage hoṛ kanam. Lạiạńme, jaejug jion ńam lạgitʼ cetʼiń cekaea?”
Jisu do uniye metadea, “Cedakʼ bhage dom mitạńkana? Isor chaḍa ar okoe hõ bhage do bạnukʼkoa.
Hukumko mam baḍaege, ‘alom khũna, alom loṭghuṭia, alom kombṛoea, eṛe goha alom ema, alom ṭhokakoa, ar gogo-babam manotkinạ.’ ”
Uni hoṛe menkeda, “E Guru, gidrạ khonge noako joto doń manao ạguyeda.”

Jisu do uniye beṅgetʼadea ar dulạṛ salakʼe metadea, “Mitʼṭen jinis dom bạki akada. Do calakʼme, ar oka menakʼtam ona ạkhrińkate reṅgecʼ orecʼko dan akome. Onate sermare dhonem ńama. Ar inạ tayom do hecʼkate ińren cela hoyokʼme.”
Noa katha ańjomkate uni hoṛ doe mirluṅena. Uni do ạḍi utạr dhon tahẽkantaete bhabnakateye ruạṛ calaoena.
Unre Jisu do beṛhaete beṅgetʼ ạcurkate acʼren celakoe metatʼkoa, “Kisạ̃ṛko lạgitʼ serma rajte bolokʼ do muskilgea!”
Khan celako do Jisuakʼ noa katha ańjomteko hahaṛayena. Jisu do arhõe metatʼkoa, “E bachako, okoe dhon-duribreko bhorsakʼkan onko lạgitʼ Isorakʼ rajte bolokʼ do muskilgea.
Kisạ̃ṛ hoṛ Isorakʼ rajte bolokʼ khon sũi bhugạkʼte ũṭe bolo tabokʼ do algagea.”
Noa iạte celako do arhõko bhaṛoyente ako talare memenko ehopʼena, “Enḍekhan kại khon do okoeye bańcao daṛekokʼa?”
Jisu do beṅgetʼatʼkoteye metatʼkoa, “Manwa hotete baṅ hoe daṛeakʼre hõ, Isor ṭhen bin leṭejokʼakʼ do bạnukʼa; uni ṭhen do sanamakʼge hoedaṛeakʼa.”
Patras do uniye metadea, “Ńelme, ale do jotowakʼ bạgikate amren celale hoeakana,”
Jisui roṛ ruạṛatʼkoa, “Sạrigeń metapekana, jãhãege iń ar Isorakʼ bhage sombat iạte oṛakʼ duạr se boehako se miserako se eṅgat se apat se gidrạko se ot baṛgekoe bạgi oṭoakatʼ,
uni do niạ purire mitʼ sae doboṛ ḍher oṛakʼ-duạr, boeha-misera, eṅgat-apat, gidrạko ar ot-baṛgekoe ńama ar ona são sãote uni doe santao ocokʼa; ar hana purire jaejug jione ạidạri joṅa.
Menkhan okoe lahare menakʼko onko modren ḍherkogeko tayomokʼa ar okoe tayomre menakʼko onko modren ḍherkogeko lahakʼa.

Inạ tayom Jisu ar acʼren celako do Jerusalem horteko rakapʼ calaoena. Ar Jisu do onko laha lahateye calakʼkan tahẽkana; ar celako do hahaṛakʼ tulucʼ uni sãoteko calakʼkan tahẽkana ar okoeko hoṛ uniko pańja idiyede tahẽkan onko doko botorokʼkan tahẽkana. Jisu do acʼren gelbar celako mitʼ secʼe hoho begarketʼkote acʼre hoyokʼ lạgidokʼ reakʼ katha lại akoe ehopʼkeda.

Uni doe metatʼkoa, “Ńelpe, Jerusalemte bon calakʼ kana. Onḍe Manwa Hopon do maraṅ naekeko ar sostor baḍaeko ṭhenko soprotea. Onko do gujukʼ lek kanae menteko bicạr dusiyea ar boṅgan hoṛ jạtrenkoakʼ tireko soprotea.
Ar boṅgan hoṛ jạtrenko do uniko nisṛạuea ar hoṛmoreko thoaea ar cạbuk baṛakateko gojea. Ar pe mãhã hilokʼre uni do arhõe jiwetʼ beredokʼa.”
Ado Sabdaeren hopon Jakob ar Johan do Jisu ṭhen hecʼkatekin menkeda, “E Guru, ạlińakʼ menjoṅakʼ do noage, ạliń okaliń koeme am do onagem onkawạlińa.”
Jisui metatʼkinạ, “Iń do aben lạgitʼ cetʼiń cekaea? Ar cetʼben khojkana?”
Unkinkin menkeda, “Am do tinre ṭhonokantem rajokʼa unre ạliń modre mitʼ hoṛ do amakʼ jojomsa aṛere ar mitʼ hoṛ do amakʼ leṅgasa aṛere jemon liń duṛupʼ daṛeakʼ.”

Jisui metatʼkinạ, “Okaṭakʼ ben khojkan, ona do baben baḍaea. Oka duk reakʼ bạṭireń ńũi lạgidokʼ kan ona do cetʼ ben ńũ daṛeakʼgea? Se oka bạptismateń bạptis lạgidokʼkan ona do cetʼ ben ataṅ daṛeakʼgea?
Metadeakin, “Hẽ daṛeakʼgea liń.” Unre Jisui metatʼkinạ, “Iń oka duk reakʼ bạṭireń ńũi aben hõ ona reaṅ ben ńũiya, ar oka bạptismań ataṅ, aben hõ ona ben ataṅa,
menkhan ińakʼ jojomsa ar leṅgasare duṛupʼ ben reakʼ ektiạri do bạnukʼtińa. Onako jaega do okoe lạgitʼ tear akan eken onkogeko ńama.”
Ar onko gel goṭen cela do noa katha ańjomkate Jakob ar Johan upạrteko edreyena.
Unre Jisu do sanamko mitʼ sãote hohoatʼkoteye metatʼkoa, “Baḍaegeape, boṅgan hoṛ jạtkoren do disạm cakʼlaokoge onkoren Probhuko hoyokʼ kana ar onkoren mukhiyạkoge onko cetanre ektiạriko calaoeda.
Menkhan apeko talare onka hoyokʼ do lek baṅkana, bickom ape modre jãhãege maraṅ hoyokʼe menjoṅkan khan uni do aperen sapʼdapʼicʼe hoyokʼma,
Ar jãhãe pạhilicʼ hoyokʼe menetʼ khan uni do jotokoren golame hoyokʼma.
Disạipe, Manwa Hopon do sapʼsor ocokʼ lạgitʼ do baṅ bickom sapʼ sosorgeye hecʼakana ar ạḍi utạr hoṛkoakʼ chaḍaokʼ reakʼ dam lekate onkoakʼ jiwi bodolte acʼakʼ jiwi emokʼgeye hecʼakana.”

Ado Jisu ar uniren celako Jerikho nagrahateko calaoena. Ar celako ar gadel hoṛko sãote nagraha khone oḍok calakʼkan tahẽkanre Timạiren hopon Bạrtimại ńutuman mitʼṭen kãṛã kokoe hoṛ do hor aṛereye duṛupʼ akan tahẽkana.
“Ar Nasaretren Jisu,” kanae menteye ańjomketʼ khan ãṭ aṛaṅte hohoye ehopʼena, “E Dạudren hopon Jisu, dayawạńme.”
Noate ḍher hoṛge uniko dhomkaokedete thir hapekokʼko metadea, menkhan uni do artetʼge ãṭ aṛaṅte hohoateye menkeda, “E Dạudren hopon Jisu mãyãwạńme baṛe.”
Jisu do teṅgoyenteye metatʼkoa, “Uni hohowaepe.” Khan uni kãṛã hoṛ hohoadeteko metadea, “Alom botorokʼa ma beretʼme. Uni do ame hohowam kana.”
Unre uni do acʼakʼ oyon kicricʼ capatʼ giḍikatʼteye don beretʼena ar Jisu ṭhene hecʼena.
Jisu do uniye kulikedea, “Am lạgitʼ cetʼ iń cekaea? Ar cetʼem khojkana?” Kãṛã hoṛe menkeda, “E Guru, jemoniń ńeńel.”
Jisui menkeda, “Do calakʼme, am do pạtiạu akantem bogeyena.” Uni hoṛ do unrege ńeńele ehopʼena ar horteye pańja idikedea.
Ado Jerusalem sorko seṭeren khan onko do Jạitun buru ṭhenakʼ Bethaphage ar Bethaniạ ato ṭhenko hecʼena. Onḍe seṭerkate Jisu do acʼren barea cela noa menkateye kolkatʼkina,
“Aben do samaṅ senakʼ atote calakʼben. Ar atote bolokʼ jokhecʼ mitʼṭen gadha hopon onḍe tol akadeben ńamea. Unire do okoege tishõ bako decʼakana.
Aben do raṛakate nonḍe ạguye ben. Ar jãhãegeye kuli ben, ‘cedakʼ ben nonkayeda?’ Enḍekhan metaeben, ‘Probhu do nui reakʼ jạruṛ menakʼtaea; ar uni do usạrateye aṛakʼ abena.’ ”
Unre unkin dokin senena ar gadha hopon chaṭka duạrre tolakade kin ńamkedea. Ar tinre kin raṛayedekan tahẽkana,
unre onḍe okoeko teṅgo akan tahẽkan onko doko metatʼkinạ, “Cetʼ ben cekayeda? Gadha hopon do cedakʼ ben raṛayedea?’’
Unkin cela do Jisu okaleka roroṛe metatʼkin tahẽkan onkagekin metatʼkoa. Unre onko do gadha hoponko idiocowatʼkinạ.
Ado Jisu ṭhenkin ạgukede khan uni cetanre ạkinakʼ oyonakʼkin aṭetʼkeda. Ar Jisu do unireye decʼena.
Ar ạḍi utạr hoṛ do akoakʼ oyonakʼko hor horteko aṭetʼkeda ar eṭakʼko do goḍa khon ḍạrko hese ạguketʼte horteko aṭetʼ idikeda.
Ar Jisu laha lahate calakʼkanko ar uni pańjayekanko do ãṭ aṛaṅteko hoho idiyetʼkan tahẽkana, “Hosanna! Bhorangeae Probhu ńutumte darae kanicʼ do.
Bhorangea aboren baba Dạudakʼ darakan raj do. Coṭ utạrre Hosanna!”
Jisu do Jerusalemre senkate mundilteye boloyena ar beṛhaete jotowakʼe ạri bạndhiketʼa, menkhan bela khaṭogeye tahẽkante acʼren gelbar celakoante Bethaniạteye calaoena.
Ado dosar hilokʼ onko do Bethaniạ ato khonko oḍokʼ hijukʼkan tahẽkanre Jisu do reṅgecʼ kedea.

Unre loa belekʼ okte do baṅ tahẽkana, menkhan enrehõ uni do sạṅgiń khon mitʼṭen loa dareye ńel ńamketʼte onare jo ńam lạgitʼe sen sorena. Ar ona dare sore senen khan onare sakam chaḍa ar cetʼge bae ńel ńamleda.
Onate dareye metatʼa, “Okoege tishõ amakʼ jo aloko jom ńamma.” Celako do Jisuakʼ noa kathako ańjom tiyokʼkeda.

Ado Jerusalemteko seṭeren khan Jisu do mundilteye boloyena ar onḍe kiriń-ạkhrińkoe laga oḍokketʼkoa. Uni do ṭaka-poesa bodoletʼkan hoṛkoakʼ ṭebilko ar parwa kiriń-ạkhrińkoakʼ mạcikoe ulṭạu giḍikatʼtakoa.
Uni do mundil talate kiriń ạkhirińkoakʼ oka jinis hõ bae parom idiocoatʼkoa.
Ado cetʼako jokhecʼ onko hoṛkoe metatʼkoa, “Sostorre cetʼ nonka baṅ olakana, ‘ińakʼ oṛakʼ do sanam jạtko lạgitʼ koejoṅ oṛakʼ ńumogokʼa mente?’ Menkhan ape do ḍạkukoakʼ danderpe benao akada!”
Maraṅ naekeko ar sostor baḍaeko do noa katha ańjomkate Jisu goje lạgitʼ ạt ńam baṛaeko ehopʼena. Onko do Jisuko botoraekan tahẽkana, ente hoṛko do Jisuakʼ cecetʼakʼteko bhaṛo caba akan tahẽkana.
Ar ạyupʼen khan uni do celakowante nagraha bahreteye oḍok calaoena.
Ado setakʼ jokhecʼ ona horteko parom calakʼkan tahẽkanre celako do rehetʼ sudhạ loa dare rohoṛ akanko ńelkeda.
Patras do Jisuakʼ katha disạketʼteye menkeda, “E Guru, ńelme okaṭakʼ darem sarapatʼ tahẽkan ona do rohoṛ akana.”
Unre Jisui metatʼkoa, “Isorre biswạs tahentapema.
Sạrigeń metapekana, jãhãege begor digdhạte noa burui metakʼ, ‘nonḍe khon uṭhạukʼte jalapurire khadlekʼme,’ are pạtiạukʼ baṅma, okae menetʼ ona do hoyokʼa mente, enḍekhan uni lạgitʼ do hoyokʼgea.
Onateń metapekana, jãhãnakʼgepe koe arpe khoj, pạtiạukʼpe ape do onape ńam akada, ar ape lạgitʼ ona do hoyokʼtapea.
Apepe koejoṅre jãhãe birudre jãhãnakʼ tahentape khan uni do ikạyepe,
jemon aperen sermaren Baba hõ apeakʼ kạikoe ikạitape.”
Ona tayom Jisu ar acʼren celako do arhõ Jerusalemteko hecʼena, ar mundilreye dãṛã bãṛãkan tahẽkanre maraṅ naekeko, sostor baḍaeko ar murubiko uni ṭhen hecʼenteko kulikedea,
“Oka ektiạrite noakom kạmi kana? Ar okoe noa ektiạriạ doe emakatʼmea?”
Jisui roṛ ruạṛatʼkoa, “Iń do mitʼṭen kathań kulipea. Adope roṛ ruạṛ daṛeạń khan iń hõń lạiapea oka ektiạrite noakoń kạmi kana mente.
Johan do bạptisma emokʼ reakʼ ektiạri oka khone ńamleda, Isor khon se manwako secʼ khon?”
Unre onko do ako talare noako galmaraoana, “Menle khan bon ‘Isor ṭhen khon,’ enḍekhane metabona, ‘cedakʼ tobe bape pạtiạuadea?’
Arhõ bon men lekhan, ‘manwa secʼ khon,’ enḍekhan?” Onko do hoṛkoko botorakokan tahẽkana, ente sanamkoge Johan do mitʼṭen nạbi menteko manaoede tahẽkana.
Onateko menkeda, “Ale do bale baḍaea.” Unre Jisui metatʼkoa, “Enḍekhan iń hõ bạń lạiapea oka ektiạrite noakoń kạmi kana.”

Ona tayom Jisu do golpoko hotete cetʼakoe ehopʼena. Uni doe metatʼkoa, “Mitʼ hoṛ do mitʼṭen darkha bagwane benaoketʼte ona beṛhaeteye eṭetʼ ạcurkada. Ar darkha rasa benao lạgitʼ lelen kunḍe laketʼte mitʼṭen usul oṛakʼe benaokeda. Ona tayom casako ṭhen bạisạu oṭokate uni do eṭakʼ disạmteye calaoena.
Ado jo belekʼ okte hoyen khan ona jo reakʼ bhag hatao lạgitʼ casako ṭhen mitʼṭen gutiye kolkedea.
Menkhan casako do uni guti hõ sapʼkedeteko dalkedea ar eken tiko kolgotʼkadea.
Unre kisạ̃ṛ do eṭakʼ ar mitʼṭen gutiye kolkedea. Khan casako do uni guti hõ bohokʼreko dalkedea ar uni tulucʼ ạḍi bạṛicʼko beoharkeda.
Enrehõ uni do eṭakʼ ar mitʼṭene kolkedea. Ar casako do uniko gocʼkedea. Tayomte uni kisạ̃ṛ do arhõ eṭakʼkoe kolketʼkoa, menkhan onko modre adom doko dalketʼkoa ar eṭakʼko doko gocʼketʼkoa.
“Ado onḍe kole lạgitʼ kisạ̃ṛren do eken mitʼ goṭengeye sarecʼena. Uni do acʼren dulạṛiạ hoponge. Ar mucạtʼre acʼren hopongeye kolkedea; are hudisana; ‘onko do nahakʼ ińren hoponko manotea.’
Menkhan onko casako do ako akoreko menana, ‘nuige owaris doe hoyokʼa. Dela bon gojea, enḍekhan aboge onaren mạlik bon hoyokʼa.’
Onko do hopontetʼ sapʼkedeteko gocʼkedea ar darkha bagwan bahrereko giḍikadea.
“Enḍekhan mase lạipe, darkha bagwanren mạlik do cetʼe cekaea? Uni doe hijukʼa ar casakoe gocʼkoa ar darkha bagwan do eṭakʼkoe jimạ oṭoakoa.
Ape do cetʼ sonot sostorre bape paṛhao akada? ‘Raj mistiriko okaṭakʼ dhiriko bad giḍi oṭoletʼ onage konac reakʼ asol dhiri hoyena;
noa do Probhu khonakʼge hoyena, ar aboakʼ mẽtʼ samaṅre do ạḍi hahaṛawakʼge?’ ”
Unre sostor baḍaeko do Jisu sabeko menana, enteko bujhạukeda, ako birudrege ona golpo doe lạiyeda. Menkhan onko do hoṛko botoratʼkote Jisu bạgiadeteko calaoena.
Onko sostor baḍaeko do Jisu acʼakʼ kathate jhạliye lạgitʼ Phạrusiko ar Herod secʼrenkoko kolketʼkoa.

Onko do Jisu ṭhen hecʼkateko menkeda, “E Guru, alele baḍaea, mitʼṭen sạri hoṛ kanam. Ar hoṛ cetʼko hudisme ar bako hudisme, ona do bam moneakʼ kana, ente am do okoeakʼ mẽtʼãhã hõ bam beṅgetʼakʼ kana. Ar sạri sạrige Isorakʼ hor reaṅem cetʼako kana. Ado lạialeme, Moseakʼ ạn lekate Romren maharaj khajna emae do ganokʼa se baṅ?
Ar uni do khajnale emaea se baṅ?” Jisu do onkoakʼ phạsiạratetʼ baḍaeketʼteye metatʼkoa, “Cedakʼpe biḍạuedeń kana? Den mitʼṭen Dinar ạguạńpe.”
Ado mitʼṭen Dinarko aguade khan Jisu do onkoe kuliketʼkoa, “Noare chap akan muṭhạn ar ńutum do okoeakʼ kana?” Metadeako, “Romren maharajakʼ kana”
Jisui metatʼkoa, “Okaṭakʼ maharajakʼ kan ona do maharajge emaepe, ar okaṭakʼ Isorakʼkan ona do Isorge emaepe.” Jisuakʼ noa katha ańjomkateko hahaṛayena.
Ado Sạdukiko modren adomko do Jisu ṭhenko hecʼena. Sạdukiko ṭhen do gocʼkoakʼ jiwetʼ beredokʼ reakʼ do cetʼge bạnukʼa.

Onate onko do Jisuko kulikedea, “E Guru, Mose do abo lạgitʼ noae ol oṭoakada, ‘jãhãe hoṛ begor gidrạwante bạhuttetʼe gocʼ bạgi oṭoae khan enḍekhan bokottetʼ do uniye baplayete dadattetʼren bõse teṅgokoma.’
Eae boehako tahẽkana, ar pạhilicʼ do baplakate begor gidrạwantegeye gocʼena.
Khan dosaricʼ do hilit erae baplakedea, menkhan uni hõ begor gidrạwantegeye gocʼena, ar tesaricʼ hõ onka lekageye gocʼena.
Ar nonkage eae boehako modre, okoeren hõ gidrạ do bako hoelena. Ado mucạtʼre uni maejiu hõe gocʼena.
Enḍekhan gocʼkoko jiwetʼ beredokʼre uni do okoeṭakʼren bạhui hoyokʼa? Ente eae hoṛge coṅ uni mako baplalede.”
Jisui roṛ ruạṛatʼkoa, “Bhuledape, ente ape do sostor hõ bape baḍaea ar Isorakʼ daṛe reakʼakʼko hõ baṅ.
Gocʼkoko jiwetʼ beredokʼre bạhu hõ bako bạhu joṅa ar jãwãe hõ bako jãwãeyokʼa; onko do serma goḍet lekako hoyokʼa.
Menkhan gocʼko jiwetʼ beredokʼ reaṅ Moseakʼ puthire ol akan jolokʼkan jhạwạ reakʼ katha do cetʼ bape paṛhao akada, Isor do Moseye metadea, ‘ińge Abrahamren Isor,
Isạhakren Isor ar Jakobren Isor?’ Isor do gocʼkoren Isor doe baṅkana, menkhan jiwetʼkoren Isorge. Ape do ạḍipe bhuleda.”
Ado sostor baḍaeko modren mitʼ hoṛ do onḍe hecʼkate reṭe peṭekʼ kane ańjomketʼkoa. Ar Jisu bes okocʼteye roṛ ruạṛetʼkan ńelkedeteye kulikedea, “Sanam khon pạhilakʼ hukum do okaṭakʼ kana?”
Jisui roṛ ruạṛkeda, “Sanam khon pạhilakʼ hukum do hoyokʼ kana, ‘E Israelko, ańjompe, aboren Probhu Isor doe mitʼ goṭengea.
Onate apeakʼ goṭa ontorte, goṭa jiwite, goṭa monte ar goṭa daṛete aperen Probhu Isor dulạṛepe.’
Ar dosarakʼ hukum do noa kana, ‘am aḍe paseren hoṛ apnar leka dulạṛem.’ Noakin banar hukum khon maraṅ hukum do ar cetʼge bạnukʼa.”
Unre sostor baḍayicʼ doe menkeda, “E Guru, bhage katha kangea. Am do sạrigem menakada, Isor doe mitʼ goṭengea ar uni chaḍa eṭakʼ Isor do bạnukʼkoa.
Ar goṭa ontorte, goṭa bujte ar goṭa daṛete uni dulạṛe ar am aḍe paseren hoṛ apnar leka dulạṛe do janwar ar eṭakʼ joto lekan dãṛẽko khon hõ sorosgea.”
Jisu do sostor baḍaeyicʼ bes budan hoṛ leka roṛ ruạṛetʼkanteye metadea, “Am do Isorakʼ raj khon pharakre do bạnukʼmea.” Ar un khon Jisu jãhãnakʼ kuliye do okoe hõ bako dilleda.
Dạud acʼge coṅ uni ma Probhui metaekan enḍekhan cekate Mạsi do uniren hopone hoedaṛekokʼa?” Ar aema hoṛ do kusi monte Jisuakʼ kathako ańjometʼ tahẽkana.
Jisu do cetʼako tulucʼe metatʼkoa, “Sostor baḍaeko khon sontor akae tahenpe. Onko do tilpạṅ talpaṅ aṅgropko horoga ar hạṭiạ bajarkore johar ocokʼko kusiyakʼa.
Onko do sunạgogre laha duṛupʼakʼko ar bhojkore asol asol jaegageko kusiyakʼa.
Ar hoṛko ṭhen ńelocokʼ lạgitʼ jeleń jeleńko koejoṅa, menkhan eṭakʼ secʼ do rạnḍi maejiukoakʼ oṛakʼ-duạrko jom ujạṛetʼtakoa. Nonkan hoṛ do bạ̃ṛti sạjạiko ńama.”
Ona tayom Jisu do mundil reakʼ dan sunduk pheḍre duṛupʼkate ṭaka-poesa emokʼkoe ạri bạndhiyetʼko tahẽkana. Ar kisạ̃ṛ hoṛko do ḍher ṭaka-poesako dankeda.
Ar mitʼṭen reṅgecʼ rạnḍi maejiu do hecʼkate eken barea huḍiń poesae dohokeda.
Unre Jisu do acʼren celako hohoatʼkoteye metatʼkoa, “Sạrigeń metapekana, nui reṅgecʼ rạnḍi maejiu do sundukre sanam hoṛko khon ḍhere danakada.
Ente onko hoṛ do akoakʼ asecʼ tasecʼ dhon khonko dohoakada, menkhan nui maejiu do acʼakʼ okulạnakʼ khon jauḍicʼ bańcao tahen lạgitʼ tahẽkantae, ona jotogeye dohokeda.”
Ado Jisu mundil khone oḍok calakʼkan tahẽkanre acʼren mitʼṭen cela do uniye metadea, “E Guru, ńelme, tinạkʼ lạṭu lạṭu dhiri ar tinạkʼ mońj mońj dolanko!”
Jisu do uniye metadea, “Am ma noako lạṭu lạṭu dolanem ńeletʼkan, menkhan noa reakʼ mitʼṭen dhiri hõ ar mitʼ dhiri cetanre baṅ tahena; joto do rạputʼ giḍi ocokʼa.”
Jisu do mundil samaṅ senakʼ Joitun burureye duṛupʼ akan tahẽkanre Patras, Jakob, Johan ar Andreasteko do hape hapete hecʼkate uniko kulikedea,
“Lạialeme, noako do tis hoyokʼa? Ar okalekan cinhạko ńeltele bujhạu daṛeakʼa noako purạukʼ lạgidokʼ ghuṛi do seṭer akana.”
Jisui metatʼkoa, “Ńelpe, okoe hõ jemon aloko bulạupe.
Aema hoṛ do iń ńutumte hecʼkateko mena, ‘iń kangeạń uni do,’ ar aema doko bulạu ocokʼa.
Ape do lạṛhại reakʼ saḍekope ańjomlere alope bilbilạukʼa. Noako do hoyokʼgea, menkhan unrehõ mucạdokʼ do baṅkana.
Mitʼ jạt eṭakʼ jạt birudre, ar mitʼ rajosṭi do eṭakʼ rajosṭi upạrteko lạṛhạiya; ar aema jaegare dhạrti laṛaokʼa ar akal hoyokʼa. Menkhan noako do eken saset reakʼ etohopʼ kana.
“Sontor akan tahenpe. Maraṅ bạisiren hoṛko ṭhenko soprotpea ar sunạgogkoreko dalpea. Iń iạte disạm cakʼlaoko ar rapajko samaṅre teṅgokʼ hoyokʼtapea; ar onko samaṅre iń reaṅ goha emokʼ hoyokʼtapea.
Sanam jạt jạtko ṭhen Isorakʼ bhage sombat do porcar maṛaṅ hoyokʼa.

Ar bicạr lạgitʼko sapʼ idilepere laha khon alope bhabnakʼa cetʼko roroṛ hoyokʼtapea mente. Ona jokhecʼ oka kathape lại ocokʼ, onage roṛpe, ente apege roroṛ hoyokʼtapea ona do baṅ bickom sonot Jiugeye roṛa.
“Boeha do boehatetʼe soprotea, apat do hopontetʼ gocʼ ocoye lạgitʼe sapʼocoyea. Gidrạko do go-baba birudreko teṅgona arko khũn ocokoa.
Iń iạte sanamkogeko hirkhạwapea, menkhan mucạtʼ hạbicʼ okoeye ṭarhao tahen uni do bańcaoe ńama.
“Ar ujạṛ reakʼ hirkhạwakʼ okare tahen baṅ ganokʼ, ona onḍe tahẽakanpe ńela (Paṛhaoicʼ doe moneakʼma) unre Jihudạre tahenko do buruteko ńir joṅma.
Chatre menaeicʼ do jãhãnakʼ oḍok idi lạgitʼ aloe pheḍokʼma ar oṛakʼte aloe bolokʼma.
Baṛgere menaeicʼ hõ oyonakʼ ạgui lạgitʼ aloe ruạṛma.
Unre bhạrti hoṛmoanko ar okoe do gidrạko nunuako onkore do hae hae!
Koejoṅpe, jemon rabaṅ dinre noako alo hoyokʼ,
ente unre nonkan santaoko hoyokʼa one oka do dhạrti sirjạu khon ńit hạbicʼ baṅ hoeakan ar ona tayom do ar baṅ hoyokʼa.
Probhu onako din bae khaṭole khan okoe hõ ohoko bańcao daṛekokʼa. Menkhan Isor do acʼren bachao akan hoṛko lạgitʼ ona dinkoe khaṭo akada.
“Unre jãhãegeye metape, ‘ńelpe, Mạsi do nonḍe,’ se ‘hanḍe menaea,’ alope pạtiạukʼa;
ente eṛe Mạsi ar eṛe nạbikoko upelokʼa ar aema lekan hahaṛa kạmikoko uduga, hoedaṛeakʼ khan Isorren bachaoko hõko bulạu daṛeakoa.
Menkhan ape do sontorakae tahenpe. Ńelpe, laharege jotowakʼ iń lại dohoatʼpea.
“Ona okte reakʼ santao tayomge siń cando doe ńutokʼa, ar ńindạ cando do bae terdeja,
Ipilko serma khonko ńurokʼa, siń cando, ńindạ cando ar ipilko do bako ṭarhaokʼa.
Unre hoṛko do Manwa Hopon maraṅ daṛe ar ṭhonokante rimilte hijukʼko ńelea.
Uni do acʼren serma goḍetkoe kolkote dhạrti reakʼ mitʼ mucạtʼ khon eṭakʼ mucạtʼ hạbicʼ ponon secʼ khon Isorren sanam bachao akan hoṛkoe jarwa mitʼkoa.
“Loa dare ńelte cetʼ joṅpe. Ente ona reakʼ dạrko balekate sakam sagenlen khanpe baḍae daṛeakʼkana, lolo din do seṭer akana.
Onkage noako hoyokʼ kanpe ńellere bujhạupe, Manwa Hopon doe hecʼ sorakana, hẽ; duạr ṭhengeye teṅgo akana.
Sạrigeń metapekana, noako hoelenre hõ noa piṛhiren thoṛa hoṛ do bańcaoko tahena.
Serma ar dhạrti do cabakʼa menkhan ińakʼ kathako do jaejug hạbicʼ tahena.
“Ona din ar ona okte reakʼ katha do okoe hõ bako baḍaea, sermaren goḍetko hõ baṅ, ar Hopon hõ baṅ, eken Babageye baḍaea.
Ape do sontor akan tahenpe, jagwar tahenpe ar koejoṅpe, ente bape baḍaea oktetetʼ do tiskan coṅ.

Ona din do nonkan mitʼṭen hoṛ lekana okoe do eṭakʼ disạmteye calao lạgidokʼkan. Ar oṛakʼe bạgiyakʼ jokhecʼ acʼren gutiko joto lekan dạyike ematʼkoa. Ar apan ạpin kạmikoe batlao baṛawatʼkote horhoicʼ do jagwar akae tahene men oṭoadea.
“Ape hõ onkage jagwar akae tahenpe, ente oṛakʼren mạlik baṅ do ạyupʼ, baṅ do tala ńindạ, baṅ do simrakʼ okte, baṅ do setakʼ jokhecʼe hijukʼ ona do bape baḍaea.
Uni do ackage hecʼkate jạpitʼ akatʼ jemon bae ńampe.
Okaṭakʼ iń metapekan ona do sanamkoń metakokana, jagwar akae tahenpe.”
Unre sen parom porob ar bin khạmianakʼ piṭhạ porob do ar bar din bạki tahẽkana. Ar maraṅ naekeko ar sostor baḍaeko do Jisu hape hapete sapʼkate goje reakʼ ạtko ńam baṛayetʼ tahẽkana.
Onkoko menkeda, “Porobre do baṅ; baṅkhan disạm hoṛko talare gulmal hoe botejokʼa.”

Unre Jisu do Bethaniạren murhucʼ jom rugi Simonakʼ oṛakʼreye tahẽkana. Ado jojome duṛupʼ akan tahẽkanre mitʼṭen maejiu do ponḍ dhiri cukạkʼre ạḍi daman jaṭamaṅsi sunumanteye hecʼena. Ar cukạkʼ rạputʼkate uni do Jisuakʼ bohokʼre ona sunume dulkeda.
Menkhan onḍe okoeko tahẽkan onko modre adom hoṛ do edreyente ako akore menjoṅana, “Cedakʼ noa mahkaokʼ sunum do nosṭo giḍikakʼ hoyokʼ kana?
Noa ạkhriń lekhan pe sae Dinar khon hõ bạ̃ṛti damkokʼa ar ona do reṅgecʼ orecʼko emdaṛekekoa.” Onko do noa menkate maejiu upạrte karacʼ kurujokʼko ehopʼena.
Unre Jisui metatʼkoa, “Thirokʼpe, cedakʼpe duk ocoyedea? Uni do iń lạgitʼ bhageakʼgeye kạmiakada.
Reṅgecʼ orecʼko ma jaoge ape sãore menakʼko, ar tinrepe monejoṅ unregepe goṛo daṛeakoa, menkhan iń do jao ghuṛi bape ńameńa.
Uni do okae daṛeakatʼ onageye kạmi akada. Uni do topayiń lạgitʼe sapṛaoedeńte laharege sunume ojokʼ ạdińa.
Sạrigeń metapekana, dhạrti reakʼ jãhã jaegarege Isorakʼ bhage sombat porcarokʼ, onḍege nui maejiue kạmiakatʼakʼ hõ uni disạye lạgitʼ lại torakʼa.”
Ona tayom Jihudạ Iskariotko metae mitʼ hoṛ do Jisu soprot ocoye lạgitʼ maraṅ naekeko ṭhene calaoena.
Naekeko do Jihudạwakʼ katha ańjomkateko rạskạyena ar ṭaka emae lạgitʼ kathako emadea. Ar Jisu soprote lạgitʼ ạt ńam baṛaye ehopʼena.

Bin khạmianakʼ piṭhạ porob reakʼ pạhil hilokʼ do sen parom porob bhojre lạgitʼ bheḍa hoponko dãṛẽyetʼko tahẽkana. Onate celako do Jisuko kulikedea, “Sen-parom porob reakʼ bhoj do okarele tearama mentem menjoṅ kana?”
Unre Jisu do acʼren barea cela noa menkateye kolketʼkinạ, “Aben do nagrahate calakʼben. Ar onḍe mitʼṭen herel hoṛ kanḍate dakʼe idikan ben ńamea. Aben do uni ben pańja idiyea.
Ar uni okaṭakʼ oṛakʼteye bolokʼa, ona oṛakʼren kisạ̃ṛ ben metaea, ‘Gurui menakada, celako sãote sen-parom porob reakʼ bhoj okareń jom daṛeakʼ ona ińakʼ peṛa kandha do okare?’
Khange uni do cetan kandhare mitʼṭen sajao akatʼ oṛakʼe udukʼ abena. Ar onḍege jotowakʼ ben sapṛaoa.”
Unre unkin cela do senkate nagrahatekin boloyena, ar Jisui metatʼkin tahẽkan lekage jotowakʼkin ńamketʼte sen parom porob reakʼ bhojkin sapṛaokeda.
Ar ạyupʼen khan Jisu do gelbar celako sãote onḍeye calaoena.
Ado jojomko duṛupʼ akan tahẽkanre Jisui metatʼkoa, “Sạrigeń metapekana, ape modre mitʼ hoṛe soprotińa, uni do iń tulucʼ jojomkanicʼge.”
Unre celako doko bhabnayente mimitʼ hoṛkate memenko ehopʼena, “Probhu, uni do cetʼ iń kạnạń?
Jisui metatʼkoa, “Uni do gelbarko modren mitʼ hoṛge, okoe do iń tulucʼ bạṭire piṭhại topoyetʼkan.
Manwa Hoponakʼ gujukʼ reaṅ sonot sostorre okaleka olakan onkage uni do gujukʼ hoyokʼtaea; menkhan hae uni hoṛ do, one okoe uniye sapʼ ocoyede! Uni hoṛakʼ janam do alo hoelen khange boge hoekokʼa.”
Adoko jojomkan tahẽkanre Jisu do piṭhạ halaṅkate Isore gun manao joharadea ar onae kecakʼketʼte celako ematʼkoteye metatʼkoa, “Ne ataṅpe, noa do ińakʼ hoṛmo kana.”
Ona tayom bạṭi halaṅkate Isore gun manao joharadea are ematʼkoa. Ar sanamkoge ona bạṭi reakʼko ńũkeda.
Unre Jisui metatʼkoa, “Noa do ińakʼ mãyãm kana, one okaṭakʼ do ạḍi hoṛko lạgitʼ emogokʼkan. Manwako lạgitʼ Isorakʼ nawa bondobos do ińakʼ mãyãm hotetege bahal tahena.
Sạrigeń metapekana, Isorakʼ rajre darkha rasa nawate ạuriń ńũi hạbicʼ noa do ar bạń ńũiya.”
Ona tayom onko do mitʼṭen sarhao sereńateko oḍokena ar jạitun buruteko rakapʼ calaoena.
Ado Jisu acʼren celakoe metatʼkoa, “Jotokoge iń iạte monrepe tạkijokʼa. Sonot sostorre olakana, ‘gupiyicʼ iń gojea, onate bhiḍiko doko chir chạturokʼa.’
Menkhan gocʼko khoniń jiwetʼ beredokʼ tayom iń do ape lahate Gạlilteń calakʼa.”
Unre Patrase menkeda, “Sanamkoko tạkicʼlenre hõ iń do ohogeń tạkicʼlena.”
Jisu do uniye metadea, “Sạrigeń metamkana, teheń ńindạ sim sạnḍi bar dhao ạuriye ragre am do pe dhaoem baṅeńa.”
Menkhan Patras do artetʼ murukteye menkeda, “Am sãote gujukʼ hoyokʼtińre hõ iń do ohogeń baṅlema.” Ar eṭakʼ celako hõ ona mitʼ kathageko roṛkeda.
Ona tayom Jisu ar acʼren celako do Gethsimạniko metakʼ mitʼṭen jaegateko oḍok calaoena. Jisu do celakoe metatʼkoa, “Tin hạbicʼ iń koejoṅ unhạbicʼ nonḍe duṛupʼ hataṛokʼpe.”
Noa menkate uni do Patras, Jakob ar Johane soṅge toraketʼkoa ar monre ạḍi duk ar dhak dhakaokʼe ehopʼena.
Uni do onkoe metatʼkoa, “Dukte ińakʼ jiwi do oḍokokʼ kantińạ. Ape do nonḍe jagwar akae tahenpe.”
Ona tayom uni do lahańokʼ senkate otre taberenteye koekeda jemon ona ghuṛi hoedaṛeakʼ khan acʼ ṭhen khon pharakokʼ.
Uni doe menkeda, “Abba, E Baba, am ṭhen do sanamakʼge hoedaṛeakʼa. Noa duk reakʼ bạṭi iń khon pharakme baṛe. Enhõ ińakʼ sanaleka do baṅ menkhan amakʼ sanalekage hoyokʼma.”
Ona tayom celako ṭhene ruạṛ hecʼen khan jạpitʼ akatʼe ńelketʼkoa. Uni do Patrase metadea, “E Simon, am dom jạpitʼ joṅkana? Mitʼ ghonṭa hõ cetʼ jagwar bam tahẽ daṛeada?
Jagwar tahenpe ar koejoṅpe jemon biḍạure alope paṛaokʼ. Ontorre sana menakʼgea, menkhan hoṛmo do nijorgea.
Jisu do arhõ senkate onkageye koekeda.
Ar inạ tayome ruạṛ hecʼen khan arhõ jạpitʼakatʼe ńamketʼkoa, ente dudṛumte onkoakʼ mẽtʼ do hạrubokʼ kan tahẽkana. Ar Jisu cetʼko roṛ ruạṛaea mente onko do bako bujhạuleda.
Ado tesar dhao ruạṛ hecʼkateye metatʼkoa, “Ńitokʼ hõpe jạpitʼ akatʼgea? Ḍher hoeakana. Ńelpe, okte do seṭerena. Ńitge Manwa Hopon do kại hoṛkoakʼ tireye soprotʼ ocokʼa.
Ma beretʼpe, dela bon calakʼa, okoe bạirikoakʼ tireye soprotiń uni doe seṭerena.”

Jisui roroṛkan tahẽkanrege Jihudạ do onḍeye hecʼena. Uni do gelbar celako modren mitʼ hoṛe tahẽkana. Ar uni sãote ạḍi utạr hoṛ do tarwaṛe ar ṭheṅgawanteko hecʼena. Onko do maraṅ naekeko ar sostor baḍaeko ar murubikoko kolakatʼko tahẽkana.
Ar okoe Jisui soprotlede uni do onko tulucʼ mitʼṭecʼ cinhại ṭhik dohoakatʼ tahẽkana. Uni doe metatʼko tahẽkana, “Okoeṭakʼ iń cokʼae, uni kangeae. Ape do unigepe sabea arpe pahra idiyea.”
Onate Jihudạ do mitʼ mohnḍa Jisu ṭhen senkateye menkeda, “E Guru!” Ar noa menkateye cokʼadea.
Unre onko hoṛ do Jisuko sapʼkedea.
Menkhan sorre teṅgo akanko modren mitʼ hoṛ do acʼakʼ tarwaṛe bocʼkate maraṅ naekeren gutiyakʼ luture hese ńurketʼtaea.
Jisu do onkoe metatʼkoa, “Iń do cetʼ ḍạku kạnạń, onate tarwaṛe ar ṭheṅgawante iń sasapʼpe hecʼakana?
Iń ma jaoge ape talare tahẽkate mundilreń cetʼape kan tahẽkan, ar unre ma bacope sapʼlediń. Menkhan sostor reakʼ katha do purạukʼtege hoyokʼa.”
Unre celako do uniko ńir bạgiadea.
Ar mitʼ juạn koṛa do eken oyonakʼte paṭhekate Jisu tayom tayomteye calakʼkan tahẽkana.
Hoṛko do uniko jhuṭiạukede khan oyonakʼ giḍikate eken hoṛmogeye ńir paskaoena.
Onko hoṛ do maraṅ naeke ṭhen Jisuko idikedea. Ar onḍe do maraṅ naekeko, murubiko ar sostor baḍaeko mitʼ ṭhenko jarwayena.
Ar Patras do pharak pharakʼre tahẽkate Jisu tayomte senkate maraṅ naekeakʼ raca hạbicʼe boloyena. Ar onḍe palṭonko sãoteye duṛupʼ panteyente seṅgel ṭhen jorogokʼe ehopʼena.
Ar maraṅ naekeko ar maraṅ bạisiren hoṛko do Jisu goje lạgitʼ gohako ńam baṛakan tahẽkana, menkhan onko do okaṭakʼ gohage bako ńamleda.
Jisu birudre aema hoṛge eṛe gohako emkeda, menkhan onkoakʼ goha hõ baṅ jurilentakoa.
Unre adom hoṛ do teṅgoyente uni birudre noa eṛe gohako emkeda,
“Ale do roroṛle ańjomakadea, ‘Iń do manwa benaoakʼ noa mundil iń dhaṅ dhasera ar pe dinte nonkan mitʼṭen mundil iń benaoa okaṭakʼ do manwa tite benaoakʼ baṅkan.’ ”
Menkhan enrehõ onkoakʼ goha do baṅ jurilentakoa.
Unre maraṅ naeke doe teṅgoyena ar Jisui kulikedea, “Am do cetʼ bam roṛ ruạṛa? Am birudre noko do cetʼ gohako emeda?”
Jisu do thirgeye tahẽyena, cetʼge bae roṛ ruạṛleda. Maraṅ naeke do arhõe kulikedea, “Am do cetʼ sarhaoanicʼ Isorren Hopon Mạsi kanam?”
Jisui menkeda, “Uni kangeạń. Ar ape do Manwa Hopon sanam daṛeanicʼ Isorakʼ jojomsa aṛere duṛupʼ akan ar rimilte hijukʼkanpe ńelea.”
Khange maraṅ naeke do acʼakʼ kicricʼ oṛecʼketʼteye menkeda, “Goha reakʼ do ar cetʼ jạruṛabona?
Ape hõ coṅpe ańjomketʼ uni do Isore opomane kana. Ado cetʼpe bujhạukea?” Onko jotoge Jisu do gujukʼ sạjại lek kanae menteko bicạr dusikedea.
Unre adomko do hoṛmoreko thoadea ar uniakʼ mẽtʼko betʼketʼtaea ar kilạukedeteko metadea, “Am do cetʼ nạbi kanam? Mase lạialeme okoeye dalketʼmea!” Ona tayom palṭonko do idikateko thapa baṛakedea.
Patras tinre bhitri racareye tahẽkana unre maraṅ naekeren mitʼṭen kạ̃ṛmĩ do onḍeye hecʼena.
Ar Patras jorogokʼkane ńelkede khan beṅgetʼ uricʼadeteye metadea, “Am hõ coṅ uni Nasaretren Jisu sãotem tahẽkan.”
Menkhan Patras doe baṅketʼteye menkeda, “Cetʼem meneda ona do baḍae hõ bạń baḍaea ar bujhạu hõ bạń bujhạueda.” Noa menkate Patras do bahre duạr ṭhene calaoen khan mitʼṭen sim sạnḍi doe rakʼgotʼkeda.
Uni kạ̃ṛmĩ do Patras arhõe ńelkede khan onḍe teṅgo akankoe metatʼkoa, “Nui hoṛ do onko modren kanae.
Patras do arhõe baṅkeda. Ado thoṛa ghạṛicʼ tayom sorre okoeko teṅgo akan tahẽkan onko hõ Patrasko metadea, “Khạṭige am do onko modren mitʼ hoṛ kanam, ente am dom Gạlilren kana.”
Unre Patras doe sarapana ar kiriạyenteye menkeda, “Okoe reakʼpe menetʼkan uni do bạń oromakadea.”

Ar unrege sim sạnḍi do dosar dhaoe rakʼgotʼkeda. Ar unre Patras do ona katha disạ hecʼadea one Jisui metade tahẽkan, “Sim sạnḍi bar dhao ạuriye ragre am do pe dhaoem baṅeńa.” Onate uni do hũk hũke rakʼkeda.
Maraṅ naekeko do ạḍi setakʼre, murubiko, sostor baḍaeko ar maraṅ bạisiren hoṛko soṅgekate mitʼṭenko solhakeda. Ona tayom Jisuko tol idikedete Romren disạm cakʼlaoicʼ Pilạt ṭhenko jimạkadea.
Pilạt do Jisui kulikedea, “Am do cetʼ Jihudikoren raj kanam?” Jisui roṛ ruạṛkeda, “Am do ṭhikgem menakada.”
Maraṅ naekeko do Jisu aemako dusikedea.
Onate Pilạt do arhõ Jisui kulikedea, “Am do cetʼ bam roṛ ruạṛa? Ńelme, tinạkʼko dusiyetʼmea.”
Menkhan Jisu do cetʼge bae roṛ ruạṛleda. Onate Pilạt doe hahaṛayena.
Sen-parom porobre Pilạt do hoṛkoakʼ khoj leka mitʼṭen kạidiye aṛakʼedekan tahẽkana.
Unre Barabbako metae mitʼṭen hoṛ do hajotreye tahẽkana. Uni do hul jokhecʼ hulletʼkan hoṛko soṅgete tahẽkateye khũnletʼ tahẽkana.
Ar gadel hoṛ do Pilạt ṭhen hecʼkateko metadea, “Am do jaoge okam ceka ạguakatʼ ńit hõ onkaeme baṛe.”
Pilạte metatʼkoa, “Jihudikoren rajiń aṛakʼapepe khojkana?”
Enteye baḍaekan tahẽkana, maraṅ naekeko do hiskạte acʼakʼ tire Jisuko soprot akadea.
Menkhan maraṅ naekeko do disạm hoṛko uskạuketʼkoa jemon onko do Jisu bodolte Barabbako khoje.
Pilạt do arhõe kuliketʼkoa, “Enḍekhan Jihudikoren rajpe metaekan uni doń cekaea?”
Onko do ãṭ aṛaṅte hohoateko menkeda, “Uni do krus kaeme.”
Pilạte metatʼkoa, “Cedakʼ, cetʼe dosakatʼte?” Menkhan hoṛko do artetʼ ãṭ aṛaṅte hohoate memenko ehopʼena, “Uni do krus kaeme.”
Ar Pilạt do hoṛko kusi ocoko lạgitʼ Barabbageye aṛakʼatʼkoa, ar Jisu do cạbuke reakʼe hukumketʼte kruskae lạgitʼe aṛakʼatʼkoa.
Ona tayom palṭonko do disạm cakʼlaoicʼakʼ dolan bhitrite Jisuko idikedea. Onḍe do eṭakʼ palṭonko hõko jarwa mitʼketʼkoa.
Onko do beguni roṅakʼ kicricʼteko oyokedea, ar jạnumanakʼ nạ̃ṛĩ reakʼ mukuṭ galaṅkate bohokʼreko horokʼadea.
Ona tayom metaeko ehopʼena, “Johar, Jihudikoren raj, jitạu hoyokʼtam ma!”
Onko do mitʼṭen ṭheṅgate bohokʼreko dal dalaekan arko thoaekan tahẽkana, ar ikhṛumkateko ḍobokʼaekan tahẽkana.
Adoko siṛog baṛawade khan beguni roṅakʼ kicricʼko totʼketʼtaete acʼakʼ kicricʼko horokʼadea ar kruskae lạgitʼko idikedea.

Ado ona jokhecʼ Kurene nagraharen Simon ńutuman mitʼṭen hoṛ do ato secʼ khon ona horteye calakʼkan tahẽkana. Uni do Aleksander ar Ruphustekinren apate tahẽkana. Palṭonko do Jisuakʼ krus gokʼiditae lạgitʼko sapʼ paṭetʼkedea.
Onko do Golgatha, torjomate do khạpriko metakʼ mitʼṭen jaegateko idikedea.
Ar gondhoros mesalakatʼ sirkạ ńũae lạgitʼko emadea, menkhan uni do bae ńũleda.
Inạ tayom onko do Jisuko kruskedea. Ar palṭonko do uniakʼ kicricʼ hạṭińjoṅa menteko gulibãṭkeda.
Onko do setakʼ are baja okte Jisuko kruskedea.
Ar uni birudre dusi reakʼ (dos-nama) re ol tahẽkana, “Jihudikoren raj.”
Onko do Jisu sãote barea ḍạku hõko krusketʼkina, mitʼṭen do uniakʼ leṅga secʼre ar eṭagicʼ do uniakʼ jojomti secʼre.
Onate sonot sostor reakʼ katha noa katha purạuena: “Uni do beạiniko tulucʼe lekhayena.”
Ar horte parom calakʼkanko do bohokʼ ruku rukuate Jisu siṛogaeteko metadea, “Eya mundil dhaṅ dhasericʼ ar pe dinte benao ruạṛicʼ!
Ma ńitokʼ krus khon pheḍ hijukʼte bańcaokʼme!”
Onkage maraṅ naekeko ar sostor baḍaeko hõ siṛogaete ako ako talare memenko ehopʼena, “Uni do eṭakʼkoe bańcaoketʼkoa, menkhan acʼ do bae bańcao daṛeakʼ kana.
Uni do Mạsi, Israelkoren raj! Ńitokʼ krus khone pheḍ hijukʼma; jemon ona ńelte ale hõle pạtiạukʼ.” Jisu sãote krus akankin hõ onkage kin siṛogadea.
Ado gelbar baja khon pe baja hạbicʼ goṭa disạm do ńũtena.
Ar pe baja okte Jisu do ãṭ aṛaṅte hohoateye menkeda, “Eloi, Eloi Lama Sabakhthani,” metakʼme “E ińren Isor, E ińren Isor, cedakʼem bạgi giḍiạdińa?”
Ar sorre teṅgoakanko modren adom hoṛ do noa ańjomkateko menkeda, “Ańjompe, uni do Eliại hohoae kana.”
Unre mitʼ hoṛ do ńir senkate sirkạre mitʼṭen spońje topokeda ar ṭheṅgare gutukate Jisu ńũae lạgitʼe cepecʼadea. Uni doe menkeda, “Hape ńellege bon Eliạ do uni bańcaoe hijukʼa se baṅ.”
Ona tayom Jisu do ãṭ aṛaṅteye hohoketʼ khan jiwi oḍokentaea.
Unre mundil reakʼ orwal do coṭ khon pheḍ hạbicʼ oṛecʼente bar hạṭińena.
Ar samaṅreye teṅgo akan tahẽkan palṭon do Jisu nonka gujukʼkane ńelkedeteye menkeda, “Sạrige uni do Isorren Hopone tahẽkana.”
Ar maejiuko hõ sạṅgińre teṅgokateko ạri bạndhiyetʼ tahẽkana. Onko modre Magdalaren Mạriạm, huḍiń Jakob ar Josestekinren eṅgat Mạriạm ar Salomitekoko tahẽkana.
Jisu Gạlilreye tahẽkanre noko maejiu do uni sãoteko calakʼkan tahẽkana arko sapʼsoraekan tahẽkana. Ar Jerusalem khonko hecʼlen tahẽkan maejiuko hõ onḍeko tahẽkana.
Enhilokʼ do sapṛaokʼ din, metakʼme jirạukʼ mãhã laha din tahẽkana.

Ado ạyupʼ hijukʼkan tahẽkan jokhecʼ Arimạthiạren Joseph do Pilạt ṭhen senkate Jisuakʼ mạ̃ṛĩye koekeda. Uni do maraṅ bạisiren mitʼṭen manotan hoṛe tahẽkana ar acʼhõ Isorakʼ raj reakʼe ńel hohorkan tahẽkana.
Pilạt do Jisu usạreteye gocʼente aḍiye hahaṛayena. Ar sạrigeye gocʼ akana se baṅ, onate subedar hohoadeteye kulikedea.
Ado subedar ṭhene baḍaeketʼ khan mạ̃ṛĩ do Josephe emadea.

Joseph do kicricʼe kiriń ạguketʼte Jisuakʼ mạ̃ṛĩye pheḍkeda ar kicricʼteye bedhaokeda, ar cạṭạinire kholao akatʼ mitʼṭen topareye dohokada. Ona tayom mitʼṭen dhiri guḍrạu ạgukate topa duạre esetʼ oṭokada.
Jisuakʼ mạ̃ṛĩ okare dohoyen, ona do Magdaloniren Mạriạm ar Joses eṅgat Mạriạmtekin hõkin ńelkeda.
Ado Jirạukʼ mãhã paromen khan Magdalaren Mạriạm, Jokob eṅgat Mạriạm, ar Salomiteko do mạ̃ṛĩre ojokʼakʼ lạgitʼ mońj so mosolako kiriń ạgukeda.
Ar hapta reakʼ pạhil din setakʼ jokhecʼ, cando rakabokʼ sãote onko do topa ṭhenko calaoena.
Unre ako akoreko menjoṅkan tahẽkana, “Topa duạr khon dhiri do okoeye ocokʼ abona?”
Menkhan onko do beṅgetʼ rakapʼkateko ńelkeda, dhiri do maraṅge tahẽkanre hõ, ona do ocokʼ akana.
Ado topa bhitriteko boloyen khan jojomsa aṛere ponḍ kicricʼ horokʼ akatʼ mitʼṭen juạn hoṛ duṛupʼ akanko ńelkedea, ar onate ạḍitetʼko tharbasaoena.

Uni juạn hoṛe metatʼkoa, “Alope tharbasaokʼa. Ape do Nasaretren Jisu, okoe doko kruslede, unipe sendra baṛayede kana? Nonḍe do bạnuea, uni doe jiwetʼ beretʼ akana. Ar nõkʼõe ńelpe ona jaega, one okareko doholede.
Ape do senkate uniren celako ar Patras hõ noa katha lạiaepe je, onko lahate uni do Gạlilteye calakʼkana. Ar cetʼlekae menletʼ onkage onko do onḍeko ńamea.”
Onko maejiu do cetʼhõ bako bujhạu daṛeakʼte thar tharaokʼ tulucʼ topa dander khon oḍokkateko dạṛkeda. Onko do nunạkʼko botorena je, botorte okoe hõ cetʼge bako lạiatʼkoa.
Ado hapta reakʼ pạhil hilokʼ ạḍire Jisu do gocʼko khone jiwetʼ beretʼen khan pạhilre Magdalaren Mạriạm ṭhene ńel ocoyena. Uni Mạriạm khonge eae goṭen bạṛicʼ jiue oḍokʼ giḍiletʼko tahẽkana.
Mạriạm do Jisui ńelkede khan senkate uni sãotenkoe khoboratʼkoa. Unre onko do bhabnateko rakʼ homor joṅkan tahẽkana.
Jisui jiwetʼ beretʼ akan ar Mạriạm ṭhene ńel ocoakan reakʼ katha ańjomkate onko do bako pạtiạulena.
Ona tayom uniren barea cela do ato secʼkin taṛam idiyetʼkan tahẽkanre Jisu do eṭakʼ rupte unkin ṭhene ńel ocoyena.
Unkin do ruạr senkate sarecʼko ona khobor kin lạiatʼkoa, menkhan unkinakʼ katha hõ eṭakʼ celako do bako pạtiạuada.

Inạ tayom Jisu do acʼren gelmitʼ celako ṭhene ńel ocoyena. Unre onko doko jojomkan tahẽkana. Ar onkoakʼ bepạtiạu ar keṭecʼ mon iạte uni doe nisrạuketʼkoa, ente gocʼko khone jiwetʼ beretʼen tayom okoeko ńellede onkoakʼ katha bako pạtiạuatʼ tahẽkana.
Jisui metatʼkoa, “Ape do dhạrti reakʼ sanam jaegate calakʼpe ar sanam hoṛko ṭhen Isorakʼ bhage sombat porcarpe.
Ar jãhãegeye pạtiạukʼ are bạptis ocokʼ unige kại khon bańcaoe ńama; menkhan okoe bae pạtiạukʼ uni do sạjạiyokʼ lạgitʼe bicạr ocokʼa.
Okoeko pạtiạukʼ onkore do noako cinhạ ńelogokʼa, onko do iń ńutumte bạṛicʼ jiukoko oḍok giḍikoa, ar nawa nawa pạrsite kathako roṛa,
onko do tite bińko sapʼkoa, ar gujukʼakʼ jãhãnakʼgeko jom ńulere hõ ohoko hạnlena, ar rugikoko capokoa arko bogekʼa.”
Ado joto kathae galmaraoatʼko tayom, Probhu Jisu do sermateye rakapʼ ocoyena. Ar uni do onḍe Isorakʼ jojomsa aṛereye duṛupʼena.
Ar celako do senkate sanam jaegare porcarko ehopʼena. Ar Probhu do onko talate kạmiye ehopʼena ar hahaṛa kạmi reakʼ daṛeteye pormankeda, onko okako porcaretʼkan ona do sạrikana mente.
Ar iń do onako reaṅ pạhil khonge mońj okocʼte suṭhik hataokate, mitʼṭen mitʼṭenkate olam do besiń hudiskeda.
Onate am okaṭakʼem ańjomakatʼ ona sạrikana se baṅa, onam baḍae daṛeakʼa.
Herod do tinre Jihudạ Prodesren raje tahẽkana unre Abiạ thokren Sakariạ ńutuman mitʼṭen hoṛ do Jihudikoren naekeye tahẽkana. Uniren bạhutetʼakʼ ńutum do Elisabet. Uni hõ naeke Aron bõsrene tahẽkana.
Isor samaṅre unkin bana hoṛge dhorom kin tahẽkana. Ar Probhuakʼ sanam hukum ar niạmko ṭhik lekakin manaoetʼ tahẽkana.
Unkinren do cele gidrạge bako hoeakan tạkin tahẽkana ente Elisabet do bạńjhigeye tahẽkana. Inạ chaḍa unkinakʼ umer hõ ạḍi aema hoeakan tahẽkana.
Mitʼ dhao Sakariạ do acʼakʼ dol reakʼ pạrire Isor samaṅre naeke reakʼe kạmikan tahẽkana.
Naeke kạmi reakʼ cạli leka gulibãṭ hotete unirege paṛaoena jemon uni do Probhuakʼ mundil reakʼ sonot jaegare dhupe jeretʼ daṛeakʼ.
Ar uni dhupe jered oktere bahrere do ạḍi utạr hoṛko koejoṅkan tahẽkana.
Unre Probhuren mitʼṭen goḍet do ackage hecʼkate dhup pinḍ reakʼ jojomsa aṛere Sakariạ ṭhene ńel ocoyena.
Ar Sakariạ do serma goḍete ńelkede khane torasena ar botor caṛhaoadea.
Serma goḍet do uniye metadea, “Alom botorokʼa, Sakariạ, ente Isor do amakʼ koejoṅe ańjomakada. Amren bạhu Elisabetren do mitʼṭen koṛa gidrại hoyokʼtaea. Ar uniakʼ ńutum do Johanem dohoetaea.
Uni do amakʼ jionre maraṅ rạskạwạnicʼe hoyokʼa ar uniakʼ janam khạtirte arhõ ạḍi utạr hoṛko rạskạkʼa.
Ente Probhuakʼ mẽtʼãhã samaṅre uni do maraṅe hoyokʼa. Uni do tishõ darkha rasa se eṭakʼ jãhãn bubulakʼko bae ńũiya ar eṅgatakʼ kukhire tahen khonge sonot Jiuteye perejokʼa.
Israelko modren ḍherkoge akoren Probhu Isor secʼe ruạṛ ạgukoa.

Uni do Eliạ nạbi reakʼ Jiu ar daṛete Probhu lahateye hijukʼa. Ar apatkoakʼ mon hoponko secʼe ruạṛtakoa ar bebatao hoṛkoakʼ mon reakʼ buje pheraotakote Isor sewa hoṛkoakʼ buj lekae hoe ocoetakoa. Nonkate uni do Probhu lạgitʼ mitʼṭen sapṛao akan jạte tearkoa.”
Unre Sakariạ do serma goḍete metadea, “Cekateń bujhạu daṛekea? Iń ma coń haṛamge ar ińren bạhuakʼ umer hõ ạḍi ḍher hoe akantaea.”
Serma goḍete menkeda, “Iń doń Gabriel kana; iń do Isor samaṅre teṅgo akaniń tahenkana. Am saõte galmarao ar noa bhage sombat emam lạgitʼge Isor doe kolakadińạ.
Ńelme, ińakʼ katha do okterege purạukʼa, menkhan ińakʼ katha bam pạtiạuatʼte am do guṅgạm tahena. Ar noako ạuri hoyokʼ hạbicʼ katha bam roṛ daṛeakʼa.”
Hoṛko do Sakariạ lạgitʼko koyokʼ horakatʼ tahẽkana. Ar mundil reakʼ sonot jaegareye bilomokʼkan ńelte onko do hahaṛakʼko ehopʼena.
Ado Sakariại oḍok hecʼen khan hoṛko sãote katha bae roṛ daṛeada. Ar noateko bujhạukeda, uni do sonot jaegare jãhãn dorsone ńelakada. Uni do hoṛko sãote isạrawate kathae roṛkeda ar guṅgạgeye tahẽyena.
Ado naeke kạmi reakʼ pạri mucạtʼentae khan uni do oṛakʼteye calaoena.
Ar inạ tayom acʼren bạhu Elisabet doe bhạrti hoṛmoyena ar mõṛẽ cando hạbicʼ oṛakʼ khon bahrete bae oḍok baṛalena. Uniye menkeda,
“Noa do Probhuakʼ kạmi kana. Manwako ṭhen khon ińakʼ lajaoe cabaetiń lạgitʼ uni doe beṅgetʼ akawạdińa.”
Elisabet turui cando bhạrti hoṛmoe tahẽkanre Gabriel ńutuman mitʼṭen serma goḍet do Isor ṭhen khon Gạlil reakʼ Nasaret atoren Mạriạm ńutuman mitʼṭen kũạ̃ri kuṛi ṭhene kol ocoyena.
Uni do Dạud bõsren Joseph ńutuman mitʼṭen hoṛ sãote baplakʼ lạgitʼe horokʼ cikhnạ akan tahẽkana.
Serma goḍet do Mạriạm ṭhen hecʼkate joharadeteye metadea, “Probhu am soṅgere menaea are bhor akatʼmea.”
Noa katha ańjomkate Mạriạm do monreye ạndukʼ mạndukʼena. Uni do hudisokʼe ehopʼena, noa baṅ cetʼlekan joharkan.
Serma goḍet do uniye metadea, “Mạriạm, alom botorokʼa, ente Isor do ạḍiye daya akatʼmea.
Ńelme, am dom bhạrti hoṛmokʼa ar mitʼṭen koṛa gidrại hoyokʼtama. Uniakʼ ńutum do Jisum dohoetaea.
Uni do maraṅe hoyokʼa. Ar maraṅ Isorren Hopone ńumogokʼa. Probhu Isor do uniren hapṛam Dạudakʼ siṅghạsone emaea.
Uni do Jakob bõsrenko cetanre jaejug hạbicʼe rajokʼa. Ar uniakʼ raj do tishõ baṅ mucạdokʼtaea.”
Mạriạm do serma goḍete metadea, “Noa do cekate hoedaṛekokʼa? Ińakʼ ma baplage coṅ baṅ hoeakan tiń.”
Serma goḍete menkeda, “Sonot Jiu do am cetanreye hijukʼa ar maraṅ Isorakʼ daṛegeye umulkama. Noa iạte okoeṭakʼ sonot Hopone janamokʼ uni do Isorren Hopone ńumogokʼa.
Ar ńelme, niạ buḍhi umerre amren peṛa Elisabet hõ hoṛmore koṛa gidrại ńam akawana. Hoṛko menetʼ tahẽkana uniren do gidrạge bako hoyokʼtaea, menkhan ńitokʼ do turui candoreye paṛao akana.
Isor ṭhen do bin daṛeanakʼ mente cetʼge bạnukʼa.”
Mạriạme menkeda, “Iń doń Probhuren kạ̃ṛmĩ kana, amakʼ katha lekage ińre jotowakʼ baṛe hoyokʼma.” Ona tayom serma goḍet do Mạriạm ṭhen khone calaoena.
Inạko din tayom Mạriạm do usạrage Jihudi Prodes reakʼ mitʼṭen atoteye calaoena. Ona ato do buru ṭoṭhare tahẽkana.
Mạriạm do onḍe Sakariạwakʼ oṛakʼre bolokate Elisabete joharadea.
Elisabet do Mạriạmakʼ johare ańjomketʼ khan acʼakʼ kukhiren bale gidrạ doe keṭel gotʼena.
Uni do sonot Jiuteye perecʼente ãṭ aṛaṅteye menkeda, “Sanam maejiuko modre am dom bhạgangea ar amren okoeṭakʼ gidrại hoyokʼ, uni hõe bhạgangea.
Ińren Probhuren eṅgat iń ṭhene hecʼakana, noa do cekate hoyena?
Ente amakʼ johar kathań ańjomketʼ sãote, ińakʼ kukhiren gidrạ do rạskạteye keṭel gotʼena.
Bhạgan geam am do, ente am dom pạtiạu akana, Probhu okae menakawatʼme ona purạukʼa mente.”
Unre Mạriạme menkeda, “Ińakʼ jiwi do Probhui sarhaoede kana;
ińren babańcaoicʼ Isor iạte, ińakʼ jiwi do rạskạte perecʼ akana,
ente acʼren kạ̃ṛmĩ secʼ uni doe beṅgetʼ akada. Ńitokʼ khon sanam hoṛ do bhạganko mitạńa,
ente daṛeanicʼ Isor do iń lạgitʼ tinạkʼ maraṅakʼkoe kạmi akada. Uni doe sonotgea.
Ar okoe uniko sewawaekan uni do onkoreye dayakʼ kana, piṛhi cetan piṛhige.
Uni do ti tiạrkate maraṅ daṛeakʼkoe kạmi akada; ar okoeakʼ mon hiskạte perecʼge onko doe chir chạturakatʼkoa.
Uni do siṅghạson khon rajkoe ńurhạketʼkoa, menkhan nindhạnko doe tul rakapʼ ketʼkoa.
Ar okoekoko reṅgecʼge, bhage, bhage jiniskote uni do onkoakʼ reṅgecʼe purun akatʼtakoa, menkhan kisạ̃ṛko do eken tiye bidạkatʼkoa.
Mạriạm do Elisabet ṭhen pe cando tahẽkate acʼakʼ oṛakʼteye ruạṛ calaoena.
Okte purạuen khan Elisabet do mitʼṭen koṛa gidrại janamkedea.
Ar uni cetanre Probhuakʼ aema mãyã reakʼ katha ańjomkate aḍepaserenko ar peṛako do uni sãote rạskạkʼko ehopʼena.
Ado Jihudikoakʼ niạm leka irạl din hilokʼ onko do gidrạ khatnaye lạgitʼko hecʼena. Ar acʼ babawakʼ ńutum leka Sakariạ ńumeko menetʼ tahẽkana,
menkhan uniren eṅgattetʼ doe menkeda, “Ona do baṅ, nuiakʼ ńutum do Johan dohoe hoyokʼa.
Onko do Elisabetko metadea, “Amren peṛako modre okoeakʼ hõ coṅ onkan ńutum ma bạnukʼ.”
Ado gidrạren apattetʼ ṭhen baḍae sanaketʼko khan, onko do isạrawateko kulikedea cetʼ ńutum dohoeyem khojkana.
Sakariạ do mitʼṭen olokʼ paṭa koekateye olkeda, “Nuiakʼ ńutum do Johan.” Ar ona iạte sanamkoko hahaṛayena,
Ar unrege Sakariạwakʼ moca do jhicʼgotʼena ar alaṅ do ulṭạuentaea ar Isor sarhaoate katha roroṛe ehopʼena.
Noa ńelte aḍepaseren hoṛko do botor caṛhaoatʼkoa, ar Jihudạ reakʼ goṭa buru ṭoṭharen hoṛko noa reaṅ galmaraoko ehopʼena.
Okoe noa kathako ańjomketʼ onko do mone monte hudisokʼko ehopʼena arko menkeda, “Nui gidrạ do enḍekhan cele bhalae hoyokʼa?” Noa kathako menkeda ente Probhuakʼ daṛe do gidrạ sãote tahẽkana.
Tayomte gidrạren apat Sakariạ do sonot Jiuteye perecʼen khan, nạbi lekate noa katha roroṛe ehopʼena,
“Israelkoren Probhu Isorakʼ sarhao hoyokʼtaema, ente uni do acʼren hoṛko secʼe beṅgetʼ akada are chaḍao akatʼkoa.
Uni do abo lạgitʼ acʼren guti Dạudakʼ bõs khon mitʼṭen daṛeanicʼ babańcaoicʼe omonkedea.
Noa katha do acʼren sonot nạbikoakʼ moca hotete uni do ḍher din laharegeye menletʼ tahẽkana.
Uni do bạirikoakʼ ti khon ar hirkhạkʼ kankoakʼ ti khon aboe bańcao akatʼ bona.
Uni do aboren hapṛamko mãyãwako lạgitʼ acʼakʼ sonot bondobos, metakʼme acʼakʼ gokʼakʼ purạu lạgitʼ, aboe rukhiyạ akatʼ bona.
Ona gokʼakʼ do aboren mare hapṛam Abraham ṭhene kiriyạlena.
E bachatiń, am do coṭ utạricʼ Isorren nạbim ńumogokʼa, ente am do uniakʼ hor tear lạgitʼ uni laha lahatem calakʼa.
jemon ńut ar gujukʼ umulreko duṛupʼ akan Onko do marsale emako, ar suluk reakʼ horteye ạyur idi bon.”
Ar Johan doe hara idiyente Jiureye daṛe idiyena. Ar Israelko samaṅre ạuriye bahalokʼ hạbicʼ uni do hahaṅkarregeye tahẽyena.
Ona jokhecʼ maharaj Agustus Kạisạr do acʼakʼ rajosṭiren sanam hoṛko ńutum ol ocoetako lạgitʼe hukumkeda.
Siriạren disạm cakʼlaoicʼ Kurinio oktere niạge pạhil dhao ńutum ol ocoe hoelena.
Ar joto hoṛ ńutum ol ocoetako lạgitʼ apan ạpin atote calakʼko ehopʼena.
Joseph do Dạud bõsren hoṛe tahẽkana. Ar Jihudạ reakʼ Betlehem do Dạud rajakʼ janam ato tahẽkana.
Onate Joseph hõ ńutum ol ocoetae lạgitʼ Gạlil reakʼ Nasaret khon Betlehem atoteye calaoena. Ar Mạriạm hõ uni sãote onḍeye senena.
Uni do Joseph tulucʼ baplakʼ reakʼ ṭhik akantae tahẽkana. Ar ona oktere Mạriạm do bhạrti hoṛmoe tahẽkana ar Betlehemre tahenrege gidrạ janame reakʼ okte hoyentaea.
Ar onḍege uni do acʼren pạhil koṛa gidrại janamkedea, ar gendrecʼteye bedhaokedete nandwarreye giticʼkadea, ente unkin lạgitʼ okarehõ tahen jaega baṅ tahẽkana.
Ona ṭoṭhare ńindạ jokhecʼ bhiḍi gupiko do bathan ṭạnḍire akoren pal bhiḍikoko horhoyetʼkokan tahẽkana.
Unre ackage Probhuren mitʼṭen serma goḍet do onko samaṅreye teṅgoyena. Ar uniakʼ ṭhonok do onko beṛhaete bamberena. Onate gupiko do ạḍiko botorena.
Serma goḍet do onkoe metatʼkoa, “Alope botorokʼa, ente ape ṭhen ạḍi rạskạ reakʼ sombat iń ạguakada. Noa rạskạ do sanam hoṛko lạgitʼ kana.
Teheń Dạud nagrahare aperen babańcaoicʼe janamakana. Uni doe Probhu Mạsi kana.
Ape lạgitʼ cinhạ do nõkʼõe, ape do kicricʼte bedhao akade ar nandwarre giticʼ akan mitʼṭen bale gidrạpe ńamea.”
Ar ackage uni serma goḍet soṅgete arhõ aema goḍetko ńelena. Onko do Isor sarhaoate memenko ehopʼena,
“Sermare Isorakʼ ṭhonok dhạrtire suluk, manwakore kusi.”
Ado serma goḍetko onko ṭhen khonko calaoen khan gupiko do ako akoreko menjoṅana, “Delabon, Betlehemte bon calakʼ ar Probhu okaṭakʼe baḍae ocoketʼ bon ona reakʼ bon ńel ạguya.”
Ar onko do usạrateko calaoen khan Mạriạm, Joseph ar nandwarre giticʼ akan uni bale gidrạko sendra ńamkedea.
Ar gidrạ reaṅ okalekako baḍae ocolen, onkage onko do bale gidrạ ńelkateko lại baṛakeda.
Gupikoakʼ katha ańjomkate sanamkogeko hahaṛayena;
menkhan Mạriạm do jotowakʼ monreye rebetʼ dohokeda, okoe hõ bae lạiatʼkoa; uni do ona reaṅ monre hudisokʼe ehopʼena.
Serma goḍetko gupiko ṭhen okako lạiletʼ onkage bhiḍi gupiko do jotowakʼko ńelketʼ khan Isor sarhaoe ar sabasiae tulucʼko ruạṛ calaoena.
Ado irạl mãhã purạuen khan Jihudikoakʼ niạm lekate uniakʼ ńutum do Jisuko dohoketʼtaea. Noa ńutum do eṅgatakʼ kukhire ạuriye hijukʼre serma goḍete emlen tahẽkana.
Ado Moseakʼ ạn lekate onkoakʼ chut meṭaokʼ reakʼ okte seṭeren khan, Joseph ar Mạriạm do Probhu samaṅre hạjiri lạgitʼ Jerusalemtekin idikedea,
ente Probhuakʼ ạnre ol menakʼa, “Pạhil janamicʼ koṛa gidrạ do Probhuren menteye ńumogokʼa.”
Ona chaḍa “Mitʼ joṛ potam se barea parwa hopon” dãṛẽkin reakʼ katha cetʼleka Probhuakʼ ạnre ol menakʼ onkage unkin do dãṛẽ emokʼkin calaoena.
Unre Jerusalemre Simon ńutuman mitʼṭen dhorom ar Isor bhokti hoṛe tahẽkana. Uni do Israelkoakʼ jiwi raṛecʼe ńel hohorkan tahẽkana.
Sonot Jiu unireye tahẽkana are sodorade tahẽkana, gujukʼ lahare uni do Probhuren Mạsiye ńelea.
Simon do sonot Jiu reakʼ uskurte enhilokʼ Jihudikoakʼ mundilteye hecʼena. Ar Moseakʼ ạn lekate cetʼko cekae jạruṛ ona lạgitʼge Jisuren eṅgat-apat do bale Jisu onḍekin ạgukedea.
Unre Simon do uniye hoborkedea ar Isor gunmanao joharaeteye menkeda.
“E Probhu, amakʼ katha leka amren guti do ńitokʼ suluktem bidạkạń kana,
Eṭakʼ jạtko ṭhen noa do hor udukʼako reakʼ marsal kana, ar amren Israel jạtko ṭhen noa do ṭhonokanakʼ kangea.”
Simon gidrạ reakʼakʼ okakoe roṛketʼ onate gidrạren eṅgat-apat dokin hahaṛayena.

Inạ tayom Simon do onkoe bhoratʼkote Jisuren eṅgat Mạriạme metadea, “Isor do noae teṅgo akada, nui bale gidrạ iạte Israelko modre aema hoṛ doko ńurokʼa, arhõ aema doko rakapʼ ocokʼa. Nui do nonkan mitʼṭen cinhại hoyokʼa, uni birudre ḍher hoṛge kathako roṛa.
Onate onkoakʼ mon reakʼ hudis bundisko sodorokʼa. Ona chaḍa tarwaṛete amakʼ ontor do sobokʼ tabokʼ tama.”
Un jokhecʼ Hanna ńutuman mitʼṭen maejiu hõ nạbiye tahẽkana. Uni do Aser bõsren Phạnuel hoponerae tahẽkana. Ar uni hõ aema umer hoeakantae tahẽkana.

Uni do eae bochor jãwãetetʼ sãote tahẽkate irạlgel pon bochor hạbicʼ rạnḍigeye tahẽkana. Uni do mundil bạgikate okate hõ bae senokʼkan tahẽkana bickom upạs ar koejoṅ tulucʼ siń ńindạ Isore sewawaekan tahẽkana.
Uni hõ unre hecʼkate Isore gun manao joharadea, ar Jerusalem reakʼ chaḍaokʼko ńel hohorkan sanam hoṛko uni gidrạ reaṅ lạiakoe ehopʼena.
Probhuakʼ ạn lekate sanamakʼkin purạuketʼ khan Joseph ar Mạriạm do ạkinakʼ ato Gạlil reakʼ Nasaret tekin ruạṛ calaoena.
Ar bale Jisu doe hara idiyena are daṛe idiyena akelte perejokʼ tulucʼ. Ar uni cetanre do Isorakʼ daya tahẽkana.
Sen-parom porob jokhecʼ Jisuren eṅgat ar apat do jao bochor Jerusalemtekin calakʼkan tahẽkana.
Jisuakʼ umạr gelbar bochor hoentae khan niạm lekage onko do porobteko calaoena.
Porob mucạtʼen khan oṛakʼko ruạṛkan tahẽkanre Jisu do Jerusalemregeye tahẽyena. Menkhan uniren eṅgat-apat do bạkin baḍaeletʼa.
Uni do sãoten hoṛko tulucʼ menaea mente hudiskate mitʼ din horkin calaoena. Tayomte ạkinren peṛako ar ńepel oprom hoṛko talare Jisu sendrayekin ehopʼena.
Menkhan baṅkin ńamledete arhõ sendra sendrate Jerusalemtekin ruạṛ calaoena.
Ado pe din tayom unkin do mundilrekin ńamkedea. Uni do guruko talare duṛupʼkate onkoakʼ kathae ańjomkan ar onkoe kuliyetʼko tahẽkana.
Ar okoeko Jisuakʼ kathako ańjometʼkan tahẽkan, onko sanamko uniakʼ akel ńelte ar uniakʼ roṛ ruạṛ ańjomteko ṭhak utạrokʼkan tahẽkana.
Ar uniren eṅgat-apat do uni ńelkatekin hahaṛayena. Eṅgattetʼ do uniye metadea, “E Beṭa, cedakʼem nonkaketʼ bona? Am baba ar iń do ạndukʼ mạndukʼliń sendra baṛayetʼmea.”
Jisui metatʼkinạ, “Cedakʼ ben sendra baṛayediń kana? Aben do cetʼ baben baḍaea, ạpuńakʼ oṛakʼre tahen hoyokʼtińa mente?”
Jisu okae menketʼ ona do acʼren eṅgat-apat bạkin bujhạu daṛeada.
Inạ tayom uni do unkin sãote Nasaret atoteye ruạṛ calaoena ar unkinakʼ tabereye tahẽyena. Menkhan eṅgattetʼ do noako reaṅ monreye rebetʼ dohokada.
Ar Jisu do akelte, umerte ar Isor ar manwakoakʼ dulạṛteye hara idiyena.

Romren moharaj Tiberius Kạisạre rajokʼkan gel mõṛẽakʼ bochorre Pontus Pilạt do Jihudạren disạm cakʼlaoicʼe tahẽkana. Unre Herod do Gạlilre ar uniren boeha Philip do Jituriạ ar Trakhonitis disạme calaoetʼ tahẽkana. Ar Lusanius do Abileneren disạm cakʼlaoicʼe tahẽkana,
ar Hannas ar Kaeapha do Jihudikoren maraṅ naekekin tahẽkana. Ona oktere Isor do hahaṅkar jaegare Sakariạ hopon Johan ṭhen acʼakʼ kathae sodorkeda.
Unre Johan do Jordan gaḍa beṛhaeteakʼ sanam jaegakore senkate porcare ehopʼena jemon hoṛko kại khon monko ạcurte ikạko ńam, ar ona reakʼ cinhạ lekate bạptismako ataṅ.
Jesaea nạbi reakʼ puthire olakan leka, “Hahaṅkarre mitʼṭen hohokạnicʼ reakʼ aṛaṅ, ‘Probhuakʼ hor tear kataepe, uniakʼ suṛucʼ horko sojhe kataepe.
Sanam buru nala bhataokʼa ḍuṅgriko copodokʼa. Konḍeawakʼko sojhekʼa, ar khõedakʼ lopakʼakʼ hor do somanokʼa.
Manwako kại khon bańcaoko lạgitʼ Isor okae ceka akatʼ, ona do sanam hoṛko ńel ńama.’ ”
Unre bạptisokʼ lạgitʼ ạḍi utạr hoṛ do Johan ṭhen hijukʼko ehopʼena. Uniye metatʼkoa, “E biń bõsrenko! Isorakʼ sạjại khon ńir pharakokʼ lạgitʼ do okoeye cetaoketʼpea?
Ar mon jepe ạcurakatʼ ona reakʼ lek leka jo apeakʼ jionre udugtape. Ar Abrahamren bõs kanape mente alope hudisa. Sạrigeń metapekana, Isor do noako dhiri khon Abrahamren bõskoe tear daṛeakoa.
Dare gonḍarege ṭeṅgocʼ do ṭenḍar dohoakana. Oka dare bhage baṅ jokʼ ona do makʼ giḍikʼte seṅgelre khadle ocokʼa.”
Unre hoṛko do Johanko kulikedea, “Enḍe khan ale do cetʼle cekaea?”
Metatʼkoae, “Jãhãeakʼ barea aṅgrop menakʼtae khan, uni do bạnukʼtaeicʼe hạṭińaema. Ar jomakʼ menakʼtaeicʼ hõe onkaema.”
Ado mạsul uṭhạuko bạptisokʼ lạgitʼko hecʼen khan Johanko metadea, “Guru, ale do cetʼle cekaea?”
Uni doe metatʼkoa, “Ạnre oka menakʼ ona khon bạ̃ṛti alope uṭhạua.”
Ar palṭonko hõko kulikedea, “Ale do cetʼle cekaea?” Uni doe metatʼkoa, “Jor julumkate se behok lekate dusikate okoe ṭhen khon hõ cetʼge alope hataoa ar apeakʼ kuṛạirege kusi tahenpe.”
Hoṛko do ạḍi askate mone monete Johange Jisu kanae menteko hudisedekan tahẽkana.

Unre Johan do sanamkoe metatʼkoa, “Iń do dakʼteń bạptisetʼpea, menkhan okoe iń khone daṛegea uni doe darae kana. Iń do uniakʼ panahi reakʼ phitạ raṛaetae lek geń baṅkana. Uni do sonot Jiu ar seṅgelteye bạptispea.
Uniakʼ haṭakʼ do tirege menakʼtaea; onate khạrạiye saphaea ar phosol do golareye doho jarwaea, menkhan peṭecʼ do baṅ iṛijokʼ seṅgelreye atar giḍikakʼa.”
Johan do arhõ ạḍi utạr sikhạunakote hoṛkoakʼ monre udgạue emakote Isorakʼ bhage sombate porcar akokan tahẽkana.
Disạm cakʼlaoicʼ Herod ar bokottetʼren bạhu Herodiạwakʼ bin ganokʼ dulạṛ ar bạṛicʼ kạmiko iạte Johan do uniakʼ doskoe udukʼade tahẽkana.
Onate uni do hajotre Johane bhorao akade tahẽkana. Ar noate uniakʼ eṭakʼ bạṛicʼ kạmiko sãote noa bạṛicʼ kạmi hõ juṭicʼentaea.
Ado okoeko hoṛ Johan ṭhenko hecʼakan tahẽkan onko bạptismako ataṅetʼ tahẽkanre Jisu hõe bạptis ocoyena. Bạptisma tayom Jisu do tinreye koejoṅkan tahẽkana unre serma do jhicʼena.
Ar sonot Jiu do parwa leka uni cetanreye pheḍ hecʼena, ar serma khon noa katha ańjomena, “Amge ińren dulạṛiạ Hopon, iń do amreń kusi akana.”
Jisu do pegel serma gan umer tahẽkanre acʼakʼ kạmiye ehopʼkeda. Hoṛko bujhạure uni do Josephren hopone tahẽkana. Joseph do Eliren hopone tahẽkana;
Eli do Mathatren hopon, Mathat do Lewiren hopon, Lewi do Melkiren hopon, Melki do Jannaeren hopon, Jannae do Josephren hopon;
Joseph do Matathiạren hopon, Matathiạ do Amosren hopon, Amos do Nạhumren hopon, Nạhum do Esliren hopon, Esli do Nạggạiren hopon;
Nạggại do Mahatren hopon, Mahat do Matathiạren hopon, Matathiạ do Simạiren hopon, Simại do Josekren hopon, Josek do Jodaren hopon;
Joda do Johananren hopon, Johanan do Resaren hopon, Resa do Serubabelren hopon, Serubabel do Sealtielren hopon, Sealtiel do Neriren hopon;
Neri do Melkiren hopon, Melki do Addiren hopon, Addi do Kosamren hopon, Kosam do Elmadamren hopon, Elmadam do Erren hopon;
Err do Jisuren hopon, Jisu do Elieserren hopon, Elieser do Jorimren hopon, Jorim do Mathatren hopon, Mathat do Lewiren hopon;
Lewi do Simeonren hopon, Simeon do Jihudạren hopon, Jihudạ do Josephren hopon, Joseph do Jonamren hopon, Jonam do Eliạkimren hopon;
Eliạkim do Melearen hopon, Melea do Mennaren hopon, Menna do Mathatharen hopon, Mathatha do Nathanren hopon, Nathan do Dạudren hopon;
Dạud do Jisạiren hopon, Jisại do Obedren hopon, Obed do Boasren hopon, Boas do Solmonren hopon, Solmon do Nahasonren hopon;
Nahason do Aminadabren hopon, Aminadab do Adminren hopon, Admin do Arniren hopon, Arnido Hesromren hopon, Hesrom do Pharesren hopon, Phares do Jihudạren hopon;
Jihudạ do Jakobren hopon, Jakob do Isahakren hopon, Isahak do Abrahamren hopon, Abraham do Thararen hopon, Thara do Nahorren hopon;
Nahor do Serugren hopon, Serug do Rạgạuren hopon, Rạgạu do Phalegren hopon, Phaleg do Eberren hopon, Eber do Sạlaren hopon;
Sạla do Kenanren hopon, Kenan do Arpaksadren hopon, Arpaksad do Semren hopon, Sem do Noahren hopon, Noah do Lamekren hopon;
Lamek do Mạthusalaren hopon, Mạthusala do Enokren hopon, Enok do Jaredren hopon, Jared do Mahalalelren hopon, Mahalalel do Kenanren hopon;
Kenan do Enosren hopon, Enos do Sethren hopon, Seth do Adamren hopon, Ar Adam do Isorren hopon.
Jisu do sonot Jiuteye perecʼen khan, Jordan gaḍa khone calaoena. Ar sonot Jiu reakʼ ạyurte pongel din hạbicʼ hahaṅkar jaegakoreye tahẽyena.
Unre Soetan do Jisu laloce udukʼaete kạire ńurhạye reakʼe kurumuṭukeda. Ar niạ pongel din Jisu do cetʼge bae jomleda; ar onako din purạuen khan uni do reṅgecʼkedea.
Unre Soetan do Jisui metadea, “Isorren Hopon kan khanem, enḍekhan noa dhiri piṭhạ hoe ocoeme.”
Jisu do uniye roṛ ruạṛadea, “Sonot sostorre ol akana, ‘piṭhạ motote manwa do jiwetʼ bako tahena.’ ”
Ona tayom Soetan do Jisu mitʼṭen usul jaegateye idikedea ar mitʼ ripitʼte dhạrti reakʼ sanam rajosṭi udukʼ adeteye metadea,
“Noako joto reakʼ ektiạri ar ṭhonokiń emama, ente noako joto do ińre jimạ akana. Ar jãhãege sanań unige onań em daṛeaea.
Ńitokʼ judi ińem ḍobokʼạń ar Probhu mentem aṅgociń, enḍekhan noako joto do amakʼge hoyokʼa.”
Jisu do uniye roṛ ruạṛadea, “Sonot sostorre ol menakʼa, ‘am do amren Isor ḍobokʼae me, ar eken uni eskarge sewawaeme.’ ”
Unre Soetan do Jisu Jerusalemteye idikedea ar mundil reakʼ coṭ cuṛạre teṅgokedeteye metadea, “Isorren Hoponkan khanem nonḍe khon latarte donme,
ente sonot sostorre olakana, uni do acʼren goḍetko am reaṅe hukumakoa ar onko do amko rukhiyạmea.
Onko do titeko sepeńmea jemon dhirire jaṅga alo bajaokʼtam.”
Jisu do uniye metadea, “Sonot sostorre roṛ akana, ‘Probhu amren Isor do alom biḍạuea.’ ”
Ado joto lekan laloce udukʼ mucạtʼketʼ khan Soetan do thoṛa okte lạgitʼ Jisu bạgiyadeteye calaoena.
Jisu do sonot Jiu reakʼ daṛeteye perecʼen khan Gạlil Prodesteye ruạṛ calaoena. Ar uniakʼ sombat do ona ṭoṭha reakʼ goṭa ṭạnḍire pasnao idiyena.
Uni do onḍenakʼ sunạgogkore cetʼakoe ehopʼena. Ar sanamkoge uni sabasiaeko ehopʼena.
Inạ tayom Jisu do Nasaretteye hecʼena. Ar nonḍege uni doe haralena. Uni do acʼakʼ niạm leka jirạukʼ mãhãre sunạgogreye boloyena, ar sostor paṛhao lạgitʼe teṅgoyena.
Ado Jesaea nạbiakʼ puthiko caladea. Ar guṛhạ akan puthiye oṭakʼketʼ khan ona jaegae ńamkeda one olakan,

“Probhuren Jiu doe decʼ akawạdińa, ente uni do ińe ojokʼ akadińạ jemon reṅgecʼ orecʼko bhage sombat iń porcarako. Ar bondi akanko ṭhen chaḍaoko reakʼ katha, kãṛã hoṛko ṭhen ńeńel reakʼ katha baḍae ocoko lạgitʼ uni doe kolakadińạ. Ar khed ocokʼkanko hõ, chaḍaoko lạgitʼe kolkedeńa.
Ona chaḍa Probhui kusiyakʼ bochor lại saḍe lạgitʼe kolakadińa,.”
Ona tayom uni do puthi guṛhạ ruạṛkate sapʼdapʼicʼ cal ruạṛadeteye duṛupʼena. Ar sunạgogren sanam hoṛkoakʼ nońjor do unire paṛaoena.
Unre Jisui metatʼkoa, “Sonot sostor reakʼ katha teheńpe ańjomketʼ são sãote ona do purạuena.”
Ar sanam hoṛ do uniko sabasiadea ar uniakʼ moca khon oḍokokʼkan mońj mońj katha ańjomteko hahaṛayena. Onkoko menkeda, “Nui do cetʼ Josephren hopon doe baṅkana?”
Jisui metatʼkoa, “Ape do noa hõpe mitạńa, ‘E raranicʼ amge baṛe bogekokʼme.’ Arhõpe mitạńa, ‘Kapharnạhumre okako kạmi reakʼ kathakole ańjomakatʼ, ńitokʼ nijakʼ atorehõ udugme.’ ”
Uni do arhõe menkeda, “Sạrigeń metapekana, okoe nạbi hõ acʼakʼ nij atoren hoṛ do bako monewaea.
Eliại tahẽkan oktere pe bochor turui cando bae dakʼleda ar goṭa disạmre maraṅ akal hoelena, unre Israel disạmre ạḍi utạr rạnḍi maejiuko tahẽkana.
Menkhan onko okoe ṭhen hõ Eliạ do bae kol ocolena, eken Sidon ṭoṭha reakʼ Sareptaren rạnḍi maejiu ṭhene kol ocolena.
Elisa nạbi oktere Israel disạmre aema murhucʼ jom rog hoṛko tahẽkana, menkhan onko okoehõ bako boge ocolena, Eken Siriạ disạmren Naman motogeye boge ocoyena.”
Noako katha ańjomkate sunạgogren sanam hoṛko do edrete pit caṛhaoatʼkoa.
Onko do beretʼente ato bahrete Jisuko oḍok ạgukedea ar buru latarte ṭhelao ńurhạye lạgitʼ coṭ cuṛateko idikedea.
Menkhan uni do hoṛko talateye sen tapʼ calaoena.
Ado Gạlil Prodes reakʼ Kapharnạhum nagrahateye calaoena ar jirạukʼ mãhãre hoṛkoe cetʼ atʼakoa.
Ar hoṛko do uniakʼ cecetʼakʼteko hahaṛa cabayena, ente uni do ektiạri menakʼtae hoṛ lekae cetʼakokan tahẽkana.
Ona sunạgogre bhut capaṛ akawade mitʼṭen hoṛe tahẽkana. Uni do kikiạuateye menkeda,
“E Nasaretren Jisu, ale tulucʼ amakʼ do cetʼ? Nosṭole lạgitʼem hecʼakana? Baḍaegeạń okoe kanam; am do Isorren uni sonoticʼ kanam.”
Jisu do bạṛjicʼ jiu dhomkao kedeteye metadea, “Thirkokʼme, ar uni khon oḍok calakʼme.” Unre bạṛicʼ jiu do onko talare uniye bhindạṛkedea ar jãhãnakʼ begor hạnete uni khone oḍok calaoena.
Noa iạte jotoge hahaṛayente ako akore menjoṅko ehopʼena, “Noa baṅ oka lekan katha kan! Ektiạri ar daṛe salakʼ bạṛicʼ jiukoe hukumako kanre onko doko oḍok calakʼkana!”
Ar ona ṭoṭha reakʼ joto jaegare Jisuakʼ katha do pasnao idiyena.
Inạ tayom Jisu do sunạgog bạgikate Simonakʼ oṛakʼteye calaoena. Unre Simonren hanhartetʼ do ruạteye jạbun akan tahẽkan. Ar uni bogeye lạgitʼ Jisuko nehõradea.
Unre Jisu do Simon hanhartetʼ pheḍre teṅgoyente ruạe dhomkaoketʼtaea. Ar inạtege ruạ do chuṭạuentaea, ar beretʼkate uni do jomakʼ sapʼsorakoe ehopʼena.
Ado bere hạsurokʼkan tahẽkanre aema lekan rugiko Jisu ṭhenko ạguketʼkoa. Onko do ạḍi lekan rogteko jạbun akan tahẽkana. Ar Jisu do onko mitʼke mitʼ capoketʼkoteye bogeketʼkoa.

Unre ạḍi utạr hoṛko khon bạṛicʼ jiuko hõko oḍok calaoena. Onko bạṛicʼ jiuko do kikiạuate memenko ehopʼena, “Am dom Isorren Hopon kana.” Onko do Mạsi kanae menteko baḍae akade tahẽkana. Ona iạte uni do onkoakʼ mocae bondketʼtakoa.
Ado ạḍi setakʼre oḍok senkate Jisu do mitʼṭen nisun jaegateye calaoena. Ar hoṛko do uniko sendra ńamkede khan ako ṭhen khon aloe calakʼ menteko doho dohokadea.
Unre Jisui metatʼkoa, “Iń do arhõ aema jaegakore Isorakʼ raj reakʼ bhage sombat porcar hoyokʼ tińạ, ente noa lạgitʼge Isor doe kolakadińạ.”
Ona tayom uni do Jihudạ disạm reakʼ eṭakʼ eṭakʼ sunạgogkore porcare ehopʼena.
Mitʼ din Jisu do Genesaret doreão aṛereye teṅgo akan tahẽkana. Unre gadel hoṛ do Isorakʼ katha ańjom lạgitʼ beṛhaeteko riḍạtʼ ciritʼede tahẽkana.
Un jokhecʼ uni do doreão aṛere barea lạukại ńel ńamkeda. Ona lạukạren jạilạko do pheḍkate akoakʼ jhạliko ạrupʼkan tahẽkana.
Unre Jisu do Simonakʼ lạukạreye decʼena ar ḍhip khon thoṛa pharak ńokʼ idiye metadea. Ona tayom uni do lạukạreye duṛupʼena ar gadel hoṛko cetʼakoe dhurạuena.
Ado galmaraoe mucạtʼketʼ khan Jisu do Simone metadea, “Khạndrite idime ar hako sapʼko lạgitʼ jhạli caḍoetape.”
Simone menkeda, “E Guru, ale do goṭa ńindạle khaṭaoena, menkhan celege bale sapʼ daṛeatʼkoa; enrehõ amakʼ katha leka jhạlile caḍoea.
Ado jhạliko caḍoketʼ khan nunạkʼ hakoko beṛketʼkoa je, jhạli do oṛejokʼ lekayena.
Unre goṛo ńam lạgitʼ onko do eṭakʼ lạukạren sãotenkoko gạwicʼatʼkoa. Ado onkoko hecʼen khan banar lạukạre nunạkʼ hakoko rakapʼketʼkoa; hakote onakin lạukạ do unumokʼ lekayena.
Noa ńelte Simon Patras do Jisu samaṅre ombakʼenteye menkeda, “E Probhu, iń doń kại hoṛ kana; iń ṭhen khon calao joṅme baṛe.”
Ar unạkʼ hako jhạliyenko ńelketʼko khan Simon Patras ar uni sãoten sanamko doko hahaṛayena.
Onkage Jakob ar Johanko metakin Sabdaeren banar hopon hõkin hahaṛayena. Unre Jisu do Simone metadea, “Alom botorokʼa; ńitokʼ khon am do hoṛ sasapʼicʼem hoyokʼa.”
Inạ tayom onko do ḍhipite lạukạko ạgukeda ar sanamakʼ bạgi oṭowatʼte Jisuko pańjakedea.

Mitʼ dhao Jisu do mitʼṭen atoteye calaoena. Ar onḍe do murhucʼ jom rogte perecʼ mitʼṭen hoṛe tahẽkana. Uni do Jisui ńelkede khan taberente nehõr salakʼe menkeda, “E Probhu, sanalem khangem boge daṛeạńạ.”
Jisu do ti tiạrkate joṭetʼkedeteye metadea, “Iń hõ onageń khojkana, ma saphakokʼme,” Ar unrege uni doe boge utạrena.

Jisu do uniye hukumadea, “Noa katha do okoe ṭhen hõ alom lại baṛaea, bickom senkate naeke ṭhen ńel ocokʼme. Ar ona tayom saphakʼ babotre Mose okaṭakʼ dãṛẽ reakʼe hukumakatʼ ona samaṅ me. Inạ khan hoṛko ṭhenem sạbudokʼa am dom boge akana.”
