Enrehõ Jisuakʼ sombat do arhõ pasnao idiyena. Uniakʼ katha ańjom lạgitʼ ar rog khon bogekʼ lạgitʼ ạḍi utạr hoṛ do uni ṭhen hijukʼko ehopʼena.
Ar Jisu do jaoge nisun jaegakore senkateye koejoṅ kan tahẽkana.

Mitʼ din Jisu do hoṛkoe cetʼakokan tahẽkanre Phạrusiko ar sostor baḍaeko hõ onḍeko duṛupʼ akan tahẽkana. Noko do Gạlil ar Jihudạ reakʼ atoko ar Jerusalem nagraha khonko hecʼakan tahẽkana. Ar rugiko bogeko reakʼ Probhuakʼ daṛe do Jisure tahẽkana.
Unre thoṛa hoṛ do parkomte mitʼ kaṛ gocʼ rog hoṛko gokʼ ạgukedea. Onko do bhitrite idikate Jisu samaṅre dohoye lạgitʼko kurumuṭukeda,
menkhan bhiṛ iạte bhitrite bolokʼ horge bako ńamleda. Unre onko do chatreko decʼena ar chat reakʼ ṭạli ocokʼkate parkom sudhạ Jisu samaṅreko pheḍ gotʼkadea.
Jisu do onkoakʼ pạtiạu ńelteye menkeda, “E gate, amakʼ kại do ikạyen tama.”
Noate sostor baḍaeko ar Phạrusiko do mone monete hudisokʼko ehopʼena, “Nui hoṛ doe okoe kante, Isore opomane kana? Isor chaḍa ar okoe kại doe ikạ daṛeakʼa?”
Ado onkoko hudisokʼkan reakʼe bujhạuketʼ khane metatʼkoa, “Mon monte cedakʼ ona katha reakʼ dope hudisokʼ kana?
Okaṭakʼ memen algawa, ‘amakʼ kại ikạyen tama,’ se ‘beretʼkate taṛam baṛaeme?’

Menkhan jemonpe baḍae daṛeakʼ Manwa Hopon do dhạrtire kại ikại reakʼ ektiạri menakʼtaea mente,” Khange Jisu do uni mitʼ kaṛ gocʼ rog hoṛe metadea, “Metam kạnạń, ma beretʼme, parkom kuṭuṅtam ar oṛakʼ calakʼme.”
Uni hoṛ do unrege jotoko samaṅreye teṅgoyena ar aṭetʼakʼ kuṭuṅkate Isor sarhao sarhaoete oṛakʼe calaoena.
Onate sanam hoṛko ṭhak cabayena ar botorokʼ salakʼ Isor sabasiaeteko menkeda, “Teheń do hahaṛawakʼ bon ńelkeda!”
Inạ tayom Jisu do bahreteye calaoena ar mạsul uṭhạu oṛakʼre Lewi ńutuman mitʼṭen mạsul-uṭhạuicʼ do duṛupʼakane ńelkedea. Jisu do Lewiye metadea, “Dela hijukʼte, ińren cela hoyokʼme.”
Onate Lewi doe beretʼena ar acʼakʼ jotowakʼ bạgikate Jisui pańjakedea.
Tayomte Lewi do acʼakʼ oṛakʼre Jisu lạgitʼ maraṅ okocʼe bhojkeda. Ar onko soṅgete ạḍi utạr mạsul uṭhạuko ar eṭakʼko hõ jojomko duṛupʼena.
Unre Phạrusiko ar onkoren sostor baḍaeko doko karacʼ kurucʼente Jisuren celakoko metatʼkoa, “Mạsul uṭhạuko ar bạṛicʼ hoṛko tulucʼ do cedakʼpe jom ńũiyeda?”
Jisui metatʼkoa, “Boge hoṛko lạgitʼ raranicʼakʼ do jạruṛ bạnukʼa, menkhan ruạkʼko lạgitʼ do jạruṛgea.
Dhorom hoṛ hohoako lạgitʼ do baṅ menkhan kại hoṛko lạgitʼgeń hecʼ akana.”
Ado onko sostor baḍaeko do Jisuko metadea, “Johanren celako do jaogeko upạseda arko koejoṅ kana, ar Phạrusikoren celako hõko onkayeda, menkhan amren cela doko jom ńũiyeda.”
Jisui metatʼkoa, “Jãwãe beṭa soṅgere tahen tulucʼ cetʼ bạriạtko doko upạs oco daṛekekoa?
Menkhan okte darae kana Jãwãe beṭa do onko ṭhen khone idiocokʼa, ar unre onko doko upạsa.”

Ona tayom Jisu do cetʼako lạgitʼ noa phene lạiatʼkoa: “Nawa kicricʼ oṛecʼkate okoe hõ marenakʼ kicricʼre bako tạli jalada, enteye onkae khan nawa kicricʼ mae oṛecʼetʼkange; ar nawa kuṭrạre mare kicricʼ hõ baṅ jurikʼa.
Nawa darkha rasa do mare kumkore bako dul dohoea, arko dohole khan nawa darkha rasate kumko do oṛejokʼa. Onate rasa do buhelokʼa ar kumko hõ nosṭokʼa.
Onate nawa darkha rasa do nawa kumrege dul dohoe jạruṛa.
Ar mare darkha rasa ńu tayom okoe hõ nawa rasa do bae khoja, enteye mena, ‘marenakʼge bogea.’ ”
Mitʼ jirạukʼ mãhãre Jisu do phosol talateye calakʼkan tahẽkana. Ar uniren celako do gele hotʼkate tire ridgạukateko jometʼ tahẽkana.
Unre adom Phạrusikoko menkeda, “Dhorom reakʼ ạn lekate jirạukʼ mãhãre baṅ ganoakʼ do cedakʼpe onkayeda?
Jisui metatʼkoa, “Ape do cetʼ bape paṛhao akada, Dạud ar acʼ soṅgetenko reṅgecʼ letʼkore uni do cetʼe cekaleda mente?
Uni do Isorakʼ oṛakʼre bolokate samaṅ akan piṭhạ reakʼe jomkeda ar soṅgetenko hõe ematʼko tahẽkana. Menkhan ona do eken naekeko chaḍa ar okoeakʼ hõ jom reakʼ niạm do baṅ tahẽkana.”
Mucạtʼre Jisu do onko Phạrusikoe metatʼkoa, “Manwa Hopon kangeae jirạukʼ mãhãren mạlik do.”
Ado eṭakʼ ar mitʼ jirạukʼ mãhãre Jisu do sunạgogre bolokateye cetʼakokan tahẽkana. Onḍe do nonkan mitʼṭen hoṛe tahẽkana, one uni do jojom ti borocʼge tahẽkantae.
Unre sostor baḍaeko ar Phạrusiko do Jisu dusire paṛaoe reakʼ ạtko ńam baṛayetʼ tahẽkana. Ar jirạukʼ mãhãre uni do jãhãeye bogekoa se baṅ, ona lạgitʼ mońjteko tạnkhi baṛayede tahẽkana.
Menkhan Jisu do onkoakʼ mon reakʼ hudisokʼakʼkoe baḍaekan tahẽkana. Onate borocʼ ti hoṛe metadea, “Beretʼme ar dela sanamko talare teṅgonme.” Ar inạtege uni doe beretʼena are teṅgoyena.
Jisu do sostor baḍaeko ar Phạrusikoe metatʼkoa, “Mitʼṭen kathań kulipea, jirạukʼ mãhãre bhage kạmi ganokʼa se bạṛicʼakʼ kạmi ganokʼa, jiwi bańcao ganokʼa se nosṭo giḍikakʼ ganokʼa?”
Ona tayom beṛhaetenkoe beṅgetʼ ạcuratʼkote uni hoṛe metadea, “Amakʼ ti tiạrtam.” Are onkaketʼ khan uniakʼ ti do boge utạrentaea.
Unre dhorom mukhiyạko do ạḍi bạṛicʼko raṅgaoena ar Jisu cetʼko cekaea ona reakʼ ako talare galmaraoko ehopʼena.
Inạ tayom Jisu do koejoṅ lạgitʼ mitʼṭen buruteye rakapʼ calaoena ar goṭa ńindạ Isor ṭhen koejoṅteye aṅgakeda.
Ado setakʼen khan acʼren celako acʼ ṭhene hohoatʼkoa ar onko mod khon gelbar hoṛe bachaoketʼko khan apostol hudại ematʼkoa.
Onko doko hoyokʼkana Simon, okoe do Patrase ńutumkede; Simonren boeha Andreas; Jakob ar Johan; Philip ar Bartholomae;
Mathae ar Thoma; Alphaeren hopon Jakob; Simon, okoe do moulobadiko metaekan;
Jakobren hopon Jihudạ ar Jihudạ Iskariot, one okoe do Jisu bạirikoakʼ tireye soprotlede.

Ado acʼren celako sãote buru khon pheḍkate mitʼṭen soman jaegareye teṅgoyena. Onḍe do acʼren ạḍi utạr celakoko jarwa akan tahẽkana. Ona chaḍa Jihudiạ, Jerusalem, Tur ar Sidonko metakʼ doreão aṛe reakʼ nagrahako khon ạḍi utạr hoṛ hõ onḍeko hecʼakan tahẽkana.
Onko do uniakʼ katha ańjomtae ar rog khon boge ocokʼ lạgitʼko hecʼakan tahẽkana. Ar tinạkʼ do bạṛicʼ jiu hotete kosṭoko ńametʼ tahẽkan onko hõko bogekʼkan tahẽkana.
Ar sanam hoṛ uni joṭede reakʼko kurumuṭuyetʼ tahẽkana, ente uni khon do daṛe oḍokokʼkan tahẽkana ar onate jotokoko bogekʼkan tahẽkana.
Jisu do celako secʼ beṅgetʼkate memene ehopʼena, “Bhạgangeape ape reṅgecʼ orecʼko do, ente Isorakʼ raj do apeakʼge.
Bhạgangeape, ape okoe ńit reṅgecʼetʼpe, ente ape dope bi ocokʼa. Bhạgangeape, ńitpe rakʼjoṅ kanko do, ente ape dope landa joṅa.
Bhạgangeape, Manwa Hopon iạte hoṛko hirkhạwapere, ar somaj khonko oḍoklepere arko landa dhutʼapere ar apeakʼ ńutum ańjomteko tholere.
Unre ape do rạskạkʼpe ar hulạsokʼpe, ente ape lạgitʼ sermare maraṅ kuṛại menakʼa. Ente onkoren hapṛamko hõ nạbikoko onkaletʼkoa.
“Menkhan hae ape kisạ̃ṛko do! Ape do apeakʼ jiwi raṛecʼpe ńam horayeda.
Hae ape bi akanko do! Ape do reṅgecʼpea. Hae ape landakanko do! Ape dope dukokʼa arpe rakʼjoṅa.
Hae ape do, joto hoṛ ape reaṅ bogeko roṛlere. Ente nokoren mare hapṛamkoge bhõnḍ nạbikoko sarhaoetʼkokan tahẽkana.
Ape ańjometʼkoń metapekana, aperen bạiriko dulạṛkope. Ar okoeko kurud apekan onko do bhạlạikope.
Okoeko sarap apekan onko bhorakope. Ar okoe ape tulucʼ bạṛicʼko beoharetʼ onko lạgitʼ koejoṅpe.
Jãhãe mitʼ johae thapame khan eṭakʼ joha hõ ạcuraeme. Okoe amakʼ oyonakʼe recʼme uni do aṅgrop hõ idiocoaeme.
Okoe am ṭhenko koe onko do emakom. Ar jãhãe amakʼ jãhãn jinise idi emanle khan ona do alom koe ruạṛea.
Hoṛko ṭhen khon cetʼleka beoharpe khojkan, onkage ape hõ onko sãote beoharpe.
“Okoeko dulạṛetʼpe, ape hõ eken onkogepe dulạṛetʼko khan; enḍekhan apeakʼ sabasi do okor? Ente boṅgan hoṛko hõ coṅ nonka mako dulạṛetʼkoge.
Okoe apeko bhạlạyetʼpe, ape hõ eken onkogepe bhạlạiyetʼko khan; enḍekhan sabasikʼ reakʼ do cetʼ menakʼtapea? Ente boṅgan hoṛko hõ coṅ ona mako onkayetʼkange.
Okoe ṭhen khon ńam ruạṛpe asokʼkan, onkoge pańcape emako khan; enḍekhan onare cetʼ sabasi menakʼa? Ńam ruạṛ iạtege coṅ bạṛicʼ hoṛ ma bạṛicʼ hoṛko pańcako emakokan.

Menkhan ape do aperen bạiriko dulạṛkope ar onko bhạlạikope. Ar baṅ ńam ruạṛokʼ askate pańca emakope. Enḍekhan ape lạgitʼ maraṅ kuṛại menakʼa, ar ape do sanam dayawạnicʼ Isorren hoponpe hoyokʼa, ente uni do gun baṅ manaoko ar bạṛicʼko hõe dayawako kana.
Aperen baba cetʼ lekae mãyãwạnicʼkan, onkage ape hõ mãyãwanko hoyokʼpe.

“Eṭakʼkoakʼ ghạṭko alope sapʼ baṛaea, inạkhan apeakʼ dos hõ baṅ sabokʼtapea. Eṭakʼko sạjại ńam lek kanako mente alope hudiskoa, onate ape hõ sạjại ńam lek mentepe menocokʼa. Eṭakʼko ikạkakope, enḍekhan ape hõpe ikạ ocokʼa.
Dan emokʼpe, enḍekhan ape hõpe emocokʼa; ota khacao khacaote, ruku rukute, curu buruateko gochawapea, ente cetʼlekape soṅakoa onkage ape hõko soṅ ruạṛapea.”
Jisu do acʼren celako cetʼako lạgitʼ ar mitʼṭen phene lạiatʼkoa, “Mitʼṭen kãṛã do cetʼ eṭakʼ ar mitʼ kãṛãe ạyur daṛekea? Onka khan bana hoṛge cetʼ ghaḍlakʼre bạkin khańjokʼa?
Cela do guru khon bae maraṅa, menkhan joto cecetʼakʼe ńamlere guru lekae hoyokʼa.
“Amren boehawakʼ mẽtʼre menakʼ cubạkʼgem beṅgetʼakʼ kana, menkhan amakʼ mẽtʼre menakʼ jobra do bam ńel ńameda?

Amakʼ mẽtʼ reakʼ jobra bam aṭkaretʼ khan, cekate amren boeha dom metae kana, ‘okor ya amakʼ mẽtʼ reakʼ cubạkʼiń oḍok letamge?’ E bhonḍicʼ pạhilre amakʼ mẽtʼ khon jobra ocokʼ maṛaṅlem, enḍeanecʼ boehamakʼ mẽtʼre menakʼ cubạkʼ oḍok lạgitʼ pusṭạutem ńeńela.
“Bhage darere bạricʼ jo, ar bạṛicʼ darere bhage jo do baṅ jokʼa.
Jo tege dare do oromokʼa. Jạnum jhạwạ khon loa ar jạnumanakʼ dare khon darkha jo do bako goda.

Bhage hoṛ do acʼakʼ ontorre perecʼ bhageakʼ khon bhage kathageye oḍok ạguya, ar bạṛicʼ hoṛ do acʼakʼ ontorre perecʼ bạṛicʼakʼ khon bạṛicʼ kathageye oḍoktaea. Manwa ontor okaṭakʼte perecʼ menakʼ, moca do ona kathageye roṛa.
“Ape do cedakʼ ‘Probhu, Probhupe’ mitạń kana, menkhan iń okań metape ona do bape onkayeda?
Jãhãege iń ṭhen hecʼkate ińakʼ kathae ańjom ar ona lekae kạmi uni do okoe lekanicʼ iń lạikepea.

Uni do nonkan mitʼṭen hoṛ lekanae, one okoe do oṛakʼe benao iạte khạndri macha la kate dhiri cetanre rehetʼe bạisạuketʼ. Ado banbạsi ar ạtukʼ dakʼko hecʼena ar ona oṛakʼre bajaoena, menkhan oṛakʼ do baṅ cekalena, ente ona do kajakte benao akan tahẽkana.

Okoe ińakʼ katha ańjomkate ona leka bae kạmi, uni do nonkan hoṛ lekanae, okoe do begor rehetʼ bạisạute hasa cetanre oṛakʼe benaoketʼ. Ado ạtukʼ dakʼ hecʼkate tinre ona oṛakʼre bajaoena unre ona oṛakʼ do lạnduṛ ńurena.”
Ado hoṛko ṭhen noako sanamakʼe lại mucạtʼketʼ khan, Jisu do Kapharnạhum nagrahateye calaoena.
Onḍe mitʼṭen Rom Subedarren guti do ruạ kạhilte gujukʼ dạkhile tahẽkana. Ar Subedar do uni guti ạḍiye dulạṛedekan tahẽkana.
Uni do Jisu reaṅe ańjomketʼ khan Jihudikoren murubiko Jisu ṭhen kolketʼkoteye nehõradea jemon uni doe hijukʼte acʼren gutiye bogeye.
Ado onko murubiko do Jisu ṭhen hecʼkate nehõrateko metadea, “Okoe lạgitʼ noam kạmi, uni do noaren lek kangeae,
ente uni do aleren hoṛkoe dulạṛetʼkoa ar aleakʼ sunạgog do unigeye tearakada.”

Unre Jisu do onko soṅgeteye calaoena. Ar ona oṛakʼ khon sạṅgińreye tahẽkanrege Subedar do acʼren gateko kolketʼkoteye men gotʼadea, “E Probhu, alom haronokʼa, ente ińakʼ oṛakʼtem bolokʼ ona reakʼ lekgiń baṅkana.
Onate iń do am ṭhen senokʼ lek hõ bạń bujhạulena. Am do eken katha baṛe roṛgotʼkam, ar inạtege ińren guti doe boge utạrokʼa.

Iń do noa kathań baḍaea, ente iń hõ eṭakʼicʼakʼ katha leka calakʼ hoyokʼ tińạ ar sipạhikohõ ińakʼ katha lekako calakʼ kana. Iń do mitʼṭecʼ ‘calakʼiń metae khan’ uni doe calakʼa, ar eṭakʼicʼ ‘hijukʼiń metae khan’ uni doe hijukʼa, ar ińren gutiń metae khan ‘noa kạmime’ uni doe onkaea.”
Noa katha ańjomkate Jisu doe hahaṛaena ar acʼ pańjayedekanko secʼ beṅgetʼ ạcurkateye menkeda, “Ińiń metapekana, Israelko modre nunạkʼ maraṅ pạtiạu do tishõ bạń ńel akawana.”
Ado Subedar okoekoe kolletʼko onkoko ruạṛ calaoen khan uni guti do boge akanko ńelkedea.
Noa tayom Jisu do Nạinko metakʼ mitʼṭen ato secʼe calao idiyena. Unre acʼren celako ar gadel hoṛko hõ uni soṅge soṅgeteko calakʼkan tahẽkana.

Ado ona ato reakʼ phaṭok-duạr ṭhene seṭeren khan mitʼṭen gocʼ hoṛ do bahreteko oḍok ạguyede tahẽkana. Ar okoeye gocʼ akan tahẽkan uni do eṅgattetʼren sadher hopone tahẽkana, ar uni maejiu hõ rạnḍigeye tahẽkana. Ar atoren ḍher hoṛge uni rạnḍi maejiu sãoteko tahẽkana.
Probhu do uni rạnḍi maejiu ńelte mãyã hecʼadeteye metadea, “Alom raga.”
Inạ tayom uni do sen sorkate parkome joṭetʼkeda. Ar onate mạ̃ṛĩ gokʼ idikanko doko teṅgoyena. Jisui menkeda, “E bạbu, metam kạnạń, ma beretʼme.”
Ar inạtege gocʼ akanicʼ do beretʼkateye duṛupʼena ar katha roroṛe ehopʼena. Ar Jisu do eṅgattetʼ ṭhene jimạkadea.
Noate sanam hoṛ do botor caṛhaoatʼkoa ar Isor sabasiaete memenko ehopʼena, “Abo talare mitʼṭen maraṅ nạbigeye upel akana. Isor do acʼren hoṛkoe hiri akatʼ bona.”
Jisuakʼ noa katha do Jihudạ Prodes ar ona beṛhaeteakʼ sanam jaegakore pasnao idiyena.
Ado Johan bạbạptisicʼren celako do noako reaṅ katha Johanko baḍae ocokedea.
Unre Johan do acʼren barea cela hohoatʼkinte Jisu ṭhen noa katha kuliye lạgitʼe kolketʼkina, “Okoeakʼ hijukʼ reakʼ katha menakʼtae uni dom am kangea, se eṭagicʼ lạgitʼle koyokʼ hora?”
Unkin hoṛ do Jisu ṭhen hecʼkatekin metadea, “Johan bạbạptisicʼ do kulime lạgitʼ am ṭhene kolakatʼlińạ, ‘okoeakʼ hijukʼ reakʼ katha menakʼtae uni dom amkangea, se eṭagicʼ lạgitʼle koyokʼ hora?’ ”
Unre Jisu do ruạ hasote jạbun akanko ar bạṛicʼ jiu sapʼakatʼko hoṛkoe bogeketʼkoa ar kãṛã hoṛko hõ ńeńel daṛeye danatʼkoa.

Ona tayom Johanren cela roṛ ruạṛatʼkinteye metatʼkinạ, “Okako ben ńelketʼ arben ańjomketʼ ona calaokate Johan lạiae ben. Ar baḍae ocoyeben je, kãṛã hoṛko ńeńel kana, leḍhakoko taṛameda, murhucʼ jom hoṛko bogekʼ kana, kala hoṛko ańjomeda, gocʼkoko jiwetʼ beredokʼ kana ar reṅgecʼ orecʼko ṭhen do bhage sombat porcarokʼ kana.
Bhạgangeae uni do, okoe iń iạte monre bae tạkijokʼ.”
Ado Johan okoeye kolletʼkin unkin hoṛkin calaoen khan Jisu do gadel hoṛko Johan reaṅ lạiakoe ehopʼena, “Cetʼ ńeńel hahaṅkarte dope oḍok calaolena? Hoete hilạukʼ kan chuci?
Se cetʼ ńel lạgitʼpe oḍok calaolena? Mońj kicricʼ horokʼ akatʼ mitʼṭen hoṛ? Okoe damanakʼ kicricʼko horokʼ bandeyetʼ ar sukko jometʼkan onko ma coṅ rajakʼ oṛakʼreko tahenkan.
Se cele ńeńelpe oḍok calaolena? Mitʼṭen nạbi? Hẽ metape kạnạń, uni do nạbi khon hõe maraṅgea.
Johan kangeae uni hoṛ do, one okoe reaṅ sonot sostorre ol akana, ‘ńelme, am lahate ińren goḍetiń kolekana. Uni do lahare senkate amakʼ hore teara.’
Ińiń metapekana, manwako modre Johan khon maraṅicʼ do okoe hõ bạnukʼkoa; enrehõ Isorakʼ rajre huḍiń utạricʼ do Johan khon hõe maraṅgea.”
Arko ańjomketʼ sanam hoṛko ar mạsul uṭhạuko do Johanakʼ porcarte Isor do dhorom menteko aṅgockedete bạptismako ataṅkeda.
Menkhan Phạrusiko ar sostor baḍaeko do Johan ṭhen bako bạptismalente Isorakʼ monejoṅakʼko neṅghaokeda.
Jisu do arhõe metatʼkoa, “Enḍekhan niạ jugren hoṛ do okoe tulucʼ iń jurikekoa? Ar okoe lekanako?
Onko do nonkan gidrạ lekanako, okoe do bajarre duṛupʼkate eṭakʼko hohoateko metakokan, ‘ape lạgitʼ tiriole oroṅkeda, menkhan bape enecʼlena; homor halaṅkedale, menkhan bape rakʼleda.’
Johan bạbạptisicʼ do hecʼkate piṭhạ ar darkha rasa bae jomletʼtepe menkeda, ‘unire do bhut menaea.’
Ar Manwa Hopon do hecʼkateye jom ńũiyetʼtepe meneda, ‘ńelepe, uni do lebṛa ar ńu bhuteṛicʼ, mạsul uṭhạuko ar boṅgan hoṛkoren gatege.’
Menkhan okoe akel reakʼ gobolreko calakʼkan, onkoakʼ jiongeye sạbudetʼ kana, akel do khạṭigea mente.’’
Mitʼṭen Phạrusi hoṛ do Jisu acʼ ṭhen joma menteye neotakedea. Unre Jisu do uniakʼ oṛakʼte senkate jojome duṛupʼena.
Ona atore mitʼṭen bạṛicʼ maejiue tahẽkana. Ar Jisu do Phạrusiakʼ oṛakʼre jom lạgitʼe calao akana menteye baḍaeketʼ khan uni do mitʼṭen ponḍ dhiri cukạkʼte mahkaokʼ sunume idi darakeda.

Ar Jisu tayom secʼre uniakʼ jaṅga ṭhen senkate teṅgoyente rakʼ rakʼte mẽtʼ dakʼte uniakʼ jaṅgakine lohotʼketʼtaea. Inạ tayom uni do acʼakʼ upʼte jaṅgae jotʼketʼtaea ar jaṅgareye cokʼadete ona mahkaokʼ sunume duladea.
Ado okoe Phạrusi Jisui neotalede uni do noa ńelte mone monteye menkeda, “Nui hoṛ do nạbiye tahẽnlen khane baḍae daṛekea, cetʼ lekan maejiu jaṅgae joṭetʼetʼtaea mente; ente maejiu doe bạṛicʼge.”
Jisu do uniye roṛ ruạṛadea, “E Simon, am tulucʼ thoṛa katha menakʼtińạ.” Simone menkeda, “E Guru, ma menme.”
Jisui menkeda, “Mitʼ mahajon ṭhen bar hoṛkin dharaoletʼa. Mitʼ hoṛ do mõṛẽ sae Dinar ar eṭakʼicʼ do mõṛẽgel Dinar.
Unkin do okoeakʼ hõ hala ruạṛ reakʼ daṛe baṅ tahẽkante bana hoṛge dayateye ikạ katʼkinạ. Enḍekhan mase lạime, unkin modre mahajon do okoeṭakʼ bạ̃ṛtikin dulạṛkea?”
Simone menkeda, “Ińakʼ hudisre, okoeakʼ bạ̃ṛti rin ikạ akantae unige.” Jisu do uniye metadea, “Am do ṭhikgem menakada.”

Ona tayom Jisu do maejiu secʼ beṅgetʼkate Simone metadea, “Nui maejiu mam ńelekange. Iń do amakʼ oṛakʼiń hecʼenre jaṅga ạbukokʼ lạgitʼ dakʼ hõ bam emadińạ, menkhan uni do mẽtʼ dakʼte ińakʼ jaṅgakine ạbukkeda ar acʼakʼ upʼteye jotʼketʼtińạ.
Am do cokʼ hõ bam cokʼ ạdińa, menkhan ińiń boloyen tayom khon uni do ińakʼ jaṅgae cokʼ ạtiń kana.
Am do bohokʼre sunum hõ bam ojokʼạdińạ, menkhan uni do ińakʼ jaṅgare mahkaokʼ sunume dulạdińa.
Onateń metam kana, ḍher dulạṛe udukʼketʼte uni doe bujhạu ocoyeda je, uniakʼ kạiko ḍhergetare hõ ona do ikạ akantaea. Ar okoeakʼ thoṛa ikạ akantae uni do thoṛage dulạṛe uduga.”
Jisu do uni maejiue metadea, “Amakʼ kạiko do ikạyena.”
Unre okoe Jisu soṅgete jojomko duṛupʼakan tahẽkan onko do mone monete memenko ehopʼena, “Nui doe okoe kante, kạiye ikạyetʼ kana?”
Jisu do uni maejiue metadea, “Pạtiạu akantem, kại khon bańcaoem ńamkeda. Ma sulukte calao joṅme.”
ar Herod rajren kạmiạyicʼ Khusạren bạhu Joanna; Susanna arhõ aema maejiukoge. Noko do Jisu ar acʼren celako sapʼsorako lạgitʼ akoakʼ ṭaka-poesa khonko khorocetʼ tahẽkana.
Unre eṭakʼ eṭakʼ atoko khon ạḍi utạr hoṛ do Jisu ṭhen hecʼkateko bhiṛkeda. Unre Jisu do cetʼako lạgitʼ noa golpoe lạiatʼkoa:
“Mitʼṭen casa do itạ er lạgitʼe oḍok calaoena. Ado erokʼ jokhecʼ adomakʼ itạ do hor aṛere ńurena. Ar hoṛko do onako lebetʼ gańjaokeda ar cẽṛẽko hõ hecʼkateko jomkeda.
Ar adomakʼ itạ do dhiri hasare ńũrente janamgotʼena, menkhan ros bae ńamletʼte ona do rohoṛ kạrcupʼena.
Arhõ adomakʼ itạ do jạnum jhạwạko talare ńurena. Ar jạnumko do cara soṅgete hara rakapʼen khan onako doe danaṅ esetʼkeda.
Arhõ adomakʼ itạ do bhage hasare ńurena ar hara rakapʼente mitʼ sae doboṛ phosol hoyena.” Noako kathae roṛketʼ khan Jisu do ãṭ aṛaṅteye menkeda, “Ańjom lạgitʼ lutur menakʼtaeicʼ doe ańjomma.”
Inạ tayom acʼren celako do ona golpo reakʼ mane cetʼkana menteko kulikedea.
Unre Jisui metatʼkoa, “Ape do Isorakʼ raj reakʼ okoakʼkope baḍae ocoakana, menkhan eṭakʼko ṭhen do golpo talateń lạiyeda, jemon ńeńel tulucʼ aloko ńel ar ańjom tulucʼ aloko bujhạu.
“Golpo reakʼ mane do nõkʼõe: Itạ do hoyokʼ kana Isorakʼ katha.
Hor aṛere ńũren itạte do onko lạgitʼge roṛ akana, okoe do kathako ańjomketʼ, menkhan unrege Soetan do hecʼkate onkoakʼ mon khon onae halaṅ idiya. Ar bako pạtiạukʼte onko do kại khon bańcao bako ńama.

Dhiri hasare ńũren itạte do onko lạgitʼge roṛ akana, okoe do katha ańjomkate rạskạteko ataṅetʼkan, menkhan onkore ona reakʼ rehetʼ do mońjte baṅ bạisạukʼ kana. Onate onko do thoṛa din lạgitʼko pạtiạukʼkana, menkhan biḍạureko paṛaolen khan doko pạcokʼ kana.

Jạnum jhạwạ talare ńũren itạte do onko lạgitʼge roṛ akana, okoe doko ańjometʼkan, menkhan jion reakʼ horte calakʼ calakʼte gharońj reakʼ dand-bhabna, dhon-durib ar suk talareko ten ocokʼ kana. Ar onate onko do jionre bako gele belekʼ kana.
Ar bhage hasare ńũren itạte do onko lạgitʼge roṛ akana, okoe do khạṭi ar soṛa monte ona katha ańjomkate kajakteko sapʼ dohojoṅkan ar onare ṭarhao akae tahente jionreko gele belekʼ kana.
“Okoe hõ diuhe jeretʼkate jãhãnakʼte do bako hạrupʼ esetʼkakʼa, se cạuki latarre hõ bako dohoea. Menkhan ona do diuhe dohowakʼ cetanregeko dohoea, jemon bhitrite bolokʼko do ona marsalko ńel ńam.
Nonkan cetʼ okoakʼge bạnukʼa, okaṭakʼ do baṅ sodorokʼ se nonkan cetʼ danaṅakʼ hõ bạnukʼa, okaṭakʼ do baṅ baḍaeyokʼ se baṅ sodorokʼ.
Onate cetʼ lekape ańjometʼkan, ona reaṅ moneakʼpe, ente okoeakʼ menakʼtae uni do arhõe emocokʼa, menkhan okoeakʼ bạnukʼtae uni do oka menakʼtae ona hõe recʼ ocokʼa,”
Ado Jisuren eṅgat ar boehako uni ṭhenko hecʼena, menkhan bhiṛ iạte uni tulucʼ bako ńapam daṛeada.
Unre mitʼṭen hoṛ do uniye lạiadea, “Eṅgam ar boehamteko do am são ńapamokʼ lạgitʼ bahrereko teṅgo akana.”
Onate Jisu do hoṛkoe metatʼkoa, “Okoe Isorakʼ katha ańjomkate ona lekako kạmikan, onko kangeako ińren eṅgạń ar boehańko do.”
Mitʼ din Jisu ar acʼren celako do mitʼṭen lạukạreko decʼena. Uni do celakoe metatʼkoa, “Delabon, doreão hanasate bon calakʼa.” Khan celako do lạukạko laṛaokeda.
Ado lạukạ calakʼ ehopʼen khan Jisu doe jạpitʼkeda. Unre doreãore ackage mitʼṭen birbão hecʼgotʼena, ar dakʼte lạukạ do perejokʼ ehopʼena. Onate celako do ạḍi muhinreko paṛaoena.

Onko do Jisu ṭhen senkate beretʼkedeteko metadea, “E Probhu, E Probhu, gujukʼ kana bon!” Unre Jisui beretʼena ar habak ḍabakokʼkan ḍheo ar hoeye dhomkaokeda. Onate hoe ar ḍheoko thirente ḍelḍel nijhumena.
Uni do celakoe metatʼkoa, “Okor tape biswạs do?” Celako do botor arko hahaṛayente ako talare memenko ehopʼena, “Nui doe okoe kante, hoe hõ hoe ar dakʼ hõ dakʼ kin bataoetʼtaea?”
Ona tayom Jisu ar acʼren celako do Gạlil doreão paromkate Gerasarenkoakʼ ṭoṭhateko calaoena.

Ado Jisu lạukạ khone pheḍgotʼen khan onḍenicʼ mitʼṭen hoṛ do uni ṭhene hecʼena. Uni hoṛ do ạḍi utạr bhutko capaṛ akawade tahẽkana ar ḍher din khon kicricʼko hõ bae horokʼ bandeyetʼ tahẽkana, ar oṛakʼre tahẽ baṅkate mạ̃ṛĩ poḍakoregeye tahenkan tahẽkana.
Ado Jisui ńelkede khan kikiạuate otre taberente ãṭ aṛaṅteye menkeda, “Maraṅ Isorren Hopon Jisu, iń tulucʼ amakʼ do cetʼ? Dayakate alom sasetińạ.”

Uni hoṛ do noa iạtegeye menkeda, ente Jisu do bạṛicʼ jiu uni khon oḍok calakʼe hukumade tahẽkana. Ar bạṛicʼ jiu do ghane ghạṛicʼ uni hoṛe sapʼ tirupʼede tahẽkana. Ar sikṛite tolkateko horhoyedekan tahẽkanre hõ uni do onae topakʼetʼ tahẽkana, ar bạṛicʼ jiu hotete hahaṅkar jaegakoreye ạcur baṛaekan tahẽkana.
Jisu do uniye kulikedea, “Celeyama ńutum do?” Uniye menkeda, “Phạdạńạ,” ente ạḍi utạr bạṛicʼ jiu uni bhitrireko bolo akan tahẽkana.
Unre onko bạṛicʼ jiu do Jisuko nehõradea, jemon athan kunḍte aloe kol giḍikako.
Ar onḍe buru dhasna sorre ạḍi saṅge khạṛ sukriko ạtińkan tahẽkana. Bạṛicʼ jiuko do Jisu nehõradeteko metadea jemon sukri bhitrire bolokʼ reakʼe aṛakʼako.
Adoe aṛakʼatʼko khan onko do uni hoṛ khonko oḍokente khạṛ sukrikoreko boloyena. Onate onko sukri do daṛaṅ secʼteko ńir calaoente doreão dakʼreko unum gocʼena.
Ar okoekoko gupikan tahẽkan, onko do noa ghoṭna ńelkate atoteko dạṛkeda ar ona aḍepase reakʼ sanam jaegakore noa khoborko lạikeda.

Unre hoṛko do cetʼ hoeakana mente ńel lạgitʼ bahreteko oḍok hecʼena. Ado Jisu ṭhenko seṭeren khan bhut capaṛ akawade hoṛ do kicricʼ horokʼ akatʼ ar mạ̃hir monte Jisuakʼ jaṅga ṭhen duṛupʼ akanko ńelkedea. Noa ńelte onko do botor caṛhaoatʼkoa.
Ar okoe ona ghoṭnako ńelletʼ onko do hoṛkoko lạiatʼkoa cetʼlekate uni doe bogeyena mente.
Unre Gerasa ṭoṭharen sanam hoṛ Jisuko nehõradea jemon ako ṭoṭha khone calaojoṅ, ente onko do ạḍi botor caṛhaoatʼko tahẽkana. Ado unre Jisu do ruạṛ calakʼ lạgitʼ lạukạreye decʼena.
Ar okoe khon bhutko oḍoken uni do Jisui nehõradea, jemon acʼhõ uni sãoteye calao daṛeakʼ. Menkhan Jisu do noa katha menkateye bidạkadea,

“Am do oṛakʼte ruạṛ calakʼme ar am lạgitʼ Isor tinạkʼ maraṅakʼe kạmi akatʼ ona porcarme.” Unre uni hoṛ do oṛakʼteye calaoena ar Jisu acʼ lạgitʼ tinạkʼ maraṅakʼe kạmi akatʼ ona reakʼ sanam jaegare lại baṛaye ehopʼena.
Ado Jisu eṭakʼ aṛe secʼe ruạṛ calaoen khan onḍenko hoṛ do rạskạ monte uniko ataṅ daramkedea, ente onko do uni lạgitʼgeko koyokʼ hor akatʼ tahẽkana.
Unre Jaerus ńutuman sunạgogren mitʼṭen mukhiyạ hoṛ do hecʼente Jisuakʼ ti jaṅgareye giḍiyena.

Ar Jisu acʼakʼ oṛakʼte hijukʼ lạgitʼe nehõradea, ente uniren gelbar bochor umerren sadher hoponera do gujukʼ dạkhile tahẽkantaea. Ado Jisu tinreye calakʼkan tahẽkana unre gadel hoṛko do beṛhaeteko riḍetʼ ciritʼede tahẽkana.

Ar onko modren mitʼṭen maejiue tahẽkana okoe do gelbar bochor khon pordhol rogteye jạbun akan tahekan. Uni do acʼakʼ joto ạsulokʼakʼko raranko tayomreye khorocʼ caba akatʼ tahẽkana, menkhan okoe hõ bako boge daṛeaekan tahẽkana.
Uni do tayom secʼ khon hecʼkate Jisuakʼ kicricʼ reakʼ ańcare joṭetʼketʼtaea, ar unrege mãyãm oḍokokʼ do thirentaea.
Unre Jisui menkeda, “Okoeye joṭetʼ kedińạ?” Ado jotokoko baṅketʼ khan Patras ar uniren sãotenko doko metadea, “E Guru, gadel hoṛko beṛhaeteko riḍetʼ ciritʼetʼmea.”
Enrehõ Jisui menkeda, “Ińiń baḍaea jãhãe baṅ jãhãe, ińe joṭetʼ akadińạ, enteń bujhạu daṛeada iń khon daṛe oḍokena.”
Uni maejiu do bae oko daṛeakʼ kana menteye ńelketʼ khan thar tharao tulucʼ hecʼkate Jisu samaṅreye ombakʼena. Ar sanamko samaṅreye lạikeda cedakʼe joṭetʼkedea, ar cetʼlekateye bogeyena.
Onate Jisu do maejiue metadea, “E mạ̃i, amakʼ pạtiạugeye bańcao akatʼmea. Do sulukte ruạṛ joṅme.”
Ado Jisu kathae roroṛkan tahẽkanrege sunạgogren mukhiyạ hoṛakʼ oṛakʼ khon, mitʼ hoṛ do hecʼkateye menkeda, “Amren hoponera doe gocʼena; onate Guru do ar alom haronea.
Noa katha ańjomkate Jisu do Jaeruse metadea, “Alom botorokʼa; eken pạtiạu dohoeme, ar inạtege uni doe bańcaokʼa.”
Ado Jaerusakʼ oṛakʼe seṭeren khan Jisu do Patras, Johan, Jakob ar kuṛiren eṅgat-apat chaḍa okoe hõ oṛakʼ bhitrite do bae bolo ocoatʼkoa.
Ar sanamkoge kuṛi lạgitʼko rakʼ homoretʼkan ar koṛamko ceṭagokʼkan tahẽkana. Unre Jisui metatʼkoa, “Alope raga, kuṛi do bae gocʼ akana, ekene jạpitʼ akada.”
Khan hoṛko do uniko landa dhutʼadea, enteko baḍaekan tahẽkana kuṛi doe gocʼakana.
Jisu do ti sapʼkate hohoadeteye metadea, “E mại, ma beretʼme.”
Ar inạtege kuṛiakʼ jiwi do ruạṛentaea, are beretʼena. Unre Jisu do uni kuṛi thoṛa jom ocoye lạgitʼe hukumatʼkoa.
Ar kuṛiren eṅgat-apat dokin ṭhak utạrena, menkhan Jisu doe baron katʼkinạ, jemon noa ghoṭna okoe ṭhen hõ alokin lại baṛae.
Niạ tayom Jisu do gelbar celako mitʼ ṭhene hoho jarwaketʼkoa ar sanam bhutko cetanre ektiạriye ematʼkoa. Ar rugiko bogeko reakʼ daṛe hõe danatʼkoa.
Ona tayom Isorakʼ raj porcar ar rugiko bogeko lạgitʼe kolketʼkoa.
Uni doe metatʼkoa, “Horte lạgitʼ ṭheṅga, khuti, piṭhạ se ṭaka cetʼge alope iditora joṅa, ar babar goṭen aṅgrop hõ alo.
Ar jãhãṭakʼ oṛakʼregepe bolokʼ onḍegepe tahena ona ato ạuripe bạgiyakʼ hạbicʼ.
Ar hoṛko bako ataṅpe khan, enḍekhan onkoakʼ ato khonpe oḍokʼ hijukʼre apeakʼ jaṅga reakʼ dhuṛi hõ koṭa giḍi oṭokakʼpe, jemon onage onko birudre gohae teṅgokʼ.”
Unre celako do ato ato dãṛãkate Isorakʼ raj reakʼ bhage sombat porcar ar rugiko bogekoko ehopʼena.
Ado Jisui kạmi akatʼakʼko reaṅ ańjomkate disạm cakʼlaoicʼ Herod do cetʼge bae bujhạu daṛeakʼkan tahẽkana. Ente adom hoṛko menetʼ tahẽkana, Johan bạbạptisicʼge gocʼko khone jiwetʼ beretʼ akana;
arhõ adomko doko menetʼ tahẽkana, Eliại sodor akana; arhõ adomko doko menetʼ tahẽkana, ḍher din laharen mitʼṭen nạbigeye jiwetʼ beretʼ akana.
Herode menkeda, “Johanakʼ bohokʼ mań makʼ ńur ocoakatʼtae. Enḍekhan okoe reaṅ iń ańjometʼkan, uni doe okoe kana?” Ar Herod do Jisu ńele reakʼ kurumuṭui ehopʼena.
Ado oneye kolletʼko celakoko ruạṛ hecʼen khan cetʼ cetʼko kạmiketʼ ona joto do Jisuko lạiadea. Unre Jisu doe soṅgeketʼkote Bethsaeda sor mitʼṭen nisun jaegateye senena.
Menkhan gadel hoṛ do ona khoborko baḍaeketʼ khan Jisuko pańjakedea. Uni do onko hoṛkoe ataṅketʼkote Isorakʼ raj reakʼe lạiatʼkoa. Ona chaḍa okoekoakʼ boge ocokʼ reakʼ jạruṛ tahẽkan onkoe bogeketʼkoa.

Ado ber hạsurokʼkan tahẽkan jokhecʼ onko gelbar celako do Jisu ṭhen hecʼkateko menkeda, “Abo okare menakʼ bon noa do mitʼṭen nisun jaegakana. Onate gadel hoṛko bidạkakome jemon onko do sor reakʼ ato ar nagrahate senkate jom ar tahen lạgitʼ jaegako sendra ńam daṛeakʼ.”

Jisui metatʼkoa, “Onko do apege jomakʼ emakope.” Adoko metadea, “Ale ṭhen do eken mõṛẽ goṭen piṭhạ ar barea hako chaḍa ar cetʼge bạnukʼa. Menkhan ale do senkate jomakʼle kiriń ạgule anecʼle jom oco daṛeakoa.”
Onḍe do mõṛẽ hajar gan herel hoponko tahẽkana. Jisu do acʼren celakoe metatʼkoa, “Mimitʼ dolre mõṛẽgel mõṛẽgelkate pantete duṛupʼ ocokope.”
Ado onkage celako do sanam hoṛko duṛupʼ ocoketʼkoa.
Ar Jisu do ona mõṛẽ goṭen piṭhạ ar barea hako ataṅkate serma secʼ beṅgetʼ rakapʼkateye bhorada are kecakʼkeda. Ona tayom gadel hoṛko emako lạgitʼ celakoakʼ tireye calatʼkoa.
Ar sanam hoṛko jomkeda arko biyena. Ar okako kecakʼ hiricʼ pạsir ńur tahẽkan onate celako do gelbar phạtiạkʼko halaṅ jarwakeda.
Mitʼ dhao Jisu do mitʼṭen nisun jaegareye koejoṅkan tahẽkana. Unre uni soṅgete eken acʼren cela motogeko tahẽkana. Adoe kuliketʼkoa, “Iń doń okoe kana, ar noa reaṅ hoṛko do cetʼko meneda?”
Celakoko metadea, “Adomko doko meneda am dom Johan bạbạptisicʼ kana; ar adomko doko meneda Eliạ kanam; arhõ adomko doko meneda sedaeren mitʼṭen nạbigeye jiwetʼ beretʼ akana.”
Jisui metatʼkoa, “Menkhan ape do okoe kạnạń mentepe meneda?” Patrase menkeda, “Am do Isorren uni Mạsi kanam.”
Unre Jisu doe sontorkatʼkoa are hukumatʼkoa, okoe ṭhen hõ jemon noa katha aloko lại baṛae.

Uni do arhõe metatʼkoa, Manwa Hopon do aema duk jojom hoyokʼtaea. Ar murubiko, maraṅ naekeko ar sostor baḍaeko do uniko nihạtea. Are gocʼ ocokʼa ar pe din hilokʼre gocʼko khon jiwetʼ beredokʼ hoyokʼtaea.
Ona tayom sanamkoe metatʼkoa, “Jãhãege ińakʼ horte hijukʼe menetʼ khan uni do acʼakʼ kusileka aloe calakʼma; ar dinạmge acʼakʼ krus gokʼkate ińe pańjańma.
Jãhãe acʼ lạgitʼ bańcao tahene menetʼ khan uni do acʼakʼ jiwiye khuạutaea; menkhan okoe iń lạgitʼ acʼakʼ jiwiye khuạutae, uni do onae bańcaotaea.
Ar jãhãege goṭa dhạrtiye lab iạte acʼakʼ jiwiye khuạutae enḍekhan uniakʼ do cetʼ porho hoyokʼtaea?
Jãhãege iń ar ińakʼ katha iạteye lajaokʼ khan, Manwa Hopon hõ tinre acʼ ar acʼren Apatakʼ ar sonot goḍetkoakʼ ṭhonokanteye hijukʼa unre acʼ hõ uni hoṛ iạteye lajaokʼa.
Sạrigeń metapekana, nonḍe adom hoṛ menakʼkoa, onko do Isorakʼ raj ạuriko ńel hạbicʼ bako gujukʼa.”
Ado noako kathae roṛketʼ mitʼ hapta tayom Jisu do koejoṅ lạgitʼ Patras, Johan ar Jakobteko soṅgekate mitʼṭen buruteye rakapʼena.
Are koejoṅkan tahẽkanrege Jisuakʼ mẽtʼãhã do bodolena ar uniakʼ kicricʼko hõ pĩṛĩtʼ pĩṛĩtʼ ponḍentaea,
ar uni tulucʼ bar hoṛ galmaraokan kin ńelena. Unkin do Mose ar Eliạge.
Onko do ṭhonokanteko ńelena. Ar Jerusalemre purạu lạgidokʼkan Jisuakʼ gujukʼ reaṅko galmarokan tahẽkana.
Unre Patras ar uni soṅgeten kin do jhap jhap dudṛumetʼko tahẽkana. Adoko beṅgetʼ pharnoen khan Jisuakʼ ṭhonokko ńelkeda ar soṅgete bar hoṛ teṅgo akan hõko ńelketʼkinạ.

Ado unkin hoṛ tinre Jisu ṭhen khonkin calakʼkan tahẽkana unre Patras do Jisui metadea, “E Guru, bhagege hoeakana nonḍe menakʼle iạte. Ale do nonḍe pea kumbạ oṛakʼle benaoa, mitʼṭen do am lạgitʼ, mitʼṭen do Mose lạgitʼ ar mitʼṭen do Eliạ lạgitʼ.” Menkhan uni do bae bujhạuleda acʼ do cetʼe meneda mente.
Patras kathae roroṛkan tahẽkanrege mitʼṭen rimil do rakapʼ hecʼente onkoe umul esetʼketʼkoa. Ar rimilteko danaṅen khan celako do botor caṛhaowatʼkoa.
Ona rimil khon noa katha ańjomena, “Nuige ińren Hopon do, one uniń bachao akade; ape do uniakʼ ańjomtaepe.”
Ado katha roṛ thiren khan eken Jisu eskargeye ńelena. Ar celako do oneko ńelketʼ reaṅ okoe hõ bako lại baṛaletʼte hapegeko tahẽyena.
Ado dosar hilokʼ Jisu ar pea cela buru khonko pheḍ hecʼen khan ạḍi utạr hoṛ do Jisu sãote ńapamokʼ lạgitʼko hecʼena.
Unre gadel hoṛ bhitri khon mitʼ hoṛ do ãṭ aṛaṅte hohoate Jisui metadea, “E Guru, dayakate hoponiń baṛe ńeleme. Uni doe sadher hopon kantińạ.
Uni do mitʼṭen bạṛicʼ jiue sabea ar ackageye kikiạu goda. Are mocṛa mucṛiyea ar uniakʼ moca khon photo photo oḍokokʼa; ar ona tayom do garal garal huruṛ baṛakateye aṛagea.
Iń do amren celako ṭheniń nehõrlena jemon uni jiuko oḍok giḍikae, menkhan bako daṛeada.”
Unre Jisui menkeda, “E bepạtiạu ar peṛta piṛhirenko! Ar tinạkʼ din ape tulucʼ iń tahena ar tinạkʼ diniń sahaokatapea? Dini hoponme nonḍe ạguyetam.”
Ado tinre koṛa do Jisu ṭhene hijukʼkan tahẽkana unre bạṛicʼ jiu do uniye mocṛao bhinḍạṛkedea. Onate Jisu do bạṛicʼ jiue dhomkaokedea ar koṛae bogekedete eṅgat-apat ṭhene jimạkadea.
Unre sanam hoṛ do Isorakʼ maraṅtetʼ iạteko hahaṛayena. Ado Jisui cekaketʼakʼ babotre hahaṛa tulucʼko hudisokʼkan tahẽkanre, uni do acʼren celakoe metatʼkoa,
“Ińakʼ noako katha monre rebetʼ dohoepe, ente Manwa Hopon do hoṛkoakʼ tireko soprotea.”
Menkhan celako do ona katha bako bujhạuleda. Isor do onko ṭhen khone danaṅ akatʼ tahẽkana jemon onko do ona aloko bujhạu daṛeakʼ. Ar celako hõ noa reakʼ jãhãnakʼ katha kuliyeko botorokʼ kan tahẽkana.
Ado celako modre okoeṭakʼ sanamko khone maraṅa ona reaṅ ako talareko reṭepeṭekʼkan tahẽkana.
Jisu do onkoko hudisokʼkan reakʼe bujhạuketʼtako khan mitʼṭen kạṭicʼ gidrạ ạgukate acʼ ṭhene teṅgokedea.

Ona tayome metatʼkoa, “Jãhãege iń ńutumte nui gidrại ataṅe, uni do ińgeye ataṅińạ. Ar okoe ińe ataṅiń, uni do kol akadińicʼgeye ataṅea. Apeko modre okoe sanamko khone huḍiń utạricʼkan, unigeye maraṅa.”
Johane menkeda, “E Guru, am ńutumte mitʼṭen hoṛ do bạṛicʼ jiukoe oḍok giḍikanle ńṭoṭhadea. Ar abo dolrene baṅkante uni dole mana akadea.”
Jisu do uniye metadea, “Alope manaea, ente okoe ape birudrene baṅ kan uni do ape secʼren kangeae.”
Ado sermate calakʼ reakʼ okte hoyentae khan uni do Jerusalemte calakʼ lạgitʼe mon murukkeda.
Uni do laharege onḍe hoṛkoe kolketʼkoa. Onko do Jisu sanamakʼ tearae lạgitʼ Samariạkoakʼ mitʼṭen atoteko boloyena.
Menkhan Jisu do Jerusalemteye calakʼkante ona atoren hoṛko do bako ataṅledea.
Ona ńelte acʼren cela Jakob ar Johan dokin menkeda, “E Probhu, Eliạ leka serma khon seṅgel ńurakote marao giḍikako lạgitʼ hukum liń emamem khojkana?’’
Jisu do unkin secʼ ạcurkate dhomkao ketʼkinteye metatʼkinạ, ‘‘Abenre cetʼlekan jiu menaea baben baḍaea, ente Manwa Hopon do manwa nosṭoko lạgitʼ do bae hecʼakana, bickom bańcaoko lạgitʼge.’’
Ona tayom onko do eṭakʼ atoteko calaoena.
Ar horteko calakʼkan tahẽkanre mitʼ hoṛ do Jisui metadea, “Jãhãtegem calakʼ iń hõ am sãote onḍegeń calakʼa.”
Jisu do uniye metadea, “Toyoko do bhugạkʼ menakʼtakoa ar cẽṛẽkoakʼ do tukạ menakʼa, menkhan Manwa Hopon do bohokʼ dohoetae reakʼ jaega hõ bạnukʼtaea.”
Ado eṭakʼ mitʼ hoṛe metadea, “Dela iń soṅgete hijukʼme.” Menkhan uni hoṛ doe menkeda, “E Guru, ạpuń baṛe topa maṛaṅ ocoạńme.”
Jisu do uniye metadea, “Gocʼko do akoren gocʼko topa ocoakome, menkhan am do hijukʼte Isorakʼ raj lại pasnaome.”
Ado arhõ eṭakʼ mitʼ hoṛe menkeda, “E Guru, iń do am sãoteń calakʼgea, menkhan iń oṛakʼrenko ṭhen bidạ hatao maṛaṅ ocowạńme.
Jisu do uniye metadea, “Nahel kãṛbare ti capokate tayom secʼ beṅgetʼicʼ do Isorakʼ raj lạgitʼ lek doe baṅkana.”

Ona tayom Probhu Jisu do arhõ eae gel celako porcar kạmi kolko lạgitʼe bachaoketʼkoa. Ar acʼ do okako ato ar jaegakote calakʼ lạgitʼe goṭa akatʼ tahẽkan, onako jaega calakʼ lahare uni do babar hoṛkateye kolkatʼkoa.
Are metatʼkoa, “Sạrige phosol do ḍhergea, menkhan kạmiyạko doko thoṛagea. Onate phosolren mạlik nehõraepe, jemon uni do acʼakʼ phosol samṭao lạgitʼ hoṛe kolko.
Do calakʼpe; iń do hunḍạrko talare bhiḍi hoponko lekań koletʼpea.
Ṭaka reakʼ thạilạkʼ, khuti se panahi hõ soṅgete alope idijoṅa, ar horkore okoe hõ alope joharakoa.
Ar jãhã oṛakʼregepe bolokʼ pạhil do menpe, ‘noa gharońjrenko sulukapema.’
Ar suluke kusiakʼkan jãhãe hoṛ onḍe menae khan enḍekhan apeakʼ suluk do unire tahena, menkhan jãhãe onkanko bạnukʼko khan enḍekhan apeakʼ suluk do aperege ruạṛ hijukʼa.
Ona oṛakʼrege tahenpe ar okako emape onage jompe, ente okoeye kạmikan uni do acʼakʼ kuṛại ńam lek kanae. Ar mitʼ oṛakʼ bạgikate eṭakʼ oṛakʼte alope calakʼa.
“Jãhã atotepe bolokʼre ar onḍenko hoṛko ataṅlepere onko okako jom ocope onage jompe.
Ar ona atoren ruạkʼ hasokʼkan hoṛko bogekope ar lạiakope, ‘Isorakʼ raj do ape ṭhen sorakana.’
Menkhan jãhã atotepe senlenre ar onḍenko hoṛ bako ataṅpe enḍekhan ona ato reakʼ kulhikore senkate noa katha menpe,
‘ape ato reakʼ jaṅgare laṭkao akawatʼle dhuṛi do ape birudrele koṭa giḍi oṭokakʼ kana. Enrehõ baḍaekakʼpe, Isorakʼ raj do sorakana.’
Ińiń metapekana, bicạr dinre ona ato reakʼ khon Sodom nagraha reakʼge boroṅ ḍher sahaokokʼa.

“Hae am do E Khorasin! Hae am do E Bethsaeda! Okako hahaṛa kạmi aben talare hoeakan, ona do Tur ar Sidon nagrahare hoelen khan, enḍekhan ḍher din laharege onko do gõṛẽ kicricʼ horokʼkate ar torocʼre duṛupʼkate kại khon monko ạcurketakoa.
Sạrige, bicạr dinre abenakʼ khon Tur ar Sidon reakʼge boroṅ ḍher sahaokʼa.
Ar am E Kapharnạhum, am do cetʼ serma hạbicʼ usul ocokʼem meneda? Tishõ baṅa, bickom am do patal puritem giḍi ocokʼa.”

Jisu do arhõ celakoe metatʼkoa, “Okoe apeakʼ kathako ańjometʼkan onko do ińakʼ kathageko ańjomeda. Okoe apeko nihạ̃tetʼpe onko do ińgeko nihạ̃tedeń kana. Ar okoe ińko nihạ̃tedeńkan onko do kol akadińicʼgeko nihạ̃tedekana.”
Ado onko eae gel cela rạskạte ruạṛ hecʼkateko metadea, “E Probhu, amakʼ ńutumle ńumetʼ khange bhutko hõ aleakʼ kathako ańjometʼ kana.”
Jisui metatʼkoa, “Soetan do serma khon bijli leka ńurokʼkaniń ńel akadea.
Ńelpe, iń do biń ar kidińko cetanre lebedokʼ reakʼ daṛe, ar aperen bạiri Soetanakʼ sanam lekan daṛe cetanre hõ ektiạriń emakatʼpea. Onate jãhãnakʼtege ohope hạnlena.
Menkhan bhutko apeakʼ kathako ańjometʼkante alope rạskạkʼa, bickom sermare apeakʼ ńutum ol caṛhao akan iạte hulạsokʼpe.”

Unre Jisu do sonot Jiu reakʼ rạskạte hulạsenteye menkeda, “E Baba, am do serma ar dhạrtiren Probhu kanam. Sarhaoetʼme kạnạń, ente am do noako reaṅ ạkilan ar budanko khonem oko dohoakada menkhan albudạha lekanko ṭhen dom sodor akada. Hẽ Baba, amakʼ sanalekage noa do hoeakana.

‘‘Ińren Baba do ińakʼ tire sanamakʼe jimạ akada. Baba chaḍa okoe hõ bako baḍaea Hopon doe okoe kana, arhõ Hopon chaḍa okoe hõ bako baḍaea Baba doe okoe kana mente. Ona chaḍa Hopon okoe ṭhen Baba sodoreye menetʼkan eken unigeye baḍaea.’’
Uni do celako secʼe ạcurente hape hapeteye metatʼkoa, “Bhạgangea onako mẽtʼ do, one okakope ńeletʼkan ar ona ńel ńametʼkanko hõ.
Ińiń metapekana, okakope ńeletʼkan, ona do ạḍi utạr nạbi ar rapajko ńeńelko menletʼre hõ bako ńelletʼa; ar okakope ańjometʼkan, ona ańjom sanaletʼkore hõ bako ańjomlakʼa.”
Mitʼṭen dhorom guru do Jisu ṭhene hecʼena. Ar biḍạue lạgitʼe menkeda, “E Guru, iń do cetʼ iń cekalere jaejug jioniń ńam daṛekea?
Jisu do uniye metadea, “Moseakʼ ạnre cetʼko ol menakʼa? Onḍe do cetʼem paṛhao akada?”
Uni dhorom gurui roṛ ruạṛkeda, “Probhu amren Isor do amakʼ goṭa ontorte, amakʼ goṭa jiwite, amakʼ goṭa daṛete ar amakʼ goṭa monte dulạṛem, ar am aḍe paseren hoṛ apnar leka dulạṛem.”
Jisu do uniye metadea, “Am do ṭhikgem roṛ ruạṛ akada. Arem onka idiyetʼkan khan enḍekhan jionem ńama.”
Uni dhorom guru do dhorome ṭarhaokʼa mente Jisui kulikedea, “Okoe kanae iń aḍepaseren hoṛ do?”

Jisui roṛ ruạṛadea, “Mitʼṭen hoṛ do Jerusalem khon Jerikho nagrahateye calakʼkan tahẽkan jokhecʼ ḍạku talareye paṛaoena. Unre onko do uni hoṛakʼ kicricʼko totʼketʼtaea ar dal admạrwạkateko bạgi oṭowadea.
Khan bhạg leka mitʼṭen naeke do ona horteye calakʼkan tahẽkana. Menkhan uni hoṛe ńelkede khan naeke doe sa paromena.
Ṭhik onkage ar mitʼṭen Lewi hoṛ hõ ona jaegareye hecʼena ar uni hõ hoṛe ńelkede khane sa paromena.
Ona tayom Samariạren mitʼṭen hoṛ hõ ona horteye calakʼkan tahẽkanre uni hoṛ ṭhene hecʼ sorena. Ar uni hoṛ ńelte mãyã hecʼadea.
Ar uni ṭhen senkate dal ghaokore sunum ar darkha rasae dulatʼteye bedhaokatʼtaea. Ona tayom acʼren gadhareye ladekedete mitʼṭen sạrạite idikedeteye jotonkedea.
Ado dosar hilokʼ bar Dinar oḍokʼkate sạrạiren mạlik emadeteye metadea, ‘nui hoṛ jotonem. Ar noa khon bạ̃ṛti khoroclen khan, iń do ruạṛokʼreń emkatama.’ ”
Mucạtʼre Jisui menkeda, “Am do ńitokʼ cetʼem hudiskea? Noko pene hoṛ modre okoeṭakʼ do ḍạku tireye paṛaolen hoṛren aḍepaserene hoyena?”
Uni dhorom gurui menkeda, “Uni mãyãwạdiyicʼ hoṛge.” Jisu do uniye metadea, “Enḍekhan am hõ calaokate onkaeme.”
Niạ tayom Jisu ar acʼren celakoko dãṛãnkan tahẽkanre mitʼṭecʼ atoteko boloyena. Ar Martha ńutuman mitʼṭen maejiu do rạskạte acʼakʼ oṛakʼte Jisui ataṅ aderkedea.
Martharen do Mạriạm ńutuman mitʼṭen boeha kuṛiye tahẽkantaea. Uni do Probhuakʼ jaṅga pheḍre duṛupʼkate kathae ańjomkan tahẽkana.

Menkhan Martha do jom ńu tear lạgitʼe udhuṛ dhupuṛ baṛaekan tahẽkana. Onate uni do hecʼkateye menkeda, “E Probhu, boehań kuṛi sapʼsosore bae goṛowạńkan do cetʼ bam moneakʼ kana? Ado ma metaeme, jemon kạmireye goṛowạń.”
Unre Jisu do Marthae metadea, “Martha, E Martha, am do ạḍi okocʼ reaṅem dạndikʼ kana, arem uduṛ dhupuṛ baṛae kana,
menkhan mitʼṭenge jạruṛakʼ do menakʼa. Ente Mạriạm do bhage bakhrageye bachao akawana. Ona do uni ṭhen khon baṅ rejogokʼa.”

Mitʼ jokhecʼ Jisu do mitʼṭen jaegareye koejoṅkan tahẽkana. Ado koejoṅe mucạtʼketʼ khan acʼren mitʼṭen cela doe menkeda, “E Probhu, Johan bạbạptisicʼ cetʼleka acʼren celako koejoṅe cetʼatʼko tahẽkan onkage ale hõ cetʼaleme.”
Jisu do onkoe metatʼkoa, “Apepe koejoṅre nonka menpe, ‘E aleren sermaren Baba, amakʼ ńutum sonotokʼma, amakʼ raj hijukʼma;
aleakʼ din hilokʼ reakʼ jạruṛ jomakʼ dinạmge emaleme baṛe;
ar aleakʼ kạiko ikạkataleme ente okoe ale birudreko kạiyetʼ ale hõ onkole ikạkatako kana. Ar biḍạute alom aderlea.’ ”
Ona tayom Jisu do acʼren celakoe metatʼkoa, “Ape modre mitʼ hoṛ tala ńindạ jokhecʼ acʼren gateakʼ oṛakʼte senkateye metae, ‘E gate, pea piṭhạ pańcate den em hataṛạńme.
Ente hortenicʼ mitʼṭen gateye hecʼ akawạdińa. Ar uni jom ocoye lạgitʼ cetʼge bạnukʼtińạ.’
Unre oṛakʼ bhitri khon acʼren gateye roṛ ruạṛadea, ‘alom ạṛisińạ. Ente ńitokʼ do duạr sińgea ar ińren gidrạko hõ iń sãote aṭetʼreko giticʼ akana. Ar beretʼkate cetʼge ohoń em daṛelema.’
Sạrigeń metapekana, uni do gate iạte jãhãnakʼ emae bae beretʼrehõ, enhõ ạḍiye nehõrokʼkante uni do beretʼkate tinạkʼ jạruṛae onae emaea.
“Onateń metapekana, koepe ado emapea; ńam baṛaepe adope ńama; ṭhopʼ ṭhobpe ado jhicʼapea.
Ente mitʼke mitʼ kokoyicʼ do milạuaea; ar ńam baṛayicʼ doe ńama; ar ṭhopʼ ṭhopʼetʼkạnicʼ do jhicʼaea.
Ape modre nonkan okoeṭakʼ apat hoṛ menaea, one hopontetʼ piṭhại koelere dhiriye calae, se hakoe koelere hako bodolte bińe calae,
se beleye koelere kidińkaṭkome calae?
Enḍekhan apepe bạṛicʼgere hõ aperen gidrạko bhage bhage jinisko emakope baḍaekan khan, sermaren Baba do acʼ koeyekanko tinạkʼ artetʼ sonot Jiue emakoa!”
Eṭakʼ mitʼ jokhecʼ Jisu do mitʼṭen guṅgạ bhute oḍok giḍiyedekan tahẽkana. Ado bhute oḍok calaoen khan, guṅgạ hoṛ do katha roroṛe ehopʼena. Ar noate hoṛko do ạḍiko hahaṛayena,
menkhan adomko doko menkeda, “Bhutkoren sordar Beelsebul hotete uni do bhutkoe oḍok giḍiyetʼkoa.”
Ar eṭakʼ hoṛko do Jisu biḍạue lạgitʼ serma khon mitʼṭen cinhạ udukʼako lạgitʼko metadea.
Menkhan uni do onkoakʼ mon reakʼ kathae bujhạuketʼtako khane metatʼkoa, “Okaṭakʼ rajosṭi acʼ talare hạṭińokʼ, ona do maraokʼa, ar onate rajosṭi reakʼ gharońjko hõ hạṭińokʼa.
Soetan hõ acʼ birudreye teṅgon khan, enḍekhan rajosṭi do cekate ṭikạu tahentaea? Apepe meneda Beelsebul hotete bhutkoń oḍok giḍiyetʼkoa.
Ar ińge, Beelsebul hoteteń oḍok giḍiyetʼko khan aperen hoṛko do okoe hotete bhutkoko oḍok giḍiyetʼkoa? Ar ṭhik kathape roṛeda se baṅ ona do aperen hoṛkoge bicạra.
Menkhan Isorakʼ daṛete bhutkoń oḍok giḍiyetʼko khan enḍekhan Isorakʼ raj do ape ṭhen seṭer akana.
“Mitʼṭen daṛe hoṛ do sanam lekan khanḍa bhanḍawate acʼakʼ oṛakʼe horhotae khan uniakʼ jinisko do nirạige tahentaea.
Menkhan uni khon ḍher daṛeanicʼ jãhãe hecʼkate uniye bhagao lekhan enḍekhan okako khanḍa bhanḍareye bhorsakʼkan tahẽkan, uni eṭakʼ hoṛ do onakoe rejea ar luṭakʼ jiniskoe hạṭińtaea.
“Jãhãege iń secʼrene baṅkan khan uni do iń birudren kanae. Okoe iń sãote bae halaṅ uni doe chiṭạua.
“Bạṛicʼ jiu do mitʼṭen hoṛ khone oḍokʼ calaolenre jirạukʼ lạgitʼ hahaṅkar jaegakoreye ạcur baṛaea. Ar bae ńamle khan uni doe mena, ‘oka oṛakʼ khoniń oḍok hecʼakan ona oṛakʼtege arhõń ruạṛ calakʼa.’
Ar ruạṛ hecʼkate uni do ona oṛakʼ sapha ar sajao akatʼe ńama.
Unre uni do senkate acʼ khon artetʼ bạṛicʼ eṭakʼ eae goṭen jiue soṅge darajoṅa ar onḍeye girobasokʼa. Onate uni hoṛakʼ dosa do pạhilakʼ khon artetʼ bạṛicʼ hoyokʼtaea.”
Ado Jisu kathae roroṛkan tahẽkanrege gadel hoṛko modren mitʼṭen maejiu do hohoateye menkeda, “Bhạgangeae uni maejiu, one okoe do kukhireye doholetʼme ar toae nunuatʼme tahekan.”
Menkhan Jisui menkeda, “Onkogeko bhạgana one okoe do Isorakʼ kathako ańjometʼkan ar ona lekako kạmikan.”

Arhõ aema hoṛ do Jisu beṛhaete lad lad jarwakʼko ehopʼena. Unre Jisui menkeda, “Niạ piṛhiren hoṛ doko bạṛicʼgea. Onko do cinhạko khojkana menkhan Jona reakʼ chaḍa eṭakʼ ar cetʼ cinhạ hõ baṅ udukʼakoa.
Jona do Ninwi nagraharen hoṛko lạgitʼ cetʼleka cinhại hoelen ṭhik onkage Manwa Hopon hõ noa piṛhirenko lạgitʼ cinhại hoyokʼa.

Bicạr dinre dạkhin disạmren rạni doe rakapʼ hijukʼte niạ piṛhiren hoṛko doskoe udukʼakoa, ente Solomon reakʼ ạkilan kathako ańjom lạgitʼ uni do dhạrti reakʼ mitʼ mucạtʼ khone rakapʼ hecʼlena; ar ńelpe, nonḍe do Solomon khon hõ maraṅicʼ mitʼṭen menaea.

Menkhan bicạr dinre Ninwi nagraharen hoṛko do beretʼkate niạ piṛhiren hoṛko doskoko udukʼakoa, ente Ninwiren hoṛ do Jonawakʼ porcarte kại khon monko ạcurletʼtakoa; ar ńelpe, nonḍe do Jona khon hõ maraṅicʼ mitʼṭen menaea.
“Okoe hõ diuhe jeretʼkate do danaṅre bako dohoea se khạclạkʼte hõ bako hạrupʼ esetʼkakʼa bickom diuhe dohowakʼ cetanregeko dohoea, jemon bhitrite bolokʼko do marsalko ńelńam.
Amakʼ mẽtʼ do hoṛmo reakʼ diuhe kana. Ar amakʼ mẽtʼ mońjgetam khan enḍekhan amakʼ goṭa hoṛmo hõ marsalte perecʼgea, menkhan mẽtʼ bạṛicʼge khan amakʼ hoṛmo hõ ńutte perecʼgetama.
Amre menakʼ marsal jemon alo ńutokʼ onate sontor akae tahenme.
Amakʼ goṭa hoṛmo marsalte perecʼgetam khan ar thoṛa hõ ńut bạnukʼ khan enḍekhan ona do goṭage marsalokʼa, cetʼleka diuhe reakʼ marsal amre paṛaolenre amakʼ hoṛmo marsalokʼtam.”
Ado Jisu katha roṛe mucạtʼketʼ khan mitʼṭen Phạrusi hoṛ do jom ocoye lạgitʼe neotakedea. Unre Jisu do bhitrite bolokate jojome duṛupʼena.
Dhorom reakʼ niạm lekate Jisu do jom lahare ti ạrubokʼ bae ńelledete uni Phạrusi doe hahaṛayena.
Unre Probhu do uniye metadea, “Ape Phạrusiko do thạri ar bạṭi reakʼ bahre secʼgepe saphayetʼ kana, menkhan apeakʼ bhitritetʼ do laloc ar bạṛicʼte perecʼgetapea.
E bebujko! Bahre secʼ benaoicʼ do cetʼ bhitri secʼ hõ bae benao akada?
Ape do thạri ar bạṭi reakʼ bhitrire oka menakʼ onage boroṅ dan emokʼpe; enḍekhan sanamakʼ saphakʼtapea.

“Hae ape Phạrusiko do! Ape do eken podina, tejpat ar mitʼke mitʼ aṛakʼ sakam reakʼ gel hạṭiń reakʼ mitʼ hạṭińge Isorpe emae kana, menkhan dhorom bicạr ar Isorakʼ dulạṛ secʼ do bape moneakʼkana. Onate sedaeakʼko pańjae são sãote tayom reakʼakʼko hõ pańjae lek tapea.
“Hae ape Phạrusiko do! Ape do sunạgog reakʼ asol asol duṛupʼakʼkore duṛubokʼ ar hạṭiạ bajarkore johar ocokʼgepe kusiyakʼ kana.
Hae ape do! Ente ape do begor cinhạ akatʼ topa lekanko kanape. One hoṛko do begor baḍaete ona cetanteko taṛam paromokʼ kan.”
Unre sostor baḍaeko modre mitʼ hoṛ do Jisui metadea, “E Guru, am do noa kathate ale hõm bemanotetʼlea.”
Jisui menkeda, “Hae ape sostor baḍaeko do! Ape do hoṛko hamal hamal bojhape ladeako kana, menkhan goṛowako lạgitʼ ape do mitʼṭen kạṭupʼte hõ bape joṭetʼ legayeda.
“Hae ape do! Ape do nạbikoakʼ topako nawatepe tol aroyeda, ente aperen hapṛamkoge onko doko gocʼletʼkoa.
Onate aperen hapṛamkoren gohako do apege ar onkoakʼ ona kạmiko hõ apegepe aṅgoceda. Ente onko do nạbikoko gocʼletʼkoa ar ape do onkoakʼ topakope benao aroyeda.
Onate Isor do acʼakʼ akel lekage noa kathae menakada, ‘iń do onko ṭhen nạbiko ar apostolkoń kolkoa. Onko modre adom doko khũnkoa ar adom doko santaokoa.’
Ar nonkate, dhạrti sirjạu reakʼ ehopʼ khon tinạkʼgan nạbikoko gocʼ ocoakana, onkoakʼ mãyãm reakʼ dạyik do niạ piṛhiren hoṛko cetanrege paṛaokʼa.

Hẽ, sạrigeń metapekana, Habel reakʼ mãyãm khon ehopʼkate Sakariạ hạbicʼ, one okoe do pinḍ ar sonot jaegareye gocʼ ocolen uni Sakariạ khũn hạbicʼ sanamkoakʼ mãyãm reakʼ dạyik do niạ piṛhiren hoṛgeko hoyokʼa.
“Hae ape sostor baḍaeko do! Ape do akel reakʼ choṛanpe iditora akada. Ape hõ bape bolokʼkana ar bhitrite bolokʼko hõ bape bolo ocoako kana.”
Ado ona jaegae bạgi oṭoatʼkan tahẽkanre sostor baḍaeko ar Phạrusiko do uni birudre emanteakʼ roroṛko ehopʼena.
Ar ạḍi lekan kuklikote jhạlire paṛaoe lạgitʼ ạt ńam baṛaeko ehopʼena.

Ar inạkʼtege hajar hajar hoṛ nonkako jarwayena je, onko do ṭhela ṭhili iạte bhindạṛokʼko ehopʼena. Unre Jisu do pạhilre acʼren celakoe metatʼkoa, “Phạrusikoakʼ khạmi khon sontor akae tahenpe. Ona khạmi do hoyokʼ kana onkoakʼ phạsiạratetʼ.
Oko reakʼ sanamakʼ do sodorokʼa ar danaṅre menakʼ jotowakʼ do baḍaeyokʼa.
Onate ńutre jãhãnakʼgepe roṛakatʼ ona do marsalreko ańjoma. Ar bhitri oṛakʼre jãhãnakʼge khae khoepe roṛakatʼ ona do sạṛim cetan khon lại saḍekʼa.
“E gateko, ińiń metapekana, hoṛmo gogocʼko ar ona tayom bạ̃ṛti jãhãnakʼ baṅ ceka daṛeakʼko do alope botorakoa.
Menkhan ińiń udukʼapea okoeṭakʼpe botoraea mente. Ape gocʼpe tayom okoe do norokre khadlepe reakʼ ektiạri menakʼtae unige botoraepe. Hẽ ińiń metapekana, ape do unige botoraepe.
“Mõṛẽ goṭen ghaṛwa cẽṛẽ do cetʼ thoṛa damte bako ạkhirińokʼ kana? Enrehõ Isor do onkoren mitʼṭen hõ bae hiṛińetʼkoa.
Menkhan apeakʼ ma bohokʼ reakʼ upʼ hõ lekha akantape. Alope botorokʼa, ente aema aema ghaṛwa cẽṛẽko khon hõ ape do bạ̃ṛtipe damangea.
“Ińiń metapekana, jãhãege hoṛko samaṅreye aṅgociń Manwa Hopon hõ uni do Isorren goḍetko samaṅreye aṅgocea.
Menkhan jãhãege hoṛko samaṅreye baṅeń, uni do Isorren goḍetko samaṅreye baṅ ocokʼa.
Manwa Hopon birudre jãhãege jãhãnakʼe roṛ uni do ikạkʼtaea, menkhan sonot Jiu birudre jãhãege opoman reakʼ kathae roṛ uni do baṅ ikạkʼtaea.
Sunạgogkore ar disạm cakʼlaoko ar ektiạrianko samaṅreko idilepere cetʼ leka se cetʼpe roṛ ruạṛa ona reaṅ do alope bhabnakʼa.
Ente unre cetʼ roroṛ hoyokʼa ona do sonot Jiugeye cetʼapea.”
Ado gadel hoṛko modren mitʼ hoṛ do Jisui metadea, “E Guru, ạlińren baba okaṭakʼ sompottiye doho oṭoakatʼ ona do boehań iń sãote hạṭiń lạgitʼ metaeme.”
Jisu do uniye metadea, “Henda ho abenakʼ bicạr lạgitʼ se aben talare sompotti hạṭińaben lạgitʼ ektiạri do okoeye emakawạdińạ?”
Ona tayom Jisu do gadel hoṛkoe metatʼkoa, “Men cehaokʼpe! Ar sanam lekan lob-laloc khon sontor akae tahenpe, ente manwakoakʼ jionre ḍher sompotti tahen do sanam khon jạruṛteakʼ do baṅkana.”
Ado gadel hoṛko cetʼako lạgitʼ mitʼṭen phene lạiatʼkoa: “Mitʼṭen kisạ̃ṛ hoṛakʼ jumire aema phosol upjạuena.
Onate uni do mone monteye hudisana, ‘nunạkʼ phosol dohoe reakʼ jaega ma bạnukʼtiń; ńitokʼ do cetʼ iń cekaea?
Adoe menkeda ińakʼ murạikoń rạpuda, ar lạṭu lạṭu murạikoń benaoa ar onare ińakʼ sanam phosolko ar dhonkoń dohoetińạ.
Ar ińakʼ jiwiń metawakʼa, E jiwi ḍher bochor lạgitʼ baeakan acel pacel dhon menakʼtama. Onate ma jirạukʼte, jomme, ńũiyme ar hesecʼ sekrecʼjokʼte din ṭalaome.’
Menkhan Isor do uniye metadea, ‘E bebuj, teheń ńindạge am dom gujukʼa. Enḍekhan onem doho jarwa akatʼ dhon do okoeakʼ hoyokʼa?’ ”
Ado mucạtʼre Jisui menkeda, “Okoe hoṛ apnar lạgitʼ dhone jarwae ar Isor samaṅre kisạ̃ṛicʼe baṅkan, enḍekhan uniakʼ dosa hõ onkage hoyokʼtaea.”
Ona tayom Jisu do acʼren celakoe metatʼkoa, “Noa iạtegeń metapekana, jiwi lạgitʼ do alope dandokʼa cetʼpe joma; ar hoṛmo lạgitʼ hõ alope dạndikʼa cetʼpe bandea mente.
Ente jiwi do eken jom ar ńũi lạgitʼ do baṅkana, ar hoṛmo hõ eken kicricʼ khạnḍwạkʼ lạgitʼ do baṅa.
Kạhũko beṅgetʼakope, onko do itạ hõ bako era ar phosol hõ bako ira. Ar kuṭhi se murại hõ bạnukʼtakoa, enrehõ Isor do onkoe jom ocoyetʼkoa. Menkhan ape do noko cẽṛẽko khon hõ artetʼ bạ̃ṛtipe damangea.
Ape modre okoe dạndikate acʼakʼ jiwi mitʼ ghonṭa gan bạ̃ṛtiye doho daṛeataea?
Ar niạ huḍiń utạrakʼ kạmi hõ bape daṛeakʼ khan enḍekhan eṭakʼakʼko lạgitʼ do cedakʼpe dandokʼ kana?

“Bahako secʼ beṅgedpe, cetʼlekate harakʼ kana mente. Onko do kạmi hõ bako kạmiya ar sutạm hõ bako takoea ar bako tińa. Menkhan ińiń metapekana, Solomon raj do nunạkʼ ṭhonokreye tahẽkanre hõ onako reakʼ mitʼṭecʼ leka hõ bae sajao daṛeada.
Ṭạnḍire okaṭakʼ ghãs teheń menakʼ ar gapa culhạre khadle ocokʼrehõ Isor do ona nonkae sajaoetʼ khan E nase pạtiạukʼko, uni do tinạkʼ artetʼge bae sajaopea!
Cetʼpe joma ar cetʼpe ńũiya mente hudiskate alope uduṛ dhupuṛ baṛaea.
Ente dhạrtiren eṭakʼ jạtkoge onako reaṅ doko ńam baṛakana; ona chaḍa aperen Baba doe baḍaegea, apeakʼ do noako jạruṛ menakʼtapea mente.
Ona khon boroṅ Isorakʼ rajko reakʼ dạndikʼpe, enḍekhan noako hõpe ńama.
“Alope botorokʼa, E huḍiń palrenko, ente aperen Baba do apege acʼakʼ rajosṭi emapeye menjoṅkana.

Ape do menakʼ tapeakʼko ạkhrińkate dan emokʼpe. Ar oka baṅ marekʼ ona ṭaka reakʼ thạilạkʼ tear joṅpe, metakʼme okaṭakʼ dhon jaejug hạbicʼ ṭikạu tahen onage sermare jarwaepe. Onḍe do kombṛo hõ bako hijukʼa ar tejoko hõ bako bạṛija.
Ente okare apeakʼ dhon menakʼ onḍege apeakʼ mon hõ tahena.
“Ape do ḍanḍare kicricʼ paṭhe akatʼ ar diuhe do jol akae tahentape ma.
Ar nonkan hoṛko leka hoyokʼpe okoe do akoren kisạ̃ṛ lạgitʼ koyokʼ horre menakʼko, jemon uni do bapla bhoj khon ruạr hecʼkate duạre ṭhopʼ ṭhopʼlere duạrko jhicʼae.
Bhạgangeako onko guti do, one okoe do jagwar tahene hecʼ ńamko. Sạrigeń metapekana, uni kisạ̃ṛ do ḍanḍare kicricʼe paṭhekʼte onkoe duṛupʼ ocokoa ar hecʼkate acʼgeye jom ocokoa.
Bhạgangeako onko gutiko do, one uni do tala ńindạ se aṅgakʼ jokhecʼ hecʼkate jagwar tahene ńamko.
Oṛakʼ kisạ̃ṛe baḍae khan oka ghuṛi kombṛoe hijukʼa, enḍekhan uni do jagware tahẽkokʼa ar acʼakʼ oṛakʼre kombṛo ohoe bolo ocolea.
Onkage ape hõ sapṛao akae tahenpe, ente bape hudisakatʼ ghuṛirege Manwa Hopon doe hijukʼa.”
Unre Patrase menkeda, “Henda Probhu, noa cecetʼakʼ do eken ale lạgitʼ se sanamko lạgitʼem emokʼkana?”
Probhui menkeda, “Uni pạtiạricʼ ar budanicʼ kạmiyạ hoṛ doe okoe kana, one uniren kisạ̃ṛtetʼ do gutiko cetanre sordare dohoyete ṭhik oktere ser sidhạ emako lạgitʼ bhare emaekan?
Bhạgangeae uni guti, one okoe do kisạ̃ṛtae pạtiạu salakʼ kạmireye hecʼńame.
Sạrigeń metapekana, uni kisạ̃ṛ do acʼakʼ sanam menakʼtaeakʼko cetanre sordare dohokaea.
Menkhan uni sordar acʼakʼ monreye menle khan, ‘ińren kisạ̃ṛ do hijukʼe bilomeda.’ Ar unre uni do sãoten guti ar kạ̃ṛmĩkoe dal baṛakote jom-ńũkate bulokʼe ehobokʼ.
Enḍekhan okaṭakʼ din ar okaṭakʼ ghuṛi reakʼ katha bae hudisetʼkan, ona din ar ona ghuṛirege acʼren kisạ̃ṛ doe hijukʼa. Are makʼ paṛagea ar bepạtiạrko tulucʼ jaegae ṭhikaea.
“Ar okoeṭakʼ guti do acʼren kisạ̃ṛakʼ sana baḍaekatehõ sapṛao bae tahen se kisạ̃ṛ okae khojkan ona bae onkae enḍekhan uni do bebạṛicʼe dal ocokʼa.
Menkhan okoe begor baḍaete sạjại ńam reakʼe kạmi akatʼ uni do thoṛageye sạjại ocokʼa. Ar ḍhere em ocoakanicʼ ṭhen khon do ḍhergeko hataoa ar ḍhere jimạ ocoakan hoṛ hõ bạ̃ṛtiko koeyea.
“Iń do dhạrtite seṅgel lagaoiń hecʼakana; ar ona do laharege jollen khan bhage hoekokʼa!
Iń do mitʼṭen bạptisma ataṅ hoyokʼtińạ ar ona ạuri purạukʼ hạbicʼ ińakʼ duk do baṅ cabakʼtińạ.
Ape do cetʼpe meneda, dhạrtire suluk emokʼiń hecʼakana? Onka do baṅa. Iń do suluk emokʼ do bạń hecʼakana, bickom manwa birudre manwa teṅgoye lạgitʼgeń hecʼakana.
Ńit khon mitʼ oṛakʼren do mõṛẽ ṭhenko hạṭińokʼa, ar pe hoṛ do bar hoṛ birudre ar bar hoṛ do pe hoṛ birudreko teṅgona.

Onko do nonka lekako hạṭińokʼa, Apat do hopon birudre ar hopon do apat birudre, eṅgat do hoponera birudre ar hoponera do eṅgat birudre, hanhartetʼ do kimintetʼ birudre ar kimintetʼ do hanhartetʼ birudre.”
Ona tayom Jisu do gadel hoṛkoe metatʼkoa, ‘‘Pạchimre rimil rakabokʼpe ńelle khangepe mena, ‘hoe dakʼ do darae kana,’ ar onkage hoyokʼ kana.
Ar dạkhin secʼ khone hoele khan dope mena, ‘jharla jhạrliye setoṅa,’ ar onkage hoyokʼ kana.
E phạsiạrako, ot ar serma reakʼ cinhạ dope baḍae orometʼ kangea, menkhan ńitokʼ reakʼ okteko do cekate bape oromeda?
“Ar okaṭakʼ ṭhikakʼkan ona do cedakʼ bape bicạreda?
Amren bạdi tulucʼ Hạkim ṭhenem calakʼre horrege phanḍao lạgitʼ kurumuṭuime. Ar baṅkhan uni do Hạkim ṭhene or ghac ghacao idimea. Unre Hạkim do daroga ṭhene jimạkama ar daroga do hajotreye bhoraokama.
Ińiń metamkana, kạuḍi kạuḍi ạurim hala cabae hạbicʼ hajot khon ohogem oḍok daṛelena.”

Ado ona jokhecʼ onḍeko jarwa akan tahẽkan adom hoṛ do Jisu Gạlil Prodes reaṅko lạiadea. Onkoko menkeda, Romren disạm cakʼlaoicʼ Pilạt do Gạlilrenkoe makʼketʼkote dãṛẽ samaṅ akatʼ janwarakʼ mãyãm sãote onkoakʼ mãyãm hõe milạuketʼtakoa.
Noa katha ańjomkate Jisui menkeda, “Ape do cetʼpe bujhạueda, onko do Gạlilrenko khon bạ̃ṛti kạiyan hoṛko tahẽkante onkako saset ocoyena?
Ińiń metapekana, ona do baṅ, ar onkage ape hõ kại khon mon bape ạcurle khan jotokogepe nosṭo ocokʼa.
Siloam reakʼ usul oṛakʼ bhindạṛlenre okoe gel irạl hoṛko gocʼlen, apeakʼ hudisre onko do cetʼ Jerusalemreko khon hõ bạ̃ṛti dusiyan hoṛko tahẽkana?
Ińiń metapekana, ona do baṅ, menkhan kại khon mon bape ạcurle khan ape hõ sanamkogepe marao utạrokʼa.”
Ona tayom Jisu do cetʼako lạgitʼ noa kathae metatʼkoa: “Mitʼ hoṛakʼ darkha bagwanre mitʼṭen loa dare rohoe tahẽkana. Mitʼ din uni hoṛ do hecʼkate joe ńam baṛakeda menkhan bae ńamleda.
Unre mạliye metadea, ‘ńelme, iń do pe bochor khon noa darere joń ńam baṛakana menkhan cetʼge bạń ńameda. Onate loa dare do makʼ giḍikakʼme. Cedakʼ je noa do ạuṛiakʼ jumiye nosṭo ocoyeda.’
Mạliye roṛ ruạṛkeda, ‘E baba niạ bochor hõ tahẽ ocoakʼme. Iń do beṛhaeteń la ghạḍluga ar guricʼkoń emakʼa.
Ar ona tayom jo sapʼlen khan ma bogege ar baṅ khan dom makʼ giḍikakʼge.’ ”
Ado mitʼ jirạukʼ mãhãre Jisu do mitʼṭen sunạgogreye cetʼako kan tahẽkana.
Onḍe do nonkan mitʼṭen maejiue tahẽkana, one okoe do mitʼṭen bạṛicʼ jiue sapʼakade tahẽkante gel irạl bochor khon ruạteye jạbun akan tahẽkan. Ar kubjạgeye tahẽkante bae sojhe daṛeakʼkan tahẽkana.
Jisu do uniye ńelkedea ar acʼ ṭhen hoho sorkateye metadea, “E go, amakʼ ruạ khon dom bogeyena.”
Ar noa katha menkateye capokedea ar inạtege uni doe sojheyente Isor gunmanao joharaye ehopʼena.

Jisu do jirạukʼ mãhãreye bogekedete sunạgogren mukhiyạ do edreyente hoṛkoe metatʼkoa, “Kạmi lạgitʼ turui din ma menakʼge. Onate jirạukʼ mãhãre baṅ hecʼkate ona turui din bhitrire hecʼkate boge ocokʼpe.”
Unre Probhu do uni mukhiyại metadea, “E phạsiạrako! Jirạukʼ mãhãre ape do cetʼ aperen gadha se ḍaṅgrako goṛa khon raṛakate dakʼ ńũ bape idiyetʼkoa?
Menkhan Abraham bõsren nui maejiu do gel irạl bochor hạbicʼ Soetane tol akade tahẽkana, ar jirạukʼ mãhãre ona tonol khone raṛa ocokʼ do cetʼ baṅ ganokʼtaea?”
Noa kathae roṛketʼ khan uni birudreko tahẽkan sanamko doko lajaoena. Menkhan eṭakʼ hoṛko do uniakʼ maraṅ kạmi ńelte ạḍiko rạskạyena.
Inạ tayom Jisui menkeda, “Isorakʼ raj do oka lekana? Ar cetʼ tulucʼ iń jurikea?

Isorakʼ raj do mitʼṭen tuṛi jaṅ lekanakʼ kana, one oka do mitʼṭen hoṛ idikate acʼakʼ goḍareye erketʼ. Tayomte ona do harayente mitʼṭen dare leka hoyena. Ar cẽṛẽko hõ hecʼkate ona reakʼ ḍạrkore tukạko benao joṅana.”
Jisu do arhõe menkeda, “Isorakʼ raj do cetʼ tulucʼ iń juria?
Isorakʼ raj do khạmi lekana. Mitʼṭen maejiu do ona idikate gel irạl keji holoṅ sãoteye sipi mesalkeda, onate joto holoṅ do phulạu rakapʼena.”
Ado ato ato ar nagrahakore dãṛã dãṛãte lại cetʼakote Jisu do Jerusalem secʼe calao idiyena.
Ar mitʼṭen hoṛ do uniye kulikedea, “Henda Probhu, kại khon bańcao do cetʼ eken thoṛa hoṛgeko ńama? Unre Jisu do gadel hoṛkoe metatʼkoa,
“Sakṛa duạrte bolokʼ lạgitʼ lạgiạ paṛaokʼpe. Ińiń metapekana, ḍher hoṛge bolokʼ lạgitʼko kurumuṭuya, menkhan bako bolo daṛeakʼa.

Unre oṛakʼren kisạ̃ṛ beretʼkate silpińe siń esetʼlere ape do bahrere teṅgokate silpiń ṭhopʼ ṭhopʼkatepe mena, ‘E Probhu, jhicʼ aleme.’ Menkhan uni doe roṛ ruạṛ apea, ‘bạń baḍaeyetʼpea okaren kan coṅpe.’
Unrepe mena, ‘ale do am sãotele jom ńũleda, ar aleakʼ kulhi korem cetʼalekan tahẽkana.’
Unreye metapea, ‘oka khon coṅpe hecʼakan, iń do bạń baḍae akatʼpea. E phạsiạrako, men iń khon pharakokʼpe.’
“Tinre Abraham, Isạhak, Jakob ar nạbiko do Isorakʼ rajosṭirepe ńelkoa ar ape do bahrerepe giḍi ocoakana, unre ape dope rakʼ homora ar hasotepe togocʼ ḍaṭaea.
Unre purub, pạchim, utạr ar dạkhin khon hoṛko hijukʼte Isorakʼ rajre jojomko duṛupʼa.
Okoe ńitokʼ tayomre menakʼko onko do lahakʼa, ar lahare okoe menakʼko onko do tayomokʼa.”
Ona ghuṛire tin uḍicʼ Phạrusiko coṅ Jisu ṭhen hecʼenteko menkeda, “Am do nonḍe khon senjoṅme, ente Herod do gocʼme lạgitʼe menjoṅ kana.”
Jisu do onkoe metatʼkoa, “Senkate uni khikṛĩ metaepe, ‘iń do teheń ar gapa bhutkoń oḍok giḍikoa ar rugikoń bogekoa ar tesar hilokʼ do kạmiń mucạda.
Enhõ teheń, gapa ar meaṅ do dãṛãntege hoyokʼtińạ, ente Jerusalem bahrere jãhãe nạbiye gujukʼ do baṅ hoedaṛeakʼa.’

“E Jerusalem, E Jerusalem! Am do nạbikom gocʼetʼkoa ar am ṭhen kol ocokʼkanko do dhiritem tińetʼkoa. Sim eṅga cetʼleka acʼren hoponko phạ̃kṛạ̃kʼ latareye guṅgutʼko onkage iń hõ amren hoṛko guṅgutʼkoń menleda, menkhan ape do bape rebenlena.
Ńelpe, apeakʼ oṛakʼ do ape samaṅre khạlige tahena. Ińiń metapekana, tin hạbicʼ ạuripe men, ‘bhorangeae Probhu ńutumte daraekanicʼ do,’ un hạbicʼ iń do ar bape ńelńameńa.”
Mitʼ jirạukʼ mãhãre Jisu do Phạrusikoren mitʼṭen mukhiyạ hoṛakʼ oṛakʼte jom lạgitʼe calaoena. Unre Phạrusiko do Jisu mońjteko tạnkhiyede tahẽkana.
Jisu samaṅre mitʼṭen rugiye tahẽkana, okoe do goṭa hoṛmo udri rog tahẽkanteye phulạu akan tahẽkana.
Jisu do sostor baḍaeko ar Phạrusikoe kuliketʼkoa, “Moseakʼ ạn lekate jirạukʼ mãhãre jãhãe bogeko do cetʼ ganokʼgea?”
Sostor baḍaeko do thir hapegeko tahẽyena. Unre Jisu do uni hoṛe joṭetʼkedea ar bogekedeteye bidạkadea.
Ona tayom sostor baḍaekoe metatʼkoa, “Jirạukʼ mãhãre ape modre jãhãeren gidrạ se ḍaṅgra kũńreye ńurlenre hare phare cetʼ bape rakapʼ godea?”
Menkhan sostor baḍaeko do noa katha reakʼ bako roṛ ruạṛ daṛeada.
Ado neota akan hoṛko laha duṛupʼakʼ jaegako bachao joṅkane ńelketʼko khan, Jisu do cetʼako lạgitʼ noa kathae metatʼkoa,
“Jãhãe bapla bhojreye neotalemre laha duṛupʼakʼre do alom duṛupʼa, ente pasere pase uni do am khon hõ manotan hoṛe neota akade.
Enḍekhan okoeye neota akatʼben uni do hecʼkateye metama, ‘noa jaega do uni aṛakʼae me.’ Unre lajaorem paṛaokʼte tayom utạrakʼ jaegarem duṛupʼa.
Onate amem neota ocolenre senkate tayomakʼ jaegare duṛupʼme. Enḍekhan neotayicʼ do hecʼkateye metama ‘E gate, dela lahare duṛupʼme.’ Unre eṭakʼ neota akanko samaṅre am do manotem ńama.
Okoe acʼte usulokʼe menetʼkan uni doe copotʼ ocokʼa, ar okoe acʼteye copodokʼ uni doe usul ocokʼa.”

Ado neota akadeyicʼ hõe metadea, “Am do jom ńũi reakʼem ehopʼlere, se bhojem tearlere amren gateko se boehako se peṛa pạrbhạko se aḍe paseren kisạ̃ṛ hoṛko do alom neotakoa. Arem onka lekhan onko hõ amko neotamete amakʼ neotako hala ruạṛkatama.
Menkhan bhojem tearlere am do reṅgecʼko, ṭhunṭako, leḍhako, ar kãṛãko neotakom.
Enḍekhan Isorakʼ bhorem ńama, ente onko do bako neota hala ruạṛ daṛeama. Ar dhoromko gocʼko khonko jiwetʼ beretʼ ocokʼre am do noa reakʼ halawama.”
Ado jojom duṛupʼ akanko modren mitʼ hoṛ do noa katha ańjomkate Jisui metadea, “Okoe Isorakʼ rajre jojome duṛubokʼ uni doe bhạgangea.”
Jisui menkeda, “Mitʼ hoṛ do maraṅ okocʼe bhojkeda ar aema hoṛe neotaketʼkoa.
Ado jojom okte hoyen khan uni do acʼren golame kolkedete neota akan hoṛko ṭhene roṛgotʼkada, ‘dela hijukʼpe,’ ńitokʼ do jotowakʼ sạt akana.
Menkhan onko sanamkoge mimitʼ mimitʼte ikạ ocokʼko ehopʼena. Pạhilicʼ do uni golame metadea, ‘iń do thoṛa jumiń kiriń akada, calaokate ńeńel hoyokʼtińạ. Onate ma ikạ kạńme.’
Ar mitʼ hoṛ doe menkeda, ‘iń do mõṛẽ ãrãṛ ḍaṅgrań kiriń akatʼkoa, onko biḍạuko lạgitʼ iń calakʼkana. Onate dayakate ikạ kạńme.’
Eṭakʼ ar mitʼ hoṛ doe menkeda, ‘bạhu akanwạnạń, onate bạń sen daṛeakʼ kana.’

“Ado uni golam do ruạṛ senkate acʼren kisạ̃ṛ jotowakʼe lạiadea. Onate oṛakʼ kisạ̃ṛ do ạḍiye raṅgaoena ar acʼren golame metadea, ‘usạrate nagraha reakʼ kulhiko ar kucitʼ horkote sen hodokʼme ar reṅgecʼko, ṭhunṭạko, kãṛãko ar leḍhako nonḍe ạgukom.’
Are onkaketʼ khan uni golam doe menkeda, ‘E Probhu, jotowakʼ do amakʼ hukum lekage hoeakana, menkhan jaega do ńitokʼ hõ menakʼgea.’
Onate kisạ̃ṛ do golame metadea, ‘am do nagraha bahre soṛokkote oḍok calakʼme ar hijukʼ lạgitʼ hoṛko jormoṭkom, jemon oṛakʼ do perejokʼtiń.
Ińiń metapekana, okoeko neota ocolen onko okoe hõ ińakʼ noa bhoj do bako cakha ńama.’ ”
Ar ạḍi gadel hoṛ do Jisu sãoteko calakʼkan tahẽkana. Jisu do onko secʼ ạcurenteye metatʼkoa,
okoe iń ṭhene hijukʼ, uni do acʼren eṅgat-apat ar bạhu ar gidrạko ar boehako ar miserako se acʼakʼ jiwi hõ iń khon bạ̃ṛtiye dulạṛ, enḍekhan ińren cela do ohoe hoedaṛelena.
Okoe acʼakʼ krus gokʼkate iń tayomte bae hijukʼ, uni hõ ińren cela ohoe hoedaṛelena.
“Ape modre jãhãege mitʼṭen usul oṛakʼ benaoe menjoṅ khan uni do lahare duṛupʼkate khoroce hisạb maṛaṅa. Uni doe ńela, ona sạt lạgitʼ ṭaka menakʼtaea se baṅa.
Ar baṅkhan rehetʼ bạisạu tayom ona oṛakʼ bae purạu daṛeakʼ khan okoe onako ńel onko doko landa dhutʼaea.
Onkoko mena, ‘uni hoṛ do benaoe ehopʼletʼgea, menkhan bae purạu daṛeada.’

‘‘Mitʼṭen raj do eṭakʼ raj birudre lạṛhạiye calakʼre pạhilre duṛupʼkateye hudis maṛaṅokʼa, ‘bargel hajar sipạhiwante okoe iń birudre lạṛhạiye hijukʼkan, uni do eken gel hajar sipạhikoteń daram daṛekea se baṅa?’
Ar bae daṛeakʼ khan eṭagicʼ raj sạṅgińreye tahenrege uni do mukhiyạ hoṛko kolkate sulukokʼ lạgitʼe kulijoṅa.”
Ado mucạtʼre Jisui menkeda, “Onkage apeko modre jãhãe begor hudis cintạte acʼakʼ jotowakʼko bae bạgi oṭowakʼ khan, uni do ińren cela ohogeye hoe daṛelena.
‘‘Buluṅ ma bhagege, menkhan sabakʼlen khan cekate ona do rahamokʼa?
Unre ona do hasa lạgitʼ hõ lek baṅ hoyokʼa, ar guricʼ mande lạgitʼ hõ baṅ; ar hoṛko do bahrete onako oḍok giḍikakʼa. Ańjom lạgitʼ lutur menakʼtae hoṛ doe ańjomma.”
Unre aema mạsul uṭhạuko ar bạṛicʼ hoṛko hõ Jisuakʼ katha ańjomtae lạgitʼ uni ṭhenko hecʼ sorena.
Onate Phạrusiko ar sostor baḍaeko do noa menkate karacʼ kurujokʼko ehopʼena, “Nui hoṛ do kại hoṛko sãoteye gatekʼkana are jom ńũyeda.”
Unre Jisu do cetʼako lạgitʼ noa kathae lạiatʼkoa:
“Ape modre, mitʼ hoṛren mitʼ sae bhiḍiko tahentae. Ar onko modre mitʼṭene atʼlen khan, uni do cetʼ onko aregel are goṭen ṭạnḍire bạgi oṭoakote atʼakanicʼ bae sendra baṛaea ạuriye ńame hạbicʼ?
Are sendra ńamle khan uni do rạskạte tarenreye ladeyea.
Ar oṛakʼte calaokate acʼren gateko ar aḍepaseren hoṛko hohoakoteye metakoa, ‘iń sãote rạskạkʼpe, ente atʼlen bhiḍi doń ńam ruạṛakadea.’
Ińiń metapekana, onkage kại khon mon ạcur bako moneakʼkan aregel are dhorom hoṛko khon bickom mitʼṭen kại hoṛ mone ạcuretʼkante sermare arhõ bạ̃ṛti rạskạ hoyokʼa.
“Mitʼṭen maejiu do gel goṭecʼ rupạ ṭaka menakʼtaea. Ar onako modre mitʼ goṭene atʼlere uni do cetʼ diuhe jeretʼkate jokʼ jokʼte bae sendraea ạuriye ńam hạbicʼ?
Are ńamle khan acʼren gateko ar aḍepaseren hoṛko hohoakoteye metakoa, ‘iń sãote rạskạkʼpe, ente oneń atʼletʼ siki doń ńam ruạṛakada.’
Ińiń metapekana, mitʼṭen kại hoṛ mone ạcurle khan Isorren goḍetko talare hõ onkage rạskạ hoyokʼa.”
Ona tayom Jisui menkeda, “Mitʼṭen hoṛren barea hoponkin tahẽkana.
Uniren huḍińicʼ hopon do apattetʼe metadea, ‘E baba, ińakʼ bhag reakʼ somppoti emkạtińme.’ Onate uni hoṛ do acʼren banar hopontetʼe hạṭińatʼkinạ.
Thoṛa din tayom huḍińicʼ hopon do acʼakʼ sompotti ạkhrińkate ṭaka-poesawante sạṅgiń disạmteye calaoena. Ar onḍe rij roṅre tahẽkate uni do acʼakʼ sanam ṭaka-poesae ublạ ḍublạ cabakeda.
Ado sanam ṭaka-poesae cabaketʼ khan ona disạm reakʼ sanam jaegare maraṅ akal hoyena. Onate uni do reṅgecʼreye paṛaoena.
Unre uni do ona disạmren mitʼṭen kisạ̃ṛ ṭhen senkate kạmiye khojkeda. Uni hoṛ do acʼren sukri gupiko lạgitʼ maṭteye kolkedea.
Ar sukriko oka coklakʼ baklakʼko jometʼ tahẽkan onakote uni hõ jom bikʼe menetʼ tahẽkana, menkhan okoege ona hõ bako emaekan tahẽkana.
“Ado mitʼ din cetao hecʼadeteye menkeda, ‘ạpuńren unạkʼ unạkʼ gutiko do sareṛokʼ leka jomakʼko ńameda, menkhan iń do nonḍe reṅgecʼteń gujukʼ kana.
Iń do beretʼkate ạpuń ṭheniń calakʼa ariń metaea, E baba, Isor ar am samaṅreń kại akada.
Amren hopon ńumugokʼ lek geń baṅkana. Onate amren gutiko modren mitʼ hoṛ mente dohokạńme.’
“Noa menkate uni doe beretʼente acʼ apat ṭhene calaoena. Ado sạṅgińreye tahẽkanrege uniren apattetʼ doe ńel ńamkedea ar ạḍi mãyã hecʼadea. Ar ńir senkate uniye hạṛupʼkedea are cokʼ cokʼadea.
Unre hopon doe menkeda, ‘E baba, iń do Isor ar am samaṅreń kại akada. Amren hopon ńumogokʼ lek geń baṅkana.’
“Menkhan apattetʼ do acʼren gutikoe metatʼkoa, ‘den usạrate mońj utạrakʼ kicricʼ ạguipe ar uni horokʼaepe. Tire mundạm ar jaṅgare panahi horokʼaepe,
ar lodgopʼ ḍaṅgra ạguyete jabeyepe. Ar dela, jom ńũ katebon hesecʼ sekrejokʼma,
ente nui ińren hopon do gocʼgeye tahẽkana menkhan arhõe jiwetʼ beretʼ akana; atʼgeye tahẽkana are ńam ruạṛ akana.’ Ona tayom onko do hesecʼ sekrejokʼko ehopʼena.
“Ona oktere maraṅicʼ hopon do maṭreye tahẽkana. Ado oṛakʼ sore hecʼen khan enecʼ sereń ar bajnako reakʼ saḍeye ańjomkeda.
Unre mitʼṭen guti hohoadeteye kulikedea, ‘noako do cetʼ hoyokʼ kana?’
“Guti doe roṛ ruạṛadea, ‘bokome hecʼakana. Ar ạpum do napaegeye ńam ruạṛkedete lodgopʼ ḍaṅgrae jabe akadea.’
“Unre maraṅicʼ hopon doe raṅgaoente bhitrite bolokʼ bae rebenlena. Onate apattetʼ doe oḍok hecʼena ar bhitrite bolokʼ lạgitʼe nehõradea.

Uni do apattetʼe metadea, ‘ńelme, iń do nunạkʼ bochor khoniń joton ạguyetʼmea; menkhan mitʼ dhao hõ amakʼ hukum do bạń taṛam parom akada. Enhõ ińren gateko sãote hesecʼ sekrejokʼ lạgitʼ mitʼṭen gan merom hopon tanakʼ hõ bam emakawạdińa.
Menkhan amren nui hopon do, kusmbiko tulucʼ amakʼ ṭaka-poesae ublạ ḍubla cabakeda, are hecʼenre uni do lodgopʼ ḍạṅgram gocʼadea.’
“Apattetʼ do uniye metadea, ‘E beṭa, am do jaoge iń soṅgere menama. Ar ińakʼ oka menakʼ ona joto do amakʼkangea.
Menkhan hesecʼ sekrejokʼ ar rạskạkʼ do lek kan tabona, ente amren nui boeha do gocʼgeye tahẽkana arhõe jiwetʼ akana; atʼgeye tahẽkana arhõe ńam ruạṛ akana.’ ”
Jisu do acʼren celakoe metatʼkoa, “Mitʼṭen kisạ̃ṛ hoṛren maraṅ lonbonicʼ do noa menteko dusikedea je, uni do acʼren kisạ̃ṛakʼ dhonkoe nosṭoyeda.
Unre kisạ̃ṛ do uni hoṛ hohoadeteye kulikedea, ‘am birudre cetʼkoń ańjomeda? Onate kạmi reakʼ hisạb imạńme, ente maraṅ lonbonicʼ do ar bam tahẽdaṛeakʼa.’
“Unre guti do mone moneteye menkeda, ‘ńitokʼ do cetʼ iń cekaea? Ińren kisạ̃ṛ ma kạmi khone ocokʼ idiń. Ar hasa makʼ reakʼ daṛe hõ bạnukʼtiń ar kokoe mań lajaokʼkan.
Jaehok, kạmi khoniń jirạu ocolenre hoṛko jemon akoakʼ oṛakʼreko ataṅiń onate cetʼ cekae lagaoạńạ ona doń baḍaegea.’
“Ar noa menkante uni do acʼren kisạ̃ṛ ṭhen dharaoletʼ tahẽkankoe hohoatʼkoa. Ona tayom pạhilicʼe kulikedea, ‘ińren kisạ̃ṛ ṭhen tinạkʼem dharao akada?’
Uni doe menkeda, ‘bar hajar ponsae liṭar sunum.’ Uniye metadea, ‘oka kagocre amakʼ dharaoakʼ ol menakʼ ona ạguime ar usạra duṛupʼkate ol hodme mitʼ hajar bar sae liṭar.’
Ona tayom eṭagicʼe metadea, ‘am do tinạkʼem dharao akada?’ Uni doe menkeda, ‘gel irạl ṭon guhum.’ Adoe metadea, ‘amakʼ kagocre gel pon tala ṭon olme.’
Ado uni gutiye bedhoromgere hõ bud salakʼe kạmiketʼte kisạ̃ṛ do uniye sarhaokedea. Noate bujhạukʼ kana, noa puriren hoponko do ako bidạlrenko talare marsalren hoponko khon hõ bạ̃ṛtiko budangea.
Ińiń metapekana, bedhorom dhonte gate benao joṅpe, jemon ona dhon cabalenre jaejug tahen reakʼ jaegareko ataṅ darampe.
Thoṛa utạrakʼkore pạtiạricʼ do ḍher okocʼakʼkore hõe pạtiạrgea. Okoe thoṛa utạrakʼkore pạtiạricʼe baṅkan, uni do ḍher okocʼakʼkore hõ ohogeye pạtiạu ocolena.
Noa piṛhi reakʼ dhonko cetanre bape pạtiạu ocokʼkan khan enḍekhan sạri dhon do bhorsakate okoeye jimạwapea?
Eṭakʼ hoṛkoakʼre pạtiạr bape tahen khan, ape apnarakʼ do okoe baṅe emape?

“Okoe hõ barea kisạ̃ṛ ṭhen guti ohoe khaṭao daṛelena, ente mitʼ hoṛ doe kurudaea ar eṭakʼicʼ doe dulạṛea, se mitʼ hoṛ doe manotea ar eṭakʼicʼ doe neṅghaoea. Isor ar dhon ṭhen guti do ohogepe khaṭao daṛelena.”
Ado noako katha ańjomkate Phạrusiko do Jisu siṛogaeko ehopʼena, ente onko do ṭaka-poesage bạ̃ṛtiko dulạṛetʼ tahẽkana.
Unre Jisui metatʼkoa, “Ape do hoṛko samaṅre dhorompe udugokʼ kana, menkhan Isor do apeakʼ mon reakʼe baḍaegea. Ente manwa ṭhen okaṭakʼ manotakʼkan, Isor samaṅre ona do hirkhạwakʼ kana.
“Moseakʼ ạn ar nạbikoakʼ olakʼ do Johan hạbicʼge. Ona tayom khon Isorakʼ raj reakʼ bhage sombat do porcarokʼ kana ar sanamkoge ona rajre jormoṭko bolokʼ kana.
Menkhan ạn reakʼ mitʼ ṭuḍạkʼ meṭaokʼ khon bickom serma ar ot cabakʼge algawa.
“Okoe acʼren bạhu bạgikate eṭakʼicʼe baplaye, uni doe laṭghaṭeda. Ar jãwãe khon bapag akan maejiu okoeye baplaye, uni hõe laṭghaṭeda.
“Mitʼṭen kisạ̃ṛ hoṛe tahẽkana. Uni do beguni roṅakʼ ar eṭakʼ damanakʼ kicricʼkoe horokʼ bandeyetʼ tahẽkana. Ar jaoge hesecʼ sekrejokʼ tulucʼe jom-ńũiyetʼ tahẽkana.
Ar uni kisạ̃ṛ hoṛakʼ duạr ṭhen Lasar ńutuman mitʼṭen kokoe hoṛ do jaoge ạgukateye doho ocokʼkan tahẽkana. Uni do goṭa hoṛmo ghaote perecʼ tahẽkantaea.
Ar kisạ̃ṛ hoṛakʼ mej khon hiricʼ pạsir okako jomakʼ ńurokʼkan tahẽkan onakote lacʼ perejtaye menetʼ tahẽkana, ar setako hõ uniakʼ ghaokoko jaletʼtae tahẽkana.
“Mitʼ din uni kokoe hoṛ doe gocʼena. Ar serma goḍetko hecʼkate Abraham ṭhenko idikedea. Ona tayom uni kisạ̃ṛ hoṛ hõe gocʼena arko topakadea.
Ado patalreye sasetokʼkan tahẽkanre coṭ secʼe beṅgetʼ rakapʼketʼ khan sạṅgińre Abraham ar uni sorre Lasare ńelkeda.

Unre uni do ãṭ aṛaṅte hohoateye menkeda, ‘E baba Abraham, dayawạńme baṛe. Ar Lasar iń ṭhen kolkaeme jemon uni do acʼakʼ coṭ kạṭupʼ dakʼre topokate ińakʼ alaṅe reaṛkạtiń. Ente noa jolokʼ seṅgelreń jal jalaokʼ kana.’
“Menkhan Abrahame menkeda, ‘disạime, am do jiwetʼem tahẽkanre tinạkʼ sukem jomleda ar Lasar do tinạkʼe sasetlena. Menkhan nonḍe uni do jiwi raṛecʼe ńameda ar am dom sasetokʼkana.
Ona chaḍa ape ar ale talare nonkan mitʼṭen maraṅ khạndṛuṅ dohoakana jemon jãhãege sanalere nonḍe khon paromkate ape ṭhen aloko calao daṛeakʼ ar onḍe khon paromkate ale ṭhen hõ aloko hecʼ daṛeakʼ.’
“Unre kisạ̃ṛ hoṛe menkeda, ‘E baba, enḍekhan dayakate iń babawakʼ oṛakʼte Lasar kolkaeme,
jemon ińren mõṛẽ goṭen boehae sontor daṛeako; ar baṅ khan onko hõ noa sasetokʼ jaegareko hijukʼa.’
“Menkhan Abrahame menkeda, ‘Mose ar nạbikoakʼ puthi ma coṅ menakʼge. Onko do onkoakʼ kathako luturakʼ ma.’
“Uni kisạ̃ṛ hoṛe menkeda, ‘baṅa, E baba Abraham, gocʼko khon jãhãege onko ṭhene calaolen khan onko do kại khon monko ạcurtakoa.’
“Unre Abrahame menkeda, ‘Mose ar nạbikoakʼ katha jãhãe bako ańjom khan enḍekhan gocʼko mod khon jãhãegeye beretʼlenre hõ onko do ohoko pạtiạulena.’ ”
Jisu do acʼren celakoe metatʼkoa, “Kại horte idiko lạgitʼ uskạu do hijukʼte hõ hijukʼgea, menkhan hae uni hoṛ do, one okoe hotete ona uskạu hijukʼkan!
Noko huḍińko modre jãhãege mitʼ goṭen kại horteye idiye enḍekhan uni do hoṭokʼre jante dhiri akawaete doreãore khadle giḍikaege bhage hoyokʼtaea.
“Men sontorokʼpe. Amren boeha am birudreye kạilere cehaoem. Ar kại khon mone ạcurletae khan uni do ikạkaeme.
Dinre eae dhao am birudreye kại khan ar eae dhaoge hecʼkateye men, ‘kastaokʼ kạnạń,’ enḍekhan uni do ikạkae me.”
Onko gelbar apostolko do Probhuko metadea, “Aleakʼ biswạs baṛe bạ̃ṛti kataleme.”
Probhui menkeda, “Mitʼṭen tuṛi jaṅ inạkʼ pạtiạu tahentape ar noa loa darepe metakʼ, ‘rehetʼ sudhạ todokʼte jalapurire khadlekʼme;’ ar inạtege ona dare do apeakʼ kathae ańjomtapea.
“Ape modre okoe menaea one uni do siokʼ se gupiyicʼ golam menaetae. Ar uni golam maṭ khone hecʼlenre kisạ̃ṛ do cetʼ ‘usạrate jom lạgitʼ duṛubokʼe metaea?’
Onka do baṅa, bickome metaea, ‘jomakʼ tearạńme, ar ạuriń jom ńũi hạbicʼ ḍanḍa paṭhekate sapʼsorạńme. Ar ona tayom do amem joma.’
Ado uni guti oneye hukumade lekae kạmiketʼte kisạ̃ṛ do cetʼ bae sarhaoea?
Onkage Isorakʼ hukum leka sanamakʼ kạmi tayom ape do menpe, ‘okạjuạ gutiko kanale; okaṭakʼ kạmi lek tahẽkantale eken inạgele kạmi akada.’ ”
Ado Jerusalemteko calakʼkan tahẽkanre Jisu do Samariạ ar Gạlil talateye sen paromokʼkan tahẽkana.
Unre mitʼṭen atoteko bolokʼkan tahẽkanre uni do gel goṭen murhucʼ jom rugiye ńel ńamketʼkoa.
Onko do sạṅgińre teṅgokate hohoateko menkeda, “Jisu, Probhu, mãyãwaleme.”
Jisu do murhucʼ jom rog hoṛ ńelketʼkoteye metatʼkoa, “Do senkate naekeko ṭhen udugokʼpe.” Ar calakʼ calakʼtege onko doko bogeyena.
Ado onko modre mitʼ hoṛ do bogeyene ńelketʼ khan ãṭ aṛaṅte Isor sarhao sarhaoateye ruạṛ hecʼena ar Jisuakʼ jaṅga pheḍre taberenteye gunmanao joharadea.
Uni do Samariạ Prodesren hoṛe tahẽkana.
Unre Jisui menkeda, “Gel goṭen do cetʼ bako bogelena? Enḍekhan sarecʼ are goṭen doko okayena?
Isor gun manao joharae lạgitʼ nui eṭakʼ jạtren chaḍa ar okoe hõ cetʼ bako ruạṛlena?
Ona tayom Jisu do uni hoṛe metadea, “Ma beredokʼme ar calao joṅme. Ente pạtiạu akantem bogeyena.”
Ado Phạrusiko modren adomko do Isorakʼ raj tis hijukʼa menteko kulikedea. Unre Jisui roṛ ruạṛatʼkoa, “Isorakʼ raj hijukʼre jãhãn cinhạ do baṅ ńelokʼa.
Okoe hõ bako mena, ‘Isorakʼ raj do nõkʼõe nonḍe’ se, ‘hane hanḍe,’ ente Isorakʼ raj do aperege menakʼa.”
Ona tayom acʼren celakoe metatʼkoa, “Nonkan dinko hijukʼ kana, ape do Manwa Hopon reakʼ mitʼṭen din ńelpe mena, menkhan bape ńelńama.
Ar hoṛkoko metapea, ‘hanḍe ńelepe’ se ‘nõkʼõe nonḍe ńelepe.’ Unre bahrete do alope oḍokokʼa se alope pańjakoa.
Bijli cetʼleka sermare mitʼ nakha khon eṭakʼ nakha hạbicʼ malkaokʼ, onkage Manwa Hopone hijukʼ dinre hõ hoyokʼa.
Menkhan pạhilre uni do ạḍi utạr duk ar saset jojom hoyokʼtaea. Ona chaḍa noa piṛhiren hoṛko do uniko nihạtea.
“Noah oktere cetʼleka hoelen onkage Manwa Hopon hijukʼre hõ hoyokʼa.
Ente Noah do jahajre ạuriye bolokʼ hạbicʼ ar ḍubạ dakʼ hecʼkate sanamko ạuriye maraoko hạbicʼ hoṛko doko jom ńũiyetʼ tahẽkana, bạhu joṅkan tahẽkanako arko jãwãeyokʼkan tahẽkana.
Loṭ oktere cetʼleka hoelen onkage hoyokʼa. Ona jokhecʼ hoṛko doko jom ńũiyetʼ tahẽkana, kiriń-ạkhrińetʼkan tahẽkanako, cas-basetʼkan tahẽkanako arko oṛakʼ duạretʼkan tahẽkana.
Menkhan Loṭ Sodom khone oḍok calaoen dinre serma khon seṅgel ar gondhok reakʼ dakʼe jạṛiketʼ khan sanam hoṛkoe ḍahao maraoketʼkoa.
Oka hilokʼ Manwa Hopone sodorokʼ ona din hõ onkage hoyokʼa.
“Enhilokʼ okoe sạṛim cetanreye tahen uni do jãhãnakʼ hatao lạgitʼ aloe pheḍokʼma. Onkage baṛgere okoeye tahen uni hõ aloe ruạṛ hijukʼma.
Loṭren bạhuwakʼ katha disạipe.
Jãhãege acʼakʼ jiwi rukhiyạu lạgitʼe kurumuṭui, uni do acʼakʼ jiwiye khuạutaea, ar okoe acʼakʼ jiwiye khuạutae uni do onae bańcaotaea.
Ińiń metapekana, ona ńindạ mitʼ aṭetʼre bar hoṛkin tahenre; mitʼ hoṛ doe idiocokʼa ar eṭagicʼ doe bạgi oṭokʼa.
Unre barea maejiu jantekin riritʼre;
Mitʼ hoṛ doe idiocokʼa ar eṭagicʼ doe bạgi oṭokʼa.”
Ado celakoko metadea, “Henda Probhu, okare?” Jisui roṛ ruạṛkeda, “Jãhãrege mạ̃ṛĩ onḍege gidi hõko jarwakʼa.”
Ado celako sanam ghạṛicʼko koejoṅ ar alo jemonko as chuṭạukʼ onate Jisu do noa phene lạiatʼkoa: “Mitʼ nagrahare mitʼṭen hạkime tahẽkana.
Uni do Isor bae botoraekan tahẽkana ar hoṛko hõ bae moneyakokan tahẽkana.
Ona nagrahare mitʼṭen rạnḍi maejiue tahẽkana. Uni do ghane ghạṛicʼ hecʼkateye metaekan tahẽkana, ‘De, hok reakʼ bicạr chinḍạu kạtińme.’
Menkhan hạkim do thoṛa din hạbicʼ cetʼge bae cekawadea. Ado mucạtʼre mone moneteye menkeda, ‘iń do Isor bạń botorae kanre hõ ar manwako bạń moneyako kanre hõ,
enhõ nui rạnḍi maejiu doe ạṛis edeńte hok reakʼ iń bicạrkataea. Ar baṅ khan gahne ghạṛicʼ hecʼkateye ạṛis cabayińạ.’ ”
Noa tayom Probhu do arhõe menkeda, “Uni bedhorom bicạricʼ cetʼe menkeda ona baṛe hudisjoṅpe.
Enḍekhan okoe siń ńindạ Isorko hohoaekan, onko bachao akan acʼren hoṛko lạgitʼ Isor do cetʼ dhorom reakʼ bae bicạra? Uni do cetʼ ona onkae lạgitʼe biloma?
Ińiń metapekana, onkoakʼ dhorom bicạrtako lạgitʼ uni do bae biloma. Menkhan Manwa Hopone hecʼlenre uni do cetʼ dhạrtire biswạse ńamgea?”
Okoe apnarte dhorom menteko hudisokʼkan ar eṭakʼkoko nihạ̃tetʼko onko cetʼako lạgitʼ Jisu do noa kathae lạiatʼkoa:
“Barea hoṛ do koejoṅ lạgitʼ mundiltekin rakapʼ calaoena. Unkin modre mitʼ hoṛ do Phạrusi ar eṭagicʼ do mạsul-uṭhạuicʼe tahẽkana.

Khan uni Phạrusi do teṅgokate acʼ babotre nonkae koekeda, ‘E Isor, gunmanao joharam kạnạń, ente iń do eṭakʼ hoṛko leka luluṭicʼ, bedhoromicʼ, ar laṭghaṭicʼ doń baṅkana, se nui mạsul-uṭhạuicʼ leka hõń baṅkana.
Iń do haptare bar dhaoiń upạsetʼkana ar ińakʼ sanam upjạuakʼ ar rojgarakʼ khon gel hạṭiń reakʼ mitʼ hạṭiń do amiń emamkana.’
Unre uni mạsul-uṭhạuicʼ do thoṛa sạṅgiń ńokʼre teṅgo akane tahẽkana. Uni do serma secʼ beṅgetʼ rakapʼ hõ bae dilleda; ar koṛam ceṭakʼateye menkeda, ‘E Isor, iń doń kại hoṛ kana; ińre mãyãkʼme baṛe.’

“Ińiń metapekana, Isor do mạsul-uṭhạuicʼge bin dusi menteye ataṅkedea ar uni do oṛakʼteye ruạṛ calaoena. Menkhan uni Phạrusi doe dusikedea. Okoe acʼteye usulokʼ uni doe copotʼ ocokʼa ar okoeye copotʼ ocokʼ uni doe usul ocokʼa.”
Ado kạṭicʼ gidrạko Jisu ṭhenko ạguketʼkoa jemone capoko. Ona ńelte celako do onko hoṛko dhomkaoketʼkoa.
Menkhan Jisu do onko gidrạko acʼ ṭhene hohoatʼkoa. Ar inạ tayom do celakoe metatʼkoa, “Gidrạko iń ṭhen hecʼ ocoakope, alope manakoa; ente Isorakʼ raj do nonkankoakʼ kangea.
Sạrigeń metapekana, jãhãege kạṭicʼ gidrạko leka Isorakʼ raj bae ataṅ uni do onare ohogeye bolo daṛelena.”
Mitʼṭen mukhiyạ hoṛ do Jisui kulikedea, “E Guru, am do mitʼṭen bhage hoṛ kanam. Lạiạńme, cetʼ iń cekalere jaejug jioniń ńamkea?”
Jisu do uniye metadea, “Cedakʼ bhage dom mitạń kana? Isor chaḍa ar okoe hõ bhage do bạnukʼkoa.
Hukumko mam baḍaege, ‘alom laṭghaṭa, alom khũna, alom kombṛoea, eṛe goha alom ema, eṅgam ạpum ganaokinme.’ ”
Uni mukhiyạ hoṛ doe menkeda, “Gidrạ khonge noako joto doń manao ạguakada.”

Noa katha ańjomkate Jisu do uniye metadea, “Ńitokʼ hõ mitʼṭen kạmi dom sarecʼ akada. Amakʼ okaṭakʼ menakʼtam onako ạkhrińkate reṅgecʼ orecʼko hạṭińakome, enḍekhan am do sermare dhonem ńama. Ar ona tayom do hecʼkate ińren cela hoyokʼme.”
