Noa katha ańjomkate mukhiyạ hoṛ do ạḍi ãṭe bhabnayena, ente uni do ạḍi kisạ̃ṛe tahẽkana.
Ado uni mukhiyạ hoṛ secʼ beṅgetʼkate Jisui menkeda, “Kisạ̃ṛko lạgitʼ Isorakʼ rajte bolokʼ do muskilgea.
Kisạ̃ṛko Isorakʼ rajte bolokʼ khon, sui bhugạkʼte ũṭe bolo tabokʼge algawa.”
Jisuakʼ noa katha okoekoko ańjomketʼ onko doko menkeda, “Enḍekhan kại khon do okoeye bańcao daṛekokʼa?”
Jisui menkeda, “Manwako ṭhen oka leṭejokʼakʼ baṅ kan Isor ṭhen ona do leṭejokʼakʼ kangea.”
Unre Patrase menkeda, “Ale ma sanamakʼ bạgikate amren celale hoeakan.”
Jisu do onkoe metatʼkoa, “Sạrigeń metapekana, okoe Isorakʼ raj iạte oṛakʼ-duạr, bạhu, boeha-misera, eṅgat-apat se gidrạkoko bạgi oṭo akatʼko,
onko mimitʼko do noa piṛhire hõ ḍherko ńama ar darakan piṛhirehõ jaejug jionko hameṭ joṅa.”
Jisu do acʼren gelbar celako mitʼ secʼe hohoatʼkoteye metatʼkoa, “Ńelpe, Jerusalemte bon calakʼ kana. Ar Manwa Hopon reaṅ nạbiko okaṭakʼko ol oṭoakatʼ ona do sanamakʼge purạukʼa.
Uni do boṅgan hoṛkoakʼ tireko soprotea. Ar hoṛko do uniko siṛogaea arko bemanotea arko thoaea.
Arko cạbukete uni doko gojea, ar pe mãhã hilokʼre uni doe jiwetʼ beredokʼa.”
Menkhan celako do noako reaṅ cetʼge bako bujhạu daṛeada. Ente ona katha reakʼ bhed onko khon danaṅre tahẽyente Jisu okae roṛketʼ ona do bako bujhạuleda.
Jisu Jerikho nagrahae seṭerokʼkan tahẽkanre mitʼṭen kãṛã hoṛ do hor aṛere duṛupʼkateye kokoekan tahẽkana.
Ar gadel hoṛko parom calakʼkan reakʼ saḍeye ańjomketʼ khan cetʼ hoyokʼ kana menteye kuliyana.
Adoko lạiadea, Nasaretren Jisu noa horteye paromokʼ kana.
Unre uni do ãṭ aṛaṅte hohoateye menkeda, “E Jisu Dạudren hopon, mãyãwạńme.”
Ado okoeko hoṛ laha lahateko calakʼkan tahẽkan onko doko dhomkaokedete thir hapekʼko metadea. Menkhan uni do artetʼ ãṭ aṛaṅte hohoateye menkeda, “E Dạudren hopon, mãyãwạńme baṛe.”
Jisu doe teṅgoyena ar uni kãṛã hoṛ acʼ ṭhen ạguye lạgitʼe metatʼkoa. Are hecʼen khane metadea,
“Cetʼem khojkana? Am lạgitʼ do cetʼ iń cekaea?” Uni doe menkeda, “E Probhu, jemoniń ńeńel.”
Jisu do uniye metadea, “Onkage hoyokʼma. Am do amakʼ biswạsgeye bogeketʼmea.”
Ar unrege uni hoṛ do ńeńele ehopʼena ar Isor sarhao sarhaoate Jisui pańjakedea. Ar noa ńelte gadel hoṛ hõ Isorko sarhaokedea.
Jisu do Jerikho nagraha talateye parom calakʼkan tahẽkana.
Ar ńelpe, Sakhae ńutuman mitʼṭen hoṛ onḍeye tahẽkana. Uni do maraṅ mạsul-uṭhạuicʼ ar mitʼṭen kisạ̃ṛ hoṛe tahẽkana.
Ar Jisu okoeṭakʼ kanae mente ńele lạgitʼe kurumuṭukan tahẽkana, menkhan geḍrageye tahẽkante bhiṛ iạte uni do bae ńel ńam daṛeaekan tahẽkana.
Onate uni do Jisu ńele lạgitʼ samaṅ secʼe ńir lahayente mitʼṭen loa darereye decʼena, ente Jisu do ona hortegeye parom calakʼkan tahẽkana.
Ado Jisu ona loa dare ṭhene seṭeren khan cetan secʼe beṅgetʼ rakapʼkeda ar Sakhaeye metadea, “E Sakhae, ma usạra pheḍ hijukʼme, ente teheń do amakʼ oṛakʼre tahen hoyokʼtińạ.”
Unre Sakhae do usạrateye pheḍena ar rạskạ salakʼ Jisui ataṅkedea.
Ar ona ńelte sanamkoge karacʼ kurujokʼko ehopʼena arko menkeda, “Uni do mitʼṭen kại hoṛ ṭhen peṛakʼ lạgitʼe calakʼ kana.”
Ar Sakhae do onḍege teṅgokate Probhui metadea, “E Probhu, ińakʼ dhon-durib reakʼ adha do reṅgecʼ orecʼkoń emako kana ar jãhãegeń ṭhoka akatʼko khan enḍekhan ona reakʼ pon dobṛań ruạṛkatako kana.”
Unre Jisui menkeda, “Teheń do noa gharońjre bańcao hoeakana, ente nui hõ Abraham bõsren hoṛ kanae.”
Ente atʼakan ńamko ar bańcaoko lạgitʼge Manwa Hopon doe hecʼakana.”

Jisu okareye tahẽkan onḍe khon Jerusalem do ḍher sạṅgiń baṅ tahẽkana, ar okoe uniakʼ kathako ańjometʼkan tahekan onko doko hudisetʼkan tahẽkana Isorakʼ raj do ne nahakʼ sodorokʼ kana. Onate Jisu do cetʼako lạgitʼ noae lạiatʼkoa:
“Mitʼṭen maraṅ bõsren hoṛ do raj hudạwanteye ruạṛ hijukʼa mente sạṅgiń disạmteye calaoena.
Ado calakʼ lahare acʼren gel goṭen gutikoe hohoatʼkoa ar mimitʼ hoṛ mitʼ sae Dinarkate ematʼkoteye metatʼkoa, ‘iń ạuriń ruạṛ hijukʼ hạbicʼ noate bạnij bepar hataṛpe.’
“Menkhan acʼakʼ disạmren hoṛko do uniko kurudaekan tahẽkana. Onate onko do uni tayomte hoṛ kolkateko roṛgotʼkada, ‘nui hoṛ ale cetanreye rajokʼ do bale khojkana.’
“Enrehõ uni do raj hoekateye ruạṛ hecʼena ar okoeko ṭakae ematʼko tahẽkan onko gel goṭen guti do hoho ạguko lạgitʼe hukumkeda. Ar okoe tinạkʼko lab akada mente baḍae sanakedea.
Ado pạhilicʼ hecʼkateye menkeda, ‘E Probhu, amakʼ ṭakate iń do arhõ gel doboṛiń lab akada.’
“Raj do uniye metadea, ‘bes akadam. Am do bhage guti kanam. Ar thoṛawakʼkore pạtiạrem tahẽkante gel goṭen nagraha reakʼ dạyikiń emamkana.’
“Dosaricʼ hõ hecʼkateye menkeda, ‘E Probhu, amakʼ ṭakate iń do arhõ mõṛẽ doboṛiń lab akada.’
“Uni gutiye metadea, ‘am hõ mõṛẽ goṭen ato reakʼ bharem ńama.’
Ado ona tayom ar mitʼṭen guti hecʼkateye menkeda, ‘E Probhu, amakʼ ṭaka do gamchareń moṭra doho akatʼ tahẽkana.
Am babotre botor tahẽkantińạ ente am do ạḍi kuṭhin hoṛ kanam; ente oka bam dohoakatʼ onam hataoeda ar oka bam erletʼ onam iretʼa.’

“Unre raje menkeda, ‘Eya bạṛicʼ golam! Amakʼ moca reakʼ kathatege am doń bicạrmea. Am mam baḍaekan tahẽkange, iń doń kuṭhin hoṛ kana; okaṭakʼ bạń dohoakatʼ onań hataoeda ar okaṭakʼ bạń erletʼ onań ireda.
Enḍekhan ińakʼ ṭaka do mahajon ṭhen cedakʼ bam bạisạukada? Enḍekhan iń do hecʼkate ṭaka hõń ńamkea ar soṅgete sud hõń ńamkea.’
“Khange raj do acʼ ṭhen teṅgo akan hoṛkoe metatʼkoa, ‘uni ṭhen khon ona mitʼ sae Dinar hataope ar okoeakʼ mitʼ hajar Dinar menakʼtae uni emaepe.’
“Unre onko hoṛ do rajko metadea, ‘E Probhu, uniakʼ ma coṅ mitʼ hajar Dinar menakʼtaege.’
Raje menkeda, ‘ińiń metapekana, okoeakʼ menakʼtae uni do arhõe em ocokʼa, menkhan okoeakʼ bạnukʼtae uni do oka menakʼtae ona hõe recʼocokʼa.
Ińren bạiriko one okoe ińakʼ raj reakʼ bako khojkan, onko do nonḍe ạgukope ar iń samaṅre gocʼ giḍikakope.’ ”
Ado noako menkate Jisu do onko laha lahate Jerusalemteye calao idiyena.
Ar Jạitun buru ṭhenakʼ Bethaphage ar Bethaniạ nagraha sore hecʼen khan acʼren barea cela noa menkateye kolketʼkinạ,
“Samaṅ senakʼ atote calakʼben. Ar onḍe bolokʼ jokhecʼ mitʼṭen gadha hopon tolakade ben ńamea. Uni cetanre okoe hoṛ hõ tisge bako decʼakana. Aben do raṛakate nonḍe bene ạguyea.
Ar jãhãye kuliben khan, ‘cedakʼ ben raṛayedea?’ Enḍekhan men ben, ‘Probhu do nui reakʼ jạruṛ menakʼtaea.’ ”
Ado okoe celakin kol ocolen unkin do senkate Jisuakʼ katha lekagekin ńamkedea.
Arkin raṛayedekan tahẽkanre kisạ̃ṛ do unkine kuliketʼkinạ, “Gadha hopon do cedakʼben raṛayede kana?”
Unkin dokin menkeda, “Probhu do nui reakʼ jạruṛ menakʼtaea.”
Ona tayom unkin cela do gadha hopon Jisu ṭhenkin ạgukedea ar unire ạkinakʼ oyonakʼ kin palanketʼte onare Jisukin decʼkedea.
Ar uniye calakʼkan tahẽkan jokhecʼ gadel hoṛko do akoakʼ kicricʼko hor horteko aṭetʼ idikeda.

Ado Jerusalem sor reakʼ okaṭakʼ hor do Joitun buru khon pheḍ hecʼakan ona soṛokreye seṭerena. Ar uni sãote uniren ạḍi utạr celako tahẽkana. Onko do uniakʼ hahaṛa kạmiko ńelletʼte rạskạte ãṭ aṛaṅte Isor sarhaoete memenko ehopʼena,
“Bhorangeae Probhu ńutumte daraekanicʼ raj do; sermare suluk ar coṭ utạrkore ṭhonok.”
Unre gadelko modren adom Phạrusiko do Jisuko metadea, “E Guru, amren celako thirokʼ metakom.”
Jisu do onkoe metatʼkoa, “Ińiń metapekana, noko thirko tahen khan enḍekhan dhirikoko hohoya.”
Ado Jerusalem ṭhenko hecʼen khan Jisu do nagraha ńelteye rakʼkeda.
Uniye menkeda, “Hae, suluk ńam lạgitʼ oka jạruṛ ona baṛe teheńem baḍaele khan honaṅ! Menkhan ńitokʼ ona do amakʼ mẽtʼãhã khon danaṅ akana.
Nonkan okte hijukʼkana amren bạiri do am birudreko teṅgona arko gherao ạcurmea ar sanam secʼ khonko cipạmea.
Onko do am ar amre menakʼko sanam hoṛ sapʼkate otreko tawakʼkoa ar amre dhiri cetan dhiri hõ bako dohoea, ente Isore hiriletʼme okte do bam baḍae oromlakʼa.”
Ona tayom Jisu do mundilre bolokate kiriń-ạkhrińkoe laga oḍokketʼkoa.
Uni do beparikoe metatʼkoa, “Sonot sostorre ol menakʼa, ‘ińakʼ oṛakʼ do koejoṅ oṛakʼ hoyokʼa,’ menkhan ape do ḍạkukoakʼ danderpe benao akada.”
Jisu do dinạm hilokʼ mundilre senkate cetʼakoe ehopʼena. Ar Maraṅ naekeko, sostor baḍaeko ar disạm hoṛkoren mukhiyạko do goje lạgitʼ ạtko ńam baṛayetʼ tahẽkana,
menkhan cetʼlekateko cekaea ona reakʼ jãhãn upạige bako ńam totʼ daṛeada, ente hoṛko do mon lagaokate uniakʼ kathako ańjometʼ tahẽkana.
Mitʼ din Jisu do mundilre hoṛkoe cetʼakokan are porcarako kan tahẽkana.
Unre maraṅ naekeko, sostor baḍaeko ar murubiko do hecʼkate Jisuko metadea, “Lạialeme, oka ektiạrite noakom kạmi kana, ar okoe noa ektiạri doe emakatʼmea?”
Jisui roṛ ruạṛatʼkoa, “Iń hõ mitʼṭen kathań kulipea. Mase lạiạńpe,
Oka khon Johan do bạptisma emokʼ reakʼ ektiạriye ńamleda, serma secʼ khon se manwako secʼ khon?”
Unre onko do ako akore galmaraoanteko menana, “Menle khan bon, ‘Isor secʼ khon,’ enḍekhane metabona, ‘tobe cedakʼ uni do bape pạtiạuadea?’
Ar bon menle khan, ‘manwa secʼ khon,’ enḍekhan disạm hoṛko dhiriteko tińbona, ente Johan do nạbi kanae menteko khạṭi akawana.”
Onate onko doko menkeda, “Ale do bale baḍaea oka khon ona ektiạriye ńamleda.”
Jisui metatʼkoa, “Enḍekhan iń hõ bạń lại apea oka ektiạrite noakoń kạmi kana mente.”
Ona tayom Jisu do disom hoṛko cetʼako lạgitʼ noae lạiatʼkoa: “Mitʼ hoṛ do mitʼṭen darkha bagwane benaokeda ar casako ṭhen bạisạu oṭokate ḍher din lạgitʼ eṭakʼ disạmteye calaoena.
Ado okte hoyen khan uni do darkha jo reakʼ bhag hatao lạgitʼ casako ṭhen mitʼṭen golame kolkedea. Menkhan casako do uniko dalkedea ar eken tiko kol ruạṛkadea.
Unre uni do ar mitʼṭen golame kolkedea, menkhan casako do uni hõko dalkedea arko bemanot kedete eken tiko kolgotʼkadea.
Tayomte uni do tesaricʼ golame kolkedea, menkhan casako do uni hõ ạḍi bạṛicʼko dalkedea arko laga oḍokkedea.
“Unre darkha bagwanren kisạ̃ṛe menkeda, ‘cetʼ iń cekaea? Iń do ińren sadher hopongeń kolea. Hoedaṛeakʼa onko do uniko manotea.’
“Menkhan casako do uniko ńelkede khan ako akoreko menana, ‘nuige nahakʼ sompottiren mạlik doe hoyokʼa. Onate delabon gojea, jemon aboge onaren ạidạriko bon hoyokʼ.’
Noa menkate uniko sapʼkedea ar bagwan bahrete idikateko gocʼkedea. “Ńitokʼ darkha bagwanren kisạ̃ṛ do onko casakoe cekakoa?
Uni do hecʼkate onkoe gocʼkoa ar bagwan do eṭakʼko ṭhene bạisạu oṭokakʼa.” Hoṛko do Jisuakʼ noa katha ańjomkateko menkeda, “Nonka do alo baṛe hoyokʼ ma.”

Unre Jisu do onko secʼ beṅgetʼkateye menkeda, “Enḍekhan sonot sostorre noa katha olakan reakʼ mane do cetʼkana, ‘raj mistiriko okaṭakʼ dhiriko bad giḍiletʼ tahẽkan, onage konac reakʼ asol dhiri hoyena.’
Ar jãhãege ona dhiri cetanreye ńurokʼ uni doe gejerokʼa ar okoe cetanre ona dhiri ńurokʼ uni doe holoṅ ḍigir utạrokʼa.”
Unre sostor baḍaeko ar maraṅ naekeko do Jisu sabeko menwana, enteko bujhạu daṛeada, Jisu do ako birudrege noako kathae roṛetʼ kana; menkhan onko do hoṛkoko botoratʼkoa.

Sostor baḍaeko ar maraṅ naekeko do Jisu akoakʼ nojorreko dohokedea ar guptocorko kolketʼkoa. Onko guptocor do Jisu acʼakʼ kathate jhạliye lạgitʼ dhorom hoṛ leka udugokʼko ehopʼena, jemon onko do disạm cakʼlaoicʼ gobolreko soprot daṛeae.
Onateko metadea, “E Guru, alele baḍaea am do ṭhik ṭhikem roṛeda arem cetʼako kana. Ar okoeakʼ mẽtʼãhã hõ bam beṅgetʼakʼ kana ar Isorakʼ hor reaṅ sạri sạriakʼgem cetʼakokana.
Ado Moseakʼ ạn lekate Romren maharaj do cetʼ khajna emae lek gea?”
Jisu do onkoakʼ phundi baḍaeketʼteye metatʼkoa,
“Mitʼṭen Dinar udukʼạńpe. Noare okoeakʼ muṭhạn ar okoeakʼ ńutum ol menakʼa?” Onkoko menkeda, “Romren maharajakʼ.”
Adoe metatʼkoa, “Enḍekhan okaṭakʼ maharajakʼkan ona do maharajge emkataepe ar okaṭakʼ Isorakʼkan ona do Isorge emaepe.”
Hoṛko samaṅre Jisu okae menketʼ onate onko guptocor do bako jhạli daṛeadea. Ar uniakʼ roṛ ruạṛteko hahaṛayente hapegeko tahẽyena.
Sạdukiko modren adomko do Jisu ṭhenko hecʼena. Sạdukiko ṭhen do gocʼkoakʼ jiwetʼ beredokʼ reakʼ do cetʼge bạnukʼa. Onate onko do Jisuko kulikedea,
“E Guru, Mose do noae ol oṭoakatʼ bona, begor gidrạwante jãhãe acʼren bạhui gocʼ bạgi oṭoae khan, enḍekhan bokottetʼ do uniren bạhui baplayema ar dadattetʼ lạgitʼ bõse teṅgokoma.
Ado eae boehako tahẽkana. Ar pạhilicʼ do baplakate begor gidrạwanteye gocʼena.
Tayomte dosaricʼ ar tesaricʼ boeha hõ uni rạnḍi maejiukin baplakedea,
ar onkaleka eae boehage begor gidrạwanteko gocʼena.
Ado mucạtʼre uni maejiu hõe gocʼena.
Enḍekhan gocʼkoko jiwetʼ beredokʼre uni do okoeṭakʼren bạhui hoyokʼa? Ente eae boehage coṅ uni mako baplalede.”
Jisu do onkoe metatʼkoa, “Niạ jugren hoṛko doko bạhujoṅ kana arko jãwãyokʼ kana.
Menkhan gocʼko khon beretʼkate darakan jugre parom calakʼ lạgitʼ lek kanako menteko lekhakʼte onko do bạhu hõ bako bạhu joṅa ar jãwãe hõ bako jãwãyokʼa.
Onko do ar bako gujukʼa, ente onko do serma goḍet lekako hoyokʼa. Onko do Isoren hoponko hoyokʼa ente gocʼko khonko jiwetʼ beretʼ ocoakana.
Jolokʼkan jhạwạ reaṅ okare olakan onḍe Moseye sodorakatʼa, gocʼko do sạrigeko jiwetʼ beredokʼa. Onḍe Mose do Probhuge, ‘Abrahamren Isor, Isạhakren Isor, ar Jakobren Isor’ menteye hohoaekana.
Menkhan Isor do gocʼkoren Isor doe baṅkana, uni do jiwetʼkoren Isorge. Uni lạgitʼge sanam hoṛ do jiwetʼko tahena.”
Unre adom sostor baḍaeko doko menkeda, “E Guru, am do bhagegem menakada.”
Onko do jãhãnakʼge Jisu kuliye ar bako dilleda.
Jisu do onko sostor baḍaekoe metatʼkoa, “Hoṛko do cekateko meneda, Mạsi do Dạud bõsren kanae?
Dạud ma Mạsige Probhu menteye hohoade tahẽkan; enḍekhan cekate Mạsi do Dạudren hopone hoedaṛekokʼa?”
Ado sanam hoṛ uniakʼ kathako ańjometʼkan tahẽkanre Jisu do acʼren celakoe metatʼkoa,

sostor baḍaeko khon sontor akae tahenpe. Onko do jhạl jhạl aṅgrop horokʼkate dãṛã bãṛãe ar hạṭiạ bajarkore johar ocokʼko kusiyakʼa. Onko do sunạgogkore laha duṛupʼakʼ ar bhojre laha jaegako kusiyakʼ kana.
Hoṛko ṭhen ńel ocokʼ lạgitʼ onko do jeleń jeleńko koejoṅa, ar eṭakʼ secʼ do rạnḍi maejiukoakʼ dhonko luṭ joṅkana. Noko hoṛ do ạḍi bạ̃ṛti sạjạyokʼ hukumko ńama.”
Niạ tayom Jisu do kisạ̃ṛ hoṛko mundil reakʼ dan sundukre akoakʼ dan dohokane ńelketʼkoa.
Ar mitʼṭen reṅgecʼ rạnḍi maejiu hõ hecʼkate barea huḍiń poesa dohoe ńelkedea.
Unre Jisu do acʼren celakoe metatʼkoa, “Sạrigeń metapekana, nui reṅgecʼ rạnḍi maejiu do eṭakʼ sanamko khon bạ̃ṛtiye dohoakada,
ente eṭakʼko do akoakʼ sareṛokʼakʼ dhon khonko dohoakada, menkhan nui maejiu doe reṅgecʼ gerehõ bańcao tahen lạgitʼ oka tahẽkantae ona jotogeye emkeda”
Celako modren adomko do mundil reaṅko galmaraokan tahẽkana. Onko doko menetʼ tahẽkana, mońj mońj dhiri ar dan reakʼ jiniskote dolan do cetʼleka sajao akana. Unre Jisui metatʼkoa,
“Ape ma noakope ńeletʼkan, menkhan nonkan din hijukʼa, unre dhiri cetan dhiri do baṅ tahena; jotoge rạputʼ giḍi ocokʼa.”
Celako do Jisuko kulikedea, “E Guru, tis noako do hoyokʼa ar okaṭakʼ cinhạ ńeltele bujhạu daṛeakʼa, noako hoyokʼ reakʼ okte do seṭer akana mente?”
Jisui roṛ ruạṛatʼkoa, “Ńelpe, okoe hõ jemon aloko bulạupe, ente ḍher hoṛge iń ńutumte hecʼkateko metapea, ‘iń kangeạń’ ar ‘okte do sorakana.’ Onko do alope pańjakoa.
Ape do lạṛhại ar gulmalkope ańjomlere alope botorokʼa, ente pạhilre noako do hoyokʼgea; menkhan unrehõ mucạtʼ do baṅ hoe hodokʼa.”
Ona tayom Jisui metatʼkoa, “Mitʼ jạt do eṭakʼ jạt birudre, ar mitʼ rajosṭi do eṭakʼ rajosṭi birudreko lạṛhạiya.
Ạḍi ãṭ dhạrti laṛao hoyokʼa ar jaega jaegakore akal ar mahamạriko hoyokʼa. Ona chaḍa sermare nonkan ghoṭnako hoyokʼa ar cinhạko ńelokʼa, oka do ạḍi botorge.
“Noako hoyokʼ lahare hoṛko do apeko sapʼpea arko santaopea. Ar bicạrpe lạgitʼ sunạgogreko idipea ar hajotreko bhoraopea. Iń iạte rapajko ar disạm cakʼlaoko samaṅreko idipea,
onate iń reaṅ goha emokʼ reakʼ ạt hoyokʼtapea.
Ńitge monre niṭ joṅpe, ar roṛ dogokʼ lạgitʼ do alope sapṛaokʼa,
ente iń do nonkan katha ar nonkan akeliń emapea, onape roṛ ruạṛakore aperen bạiriko do cetʼ hõ bako roṛ daṛeakʼa, ar ona hõ bako baṅ daṛeakʼa.
Aperen gogo-baba, boeha, gate ar peṛa pạrbhạko do apeko sapʼocopea. Ar ape modre adomko doko gocʼ ocokoa.
Iń iạte joto hoṛko hirkhạwapea,
menkhan apeakʼ do mitʼṭen upʼ hõ baṅ loksanokʼ tapea.
Ape do ṭarhao akaepe tahente sạri jionpe labjoṅa.
“Tinre Jerusalem do palṭonko hotete esetʼ ạcurakatʼpe ńela unre bujhạupe je, Jerusalem dhaṅ dhaserokʼ din do sorakana.
Unre okoe Jihudạreko tahen onko do buruteko ńirjoṅma. Ar okoe nagrahareko tahen onko do nagraha bahreteko oḍok calakʼma. Ar okoe atoreko tahen, onko do nagrahate aloko hijukʼma,
ente noako din do sạjạyokʼ din hoyokʼa, ar onate sonot sostorre oka ol menakʼ ona do purạukʼa.
Unre bhạrti hoṛmo akanko ar okoe gidrạko nunuakokan onkore do hae hae! Unre dhạrtire do maraṅ dorloe hoyokʼa ar Jihudiko cetanre Isorakʼ sạjại pheḍ hijukʼa.
Onko do tarwaṛeteko gocʼ ocokʼa ar sanam jạtko talare bondi akan leka chir chạturko tahena. Ar por jạtkoakʼ okte ạuri purạukʼ hạbicʼ Jerusalem do onkoakʼ jaṅgate lebetʼ gańjaokʼa.
“Unre siń cando, ńindạ cando ar ipilkore ạḍi lekan cinhạko ńelokʼa. Dhạrtiren sanam jạtko do kosṭoko ńama ar jalapuri reakʼ hudhud saḍe ar ḍheoko iạte onko do jiwi oṭaṅokʼ takoa.
Ar dhạrtire darakanakʼko reakʼ botorte hoṛko doko keklesedokʼa, ente siń cando, ńindạ cando ar ipilko do ar bako ṭarhao tahena.
Unre Manwa Hopon do ạḍi daṛe ar ṭhonokante rimilre hijukʼkanko ńelea.
Noa ghoṭnako hoyokʼre ape do sojhete teṅgokʼpe ar bohokʼ rakabtape, ente apeakʼ chaḍaokʼ do sorakana.”
Ona tayom Jisu do acʼren celako cetʼako lạgitʼ noa phene lạiatʼkoa, “Loa dare ar eṭakʼ dareko beṅgetʼakʼpe.
Sakam sagenlen khanpe bujhạu daṛeakʼ kana, hoe lolo din do sorakana.
Onkage noako hoyokʼpe ńellere bujhạupe, Isorakʼ raj do sorakana.
Sạrigeń metapekana, noako hoelenre hõ niạ jugren thoṛa hoṛ do jiwetʼko tahena.
Ot ar serma do cabakʼa, menkhan ińakʼ kathako do jaejug hạbicʼ tahena.
“Sontor akae tahenpe, jemon apeakʼ mon do rij roṅ, ńũ bulokʼ ar gharońj reakʼ dạndite ten alo tahentape.
Ar baṅkhan cetʼleka pạsi ackage bond godokʼ onkage ona din hõ ackage apere hecʼpaṛaokʼa, ar onka leka dhạrtiren sanam hoṛko cetanre hõ hecʼ paṛaokʼa.
Onate jagwar tahenpe ar koejoṅpe jemon jãhãnakʼge hecʼape onakope parom idite Manwa Hopon samaṅrepe teṅgo daṛeakʼ.”
Onako dinre Jisu do dinạmge mundilreye cetʼakokan tahẽkana, menkhan ńindạ do bahrete senkate Joitun burureye tahenkan tahẽkana.
Ar sanam hoṛ uniakʼ katha ańjomtae lạgitʼ setakʼ khonge mundilteko hijukʼkan tahẽkana.
Ona oktere Jihudikoakʼ bin khạmianakʼ piṭhạ porob hecʼ sorakan tahẽkana. Noage sen-parom porob hõko metakʼkan tahẽkana.
Maraṅ naekeko ar sostor baḍaeko do hape hapete Jisu goje reakʼ ạtko ńam baṛayetʼ tahẽkana, ente onko do disạm hoṛko botorako kan tahẽkana.
Unre okoe Jihudạ Iskạriotko metaekan tahẽkan unire do Soetane boloyena. Nui do Jisuren gelbar celako modren mitʼ hoṛe tahẽkana.
Uni do senkate maraṅ naekeko ar mundilren kạmiyạko sãoteye galmaraokeda cetʼlekate onkoakʼ tire Jisui soprotea mente.
Onate onko do ạḍiko rạskạyena ar ṭaka emae reakʼko gokʼadea.
Unre Jihudạ doe rạjiyena ar ạt ńam baṛaye ehopʼena jemon hoṛ bako tahenre Jisui soprot daṛeae.
Unkin do Jisukin kulikedea, “Okareliń tearama mentem menjoṅ kana?”
Unre uni do cetan koṭhare sajao akatʼ mitʼṭen kandhae udukʼ abena; ar onḍege jotowakʼ ben teara.”
Ado Jisui metatʼkin lekage, unkin do senkate sanamakʼ onkage kin ńamkeda ar sen-parom porob reakʼ bhojkin sapṛaokeda.
Ona tayom okte hoyen khan Jisu do apostolko tulucʼ jojome duṛupʼena.
Uni doe metatʼkoa, “Duk ạuriń jomre, sen-parom porob reakʼ noa bhoj ape tulucʼ jojom ạḍi sana tahẽkantińạ.
Ińiń metapekana, Isorakʼ rajre noa reakʼ ạuri purạukʼ hạbicʼ, iń do noa ohogeń jomlea.”
Inạ tayom Jisu do bạṭi ataṅkate Isor gunmanao joharadeteye menkeda, “Ape do noa reakʼ hạṭińjoṅpe,
enteń metapekana, ńit khon Isorakʼ raj ạuri hijukʼ hạbicʼ iń do darkha rasa bạń ńũiya.”
Ona tayom uni do piṭhạ ataṅkate Isore gunmanao joharadea. Ar ona kecakʼkate celako ematʼkoteye metatʼkoa, “Noa do ińakʼ hoṛmo kana oka do apeko lạgitʼ emogokʼkan. Nonkaepe iń disạyiń lạgitʼ.”
Ado jom tayom onkage bạṭi hõ ataṅkateye metatʼkoa, “Ińakʼ mãyãm hotete Isorakʼ oka nawa bondobos bahalokʼkan, ona bondobos reakʼ cinhạ do noa bạṭi kana. Ińakʼ noa mãyãm do apeko lạgitʼ emogokʼa.
Ńelpe, okoe ińe soprotiń uniakʼ ti hõ ińakʼ ti sãote noa mejre menakʼa.
Isor okae niṭ dohoakatʼ onkage Manwa Hopon do gujukʼ hoyokʼtaea; menkhan hae uni hoṛ lạgitʼ do, one okoe do uniye soprot ocoye!”
Khange celako do ako akore kupulikʼko ehopʼena, nonkanakʼ do okoeṭakʼe kạmikea mente.
Ado okoeṭakʼe maraṅa ona reaṅ ako talareko reṭepeṭekʼ kan tahẽkana.
Jisui metatʼkoa, “Boṅgan hoṛ jạtko modre rapajkoge mạlikiko calaoeda ar onkoren ektiạriankoge bhạlạikoko metako kana,
menkhan apeko talare nonka hoyokʼ do lek baṅkana. Ape modre joto khon maraṅicʼ do huḍińicʼ lekae hoyokʼma, ar ạyuricʼ do sapʼdapʼicʼ leka.
Okoeṭakʼe maraṅa, jojom duṛupʼ akanicʼ se sapʼ sosoricʼ guti? Uni jojom duṛupʼ akanicʼge cetʼ baṅa? Menkhan iń do apeko talare sapʼ sosoricʼ lekań hoeakana.
Ińakʼ sanam harket saset oktere ape do bape bạgi giḍi akawạdińạ.
Ińren Baba cetʼleka ektiạriye emakawạdiń onkage iń hõ apeko ektiạriń dan akawatʼpea.
Onate ińakʼ rajre ape do iń tulucʼpe jom ńũiya ar siṅghạsonre duṛupʼkate Israelren gel bar khũṭrenkoakʼpe bicạrtakoa.
E Simon, E Simon, ńelpe, Soetan do guhum leka calape lạgitʼe khoj akada.
Menkhan iń do am lạgitʼ iń koeyeda, jemon amakʼ biswạs alo ḍigạukʼtam. Am do iń ṭhenem ruạṛ hijukʼre amren noko boehakom keṭecʼkoa.”
Patras do Jisui metadea, “E Probhu, am tulucʼ hajot ocokʼ ar gujukʼ hõń sapṛaogea.”
Jisui roṛ ruạṛadea, “E Patras, ińiń metam kana, teheń sim sạnḍi ạuriye ragre am do pe dhaoem baṅeńa.”
Ona tayom Jisu do acʼren celakoe metatʼkoa, “Ṭaka reakʼ thạilạkʼ, khuti ar panahi chaḍań koletʼpere cetʼ jãhãnakʼtepe ṭonṭa emanlena?” Celakoko menkeda, “Cetʼte hõ baṅa.”

Jisui metatʼkoa, “Menkhan ńitiń metapekana, jãhãege ṭaka reakʼ thạilạkʼ se khuti menakʼtae khan uni doe iditora joṅma. Ar okoeakʼ tarwaṛe bạnukʼtae uni do acʼakʼ oyonakʼ ạkhrińkate mitʼṭen tarwaṛeye kirińjoṅ ma.
Sonot sostorre olakana, ‘uni do kại hoṛko sãoteye lekhayena.’ Ińiń metapekana, noa katha do ińrege hoe purạukʼa, ente iń reaṅ okako olakan ona do purạu lạgidokʼ kana.”
Unre celakoko menkeda, “E Probhu, ńelme, nonḍe do barea tarwaṛe menakʼa.” Jisui roṛ ruạṛatʼkoa, “Inạge ḍhera.”
Ado Jisu ona jaegae bạgi oṭoatʼte acʼakʼ cạli leka Jạitun buruteye rakapʼena. Ar acʼren celako hõ uniko pańjakedea.
Ar ṭhik jaegareye seṭeren khan Jisu do onkoe metatʼkoa, “Koejoṅpe jemon biḍạure alope paṛaokʼ.”
Ona tayom Jisu do celako ṭhen khon thoṛa sạṅgiń ńokʼ senkate ikhṛumente koejoṅe ehopʼena,
“E Baba, amem mone joṅkan khan, noa duk reakʼ bạṭi iń khon pharakme baṛe. Enhõ ińakʼ monejoṅ leka do baṅ, menkhan amakʼ sana lekage hoyokʼma.”
Unre serma khon mitʼṭen goḍet do hecʼkate Jisui daṛe ocokedea.
Ar Jisu do ala jhalareye paṛaoente arhõ jidkateye koekeda. Uniakʼ hoṛmo reakʼ balbal dakʼ do mãyãm leka otre ṭhopʼ ṭhopʼ ńurokʼ ehopʼena.
Jisu kathae roroṛkan tahẽkanrege onḍe ạḍi utạr hoṛko hecʼena. Ar Jihudạko metae gelbar celako modren mitʼ hoṛ do onko laha lahateye hijukʼkan tahẽkana. Uni do Jisu ṭhene hecʼ sorena cokʼae lạgitʼ.
Unre Jisu do uniye metadea, “E Jihudạ, cokʼate Manwa Hoponem soprotede kana?”
Ado Jisu beṛhaete okoeko tahẽkan onko do cetʼ hoe lạgidokʼ kana menteko bujhạukeda. Onate onko do Jisuko metadea, “E Probhu, ale do cetʼ tarwaṛele calaoa?”
Ar celako modren mitʼ hoṛ do tarwaṛete maraṅ naekeren gutiwakʼ jojom luture hese ńurketʼtaea.
Jisui menkeda, “Inạkʼ kakʼme, ar baṅa.” Ar noa menkate uni hoṛakʼ luture joṭetʼketʼteye bogekedea.
Ado acʼ upạrte hecʼakan maraṅ naekeko, mundilren kạmiyạko ar murubikoe metatʼkoa, “Iń do cetʼ ḍạku kạnạń, onate tarwaṛe ar ṭheṅgawantepe hecʼ akana?
Iń do mundilre dinke din ape samaṅreń tahẽkana, menkhan unre ma bacope sapʼlediń. Menkhan ńitokʼ do apeakʼ okte kangea; ar ńut reakʼ ektiạri hõ ńelokʼ kana.”
Unre onko do Jisu sapʼkate maraṅ naekeakʼ oṛakʼteko idikedea. Ar Patras do pharak pharakre tahẽkate uniye pańja idikedea.
Ar bakher raca talare okoe do seṅgel jolkateko jorogokʼkan tahẽkan onko ṭhen hecʼkateye duṛupʼ panteyena.
Unre mitʼṭen kạ̃ṛmĩ do seṅgel reakʼ marsalte Patrase ńel ńamkede khan beṅgetʼ uricʼadeteye menkeda, “Nũi hoṛ hõ uni sãoteye tahẽkana.”
Menkhan Patras do baṅketʼteye menkeda, “Uni do bạń oromakadea.”
Thoṛa ghạṛicʼ tayom ar mitʼṭen hoṛ hõ uni ńelteye menkeda, “Am hõ onko modren mitʼ hoṛ kanam.” Patrase menkeda, “Baṅ, iń doń baṅkana.”
Ado mitʼ ghonṭa tayom ar mitʼ hoṛ jorkateye menkeda, “Nũi hoṛ do khạṭige uni sãoteye tahẽkana, ente nũi hõe Gạlilren kana”
Patrase menkeda, “Am okam roṛetʼkan ona do bạń bujhạueda.” Patrasakʼ katha ạuri mucạdokʼrege sim sạnḍi doe rakʼgotʼkeda.
Unre Probhu doe ạcurente Patrase beṅgetʼadea. Onate Patras do one Probhui metade tahẽkan kathae disạgotʼkeda, “Teheń sim sạnḍi ạuriye ragre pe dhaoem baṅeńa.”
Unre Patras do bahrete senkate ạḍiye rakʼkeda.
Ado okoeko Jisuko horhoyedekan tahẽkan onko do uniko siṛogadea arko dalkedea.
Ar mẽtʼko betʼketʼtaete uniko metadea, “Mase lạime, okoeye dalketʼmea?
Nonkate onko do arhõ ạḍi utạr kathakote uniko bemanotkedea.
Ado setakʼen khan Jihudikoren murubiko, maraṅ naekeko ar sostor baḍaekoko jarwa mitʼena ar maraṅ bạisi samaṅre Jisu ạgukedeteko metadea,
Menkhan Manwa Hopon do ńit khon sanam daṛeanicʼ Isorakʼ jojomsa aṛere duṛupʼ akane tahena.”
Unre sanamkoko kulikedea, “Enḍekhan am do cetʼ Isorren Hopon kanam?” Uniye metatʼkoa, “Ape do ṭhikgepe meneda, iń doń uni kangea.”
Unre mukhiyạkoko menkeda, “Goha reakʼ do ar cetʼ jạruṛa bona? Abo sanamkoge coṅ uniakʼ moca khon bon ańjomketʼ.”
Unre ona bạisiren sanamko do beretʼente Romren disạm cakʼlaoicʼ Pilạt ṭhen Jisuko idikedea.

Onko do noa menkate Jisu birudre lạlisaeko ehopʼena, “Alele ńel akadea, nui hoṛ do aleren hoṛko raj birudreye bhiṅgṛạuetʼkoa. Uni do maharaj khajna emaye baronetʼkoa ar acʼge Mạsi ar mitʼṭen raje ńumogokʼ kana.”
Pilạt do Jisui kulikedea, “Am do cetʼ Jihudikoren raj kanam?” Jisui menkeda, “Am do ṭhikgem meneda.”
Unre Pilạt do maraṅ naekeko ar sanam hoṛkoe metatʼkoa, “Iń do nui hoṛakʼ jãhãn dosge bạń ńametʼtaea.”
Menkhan onko do artetʼ ãṭ aṛaṅte memenko ehopʼena, “Jihudi Prodes reakʼ sanam jaegareye cetʼakokante hoṛkoe ạulạuetʼkoa. Uni do Gạlil khon ehopʼkate ńitokʼ do nonḍeye hecʼakana.”
Noa katha ańjomkate Pilạt doe kuliyana, Jisu do Gạlil Prodesren hoṛ kanae se baṅ.
Ado Jisu Herodakʼ Prodesren kanae menteye baḍaeketʼ khan Pilạt do Herod ṭhene kolkadea. Un jokhecʼ Herod hõ Jerusalemregeye tahẽkana.

Herod do Jisui ńelkedekhan ạḍiye rạskạyena. Uni do Jisu reaṅ ạḍi utạr kathae ańjomakatʼ tahẽkana, ar ḍher din khon uni ńele lạgitʼe monejoṅkan tahẽkana. Ar Herod doe asokʼkan tahẽkana, Jisu do jãhãn hahaṛa kạmiye udukʼaea.
Uni do Jisu ḍhere kulikedea, menkhan Jisu do cetʼge bae roṛ ruạṛadea.
Unre maraṅ naekeko ar sostor baḍaeko do onḍe teṅgokate ãṭ aṛaṅte hohoate Jisu dusiyeko ehopʼena.
Unre Herod do Jisui bemanotkedea are siṛogadea, ar uniren sipạhiko hõko onkawadea. Ona tayom uni do ṭhosok kicricʼe horokʼadete Pilạt ṭhene kol ruạṛkadea.
Noa lahare Herod ar Pilạt talare bạiri tahẽkana, menkhan enhilokʼ khon unkin do arhõkin gateyena.
Unre Pilạt do maraṅ naekeko, mukhiyạko ar sanam hoṛko hoho jarwakateye metatʼkoa,

“Ape do noa dusiyete iń ṭhenpe ạguakadea baṅma uni do raj birudre hoṛkoe idiyetʼkoa. Menkhan iń do ape samaṅreń kuliakadea. Ar uni birudre okako gohape emetʼkan ona reakʼ mitʼṭente hõ dusireye paṛaokʼa mente jãhãn porman bạń ńameda.
Herod hõ uniakʼ jãhãn dos bae ńamletʼtaea, ente uni do abo ṭhene kol ruạṛkedea. Arpe ńeletʼ kangea, gocʼ ocokʼ leka jãhãn bạṛicʼ kạmi hõ uni do bae kạmi akada.
Onate sạjại kateń aṛakʼkaea.”
Uni do noa iạteye menkeda ente sen-parom porobre jaoge mitʼṭen kạidiye aṛakʼedekan tahẽkana.
Menkhan hoṛko do mitʼ jomkaote hohoateko menkeda, “Uni do pharakeme, ar Barabba aṛakʼaleme.”
Nui Barabba do nagraha bhitrire hul ar khũn iạte hajotreye bhorao ocoakan tahẽkana.
Pilạt do Jisu aṛageye menjoṅkan tahẽkante hoṛko arhõ inạ kathageye metatʼkoa.
Menkhan onko do noa menkate hohoko dhurạuena, “Kruskae me, kruskaeme.”
Pilạt do tesar dhao arhõ hoṛkoe metatʼkoa, “Cedakʼ, nui do cetʼe dos akada? Iń do uniakʼ jãhãn dosge bạń ńeletʼtaea, one onate gujukʼ sạjại iń emdaṛeke. Onate sạjại emkateń aṛakʼgotʼkaea.”
Menkhan hoṛko do Jisu kruskae lạgitʼ hohotegeko tahẽyena, ar mucạtʼre onkoakʼ hohoge sorosentakoa. Ar Pilạt do hoṛkoakʼ kathage manao lạgitʼe goṭakeda.
Ado khũn ar hul iạte okoe do hajotreye bhorao ocoakan tahẽkan hoṛko do unigeko khojkedea; ar Pilạt hõ unigeye aṛakʼatʼkoa,
ar Jisu do hoṛkoakʼ sana leka goje lạgitʼ onkoakʼ tireye jimạkadea.

Ado Jisuko idiyede kan tahẽkanre Kureniren Simon ńutuman mitʼ hoṛ do ato secʼ khone oḍok hijukʼkan tahẽkana. Unre palṭonko do uniko sapʼpaṭetʼkedete tarenre krusko ladeadea jemon Jisu tayomte onaye gokʼ idiy.
Ar ạḍi utạr hoṛ do Jisuko pańja idiyede tahẽkana. Onko modre maejiuko hõko tahẽkana. Onko do koṛam ceṭakʼ ceṭakʼteko rakʼ homoretʼ tahẽkana.
Jisu do onko secʼ ạcurenteye metatʼkoa, “E Jerusalemren hoponerako, iń lạgitʼ do alope raga. Ape do apnar lạgitʼ ar aperen gidrạko lạgitʼ rakʼjoṅpe,
ente nonkan din darae kana unre hoṛkoko mena, ‘bhạgangeako bạńjhiko ar baṅ janam akatʼko kukhiko ar baṅ nunuakawatʼko toako do.’
Unre hoṛko do maraṅ burukoko metakʼa, ‘De ale cetanre dhasaokʼpe,’ ar huḍiń buruko doko metakʼa, ‘De danaṅlepe.’
Dare hạriạṛ tahenregeko nonkayetʼ khan, enḍekhan dare rohoṛlenre cetʼ baṅ bako cekae!”
Palṭonko do barea dusi hoṛ hõ gocʼkin lạgitʼ Jisu soṅgeteko idiketʼkinạ.
Ado khạpriko metakʼ jaegako seṭeren khan Jisu ar unkin banar dusi hoṛ hõko krus ketʼkinạ, mitʼ hoṛ do Jisuakʼ jojomti secʼre ar eṭagicʼ do uniakʼ leṅgati secʼre.
Unre Jisui menkeda, “E baba, ikạkakome, ente bako baḍaea cetʼko cekayeda.” Onko do gulibãṭkate Jisuakʼ kicricʼko hạṭińana.
Ar hoṛko do teṅgokateko ńeńelkan tahẽkana. Sostor baḍaeko do Jisu siṛogadeteko menkeda, “Uni ma eṭakʼkoe bańcaoetʼko tahẽkan. Uni do Mạsi, Isorren bachaoicʼ kanae menkhan; acʼ baṛeye bańcaokʼma!”
Ar Palṭonko hõ uni siṛogaeko ehopʼena. Onko do Jisu sirkạko ńũ ocoye lạgitʼ idiyadeteko metadea,
“Jihudikoren raj kan khanem, enḍekhan amte bańcaokʼme.”
Ar uniakʼ bohokʼ coṭre mitʼṭecʼ olakʼ tahẽkana, “Nui do Jihudikoren raj.”
Ar okoekin dusi hoṛ krusrekin aka ocoakan tahẽkan unkin modre mitʼ hoṛ do Jisu siṛogadeteye menkeda, “Amge baṅ Mạsi do? Enḍekhan am ar ạliń bańcao bonme.”
Unre eṭagicʼ doe menkeda, “Am do cetʼ Isor bam botorae kana? Am hõ coṅ onkan sạjạigem ńametʼkan.
Alaṅ ma lek reakʼ ar kạmi akatʼ lekage sạjại laṅ ńametʼ, menkhan nui do cetʼ hõ bae dos akada.”
Tayomte uni doe menkeda, “E Jisu, amakʼ rajosṭirem ruạṛ hecʼlenre iń hõ disạime baṛe.”
Jisu do uni roṛ ruạṛadeteye metadea, “Sạrigeń metam kana, am do teheńge Paradesrem iń tulujokʼa.”
Jisu do ãṭ aṛaṅte hohoateye menkeda, “E Baba amakʼ tire ińakʼ jiwiń jimạyetʼkana.” Ar noae roṛketʼ khan jiwi oḍokentaea.
Noa ńelte Romren subedar do Isor sarhaokedeteye menkeda, “Sạrige nui do bin dusạngeye tahẽkana.”
Ar okoeko onḍeko jarwa akan tahẽkan onko do noa ghoṭna ńelte koṛam ceṭakʼ ceṭakʼte onḍe khonko ruạṛ calaoena.
Ar tinạkʼ do Jisuko oromakade tahẽkan ar Gạlil khon uni soṅgeteko hecʼlen sanamkoge sạṅgińre teṅgokate jotowakʼko ńeletʼkan tahẽkana.
Joseph ńutuman mitʼṭen bhage ar dhorom hoṛ do maraṅ bạisiren sosolhaicʼe tahẽkana. Uni do Arimạthiạko metakʼ Jihudikoakʼ mitʼṭen atoren hoṛe tahẽkana.
Uni do Jisu babotre bạisiren hoṛko tulucʼ bae mitʼ mot daṛeada. Ente uni hõ Isorakʼ raj lạgitʼe koyokʼ hor akatʼ tahẽkana.
Uni do Pilạt ṭhen senkate Jisuakʼ mạ̃ṛĩye koekeda.
Ar krus khon mạ̃ṛĩ pheḍkate kicricʼteye bedhaokeda ar dhirire kholao akatʼ mitʼṭen topareye dohokada. Ona topare do okoege tishõ bako doho akatʼko tahẽkana.
Ona din do tahẽkana jirạukʼ mãhã reakʼ sapṛaokʼ din. Ar jirạukʼ mãhã do ehopʼ lạgidokʼkan tahẽkana.
Ar Gạlil khon okoeko maejiu Jisu sãoteko hecʼlen tahẽkan onko do Joseph tayom tayomte senkate topa ar Jisuakʼ mạ̃ṛĩ cetʼleka doho akan onako ńelkeda.
Ona tayom ruạṛ senkate uniakʼ hoṛmore lạgitʼ mahkaokʼ sunum ar mosolako tearkeda. Ar ona tayom do Moseakʼ hukum leka jirạukʼ mãhã hilokʼ doko jirạuena.
Ado hapta reakʼ pạhil hilokʼ ạḍi setakʼre onko maejiu do ona mahkaokʼ mosolawante topa ṭhenko calaoena.
Onko do topa reakʼ duạr khon dhiri ocokʼ akatʼko ńelkeda.
Menkhan topa bhitriteko boloyen khan Probhu Jisuakʼ hoṛmo do bako ńel ńamleda.
Ar hahaṛakʼ tulucʼ ona reaṅko hudisetʼkan tahẽkanre bijli leka pĩṛĩtʼ pĩṛĩtʼ kicricʼ horokʼ akatʼ bar hoṛ onko samaṅre hecʼkatekin teṅgoyena.
Onate maejiuko do botorteko ombakʼena. Unkin dokin metatʼkoa, “Jiwetʼicʼ do gocʼko talare cedakʼpe ńam baṛayede kana?
Nonḍe do bạnuea; uni doe jiwetʼ beretʼ akana. Gạlilreye tahẽkanre okae metatʼpe tahẽkan ona baṛe disạipe.
Uniye menletʼa, Manwa Hopon do kại hoṛkoakʼ tireko soprotea. Ar ona tayom doko kruskaea ar tesar hilokʼ uni doe jiwetʼ beredokʼa.”
Unre onko do ona katha disạ hecʼatʼkoa.
Ar topa khon ruạṛ senkate gelmitʼ celako ar eṭakʼ sanamko noa kathako baḍae ocoketʼkoa.
Onko maejiuko modre Magdalini Mạriạm, Johana ar Jakob eṅgat Mạriạm hõkin tahẽkana. Ar onko sãoteko tahẽkan eṭakʼ maejiuko hõ noa sanamakʼ katha do apostolko ṭhenko lạikeda.
Menkhan onako katha do onko ṭhen ạuṛiakʼ lekage bujhạuena. Onate onko maejiukoakʼ kathate bako pạtiạulena.
Menkhan Patras doe beretʼente topa ṭhene ńir calaoena are oyoṅketʼ khan eken kicricʼkogeye ńel ńamkeda. Ar oka hoeakan onate hahaṛakʼ tulucʼe ruạṛ hecʼena.
Enhilokʼge barea cela do Emaoko metakʼ mitʼṭen atotekin calakʼ kan tahẽkana. Ona ato do Jerusalem khon eae mail sạṅgińre tahẽkana.
Ar oka hoeakan ona reakʼkin galmarao kan tahẽkana.
Ona jokhecʼ Jisu do unkin ṭhene hecʼ sorente unkin tulucʼe sen idiyena.
Ar unkinakʼ mẽtʼ do akoṭ akan tahẽkante Jisu bạkin orom daṛeadea.
Unre Jisui metatʼkinạ, “Cetʼ ben galmarao idiyetʼ kana?” Unkin cela do mulingekin teṅgo tahẽyena.
Unre unkin modre Kleopa ńutuman mitʼ hoṛ do Jisui kulikedea, “Am eskarge cetʼ Jerusalemre upriạ menama ar niạko dinre onḍe hoeakanakʼko bam baḍaea?”
Jisu do unkine metatʼkinạ, “Cetʼ hoeakana?” Ado Nasaretren Jisu babotre hoe akanakʼkin lạiadea. Uni do nạbiye tahẽkana. Kạmire ar kathate Isor ar sanam hoṛko ṭhen daṛeanicʼe tahẽkana.
Aleren maraṅ naekeko ar sostor baḍaeko do Romren hoṛkoakʼ tireko soprotledea jemon bicạrete gujukʼ sạjạiko emae. Ar Jihudi mukhiyạko do uniko kruskedea.
Menkhan alele asokʼkan tahẽkana uni do Israel jạtkoe chaḍaokoa. Ar eken ona do baṅ, teheń noako ghoṭna do pe din hoyokʼkana.
Arhõ ale modren adom maejiuko do aleko hahaṛa ocoketʼlea. Onko do ạḍi setakʼre Jisuakʼ topa ṭhenko senlena,
menkhan uniakʼ hoṛmo onḍe do bako ńamletʼtaea. Ar ruạṛ hecʼkateko lạikeda, onko do serma goḍetko ńelketʼkinạ ar unkin serma goḍet dokin lạiatʼkoa Jisu doe jiwetʼgea.
Unre ale soṅgete tahẽkanko modre adomko do topa ṭhen senkate maejiuko lạiletʼ tahẽkan lekageko ńelkeda, menkhan Jisu do bako ńel ńamledea.”
Khange Jisu do unkine metatʼkinạ, “Aben do cetʼge baben bujhạu akada. Abenakʼ mon do goṛdho akana, onate nạbikoko roṛakatʼ katha hõ baben pạtiạuakʼ kana.
Mạsi do cetʼ noako duk jomkate ṭhonok ńam reakʼ katha baṅ tahẽkantaea?”
Inạ tayom uni do Moseakʼ ar joto nạbikoakʼ olakʼ khon ehopʼkate sanam sonot sostorre acʼ reaṅ okako olakan ona jotoe bujhạuatʼkinạ.
Ado okaṭakʼ atotekin calakʼkan tahẽkan, ona ato sorko hecʼen khan Jisu do arhõ laha secʼe sen idikʼkan tahẽkana.
Unre unkin do nehõradete kin metadea, “Ber hõe danaṅena, ar ạyubokʼkana. Am do ạliń tulucʼ tahenme.” Onate uni do unkin tulucʼ tahen lạgitʼ oṛakʼteye boloyena.
Ado unkin tulucʼ jojome duṛupʼenre uni do piṭhạ ataṅkate Isore gunmanao joharadea are kecakʼketʼteye ematʼkinạ.
Unre unkinakʼ mẽtʼ do jhicʼgotʼena ar Jisukin oromkedea, menkhan ona são sãote uni do ar bae ńelena.
Ado ạkin talarekin menjoṅana, “Horre uni do alaṅ sãoteye galmaraokan tahẽkanre ar sonot sostor reakʼe bujhạu alaṅkan tahekanre mon do cetʼ baṅ lolokʼkan tahẽkana?”
Ar beretʼkate unkin do Jerusalamte kin calaoena ar onko gelmitʼ celako sãote eṭakʼko hõ mitʼ jaegarekin ńel ńamketʼkoa.
Onko doko galmaraokan tahẽkana, Probhu do sạrigeye jiwetʼ beretʼ akana ar Simon ṭhene ńel ocoakana.
Ar unkin cela do horre hoelenakʼ kin baḍae ocoketʼkoa. Unkin do arhõkin lạikeda, piṭhại kecakʼetʼ tahẽkanre cetʼlekate kin oromkedea.
Ado noako reaṅko galmaraokan tahẽkanre Jisu do hecʼkate onko talare teṅgoyente sanamkoe metatʼkoa, “Suluk ape ma.”
Onko do bhutko ńele kana menteko hudisketʼte ạḍiko botorena.
Jisu do onkoe metatʼkoa, “Cedakʼpe toras akana ar monre cedakʼpe digdhạkʼkana?
Ińakʼ ti ar jaṅga ńelpe. Tunum legayińpe, ińkangeạń, ente bhutakʼ do iń leka jel ar jaṅ bạnukʼtakoa.”
Noa katha menkate Jisu do acʼakʼ ti ar jaṅgae udukʼatʼkoa.
Menkhan nunạkʼko rạskạyena arko hahaṛayena je, onko do pạtiạu hõ bako pạtiạu daṛeakʼkan tahẽkana. Unre Jisui kuliketʼkoa, “Nonḍe jãhãn jomakʼ menakʼtapea?”
Onko do mitʼ kuṭrạ rapakʼ hakoko emadea.
Uni do ona ataṅkate onko samaṅreye jomkeda.
Ar ona tayome metatʼkoa, “Iń do ape sãote tahẽkanreń menleda, Mose reakʼ ạnre, nạbikoakʼ olakʼre ar sereńkore iń reakʼ okako katha olakan ona sanamakʼ do purạukʼtehõ purạukʼgea.”
Uni do sonot sostor bujhạu ocoko lạgitʼ celakoakʼ bude jhicʼketʼtakoteye metatʼkoa,
“Ol menakʼa, Mạsi do duk jojom hoyokʼtaea ar pe din hilokʼre gocʼko khone jiwetʼ beredokʼa.
Arhõ ol menakʼa, Jerusalem khon ehopʼkate sanam jạtko ṭhen kại ikạkʼ lạgitʼ mon ạcur porcarokʼa.
Apege noa sanamakʼko reaṅ goha do.
Ńelpe, ińren Baba okaṭakʼ emokʼ reakʼe gokʼakatʼ, onań kolapea. Serma khon daṛe ạuripe ńam hạbicʼ ape do noa nagraharege tahẽ hataṛokʼpe.”
Jisu do acʼren celako sãote Bethaniạ hạbicʼe calaoena. Ar onḍe uni do acʼakʼ ti tiạrkate onkoe bhoratʼkoa.
Are bhorakokan tulucʼge onkoe bạgiatʼkoa ar sermateye rakapʼ idi ocoyena.
Unre onko do uniko sewawadea ar ạḍi rạskạ salakʼ Jerusalemteko ruạṛ senena.
Ar jaoge mundilre hecʼkate Isorko sarhaoedekan tahẽkana.
Etohopʼrege kathatetʼ tahẽkana, ar kathatetʼ do Isor ṭhen tahẽkana ar kathatetʼ do acʼge Isore tahẽkana.
Etohopʼrege uni do Isor sãoteye tahẽkana.
Sanamakʼge ona katha hotete sirjạu akana, ar oka sirjạu akan onako modre okaṭakʼ hõ uni begor do baṅ sirjạu akana.
Onare jion tahẽkana ar ona jionge manwakoakʼ marsal tahẽkana.
Ona marsal do ńutre jolokʼ kana ar ńut do marsal bae bhagao daṛeada.
Isor do Johan ńutuman mitʼṭen hoṛe kolledea.
Uni do marsal reaṅ goha emokʼ lạgitʼe hecʼlena jemon jotoko uniakʼ goha ańjomkateko pạtiạukʼ.
Johan acʼtetʼ do ona marsal bae tahẽkana menkhan ona marsal reakʼ goha emokʼe hecʼlena.
Unige sạri marsal do, one okoe mimitʼ manwako marsale emakokan, uni do dhạrtiteye hecʼlena.
Uni do dhạrtireye tahẽkana ar dhạrti do uni hotetege sirjạu akana, enhõ dhạrtiren manwa do bako oromledea.
Uni do acʼrenko ṭhene hecʼlena, menkhan acʼren hoṛge bako ataṅledea.
Menkhan tinạkʼ do unireko pạtiạuen arko ataṅkede onko mimitʼko do Isorren gidrạ hoyokʼ reakʼ ektiạriye ematʼkoa.
Noko hoṛkoakʼ janam do mãyãm khonakʼ do baṅ hoeakana, ar jel reakʼ sana se herel hoṛakʼ sana khon hõ baṅ, bickom Isor khonge hoeakana.
Ar ona kathatetʼge manwa jạt lekateye janamena ar aboko talareye girobasena. Isor Babaren sadher Hopon lekate uniakʼ oka ṭhonok menakʼ ona do alele ńelakada. Uni do daya ar sạriakʼteye perecʼgea.
Johan do uni reaṅ ãṭ aṛaṅte goha emetʼteye meneda, “Nui kangeae uni do one okoe reaṅ iń menletʼ, iń tayomteye daraekan ar iń khone maraṅge, ente uni do iń ạuri khonge menaea.”
Abo jotokoge uniakʼ ona perecʼakʼ khon daya cetan daya bon ńam akada.
Mose hotete ạn-ạriko em hoelena, menkhan daya ar sạritetʼ do Jisu Mạsi hotetege hecʼakana.
Isor do okoe hõ tisge bako ńelakadea. Ar acʼ sãote menae uni sadher Hopon, one okoe do acʼtetʼgeye Isorkan, unige uni doe sodor akadea.
Jihudi mukhiạko do Jerusalem nagraha khon naekeko ar Liwiko Johan ṭhenko kolketʼko khan Johan do onko ṭhen gohae emkeda. Onko doko kulikedea, “Am dom okoe kana?”
Johan do bae baṅleda bickom aṅgocketʼteye menkeda, “Iń do Mạsi doń baṅkana.”
Unre onko do Johanko kulikedea, “Okoe enḍekhan? Eliạ kanam?” Uni doe menkeda, “Baṅ, iń do Eliạ hõń baṅkana.” Onkoko metadea, “Enḍekhan am do cetʼ uni nạbi kanam?” Uniye roṛ ruạrkeda, “Baṅ.”
Adoko metadea, “Enḍekhan am dom okoe kana? Ente ale okoeko kolakatʼle sen ruạṛkate onko lạiako hoyokʼtalea. Ar am reaṅ do cetʼem menkea?”
Johane menkeda, “Ińge ona hohokạnicʼ reakʼ aṛaṅ do, one okoe reaṅ Jesaea nạbiye menakatʼ, Hahaṅkarre mitʼṭen hohokạnicʼ reakʼ aṛaṅe baḍae ocokʼkana, Probhuakʼ hor sojhekataepe.”
Johan ṭhen okoeko kol ocolen onko do Phạrusiko tahẽkana. Onko do Johanko kulikedea,
“Am do Mạsi hõ baṅ, Eliạ hõ baṅ, ar uni nạbi hõm baṅkan khan enḍekhan cedakʼem bạptisetʼkoa?”
Johan do onko Phạrusikoe metatʼkoa, “Iń ma dakʼteń bạptisetʼpe, menkhan apeko modre nonkan mitʼ goṭene teṅgo akana okoe do bape oromede.
Unikangea uni hoṛ do, one okoe iń tayomte hijukʼ reakʼ katha tahẽkantae. Iń do uniakʼ panahe reakʼ phitạ raṛaetae lekgeń baṅkana.”
Noa do Jordan gaḍa eṭakʼ aṛe reakʼ Bethaniạ atore hoelena one okare Johan doe bạptisetʼko tahẽkan.
Dosar hilokʼ Johan do Jisu acʼ ṭhen hijukʼkane ńelkede khane menkeda, “Hạni ńelepe Isorren Bheḍa Hopon, one uni manwakoakʼ sanam kạiye gokʼ idiyetʼkan.
Nui kangea uni do one okoe reakʼ iń lạiletʼ okoe do iń tayomteye daraekan ar iń khon hõe maraṅge, ente uni do iń ạuri khonge menaea.
Iń do bạń oromakade tahẽkana, menkhan uni do Israelko ṭhen jemone sodor ocokʼ onate iń do hecʼkate dakʼteń bạptisetʼpea.”
Ona tayom Johan do noa gohae emkeda, “Iń do serma khon sonot Jiu parwa leka pheḍ hijukʼte uni cetanre apʼakaniń ńelkedea.
Uni do bạń oromakade tahẽkana, menkhan okoe dakʼte bạptisko lạgitʼe kolakadiń unigeye men akadińa, ‘okoe cetanre sonot Jiu pheḍ hijukʼkanem ńelea, unige sonot Jiuteye bạptispea.’
Iń do onań ńelakada ar gohań emetʼkana nui kangeae Isorren Hopon.”
Dosar hilokʼ Johan ar acʼren barea cela do arhõ onḍekin tahẽkana.
Unre Jisui dãṛã baṛaekan tahẽkanre Johane menkeda, “Hạni ńele ben, Isorren Bheḍa Hopon.”
Ado Johan noa katha roroṛkin ańjomkede khan unkin banar cela do Jisukin pańjakedea.
Jisu do ạcurente pańjakane ńelketʼkinteye metatʼkinạ, “Cetʼben ńam kana?” Johanren cela dokin kulikedea, “E Rabbi, (torjomate) E Guru, am do okarem tahen kana?”
Jisui metatʼkinạ, “Dela hijukʼte ńel idiben.” Unre unkin do senkate Jisui tahenkan jaegakin ńelkeda ar enhilokʼ do uni sãotegekin tahẽyena. Unre okte do pon baja gan hoeakan tahẽkana.
Johanakʼ katha ańjomkate okoekin cela Jisukin pańjalede unkin modre mitʼ hoṛakʼ ńutum do tahẽkana Andreas. Uni do Simon Patrasren boehae tahẽkana.
Andreas do pạhilre acʼren boeha Simone sendra ńamkedeteye metadea, “Ạliń do Mạsi liń (torjomate do Krisṭ) ńam akadea.”
Ar Andreas do Jisu ṭhen Simone ạgukedea. Jisu do Simon beṅgetʼ adeteye metadea, “Am do Johan hopon Simon kanam, menkhan am do kephasem hoho ocokʼa.” Noa ńutum reakʼ mane do Patras, metakʼme dhiri.
Dosar hilokʼ Jisu do Gạlil Prodeshte calakʼe goṭawana. Un jokhecʼ Philipe ńelkede khan uniye metadea, “Dela pańjayińme ar ińren cela hoyokʼme.”
Philip do Bethsaeda atoren hoṛe tahẽkana, Andreas ar Patras hõ ona atorengekin tahẽkana.

Philip do Nathanaele sendra ńamkedeteye metadea, “Mose do okoeakʼ katha ạn-ạrikoreye ol oṭo akatʼ ar nạbiko hõ okoe reaṅko olakatʼ uni do alele ńam akadea. Uni do Nasareth atoren Josephren hopon Jisu kanae.”
Nathanael do Philipe metadea, “Nasaret khon do cetʼ jãhãn bhageakʼ hecʼ daṛekokʼa? Philip do uniye metadea, “Dela hijukʼte ńeleme.”
Jisu do Nathanael acʼ ṭhen hijukʼkane ńelkede khane menkeda, “Hạni ńelepe, mitʼṭen sạri Israel. Uniakʼ monre jãhãn phạsiạratetʼge bạnukʼ anaṅ.”
Nathanael do Jisui kulikedea, “Cekate iń dom oromkedińa?” Jisui roṛ ruạṛadea, “Philip ạuriye hohoamre, loa dare buṭạrem tahẽkanreń ńelletʼmea.”
Noate Nathanael do Jisui metadea, “E Guru, am do Isorren Hopon kanam ar amge Israelkoren raj do.”
Jisu do uniye metadea, “Loa dare buṭạreń ńelletʼme reakʼ kathań metatʼme iạtem pạtiạukʼ kana? Noa khon arhõ aema daṛeakʼkom ńela.”
Jisui menkeda, “Sạrigeń metapekana, serma jhicʼ akanpe ńela ar Isorren goḍetko do Manwa Hopon ṭhen pheḍ hijukʼ ar rakapʼ calakʼkanpe ńelkoa.”
Niạ bar din tayom Gạlil reakʼ Kana nagrahare mitʼṭen bapla hoyena. Ar Jisuren eṅgat hõ onḍeye tahẽkana.
Ona baplare Jisu ar acʼren celako hõko neota ocoakan tahẽkana.
Ado darkha rasa cabayentako khan Jisuren eṅgat do Jisui metadea, “Darkha rasa do bạnukʼtakoa.”
Jisui menkeda, “Henda go noa babotre iń tulucʼ amakʼ do cetʼ? Ińakʼ okte do ńit hõ ạuriakʼa.”
Unre Jisuren eṅgattetʼ do sapʼ dapʼkoe metatʼkoa, “Uni jãhãnakʼgeye metape onage onkaepe.”
Jihudikoakʼ cạli leka ona jaegare apʼ ạbukokʼ lạgitʼ dhiri reakʼ turui goṭen dakʼ hanḍhako doṛomakatʼ tahẽkana. Onako reakʼ mimitʼ goṭecʼre do babar pepe mon leka dakʼ sahobokʼa.
Jisu do onko sapʼdapʼkoe metatʼkoa, “Noako hanḍhare dakʼ dul perejpe. Unre sapʼdapʼko do dakʼko dul perecʼkeda.
Ona tayom onkoe metatʼkoa, “Ma ńitokʼ do ona khon thoṛa bhurạgpe ar bhojren mukhiạ idiaepe.” Khan sapʼ dapʼko doko onkakeda.

Ado ona darkha rasa, one oka do dakʼ khon hoeakan, ona bhoj mukhiạe cakha ạikạukeda. Menkhan oka khon hecʼena ona do bae baḍaelakʼa; eken okoe dakʼko dul perecʼletʼ onkogeko baḍaekan tahẽkana. Onate bhojren mukhiạ do Jãwãe beṭa hohoadeteye metadea,
“Sanam hoṛge pạhilre do bhage darkha rasako calao maṛaṅa. Ar ona tayomko ńu bhagaolen khan lahatenakʼ khon thoṛa kom bogeakʼko emakoa. Menkhan am do ńit hạbicʼ bhageakʼ darkha rasam dohoakada.
Jisu do Gạlil reakʼ Kana nagrahare noage cinhạ lekate pạhil hahaṛa kạmiye kạmiketʼte acʼakʼ ṭhonoke sodorkeda. Onate celako do unireko pạtiạuena.
Ona tayom Jisu do acʼren eṅgattetʼ, boehako ar celako sãote Kapharnạhum nagrahateye calaoena, menkhan onḍe onko do ḍher din bako tahẽlena.
Jihudikoakʼ sen-parom porob soren khan Jisu do Jerusalemteye rakapʼ calaoena.
Uni do mundilre ḍaṅgra, bheḍa, parwa ạkhrińko ar ṭaka-poesa bodoletʼkan hoṛko duṛupʼ akane ńamketʼkoa.

Ado noakoe ńelketʼ khan uni do baber reakʼ mitʼṭen cạbuke benaokeda, ar onate sanam ḍaṅgra, bheḍa ar hoṛko onḍe khone laga oḍokketʼkoa. Ar ṭaka bodolkoakʼ poesakoe chiṭạuketʼte mạciko hõe ulṭạu giḍikatʼtakoa.
Uni do parwa ạkhrińkoe metatʼkoa “Men nonḍe khon noako idipe. Iń Babawakʼ oṛakʼ do bạnij-bepar oṛakʼ alope benaoa.”
Onate celako do sonot sostorre olakan uniakʼ noa katha disạ hecʼatʼkoa: Amakʼ oṛakʼ lạgitʼ ińakʼ oka khạndri dulạṛtiń, ona dulạṛge ińakʼ ontor doe jal jalaotińạ.
Unre Jihudi mukhiạko do Jisuko kulikedea, “Noako kạmi reakʼ ektiạriạ je sạrige menakʼtam ona reakʼ cinhạ lekate cetʼ hahaṛa kạmim udukʼ daṛealea?”
Jisui roṛ ruạṛatʼkoa, “Isorakʼ oṛakʼ dhaṅ dhaserpe, ar pe mãhãte ona do arhõń beretʼ ruạṛa.”
Noa katha ańjomkate Jihudi mukhiạko ko metadea, “Noa mundil benaote pongel turui bochor lagaolena, ar am do cetʼ noa pe mãhãtem beretʼ ruạṛa?”
Jisu do menkhan Isorakʼ oṛakʼ mente acʼakʼ hoṛmo reakʼ kathageye roṛletʼa.
Onate Jisu gocʼko khone jiwetʼ beretʼenre celakoko disạkeda uni do ona kathageye roṛletʼa mente. Unre celako do sonot sostor reakʼ katha ar Jisu okae roṛletʼ onareko pạtiạuena.
Ado sen-parom porobre Jisu Jerusalemre tahẽkate okako hahaṛa kạmiye kạmiketʼ ona ńelte ạḍi utạr hoṛ do unireko pạtiạuena.
Menkhan Jisu do onko ṭhen bae sodorlena, ente uni do joto hoṛe baḍae akatʼko tahẽkana.
Ar manwa reaṅ okoeakʼ goha hõ baṅ jạruṛadea, ente manwakoakʼ monre oka menakʼ ona doe baḍaekan tahẽkana.
Phạrusiko modre Nikodemus ńutuman Jihudikoren mitʼṭen mukhiạ hoṛe tahẽkana.

Uni do mitʼ din ńindạ jokhecʼ Jisu ṭhen hecʼkateye menkeda, “E Guru, alele baḍaea am do mitʼṭen cecetʼicʼ leka Isor ṭhen khonem hecʼakana, ente okako hahaṛawakʼ kom kạmikan, ona do Isor soṅgete bae tahẽlen khan okoe hõ ohoe kạmi daṛelea.”
Jisu do Nikodemuse metadea, “Sạrigeń metam kana, jãhãe hoṛ dosar karte bae janamlen khan Isorakʼ raj do ohoe ńel daṛelea.”
Unre Nikodemus do uniye metadea, “Manwa do haṛamkate cekate arhõe janam daṛekokʼa? Dosar dhao eṅgatakʼ kukhire bolo ruạṛkate uni do cetʼ arhõe janam daṛeakʼa?”
Jisui menkeda, “Sạrigeń metamkana, dakʼ ar sonot Jiu khon bae janamlen khan okoe hõ Isorakʼ rajte ohoe bolo daṛelena.
Manwa khon janamicʼ do manwage ar Jiu khon janamicʼ do Jiuge.
Dosar karte janamokʼ hoyokʼtapea menteń metatʼmete alom hahaṛakʼa.

Hoe do oka secʼ sanaye ontegeye hoeyeda ar ona reakʼ saḍetetʼem ańjoma, menkhan oka khon hijukʼ kana ar okate calakʼa ona do bam baḍaea. Sonot Jiu khon okoeakʼ janam hoeakan onko do ṭhik onkageko hoyokʼa.”
Nikodemus do Jisui kulikedea, “Noa do cekate hoedaṛekokʼa?”
Unre Jisu do uniye metadea, “Israelkoren guru hoekatere hõ cetʼ noako bam bujhạueda?”
Sạrigeń metamkana, ale do okale baḍae akatʼ onagele roṛeda ar okale ńelakatʼ ona reaṅge gohale emeda, menkhan ape do aleakʼ goha bape luturakʼ kana.
Dhạrti reakʼakʼkoń lạiapere bape pạtiạukʼkan khan serma reakʼakʼ iń lạiapere cekatepe pạtiạukokʼa?
Sermare okoeye tahenkan ar serma khon okoeye hecʼakan uni Manwa Hopon chaḍa ar okoe hõ sermate do bako rakapʼ akana.
Cetʼleka Mose do hahaṅkarre bińe rakapʼlede onkage Manwa Hopon hõe rakapʼ ocokʼa,
jemon jãhãege unireye pạtiạukʼ uni do jaejug jion tahentae.
“Isor do manwa nunạkʼe dulạṛketʼkoa acʼren eskar janam Hopongeye emkedea, jemon unire pạtiạukʼ mitʼke mitʼ hoṛ aloko nosṭokʼ bickom jaejug jion tahentako.
Uni do manwako dusire paṛaoko lạgitʼ acʼren Hopon bae kolakadea bickom Hopon hotete jemon kại khon bańcaoko ńam ona lạgitʼgeye kolakadea.

Okoe uni Hoponreye pạtiạukʼ uniakʼ do jãhãn bicạr baṅ hoyokʼtaea, menkhan okoe bae pạtiạukʼ uni do dusi kanae mente laharegeye lekha ocoakana, ente uni do Isorren eskar janam Hoponre bae pạtiạu akana.
Uni do dusi menteye lekha ocoakana ente dhạrtire marsal hecʼ akana, menkhan manwakoakʼ kạmiko bạṛicʼgete manwa do marsal khon ńutge bạ̃ṛtiko dulạṛetʼkana.
Okoe bạṛicʼakʼe kạmikan uni do marsale hirkhạwakʼ kana. Ar bạṛicʼ kạmiko sodorokʼtae iạte marsal ṭhen do bae hijukʼ kana.
Menkhan okoe sạri horteye calakʼkan uni do marsal ṭhene hijukʼ kana jemon uniakʼ kạmiko Isorakʼ sanaleka hoeakana mente sodorokʼtae.”
Noa tayom Jisu ar uniren celako do Jihudạ disạmteko calaoena. Ar onḍe uni do acʼren celako sãote thoṛa dine tahẽyena ar hoṛko bạptiskoe ehopʼena.
Unre Salem ńutumanakʼ mitʼṭen ato sor ṭhen Aenonko metakʼ mitʼṭen jaegare Johan hõe bạptisetʼko tahẽkana, ente ona jaegare do ḍher dakʼ tahẽkana ar hoṛko hõ hecʼkateko bạptis ocokʼkan tahẽkana.
Ar un hạbicʼ Johan hõ hajotre bae bhorao ocoakan tahẽkana.
Ona jokhecʼ dhorom reakʼ niạm lekate saphakʼ babotre Johanren celako do mitʼṭen Jihudi sãoteko reṭepeṭekʼkan tahẽkana.
Onko do Johan ṭhen hecʼenteko menkeda, “E Guru, okoe do Jordan hanasare am sãoteye tahẽkan ar okoeṭakʼ reakʼ goham emletʼ, ńelme, uni doe bạptisetʼkoa ar sanam hoṛ uni ṭhengeko calakʼkana.”
Unre Johane roṛ ruạṛkeda, “Serma khon baṅ emlen khan okoe hõ cetʼge ohoe ńam daṛelea.
Apege roroṛpe ańjomakadiń je, Mạsi doń baṅkana, menkhan uni lahateń kol ocoakana.
Okoe ṭhen bạhui jimạ ocoakan uni kangeae jãwãe do. Ar lomta koṛa do jãwãe beṭawakʼ kathae ańjoma ar uniakʼ aṛaṅ ańjomteye rạskạkʼa. Onkage ińakʼ rạskạ hõ teheń do purạu akantińạ.
Uni do maraṅ idikʼtege hoyokʼtaea ar iń do ocogokʼ hoyokʼtińạ.”

Coṭ khon hijukʼ kanicʼ do sanamko cetanren kanae. Okoe dhạrti khone hijukʼkan uni do dhạrtiren kanae, ar uni do dhạrti reakʼ kathageye roṛa. Menkhan okoe serma khone hijukʼkan uni do sanamko cetanren kanae.
Uni do okae ńel akatʼ ar okae ańjomakatʼ ona reakʼ gohageye ema, menkhan okoe hõ uniakʼ goha do bako aṅgoctaea.
Okoe uniakʼ gohae aṅgoc akatʼ uni do ona hotetegeye sodoreda je, Isor okae men ona do sạrikana mente.
Isor okoeye kolakade uni do Isorakʼ kathageye roṛa, ente Isor do sonot Jiu soṅkate bae emekana.
Baba do Hopone dulạṛede kana ar uniakʼ tirege jotowakʼe emakada.
Hoponre pạtiạukʼicʼ do jaejug jion menakʼtaea, menkhan Hopon reakʼ bebataoicʼ do jion ohoe ńamlea, bickom Isorakʼ edre uni cetanre paṛaokʼa.
Jisu do Johan khon hõ bạ̃ṛtiye celayetʼko are bạptisetʼkokan ona do Phạrusikoko ańjomakatʼ tahẽkana.
Jisu do apnarte bae bạptisetʼko tahẽkana menkhan uniren celakogeko bạptisetʼko tahẽkana.
Ado Jisu onae baḍaeketʼ khan Jihudạ Prodeshe bạgiatʼe arhõ Gạlilteye calaoena.
Ar Gạlilteye calakʼkan tahẽkan jokhecʼ uni do Samariạ disạm talate sen paromokʼ hoyentaea.
Uni do Samariạkoakʼ Sukhạrko metakʼ mitʼṭen nagrahateye hecʼena. Noa nagraha do Jakob acʼren hopon Joseph okaṭakʼ jaegae emade tahẽkan ona sorrege tahẽkana.
Ona jaegare Jakobakʼ mitʼṭen kũń tahẽkana. Jisu do dãṛã dãṛãteye laṅgayen khan ona kũń aṛereye duṛupʼena. Unre ber do tikin amdaj tahẽkana.
Uni Samariạ maejiue menkeda, “Iń mań Samariạ maejiukan. Ar Jihudi hoekate cekate am do dakʼem koeyeń kana?” Maejiu do noa iạteye menkeda ente Jihudi ar Samariạko do bako duṛupʼ teṅgonkan tahẽkana.
Jisu do uni maejiue roṛ ruạṛadea, “Isorakʼ danem baḍaele khan ar okoe am ṭhen dakʼe kokoe kana enḍekhan amge honaṅ uni ṭhen dakʼem koekea ar uni do jiwetʼ dakʼe emkema.”
Maejiue menkeda, “Menkhan amakʼ ma loloteakʼ hõ coṅ bạnukʼtam ar kũń ma khạndrige. Enḍekhan oka khon ona jiwetʼ dakʼ dom ńamkeda?
Aleren baba Jakob khon do bam maraṅa. Noa kũń do unigeye emakatʼlea. Uni ar acʼren hoponko do noa kũń reakʼ dakʼko ńũiyetʼ tahẽkana ar uniren mihũ meromko hõko ńũiyetʼ tahẽkana.”
Unre Jisui menkeda, “Jãhãege noa dakʼe ńũi uni do arhõ tetaṅea.
Menkhan iń oka dakʼiń emokʼ, ar okoe onae ńũi uni do tisge oho tetaṅlea. Ona dakʼ do uniakʼ ontorre jaejug jion lạgitʼ bhumbukokʼkan jharna leka hoyokʼa.”
Onate uni maejiu do Jisui metadea, “Enḍekhan ona dakʼ baṛe imạńme jemon alo tetaṅiń ar nonḍe dakʼ lo hijukʼ hõ alo hoyokʼ tiń.”
Jisu do uniye metadea, “Do calakʼme, ar amren jãwãe hoho ạguyem.”
Maejiue menkeda, “Jãwãe do bạnuitińạ.” Jisu do uniye metadea, “Ṭhikgem menakada jãwãe bạnuitama,
ente niạ lahare amren do mõṛẽ goṭen jãwãeko tahẽkantama, ar ńit okoe menae uni hõ amren jãwãe doe baṅkana. Am do sạri kathagem menakada.”
Unre maejiu do Jisui metadea, “Ńit iń baḍae daṛeakʼ kana am do mitʼṭen nạbi kanam.
Aleren hapṛamko do noa burureko sewaletʼ tahẽkana, menkhan apepe meneda, Jerusalemrege sewa do lek kana.”
Jisu do uniye metadea, “Ańjomme ar ińakʼ kathare pạtiạukʼme, ente nonkan okte hijukʼ kana unre Isor Baba do noa burure hõ baṅ ar Jerusalemre hõ bape sewawaea.
Ente ape do okaṭakʼ bape baḍaekan onape sewawakʼ kana, menkhan ale okaṭakʼle baḍaeakatʼ onagele sewawakʼ kana, ente kại khon bańcaokʼ do Jihudiko khonge hecʼakana.
Menkhan okte daraekana, ar ńit hõ kangea, one unre sạri sewako do Jiu ar sạriakʼte Babako sewawaea. Ar Baba hõ nonkan sewakogeye ńam baṛayetʼkoa.
Isor doe Jiu kana; ar okoe uniko sewawaekan, onko do Jiu ar sạriakʼte sewa lek takoa.”
Unre uni maejiue menkeda, “Baḍaegeạń, Mạsi, okoe do Krisṭko metaekan uni doe darae kana. Are hecʼlenre sanamakʼe baḍae ocobona.”
Jisu do uniye metadea, “Iń kangeạń uni do, one okoe am tulucʼe galmaraokan.”

Ar inạkʼtege Jisuren celako doko hecʼena, ar mitʼṭen maejiu tulucʼ Jisu galmaraoko ńelkede khan onko doko hahaṛayena. Menkhan enhõ okoege bako metadea, “Am do cetʼem khojkana se cedakʼ uni tulucʼ dom galmaraoeda?”
Unre maejiu do acʼakʼ kanḍae bạgi oṭoatʼte atoteye senena ar hoṛkoe metatʼkoa,
“Dela hijukʼte mitʼṭen hoṛ ńelepe. Uni do ińiń ceka akatʼ jotowakʼe lại ạdińa. Baṅ do nuigeye Mạsikan?”
Onate hoṛko do ato khon oḍokkate Jisu ṭhen hijukʼko ehopʼena.
Ar inạ takre celako do nehõradeteko metadea, “E Guru, thoṛa jom maṛaṅlem.”
Jisu do onkoe metatʼkoa, “Iń ṭhen nonkan jomakʼ menakʼa one ona reakʼ ape do bape baḍaekan.”
Onate celako doko menana, “Enḍekhan cetʼ jãhãe jomakʼko ạgu akawadea?”
Unre Jisui metatʼkoa, “Okoeye kol akadiń uniakʼ sanaleka senakʼ ar uniakʼ kạmi purạutaege hoyokʼ kana ińakʼ jomakʼ do.
Ape do cetʼ bape meneda, ‘ar pon cando khange phosol samṭao din do seṭerokʼa mente?’ Menkhan ińiń metapekana, mitʼ dhao khetko secʼ beṅgetʼakʼpe, phosol samṭao okte do hoeakana.
Okoe phosole samṭaoetʼkan uni do ńitge kuṛạiye ńameda ar jaejug jion lạgitʼ phosole doho jarwayeda. Onate itạ erokʼicʼ ar phosol samṭaoicʼ, unkin banarge mitʼ sãotekin rạskạkʼ kana.
Noate sạbudokʼ kana, ‘mitʼ hoṛ doe era ar eṭagicʼ doe samṭaoa.’
Iń do nonkan phosol samṭaoiń kolketʼpea one ona lạgitʼ ape do bape khaṭao akan. Ente eṭakʼko doko khaṭao akana ar ape do ona khaṭaoakʼ reakʼ phosolpe samṭaoeda.”
Ado okoe maejiue gohayetʼ tahẽkan, acʼe ceka akatʼ ona jotowakʼ do uniye lạiakada mente, onate uniakʼ katha ańjomkate ona atoren ạḍi utạr Samariạ hoṛ do Jisureko pạtiạuena.
Onko do Jisu ṭhen hecʼkate ako sãote tahen lạgitʼko nehõradea. Onate Jisu do onḍe bar dine tahẽyena.
Unre uniakʼ katha ańjomkate arhõ ạḍi utạr hoṛko pạtiạuena.
Onko do uni maejiuko metadea, “Ńitokʼ do eken amakʼ katha iạtele pạtiạukʼ kana ona do baṅ, menkhan uniakʼ katha ańjomkatele bujhạu daṛeakʼ kana, sạrige uni do manwakoren babańcaoicʼ kanae.”
Ar Gạlilreye seṭeren khan Gạlilrenko do uniko ataṅ daramkedea. Ente porob jokhecʼ okoeko hoṛ Jerusalemteko senlen onko do Jisui kạmiletʼakʼ jotowakʼko ńelleda.

Jisu do arhõ Gạlil reakʼ ona Kana atoteye calaoena. Nonḍege uni do dakʼe darkha rasa ocoletʼ tahẽkana. Ar Gạlil reakʼ Kapharnạhum nagrahare mitʼṭen raj kạmiạ hoṛren hopontetʼ doe ruạ kạhil akan tahẽkana.

Uni raj kạmiạ hoṛ do Jisu Jihudiạ khon Gạlilteye hecʼakana menteye baḍaeketʼ khan uni do Jisu ṭhen senkateye nehõrena jemon Kapharnạhumte senkate gidrạye bogeye. Unre uniren gidrạ do gujukʼ dạkhile tahẽkana.
Jisu do uni raj kạmiạ hoṛe metadea, “Jãhãn cinhạ se hahaṛa kạmi bape ńellekhan ape do okalekate hõ ohope pạtiạulena.”
Unre uni raj kạmiạ hoṛ doe menkeda, “Ma dayakate ińren gidrạ ạuriye gujukʼrege hijukʼme.”
Jisu do uniye metadea, “Do calakʼme, hoponme doe bogeyena.” Ar uni kạmiạ hoṛ do Jisuakʼ kathare pạtiạuenteye calaoena.
Ado uni raj kạmiạ hoṛ do tinre oṛakʼe ruạṛ senokʼkan tahẽkana unre horrege uniren gutiko do hecʼkateko metadea, “Amren hoponme doe bogeyena,”
Uni doe kuliketʼkoa, “Oka okteye bogeyena?” Adoko lạiadea, “Hola tikin mitʼ baja okte ruạ do chuṭạuentaea.”
Ar inạtege gidrạren apattetʼe doe bujhạukeda, ṭhik ona okterege Jisu doe metade tahẽkana, “Amren gidrạ doe bogeyena.” Unre acʼ ar acʼakʼ gharońjren sanamko do Jisureko pạtiạuena.
Ar Jihudạ khon Gạlilre hecʼen tayom Jisu do dosar dhao noa hahaṛa kạmiye kạmikeda.
Niạ tayom Jisu do Jerusalemteye calaoena, ente ona jokhecʼ Jihudikoakʼ mitʼṭen porob tahẽkana.
Jerusalemre bhiḍi-phaṭokʼ ṭhen mitʼṭen pukhri menakʼa; onḍe do mõṛẽ goṭen umul akatʼ jaega menakʼa. Ibri pạrsite ona pukhri reakʼ ńutum do Bethsaedako metakʼkana.
Ar onako jaegare ạḍi utạr rugiko tahẽnkan tahẽkana. Kãṛãko, leḍhako, ar hoṛmo rohoṛ caba akan hoṛko hõ onko modreko tahẽkana.

Ar mitʼṭen serma goḍet do okte oktere ona pukhrire pheḍkate dakʼe laṛao oṭokakʼkan tahẽkana ar ona tayom pạhilre okoe ona dakʼreye pheḍ maṛaṅokʼ uni do joto lekan rog khone boge utạrokʼ kan tahẽkana. Ar rugiko do dakʼ laṛaokʼ reakʼ koyokʼ horreko tahẽnkan tahẽkana.
Onḍe do pe gel irạl bochor khon rogteye jạbun akan mitʼṭen hoṛe tahẽkana.
Ar ḍher din khon onḍe menaea mente Jisui baḍaeketʼ khan uniye kulikedea, “Am do cetʼ bogekʼ sanayetʼmea?”
Ruạkʼicʼ doe roṛ ruạṛkeda, “E baba, ińren do okoe hõ bạnukʼkoa, one okoe do dakʼ laṛaokʼ são sãote pukhriteko pheḍkạń. Ente ińiń pheḍokʼ pheḍokʼtege iń khon lahare ar mitʼ hoṛe pheḍ godokʼ kana.”
Jisu do uniye metadea, “Ma beretʼme, ar amakʼ aṭetʼ kuṭuṅtam ar taṛamme.”
Unre uni hoṛ doe boge utạrena ar acʼakʼ aṭetʼakʼ kuṭuṅkate taṛame ehopʼena. Ar enhilokʼ do jirạukʼ mãhã tahẽkana.
Onate Jihudi mukhiạko do uni hoṛko metadea, “Teheń do jirạukʼ mãhã kana; ar dhorom reakʼ niạm lekate aṭetʼakʼ kuṭuṅ baṛae do lek baṅkana.”
Unre uni do mukhiyạkoe metatʼkoa, “Menkhan okoeye boge akadiń unige ‘aṭetʼ kuṭuṅkate taṛam baṛaeye metadińạ.’ ”
Onko do uni hoṛko kulikedea, “Okoe kanae uni hoṛ do, oneye metatʼme, ‘amakʼ aṭetʼakʼ kuṭuṅkate taṛamme?’ ”
Menkhan boge ocoyenicʼ do bae baḍaeleda uni doe okoe kana mente, ente ona jaegare ạḍi utạr hoṛko bhiṛakatʼ tahẽkante Jisu do onḍe khone calaoena.
Ona tayom Jisu do mundilre uni hoṛ ńel ńamkedeteye metadea, “Ńelme, am dom boge akana. Ar alom kạiya, jemon jãhãnakʼ bạṛicʼ alo hoyokʼtam.”
Unre uni hoṛ do calaokate Jihudi mukhiyạkoe lạiatʼkoa, acʼ okoeye bogeakade uni doe Jisu kana.
Jirạukʼ mãhãre Jisu do noakoe kạmiketʼte Jihudi mukhiạko do goje lạgitʼko kurumuṭukeda.
Unre uni do onko mukhiyạkoe metatʼkoa, “Ińren Baba do jao ghuṛiye kạmi kana ar iń hoń onkayeda.”

Jisuakʼ noa katha iạte mukhiạko do goje reakʼ artetʼ dão ńam baṛaeko ehopʼena, ente uni do eken jirạukʼ mãhã reakʼ niạme rạputʼeda ona do baṅ, bickom Isor do acʼren Baba menteye metaekante acʼ do Isor somane benaokʼkana.

Onate Jisu do onko mukhiyạkoe metatʼkoa, “Sạrigeń metapekana, Hopon do acʼte cetʼge bae ceka daṛeakʼa. Baba okaṭakʼ kạmikane ńelekan eken onageye daṛeakʼa, ente Baba okae cekae Hopon hõ onageye onkayeda.

Baba do Hopone dulạṛede kana ar acʼ jãhãnakʼgeye cekayetʼ, ona jotowakʼge Hopone ńel ocoyedea. Uni do noako khon hõ maraṅ maraṅakʼ kạmiko Hopone udukʼaea, jemon Hoponakʼ sanam kạmiko ńeltepe hahaṛakʼ.
Baba do cetʼleka gocʼko jiwi emkateye beretʼetʼko onkage Hopon hõ jãhãerege sanayede unigeye jiwetʼ edekana.
Baba do okoe hõ bae bicạrkoa, menkhan joto bicạr reakʼ dạyik do Hopone emakawadea,
Baba cetʼlekako manotede onkage jemon Hopon hõko manote. Hopon okoe bae manotede, uni do kolakadińicʼ Baba hõ bae manotea.
“Sạrigeń metapekana, Ińakʼ katha okoeye ańjom ar kol akadińicʼreye pạtiạukʼ uni do jaejug jion menakʼtaea. Uni do dusi mente bae lekhakʼa, ente uni do moron khon jionteye parom akana.
Sạrigeń metapekana, nonkan okte hijukʼ kana, bickom ńitokʼkangea, tinre gocʼko do Isorren Hoponakʼ aṛaṅko ańjoma ar tinạkʼko ańjom onko doko jiwedokʼa.
Ente, Baba do cetʼleka acʼre jion menakʼtae onkage uni do Hopon hõ jion tahentae lạgitʼe emakawadea.
Baba do manwa bicạrko lạgitʼ ektiạri Hopone emakawadea, ente uni doe Manwa Hopon kana.
Noa katha ańjomkate alope hahaṛakʼa, ente nonkan okte daraekana, okoe topare menakʼko onko sanamkoge manwa Hoponakʼ aṛaṅ ańjomteko oḍokʼ hijukʼa.
Okoe bhageko kạmi akatʼ onko do jion ńam lạgitʼko beredokʼa, ar okoe bạṛicʼakʼ kạmikote okteko khemao akatʼ onko do sạjạiyokʼ lạgitʼgeko beredokʼa.
Iń do apnarte cetʼge bạń ceka daṛeakʼa; cetʼlekań ańjoma onkageń bicạra. Iń do hok reakʼgeń bicạra, ente ińakʼ sana leka kạmi do bạń khojkana menkhan okoeye kolakadiń uniakʼ menjoṅ lekageń kạmia.
Ińge apnar reaṅ gohań emle khan ona goha sạriakʼ do baṅkana.
Eṭakʼ mitʼ hoṛ menaea okoe do iń reaṅ gohae emetʼkan, ar ińiń baḍaea uni oka gohae em ona do sạrigea.
Ape do Johan ṭhen kathape kolleda, ar uni do sạri gohageye emakada.
Iń do manwakoakʼ gohare bạń ṭehãḍokʼ kana, menkhan ape jemon kại khon bańcaope ńam onate noako katha doń roṛeda.
Johange ona jolokʼkan diuheye tahẽkana one okaṭakʼ do ḍig ḍigạukʼkan tahẽkan; ar ape do thoṛa okte lạgitʼ uniakʼ ona marsalre hulạsokʼpe kusilena.
Menkhan Johanakʼ khon hõ ińakʼ do maraṅ goha menakʼtińạ, ente okako kạmi Babae emakawạdiń onakogeń kạmi kana. Ar onako do iń reaṅ noa gohae emeda je, Babageye kolakadińạ.
Uni Babage, one okoe do ińe kolakadiń, uni acʼge iń reaṅ gohae emakada. Ape do tis hõ uniakʼ aṛaṅ bape ańjom akatʼtaea ar mẽtʼãhã hõ bape ńelakada.
Ona chaḍa uniakʼ kathako do apeakʼ ontorre baṅ tahen kana, ente okoeye kolakade unire bape pạtiạukʼkana.
Ape do sonot sostorkope ḍunḍhạueda, entepe hudiseda ona hotetege jaejug jionpe ńama. Menkhan ona sostor ma coṅ iń reaṅge gohae emetʼkan;
enrehõ ape do jion ńam lạgitʼ iń ṭhen hijukʼ baṅ sanayetʼpea.
“Manwakoakʼ sabasi ńam lạgitʼ do bạń kurumuṭuyeda,
menkhan iń do apeń baḍae akatʼpea. Ińiń baḍaea apeakʼ ontorre Isorakʼ dulạṛ do bạnukʼtapea.
Iń do ińren Baba ńutumteń hecʼakana ar bape aṅgocedeń kana; menkhan eṭakʼ jãhãe acʼ nijakʼ ńutumteye hecʼlen khan uni dope aṅgocea.
Ape do eṭakʼko ṭhen khon sarhao ocokʼpe ńamkana, menkhan okaṭakʼ sarhao eken Isor ṭhen khon ńamokʼ ona reakʼ do bape kurumuṭuyeda. Ar noa tayom do cekatepe pạtiạu daṛekokʼa?
Alope hudisa, Baba ṭheniń dusipea; menkhan okoe Mose ṭhenpe as akan uni Mosege ape doe dusipea.
Ape do Mosepe pạtiạuae khan honaṅ ińrehõpe pạtiạukokʼa, ente Mose do iń reaṅgeye olakada.
Menkhan uniakʼ olakʼge bape pạtiạuakʼkan khan cekate ińakʼ kathako dope pạtiạuakʼa?”
Ona tayom Jisu do Gạlil doreão hanasae parom calaoena. Noa doreãoge Tiberias doreão hõko metakʼkana.
Ar ạḍi utạr hoṛ do Jisuko pańja idikedea, ente rugiko cetanre cinhạ kạmi lekate okako hahaṛa kạmiye kạmi akatʼ tahẽkan onko do onakoko ńelakatʼ tahẽkana.
Ado Jisu ar acʼren celako do mitʼṭen burure rakapʼenteko duṛupʼena.
Unre Jihudikoakʼ sen-parom porob do sor hecʼakan tahẽkana.
Ado Jisui beṅgetʼ rakapʼketʼ khan gadel hoṛ acʼ ṭhen hijukʼkane ńelketʼkoa. Uni do Philipe metadea, “Noko hoṛ jom ocoko lạgitʼ piṭhạ do oka khon bon kiriń ạgukea?”
Uni do Philip biḍạue lạgitʼ noa kathae metadea, ente cetʼe cekaea ona doe baḍaekan tahẽkana.
Philip do Jisui metadea, “Onko mimitʼ hoṛ jauḍicʼkateko ńamlere hõ bar sae Dinar reakʼ piṭhạte hõ ohoko anṭaolena.”
Jisuren celako modre mitʼ hoṛakʼ ńutum do Andreas tahẽkana. Uni do Simon Patrasren boehae tahẽkana.
Uni do Jisui metadea, “Nonḍe mitʼṭen huḍiń koṛa ṭhen barea kạṭicʼ hako ar mõṛẽ goṭen jao reakʼ piṭhạ menakʼa, menkhan noate nunạkʼ hoṛakʼ do cetʼ hoyokʼa?”
Jisui menkeda, “Hoṛko duṛupʼ ocokope.” Ona jaegare ḍher ghãs tahẽkana. Onate gadel hoṛ do ona cetanregeko duṛupʼena. Onḍe do mõṛẽ hajar herel hoṛko tahẽkana.
Ona tayom Jisu do onako piṭhạ ataṅkate Isore gun manao joharadea ar duṛupʼ akankoe hạṭińatʼkoa. Onkage uni do hako reakʼ hõe ematʼkoa. Ar okoe tinạkʼko khojketʼ unạkʼgeko ńamkeda.
Adoko jom biyen khan Jisu do acʼren celakoe metatʼkoa, “Sarecʼakʼ kecakʼko jarwaepe jemon cetʼge alo nosṭokʼ.”
Adoko jomketʼ tayom ona mõṛẽ goṭen piṭhạ reakʼ okako sarecʼ tahẽkan celako do onako halaṅ samṭaoketʼte gelbar khạclạkʼko perecʼkeda.
Jisuakʼ noa hahaṛa kạmi ńelte gadel hoṛkoko menkeda, “Dhạrtite okoeṭakʼ nạbi hijukʼ reakʼ katha menakʼtae sạrige uni nạbi doe nuikangea.”
Noate Jisui bujhạukeda, hoṛko do raje lạgitʼko jormoṭe lạgidokʼ kana. Onate acʼ eskarge uni do arhõ ona buruteye rakapʼ calaoena.
Ạyupʼen khan Jisuren celako do doreão aṛeteko calaoena,
ar mitʼṭen lạukạre decʼkate onko do Kapharnạhum nagrahate senokʼ lạgitʼ doreão paromokʼko ehopʼena. Unre do ńut akan tahẽkana, ar unhạbicʼ hõ Jisu do onko ṭhen bae hecʼakan tahẽkana.
Ar ạḍi tạpise hoeyetʼ tahẽkante doreãore maraṅ maraṅ ḍheoko rakabokʼ kan tahẽkana.
Ado pe se pon mail gan lạukạko calao idiakatʼ tahẽkanre, Jisu do doreão cetante taṛamate lạukạ ṭhen hijukʼkanko ńelkedea. Ar uni ńelte celako do ạḍi bạṛicʼko botorena.
Unre Jisui metatʼkoa, “Alope botorokʼa, iń kangeạń.”
Celako do lạukạre Jisu deje sanaketʼkoa, ar okateko calakʼkan tahẽkan onḍeko seṭergotʼena.

Ado doreão eṭakʼ aṛere okoeko hoṛko teṅgo akan tahẽkan, dosar hilokʼ onko doko bujhạu daṛekeda je, laha hilokʼ onḍe do mitʼṭen chaḍa ar eṭakʼ jãhãn lạukạ do baṅ tahẽkana. Onko do arhõko bujhạukeda je, Jisu do acʼren celako sãote ona lạukạre bae decʼlena bickom cela motogeko sen akan tahẽkana.
Menkhan okare Probhu do gun manao joharkate hoṛko piṭhại jom ocoletʼko ona jaegare unre Tibiriạ nagraha khon eṭakʼ lạukạko hecʼena.
Onate hoṛko do tinreko ńelkeda je, Jisu se uniren cela okoege onḍe bạnukʼkoa unre onko do onako lạukạre decʼkate Jisu ńame lạgitʼ Kapharnạhumteko calaoena.
Onḍe seṭerkate onko do Jisu sendra ńamkedeteko metadea, “E Guru, tinre nonḍe dom hecʼakana?”
Jisui roṛ ruạṛatʼkoa, “Sạrigeń metapekana, hahaṛa kạmipe ńelletʼ iạtepe ńam baṛayediń kana ona do baṅ, bickom piṭhạkotepe jom bilen iạtepe ńam baṛayedińa.

Menkhan oka jomakʼ nosṭo giḍikʼ ona lạgitʼ uduṛ dhupuṛ baṛae reakʼ do cetʼ lab? Okaṭakʼ jomakʼ baṅ nosṭokʼ bickom jaejug jion tahentape ona lạgitʼ kạmipe. Ona do Manwa Hopongeye emapea, ente Isor Baba doe sạbud akada, noa kạmi reakʼ ektiạri do eken uniakʼge menakʼtaea mente.
Noa iạte Jisuko kulikedea, “Enḍekhan Isorakʼ kạmi lạgitʼ ale do cetʼ cekae hoyokʼ talea?”
Jisui metatʼkoa, “Isor okoeye kolakade unire pạtiạukʼge hoyokʼ kana Isorakʼ kạmi.”
Unreko kulikedea, “Enḍekhan cetʼlekan hahaṛa kạmim udukʼ alete amrele pạtiạu daṛekokʼa? Ar am do cetʼem kạmiya?
Aboren hapṛamko ma hahaṅkarre Mannako jomletʼ. Sonot sostorre olakana, ‘Isor do serma khon jom lạgitʼ piṭhại ematʼkoa,’ ”
Jisu do onkoe metatʼkoa, “Sạrigeń metapekana, serma khon oka piṭhạpe ńamletʼ ona do Mose hõ bae emakatʼpea, menkhan ińren Babage sạri piṭhạ serma khone emapekana.
Serma khon pheḍ hecʼkate manwako okoe jione emakokan unikangeae Isore emokʼkan piṭhạ do.”
Ado hoṛko uniko metadea, “E Guru, enḍekhan jaoge noa piṭhạ emaleme baṛe.”
Jisui metatʼkoa, “Ińge ona jion reakʼ piṭhạ do. Okoe iń ṭhene hijukʼ uni do tis hõ baṅ reṅgejea. Ar okoe ińreye pạtiạukʼkan uni do tisge baṅ tetaṅea.
Iń doń lại akawatʼpea, ńel akadińạpe menkhan enhõ ape do bape pạtiạukʼkana.
Baba okoekoe emawạń onko jotoge iń ṭhenko hijukʼa. Okoe iń ṭhene hijukʼ uni do oka lekate hõ ohoń oḍok giḍilea,
ente ińakʼ sanaleka kạmi lạgitʼ do baṅ, bickom okoeye kol akadiń uniakʼ monejoṅ leka kạmi lạgitʼge serma khoniń pheḍ hecʼakana.
Okoeye kolakadiń uniakʼ sana do noage je, uni okoekoe emakawạdiń onko modre mitʼṭen hõ alo jemoniń atʼko bickom mucạtʼ dinreń jiwetʼ beretʼkoa.
Ińren Babawakʼ sana do nõkʼõe jemon Hoponko beṅgetʼae ar unire pạtiạukʼ mitʼke mitʼko do jaejug jion tahentako. Ińge onko do mucạtʼ dinreń jiwetʼ beretʼkoa.”
Unre Jihudi mukhiạko do uni upạrteko karacʼ kurucʼena, ente Jisui metatʼko tahẽkana, “Serma khon oka piṭhạ pheḍ hecʼakan ona piṭhạ doń ińkangea.”
Khan onko mukhiạko do memenko ehopʼena, “Nũi do cetʼ Josephren hopon Jisu doe baṅkana? Nuiren go-babakin ma coṅ bon oromakatʼ kinge. Enḍekhan cekateye meneda, ‘iń do serma khoniń pheḍ hecʼakana?’ ”
Jisui metatʼkoa, “Ape apere alope karacʼ kurujokʼa.
Ińren Baba, one okoeye kolakadiń uni bae orle khan okoe hõ iń ṭhen ohoe hecʼ daṛelena. Ar ińge mucạtʼ dinre uniń jiwetʼ beredea.
Nạbikoakʼ puthire ol akana, ‘onko sanamkoge Isor ṭhen sikhạunako ńama.’ Baba ṭhen khon ańjomkate okoeye cetʼakatʼ unige iń ṭhene hijukʼa.
Baba do okoe hõ bako ńel akadea, eken okoe Isor ṭhen khone hecʼakan unigeye ńelakadea.
Sạrigeń metapekana, jãhãege ińreye pạtiạukʼ uni do unrege jaejug jione ńama.”
“Ińge jion reakʼ piṭhạ do.
Aperen hapṛamko do hahaṅkarre Mannako jomleda ar enhõko gocʼena.
Menkhan noa kangea ona piṭhạ do one oka serma khon pheḍ hecʼakan, jemon manwa ona jomkate gujukʼ khon bańcaoko ńam.

Ińge ona jiwetʼ reakʼ piṭhạ oka do serma khon pheḍ hecʼakan. Ar okoe noa piṭhại jom uni do jaejug hạbicʼ jione ńama. Ińakʼ hoṛmoge ona piṭhạ do. Manwa jemon jionko ńam ona lạgitʼ iń do ińakʼ hoṛmoń emokʼa.”
Noa katha ańjomkate Jihudi mukhiạko do reṭe peṭekʼko ehopʼena. Onko doko menkeda, “Cekate nui hoṛ do acʼakʼ hoṛmo jom lạgitʼe em daṛekebona?”
Jisui metatʼkoa, “Sạrigeń metapekana, Manwa Hoponakʼ jel bape jomle khan ar uniakʼ mãyãm bape ńule khan apere jion do bạnukʼanaṅ.
Jãhãege ińakʼ jele jom ar mãyãme ńũi uni do jaejug jione ńama, ar mucạtʼ dinre uni doń jiwetʼ beredea.
Ińakʼ jel do sạri jomakʼ kana ar ińakʼ mãyãm do sạri ńũiyakʼ kana.
Okoe ińakʼ jele jom ar ińakʼ mãyãme ńũi uni do ińreye tahẽnkana ar iń hõ unire.
Iń do jiwetʼicʼ Babageye kolakadińạ ar uni iạtege jiwetʼ minạńa. Onkage iń jojomicʼ hõ iń hotete jiwetʼe tahena.
Noage serma khon pheḍ hecʼakan piṭhạ do. Aperen hapṛamko okaṭakʼ piṭhạ jomkateko gocʼen onkan piṭhạ noa do baṅkana. Noa okoeye jom uni do jaejug hạbicʼ jione ńama.
Kapharnạhum reakʼ sunạgogreye cetʼako kan tahẽkanre Jisu do noa kathae roṛleda.
Ar uniren celako modre ḍherkoge noa katha ańjomkateko menkeda, “Noa do ạḍi keṭecʼ sikhạuna kana. Ar noa do okoeye ańjom daṛekea?”
Jisu do acʼren celako noa reakʼ karacʼ kurujokʼkane bujhạuketʼkoa. Onate uni doe metatʼkoa, “Noa iạte cetʼ monrepe tạkijokʼ kana?
Enḍekhan Manwa Hopon pạhil okareye tahẽkan onḍe rakapʼ calakʼkanpe ńellere ape do cetʼpe mena?
Manwa hoṛmo do oka kaj reakʼ hõ baṅkana; sonot Jiuge jione emokʼkana. Okako katha ape ṭheniń roṛakatʼ ona do jiu ar jion kana.
Menkhan ape modre nonkanko menakʼkoa okoe do ińre bako pạtiạukʼkan.” Okoeko Jisure bako pạtiạukʼkan ar okoe hoteteye soprot ocokʼ, ona do Jisu pạhil khongeye baḍaekan tahẽkana.
Ona iạteye menkeda, “Onateń metapekana, Ạpuń daṛe bae emape khan okoe hõ iń ṭhen do ohope hecʼ daṛelena.”
Jisuakʼ noa katha iạte celako modre ḍherkoge pạcena ar uni tulucʼ ar bako dãṛãleda.
Onate Jisu do onko gelbar celakoe metatʼkoa, “Ape hõ cetʼ ruạṛ joṅpe ńamkana?”
Simon Patras do Jisui metadea, “E Probhu, ale do okoe ṭhenle calakʼa? Jaejug jion reakʼ katha ma coṅ am ṭhenge.
Alele biswạs akana arle baḍae akada, am do Isorren uni sonoticʼ kanam.”
Unre Jisu do onkoe metatʼkoa, “Ape gelbar goṭenge cetʼ bạń bachao akatʼpea? Menkhan ape modre mitʼṭen bạiri menaea.”
Jisu do Simon Iskariotren hopon Jihudạwakʼ kathae menetʼ tahẽkana, ente unigeye soprote lạgidokʼkan tahẽkana. Ar uni do gelbarko modren mitʼ hoṛe tahẽkana.
Noa tayom Jisu do Gạlilregeye dãṛãnkan tahẽkana. Ar Jihudi mukhiạko gojeko menetʼ tahẽkante uni do Jihudạ disạmre dãṛãne bạgikeda.
Unre Jihudikoakʼ chạuni-porob do sor hecʼakan tahẽkana.
Onate uniren boehakoko metadea, “Noa jaega bạgiyakʼte Jihudạ disạmte calakʼme, jemon okakom kạmikan ona do amren celakoko ńel daṛeakʼ.
Jãhãe acʼte sodorokʼe menjoṅ khan uni do oko okote cetʼge bae kạmiya. Ado noakom kạmikante am do hoṛko samaṅre udugokʼme.”
Ar acʼren boehako hõ Jisu do bako pạtiạuaekan tahẽkana.
Onate Jisu do onkoe metatʼkoa, “Ińakʼ okte do ńit hõ ạuriạtińạ, menkhan ape do jaoge menakʼtapea.
Dhạrtiren hoṛko ape do bako kurudapea menkhan iń doko kurudạńgea, ente onko reaṅ noa gohań emeda je, onkoakʼ joto kạmi do bạṛicʼgetakoa.
Do, apege porobte calakʼpe. Ińakʼ okte do ńit hõ baṅ purạu akante bạń sen hataṛokʼ kana.”
Noako katha menkate Jisu do Gạlilregeye tahẽyena.
Ado acʼren boehako porobteko senen khan acʼ hõ onḍeye calaoena, menkhan sodorte do baṅ bickom oko okotege.
Ar porobre Jihudi mukhiạko do Jisu ńam baṛayeko ehopʼena arko menkeda, “Uni hoṛ do okare menaea?”
Ar hoṛko hõ bhiṛ talare Jisu reaṅko phasar phusuretʼ tahẽkana. Adomko doko menkeda, “Uni do bhage hoṛ kanae.” Arhõ adomko doko menkeda, “Baṅ, uni do hoṛkoe bulạuetʼkoa.”
Menkhan Jihudi mukhiạko botorte okoe hõ uni reaṅ sodorte do cetʼge bako roṛetʼ tahẽkana.
Ado porob adha ạdhiyen khan Jisu do mundilre bolokate cetʼakoe ehopʼena. Noate Jihudi mukhiạko do hahaṛayenteko menkeda,
“Nui hoṛ do jãhãn sikhnạt bae ńamakatʼre hõ cekate noako reaṅ doe baḍaekana?”
Jisu do onkoe metatʼkoa, “Oka cecetʼakʼ iń emokʼkan ona do ińakʼ do baṅkana, menkhan okoeye kolakadiń, uniakʼ kangea.
Jãhãe uniakʼ sanaleka senokʼe menjoṅ khan enḍekhane bujhạu daṛeakʼa noa cecetʼakʼ do Isor secʼ khonakʼ kana se iń nij khoniń roṛeda.
Okoe nij khon kathae roṛ uni do acʼakʼ sabasigeye ńam baṛaea, menkhan okoe kolakadiyicʼ reakʼ sabasiye ńam baṛayetʼkan uni doe sạrigea ar unire jãhãn eṛeakʼ do bạnukʼa.
Mose do cetʼ ạn-ạriko bae emakatʼpea? Menkhan ape modre okoe hõ onako ạn do bape manaoeda. Enḍekhan cedakʼ gojeń lạgitʼ dope kurumuṭuyeda?”
Onkoko roṛ ruạṛadea, “Amre do bhut menaea; okoe am gocʼme lạgitʼ doe kurumuṭu kana?”
Jisui metatʼkoa, “Iń do mitʼṭen iń kạmi akatʼte sanamkope hahaṛakʼ kana.
Mose do khatnakʼ reakʼ ạne emakatʼpea, ar jirạukʼ mãhãre hõ ape dope khatnayetʼkoa. Menkhan noa niạm do Mose khonakʼ do baṅkana, mare hapṛamko ṭhen khonge hecʼ ạguakana.
Moseakʼ ạn alo rạpud lạgitʼ jirạukʼ mãhãre gidrạkope khatnayetʼko khan, enḍekhan jirạukʼ mãhãre mitʼṭen hoṛiń bogekedete cedakʼpe edreạń kana?
Mẽtʼãhã ńelte do alope bicạra bickom hok reakʼge bicạrpe.”
Unre Jerusalemren adom adom hoṛko menkeda, “Mukhiyạko gojeko menetʼkan hoṛ do cetʼ nui kangeae?
Menkhan uni ma khulạsate kathae roroṛkan, ar mukhiạko hõ coṅ cetʼge bako metaekan. Enḍekhan onko do cetʼ sạrigeko baḍae oromkedea, nui doe Mạsi kana mente?
Tobe abo mabon baḍaege nui do oka khone hecʼakana mente. Menkhan Mạsiye hecʼlenre okoe hõ bako baḍaeyea uni do oka khone hecʼakana.”

Ona tayom Jisu do mundilreye cetʼakokan tahẽkanre ãṭ aṛaṅteye menkeda, “Ape do iń hõpe baḍae akadińạ, ar oka khoniń hecʼ akana ona hõpe baḍaegea. Ente ińte do bạń hecʼakana, menkhan sạri Isorgeye kolakadińa.
Uni do bape baḍae akadea menkhan iń doń baḍae akadea, ente iń do uni ṭhen khongeń hecʼakana ar unige iń doe kolakadińạ.”
Noa iạte onko hoṛ do Jisu sabeko menetʼ tahẽkana, menkhan un hạbicʼ hõ okte baṅ hoeakantae tahẽkante okoe hõ bako joṭetʼledea.
Menkhan ḍher hoṛge Jisure pạtiạuenteko menkeda, “Nui do aema hahaṛawakʼkoe kạmi kana. Mạsiye hecʼlenre noako khon hõ bạ̃ṛti hahaṛawakʼko cetʼ bae kạmiya?”
Hoṛko Jisu reaṅko phasar phusuretʼkan ona do Phạrusikoko ańjomkeda. Unre maraṅ naekeko ar Phạrusiko do Jisu sabe lạgitʼ peadakoko kolketʼkoa.
Jisui metatʼkoa, “Ape talare ḍher din do bạnuńa. Ona tayom okoeye kolakadiń uni ṭheniń ruạṛ calakʼa.
Arpe ńam baṛayińạ menkhan bape ńameńa, ar okareyiń tahen onḍe hõ ohogepe sen daṛelena.”
Jisuakʼ noa kathate Jihudi mukhiạko do ako talareko menkeda, “Nui hoṛ do okateye calakʼte babon ńam daṛeaea? Baṅ do Junạniko talare chir chạtur akan Jihudiko ṭhen senkate Junạnikoe cetʼako?
Enteye meneda, ‘ńam baṛańape menkhan bape ńameńa, ar iń okareń tahen onḍe do ohope sen daṛelena,’ noa katha reakʼ mane do cetʼkana?”
Ado porob reakʼ mucạtʼ din do mitʼṭen asol din tahẽkana. Enhilokʼ Jisu doe teṅgoyente ãṭ aṛaṅteye menkeda, “Jãhãe hoṛ tetaṅede khan uni do iń ṭhene hijukʼma ar dakʼe ńũ idijoṅma.
Ińre pạtiạukʼkạnicʼ do sonot sostor reakʼ katha leka uniakʼ ontor khon jiwetʼ dakʼ reakʼ gaḍa ạtu oḍokokʼa.”
Noa do uni Jiu reaṅe roṛkeda, one okoe acʼre pạtiạukʼte sonot Jiuko ńame. Unre sonot Jiu do bae emakan tahẽkana, ente un hạbicʼ Jisu hõ bae ṭhonok ocoakan tahẽkana.
Ado noako katha ańjomkate gadel hoṛko modre adomko doko menkeda, “Sạrige nui doe uni nạbi kana.”
Ar eṭakʼko doko menkeda, “Nui kangeae Mạsi do.” Menkhan adomko doko menkeda, “Mạsi do cetʼ Gạlil khone hijukʼa?
Sonot sostorre cetʼ bae meneda, Dạud bõs ar Dạude tahẽkan Betlehem khonge Mạsi doe janamokʼa mente?”
Nonkate Jisu iạte hoṛko talare bhinạ bhini hoyena.
Onko modre adomko do Jisu sabeko menetʼ tahẽkana menkhan okoe hõ unire hat bako lagaoleda.
Ar okoe peadakoko kol ocolen onko do maraṅ naeke ar Phạrusiko ṭhenko ruạṛ hecʼen khanko kuli ocoyena, “Uni do cedakʼ bape ạguledea?”
Adoko menkeda, “Uni hoṛ cetʼ lekae roṛetʼkan onka do okoe hõ tisge bako roṛakada.”
Noate Phạrusiko do onko peadakoko metatʼkoa, “Ape hõpe bulạu ocoyena se cetʼ?
Mukhiyạko se Phạrusiko modren okoe hõ coṅ unirema bacoko pạtiạu akan.
Menkhan noko hoṛko, noko do Moseakʼ ạn-ạriko hõ bako baḍaea; nokore do sarap paṛao akana.”
Nikodemus, okoe do lahare Jisu ṭhene senlen, uni do Phạrusiko modren mitʼ hoṛe tahẽkana.
Uni doe metatʼkoa, “Jãhãe hoṛakʼ moca katha begor ańjomte ar cetʼe ceka kana begor baḍaete sạjại emae do cetʼ aboakʼ ạnre menakʼgea?”
Inạ tayom hoṛko do apan ạpin oṛakʼteko senbaṛayena, menkhan Jisu do Jạitun buruteye rakapʼ calaoena.
Dosar hilokʼ Jisu do ạḍi setakʼre arhõ mundilteye hecʼen khan sanam hoṛ uni ṭhenko hecʼena. Unre Jisu do duṛupʼkate onko cetʼakoe ehopʼena.
Ạn-ạrire Mose do nonkan maejiu dhirite tiń gocʼko reakʼe hukum akatʼbona. Menkhan am do cetʼem meneda?”
Onko do Jisu biḍạue lạgitʼ noa kathako menkeda, jemon dusire paṛaoe lạgitʼ mitʼṭen karonko ńam daṛeakʼ. Unre Jisu do tumbutʼkate kạṭupʼte otre olokʼe ehopʼena.
Ado kulitegeko tahẽyen khan uni do sojheyenteye metatʼkoa, “Apeko modre okoe bae kại akatʼ unige pạhilre dhiriteye tiń maṛaṅema.”
Noa tayom uni do arhõe tumbutʼente otre olokʼe ehopʼena.
Noa katha ańjomkate onko mukhiạko modre haṛam khon ehopʼkate mitʼ mitʼte jotoko calao cabayena. Eken Jisu eskargeye sarecʼ tahẽyena, ar acʼ samaṅre do uni maejiuge teṅgo akan.
Jisu doe sojheyente uni maejiue metadea, “Okayenako onko do? Okoege cetʼ sạjại ńam lek mente bako bicạr dusiletʼmea?”
Uni maejiue roṛ ruạṛkeda, “Okoe hõ baṅ Probhu.” Unre Jisui menkeda, “Iń hõ bạń dusiyetʼmea. Do calakʼme ar kạire jion alom khemaoa.”
Jisu do arhõ hoṛkoe metatʼkoa, “Ińge dhạrti reakʼ marsal. Okoe ińakʼ horteye calakʼ uni do tis hõ ńutre bae taṛama, bickom jion reakʼ marsale ńama.”
Onate Phạrusiko do Jisuko metadea, “Amakʼ goha do sạriakʼ do baṅkana, ente am do apnar reaṅ goham emeda.”

Jisui roṛ ruạṛatʼkoa, “Iń do apnarte gohań emetʼkanre hõ ińakʼ goha do sạrigea, ente oka khoniń hecʼakana ar okateń calakʼkan ona doń baḍaegea. Menkhan ape do bape baḍaea oka khoniń hecʼakana ar okateń calakʼa mente.
Manwa cetʼlekako bicạretʼkan onkage ape hõpe bicạretʼ kana, menkhan iń do okoe hõ bạń bicạretʼkoa.
Ar jãhãtis iń bicạrlere hõ ińakʼ bicạr do sạrigea, ente iń do bạń eskara. Iń ma minạńge ar okoeye kolakadiń uni ińren Baba hõ soṅgete menaea.
Apeakʼ ạnre ol menakʼa, bar hoṛ mitʼ gohakin emlekhan ona do sạrigea.
Iń do iń reakʼ gohań emeda, ar ińe kolakadiń Baba hõ iń reakʼ gohae emeda.”
Phạrusikoko metadea, “Amren Baba do okare menaea?” Jisui roṛ ruạṛatʼkoa, “Ape do iń hõ bape baḍae akadińạ ar ińren Baba hõ bape baḍae akadea. Ente ińpe baḍaeliń khan honaṅ ińren Baba hõpe baḍaekea.”
