Jisu do mundilreye cetʼakokan tahẽkan jokhecʼ dan samaṅokʼ jaegare noa doe metatʼkoa. Menkhan un hạbicʼ uniakʼ okte baṅ hoeakantae tahẽkante okoe hõ bako sapʼledea.
Jisu do arhõ Phạrusikoe metatʼkoa, “Iń doń calakʼkana. Arpe ńam baṛańa, menkhan ape do apeakʼ kạirepe gujukʼa. Ar okateń calakʼkan onḍe do ohope sen daṛelena.”
Unre Jihudi mukhiạko menkeda, “Acʼtegeye gujukʼa se cetʼ? Enteye meneda, ‘iń okateń calakʼkan onḍe do bape sen daṛeakʼa.’ ”
Jisui metatʼkoa, “Iń do coṭ khoniń hecʼ akana ar ape do latar khonpe hecʼakana. Ape do noa dhạrtiren kanape, menkhan iń do noa dhạrtiren doń baṅkana.
Onateń metapekana, ape do apeakʼ kạirepe gujukʼa. Ar ińkangeạń mente bape pạtiạukʼ kan khan apeakʼ kạiregepe gujukʼa.”
Noa iạte mukhiạko do Jisuko kulikedea, “Am dom okoe kana?” Jisui metatʼkoa, “Pạhil khon okań metapekan iń doń uni kangea.
Ape roṛpe reaṅ ar bicạrpe lạgitʼ ạḍi okocʼge menakʼtińạ. Menkhan okoeye kolakadiń unire eṛeteakʼ do bạnukʼa; ar uni ṭhen khon okań ańjomakatʼ onage manwakoń lạiako kana.”
Onko do bako bujhạleda Jisu do Baba reaṅgeye lạiako kana mente.

Onate Jisui metatʼkoa, “Manwa Hopon tinre coṭtepe rakabea unrepe baḍae daṛeakʼa, iń doń uni kangea. Ar noa hõpe bujhạu daṛeakʼa iń do ińte cetʼge bạń kạmikana, bickom Baba okae cetʼ akawạdiń onageń roṛeda.
Okoe ińe kolakadiń unige iń sãote menaea. Uni do eskar bae bạgi akawạdińạ, ente okaṭakʼ kạmiye kusiyakʼkan onage siń sạṭupʼ iń kạmiyeda.”
Jisu do noakoe galmarao akokan tahẽkanre ḍher hoṛge unireko pạtiạuena.
Ado okoe Jihudikoko pạtiạuade Jisu do onkoe metatʼkoa, “Ińakʼ katha lekape senlen khan sạrige ińren celako kanape.
Ona chaḍa ape do sạriakʼtetʼpe baḍae daṛeakʼa, ar ona sạriakʼtetʼge ape doe sạdhinpea.”
Unre Jihudi mukhiạko do Jisuko metadea, “Ale do Abrahamren bõs kanale; ar tisge okoeren golam hõ bale hoeakana. Am do cekatem meneda, ale dole sạdhin ocokʼa?”
Jisui roṛ ruạṛatʼkoa, “Sạrigeń metapekana, okoe kạireko tahenkan onko sanamkoge kạiren golam kanako.
Golam do oṛakʼre jaejug bae tahena menkhan Hopon do jaejug hạbicʼe tahena.
Onate Isorren Hopone sạdhinlepere sạrige ape do sạdhinpe hoyokʼa.
Baḍaegeạń Abrahamren bõsko kanape, menkhan enhõ ape do gojeńpe menjoṅkana, ente ińakʼ katha do apeakʼ ontorre jaega bae ńameda.
Iń do ińren Baba ṭhen okań ńelakatʼ onageń roṛeda, ar ape do aperen baba ṭhen khon okape ańjomakatʼ onagepe kạmi kana.”
Onate onko Jihudi mukhiạko do Jisuko metadea, “Abraham doe aleren baba kana.” Jisui metatʼkoa, “Ape do Abrahamren hoponkope hoelen khan Abraham lekagepe kạmikea.
Isor ṭhen khon oka sạriakʼtetʼ iń baḍae akatʼ onage ape doń lạiape kana, ar enhõ gojeńpe menetʼkana; menkhan Abraham do nonka bae kạmileda.
Ape do aperen baba okae kạmikan ape hõ onagepe kạmikana.” Onko do Jisuko metadea, “Loṭghuṭire do bale janam akana. Aleren do mitʼ goṭenge baba menae talea, uni do Isorge.”

Jisui metatʼkoa, “Isor do sạrige aperen babae hoelentape khan ińpe dulạṛkińạ, ente iń do Isor khoniń hecʼ akana ar ńitokʼ do ape talare minạńạ. Iń apnarte do bạń hecʼakana, menkhan unigeye kolakadińạ.
Cetʼ iạte ińakʼ kathako bape bujhạueda? Ente ape do ińakʼ roṛ bape sahao daṛeakʼ kana.

Soetange aperen baba do, ar ape do uniren hoponko kanape; onate uniakʼ sana purạupe menjoṅ kana. Soetan do pạhil khongeye khũniạhi kana. Uni do tisge sạriakʼre bae teṅgo akana, ente unire do sạriakʼtetʼge bạnukʼa. Uni do eṛe kathae roṛre acʼ khongeye roṛa, ente uni doe eṛeyicʼ kana ar sanam lekan eṛeakʼ do uni khonge janam akana.
Menkhan sạri kathań roṛetʼte ape do bape pạtiạuạń kana.
Ape modre kại hoṛ kạnạń mente jãhãeye sạbud daṛekińạ? Ar sạriakʼ iń roṛetʼ khan cedakʼ bape pạtiạuạń kana?
Okoe hoṛ doe Isorren kan, uni do Isorakʼ kathageye ańjoma. Ape dope baṅkante Isorakʼ katha bape ańjomeda.”
Unre Jihudi mukhiạko do Jisuko metadea, “Ale do cetʼ ṭhik kathage bale meneda baṅma, am dom Samariạ kana ar amre do bhut menaea mente?”
Jisui roṛ ruạṛatʼkoa, “Ińre bhut do bạnuea. Iń do ińren Babań manot edekana, menkhan ape dope be manot edeńkana.
Iń do apnarakʼ sabasi ńam lạgitʼ do bạń kurumuṭu kana, menkhan mitʼ goṭen menaea one okoe do manote emạńkan, ar uni kangea bicạricʼ do.
Sạrigeń metapekana, jãhãege ińakʼ katha leka senokʼe menjoṅ enḍekhan uni do tis hõ bae gujukʼa.”

Jihudi mukhiạko do uniko metadea, “Ale do ńitokʼ sạrigele bujhạueda je, amre do bhut menaea. Abraham ar nạbiko hõko gocʼena, ar am dom meneda, ‘jãhãege ińakʼ katha lekae senokʼ uni do tis hõ bae gujukʼa.’ Am do cetʼ baba Abraham khon hõm maraṅgea?
Uni mae gocʼenge ar nạbiko hõko gocʼena. Am do apnarte celeyem benaokʼ kana?”
Jisui roṛ ruạṛatʼkoa, “Iń do ińtegeń sabasikʼkan khan ona reakʼ do cetʼ damge bạnukʼa. Ińren Baba, one okoe do aperen Isor mentepe dạbiyetʼkan unige iń do manote emạń kana.
Ape do tis hõ bape baḍae akadea, menkhan iń doń baḍae edekana. Ar bạń baḍae akadea menteń menlekan, ape leka eṛeyicʼgeń hoyokʼa. Menkhan iń doń baḍaeyede kana ar uniakʼ katha lekageń calakʼ kana.
Aperen baba Abraham hõ ińakʼ dinko ńel lạgitʼe hulạslena. Menkhan uni doe ńelleda ar kusi hõe kusilena.”
Jihudi mukhiạko do Jisuko metadea, “Amakʼ umer ma mõṛẽgel bochor hõ baṅ hoeakan, ar am do cetʼ Abrahamem ńelakadea?”
Ado horteye calakʼkan tahẽkan jokhecʼ Jisu do mitʼṭen kãṛã hoṛe ńel ńamkedea. Uni do janam khonge kãṛãgeye tahẽkana.
Unre celako do Jisuko kulikedea, “E Probhu, okoeye kạiletʼte nui do kãṛãgeye janamena? Nui se nuiren go-babakin?”
Jisui roṛ ruạṛkeda, “Nui hõ bae kại akada, ar nuiren go-baba hõ baṅ. Noa do hoeakana jemon Isorakʼ kạmi uni bhitrite sodorokʼ.
Okoeye kolakadiń, uniakʼ do siń tahenrege kạmi hoyokʼ tabona. Ńindạ daraekana unre okoe hõ bako kạmi daṛeakʼa.
Dhạrtire tinạkʼ din minạń iń do dhạrti reakʼ marsal kạnạń.”
Ado noa menkate uni do otreye thokeda ar losotʼe benaokeda. Ar ona tayom do uniakʼ mẽtʼre thopramadeteye metadea,

“Do Siloam pukhrire senkate abokʼme.” Siloam reakʼ mane do kol ocoakan. Uni hoṛ do senkateye apʼena ar ńeńele ehopʼen khane ruạṛ hecʼena. Noa ńelte aḍepaserenko ar okoe do kokoe hoṛ menteko ńellede onko sanamkogeko menkeda,
nui do cetʼ uni hoṛ doe baṅkana, one okoe do duṛupʼkateye kokoekan tahẽkan?”
Adomko doko menkeda, “Hẽ, nui hoṛ kangeae.” Arhõ adomko doko menkeda, “Nui do ńelokʼte uni lekanre hõe uni doe baṅkana.” Menkhan uni hoṛ do acʼgeye menkeda, “Hẽ, uni kangeạń.”
Adoko metadea, “Enḍekhan cekate amakʼ mẽtʼ do beṅgetʼentama?”
Uni doe roṛ ruạṛkeda, “Jisu ńutuman hoṛ do losotʼ benaokate ińakʼ mẽtʼreye lagao ạdińa ar Siloam pukhrire senkate abokʼe metadińạ. Iń do calao kateń apʼen khan ńeńeliń ehopʼena.”
Onko doko metadea, “Okare menaea uni hoṛ do?” Uni doe menkeda, “Iń do bạń baḍaea.”
Ado Phạrusiko ṭhenko idikedea.
Jisu do oka hilokʼ losotʼ benaokate uni hoṛakʼ mẽtʼkine beṅgetʼ ocoketʼtae ona din do jirạukʼ mãhã tahẽkana.
Onate Phạrusiko do arhõko kulikedea, “Am do cekatem ńeńelkana?” Khange Phạrusikoe metatʼkoa, “Uni do ińakʼ mẽtʼkinre losotʼe lagao ạdińạ ariń apʼen khan ńeńeliń ehopʼena.”

Noate Phạrusiko modren adomko doko menkeda, “Uni hoṛ do Isor ṭhen khon bae hecʼakana, ente uni do jirạukʼ mãhã hõ bae manaoeda.” Eṭakʼ Phạrusiko doko menkeda, “Cekate mitʼṭen kại hoṛ do nonkan hahaṛawakʼe kạmi daṛekea?” Nonkate onko talare bhinạ bhini hoyena.
Unre onko do arhõ uni hoṛko kuli doṛhakedea, “Am do uni reakʼ cetʼem menkea? Ente uni do amakʼ mẽtʼkine jhicʼ ocoakatʼtama.” Uni doe menkeda, “Mitʼṭen nạbi kanae.”
Menkhan Jihudi mukhiạko do uniren go-baba ạuriko kulikin hạbicʼ bako pạtiạulena je, uni do jonom kãṛãye tahẽkana ar ńitokʼ doe ńeńelkana mente.
Onko do uniren go-babako kuliketʼkinạ, “Nui do cetʼ abenren koṛa kanae one uni reaṅ ben menetʼkan uni do kãṛãgeye janamlena mente? Enḍekhan cekate ńitokʼ doe ńeńelkana?”
Uniren go-babakin roṛ ruạṛatʼkoa, “Ạliń liń baḍaea nui do ạlińren koṛa kanae, ar kãṛãgeye janamlena.
Menkhan cekate ńitokʼ doe ńeńelkana ona do bạliń baḍaea; ar okoe nuiakʼ mẽtʼe beṅgetʼ ocoakatʼtae ona hõ bạliń baḍaea. Uni doe sẽṛãgea, unige kuliyepe. Uni do acʼ reaṅ acʼtegeye lại ocoge.”
Uniren go-baba do Jihudi mukhiạko botorte noa dokin menkeda, ente Jihudi mukhiạko do laha khongeko goṭa ạguakatʼ tahẽkana je, jãhãege Jisu do Mạsi menteye aṅgoce uni doe biṭlạha ocokʼa.
Onate uniren go-baba dokin menkeda, “Uni doe sẽṛãgea, unige kuliyepe.”
Ado okoe kãṛãgeye tahẽkan mukhiạko do arhõ dosar dhao hohoadeteko metadea, “Am do sạri katha roṛte Isorge sabasi emaeme. Alele baḍaea uni doe kại hoṛ kana.”
Uniye roṛ ruạṛatʼkoa, “Kại hoṛ kanae se baṅ ona do bạń baḍaea; menkhan noań baḍaea, lahate iń do kãṛãgeń tahẽkana ar ńitokʼ doń ńeńelkana.”
Mukhiyạko doko metadea, “Uni do cetʼe cekawatʼmea? Ar cekate mẽtʼ doe beṅgetʼ ocoketʼtama?”
Uni hoṛ doe roṛ ruạṛatʼkoa, “Iń ma coṅ laharegeń lại akawatʼpe, menkhan ape do bape ańjomleda. Enḍekhan cedakʼ arhõ ańjom sanayetʼpea? Ape hõ cetʼ uniren cela hoyokʼ sanayetʼpea?”
Onate mukhiạko do ruhạtʼkedeteko metadea, “Am kanam uni hoṛren cela do, menkhan ale do Moseren cela kanale.”
Alele baḍaea Isor do Moseye galmaraoade tahẽkana, menkhan uni hoṛ do oka khone hecʼakana ona do bale baḍaea.”
Unre uniye roṛ ruạṛatʼkoa, “Onage tho hahaṛa do! Ape hõ bape baḍaea uni do oka khone hecʼakana menkhan uni do ińakʼ mẽtʼe beṅgetʼ ocoketʼtińạ.”
Baḍaegea bon Isor do kại hoṛakʼ katha bae ańjoma. Menkhan jãhãege Isor sewa hoṛe hoyokʼ ar uniakʼ sanalekae kạmi enḍekhan Isor do uniakʼe ańjomtaea.
Dhạrti sirjạu khon tis hõ baṅ ańjom akana jonom kãṛã hoṛakʼ mẽtʼ jãhãeye jhicʼ akatʼa mente.
Uni do Isor ṭhen khon bae hecʼlen khan honaṅ cetʼge ohoe ceka daṛelea.”
Khange mukhiạko doko metadea, “Am ma kạirem janam akan ar alem cetʼale kana?” Noa menkate onko do somaj khonko oḍok gotʼkadea.
Ado Jisui ańjomkeda je, mukhiạko do uni hoṛ bahreteko oḍok akadea. Tayomte Jisu do uni hoṛ sendra ńamkedeteye metadea, “Am do cetʼ Manwa Hoponrem pạtiạukʼ kana?”
Uniye roṛ ruạṛkeda, “E Probhu, lạiạńme uni doe okoe kana, jemon unireń pạtiạukʼ.”
Jisu do uniye metadea, “Uni dom ńelakadegea, ar unige am sãoteye galmarao kana.”
Unre uni hoṛe menkeda, “E Probhu, iń doń pạtiạukʼ kangea.” Ar noa menkate Jisui sewawadea.
Jisui menkeda, “Iń do dhạrtite bicạr lạgitʼ iń hecʼakana, jemon baṅ ńeńelkoko ńeńel ar okoeko ńeńelkan onko do kãṛãko hoyokʼ.”
Adom Phạrusiko do Jisu sãoteko tahẽkana. Onko do noa katha ańjomte Jisuko metadea, “Enḍekhan ale hõ cetʼle kãṛãgea?”
Jisui metatʼkoa, “Kãṛãpe tahen khan honaṅ kại do oho tahẽlen tapea. Menkhan apepe meneda ńeńel kangeale ar onatege apeakʼ kại do tahen kana.
“Sạrigeń metape kana, jãhãege bhiḍi khạṛ reakʼ duạrte baṅ bolokate eṭakʼ secʼteye bolokʼ uni do kombṛo are ḍạku kana.
Menkhan okoe duạr secʼte bhitriteye bolokʼkan unige bhiḍikoren gupiyicʼ do.
Bhiḍikoakʼ khạṛ okoeye horhoyetʼkan uni do gupiyicʼge duạre jhicʼaea. Bhiḍiko do uniakʼ aṛaṅko ańjomtaea, ar gupiyicʼ do acʼren bhiḍiko ńutum ńumkateye hohoakote bahreteye oḍok idikoa.
Ar acʼren sanam bhiḍikoe oḍokleko tayom onko laha lahateye calakʼa ar bhiḍiko do uniko pańja idiyea ente onko do uniakʼ aṛaṅko oromakatʼtaea.
Onko do tis hõ ạnạṛi hoṛ ohoko pańjalea bickom uni khonko ńir pharakokʼa, ente ạnạṛi hoṛakʼ aṛaṅ do bako oromakada.”
Onko Phạrusiko cetʼako lạgitʼ Jisu do noa kathae menkeda menkhan cetʼe lạiatʼkoa ona do bako bujhạuleda.
Onate Jisu do arhõe metatʼkoa, “Sạrigeń metape kana, ińkangeạń bhiḍiko reakʼ duạr do.
Iń lahate okoeko hecʼlen onko sanamkoge kombṛo arko ḍạku kana, menkhan bhiḍiko onkoakʼ katha do bako ańjomleda.
Duạr do ińge. Ente jãhãege iń secʼte bhitriteye bolokʼ uni do bańcaoe ńama. Uni do bhitriteye bolokʼa ar bahreteye oḍokokʼa ar ạtiń lạgitʼ jaegae ńama.
Kombṛo do eken kombṛo, khũn ar nonosṭo lạgitʼe hijukʼa. Iń doń hecʼakana jemon jionko ńam, ar ona jion jemon sareṛokʼtako.
“Boge gupiyicʼ do ińge. Boge gupiyicʼ do acʼren bhiḍiko lạgitʼ acʼakʼ jiwiye alaetaea.
Arhõ bhiḍiko menakʼkotińạ one okoe do noa khạṛrenko baṅkan; onko hõ ạguko hoyokʼtińạ. Onko do ińakʼ aṛaṅko ańjoma ar onate mitʼ khạṛ bhiḍiko hoyokʼa ar gupiyicʼ hõ mitʼṭenge.
Baba do noa iạteye dulạṛedeń kana, ente iń do ińakʼ jiwiyiń alayetʼtińa jemon arhõ onań ruạṛ ạgu daṛeakʼ.

Okoe hõ ińakʼ jiwi iń khon do bako rejeńa, menkhan iń do ińtegeń alaeyeda. Iń do jiwi alae reakʼ ektiạri menakʼtiń arhõ jiwi hatao ruạṛ reakʼ hõ ektiạri menakʼtińạ. Noa dạyik do ińren Baba ṭhen khoniń ńamakada.”
Jisuakʼ noa katha iạte Jihudiko talare arhõ bhinạ bhini hoyena.
Onko modren ḍher hoṛko menkeda, “Unire do bhut menaea, uni doe bạulạha akana; cedakʼ uniakʼ katha dope ańjometʼtaea?”
Eṭakʼko doko menkeda, “Noa do bhut capaṛ hoṛakʼ katha do baṅkana. Bhut do cetʼ kãṛã hoṛakʼ mẽtʼe beṅgetʼ oco daṛekea?”
Noa tayom Jerusalemre mundil dhorom aroe reakʼ porob seṭerena. Unre rabaṅ din tahẽkana.
Jisu do mundilre Solomonakʼ pinḍạreye dãṛã bãṛãekan tahẽkana.
Unre Jihudi mukhiạko do Jisu esetʼ ạcurkedeteko metadea, “Ar tinạkʼ din digdhạrem dohokalea? Mạsi kanam menkhan enḍekhan pusṭạute lạialeme.”
Jisui roṛ ruạṛatʼkoa, “Ape mań lại akawatʼpe, menkhan bape pạtiạukʼ kana. Ińren Baba ńutumte okakoń kạmikan onakoge iń reaṅ gohaye emeda.
Menkhan ape do bape pạtiạukʼkana, ente ińren bhiḍiko dope baṅkana.
Ińren bhiḍiko do ińakʼ aṛaṅko ańjomeda. Ar iń doń baḍae oromakatʼkoa ar onko do ińko pańjayediń kana.
Iń do jaejug jioniń emakokana. Onko do tishõ ohoko nosṭolena ar okoe hõ iń khon ohoko recʼidi daṛelekoa.
Ińren Baba, one okoe do onkoe emakawạdiń, uni do sanam khone maraṅa. Okoe hõ Babawakʼ ti khon do bako recʼ idi daṛeakoa.
“Iń ar Baba doliń mitʼgea.”
Unre Jihudi mukhiạko do tińe lạgitʼ dhiriko halaṅkeda.
Jisu do onkoe metatʼkoa, “Babawakʼ hukumleka ạḍi okocʼ bhage kạmikoń udukʼ akawatʼpea Onako modre okalekanakʼ kạmi iạte dhirite tińińpe menetʼ kana?”
Mukhiyạkoko menkeda, “Bhage kạmi iạte tińme do bale meneda, menkhan Isor birudre bemanot katham roṛetʼ iạtege. Ente am do manwa hoekate hõ Isorem benaokʼkana.”
Jisui menkeda, “Apeakʼ ạnre cetʼ baṅ olakana, ‘Ińiń menakada, ape do Deb kanape?’
Isorakʼ katha okoe ṭhen hecʼlen onkoge coṅ uni ma Deb menteye metatʼko tahẽkan. Sonot sostor reakʼ katha do cetʼ mạutạ daṛekokʼa? Tis hõ baṅa.
Enḍekhan Baba okoeye sonot akade ar dhạrtiteye kolkede uni ińge tinreń metapekana ‘Iń doń Isorren Hopon kana,’ unre cekatepe meneda, ‘am do Isor birudre bemanot katham roṛeda?’
Ińren Babawakʼ kạmiko bạń kạmiyetʼ khan alope pạtiạuạńạ.
Menkhan ińiń kạmikan khan iń bape pạtiạuạńre hõ ińakʼ kạmiko baṛe pạtiạuakʼpe. Onatepe baḍaea arpe bujhạu daṛeakʼa, Baba do ińre menaea ar iń do Babare minạńa.”
Unre Jihudi mukhiạko do Jisu sabe lạgitʼko kurumuṭukeda, menkhan uni do onkoakʼ ti khone paskao calaoena.
Ona tayom uni do arhõ Jordan gaḍa hanasa senkateye tahẽyena. Johan do nonḍege pạhile bạptisetʼko kan tahẽkana.
Ar ḍher hoṛ Jisu ṭhenko hecʼena arko menkeda, “Johan do jãhãn hahaṛa kạmi bae kạmileda, menkhan enhõ nui hoṛ reaṅ cetʼkoe lạiletʼ ona joto do sạrigea.”
Ar onḍe ạḍi utạr hoṛ Jisureko pạtiạuena.
Lasar ńutuman Bethaniạren mitʼṭen hoṛ do ruạteye kạhil akan tahẽkana. Mạriạm ar uniren boeha kuṛi Martha hõ ona atoregekin tahenkan tahẽkana.
Nui doe uni Mạriạm kana one okoe do Probhuakʼ jaṅgare mahkaokʼ sunume ojokʼade tahẽkante acʼakʼ upʼte jaṅgakine jotʼletʼtae. Ar ruạte okoeye kạhil akan tahẽkan nui Lasar do Mạriạmren boehae tahẽkana.
Onate unkin boeha kuṛi do Jisu ṭhen noa kathakin roṛgotʼkada, “E Probhu, okoeyem dulạṛedekan uni do ruạteye kạhil akana.”
Noa katha ańjomkate Jisui menkeda, “Noa ruạ do gujukʼ lạgitʼ do baṅkana bickom Isorakʼ ṭhonok sodorokʼ lạgitʼge hoeakana, jemon noa hotete Isorren Hoponakʼ ṭhonok sodorokʼtae.”
Jisu do Martha ar uniren bokot kuṛi ar Lasare dulạṛetʼko tahẽkana.
Ado tinre Lasarakʼ ruạkʼ reakʼ kathae ańjomkeda unre uni do okareye tahẽkan onḍege arhõ bar dine tahẽyena.
Ona tayom Jisu do celakoe metatʼkoa, “Dela bon, arhõ Jihudạte bon calakʼa.”
Celakoko metadea, “E Guru, thoṛa din lahare mukhiạko dhirite tińmeko menetʼ tahẽkana, am do cetʼ arhõ onḍe calakʼem menjoṅ kana?”
Jisui roṛ ruạṛatʼkoa, “Din reakʼ do cetʼ gelbar ghonṭa bạnukʼa? Jãhãege sińreye dãṛãn khan uni do bae tohodokʼa, ente uni do noa dhạrti reakʼ marsale ńeleda.
Menkhan jãhãege ńindại dãṛãn uni doe tohodokʼa ente unire marsal do bạnukʼa.”
Noako katha roṛ tayom celakoe metatʼkoa, “Aboren gate Lasar doe jạpitʼ akada, menkhan uni berede lạgitʼ iń calakʼkana.”
Noa iạte celakoko metadea, “E Probhu, jạpitʼ akatʼ khane bańcaokʼa.”
Jisu do Lasare gocʼ akan reakʼ kathae roṛkeda, menkhan uniren celako doko bujhạukeda jạpitʼ hataṛ reakʼ kathageye metatʼkoa.
Unre Jisu do pusṭạuteye metatʼkoa, “Lasar doe gocʼ akana,
menkhan apeakʼ katha hudiskate rạskạń bujhạueda, iń do onḍe bạń tahẽkana jemonpe pạtiạukʼ. Ado dela, Lasar ṭhen bon calakʼa.”
Unre Thoma, okoe do jawako metae, uni do sãotenkoe metatʼkoa, “Delabon, abo hõbon calakʼa, jemon uni sãotebo gujukʼ.”
Ado Jisu onḍe seṭeren khane baḍaekeda, Lasar do pon din lahareko topa akadea.
Ar Jerusalem khon Bethaniạ do bar mail gan sạṅgińre tahẽkana.
Jihudiko modren ḍher hoṛge Martha ar Mạriạmren boehae gocʼakan iạte jiwi raṛecʼ tạkin lạgitʼko hecʼakan tahẽkana.
Ado Jisui hijukʼkane ańjomketʼ khan Martha do uni sãote ńapamokʼ lạgitʼe oḍok calaoena, menkhan Mạriạm do oṛakʼregeye duṛupʼ tahẽyena.
Martha do Jisui metadea, “E Probhu, nonḍem tahẽlen khan bareń do ohoe gocʼlena.
Menkhan ińiń baḍaea, am do ńit hõ Isor jãhãnakʼgem koeye Isor do onageye emama.”
Jisu do uniye metadea, “Amren boeha do arhõe jiwetʼ beredokʼa”
Unre Marthae menkeda, “Baḍaegeạń, mucạtʼ dinre gocʼko tinreko jiwetʼ beredokʼa unre uni hõe beredokʼa.”
Jisu do uniye metadea, “Ińge beretʼ ruạṛokʼtetʼ ar jion do. Okoe ińreye pạtiạukʼ uni doe gocʼlenre hõ jiwetʼe tahena.
Ar okoe jiwetʼ menae ar ińreye pạtiạukʼkan uni do tis hõ ohoe gocʼlena. Am do cetʼ noam pạtiạukʼ kangea?”
Marthae menkeda, “Hẽ Probhu, iń doń pạtiạukʼ kangea, amge Isorren Hopon dhạrtite hijukʼicʼ do.”
Noa katha menkate Martha doe calaoena ar bokot kuṛi Mạriạm danaṅre hohoadeteye metadea, “Gurui hecʼ akana are hohoam kana.”
Mạriạm do noa katha ańjomtora usạra beretʼkate Jisu ṭhene senena. Jisu do un hạbicʼ hõ atote bae boloakan tahẽkana;
Martha okareye ńapamlede uni do onḍegeye tahẽkana.

Ar okoe Jihudiko Mạriạm tulucʼ oṛakʼreko tahẽkan ar jiwiko raṛecʼetʼtae tahẽkan onko do Mạriạm hako pako bahrete calakʼkanko ńelkede khanko pańjakedea. Onko doko hudiskeda, Mạriạm do topa ṭhen rakʼjoṅ lạgitʼe calakʼkana.
Ado Jisu okareye tahẽkan onḍe Mạriạme hecʼena ar uniye ńelkede khan jaṅgare giḍiyenteye menkeda, “E Probhu, nonḍe baṛem tahẽlen khan bareń do ohoe gocʼlena.”
Jisu do Mạriạm ar uni soṅgeteko hecʼakan Jihudiko rarakʼkane ńelketʼko khan jiwireye kạulạ kạuliyena.
Uni do onkoe metatʼkoa, “Okare Lasarpe bae akadea?” Metadeako, “E Probhu, dela hecʼkate ńelme.”
Unre Jisui rakʼkeda.
Onate Jihudikoko menkeda, “Ma ńelepe, uni do Lasar tinạkʼe dulạṛede tahẽkana.”
Menkhan Jihudiko modren adomko doko menkeda, “Okoe kãṛã hoṛakʼ mẽtʼẽ beṅgetʼ ocoketʼ uni do cetʼ nonkanakʼ bae kạmi daṛekea jemon Lasar aloe gocʼkokʼ?”
Noate Jisuakʼ mon do arhõ kạulạ kạuliyentaea ar topa ṭhene calaoena. Topa do mitʼṭen dander tahẽkana. Ar ona dander duạrre mitʼṭen dhiri doho akan tahẽkana.
Jisui metatʼkoa, “Dhiri ocogpe.” Ado gocʼakanicʼren misera Martha do Jisui metadea, “E Probhu, ńitokʼ doe soyena, ente gocʼkate teheń pon dine hoyokʼkana.”
Jisu do Marthae metadea, “Am do cetʼ bạń metatʼmea pạtiạulen khan Isorakʼ ṭhonokem ńela?”
Unre dhiriko ocokʼkeda. Ar Jisu do coṭ secʼ beṅgetʼ rakapʼkateye menkeda, “E Baba, ińakʼ katham ańjomketʼte iń do amiń gun manao joharam kana.
Ińiń baḍaea am do jaoge ińakʼ katham ańjometʼtińa. Menkhan okoeko hoṛ beṛhaeteko teṅgo akan onko jemonko pạtiạukʼ amem kolakadińạ mente, ar onatege noa katha doń menkeda.
Noa kathae menketʼ khan Jisu do ãṭ aṛaṅteye hohokeda, “E Lasar, oḍok hijukʼme.”
Khange gocʼlenicʼ do topa khone oḍokʼ hecʼena. Uniakʼ ti-jaṅga do topa reakʼ kicricʼte bedhao akan ar mẽtʼãhã do gamchate tol poṭomge tahẽkantaea. Jisu do hoṛkoe metatʼkoa, “Raṛayepe ar sen ocoaepe.
Mạriạm ṭhen okoe Jihudikoko hecʼakan tahẽkan onko modren ạḍi utạr hoṛ do Jisuakʼ noa kạmi ńelte unireko pạtiạuena.
Menkhan onko modren adomko do Phạrusiko ṭhen senkate Jisu okae kạmiletʼ onako lạiatʼkoa.
Unre maraṅ naekeko ar Phạrusiko do maraṅ bạisiren hoṛkoko jarwaketʼkoteko metatʼkoa, “Ńitokʼ do cetʼ bo cekaea? Nui hoṛ do ạḍi utạr hahaṛa kạmikoe kạmi kana.
Ar nonkage bon aṛakʼ idiyae khan sanamkoge unireko pạtiạukʼa ar Romiko do hecʼkate aboakʼ mundil ar jạtko marao tabona.”
Onko modren Kaeapha ńutuman mitʼ hoṛ do ona bochorren maraṅ naekeye tahẽkana.
Uni doe metatʼkoa, “Ape do cetʼge bape baḍaea, ar hudis hõ bape hudisetʼ kana, goṭa jạt nosṭokʼ khon bickom sanam hoṛko bodolte mitʼ hoṛ gujukʼge bhagea.”
Kaeapha do noa katha apnar khone roṛleda ona do baṅ menkhan uni do ona bochorren maraṅ naekeye tahẽkana. Onate uni doe nạbileda, Jihudi jạtko lạgitʼ Jisugeye gujukʼa mente.
Ar eken Jihudi jạtko lạgitʼ do baṅ, menkhan Isorren chir chạtur akan gidrạko samṭaoko lạgitʼ hõ uni doe gujukʼa.
Ado enhilokʼ khon Jihudi mukhiạko do Jisu goje lạgitʼ soṛojontroko ehopʼena.
Onate Jisu do Jihudiko talare sodorte dãṛãne bạgikeda, ar ona jaega bạgikate hahaṅkar sor reakʼ Ephrạimko metakʼ mitʼṭen atoteye calaoena. Ar acʼren celako sãote onḍeye tahẽyena.
Unre Jihudikoakʼ sen-parom porob do sor hecʼakan tahẽkana. Ar porob lahare saphakʼ lạgitʼ ạḍi utạr hoṛ do atoko khon Jerusalemteko calao akan tahẽkana.
Ar onko hoṛ do Jisu ńam baṛayeko ehopʼena. Onko do mundilre teṅgokate kupulikʼko ehopʼena, “Noa porobre uni do cetʼ bae hijukʼa? Ape do cetʼpe hudiseda?”
Maraṅ naekeko ar Phạrusiko doko hukumletʼ tahẽkana je, Jisu okare menaea mente jãhãegeye baḍaele khan uni do onkoe baḍae ocoko jemon onko do Jisuko sapʼ daṛeae.
Ado sen-parom porob turui din lahare Jisu do Bethaniạ atoteye senena. Ar gocʼko khon okoeye jiwetʼ beretʼlede uni Lasar hõ Bethaniạ atoregeye girobasokʼkan tahẽkana.
Onḍe onko do Jisu lạgitʼ jomakʼko tearkeda. Ar Martha doe sapʼsorako kan tahẽkana. Ar okoeko Jisu tulucʼ jojomko duṛupʼ akan tahẽkan onko modre Lasar hõe tahẽkana.
Unre Mạriạm do tala ser gan ạḍi damanakʼ mahkaokʼ sunume ạgukeda ar Jisuakʼ jaṅgareye dulkeda ar acʼakʼ upʼteye jotʼketʼtaea. Ar ona mahkaokʼ sunum reakʼ mohokte goṭa oṛakʼ perecʼena.
Jisuren celako modren mitʼ hoṛ, okoe do bạirikoakʼ tire Jisui soprot ocoye uni Jihudạ Iskariot doe menkeda,
“Noa mahkaokʼ sunum do cedakʼ pe sae Dinarte baṅ ạkhrińlena, ar reṅgecʼ orecʼko baṅ ematʼkoa?”
Jihudạ do reṅgecʼko lạgitʼ dạndikate noa kathae menleda ona do baṅ. Uni do kombṛoe tahẽkana. Ar uni jimạre ṭaka reakʼ baksa tahẽkante dohoakʼko khone kombṛoyetʼkan tahẽkana.
Jisui menkeda, “Alope duk ocoyea. Ente topayiń jokhecʼ sajaoiń iạte uni do noae doholeda.
Reṅgecʼko ma jaoge ape tulucʼ menakʼko, menkhan iń do jao okte bape ńameńạ.”

Ado Jisu Bethaniạre menaea menteko baḍaeketʼ khan Jihudiko mod khon ạḍi utạr hoṛ do onḍeko hecʼena. Onko do eken Jisu lạgitʼ do baṅ, menkhan Jisu gocʼko khone jiwetʼ beretʼ akade uni Lasar ńele lạgitʼ hõko hecʼlena.
Unre maraṅ naekeko do Lasar hõ goje lạgitʼko goṭakeda,
ente Lasar iạte Jihudiko modren ḍher hoṛge mukhiạkoko bạgiatʼkote Jisureko pạtiạuena.
Ado porobre okoeko hoṛko hecʼakan tahẽkan onko do dosar hilokʼko ańjomkeda Jisu do Jerusalemteye hijukʼ kana.
Unre onko do khijur ḍạr sapʼkate daram ạguye lạgitʼko oḍok calaoena ar ãṭ aṛaṅte hohoate memenko ehopʼena, “Hosanna, bhorangeae Probhu ńutumte daraekạnicʼ, Israelkoren raj do.”
Sonot sostor reakʼ katha leka Jisu do mitʼṭen gadha hopone ńamkedete unireye decʼena. Sostorre olakan leka,
“E Sionren kuṛi, alom botorokʼa. Ńelme, amren raj do gadha hoponre decʼkateye hijukʼ kana.”

Jisuren celako do pạhilre noako bako bujhạu daṛeada. Ado tinre Jisuakʼ ṭhonok sodorena unre onko doko disạkeda sonot sostor reakʼ ona katha do Jisu reaṅge olakan tahẽkana mente. Onko do arhõ disạ hecʼatʼkoa hoṛko do Jisu lạgitʼgeko onkaleda.
Ado topa dander khon Lasare hoho oḍokkede ar gocʼko khone beretʼkede jokhecʼ okoeko hoṛ Jisu ṭhenko tahẽkan onkoge Lasarakʼ jiwetʼ beredokʼ reaṅ gohako emkeda.
Onate gadel hoṛko do Jisu daram ạguye lạgitʼko oḍok calaolena, enteko ańjomakatʼ tahẽkana Jisuge ona hahaṛawakʼ kạmi doe kạmi akada.
Noa ńelte Phạrusiko do ako akoreko men joṅana, “Aboakʼ do cetʼ labge baṅ hoyokʼkana. Ente ńelpe, goṭa duniạrenkoge uniakʼ dolreko calaoena.”
Ona porobre okoeko sewa lạgitʼko hecʼakan tahẽkan onko modre adomko do Junạni hoṛko tahẽkana.
Onko do Philip ṭhen hecʼkate nehõradeteko metadea, “E baba ale do Jisule ńelea.” Philip do Gạlil reakʼ Bethsaeda atoren hoṛe tahẽkana.
Ar Philip do senkate Andrease lạiadea Ar Andreas ar Philip do senkate Jisukin metadea.
Unre Jisu do Andreas ar Philipe metatʼkinạ, “Manwa Hopon do ṭhonok sodorokʼ reakʼ okte seṭer akanataea.
Sạrigeń metaben kana, guhum jaṅ hasare ńurkate baṅ gocʼlen khan ona do eskarge tahena, menkhan gocʼlen khan do ạḍi utạr gele belekʼa.
Okoe acʼakʼ jiwiye dulạṛ uni do acʼakʼ sạriakʼ reakʼ jione khuạutaea, menkhan okoe noa dhạrtire acʼakʼ jiwi bae dulạṛ uni do jaejug jion lạgitʼ acʼakʼ sạriakʼ reakʼ jione rukhiyạitaea.
Jãhãege ińakʼe kạmikan khan uni do ińe pańjańma. Iń okareń tahena ińren kạmiạko hõ onḍegeko tahena. Jãhãege ińakʼe kạmikan khan Baba do uniye manotea.
Ińakʼ jiwi do ńitokʼ khad badaokʼkan tińạ. Iń do cetʼ niạ kathageń mena, ‘E Baba, noa ghuṛi khon de bańcaoiń me?’ Menkhan niạ lạgitʼge coṅ noa okte hạbicʼ mań hecʼakana.
E Baba, amakʼ ṭhonok sodorme baṛe.” Unre serma khon noa katha ańjomena, “Iń do ińakʼ ṭhonokiń sodor akada ar ona do arhõń sodora.”
Ar okoeko hoṛ onḍeko teṅgo akan tahẽkan onko do ona ańjomkateko menkeda, “Rimil saḍeyena.” Adomko doko menkeda, “Jãhãe serma goḍet uni tulucʼ kathae roṛkeda.”
Noa iạte Jisui menkeda, “Noa katha iń lạgitʼ do baṅ roṛakana, menkhan ape lạgitʼge roṛakana.
Noa dhạrtiren hoṛkoakʼ bicạr reakʼ okte do seṭer akana, ar dhạrtiren rajakʼ ti khon ńitokʼ do recʼ ocokʼa.
Iń do ot khon coṭteń rakapʼ ocokʼre sanamko iń ṭheniń or sorkoa.”
Uni do cetʼlekan gujukʼ hoyokʼtaea ona bujhạu ocoko lạgitʼge noa katha doe roṛkeda.

Unre hoṛko do Jisuko metadea, “Sonot sostor khonle baḍae akada Mạsi do jaejug hạbicʼe tahena. Enḍekhan am do cekatem meneda, Manwa Hopon do coṭte rakapʼ ocokʼ hoyokʼtaea? Enḍekhan nui Manwa Hopon doe okoe kana?”
Jisui metatʼkoa, ar thoṛa dinge ape talare marsaltetʼ menakʼa. Ape ṭhen marsal menakʼrege dãṛãnpe, jemon apere ńut do aloe jitạu daṛeakʼ.
Marsal ape ṭhen tahenrege marsalre pạtiạukʼpe jemon ona marsalren hoṛpe hoedaṛeakʼ.” Noako kathae lạiatʼko khan Jisu do onko khon apnartetʼe danaṅenteye calaoena.
Menkhan onko samaṅre cinhạ lekate unạkʼ hahaṛawakʼkoe kạmiketʼre hõ hoṛko unire bako pạtiạulena.
Noa do hoyena Jesaea nạbi hotete roṛlenakʼ katha jemon purạukʼ: E Probhu, alele ańjomakatʼakʼ do okoe baṅe pạtiạuatʼ? Ar okoe ṭhen Probhuakʼ daṛeanakʼ ti do sodor akana?
Onko hoṛ do noa iạtege bako pạtiạu daṛeada, ente Jesaea cetʼ lekae roṛletʼ onkage,
“Isor do onkoakʼ mẽtʼe kãṛã akatʼtakoa ar ontor doe goṛdho akatʼtakoa, jemon onko do mẽtʼte aloko ńeńel ar ontorte aloko bujhạu, ar bogekʼ lạgitʼ uni ṭhen aloko ruạṛ hijukʼ.”
Jesaea do Jisuakʼ ṭhonoke ńelletʼte uni reaṅ noa kathae roṛleda.
Enre hõ mukhiạko modren ḍher hoṛge unireko pạtiạuena, menkhan Phạrusiko ṭhen biṭlạha ocokʼ botorte bako aṅgocleda.
Onko do Isor ṭhenakʼ man khon hoṛko ṭhenakʼ mange bạ̃ṛtiko kusiyakʼkan tahẽkana.
Jisu do ãṭ aṛaṅteye menkeda, “Okoe ińreye pạtiạukʼkan uni do eken ińre do baṅ bickom okoeye kolakadiń unire hõe pạtiạukʼkana.
Ar okoe ińe ńeleńkan, uni do kol akadinicʼgeye ńelekana.
Iń do noa dhạrtire marsal lekań hecʼakana, jemon ińre okoeye pạtiạukʼ uni do ńutre aloe tahen.
Jãhãege ińakʼ kathae ańjom ar onaleka bae senokʼ enḍekhan uni do bạń bicạrea, ente manwa dusiko lạgitʼ do baṅ, bickom kại khon bańcaoko lạgitʼgeń hecʼ akana.
Okoe iń bae bạsutạń ar ińakʼ katha bae ańjom uni lạgitʼ do bicạricʼ menaea. Oka kathań roṛakatʼ ona kathage mucạtʼ dinre uni do dusi menteye sạbudea;
ente iń do apnarte cetʼge bạń roṛakada, menkhan okoeye kolakadiń uni Babageye hukum akawạdińạ cetʼko roroṛ hoyokʼ tińạ mente.
Ińiń baḍaea uniakʼ hukum do jaejug jion kana. Onate okako kathań roṛetʼkan ona do Babawakʼ hukum lekageń roṛeda.”

Sen-parom porob thoṛa laha reakʼ ghoṭna. Jisu do noa dhạrti bạgikate Baba ṭhen calakʼ reakʼ okte seṭer akana menteye bujhạu daṛeatʼ tahẽkana. Ar dhạrtire okoeko acʼren hoṛko tahẽkan onkoe dulạṛetʼko tahẽkana ar mucạtʼ hạbicʼe dulạṛketʼkoa.
Unre kedokʼ jokhecʼ. Soetan do Simon hopon Jihudạ Iskariotakʼ monre bạirikoakʼ tire Jisu soprote lạgitʼ sanae rakapʼ ocoletʼtaea.
Jisu doe baḍaekan tahẽkana, Isor Baba do acʼakʼ tire jotowakʼe jimạ akada. Ar noa hõe baḍaekan tahẽkana, acʼ do Isor ṭhen khone hecʼakana ar uni ṭhengeye ruạṛ calao lạgidokʼ kana.
Onate kedokʼ khone beretʼena ar oyonakʼe dohokeda ar mitʼṭen gamcha hataokate ḍanḍareye paṭheyena.
Ona tayom gamlare dakʼe dulketʼte celako jaṅgae ạbuk ketʼkoa ar ḍanḍareye paṭhe akan tahẽkan gamchate jojotʼe ehopʼena.
Ado Simon Patras ṭhene hecʼen khan Patras do uniye metadea, “E Probhu, am do cetʼ ińakʼ jaṅgam ạbuktińạ?”
Jisui roṛ ruạṛadea, “Okań cekayetʼkan ona do ńitokʼ bam baḍaeyeda menkhan tayomtem bujhạua.”
Patras do uniye metadea, “Ińakʼ jaṅga do tis hõ bam ạbuk ńama.” Jisu do Patrase metadea, “Bạń ạbukletam khan iń tulucʼ amakʼ bakhra do bạnukʼ tama.”
Unre Simon Patrase menkeda, “E Probhu, enḍekhan eken jaṅga moto do alo, ińakʼ ti ar bohokʼ hõ ạbuk tińme.”
Jisu do uniye metadea, “Um akanicʼ do jaṅga chaḍa ar cetʼge ạbukokʼ reakʼ jạruṛ bạnukʼtaea, ente uni do jotoge saphagetaea.
Ape dope saphagea, menkhan sanamko do baṅ.” Okoe acʼe soprote uni doe baḍae akade tahẽkana. Onate uni doe menkeda, “Ape joto do bape saphawa.”
Ado joto hoṛe ạbuk sạtketʼko khan Jisu do acʼakʼ oyonakʼ hataokate arhõ duṛupʼenteye metatʼkoa, “Iń cetʼ iń cekaketʼ ona dope bujhạuletʼgea?
Ape do Guru ar Probhu mentepe hohowạńkana, ar ona do ṭhikgepe meneda, ente uni kangeạń.
Menkhan iń do Probhu ar Guru hũyạte hõ cetʼ lekań ạbukketʼpe onkage ape hõ eṭakʼkoakʼ jaṅga ạbuk lek tapea.
Iń do noań udukʼ atʼpea jemon apere cetʼlekań cekaketʼ ape hõpe onkae.
Sạrigeń metapekana, guti do acʼren kisạ̃ṛ khon bae maraṅa. Ar kol ocoyicʼ hõ kokolicʼ khon bae maraṅa.
Noako baḍaekate onako lekape kạmile khan enḍekhan ape dope bhạgangea.

Ape sanamkoakʼ katha do bạń meneda. Iń okoeyiń bachao akatʼko onko doń baḍae akatʼkogea. Menkhan sonot sostor reakʼ noa katha do purạukʼtege hoyokʼa, ‘okoe iń tulucʼ piṭhại jojomkan unige iń birudre jaṅgae tulketʼtaea.’
Iń do noa hoyokʼ laharegeń lạiape kana, jemon hoelenrepe pạtiạukʼ baṅma, iń kangeạń.
Sạrigeń metapekana, iń okoeyin kole, ar uni okoeye ataṅe, uni do ińgeye ataṅedińạ ar iń okoeye ataṅiń uni do kolakadińcʼgeye ataṅedekana.”
Ado noako katha menkate Jisu do jiwireye khad badaoena. Uni do pusṭạuteye menkeda, “Sạrigeń metapekana, ape modren mitʼ hoṛ bạirikoakʼ tireye soprotińạ.”
Jisu okoeakʼ kathae meneda ona bako bujhạu daṛeatʼte celako do ako akoreko beṅgetʼ baṛawana.
Onko modren Jisu okoeye dulạṛede tahẽkan uni do Jisuakʼ koṛam pheḍreye ṭenḍar akan tahẽkana.
Simon Patras do uni isạrawadeteye metadea, “Kuliyeme uni do okoe reaṅe roṛeda.”
Unre uni cela do Jisure ṭenḍarenteye menkeda, “Henda Probhu, uni doe okoe kana?”
Jisui roṛ ruạṛkeda, “Noa piṭhạ kecakʼ bạṭire topokate okoeyiń emae unikangeae uni hoṛ do.” Ado piṭhạ kecakʼ bạṭire topokate Simon Iskariotren hopon Jihudại emadea.
Piṭhạ kecakʼe ńamketʼ khan Soetan do Jihudạreye boloyena. Jisu do uniye metadea, “Okaṭakʼ cekayem menetʼkan ma usạraeme.”
Jisu sãote okoeko jojomkan tahẽkan onko do bako bujhạuleda cedakʼ Jisu do Jihudạ noa kathae metadea.
Adomko doko bujhạukeda, porobre lạgitʼ jạruṛokʼakʼko kiriń ạgui se reṅgecʼ orecʼko jãhãnakʼ emako lạgitʼ Jisu do Jihudại metadea, ente ṭaka reakʼ baksa do Jihudạ ṭhenge tahẽkana.
Ado piṭhạ kecakʼe hataoketʼ torage Jihudạ do bahreteye oḍok calaoena. Unre do ńindạ tahẽkana.
Ado Jihudạ bahreteye calaoen khan Jisui menkeda, “Manwa Hoponakʼ ṭhonokokʼ reakʼ okte do seṭerena ar unire Isorakʼ ṭhonok do sodorokʼa.
Isorakʼ ṭhonok tinre unire sodorokʼa unre Isor hõ Manwa Hoponakʼ ṭhonok acʼreye sodora ar usạrageye ṭhonok ocoyea.

“E bachako, iń do ape tulucʼ ar thoṛa ghạṛicʼ minạńa. Ape do ińpe ńam baṛańạ, menkhan Jihudi mukhiạko cetʼlekań metatʼko tahẽkan, ‘okateń calakʼkan onḍe do ohope sen daṛelena,’ onkage ape hõ ńitiń metapekana.
Mitʼṭen nawa hukumiń emape kana dupulạṛpe. Cetʼleka iń do apeń dulạṛakatʼpe onkage ape hõ dupulạṛpe.
Nonkage ape apere dulạṛ tahen khan sanamkoko bujhạu daṛeakʼa ape do ińren celako kanape mente.”
Simon Patras do Jisui metadea, “E Probhu am do okatem calakʼ kana?” Jisui roṛ ruạṛkeda, “Iń okateń calakʼkan, onḍe do ńitokʼ iń sãote ohope sen daṛelena, menkhan tayomtepe hijukʼa.”
Patras do uniye metadea, “E Probhu, cedakʼ ńitokʼ do am sãote bạń calao daṛeakʼa? Am lạgitʼ ińakʼ jiwi hõń emokʼa.”
Unre Jisui menkeda, “Iń lạgitʼ cetʼ jiwim alaetama? Sạrigeń metam kana, sim sạnḍi ạuriye ragre am do pe dhaoem baṅeńa.
“Apeakʼ mon do alo khad badaokʼtape ma. Isorre pạtiạukʼpe ar ińre hõ pạtiạu akae tahenpe.
Ińren Babawakʼ oṛakʼre ạḍi utạr tahen jaega menakʼa. Ona baṅ tahẽlen khaniń lạikepea, ape lạgitʼ jaega teariń calakʼ kana.
Ar senkate ape lạgitʼ jaegań benaole khan arhõń ruạṛ hijukʼa ar iń ṭheniń ataṅ idipea, jemon iń okareń tahen ape hõ onḍepe tahen.
Ar iń okateń calakʼkan ona reakʼ hor mape baḍaege.”
Thoma do Jisui metadea, “E Probhu, bale baḍaea okatem calakʼkana, ente cekate hor dole baḍaea?”
Jisu do Thomae metadea, “Ińge hortetʼ, sạriakʼtetʼ ar jion. Iń hotete baṅkhan okoe hõ Baba ṭhen ohoko calao daṛelena.
Ińpe baḍaeliń khan ińren Baba hõpe baḍaekea. Ape do ńitokʼ unipe baḍae akadea ar ńel hõpe ńelakadea.”
Philip do Jisui metadea, “E Probhu, Baba baṛe udukʼaleme, inạge ale lạgitʼ ḍhera.”
Jisu do uniye metadea, “E Philip, nunạkʼ din ape tulucʼ minạńa, enrehõ cetʼ bape baḍae akadińạ? Okoe ińe ńelakadiń uni do Baba hõe ńelakadea. Am do cekatem meneda, ‘Baba baṛe udukʼaleme?’
Am do cetʼ bam pạtiạukʼ kana, iń do Babare minạńa ar Baba do ińre menaea mente? Iń okako kathań lại apekan ona do apnar khonakʼ do bạń roṛeda, menkhan ińre menae Babageye kạmi kana.
Ińakʼ kathare pạtiạukʼpe je, iń do Babare ar Baba do ińre menaea mente. Ar baṅ khan ińakʼ noako kạmi iạte pạtiạuạńpe.
“Sạrigeń metapekana, okoe ińreye pạtiạukʼkan uni do iń okakoń kạmikan uni hõ onakoe kạmiya. Ar Baba ṭheniń calakʼkante uni do noako khon arhõ maraṅ maraṅakʼkoe kạmiya.
Jãhãnakʼge iń ńutumtepe koe iń do onań onkaea, jemon Babawakʼ ṭhonok Hopon hotete sodorokʼtae.
Iń ńutumte jãhãnakʼgepe koe enḍekhan onań onkaea.
“Ińpe dulạṛediń khan ińakʼ sanam hukumkope dohoea.
Iń do Baba ṭheniń koeapea, ar uni do jaejug hạbicʼ mitʼṭen sohotʼicʼe kolapea.

Uni sohotʼicʼ kangeae sạriakʼren Jiu do. Dhạrtiren hoṛko uni do ohoko ataṅ daṛelea, ente onko do ńelhõ bako ńelekana ar baḍae hõ bako baḍae akadea. Menkhan ape dope baḍae akadea, ente uni do ape são sãoteye tahẽkana ar apeakʼ ontorreye girobasokʼa.
“Bạń ṭũạr oṭokapea; iń do ape ṭheniń hijukʼa.
Ar thoṛa ghạṛicʼ khange dhạrtiren hoṛko do ar bako ńel ńameńa, menkhan ape dope ńeleńgea. Iń do jiwetʼge minạńte ape hõ jiwetʼpe tahena.
Enhilokʼgepe baḍae daṛeakʼa, iń do Babare, ape do ińre ar iń do apere minạńa mente.
Okoe ińakʼ hukumkoe baḍaekan ar onakoe manaoetʼkan unige iń doe dulạṛedeńa.” Ar okoe ińe dulạṛedeń ińren Baba hõ uniye dulạṛea. Iń hõ uniń dulạṛea ar uni ṭheniń sodorokʼa.
Unre Jihudạ do (Iskariot do baṅ) uniye metadea, “E Probhu, am do cetʼ eken ale ṭhengem sodorokʼa, ar dhạrtiren hoṛko ṭhen do baṅ?”
Jisu do uniye roṛ ruạṛadea, “Jãhãege ińe dulạṛiń uni do ińakʼ kathae dohoea. Ińren Baba do uniye dulạṛea ar uni ṭhen liń hijukʼte uni soṅgeteliń tahena.
Okoe bae dulạṛiń uni do ińakʼ katha leka ohoe calaolena. Okaṭakʼ kathape ańjometʼkan ona do ińakʼ katha do baṅkana menkhan okoe ińe kolakadiń uni Babawakʼ katha kangea.
Ape sãoteń tahenrege noako kathań galmarao akawatʼpea
Uni sohotʼicʼ sonot Jiu one okoe do Baba iń ńutumteye kolape, unige sanamakʼkoe cetʼapea, ar okakoń lạiakawatʼpe onako joto doe disạ ocopea.

“Iń do ape lạgitʼ suluk iń doho oṭokakʼ kana, ińakʼ sulukge apeń emape kana; dhạrti cetʼ lekae emokʼkan onka do bạń emokʼ kana. Apeakʼ ontor do alo khad badaokʼtapema ar monre botor hõ alo tahentape ma.
Ańjom akadape ińiń menakatʼpea, ‘iń doń calakʼkana ar ape ṭhen arhõń ruạṛ hijukʼa.’ Ape do ińpe dulạṛliń khan Baba ṭheniń calakʼkan iạtepe rạskạkokʼa, ente Baba do iń khon hõe maraṅgea.
Noako hoyokʼ laharege iń doń lại dohoakatʼpea jemon hoelenrepe pạtiạukʼ.
Iń do ape tulucʼ ar ḍher ghạṛicʼ bạń galmaraoa, ente noa dhạrtiren raje hijukʼkana. Ińre uniakʼ jãhãn ektiạri do bạnukʼtaea.
Menkhan noa do hoyokʼ kana jemon hoṛkoko baḍae daṛeakʼ je, iń do Babań dulạṛedekana ar Baba cetʼ lekae hukum akadiń onkage jotowakʼ iń kạmikana. Ma beredokʼpe, dela nonḍe khon bon calakʼa.
“Ińge sạri darkha nạ̃ṛĩ ar ińren Baba doe mạli kana.
Ińre okako ḍạr baṅ jokʼ onako doe getʼ giḍikakʼa, ar oka ḍạrko jokʼkan onako doe kamana jemon arhõ bạ̃ṛti jokʼ.
Okaṭakʼ kathań galmarao akatʼpe onate ape do laharegepe saphagea.
Ińre tahenpe ar iń hõ apeakʼ ontorreń tahena. Darkha nạ̃ṛĩre ḍạrko joṛao baṅ tahẽlen khan cetʼ leka apnarte baṅ jokʼ onkage ape hõ ińre bape tahẽlen khan apnarte ohope jo daṛelena.
“Ińge darkha nạ̃ṛĩ ar ape do ḍạrko. Okoe ińreye tahenkan ar iń do unire enḍekhan uniakʼ jionre do ạḍi jo jokʼa, ente iń begor ape do cetʼ hõ bape ceka daṛeakʼa.
Jãhãege ińre bae tahen khan uni do getʼ giḍiakatʼ ḍạr leka bahreteye giḍi ocokʼa ar ona do rohoṛokʼa. Unre ona ḍạr jarwakate seṅgelreko khadlekakʼa ar ona do lokʼa.
Ińrepe tahẽlen khan ar ińakʼ kathako apeakʼ ontorre tahẽnlen khan enḍekhan jãhãnakʼge sanape, onage koepe; ar ona do hoeapea.
Apeakʼ jionre ḍherpe jolen khan enḍekhan nonkate ape do ińren celape sạbudokʼa ar ińren Baba doe ṭhonok ocokʼa.
Baba cetʼlekae dulạṛ akadiń ińhõ onkage apeń dulạṛakatʼpea. Ińakʼ dulạṛre tahenpe.
Cetʼleka iń do Babawakʼ sanam hukumkoń dohoyetʼkante uniakʼ dulạṛre minạńa, onkage ińakʼ hukumkope dohole khan ape hõ ińakʼ dulạṛrepe tahena.
Noako kathań menkeda jemon ińakʼ rạskạ do apeakʼ ontorre tahen ar apeakʼ rạskạ purạukʼtape.
Ińakʼ hukum do nõkʼõe, cetʼlekań dulạṛakatʼpe onkage ape hõ dupulạṛpe.
Jãhãege acʼren gateko lạgitʼ acʼakʼ jiwiye alaetae enḍekhan noa khon maraṅ dulạṛ do ar okoeakʼ hõ bạnukʼa.
Okako hukumiń emape onakope dohole khan enḍekhan ape do ińren gatepe hoyokʼa.
Iń do golam bạń metapekana, ente kisạ̃ṛ cetʼe cekakan golam do ona bae baḍaea; menkhan iń do gateń metapekana, ente Baba ṭhen khon okań ańjomakatʼ onage apeń baḍae ocoakatʼpea.

Ape do bape bachao akadińạ, menkhan ińgeń bachao akatʼpete kạmireń dhurạu akatʼpea jemon apeakʼ jionrepe jokʼ ar ona jo do jemon tahẽ akae tahentape. Enḍekhan iń ńutumte Baba ṭhen jãhãnakʼgepe koe uni do onageye emapea.
Iń do noa hukumiń emapekana, jemonpe dupulạṛ.
“Dhạrtiren hoṛkoko kurudape khan, baḍaepe ape lahare onko do ińgeko kurudạńkana.
Ape do noa dhạrtirenpe hoelen khan enḍekhan hoṛko do apnarren menteko dulạṛkepea. Menkhan noa dhạrtiren dope baṅkana, bickom iń do dhạrti khoniń bachao akatʼpete dhạrtiren hoṛko apeko kurudape kana.
Ińakʼ noa katha do alope hiṛińa, guti do acʼren kisạ̃ṛ khon bae maraṅa. Onate hoṛko iń gojeńko kurumuṭuyetʼ khan ape hõko onkapea; ar ińakʼ kathako ańjom khan apeakʼ katha hõko ańjoma.
Onko do iń iạteko onkapea, ente iń okoeye kolakadiń uni do bako baḍaeyedekana.
“Iń aloń hecʼlen khan ar bạń galmaraoako khan onko do ohoko dusikokʼa; menkhan ńitokʼ do kại reakʼ jãhãn ạnḍuṅge bạnukʼtakoa.
Okoe ińe kurudạń uni do ińren Babageye kurudae kana.
Okako kạmi okoe tisge bako kạmiakatʼ onako kạmi onko samaṅre bạń kạmi lekhan onkoakʼ dos do oho hoekokʼa. Menkhan ńitokʼ onko do iń ar ińren Baba hõko ńelakadea arko kurud ạliń kana.
Noa do hoeakana onkoakʼ ạn-ạrire olakan katha jemon purạukʼ, ‘onko do ạuṛiakʼte ińko kurudạń kana.’
“Okoe sohotʼicʼ Baba ṭhen khoniń kolape, uniye hecʼlenre unige iń reaṅ gohae ema. Uni doe hoyokʼ kana sạriakʼren Jiu one okoe do Baba ṭhen khone hijukʼkan.
Ape hõ iń reaṅ gohape ema, ente pạhil khonge ape do iń são sãote menakʼpea.
“Iń do noako joto kathań lạiatʼpea jemon monre alope tạkijokʼ.
Sunạgog khonko oḍok idipea; ar nonkan okte hijukʼ kana one okoe apeko gocʼpe onko doko monejoṅa, Isorgeko sewawae kana mente.
Onko do noa iạtegeko onkaea ente Baba hõ bako baḍaeakadea ar iń hõ bako baḍae akadińạ.
Iń do noakoń galmaraowatʼpea jemon ona okte hecʼlenrepe disại, noa kathań metatʼpe tahẽkana. “Pạhil khon noako katha do bạń lại akawatʼpea, ente ape tulucʼ iń tahẽkana.
Okoe ińe kolakadiń iń do ńitokʼ uni ṭhengeń calakʼ kana, ar apeko modren okoe hõ bape kuliyediń kana, ‘okatem calakʼ kana mente?’
Iń do noakoń lại akawatʼpe iạte apeakʼ mon do dukte perecʼ akana.
Enre hõ sạri kathageń lạiape kana, ińakʼ calakʼ do ape lạgitʼ bhagegea, ente bạń senlen khan uni sohotʼicʼ do ape ṭhen bae hijukʼa. Menkhan ińiń senlenre uni do ape ṭheniń kolea.
Uniye hecʼlenre dhạrtirenko do kại reaṅ, dhorom reaṅ ar Isorakʼ bicạr reaṅ cehaonae emakoa.
Uni do kại reaṅ hõ cehaonae emakoa, ente hoṛko do ińre bako pạtiạukʼ kana;
Isorakʼ sanaleka calakʼ reaṅ hõ cehaonae emakoa, ente iń do Baba ṭheniń calakʼ kana menkhan ape do ar bape ńel ńameńa;
Bicạr reaṅ hõ cehaonae emokʼa, ente dhạrtiren rajakʼ bicạr do hoeakana.
“Ape lại ape lạgitʼ arhõ ạḍi okocʼ kathako menakʼtińạ, menkhan ńitokʼ onako do ohope sahao daṛelea.
Menkhan uni sạriakʼren Jiu tinreye hijukʼa unre uni do hore udukʼapete sạriakʼreye ạyurpea. Uni do acʼte bae roṛa, menkhan okaṭakʼe ańjom onageye roṛa ar okaṭakʼ hoyokʼ lạgidokʼ ona hõe baḍae ocopea.
Uni sạriakʼren Jiuge ińakʼ ṭhonoke sodora, ente jãhãnakʼgeń cekae ariń roṛ onage uni do ape ṭhene sodora. Babawakʼ oka menakʼtae onako sanamakʼge ińakʼ kana.
Ona iạteń meneda, jãhãnakʼgeń cekae ariń roṛ onage uni do apeye baḍae ocopea.
“Thoṛa ghạṛicʼ khange bape ńel ńameńa, arhõ thoṛa ghạṛicʼ khangepe ńeleńa.”

Ado noa katha ańjomkate Jisuren celako modren adomko do roṛ baṛaeko ehopʼena, “Nui do cetʼe metabon kana, ‘thoṛa ghạṛicʼ khange bape ńeleńa arhõ thoṛa ghạṛicʼ khangepe ńeleńa?’ Arhõ uni doe meneda, ‘Baba ṭheniń calakʼ kana.’
Ar one thoṛa ghạṛicʼ reakʼ kathae menetʼkan ona do cetʼ kana? Abo do babon bujhạu daṛeakʼ kana cetʼe meneda.”

Ado celako noa reaṅ kuliyeko menjoṅ kana menteye bujhạuketʼ khan Jisu do onkoe metatʼkoa, “Ińiń menakatʼ, ‘thoṛa ghạṛicʼ khange bape ńeleńa arhõ thoṛa ghạṛicʼ khangepe ńeleńa,’ noa reaṅge cetʼ ape talare bape kupulikʼ kana?
Sạrigeń metapekana, ape dope rakʼjoṅa arpe hae haeokʼa menkhan dhạrtiren hoṛ doko rạskạkʼa. Ape do dukpe ńama, menkhan apeakʼ noa duk do baṅ tahena; ona bodolte ape dope rạskạkʼa.
Maejiu do gidrại janame jokhecʼ kosṭoe ńama, ente uniakʼ okte do seṭerentaea. Menkhan gidrại janamlere, dhạrtire mitʼṭen nawa manwae hecʼen reakʼ rạskạte ona kosṭo do ar bae disạea.
Onkage ape hõ ńitokʼ do haron ar kosṭope ńameda; menkhan arhõ apeko sãoteń ńapamokʼa unre apeakʼ mon do rạskạte perejokʼa ar ona rạskạ do okoe hõ bako recʼ daṛeapea.
Enhilokʼ ape do cetʼge bape kuliyińạ. Sạrigeń metapekana, iń ńutumte Baba ṭhen jãhãnakʼgepe koe uni do onae emapea.
Ape do ńit hạbicʼ iń ńutumte jãhãnakʼge ạuripe koea. Koepe, adope ńama jemon apeakʼ rạskạ purạukʼtape.
“Noako sikhạuna katha do phenkoteń galmaraoatʼpea. Ente nonkan okte hijukʼkana one unre iń do phenkote bạń galmaraoa, menkhan pusṭạute Baba reaṅ iń lạiapea.
Enhilokʼ ape do iń ńutumtepe koea, ar bạń meneda, ińge ape lạgitʼ Baba ṭheniń nehõrok̕a.
Baba ma coṅ acʼgeye dulạṛetʼpe, ente ape do ińpe dulạṛakadińạ arpe pạtiạu akana, iń do Baba Isor ṭhen khoniń hecʼakana.
Sạrige iń do Baba ṭhen khon noa dhạrtiteń hecʼakana, arhõ noa dhạrti bạgikate Baba ṭhengeń calakʼ kana.”
Unre uniren celakoko metadea, “Ńelme ńitokʼ do sodortegem roṛeda, jãhãn phente do bam lạiyeda.
Nitokʼ dole bujhạu daṛeakʼkana, bin baḍaeakʼ do cetʼge bạnukʼtama, ar jãhãege jãhãnakʼe kulime ona reakʼ jạruṛ hõ bạnukʼtama. Ona iạtegele pạtiạukʼ kana am do Isor ṭhen khonem hecʼakana.”
Jisu do acʼren celakoe metatʼkoa, “Enḍekhan ńitokʼ do cetʼ pạtiạukʼ kangeape?
Ńelpe, ona okte do hijukʼkana, hẽ hecʼakangea, unre ape dope chir chạturokʼa ar iń eskarpe bạgi oṭowạńte apan ạpin jaegatepe calakʼa, enrehõ iń do bạń eskara, ente iń tulucʼ do Baba menaea.
Iń do noakoń lạiatʼpea jemon iń tulucʼ mitʼ akanpe tahente monre sulukpe ńam. Noa dhạrtire ape do harkhet ar sasetre menakʼpea, menkhan khạtirokʼpe; ińge dhạrti doń jitạuakada.”
Ado noako kathae roṛketʼ khan Jisu do serma secʼ beṅgetʼ rakapʼ kateye menkeda, “E Baba, okte do seṭerakana. Amren Hopon ṭhonok ocoyem jemon Hopon hõ amakʼ ṭhonoke sodortam.
Am do sanam manwako cetanre ektiạriyem emakawadea, jemon okoekom emakawade onko sanamko jaejug jione emako.
Ar jaejug jion do nõkʼõe, amge eskar sạri Isorko baḍaeme ar amem kolakade Jisu Mạsi.
Am do okaṭakʼ kạmim emakawadiń ona sạtkate noa dhạrtireń ṭhonok ocoakatʼmea.
E Baba, dhạrti ạuri sirjạure am sãote oka ṭhonok tahẽkantiń, ona ṭhonok arhõ emạńme baṛe.
“Dhạrtirenko mod khon okoekom emakawạdiń onko ṭhen amiń sodor akatʼmea. Onko do amrengeko tahẽkana, ar am do ińem emakawạdińa. Onko do amakʼ kathako batao akada.
Ar ńitokʼ doko bujhạu daṛeakada, jãhãnakʼgem emakawạdiń onako sanamakʼ do am ṭhen khon hecʼakana.
Ente okako katha lạiakom metadiń tahẽkan iń do onakoń lại akawatʼkoa. Ar onko do onako ataṅketʼte sạrigeko baḍaekeda, iń do am ṭhen khoniń hecʼakana, arko pạtiạu akana, amge ińem kolakadińa.
“Sanamko lạgitʼ do bạń nehõrokʼkana, menkhan okoekom emakawạdiń onko lạgitʼ iń nehõramkana, ente amren kangeako.
Ińakʼ sanamakʼko do amakʼ kana, ar amakʼ sanamakʼ hõ ińakʼ kangea. Ar onkore ińakʼ ṭhonok do sodor akana.

Iń do noa dhạrtire ar bạń tahen kana, menkhan onko do noa dhạrtire menakʼkoa; iń do am ṭheniń hijukʼkana. E sonoticʼ Baba, amakʼ oka ńutumem emakawạdiń ona ńutumte noko rukhiyạkom, jemon alaṅ cetʼ lekalaṅ mitʼge noko hõ onkage mitʼko tahen.

Iń do tinạkʼ din onko sãoreń tahẽkan unạkʼ din amakʼ oka ńutumem emakawạdiń ona ńutumteń rukhiyạ ạguakatʼkoa. Iń doń horho akatʼkoa ar onko mod khon okoe hõ bako nosṭo akana. Eken okoeakʼ nosṭokʼ reakʼ katha tahẽkan unigeye nosṭo akana, jemon sonot sostor reakʼ katha purạukʼ.
“Ńitokʼ do am ṭheniń hijukʼ kana, ar ińakʼ rạskạte onkoakʼ ontor jemon perejokʼtako onate dhạrtire tahenrege noako kathań roṛeda.
Am okakom menakawạdiń onakogeń baḍae ocoakatʼkoa. Dhạrtiren hoṛ do onkoko kurud akatʼkoa, ente iń do cetʼleka noa dhạrtiren iń baṅkan onkage onko hõ noa dhạrtiren doko baṅkana.
Noa dhạrti khon idiko lạgitʼ do bạń nehõram kana, bickom nehõrokʼ kạnạń, jemon Soetanakʼ ti khonem bańcaoko.
Cetʼleka iń do noa dhạrtireniń baṅkan onkage onko hõ noa dhạrtiren doko baṅkana.
“Sạriakʼ hotete am lạgitʼge onko do begar dohokom. Amakʼ katha kangea ona sạriakʼtetʼ do.
Ar cetʼleka dhạrtitem kolakadiń onkage ińhõ dhạrtite nokoń kolakatʼkoa.
Onko iạte am lạgitʼ iń doń begar akana jemon sạriakʼ hotete onko hõko begar ocokʼ.
“Eken onko lạgitʼ iń nehõrokʼ kana ona do baṅ, menkhan okoe nokoakʼ kathate ińreko pạtiạukʼkan onko lạgitʼ hõń nehõrokʼkana, jemon onko sanamko mitʼko hoyokʼ.
E Baba cetʼleka ińre jopoṛao menam ar ińhõ amre minạń onkage onko hõ jemon alaṅ soṅge jopoṛaoko tahen. Onate dhạrtiren hoṛkoko pạtiạukʼa je, amgem kolakadińạ.
Oka ṭhonokem emakawạdiń ona do onkoń emakatʼkoa, jemon alaṅ cetʼleka mitʼ menakʼlaṅ onko hõ onka mitʼko tahen.
Metakʼme iń do onkore, ar am do ińre, jemon nonkate onko do mitʼko hoyokʼ. Onate dhạrtiren hoṛko baḍae daṛeakʼa, amge ińem kolakadińa ar cetʼleka ińem dulạṛedeńkan onkage onko hõm dulạṛetʼkoa.

“E Baba, menjoṅ kạnạń am okoekom emakawạdiń, ińakʼ ṭhonok ńel ocoko lạgitʼ onko do jemon iń okareń tahen onḍeko tahẽ daṛeakʼ. Ona ṭhonok do amgem emakawạdińa, ente dhạrti ạuri sirjạu khonge am dom dulạṛedeń kana.
E dhoromren Baba, dhạrtiren hoṛko bako baḍae akatʼmea, menkhan iń doń baḍae akatʼmea. Ar nokoko baḍae akada amge ińem kolakadińạ.
Iń do onko ṭheniń sodor akatʼmere hõ arhõń sodormea, jemon cetʼ lekam dulạṛ edeńkan onkan dulạṛ onkoakʼ ontorre tahentako ar iń do jemon onko tulucʼ mitʼ akaniń tahen.
Ado noakoe roṛ sạtketʼ khan Jisu do acʼren celako sãote kedronko metakʼ mitʼṭen nala hanasae parom calaoena. Onḍe do mitʼṭen bagwan tahẽkana. Jisu ar acʼren celako do ona bagwanteko oḍok calaoena.
Ar bạirikoakʼ tire okoeye soprotlede uni Jihudạ hõ ona jaega doe baḍaeakatʼ tahẽkana, ente ạḍi dhao Jisu do acʼren celako sãote onḍeye senokʼkan tahẽkana.
Ar maraṅ naekeko ar Phạrusiko do Jihudạ soṅgete mitʼ dol palṭon ar kạmiạko kolketʼkoa. Unre Jihudạ do onko sãote diuhe, mosal ar khanḍa banḍawante onḍeye seṭerena.
Jisu do acʼre hoe lạgidokʼkan jotowakʼ doe baḍaekan tahẽkana. Onate uni do oḍok hecʼkate onkoe metatʼkoa, “Okoepe ńam baṛayede kana?”
Onkoko menkeda, “Nasaretren Jisu.” Jisui metatʼkoa, “Iń kangeạń uni do.” Ar bạirikoakʼ tire okoeye soprotlede uni Jihudạ hõ onko sãoteye teṅgo akan tahẽkana.
Ado “Ińkangeạń,” menteye metatʼko khan onko doko pạcgotʼena ar otreko bhindạṛena.
Jisu do arhõe kuliketʼkoa, “Okoepe ńam baṛayede kana?” Metadeako, “Nasaretren Jisu.”
Unre Jisui metatʼkoa, “Iń ma coń metapekange uni kangeạń. Ar ińgepe ńam baṛayediń khan noko do sen ocoakope.”
Noa do hoyena Jisui menletʼ katha jemon purạukʼ, “Okoekom emakawạdiń onko modre mitʼ hoṛ hõ bạń atʼakadea.”
Simon Patras ṭhen mitʼṭen tarwaṛe tahẽkana. Patras do tarwaṛe bocʼkate maraṅ naekeren gutiakʼ jojom luture heseketʼtaea. Uni gutiakʼ ńutum do Malkus tahẽkana.
Noa iạte Jisu do Patrase metadea, “Tarwaṛe do khapre bhoraokakʼme. Baba oka duk reakʼ bạ̃ṭiye emakawạdiń ona do cetʼ bạń ataṅa?”
Unre palṭonko ar onkoren subedarko ar Jihudi mukhiạkoren kạmiạko do Jisu sapʼkedeteko tolkedea.
Ar Hannas ṭhenko idi maṛaṅkedea, ente Hannas do ona bochorren maraṅ naeke Kaeapharen hońhartetʼe tahẽkana.
Nui Kaeaphage Jihudi mukhiyạkoe solhawatʼko tahẽkana je, goṭa jạt bodolte mitʼ hoṛ gujukʼge boroṅ bhagea.
Simon Patras ar eṭakʼ mitʼṭen cela do Jisukin pańja idikedea. Uni eṭakʼ cela do maraṅ naekeren oprom hoṛe tahẽkana. Uni cela do Jisu sãote maraṅ naekeakʼ bahre raca hạbicʼe bolo calaoena,
menkhan Patras do bahre duạr ṭhene teṅgo tahẽyena. Unre maraṅ naekeren opromicʼ cela do bahrete senkate duạr horhoyicʼ kạ̃ṛmĩye galmaraoade khan bhitrite Patrase aderkedea.
Uni kạ̃ṛmĩ do Patrase metadea, “Am hõ cetʼ uniren celako modren kanam?” Patrase menkeda, “Baṅ kạnạń.”
Unre bes rabaṅ paṛao akan tahẽkana. Ona iạte golamko ar kạmiạko do koela seṅgel jolkate teṅgokateko jorogokʼkan tahẽkana. Ar Patras hõ onko sãote teṅgokate jorogokʼe ehopʼena.
Unre maraṅ naeke do Jisu acʼren celako reaṅ ar acʼakʼ cecetʼakʼ reaṅe kulikedea.
Jisui roṛ ruạṛkeda, “Iń do hoṛko ṭhen sodortegeń galmarao akada. Ar Jihudiko mitʼ sãote okareko jarwakʼ ona sunạgogkore ar mundilre iń do jaogeń cetʼ akatʼkoa. Ar danaṅre do cetʼge bạń roṛakada;
enḍekhan cedakʼ iń dom kuliyediń kana? Ińakʼ katha okoeko ańjomakatʼ onkoge kulikom cetʼiń men akatʼkoa mente. Ar okań roṛakatʼ ona doko baḍaegea.
Jisu noa kathae roṛketʼ khan sorre teṅgo akan tahẽkan kạmiạko modren mitʼ hoṛ do uniye thapakedeteye metadea, “Maraṅ naeke nonkam roṛ ruạṛae kana?”
Jisu do uniye metadea, “Bạṛicʼ iń roṛketʼ khan udukʼạń me. Menkhan bhageakʼ iń menakatʼ khan cedakʼem daleńkana?”
Unre Hannas do maraṅ naeke Kaeapha ṭhen tolgeye kolkadea.
Ado Simon patras teṅgokate tinreye jorogokʼ kan tahẽkana unre hoṛko do uniko metadea, “Am hõ cetʼ uniren celako modren mitʼ hoṛ kanam?” Patras do baṅketʼteye menkeda, “Baṅ iń doń baṅkana.”
Patras okoeakʼ luture heseletʼtae uniren mitʼ peṛa do maraṅ naekeren golame tahẽkana. Khan uniye menkeda, “Iń do bagwanre uni tulucʼ cetʼ bạń ńeletʼmea?”
Patras do arhõe baṅkeda, ar unrege mitʼṭen sim sạnḍi doe rakʼgotʼkeda.

Jihudi mukhiạko do ạḍi setakʼre Kaeapha ṭhen khon Romren disạm cakʼlaoicʼ Pilạtakʼ doṅgolte Jisuko idikedea. Menkhan onko do ona doṅgol bhitrite bako bololena jemon saphako tahente sen-parom porob reakʼ bhojko jom daṛeakʼ.
Unre Pilạt do onko ṭhen bahrete oḍok hecʼenteye metatʼkoa, “Nui hoṛ do cetʼe dos akatʼtepe dusiyede kana?”
Jihudi mukhiạkoko menkeda, “Bạṛicʼakʼ bae kạmile khan am ṭhen do ohole ạgukea.”
Pilạte metatʼkoa, “Nui do idiyepe ar apeakʼ ạn leka bicạrepe.” Onate Jihudi mukhiạko do Pilạtko metadea, “Menkhan jãhãege gujukʼ sạjại emae reakʼ ektiạri aleakʼ do bạnukʼtalea.”
Jisu do cetʼleka gujukʼ hoyokʼtaea ona do laharegeye lạiletʼa. Noa do hoyena uniakʼ ona katha jemon purạukʼ.
Unre Pilạt do arhõ oṛakʼ bhitriteye boloyena ar Jisu hohoadeteye metadea, “Am do cetʼ Jihudikoren raj kanam?”
Jisui menkeda, “Am do cetʼ apnarte noa katham roṛeda, se eṭakʼ hoṛ iń reaṅko lại akawatʼmea?”
Pilạte roṛ ruạṛkeda, “Iń do cetʼ Jihudi kạnạń? Am jạtren hoṛ ar maraṅ naekekoge coṅ iń ṭhenko soprot akatʼme. Am do cetʼem ceka akada?”

Jisui menkeda, “Ińakʼ raj do noa dhạrti reakʼ do baṅkana. Ente noa dhạrti reakʼ tahẽlen khan enḍekhan ińren hoṛko lạṛhạikokʼa jemon Jihudi mukhiạkoakʼ tire aloń paṛaokokʼ; menkhan ińakʼ raj do nonḍenakʼ do baṅkana.”

Pilạt do Jisui metadea, “Enḍekhan am do cetʼ raj kanam?” Jisui roṛ ruạṛkeda, “Am do ṭhikgem menakada, iń doń raj kana. Iń do sạri goha emokʼ lạgitʼgeń janam akana ar ona lạgitʼge dhạrtiteń hecʼakana. Ar okoeye sạriakʼren kan uni do ińakʼ kathae ańjoma.”
Pilạt do uniye metadea, “Sạriakʼ do cetʼ kana? Noa katha menkate uni do arhõ bahrete senkate Jihudi mukhiyạkoe metatʼkoa, “Iń do nuiakʼ cetʼ dosge bạń ńametʼtaea.
Menkhan apeakʼ mitʼṭen niạm menakʼa, sen-parom porobre mitʼṭen kạidiń aṛakʼape. Ape do cetʼ Jihudikoren rajiń aṛakʼapepe khojkana?”
Noa iạte sanamko ãṭ aṛaṅte hohoateko menkeda, “Uni do baṅ, Barabbage.” Uni Barabba do mitʼṭen ḍạkui tahẽkana.
Unre Pilạt do Jisu idiyete cạbuke reakʼe hukumatʼkoa.
Palṭonko do jạnum reakʼ mukuṭ galaṅkate bohokʼreko horokʼadea.
Ar beguni roṅ reakʼ aṅgropko horokʼadete uni ṭhen senkateko menkeda, “Johar, Jihudikoren raj, jitạu hoyokʼtam ma!” Noa menkate onko doko thapa baṛakedea.
Pilạt do arhõ bahrete oḍok hecʼkate hoṛkoe metatʼkoa, “Ńelpe, ape ṭheniń oḍok ạguyedea jemonpe bujhạu daṛeakʼ, uniakʼ jãhãn dosge bạń ńametʼtaea.”
Ar Jisu do jạnum reakʼ mukuṭ ar beguni roṅanakʼ kicricʼ horokʼ akatʼge bahreteye oḍok hecʼena. Unre Pilạt do hoṛkoe metatʼkoa, “Nũkʼũi ńelepe, uni hoṛ.”
Ado Jisuko ńelkede khan maraṅ naekeko ar kạmiạko do hohoateko menkeda, “Krus kaeme, uni do krus kaeme.” Pilạt do hoṛkoe metatʼkoa, “Apege idiyete krus kaepe, ente uniakʼ jãhãn dosge bạń ńametʼtaea.”
Khange Jihudi mukhiạko do Pilạtko metadea, “Ale do mitʼṭen ạn menakʼtalea, ar ona ạn lekate uni do gocʼ ocokʼ lek kanae, ente uni do acʼte Isorren Hopone ńumogokʼ kana.”
Pilạt do noa kathae ańjomketʼ khan artetʼgeye botorena.
Uni do arhõ oṛakʼ bhitrite bolokate Jisui kulikedea, “Am do oka khonem hecʼakana?” Menkhan Jisu do cetʼge bae roṛ ruạṛleda.
Onate Pilạt do Jisui metadea, “Iń tulucʼ bam roṛa? Am do cetʼ bam baḍaea aṛakʼme se kruskam reakʼ ektiạri menakʼtińạ mente?”
Jisui roṛ ruạṛkeda, “Coṭ khon ektiạri baṅ emam khan iń cetanre jãhãn ektiạrige oho tahẽlentama.” Onate okoe amakʼ tireye soprot akadiń uniakʼ kại do ḍhergetaea.”

Noa ańjomkate Pilạt do Jisu aṛage lạgitʼe kurumuṭukeda, menkhan Jihudi mukhiạko do hohoateko menkeda, “Nuiyem aṛakʼ lekhan enḍekhan maharaj Kạisạrren gate dom baṅkana. Jãhãege acʼte raj menteye benaokʼ khan uni do Kạisạrren bạiri kanae.”
Noa katha ańjomkate Pilạt do Jisu bahreteye ạgukedea ar dhirite tolakʼ mitʼṭen bicạr jaegareye duṛupʼena. Ibrite ona jaega do Gabbathako metakʼkan tahẽkana.
Enhilokʼ do sen-parom porob reakʼ sapṛaokʼ din tahẽkana. Unre tikin amdaj tahẽkana. Pilạt do Jihudi mukhiyạkoe metatʼkoa, “Nũk̕ũi ńelepe, aperen raj.”

Onate onko do ãṭ aṛaṅte hohoateko menkeda, “Idiyem, idiyem ar krus kaeme.” Pilạte metatʼkoa, “Aperen raj do cetʼ ińiń kruskaea?” Maraṅ naekeko roṛ ruạṛadea, “Kạisạr chaḍa aleren do ar cele raj hõ bạnukʼkoa.”
Unre Pilạt do kruse lạgitʼ onkoakʼ tireye soprotkadea. Unre palṭonko do Jisuko idikedea.
Ar Jisu do acʼakʼ krus gokʼkate khạpriko metakʼ mitʼṭen jaegateye senena. Ona jaega reakʼ ńutum do Ibrite Golgothako metakʼkan tahẽkana.
Onko do onḍe Jisuko kruskedea ar uni dene banar secʼre bar hoṛ hõko krusketʼkinạ.
Ar Pilạt do mitʼṭen olakʼre olkate Jisuakʼ krus cetanreye bạisạu ocokeda. Onare ol tahẽkana, “Nasaretren Jisu Jihudikoren raj.”
Okare Jisuko kruskede ona jaega do nagraha sorre tahẽkante Jihudiko modren ḍher hoṛge ona olakʼko paṛhaokeda. Ona do Ibri, Romi ar Junạni pạrsite olakan tahẽkana.
Unre Jihudikoren maraṅ naekeko do Pilạtko metadea, “ ‘Jihudikoren raj,’ noa katha do alom ola, bickom olme, ‘uniye menetʼ tahẽkana, iń doń Jihudikoren raj kana.’ ”
Pilạte metatʼkoa, “Okań ol akatʼ ona doń ol akada.”

Ado Jisuko kruskede khan palṭonko do uniakʼ kicricʼ ako talare pon ṭhenko hạṭińana. Ar Jisuakʼ aṅgrop hõko hataokeda. Ona aṅgropre do jãhãn silạige baṅ tahẽkana, ona do coṭ khon pheḍ hạbicʼ jotoge teńakʼ tahẽkana.

Ona ńelte palṭonko do akoreko menjoṅana, “Noa do babon oṛeja bickom gulibãṭkate bon ńela okoeakʼ hoyokʼa mente.” Noa do hoyena sonot sostor reakʼ katha jemon purạukʼ, Onko do ako talare ińakʼ kicricʼko hạṭińana, ińakʼ aṅgrop doko gulibãṭkeda. Ar palṭonko do sạrigeko onkakeda.
Jisuren eṅgattetʼ, ar uniren eṅgattetʼren bokot kuṛi, Klopa rinicʼ Mạriạm, ar Magdalaren Mạriạm noko do Jisuakʼ krus ṭhenko teṅgo akan tahẽkana.
Jisu do acʼren eṅgattetʼ ar uniye dulạṛedekan tahẽkan cela teṅgo akane ńelketʼkin khan eṅgattetʼe metadea, “E go, ńeleme nũkʼũitam hoponme.”
Ona tayom uni celae metadea, “Ńeleme nũkʼũitam eṅgam.” Ar unrege uni cela do Jisuren eṅgattetʼ acʼakʼ oṛakʼteye idikedea.
Inạ tayom sanamakʼ purạu akana menteye baḍaeketʼ khan sonot sostor reakʼ katha jemon purạukʼ onate Jisui menkeda, “Tetaṅedińa.”
Ona jaegare sirkạte perecʼ mitʼṭen hanḍha tahẽkana. Unre onko do mitʼṭen ispońj ona sirkạreko topokeda ar husup ḍạr reakʼ agalre gutukate moca ṭhenko tomboṅadea.
Jisu sirkại ńamketʼ khane menkeda, “Purạu akana.” Ar ona tayom do bohokʼe kuḍburketʼte Jiue jimạketʼtaea.

Ona din do porob reakʼ sapṛaokʼ din tahẽkana. Ar dosar hilokʼ jirạukʼ mãhã tahẽkante Jihudi mukhiạko do ona dinre krus cetanre mạ̃ṛĩko tahen do bako khojlakʼa. Onate Pilạt ṭhenko nehõrena jemon krusre menakʼkoakʼ jaṅga rạputʼkate krus khonko pheḍ idiko.
Unre palṭonko hecʼkate Jisu sãoteko krusletʼkin unkin bana hoṛakʼ jaṅgako rạputʼkeda.
Ar Jisu ṭhenko hecʼen khan gocʼ hataṛ akanko ńelkedete uniakʼ jaṅga do bako rạputʼletʼtaea.
Menkhan mitʼṭen palṭon do borlomte uniakʼ kokhareye sobokʼkedea ar onḍe khon mãyãm ar dakʼ oḍokena.
Okoe nij mẽtʼte noakoe ńelletʼ unige gohae emakada, ar uniakʼ goha do sạrigea. Uni doe baḍaegea, acʼ okae roṛetʼ ona do sạrigea, ar ape hõ jemonpe pạtiạukʼ.
Noa do hoyena sonot sostor reakʼ katha jemon purạukʼ, “Uniakʼ do mitʼṭen jaṅ hõ baṅ rạpudokʼtaea.”
Arhõ sostor reakʼ ar mitʼṭen katha do noage, “Okoe uniko sobokʼ tapʼlede onkoge uniko beṅgetʼaea.”

Noako sanamakʼ hoyen tayom Arimạthiạ atoren Joseph do Jisuakʼ mạ̃ṛĩ idiy lạgitʼ Pilạt ṭhene koekeda. Joseph hõ Jisuren celae tahẽkana menkhan sodorte do baṅ, ente uni do Jihudi mukhiyạkoe botorakokan tahẽkana. Ado Pilạte aṛakʼade khan uni do hecʼkate Jisuakʼ mạ̃ṛĩye idikeda.
Ar lahate ạyupʼ jokhecʼ okoe do Jisu ṭhene hecʼlen uni Nikodemus hõ pe gel pe keji mesao akatʼ gondhoros ar oguruanteye hecʼena.
Unkin do Jisuakʼ mạ̃ṛĩ hataokate Jihudikoakʼ topa reakʼ cạli leka ona sanam mosola salakʼ musnạ kicricʼte mạ̃ṛĩkin bedhaokeda.
Ar Jisu okareko kruslede ona jaegare mitʼṭen bagwan tahẽkana ar onḍe do nawage kholao akatʼ mitʼṭen topa tahẽkana. Ona topare do okoege tis hõ bako dohoakatʼko tahẽkana.
Ona din do Jihudikoakʼ porob reakʼ sapṛaokʼ din tahẽkana, ar topa hõ sorrege tahẽkante unkin do ona toparege Jisukin baekadea.
Ado hapta reakʼ pạhil din ạḍi setakʼre, ńut tahẽkanrege Magdalaren Mạriạm do ona topa ṭhene hecʼena. Ar topa duạr khon dhiri do ocokʼ akatʼe ńelkeda.
Onate uni do Simon Patras ar Jisui dulạṛedekan tahẽkan cela ṭhen ńir senkateye lạiatʼkinạ, “Probhu do topa khonko idiakadea. Ar okareko dohoakadea ona do bale baḍaea.”
Unre Patras ar uni eṭakʼ cela do oḍokkate topa secʼkin calao idiyena.
Ar mitʼtekin dạṛ idikeda. Uni eṭagicʼ cela do Patras laha lahate usạrateye ńir senente topa ṭhene seṭer maṛaṅena, menkhan topa bhitrite uni do bae bololena.
Uni do eṅgotʼkateye oyoṅketʼ khan Jisuakʼ hoṛmore okaṭakʼ kicricʼ bedhao tahẽkan onako doho akane ńelkeda.
Simon Patras hõ uni tayomte seṭerkate topa bhitriteye boloyena ar kicricʼko dohoakatʼe ńelketʼa.
Uni do arhõe ńelkeda, bohokʼre okaṭakʼ rumạl bedhao tahẽkan ona do eṭakʼ kicricʼko sãote bạnukʼa, menkhan guṛhạ akatʼ mitʼ jaegare begar dohoakana.
Ado okoeṭakʼ cela pạhilte topa ṭhene seṭerlen uni hõ topa bhitriteye boloyena are ńelketʼteye pạtiạuena.
Ar gocʼko khon Jisuakʼ jiwetʼ beredokʼ reakʼ je jạruṛ menakʼ, ona sonot sostor reakʼ katha onko do lahare bako bujhạu akatʼ tahẽkana.
Ona tayom unkin cela do oṛakʼtekin ruạṛ calaoena,
menkhan Mạriạm do topa bahrere teṅgokateye rakʼjoṅkan tahẽkana. Uni do rarakʼ tulucʼ eṅgotʼkate topa bhitriye oyoṅketʼ khan,
Jisuakʼ mạ̃ṛĩ okare dohoakan tahẽkan onḍe ponḍ kicricʼ horokʼ akatʼ barea serma goḍet duṛupʼ akane ńelketʼkinạ, mitʼṭen do bohokʼ secʼre ar eṭakʼicʼ do jaṅga secʼre.
Unkin do Mạriạmkin metadea, “Cedakʼem rakʼeda?” Metatʼkinae, “Ińren Probhuko idiakadea ar okareko dohoakadea ona do bạń baḍaea.”
Noa menkate tayom secʼe beṅgetʼ ạcurketʼ khan Jisu teṅgo akane ńelkedea, menkhan Jisu kanae mente bae bujhạu daṛeadea.

Jisu do uniye metadea, “Cedakʼem rakʼeda? Ar okoeyem ńam baṛayede kana?” Mạriạm do Jisu bagwanren mạli hudiskedeteye metadea, “Amem idiakade khan dayakate lạiạńme okarem doho akadea. Iń do uniń idiyea.”
Jisui menkeda, “Mạriạm.” Onate Mạriạm doe ạcurente Ibrite Jisui metadea, “Rạbbuni.” Mane do E Guru.

Jisui menkeda, “Alom hạṛubińạ, ente ńit hõ sermaren Baba ṭhen ạuriń calakʼa. Am do senkate boehako lạiakome, okoe doe iń ar aperen Babakan ar okoe doe iń ar aperen Isorkan, iń do uni ṭheniń rakapʼ calakʼkana.”
Unre Magdalani Mạriạm do celako ṭhen senkateye jạhiratʼkoa je, uni do Probhui ńelakadea ar Probhuge noako katha lại lạgitʼe menakawạdińa.

Ado enhilokʼge, hapta reakʼ pạhil din ạyupʼ jokhecʼ celako do Jihudi mukhiạko botorte duạr sińkate mitʼ ṭhenko jarwa akan tahẽkana. Unre Jisu do hecʼkate onko talare teṅgoyenteye metatʼkoa, “Suluk apema.”
Ar noa menkate uni do acʼakʼ banar ti ar kokhae udukʼatʼkoa. Ar Probhuko ńelkede khan celako do ạḍitetʼko rạskạyena.
Jisu do arhõe metatʼkoa, “Suluk ape ma. Baba cetʼleka ińe kolakadiń onkage iń hõ apeń koletʼpea.”
Noa menkate uni do celako oṅatʼkoteye metatʼkoa, “Sonot Jiu hatao joṅpe.
Ape do jãhãekoakʼ kạipe ikạitako, enḍekhan onkoakʼ do ikạkʼtakoa. Ar jãhãekoakʼpe tahẽ ocoetako khan onkoakʼ do tahẽakan tahentakoa.”
Jisu tinreye hecʼlen unre gelbarko modren Thoma ńutuman mitʼ hoṛ do onko soṅgere bae tahẽkana. Nui Thomage jawako metaekan tahẽkana.

Ar eṭakʼ celako do Thomako lạiadea, “Ale do Probhule ńelakadea.” Khan Thoma do onkoe metatʼkoa, “Tin hạbicʼ uniakʼ banar tire jạlại reakʼ cinhạ bạń ńel, ar bhugạkʼre kạṭupʼ bạń gutui ar kokhare ti bạń sog unhạbicʼ ohogeń pạtiạulena.”

Ado niạ mitʼ hapta tayom celako do arhõ oṛakʼ bhitrire mitʼ ṭhenko jarwayena, ar Thoma hõ onko sãoteye tahẽkana. Unre silpińko sińge tahẽkanre hõ Jisu do hecʼkate onko talare teṅgoyenteye metatʼkoa, “Suluk ape ma.”
Ona tayom uni do Thomae metadea, “Amakʼ kạṭupʼ nonḍe ạguitam ar ińakʼ banar ti ńelme ar amakʼ ti tiạrkate kokhare sogeńme. Ar bin pạtiạricʼ do alom hoyokʼa bickom pạtiạuicʼge hoyokʼme.”
Unre Thomae menkeda, “E ińren Probhu, E ińren Isor.”
Jisu do uniye metadea, “Thoma, am do cetʼ ńel akadińtem pạtiạukʼ kana? Okoe begor ńelteko pạtiạukʼ onkogeko bhạgana.”
Jisu do celako samaṅre arhõ ạḍi utạr cinhạ kạmiye kạmileda; one onako do noa puthire baṅ olakana.
Menkhan noako olena jemonpe pạtiạukʼ, Jisu do Mạsi, Isorren Hopon kanae mente, arpe pạtiạukʼte uni hotete jion tahentape.
Inạ tayom Jisu do Tiberias doreão aṛere celako ṭhen arhõe ńel ocoyena. Onḍe do nonka lekae sodorena.
Simon Patras, ar jawako metae Thoma ar Gạlil reakʼ Kana nagraharen Nathaniel, Sabdaeren hoponkin ar Jisuren eṭakʼ barea cela onko do mitʼ soṅgeteko tahẽkana.

Unre Simon Patrase metatʼkoa, “Iń do hako sasapʼiń calakʼ kana.” Onkoko metadea, “Ale hõ am sãotele calakʼa.” Unre onko do oḍok senkate lạukạreko decʼena, menkhan ona ńindạ do celege bako sapʼ daṛeatʼkoa.
Ado aṅga hijukʼkan tahẽkanre Jisu do doreão aṛere hecʼenteye teṅgoyena. Menkhan celako do Jisu kanae mente bako oromledea.
Uni do celakoe metatʼkoa, “E bachako jãhãn jomakʼ menakʼtapea? Metadeako, “Bạnukʼtalea.”
Jisui metatʼkoa, “Lạukạ reakʼ jojomsa aṛe secʼ jhạli caḍoetape, khanpe ńamkoa.” Unre onko do jhạliko caḍoketʼa ar nunạkʼ hakoko beṛketʼkoa je, onko do bako or rakapʼ daṛeada.

Ado Jisu okoeṭakʼ celae dulạṛedekan tahẽkan uni do Patrase metadea, “Uni doe Probhu kana.” Unre Simon Patras do koṭogeye tahẽkana. Onate “Probhu kanae” menteye baḍaeketʼ khan aṅgropte paṭheyente doreão dakʼreye don khadleyena.
Onko do ghuṭu khon ḍher sạṅgińre do baṅ, eken bar sae mokagan sạṅgińreko tahẽkana. Onate eṭakʼ celako do hakote perecʼ jhạli or orte lạukạte aṛeteko hecʼena.
Ado ghuṭuteko seṭeren khan kaṭ koela reakʼ seṅgel ar onare hako khadle akanko ńelkeda; ar onḍe do piṭhạ hõ tahẽkana.
Unre Jisui metatʼkoa, “Ńitokʼpe sapʼketʼko hako khon thoṛa ạgukope.”
Khan Simon Patras do lạukạreye decʼente aṛete jhạliye or ạgukeda. Ar jhạli do mitʼ sae mõṛẽgel pea lạṭu hakote perecʼ tahẽkana. Menkhan jhạlire nunạkʼ hakoko tahẽkanre hõ ona do baṅ oṛecʼlena.
Jisui metatʼkoa, “Dela hijukʼpe ar jompe.” Menkhan celako modre okoe hõ dilkate bako kuliledea, “Am dom okoe kana mente?” Ente onko doko baḍaekan tahẽkana, uni doe Probhu kana.
Jisu do hecʼkate piṭhại halaṅkeda are ematʼkoa, ar onkage hako hõ.
Gocʼko khon beretʼ ruạṛ tayom Jisu do tesar dhao acʼren celako ṭhene ńel ocoyena.

Adoko jom sạtketʼ khan Jisu do Simon Patrase metadea, “E Jona hopon Simon, noko khon bạ̃ṛtim dulạṛedeń kana?” Simon Patrase menkeda, “Hẽ Probhu, baḍaegeam tinạkʼiń dulạṛetʼmea mente.” Jisu do uniye metadea, “Ińren bhiḍiko gupikom.”

Jisu do dosar dhao uniye metadea, “E Jona hopon Simon, ińem dulạṛedeń kangea? Simon Patrase menkeda, “Hẽ Probhu, baḍaegeam tinạkʼ iń dulạṛetʼmea mente.” Jisu do uniye metadea, “Ińren bhiḍiko jotonkom.”

Uni do tesar dhao Simon Patrase metadea, “Jona hopon Simon, sạrigem dulạṛedeń kana?” Patras doe mon dukena, ente Jisu do tesar dhao uniye kulikedea, “Sạrigem dulạṛedeń kana?” Onate Patras do Jisui metadea, “E Probhu am do jotowakʼgem baḍaea, ar noa hõm baḍaegea amiń dulạṛetʼme kana.” Jisu do uniye metadea, “Ińren bhiḍiko gupikom.

Sạrigeń metamkana, juạnem tahẽkanre amtem paṭhekʼkan tahẽkana ar jãhãtege sanayetʼme tahẽkan onḍegem calakʼkan tahẽkana. Menkhanem haṛamlenre am do amakʼ tim tiạr tama ar eṭagicʼ do ame tolmea ar okare calakʼ baṅ saname onḍegeye idimea.”
Isorakʼ ṭhonok sodortae lạgitʼ Patrasakʼ cetʼleka gujukʼ hoyokʼtaea ona bujhạu ocoe lạgitʼ Jisu do noa kathae roṛkeda. Ar noae roṛketʼ khan Patrase metadea, “Dela pańjańme.”

Patras do tayom secʼe beṅgetʼ ạcurketʼ khan, Jisui dulạṛedekan tahẽkan cela pańjakane ńelkedea. Nui celage, kedokʼ jokhecʼ Jisuakʼ koṛamre ṭenḍarkateye menletʼa, “E Probhu, bạirikoakʼ tireye soprotme, uni doe okoe kana?”
Patras do uniye ńelkedete Jisui metadea, “E Probhu, nuiakʼ do cetʼ hoyokʼa?”
Jisu do Patrase metadea, “Ạuriń ruạṛ hijukʼ hạbicʼe tahẽ hataṛokʼ khan amakʼ do cetʼ? Menkhan am do iń pańjańme.”

Onate boehako talare katha pasnaoena je, uni cela do bae gujukʼa. Menkhan Jisu do Patras bae menakawadea uni do bae gujukʼa mente. Bickome metade tahẽkana, “Ạuriń ruạṛ hijukʼ hạbicʼe tahẽ hataṛokʼ iń menjoṅkan khan amakʼ do cetʼ?”
Uni celage noako reaṅ gohae emetʼkana ar noakoe oletʼkana. Alele baḍaea uniakʼ goha do sạrigea.
Jisu do arhõ ạḍi utạrakʼkoe kạmileda. Onako mitʼ mitʼte ollen khan nunạkʼ puthiko hoekokʼa je, ińakʼ bujre noa dhạrtire ohoge sahopʼlena.

Uni do acʼakʼ duk jom tayom nokoko hoṛ ṭhengeye ńel ocolena ar uni je jiwetʼge menae ona reakʼ ạḍi utạr biswạsteakʼ pormane emakada. Uni do pon gel din hạbicʼ celako ṭhene ńel ocoyente Isorakʼ raj reaṅe lạiatʼko tahẽkana.

Onako oktere mitʼ din Jisu do celako sãoteye tahẽkanre noae hukumatʼko tahẽkana, “Ape do Jerusalem alope bạgiakʼa, bickom ińren Babawakʼ gokʼa oka dan reakʼ katha iń ṭhenpe ańjomakatʼ ona lạgitʼ koyokʼ hor akae tahenpe.
Johan do dakʼteye bạptisetʼko tahẽkana, menkhan thoṛa din khange ape do Babawakʼ ona gokʼakʼ lekate sonot Jiutepe bạptis ocokʼa.”
Ado celako hecʼ jarwakate Jisuko kulikedea, “E Probhu, niạ jokhecʼ am do cetʼ Israelko rajosṭim teṅgo ruạṛakoa?”
Jisui metatʼkoa, “Okaṭakʼ din se okte Baba do acʼakʼ ektiạrireye dohoakatʼ ona do bape baḍae ocoakana.
Menkhan sonot Jiu apereye hecʼlenre ape do daṛepe ńama, ar Jerusalem, goṭa Jihudạ, Samariạre, hẽ, dhạrti reakʼ mucạtʼ simạ hạbicʼge ińren gohakope hoyokʼa.”
Noa kathae lạiatʼko khan celako samaṅrege Jisu doe rakapʼ ocoyena ar mitʼṭen rimil reakʼ danaṅteye calaoena.
Ado Jisu coṭ secʼe rakapʼ calakʼkan tahẽkanre celako do serma secʼko koyokʼ uricʼ akatʼ tahẽkana. Ar unre ponḍ kicricʼ horokʼ akatʼ bar hoṛ do celako ṭhen teṅgoyentekin menkeda,
E Gạlilren hoṛko nonḍe teṅgokate serma secʼ do cedakʼpe beṅgetʼ akada? Okoe ape ṭhen khone rakapʼ ocoyen ar cetʼleka sermate calakʼkanpe ńelkede onkage uni doe ruạṛ hijukʼa.”
Unre celako do jạitun buru khon Jerusalemteko ruạṛ hecʼena. Jerusalem nagraha khon noa buru do mitʼ kilomiṭar saṅgińre tahẽkana.

Ado nagrahateko boloyen khan onko do oka koṭha kandhareko tahẽkan onḍeko rakapʼena. Noko celakoakʼ ńutum do Patras, Johan, Jakob ar Andreas, Philip ar Thoma, Bartholomae ar Mathae, Alphaeren hopon Jakob ar moulobadi Simon ar Jakobren hopon Jihudạ.
Onko jotoge biswạsi maejiuko ar Jisu eṅgat Mạriạm ar uniren boehako tulucʼ mitʼ monte koejoṅre jamaṛ akanko tahẽkana.
Onako dinre Patras do Mạsire pạtiạu akan mitʼ sae bargel hoṛko talare teṅgoyente menkeda,

“E boehako, ḍher din lahare sonot Jiu do Dạud rajakʼ mocate Jihudạ reaṅ oka kathae roṛletʼ, sonot sostor reakʼ ona katha do purạukʼ reakʼ jạruṛ tahẽkana. Ar okoeko Jisuko sapʼlede, onko do uni Jihudạge hore udukʼatʼko tahẽkana.
Uni do alerenge mitʼ hoṛe tahẽkana ar ale sãote kạmi lạgitʼe bachao ocolena.”
Bạṛicʼ kạmi iạte oka ṭakae ńamletʼ onate thoṛa hasae kirińkeda, ar onḍe uni doe tupucʼ ńũrenteye ṭhu oṛecʼena, ar uniakʼ lacʼko posakʼ oḍokentaea.
Jerusalemren sanamkoge ona katha doko ańjomleda. Onate onkoakʼ pạrsite noa jumi do Akeldama se mãyãm reakʼ goḍako metakʼkana.
Patrase menkeda “Sonot sostorre sereńko reakʼ puthire olakana, uniakʼ oṛakʼ do ujạṛokʼma; onare okoe hõ aloko tahenma, ar uniakʼ cetan hudạ do eṭakʼ hoṛe hataoma.
Unre celako do bar hoṛko teṅgoketʼkina, Barsabako metae Joseph, one okoe do Justuse bahnayen ar Mạthiạ.
Adoko gulibãṭketʼ khan Mạthiạ ńutum rakapʼena. Onate Mạthiạ do onko gelmitʼ apostolko sãoteye lekha mitʼena.
Niạ thoṛa din tayom Pentekosṭ porob reakʼ dinre celako do mitʼ ṭhenko jarwa mitʼakan tahẽkana.
Unre ackage serma khon tạpis hoe reakʼ hud hud saḍe leka mitʼṭen saḍe hecʼena ar onko okareko tahẽkan ona oṛakʼ do saḍete perecʼena.
Ar celakoko ńelkeda seṅgel reakʼ alaṅ leka cetʼ coṅ hạṭińokʼkana ar onako do hoṛo hoṛo apʼatʼkoa.
Onate onko jotoge sonot Jiuteko perecʼena ar uni Jiue danatʼko daṛe leka eṭakʼ eṭakʼ pạrsite roroṛko ehopʼena.
Ona oktere dhạrti reakʼ aema disạm khon Isor bhokti Jihudiko do Jerusalemre hecʼkateko girobasokʼ kan tahẽkana.
Onko do ona saḍeko ańjomkeda ar ḍherkoge onḍeko jarwayena. Ar apan ạpin pạrsite celako katha roroṛko ańjomketʼko khan onko doko tharbasaoena.
Onko do ạḍi hahaṛayenteko menkeda, “Katha roroṛkanko do cetʼ jotoge Gạlilren doko baṅkana?
Ar onka kan khan abo do cekate apan ạpin pạrsite onkoakʼ moca khon katha bon ańjomeda?
Parthiko, Mediko, Elamiko ar Mesopotamiare berelakan hoṛko, Jihudạ ar Kapadokiạren, Pontos ar Asiạren,
Phrugiạ ar Pamphuliạren, Misor ar Kurene senakʼ Lubiạ reakʼ adom jaegaren hoṛko, ar Rom nagrahare upriạ Jihudiko ar Jihudi dhoromreko pạtiạu akan boṅgan hoṛ jạtrenko,
Kret dipren hoṛko ar Arobrenko; abo sanamkoge coṅ aboakʼ nij nij pạrsite Isorakʼ maraṅ kạmiko reakʼ katha roroṛkan bon ańjometʼko.”
Onko do hahaṛa arko tharbasaoente ako akore kupulikʼko ehopʼena, “Noa reakʼ mane do cetʼ kana?”
Arhõ eṭakʼko do celakoko cigạriatʼkoteko menkeda, “Onko do bubulakʼteko ńu bhuteṛ akana.”
Unre Patras do onko gelmitʼ celako sãote teṅgokate ãṭ aṛaṅte hoṛkoe metatʼkoa, “E Jihudiren hoṛko ar okoe do Jerusalemrepe tahenkan, ape do baḍae dohokakʼpe ar monte ińakʼ kathako ańjompe.
Ape dope hudisetʼkana noko doko bul akana, menkhan ona do baṅ; ente ńitokʼ ma setakʼ are baja hoeakan.
Noa do ona ghoṭna leka, one okoeakʼ katha Joel nạbi hotete roṛlen,

‘Mucạtʼ dinkore iń do sanam hoṛko cetanre ińren Jiu iń dulea; onate aperen hopon ar hoponerako do nạbi lekate Isorakʼ kathako lạiya, ar aperen juạnko do dorsonko ńama, ar aperen murubiko do kukmuko ńela.
Ona oktere ińren guti ar kạ̃ṛmĩko cetanre, iń do ińren Jiuiń dulakoa, ar onko do nạbi lekate kathako roṛa.
Iń do coṭ sermare hahaṛawakʼ ghoṭnakoń uduga, ar dhạrtire hõ ạḍilekan cinhạkoń hoeocoya; metakʼme mãyãm, seṅgel ar aema dhuạ̃ń ńel ocoya.
Probhuakʼ ona maraṅ ar ṭhonokte perecʼ dinko hijukʼ lahare, siń cando doe ńutokʼa; ar ńindạ cando do mãyãm lekae hoyokʼa.
Ar bańcao ńam lạgitʼ, okoe Probhui hohowae uni doe bańcaokʼa.’
“E Israelko, noa katha ańjompe. Nasaretren Jisu hotete Isor do ape talare bhage ar hahaṛa kạmikote ape ṭhene sạbud akada je, uni do Jisui kolledea; ar noa katha do ape hõpe baḍaegea.
Isor, okoe do laharege jotowakʼe baḍaekan, uni do laharegeye ṭhik dohoakatʼ tahẽkana je, apeakʼ tire Jisui soprotea. Ar ape hõ bạṛicʼ hoṛko hotete unipe kruskedea arpe gocʼ ocokedea.
Menkhan Isor do gujukʼ reakʼ bedon khon khalaskate uniye jiwetʼ beretʼkedea, ente uni sapʼ dohoye reakʼ ektiạri gujukʼakʼ do bạnukʼtaea.
Dạud do uni reaṅe menakada, ‘Probhu do jaoge iń samaṅreń ńelekana; uni do ińakʼ jojomsa aṛere menaete iń doń ṭarhao tahena.
Noa iạte ińakʼ mon do rạskạte perecʼjokʼ kana, ińakʼ alaṅ do rạskạ reakʼ kathae roṛa, ar ińakʼ hoṛmo hõ aste bańcaokʼ tińạ;
ente patal purire do bam giḍiyińạ, ar amren sonoticʼakʼ hoṛmo hõ bam nosṭo ocoya.
Jion reakʼ horkom baḍae ocokedińạ; ar am ṭhen tahenge rạskạ reakʼ perecʼtetʼ do menakʼa.’
“E boehako, noa katha do khạṭigeń men daṛeakʼa je, raj bõsren baba Dạud doe gocʼena ar topa hõe topa ocoakana ar uniakʼ topa do teheń hõ nonḍe menakʼa.
Uni do mitʼṭen nạbiye tahẽkana, are baḍaekan tahẽkana Isor do kiriạkate noae gokʼade tahẽkana je, uniakʼ siṅghạsonre uni bõsrenge mitʼṭen hoṛe duṛubea.
Ar tayomte cetʼ hoyokʼa onae ńelletʼte uni do gocʼko khon Mạsiakʼ arhõ jiwetʼ beredokʼ reaṅe roṛleda je, Mạsi do patal purire hõ bae doho giḍi ocolena ar hoṛmo hõ baṅ sealentaea.
Uni Jisuge Isor doe jiwetʼ beretʼkedea, ar ale do sanamkoge uniren gohako kanale.

Isorakʼ jojomsa aṛere duṛubokʼ reakʼ ṭhonok do unigeye dan akawadea are gokʼade tahẽkan sonot Jiu do Isor Baba ṭhen khongeye ńam akadea; ar ńitokʼ ape okape ńeletʼkan arpe ańjometʼkan ona do Jisugeye emakana.
“Onate sanam Israel jạtko noa katha khạṭiteko baḍaema je, ape okoepe kruslede Isor do uni Jisuge Probhu hõ ar Mạsi hõe hoeoco akedea.”
Noa katha ańjomkate hoṛko do monre dukko ńamkeda. Onko do Patras ar eṭakʼ apostolkoko kuliketʼkoa, “E boehako, ale do cetʼle cekaya?”
Patrase roṛ ruạṛatʼkoa, “Kại khon mon ạcurtape ar Jisu Mạsi ńutumte bạptisokʼpe. Ar ape do dan lekate sonot Jiupe ńamea.
Ape lạgitʼ, aperen gidrạ lạgitʼ ar okoe do sạṅgińre menakʼko, metakʼme aboren Probhu Isor do okoeko acʼren hoṛ hoyokʼ lạgitʼe hohoako, onko sanamko lạgitʼ noa gokʼakʼ do emakana.”
Ona chaḍa arhõ ạḍi utạr kathakote Patras do goha emokʼe ehopʼena. Uni do noa menkate bujhạu ocokoe kurumuṭukeda, “Niạ peṛta piṛhiren hoṛko khon apnarte bańcaokʼpe.”
Ado uniakʼ kathare okoeko pạtiạuen onko doko bạptisena ar enhilokʼ onko sãote pe hajar hoṛko juṭucʼena.
Onkoko hoṛ do apostolkoakʼ cecetʼakʼko ańjometʼkan tahẽkana, ar onko sãote mitʼte Probhu kedokʼko ataṅetʼ tahẽkana ar koejoṅre jamaṛ akanko tahẽyena.
Ar sanamkoge botor caṛhaoatʼkoa, ar apostolko do ạḍi utạr hahaṛa kạmi ar cinhạ kạmiko ehopʼena.
Ar sanam biswạsikoge mitʼ soṅgeteko tahenkan tahẽkana ar jotowakʼge apan ạpin jạruṛakokan lekako beboharetʼ tahẽkana.
Onko do akoakʼ khet baṛge ar dhon-duribko ạkhrińkate mimitʼkoakʼ jạruṛokʼakʼ lekako em hạṭińakokan tahẽkana.
Onko do din hilokʼ mundilreko jarwakʼkan tahẽkana ar oṛakʼ oṛakʼ piṭhạ kecag tulucʼ rạskạ salakʼ soṛa monte mitʼteko jom ńũiyetʼ tahẽkana.
Onko do jao ghuṛi Isorko sarhaoede tahẽkana ar sanam hoṛge onkoko manotetʼkokan tahẽkana. Ar okoe kại khon bańcaokʼko ńametʼ tahẽkan Probhu do biswạsiko tulucʼ jao hilokʼ onkoe juṭucʼ idiketʼkoa.
Mitʼ din Patras ar Johan do tarasiń okte reakʼ koejoṅre mundiltekin rakapʼ calakʼkan tahẽkana.

Onḍe hoṛko do mundil reakʼ mońjko metakʼ duạr ṭhen dinạmge mitʼṭen hoṛ gokʼ ạgukateko dohokaekan tahẽkana. Uni do janam khonge leḍhageye tahẽkana. Ar mundilte bolokʼkanko ṭhen khon koe ńam lạgitʼ onḍeye doho ocokʼkan tahẽkana.
Uni do Patras ar Johan mundilte bolokʼkane ńelketʼkin khan unkin ṭhene koekeda.
Unre Patras ar Johan do unikin beṅgetʼ uricʼadea. Ona tayom Patrase menkeda, “Ạliń secʼ beṅgedme.”
Unre uni hoṛ do jãhãnakʼe ńama aste unkin secʼe beṅgetʼkeda.
Unre Patrase menkeda, “Sona ar rupạ do bạnukʼtińạ, menkhan okaṭakʼ menakʼtiń onageń emamkana. Nasaretren Jisu Mạsiakʼ ńutumte beretʼme ar taṛamme.”
Ado jojom ti sapʼkateye beretʼkedea ar unrege uniakʼ jaṅga ar iḍi do keṭecʼentaea.
Uni doe don beretʼena ar taṛam baṛaye ehopʼena. Tayomte uni do taṛam ar don donte Isor sarhao sarhaoete unkin sãote mundilteye boloyena.
Uni kokoe hoṛ do Patras ar Johan tạkin bae bạgiatʼkinạ. Ar hoṛko do Patrasakʼ kạmi iạteko hahaṛayente unkin ṭhenko ńir hecʼena.

Unre onko do Solomonakʼ pinḍạreko tahẽkana. Ar Patras do onae ńelketʼ khan hoṛkoe metatʼkoa, “E Israelko, noa iạte cedakʼpe hahaṛakʼ kana? Ạlińakʼ daṛete se Isorakʼ bhoktite nui liń taṛam daṛe ocokedete cedakʼpe beṅgetʼ uricʼ ạliń kana?

Abraham, Isạhak ar Jakobren Isor, metakʼme aboren hapṛamkoren Isorge noa kạmi hotete acʼren golam Jisuakʼ ṭhonoke sodor akada. Ape ma goje lạgitʼ mukhiyạkoakʼ tirepe soprotlede. Pilạt do aṛakʼkaegeye menleda, menkhan Pilạt samaṅre unipe baṅkedea.
Ape do uni sonoticʼ ar dhoromicʼpe baṅkedete mitʼṭen khũniạhi aṛakʼape lạgitʼpe khojleda.
Okoe doe jionren mạlik kan unigepe gocʼkedea, menkhan Isor do gocʼko khon uniye jiwetʼ beretʼakadea; ar ale do onaren gohako kanale.
Nuipe ńelekan arpe baḍaeyede kan hoṛ do, Jisureye pạtiạuente, uniakʼ ńutumte daṛeye ńamkeda. Ar Jisu hotete oka pạtiạu hijukʼkan ona pạtiạuge uni do sanamko samaṅreye bogekedea.
“E boehako, ńitokʼ ińiń baḍaea aperen murubiko leka ape hõ begor bujhạutege Jisupe krusledea.
Menkhan Isor do ḍher din lahare sanam nạbiko hoteteye roṛleda Mạsi do duk jojom hoyokʼtaea; ar Isor do ona katha nonkageye purạukeda.
Onate kại khon mon ạcurtape ar Isor secʼ ruạṛokʼpe jemon apeakʼ kạiko meṭaokʼtape;
Ar ona iạte jemon Isor do uni Mạsi, metakʼme Jisui kol apeteye cerṭha ocope. Ente ape lạgitʼge uni doe bachao ocoakana.
Isor do lahate leka sanamakʼ arhõe beretʼ ruạṛa mente ḍher laha khonge sonot nạbiko hoteteye roṛletʼa. Ar tin hạbicʼ acʼakʼ onako katha bae purạu unạkʼ hạbicʼ Jisu do sermare tahen hoyokʼtaea.
Moseye menleda; ‘Aperen Probhu Isor do aperen boehako mod khon iń leka mitʼṭen nạbiye teṅgoapea. Ar uniakʼ katha leka ape do calakʼ hoyokʼtapea.
Ar okoe uniakʼ katha bae ańjom uni do acʼren hoṛko khone marao giḍiyea.’
“Ona chaḍa Sạmuel khon ehopʼkate tinạkʼ nạbikoko roṛakatʼ, onko hõ niạ okte reakʼ katha lahareko lại oṭoakada,

ar ape ma onko nạbikoren bõsko kanpe. Aperen hapṛamko lạgitʼ Isor okae bondobos akatʼ tahẽkan, ape hõ coṅ onaren bhạgiạdarko kanpe. Isor do Abraham noa kathateye bondobos akawade tahẽkana, ‘am bõsren hotete dhạrtiren sanam jạtkoge bhorko ńama.’
Ar ape mimitʼko apeakʼ bạṛicʼ hor khon ạcurokʼte bhorape lạgitʼge Isor do ape ṭhen acʼren Guti Jisui kolledea.”
Patras ar Johan do tinre hoṛkokin galmarao akokan tahẽkana unre naekeko, mundilren mukhiyạko ar Sạdukiko hõ unkin ṭhenko hecʼena.
Onko do ạḍiko edre akan tahẽkana, ente Patras ar Johan do hoṛkokin cetʼakokan tahẽkana ar Jisu hotete gocʼko arhõ jiwetʼ beredokʼ reaṅ kin porcaretʼ tahẽkana.
Onko do Patras ar Johanko sapʼketʼkinạ ar ạyupʼ akan tahẽkante dosar hilokʼ hạbicʼ hajotreko dohokatʼkinạ.
Menkhan okoeko Patrasakʼ kathako ańjomletʼ onko modren ḍher hoṛgeko pạtiạuena; ar nonkate biswạsikoko ḍher idiyente mõṛẽ hajarko hoyena.
Ado dosar hilokʼ Jihudikoren maraṅ naekeko, murubiko ar sostor baḍaeko do Jerusalemreko jarwa mitʼena.
Onḍe do maraṅ naeke Hannas hõe tahẽkana. Ona chaḍa Kaeapha, Johan, Aleksander ar maraṅ naekeakʼ gharońjren eṭakʼ hoṛko hõko tahẽkana.
