Onko do Patras ar Johan ako talareko teṅgoketʼkinteko kuliketʼkinạ, “Aben do cetʼ reakʼ daṛete se okoe ńutumte noa ben kạmi kana?”
Unre Patras do sonot Jiuteye perecʼente onkoe metatʼkoa, “Maraṅ naekeko ar murubiko,
ạliń do mitʼṭen leḍha hoṛliń bogekedete teheńpe kuliyetʼlińạ, uni hoṛ do cekateye bogeyena.

Enḍekhan ape ar sanam Israelko noa katha baḍae dohokakʼpe je, Nasaretren Jisu Mạsi, okoe dope kruslede ar okoe do gocʼko khon Isore jiwetʼ beretʼkede, uniakʼ daṛetege nui hoṛ doe bogeyente ape samaṅreye teṅgo akana.
Sonot sostor reakʼ katha leka Jisu Mạsi kangeae ‘ona dhiri do, one okaṭakʼ raj mistiriko, metakʼme apepe nihạt giḍiletʼ tahẽkan; ar onage konac reakʼ asolakʼ dhiri do hoyena.’
Kại khon bańcao do ar okoe ṭhen khon hõ oho ńamlena, ente serma latarre, manwako talare nonkan okoege bạnukʼkoa one uniakʼ ńutumte kại khon bańcao bon ńam daṛeke.”
Ado Patras ar Johanakʼ dil ńelte ar bin bidiyạwan ar ne hoṛkanakin menteko baḍaeketʼ khan onko mukhiyạko doko hahaṛayena, ar noa hõko bujhạukeda je unkin hõ Jisu sãotekin tahẽkana.
Ar okoeye boge ocoyen uni do Patras ar Johan sãote teṅgo akanko ńelkede khan unkin birudre roroṛ reakʼ ar cetʼge baṅ tahẽlen takoa.
Onate onko do maraṅ bạisi khon oḍok calakʼ lạgitʼko hukumatʼ kinạ. Ar inạ tayom onko do mitʼ ṭhenko jarwayente sopolhako dhurạuena.
Onkoko menkeda, “Nukin hoṛ do cetʼ bon cekakinạ? Ente Jerusalemre okoeko tahenkan onko do jotogeko baḍaekeda je, nukin do mitʼṭen hahaṛawakʼkin kạmi akada, ar ona do abo hõ babon baṅ daṛelea.
Menkhan disạm hoṛko talare kathako jemon ar alo pasnaokʼ onate nukin hoṛ do botor udukʼ ạkin hoyokʼa, jemon Jisu reaṅ ar okoe hõ alokin galmaraoako.”
Noa tayom Patras ar Johan do arhõ bhitrite hohoatʼkinte noako hukumatʼkinạ jemon unkin do Jisu reaṅ ar cetʼge alokin lạiako se alokin cetʼako.
Patras ar Johankin roṛ ruạṛkeda, “Apeakʼ hukum liń manaoa se Isorakʼ hukumkoliń senakʼa? Isorakʼ mẽtʼãhã samaṅre okaṭakʼ ṭhika, ona do apege bicạrpe.
Ạliń do okaliń ńelakat̕ arliń ańjomakatʼ ona begor lạite do oholiń tahẽdaṛelena.”

Unre onko do Patras ar Johan arhõ botorko udukʼatʼkinte unkin doko aṛakʼkatʼkinạ. Onko do hoṛkoko botoratʼkote bako goṭa daṛeada cetʼ lekateko sạjạikinạ mente, ente oka hoeakan onate joto hoṛge Isorko sarhaoede kan tahẽkana.
Ar okoe hoṛe bogeyen uniakʼ umer do pongel bochor khon hõ bạ̃ṛti tahẽkantaea.
Ado onḍe khonkin aṛakʼ ocoyen khan unkin do ạkinren hoṛko ṭhenkin calaoena ar maraṅ naekeko ar murubiko cetʼ cetʼko metatʼkin tahẽkan ona sanamakʼ do onkokin baḍae ocoketʼkoa.
Noa katha ańjomkate onko do mitʼ monte Isor ṭhen nonkako koekeda,” E Probhu, am do serma ar dhạrti ar jalapuri ar onare menakʼ jotowakʼem sirjạu akada.
Am do sonot Jiu hotete amren golam aleren hapṛam Dạudakʼ mocatem menakada, ‘Sanam jạtren hoṛko do cetʼ iạte akbakteko kikiạukʼ kana? Ar cedakʼ hoṛko do ạuṛiakʼko soṛojontro kana?
Probhu ar uniren Mạsi birudre dhạrtiren rapajko do mitʼsãoteko teṅgoyena, ar cakʼlaoko do mitʼ ṭhenko jarwayena.’
“Amren sonot Guti Jisu, okoe do Mạsi mentem bahal akade, uni upạrte Herod raj ar Pontus Pilạt do noa nagraharege boṅgan hoṛ jạtrenko ar Israelko sãote uni birudre tikin milạuleda.
Amakʼ daṛe ar sanate oka hoyokʼa mentem goṭa doholetʼ tahẽkan onko do onageko onkakeda.
Ar ńitokʼ do E Probhu, cetʼ lekako botor ocoyetʼle ona dom ńeletʼkangea. Amren gutiko nonkan daṛe baṛe emakom jemon dil salakʼ amakʼ kathako lại sodor daṛeakʼ.
Amakʼ ti tiạrtam jemon amren sonot Guti Jisu ńutumte onko do hoṛkoko boge daṛeako ar hahaṛa kạmi ar cinhạkoko udukʼ daṛeakʼ.”
Ado oka jaegare onkoko jarwa mitʼakan tahẽkan, koejoṅ tayom ona jaega do dal dalaoena. Ar onko sanamkoge sonot Jiuteko perecʼente dil salakʼ Isorakʼ katha lạlạiko ehopʼena.
Mạsire pạtiạu akan sanamkoge mon ar jiwite mitʼko tahẽkana. Onko do okaṭakʼge apnarakʼ kana mente bako dạbiyetʼkan tahẽkana, bickom sanamakʼge apan ạpin jạruṛakokan lekako beoharetʼ tahẽkana.
Ar apostolko do maraṅ daṛe salakʼ gohako emidiyetʼ tahẽkana je, Probhu Jisu do gocʼko khone jewetʼ beretʼ akana ar sanamko cetanre Isorakʼ maraṅ daya do tahẽkana.
Lewi bõsren Joseph ńutuman mitʼṭen hoṛe tahẽkana. Uni do Kupriko metakʼ dipre oṛakʼ tahẽkantaea. Apostolko do Barnabasko bahnakedea torjomate do jiwi raṛecʼren hoponko hohoaekan tahẽkana.
Uni do mitʼṭen goḍa tahẽkantaea; ar onae ạkhrińketʼte ṭaka ạgukate apostolkoakʼ jaṅga ṭhene dohokeda.
Unre Ananiạs ńutuman mitʼṭen hoṛ ar uniren bạhu Sạphira do mitʼṭen sompottikin ạkhrińkeda.
Ar uniren bạhu baḍae tulucʼge ạkhriń akatʼ ṭaka reakʼ thoṛa hạṭiń do apnar lạgitʼ dohokate sarecʼ ṭaka do apostolkoe ematʼkoa.
Unre Patrase menkeda, “Henda Ananiạs, Soetan do amakʼ mon cekate nonkae perecʼketʼ tamte, sonot Jiu ṭhen eṛe katham roṛkeda ar jumi ạkhriń reakʼ ṭaka khon thoṛa do am lạgitʼem dohokeda?

Ạkhriń lahare jumi do cetʼ amakʼge baṅ tahẽkana? Ar ạkhriń tayom hõ ṭaka do cetʼ amakʼ tirege baṅ tahẽkana? Enḍekhan cedakʼ nonkan kạmi dom kạmikeda? Am do manwa ṭhen eṛe do bam roṛakada, menkhan Isor ṭhengem roṛakada.”
Ananiạs do noa kathae ańjomketʼ torage otre bhindạṛenteye gocʼena. Ar noa ghoṭna reakʼ katha okoeko ańjomketʼ onko sanamkoge ạḍi botor caṛhaoatʼkoa.
Ado juạn hoṛko do beretʼente uniakʼ hoṛmoko oyo poṭomketʼtaea ar bahrete idikateko topakadea.
Inạ pe ghonṭa gan tayom Ananiạs ren bạhu do onḍeye hecʼ boloyena, menkhan cetʼ hoeakana ona do bae baḍaekan tahẽkana.
Unre Patras do uniye kulikedea, “Mase lạime, am ar Ananiạs do cetʼ ona jumi inạkʼ tegeben ạkhriń akada?” Uniye menkeda, “Hẽ, inạkʼ ṭakatege.”
Unre Patras do uniye metadea, “Probhuren Jiu biḍạue lạgitʼ cedakʼ ben mitʼ mot akana? Ńelme, okoeko hoṛ amren jãwãeko topakede onko do duạr ṭhenko hecʼ seṭerakana, ar amhõ bahreteko oḍok idimea.”
Ar Sạphira do unrege Patrasakʼ jaṅga ṭhene bhindạṛena are gocʼena. Ar onko juạn hoṛko do bhitrite bolokate uni hõ gocʼgeko ńelkede khan bahrete idikate uniren jãwãetetʼ pantereko topakadea.
Unre manḍerrenko ar eṭakʼ okoe do onako ańjomketʼ onko sanam hoṛge ạḍi botor caṛhaoatʼkoa.
Apostolko do hoṛko talare ạḍi lekan cinhạko ar hahaṛa kạmiko kạmikan tahẽkana; ar sanam biswạsikoge mundil reakʼ Solomonakʼ pinḍạre mitʼ ṭhenko jarwakʼkan tahẽkana.
Ar hoṛko do ạḍiko manotetʼko tahẽkanre hõ onko tulucʼ midokʼ do bako diletʼ tahẽkana.
Ar enrehõ ạḍi utạr herel ar maejiuko Probhureko pạtiạuena ar biswạsiko tulucʼko juṭucʼ idiyena.
Ado apostolko okako cekayetʼkan tahẽkan ona ńelte hoṛko do parkom ar cạukikote rugiko ạguketʼkoa ar hor horteko dohoketʼkoa, jemon Patrase parom calakʼ jokhecʼ uniakʼ umul do onkore paṛaokʼ.
Ar Jerusalem reakʼ aḍe pase atoko khon ḍher hoṛ do akoren rugiko ar bạṛicʼ jiute sasetokʼkan hoṛkoko ạgu daraketʼkoa, ar onko sanamkogeko bogeyena.
Unre maraṅ naeke ar acʼ sãoten Sạdukiko do ạḍi bạṛicʼko edreyena.
Onko do apostolko sapʼkate hajotreko bhoraokatʼkoa.
Menkhan ńindạ jokhecʼ Probhuren mitʼṭen goḍet do hajot reakʼ silpińkoe jhicʼkeda ar bahrete oḍok ạguketʼkoteye metatʼkoa,
“Do calakʼpe, ar mundilre teṅgokate disạm hoṛko ṭhen jaejug jion reakʼ katha lại jạhirpe.”

Onko do ona katha lekage ạḍi setakʼre mundilteko boloyena ar hoṛko lại cetʼkoko ehopʼena. Ar maraṅ naeke ar acʼ sãoten Sạdukiko do maraṅ bạisiko hohokeda, metakʼme Israelren murubiko dolren jotogeko hoho jarwaketʼkoa. Ona tayom apostolko ạguko lạgitʼ adom kạmiạkoko kolketʼkoa.
Menkhan onko kạmiyạko do hajot oṛakʼte senkate apostolko bako ńamletʼkoa.

Unre onko do ruạṛ hecʼkate noako lạikeda, “Ale dole ńelkeda hajot reakʼ duạr do kulup kajakge menakʼa ar duạr duạrkore pahradarko hõko teṅgo akana, menkhan duạrle jhicʼketʼ khan bhitrire do celege bale ńamletʼkoa.”
Noa katha ańjomkate mundilren maraṅ kạmiạyicʼ ar maraṅ naekeko doko andesaleyena ar cetʼ coṅ hoyokʼa nahakʼ mente hudisokʼko ehopʼena.
Unre mitʼṭen hoṛ do hecʼkateye menkeda, “Ńelpe, okoe hoṛko hajotrepe bhoraoletʼko onko do mundilre teṅgokate hoṛkoko cetʼako kana.”
Unre maraṅ kạmiạyicʼ do acʼren kạmiạkoe idiketʼkote apostolkoe sapʼ ạguketʼkoa. Menkhan hoṛko do kạmiyạko dhiriteko tiń botecʼko botorte apostolko ạḍi bako jormoṭletʼkoa.
Onko do apostolkoko ạguketʼko khan maraṅ bạisi samaṅreko teṅgoketʼkoa. Unre maraṅ naeke do apostolkoe metatʼkoa,
“Uni hoṛ reaṅ alo cetʼako lạgitʼ kajaktele hukumatʼpe tahẽkana, menkhan ape do apeakʼ cecetʼakʼte Jerusalempe perecʼ akada ar uni hoṛakʼ mãyãm alere paṛao ocoepe mone akada.”
Unre Patras ar eṭakʼ apostolkoko roṛ ruạṛkeda, “Manwakoakʼ hukum batao khon Isorakʼ hukumkoge batao lek tabona.
Ape do okoeṭakʼ kaṭre aka katepe gocʼlede aboren hapṛamkoren Isor do uni Jisuge gocʼko khone jiwetʼ beretʼakadea.
Isor do unige raj ar babańcaoicʼ menkate acʼakʼ jojomsa aṛere duṛube lạgitʼ ṭhonoke dan akawadea, jemon Israelkoakʼ mon ạcurtako lạgitʼ ạte emakote kại reakʼ ikại emako.
Ale do noaren gohako kanale ar okoe Isorakʼko bataoetʼkan, ar okoe do sonot Jiue emakatʼko uni sonot Jiu hõ ona reaṅ goha kanae.”
Noa katha ańjomkate mukhiyạko do ạḍiko raṅgaoena ar apostolko gocʼko lạgitʼko khojkeda,

menkhan Gamaliel ńutuman Phạrusi dolren mitʼṭen hoṛ do maraṅ bạisi talareye teṅgoyena. Uni do mitʼṭen sostor baḍae hoṛe tahẽkana ar sanamkoge uniko manotedekan tahẽkana. Uni do apostolko thoṛa ghạṛicʼ bahrere dohoko lạgitʼe hukumkeda.
Ona tayom maraṅ bạisiren hoṛkoe metatʼkoa, “E Israelko, men sontorokʼpe, noko hoṛko cetanre okaṭakʼ kạmipe menjoṅkan.

Ente niạko din lahare Theudase ńutuman mitʼṭen hoṛ do hecʼkate apnarte mitʼṭen bises hoṛkanae menteye dạbileda, ar pon sae gan hoṛ uni tulucʼko seletʼlena. Uni doe gocʼ ocoyena ar uniren sanam soṅgetenko doko chir chạturena. Ar noate uni do joto ạuṛiakʼentaea.
Ona tayom hoṛ lekhako jokhecʼ Gạlilren Jihudạ hõ hecʼkate hoṛko acʼ secʼe ạcurketʼkoa. Ar uni hõe gocʼena, ar uniren sãotenko hõ sanamko chir chạturena.
Onateń metapekana, noko hoṛko cetanre cetʼge alope cekaya. Noko do aṛakʼkakope, ente nokoakʼ monsubạ ar kạmiko manwa secʼ khonakʼkan khan ona do maraokʼa.
Menkhan Isor secʼ khonakʼ kan khan ohope thir ocodaṛelekoa. Ente hoedaṛeakʼa ape do Isor birudregepe lạṛhại kan.”

Unre Gamalielakʼ katha leka mukhiyạko doko mitʼ motena. Onko do apostolko bhitrite hoho idikate dalko lạgitʼko hukumkeda. Ar ona tayom doko aṛakʼkatʼkoa arko hukumatʼkoa Jisu reaṅ jemon jãhãnakʼ ar aloko roṛ baṛae.
Apostolko do Jisu ńutumte bemanot ocokʼ lek kanako menteko bujhạuketʼ khan rạskạte maraṅ bạisi khonko oḍok calaoena.
Onko do jaoge mundilre ar oṛakʼ oṛakʼ senkate cetʼakoko ehopʼena ar Jisuge Mạsi kanae mente noa bhage sombat porcar iditegeko tahẽyena.

Inạko dinre celako doko saṅge idikʼkan tahẽkana. Unre celako modre okoe Jihudiko Junạni pạrsiteko roṛetʼkan tahẽkana onko do Ibri pạrsite roroṛkan Jihudiko nonka mente dusikoko ehopʼena je, dinạmge jomakʼ emokʼ jokhecʼ onkoren rạnḍi maejiuko do cetʼge bako ńametʼa.
Onate onko gelbar apostolko do joto cela mitʼ jaegare hoho jarwakateko metatʼkoa, “Isorakʼ katha porcar ḍhilạukate, jom ńũ reakʼ sapʼ dapʼ do baṅ ṭhika.

Ado dolren sanamkoge noa katha do mońjko metatʼa. Onko do biswạs ar sonot Jiute perecʼakan Stephanko bachaokedea. Ona chaḍa Philip, Prokhorus, Nikanor, Timon, Parmenas ar Antiokiạren Nikolas hõko bachaokedea. Nui Nikolas do boṅgan jạtrene tahẽkanre hõ Jihudi dhorome pańjayetʼkan tahẽkana.
Onko do apostol ṭhenko idiketʼkoa. Ar apostolko do onko lạgitʼko koekeda ar kạmire bahalko lạgitʼ capokateko bhoratʼkoa.
Nonkate Isorakʼ katha do pasnao idiyena, ar Jerusalemre celako do lekhare ạḍi usạrako saṅge idiyena ar ạḍi utạr naekeko hõ Mạsiakʼ dhoromreko pạtiạuena.
Stephan do Isorakʼ daya ar daṛeteye perecʼente hoṛko talare ạḍi lekan cinhạko ar hahaṛa kạmiko kạmiye ehopʼena.

Ar okaṭakʼ sunạgog do sạdhin hoṛkoakʼ sunạgogko metakʼkan tahẽkan ona sunạgogren adom hoṛko do Stephan birudreko teṅgoyena. Onko do Kureni ar Alekasndriạ nagraharen ar Kilikiạ ar Asiạ disạmren Jihudikoko tahẽkana.
Onko do Stephan sãote reṭepeṭekʼko ehopʼena, menkhan Stephan do sonot Jiu hotete akel salakʼe galmaraoatʼkoa. Onate onko do uni birudre bako teṅgo daṛeada.
Unre onko Jihudiko do hape hapete adom hoṛko noa menkateko uskạuketʼkoa, “Stephan do Mose ar Isor birudre opoman reakʼ katha roroṛle ańjomakadea.”
Nonkate onko do disạm hoṛko, murubiko ar sostor baḍaekoko ạulạuketʼkoa ar Stephanko sapʼkedete maraṅ bạisi samaṅreko ạgukedea.
Onko do adom eṛe gohakoko teṅgoketʼkoa. Eṛe gohakoko menkeda, “Nui hoṛ do jaoge mundil birudre ar Moseakʼ ạn-ạri birudre kathae roṛeda.
Ale do noa katha roroṛle ańjomakadea, Nasaretren uni Jisu do noa mundile rạputʼ giḍia ar Mose oka ạn-ạrikoe emakatʼbon onako hõe pheraoa.”
Ado ona maraṅ bạisire okoeko duṛupʼ akan tahẽkan onko sanamkoge Stephanko beṅgetʼ uricʼade khan uniakʼ mẽtʼãhã do sermaren mitʼṭen goḍetakʼ mẽtʼãhã lekako ńelketʼtaea.
Unre maraṅ naeke do Stephane kulikedea, “Noako katha do cetʼ sạrikangea?”

Stephan do roṛ ruạṛketʼteye menkeda, “E boehako ar babako ińakʼ katha ańjompe. Aboren hapṛam Abraham do Haran nagrahare ạuriye berelokʼre Mesopotamiạ disạmreye tahẽkana ar unre ṭhonokren Isor do uni ṭhen ńel ocoyenteye metade tahẽkana,
‘am do amakʼ disạm ar peṛa pạrbhạko bạgikate okaṭakʼ disạmiń udukʼam ona disạmte calakʼme.’
“Onate uni do Kạldiakoakʼ disạm bạgikate Haran naṅgarhare senkateye berelena. Ar ńit oka disạmrepe girobasokʼkan Isor do Abraham nonḍegeye kolledea uniren apattetʼe gocʼen tayom.

Ar acʼakʼ ạidạri lạgitʼ Isor do Abraham cetʼge bae emadea, jaṅga lebedokʼ leka jaega hõ baṅ. Menkhan Isor doe gokʼade tahẽkana je, uni ar uniren bõsko do ạidạrilekate ona disạme emakoa. Menkhan unhõ Abrahamren do cele gidrạge bako tahẽkantaea.
Isor do uniye metadea, ‘amren bõsko do upriạko hoyokʼa. Hoṛko do golamko khaṭaokoa ar pon sae bochor hạbicʼko santaokoa.’
Isor do arhõe metadea, ‘okoe onko golamko khaṭaoko onko jạt doń sạjạikoa. Ar onko do ona disạm khonko oḍok hijukʼte noa jaegare ińko sewawạńạ.’

Ona tayom Isor do acʼakʼ bondobos reakʼ cinhạ lekate khatna reakʼ niạme emena. Inạ tayom Abrahamren hopon Isạhake janamena ar irạl din hilokʼreye khatna ocokedea. Ar Isahak do Jakobe khatna ocokedea ar Jakob do onko gelbar khũṭren hapṛamkoe khatna ocoketʼkoa.
“Inạ tayom goṭa Misor ar Kanan disạmre akal hoyena. Onate ạḍi haron kosṭo hecʼ paṛaoena ar aboren hapṛamko do jomakʼ bako ńamleda.
Menkhan Jakob do Misorre jomakʼ menakʼa menteye ańjomketʼ khan aboren hapṛamko pạhil dhao onḍeye kolletʼkoa.
Ar dosar dhaore Joseph do boehakoe baḍae ocoketʼkoa acʼ doe okoe kana mente. Unre Pharao do Josephakʼ gharońj reaṅe baḍaekeda.
Ona tayom Joseph do acʼren apat Jakob ar gharońjren eṭakʼ sanamkoe hoho ạgu ocoketʼkoa. Onko do lekhare eaegel mõṛẽ hoṛko tahẽkana.
Ado Jakob hõ Misorteye calaoena, ar onḍe do uni ar aboren hapṛamko hõko gocʼena.
Ar onkoakʼ mạ̃ṛĩko do Sikemre idikateko topakada. Noa mạ̃ṛĩ poḍa Abraham do Sikem nagraharen Hamorren hoponko ṭhen khone kirińleda.
“Abraham ṭhen Isor okaṭakʼe gokʼletʼ tahẽkan ona purạukʼ reakʼ okte seṭeren khan Misorre aboren hoṛko doko saṅge idiyena.
Inạ tayom Misorre ar mitʼ hoṛe rajena. Uni do Joseph reaṅ cetʼge bae baḍaekan tahẽkana.
Uni raj do aboren hoṛkoe ṭhokayetʼko tahẽkana ar aboren hapṛamko hõ ạḍiye santaoketʼkoa. Ar onkoren bale gidrạkoko janamokʼkan tahẽkanre onko do gocʼko lạgitʼ bahreteye giḍi ocoketʼkoa.
“Ona jokhecʼ Moseye janamena. Uni do ńelokʼte ạḍi mońje tahẽkana. Ar pe cando hạbicʼ acʼren apatakʼ oṛakʼreye ạsul ocoyena.
Ar tinre bahreteye giḍi ocoyena unre Pharaoren hoponera do uniye hạr sãohãkedea ar acʼren gidrạ lekae joton harakedea.
Mose do Misorrenkoakʼ sanamakʼ akelte akelanicʼe hoyena, ar acʼakʼ katha ar kạmikote uni do daṛeanicʼe tahẽkana.
“Moseakʼ umer pongel bochor hoyentae khan uni do acʼren Israel boehako sãote ńapamokʼe menjoṅana.
Unre mitʼṭen Misri hoṛ do mitʼṭen Israel hoṛ cetanre bạṛicʼ beoharetʼkane ńelkede khan uni Israel goṛowae lạgitʼe calaoena ar Misri hoṛe gocʼkedete uniakʼe hala ruạṛkeda.
Mose doe hudisetʼ tahẽkana, acʼren hoṛkoko bujhạu daṛeakʼa Isor do acʼ hotete onkoe bańcaokoa mente, menkhan onko do bako bujhạu daṛeada.
Dosar hilokʼ Mose do barea Israel hoṛ lạṛhạikane ńelketʼkinạ. Unre sulukokʼ lạgitʼe metatʼkinạ, ‘Henda ho, boehakan coṅ ben, enḍekhan aben talare cedakʼ nonka bạṛicʼ do ben beohareda?’
“Menkhan okoe bạṛicʼe beboharetʼ tahẽkan uni do Mose ṭhelao ocokʼkedeteye metadea, ‘okoe baṅ ạliń talare mukhiyạ ar bicạricʼe dohoakatʼme?
Holanokʼ cetʼleka uni Misri hoṛem gocʼkede, onkage cetʼ iń hõ gojeńem menetʼkana?’
Ado Mose noa kathae ańjomketʼ khan Midiạn disạmteye dạṛkeda ar onḍegeye berelena. Ar onḍege uni do barea koṛa gidrại gidrạwana.
“Ona tayom pongel bochor paromena. Ar Sinại buru ṭhen oka hahaṅkar jaega menakʼ onḍe mitʼṭen jạnum jhạwạre jolokʼkan seṅgelre mitʼṭen serma goḍet do Mose ṭhene ńelocoyena.
Ona ńelte Mose doe hahaṛayena. Ar mońj okocʼte ńel lạgitʼe sen soren khan Probhuakʼ noa kathae ańjomkeda,
‘Iń do amren hapṛamkoren Isor kanạń, Abraham, Isahak ar Jakobren Isorge.’ Unre Mose do botorteye thar tharaoena; ar ńel lạgitʼ dil hõ bae dilleda.
“Unre Probhu do uniye metadea, ‘amakʼ jaṅga khon panahi bojtam, ente onem teṅgo akan jaega do sonotgea.
Misor disạmre ińren hoṛko cetanre oka santao hoyokʼkan ona doń ńelakada. Iń do onkoakʼ rakʼ iń ańjomakada ar onko chaḍaoko lạgitʼ iń pheḍ hecʼakana. Iń do ńitokʼ Misor disomteń kol ruạrmea.’

“Nui doe uni Mose kana one okoe do Israelkoko baṅlede, oneko menletʼ ‘okoe baṅ am do mukhiyạ ar bicạricʼe doho akatʼme?’ Ar okoeṭakʼ serma goḍet ona jhạwạ talare Mose ṭhene ńel ocolen uni hotete Isor acʼge Israelkoren Mukhiyạ ar chaḍaoicʼ menkate Misorte Moseye kolledea.
Ar nui Mosege Misor disạm khon Israelkoe oḍok ạguletʼkoa ar Misor disạmre, arakʼ doreãore ar pongel bochor hạbicʼ hahaṅkarre ạḍi utạr hahaṛa kạmi ar cinhạkoe kạmileda.
Nui kangea uni Mose one okoe do Israelkoe metatʼko tahẽkan, ‘aperen Isor do aperen Israel boehako mod khon iń lekanicʼ mitʼṭen nạbiye teṅgoapea.’

Nui Mosege hahaṅkarre Israelkoren ona dol modre aboren hapṛamko sãoteye tahẽkana. Ar okoeṭakʼ serma goḍet do sinại burure kathae roṛletʼ tahẽkan, onḍe do nui Mosege serma goḍet sãoteye tahẽkana. Ar abo emabon lạgitʼ jiwetʼ kathako do nui Mosege onḍegeye ńamleda.
Unre onko do mitʼṭen mĩhũ muṭhạn leka boṅgako benaoana. Ar ona muṭhạn ṭhen janwar dãṛẽko samaṅkeda ar akoakʼ titeko tearakatʼ kạmiko iạteko onko doko hesecʼ sekrecʼena.

Menkhan Isor do ạcurente onkoe alae giḍikatʼkoa sermaren siń cando, ńindạ cando ar ipilko sewawako lạgitʼ. Ar inạ kathage nạbikoakʼ puthire olakana: E Israel hoponko, hahaṅkarre pongel bochor ape do cetʼ iń lạgitʼ janwar se eṭakʼ jãhãn dãṛẽkope samaṅleda?
Baṅa, bickom ape do sewae lạgitʼ oka muṭhạnpe benaoletʼ tahẽkan uni Molok boṅga reakʼ muṭhạn ar Rophan boṅgaren ipilge ape dope gokʼ idiledea. Onatege iń do Babel disạmte bondi lekateń kolpea.
“Goha reakʼ tạmbu do hahaṅkarre aboren hapṛamko sãote tahẽkana. Isor do Mose cetʼlekae hukumade tahẽkan ar Mose okaṭakʼ nạmunae ńelletʼ onkage noa tạmbu hõ tear akan tahẽkana.

Aboren hapṛamko do ona tạmbu ńamkate akoren ạyuricʼ Josuạ tabere tahẽkate ako sãote aboakʼ noa disạmteko ạguleda. Un johkecʼ Isor do onko samaṅ khon eṭakʼ jạtkoe laga ńirketʼkoa ar onko do noa disạmko ạidạriana. Ar Dạud hạbicʼ ona tạmbu do noa disạmrege tahẽkana.
Dạud do Isorakʼ daya ńamkate Jakobren Isorakʼ tahen jaega benao lạgitʼe koean tahẽkana;
menkhan Solomonge uni lạgitʼ oṛakʼ doe benaoleda.
“Menkhan maraṅ Isor do manwakoakʼ benaoakʼ oṛakʼre bae tahenkana. Nạbiye menetʼ leka,
Probhui meneda, ‘serma do ińakʼ siṅghạson kana ar ot do ińakʼ jaṅga lebedokʼakʼ ganḍo kana; am do iń lạgitʼ cetʼlekan oṛakʼem benaoa? Ar ińakʼ jirạukʼ ṭhạ̃i do okare hoyokʼa?
Noako jinis do cetʼ ińakʼ nij tite bạń benao akada?’
E keṭecʼ hoṭokʼanko! Be-Jihudiko lekage apeakʼ lutur ar ontor do, ar apehõ ṭhik aperen hapṛamko leka kanape. Ape do jaoge sonot Jiupe tạkicʼ daramedekana.

Nonkan jãhãe nạbi menakʼkoa, one okoe do aperen hapṛamko bako santao akatʼko? Se uni dhoromicʼ hoṛ, metakʼme Mạsiakʼ hijukʼ reakʼ katha okoe doko lại lahaletʼ, onko hõko gocʼketʼkoa. Ar ńitokʼ ape do bạirikoakʼ tire Jisupe sapʼ ocokedete uni hõpe khũn ocokedea.
Serma goḍetko hotete ape ṭhenge coṅ ạn-ạriko ma emlen, menkhan ape do ona bape manao akada.”
Noako katha ańjomkate onko mukhiyạko do Stephan birudre ạḍi bạṛicʼko raṅgaoena ar uni birudreko togocʼ ḍaṭakeda.
Menkhan Stephan do sonot Jiuteye perecʼen khan serma secʼe beṅgetʼkeda ar Isorakʼ ṭhonoke ńel ńamkeda. Uni do Isorakʼ jojomsa aṛere Jisu teṅgo akane ńelkede khane menkeda,
“Ńelpe, iń do serma jhicʼ akan ar Manwa Hopon Isorakʼ jojomsa aṛere teṅgo akaniń ńelekana.”
Noa iạte onko do akoakʼ luturko tubạtʼketʼtakoa ar ãṭ aṛaṅte hohoate mitʼ dhaote Stephanko jhapṭaokedea.
Onko do dhirite tińe lạgitʼ nagraha bahreteko or oḍokkedea, ar gohako do akoakʼ kicricʼ totʼkate Sạul ńutuman mitʼṭen juạn hoṛakʼ jaṅga ṭhenko dohokeda.
Arko tińekan tahẽkanre uni do nonkae koekeda, “E Probhu Jisu, ińakʼ jiwi ataṅ tińme baṛe.”
Ar ikhṛumente ãṭ aṛaṅteye menkeda, “E Probhu, nokoakʼ noa kại do alom lekhawakoa,” Ar noa menkate uni doe gocʼena.

Ar onḍe Sạul hõ uni gocʼ ocokʼre rạjigeye tahẽkana. Enhilokʼ Jerusalem manḍerren hoṛko upạrte maraṅ okocʼ khed ehopʼena. Onate apostolko chaḍa sanam biswạsiko do Jihudạ ar Samariạ disạm reakʼ ṭoṭhakoreko chir chạturena.
Ar adom Isor bhokti hoṛ do Stephanko topakedea ar uni lạgitʼ ạḍiko rakʼ homorkeda.
Menkhan Sạul do onako manḍer marao lạgitʼ oṛakʼ oṛakʼ bolokate manḍerren herel ar maejiuko or totʼkate hajotre bhoraokoe ehopʼena.
Ado okoe biswạsiko chir chạtur akan tahẽkan onko do beṛhaete senkate Mạsiakʼ bhage sombat porcarko dhurạuena.
Un jokhecʼ Philip do Samariạ disạm reakʼ mitʼṭen nagrahate senkate Mạsi reaṅe porcarkeda.
Ar hoṛko do uniakʼ katha ańjomkate ar uniakʼ hahaṛa kạmiko ńelte uniakʼko luturatʼtaea.
Ar ḍher hoṛko khon bạṛicʼ jiuko do ãṭ aṛaṅte hohoateko oḍokena ar mitʼkaṛ gocʼ hoṛ ar leḍhako hõko bogeyena.
Onate ona nagraharen hoṛko do ạḍiko rạskạyena.
Ona nagrahare Simon ńutuman mitʼṭen hoṛ do ḍher din khon jạduye udukʼ ạguyetʼkan tahẽkana. Onate Samariạren sanam hoṛkoko ṭhak caba akan tahẽkana.

Ar acʼ do mitʼṭen maraṅ hoṛ menteye udugokʼkan tahẽkana, ar kisạ̃ṛko ar reṅgecʼko sanamkoge uniakʼ kathako hetawakʼkan tahẽkana. Hoṛko menetʼ tahẽkana, “Isor reakʼ maraṅ daṛe oka menogokʼkan nui hoṛ kangeae ona daṛe do.”
Ar hoṛko hõ uniakʼ katha lekako calakʼkan tahẽkana, ente ḍher din khon uni do acʼakʼ jạduteye ṭhak caba akatʼko tahẽkana.
Menkhan Philip do tinre Isorakʼ raj ar Jisu Mạsi reaṅ bhage sombate porcarkeda unre hoṛko do uniakʼ kathareko pạtiạuena ar herel ar maejiukoko bạptisena.
Ar uni Simon hõe pạtiạuente bạptismae hataokeda ar Philip são sãote sanam jaegakoteye senena ar cinhạ kạmiko ar maraṅ maraṅ hahaṛa kạmiko ńelteye ṭhak utạrena.
Ado Jerusalemren apostolko do tinreko ańjomkeda Samariạren hoṛko Isorakʼ kathako ataṅakada unre Patras ar Johan onko ṭhenko kolkatʼkinạ.
Patras ar Johan do hecʼkate onko lạgitʼ kin koekeda jemon sonot Jiuko ńame,
ente unhạbicʼ hõ onko cetanre sonot Jiu do bae hecʼakan tahẽkana; eken Probhu Jisu ńutumte onko doko bạptis ocoakan tahẽkana.
Unre Patras ar Johan do onkokin capoketʼkoa, ar onko do sonot Jiuko ńamkedea.
Ado apostolkin ti capokate sonot Jiukin emokʼkane ńeltʼketʼ khan Simon do unkin ṭhen ṭaka ạgukateye menkeda,
“Iń hõ noa daṛe imạń ben jemon jãhãegeń capoye unige sonot Jiue ńame.”
Unre Patras do uniye metadea, “Amakʼ ṭaka do am sãotege nosṭokʼma, ente am dom hudisetʼkana Isorakʼ dan do ṭakate kirińokʼa.
Ạlińakʼ noa kạmire amakʼ bakhra se ạidạri do bạnukʼtama, ente Isor samaṅre amakʼ ontor do baṅ sojhetama.
Amakʼ dusṭami khon mon ạcurtam ar Probhu ṭhen koejoṅme; enḍekhan amakʼ mon reakʼ noa bạṛicʼ hudis pasere pase uni doe ikại tam.
Ińiń ńel ńameda, amakʼ mon do lalocte perecʼgea ar am do kại reakʼ tonolre menama.”
Unre Simone roṛ ruạṛkeda, “Abenge Probhu ṭhen iń lạgitʼ koe ben jemon aben okaṭakʼ ben roṛakatʼ ona do ińre alo hoyokʼ.”
Inạ tayom Patras ar Johan do Probhu reaṅ goha emkate Jerusalemtekin ruạṛ calaoena. Ar calakʼ calakʼte unkin do Samariạkoakʼ aema atokore bhage sombatkin porcar idikeda.
Mitʼ din Probhuren mitʼṭen goḍet do Philipe metadea, “Ma beretʼme, ar dạkhin secʼ calakʼme, one okaṭakʼ hor do Jerusalem khon Gaja nagraha secʼ calao akan ona horte calakʼme.” Ona hor do nisungea.

Unre Philip do ona secʼe calaoena. Ar horre Ithipiạ disạmren mitʼṭen maraṅ raj kạmiạyicʼ soṅgeteye ńapamena. Uni raj kạmiạyicʼ do cạkrại tahẽkana. Ithipiạren Kandake rạniakʼ dhon-duribko ńel todarot reakʼ bhar do nui hoṛ cetanrege tahẽkana. Uni kạmiạyicʼ do Isor sewawae lạgitʼ Jerusalemteye senlena.
Ado oṛakʼteye ruạṛkan tahẽkanre uni do sadom gạḍire duṛupʼkate Jesaea nạbi reakʼ puthiye paṛhao joṅkan tahẽkana.
Unre sonot Jiu do Philipe metadea, “Do ona gạḍi ṭhen sorokʼme ar uni sãote calakʼme.”
Khange Philip do ona gạḍi ṭhene ńir sorena ar uni hoṛ do Jesaea nạbi puthi reakʼ paṛhaokʼ kane ańjomkedea. Adoe kulikedea, “Okaṭakʼem paṛhaoetʼkan ona do cetʼem bujhạu daṛeakʼ kangea?”
Uni kạmiạyicʼe menkeda, “Jãhãe bae bujhạuạń khan cekateń bujhạu daṛekea?” Uni do Philipe nehõradea jemone dejokʼte acʼ ṭhene duṛupʼ.

Uni kạmiạyicʼ do sonot sostor khon okae paṛhaoetʼ tahẽkan ona do noage; bheḍa do jabeye lạgitʼ cetʼlekae idi ocokʼ onkage uni doe idi ocoyena. Kạpciyicʼ samaṅre bhiḍi hopon cetʼleka thir akane tahen, onkage uni do moca bae jhicʼletʼtaea.
Uni doe bemanot ocoyena, unire do hok reakʼ bicạr baṅ hoelena. Uni bõs reakʼ katha do ohoge lại daṛekokʼa, ente dhạrti khon uniakʼ jion hatao akantae tahẽkana.
Uni kạmiạyicʼ do Philipe metadea, “Dayakate lạiạńme, nạbi do okoe reaṅ noa kathae roṛakada? Acʼ reaṅ, se eṭakʼ jãhãe reaṅ?”
Unre Philip do sonot sostor reakʼ ona hạṭiń khon ehopʼkate uni ṭhen Jisu reaṅ bhage sombate porcarkeda.
Uni do gạḍi teṅgoe lạgitʼe hukumkeda. Ona tayom Philip ar uni kạmiạyicʼ do dakʼrekin pheḍena ar uniye bạptiskedea.
Ado dakʼ khonkin rakapʼen khan Probhuren Jiu do ackage Philipe idikedea. Ar uni cạkrạ hoṛ do ghuriạ Philip bae ńel ńamledea. Unre uni do rạskạte oṛakʼe calaoena.
Menkhan Philip do Asdod nagrahareye ńelena. Ar uni do ato ato bhage sombat porcar porcarte mucạtʼre Kạisạriạteye calaoena.
Ado hor horteye calakʼkan tahẽkanre Damesek ṭhene seṭeren khan ackage serma khon mitʼṭen marsal uni beṛhaete bamberena.
Uni do otreye bhindạṛena ar mitʼṭen aṛaṅ metaekane ańjomkeda, “E Sạul, E Sạul cedakʼem khedeń kana?”
Sạul doe menkeda, “E Probhu, am dom okoe kana?”
Uniye menkeda, “Iń doń Jisu kana, okoe amem khedeńkan. Ńitokʼ do beredokʼme ar nagrahate calakʼme. Ar cetʼ cekae hoyokʼtama ona dom lại ocokʼa.”
Ar okoeko hoṛ Sạul sãoteko calakʼkan tahẽkan, onko do hahaṛakʼ tulucʼko teṅgo tahẽyena. Onko do kathako ańjomkeda menkhan okoege bako ńel ńamledea.
Ado Sạul ot khone beretʼena, menkhan mẽtʼe beṅgetʼketʼ khan cetʼge bae ńel ńam daṛeada. Unre acʼren sãotenko do Damesekte uniko tiyạkʼ idikedea.
Pe din hạbicʼ Sạul do mẽtʼte bae ńel ńamleda ar jom hõ cetʼge bae jomleda.
Damesek nagrahare Ananiạs ńutuman mitʼṭen celae tahẽkana. Probhu do dorsonte uniye metadea, “Ananiạs.” Adoe menkeda, “Probhu, nõkʼõe minạńgea.”
Probhu do uniye metadea, “Ma beretʼkate sojheko metakʼ kulhite calakʼme. Ar onḍe Jihudạwakʼ oṛakʼre Tạrsus nagraharen Sạul ńutuman mitʼṭen hoṛ khojeme.
Uni doe koejoṅ kana ar dorsone ńel akada, Ananiạs ńutuman mitʼṭen hoṛ hecʼkate hoṛmoreye capoakadea jemon arhõe ńeńel.”
Ananiạse menkeda, “E Probhu, ḍher hoṛkoakʼ moca khon nui hoṛ reaṅ iń ańjomakada, Jerusalemre amren hoṛko ạḍi bạṛicʼe khed akatʼkoa.
Ona chaḍa am ńutumte koejoṅkanko sapʼko lạgitʼ maraṅ naekeko ṭhen khon ektiạri hataokate nonḍeye hecʼakana.”
Menkhan Probhu do Ananiạse metadea, “Do calakʼme, ente boṅgan hoṛ jạtrenko ar onkoren rajko ar Israelko ṭhen porcar lạgitʼ, iń do uni hoṛgeń bachao akadea.”
Ar iń iạte tinạkʼ duk jojom hoyokʼtaea onań udukʼaea.”

Unre Ananiạs do senkate ona oṛakʼteye boloyena ar tikin capoadeteye metadea, “E boeha Sạul, nonḍe hijukʼ jokhecʼ horre okoe do am ṭhene ńel ocolen uni doe Probhu Jisu kana. Unige iń doe kol akadińạ jemon am dom ńeńel ar sonot Jiutem perejokʼ.”
Unre Sạulakʼ mẽtʼ khon cuiạ̃kʼ leka phạnṭil ńurgotʼena ar ńeńele ehopʼena.
Ona tayom uni do beretʼenteye bạptisena ar jom ńũketʼteye daṛeyena. Ar Sạul do Damesekren celako sãote thoṛa dine tahẽyena.
Ona tayom uni do bin bilomte eṭakʼ eṭakʼ sunạgogkore noa menkate porcare ehopʼena je, Jisu kangea Isorren Hopon do.

Ar okoe uniakʼ kathako ańjomketʼ onko sanamkoge hahaṛakʼ tulucʼko kulikan tahẽkana, “Nui do cetʼ uni doe baṅkana, one Jerusalemre Jisu ńutumte koejoṅkoe khedetʼko tahẽkan? Ar nonḍehõ okoeko onkayetʼkan onko tolkate maraṅ naekeko ṭhen idiko lạgitʼge cetʼ bae hecʼakana?”
Menkhan Sạul do arhõe daṛe idiyena ar Jisuge Mạsikanae menteye sạbudkedea. Noate Damesekren Jihudiko doko tharbasaoena.
Ado ḍher din tayom Jihudiko do uni goje reaṅko solhawana,
Menkhan Sạul do onkoakʼ goṭawakʼe baḍaeketʼtakoa. Ar uni goje lạgitʼ Jihudiko do nagraha reakʼ Phoṭokkore siń ńindạ pahrako ehopʼena.
Menkhan mitʼ din ạyupʼ jokhecʼ Sạulren celako do mitʼṭen khạclạkʼte pạcri reakʼ jalnate hanasako pheḍgotʼ kadea.
Sạul do Jerusalem hecʼkate celako sãote gatekʼe kurumuṭukeda, menkhan onko do uniko botoraekan tahẽkana. Onko do bako pạtiạu daṛeakʼkan tahẽkana, Sạul do sạrige mitʼṭen celae hoeakana mente.

Menkhan Barnabas do uniye soṅgekedete apostolko ṭhene idikedea are baḍae ocoketʼkoa, Damesek reakʼ horre Sạul do cetʼlekate Jisui ńelledea ar cetʼleka Probhu do uni sãoteye galmaraoleda, ar Damesekre Jisu reaṅ cetʼleka dilkateye porcarleda.
Ona tayom Sạul do Jerusalemren celako sãoteye tahẽyena ar onko sãoteye bolo oḍokokʼkan tahẽkana ar goṭa Jerusaleme dãṛãketʼa ar Probhu reaṅ dilkateye porcaretʼ tahẽkana.
Ar okoeko Jihudiko Junạni pạrsiteko roṛetʼkan tahẽkan uni do onko sãoteye galmarao kan tahẽkana are reṭe peṭekʼkan tahẽkana, menkhan noko Jihudikoge uni goje lạgitʼ kurumuṭuko ehopʼena.
Ado biswạsi boehako noako ańjomketʼ khan Kạisạriạ nagrahateko idikedea ar tayomte Tạrsus nagrahateko kolkadea.

Ona oktere Jihudạ, Gạlil ar Samariạ disạm reakʼ manḍerkore suluk tahẽkana, ar ona manḍerko benao rakabokʼkan tahẽkana. Onate Probhu botoraete ar sonot Jiu reakʼ uskurte onko doko saṅge idikʼkan tahẽkana.
Patras do goṭa ṭạnḍi ạcur ạcurte Luddareko berelakan tahẽkan Isorren hoṛko ṭhene hecʼena.
Ona atore Aeneas ńutuman mitʼ hoṛe tahẽkana. Uni do mitʼkaṛ gocʼ ruạte irạl bochor khon aṭetʼreye jaṛao akan tahẽkana.
Patras do uni ńelkede khane metadea, “E Aeneas, Jisu Mạsi do ame bogeketʼmea. Ma beretʼme, ar amakʼ aṭetʼ kuṭuṅtam.” Khange uni do saṭmenteye beretʼena.
Unre Ludda ar Sharon atoren sanam hoṛ do Aeneasko ńelkede khan Probhu secʼko ạcurena.

Joppa nagrahare Tabitha ńutuman mitʼṭen maejiu celae tahẽkana. Junạni pạrsite noa ńutum reakʼ mane do Dorkas (se Posta). Uni do jaoge eṭakʼkoe bhạlạiyetʼko tahẽkana, ar reṅgecʼ orecʼko hõe goṛoakokan tahẽkana.
Uni do ruạ kạhilenteye gocʼena arko um saphakedete mitʼṭen koṭha kandhareko dohoakade tahẽkana.
Jappo do Ludda sorre tahẽkana; onate celako do Patras Luddare menaea menteko ańjomketʼ khan bar hoṛ uni ṭhen kolketʼkinteko nehõradea, “Am do usarate ale ṭhen baṛe hijukʼme.”

Unre Patras do unkin soṅgeteye calaoena. Ar onḍeye seṭeren khan ona cetan koṭha kandhateko idikedea. Unre sanam rạnḍi maejiuko do Patras beṛhaete teṅgokate rarakʼko ehopʼena ar Dorkas jiwetʼe tahẽkanre okako aṅgrop ar eṭakʼ kicricʼkoe benao akatʼ tahẽkan onakoko udukʼadea.

Unre Patras do sanamko oṛakʼ khone oḍokketʼkote ikhṛumenteye koekeda. Ona tayom gocʼ akan maejiu secʼ ạcur kateye menkeda, “E Tabitha ma beretʼme.” Ar inạtege Dorkas doe beṅgetʼkeda ar Patrase ńelkede khane duṛupʼena.
Unre Patras do ti sapʼkate uniye beretʼkedea. Ar Isorren hoṛko ar rạnḍi maejiuko hohoatʼkote onkoe udukʼatʼkoa je, Dorkas doe jiwetʼena.
Noa katha do Joppa nagraharen sanamko baḍaekeda ar ḍher hoṛge Probhureko pạtiạuena.
Ar Patras do Joppare Simon ńutuman mitʼṭen hoṛakʼ oṛakʼre ḍher dine tahẽyena. Ar nui Simon do mitʼṭen camare tahẽkana.
Kạisạriạ nagrahare Kornelius ńutuman mitʼṭen hoṛ do Itạliạ Palṭon dolren subedare tahẽkana.

Uni do Jihudi hoṛe baṅkanre hõ Isor bhokti hoṛe tahẽkana ar acʼ gharońjren sanamkoge Isorko sewawaekan tahẽkana. Uni do reṅgecʼ orecʼko ṭaka-poesakoe dan akokan tahẽkana ar Isor ṭhen jaogeye koejoṅkan tahẽkana.
Mitʼ din pe baja okte uni do mitʼṭen dorsone ńelkeda. Uni do pusṭạuteye ńelkeda Isorren mitʼṭen goḍet do hecʼkateye metaekana, “E Kornelius.”

Kornelius doe botorente serma goḍet secʼ beṅgetʼkateye menkeda, “Roṛme, Probhu.” Serma goḍete menkeda, “Amakʼ koejoṅ ar reṅgecʼ orecʼkom dan akokan reakʼ katha do sermate seṭer akana ar Isor do onae disạ dohoakada.
Ńitokʼ am do Joppa nagrahate hoṛ kolkom, ar Simon, one okoe do Patrasko metae uni hoho ạguyem. Onḍe jalapuri aṛere ar mitʼṭen Simon menaea.
Uni do harta reakʼe kạmiya. Patras do uni Simonakʼ oṛakʼrege menaea.”
Ado okoeṭakʼ serma goḍet sãoteye galmaraokan tahẽkan uniye calaoen khan Kornelius do barea guti ar mitʼṭen goṛoyicʼ palṭone hohoadea. Nui palṭon hõ Isor bhokti hoṛe tahẽkana.
Ar sanamakʼe lại bujhạuatʼko khan uni do Joppateye kolkatʼkoa.
Dosar hilokʼ onko hoṛ tinre Joppa nagraha secʼko hijukʼkan tahẽkana unre tikin okte tahẽkana. Un jokhecʼ Patras do koejoṅ lạgitʼ chatteye rakapʼena.
Unre Patras do ạḍi reṅgecʼkedea ar thoṛa jojome menana. Ar tinre jomakʼ tearokʼkan tahẽkana unre mitʼṭen dorson paṛaoadea.
Unre uni do serma jhicʼakan ar maraṅ mitʼṭen cador leka pon konare sapʼakatʼ otre pheḍ hijukʼkane ńelkeda.
Onare joto lekan janwarko, ar otren leńokʼko ar coṭren uḍạukʼkoko tahẽkana.
Inạ tayom okoe coṅ roroṛkane ańjomkedea, “E Patras, ma beredokʼme, ar gocʼkate jomkom.”
Patrase menkeda, “Baṅa, Probhu, ohoge hoelena. Besapha ar chutakʼ jãhãnakʼge tis hõ bạń jomakada.”
Unre arhõe ańjomkeda, “Isor okakoe sapha akatʼ ona do chutakʼ alom metakʼa.”
Onkage pe dhao hoyen tayom ona cador do sermate rakapʼ ocoyena.
Patras do okaṭakʼ dorsone ńelketʼ ona reakʼ cetʼ mane hoedaṛekokʼa menteye hudisokʼkan tahẽkanrege, Korneliuse kolakatʼko hoṛ do Simonakʼ oṛakʼ sendra ńamkate duạr ṭhenko teṅgoyena.
Onko do hohokateko kuliyana, “Simon, okoe do Patrashõko metaekan, uni do cetʼ nonḍeye tahenkana?”
Patras do unhõ dorson reakʼ kathae hudiskan tahẽkana, unre sonot Jiu do uniye metadea, “Ńelme, pe hoṛ amko khojetʼmea.
Ma beretʼkate latarte pheḍokʼme. Ar jãhãnakʼ begor digdhạte onko soṅgete calakʼme, ente ińge onko doń kolakatʼkoa.”
Unre Patras doe pheḍ hecʼente onko hoṛkoe metatʼkoa, “Ape okoepe ńam baṛayede uni hoṛ doń ińkangea. Ape do cetʼ lạgitʼpe hecʼakana?”

Onko hoṛko menkeda, “Subedar Korneliusge ale doe kolakatʼlea. Uni do mitʼṭen dhorom ar Isor bhokti hoṛ kanae. Ar sanam Jihudikoge uniko sarhaoede kana. Isorren mitʼṭen goḍet do uniye hukumade tahẽkana jemon acʼakʼ oṛakʼte ame hoho idi ocomete amakʼ kathakoe ańjomtam.”

Unre Patras do oṛakʼ bhitrite onko hoṛe hoho aderketʼkoa ar onkoakʼ tahen jaega ar jom-ńu reakʼe bebostawatʼkoa. Ado dosar hilokʼ Patras do onko tulucʼe senena. Ar Joppa nagraharen adom biswạsi boehako hõ uni sãoteko sen torayena.
Ar tesar hilokʼ do Kạisạriateko seṭerena. Unre Kornelius do acʼren peṛa ar gateko hoho jarwakate onko lạgitʼe koyokʼ horakatʼ tahẽkana.
Ado Patras oṛakʼteye boloyen khan Kornelius do uniakʼ ti jaṅgare giḍiyente uniye ḍobokʼadea.
Menkhan Patras do uni beretʼkedeteye metadea, “Ma beretʼme, iń hõ coń manwakange.”
Kornelius tulucʼ galmarao galmaraote Patras do bhitriteye boloyen khan onḍe aema hoṛ jarwa akane ńelketʼkoa.

Uni doe metatʼkoa, “Ape mape baḍaege je, mitʼṭen Jihudi hoṛ do mitʼṭen boṅgan hoṛ sãote gatekʼ se uni sãote ńapamokʼ hõ aleakʼ dhorom reakʼ ạn-ạri birudkana. Menkhan Isor do ińe udukʼ akawạdińạ, okoe hõ besapha se chut mente metako do lek baṅkan tińạ.
Onate tinre ińpe hohowạdińa unre begor ạnḍuṅte nonḍeń hecʼakana. Ar ńitokʼ iń kuliyetʼpea, cedakʼ iń dope hoho akadińạ?”

Unre Korneliuse menkeda, “Pon din lahare ṭhik niạ jokhecʼ pe baja okte iń do ińakʼ oṛakʼreń koejoṅkan tahẽkana. Unre ackage pĩṛĩtʼ pĩṛĩtʼ ponḍ kicricʼ horokʼ akatʼ mitʼṭen hoṛ iń samaṅre hecʼenteye metadińạ,
‘Kornelius, Isor do amakʼ koejoṅe ańjom akada ar reṅgecʼ orecʼkom danakokan reakʼ katha hõ uni doe disạ akada.
Ado ńitokʼ Joppate hoṛ kolkom, ar Simon, okoe do Patrasko metaekan uni hoho ạguyem. Uni do jalapuri aṛere Simon camarakʼ oṛakʼreye ḍera akana.’

Onate iń do am hoho ạgume lạgitʼ unrege hoṛiń kolketʼkoa, ar amem hecʼente dom bhageakatʼgea. Nonḍe ale do ńitokʼ sanamkoge Isor samaṅre menakʼlea. Ar Probhu okaṭakʼ ale ṭhen galmarao lạgitʼe hukum akatʼme ona jotowakʼgele ańjoma.”
Unre Patras do roroṛe ehopʼena, “Iń do ńitokʼ sạrigeń bujhạu daṛeakʼ kana, Isorakʼ mẽtʼãhã samaṅre do jotogeko somangea.
Ar mimitʼ jạtko mod khon okoe do uniko botoraekan ar uniakʼ mẽtʼãhã samaṅre dhoromko kạmikan uni do onkoe ataṅkoa.
Isor do Israelko ṭhen noa bhage sombate kolletʼ tahẽkana je, Jisu Mạsi, one okoe do sanamkoren Probhu kane, uni hotetege suluk do ńamokʼa mente.
Ar Johan do hoṛkoakʼ bạptisma ataṅ jạruṛa menteye porcarketʼ khan Gạlil khon ehopʼkate goṭa Jihudạre okako hoelen ona katha mape baḍaege.

Ar noa hõpe baḍaegea je, Isor do Nasaretren Jisuge sonot Jiu ar daṛeteye ojokʼlede tahẽkana. Isor do uni tulucʼe tahẽkante bhageakʼkoe kạmiyetʼ tahẽkana ar Soetanakʼ tire okoeko kosṭoko ńametʼkan tahẽkan onko sanamkoe bogeyetʼko tahẽkana.
“Jihudikoakʼ disạmre ar Jerusalemre uni okakoe kạmiletʼ onaren gohako do ale kangeale. Hoṛko do krusre akakate uniko gocʼkedea.
Menkhan Isor do pe din hilokʼre gocʼko khon uniye jiwetʼ beretʼkedea ar sodorokʼ reakʼe danadea.

Menkhan sanamko do bako ńelledea, eken okoe gohako Isor do lahareye bachao dohoakatʼko tahẽkan onkogeko ńelledea, metakʼme gocʼko khon jiwetʼ beretʼ tayom ale do uni sãotele jom-ńũleda ar alege unile ńelledea.
Uni doe hukum akawatʼlea jemon Jihudiko ṭhenle porcar ar gohale em baṅma, Isor do unige jiwetʼko ar gocʼko bicạrko lạgitʼe niṭ akadea mente.
Ar sanam nạbikoge uni reaṅ noa gohako emetʼkana, unire pạtiạukʼ mitʼke mitʼ hoṛ do uniakʼ ńutumte kại reakʼ ikạko ńama.”
Patras do unhõ kathae roroṛkan tahẽkanre okoe kathako ańjomkan tahẽkan onko sanamkore sonot Jiu doe hecʼena.
Ar okoe Jihudi biswạsiko Patras sãoteko hecʼlen onko do be-Jihudiko cetanrehõ sonot Jiu reakʼ dan dul oḍoken ńelteko hahaṛayena.
Onko do onako bujhạu daṛeada ente noko be-Jihudiko hõ eṭakʼ eṭakʼ pạrsite roroṛkan ar Isor sabasiaekanko ańjomketʼkoa. Unre Patrase menkeda,
“Dakʼte bạptisokʼ lạgitʼ noko hoṛ do cetʼ jãhãeye akoṭ daṛekea? Onko hõ coṅ abo leka sonot Jiuko ńamakade.”
Unre uni do onko hoṛko Jisu Mạsi ńutumte bạptisokʼ lạgitʼe hukumatʼkoa. Ar ona tayom onko do ako ṭhen thoṛa din tahen lạgitʼ Patrasko nehõradea.
Boṅgan hoṛ jạtrenko hõ Isorakʼ kathareko pạtiạu akana mente ona katha do apostolko ar goṭa Jihudạren biswạsi boehako hõko ańjomkeda.
Onate Patras do Jerusalemteye hecʼen khan biswạsiko modren okoekoko khatna ocoakan tahẽkan onko do uni dusikedeteko metadea,
“Am do begor khatna akan hoṛkoakʼ oṛakʼte senkate onko soṅgem jom-ńũyetʼ kana.”
Unre Patras do pạhil khon ehopʼkate cetʼ cetʼko hoelen ona mitʼ mitʼte bujhạuatʼkoteye metatʼkoa,
“Joppa nagrahareń koejoṅkan tahẽkanre mitʼṭen dorsoniń ńelkeda. Iń doń ńelkeda mitʼṭen cador lekanakʼ pon konare sapʼ akatʼ serma khon iń ṭhen pheḍ hecʼena.
Ar mońjteń ạri bạndhiketʼ khan onare ạḍi lekan janwarko, bir janwarko, leńokʼko ar coṭren cẽṛẽko menakʼkoa menteń ńelkeda.
Ar okoe coṅ memeniń ańjomkedea, ‘E Patras, ma beredokʼme ar gocʼkate jomkom.’
Iń doń menkeda, baṅa, Probhu, ohoge hoedaṛelena. Besapha ar chutakʼ jãhãnakʼge tishõ ińakʼ mocare do baṅ bolo akana.
“Ona tayom serma khon dosar dhao roṛena, ‘Isor okaṭakʼe sapha akatʼ ona do be sonotakʼ alom metakʼa.’
Nonkage pe dhao hoyena, ar ona tayom jotowakʼ do arhõ sermate rakapʼ ocoyena.
“Ar ona são sãote okaṭakʼ oṛakʼreń tahẽkan ona oṛakʼre pe hoṛ do hecʼkateko teṅgoyena. Onko do Kạisạriạ khonko kol ocoakan tahẽkana.
Unre sonot Jiu do begor digdhạte onko sãote calakʼe metadińạ. Ar iń tulucʼ noko turui boeha hõko sen toralena. Ale do uni hoṛakʼ oṛakʼtele boloyena one okoe do ińe hohowạdiń tahẽkan.

Uni do mitʼṭen serma goḍet acʼakʼ oṛakʼre cetʼlekae ńellede onae lạiyatʼlea. Uni serma goḍete metade tahẽkana, ‘Simon, okoe do Patrasko metaekan, uni hoho ạguye lạgitʼ am do Joppa nagrahate hoṛ kolkom.
Ar uni okako kathae lạiam, ona kathatege am ar am gharońjren sanam hoṛ kại khon bańcaope ńama.’
“Sonot Jiu etohopʼre cetʼleka aboko cetanreye hecʼlen, onkage galmaraoiń ehopʼketʼ khan onko cetanreye hecʼena.
Unre Probhui menletʼakʼ katha disạ hecʼạdińạ, ‘Johan do dakʼteye bạtisetʼkokan tahẽkana, menkhan ape do sonot Jiutepe bạptis ocokʼa.’
Enḍekhan Probhu Jisu Mạsire bon pạtiạulenre Isor okaṭakʼ dane ematʼbon tahẽkan inạ mitʼ dange uni do onko hõe ematʼko khan iń doń celekante, Isoriń akoṭ daṛekea?”
Noa katha ańjomkate Jihudạren biswạsiko do begor ạnḍuṅte Isor sarhaoateko menkeda, “Isor do boṅgan hoṛ jạtrenko hõ kại khon mon ạcurkate jion ńam lạgitʼ ạte em akatʼkoa.”
Ado Stephan babot hoyen santao iạte okoekoko chir chạtur akan tahẽkan onko do Phoenikiạ, Kupros ar Siriạ disạm reakʼ Antiokiạ hạbicʼ senkate eken Jihudiko ṭhenge Isorakʼ kathako lạikeda.
Menkhan onko modre adomko do Antiokiạte senkate Junạni pạrsiren hoṛko ṭhen hõ Probhu Jisu reaṅ bhage sombat porcarko dhurạuena. Noko do Kupros dip ar Kurene nagraharen hoṛko tahẽkana.
Isorakʼ ti onko cetanre tahẽkante ạḍi utạr hoṛ do Probhureko pạtiạuente uni secʼko ạcurena.
Ado Jerusalem manḍerren hoṛko noa sombatko ańjomketʼ khan onko do Antiokiạte Barnabasko kolkadea.
Ar Antiokiạren hoṛko Isorakʼ dayako ńamakada menteye ńelketʼ khan Barnabas do ạḍiye rạskạyena. Onko jemon goṭa ontorte Probhure biswạsko tahen onate uni do sanamkoe sikhạu paṛhaoketʼkoa.
Barnabas do mitʼṭen bhage hoṛe tahẽkana uni do sonot Jiu ar biswạste hõ perecʼ akane tahẽkana. Unre Probhu do ḍher hoṛge acʼ apnar ṭhene ạguletʼkoa.
Noa tayom Barnabas do Sạul ńame lạgitʼ Tạrsus nagrahateye calaoena,

ar uniye ńamkede khan Antiokiạteye ạgukedea. Barnabas ar Sạul do goṭa bochor manḍerren hoṛko sãotekin tahẽyena ar ạḍi utạr hoṛkin cetʼatʼkoa. Ar noa Antiokiạrege celako do pạhil Khristanko ńumocoyena.
Onako dinre adom nạbiko do Jerusalem khon Antiokiạteko hecʼena.
Onko modren Agabus ńutuman mitʼ hoṛ doe teṅgoyente sonot Jiuakʼ ạyurteye lại lahakeda je, goṭa Rom disạmre mitʼṭen maraṅ akal hoyokʼa. (Ona do Klạudius raj oktere hoelena.)
Unre celako doko goṭakeda, Jihudạ disạmren biswạsi boehako goṛoako lạgitʼ apan ạpin daṛe leka onko do jemon ṭakako kol. Arko onkaletʼgea.
Onko do Barnabas ar Sạulakʼ tite Jihudạ manḍerren maraṅ mukhiyạko ṭhen ona goṛoko kolleda.
Ona jokhecʼ Herod raj do santaoko lạgitʼ manḍerren adom hoṛkoe sapʼ ạguketʼkoa.
Uni do Johanren boeha Jakob tarwaṛeteye khũn ocokedea.
Onate Jihudikoko kusi akana menteye ńelketʼ khan uni do Patras hõ sabe lạgitʼe calaoena. Noa ghoṭna do bin khạmianakʼ piṭhạ porob jokhecʼ hoelena.

Uni do Patras sapʼkate hajotreye bhoraokedea. Ar popon hoṛkate pạri pạrite horhoye lạgitʼ palṭonkoe bharatʼkoa. Herod doe goṭakeda, sen-parom porob tayom bicạre lạgitʼ Patras do hoṛko samaṅreye oḍok ạguyea.
Onatege Patras do hajotreye doho ocokʼkan tahẽkana. Menkhan manḍerren hoṛko do uni lạgitʼ Isor ṭhen mitʼ monteko koejoṅkan tahẽkana.

Oka hilokʼ Herod do Patras bicạre lạgitʼe oḍok ạguyea ona laha ńindạ Patras do barea palṭon talareye jạpitʼ akatʼ tahẽkana. Uni do barea sikṛiteko tolakade tahẽkana ar pahradarko do duạrreko pahrakan tahẽkana.

Unre Probhuren mitʼṭen goḍet do ackage hecʼkate onḍeye teṅgoyena. Onate hajot oṛakʼ reakʼ ona kandhare marsal bamberena. Serma goḍet do Patras kokhare ceṭakʼkedeteye ebhenkedea are metadea, “Usạra beretʼ godokʼme.” Ar inạtege Patrasakʼ banar ti khon sikṛi do ńurgotʼena.
Unre serma goḍet do Patrase metadea, “Ma paṭhe keṭejokʼme, ar jaṅgare panahi horogme.” Khan Patras doe onkakeda. Ar serma goḍet do uniye metadea, “Amakʼ oyonakʼte oyokʼme, ar pańjańme.”
Patras do uni tayom tayomte hajot oṛakʼ khon bahreteye oḍok hecʼena, menkhan bae bujhạu daṛeada, serma goḍet hotete hoyokʼ kanakʼ do sạrikana mente. Uni doe hudiskeda dorsone ńeńelkana.

Unkin do pạhil ar dosar pahradarko kin paromketʼko khan nagrahate bolokʼ mẽṛhẽtʼ silpiń duạr ṭhenkin seṭerena. Ar silpiń do acʼtege jhicʼena ar unkin do ona talatekin oḍok hecʼena. Ado mitʼṭen hortekin calakʼkan tahẽkanre serma goḍet do ackage Patrase bạgi oṭowadea.
Unre Patras do disạ ạcurenteye menkeda, “Ńitokʼ sạrigeń bujhạu daṛeakʼ kana, Probhu do acʼren goḍete kolkedete Herodakʼ ti ar Jihudikoakʼ sanam bạṛicʼ phorphundi khone bańcao akadińạ.”
Noa kathae bujhạuketʼ khan uni do Johanren eṅgat Mạriạmakʼ oṛakʼteye calaoena. Nui Johan do Mark hõko metaekan tahẽkana. Ar ona oṛakʼre do aema hoṛ mitʼ ṭhen jarwakateko koejoṅkan tahẽkana.
Patras do bahre silpińe ṭhopʼ ṭhopʼketʼ khan Roda ńutuman mitʼṭen kạ̃ṛmĩ kuṛi silpiń jhicʼ lạgitʼe hecʼena.
Uni do Patrasakʼ aṛaṅe oromketʼtae khan nunạkʼe rạskạyena je, silpiń jhicʼ baṅkate bhitrite ńir bolokateye lạiatʼkoa, “Patras do duạr ṭhene teṅgo akana mente.”
Unre celako do kuṛiko metadea, “Amakʼ bohokʼ do bạṛicʼ akantama.” Menkhan uni do artetʼ murukteye menetʼkante onkoko menkeda, “Enḍekhan uni do Patrasren rukhiyạicʼ goḍet kanae.”
Patras do silpiń ṭhopʼ ṭhopʼtegeye tahẽyena. Unre celako do silpińko jhicʼketʼ khan Patras ńelkedeteko ṭhak utạrena.

Patras do thirokʼ lạgitʼ titeye isạrawatʼkoa ar hajot khon Probhu cetʼlekateye oḍok ạgukede onae baḍae ocoketʼkoa. Ar mucạtʼreye metatʼkoa, “Noa khobor do Jakob ar eṭakʼ boehako hõ lạiyakope.” Noa katha menkate uni doe oḍokente eṭakʼ jaegateye calaoena.
Ado setakʼen khan Patrase okayena mente palṭonko talare gulmal hoyena.

Herod do ạḍi mońjteye sendrakedea, menkhan bae ńamledete pahradarkoe kuliketʼkoa ar tayomte pahradarko gocʼko reaṅe hukumkeda. Ona tayom Herod do Jihudạ khon Kạisạriạteye calaoena ar onḍe thoṛa dine tahẽyena.

Ona oktere Herod do Tur ar Sidon nagraharen hoṛko cetanre ạḍiye edreyena. Unre onḍenko hoṛ do riạu mitʼkate Herod sãote ńapamokʼ lạgitʼko calaoena. Ar Blastos ńutuman rajakʼ giticʼ oṛakʼren kạmiạyicʼko rạmjạukedete onko do raj sãote sulukokʼ reakʼko koekeda, ente Herod rajakʼ disạm khonge ako lạgitʼ jomakʼ do hijukʼ kan tahẽkana.
Unre Herod do mitʼṭen dine goṭakeda. Ar ona dinre uni do raj kicricʼ horokʼkate siṅghạsonreye duṛupʼena ar onko hoṛe galmaraoatʼkoa.
Onko do uniakʼ katha ańjomkate hohoateko menkeda, “Noa do debakʼ aṛaṅ kana, manwawakʼ do baṅa.”
Herod do unre Isor bae sarhaoledete Probhuren mitʼṭen goḍet do uniye ńetʼkedea, arko tejokedete uni doe gocʼena.
Menkhan Isorakʼ katha do pasnao idiyena ar aema hoṛ onateko pạtiạuena.
Barnabas ar Sạul do sapʼdapʼ kạmikin purạuketʼ khan Johankin soṅge torakedete Jerusalemteko ruạṛ calaoena. Nui Johange Mark hõko metaekan tahẽkana.
Antiokiạ manḍerre do thoṛa nạbi ar cecetʼkoko tahẽkana. Onkoakʼ ńutum do Barnabas, Nigerko metaekan Simeon, Kurene nagraharen Lukius, disạm cakʼlaoicʼ Herod sãoteye ạsul haralen Manaen ar Sạul.
Onko do upạskate Probhuko sewawaekan tahẽkanre sonot Jiu do onkoe metatʼkoa, “Barnabas ar Sạul oka kạmi lạgitʼ iń hohoakatʼkin, ińakʼ ona kạmi lạgitʼ ńitokʼ unkin baṛe begarkinpe.”
Unre onko do upạskateko koejoṅkeda arko capoketʼkinte unkinko bidạgotʼkakʼ kinạ.
Ado sonot Jiu hotetekin kol ocoyen khan Barnabas ar Sạul do Seleukiạtekin rakapʼ calaoena. Ar onḍe khon jahajte unkin do Kupros diptekin senena.
Salamisre seṭerkate unkin do Jihudikoakʼ sunạgogkore Isorakʼ kathakin porcarkeda. Unre goṛoyicʼ lekate Johan hõ unkin sãoteye tahẽkana.
Ado goṭa dipkin dãṛã mucạtʼketʼ khan unkin do Paphos hạbicʼkin hecʼena ar onḍe do Bar-Jisu ńutuman mitʼṭen Jihudi jạdu udukʼicʼ eṛe nạbikin ńamkedea.

Uni eṛe nạbi do Eluma, metakʼme jạdu alako metaekan tahẽkana. Uni jạdu udukʼicʼ do disạm cakʼlaoicʼ Sergius Pạulusren mitʼṭen gateye tahẽkana ar uni disạm cakʼlaoicʼ do mitʼṭen budan hoṛgeye tahẽkana. Uni do Isorakʼ katha ańjom lạgitʼ Barnabas ar Sạule hoho ạgu ocoketʼkina.
Menkhan Eluma do Barnabas ar Sạul tạkicʼkine ehopʼkeda ar disạm cakʼlaoicʼ hõ Jisure pạtiạukʼ khon ruạṛe lạgitʼe kurumuṭukeda.
Unre Sạul okoe do Pạulko metaekan uni do sonot Jiuteye perecʼente Eluma secʼ beṅgetʼ uricʼkateye metadea,
“Am do Soetanren hopon ar joto bhageakʼren bạiri kanam. Amre do joto lekan phạsiara ar bedhorom menakʼa. Probhuakʼ sojhe horko konḍeae do cetʼ bam bạgiya?

Ńelme, Probhuakʼ ti do am birudre rakapʼ akana. Am dom kãṛãkʼa ar thoṛa din hạbicʼ siń cando reakʼ marsal bam ńelńama.” Ar unrege dhund ar ńut paṛaoadete hoṛe ńamkoa mente onte note ṭạmḍạu baṛaye ehopʼena.
Noako ńelte uni disạm cakʼlaoicʼ do Probhureye biswạsena, ente Probhu reaṅ oka cecetʼakʼe ńamletʼ onate uni doe hahaṛalena.
Noa tayom Pạul ar uniren sãotenko do jahajte Paphos khon Pamphuliạ disạm reakʼ Perga nagrahateko calaoena. Unre Johan do onko bạgikate Jerusalemteye ruạṛ senena.
Tayomte onko do Perga khon Pisidiạ disạm reakʼ Antiokiạ nagrahateko senena ar jirạukʼ mãhãre sunạgogre bolokateko duṛupʼena.
Ado sonot sostor reakʼ ạn-ạri ar nạbikoakʼ puthi khon paṛhao sạten khan sunạgogren mukhiyạko do onkoko metatʼkoa, “E boehako, jãhãn sikhạuna katha menakʼtape khan ma roṛpe.”
Unre Pạul doe teṅgoyena ar ti tulkateye menkeda, “E Israelko ar Isor botoraekan boṅgan hoṛ jạtrenko ańjompe baṛe.
Ona tayom Kanan disạmren eae goṭen jạtkoe maraoketʼkote acʼren hoṛko ona disạm cetanre ạidạriye ematʼko tahẽkana.
Noako sanamakʼ hoe purạukʼte pon sae mõṛẽgel bochor lagaolena. “Noa tayom Sạmuel nạbi hạbicʼ Isor do bicạricʼe ematʼko tahẽkana.
Ona tayom disạmren hoṛko do rajko khojkedea. Unre uni do Benjamin khũṭren, Kisren hopon Sạulgeye ematʼkoa. Sạul do pongel bochor hạbicʼ raje calaoketʼa.
Ona tayom Isor do Sạul ocokʼkate Dạude rajkedea. Uni do Dạud reaṅe menakada, ‘iń do Jisạiren hopon Dạudre ińakʼ mone lekan mitʼṭen hoṛiń ńamakadea. Uni do ińakʼ sanam monejoṅakʼe purạutińạ.’
Isor do acʼakʼ gokʼakʼ lekage noko hoṛkoakʼ bõs khon babańcaoicʼ Jisuge Israelko ṭhene sodorkedea.
Jisu hijukʼ lahare sanam Israelko ṭhen Johan do noa menteye porcarleda je, hoṛko do kại khon mon ạcurkate bạptisma hatao lek takoa.

Johan do acʼakʼ kạmiye mucạtʼ ạguyetʼ tahẽkanreye menleda, ‘iń doń okoe kana mentepe hudisetʼkana? Iń do uni Mạsi doń baṅkana. Uni do iń tayomteye daraekana, iń do uniakʼ panahi raṛaetae lek hõń baṅkana.’
“E boehako, Abrahamren hoponko ar Isor botoraekanko, kại khon bańcao reakʼ noa khobor do abon ṭhenge kolakana.

Jerusalemren hoṛko ar onkoren mukhiyạko do Jisu bako oromledea. Noa chaḍa nạbikoakʼ okaṭakʼ katha jirạukʼ mãhãre jaoge paṛhao idikʼkan tahẽkan, ona katha hõ onko do bako bujhạu daṛeada; onate Jisuko dusikedete ona kathako purạukeda.
Onko do Jisuakʼ gocʼ ocokʼ reaṅ jãhãn dos bako ńamletʼtaere hõ Pilạtko metadea jemon uniye goje.
Sonot sostorre uni reaṅ cetʼko ol tahẽkan ona sanamakʼ purạuen khan onko do krus khon pheḍkedeteko topakadea.
Menkhan Isor do gocʼko khon uniye jiwetʼ beretʼkedea.
Gạlil khon okoeko uni sãote Jerusalemteko hecʼlen, onko do aema din hạbicʼ uniko ńelledea. Ar onkoge ńitokʼ do aboren hoṛko ṭhen uni reaṅ gohako emeda.
“Ạliń do apeko ṭhen noa bhage sombat liń emape kana, aboren hapṛamko ṭhen Isor okaṭakʼe gokʼletʼ tahẽkan,
ona do onkoren hoponko lạgitʼ, metakʼme abo lạgitʼ Jisu gocʼko khone jiwetʼ beretʼkedeteye purạu akada. Noa reaṅ do dosarakʼ sereńre olakana: Am dom ińren hopon kana, teheńge amren apatiń hoyena.
Isor do gocʼko khon uniye jiwetʼ akadea ar uniakʼ hoṛmo do tishõ baṅ nosṭokʼtaea, ona kathakore Isore menakada, ‘Sonot ar sạriakʼ bhor reakʼ Dạud ṭhen okań kiriyạlen, ona do amiń emama.’
Ona reaṅ ar mitʼ jaegare olakana: Amren sonoticʼ do alom sea ocoaea.
“Dạud do ona piṛhiren hoṛko modre Isorakʼ monejoṅakʼe purạuketʼ tayome gocʼena. Ar uniren hapṛamko sãoteko topakede khan uniakʼ hoṛmo do nosṭoyena.
Menkhan Isor do okoe gocʼko khone jiwetʼ beretʼkede, uniakʼ hoṛmo do baṅ sealena.
Onate E ińren boehako, ape do baḍae joṅpe, Jisu hotetege ape ṭhen kại reakʼ ikạ ńam reaṅ jạhirokʼ kana.
Ape do Moseakʼ ạn-ạri hotete kại reakʼ sạjại khon bape rukhiyạu akana, menkhan jãhãege Jisureye pạtiạukʼ, uni do kại reakʼ sạjại khon bańcaoe ńama.
Onate ape do sontorokʼpe, jemon nạbikoko roṛakatʼ noako apere alo paṛaokʼ:
Ape okoe do Isor sãotepe khiloḍkan, ańjompe Ape do bhaṛokʼpe ar mohor meṭaokʼpe; ente ape bidạlrege iń do nonkanakʼ iń kạmiya one uniakʼ katha ohogepe pạtiạulen, jãhãeye lạiapere hõ baṅa.”
Ado Pạul ar Barnabas sunạgog khonkin oḍok calakʼkan tahẽkan jokhecʼ hoṛkoko nehõratʼkinạ jemon hijukʼkan jirạukʼ mãhãre noako reaṅ arhõkin galmaraoako.

Ar sunạgog khonko calao baṛayen khan ạḍi utạr Jihudiko ar Jihudi dhoromre pạtiạu akan Isor botoraekanko do Pạul ar Barnabas tạkinko pańjaketʼkinạ. Unre Pạul ar Barnabas do onkokin galmaraoatʼkoa, ar Isorakʼ dayare jemon khạtirko tahen ona lạgitʼ kin udgạuketʼkoa.
Ado dosarakʼ jirạukʼ mãhãre nagraharen sanam hoṛko Isorakʼ katha ańjom lạgitʼ mitʼ sãoteko jarwayena.
Ar nunạkʼ hoṛakʼ bhiṛ ńelte Jihudiko do hiskạteko perecʼena ar Pạul okae menetʼkan tahẽkan ona birudre aema lekan kathakote nisṛạueko ehopʼena.

Unre Pạul ar Barnabas do dilkate kin roṛ ruạṛatʼkoa, “Pạhilre ape ṭhen Isorakʼ katha lạlại jạruṛ tahẽkan tạlińa, menkhan tinre ape do bape moneada ar jaejug jion ńam lạgitʼ apete lek bape bujhạulena unre ạliń do boṅgan hoṛ jạtrenko secʼliń ạcurokʼkana.
Ente Probhu do noa kathae men akada, ‘boṅgan hoṛko ṭhen iń do mitʼṭen marsal lekań dohoakatʼmea, jemon am hotete goṭa dhạrtiren hoṛko kại khon bańcaoko ńam.’ ”
Noa katha ańjomkate boṅgan hoṛ jạtrenko doko rạskạyena ar Probhuakʼ kathako sarhaokeda; ar jaejug jion ńam lạgitʼ Isor tinạkʼe niṭ dohoakatʼko tahẽkan onko doko pạtiạuena.
Ar Probhuakʼ katha do onako ṭoṭha reakʼ sanam jaegakore pasnao idiyena.
Menkhan Jihudiko do Isor bhoktiae bhodro maejiuko ar nagraharen manotan hoṛkoko udgạuketʼkoa. Nonkate onko do Pạul ar Barnabas upạrte khedko calaoketʼte ona ṭoṭha khonko oḍok gotʼkatʼ kinạ.
Unre Pạul ar Barnabas do onko hoṛko upạrte ạkinakʼ jaṅga reakʼ dhuṛikin koṭa oṭokatʼte Ikonium nagrahatekin calaoena.
Menkhan onḍenko cela do rạskạ ar sonot Jiuteko perecʼena.
Ikonium nagrahare Pạul ar Barnabas do ạkinakʼ cạli leka Jihudikoakʼ sunạgogkote kin boloyena. Unkin do onḍe nonkan kathakin galmaraoatʼkoa je, Jihudiko ar Junạniko khon ạḍi utạr hoṛko pạtiạuena.
Menkhan okoeko Jihudi bako pạtiạulen onko do boṅgan hoṛ jạtrenkoko uskạuketʼkote biswạsi boehako birudre onkoakʼ monko bạṛicʼketʼtakoa.

Pạul ar Barnabas do ona nagrahare thoṛa dinkin tahẽyena ar dil salakʼ Probhuakʼ kathakin galmaraoatʼkoa. Ar Probhuakʼ daya reaṅ okakin porcaretʼ tahẽkan ona katha sạrikana mente sạbud lạgitʼ Probhu do Pạul ar Barnabas hotete cinhạko ar hahaṛawakʼkoe hoeocokeda.
Onate nagraharen hoṛko doko begarena; adomko do Jihudiko secʼ ar adomko do apostol secʼko calaoena.
Unre boṅgan hoṛ jạtrenko ar Jihudikoren mukhiyạko do jarwa mitʼkate Pạul ar Barnabas santaokin ar dhirite tińkin lạgitʼko solhawana.
Menkhan Pạul ar Barnabas do onakin baḍaeketʼ khan Lukạuniạ Prodes reakʼ Lustrạ ar Derbe ar ona aḍe pase ṭoṭhatekin dạṛkeda.
Onako ṭoṭhare unkin do Mạsi reaṅ bhage sombat porcarkin dhurạuena.
Lustrạ nagrahare mitʼṭen leḍha hoṛe duṛupʼkokʼkan tahẽkana. Uni do jonom khonge leḍhae tahẽkana ar tis hõ bae taṛamakatʼ tahẽkana.
Pạul okae kạmiketʼ ona ńelte hoṛko do Lukạuniạ pạrsite hohoateko menkeda, “Debko manwa chinte abo ṭhenko pheḍ hecʼakana.”
Onate Barnabas do Jupiter ar Pạul do kathae roroṛkan tahẽkante Merkuriko ńutumkedea.

Jupiter debakʼ than do nagraha bahrere tahẽkana. Ar uni debren naeke do nagraha reakʼ duạr ṭhen daṅgra ar malae ạgukeda, ente naeke ar sanam hoṛko do Pạul ar Barnabas janwar dãṛẽ emakin lạgitʼko menetʼ tahẽkana.
Barnabas ar Pạul do ona kathakin ańjomketʼ khan ạkinakʼ kicricʼkin oṛecʼketʼte hoṛko ṭhenkin ńir calaoena ar ãṭ aṛaṅtekin menkeda,

“E ho gateko, ape do cedakʼ noakope onkayeda? Ạliń hõ coṅ ape leka duk suk jojom manwakangeliń. Ạliń do ape ṭhen bhage sombat liń porcareda jemon noa ạuṛiakʼko khon jiwetʼ Isor secʼpe, ạcurokʼ. Unige serma, dhạrti, jalapuri ar onakore menakʼ jotowakʼ doe sirjạu akada.
Laha piṛhiren sanamkoge uni do akoakʼ sana lekageye sen ocowatʼko tahẽkana,

menkhan enhõ uni do jao okte acʼ reaṅ gohae emakada. Ente uni do serma khon dakʼe emokʼkana ar okte nạpitre phosole dan abon kante dayae udukʼape kana. Uni do asambheṛ jomakʼe dan apekante apeakʼ mon do rạskạteye perecʼetʼtapea.”
Noako katha kin galmaraoatʼkore hõ janwar dãṛẽ khon hoṛko thir ocoko lạgitʼ unkin do ạḍi haronokʼ hoyentạkina.
Ado Antiokiạ ar Ikonium khon adom Jihudiko hecʼkate Pạul ar Barnabas birudre hoṛkoko bhiṅgṛạuketʼkoa. Unre Pạul do dhiriteko tińkedea ar gocʼenae hudiskate nagraha bahreteko or idikadea.
Menkhan tayomte biswạsiko uni beṛhaeteko teṅgoyen khan uni doe beretʼente nagrahateye ruạṛ calaoena. Ar dosar hilokʼ acʼ ar Barnabas do Derbe nagrahatekin calaoena.
Unkin do mitʼke mitʼ manḍerre maraṅ mukhiyạ kin bahalketʼkoa ar okoe Probhu cetanreko biswạs akan tahẽkan, koejoṅ ar upạste uni Probhuakʼ tirege manḍerren hoṛkokin jimạkatʼkoa.
Tayomte Pạul ar Barnabas do Pisidiạ Prodes talatekin parom calaoente Pamphuliạ Prodeshte kin seṭerena.
Unkin do Perga nagrahare Isorakʼ katha porcarkate Attaliạ bondortekin calaoena.
Ar Attaliạ khon jahajte Siriạ disạm reakʼ Antiokiạ tekin ruạṛ hecʼena. Ar oka kạmi ńitkin mucạtʼketʼ ona kạmi lạgitʼge noa Antiokiạ khonge Isorakʼ dayarekin jimạ ocolena.

Ado Antiokiạtekin seṭeren khan unkin do manḍerren sanamko mitʼ ṭhenkin jarwaketʼkoa ar Isor ạkin hotete okakoe kạmiketʼ ona sanamakʼ kin lạiatʼkoa. Ar cetʼlekate Isor do boṅgan hoṛ jạtrenko Mạsire biswạs reakʼ duạre jhicʼ akawatʼko ona reakʼ hõkin lạiatʼkoa.
Ona tayom Pạul ar Barnabas do celako sãote onḍe ḍher dinkin tahẽyena.

Jihudạ disạm khon adom hoṛ do Siriạ disạm reakʼ Antiokiạteko hecʼena ar biswạsi boehako noa menkate cetʼakoko ehopʼena, “Moseakʼ ạn-ạri lekate bape khatna ocolen khan kại khon bańcao do ohogepe ńamlea.”

Onate Pạul ar Barnabas sãote onko hoṛko doko apṭha ạpṭhiyena. Onko doko goṭakeda je, Pạul ar Barnabas do Antiokiạren thoṛa biswạsiko soṅgekate Jerusalemkin calakʼa ar apostolko ar manḍerren mukhiyạko tulucʼ noa reaṅko galmaraoa.

Antiokiạ manḍerrenko do onkoakʼ calakʼ reakʼko bebostakeda. Ado Phoenikiạ ar Samariạ Prodes talate calakʼ jokhecʼ Pạul ar Barnabas do hoṛkokin baḍae ocoketʼkoa, boṅgan hoṛ jạtrenko do Isor secʼ cetʼlekako ạcurokʼ kana mente. Ar noa khobor ańjomkate sanam biswạsikoge ạḍiko kusiyena.
Pạul ar Barnabas Jerusalemtekin hecʼen khan manḍerren hoṛko, mukhiyạko ar apostolko do ạḍi rạskạ salakʼko ataṅ daramketʼkinạ. Ar unkin hotete Isor okakoe cekaletʼ tahẽkan ona sanamakʼkin lạiatʼkoa.
Unre Phạrusikoren thoṛa hoṛ hõ biswạsiko tahẽkana. Onko do teṅgoyenteko menkeda, “Boṅgan hoṛ jạtrenko do khatnakʼ jạruṛgetakoa ar Moseakʼ ạn-ạri jemonko pańjae ona lạgitʼ hukum emako jạruṛa.”
Unre apostolko ar manḍerren mukhiyạko do noa reaṅ hudis lạgitʼ mitʼ ṭhenko jarwayena.

Ado aemako galmaraoketʼ khan Patras do teṅgoyenteye metatʼkoa, “E boehako, ape mape baḍaege, ḍher din lahare apeko tala khon Isor do ińe bachao akadińạ jemon boṅgan hoṛ jạtrenko hõ ińakʼ moca khon bhage sombat reakʼ katha ańjomkateko pạtiạukʼ.
Isor do sanam hoṛkoakʼ mone baḍaea. Uni do cetʼleka sonot Jiue danatʼbon tahekan, onkage boṅgan hoṛ jạtrenko hõe danatʼkote gohae emakada je, onko hõ kại khon bańcaoko ńamakada.
Uni do abo ar onko talare jãhãn begar do bae dohoakada, ente onkoko pạtiạu akante uni do onkoakʼ ontore sapha akatʼtakoa.
Enḍekhan aboren hapṛamko se abo okaṭakʼ bojha babon gokʼ daṛe akatʼ ona bojha pạtiạu akan boṅgan hoṛ jạtrenkoakʼ tarenre gokʼakote cedakʼ ape do Isor biḍạue lạgitʼpe kurumuṭu kana?
Alele pạtiạukʼ kana je, Probhu Jisuakʼ dayate pạtiạu akan boṅgan hoṛ jạtrenko do cetʼleka kại khon bańcaoko ńamakatʼ, onkage abon hõ bańcao bon ńamakada.”
Unre bạisiren sanamko doko thir hapeyena ar Pạul ar Barnabas hotete boṅgan hoṛ jạtrenko talare Isor do okako hahaṛa kạmiye kạmi akatʼ ona unkinakʼ moca khon ańjomko ehopʼena.
Adokin roṛ mucạtʼketʼ khan Jakobe menkeda, “E boehako, ańjompe.

Isor do acʼren hoṛko hoyokʼ lạgitʼ boṅgan hoṛ jạtrenko modkhon thoṛa hoṛ bachaokateye udukʼakada je, boṅgan hoṛ jạtrenko lạgitʼ hõ uni doe dạndikʼ kana. Ar noa kathage Simon Patras do aboe lại akatʼ bona.
Ar noa katha tulucʼ do nạbikoakʼ katha hõ jurikʼkana, ente sostorre olakana:
‘Noa tayom hecʼkate iń do Dạudakʼ lạnduṛ akan oṛakʼ arhõń benaoa ruạṛa. Oka dhaṅ dhaser akan ona do arhõń gathao ruạṛa, ona do arhoń teṅgo ruạṛa;
Jemon eṭakʼ sanam hoṛko, metakʼme boṅgan hoṛ jạtrenko okoe do ińren menteko hoho ocokʼkan onko jemonko sendrayiń. Probhu, okoe do noakoe kạmikan, unige noako kathae menakada.’
Ar ḍher din laha khon noa do uniakʼ monre tahẽkana.”
Jakob do arhõe menkeda, “Noa iạtege ińakʼ bujre boṅgan hoṛ jạtren okoeko Isor secʼko ạcurokʼkan onko duk emako lek do baṅkan tabona.
Bickom onko ṭhen noa katha bon olma, jemon boṅga tulucʼ jopoṛao sanamakʼ ar joto lekan loṭghuṭi khon sahaṛ akanko tahen, ar limbạtʼ gocʼ janwarakʼ jel ar mãyãm jemon aloko jom.
Noa hukum emakoge bhagea, ente Mose okae menakatʼ ona do mimitʼ nagrahakore ạḍi laha khonge porcarokʼ kana ar uni okae ol oṭoakatʼ ona do mimitʼ jirạukʼ mãhãre sunạgogkore paṛhao idikʼkana.”

Unre apostolko, manḍerren murubiko ar manḍerren eṭakʼ sanam hoṛkoko goṭakeda je, onko do akoren adom hoṛko bachaokate Pạul ar Barnabas sãote Antiokiạteko kolkoa. Onko do Jihudạ ar Silạs tạkinko bachaoketʼkinạ. Nui Jihudạge Barsabako metaekan tahẽkana. Ente biswạsi boehako modre nukin bana hoṛge mukhiyạkin tahẽkana.

Ado onko hotete noa ciṭhiko kolkeda: Antiokiạ, Siriạ ar Kilikiạren biswạs akan boṅgan hoṛ jạtren boehako ṭhen ale apostolko ar manḍerren murubiko, metakʼme aperen boehako do noa ciṭhile olape kana. Apeakʼ suluk hoyokʼma.
“Alele ańjomkeda je, aleko mod khon adom hoṛ do senkate ạḍi lekan kathate apeakʼ monko ạulạuetʼte kosṭoko emapekana, menkhan ale do nonkan kạmi bale menakatʼkoa.
Onate ale sanamkoge mitʼkate thoṛa hoṛ bachaokate aleren dulạṛiạ gate Barnabas ar Pạul sãote ape ṭhenle kolketʼkoa.
Barnabas ar Pạul do aboren Probhu Jisu Mạsi iạte gujukʼrekin paṛaolena.
Ale do Jihudạ ar Silạs tạkinle kolketʼkinạ jemon okale olakatʼ ona do mocate hõ kin lạiape.
Sonot Jiu ar ale do noage mońjle metakʼ kana, noa jạruṛokʼakʼko reaṅ chaḍa ar okaṭakʼte hõ jemon ape cetanre bạ̃ṛti bojha aloko ladeape.

Ona jạruṛokʼakʼko reaṅ do hoyokʼ kana: Boṅga ṭhen samaṅakʼ jãhãnakʼge alope joma, mãyãm hõ alope ńũiya, ar limbạtʼ gocʼkoakʼ jel hõ alope joma, ar sanam lekan loṭghuṭi khon sahaṛ akae tahenpe. Ar noako khon sạṅgińrepe tahen khan bhage hoyokʼtapea. Ma napaete tahen tabonpe.’’
Ado Pạul, Barnabas ar unkin hoṛko kolketʼkin khan onko do Antiokiạteko calaoena. Onḍe onko do manḍerren hoṛko mitʼ ṭhenko jarwaketʼkote ona ciṭhiko ematʼkoa.
Hoṛko do ona ciṭhiko paṛhaokeda ar onare oka jiwi raṛecʼ reakʼ katha tahẽkan onate ạḍiko kusiyena.
Jihudạ ar Silạs apnarhõ nạbi kin tahẽkana; onate unkin do aemakin galmaraoatʼkote onḍenko boehakin udgạuketʼkoa ar onkoakʼ pạtiạukin keṭecʼ ocoketʼtakoa.
Menkhan Pạul ar Barnabas do Antiokiạrege kin tahẽyena. Onḍe unkin do arhõ aemako ṭhen Probhuakʼ katha cetʼako ar porcarkin dhurạuena.

Thoṛa din tayom Pạul do Barnabase metadea, “Dela, okako jaegare Probhuakʼ katha laṅ porcarakatʼ, onako jaegate arhõ ruạṛ senkate boehako laṅ hirikoa ar cetʼleka menakʼkoa mente ona hõ laṅ ńeltorakoa.”
Unre Barnabas do Johan soṅgetora joṅe menana. Nui Johan do Mark hõko metaekan tahẽkana.
Menkhan Pạul do uni soṅgete iditoraye bhage do bae metatʼa, ente Mark do Pamphuliạreye bạgi oṭoatʼkin tahẽkana ar unkin sãote ar bae kạmileda.
Unre Pạul ar Barnabas do mot baṅ mitʼlente unkin dokin begarena. Onate Barnabas do Marke soṅgekedete jahajte Kupros dipteye calaoena, ar Pạul do Silạse bachaoana.
Unre Antiokiạren boehako do Pạul ar Silạs tạkin Probhuakʼ tireko jimạketʼkin khan unkin dokin mohḍhayena.
Pạul do Siriạ ar Kilikiạ talateye parom calao idiyente sanam manḍerkore pạtiạukoe keṭecʼketʼtakoa are daṛe ocoketʼkoa.

Tayomte Pạul do Derbe ar Lustrạ nagrahateye calaoena. Onḍe Timothi ńutuman mitʼṭen celae tahẽkana. Uniren eṅgattetʼ hõ Mạsire pạtiạu akan mitʼṭen Jihudi maejiue tahẽkana, menkhan apattetʼ do mitʼṭen Junạni hoṛge.
Lustrạ ar Ikonium nagraharen pạtiạu akan boehako do Timothi ạḍiko sarhaoedekan tahẽkana.
Ar Pạul do soṅgete Timothi iditoraye menjoṅante uniye khatna ocokedea, ente onako ṭoṭhare okoe Jihudikoko tahenkan tahẽkan onko doko baḍaekan tahẽkana Timothiren apattetʼ do mitʼṭen Junạni hoṛ kanae.
Ar unkin do onako nagraha talatekin parom calaoena ar Jerusalemren apostolko ar manḍerren mukhiyạko okako ạnko goṭa akatʼ tahẽkan ona do hoṛkokin baḍae ocoketʼkoa ar pańjae lạgitʼkin metatʼkoa.
Nonkate manḍerren hoṛko do biswạsreko keṭecʼ idiyena ar dinke dinko saṅge idiyena.
Pạul ar uni sãotenko do sonot Jiu hoteteko mana ocoyente Asiạre do bako porcarleda. Unre onko do Phrugiạ ar Galatiạ Prodes reakʼ sanam jaegateko calaoena.
Ado Musiạ aṛeteko hecʼen khan onko do Bethaniạ disạmte calakʼko kurumuṭukeda, menkhan Jisuren Jiu do bae sen ocowatʼkoa.
Onate onko do Musiạ talate Troas nagrahateko calaoena.
Ar Pạul do ńindạ mitʼṭecʼ dorsone ńelkeda, Makedoniạ disạmren mitʼṭen hoṛ do teṅgokate nehõr salakʼe meneda, “Makedoniạte parom hijukʼte dela goṛowaleme.”
Ado Pạul noa dorsone ńelketʼ khan ale do Makedoniạte calakʼ lạgitʼ unregele sapṛaoena, entele bujhạu daṛeada Makedoniạren hoṛko ṭhen Mạsi reaṅ bhage sombat porcar lạgitʼ Isor doe hohoale kana.
Tayomte ale do Troas bạgikate jahajte sojhe Samothrake diptele calaoena ar dosar hilokʼ do Neapolis nagrahatele hecʼena.
Ar onḍe khon ale do Philipi nagrahatele calaoena. Noa Philipige Makedoniạ ṭoṭha reakʼ maraṅ nagraha tahẽkana. Ar onḍenko hoṛ do Rom rajren porjako tahẽkana. Ale do thoṛa din ona nagraharele tahẽyena.

Ado jirạukʼ mãhãre ale do nagraha reakʼ phaṭok bahre gaḍa aṛe ṭhenle calaoena; entele hudisetʼ tahẽkana onḍe do Jihudikoakʼ sunạgog menakʼtakoa mente. Ar onḍe okoeko maejiuko jarwa akan tahẽkan onko ṭhen duṛupʼkate galmaraole ehopʼena.

Ar okoekoko ańjometʼkan tahẽkan onko modre Thuạtirạ nagraharen Ludiạ ńutuman mitʼṭen maejiue tahẽkana. Uni do beguni roṅ reakʼ kicricʼe kiriń ạkrińetʼ tahẽkana. Ar Jihudi bae tahẽkanre hõ uni do Isore sewawaekan tahẽkana. Probhu do Ludiạwakʼ ontor nonkae jhicʼketʼtaea jemon uni do Pạulakʼ katha monteye ańjom are pạtiạukʼ.

Ar noate uni ar acʼ gharońjren sanamkogeko bạptisena. Inạ tayom uni do noa menkateye neotaketʼlea, “Probhure biswạs akanpe hudisedeń khan dela ińakʼ oṛakʼre hijukʼte tahenpe.” Ar noa katha menkate acʼakʼ oṛakʼteye idiketʼlea.

Mitʼ din ona koejoṅ jaegatele calakʼkan tahẽkanre mitʼṭen kạ̃ṛmĩ sãotele ńapamena. Uni do mitʼṭen bạṛicʼ jiue ńamakawan tahẽkante darakan dinko reakʼ sanamakʼe lại daṛeakʼkan tahẽkana. Onate acʼren kisạ̃ṛakʼ do ạḍi lab hoyokʼkantae tahẽkana.
Uni kạ̃ṛmĩ do Pạul ar ale tayom tayomte hijukʼte hohoateye menetʼ tahẽkana, “Nukin hoṛ do maraṅ Isorren guti kanakin. Ar cetʼlekate kại khon bańcao ńamokʼa onagekin lạiape kana.”

Uni do ḍher din hạbicʼe nonka idikeda. Mucạtʼre Pạul doe ạṛisen khan beṅgetʼ ạcurkate uni bạṛicʼ jiue metadea, “Jisu Mạsi ńutumteń hukumam kana, nui khon oḍok calakʼme.” Ar unrege uni bạṛicʼ jiu do uni khone oḍok calaoena.
Ado rojgar cabayena menteko ńelketʼ khan uni kuṛiren kisạ̃ṛko do Pạul ar Silạs sapʼkate nagraharen mukhiyạ ṭhenko or idiketʼkinạ.
Ona tayom disạm cakʼlaoicʼ ṭhen idiketʼkinteko menkeda, “Nukin hoṛ do aboakʼ nagrahare gulmalkin ehopʼakada. Nukin dokin Jihudi kana.
Nukin do nonkan ạri-cạli reaṅ kin cetʼako kana okaṭakʼ do Romiko hoekate abo lạgitʼ ataṅ se batao do ạn birud kạmi kana.”
Ado eṭakʼ hoṛko hõ onko sãote mitʼkate Pạul ar Silạs birudreko teṅgoyena. Unre disạm cakʼlaoicʼ doe hukumkeda unkinakʼ kicricʼ jemonko oṛejtạkin arko dalkin.
Onko do kajak dalko dalketʼkinte hajotreko bhoraokatʼkinạ, ar kajakte pahrae lạgitʼ hajotren darogako hukumadea.
Ar daroga do noa hukume ńamketʼ khan hajot reakʼ bhitri kandhareye idiketʼkinạ ar hạṛi paṭate jaṅgae aṭkaokatʼ tạkina.
Un jokhecʼ do tala ńindạ okte tahẽkana. Pạul ar Silạs do Isorkin sarhaoedekan tahẽkana arkin koejoṅkan tahẽkana. Ar eṭakʼ kạidiko hõ onako ańjomkan tahẽkana.
Unre ackage ạḍi botor dhạrti laṛaoena onate hajot oṛakʼ reakʼ rehetʼko sudhạ dal dalaoena. Ar hajot oṛakʼ reakʼ sanam silpińko jhicʼtʼena ar kạidikoakʼ sikṛiko hõ raṛayena.
Unre hajot oṛakʼren daroga doe ebhenena ar hajot oṛakʼ reakʼ silpińko jhicʼgeye ńelketʼ khan tarwaṛe bocʼkate acʼte gujukʼe menana. Uni doe hudiskeda sanam kạidikoko dạṛ cabakeda.
Unre Pạul do ãṭ aṛaṅte hohoateye metadea, “Thirokʼme, jiwi do alom loksantama; ale sanamkoge nonḍe menakʼlea.”
Unre daroga do mitʼ hoṛ diuhe ạguye metadea ar acʼ do bhitriteye ńir boloyena ar botorte thar tharaokʼkan tulucʼ Pạul ar Silạs tạkinakʼ jaṅgareye giḍiyena.
Ona tayom uni do Pạul ar Silạs tạkin bahreteye oḍok ạguketʼkinteye kuliketʼkina, “Ma lạiyạń ben, kại khon bańcao ńam lạgitʼ do cetʼ cekae hoyokʼ tińạ?”
Adokin metadea, “Am ar amakʼ gharońjrenko Probhu Jisure pạtiạukʼpe, enḍekhan kại khon bańcaope ńama.”
Unre Pạul ar Silạs do daroga ar uniakʼ oṛakʼren sanamko Probhuakʼ kathakin galmaraoatʼkoa.
Ar inạ ńindạge daroga do Pạul ar Silạse idiketʼkinte unkinakʼ hoṛmo reakʼ ghạlkoe ạrupʼketʼ tạkina, ar acʼ gharońjren sanamkoko bạptisena.
Ona tayom uni do acʼakʼ oṛakʼte Pạul ar Silạse idiketʼkinte unkine jom-ńũ ocoketʼkinạ. Ar acʼ gharońjrenko do Isorreko biswạsente ạḍitetʼko rạskạyena.
Dosar hilokʼ setakʼ jokhecʼ hạkimko do akoren kạmiyạko hoteteko roṛgotʼkada “Unkin hoṛ do aṛakʼ kạkinpe.”
Unre daroga do Pạule metadea, “Disạm cakʼlaoicʼ do Silạs ar am aṛakʼ ben lạgitʼe roṛgotʼ akada. Onate ma ńitokʼ do oḍokokʼ ben ar sulukte calao joṅben.”

Unre Pạul do onko kạmiạkoe metatʼkoa, “Ạliń do Romi hoṛ kanaliń, ar begor bicạr dusite hoṛko samaṅreko dalketʼlińạ ar hajotreko bhoraokatʼlińạ. Ar ńitokʼ disạm cakʼlaoicʼ do hape hapete aṛakʼgotʼ kạlińe menjoṅ kana? Ona do baṅ hoyokʼa; onkoge apnarte hecʼkateko oḍok idi lińma.”
Unre onko kạmiyạko do noa katha hạkimkoko baḍae ocoketʼkoa. Ar onko hạkimko do Romi hoṛ kanakin menteko baḍaeketʼ khan botor hecʼatʼkoa.
Onko do Pạul ar Silạs ṭhen senkate ikạko koekeda ar hajot oṛakʼ khonko oḍok ketʼkinte nagraha bạgiyakʼ lạgitʼko nehõratʼkinạ.
Pạul ar Silạs do hajot oṛakʼ khonkin oḍoken khan Ludiạwakʼ oṛakʼtekin senena. Onḍe unkin do biswạsi boehako sãotekin ńapamena. Ar boehakokin udgạuketʼkote onḍe khonkin calaoena.
Pạul ar Silạs do Amphipolis ar Appoloniạ nagraha talate Thessalonikiạ nagrahatekin calaoena. Onḍe do Jihudikoakʼ mitʼṭen sunạgog tahẽkana.
Pạul do acʼakʼ cạli leka ona sunạgogteye boloyena ar pe jirạukʼ mãhãre sonot sostor khon hoṛkoe galmaraoatʼkoa.
Uni doe bujhạuatʼkoa are sạbudkeda je, Mạsi do duk jojom ar gocʼko khon jiwetʼ beredokʼ reakʼ jạruṛ tahẽkantaea. Uni doe metatʼkoa, “Ape ṭhen okoe Jisu reakʼ kathań lạiyetʼkan uni kangeae Mạsi do.”
Noa katha ańjomkate adom Jihudiko doko pạtiạuente Pạul ar Silạs tạkin sãoteko mitʼena. Ona chaḍa Isor botorae aema Junạniko ar bhodro maejiuko hõ unkin sãoteko mitʼena.

Menkhan Jihudiko do hiskạte bajar khon adom bạṛicʼ hoṛko ńam jarwaketʼkote nagrahare gulmalko ehopʼkeda. Ona tayom Pạul ar Silạs ńamkate hoṛko ṭhen ạgukin lạgitʼ onko do Jasonakʼ oṛakʼre jhapko emkeda,

menkhan unkin do onḍe bako ńamletʼkina. Unre onko do Jason ar adom biswạsi boehako or oḍok idikate nagraha cakʼlaoko ṭhenko idiketʼkoa ar hohoateko menkeda, “Okoe hoṛ goṭa dhạrtiko gulmaletʼ onko do ńitokʼ nonḍe hõko hecʼakana;
ar Jason do acʼakʼ oṛakʼre jaegae emakatʼkoa. Ar onko do sanamkoge Kạisạrakʼ hukum birudko kạmikana, arko meneda, uni chaḍa Jisu ńutumanicʼ ar mitʼṭen raj menaea.”
Noako menketʼte onko Jihudiko do nagraha cakʼlaoko ar hoṛkoko toras ocoketʼkoa.
Menkhan Jason ar eṭakʼko do jạmin reakʼ ṭakako emketʼ khan doko aṛakʼkatʼkoa.
Ńindạyen khan biswạsi boehako do Pạul ar Silạs tạkin Beroeateko kolkatʼkinạ. Unkin do onḍe seṭerkate Jihudikoakʼ sunạgogtekin boloyena.

Thessalonikiạren Jihudi khon Beroea nagraharen Jihudikoakʼ mon do bạ̃ṛti soṛage tahẽkantakoa. Onko do khaṛa monte Isorakʼ katha ańjomkateko ataṅkeda. Ar Pạul okae menakatʼ ona do sạri kana se baṅ ona ńel lạgitʼ dinạm hilokʼ sostorko ḍunḍhạuetʼkan tahẽkana.
Unre ạḍi utạr Jihudiko do Jisureko pạtiạuena; ona chaḍa aema bhodro Junạni maejiuko ar herel hoponko hõko pạtiạuena.
Thessalonikiạren Jihudiko do Pạul Beroeare Isorakʼ kathae porcareda menteko ańjomketʼ khan onko do onḍeko calaoena ar onḍenko hoṛko ạulạuketʼkote gulmalko hoe ocokeda.
Unre biswạsi boehako do jalapuri aṛe secʼ Pạulko kolgotʼkadea, menkhan Silạs ar Timothi do Beroea regekin tahẽyena.

Ar okoeko hoṛ do soṅgete Pạulko idiyede tahẽkan onko do Athens hạbicʼko ạgu seṭerkadea. Ona tayom onko do Silạs ar Timothi lạgitʼ noa hukumante Beroeateko ruạṛ calaoena je, Silạs ar Timothi do senkate usạra jemon Pạul sãotekin midokʼ.
Pạul do Athens nagrahare Silạs ar Timothiye tạṅgiyetʼkin tahẽkanre ona nagraha do boṅga murtikote perecʼ akane ńelkeda. Onate uniakʼ mon do ạḍi jal jalaoentaea.
Uni do sunạgogre Jihudiko ar Isor botoraekan Junạniko tulucʼ galmaraoe ehopʼena. Ona chaḍa bajarte okoekoko hijukʼkan tahẽkan, onko tulucʼ hõ din ke dine galmaraokan tahẽkana.

Unre Epikuri ar Stoik ponḍitko modren adomko do Pạul tulucʼ reṭepeṭekʼko ehopʼena. Onko modren adomkoko menkeda, “Nui galbạjạriạ do cetʼe menetʼkana?” Arhõ eṭakʼko doko menkeda, “Uni do pasecʼ ạnạṛi boṅgako reakʼ kathae porcareda.” Onko do noa iạtegeko menkeda, ente Pạul do Jisu reaṅ ar gocʼko khon jewetʼ beredokʼ reaṅe porcarako kan tahẽkana.
Unre onko guruko do Areopagos reakʼ bạisi samaṅre Pạulko idikedea. Arko kulikedea, “Okaṭakʼ nawa sikhnạtem emokʼkan ona do cetʼ le baḍae daṛekea?
Ente adomakʼko nonkam galmaraoale kana one oka do ạnạṛigele ańjometʼ. Onate baḍae sanayetʼlea onako reakʼ mane do cetʼkana mente.”
Onko do noa iạtegeko menkeda, ente Athensren sanam hoṛko ar ona nagrahare okoe upriạko tahẽkan onko do nawa nawanakʼ babotre katha roṛ ar ańjomte okteko khemaoetʼ tahẽkana.
Unre Pạul do Areopagos reakʼ bạisire teṅgoyenteye menkeda, “E Athens nagraharen hoṛko ańjompe. Iń doń ńeletʼ kana, ape do joto secʼ khonge deb manaoko kanape,

ente ińiń dãṛã baṛaekan tahẽkanre apeakʼ sewa jiniskoń ạribạndhiyetʼ tahẽkana ar nonkan mitʼṭen pinḍ hõń ńamkeda one ona cetanre ol akan, ‘Baṅ baḍae akadeicʼ deb lạgitʼ.’ Ar ape do bin baḍaete okoepe sewawaekan uni reaṅge iń doń porcarape kana.
“Isor, one uni dhạrti ar onare menakʼ jotowakʼe benao akatʼ, unige serma ar dhạrtiren Probhu kanae. Uni do tite benaoakʼ okaṭakʼ mundilre hõ bae tahenkana.
Uni do jãhãn reṅgecʼ bạnukʼtaea, onate manwakoakʼ tite pujạ hatao hõ baṅ jạruṛaea, ente unige sanam manwako jiwi, sahetʼ ar eṭakʼ jotowakʼkoe danako kana.
Uni do mitʼṭen manwa khon sanam jạtren hoṛkoe sirjạu akatʼkoa jemon goṭa dhạrtireko girobasokʼ. Onko do tinre okakoreko girobasokʼa ona hõ acʼakʼ sana lekae goṭa dohoakada.
Isor do noae kạmikeda jemon manwako ṭamḍạuate uniko ńam baṛaye. Menkhan sạrige abo khon sạṅgińre do bạnuia,
ente uniakʼ daṛetege jion bon khemaoeda arbon dãṛãn kana ar jiwetʼ hõ menakʼ bona. Aperen adom sereń joṛaokoko menakada, ‘abon hõ uniren hoponko kana bon.’
“Enḍekhan uniren hoponkan khan bon Isor do manwa reakʼ kạrigol ar hudis bundiskote benao akatʼ sona, rupạ se dhiriren murti leka hudise do lek baṅkan tabona.
Ente sedaeren hoṛ do bako baḍaekan tahẽkante Isor do noako secʼ bae beṅgetʼletʼa. Menkhan ńitokʼ uni do sanam jaegare joto hoṛge kại khon mon ạcur lạgitʼe hukumako kana,

ente uni do nonkan mitʼṭen dine nenḍa akada one ona dinre acʼe bahal akade mitʼṭen hoṛ hotete manwako dhoromteye bicạrko. Uni do gocʼko khone jiwetʼ beretʼ akadete sanam manwako ṭhen noae sạbud akada.”
Ado gocʼko arhõko jiwetʼ beredokʼa menteko ańjomketʼ khan onko modren adomko doko cigạriadea, menkhan eṭakʼko doko menkeda, “Ale do noa reaṅ arhõle ańjoma.”
Unre Pạul do ona bạisi khone oḍok calaoena.
Ar unre adomko hoṛ doko Pạul secʼena arko pạtiạuena. Onko biswạsiko modre Areaopagosren Dionusios ar Damaris ńutuman mitʼṭen maejiu hõe tahẽkana, ar unkin sãote arhõko tahẽkana.
Niạ tayom Pạul do Athens khone oḍok senente Korinth nagrahateye calaoena.

Onḍe do Akuilạ ńutuman mitʼṭen Jihudi sãoteye ńapamena. Nui Akuilạ do Pontus disạmreye janamlena. Maharaj Klạudius do sanam Jihudiko Rom khon oḍok calakʼ lạgitʼe hukumatʼko tahẽkana. Onate thoṛa din lahare Akuilạ do acʼren bạhu Priskillạ soṅgekate Itạliạ khon Korinth nagrahateye hecʼakan tahẽkana. Ar Pạul do unkin ṭhene calaoena.
Uni do unkin leka tạmbu benao kạmiye baḍaekan tahẽkante unkin sãote tahẽkate kạmiye dhurạuena.
Ar jao jirạukʼ mãhãre Pạul do sunạgogre bolokate Jisu reaṅe galmarao akokan tahẽkana ar Junạni ar Jihudiko Jisuakʼ horte ạguko lạgitʼe kurumuṭuyetʼ tahẽkana.
Silạs ar Timothi Makedoniạ khonkin hecʼen khan Pạul do eken Isorakʼ katha porcarte acʼakʼ okteko khemaoe ehopʼena. Uni do Jihudiko ṭhen Jisuge Mạsi kanae mente gohae emetʼ tahẽkana.

Menkhan Jihudiko do tinre Pạul birudre katha roṛ ar uni opomaneko ehopʼena unre Pạul do onko birudre acʼakʼ kicricʼkoe koṭakeda are metatʼkoa, “Apeakʼ mãyãm do apeakʼ bohokʼrege paṛaokʼma. Noa babotre ińakʼ jãhãn dos do bạnukʼtińạ. Ńit khon iń do boṅgan hoṛ jạtrenko ṭheniń calakʼa.”

Inạ tayom Pạul do sunạgogre bạgikate Titus Jusṭu ńutuman mitʼṭen hoṛakʼ oṛakʼteye boloyena. Uni hoṛakʼ oṛakʼ do sunạgog sorrege tahẽkana ar boṅgan hoṛ jạtrene tahẽkanre hõ uni do Isore sewawaekan tahẽkana.
Sunạgogren mukhiyạ Krispus ar acʼ gharońjren sanamkoge Probhureko pạtiạuena. Ona chaḍa Korinthiko modren ḍherkoge Pạulakʼ katha ańjomkateko pạtiạuena ar bạptismako ataṅkeda.
Mitʼ din ńindạ jokhecʼ Probhu do mitʼṭen dorson hotete Pạul noa kathae metadea, “Alom botorokʼa, katha roroṛtege tahenme, alom thir hapekokʼa;
ente iń do am sãote minạńa. Amre jhãp emkate okoe hõ ohoko hạnlema, ente noa nagrahare ạḍi utạr hoṛ menakʼkotińa.”
Onate Pạul do mitʼ bochor turui cando ona nagrahare tahẽkate hoṛko Isorakʼ kathae cetʼatʼkoa.
Ado Gallio tinre Akhaearen disạm cakʼlaoicʼ tahẽkana unre Jihudiko do jomkao mitʼkate Pạulko sapʼkedea ar bicạre lạgitʼ adalotteko ạgukedea.
Onkoko menkeda, “Nui hoṛ do Isor sewawae lạgitʼ nonkae ạnḍicʼetʼkoa one oka do ạn-ạri birudkan.”
Ado Pạul kathae roṛ lạgidokʼkan tahẽkanre Gallio do Jihudikoe metatʼkoa, “E Jihudiko, jãhãn behokakʼ se jãhãn dusiakʼ tahentape khan jạruṛgeń ańjomketapea.
Menkhan jãhãnakʼ katha reakʼ, jãhãeakʼ ńutum reakʼ ar apeakʼ ạn-ạriko babot reakʼ kan khan, enḍekhan apetege phanḍaope baṛe. Onako babot reakʼ do bạń bicạrkatapea.”
Noa katha menkate uni do adalot khon oḍokko lạgitʼe hukumkeda.
Unre Jihudiko do sunạgogren mukhiyạ Sosthenesko sapʼkedete adalot samaṅregeko dalkedea; menkhan Gallio do cetʼge bae mẽtʼ luturada.

Pạul do ḍher din Korinthreye khemaoketʼ khan biswạsi boehako ṭhen khon bidạye hataokeda ar Akuilạ ar Priskillạ sãote jahajte Siriạ disạme hecʼena. Pạul do mitʼṭecʼe goṭa dohoakatʼ tahẽkante mohnḍakʼ lahare Kenkhreare uni doe hoyo munḍrạyena.
Ar Ephesus nagrahae seṭeren khan Priskillạ ar Akuilạ doe bạgiatʼkinạ. Ar sunạgogre bolokate Jihudiko sãote apnarge Jisu reaṅ galmaraoakoe ehopʼena.
Unre Jihudiko ako sãote thoṛa din tahen lạgitʼko nehõradea, menkhan uni do tahen bae rebenlena.
Menkhan onḍe khon calakʼ jokhecʼ uni doe metatʼkoa, “Isorakʼ sana hoelen khan iń do arhõń ruạṛ hijukʼa.” Ar ona tayom uni do Ephesus khon jahajteye mohnḍayena.
Ado Kạisạriạ nagrahateye seṭeren khan jahaj khon pheḍekate uni do Jerusalemteye calaoena. Ar onḍe manḍerren hoṛkoe joharatʼko tayom uni do Antiokiạteye senena.
Antiokiạre thoṛa din khemaokate onḍe khone mohnḍayente Galatiạ ar Phorugiạ Prodesh reakʼ mitʼ jaega khon eṭakʼ jaegae dãṛãketʼte celakoakʼ pạtiạue kajakketʼtakoa.

Niạ oktere Apollos ńutuman mitʼṭen Jihudi do Ephesusteye hecʼena. Uniakʼ oṛakʼ do Alekasndriạ nagrahare tahẽkana. Uni do katha roroṛe mitʼṭen gạkhuṛ hoṛe tahẽkana ar sonot sostor hõ bes okocʼteye baḍaekan tahẽkana.

Uni do Probhuakʼ hor reaṅ sikhnạte ńamakatʼ tahẽkana. Ar ạḍi mon lagaokate kathae roṛetʼ tahẽkana ar Jisu reaṅ ṭhiktegeye cetʼakokan tahẽkana, menkhan Johanakʼ bạptisma chaḍa ar eṭakʼ bạptisma reakʼ katha uni do bae baḍaekan tahẽkana.

Uni do ạḍi dil salakʼ sunạgogre katha roroṛe ehopʼena. Unre Priskilla ar Akuilạ do Apollosakʼ kathakin ańjomketʼ khan ạkinakʼ oṛakʼtekin neota kedea ar Isorakʼ hor reakʼakʼko reaṅ arhõ mońjtekin bujhạuadea.

Ar Apollos do Akhaeate calakʼe monean khan Ephesusren biswạsi boehako do udgạuko emadea. Ar Akhaearen celako jemon Apollosko ataṅe onate Ephesusren boehako do Akhaeate ciṭhiko olkeda. Isorakʼ dayate Akhaeare okoekoko pạtiạulen onḍe Apollose seṭeren khan uni do ạḍiye goṛowatʼkoa.
Uni do sonot sostor khone sạbudkeda Jisu kangeae Mạsi do ar sanamko samaṅre ạḍi jothat reakʼe lạiatʼkote Jihudikoe bhagaoketʼkoa.
