Unre Pạule metatʼkoa, “Enḍekhan okaṭakʼ bạptismape ńamleda?” Adoko metadea, “Johanakʼ bạptismage.”

Khan Pạule metatʼkoa, “Kại khon mon ạcurkate okaṭakʼ bạptisma ataṅokʼ, ona do Johanakʼ bạptisma kana. Johan do hoṛkoe metatʼko tahẽkana, acʼ tayomte okoeye daraekan unire, metakʼme Jisure jemonko pạtiạukʼ.”
Ado noa katha ańjomkate onko celako do Probhu Jisu ńutumte bạptismako ataṅkeda.
Ar Pạul do onkoe capoketʼko khan onkore sonot Jiue hecʼena, ar onko do eṭakʼ eṭakʼ pạrsite roroṛkan ar nạbi leka Isorakʼ katha lạlạiko ehopʼena.
Onko celako do lekhare gelbar goṭenko tahẽkana.
Inạ tayom Pạul do sunạgogkoteye boloyena ar pe cando hạbicʼ dil salakʼ kathakoe galmaraoatʼkoa. Uni do Isorakʼ raj reaṅakʼko khode khod galmaraoatʼkote biswạs janam ocoetako lạgitʼe kurumuṭukeda.

Menkhan onko modren adomkoakʼ mon do goṛdhoge tahẽkante bako pạtiạulena ar sanamko samaṅre Jisuakʼ hor reaṅ ạḍi leka opomanko ehopʼena. Unre Pạul do onko bạgiatʼkoteye calaoena. Uni do celakoe soṅgeketʼkote Turanus ńutuman mitʼṭen iskulre senkate dinạm hilokʼe lại bujhạuako kan tahẽkana.
Ado bar bochor hạbicʼ onkage hoe idiyena. Onate okoe Jihudi ar Junạniko Asiạ Prodesreko tahẽkan onko sanamkoge Probhuakʼ kathako ańjomkeda.
Ar Isor do Pạul hotete ạḍi hahaṛa hahaṛawakʼ kạmikoe ehopʼkeda.
Uniakʼ gamcha ar oyonakʼ rugiko ṭhenko idiyetʼ tahẽkanre onkoakʼ ruạ do bogekʼkan tahẽkana ar bạṛicʼ jiuko hõko oḍok calakʼkan tahẽkana.

Ar adom Jihudiko hõ jhaṛ ar husitʼte bạṛicʼ jiukoko oḍok giḍiyetʼko tahẽkana. Onko do Probhu Jisu ńutumte bạṛicʼ jiu capaṛ akawatʼ hoṛko bogeko reakʼ kurumuṭuko ehopʼena. Onkoko menetʼ tahẽkana, “Pạul okoe reaṅe porcaretʼkan, uni Jisu ńutumte oḍok calakʼ iń hukumam kana.”
Onko modre Skewa ńutuman mitʼṭen Jihudikoren maraṅ naekeren eae goṭen koṛa do onkako kạmikan tahẽkana.
Ado mitʼ dhaoko onkayetʼkan tahẽkanre bạṛicʼ jiu do onkoe metatʼkoa, “Iń do Jisu hõń baḍae akadea ar Pạul hõń oromakadea, menkhan ape dope okoe kana?”
Ar okoe hoṛ bạṛicʼ jiue sapʼakade tahẽkan uni do onko eae boehako cetanreye don ladeyente nonkae ghạlketʼkoa je, onko do ghạl akan koṭoge ona oṛakʼ khonko dạṛkeda.
Ado noa khobor Ephesusre girobas akan Jihudi ar Junạnikoko baḍaeketʼ khan sanamkoge ạḍiko botorena ar Probhu Jisuakʼ ńutum do maraṅentaea.
Ar okoe do Probhu Jisureko pạtiạu akan tahẽkan nonka ḍher hoṛge hecʼkate akoakʼ bạṛicʼ kạmi reaṅ sodorteko aṅgockeda.

Ar okoe do jạduko udukʼ baṛayetʼ tahẽkan onko modren ḍher hoṛge akoakʼ puthiko jarwakate jotoko samaṅre onako jeretʼ giḍikada. Ona puthi reakʼ dam hisạbkate ńelena ona reakʼ dam do mõṛẽ gel hajar Dinar.
Nonkate Probhuakʼ katha do pasnao idiyena ar hoṛkoakʼ monre uniakʼ daṛe do arhõ bạ̃ṛti kạmiye ehopʼkeda.
Ado noako hoe baṛayen khan Pạul do Makedoniạ ar Akhaea secʼte Jerusalemte calakʼ reakʼe goṭawana. Uni doe menkeda, “Jerusalemte calao tayom iń do Rom nagrahate hõ calakʼ hoyokʼ tińạ.
Tayomte Timothi ar Erastus ńutuman acʼren barea goṛokin do Makedoniạteye kolketʼkinạ, ar acʼ do arhõ thoṛa din Asiạreye tahẽyena.
Ona jokhecʼ Jisuakʼ hortetʼ babotre ạḍi gulmal ehopʼena.
Demetrius ńutuman mitʼṭen sonhar do Artemis reakʼ mundil leka huḍiń huḍiń rupạ reakʼ mundilkoe benaoetʼ tahẽkana. Ar nonkate kạrigolkoakʼ ạḍi lab hoyokʼkan tahẽkana.
Demetrius do onko kạrigolko ar onko lekan eṭakʼkoe jarwaketʼkoteye metatʼkoa, “E boehako, ape dope baḍaegea je, abo do noa kạmitege bon ạsulokʼ kana.

Menkhan ape hõpe ńeletʼkana arpe ańjometʼgea, Pạul ńutuman uni hoṛ do aboakʼ noa Ephesusre ar goṭa Asiạ Prodesren ḍher hoṛkoe biswạs ocoyetʼkote bhul horteye idiyetʼkoa. Uni doe metako kana tite benaoetʼko deb-debi do cele hõko baṅkana.

Noate eken aboakʼ ạsulokʼakʼ rojgar cabakʼa ona do baṅ, bickom maraṅ debi Artemis reakʼ mundil hõ ạuṛiagokʼa. Ar Asiạ disạmren sanam hoṛko, se dhạrtiren sanamkoge okoe debko sewawaekan uni hõ maraṅ do bae tahena.”
Noa kathako ańjomketʼ khan onko do edreteko perecʼena ar ãṭ aṛaṅte memenko ehopʼena, “Ephesuskoren Artemis debgeye maraṅa.”

Ar goṭa nagraha do usạra ạulạu cabayena. Unre Gạius ar Aristarkhos ńutuman Makedoniạren okoekin hoṛ do Pạul sãotekin calakʼkan tahẽkan, hoṛko do unkinko sapʼketʼkinạ ar sanamkoge bạisiteko gad gadao boloyena.
Pạul do ṭhạurạ akan hoṛko ṭhen senokʼe menleda, menkhan celako do bako sen ocoadea.
Ona disạmren adom raj kạmiyạko do Pạulren gateko tahẽkana. Onko hõ Pạul ṭhen khoborko kolketʼte uniko nehõradea jemon bạisite aloe calakʼ.
Ar inạkʼtege bạisire gulmal ehopʼena. Unre adomko do mitʼ leka ar adomko do eṭakʼ lekako hohoyetʼ tahẽkana. Ar ḍher hoṛge bako baḍaekan tahẽkana cedakʼ bạisireko hecʼakana mente.
Khange Jihudiko do Aleksander samaṅ secʼko ṭhelao idikede khan, cetʼe roṛa mente adom hoṛko lạiadea. Unre Aleksander do katha roṛ lạgitʼ titeye isạrawatʼkote thirokʼ lạgitʼe kurumuṭukeda.
Menkhan hoṛko do Aleksander Jihudi kanae menteko baḍaeketʼ khan sanamkoge mitʼ sãote bar ghonṭa ganko hohokeda, “Ephesuskoren Artemis debgeye maraṅa”

Ado mucạtʼre nagraharen mitʼṭen sorkari kạmiạyicʼ do hoṛkoe thir ocoketʼkoteye metatʼkoa, “E Ephesusren hoṛko, noa katha do sanam hoṛgeko baḍaea baṅma, maraṅ Artemis debakʼ mundil ar Jupiter khon uniakʼ oka muṭhạn ńur akan onaren rukhiyạko do Ephesus nagraharenge.
Ar noa katha sạri kana mentepe aṅgoc khan lelhako leka kạmi baṅkate thir hapekokʼge lek tapea.
Ente nukin hoṛ do aboakʼ mundil khon kombṛo hõ bạkin kombṛo akada ar aboren deb hõ bạkin neṅghao akadea, enhõ nukin hoṛ do nonḍepe ạguakatʼkinạ.
Ado Demetrius ar uni sãoten kạrigolko do jãhãe birudre jãhãn katha menakʼtako khan enḍekhan kacahạrima jhicʼge ar hạkimko hõ coṅ menakʼkoge. Onate onko do onḍeko mambla daṛeakʼa.
Menkhan arhõ jãhãnakʼ bạ̃ṛti roṛpe menetʼ khan ona do ạn bandhao bạisire chinḍạu hoyokʼtapea.
Teheńakʼ gulmal babotre abo cetanrege dos paṛaokʼ reakʼ botor menakʼa. Ar nonkage hoelen khan noa gulmal reakʼ cetʼ karonge babon udukʼ daṛeakʼa, ente noa gulmal reakʼ do jãhãn karonge bạnukʼa.”
Ado nonkae roṛketʼ khan uni do jarwa akan hoṛkoe bidạkatʼkoa.
Gulmalko thiren khan Pạul do celakoe hoho ạguketʼkoa. Ar onkoe udgạuketʼko khan onko ṭhen khon bidạ hataokate uni do Makedoniạ secʼe mohnḍayena.
Ado Beroearen Puros hopon Sopatros, Thessoloniki khon Aristarkhos ar Sekundus, Derberen Gaius, Timothi ar Asiạ khon Tukhikus ar Trophimus noko hõ Pạul sãoteko calaoena.
Nokoko hoṛ do lahare senkate Troas nagrahare ale lạgitʼko tạṅgi akatʼ tahẽkana.
Ar bin khamianakʼ piṭhạ porob tayom ale do Philipi khon jahajtele mohnḍayena ar mõṛẽ din tayom onko sãote Troasrele ńapamena. Ar Troasre ale do eae dinle tahẽkana.

Ado hapta reakʼ pạhil din Probhuakʼ bhoj ataṅ lạgitʼ ale do mitʼ ṭhenle jarwayena. Unre Pạul do hoṛko porcarakoe ehopʼena. Uni do dosar hilokʼ calakʼ reakʼ katha tahẽkantaete tala ńindạ hạbicʼe galmarao idikeda.
Ale do cetan koṭha reakʼ oka kandharele jarwa akan tahẽkan onḍe do ạḍi utạr diuhe tahẽkana.

Ar Euthukus ńutuman mitʼṭen juạn koṛa do ona oṛakʼ reakʼ khiṛki cetanreye duṛupʼ akan tahẽkana. Ado Pạul ạḍi ghạṛicʼe galmaraoetʼ kan tahẽkante uni do dudṛumkedeteye jạpitʼkeda. Are jạpitʼ lạthiạuen khan pe tala khon latarteye ńurhạyena ar gocʼgeko tul rakapʼkedea.
Unre Pạul do latarteye pheḍena ar uni koṛa taber loṭomkedeteye metatʼkoa, “Alope botorokʼa, uni do jiwetʼge menaea.”
Inạ tayom Pạul do arhõ cetan kandhate rakapʼkate Probhuakʼ bhoje ataṅkeda ar ạḍi ghạṛicʼ aṅga marsalokʼ hạbicʼe galmaraoatʼko tayom uni doe calaoena.
Ar hoṛko do uni koṛa jiwetʼge oṛakʼteko idikedea ar ạḍi jiwi raṛecʼko ńamkeda.

Ale do lahare senkate jahajre decʼkate Assos bondor secʼle monḍhayena. Onḍe khon ale do Pạul deje reakʼ katha tahẽkantalea. Uni do onkageye metatʼle tahẽkana, ente taṛam horte onḍe calakʼe goṭawan tahẽkana.
Ado Assosrele ńapamkede khan uni do jahajrele decʼkedea ar Mitulenetele hecʼena.
Dosar hilokʼ ale do onḍe khon mohnḍakate Khios diprele seṭerena. Ar tesar hilokʼ do doreão paromkate Samos diptele calaoena. Inạ tayom din do Miletus bondortele seṭerena.

Asiạ Prodeshre Pạul jemon aloe bilomokʼ onate uni do Ephesusre teṅgo baṅkate ona aṛete parom calakʼe goṭa akatʼ tahẽkana. Uni do Jerusalemte seṭerokʼ lạgitʼe usạrayetʼ tahẽkana jemon hoedaṛeakʼ khan penṭekosṭ hilokʼ do onḍeye tahẽdaṛeakʼ.
Pạul do Miletus khon Ephesuste hoṛ kolkate ona manḍerren murubikoe hoho ạgu ocoketʼkoa.
Ado onko onḍeko seṭeren khan Pạul do onkoe metatʼkoa, “Asiạ disạmreń hecʼen pạhil din khon ape sãote jaoge cetʼ lekań khemaoletʼ ona dope baḍaegea.
Jihudikoakʼ ạḍi lekan phor phundi iạte bạṛicʼ biḍạukoreń paṛaolena, menkhan iń do nindhạn monte mẽtʼ dakʼ joro jorote Probhuren sapʼ dapʼicʼiń hoeakana.
Apeakʼ okaṭakʼte porhoanakʼ hoyokʼ nonkan jãhãnakʼge ape baḍae ocope lạgitʼ do bạń pạclena, bickom bahrere sodorte apeakʼ oṛakʼreń cetʼakawatʼpea ariń porcar akada.
Jihudi ar Junạniko ṭhen iń do jorkateń lại akada je, kại khon mon ạcurkate onko do Isor secʼ ruạṛokʼ hoyokʼtakoa ar Probhu Jisure biswạsokʼ jạruṛtakoa.
“Sonot Jiureń tolakante iń do ńitokʼ Jerusalemiń calakʼ kana. Onḍe iń cetanre cetʼ hoyokʼa ona do bạń baḍaea.
Eken niạ kathań baḍaea, sonot Jiu do sanam nagrahare noa kathae baḍae ocoyediń kana je, hajotokʼ ar duk jojom hoyokʼtińạ.

Menkhan iń ṭhen do ińakʼ jiwi reakʼ jãhãn dam bạnukʼa. Ińakʼ sana do noage, jemon mucạtʼ hạbicʼ iń ṭarhao daṛeakʼ, metakʼme Probhu Jisu oka kạmi lạgitʼ dạyike emakawạdiń ona jemoniń purạu daṛeakʼ. Ona kạmi do hoyokʼ kana Isorakʼ daya reaṅ bhage sombat reakʼ goha emokʼge.
“Iń do ńitokʼ noa kathań baḍaea je, ape okoeko ṭhen senkate Isorakʼ rajosṭi reakʼ iń porcar akatʼ onko okoege iń do ar bako ńeleńa.
Onate teheń pusṭạuteń lạiape kana, iń do okoeakʼ mãyãm reakʼ hõ dạyik doń baṅkana,
ente Isor okae khojkan ona baḍae ocope do tishõ bạń pạc akana.

Ape do apnar lạgitʼ sontor akae tahenpe, ar okoe sonot Jiu biswạsikoren horhoyicʼ lekate ape cetanreye emakan onko lạgitʼ hõ sontor akae tahenpe. Gupiyicʼ do cetʼleka acʼakʼ palren bhiḍikoe ńel todarotetʼko onkage ape hõ Isorakʼ manḍerko ńel todarotpe. Ente Isor do acʼakʼ mãyãmte onako manḍerre kirińakada.
Ińiń baḍaea je, iń sen tayom hoṛko do hunḍạr leka ape talareko hijukʼa ar palren bhiḍikoko loksankoa.
Ape bhitriko khon hõ hoṛko teṅgonte Isorakʼ sạriakʼtetʼ do eṛeteakʼ benaoko kurumuṭuya jemon pạtiạu akanko ako secʼko or idi daṛeako.
Onate ape do sontor akae tahenpe. Disạipe, pe bochor khon siń ńindạ mẽtʼ dakʼ joro joroteń sontor akatʼpea, ar tisge bạń thirakana.

‘‘Menkhan ńitokʼ do Isor ar uniakʼ kathareń jimạkape kana. Isorakʼ katha do uniakʼ daya reaṅe roṛa, ar apeko benao rakapʼpe reakʼ daṛe hõ ona katharege menakʼa. Ona chaḍa Isor do acʼren hoṛko lạgitʼ okae dohoakatʼ ona katha do apeko hõe em daṛeapea.
Jãhãekoakʼ sona, rupạ se kicricʼ khạnḍwạkʼ cetanre iń do bạń lalocakana.
Ape dope baḍaegea, noa banar ti do ińakʼ ar ińren sãotenkoakʼ sanam jạruṛokʼakʼe meṭao akada.

Iń okań ceka akatʼ ona sanamakʼge ape koń udukʼakatʼpea je, nonkan kajak khaṭao hotete nijorko goṛowako do lek kana ar Probhu Jisuakʼ noa katha jemon disạ dohokʼ baṅma, ‘hatao khon emokʼrege bickom ḍher bhor do ńamokʼa.’”
Noa katha menkate Pạul do sanamko sãote ikhṛumenteye koekeda.
Ar manḍerren sanam mukhiyạko do Pạul hạṛupʼ kedeteko cokʼadea ar rarakʼko ehopʼena.
Pạulakʼ mẽtʼãhã ar bako ńel ńam iạte ạḍitetʼko bhabnayena. Ar noa tayom onko do jahaj hạbicʼko koyokʼ gotʼkadea.

Ado Ephesusren mukhiyạko ṭhen khon bidạ hataokate ale do jahajte mitʼ mohnḍa Kos diptele calaoena. Ar dosar hilokʼ do Rhodos diptele hecʼena. Ona tayom onḍe khon Patara nagrahatele calaoena. Onḍe do Phoenikiạte calakʼ lạgitʼ mitʼṭen jahajle ńamkeda.
Unre ale do ona jahajre decʼkatele mohnḍayena.
Kupros diple ńel ńamketʼ khan ona dạkhin secʼte ạcurkate Siriạ Prodes reakʼ Tur nagrahate senkate jahaj khonle pheḍena. Onḍege aleakʼ jahaj reakʼ bojha do pheḍ reakʼ katha tahẽkantalea.
Ado onḍenko celale sendra ńamketʼko khan onko sãote eae dinle tahẽyena. Onko do sonot Jiu hotete Pạulko nehõradea jemon Jerusalemte aloe calakʼ.

Onako din paromen khan ale do onkole bạgiatʼkote aleakʼ hortele mohnḍayena. Unre sanam celako ar onkoren bạhuko ar gidrạko do ale sãote nagraha bahre hạbicʼko oḍok hecʼena. Ar doreão aṛere ikhṛumentele koeyana.
Ona tayom ale do bidạ hataokate jahajrele decʼena ar onko do akoakʼ oṛakʼkoteko ruạṛ calaoena.
Ado Tur khonle mohnḍayente Ptolemaisrele seṭerena. Onḍe do biswạsi boehakole joharatʼkote onko sãote mitʼ dinle tahẽyena.
Dosar hilokʼ dole oḍokente Kạisạriạtele hecʼena ar bhage sombat poporcaricʼ Philipakʼ oṛakʼrele tahẽyena. Uni do Jerusalem manḍerren eae goṭen sapʼ dapʼko modren mitʼ hoṛe tahẽkana.
Uniren do ponea kũạ̃ri kuṛiko tahẽkantaea. Ar onko doko nạbi baṛayetʼ tahẽkana.
Ale do thoṛa din onḍele tahẽyen khan Jihudạ khon Agabus ńutuman mitʼṭen nạbiye hecʼena.

Uni do ale ṭhen hecʼkate Pạulakʼ ḍanḍa paṭheakʼe raṛaketʼtaea ar onate acʼakʼ ti jaṅga tolketʼtaeteye menkeda, “Sonot Jiue meneda, “Jerusalemren Jihudiko do noa paṭheakʼren mạlik hõ nonkageko tolea ar boṅgan hoṛ jạtrenkoakʼ tireko jimạyea.”
Noa kathale ańjomketʼ khan onḍenko hoṛko ar ale hõ Pạul ạḍile nehõradea jemon uni do Jerusalemte aloe calakʼ.
Unre Pạule menkeda, “Rakʼ rakʼte monre cedakʼ dukpe imạń kana? Probhu Jisu lạgitʼ iń do Jerusalemre eken bondi ocokʼ do baṅ, bickom gocʼ ocokʼ hõń sapṛaogea.”
Ado bae rebenlente ale dole thir hapeyena ar tayomtele menkeda, “Probhuakʼ sana lekage baṛe hoyokʼma.”
Niạ tayom moṭra jhoṭra tolkate ale do Jerusalemtele calaoena.

Kạisạriạren adom celako hõ ale sãoteko calaoena ar Manason ńutuman Kupros dipren mitʼ hoṛakʼ oṛakʼteko idiketʼlea. Ar aleakʼ tahen reakʼ katha do uniakʼ oṛakʼrege tahẽkantalea. Uni do pạhil celako modren mitʼ hoṛe tahẽkana.
Ado Jerusalemtele seṭeren khan biswạsi boehako do kusiteko ataṅ daramketʼlea.
Ar dosar hilokʼ Pạul do ale sãote Jakob ńeńele senena. Onḍe do manḍerren sanam murubikoko tahẽkana.
Pạul do onkoe joharatʼkoa ar acʼakʼ porcar talate cetʼleka Isor do boṅgan hoṛ jạtrenko talareye kạmi akada ona sanamakʼe lạiatʼkoa.

Noa kathako ańjomketʼ khan onko murubiko do Isorko sarhaokedea ar Pạulko metadea, “E boeha, am mam ńeletʼkokange, tinạkʼ hajar hajar Jihudiko do Jisureko pạtiạu akana, ar onko sanamkoge Moseakʼ ạn-ạri pańja lạgitʼ ạḍiko ahkaokʼ kana.

Onko do khoborko ańjomakada, boṅgan hoṛ jạtrenko talare okoe Jihudiko menakʼko onko do Mose reakʼ ạn-ạri bạgikate senokʼ reakʼ sikhnạtem memako kana, metakʼme am do onkoren gidrạko bam khatna ocoako kana ar Jihudikoakʼ cạli leka senokʼ hom baronetʼkoa. Ńitokʼ ale do cetʼle cekaya?
Onko do khạṭigeko ańjoma amem hecʼ akana mente.
Onate ńitokʼ okale metam, ona baṛe onkaeme. Ale talare nonkan pon hoṛ menakʼkoa one okoe do mitʼṭenko khạṭi akawan.

Noko hoṛ am sãote iditorakom ar onko soṅgete am hõ saphakʼme ar onkoakʼ bohokʼ upʼ hoyo giḍikatako reakʼ khoroc emokʼme. Unre sanam hoṛko baḍaea daṛeakʼa je, am reaṅ oka khoborko ańjomakatʼ ona do ạuṛiakʼgea ar ạn-ạriko hõ ṭhik lekam manaoetʼkana mente.

Menkhan boṅgan hoṛ jạtren biswạsiko lạgitʼ okale goṭa akatʼ ona reaṅ do nonka ol katele baḍae ocoakatʼkoa je, onko do boṅga ṭhen samaṅakʼ bako joma, mãyãm hõ baṅ, limbạtʼ gocʼ janwarakʼ jel hõ bako joma ar jãhãlekan loṭghuṭi hõ bako kạmiya.”

Unre Pạul do onko hoṛe iditoraketʼkote acʼhõ onko sãoteye saphayena. Ar dosar hilokʼ uni do mundilteye calaoena, ar onkoakʼ saphakʼ reakʼ kạmi tis cabakʼa mente ar mimitʼko lạgitʼ tis janwar teṅgenko hoyokʼa onakoe baḍae ocoketʼkoa.
Ado saphakʼ lạgitʼ ona eae din purạu lạgidokʼ kan tahẽkanre Asiạ Prodesren adom Jihudiko do mundilre Pạulko ńelkedea. Onko do onḍe sanam hoṛko ạulạuketʼkoa ar Pạulko sapʼkedea.

Ar ãṭ aṛaṅte nonka memenko ehopʼena, “E Israelko, dela hijukʼpe. Sanam jaegaren hoṛko ṭhen aboakʼ jạt ar aboakʼ ạn-ạri ar mundil birudre okoe doe cetʼakokan uni hoṛ doe nui kangea. Ona chaḍa mundilre Junạnikoe aderetʼkote uni do noa sonot jaegaye bhõnḍ akada.”
Onko do noa iạtegeko menkeda, ente noa lahare Ephesusren Trophimus hõ Pạul sãote nagrahareko ńelledea. Onateko hudiskeda, Pạul do Trophimus hõ mundilteye ạguakadea.
Unre goṭa nagrahare gulmal ehopʼena. Hoṛko do mitʼ sãoteko ńir hecʼente Pạulko sapʼkedea ar mundil khonko or oḍok kedea ar ona são sãote mundil reakʼ duạrkoko sińkada.
Hoṛko do Pạul gojeko kurumuṭu kan tahẽkanre, Romi palṭonkoren maraṅ subedar ṭhen khobor calaoena je, goṭa Jerusalem nagrahare gulmal hoyokʼkana.
Unre Maraṅ subedar do adom subedarko ar palṭonko soṅgekate bhiṛ akatʼ ṭhene ńir calaoena. Ar hoṛko do maraṅ subedar ar palṭonkoko ńelketʼko khan Pạul dadalko thirena.
Unre maraṅ subedar do senkate Pạule giriptarkedea ar barea sikṛite tole lạgitʼe hukumkeda. Ona tayom uni doe kuliketʼkoa, “Nui hoṛ doe okoe kana? Ar cetʼe ceka akada?”
Unre hoṛko modre adomko do mitʼlekako arhõ adomko do eṭakʼ lekako hohoyetʼkan tahẽkana. Onate maraṅ subedar do sạri ghoṭna bae baḍae daṛeatʼte palṭon gaṛte Pạul idiye lạgitʼe hukumkeda.
Ado Pạul siṛhi hạbicʼe seṭeren khan hoṛkoakʼ ti khon bańcaoe lạgitʼ palṭonko do gokʼ idiye hoyen takoa.
Ar hoṛko do tayom tayomte ãṭ aṛaṅte hohoateko menkeda, “Uni do goje me.”
Ado palṭon gaṛteko adere lạgidokʼkan tahẽkanre Pạul do maraṅ subedare metadea, “Am sãote thoṛa kathań roṛ daṛekea?” Maraṅ subedare menkeda, “Junạni pạrsim baḍaegea?
Misor disạmren uni hoṛ okoe do thoṛa din lahare hulkate pon hajar dạkuko hahaṅkarteye idiletʼko am do cetʼ uni hoṛ dom baṅkana?”
Unre Pạule roṛ ruạṛkeda, “Iń do Kilikiạ Prodes reakʼ Tạrsus nagraharen mitʼṭen Jihudi hoṛ kạnạń. Jãhãlekan nagraharen hoṛ doń baṅkana. Dayakate onko hoṛ sãote katha roṛ ocoạńme.”
Ado maraṅ subedarakʼ hukume ńamketʼ khan Pạul do siṛhi cetanreye teṅgoyena ar ti tulkate hoṛko thirokʼ lạgitʼe isạrawatʼkoa. Arko thiren khan Pạul do Ibri pạrsiteye metatʼkoa.
“E boehako ar Babako, ńitokʼ iń do apnarteń roṛ dogokʼ kana, ańjomtińpe baṛe.”
Hoṛko do Ibri pạrsite roroṛko ańjomkede khan ekalteko thir hapeyena. Unre Pạul doe menkeda,

“Iń doń Jihudi hoṛ kana. Kilikiạ reakʼ Tạrsus nagrahareń janamlena, menkhan noa nagraharegeń hara akana. Gamalielakʼ jaṅga pheḍre duṛupʼkate aboren hapṛamkoakʼ ạn-ạriko mońjteń cetʼakada. Isor reaṅ teheń ape cetʼ lekape gagojokʼkan onkage iń hõń gagojokʼkan tahẽkana.
Jisuakʼ horte okoeko calakʼkan tahẽkan onko doń santaoetʼko tahẽkana ariń gocʼetʼko tahẽkana ar herel ar maejiuko sapʼ ạgukate hajotreń bhoraoetʼko tahẽkana.

Noa katha do sạrikana je, onaren goha do maraṅ naekeko ar maraṅ bạisiren sanamkoge. Iń do onko ṭhen khon Damesek nagraharen dhorom mukhiyạko emako lạgitʼ ciṭhiń hataoleda ar onkan hoṛko tol ạgukate Jerusalemre sạjạiko lạgitʼge onḍeń calakʼkan tahẽkana.
“Unre tikin okte tahẽkana” Iń do Damesek soriń seṭeren khan ackage serma khon iń beṛhaete mitʼṭen marsal bamberena.
Ar iń do otreń bhindạṛena ar okoe coṅe mitạńkaniń ańjomkeda, ‘E Sạul, E Sạul cedakʼem khedeń kana?’
‘‘Iń doń kulikedea, ‘Probhu am dom okoe kana?’ Uni doe roṛ ruạṛkeda, ‘iń do Nasaretren Jisu kạnạń, one okoeyem khedeńkan.’
Unre okoe iń sãoreko tahẽkan onko hõ ona marsalko ńelkeda, menkhan iń tulucʼ okoeye galmaraoketʼ uniakʼ katha do bako bujhạuleda.
Adoń menkeda, ‘E Probhu iń do cetʼ iń cekaya?’ “Probhui menkeda, ‘ma beretʼme, ar Damesekte calakʼme. Ar am lạgitʼ oka ṭhik doho akan ona do onḍegem baḍae ocokʼa.’
Unre ińren soṅgetenko do tire sapʼkate Damesekteko tiạkʼ idikedeńa, ente ona jhãk jhãk marsal iạteń kãṛãyena.
“Ado Ananiạs ńutuman mitʼṭen hoṛ iń ṭhene hecʼena. Uni do Moseakʼ ạn-ạriko manot salakʼe pańjayetʼ tahẽkana, ar onḍenko sanam Jihudiko ạḍiko manotedekan tahẽkana.
Uni do hecʼkate iń aṛere teṅgoyenteye metadińa, ‘E boeha Sạul, amakʼ ńeńel reakʼ daṛe ruạṛ hijukʼtam ma.’ Ar inạtege iń do uniń ńel ńamkedea.
“Unre Ananiạse menkeda, ‘aboren hapṛamkoren Isor do ame bachao akatʼmea jemon uniakʼ sanakom baḍae daṛeakʼ ar uni dhoromicʼ hoṛ, metakʼme Jisu Mạsim ńel ńame ar uniakʼ katham ańjomtae.
Am do unirenge goham hoyokʼa ar okam ńelakat̕ arem ańjomakatʼ ona do sanam hoṛko ṭhenem lạiya.
Am do ńitokʼ cedakʼem bilomeda? Ma beredokʼte bạptis ocokʼme ar uniakʼ ńutum dohaeakʼme ar amakʼ joto kạiko ạrupʼ saphaetam.’
“Jerusalemte ruạṛ hecʼkate mitʼ din mundilreń koejoṅkan tahẽkanre iń do mitʼṭen dorsoniń ńelkeda.
Probhu do iń sãote galmarao kaniń ńelkedea. Uni doe metadińạ, ‘usạragodme ar ńitge Jerusalem khon oḍok calakʼme, ente iń reaṅ goha do hoṛko bako ataṅ tama.’
Ińiń menkeda, ‘E Probhu, noko hoṛko baḍaegea, okoe amreko pạtiạukʼkan tahẽkan onko dal ar tolkate hajotre bhoraoko lạgitʼ iń do mitʼ sunạgog khon eṭakʼ sunạgogteń calakʼkan tahẽkana.
Ar amren gohayicʼ Stephanko gojekan tahẽkanre onḍegeń teṅgo akan tahẽkana ar uni gocʼ ocokʼre iń hõ rạjigeń tahẽkana, ar okoe uniko gojekan tahẽkana onkoakʼ kicricʼkoń horhoyetʼ tahẽkana.’
“Unre Probhu do ińe metadińạ, ‘Do calakʼme, ente iń do sạṅgińte boṅgan hoṛ jạtrenko ṭheniń kolmea.’ ”

Hoṛko do un hạbicʼ Pạulakʼ kathako ańjomkan tahẽkana, menkhan boṅgan hoṛ jạtrenkoakʼ kathae roṛketʼ khan ãṭ aṛaṅte hohoate memenko ehopʼena, “Uni do dhạrti khon ocokʼ giḍikaepe; uni do jiwetʼ tahen lek doe baṅkana.”
Ar rạgạu rạgạuko hohoyetʼkan tahẽkanre akoakʼ kicricʼko capatʼ giḍiyetʼ tahẽkana ar coṭte dhuṛiko oṭaṅetʼ tahẽkana,
unre maraṅ subedar do palṭonkoakʼ gaṛte Pạul idiye lạgitʼe hukumkeda. Ar Pạul birudre cedakʼ nonkako hohoyeda ona baḍae lạgitʼ cạbuk baṛakate jeraye lạgitʼe hukumkeda.
Ado cạbuke lạgitʼko tolkede khan Pạul do onḍeye teṅgo akan tahẽkan subedare metadea, “Romi hoṛ bin bicạr dusite cạbuke reakʼ hukum do cetʼ apeakʼ ạnre menakʼgea?
Noa katha ańjomkate uni subedar do maraṅ subedar lạiyadeteye metadea, “Am do cetʼem cekae lạgidokʼ kana? Nui ma coṅe Romi hoṛkan.”
Unre maraṅ subedar do Pạul ṭhen hecʼenteye kulikedea, “Lạiạńme am do cetʼ Romi kanam? Pạule menkeda, “Hẽ.”
Maraṅ subedare menkeda, “Iń do ạḍi utạr ṭaka-poesa emkate Romren porja hoyokʼ reakʼ ạidạriń ńamakada.” Pạule menkeda, “Menkhan iń do janam khonge Romren porja kạnạń.”
Noa kathako ańjomketʼ khan cạbuke lạgidokʼkanko do unreko calao baṛayena. Ar maraṅ subedar do mitʼṭen Romi hoṛe tol akadea menteye baḍaeketʼ khan botor hecʼadea.

Jihudiko cedakʼ Pạulko dusiyede kana ona ṭhik lekate baḍae lạgitʼ dosar hilokʼ maraṅ subeder do Pạule raṛakedea ar maraṅ naekeko ar maraṅ bạisiren hoṛko mitʼ ṭhen jarwakʼ lạgitʼe hukumatʼkoa. Ona tayom Pạul ạgukate onko samaṅreye teṅgokedea.
Pạul do maraṅ bạisiren hoṛko secʼ beṅgetʼkateye menkeda, “E ińren boehako, iń do teheń hạbicʼ bhage hudiste Isor samaṅre ińakʼ dạyikiń manao ạguakada.”
Noa katha ańjomkate maraṅ naeke Ananiạs do sorre teṅgo akanko mocare thapaye lạgitʼe hukumatʼkoa.
Unre Pạul do Ananiạse metadea, “E phạsiạra, Isor hõ ame thapamea. Ạn lekate ińakʼ bicạr lạgitʼ am do onḍem duṛupʼ akana, menkhan daleń reakʼem hukumetʼte amge coṅ ạn mam rạputʼetʼkan.”
Pạul ṭhen teṅgo akanko doko menkeda, “Am do Isorren maraṅ naekeyem bemanot edekana?”

Unre Pạule menkeda, “E boehako, bạń baḍaekan tahẽkana uni doe maraṅ naeke kana. Ariń baḍae lekhan ona katha do bạń menkea, ente sonot sostorre ol menakʼa, ‘am jạtren mukhiyạ reaṅ bạṛicʼ do alom roṛa.’ ”

Ona bạisiren mitʼ dol do Sạdukiko ar eṭakʼ dol do Phạrusi menakʼkoa menteye baḍaeketʼ khan Pạul do maraṅ bạisi talare ãṭ aṛaṅteye menkeda, “E boehako, iń do mitʼṭen Phạrusi hoṛ kạnạń ar Phạrusikoren hoponge. Ińakʼ bicạr hoyokʼ kana, ente ińiń pạtiạukʼ kana, gocʼko do arhõko jiwetʼ beredokʼa.”
Uniakʼ noa katha iạte Phạrusi ar Sạdukiko talare jhogṛa ehopʼena. Onate maraṅ bạisiren hoṛ doko hạṭińena,
ente Sạdukikoko mena, “Gocʼko do ar bako jiwetʼ beredokʼa.” Ona chaḍa arhõko mena, serma goḍetko hõ bạnukʼkoa, jãhãn jiuko hõ bạnukʼkoa; menkhan Phạrusiko do noa sanamakʼgeko pạtiạuakʼa.

Unre maraṅ gulmal hoyena ar Phạrusi dolren adom sostor baḍaeko doko teṅgoyente ạḍiko rapṭa rạpṭiyena. Onkoko menkeda, “Ale do nui hoṛakʼ jãhãn dosge bale ńametʼtaea. Hoedaṛeakʼa jãhãn jiu se sermaren goḍet do uni sãoteye galmarao akada.”

Ona jhogṛa do nonka sạrdi idiyena je, maraṅ subedar doe botorena ente onko do Pạulko or cirạ botejea. Uni do palṭonkoe hukumatʼkoa jemon senkate hoṛkoakʼ ti khon Pạulko chingạu ạguyete palṭon gaṛteko idiye.
Dosar hilokʼ ńindạ Probhu do Pạul ṭhen teṅgoyenteye metadea, “Dil joṅme, Jerusalemre cetʼleka iń reaṅ goham emakatʼ onkage Romre hõ ińakʼ goha emokʼ hoyokʼtama.”
Ado dosar hilokʼ setakʼ bela Jihudiko do mitʼṭenko soṛojontrokeda ar Pạul ạuriko goje hạbicʼ cetʼge bako joma menteko kiriạyena.
Onko do pongel khon hõ bạ̃ṛti hoṛko tahẽkana.
Onko do maraṅ naekeko ar Jihudiren murubiko ṭhen senkateko menkeda, “Pạul ạurile goje hạbicʼ cetʼge bale joma mentele kiriyạ akana.

Ńitokʼ ape ar maraṅ bạisiren hoṛko noa babotre arhõ mońj okocʼte tojbija mente ape samaṅre Pạul ạguye lạgitʼ maraṅ subedar ṭhen khobor kolpe. Ar ale do nonḍe ạuriye seṭerokʼrege uni goje lạgitʼ sapṛao akanle tahena.”
Menkhan Pạul miseratren hopontetʼ do noa soṛojontro reakʼ katha ańjomkate palṭonkoakʼ gaṛteye calaoena ar ona katha Pạule baḍae ocokedea.
Unre Pạul do mitʼṭen subedar hohoadeteye metadea, “Nui koṛa do maraṅ subedar ṭhen idiyem. Uni ṭhen thoṛa mementeakʼ menakʼtaea.”
Unre subedar do uni koṛa maraṅ subedar ṭhene idikedea are metadea, “Pạul ińe hohoạdińte nui koṛa am ṭhen ạguye reakʼe metadińạ, ente uni do am ṭhen thoṛa roroṛteakʼ menakʼtaea.”
Maraṅ subedar do tire sapʼkate mitʼ secʼe idikedeteye metadea, “Cetʼ mitạńem meneda?”
Uni koṛa doe menkeda, “Jihudikoko goṭa akada, Pạul reaṅ mońj okocʼte tojbij lạgitʼ gapa arhõ maraṅ bạisite idiye lạgitʼko nehõrama.

Am do onkoakʼ katha alom senakʼa, ente pongel khon hõ bạ̃ṛti hoṛ Pạul lạgitʼ tãṛãkʼ akan menakʼkoa. Noko hoṛ do Pạul ạuriko goje hạbicʼ cetʼge bako joma menteko kiriyạ akana. Arko sapṛao akana ar am ṭhen khon kathako ńel hohorkana.”
Maraṅ subedar do uni koṛa noa menkateye bidạkadea, “Am do noa katha ińem baḍae ocoakadiń ona do okoe ṭhen hõ alom lạiya.”
Maraṅ subeder do acʼren barea subedar hohoatʼkinteye metatʼkinạ, “Bar sae palṭon, eae gel aswariko ar barsae borlom palṭonko teheń ńindạ are baja okte Kạisạriạte calakʼ lạgitʼ ben sapṛao dohokoa.
Ar Pạul hõ sadom ben bebostaea jemon napaete disạm cakʼlaoicʼ Pheliks ṭhenpe idi seṭer daṛeae.”
Maraṅ subedar do noa ciṭhiye olkeda:
“Iń do Klạudius Lusius, maraṅ disạm cakʼlaoicʼ Pheliks ṭhen noa ciṭhiń oletʼkana. Ińakʼ johar ataṅtińme.
“Jihudiko do nui hoṛ sapʼkateko gojekan tahẽkana, menkhan iń do ińren palṭonko idikate uniyiń bańcao ạgukedea, enteń baḍaekeda uni do mitʼṭen Romi hoṛ kanae.
Ar baḍae sanakedeńa cedakʼko dusiyede kana mente. Onate uni do onkoakʼ maraṅ bạisireń idikedea.
Ariń baḍaekeda, onkoakʼ dhorom reakʼ ạn-ạriko babotre uniko dusikedea, menkhan gocʼ ocokʼ se hajotre bhorao ocokʼ leka jãhãn dos do bạnukʼtaea.
Ar uni birudre soṛojontro reakʼ kathań baḍaeketʼ khan iń do am ṭheniń kolkedea. Ar okoe uniko dusiyedekan onko hõń hukumatʼkoa jemon nuiakʼ dos reaṅko lạiam.”
Unre maraṅ subedarakʼ hukum leka Pạul do ńindạge ako sãote Antipatris nagraha hạbicʼko idikedea.
Ar dosar hilokʼ onko do aswariko sãote Pạulko kolkedete palṭon gaṛteko ruạṛ calaoena.
Ar aswariko do Kạisạriạreko seṭeren khan ciṭhi do disạm cakʼlaoicʼko emadea ar Pạul hõ uniakʼ tireko jimạkadea.
Disạm cakʼlaoicʼ do ciṭhiye paṛhaoketʼ khan Pạul oka jaegaren hoṛ kanae menteye kulikedea. Ar Pạul do Kilikiạ disạmren hoṛ kanae menteye baḍaeketʼ khan uni doe menkeda,
“Okoe hoṛko amko dusiakatʼme onko nonḍeko hecʼlen khan iń do amakʼ kathań ańjoma.” Tayomte uni do Herod rajakʼ hajotre Pạul horhoye lạgitʼe hukumatʼkoa.
Mõṛẽ din tayom maraṅ naeke Ananiạs do Jihudikoren adom murubiko ar Tertullus ńutuman mitʼṭen ukil soṅgekate Kạisạriạteye calaoena ar Pạul birudre disạm cakʼlaoicʼ ṭhene lạliskeda.
Menkhan amakʼ somoe jemon alo nosṭokʼtam onateń nehõram kana, dayakate aleakʼ katha ańjom taleme. Ale do thoṛa kathate jotowakʼle lạiama.
“Alele ńṭoṭhadea nui hoṛ do mitʼṭen jhamelayicʼ kanae; uni do jao okte gulmale ehopʼeda. Uni do goṭa dhạrtiren Jihudiko talare gulmale ehopʼakada. Uni do Nasario dolren mitʼṭen ạyuricʼ kanae.
Ar ale okakole dusiyedekan, ona do unim kulile khange jotowakʼem baḍae daṛeakʼa.”
Ar Jihudiko hõ noa katha do sạri kana menteko suhi akada.
Unre disạm cakʼlaoicʼ do Pạul roṛ lạgitʼe isạrawade khan roroṛe ehopʼena, “Ińiń baḍaea, ḍher bochor khon am do noko Jihudi jạtkoakʼem bicạr ạguyeda; onate ạḍi rạskạ salakʼ iń reakʼ iń roṛetʼkana.
Teheń gelbar din khon bạ̃ṛti do baṅ hoeakana iń do sewae lạgitʼ Jerusalemteń rakapʼ calaolena. Arem suṭhik lekhan ona dom baḍae daṛeakʼa.
Ar okoeko dusiyediń kan onko do mundilre okoe tulucʼ hõ rapṭa rạpṭikʼ do bako ńṭoṭhadińạ sunạgogre se nagrahare jãhãrege hoṛko ạulạuko hõ bako ńṭoṭhadińạ.
Ar okaṭakʼ reakʼko dusiyedińkan ona reakʼ porman hõ onko do bako udukʼ daṛeama.

Iń do noa katha am ṭheniń aṅgoceda je, Jisu Mạsiakʼ hor, okaṭakʼ do onko dhorom birudko metakʼkan, iń do ona horrege ińren hapṛamkoren Isoriń sewawae kana. Moseakʼ ạn-ạri sãote okaṭakʼ juri menakʼ onare ar nạbikoakʼ olakʼre hõń pạtiạukʼ kana.
Onko cetʼlekako asokʼkan onkage iń hõ Isorre noa as menakʼtińạ je, dhorom ar bedhorom sanamkoge arhõko jiwetʼ beretʼ ocokʼa.
Onate iń do Isor ar manwako samaṅre jaoge ińakʼ bibek sapha dohoe reakʼ iń kurumuṭuyeda.
“Ḍher bochor tayom iń do Jerusalemteń senlena jemon iń jạtren reṅgecʼ-orecʼ hoṛko ṭaka-poesateń goṛo daṛeako ar dãṛẽ hõ jemoniń samaṅ daṛeakʼ.
Ado ińiń saphayen tayom tinre onań kạmikan tahẽkana unre onko do mundilreko ńelledińa. Ar iń ṭhen hoṛko hõ bako ṭhạurạulena se iń iạte jãhãn gulmal hõ baṅ hoelena.
Menkhan Asiạ Prodesren adom Jihudiko do onḍeko tahẽkana. Onkoge am ṭhen hijukʼ reakʼ jạruṛ tahẽkantakoa ar iń dusiyiń reakʼ jãhãnakʼ tahen tako khan onkogeko dusikińạ.
Se okoeko nonḍe menakʼko onkogeko men ocoge, maraṅ bạisi samaṅre tinreń teṅgo akan tahẽkana unre cetʼ dosko ńamletʼtińạ mente.
Eken noa mitʼṭen reaṅko dusi daṛeạńạ, iń do onko samaṅre teṅgokate ãṭ aṛaṅteń roṛletʼ tahẽkana, ‘gocʼko do arhõko jiwetʼ beredokʼa ar noa reaṅge teheń ape samaṅre bicạr hoyokʼ kantińạ.’ ”
Jisuakʼ hortetʼ reakʼakʼko Pheliks hõ bes okocʼtegeye baḍaekan tahẽkana. Uni do bicạr kạmi bondkateye menkeda, “Maraṅ subedar Lusiuse hecʼlen tayom iń do apeakʼ noa bicạriń chinḍạukatapea.”
Uni do Pạul horhoye lạgitʼ subedare hukumadea, menkhan thoṛa sạdhin macha dohoye reakʼ hõe metadea. Ar Pạulren gateko hõ hecʼkate jemon jạruṛleka uniko sapʼ sorae.
Ado thoṛa din tayom Pheliks do acʼren Jihudi bạhu Drusilla soṅgekateye hecʼena. Uni do Pạule hoho ạgu ocokedete uni ṭhen khon Jisu Mạsire pạtiạukʼ reakʼ kathae ańjomkeda.
Pạul do tinre dhorom horte calakʼ reakʼ, apnar sambṛaokʼ ar darakan bicạr reaṅe lạiadea, unre Pheliks do botorenteye menkeda, “Ma ńitokʼ do calakʼme; arhõ okte nạpitreń hohoama.”
Uni doe asokʼkan tahẽkana Pạul do nahakʼ ghuse emaea. Onate ghane ghạṛicʼ Pạul hoho ạgukate uni tulucʼe galmaraokan tahẽkana.
Ado bar bochor paromen khan Pheliks bodol Porkius Phestuse bahalena. Ar Pheliks do Jihudiko kusi ocoko lạgitʼ Pạul do hajotregeye doho oṭokadea.
Ado Phestus ona ṭoṭhareye hecʼen khan pe din tayom Kạisạriạ khon Jerusalemteye rakapʼ calaoena.
Unre maraṅ naekeko ar Jihudi mukhiyạko do uni ṭhen senkate Pạul birudreko lạlisadea.
Onko do Phestus ạḍiko nehõradea jemon onkoreye dayakʼte Jerusalemte Pạule ạgu ocoye. Ona reakʼ karon do noage je, onko do horre tãṛãkʼkate Pạul goje reakʼko soṛojontrokan tahẽkana.
Unre Phestuse menkeda, “Pạul do Kạisạriạ reakʼ hajotre menaea ar iń do usạrage onḍeń calakʼkana.
Ar aperen adom ektiạrianko do iń sãoteko calakʼma ar uni hoṛ jãhãnakʼe dosakatʼ khan onakoko udukʼạńma.”
Phestus do onko talare irạl se gel din tahẽkate Kạisạriạteye ruạṛ calaoena. Ar dosar hilokʼ uni do bicạr duṛupʼakʼreye duṛupʼente acʼ samaṅre Pạul ạguye lạgitʼe hukumkeda.
Ar okoe Jihudiko Jerusalem khonko hecʼakan tahẽkan onko do Pạul onḍeye hecʼen khan uni beṛhaeteko teṅgo ạcurena ar ạḍi okocʼko dusikedea, menkhan onako reakʼ jãhãn porman do bako em daṛeada.
Unre Pạul doe roṛ dokʼenteye menkeda, “Iń do Jihudikoakʼ ạn-ạri se mundil se Rom maharaj birudre jãhãnakʼ bạń behok akada.”
Khan Phestus do Jihudiko kusi ocoko lạgitʼ Pạule metadea, “Noako dos reakʼ Jerusalemre jemoniń bicạr daṛeakʼ ona lạgitʼ cetʼ onḍe calakʼem khaṛagea?”

Unre Pạul doe menkeda, “Iń do ńitokʼ Kạisạrakʼ bicạr duṛupʼakʼ samaṅreń teṅgo akana ar Rom sorkar ṭhen bicạr ocokʼge lek kantińạ. Am hõ bes okocʼtem baḍaegea je, Jihudiko cetanre jãhãn behokakʼ do bạń kạmi akada.

Ar gujukʼ lek kạnạń mente jãhãnakʼ iń dos akatʼ khan iń do gujukʼ hõń rạjigea. Menkhan noko Jihudiko iń birudre okaṭakʼ dosteko dusiyedińkan ona judi sạriakʼ baṅ hoelen khan enḍekhan onko tire aṛakʼkạń reakʼ ektiạri do okoeakʼ hõ bạnukʼa. Iń do Kạisạrgeń dohaeae kana.”
Khange Phestus do acʼren sopolhako tulucʼ solhakateye menkeda, “Am do Kạisạrem dohae akawadea; Kạisạr ṭhengem calakʼa.”
Ado niạ thoṛa din tayom Jihudikoren Ạgrippa raj ar acʼren bạhu Bernike do Phestus johar emae lạgitʼ Kạisạriạtekin hecʼena.
Ar ḍher din onḍekin tahẽkante Phestus do Pạul reaṅ raje baḍae ocokedea. Uni doe menkeda, “Pheliks do mitʼṭen hoṛ hajotreye doho oṭoakadea.
Iń do tinre Jerusalemteń senlena unre maraṅ naekeko ar Jihudikoren mukhiyạko nui hoṛ birudre ạḍi okocʼko lạlisadiń tahẽkana ar sạjại emae lạgitʼko nehõradiń tahẽkana.
“Iń do onkoń metatʼko tahẽkana, ‘jãhãe hoṛ birudre jãhãeye lạlis khan enḍekhan okoeko lạlis akatʼ onko samaṅre bin dusạn sạbudokʼ reakʼ ạt ạuriye ńam hạbicʼ sạjại emae do Romikoakʼ niạmre bạnukʼa.’
“Ado onko Jihudiko iń sãoteko hecʼen khan begor bilomte dosar hilokʼge bicạri lạgitʼ iń duṛupʼena ar uni hoṛ ạguye reakʼ iń hukumkeda.
Ar okoe hoṛko uniko dusiyedekan tahẽkan onko do katha roṛ lạgitʼko teṅgoyen khan okań hudisetʼ tahẽkan onkan jãhãnakʼ do bako lạlisleda,
Menkhan akoakʼ dhorom leka mitʼṭen gocʼen Jisu reaṅko dusikedea. Ar Pạul ńutuman uni hoṛ do jorkateye menetʼ tahẽkana je, Jisu do jiwetʼge menaea.
Ar noako babotre cekateń tojbija ona bạń bujhạuletʼte uniń kulikedea, noako dusi reakʼ jemonem bicạrokʼ, onate Jerusalemte calakʼem khaṛagea se baṅ.
Menkhan maharajakʼ ṭhen bicạr ocokʼ lạgitʼe dohaeketʼ khan uni ṭhen ạuri kolkae hạbicʼ horhoye reakʼ iń hukumakada.”
Unre Agrippa do Phestuse metadea, “Iń hõ uni hoṛ reaṅ ańjom sanayediń kana.” Phestuse menkeda, “Gapagem ańjomtaea.”
Dosar hilokʼ Agrippa raj ar Bernike do maraṅ subedarko ar nagraharen manotan hoṛko sãote ạḍi ṭhosok sajkate bạisitekin boloyena. Ar Phestuse hukumketʼ khan Pạul do onḍeye ạgu ocoyena.

Unre Phestus doe menkeda, “E Agrippa raj ar nonḍe menakʼpe sanamkoge, ape do nui hoṛpe ńelekana; nui reaṅ Jihudiko do, Jerusalemre ar Kạisạriạre iń ṭhenko lạlis akada ar hohoateko menetʼ tahẽkana, nui hoṛ do jiwetʼ tahen lek doe baṅkana.
Menkhan ińiń ńelakada, nui hoṛ do gujukʼ sạjại emae leka jãhãnakʼ bae dos akada. Ar tinre uni do Kạisạre dohae adea unre maharaj ṭhen kolkae lạgitʼ iń goṭakeda.
Menkhan maraṅ maharaj ṭhen olokʼ leka nonkan cetʼge bạń ńamleda. Onate iń do Agrippa raj ar sanamko samaṅreń ạguakadea jemonpe kuliyete ol lạgitʼ jãhãnakʼ iń ńam daṛeakʼ;
ente iń bujre jãhãe kạidi hoṛ calane jokhecʼ uni upạrte lạlis reakʼ karon udug do jạruṛgea.”
Unre Agrippa do Pạule metadea, “Apnar reaṅ roroṛiń aṛakʼam kana.” Unre Pạul do ti tiạrkate acʼ reaṅ noa kathae roṛkeda,
“E Agrippa raj, Jihudiko okako dusi akadiń ona birudre am samaṅre katha roṛ reakʼ ạtiń ńamketʼte bhạganiń bujhạukʼ kana,
am do Jihudikoakʼ cạliko ar reṭe peṭekʼkan reaṅakʼko bes okocʼtegem baḍae kana. Onate jiwi hataṛkate ińakʼ kathako ańjom lạgitʼ biseskaeteń nehõram kana.
“Iń do gidrạ khonge, metakʼme ińakʼ jion reakʼ pạhil khon ińakʼ disạmre ar tayomte Jerusalemren hoṛko talare cetʼlekan jioniń khemaoetʼ tahẽkan ona do sanam Jihudikoko baḍaegea.
Onko do ḍher din khonge ińko orom akadińạ ar goha emokʼko menle khan noako emdaṛeakʼa je, iń do aleakʼ dhoromre Phạrusiko ńutuman okaṭakʼ dol menakʼ ona Phạrusi dhorom leka jioniń khemaoetʼ tahẽkana.
Isor do aboren hapṛamko ṭhen okaṭakʼe gokʼletʼ tahẽkan onareń asokʼkante ńitokʼ ińakʼ bicạr hoyokʼkantińạ.
Aleren gelbar khũṭren hoṛko do siń-ńindạ mon ar ontorte Isor sewawaete ona gokʼakʼ reakʼ purạukʼtetʼ ńel reakʼ asre menakʼkoa. E maharaj, ona as iạtege Jihudiko do ińko dusiyediń kana.
Isor gocʼkoe jiwetʼ beretʼko noa katha do cedakʼ bape pạtiạuakʼ kana?
“Iń do apnargeń pạtiạukʼkan tahẽkana, Nasaretren Jisu birudre okań daṛeakʼ ona jotoge kạmi lek tińạ mente,
ar ṭhik onkage Jerusalemre hõń kạmiletʼgea. Maraṅ naekeko ṭhen khon ektiạri ńamkate Mạsire pạtiạukʼkan ḍherkoge hajotreń bhoraoletʼkoa ar onko gocʼ ocokore hõ rạjigeń tahẽkana.

Onko sạjạiko lạgitʼ mitʼ sunạgog khon eṭakʼ sunạgog hạbicʼ iń calakʼkan tahẽkana ar Jisu birudre katha roṛ lạgitʼ iń jormoṭetʼko tahẽkana. Onko cetanre nunạkʼ ãṭ raṅgao tahẽkantińạ je, onko khedko lạgitʼ bides reakʼ nagrahako hạbicʼ hõń calakʼkan tahẽkana.
“Nonkage mitʼ dhao maraṅ naekeko ṭhen khon ektiạri ar hukum ńamkate Damesekteń calakʼkan tahẽkana.
Menkhan E maharaj, unre tikin okte tahẽkana. Ar horre siń cando khon hõ bạ̃ṛti jhak jhak mitʼṭen marsal serma khon iń ar iń sãotenko beṛhaete bamberena.

Unre ale sanamkoge otrele bhindạṛena ar iń do mitʼṭen aṛaṅ Ibri pạrsite mitạń kaniń ańjomkeda, ‘E Sạul, E Sạul, cedakʼem khedeń kana? Jạnum bạisạu akatʼ ṭheṅgare kolsaete apnarakʼge cetʼ bam loksaneda?’
“Unreń menkeda, ‘E Probhu okoe kanam?’

“Probhui menkeda, ‘iń doń Jisu kana, onem khedeńkan. Ma ńitokʼ do beretʼme ar amakʼ jaṅgate teṅgokʼme. Sapʼ sosoricʼ ar goha lekate bahalme lạgitʼge iń do am ṭheniń ńelocoyena. Ar cetʼlekam ńelkedeń ar okaṭakʼ iń udukʼ am ona do eṭakʼko ṭhenem lạiya.
“E Agrippa raj, onate serma khon noa dorson hotete okakoń men ocoakan ona doń batao ạguakada.

Damesekre okoe menakʼko pạhilre onko ṭhen, ar ona tayom do Jerusalemrenko ar goṭa Jihudirenko ar boṅgan hoṛ jạtrenko ṭhen hõń porcar akada je, onko do kại khon mon ạcurkate Isor secʼ ruạṛokʼ lek takoa, ar nonkan kạmi lek takoa one okaṭakʼte sạbudokʼ baṅma onko do monko ạcur akada mente.
Onatege Jihudiko do mundilre sapʼkate gojeń reakʼko kurumuṭuyetʼ tahẽkana.
Menkhan Isor do teheń hạbicʼe goṛo akawạdińa ar onate nonḍe teṅgokate kạṭicʼ lạṭu sanamko ṭhen gohań emeda. Nạbiko ar Mose hõ okaṭakʼ hoyokʼgea menteko roṛakatʼ ona bahre do cetʼ hõ bạń roṛeda.
Ar ona katha do hoyokʼkana, Mạsi do duk jojom hoyokʼtaea ar unige pạhilre gocʼko khone jewetʼ beredokʼte acʼ jạtrenko ar boṅgan hoṛ jạtrenko ṭhen marsalakʼ rajosṭi reaṅ lại jạhir hoyokʼtaea.”
Ado Pạul nonkae roṛ dogokʼkan tahẽkanre Phestus do tạkicʼ daramkedete ãṭ aṛaṅteye menkeda, “E Pạul, am dom pagla akana. Ente ḍher bidiyạm hameṭ akada ar ona bidiyạgeye pagla oco akatʼmea.”
Unre Pạule menkeda, “Manotan Phestus, iń do bạń pagla akana. Okań roṛetʼkan ona do sạriakʼ ar soteteakʼ kathageń roṛeda.
Ente raj do noakoe baḍaegea ar iń do uni sãote sohosateń roṛ daṛeakʼa. Noa katha do khạṭigeń baḍaea je, noako mod khon okaṭakʼ hõ uni khon do baṅ okoakana, ente danaṅre noako do baṅ hoeakan.
E Agrippa raj, am do cetʼ nạbikoakʼ katha rem pạtiạukʼ kangea? Ińiń baḍaea pạtiạuatako kangeam.”
Khange Agrippa do Pạule metadea, “Am do cetʼ thoṛa okterege Isạiyiń lạgitʼem kurumuṭuyeda?”

Pạule menkeda, “Thoṛare hõ se ḍherre hõ, iń do Isor ṭheniń koejoṅ kana, eken am eskar do baṅ bickom teheń tinạkʼ do ińakʼ kathako ańjometʼkan onko sanamko jemon iń lekako hoyokʼ, eken noa sikṛi chaḍa.”
Unre raj doe beretʼena ar uni sãote disạm cakʼlaoicʼ Phestus ar Bernike ar onko sãote okoeko duṛupʼ akan tahẽkan onko sanamko hõko teṅgoyena.
Ona tayom onko do ona oṛakʼ bạgikateko calaoena ar ako ako talare memenko ehopʼena, “Nui hoṛ do gocʼ ocokʼ se hajot ocokʼ leka cetʼ hõ bae ceka akada.”
Ar Agrippa do Phestuse metadea, “Nui hoṛ do Kạisạr aloe dohaeae khane aṛakʼ ocokokʼgea.”
Ado jahajte Itạliạte idileko goṭaketʼ khan Pạul ar eṭakʼ adom kạidiko do Julius ńutuman mitʼṭen subedarakʼ tireko jimạkatʼlea. Julius do maharaj Agustus palṭonko modren mitʼṭen subedare tahẽkana.

Ale do Adramuttium bondorre mitʼṭen jahajre decʼkatele mohnḍayena. Ona do Asiạ reakʼ eṭakʼ eṭakʼ bondorkote calakʼ lạgitʼ sapṛaoge tahẽkana. Makedoniạ disạmren Thessalonikiạ nagraharen Aristarkhos hõ ale sãoteye tahẽkana.
Dosar hilokʼ aleakʼ jahaj do Sidonrele teṅgokeda. Julius do Pạul sãote ạḍi mońje beoharkeda ar cerṭhakʼ lạgitʼ uniren gateko ṭhene sen ocoadea jemon acʼren gateko jạruṛokʼakʼ jiniskoko emdaṛeae.
Ado onḍe khon arhõ jahajko laṛaoketʼtalea. Menkhan samaṅ secʼ khone hoyetʼ tahẽkante ale do Kupros dip aṛetele calao idiyena.
Tayomte Kilikiạ ar Pamphuliạ aṛeteakʼ doreão paromkate Lukiạ Prodes reakʼ Murạ nagrahatele seṭerena.
Onḍe Subedar do Alekasandriạ reakʼ mitʼṭen jahaje ńamkeda. Ona jahaj do Itạliạ disạmte calakʼkan tahẽkante uni do ona jahajre aleye decʼketʼlea.

Aleakʼ jahaj do ḍher din hạbicʼ bại bạite calao idiyente ạḍi kosṭote Knidos nagraha sorle seṭerena, menkhan hoe do ar bae laha ocoatʼlea. Unre ale do Krete dip aṛete Salmone muhạ muhile calao idiyena.
Ar doreão aṛe aṛetele calao idiyente bhage bondorko metakʼ mitʼṭen jaegarele hecʼena. Ona sorrege Lassaea nagraha do tahẽkana.
Ado nonkate ḍher din parom calaoena. Ar upạs dinko paromente rabaṅ din hõ sor akan tahẽkana. Unre jahajte dãṛãn do muskilge hoyentalea. Onate Pạul do jahajren hoṛko sontorko lạgitʼe metatʼkoa,
“E ho ńelpe, ińiń ńeletʼkana noa dãṛãnre ạḍi loksan hoyokʼ tabona. Ona loksan do eken jahaj ar mal-jal reakʼ do baṅ, aboakʼ jiwi hõ loksanokʼ tabona.”
Menkhan subedar do Pạulakʼ katha bae luturatʼte jahaj calaoicʼ ar mạlikakʼ kathae ańjomkeda.

Ona bondorre rabaṅ din khemao lạgitʼ lek lekan jaega baṅkante ḍher hoṛgeko goṭakeda je, onḍe khon mohnḍakate hoedaṛeakʼ khan Phoenikiạte senkate rabaṅ dinko khemaoa. Phoenikiạ do Krete dipre jahaj teṅgoe reakʼ jaega tahẽkana. Noa jaegare dạkhin pạchim ar utạr pạchim secʼ do phaelaoge tahẽkana.

Ado tinre dạkhin khon hisitʼ hisitʼ hoeye ehopʼkeda unre onko doko hudiskeda ako okako khojkan tahẽkan onage hoeakana mente. Onate jahaj reakʼ loṅgorko rakapʼkeda ar Krete dip aṛe aṛeteko laha idiyena.
Menkhan thoṛa tayom khange ona dip khon Eurakolonko metakʼ mitʼṭen kajak hoe ehopʼena, ar jahaj do ona hoere paṛaoena.
Hoe iạte samaṅ secʼ do bale laha daṛeada; onate laha idikʼ kurumuṭu baṅkate jahaj do hoe rele ḍombol ocoada.
Ar Klạudako metakʼ mitʼṭen kạṭicʼ dip oka secʼ do hoe baṅ tahẽkan ontele calao idiyena ar jahajre okaṭakʼ lạukạ tahen ona do ạḍi kosṭote rạpudokʼ khonle rukhiyạkeda.

Hoṛko do jahajre onako or rakapʼketʼ khan barahikote jahaj reakʼ kholko tolkeda jemon ona reakʼ toktako alo begarokʼ. Ar Surtisko metakʼ doreão reakʼ bạl gadare gạḍiạukʼ botorte badamko raṛa pheḍketʼte jahaj do hoere ḍombolokʼ lạgitʼko aṛakʼada.
Ar birbãote aleakʼ jahaj do nonka sokojokʼ ehopʼena je, dosar hilokʼ hoṛko do jahaj reakʼ bojhako dakʼreko giḍikada.
Tesar hilokʼ hõ onko do akoakʼ tite jahaj reakʼ jisinkoko giḍikada.
Ar ḍher din hạbicʼ siń cando se ipilko celege bako ńel ńamlena ar botorgeye hoe idiyetʼ tahẽyena. Ar mucạtʼre bańcaokʼ reakʼ as do cabayentalea.

Hoṛko ḍher din khon cetʼge bako jomakatʼ tahẽkante Pạul do onko samaṅre teṅgoyenteye menkeda, “E ho, ape do ińakʼ katha ańjomkate Krete dip khon jahaj baṅ laṛaoge boge tahẽkantapea. Enḍekhan noa muskil ar loksanre do ohope paṛaolena.
Menkhan ńitokʼ iń nehõrapekana, monre dil dohojoṅpe, ente ape modren okoe hõ bape gujukʼa; eken noa jahaj chaḍa.
Ente ińiń okoeren kan ar okoeyiń sewawaekan uni Isorren mitʼṭen goḍet do ńindạ iń pheḍre teṅgoyenteye metadińạ,
‘E Pạul, alom botorokʼa. Am do Kạisạr samaṅre teṅgokʼ hoyokʼtama. Ar noa jahajre tinạkʼ do am sãoteko calakʼkan onko sanamkoakʼ jiwi Isor do dayateye dan akawatʼmea.’
Onate monre dil joṅpe. Isorre noa pạtiạu menakʼtińạ je, uni okae menakawạdiń ona do hoyokʼgea.
Ar abo do oka dipre coṅ bon ḍhaṅokʼa.”
Ale do Adriạ doreão cetante onkage calakʼtegele tahẽyena. Ar gelpon mãhã hilokʼ tala ńindạ okte jahaj calaoko doko onmankeda je, ghuṭu sorko hecʼakana mente.
Onko do soṅkateko ńelkeda onḍe do irạlgel moka khạndri dakʼ tahẽkana. Arhõ thoṛa tayomko soṅkeda, onḍe do turui gel moka khạndri dakʼko ńamkeda.
Ado dhirire bajaokʼ botorte jahaj reakʼ tayom secʼ khon ponea loṅgorko caḍokeda ar siń marsal lạgitʼ koejoṅko ehopʼena.
Ar jahajren nạbiko do jahaj khon dạṛ reakʼko kurumuṭuketʼte samaṅ secʼ khon loṅgor caḍoea mente jahaj reakʼ lạukạ doreãoreko pheḍkeda.
Unre Pạul do subedar ar palṭonkoe metatʼkoa, “Noko nạbiko jahajre bako tahen khan rukhiyạ ohope ńamlea.”
Khan palṭonko do lạukạ reakʼ barahikoko samakʼ topakʼketʼte dakʼreko aṛakʼgotʼkada.

Ado ạuri marsalokʼre Pạul do sanamko thoṛa jom lạgitʼ nehõratʼkoteye metatʼkoa, “Teheń gelpon din hoyokʼ kana, ar cetʼ hoyokʼa baṅ hoyokʼa ona reakʼ bhabnate upạsge menakʼpea ar cetʼge bape jom akada.
Menkhan ńitokʼ do thoṛa jom reakʼ iń nehõrape kana. Ente bańcao tahen lạgitʼ jojom jạruṛtapea. Ente, apeakʼ bohokʼ reakʼ mitʼṭen upʼ hõ baṅ nosṭokʼtapea.”
Ado noa katha menkate Pạul do piṭhạ hataokate onko samaṅre Isore gun manao joharadea ar ona kecakʼkate jojome ehopʼena.
Unre onko sanamko dilko ńamketʼ khan jojomko dhurạuena.
Jahajre jotote ale do bar sae eae gel turui hoṛle tahẽkana.
Ar sanamkoko jom biyen khan jahaj reakʼ hamal komao lạgitʼ joto guhum do doreãoreko giḍikada.

Ado setakʼ bela ona jaega do bako ńel orom daṛeada, menkhan onko do mitʼṭen huḍiń macha doreãoko ńel ńamkeda one ona reakʼ aṛe do gitilte perecʼge tahẽkan. Unreko goṭakeda jahaj do ona aṛere idikateko ḍhaṅkakʼa.

Onate onko do jahaj reakʼ loṅgorko getʼkate doreãoreko giḍikada ar hạl reakʼ tonol doko raṛakada. Inạ tayom hoe ńam lạgitʼ laha reakʼ badomko rakapʼkeda ar aṛe secʼ laha idiyente ona do gitilre ḍhaṅena.
Ar jahaj reakʼ samaṅ secʼ gạḍiạu uricʼente teṅgo hapeyena ar ḍheoko reakʼ tạpiste jahaj reakʼ tayom secʼ do rạpudokʼ ehopʼena.
Unre palṭonko do kạidiko gocʼko reakʼko goṭakeda jemon onko modre okoe hõ paera oḍokokʼte aloko dạṛ daṛeakʼ.

Menkhan subedar do Pạul bańcaoe lạgitʼ mon tahẽkantaete palṭonko akoakʼ sana leka bae kạmi ocoatʼkoa. Uni doe hukumkeda okoe paerakʼko baḍae onko do pạhilre jahaj khon don pheḍokʼte guṭuteko rakabokʼma,
ar sarecʼko do jahaj reakʼ tokta se eṭakʼ jãhãnakʼ kaṭ kuṭrạ sapʼkateko paera rakabokʼma. Ar nonkate sanamko nirạite ghuṭuteko rakapʼena.
Ado nirạite ghuṭutele rakapʼen khan ona do Malṭa dip kana mentele baḍaekeda.
Ona dipren hoṛko do ale sãote ạḍi mońjko beoharkeda. Unreye dakʼetʼkan tahẽkana ar rabaṅkan tahẽkante onko do seṅgel jolkate sanamkoko hohoatʼlea.
Pạul do mitʼ bojha rohoṛ jhuriko samṭaokate seṅgelreye khadleketʼ khan seṅgel reakʼ lolote mitʼṭen bisan biń do ona bojha khone oḍokena ar Pạulakʼ tireye gerbitʼena.
Ado Pạulakʼ tire uni biń ḍhilwạṅ akanko ńelkede khan ona dipren hoṛ doko menana, “Nui hoṛ doe khũniạhi kana ente doreão khone bańcaoenre hõ hokren bicạricʼ do jiwetʼ bae tahẽ ocoaekana.”
Menkhan Pạul do uni biń seṅgelreye irci giḍikadea ar cetʼ hõ bae hạnlena.

Hoṛko doko hudisetʼ tahẽkana uniakʼ hoṛmo do phulạkʼtaea se ackageye gocʼ bhindạṛokʼa nahakʼ. Menkhan ḍher ghạṛicʼre hõ unire cetʼge baṅ hoyokʼkanko ńelketʼ khan hudis ạcurenteko menkeda, “Uni doe deb kana.”
Ona jaegare sorre Publius ńutuman mitʼṭen napṛakʼ hoṛ do jumidari tahẽkantaea. Uni do acʼakʼ oṛakʼteye idiketʼlea ar pe din hạbicʼ ạḍi mońjteye peṛaketʼlea.
Unre Publiusren apattetʼ do ruạ ar amasateye jaṛao akan tahẽkana. Pạul do bhitrite uni ṭhene boloyena are koeadea ar capokedeteye bogekedea.
Ado noa ghoṭna tayom ona dipren sarecʼ sanam rugiko hecʼkateko boge ocoyena.
Onko do ạḍi lekateko manotketʼlea ar tayomte jahaj laṛao jokhecʼ aleakʼ jạruṛokʼakʼko bojha gotʼatʼlea.

Niạ pe cando tayom ale do mitʼṭen jahajtele mohnḍayena. Ona jahaj do inạ diprege rabaṅ dine ṭalao akatʼ tahẽkana. Ona do Alekasndriạ nagraha reakʼ jahaj tahẽkana ar ona reakʼ bohokʼre jawa debakʼ muṭhạn tahẽkana.
Ale do Surạkusre jahajle teṅgoketʼte onḍe pe dinle tahẽyena.
Ar onḍe khonle monḍhayente Regiumrele seṭerena. Ar dosar hilokʼ dạkhin secʼ khone hoeyetʼ tahẽkante tesar hilokʼ do Puteolitele seṭerena.
Onḍe do thoṛa biswạsi boehakole ńamketʼkoa. Onko do ako sãote mitʼ hapta tahen lạgitʼko nehõratʼlea. Nonkate ale do Romtele hecʼena.

Onḍenko biswạsi boehako do aleakʼ hijukʼ reaṅko ańjom akatʼ tahẽkana. Ar horte ale sãote soṅgekʼ lạgitʼ onkoren adomko do Appius Haṭ, ar adomko do Pe Sạrại ato hạbicʼ ale daramko oḍok hecʼena. Khan noko hoṛko ńelte Pạul do Isore sarhaokedea ar acʼ hõ monre udgạue ńamkeda.
Ar Romtele seṭeren khan Pạul do acʼ eskar mitʼṭen oṛakʼre tahen lạgitʼ hukume ńamkeda. Ar mitʼṭen palṭon do uniye pahrayede kan tahẽkana.

Pe din tayom Pạul do onḍenko Jihudiko mukhiyạko mitʼ ṭhene hoho jarwaketʼkoa. Adoko jarwayen khan Pạul do onkoe metatʼkoa, “E ińren boehako, iń do abo jạtrenko se hapṛamkoakʼ cạli birudre cetʼge bạń ceka akada, enhõ Jerusalemre sapʼ ocokate Romikoakʼ tireń jimạ ocoakana.
Arko kuli baṛakediń khan onko do aṛakʼkạńgeko menleda, ente gocʼ ocokʼ lek jãhãn cetʼ dosge bạń kạmi akada.
Menkhan Jihudikoko roṛ daramketʼ khan maharaj Kạisạr dohaeae lạgitʼ jạruṛ hoyentińạ. Menkhan iń jạtren hoṛko jãhãnakʼ dusiko lạgitʼ do bạń hecʼakana.
Onate iń do apeko sãote ńapamokʼ ar galmarao lạgitʼ iń khojkeda. Ar Israel jạtkoakʼ oka as menakʼ ona lạgitʼge iń do noa sikṛiteń tol ocoakana.”
Unre Jihudi mukhiyạkoko metadea, “Jihudạ khon am reaṅ do jãhãn ciṭhige bale ńam akada. Ar boehako modren okoe hõ onḍe hecʼkate am reaṅ cetʼge bako baḍae ocoakatʼlea se jãhãn bạṛicʼ do bako roṛakada.
Menkhan ale do amakʼ mon reakʼ kathakole ańjomtama, ente alele baḍaea joto jaegarege hoṛko do ona dol reakʼ birudre kathako roṛeda.”

Onko do Pạul são ńapamokʼ lạgitʼ mitʼṭen dinko goṭakeda. Ar Pạul okareye tahẽkan onḍe do onko chaḍa arhõ aema hoṛko hecʼena. Unre Pạul do setakʼ khon ạyupʼ hạbicʼ Isorakʼ raj reaṅe galmaraoatʼkoa are bujhạuatʼkoa. Uni do Moseakʼ ạn-ạri ar nạbikoakʼ puthi khon hõ Jisu reaṅe bujhạu akokan tahẽkana.
Ar uni okakoe roṛketʼ onate adomko doko pạtiạuena ar adomko do bako pạtiạulena.
Pạulakʼ kathate ako talare katha baṅ jurilente onko do onḍe khonko calaoena. Adoko calakʼ lahare Pạule menkeda, “Sonot Jiu do Jesaea nạbi hotete aperen hapṛamko ṭhen ṭhikgeye roṛlakʼa,
Noko hoṛ senkate metakom, ańjom dope ańjomgea, menkhan bape bujhạua, ńeńel dope ńeńelgea menkhan bape oroma.

Noko hoṛakʼ ontor do goṛdhoyentakoa, lutur hõ tepetʼ akan takoa, ar mẽtʼ doko jạpitʼ akatʼtakoa, jemon mẽtʼte aloko ńeńel, luturte aloko ańjom, ar ontorte aloko bujhạu, ar bogekʼ lạgitʼ iń ṭhen aloko ruạṛ hijukʼ.
Ar Pạul do purạ bar bochor acʼakʼ bhaṛa oṛakʼreye tahẽkana ar acʼ ṭhen bolokʼ sanamkogeye ataṅetʼko kan tahẽkana.
Uni do sohosate ar bin akoṭte Isorakʼ raj reakʼe porcaretʼ tahẽkana ar Probhu Jisu Mạsi reaṅe cetʼakokan tahẽkana.
Iń Pạul Jisu Mạsiren golam do Rom nagraharen biswạsiko ṭhen noa ciṭhiń oletʼkana. Isor do acʼren apostol hoyokʼ lạgitʼe hoho akawạdińa ar uniakʼ bhage sombat porcar lạgitʼ hõe bachao akadińạ.
Isor do acʼren nạbiko hotete sonot sostorkore noa bhage sombat reakʼ laharegeye gokʼ dohoakatʼ tahẽkana.
Ona bhage sombat do hoyokʼ kana acʼren Hopon reaṅge. Ar uni Hopon kangeae Jisu Mạsi, ar aboren Probhu do. Hoṛmo secʼ lekate uni do Dạud bõsrengeye tahẽkana,
ar acʼren sonot Jiute uni do maraṅ daṛe salakʼ gocʼko khone jiwetʼ beretʼente Isorren Hopon menteye sodorlena.
Uni hotete ar uniakʼ ńutum iạte ale do daya ar apostol hudạle ńamakada, jemon sanam jạtren hoṛko pạtiạukʼte Isorakʼko bataotae.
Onko hoṛko modre ape hõ menakʼpea. Jisu Mạsiren hoṛ hoyokʼ lạgitʼ Isorge ape doe hoho akawatʼpea.

Rom nagraharen okoeko hoṛ do Isore dulạṛetʼko ar acʼren hoṛ hoyokʼ lạgitʼe hohoakatʼko, onko sanamko ṭhen, metakʼme ape ṭhenge iń do noa ciṭhiń oletʼkana. Aboren Isor Baba ar Probhu Jisu mạsi doe mãyã apema ar suluke dan apema.
Pạhilrege iń do Jisu mạsi hotete ape sanamko iạte ińren Isoriń gunmanao joharae kana, ente apeakʼ biswạs reakʼ katha do goṭa dhạrtire pasnao akana.
Isorren Hopon reaṅ bhage sombat porcarte ińakʼ goṭa ontorte iń do Isoriń sewawae kana. Iń do tinạkʼ dhaoiń koejoṅkan unạkʼ dhaoge apeń disạ akatʼpea, ar onaren goha do unige.
Ińakʼ koejoṅ do noage, jãhã lekate Isor reakʼ monete jemon ape ṭheniń sen daṛeakʼ.
Ar ape daṛe ocope lạgitʼ jemon jãhãn Jiuanakʼ daya daniń em hạṭiń daṛeape onate ape tulucʼ ńapamokʼ iń menjoṅ kana.
Noa do hoyokʼ kana, abo sanamko jemon apan ạpin biswạs khon udgạu bon ńam.

E boehako, noa katha baḍaepe, ḍher dhao ape ṭhen calakʼ sanaledińre hõ ńit hạbicʼ akoṭakʼko do hecʼạń kangea. Cetʼleka eṭakʼ eṭakʼ jaegakore boṅgan hoṛ jạtrenko talare porcarkate jo iń ńamakatʼ, onkage apeko talare hõ thoṛa jo ńam reakʼ aste ape ṭhen calakʼ iń menjoṅ kana.
Sobbho ar osobbhoko, akelanko, bebujko ar sanamko ṭhenge iń do rinakatʼ hoṛ leka kạnạń.
Onate okoe Romre menakʼpe ape ṭhen hõ Jisu Mạsi reaṅ bhage sombat jạhirape lạgitʼ doń khaṛagea.

Jisu Mạsi reaṅ noa bhage sombat iạte iń do bạń lajaokʼ kana, ente noa bhage sombat do Isorakʼ daṛe kana one oka hotete uni do sanam biswạsiko kại khone bańcaoko. Pạhilte do Jihudiko, ar ona tayom do boṅgan hoṛ jạtrenkoge.

Isor manwako cetʼlekate dhorom menteye ataṅko ona do bhage sombat hotete sodor akana. Etohopʼ khon mucạtʼ hạbicʼ pạtiạu hotetege manwa do eken dhorom menteye ataṅ ocokʼa. Sonot sostorre olakana; “Dhoromicʼ do pạtiạu hotete jione ńama.”
Manwa do Isorakʼ sạriakʼtetʼ bedhoromteko ten esetʼeda, onate sanam bebhokti ar sanam bedhorom kạmiko iạte serma khon Isorakʼ edre do manwakore sodorokʼ kana.
Isor reaṅ oka baḍaeyokʼakʼ ona do manwako ṭhen pusṭạugea, ente Isor acʼtetʼge onko ṭhen onae sodor akada.

Isorakʼ oka gun mẽtʼte baṅ ńelokʼkan, metakʼme uniakʼ jaejug reakʼ daṛe ar uniakʼ Isortetʼ do sirjon reakʼ etohopʼ khonge pusṭạute sodorgea. Uniakʼ sirjon khonge manwa do bes okocʼte onako ńel oromeda arko bujhạu daṛeakʼ kana. Niạ tayom manwakoakʼ do ar jãhãn ạnḍuṅteakʼ baṅ tahena.
Manwa do uni reakʼakʼko baḍaekatere hõ Isor mente bako mạhimawadea, ar bako gunmanao joharadea. Onkoakʼ hudisjoṅakʼko do ạuṛiakʼena ar onkoakʼ bebuj ontor do ńutte perecʼ akana.
Onko do akote akelan hoṛ menteko lạiạgokʼkanre hõ asokaete onko doko lelhagea.
Jaejug ṭhonokte perecʼicʼ Isor sewa bạgikate onko do manwako, cẽṛẽko, janwarko ar leńokʼ ṭunḍạṅokʼkoakʼ muṭhạnko sewawakʼ kana.
Onate Isor do manwako akoakʼ ontor reakʼ bạṛicʼ sana ar hirkhạwakʼ kạmi lạgitʼe aṛakʼatʼkoa. Onate onko do ako akore hirkhạwakʼko kạmikante akoakʼ hoṛmoko bemanoteda.
Isorakʼ sạriakʼtetʼ bạgikate eṛeakʼko ataṅ akawana. Sisirjạuicʼ bạgikate uniakʼ sirjạuakʼko sewawakʼ kana, menkhan sanam mạhima do jaejug hạbicʼ uni sisirjạuicʼakʼ kangea. Amen.
Manwa noakoko kạmi akatʼte Isor do lajaote perecʼ rij roṅreye soprotkatʼkoa. Ente maejiuko do herel tulucʼ baṅkate eṭakʼ maejiuko tulucʼ bạṛicʼ ar lajao paṛaoakʼ kạmiko kạmi kana.

Onkage herel hõ maejiuko baṅkate herel tulucʼ rij roṅteko jaljalaokʼ kana; ar herel do herel tulucʼ lajao paṛaoakʼ bạṛicʼ kạmiko kạmikana. Onate onko mitʼke mitʼ hoṛ do akoakʼ bạṛicʼ kạmi reakʼ sạjại akoregeko ńameda.
Nonkate manwa do Isor bako manaoedete Isor hõ kại monreye soprotkatʼkoa, ar onatege manwa do be ṭhikakʼko kạmikana.
Jotolekan bedhorom, dusṭạmi, laloc, nicạṛakʼ, hiskạ, khũn, kạphạriạu, eṛe ar eṭakʼkoakʼ loksan tako reakʼ sanateko perecʼ akana. Onko do eṭakʼ hoṛ reaṅko cuglia,
eṭakʼkoakʼko oktawa ar Isorko hirkhạwaea. Onko do raṅgaokʼko, usul monanko ar bạḍạiko kanako. Bedhorom kạmi lạgitʼ nawa nawa ponthako ńamtotʼeda. Onko do go-baba bebataoko kanako,
boge bạṛicʼ papachnao reakʼ akel bạnukʼtakoa, bepạtiạrko kanako. Gharońjrenko lạgitʼ dulạṛ do bạnukʼtakoa, enteko kumãyãgea.

Isorakʼ bicạr reakʼ katha mońjtegeko baḍaea je, okoe nonkanakʼko kạmi onko do gujukʼ sạjại lek kanako mente. Ar noa katha baḍaekate hõ eken niạgeko kạmikana ona do baṅ, bickom eṭakʼko hõ onkan kạmi lạgitʼko sãhãkʼako kana.

Jãhãege noa iạte eṭakʼkoe dusiko enḍekhan uniń metaea, amakʼ ạnḍuṅteakʼ do okortam? Am do eṭakʼkom dusiyetʼkore apnarge cetʼ dusi mente bam sạbudokʼ kana? Ente eṭakʼko dom dusiyetʼkoa menkhan am do onagem kạmikana.
Baḍaegea bon okoe nonkanakʼko kạmikan Isor do onko hok reakʼgeye bicạrkoa.
Oka kạmi lạgitʼ eṭakʼkom dusiyetʼko ona kạmige am hõm kạmiyetʼ khan enḍekhan cetʼ Isorakʼ sạjại khonem paskao daṛeakʼa?
Am do Isorakʼ asambheṛ daya, sahao daṛe ar soborim neṅghaoetʼtaea. Am dom hiṛiń akada, Isorakʼ noa daya do kại khone ạcur ruạṛetʼmea mente.

Menkhan amakʼ mon do keṭecʼgea; am do kại khon mon ạcur bam khojkana. Onate am do Isorakʼ edre tis sodorokʼ, enhilokʼ lạgitʼ amakʼ paona sạjạyem sõcjoṅkana. Ar unrege Isorakʼ dhorom bicạr do sodorokʼa.
Uni do mitʼke mitʼ hoṛ akoakʼ kạmi lekae halawakoa.
Okoe sombhuri salakʼ bhage kạmikote Isor ṭhen khon ṭhonok, man ar bin maraokʼ jionko khojkan, onkoge Isor do jaejug jione emakoa.
Menkhan okoe akoakʼ sana lekako senokʼ, ar sạriakʼ baṅ bataokate bedhoromakʼko bataoetʼkan, Isor do onko ạḍi bạṛicʼe sạjạikoa.
Okoe bạṛicʼakʼko kạmikan onko mimitʼko do duk saset ar santaoko ńama. Pạhilre Jihudiko, ar ona tayom do boṅgan hoṛ jạtrenko.
Menkhan bhageakʼ kạmikanko do ṭhonok, man ar sulukko hameṭ joṅa. Pạhilre Jihudiko ar ona tayom do boṅgan hoṛ jạtrenkoge.
Ente Isor ṭhen mẽtʼãhã beṅgetʼakʼ do bạnukʼ anaṅ.
Moseakʼ ạn-ạri bahre tahẽkate okoeko kạiyetʼkan onko do begor ạntegeko nosṭokʼa. Menkhan okoe ạn bhitrire tahẽkateko kạiyetʼ onkoakʼ bicạr do ạn hotetege hoyokʼa.
Okoe eken ạn reakʼ kathako ańjometʼkan onko do Isor samaṅre dhorom doko baṅkana, menkhan ạn lekate calakʼkankoge Isor do dhorom menteye ataṅkoa.
Boṅgan hoṛ jạtrenko do Moseakʼ ạn bako ńamakada, menkhan enrehõ onko do apnar khonge ạn lekako kạmiyeda, ar ạn bako ńamakatʼre hõ onko do apnar lạgitʼ ạn kanako.
Ente ạn lekate oka lekge ona do onkoakʼ ontorrege ol menakʼa. Ar onkoakʼ bibek hõ ona gohageye emetʼkana. Onkoakʼ hudisge oka oka jokhecʼ doe dusikoa, arhõ oka jokhecʼ doe onko sejokʼa.
Oka hilokʼ Isor do Jisu Mạsi hotete manwakoakʼ okoakʼkoe bicạra enhilokʼge ona do sodorokʼa. Ar okaṭakʼ bhage sombatiń porcaretʼkan ona lekage bicạr do hoyokʼa.
Am do apnarte Jihudiyem ńumogokʼ kana? Am do Moseakʼ ạn-ạrikorem hirlạ joṅkana ar apnarte Isorren hoṛ mentem gorbokʼ kana.
Isor okae khojkan ona dom baḍaegea ar okaṭakʼ bhageakʼkan ona dom aṅgoceda, ente ạn-ạri khonge ona sikhnạt dom ńamakada.
Am dom hudiseda kãṛãko horem udukʼ akokana. Ar ńutre okoe menakʼko onko ṭhen do marsal lekam hudisokʼ kana.
Amakʼ hudisre, bebujko dom sudhrạuetʼkoa ar ạn-ạri reaṅ sikhạuna bako ńamakatʼ hoṛ dom cetʼako kana. Ạnre akel ar sạritetʼ menakʼ iạtege noako dom hudis aṭkareda.
Bhagegea, eṭakʼ hoṛkom cetʼakokanre am do cedakʼ bam cetʼjoṅ kana? Am dom porcareda, “Alom kombṛoea,” Menkhan amge cetʼ bam kombṛoyeda?
Am dom menetʼkana, “Alom laṭghaṭa,” Menkhan amge cetʼ bam laṭghaṭeda? Am ma murtikom hirkhạwako kan, menkhan amge cetʼ murtikoakʼ mundilte bolokate bam kombṛoyeda?
Am do ạn-ạrikotem gorbokʼ kana, menkhan amge ạn bam bataoetʼte Isorge cetʼ bam opomanede kana?
Sonot sostorre olakana, “Ape iạtege boṅgan hoṛ jạtrenko do Isorakʼ ńutumko opomanwakʼ kana.”
Ạn-ạrikom senakʼkan khan enḍekhan khatna do porhoanakʼ kangea, menkhan ạn-ạri bam bataoetʼ khan khatna akanre hõm Isor samaṅre do bin khatna akan hoṛ lekanam.
Onate jãhãe bin khatna hoṛ ạn-ạrikoe manaoetʼ khan enḍekhan Isor do cetʼ khatna akan hoṛ mente bae aṅgocea?
Am ṭhen ma coṅ olakʼ ạnko menakʼge ar khatna hõm khatna ocoakange. Menkhan ạn-ạriko bam bataoetʼ khan okoe bin khatnare hõ ạnkoe manaoetʼ, uni do cetʼ ạn bam bataoetʼkante bae dusimea?
Eken bahre secʼte okoeye Jihudikan uni do khạṭi Jihudi doe baṅkana. Ar hoṛmo bahre secʼte khatna akanicʼ hõ khạṭi khatnayicʼ doe baṅkana.

Menkhan ontorte okoe doe Jihudikan uni kangeae khạṭi Jihudi. Ar khạṭi khatna akan reakʼ kạmi hõ ontorrege hoyokʼa. Ona do sonot Jiu reakʼakʼko kana, olakʼ ạnko pańjae reakʼ do baṅkana. Nonkan hoṛ do manwa secʼ khon sarhao bako ńama, menkhan Isor khon sarhao doko ńamgea.
Ar onkage hoyokʼ khan enḍekhan Jihudikoakʼ do bises cetʼ porho hoeakana? Ar khatnakʼ reakʼ porho baṅ cetʼkan?
Joto secʼ khonge porhowanakʼ hoeakana. Pạhilte Isor do acʼakʼ katha Jihudikogeye ematʼko tahẽkana.
Onko modre adom hoṛ do bako pạtiạulena, menkhan onate do cekayena? Onko bako pạtiạu akan iạte Isor hõ cetʼ bepạtiạricʼe hoyokʼa?
Khạṭige baṅa. Sanam manwako eṛegere hõ Isor do jao okteye sạrigea. Sonot sostorre ol menakʼa, jemon amakʼ kathakore dhoromem ṭarhaokʼ arem bicạrokʼre dom jitạukʼ.

Menkhan aboakʼ behokakʼ kạmiko khon arhõ pusṭạute bujhạukʼ kana, Isor do jaoge hok reakʼe kạmikana. Enḍekhan cetʼ bon menkea, aboe sạjạiyetʼ bonre uni doe behokeda? Iń do manwa lekateń roṛeda, sạrige uni do tishõ bae behoka.
Isorre behokle khan enḍekhan cekate uni do manwakoakʼe bicạra?
Jãhãeye menkea, “Ińakʼ eṛe roṛ iạte Isorakʼ sạritetʼ do arhõ bes okocʼte sodorokʼ kana. Ar noate Isore mạhimakʼkan khan kại hoṛ mente cedakʼ iń doń dusi ocokʼ kana?”

Enḍekhan cetʼ noa katha bon mena, “Dela, bạṛicʼakʼ bon kạmi idima jemon bạṛicʼakʼ hotete bhageakʼ hoyokʼtabon?” Adom adom hoṛko nisṛạuetʼbona je, abo do nonkan kathage bon roṛ baṛayeda. Onko do akoakʼ sạjạiko ńamjoṅa.
Enḍekhan ńitokʼ cetʼbon menkea? Jihudi lekate cetʼ boṅgan hoṛ jạtrenko khonle sorosgea? Baṅa. Ente laharege coṅle menakatʼ Jihudiko ar boṅgan hoṛ jạtren sanamkoge kại gobolren kanako.
Sonot sostorre olakana, dhorom do okoe hõ bạnukʼkoa, mitʼ hoṛ hõ baṅ;
okoe hõ sạriakʼ reakʼ akelte do bako calakʼ kana. Ar okoe hõ Isorakʼ sana leka bako kạmi kana.
Sanamkoge sạri hor khonko ocokʼ akana, ar jotoge mitʼ sãoteko bạṛicʼ akana. Bhageakʼ kạmiko do okoe hõ bạnukʼkoa, mitʼ hoṛ hõ baṅa.
Onkoakʼ moca do oṭakʼ akatʼ topa lekana, onko do alaṅte eṛeko roṛa, ar luṭire do bińakʼ bis menakʼtakoa.
Onkoakʼ moca do sarap ar haṛhatʼte perecʼgetakoa.
Khũn lạgitʼ jaṅga do usạrate lahakʼtakoa,
onkoakʼ horkore do jarkhar ar harkhetge menakʼa.
Suluk reakʼ hor onko do bako baḍaea,
onko do Isor hõ bako botoraea.
Baḍaegea bon Moseakʼ ạn do onko lạgitʼge one okoe do ona ạn gobolre menakʼko. Onate Jihudi ar boṅgan hoṛ jạtrenko okoe hõ jãhãnakʼ mementeakʼ do bạnukʼtakoa, sanam manwage Isor samaṅreko dusigea.
Ạn-ạri manao lekhange Isor do manwa dhorom menteye ataṅkoa ona do baṅ, menkhan ạn hotetege manwa do acʼakʼ kại reaṅ cehaonae ńameda.
Isor do manwako ạn begorte cetʼlekate dhorom menteye ataṅkoa ona do ńitokʼ sodor akana. Moseakʼ ạnre ar nạbiko hõ ona reaṅ gohako emakada.
Okoe Jisu Mạsireko pạtiạukʼkan onkoakʼ ona biswạs hotetege Isor do dhorom mente onkoe ataṅkoa. Jihudi ar boṅgan hoṛ jạtrenko sanamgeko somangea,
ente sanamkogeko kại akada ar Isorakʼ sarhao ńam lạgitʼko be lekgea.
Menkhan Jisu Mạsi do manwa kại khon chaḍaoko reakʼe bondobos akada ar ona chaḍao hotete pạtiạukʼko do daya dan lekate dhorom menteye ataṅetʼkoa.

Isor doe sodorakatʼ tahẽkana je, okoeko pạtiạukʼkan onko lạgitʼ Jisu Mạsi do acʼakʼ mãyãm hotete, metakʼme acʼakʼ jiwiye alaeketʼte uniye kusi ocokedea. Nonkate Isor doe udukʼ akada acʼakʼ sahao gun iạte manwakoakʼ lahateakʼ kại reakʼ sạjại bae emlenre hõ uni doe dhoromgea.
Onate ńitokʼ sạbudokʼ kana je, acʼ cetʼlekae dhoromge onkage Jisure pạtiạukʼicʼ hõ dhorom menteye ataṅea.

Niạ tayom manwa do gorbokʼ reakʼ ar cetʼ menakʼtaea? Cetʼhõ baṅa. Menkhan cedakʼ bạnukʼa? Manwa do ạnkoe manaoetʼkante gorbokʼ reakʼ cetʼge bạnukʼtaea? Ona do baṅa. Sạri katha do noa kana, biswạsre gorbokʼ reakʼ jaega do bạnukʼa,
ente bon baḍaegea, Isor do biswạs hotete manwa do dhorom menteye ataṅea, menkhan ạn-ạriko manaote do baṅ.
Isor do cetʼ eken Jihudikoren kangeae, boṅgan hoṛ jạtrenko doe baṅkana? Hẽ, uni do boṅgan hoṛ jạtkoren hõ Isor kanae,
ente Isor doe mitʼ goṭengea. Uni do Jihudiko cetʼleka biswạs hotete dhorom menteye ataṅ akatʼko onkage boṅgan hoṛ jạtrenko hõe dhorom ocokoa.
Noa biswạs iạte cetʼ ạn-ạriko bon mạutạyeda? Tis hõ baṅ, bickom ạn reakʼ katha sạrikana mente bon sạbudetʼ kana.
Enḍekhan aboren mare hapṛam Abraham reaṅ do cetʼ bon menkea? Noa babotre uni do cetʼe ńelleda?
Abraham do kạmiko iạte dhorom menteye ataṅ ocoakan khan enḍekhan uniakʼ gorbokʼ reakʼ do menakʼgetaea. Menkhan Isor samaṅre acʼakʼ gorbokʼ reaṅ cetʼge bạnukʼtaea.
Sonot sostorre olakana; “Abraham do Isorakʼ kathareye pạtiạuena ar onate Isor do dhorom menteye ataṅkedea.”
Kạmikate okaṭakʼ kuṛại ńamokʼ, ona do dan do baṅkana, menkhan paona kana.
Menkhan okoe acʼakʼ kạmire bhorsa baṅkate eken Isorreye pạtiạukʼkan, Isor do uniakʼ biswạs iạte dhorom menteye lekhayea, ente unige kại hoṛ do dhorom menteye lekha daṛeaea.
Dạud hõ onkan hoṛ do bhạganicʼe metaekana one okoe Isor do begor kạmitege dhorom menteye lekhayede; enkathae,
bhạgangeako onko do, one okoekoakʼ bedhoromakʼko ikạ akantako, ar okoeakʼ kạiko dapal akantako.
Bhạgangeae uni hoṛ do, one okoeakʼ kạiko Probhui ikạ akatʼtae.

Nonḍe do cetʼ eken khatna ocoakankoge bhạganko men ocoakana? Ar bin khatna akanko lạgitʼ hõ cetʼ baṅ men akana? Hẽ, onko hõ bhạgankoko men ocoakangea, ente bon meneda, “Abraham do biswạs iạte dhorom menteye lekha akana.”
Oka obostare lekhayentaea? Khatna tayom se khatna ạurire? Khatna tayom do baṅ menkhan ạuriye khatnakʼrege.

Khatna ạurire biswạs iạtege Isor do dhorom menteye lekhakedea ar onage tahẽkana uniakʼ sạbudokʼ reakʼ cinhạ. Enḍekhan ńelokʼkana, khatna begorte okoe do eken biswạs hotete dhorom menteko ataṅ ocokʼkan, onko sanamkoren hõ Abraham deo baba kana.
Ona chaḍa, khatnakʼ lahare Abraham do cetʼleka biswạs reakʼ horreye taṛametʼ tahẽkan, onkage khatna akan okoe doko calakʼkan onkoren hõ Abraham doe baba kana.

Abraham ar uniren bõsko ṭhen Isor doe gokʼleda je, noa dhạrti do Abrahamakʼge hoyokʼa. Ạn-ạriko pańjaete do baṅ, menkhan biswạs hotete uni do dhorom menteye lekhayena ar onatege ona gokʼakʼ do doholena.
Ạn-ạriko pańjaete jãhãe dhạrti reakʼ ạidạriye ńam khan, enḍekhan pạtiạu do okạjuạgea ar Isorakʼ ona gokʼakʼ reakʼ hõ jãhãn damge baṅ tahena.
Ente ạn-ạri do Isorakʼ sạjạiye ạguea. Sạri katha do noage, okare ạnko baṅ tahen onḍe do ạn bemanot reakʼ kukli hõ oho rakapʼlena.

Onate manwakoakʼ biswạste noa gokʼakʼ do purạu akana, jemon noa do Isorakʼ daya reakʼ dan hoyokʼ. Onate Abraham bõsrenko lạgitʼ noa gokʼakʼ do khạṭige purạukʼa. Noa gokʼakʼ do eken ạn-tạriren hoṛko lạgitʼ purạukʼa ona do baṅ, menkhan okoeko hoṛ do Abraham leka inạ mitʼ pạtiạureko pạtiạu akan onko lạgitʼ hõ noa gokʼakʼ do khạṭige purạukʼa.

Sonot sostorre olakan leka, “Iń do ạḍi utạr jạtkoren babageń hoe ocoakatʼmea,” Ona lekate Isor samaṅre Abraham do abo sanamkoren baba kanae. Okoe gocʼkoe jiwetʼetʼko ar bạnukʼakʼko hõ menakʼakʼko lekae metakʼkan uni Isorrege Abraham doe pạtiạulena.

Abraham do baba hoyokʼ reakʼ jãhãn asge baṅ tahẽkantaere hõ uni do Isorre askate pạtiạu akane tahẽkana. Isor do uniye metade tahẽkana, “Amren bõsko do sermaren ipil leka saṅgeko hoyokʼa.” Ar ona katha lekage Abraham do ạḍi utạr jạtkoren babae hoelena.
Mitʼ sae umerren haṛam Abraham doe bujhạu daṛeakʼ tahẽkana je, hoṛmo do okạjuạ akantaea ar Sara hõ gidrạ hoyokʼ reakʼ umer do bạnukʼtaea, ar enrehõ uni do biswạsre nijor bae tahẽkana.
Isorakʼ gokʼakʼre uniakʼ monre tis hõ jãhãn digdhạ baṅ hecʼ akawade tahẽkana, bickom pạtiạure arhõ keṭecʼ tahente uni do Isore sarhaoedekan tahẽkana.
Abraham do purạte noae pạtiạukʼkan tahẽkana je, Isor okaṭakʼe gokʼakawade ona purạu lạgitʼ daṛe do menakʼgetaea mente.
Onate Abrahamakʼ biswạs do dhorom mente lekhayentaea.
“Dhorom menteye lekhayena,” Noa katha do eken Abraham moto lạgitʼ do baṅ olakana,
aboko lạgitʼ hõ olakana. Biswạs iạte Isor do abo hõ dhorom menteye lekha bona, ente aboren Probhu Jisu gocʼko khon okoeye jiwetʼ beretʼkede, abo do unirege bon pạtiạu akana.
Aboakʼ kạiko iạte Jisu do gujukʼ tireye soprotʼlena ar dhorom mente ataṅ bon lạgitʼ uni do gocʼko khone jiwetʼ beretʼ ocoyena.
Biswạs hotetege bon dhorom ocoakana ar ona iạtege Probhu Jisu Mạsi hotete Isor ar abo talare suluk hoeakana.
Ńitokʼ Isorakʼ daya reakʼ oka horte bon calakʼkan onḍe do Mạsire pạtiạu iạte bon seṭer akana. Ar Isorakʼ ṭhonok ńam reakʼ asre bon rạskạkʼ kana.
Eken ona do baṅ, harkhet sasetre hõ bon rạskạkʼ kana, ente bon baḍaea harkhet saset reakʼ jo do soboriye hoe ocoea,
ar sobori reakʼ jo do bhage colon ar bhage colon reakʼ jo do asge.
Noa as do bae lajao ocobona, ente Isore emakan sonot Jiu hotete aboakʼ ontor do acʼakʼ dulạṛteye perecʼ akada.
Nijor bon tahẽkanre Mạsi do ṭhik okterege be-bhoktiae manwako lạgitʼ, metakʼme abon lạgitʼgeye gocʼlena. Jãhãe dhorom hoṛ lạgitʼ okoehõ jiwi do bako em lạgidokʼa.
Okoe eṭakʼkoe bhạlạyetʼko onkan hoṛ lạgitʼ hoedaṛeakʼa jãhãe dilkate jiwi emreye hõ em daṛekea.
Menkhan Isor je aboe dulạṛetʼ bon ona reakʼ cinhạ do noage, kại hoṛ bon tahẽkanrege Mạsi do abo lạgitʼ jiwiye emkeda.
Enḍekhan Mạsiakʼ mãyãm hotete tinre abo do dhorom mente bon ataṅ ocoakana unre abon do Mạsi hotetege Isorakʼ sạjại khon khạṭige rukhiyạ bon ńama.
Abo do Isorren bạiribon tahẽkanre acʼren Hoponakʼ gujukʼte uni tulucʼ bon samge ocoakana. Ar nonkage bon samge ocoakante Mạsiakʼ jionte khạṭige kại khon bańcao bon ńama.
Eken ona do baṅ, okoe hotete Isor tulucʼ bon samge akan uni Probhu Jisu Mạsi hotete abo do Isor sãote bon rạskạ midokʼ kana.
Mitʼṭen manwa hotete dhạrtire kại boloyena ar ona kại hotete gujukʼ hõ boloyena. Ente sanam manwako kại akatʼte sanamko ṭhenge gujukʼ hõ boloyena.
Moseakʼ ạn ạuri tahen khonge dhạrtire do kại tahẽkana, menkhan ạn baṅ tahen khan kại do kại mente oho lekha lena.

Enrehõ Adam khon ehopʼkate Mose hạbicʼ sanamko cetanrege gujukʼ do raje calaokeda. Isorakʼ hukum manao baṅkate okoe do Adam leka bako kại akatʼ onko cetanre hõ gujukʼ do raje calaoleda. Ar okoeakʼ hijukʼ reakʼ katha tahẽkan, uni Jisu Mạsiren nạmunage Adam doe tahẽkana.

Menkhan Adamakʼ kại ghạṭko okaleka kan, Isorakʼ bin damanakʼ dan onka do baṅkana. Tinre mitʼṭen hoṛakʼ kại iạte aema doko gocʼena, unre Isorakʼ daya ar mitʼṭen manwa hotete oka dan hecʼen, ona do artetʼ aemako lạgitʼge sareṛena! Ar uni mitʼṭen manwa doe hoyokʼ kana Jisu Mạsi.

Isorakʼ dan do Adamakʼ kại reakʼ jo leka do baṅkana, ente mitʼṭen kại reaṅ bicạr lekate sanam manwakoge sạjại lek kanako menteko lekha ocoakana, menkhan dhorom mente Isor ṭhen ataṅokʼ reakʼ nokʼoe noa daya dan, ona do ạḍi utạr kại iạte hecʼakana.

Mitʼṭen manwawakʼ kại gunạkʼte gujukʼ ar uni mitʼ hoṛ hotetege rajokʼe ehopʼleda. Menkhan okoe do Isorakʼ asambheṛ daya ar dhorom menteko ataṅ ocokʼ, onko do uni mitʼ hoṛ, metakʼme Jisu Mạsi hotete sạri jion reakʼ perecʼtetʼ iạte khạṭigeko rajokʼa.

Enḍekhan mitʼṭen kại hotete cetʼleka sanam manwako sạjại ńam lek kanako menteko lekhakʼ kan, onkage mitʼṭen dhorom kạmi hotete sanam manwakoge dhorom mente aṅgocko lạgitʼ bondobos hõ dohoakana ar ona reakʼ jo do hoyokʼ kana jaejug jion.
Cetʼleka mitʼṭen manwawakʼ bebakʼtao hotete ḍherkoge kại hoṛ menteko lekhayen, onkage mitʼṭen manwawakʼ batao iạte ḍher hoṛ do dhorom menteko ataṅ ocokʼa.
Ạn-ạriko emena jemon behokakʼko ḍherokʼ, menkhan okare behokakʼ ḍherena onḍege Isorakʼ daya hõ artetʼge bạ̃ṛtiyena.

Ona daya do noa iạtege ḍherena jemon gujukʼ talate cetʼleka kại do raje calaoetʼ tahẽkan, onkage manwa hõ dhorom menteye aṅgocokʼte ńitokʼ uniakʼ daya do rajokʼ: ar ona reakʼ jo do hoyokʼkana aboren Probhu Jisu Mạsi hotete jaejug jion hameṭ joṅ.
Enḍekhan cetʼ noa bon mena, Isorakʼ daya jemon bạ̃ṛtikʼ, onate kại iditege bon tahena?
Khạṭige baṅa. Ente kại secʼte ma bon gocʼge; enḍekhan cekate abo do arhõ kại horte bon calakʼa?
Noa katha do cetʼ bape baḍaea je, abo okoe Mạsi Jisure bon bạptis akan, abo do uniakʼ gujukʼre seletʼkatege bon onka akada mente?

Onate bạptisma hotete Mạsi tulucʼ bon gocʼena arbon topayena, jemon Isor Baba cetʼleka acʼakʼ maraṅ daṛe hotete Mạsi gocʼko khone jiwetʼ beretʼakade onkage abo hõ jemon nãwã jion reakʼ hor rebon taṛam daṛeakʼ.
Mạsi sãotebon gocʼente cetʼleka unire bon mitʼakan, ar cetʼleka gocʼko khone jiwetʼ beretʼ akan, ṭhik onkage abo hõ uni tulucʼ bon jiwetʼ beredokʼa.
Baḍaegea bon, aboakʼ kại hoṛmo marao lạgitʼge aboren ‘mare hoṛtetʼ’ do Mạsi sãoteye krus ocoyena jemon kạiren golam ar alo bon tahen;
ente okoeye gocʼ akan uni do kại khon chaḍaoe ńam akada.
Abo do tinre Mạsi tulucʼ bon gocʼakana unre bon pạtiạukʼ kana je, uni tulucʼ jiwetʼ hõ bon tahena.
Baḍaegea bon Mạsi do gocʼko khone jiwetʼ beretʼ ocoakante ar tishõ bae gujukʼa, metakʼme uni cetanre moron do ar bae mạlik daṛeakʼa.
Uni tinreye gocʼlena unre uni do kại secʼteye gocʼlena; ar unire kại reakʼ jãhãnakʼ ar do baṅ tahẽlena. Ńitokʼ uni doe jewetʼ beretʼ akante Isor lạgitʼ bańcao menaea.
Ṭhik onkage noa kathare pạtiạukʼpe je, Jisu Mạsi tulucʼpe mitʼ akante ape hõ kạirepe gocʼ akana, ar ńitokʼ do Isor lạgitʼ jiwetʼ menakʼpea.
Onate apeakʼ gujukʼakʼ hoṛmore kại do raj alope calao ocoaea. Arpe calao ocoae khan apeakʼ hoṛmo reakʼ bạṛicʼ sana gobolrepe calao idikʼa.

Hoṛmo reakʼ oka hạṭiń hõ behokakʼ kạmi reakʼ hạtiạr lekate kại reakʼ tire alope jimạkakʼa. Gocʼko khon jiwetʼ akan hoṛko lekate ape do Isor ṭhen gobolokʼpe ar dhorom kạmi reakʼ hạtiạr lekate apeakʼ goṭa hoṛmoge Isor emaepe.
Ape do kạiren golam dope baṅkana, ente Isorakʼ daya tạriren kanape, ạn-tạriren dope baṅkana.
Menkhan ạn-tạrire tahẽ baṅkate daya tạriren bon hoeakante cetʼ enḍekhan bon kạigea? Khạṭige baṅa.

Ape do cetʼ bape baḍaea, golam leka jãhãeakʼ gobolrepe tahen ar uniakʼ hukumkope bataotae khan uniren golamkope hoyokʼ kana mente? Onkage ape do kạiren golam hoyokʼtepe gujukʼa, ar baṅkhan Isorren golam leka dhoromakʼkope kạmiya.
Menkhan Isorakʼ sarhao hoyokʼma, ente ape do kạiren golampe tahẽkanre hõ, okaṭakʼ sikhạunape ńamakatʼ ona reakʼ do goṭa ontortepe batao akada.
Kại khonpe sạdhinente dhoromren golampe hoeakana.

Manwakoakʼ nijortetʼ iạte iń do manwako bujhạu ocoko lekage kathań roṛeda. Ape hõ cetʼleka lahate artetʼ behokakʼ kạmi lạgitʼ apeakʼ hoṛmo hạṭińko besapha ar bedhoromren golampe hoe ocoletʼ, onkage ńitokʼ do sonotre hara rakabokʼte apeakʼ hoṛmo hạṭińko dhorom kạmi lạgitʼ golam hoe ocoetape.
Tinre ape do kạiren golampe tahẽkana unre dhoromren golam do bape tahẽkana.
Lahateakʼ okako kạmi reakʼ kathako hudiskate ńitokʼpe lajaokʼkan onako kạmi khon apeakʼ do cetʼ porho hoekokʼa? Ona reakʼ mucạtʼ jo do hoyokʼ kana moron.
Menkhan ńitokʼ do kại khonpe sạdhin akante Isorren golampe hoeakana. Onate porho do noage hoeakana, ape dope sonot ocokʼa, ar ona reakʼ mucạtʼ jo do hoyokʼ kana jaejug jion.
Kại reakʼ kuṛại do moron kana, menkhan Isorakʼ daya dan do aboren Probhu Mạsi hotete jaejug jionge.
E boehako ape ma ạn-ạrikope baḍaege. Ape do cetʼ bape baḍaea, manwa jiwetʼ tahen bhorge ạn do uni cetanreye mạlikokʼ kana mente?
Jãwãetetʼ tinạkʼ din jiwetʼe tahen, unạkʼ din bạhu hõ ạn-tạrire tolgeye tahena. Menkhan jãwãetetʼe gocʼlen khan ona ạn-tạri reakʼ tonol khon bạhu doe sạdhinokʼa.

Onate jãwãetetʼ jiwetʼ tahenrege eṭakʼ herel ṭhene jãwãelen khan enḍekhan uni do laṭghaṭicʼ menteye bikạukʼa. Menkhan jãwãetetʼe gocʼlen khan uni do ona ạn-tạri reakʼ tonol khone sạdhingea. Unre eṭakʼ jãhãe ṭhene jãwãelenre hõ uni do loṭghoṭiyicʼ bae hoyokʼa.

Ṭhik onkage E ińren boehako, Mạsiakʼ hoṛmo secʼte ar Moseakʼ ạn-ạri lekate ape hõpe gocʼena. Onate ape do okoe gocʼko khone jiwetʼ beretʼ ocoakan uni Jisu Mạsiren pe hoeakana, jemon apeakʼ jion do Isor lạgitʼ jo daṛeakʼ.
Kại gobolre bon tahẽkanre ạn-ạriko do abo talare kại reakʼ laloce rakapʼ ocoyetʼ tahẽkana ar ona lalocge aboakʼ hoṛmoreye kạmikan tahẽkana; onate aboakʼ jionre moron lạgitʼ bon jokʼ kan tahẽkana.

Unre abo okaṭakʼko tol akawatʼbon tahẽkan onarege bon gocʼlena. Onate ńitokʼ do ạn khon bon sạdhingea. Ona iạte abo do olakʼ ạn-ạri reaṅ ona sedaeakʼ jion horren golam dobon baṅkana, menkhan sonot Jiu emakʼ nawa jion horren golam bon hoeakana.

Enḍekhan cetʼ bon mena, ạn do bạṛicʼgea? Khạṭige baṅa; bickom noa katha do ṭhikgea je, ạnko baṅ tahẽlen khan kại do cetʼ kana mente ohoń baḍae daṛelea. “Alom laloca,” Ạn-ạrire noa katha baṅ lạilen khan laloc do cetʼ kana mente ona hõ ohoń baḍaelea.
Menkhan kại do hukum reakʼ ạte ńamketʼte ińre joto lekan laloce omon ocokeda, ente ạnko baṅ tahẽlen khan kại do gocʼge tahẽkokʼa.
Ińakʼ jionre ạnko hijukʼ lahare iń do jiwetʼgeń tahẽkana, menkhan hukum hijukʼ são sãote kại hõ jiwetʼ ruạṛena.
Ar iń hõń gocʼena. Okaṭakʼ hukum iạte jion ńam reakʼ katha, ona do iń lạgitʼ gujukʼe ạgukeda,
ente ona hukum reakʼ ạt iạte kại doe bulạukedeńa, ar ona hukum hotetege kại doe gocʼkedeńạ.
Noa katha do khạṭigea je, ạn do sonotgea ar ona reakʼ hukum hõ sonot, dhorom ar bhagegea.

Enḍekhan okaṭakʼ bhạlạiyakʼ kan ona hotete cetʼ iń doń gocʼena? Tisge baṅa, bickom bhạlạiyakʼ hotetege kại do ińakʼ gujukʼe hoeocokeda, jemon kại do kại kana mente oromokʼ. Ar kại je tinạkʼ bạṛicʼakʼ kana ona do hukum hotetege bujhạukʼ kana.
Baḍaegea bon ạn do Jiu reaṅ kana, menkhan iń doń kại gobolren kante kạiren golamiń hoeakana.
Iń okaṭakʼ iń kạmikan ona do iń nijạge bạń bujhạueda, ente okaṭakʼ cekayiń menetʼkan ona do bạń onkayeda bickom okakoń hirkhạwakʼ kan onakogeń onkayeda.
Okaṭakʼ bạń khojkan, onageń kạmikan khan iń do noań aṅgocetʼ kana je, ạnko do bhagegea.
Enḍekhan ńelokʼ kana apnarte noako do bạń kạmikana, menkhan ińre oka kại bolo akan unige onakoe kạmi ocoyediń kana.
Ińiń baḍaea ińre, metakʼme ińakʼ jel reakʼ sanare bhage mente do cetʼge bạnukʼa. Ar okaṭakʼ sạrige bhageakʼkan ona kạmi reakʼ sana menakʼgea menkhan daṛe do bạnukʼtińa.
Okako bhage kạmi sanańkan ona do bạń kạmiyeda, bickom ona bodolte oka bạń khojkan onako bạṛicʼ kạmiyiń kạmiyeda.
Okaṭakʼ kạmi bạń menjoṅkan, onageń kạmikan khan apnarte ona do bạń kạmiyeda, bickom ińre berel akan kạige onae kạmi ocoyediń kana.
Enḍekhan ińre mitʼṭen niạm kạmikaniń ńel ńameda. Ona niạm do noage okaṭakʼ bhageakʼ tinre kạmiń menjoṅ unre bạṛicʼakʼ do jao ghuṛi ińre tahenkana.
Ińakʼ ontor do Isorakʼ ạn-ạrikoteye rạskạkʼ kana;

enrehõ iń doń ńel ńameda je, mitʼṭen eṭakʼ lekan niạm do ińakʼ hoṛmoreye kạmikana. Oka bhageakʼkan ińakʼ mon do onage bhageakʼ menteye ataṅeda, menkhan noa eṭakʼ niạm do ińakʼ mon birudreye lạṛhại kana, are gobol akadińạ. Ińre oka kại menakʼ noage ona reakʼ niạm do.
Hae iń dukhạliạ hoṛ do! Ińre noa kại, one oka do gujukʼe ạguyetʼ, ona khon okoeye rukhiyạińạ?

Aboren Probhu Jisu Mạsi hotete iń do Isor iń sarhaoedekana je, uni do ińe rukhiyạ akadińạ. Enḍekhan ńelokʼ kana je, mon secʼte iń do Isorakʼ ạnren golam kạnạń, menkhan kại secʼte do kại reakʼ niạmren golamge.
Okoe Jisu Mạsireko kolom mitʼakan Isor do onko sạjạyokʼ lek mente bae hudiskoa.
Jionren mạlik sonot Jiu reakʼ niạmge Jisu Mạsi hotete kại ar gujukʼ reakʼ niạm khone chaḍao akadińạ.

Manwawakʼ kại gunạkʼte ạnko do nijor akan tahẽkana, ona iạte ạn oka bae daṛeakʼkan tahẽkan, Isor ona do acʼgeye onka akada. Uni do kại meṭao lạgitʼ acʼren bin-dusạn Hopon manwa muṭhạn emkateye kolkedea ar acʼren Hoponakʼ gujukʼ hotete kại reakʼe bicạrketʼte ona reakʼ daṛeye ocokʼkeda.
Uni do noa iạtegeye onkakeda, jemon kại gobolre tahẽ baṅkate sonot Jiuakʼ gobolre bon senokʼte abore ạnko purạukʼ.
Okoe kại gobolre menakʼko onko do kại okae khoj ona reakʼgeko moneakʼa; ar okoe sonot Jiu gobolre menakʼko onko do sonot Jiu okae khoj ona reakʼgeko moneakʼa.
Kại okae khojkan ona reakʼ monejoṅakʼ do moron kana, ar sonot Jiu reakʼ khojogokʼ leka senokʼ do jion ar sulukge.
Okaṭakʼ mon do kại okae khoj onageye moneakʼ, ona mon do Isor birudgea, ente ona do Isorakʼ ạn bae bataoa ar manao hõ bae manaoa.
Onate okoe kại reakʼ gobolre menakʼko onko do Isor ohoko kusi oco daṛelea.
Menkhan Isorren Jiu apeakʼ ontorreye berel akan khan ape do kại gobolren dope baṅkana bickom sonot Jiu gobolren kanape. Okoeakʼ ontorre Mạsiren Jiu bạnui uni do Mạsiren doe baṅkana.
Menkhan Mạsi apeakʼ ontorre menae khan enḍekhan kại iạte apeakʼ hoṛmo gocʼlenre hõ aperen Jiu doe jiwetʼgea, ente Isor do dhorom menteye ataṅ akatʼpea.
Okoe do Jisu gocʼko khone jiwetʼ beretʼakade uni Isorren Jiu apeakʼ ontorreye girobas akan khan, enḍekhan Isor do acʼren uni Jiu hotete apeakʼ gujukʼakʼ hoṛmo hõe jiwetʼ ocoetapea.
Onate E boehako, abo do dharaoko kana bon, menkhan ona dharaoakʼ do kại ṭhen do baṅ. Kại gobolre colon reakʼ jạruṛ do ar bạnukʼ anaṅ.
Ape do kại gobolrepe colon khan jaejug lạgitʼpe gujukʼa. Menkhan sonot Jiu hotete hoṛmo reakʼ sanam bạṛicʼakʼ kạmikope marao giḍiletape khan, enḍekhan jaejug hạbicʼ jiwetʼpe tahena,
ente okoe Isorren Jiu hoteteko ạyur ocokʼkan onkoge Isorren hoponko hoyokʼa.

Ape ma golami reakʼ Jiu ma bape ńamakade one onatepe botorkokʼ; Ape do Isorren Jiupe ńam akadea one okoe do hopon hoyokʼ reakʼ ạidạriye emakatʼpe. Ona iạtege Isor do Abba, metakʼme Baba mente bon hohoaekana.
Sonot Jiu hõ acʼge aboakʼ ontorre noa gohae emetʼkana je, abo do Isorren gidrạko kana bon.

Ar gidrạko bon hoeakan khan, enḍekhan Isor acʼren gidrạko okaṭakʼ emokʼ reakʼe gokʼatʼko tahẽkan abo hõ ona bon ńama. Mạsige Isor ṭhen khon onae ńama ar abo hõ uni sãote ona bon ńama, ente Mạsi sãote bon harket sasetlen khan abo hõ uni sãote ṭhonokren bhạgiạdar bon hoyokʼ.
Ińiń baḍaea, oka ṭhonok bon ńam ona tulucʼ jurikʼ lạgitʼ aboakʼ nahakʼ jug reakʼ harket ar sasetko do cetʼge baṅkana.
Isorren hoponko tinre ona ṭhonokteko sodorokʼa ona lạgitʼ sanam sirjon do gagocokʼ tulucʼe ńel horeda.
