Ente sirjon do ạuṛiakʼ ṭhene tabe ocoyena. Acʼakʼ kusite do baṅ hoeakana, Isorge uni doe tabe ocoakadea. Menkhan ona são sãote noa as hõe emakana,
sirjon do acʼ hõ nosṭokʼ reakʼ tonol khone chaḍao ocokʼte Isorren hoponkoakʼ ṭhonok reakʼ sạdhintetʼ lạgitʼ bhạgiạdare hoedaṛeakʼa.
Baḍaegea bon, goṭa sirjonge bedonte ńit hạbicʼ mitʼteko kũhrạuetʼ kana.

Eken ona do baṅ, menkhan oka mạhima tayomte bon ńam, ona reakʼ pạhil jo lekate sonot Jiu ńamkate abo hõ apnarakʼ ontorre bon kũhrạukʼ kana. Ona sãote ona din lạgitʼ hõ ńel horre menakʼbona one tinre abo do Isorren hoponko mente bon sodor ocokʼ, metakʼme nonosṭoakʼ ti khon aboakʼ hoṛmo do sạdhinokʼ tabona.
Kại khon bańcao ńamkate abo do noa asge bon ńamakada. Ar oka lạgitʼ bon asakan ona bon ńamakatʼ khan enḍekhan ona as do ar asge baṅ tahẽlena. Oka ńam akan, ona lạgitʼ do ar okoeye asokʼa?
Menkhan oka baṅ ńam akan ona reakʼ aboakʼ as tahen khan enḍekhan abo do sombhurikatere hõ ona lạgitʼ bon ńel hohorkana.

Noa chaḍa aboakʼ nijortetʼre sonot Jiu doe goṛo abon kana. Ar cetʼ leka koejoṅ lek tabon ona do babon baḍae kana, menkhan oka roṛte baṅ sodorokʼ onkan kũhrạu tulucʼ sonot Jiu do acʼge abo lạgitʼe nehõrokʼ kana.
Okoe manwakoakʼ ontore ńeletʼkan uni do sonot Jiuakʼ mon reakʼ katha hõe baḍaea, ente sonot Jiu do Isorakʼ sanalekage Isorren hoṛko lạgitʼe nehõrokʼkana.
Baḍaegea bon okoe Isorko dulạṛede, metakʼme Isor acʼakʼ monsubạ leka okoekoe hohoakatʼko onko bhạlạiko lạgitʼ jotowakʼge mitʼ sãoteye kạmikana.
Isor do okoeko lahareye bachao akatʼko onko do acʼren hopon hoyokʼ lạgitʼ laha khongeye ṭhik doho akatʼko tahẽkana, jemon uni Hopon do ạḍi utạr boehako modre maraṅicʼe hoyokʼ.

Okoe laha khone ṭhik dohoakatʼko tahẽkan onko do hoho hõe hohoatʼkoa; ar okoeye hohoatʼko onko do dhorom mente ataṅ hõe ataṅketʼkoa; ar okoeko dhorom menteye ataṅketʼko onko do acʼakʼ ṭhonok hõe danatʼkoa.
Enḍekhan noako babotre cetʼbon menkea? Isor abo tulucʼ menae khan enḍekhan jãhãeye hạn daṛekebona?
Isor do acʼren Hopon hõ bae mãyãwadea bickom abo sanamko lạgitʼ gujukʼ tireye emkedea. Enḍekhan uni do cetʼ Hopon sãote ar sanamakʼko bae danabona?
Isor okoekoe bachao akatʼko onko birudre do okoeye lạlisa? Isor acʼge coṅ onko ma dhorom menteye ataṅ akatʼko.
Ar okoe hale onko do dusi menteye ṭahraokoa? Okoeye gocʼlen ar gocʼko khone jiwetʼ beretʼ ocoyen uni Mạsi Jisu do ńitokʼ Isorakʼ jojomsa aṛere menaea ar abon lạgitʼe nehõrokʼ kana.
Nonkanakʼ cetʼ menakʼa one onate Mạsiakʼ dulạṛ khone begar daṛeabon? Saset? Mon reakʼ kosṭo? Santao? Reṅgecʼ? Kicricʼ khạnḍwạkʼ reakʼ okulạn? Muhin? Se gujukʼ?
Sonot sostorre olakana, am iạte jaogele gocʼ ocokʼ kana: ar jabe ocokʼ bhiḍiko lekageko hudisetʼlea.
Menkhan okoe apeye dulạṛetʼpe uni hotete noa sanamakʼ talate hõ abo do purạute bon jitạu akana.
Iń do noa katha bes okocʼtegeń baḍaea, moron se jion, serma goḍet se Soetanren goḍet, menakʼakʼko se darakanakʼko se eṭakʼ jãhãn daṛeko,
se serma cetan se dhạrti latar reakʼ jãhãnakʼ sirjạukʼge okoe hõ Isorakʼ dulạṛ khon ohoko begar daṛelebona. Isorakʼ noa dulạṛ do aboren Probhu Mạsi Jisurege menakʼa.
Ińren boehako bodolte, metakʼme iń jạtren hoṛko bodolte hoedaṛeakʼ khan iń apnarge Mạsi ṭhen khon pharakokʼ reakʼ sarapiń hataokea.

Onko ma Israel jạtren hoṛ kanako. Isor do hopon hoyokʼ reakʼ ạidạriye emakatʼkoa, uni do acʼakʼ ṭhonoke udukʼ akawatʼkoa, onko lạgitʼ bondobose dohoakada, ạn-ạrikoe emakada, acʼ sewawae reakʼ ponthae emakana ar ạḍi utạr gokʼakʼ hõe gokʼakawatʼkoa.

Isorren maraṅ sewako do onkoren hapṛamkogeko tahẽkana ar manwa lekate Mạsi do onko bõsregeye janamlena. Uni kangeae Isor do, one uni sanamakʼ cetanre menae; jaejug hạbicʼ uniakʼge sarhao hoyokʼtae ma. Amen.
Isorakʼ katha je eṛeteakʼ hoeakan ona do baṅa, ente okoe Israel jạtreko janamakan onko sanamkoge khạṭi Israel doko baṅkana.
Onko doko Abrahamren bõskanre hõ uniren sạriakʼren hopon doko baṅkana, bickom sonot sostor reakʼ katha leka, “Isạhakren bõskoge amren bõs menteko ńumogokʼa.”
Metakʼme, Israel jạtreko janam akanre hõ Isorren gidrạ doko baṅkana, menkhan Isorakʼ gokʼakʼ lekate okoekoakʼ janam hoeakan, onkoge Abrahamren bõs menteko lekhakʼa.
Ona gokʼakʼ do noage, “Ṭhik oktereń ruạṛ hijukʼa ar Sararen do mitʼṭen koṛa gidrại hoyokʼtaea.”
Eken ona do baṅ, Rebekaren jawa gidrạ hõ uni mitʼ herel hoṛren gidrạge kin tahẽkana.
Onate sonot sostorre ol menakʼa, “Jakob doń dulạṛkedea, menkhan Esau do bạń moneae kana.”
Enḍekhan cetʼ bon menkea Isor doe behoketʼ kana? Ekaltege baṅa. Uni do Moseye metade tahẽkana,
“Okoe hoṛ iń dayawae unigeń dayawaea; ar okoe hoṛ iń mãyãwae unigeń mãyãwaea.”
Enḍekhan noa do okoeakʼ kurumuṭu se sana lekate hõ baṅ hoyokʼkana, eken Isorakʼ daya cetanrege ṭehãḍokʼ kana.
Sonot sostorre Isor do Pharao noa kathae metade tahẽkana, “Amiń raj akatʼmea jemon am hotete ińakʼ daṛeń udug ar goṭa dhạrtire jemon ińakʼ ńutum lại pasnaokʼ.”
Onate Isor do acʼakʼ kusi leka okoeye daya akokan onkogeye daya akokana ar okoe keṭejeye menjoṅkan uni doe keṭecʼede kana.
Hoedaṛeakʼa ape modre jãhãepe metạńa, “Cedakʼ enḍekhan ńit hõe dusi kana? Ar jãhãege cetʼ uniakʼ monejoṅakʼreye teṅgo daram daṛeakʼa?”

Enḍekhaniń menkea, E manwa; am dom celekante Isor upạrtem roṛ ruạṛetʼkana? Jãhãe hoṛ mitʼṭecʼ jinise benao khan, enḍekhan ona benaoakʼ jinis do cetʼ uniye kuli daṛekea, “Cedakʼ nonka dom benao kedeńa?”
Kuṅkạl do inạ hasa ḍhimbạ khonge mitʼ bhajan do manotakʼ lạgitʼ ar eṭagakʼ do bemanotakʼ lạgitʼ benao reakʼ ektiạri do cetʼ bạnukʼtaea?

Ṭhik onkage Isor do acʼakʼ edre ar daṛe udug lạgitʼe monejoṅkan tahẽkana; enrehõ okoe hoṛko birudre acʼakʼ edre sodore menletʼ, onkoakʼ do ạḍi soborikateye sahaoketʼtakoa. Ente noko hoṛkoakʼ kuṛại do moron tahẽkana.
Arhõ uni do acʼakʼ bin mucạtʼ ṭhonok reakʼ katha hõ baḍae ocokoe menletʼ tahẽkana. Okoe uniakʼ dayako ńamakatʼ onko do laha khongeye tear akatʼko tahẽkana acʼakʼ ṭhonok ńam lạgitʼ.
Abokangea bon ona dayaren hoṛ do. Uni do Jihudiko mod khon eken abo eskar do bae hohoakatʼ bona, menkhan boṅgan hoṛ jạtrenko mod khon hõe hohoakatʼkoa.
Ente Hosea nạbi puthire Isore menakada, “Okoe ińrenko baṅkan, onkoge ińren hoṛ menteń hohoakoa. Ar okoe bạń dulạṛakade, uni do dulạṛiạ menteń hohoaea.
Oka jaegare onkoko menocolen; ‘ińren hoṛ dope baṅkana,’ onḍege onko do jiwetʼ Isorren hopon menteko hoho ocokʼa.”
Jesaea nạbi hõ Israel jạtko reaṅe roṛeleda, “Israel hoponko reakʼ lekha do jalapuri reakʼ gitil unạkʼlenre hõ eken sarecʼkoge bańcaoko ńama.
Probhu do ạḍi usạrage dhạrtiakʼ kuṛại purạteye emkataea.”
Jesaea do arhõe roṛleda, “Sanam daṛeanicʼ Probhu do bõs aloe sarecʼ abon khan enḍekhan Sodom ar Gomora nagraha leka bon hoekokʼa.”
Enḍekhan noa katha bon mena je, boṅgan hoṛ jạtrenko do Isorakʼ dhorom khudạu bako kurumuṭuletʼre hõ pạtiạu hotetege onko do Isorren dhoromko menteko lekha ocoyena.
Menkhan Israelko do ạn-ạri hotete Isorakʼ dhoromko khudạuletʼ tahẽkana, menkhan bako hoedaṛeada.
Cedakʼ bako daṛeada? Ente onko do biswạsre ṭehãḍ baṅkate kạmire ṭehãḍ akanko tahẽkana. Okaṭakʼ dhirire hoṛko tohodokʼ onarege onko hõko tohotʼlena.
Noa reaṅ sonot sostorre olakana, Ńelpe, Sionre tohotʼakʼ dhiri ar tạkicʼakʼ cạṭạniń dohoyeda, unire pạtiạuicʼ do baṅgeye lajao ocokʼa.
E boehako, Israelko lạgitʼ ińakʼ ontor reakʼ sana ar Isor ṭhen ińakʼ koejoṅ do noage, onko jemon kại khon bańcaoko ńam.
Onko reaṅ do noa gohań emokʼ kana je, onko do Isor lạgitʼ ahkaokʼ mon menakʼgetakoa, menkhan Isor ṭhen cetʼ lekateko ataṅ ocokʼa ona do bako baḍaea.

Isor do manwako cetʼ lekate dhorom menteye ataṅkoa ona katha luturakʼ baṅkate onko do akoakʼ kurumuṭute dhorom udugokʼko menjoṅkan tahẽkana. Onatege Isor okaṭakʼ ponthate manwa dhorom menteye aṅgoce ona do bako manaoleda.
Mạsige ạnkoe purạuketʼte ona reakʼ daṛeye bạtilkeda, jemon acʼre okoeko pạtiạukʼ onko do Isor ṭhen dhorom menteko ataṅ ocokʼ.
Ạn-ạriko pańjaete dhorom ocokʼ babotre Moseye olakada, “Okoe hoṛ ạn-ạriko lekae calakʼkan uni do ona hotetege jiwetʼe tahena.”

Menkhan biswạs hotete manwa do Isor ṭhen cetʼlekate dhorom menteye ataṅokʼa ona reaṅ sonot sostorreye menakada, “Mon monte noa do alom mena, ‘sermate do okoeye dejokʼa?’ ” Metakʼme, serma khon Mạsi pheḍ ạguiye lạgitʼ okoe sermate doe dejokʼa?
“Se alom mena, ‘patalte gocʼko ṭhen do okoeye pheḍokʼa?’ ” Metakʼme gocʼko khon Mạsi rakapʼ ạguiye lạgitʼ patalte do okoeye pheḍokʼa?

Isor ṭhen dhorom mente ataṅokʼ reaṅ sostorre arhõe meneda, “Isor okae menakatʼ ona do am sãorege menakʼa, metakʼme amakʼ moca ar amakʼ ontorre menakʼa.” Okaṭakʼ biswạs reakʼ katha bon porcaretʼkan ona do Isorakʼ katha kangea.
Ona katha do hoyokʼkana, Jisu do Probhu kanae mente amakʼ mocatem aṅgoce ar ontortem pạtiạukʼ baṅma, Isor do gocʼko khone jiwetʼ beretʼ akadea enḍekhan am do kại khon bańcaoem ńama;
ente ontorre biswạs iạte Isor do manwa dhorom menteye lekhayea ar mocateye aṅgocetʼkante kại khone bańcaoea.
Sonot sostorreye meneda, “Jãhãege unireye pạtiạukʼ uni do bae lajao ocokʼa.”
Jihudi ar boṅgan hoṛ jạtrenko talare jãhãn begar do bạnukʼa, ente sanamkorenge ini mitʼ Probhu kanae. Okoe acʼko hohoaekan onkore uni do asambheṛ bhor dane dul akokana.
Sonot sostorre menakʼa, “Bańcao ńam lạgitʼ jãhãege Probhui hohoae uni do bańcaoe ńama.”
Menkhan okoere bako biswạs akan uni do cekateko hohoaea? Okoe reaṅ bako ańjomakatʼ unire cekateko pạtiạukʼa? Ar poporcaricʼ bae tahen khan onko do cekateko ańjoma?
Ona chaḍa jãhãe bako kol ocolen khan cekate poporcarko doko porcara? Sonot sostorre olakana, “Bhạgangea onkoakʼ jaṅga do one okoe bhage sombat porcar lạgitʼko hijukʼkan.”
Menkhan sanamko ona bhage sombat do bako luturada. Jesaea nạbiye menakada, “E Probhu, alele porcarakatʼ bhage sombat do okoeye pạtiạuada?”
Enḍekhan ńelokʼkana, Isorakʼ katha ańjom iạtege biswạs do hijukʼkana, ar Mạsi reaṅ do porcar talate ańjomokʼ kana.

Menkhan ińiń mena, Israelko do cetʼ ona katha bako ańjom ńamleda? Khạṭigeko ańjom akada. Sonot sostore meneda, Onkoakʼ aṛaṅ do goṭa dhạrtire ḍamḍahe akana, ar kathako hõ pasnao akana dhạrti reakʼ mucạtʼ hạbicʼge.

Iń do arhõń mena, Israelko do cetʼ ona katha bako bujhạu daṛeada? Pạhilre Moseye menakada, “Okoe jạti do jãhãn jạtko baṅkan, onko jạtko hotetege iń do apeakʼ gagoc iń janam ocoea; ar mitʼṭen bebuj jạtko hotete apeakʼ pitiń caṛhao ocoya.”

Ona tayom Jesaea do arhõ murukteye menakada, “Onko ṭhengeń tahẽkana, menkhan jãhãnakʼ goṛo ocokʼ lạgitʼ iń ṭhen do bako hecʼlena. Iń do onko hoṛko nehõrokʼ lạgitʼ ạtiń ematʼko tahẽkana, menkhan iń ṭhen cetʼge bako arojlakʼa.”
Menkhan Israelko reaṅ doe meneda, “Bebatao ar ṭenḍosokʼ hoṛko secʼ ińakʼ ti do goṭa dingeń tiạrakada.”
Adoń meneda, Isor do cetʼ acʼren hoṛkoe giḍisaeketʼ koa? Tisge baṅa. Ente iń hõ mitʼṭen Israel hoṛ kangeạń, Abraham bõsren ar Benjamin gusṭirenge.

Isor do acʼren okoeko hoṛ laha khongeye bachao akatʼko tahẽkan onko do bae dea giḍiletʼkoa. Se bape baḍaea, sonot sostorre Eliạ nạbi reakʼ cetʼe meneda mente? Uni do Isor ṭhen Israel birudreye roṛleda,
“E Probhu, noko do amren nạbikoko gocʼ akatʼkoa ar amakʼ pinḍko rạputʼ giḍiakada. Eken iń eskarge sarecʼ minạńa, ar iń hõ gojeń reakʼko kurumuṭukana.”
Menkhan Isor do Eliạ cetʼe roṛ ruạṛade tahẽkana? Uniye metade tahẽkana, “Eae hajar herel hoponkoń sarecʼ doho akawana, one okoe do Bak̕al-deb ṭhen bako ikhṛum akan.”
Isor do onkage ńit hõ Israelkoe daya akokanteye bachao doho akatʼkoa.
Isor do dayategeye bachao dohoakatʼko khan, enḍekhan ona do jãhãn kạmi reakʼ jo do baṅkana. Ar onkage hoelen khan daya do daya mente baṅ tahẽkokʼa.

Enḍekhan bujhạukʼ kana, Israelko okaṭakʼ ńam reakʼko kurumuṭuyetʼ tahẽkan ona do bako ńamleda, menkhan Isor okoekoe bachao doho akawan tahẽkan onkoge ona doko ńam akada, ar eṭakʼkoakʼ mon do dhiri leka keṭecʼ akan takoa.
Sonot sostorre olakana, “Isor do onkoakʼ ontor nonkae goṛdhoketʼ takoa, teheń hạbicʼ onko do ńeńel tulucʼ bako ńeńel kana ar luturte ańjom tulucʼ bako ańjomeda.”
Dạud raj hõe menleda, onkoakʼ jojom ar ńũńũakʼ do pạsi ar jhampa leka hoyokʼ ma; ona do jemon onkoakʼ tạkicʼakʼ hoyokʼtako, ar oka kuṛại menakʼtako onage jemonko ńam.
Onkoakʼ mẽtʼ do kãṛãkʼtako ma jemon aloko ńeńel, ar onkoakʼ dea do jaejug kubjạ akan tahentakoma.
Enḍekhan Jihudikoko tohotʼente cetʼ jaejug hạbicʼko gurena? Ekalte baṅa, bickom onkoakʼ kại gunạkʼtege boṅgan hoṛ jạtrenko do bańcaokʼ lạgitʼ ạtko ńamkeda jemon Jihudiko gagoj hecʼako.

Enḍekhan ńelokʼ kana, Jihudikoakʼ kại gunạkʼte dhạrtiren hoṛkoakʼ ḍher lab hoeakana, ar onkoakʼ loksan iạte boṅgan hoṛ jạtrenko do Isorakʼ bhorko ńamkeda. Onate Jihudiko cetanre Isorakʼ purạ bhor hijukʼre boṅgan hoṛ jạtrenko hõ artetʼ bạ̃ṛti bhor hecʼakoa!
E boṅgan hoṛ jạtrenko, metape kạnạń, boṅgan hoṛ jạtrenko ṭhen apostol lekate ińakʼ kạmiko do ạḍi manot salakʼ iń ńeleda.
Ar nonkate jemon apnar jạtren hoṛkoń gagoj ocokote onko mod khon thoṛa hoṛ iń bańcao daṛeako.
Isor do Jihudiko bae bạsutako khan ar onkoakʼ giḍi ocokʼ do dhạrtirenkoakʼ samgeakʼkan khan enḍekhan Jihudikoe ataṅkore cetʼ hoyokʼa? Ona do cetʼ gocʼko jionko ńamakatʼ leka do baṅa?
Sipiakʼ holoṅ khon pạhil tearakʼ piṭhạge sonotge khan enḍekhan ma sanam sipiyakʼ holoṅ hõ sonotgea. Jạitun dare reakʼ rehetʼge sonotge khan ḍạrko hõ sonotgea.
Judi ona jạitun dare reakʼ adom ḍạrko rạputʼ giḍikate onare am lekan bir jạitun dare reakʼ ḍạrko kolom mitʼlen khan am do asol jạitun dare reakʼ rehetʼ khon ros hatao joṅme,
ar rạputʼ giḍiakatʼ ḍạrko khon apnar do maraṅ alom hudisokʼa. Arem hudisokʼkan khan enḍekhan disạime, rehetʼ do bam sapʼ ṭahraoetʼ kana bickom rehetʼge am doe sapʼ ṭahraoetʼmea.
Am dom men botecʼkea, “Ińiń kolom mitʼ ocokʼ lạgitʼge ḍạrko do rạputʼ giḍi ocoakana.”
Bhagegea. Menkhan onkoko rạputʼ giḍi ocoakana onkoakʼ bepạtiạu iạte ar am dom kolom mitʼ akana amakʼ pạtiạu iạte. Onate alom usul monokʼa bickom botorokʼme,
ente Isor do asol ḍạrkoge bae mãyãwakʼ kan khan enḍekhan am hõ ohoe mãyãlema.

Onate Isor do tinạkʼ dayakʼicʼ ar tinạkʼ ajhãṭicʼ kanae ona baṛe hudisme. Okoeko ńurhạ akan onko lạgitʼ doe ajhãṭena, menkhan am lạgitʼ do dayawạnicʼge, khạjuk uniakʼ daya latarrem tahen. Ar baṅ khan am hom makʼ giḍi ocokʼa.
Onko do bepạtiạu khonko ạcur ruạṛlen khan enḍekhan akoakʼ dare sãote arhõko kolom mitʼ ocokʼa, ente noa kolom mitʼ reakʼ kạmi do Isorgeye daṛeakʼa.

Am do mitʼṭen bir jạitun dare reakʼ ḍạrem tahẽkana, ar ona dare khonem makʼ ạgu ocoyente bagwan reakʼ jạitun darerem kolom mitʼ ocoakana. Enḍekhan okoe ona dareren asol ḍạrkoko tahẽkan, onko do tinạkʼ algatege arhõ akoakʼ darereko kolom mitʼ ocokʼa!

E boehako, apnarte jemon budanko alope monejoṅ onate iń do mitʼṭen sạri okowakʼ baḍae ocopeń menjoṅ kana. Ona sạriakʼ do noage, boṅgan hoṛ jạtrenkoakʼ lekha ạuri purạukʼ hạbicʼ ḍher bhag Israelkoakʼ ontor do keṭecʼge tahena.
Nonkate joto Israelko do bańcaoko ńama. Sonot sostorre olakana; Sion khon babańcaoicʼe hijukʼa; uni do Jakob bõsren hoṛko tala khon, bebhoktikoe ocokʼ giḍiya.
Iń do tinre onkoakʼ kạikoń meṭao giḍiya unre onko tulucʼ noage ińakʼ bondobos do hoyokʼa.
Bhage sombat secʼte apeakʼ bhạlại lạgitʼge onko do ńitokʼ Isorren bạiri kanako. Menkhan Isorakʼ bachao lekate onko do mare hapṛamko iạte Isorren dulạṛiạko kanako.
Isor okae dan ar okoeye hohowae ona babotre acʼakʼ mon do bae bodoltaea.
Mitʼ jokhecʼ ape do Isorakʼ bebataorepe tahẽkana, menkhan ńitokʼ do Jihudikoakʼ bebatao iạte Isorakʼ dayape ńamakada,
ar onkaleka mãyãpe ńamakatʼte onko hõ ńitokʼ bebataokoko hoeakana jemonko mãyã ocokʼ.
Isor jemon sanamkoe mãyãwako onate uni do sanamkoge bebataoreye bondi esetʼ akatʼkoa.
Isorakʼ dhon do asambheṛgea. Uniakʼ bud ar akel do khạndrińgea. Uniakʼ bicạr ar sanam kạmiko do oho ḍunḍhạulena.
Probhuakʼ mon do okoe haleye baḍaeakada? Ar okoe baṅ uniren sosolhayicʼe hoeakan?
Isor birudre okoeakʼ dạbi menakʼa je, uniakʼ dạbi do manao hoyokʼtaea mente?
Ente jotowakʼge coṅ uni khon ar uni hotetege hijukʼkan ar sanamakʼ do uni lạgitʼkangea. Uniakʼge jaejug ṭhonok hoyokʼtaema. Amen.
Enḍekhan E boehako, Isorakʼ noako daya iạtege iń do asokaeteń nehõrape kana, apeakʼ hoṛmo do jiwetʼ, sonot ar Isore kusiyakʼ dãṛẽ menkate uni ṭhen samaṅpe. Ar onage apeakʼ lek reakʼ sewa do hoyokʼa.

Noa bạṛicʼ piṛhirenko leka do alope colona, bickom Isorge apeakʼ mon nawate tear ocowaepe ar purạte nawa arokʼpe, jemon Isorakʼ monejoṅakʼpe baḍae daṛeakʼ. Isorakʼ monejoṅakʼko do bhagegea, ar purạ khạṭigea ar onate Isor doe kusikʼkana.

Iń do Isor ṭhen khon oka dayań ńamakatʼ onate ape mimitʼkoń metapekana, apnar reaṅ okaṭakʼ lek kan ona khon bạ̃ṛti do alope hudisokʼa, bickom tinạkʼ lek mentepe bujhạukʼkan inạkʼge hudisokʼpe. Isor do okoe tinạkʼgan pạtiạukʼ reakʼ daṛeye emakawade ona khon bạ̃ṛti do okoe hõ jemon apnarte aloe hudisokʼma.
Abo mimitʼkoakʼ hoṛmore do aema hạṭińko menakʼa, menkhan joto hạṭińko do mitʼ leka bae kạmiya;
ṭhik onkage abo do lekhare bon ḍhergere hõ Mạsire bon mitʼ akante mitʼ hoṛmoge bon hoeakana. Ar abo mimitʼko do eṭakʼkoakʼ hoṛmo hạṭińko kana bon.
Isorakʼ daya lekate abo do judạ judạ daya dan bon ńamakada. Ar ona daya dan do nạbi lekate katha roṛ reakʼ daṛe menakʼ khan enḍekhan biwạs lekate uni do Isorakʼ kathae lạima.
Ar sapʼ dapʼ reakʼ daṛe hoyokʼ khan enḍekhan uni do sapʼ dapʼ giriye kạmi ma. Okoe cecetʼakʼ emokʼ reakʼ daṛeye ńamakatʼ uni doe cetʼakoma;

okoe sikhạu paṛhao reakʼ daṛeye ńamakatʼ uni doe sikhạu paṛhaokoma; okoe eṭakʼko danako reakʼ daṛeye ńamakatʼ, uni do soṛa monteye emokʼma; okoe mukhiyạ hoyokʼ reakʼ daṛeye ńamakatʼ uni do jidkateye calaoma; ar okoe eṭakʼko goṛowako lạgitʼ daṛeye ńamakatʼ uni do kharsala monteye goṛoakoma.
Dulạṛre phạsiạra do alo tahenma. Okaṭakʼ bạṛicʼakʼkan ona do hirkhạwakʼpe; ar bhageakʼre jamaṛ akae tahenpe.
Ape ape talare boeha leka dupulạṛpe. Ar apnar khon eṭakʼko bạ̃ṛti manotkope.
Probhu secʼ jao ghuṛi apeakʼ mon ahkaokʼtape ma. Apeakʼ ontor do bhoktite perecʼ tahen ma. Ar Probhuakʼ kạmire lạgiạ paṛao akan tahenpe.
Apeakʼ okaṭakʼ as menakʼ, ona iạte rạskạkʼpe. Harkhet sasetre soboripe. Koejoṅre jamaṛakan tahenpe.
Isorren hoṛko reṅgejokʼ oktere goṛowakope. Ar peṛakʼ gun dohojoṅpe.
Okoeko khedetʼpe onko do alope sarapakoa bickom bhorakope.
Okoeko rạskạkʼkan onko tulucʼ rạskạkʼpe; ar rakʼ joṅko tulucʼ do rakʼjoṅpe.
Ape apere mitʼ mon tahentape ma. Usulakʼko do alope moneakʼa bickom nindhạnko tulucʼ helmelokʼpe. Apnarte budanko mente alope hudisokʼa.
Bạṛicʼ bodol bạṛicʼ okoe hõ alope halawakoa. Sanam hoṛkoakʼ mẽtʼre okaṭakʼ bhageakʼ kan ona reaṅ moneakʼpe.
Daṛeakʼ bhor sanam hoṛko sãote sulukte tahenpe.

Dulạṛiạ boehako, okoe hõ alope hala ruạṛakoa, bickom Isorge sạjại lạgitʼ aṛakʼaepe. Sonot sostorre Probhui meneda, “Hala hạli sạjại emokʼ reakʼ ektiạri do eken ińakʼge menakʼa; ar ińgeń hala ruạṛakoa.”
Sostor reakʼ katha leka, “Amren bạiri reṅgecʼlere jomakʼ emaeme; ar tetaṅlere ńũiyakʼ emaeme. Entem nonkale khan uniakʼ bohokʼre seṅgel aṅgram puńjiaea.”
Bạṛicʼakʼte alom bhagao ocokʼa, bickom bhageakʼte bạṛicʼakʼ bhagaome.
Sanamkoge disạm cakʼlaoko tabereko tahenma; ente Isor okoeye hoeocoye uni chaḍa ar okoe hõ ektiạrianicʼ do bae hoedaṛeakʼa. Isorge disạm cakʼlaokoe bahal akatʼkoa;
Onate ektiạrianko birudre okoeye teṅgon, uni do Isorakʼ ḍanṭaoakʼko birudregeye teṅgon kana. Ar okoeko nonkayetʼkan onko do akotege sạjạiko ạgujoṅ kana.

Okoe bhageakʼko kạmikan onko do ektiạrianko ohoko botorlekoa, menkhan okoe bạṛicʼakʼko kạmikan onkogeko botorokʼa. Ape do ektiạrianko begor botorakote senokʼpe khojkana? Enḍekhan bhageakʼko kạmipe, inạ khan onko ṭhen khon sabasipe ńama.

Apeakʼ bhage lạgitʼge uni do Isorren sapʼdapʼicʼ lekae kạmiya. Ar bạṛicʼakʼpe kạmikan khan botorokʼpe, ente bạṛicʼakʼ kạmikanko sạjạiko reakʼ ektiạri do uniakʼ menakʼtaea. Uni doe Isorren sapʼdapʼicʼ kana; ar okoe bạṛicʼakʼko kạmikan onko do Isor lekate sạjạiye emakoa.
Onate ektiạrianko tabere tahen do jạruṛgetapea. Isorakʼ sạjại botorte onkoakʼ gobolre tahenpe aṅgoceda ona do baṅ, apeakʼ bibek sapha dohoe lạgitʼ hõ onape onkayeda.
Onatege ape do raj bhejape emetʼ kana, ente mạsul uṭhạuko do akoakʼ kạmi hotete Isorakʼko kạmikana.
Okoeakʼ oka paona ona emkataepe. Khajna hataoicʼ do khajna; mạsul uṭhạuicʼ do mạsul; botorae lekicʼ do botor; ar manot emae lekicʼ do manot emaepe.
Okoe ṭhen hõ jãhãnakʼge alope dharaoa, eken dulạṛ chaḍa. Okoe eṭakʼkoko dulạṛetʼko onko do Moseakʼ ạngeko pańja akada.

Hukum menakʼa, “Alom laṭghaṭa, alom khũna; alom kombṛoea, alom lalocakʼa.” Noako ar noa lekan arhõ eṭakʼ hukumko do niạ katharege guṭ mitʼkate noage roṛakana je, “Am aḍepaseren hoṛ apnar leka dulạṛem.”
Dulạṛ do okoeakʼ bạṛicʼ hõ bae khoja. Enḍekhan ńelokʼ kana dulạṛ hotetege sanam ạn do purạukʼ kana.

Un ghạṛicʼ okań roṛketʼ, ńit reakʼ okteko bujhạukate onka leka calakʼpe. Jạpitʼ khon ebhenokʼ reakʼ okte hoeakana, ente abo tinre bon pạtiạulen, un khon boroṅ ńitokʼge bańcao ńam reakʼ okte do artetʼ sorakana.
Ńindạ do caba hecʼena, aṅgakʼ lạgidokʼ kana; onate dela, ńut reakʼ kạmi bạgikate marsal reakʼ khanḍa banḍa bon horokʼ joṅma.
Rij roṅ ar ńu bulokʼte do baṅ, loṭghuṭi ar lucạ lamoṭte do baṅ, reṭha reṭhi ar hiskạte do baṅ, menkhan siń marsalre dãṛãnkanko leka jion bon khemao ma.
Ape do kicricʼ leka Probhu Jisu Mạsi horokʼjoṅpe; ar jel reakʼ sana purạu lạgitʼ do alope moneakʼa.
Pạtiạure okoeye nijorge uni do ataṅ sãohãyepe; uniakʼ hudis bundis joṅre uni tulucʼ alope reṭe peṭekʼa.
Jãhãeye hudiskea uni do jotowakʼe jom daṛeakʼa, menkhan okoe pạtiạureye nijorge uni do eken aṛakʼ sakamgeye jomeda.
Jel jojom hoṛ do jel baṅ jojomicʼ hoṛ aloe nisṛạuema ar jel jojomicʼ hõ jel baṅ jojomicʼakʼ dos aloe sabtaema, ente Isor do unkin bana hoṛgeye ataṅ sãohã akatʼkinạ.
Am dom celekante, eṭakʼ hoṛren gutim bicạrede kana? Uni doe teṅgo ṭahraokʼa, seye ńurocokʼa, ona do uniren kisạ̃ṛgeye bujhạua. Menkhan uni doe teṅgo ṭahraokʼa, Probhuge uni doe teṅgo ṭahrao ocoyea.
Mitʼ hoṛ do mitʼ din eṭakʼ din khon sorose bujhạueda. Arhõ eṭakʼ hoṛ do joto dinge somangeye bujhạueda. Noa babotre okoe cetʼe cekae ar bae cekae, ona do monreye khạṭi joṅma.

Din okoeye manaoetʼkan uni do Probhu kusi ocoye lạgitʼgeye onkayeda. Ar okoe sanamakʼe jometʼkan uni do Probhu kusi ocoye lạgitʼgeye jomeda, ente uni do Isore gunmanao joharae kana. Okoe sanamakʼ bae jometʼkan uni hõ Probhu kusi ocoye lạgitʼge bae jomeda, ar uni hõ Isore gun manao joharae kana.
Aboko modre okoe hõ apnar lạgitʼ jiwetʼ babon tahenkana ar apnar lạgitʼ okoe hõ babon gujukʼ kana.
Abo jiwetʼ bon tahen khan abo do Probhu lạgitʼge jiwetʼ bon tahenkana, ar bon gujukʼ kan khan Probhu lạgitʼge bon gujukʼ kana. Enḍekhan jiwetʼ bon tahen se bon gujukʼ, abo do Probhuren kangea bon.
Mạsi doe gocʼlena are jiwetʼ beretʼena jemon uni do jiwetʼko ar gocʼkoren Probhui hoedaṛeakʼ.
Enḍekhan cedakʼ am do amren boehamakʼ dosem sapʼeda? Ar cedakʼ amren boeha dom nihạtede kana? Bicạr lạgitʼ ma sanamkoge coṅ Isor samaṅre teṅgokʼ hoyokʼ tabon.
Sonot sostorre olakana, “Probhui meneda, ‘ińiń jiwetʼgete mitʼke mitʼ gunṭhi do iń samaṅre ikhṛumokʼa, ar mitʼke mitʼ alaṅ do Isore sarhaoea.’ ”
Enḍekhan ńelokʼ kana, abo mimitʼ hoṛ do apnar reaṅ lekha jokha Isor emae hoyokʼ tabona.
Onate abo do mimitʼ hoṛakʼ dosko alo bon sabtakoma, ar nonkanakʼ alo bon kạmi ma one ona ńelte jãhãe boeha monreye tạkijokʼ se kạireye ńur botecʼkokʼ.

Probhu Jisu tulucʼ bon kolom mitʼ akante iń do bes okocʼteń baḍaea je, okaṭakʼ jomakʼ hõ besaphawakʼ do baṅkana, menkhan jãhãe jãhãn jomakʼ besaphagea menteye hudisetʼ khan enḍekhan uni lạgitʼ ona jomakʼ do besaphagea.
Jãhãn jomakʼ iạte amren boeham duk ocoyedekan khan am do bam dulạṛede kana. Okoe lạgitʼ Mạsiye gocʼlen, jomakʼ karonte uni do alom nasao ocoyea.
Apeakʼ bhageakʼ do okoe hõ alo jemonko neṅghaotape.
Isorakʼ rajre jom ar ńũ do maraṅakʼ do baṅkana; maraṅ katha do hoyokʼ kana, dhorom ar suluk ar rạskạge Sonot Jiure.
Okoe nonkate Mạsi ṭhen golame khaṭaokʼkan, Isor do unireye kusikʼkana ar hoṛko hõ uni do bhageko metaekana.
Onate okaṭakʼ kạmile khan suluk hoyokʼ ar okaṭakʼte sanamko bon gopoṛo daṛeakʼ, ona reakʼ bon kurumuṭuima.
Jãhãn jomakʼ khạtirte Isorakʼ kạmiko do alope nosṭoea. Joto jomakʼge sonotgea, menkhan jãhãe jãhãnakʼ jomte eṭagicʼakʼ monre tạkicʼakʼe janam ocoyetʼ khan uni lạgitʼ ona jom do baṅ ṭhika.
Jel jom, se darkha rasa ńũi se nonkanakʼ kạmi lek do baṅkana one okaṭakʼte amren boehae tạkicʼ botecʼkokʼ.
Noa reaṅ am okaṭakʼ bhage mentem pạtiạukʼkan ona do Isor ar am talarege dohoeme. Ar bhageakʼ menkate jãhãnakʼ kạmi jokhecʼ jãhãeakʼ bibek hõ uni bako dusiye khan enḍekhan uni doe bhạgangea.
Menkhan jãhãe digdhạkate jãhãnakʼe jom khan enḍekhan uni do dusiye hoyokʼa, ente uni do acʼakʼ biswạs leka bae kạmiyeda. Ente biswạs birudre jãhãnakʼ kạmige kại kana.
Abo okoe dobon daṛeanko kan abo do bon dạyik kana bin daṛeankoakʼ nijorakʼkore teṅgo goṛoako lạgitʼ, ar eken apnar kusikʼ lạgitʼ do baṅ.
Biswạsi boehako benao rakabe lạgitʼ abo sanamkoge jemon uniakʼ bhạlại lạgitʼ uni bon kusiocoye.
Mạsi hõ apnartetʼ do bae kusi ocolena. Sonot sostorre olakana, “Okoe amko opomanetʼme onkoakʼ sanam opoman do ińrege paṛaokʼ kana.”
Sonot sostorre okako ol lahalen ona do abo cetʼabon lạgitʼge ollena, jemon sostor khon sobori ar udgạu bon ńamte as tahen tabon.
Jisu Mạsi sãote calakʼ horre sobori ar udgạuicʼren Isor do ape sanamkoakʼ mon baṛeye mitʼ ocoetapema.
Enḍekhan ape do mitʼ monte ar mitʼ aṛaṅte aboren Probhu Jisu Mạsiren Isor Babape sarhao daṛeae.
Isorakʼ ṭhonok jemon sodorokʼ, onate Mạsi cetʼlekae ataṅ sãohãketʼpe onkage ape hõ ape apere ataṅ sãohãkʼpe.

Baḍaekakʼpe, Isorakʼ katha je sạriakʼkan ona sạbud lạgitʼge Mạsi do Jihudikoren sapʼ dapʼicʼe hoelena. Noa reakʼ monsubạ do tahẽkana, Isor do hapṛamko ṭhen okae gokʼletʼ tahẽkan ona jemon purạukʼ ar uniakʼ daya iạte boṅgan hoṛ jạtrenko hõ uniko sarhaoe.
Sonot sostorre olakana, ona iạte iń do boṅgan hoṛ jạtrenko talareń sarhaomea, ar amakʼ ńutumiń õṛhẽytama.
Arhõe meneda, E ape boṅgan hoṛ jạtrenko, ape do Isorren hoṛko tulucʼ uni sarhaoepe.
Arhõ olakana, Probhu sarhaoepe, E sanam boṅgan hoṛ jạtrenko; ar jạt jạtrenko do uniko ńumema.
Arhõ Jesaeae meneda, okoe doe Jisại reakʼ rehetʼkan, uni doe hijukʼa, uni do joto jạtkore rajokʼ lạgitʼe teṅgona. Ar sanam jạtren hoṛko do uniregeko bhorsakʼa.
Okoe ase dan abon kan uni Isor do apeakʼ biswạs hotete asambheṛ rạskạ ar sulukteye perecʼpema. Enḍekhan sonot Jiu reakʼ daṛete apeakʼ ontor reakʼ as do sareṛokʼtapea.
E ińren boehako, iń do noań pạtiạukʼ kana, apeakʼ ontor do bhageakʼte purun akana, ar joto lekan akeltehõpe perecʼgea, ente ape do mimitʼkope sikhạu paṛhao daṛeako kana.
Enrehõ iń do mitʼ bar katha disạ ocope lạgitʼ dilkate noań olape kana, ente Isor do boṅgan hoṛ jạtrenko ṭhen Mạsi Jisuren sapʼ dapʼicʼ hoyokʼ reakʼ ạsirbade dan akawạdińa.
Sonot Jiu hotete okoe Jihudikoko bachao doho ocoakan, onko do Isor ṭhen jemon samaṅokʼakʼko hoedaṛeakʼ ona iạte uniakʼ bhage sombat lại pasnaore naeke kạmiyiń kạmi kana.
Iń do Isor lạgitʼ okaṭakʼ iń kạmikan onate Mạsi Jisu hotete ińakʼ sarhaokʼ reakʼ ạidạri do menakʼgetińạ.
Okare Mạsiakʼ ńutum tisge baṅ lại akan onḍege bhage sombat jạhirakoń jidkeda, jemon eṭakʼkoakʼ ehopʼakʼre aloń benao rakab.
Sonot sostorre olakana, “okoe uni reaṅ baṅ lại akawatʼko, onko do onako ńel ńama, ar okoe tisge bako ańjomakatʼ, onko do onako bujhạu daṛeakʼa.”
Ona iạtege ape ṭhen senokʼ do ạḍi dhao iń akoṭena.
Menkhan ńitokʼ noako ṭoṭhare ińakʼ kạmi reakʼ jaega do ar bạnukʼa. Ar ḍher bochor khonge ape ṭhen senokʼ reakʼ sana menakʼtińạ,

onate ńitokʼ Spaniạ disạmte parom calakʼ jokhecʼ ape ṭhen calakʼ iń menjoṅ kana. Ar asiń dohoyeda, ona horte sen paromokʼ jokhecʼ apeń ńel torapea ar ape tulucʼ thoṛa okte rạskạte khemao tayom apege Spaniạ disạmte calakʼ reakʼpe bondobosạńạ.
Menkhan ńitokʼ do Isorren hoṛko goṛowako lạgitʼ Jerusalemteń calakʼ kana,
ente Jerusalemre Isorren hoṛko modre okoe reṅgecʼ hoṛ menakʼko onko lạgitʼ Makedoniạ ar Akhaea manḍerren hoṛko do thoṛa danko uṭhạu akada.

Onko do noa dan rạskạtegeko uṭhạu akada. Ona chaḍa noa manḍerko do Jerusalemren Isorren hoṛko ṭhenko rinigea, ente Jihudiko do akoakʼ Jiuteakʼ bhor dan reakʼ bhag tinre boṅgan hoṛ jạtrenkoko hạṭiń akatʼkoa unre boṅgan hoṛ jạtrenko hõ Jihudiko gharońj secʼte goṛowako do lek kantakoa.
Ińakʼ noa kạmiń sạtle khan ar ona canda ṭhik leka seṭer akana menteń baḍaele khan ape secʼte Spainiạteń calakʼa.
Ińiń baḍaea ape ṭheniń senlenre iń do Mạsiakʼ purạ puri bhoriń iditoraea.
E boehako, aboren Probhu Jisu Mạsi hotete ar sonot Jiuakʼ dulạṛteń nehõrape kana, iń lạgitʼ Isor ṭhen koejoṅre iń sãote lạgiạ paṛaokʼpe.
Koejoṅpe, Jihudiạre okoe do Isorko opomanekan onkoakʼ ti khon jemon rukhiyạń ńam, ar Jerusalemre Isorren hoṛko jemon ińakʼ noa goṛoko ataṅ.
Unre Isorakʼ sanaleka iń do kusi monte ape ṭheniń calao daṛeakʼa ar ape sãote tahẽkate jiwiń ṭanḍhaetińa.
Sulukren Isor do ape sanamko sãoteye tahenma. Amen.
Niạ dhao iń do aboren misera Phoebe ape ṭheniń cinhạpkae kana. Uni do Kenkhrea manḍerren sapʼdapʼicʼ kanae.
Ar cetʼleka Isorren hoṛko ataṅ daram lek kan onkage Probhu ńutumte ataṅepe. Ape ṭhen jãhãn goṛoye khoj khan goṛoaepe, ente uni do aema hoṛe goṛo akatʼkoa ar iń hõe goṛowạdiń tahẽkana.
Priskạ ar Akuilạ hõ ińakʼ johar emakinpe. Unkin do Mạsi Jisuakʼ kạmire iń sãote ạḍikin khaṭao akana.
Unkin do ińakʼ jiwi rukhiyạ khạtirte ạkinakʼ hoṭokʼkin alaeletʼa. Eken iń eskar do baṅ, menkhan sanam boṅgan hoṛ jạtrenkoakʼ joto manḍerrenko hõ unkinko gunmanao johar ạkin kana.
Unkinakʼ oṛakʼre okoe do manḍerren lekate mitʼ ṭhenko jarwakʼkan onko hõ joharakope. Ińren dulạṛiạ gate Epaenetos hõ joharaepe, ente Asiạre unige pạhilte Mạsiye ataṅledea.
Mạriạm hõ joharaepe, uni do ape lạgitʼ ạḍi ãṭe khaṭaolena. Ona chaḍa Andronikus ar Juniạ hõ joharakinpe.
Unkin do iń leka Jihudi hoṛ kanakin ar iń sãote hajotrekin tahẽkana. Apostolko modre ạḍi manotan hoṛ kanakin. Unkin do iń khon hõ laharege Mạsiren kin hoeakana.
Probhure ińren dulạṛiạ gate Ampliatus joharaepe.
Urbanus, one okoe do abo sãote Mạsi lạgitʼe kạmikan, uni ar ińren dulạṛiạ gate Skatus hõ joharaepe. Apelles hõ joharaepe.
Mạsiren hoṛ lekate uni doe biḍạu ocoakana. Aristobulus gharońjrenko hõ joharakope.
Herodion, joharaepe, one okoe do iń lekae Jihudikan. Narkissus oṛakʼren okoe do Probhuren hoṛkanko onko hõ joharakope.
Truphaena ar Truphosa joharạkinpe. Nukin maejiu do Probhu lạgitʼkin khaṭao akana. Dulạṛiạ Persis hõ joharaepe. Ente nui maejiu hõ Probhu lạgitʼ ḍhere khaṭao akana.
Mạsire keṭecʼ pạtiạuicʼ mente okoeakʼ ńutum menakʼ uni Ruphus ar uniren eṅgattetʼ hõ joharạkinpe. Ente uniren eṅgattetʼ do ińren hõ gogoleka kanae.
Asunkritus, Phelegon, Hermes, Patrobas, Hermas ar onko sãoren Mạsire pạtiạkʼkan eṭakʼ boehako hõ joharakope.
Philologus ar Julia, Neresus ar uniren miserat, Olumpas ar onko sãote Isorren okoe hoṛko menakʼko onko sanamko joharakope.
Sonot cokʼte jopoharpe. Mạsiakʼ sanam manḍerrenko do apeko joharape kana.
E boehako, okaṭakʼ sikhnạtpe ńamakatʼ ona birudre okoe do kạphạriạu ar tạkicʼakʼko janam ocoyetʼkan onko oromkakope ar onko khon sahaṛokʼpe,
ente nonkanko hoṛ do aboren Probhu Mạsiren golam hoyokʼ baṅkate apnar lacʼgeko moneakʼkana. Onko do sebel ar luhum suhum kathate sojhe monan hoṛko bulạuetʼkoa.
Apepe bataoetʼ reakʼ katha do jotogeko ańjomakada, ar onate apereń kusi akana. Iń doń khojkana ape do jemon bhageakʼko oromkatepe ataṅ ar bạṛicʼakʼko khon pharakpe tahen.
Sulukren Isor do ạḍi usạrage apeakʼ jaṅga latarre Soetane lebetʼ gańjaoea. Aboren Probhu Jisuakʼ daya do ape cetanre tahenma.
Ińren são kạmiyạicʼ Timothi hõe joharape kana; Lukius, Jason ar Sosipatros hõ apeko joharapekana. Iń lekage onko hõ Jihudi jạtren hoṛ kanako.
Iń Tertiusge, Pạulakʼ noa ciṭhi doń oletʼkana. Probhuren hoṛ lekate iń hõ apekoń joharape kana.
Jisu Mạsi reaṅ oka bhage sombat iń porcaretʼkan ona bhage sombat hotete ṭarhao dohope reakʼ daṛe do Isorakʼ menakʼgetaea. Ar ḍher jug hạbicʼ Isor do acʼakʼ okoakʼko reaṅ okoege bae lại akawatʼkoa,

menkhan ńitokʼ bhage sombat hotete ona do sodor akana ar ona lekage iń hõń porcareda. Ar jaejugicʼ Isorakʼ hukum leka nạbikoakʼ olakʼ hotete sanam jạtren hoṛko ṭhen ona do baḍae ocoakana, jemon onko do Mạsireko pạtiạukʼte Isorren bataokoko hoedaṛeakʼ.
Eken uni eskargeae Isor do, ar unige akelanicʼ do. Jisu Mạsi hotete jaejug hạbicʼ uniakʼge ṭhonok hoyokʼtaema. Amen.
Aboren Isor Baba ar Probhu Jisu Mạsiakʼ daya ar suluk do apeko tulucʼ baṛe tahenma.
Iń do siń sạṭupʼ ape lạgitʼ ińren Isoriń gunmanao joharae kana, ente Mạsi Jisu tulucʼpe mitʼ akante ape do Isorakʼ dayape ńam akada.
Ona daya do noage, ape do Mạsi tulucʼpe mitʼ akante joto secʼ khon metakʼme, sanamakʼ roṛ reakʼ daṛete ar akeltepe kisạ̃ṛ akana,
ente Mạsi reaṅ aleakʼ goha do apeakʼ ontorre gathao akana.
Onate aboren Probhu Jisu Mạsiakʼ sodorokʼ reakʼpe ńel hohorkanre okaṭakʼ dante hõ bape khaṭo ocokʼkana.
Aboren Probhu Jisu Mạsige mucạtʼ hạbicʼe ṭarhao ocopea, onate uniakʼ hijukʼ dinre ape do sanam lekan bin dusạnkope hoyokʼa.
Isor doe pạtiạrgea, ar unige ape doe hohoakatʼpea jemon uniren Hopon aboren Probhu Jisu Mạsi ar ape talare helmel tahen.
E boehako, aboren Probhu Jisu Mạsi ńutumteń nehõrape kana, sanamkoge mitʼakan tahenpe, ape talare jãhãn dola duli alo tahen ma, bickom ape do mitʼmon ar mitʼakan tahenpe.
E ińren boehako, iń do Kloe gharońjrenko hotete ape reaṅ iń baḍaekeda je, apeko talare reṭha reṭhi menakʼa mente.
Iń do noań meneda, apeko modren adomkoko meneda, “Iń doń Pạulren kana” ar adomko doko meneda, “Apollosren kạnạń” ar adomko doko meneda, “Kephasren kạnạń” ar adomko doko meneda, “Iń doń Mạsiren kana.”
Menkhan Mạsi do cetʼe hạṭiń akana? Ar Pạul do cetʼ ape lạgitʼe krus ocolena? Ape do cetʼ Pạul ńutumtepe bạptis ocoakana?
Isoriń gunmanao joharae kana, iń do apeko modre Krispus ar Gaius chaḍa ar okoe hõ bạń bạptis akatʼkoa,
jemon okoe hõ aloko lại daṛeakʼ, ape do iń ńutumtepe bạptis akana mente.
Stephan gharońjren hõń bạptis akatʼkogea, menkhan ar jãhãe iń bạptis akatʼko reakʼ do bạń disạyeda.
Mạsi do bạptisko lạgitʼ bae kolakadińa menkhan bhage sombat porcar lạgitʼgeye kolakadińạ. Ona bhage sombat do akel reakʼ kathate porcar do bae kol akadińạ, jemon Jisu Mạsiakʼ krus alo ạuṛiagokʼtae.
Okoe nosṭokʼ reakʼ horteko taṛametʼ onko ṭhen Mạsiakʼ gujukʼ reakʼ katha do lelhawakʼ chaḍa ar cetʼge baṅkana; menkhan okoe bańcao bon ńam lạgidokʼkan abo ṭhen ona do Isorakʼ daṛe kana;
Ente sostorre olakana, “Iń do akelankoakʼ akeliń maraotakoa, ar budankoakʼ bud iń ạuṛiagtakoa.”
Menkhan akelanicʼ do ukuricʼ? Bidiạwạnicʼ hõ ukuricʼ? Noa piṛhiren esetʼicʼ hõ ukuricʼ? Noa dhạrti reakʼ akel je, lelhawakʼkan ona do cetʼ Isor bae udukʼ abon kana?
Isor do acʼakʼ akele ṭarhao akatʼte dhạrtirenko do akoakʼ akelte Isor bako orom daṛeadea. Onate Isor do bhage sombat reakʼ lelhatetʼ iạte biswạsiko kại khon bańcaokoe kusiyena.
Jihudiko do cinhạ lekate hahaṛa kạmi ńeńelko khojkana ar Junạniko do akelko ńam baṛayetʼ kana;
menkhan ale do kruslen Mạsiakʼ kathale porcareda. Ona katha Jihudiko ṭhen do mitʼṭen tạkicʼakʼ kana ar boṅgan hoṛ jạtrenko ṭhen do lelhawakʼge,
menkhan baṅ do Jihudige ar baṅ do Junạnige, Isor okoeye hoho akatʼko onko ṭhen do uni Mạsi kangeae Isorakʼ daṛe ar akeltetʼ.
Isorakʼ lelhatetʼ do manwakoakʼ akel khon hõ bạ̃ṛti akelanakʼ kana, ar Isorakʼ nijortetʼ do manwakoakʼ daṛe khon hõ bạ̃ṛti jorana.
E boehako, apepe hoho ocolenre cetʼ lekan hoṛpe tahẽkana ona disạipe. Manwa jạt lekate akelanko do ḍher bape hoho ocoakana, daṛeanko hõ baṅ ar bhodroko hõ ḍher do baṅ;
menkhan dhạrti do okaṭakʼ lelhawakʼe metakʼkan, onage Isor doe bachaoana, jemon akelankoe lajao ocoko. Ar dhạrti okaṭakʼ nijorakʼe metakʼkan, onage Isor doe bachaoana jemon daṛeankoe lajao ocoko;
dhạrti do okaṭakʼ nicạṛ, nihạtakʼ ar bạnukʼakʼe metakʼkan, onage Isor doe bachaoana, jemon dhạrtire menakʼakʼ koe ạuṛiakʼ ocoe;
uni do onakogeye bachaoana jemon Isor samaṅre okoe manwa hõ aloe sarhaokʼ.
Jisu Mạsi tulucʼpe mitʼakan ona do Isor khonge hoeakana. Jisu Mạsige abo lạgitʼ Isor ṭhen khone emakan akel do; unige aboren dhoromicʼ, sonoticʼ ar chaḍaoicʼ.
Onatege sonot sostorre ol akana, “Sarhaokʼ kanicʼ do Probhureye sarhaokʼma.”
E boehako, ape ṭheniń senlenre ar Isorakʼ bhage sombat iń jạhirape oktere mońj katha se ạḍi akelan hoṛ leka do bạń galmarao akatʼpea.
Ińiń goṭawan tahẽkana, ape ṭhen tahen jokhecʼ Jisu Mạsige metakʼme, kruslediyicʼ Jisu Mạsi baḍaeye chaḍa ar cetʼge bạń baḍaea.
Tinre apeko ṭheniń tahẽkana unre iń do nijorgeń ạikạuetʼ tahẽkana ar botorteń thar tharaokʼkan tahẽkana,
ińakʼ porcar ar ińakʼ roṛre hoṛko rạmjạu ocoko leka akelte perecʼ bidiyạ hõ baṅ tahẽkana, bickom onare sonot Jiuakʼ daṛege ńelokʼkan tahẽkana,
jemon apeakʼ biswạs do manwakoakʼ akelre ṭehãḍ baṅkate Isorakʼ daṛe cetanrege ṭehãḍokʼtape.
Okoe Mạsiakʼ Jionreko hara sạbitʼ akan onko ṭhen do akel reakʼ kathagele roṛeda; menkhan ona akel do noa dhạrti reakʼ baṅkana, se noa jugren mukhiyạkoakʼ hõ baṅkana one okoe doko parom calakʼko kan;
menkhan ale do Isorakʼ akelte perecʼ akan okoakʼ kathakole roṛeda, one oka do dhạrti ạuri sirjạu khon Isore niṭ dohoakatʼ tahẽkan jemon uniakʼ ṭhonok reakʼ bhạgiạdar bon hoedaṛeakʼ.
Menkhan niạ jugren cakʼlaoko modre okoe hõ ona do bako baḍaeleda; enteko baḍaele khan ṭhonokren Probhu do ohoko kruslea.
Menkhan sonot sostor reakʼ katha leka; “Isor okoeko dulạṛedekan onko lạgitʼ uni okakoe ṭhik dohoakatʼ, ona do okoe hõ mẽtʼte bako ńelakada, luturte bako ańjom akada ar hudis hõ bako hudis akada.”
Menkhan Isor do acʼren Jiu hotete onako abo ṭhene sodor akada, ente sonot Jiu do bin baḍaeyakʼ mente cetʼge bạnukʼtaea; ente uni do Isorakʼ khạndriakʼko hõe baḍaegea.

Manwako modre nonkan okoe menaea, one uni do eṭagicʼakʼ mon reakʼ kathae baḍaekan? Manware okoe Jiu menae eken unige acʼakʼ monejoṅakʼe baḍaea. Onkage Isorren Jiu chaḍa Isorakʼ monejoṅakʼko do eṭakʼ okoe hõ ohogeko baḍae daṛelea.
Abo do dhạrtiren Jiu babon ńamakadea, bickom Isor khonakʼ uniren Jiuge bon ńamakadea, jemon Isor okae danakatʼ ona bon bujhạu daṛeakʼa;

ar ona danko reakʼ kathage roṛ hõ bon roṛ baṛayeda. Ona roṛ lạgitʼ okako katha bon laṛcaṛetʼkan ona do manwakoakʼ akel khon cecetʼakʼ ńamkate do babon roṛeda, menkhan sonot Jiu reakʼ cecetʼakʼ hotete bon roṛeda. Jiu reakʼ sạri cecetʼakʼ lạgitʼ abo do Jiu reakʼ kathage bon roṛeda.

Okoe Jiurene baṅkan, uni do Isorren Jiu ṭhen khon oka hijukʼ ona bae aṅgoca; ente uni ṭhen ona do lelhawakʼ kana. Uni do onako bae baḍae daṛeakʼa, ente sonot Jiu bae cetʼae khan onako do ohoe tojbij daṛelea.
Okoe hoṛ doe Jiutenicʼ kan uni do jotowakʼkoe tojbijeda, menkhan okoe hõ uni do bako tojbij daṛeaea.
Sonot sostorre olakana, “Probhuakʼ mone do okoeye baḍae akatʼte, uni doe sikhạu daṛekea?” Menkhan abo do Mạsiakʼ mon bon ńam akawana.

E boehako, jiutenko ṭhen cetʼleka katha roroṛ hoyokʼ, onka do bạń galmarao daṛeakatʼpea, menkhan jel gobolrenko ṭhen cetʼleka roroṛ lek kan onkageń galmarao akatʼpea. Mạsire ape do bale gidrạko leka kanape, onate onkageń galmarao akatʼpea.
Iń do keṭecʼ jomakʼ bạń ematʼpea, bickom toageń ńũatʼpea, ente unre ona keṭecʼ jomakʼ hajam lạgitʼ daṛe do baṅ tahẽkantapea. Ar ńit hõ ape do onkage menakʼpea,
ente ńit hõ jel gobolrege menakʼpea. Ape talare hiskạ ar reṭha reṭhi menakʼ khan enḍekhan cetʼ jelrenko dope baṅkana? Manwako leka do cetʼ bape coloneda?
Ape modre mitʼ hoṛ do Pạulren, ar mitʼ hoṛ do Apollossrene menetʼ khan enḍekhan unre cetʼ manwako leka dope baṅkana?
Apolloss doe celekana? Ar Pạul baṅe celekan? Unkin makin sapʼ dapʼkin kan, one unkin hotetepe pạtiạu akan, ar Probhuge mimitʼ hoṛ apan ạpin kạmiye emakatʼkinạ.
Iń doń rohoekeda, ar Apolloss do dakʼe emada, menkhan Isor do onae hara ocokeda.
Onate rohoyicʼ hõ cele hoẽ baṅkana ar dakʼ emakʼicʼ hõ baṅ, menkhan okoeye hara ocoyetʼ uni do Isorge.
Rohoyicʼ ar dakʼe emokʼicʼ unkinakʼ monsubạ do mitʼgea, menkhan unkin do apan ạpin kạmi leka kuṛạikin ńama,
ente ale do Isor tulucʼle kạmikana. Ar ape do Isorakʼ goḍa kanape, Isorakʼ benao akan oṛakʼge.

Isor ṭhen khon oka dayań ńamakatʼ ona hotetege iń do gạkhuṛ kạrigol leka rehetʼ iń bạisạu akada, ar eṭakʼko do ona cetanre oṛakʼko benao kana. Menkhan okoe okalekae benaokan ona reaṅ uni doe sontorokʼma.
Okaṭakʼ rehetʼ laharege bạisạu akan ona chaḍa ar jãhãn rehetʼ okoe hõ bako bạisạu daṛeakʼa. Jisu Mạsigeye hoyokʼ kana ona reakʼ rehetʼ do.
Ona rehetʼ cetanre sona, rupạ, damanakʼ dhiri, kaṭ, ghãs, lanḍha se busupʼ reakʼakʼe benao rakab,

enḍekhan okoe oka lekae kạmi akatʼ ona do mońjte ńelokʼtaea. Ar bicạr dinre sodorokʼa, ente ona din reakʼ sodorokʼ do seṅgel talatege hoyokʼa. Ar okoeakʼ kạmi oka lekan ona do seṅgelgeye biḍạu aṭkara.
Okoe okaṭakʼe benao akatʼ onage ṭikạu tahentae khan enḍekhan uni do kuṛạiye ńama;
ar ona kạmiyakʼ atar giḍilentae khan enḍekhan uni do lokshan hoyokʼtaea. Acʼtetʼ doe bańcaokʼa, menkhan uniakʼ dosa do nonkan hoṛleka hoyokʼtaea one okoe do seṅgel talateye parom hecʼakan.
Ape do cetʼ bape baḍaea, ape do Isorakʼ mundil kanape ar Isorren Jiu do apeakʼ ontorreye girobasokʼkana mente?
Jãhãege Isorakʼ mundile bạṛij enḍekhan Isor hõ uniye bạṛijea, ente uniakʼ mundil do sonotgea, ar ona mundil dope ape kangea.
Okoe hõ apnarte aloe bulạukʼma. Ape modren jãhãe niạ jugren akelanicʼ menteye hudisokʼkan khan, enḍekhan uni do lelhayicʼ lekae hoyokʼma, jemon sạri akelanicʼe hoedaṛeakʼ,
ente Isor samaṅre noa dhạrti reakʼ akel do eken lelhawakʼ kana. Sonot sostorre ol menakʼa, “Isor do akelanko akoakʼ seantetʼreye sapʼetʼkoa.”
Arhõ olakana, “Probhu doe baḍaegea, akelankoakʼ sanam hudis bundisko do ạuṛiakʼgetakoa mente.”
Onate okoe hõ jãhãe manwa iạte alope sarhaokʼa, ente jotoge coṅ apeakʼkan;
baṅ do Pạul, baṅ do Apolloss, baṅ do Kephas, baṅ do dhạrti, baṅ do jion, baṅ do moron, baṅ do ńit menakʼakʼko, baṅ do tayom daramakʼko, onako sanamakʼge apeakʼkana;
ar ape do Mạsiren, ar Mạsi do Isorren.
Hoṛ do nonka lekako bujhạule ma je, ale do Mạsiren sapʼdapʼko kanale ar Isorakʼ sạri okoakʼko baḍae ocoko reakʼ bhar do alerege emakana.
Ar okoere bhar emakan onko do udugokʼ hoyokʼtakoa je, pạtiạranko kanako mente.
Ińakʼ bicạr do apege bicạrpe baṅ do bạisiren hoṛko hotete hoyokʼ, onate ińakʼ do jãhãnakʼ cetʼge baṅ cekakʼtińạ; metakʼme iń hõ apnarte do bạń bicạrokʼ kana.
Ińakʼ bibek do saphagea, menkhan onate noa do baṅ sạbudokʼ kana je, iń doń dhoromgea. Probhuge ińakʼe bicạrtińạ.

Onate Probhu hijukʼ lahare, metakʼme ona niṭ akan din lahare okaṭakʼ hõ alope bicạra. Ńutre oka okoge menakʼ uni do unre ona marsalteye ạguya ar manwa ontor reakʼ okoakʼ monsubạkoe sodora. Unre mimitʼ hoṛ do Isor ṭhen khon sarhaoko ńama.

E boehako, apeakʼ porho lạgitʼge iń do ińakʼ ar Apollossakʼ kathakoń roṛeda, jemon ạliń ṭhen khonpe cetʼ daṛeakʼ baṅma, oka olakan ona bahre calakʼ do baṅ ṭhika mente. Enḍekhan ape do mitʼ hoṛ bạgikate eṭagicʼ upạrte bape gorbokʼa.
Am do eṭakʼko khonem begargea mente okoe hõ bako monejoṅ kana. Nonkanakʼ cetʼ menakʼtama one okaṭakʼ do dan lekate bam ńamakatʼ? Arem ńam akatʼ khan cedakʼ begor ńamicʼ leka dom sarhaokʼ kana?
Ape ńelte ńelokʼ kana ape do laharege jotowakʼpe ńam akada, ar laharegepe kisạ̃ṛ akana, ar ale begortegepe raj akana. Arpe rajlen khan do bhagege hoekokʼa; enḍekhan ale hõ ape tulucʼle raj daṛekokʼa.

Ińakʼ bujre Isor do ale apostolko ses utạrko menkateye udukʼ akatʼlea, gocʼ ocokʼ lạgitʼ ṭarhao akanko lekage. Ale do goṭa dhạrtirenko ṭhen, metakʼme sermaren goḍetko ar manwako ṭhen tamasa lekale hoeakana.
Ale do Mạsi iạte lelhale hoeakana, menkhan ape do Mạsirepe mitʼakante budankope hoeakana. Ale do nijorkoge menkhan ape do joranko. Ape do sabasiankope hoeakana ar ale do bemanotkoge.
Ale do ńitokʼ hõ reṅgecʼ ar tetaṅtele loraokʼ kana. Ale do reṅgecʼ arle laṅgaṭgea, kilạu ocokʼ kanale ar aleakʼ oṛakʼ duạr do bạnukʼtalea;
ale do nij titele kạmiyeda arle khaṭaokʼ kana; ar hoṛkoko ruhetʼetʼlere hõ onko dole bhorako kana, arle khed ocokʼkanre hõ ale dole sahaoetʼ kana;
arko bodnametʼlere hõ mạ̃hir seletʼle roṛ ruạṛako kana; ar ńit hạbicʼ hõ dhạrti reakʼ mạilạ ar sanamko reakʼ jobra lekagele hoeakana.
Lajao ocope lạgitʼ do bạń oletʼ kana, bickom ińren dulạṛiạ gidrạko leka sontorpe lạgitʼgeń oleda.
Mạsi reaṅ cetʼape lạgitʼ aperen do gel hajar gurukoko tahẽ daṛeakʼa; menkhan aema baba do bạnukʼkotapea; ińge bhage sombat hotete Mạsiakʼ jionre aperen Babań hoeakana.
Onateń nehõrape kana, iń okakoń cekae, ape hõ onako onkaepe;

onate ape ṭhen Timothiń kolkedea; uni do Probhure ińren dulạṛiạ ar pạtiạr gidrạ kanae. Uni do Jisu Mạsire ińakʼ cạl-colonkoe disạ ocopea. Iń do nonkage sanam jaega ar mimitʼ manḍerkore onako reaṅiń cetʼako kana.
Ape ṭhen bạń calakʼkante adom adomko do demagteko phulạu akana.
Menkhan Probhuakʼ sana hoelen khan ạḍi usạrage ape ṭheniń hijukʼa, ar onko phulạu akankoakʼ katha do baṅ, menkhan onkoakʼ daṛe hõ ńel lạgitʼgeń hijukʼa.
Ente Isorakʼ raj do katha reakʼ do baṅkana, bickom daṛeteakʼge. Cetʼpe ńamkana?
Ṭhengawante ape ṭheniń hijukʼa, se dulạṛ ar mạ̃hir monante?

Ańjomokʼ kana, ape talare loṭghuṭi hoyokʼ kana, ar ona loṭghuṭi do nunạkʼ hirkhạge je, boṅgan hoṛ jạtrenko talare hõ onkanakʼ do bạnukʼanaṅ. Ente mitʼṭen hoṛ do kạki eṅgattetʼ acʼren bạhu menteye dohoakadea.
Ar noa tayom hõ ape dope gorbokʼ kana! Bickom ape dope mon dukkokʼa honaṅ, jemon nonkae kạmiketʼicʼ do ape tala khone oḍok ocokʼ?
Hoṛmo secʼte ape sãote hạjir bạnuńre hõ Jiu secʼte do hạjirge minạńa. Okoe nonkae kạmi akatʼ, uni do ape ṭhen minạń lekageń bicạr akadea.
Ińakʼ bicạr do noage, aboren Probhu Jisu ńutumte mitʼ ṭhenpe jarwakʼre iń hõ Jiu secʼte ape tulucʼ iń tahena ar Probhu Jisuakʼ daṛe do abo cetanre tahena,
unre uni hoṛ do Soetan tire jimạkae hoyokʼa, jemon uniakʼ hoṛmo ḍahao maraokʼtae menkhan Jiu do Probhu Jisuakʼ hijukʼ dinre bańcaoe ńam.
Sarhaokʼ do ape lạgitʼ baṅ bhagea. Ape do cetʼ bape baḍaea je, kạṭicʼ culuṅ khạmi do joto sipiyakʼ holoṅgeye phulạu ocoea mente? Ape khon ona mare khạmi oḍok giḍikakʼpe;
jemon nawa bin khạmianakʼ sipiyakʼ holoṅpe hoedaṛeakʼ; ar ape do bin khạmianko kangeape, ente aboakʼ sen-parom porobren dãṛẽ doe teṅgenena metakʼme Mạsige.
Onate mare khạmi, metakʼme hiskạ ar bạṛicʼakʼ reakʼ khạmite do alo, menkhan nirạ ar sạriakʼ reakʼ bin khạmianakʼ piṭhạte bon porobokʼma.
Ińakʼ ciṭhiren olatʼpe tahẽkana, loṭghuṭi hoṛko tulucʼ jemon alope mesaokʼ.
Noa dhạrtiren loṭghuṭiko, lalocko, luluṭko se boṅga sewako tulucʼ gatekʼ do bạgi utạr hoyokʼtapea ona do baṅ, ente onka khan ma noa dhạrti khon bahrete calakʼ hoyokʼtape.

Menkhan iń do okań olatʼpe tahẽkan ona do noage, okoe acʼte biswạsi boehae ńumogokʼ kan, menkhan uni do loṭghuṭiyicʼ se dhon lalocicʼ, se boṅga sewayicʼ se oktayicʼ se ńu bulokʼicʼ se luluṭicʼkan enḍekhan uni tulucʼ do gate hõ alope gatekʼa ar jom hõ alope jom-ńũiya.
Manḍer bahreren hoṛko bicạrko reakʼ do cetʼ jạruṛ paṛao akawạdińa? Menkhan manḍerren hoṛko bicạrko do cetʼ lek baṅ kantapea?
Okoeko bahreren kan onkoakʼ do Isorgeye bicạra. Sonot sostor reakʼ katha leka, “Ape mod khon uni bạṛicʼ hoṛ do oḍok giḍikaepe.”
Ape modren jãhãe hoṛ eṭakʼ boeha upạrte lạlis reakʼ jãhãnakʼ menakʼtae khan, enḍekhan oka dilte uni do sonotko ṭhen calao baṅkate boṅgan hoṛko ṭhen bicạre khojkana?
Ape do cetʼ bape baḍaea, Isorren hoṛkoge dhạrti reakʼko bicạra mente? Ar dhạrti reakʼpe bicạr khan, enḍekhan huḍiń utạrakʼko bicạr lạgitʼ do cedakʼpe belekgea?
Ape do cetʼ bape baḍaea, abo do serma goḍetkoakʼ hõ bon bicạra mente? Ar onage hoyokʼ khan enḍekhan dhạrti reakʼko reaṅ ma coṅ thoṛawakʼkange.
Apeakʼ nonkan jãhãn lạlis tahentape khan, enḍekhan okoe do manḍerrenko baṅkan onkankoge cetʼ bạisirepe duṛupʼ ocoyetʼkoa?
Iń do lajao ocope lạgitʼge noa katha doń roṛeda. Ape talare akelan nonkanicʼ cetʼ jãhãe bạnuea, one okoe do apnar boehako talare gulmalkoe bicạr chinḍạu daṛeke?
Ona bodolte ape do boeha birudrepe lạliskana, ar ona hõ bepạtiạrko ṭhenge!
Ape do mimitʼ hoṛ birudrepe mamblakʼ kante noage sạbudokʼ kana je, ape dope bhagao ocoakana. Ona khon bickom behok ocokʼge cedakʼ bape sahaoeda? Ar cedakʼ bape recʼ ocokʼkana?
Ona bodolte apegepe behokeda, arpe rerecʼ kana ar ona do aperen boehako cetanregepe onkayeda!
Ape do cetʼ bape baḍaea, bedhoromko do Isorakʼ raj bako ạidạrijoṅa mente? Alope bulạukʼa; baṅ do loṭghuṭiko, baṅ do boṅga sewako, baṅ do laṭghaṭko, baṅ do laṅcạṅgiạko, baṅ do jojognako;
baṅ do kombṛoko, baṅ do dhon lalociạko, baṅ do bulokʼko, baṅ do cokakʼ baklakʼ roroṛko, baṅ do luluṭko, onko do okoege Isorakʼ raj bako ạidạri joṅa.
Ape modre adomko do onkageko tahẽkana, menkhan Probhu Jisu Mạsi ńutumte ar aboren Isorren Jiu hotete ape dope ạrupʼ sapha ocoakana, ar Isor lạgitʼpe sonot ocoakana arpe dhorom ocoakana.
Adom adomko doko mena “Jotowakʼge ganokʼtińạ,” menkhan jotoakʼ do baṅ porhoana. Jotowakʼge ganokʼtińạ, menkhan okaṭakʼte hõ bạń tabe ocokʼa.

Ar noa katha hõ roṛakana, “Jomakʼ do lacʼ lạgitʼ, ar lacʼ do jomakʼ lạgitʼge.” Menkhan mitʼ din Isor do noakin banargeye maraoa. Hoṛmo hõ loṭghuṭi lạgitʼ do baṅkana bickom ona do Probhu lạgitʼge ar Probhu do hoṛmo lạgitʼge.
Isor do acʼakʼ daṛete gocʼko khon Probhui jiwetʼkedea ar abo hõe jiwetʼ beretʼ bona.
Ape do cetʼ bape baḍaea, apeakʼ hoṛmo do Mạsiakʼ hoṛmo hạṭińko kana mente? Enḍekhan Mạsiakʼ hoṛmo hạṭińko hataokate cetʼ iń do kusmbiakʼ hoṛmo hạṭińkoń hoe ocoea? Tis hõ baṅa.
Se bape baḍaea, kusmbire jamaṛ akanicʼ do uni tulucʼe mitʼ hoṛmokʼ kana mente? Ente sostorre olakana, “Unkin dokin mitʼ hoṛmokʼa.”
Menkhan Probhu tulucʼ mitʼakanicʼ do uni tulucʼe mitʼ Jiugea.
Sanam lekan loṭghuṭi khon ńir joṅpe. Ente manwa okakoe kạiyetʼkan ona do acʼakʼ hoṛmo bahrereye onkayeda; menkhan okoeye loṭghuṭiyetʼkan uni do acʼakʼ hoṛmo birudregeye kạiyeda.
Se bape baḍaea, apeakʼ ontorre okoeye tahenkan ar okoe do Isor ṭhen khonpe ńamakade, uni sonot Jiuakʼ tahen mundilge apeakʼ hoṛmo hạṭińko kana mente?
Ape do apnar lạgitʼ dope baṅkana; ente aema damtepe kiriń ocoakana; onate apeakʼ hoṛmo do Isorakʼ mạhimakʼ lạgitʼ emokʼpe.
Ape okako reaṅpe ol akawạdiń, ona reakʼ roṛ ruạṛiń emape kana. Okoe bae baplakʼ enḍekhan uni doe bhageyetʼgea;
Menkhan goṭa ṭạnḍige loṭghuṭi hoyokʼkana, onate mimitʼ herel hoṛren do rinicʼtetʼe tahentaema, ar mimitʼ maejiuren hõ jãwãetetʼe tahentaema.
Hoṛmo secʼte herel do acʼ rinicʼtetʼ oka ńam lektae onae emaema; ar onkage rinicʼtetʼ hõ jãwãetetʼe emkataema.

Rinicʼtetʼakʼ hoṛmo do eken acʼ eskarakʼ do baṅkana menkhan onare hereltetʼakʼ hõ ektiạri menakʼtaea ar onkaleka jãwãetetʼakʼ hoṛmo hõ acʼ eskarakʼ do baṅkana, menkhan onare rinicʼtetʼakʼ hõ ektiạri menakʼa.
Alope apan ạpinokʼa; menkhan solha mitʼkate koejoṅ lạgitʼ thoṛa din apan ạpin tahẽ hataṛokʼpe; ona tayom do ar hõ mitʼ ṭhenokʼpe jemon apeakʼ bin sambṛao iạte Soetan aloe biḍạupe.
Iń do bạń hukumape kana bickom aṛakʼape kan lekageń roṛeda.
Sanam hoṛge iń lekako hoyokʼma! Menkhan Isor ṭhen khon mimitʼ hoṛ do apan ạpin daya danko ńamakada. Mitʼ hoṛakʼ dan do mitʼleka ar eṭagicʼakʼ dan do eṭakʼleka.
Baṅ bapla akanko ar rạnḍi maejiukoń metako kana, onko hõ iń lekako tahẽlen khan onko lạgitʼ bhage hoekokʼa;
menkhan apnarte okoe bako sambṛaokʼ daṛeakʼ onko doko baplakʼma, ente hoṛmo reakʼ sanate lokʼ khon baplakʼge bhagea.
Bapla akanko do noageń hukumako kana, iń do baṅ menkhan Probhuge; bạhu do jãwãetetʼ ṭhen khon aloe chaḍaokʼma;
menkhane chaḍao emanlen khan uni do ar aloe baplakʼma, menkhan jãwãetetʼ sãote arhõe mitʼ ruạṛokʼma. Jãwãe hõ bạhutetʼ aloe bạgiyema.
Menkhan eṭakʼko do ińiń metako kana, Probhu do baṅ; jãhãe boeharen Mạsire bepạtiạuicʼ bạhu tahentae ar bạhutetʼ do uni tulucʼ tahene rạjige khan enḍekhan jãwãe do uni aloe bạgiyema;
onkage rinicʼtetʼren hõ Mạsire bepạtiạuicʼ jãwãeye tahentae ar jãwãetetʼ do uni tulucʼ tahene rạjige khan enḍekhan uni do jãwãetetʼ aloe bạgiyema;

ente rinicʼtetʼ hotete uni bepạtiạricʼ jãwãe ar jãwãetetʼ hotete uni bepạtiạricʼ rinicʼtetʼ doe sonot ocoakana; ar onka baṅ hoelen khan aperen gidrạko do besaphako hoekokʼa, menkhan Isor samaṅre onko do besapha doko baṅkana.

Menkhan uni bepạtiạricʼ jãwãetetʼ se rinicʼtetʼ do chaḍaokʼe menetʼ khan uni doe chaḍaokʼma; ar nonkanakʼ obostare uni pạtiạricʼ boeha se misera do bae golam akana. Menkhan Isor do sulukte tahen lạgitʼgeye hohoakatʼ bona.
E ayo, cekatem baḍaea, am do amren jãwãeyem bańcao daṛeaea se baṅ? Ar E baba am hõ cekatem baḍaea, amren bạhum bańcao daṛeaea se baṅ?
Onate Probhu okoe okalekae dohoakade ar Isor okoe oka lạgitʼe hohoakawade, uni do onka lekageye calakʼma. Noa hukum do goṭa manḍerrenkogeń emakokana.
Jãhãe hoṛ khatna akane hoho ocoakana? Enḍekhan aloe bin khatna ruạṛokʼma? Bin khatnage jãhãeye hoho ocoakana? Enḍekhan uni do aloe khatnakʼma.
Khatna ar bin khatna do cetʼ hõ baṅkana, menkhan Isorakʼ hukum dohoge asolakʼ kana.
Isor okoe oka lạgitʼe hohoakawade, uni do onarege tahẽ akane tahenma.
Amem hoho ocolenre am do cetʼ golamem tahẽkana? Onate alom dukokʼa; ar sạdhinokʼ reakʼ ạtem ńam khan enḍekhan ona do hataome.
Golam tahenre Probhu okoeye hohoakawade uni do Probhu hotetegeye sạdhin ocoakana. Onkage okoe sạdhin tahenreye hoho ocoakan uni do Mạsiren golame hoeakana.
Ape do aema damtepe kiriń akana; onate manwakoren golam do ar alope hoyokʼa.
E boehako, Isor okoe okalekae hohoakawade, uni do Isor samaṅre onalekageye tahenma.
Kũạ̃ri kuṛiko reaṅ do Probhu ṭhen khon jãhãn hukum bạń ńam akada. Menkhan Isorakʼ daya ńamkate pạtiạr minạńte ińiń bujhạuetʼ lekageń roṛeda.
Ạḍi harkhet ar saset reakʼ oka okte hijukʼkan ona lạgitʼ ińakʼ bujre okoe okaleka menakʼpe onka tahenge bogea.
Am do cetʼ bạhu menae tama? Enḍekhan bạhu bạgiye reakʼ do alom kurumuṭuya. Am do cetʼ bạhu khonem chaḍao akana? Enḍekhan bạhu joṅ reakʼ alom kurumuṭuya.
Menkhan amem baplalenre am do bam kạiyetʼ kana. Ar jãhãe kũạ̃ri kuṛiye baplalenre uni hõ bae kạiyeda. Menkhan okoeko baplakʼkan onko do hoṛmore jalako ńama, ar iń do ona khoniń rukhiyạkepea.
E boehako, noageń meneda, okte do khaṭo akana. Onate ńit khon bạhuanko do begor bạhuanko lekako tahenma;
ar rakʼetʼkanko do bin rarakʼkanko leka; ar rạskạkʼkanko do bin rạskạkʼkanko leka; ar kirińetʼkanko do cetʼge jemon aloko dohojoṅma;
okoe dhạrti reakʼakʼko laṛcaṛetʼkan, onko do purạpuri aloko laṛcaṛma; ente noa dhạrti reakʼ rup do pheraokʼ kana.
Menkhan iń doń menjoṅ kana, jemon nir dạndipe tahen. Bin bapla akanicʼ do Probhu reaṅe dạndikʼ kana, uni doe hudiseda cekate Probhui kusi ocoyea.
Ar bapla akan hoṛge gharońj reakʼ doe dạndikʼ kana; cekate uni do rinicʼtetʼe kusi ocoea mente.

Bạhu ar kũạ̃ri kuṛi reaṅ hõ begar menakʼa. Bin baplayicʼ maejiu do Probhu reakʼakʼko reaṅe dandokʼ kana, jemon hoṛmote ar Jiute sonote tahen; menkhan bapla akan kuṛi do gharońj reakʼe dandokʼkana, cekate uni do jãwãetetʼe kusi ocoyea.
Noa katha do apeakʼ porho lạgitʼgeń roṛeda. Iń do bạń ladeape kana, bickom oka jạruṛa ar okaṭakʼ bhagea ona lạgitʼgeń udgạuetʼpea, jemon ape do goṭa monte Probhuakʼpe kạmi daṛeakʼ.

Ar jãhãe acʼe cikhnạ akade acʼren kũạ̃ri kuṛi tulucʼ bin leke beohareda menteye bujhạuetʼ khan, ar kuṛiyakʼ baplakʼ umer hoeakan khan ar baplaye reakʼ jạruṛe bujhạu khan, enḍekhan uni do acʼakʼ sana lekae kạmi ma. Are onkae khan bae kạiyeda, bapla ocoakin.
Menkhan jạruṛ bạnukʼtae iạte acʼakʼ monre ektiạri menakʼtaete jãhãeye mone muruk akatʼ ar ontorreye khạṭi akawan baṅma acʼren kũạ̃ri kuṛi bin baplaye tahẽ ocowaea mente, enḍekhan uni hõe beseda;
onate okoe acʼe cikhnạ akade acʼren kũạ̃ri kuṛiye baplayede uni do artetʼe beseda.

Jãwãetetʼ tinạkʼ din jiwetʼe tahen, unạkʼ din rinicʼtetʼ do tolgeye tahena, menkhan jãwãetetʼe gocʼlen khan uni doe sạdhinokʼa, ar jãhãegeye kusiae unigeye bapla daṛeaea, menkhan uni hoṛ do Probhurenge jemone hoyokʼ.
Menkhan ińakʼ bujre uni do enkageye tahẽlen khan artetʼ bhạgane hoyokʼa; ariń meneda, iń do Isorren Jiu hotete noa kathań roṛeda.
Iń do ńitokʼ boṅga ṭhen samaṅakʼ jomakʼko reaṅ iń roṛeda. Baḍaegeabon, sanamkoakʼge akel menakʼtabona. Akel do manwae phulạu ocoyea, menkhan dulạṛ doe benao rakapʼa.
Jãhãe jãhãnakʼe baḍaea menteye menjoṅ kan khan, uni do cetʼleka baḍae jạruṛ tahẽkantae onka do ńit hõ bae baḍae akada.
Menkhan okoe Isore dulạṛedekan, Isor do eken unigeye baḍaeyede kana.
Ńitokʼ do boṅga ṭhen samaṅakʼ jomakʼ reaṅ iń roṛeda. Baḍaegeabon dhạrtire cele boṅgage bạnukʼkoa, ar mitʼ goṭen chaḍa ar cele Isor hõ bạnukʼkoa.
Serma se dhạrtire deb-debi mente jãhãe menakʼko khan enḍekhan debota hõ aema ar Probhu hõ aema menakʼkoa.

Enrehõ abo lạgitʼ do mitʼ goṭenge Isor menaea. Unige Baba do; ar uni ṭhen khonge jotowakʼ do hecʼakana ar uni lạgitʼge jiwetʼ menakʼ bona. Aboren Probhu hõe mitʼ goṭengea, uni do Jisu Mạsige. Uni hotetege jotowakʼ do hecʼakana ar uni hotetege jiwetʼ menakʼbona.
Menkhan noa akel do jotokoakʼ do bạnukʼa. Boṅga sewa reakʼ hewa tahẽkante adomko do ńitokʼ hõ boṅga ṭhen samaṅakʼ jomakʼko jomeda. Onate onkoakʼ bibek hõ nijorgete bhõnḍokʼ kantakoa.
Menkhan jomakʼ hotete Isor ṭhen do babo teṅgo ṭarhao daṛeakʼa. Ente babon jomle khan aboakʼ do cetʼ loksan hõ baṅ hoyokʼtabona; ar bon jom lekhan hõ jãhãn lab do bạnukʼa.
Menkhan, sontor akan tahenpe, jemon apeakʼ noa sạdhintetʼ do nijorkoakʼ tạkicʼakʼ aloe hoeocoe.
Amakʼ do akel menakʼtama, menkhan okoeakʼ bibek nijorge uni do boṅga mundilkore jojom duṛupʼe ńellem khan boṅga samaṅakʼ jom lạgitʼ uni hõ cetʼ dil bae ńama?
Onkate amakʼ akel karonte nijoricʼ one okoe lạgitʼ Mạsiye gocʼlen, uni doe nosṭokʼa.
Nonkate aperen boehako birudrepe kại ar onkoakʼ nijor bibekkope hạnletako khan enḍekhan ape do Mạsi birudregepe kạiya.
Onate jomakʼte ińren boehae tạkijokʼ khan, enḍekhan iń do tis hõ jel do bạń joma, jemon ińren boeha aloe tạkijokʼ.
Iń do cetʼ sạdhin doń baṅkana? Iń do cetʼ apostol doń baṅkana? Aboren Probhu Jisu do cetʼ bạń ńṭoṭhadea? Probhu lạgitʼ okaṭakʼ iń kạmi akatʼ ona reakʼ jo do cetʼ ape dope baṅkana?
Eṭakʼko apostol mente bako aṅgocińre hõ ape do apostol mentepe aṅgocińạ. Ape je Probhuren hoṛpe hoeakan onage ińakʼ apostol hudạ reakʼ sạbudtetʼ do.
Ar okoe ińakʼ apostol hoyokʼ reakʼ kukliye rakab onko ṭhen ińakʼ roṛ ruạṛ do noage,
aleakʼ do cetʼ jom ńũi reakʼ hok bạnukʼtalea?
Eṭakʼ sanam apostolko, Probhuren boehako ar Kephasteko cetʼ leka akoren bạhuko seletʼ porcarko oḍokokʼkan, onkage Mạsire pạtiạukʼ akan bạhuko seletʼ porcar oḍokokʼ reakʼ ạidạri do cetʼ bạnukʼtalea?
Barnabas ar ińge cetʼ kạmikate jojom hoyokʼ tạlińa?
Apnarakʼ poesa khorojkate palṭon kạmi do okoeye kạmi kana? Okoe darkha bagwane benaoetʼkan uni do cetʼ ona reakʼ jo bae jomeda? Se okoeye gupikan uni do cetʼ palrenkoakʼ toa bae ńũiya?
Iń do cetʼ eken manwa dharatege noakoń roṛeda? Moseakʼ ạn-ạriko hõ cetʼ noako do bae menetʼkana?
Onare olakana, “Enokʼkan daṅgra do moca alom toltaea.” Isor do cetʼ eken ḍaṅgarako lạgitʼgeye dandokʼ kana?
Uni do cetʼ abo lạgitʼge noa katha do bae meneda? Hẽ noa katha do abo lạgitʼge olakana; ente siokʼkạnicʼ do askatege siokʼ lek taea; ar enokʼicʼ hõ bhag ńam reakʼ astege enokʼ hoyokʼtaea.
Ale do apere Jiu reakʼ itạle erakatʼte ape ṭhen khon hoṛmo reakʼ jom-ńũle tear khan enḍekhan ona do cetʼ maraṅ katha kana?

Noa lạgitʼ ape cetanre eṭakʼkoakʼ bakhra menakʼtako khan enḍekhan ale do artetʼ ńam lek dole baṅkana? Menkhan ona hok do bale laṛcaṛeda bickom sanamakʼle sahaoeda, jemon Mạsiakʼ bhage sombat porcarre jãhãn tạkicʼakʼ alole hoyokʼ.
Ape do cetʼ bape baḍaea, okoe mundil reakʼko kạmikan onko do mundil khonge jomakʼko ńama, ar okoe pinḍreko kạmikan onko do pinḍre jãhãnakʼge samaṅokʼkan ona reakʼ hạṭińko ńama mente?
Onkage Probhu do bhage sombat porcarko lạgitʼ noae hukum akada, okoe bhage sombatko porcaretʼkan onko do ona khonakʼge jom-ńũi reakʼko ńama.
Menkhan iń do noa reakʼ cetʼge bạń beohar ạguakada. Ape do iń lạgitʼ nonkape hoeocoe reakʼ do bạń oletʼkana. Ente jãhãe ińakʼ sarhaoakʼko ạuṛiagtiń khan ona khon boroṅ gujukʼge bogetińạ.
Iń do bhage sombatgeń porca akada, enrehõ onate sarhaokʼ reakʼ cetʼge bạnukʼtińạ, ente ona do kạmi lagaoạńgea. Bhage sombat bạń porcarle khan ińre do hae hae!
Iń do apnar kusiteń porcaretʼ khan, enḍekhan kuṛại do menakʼgetińạ, ar apnar kusite bạń porcaretʼ kanrehõ iń cetanre ona bhar menakʼte onań kạmi kana.
Enḍekhan ińakʼ kuṛại do cetʼ? Ona do noage je, bhage sombatiń porcar bodolte ińakʼ oka paona menakʼ ona hatao baṅkate begor poesate onań kạmi daṛeakʼ.
Iń do jãhãeren golamiń baṅkanre hõ sanamkoren golamiń hoeakana, jemon Mạsi lạgitʼ ḍher hoṛiń lab daṛeako.
Jihudiko labko lạgitʼ do Jihudiko ṭhen Jihudi lekań hoeakana. Ente Moseakʼ ạn-tạriren iń baṅkanre hõ okoe ạn-tạrire menakʼko onko labko lạgitʼ onko lekań hoeakana.
Arhõ okoe ạn-tạri bahrere menakʼko onko labko lạgitʼ iń do ạn-tạri bahreren hoṛ lekań hoeakana. Onate Isorakʼ ạn bahrere minạńa ona do baṅ; iń do Mạisakʼ ạn taberege minạńa.
Pạtiạure okoeko nijorge onko ṭhen do onko lekan hoṛiń hoeakana, jemon Mạsi lạgitʼ purạteń lab daṛeako. Metakʼme sanamko ṭhen iń do sanamakʼiń hoeakana jemon jãhãlekatege thoṛa hoṛiń bańcao daṛeako.
Iń do bhage sombat lạgitʼge noakoń onkayeda jemon onaren bhạgiạdariń hoyokʼ.
Ape do cetʼ bape baḍaea ńir enecʼre sanamkogeko seledokʼa, menkhan eken mitʼ hoṛge kuṛại doe ńama? Onate ape hõ nonka dạṛpe jemon kuṛạipe ńam daṛeakʼ.

Okoe dạṛ enecʼreko seledokʼkan onko do laha khonge mitʼṭen niạm bhitriteko calakʼa. Onko do okaṭakʼ jid ṭupri mosodokʼ ona ńam lạgitʼko onkayeda, menkhan abo do bin mosodokʼ ṭupri ńam lạgitʼge one okaṭakʼ do tisge baṅ nosṭokʼ.
Onate ạuṛiakʼ do bạń dạṛeda. Okoe hoeye daletʼkan onka do bạń kuhạueda.
Iń do bickom hoṛmoń kuhạu gaṅetʼtińạ ar golam akae iń dohoyeda, jemon eṭakʼko ṭhen bhage sombat porcar tayom ińakʼ kuṛại ńam lạgitʼ belek bạń hoyokʼ.
E boehako, iń doń khojkana jemonpe baḍae, aboren hapṛamko do jotoge ona rimil reakʼ umulreko tahẽkana ar sanamkoge doreão talateko paromlena.
Mose tulucʼ midokʼ lạgitʼge onko do rimil ar doreãoreko bạptis ocolena.
Enrehõ Isor do onko modren ḍher hoṛko cetanre kusi bae tahẽkana. Onate onkoakʼ mạ̃ṛĩ do hahaṅkarrege giḍi ocoyentakoa.
Ona ńelte abo jemon bon cetʼ daṛeakʼ ona lạgitʼge noako do hoelena, jemon onko cetʼleka bạṛicʼakʼko lalocatʼ tahẽkan onka alo bon kạmi.
Cetʼleka onko modren adomko do boṅgako sewawako kan tahẽkan onka leka boṅga sewako do alope hoyokʼa. Olakan leka, “Hoṛko do jojom ar ńũńũko duṛupʼena, ar enejokʼko beretʼena.”
Onko modre ḍher hoṛgeko laṭghaṭletʼte mitʼ dinre bargel pe hajar hoṛko gocʼlena. Abo do onka alo bon loṭghuṭiyma.
Onko modre ḍherkoge Probhuko biḍạukedete cetʼleka biń gerteko gocʼlen, onka jemon Probhu alo bon biḍạue.
Onko modre ạḍi hoṛgeko karacʼ kurucʼlente cetʼleka nonosṭoyicʼ goḍet hoteteko marao ocolen, ape do onaka alope karacʼ kurujokʼa.
Eṭakʼ hoṛko jemon ńelkateko cetʼ daṛeakʼ onate onko cetanre noako do hoelena. Okoe jug reakʼ mucạtʼre bon seṭerakan, abo cehao bon lạgitʼge noako do olakana.
Onate jãhãe kajakteye teṅgo akana menteye monejoṅkan khan, enḍekhan uni doe sontorokʼma jemon aloe bhindạṛokʼ.

Manwa jionre okako biḍạu hoe emanokʼ ona chaḍa ar eṭakʼ jãhãn biḍạu do baṅ paṛao akawatʼpe. Isor doe pạtiạrgete, sahao daṛeakʼ khon bạ̃ṛti do bae biḍạupea, bickom biḍạu são sãote ona khon oḍokokʼ reakʼ hõe horapea, jemonpe sahao daṛeakʼ.
Onate E ińren gateko, boṅga sewa khon men ńir joṅpe.
Iń do budanko menteń baḍaeyetʼpete noakoń galmaraoape kana; ar okań roṛetʼkan, ona do apege bicạrpe.

Probhu kedokʼ okte gunmanao joharate oka bhoranakʼ bạṭi khon bon ńũi, ona do cetʼ Mạsiakʼ mãyãmre bakhra seledokʼ leka do baṅkana? Ar oka piṭhạ kecakʼ katebon jometʼkan ona hõ cetʼ Mạsiakʼ hoṛmore bakhra seledokʼ leka do baṅkana?
Ar bon aemagere hõ mitʼ hoṛmo kanabon, ente piṭhạ do mitʼ goṭengea, ar sanamkoge ona mitʼ piṭhạ reaṅ hạṭińge bon ataṅeda.
Israel jạtko beṅgetʼakope. Onko modre okoe teṅgenakʼko jometʼkan onko do cetʼ ona pinḍ reakʼ jotoge bako bakhra joṅkana?
Enḍekhan cetʼ iń roṛeda? Boṅga ṭhen teṅgenakʼ jomakʼ do jãhãnakʼ kana se muṭhạnge jãhãnakʼ kana?
Ona do baṅ, bickom iń meneda, boṅgan hoṛko okako teṅgenetʼkan ona do Isor lạgitʼ do baṅ, ona do bạṛicʼ jiuko ṭhengeko onkayeda. Ar bạṛicʼ jiuko tulucʼpe gatekʼ do bạń khojkana.
Probhuakʼ bạṭi ar bạṛicʼ jiukoakʼ bạṭi, noa banar khon baṅgepe jom daṛeakʼa. Probhuakʼ mej cetanre ar bạṛicʼ jiukoakʼ mej cetanre oka menakʼ ona banar reakʼ bakhra do ohogepe jom daṛelea.
Noate do cetʼ Probhu bon ãṭ ocoyede kana? Abo do cetʼ uni khon bon daṛeangea?
Adomkoko mena, “Jotowakʼge ganokʼgea.” Menkhan jotowakʼ do baṅ porhowana. Jotowakʼge ganokʼa; menkhan jotowakʼ do baṅ benao rakapʼa.
Okoe hõ apnar bhạlại lạgitʼ aloe kurumuṭuima, menkhan eṭakʼkoakʼ bhạlạigeye ńam baṛaema.
Bajarre ạkhrińokʼ jãhãnakʼge jompe; apeakʼ bibek khạtirte cetʼ hõ begor kulite;
ente sonot sostor reakʼ katha leka, “Dhạrti ar onare menakʼakʼ jotowakʼge Probhuwakʼ kana.”
Ar jãhãe bin pạtiạuicʼe neotalepere arpe calaolenre, bibek khạtirte cetʼ hõ begor kulite samaṅ akawatʼpe reakʼ jompe.
Menkhan jãhãeko metape khan, “Noa do boṅga ṭhen teṅgenakʼ kana,” Enḍekhan one okoeye menakatʼpe uni iạte ar bibek khạtirte alope joma.
Iń do apeakʼ bibek reakʼ katha do bạń roṛeda, eṭakʼ mitʼ hoṛakʼ bibek reakʼ kathań roṛeda. Menkhan eṭakʼ mitʼ hoṛakʼ bibek iạte cedakʼ ińakʼ sạdhintetʼreń bicạr ocokʼa?
Ar gunmanao joharateń jomle khan, enḍekhan oka jomakʼ lạgitʼ gunmanao iń joharetʼkan ona lạgitʼ cedakʼiń opoman ocokʼa?
Onate ape do jom-ńũi ar jãhãnakʼgepe cekae, jotowakʼge Isorakʼ ṭhonokʼ lạgitʼ kạmipe.

Iń do cetʼleka sanam manwako jotowakʼte kusi ocoko lạgitʼ iń kurumuṭuyetʼ kan ape hõ onkage kurumuṭuipe; metakʼme Jihudi ar boṅgan hoṛ jạtrenko se Isorakʼ manḍerren hoṛko ṭhen tạkicʼako alope hoyokʼa.
Iń do apnar porho lạgitʼ kurumuṭu baṅkate ḍher hoṛkoakʼ bhạlại lạgitʼgeń kurumuṭu kana jemon onko do kại khon bańcaoko ńam.
Iń do cetʼleka Mạsireń calakʼkan, ape hõ onkage calakʼpe.
Apeń sarhaoetʼpea, ente ape do sanamakʼkorepe disạyediń kana ar okań cetʼ akawatʼpe onape sapʼ dohoakatʼa.
Iń doń menjoṅ kana jemonpe baḍae baṅma, mitʼ ke mitʼ herelkoren matha do Mạsige, ar maejiuren matha do jãwãetetʼ, ar Mạsiren matha do Isorge.
Jãhãe herel hoṛ bohokʼ dapalkateye koejoṅ se nạbi leka Isorakʼ kathakoe lại, uni do acʼakʼ bohokʼe bemanoteda.
Ar jãhãe maejiu bohokʼ begor ṭuṭurikateye koejoṅ se nạbi lekate kathae lại, uni do acʼakʼ bohokʼe bemanoteda, ente uni do hoyo poṭor akan maejiu lekageye hoeakana.
Jãhãe maejiu bohokʼ bae ṭuṭurikʼ khan uni do acʼakʼ upʼe kạpci giḍikakʼma. Menkhan maejiuko lạgitʼ kạpcikʼ se hoyo poṭorokʼ do lajao paṛage khan onko doko ṭuṭurikʼma.
Herelakʼ bohokʼ dapal do lek baṅkana, ente Isor do acʼlekage herele sirjạu akadea ar herel hotetege Isorakʼ ṭhonok do sodor akana. Menkhan maejiu hotete herelakʼ do ṭhonok sodorokʼa.
Herel do maejiu khon bae hecʼakana, menkhan maejiuge herel khone hecʼakana.
Maejiu lạgitʼ herel do bae sirjạu akana, menkhan herel lạgitʼge maejiu doe sirjạu akana.
Onate maejiuko do serma goḍetko iạte akoakʼ bohokʼre gobolokʼ reakʼ cinhạ lekate bohokʼ ṭuṭurikʼ do lek takoa.
Enrehõ Probhure herel do maejiu begorte cele hõe baṅkana ar maejiu hõ herel begorte cele hõe baṅkana;
ente cetʼ leka herel khon maejiue hecʼakan onkage arhõ maejiu hotete herelakʼ janam do hoeakana. Menkhan sanamakʼ do Isor khonge.
Ape apnarte baṛe bicạrpe, maejiuko begor ṭuṭurite Isor ṭhenko koejoṅ do cetʼ sajaokʼgea?
Khaṭo budte cetʼ noa baṅ bujhạukʼ kana, herel do jhạl upʼ tahẽntako khan bemanot hoyokʼtakoa mente?
Menkhan maejiuko jeleń upʼ tahentako khan ona do onko lạgitʼ ṭhonok kana, ente apnar dapalokʼ lạgitʼge maejiuko do jeleń upʼ emakatʼkoa.
Ar jãhãe noa iạteko ṭhapa ṭhugokʼ khan noań menkea, eṭakʼ jãhãn niạm do abo talare bạnukʼa ar Isorakʼ manḍerkore hõ bạnukʼa.
Menkhan ńitiń hukumape kanre do bạń sarhaoetʼpea, ente ape do manḍerre boge lạgitʼ do baṅ bickom bạṛijokʼ lạgitʼgepe jarwakʼ kana.
Pạhilreń ańjomeda, manḍer jarwakʼre ape talare dola doli tahenkana, ar iń do thoṛ pạtiạu hõń pạtiạukʼkangea.
Ente ape talare dola duli do tahengea, jemon Isor samaṅre ape modre biḍạukʼ ṭarhaokʼkoko sodorokʼ.
Manḍer lekate mitʼ jaegare jarwakate okaṭakʼpe jometʼkan ona do Probhu bhoj do baṅkana,
ente begor tạṅgitepe jomeda. Onate mitʼ hoṛakʼ do reṅgecʼ tahen kangea ar eṭagicʼ doe bulokʼkana.
Jom ńũi lạgitʼ apeakʼ oṛakʼ do cetʼ bạnukʼtapea? Se Isorakʼ manḍerkope nihạteda ar okoeakʼ cetʼge bạnukʼtako onkope lajao ocoyetʼkoa? Iń do cetʼiń metapea? Noa iạteń sarhaopea? Khạṭige baṅa.
Okaṭakʼ iń cetʼ akawatʼpe ona do Probhu ṭhen khongeń ńamakada. Oka ńindạ Probhu do bạirikoakʼ tireye sapʼ ocolen,
ona ńindạ uni do piṭhạ ataṅkate Isore gunmanao joharadea ar onae kecakʼketʼteye menleda, “Noa do ińakʼ hoṛmo kana one ape lạgitʼ emogokʼkan; ar iń disạyiń lạgitʼge nonkaepe baṛe.”
Kedokʼ tayom onkage bạṭi hõ halaṅkateye menleda, “Noa bạṭi do ińakʼ mãyãm hotete Isorakʼ nawa bondobos kana; tinạkʼ dhaope ńũi nonkaepe, iń disạyiń lạgitʼ.”
Onate uni ạuriye hijukʼ hạbicʼ tinạkʼ dhao noa piṭhạpe jom ar noa bạṭi reakʼpe ńũi unạkʼ dhao Probhuakʼ gujukʼ reakʼ kathape porcara.
Onate jãhãe belek lekate noa piṭhạ ar Probhuakʼ bạṭi khone jom uni do Probhuakʼ hoṛmo ar mãyãm reakʼ dạyike hoyokʼa.
Onate manwa do piṭhạ ar bạṭi reakʼ jom lahare apnarteye biḍạukʼma,
ente jojom jokhecʼ Probhuakʼ hoṛmo reaṅ bae bujhạu khan enḍekhan ona jomte uni do acʼ cetanre sạjạiye ạgujoṅa.
Ar onatege ape talare ạḍi utạr nijor ar rugiko menakʼkoa, ar aemako gocʼ akana.
Abo do apnarte bon biḍạulen khan enḍekhan Probhuakʼ bicạr khon bon rukhiyạkokʼa.
Menkhan Probhui bicạrbonre uni doe ḍanṭaoetʼ bona, jemon dhạrtiren sanamko sãote dusi mente alo bon ṭarhaokʼ.
Onate E ińren boehako, manḍerre jom lạgitʼpe jarwakʼre tạṅgikʼpe.
Ar jãhãe reṅgeje khan uni do oṛakʼ khone jom ạguima, jemon manḍer jarwakʼ khạtirte sạjại aloe ńam; ar eṭakʼakʼ reaṅ do ińiń hecʼlenreń lạiapea.
E boehako, sonot Jiuteakʼ dan reaṅ bin baḍaepe tahen do baṅ sanań kana.
Baḍaegeape, Isor bape sewawaekan tahẽkanre ape do nonkan muṭhạnko secʼpe ạyur ocokʼkan tahẽkana one okoe doko guṅgạge.
Ińiń baḍae ocoyetʼpea, Isorren Jiute roroṛkanko do okoe hõ bako mena, “Jisu do sarapicʼ kanae mente.” Ar sonot Jiu begor, “Jisuge Probhu” kanae mente okoe hõ bako men daṛeakʼa.
Ini mitʼ sonot Jiuakʼ daya danko do judạ judạgea;
ar judạ judạ dharate abo do ini mitʼ Probhuge bon sewawae kana.
Abo mimitʼko do judạ judạ kạmi bon emocoakana, menkhan ini Isorge judạ judạ dharate mimitʼko talareye kạmikana.
Sanamkoakʼ bhạlại lạgitʼge sonot Jiu do mimitʼ hoṛre mimitʼ lekae sodorokʼ kana.
Adom adom hoṛ do uni sonot Jiu hotete akel reakʼ kathako roṛeda.
Ar eṭakʼko do ini Jiu hotete pạtiạu se ruạ boge reakʼ daṛe se hahaṛa kạmi reakʼ daṛe se nạbi leka Isorakʼ katha roroṛ reakʼ daṛe se boge ar bạṛicʼ jiuko oromko reakʼ daṛe;
ar adomko do judạ judạ pạrsite roṛ reakʼ daṛe se judạ judạ pạrsite torjoma reakʼ daṛe ini mitʼ Jiugeye kạmi ocoyeda.
Noako joto kạmi do ini sonot Jiugeye kạmiyeda. Uni do cetʼleka sanayede kan onkage onako dan mimitʼko judạ judạye emako kana.
Mitʼṭen hoṛmore cetʼleka aema hạṭińko tahen ar ona hạṭińko ḍhergere hõ cetʼleka mitʼṭen hoṛmoge hoyokʼ, Mạsi hõ ṭhik onkage.

Abon do baṅ dobon Jihudikan, baṅ dobon boṅgan hoṛ jạtrenkokan, baṅ dobon golamko kan, baṅ dobon sạdhinko kan, jotoge ini mitʼ sonot Jiu hotete bon bạptis akana; ar jotokoge ini sonot Jiuge bon ńam akadea.
Hoṛmo do eken mitʼṭen hạṭińte do baṅ benao akana, ona do aema hạṭińtege tearakana.
Jaṅgae menkhan, “Ti doń baṅkana, onate hoṛmo reakʼ hạṭiń hõń baṅkana,” Enḍekhan hoṛmo reakʼ hạṭiń baṅkana ona do baṅa.
Luture menkhan, “Mẽtʼ doń baṅkana, onate hoṛmo reakʼ hạṭiń hõń baṅkana,” Enḍekhan hoṛmo reakʼ hạṭiń baṅkana ona do baṅa.
Ar goṭa hoṛmoge mẽtʼ hoelen khan, enḍekhan ańjom reakʼ daṛe do okare tahẽkokʼa? Ar goṭa hoṛmoge lutur hoelen khan, enḍekhan ji reakʼ daṛe do okare tahẽkokʼa?
Isor do cetʼlekae monejoṅkan onkage hoṛmo reakʼ hạṭińko hoṛmoreye bạisạu akada.
Ar joto hạṭińko mitʼ lekage hoelen khan, enḍekhan hoṛmo do okare tahẽkokʼa?
Hạṭińko aemagere hõ, menkhan hoṛmo do mitʼṭengea.
Mẽtʼ do ti ohoe men daṛelea, “Amakʼ do jạruṛ bạnukʼtińạ,” Bohokʼ hõ jaṅga ohoe men daṛelekina, “Abenakʼ do jạruṛ bạnukʼtińạ.”
Menkhan hoṛmo reakʼ oka hạṭińko nijorge aṭkarokʼkan onage bạ̃ṛti jạruṛa.
Hoṛmo reakʼ oka hạṭińko thoṛa manotakʼ bon metakʼkan, ona hạṭińkoge bạ̃ṛti manot bon udukʼeda; ar oka hạṭińko baṅ udugokʼkan onako do ạḍi manot salakʼ bon poṭom esetʼkakʼ kana,
menkhan oka hạṭińko bahrere udugokʼ, ona do poṭom esetʼ reakʼ jãhãn jạruṛ bạnukʼa; ar hoṛmo reakʼ oka hạṭińko jãhãn manot bạnukʼ, Isor do onakoge bạ̃ṛti manote emakada ar sanam hạṭińkoe mitʼakada,
jemon hoṛmo do alo bhaga bhạgikʼ, bickom hoṛmo hạṭińko mitʼ lekako dạndikʼ. Mitʼ hạṭiń dukokʼ khan ona sãote goṭa hạṭińge dukokʼa.
Mitʼ hạṭiń manote ńam khan enḍekhan goṭa hạṭińge ona sãote hulạsokʼa.
Ape do Mạsiakʼ hoṛmo kanape, ar mimitʼ hoṛ do ona hoṛmoren hạṭińkoge.

Isor do manḍerre pạhilte apostolko, dosarte nạbiko, tesarte cecetʼkoe dohoketʼkoa. Ona tayom noko hoṛkoe bachaoketʼkoa, one okoe do hahaṛa kạmi reakʼ ektiạriko ńamakatʼ, ar okoe do ruạ boge reakʼ daṛe, ar okoe do goṛowako reakʼ daṛe, ar okoe do calao ganao reakʼ daṛe, okoe do pạrsi torjoma reakʼ daṛe, onko sanamkoge cetʼ apostol kanako?
Sanamkoge cetʼ nạbi kanako? Jotoge cetʼ cecetʼko kanako? Sanamkoakʼge cetʼ hahaṛa kạmi reakʼ ektiạri menakʼtakoa?
Sanamkoge cetʼ ruạ bogekʼ reakʼ ektiạri menakʼ takoa? Sanamkoge cetʼ aema lekan pạrsiteko roṛeda? Sanamkoge cetʼ ona reakʼ maneko bujhạuako kana? Khạṭige baṅa.
Bickomiń mena, ape do joto khon jạruṛanakʼ danko ńam baṛae lạgitʼ gagojokʼpe. Iń do apeko artetʼ sorosakʼ mitʼṭecʼ hor iń udukʼape kana:
Manwakoakʼ ar serma goḍetkoakʼ pạrsiteń roṛlere hõ dulạṛ bạnukʼtiń khan, raṛaṅ raṛaṅokʼkan ghonṭa ar chaṅ chaṅokʼkan kortaliń hoeakana.

Nạbi leka roṛ reakʼ ektiạri tahentiń, ar sanam okoakʼ iń baḍae daṛeakʼ ar joto lekan akel tahentiń, se buruko ucạṛ daṛeakʼ leka purạ biswạs tahentiń, menkhan dulạṛ bạnukʼ tiń khan, cetʼ porho hõ bạnukʼtińạ.
Jãhãnakʼge menakʼtiń ona joto do reṅgecʼ orecʼko jom ocoko lạgitʼ iń danlere ar atar giḍikʼ lạgitʼ ińakʼ hoṛmo hõń alaelere hõ, dulạṛ bạnukʼtiń khan cetʼ porho hõ bạnukʼtińạ.
Dulạṛ doe soboria, dulạṛ doe susṭoba; dulạṛ do bae hiskạwa,
dulạṛ do bae phulạukʼa, dulạṛ do bae becola, dulạṛ do bae hạr dogokʼa; dulạṛ do bae kaḍraokʼa; dulạṛ do bae adopa; dulạṛ do bạṛicʼ bae hisạba;
dulạṛ do bedhoromakʼte bae rạskạkʼa bickom oka sạriakʼkan onateye rạskạ midokʼa.
Dulạṛ do sanamakʼgeye sahaoa, sanamakʼgeye pạtiạuakʼa; sanamakʼrege ase dohoea; ar sanamakʼgeye sumbhrạua.
Dulạṛ do tisge baṅ mucạdokʼa. Nạbi lekate roṛ reakʼ ektiạri cabakʼa, ar eṭakʼ pạrsite roṛ reakʼ ektiạri menakʼ khan ona do adokʼa; ar baḍaeakʼ menakʼ khan ona hõ mạutạkʼa;
ente abon do jotowakʼ purạute babon baḍaea, ar nạbi lekate purạute hõ babon nạbiyeda.
Menkhan purạwakʼ seṭerlen khan bin purạuwakʼ do mạutạkʼa.
Iń do gidrạń tahẽkanre gidrạ lekań roṛetʼ tahẽkana, gidrạ lekań hudisetʼ tahẽkana ar gidrạ lekageń bicạretʼ tahẽkana; ar ńitokʼ doń sẽṛã akana, onate gidrạ reakʼakʼko doń bạgi akada.

Abo do ńitokʼ ạrsire pusṭạute babo ńeleda, menkhan unre samna sạmni bon ńel ńama. Iń do ńitokʼ okań baḍaekan ona do purạute bạń baḍaea, menkhan Isor do cetʼleka purạteye baḍaeyediń kan, unre onkage purạteń baḍaea.
Menkhan ńitokʼ do biswạs, as, ar dulạṛ, noako penege tahenkana; menkhan noako modre joto khon soros utạrakʼ do dulạṛkangea.
Noa dulạṛ lạgitʼ ape do biseskaete kurumuṭuipe, ar sonot Jiu emakʼ dan, biseskaete nạbi lekate roṛ reakʼ ektiạri ńam lạgitʼ gagojokʼpe.
Eṭakʼ pạrsite roroṛicʼ do manwako ṭhen katha bae roṛeda, menkhan Isor ṭhengeye roṛeda; ente ona do okoe hõ bako bujhạu daṛeakʼa; uni do Jiu hotete sạri okoakʼ reakʼ roṛeda.
Menkhan nạbi lekate katha roroṛicʼ do manwako ṭhen nonkan kathae roṛa one okaṭakʼteye benao rakapʼko, are udgạuko ar jiwi raṛecʼe danako.
Eṭakʼ pạrsite katha roroṛicʼ do apnargeye benao rakabokʼa, menkhan nạbi lekate roroṛicʼ do manḍerren hoṛkoe benao rakapʼkoa.

Ińakʼ sana do jotoko jemon eṭakʼ eṭakʼ pạrsitepe roṛ daṛeakʼ, menkhan arhõ bạ̃ṛtiń khojkana nạbi lekate jemon kathape roṛ daṛeakʼ. Eṭakʼ pạrsikote roroṛicʼ do manḍerren hoṛko benao rakapʼko lạgitʼ bae torjomae khan, enḍekhan uni khon nạbi lekate okoe kathae roṛetʼ unigeye sorosa.
Onate E boehako, ape ṭhen senkate eṭakʼ pạrsikoteń roṛle khan enḍekhan cetʼ iń porhokepea; sodorakʼ, se baḍaeakʼ, se nạbiakʼ, se sikhạuna reakʼakʼ bạń galmarao ape khan do?
Tirioge cetʼ ar peṛesaṅge cetʼ onako do rạṛ aloko begarle khan cekate oroṅakʼ ar banamakʼ do baḍae oromokʼa?
Lạṛhại siṅgạ pusṭạute baṅ saḍelen khan, enḍekhan lạṛhại lạgitʼ okoe haleye sapṛaokʼa?
Onkage okaṭakʼ pạrsi hoṛ bako bujhạu ona pạrsitepe roṛle khan enḍekhan okaṭakʼpe roṛ ona do cekate bujhạukʼa? Ente unre okaṭakʼ kathape roṛ ona ma hoe ṭhengepe roṛetʼkan.
Noa dhạrtire aema lekan pạrsiko menakʼa; onako modre okaṭakʼge okạjwạ do baṅkana.
Onate jãhãn pạrsi reakʼ bhed bạń baḍaele khan enḍekhan uni roroṛicʼ ṭhen do eṭakʼ pạrsiren hoṛ lekań hoyokʼa ar uni hõ iń ṭhen do eṭakʼ pạrsiren hoṛ lekage.
Apere hõ noa katha do sạrigea. Ape do sonot Jiu reakʼ dan ńam lạgitʼpe jidre okaṭakʼ dan hotete manḍer benao rakapʼ daṛekokʼ onako ḍherkaete ńam lạgitʼ kurumuṭuipe.
Onate jãhãe hoṛ eṭakʼ pạrsite kathae roṛetʼ khan uni doe koejoṅma jemon ona reakʼ maneye bujhạu daṛeako.
Iń do eṭakʼ pạrsiteń koejoṅ, enḍekhan ińren Jiugeye koejoṅkana menkhan ińakʼ mon do bae kạmikana.
Enḍekhan cetʼ cekae jạruṛtińạ? Iń do Jiuteń koejoṅa, ar akelte hõń koejoṅa; ar Jiuteń sereńa ar akelte hõń sereńa.
Am do Jiutem gunmanao johar khan ona pạrsi bin baḍaeyicʼ hoṛ onḍe hạjire tahenre cekate amakʼ gunmanao joharakʼre uni do Amene mena? Ente am cetʼem menetʼ uni do bae bujhạueda?
Am do hoedaṛeakʼa bes okocʼtem gunmanao joharakʼ kana, menkhan onate uni eṭakʼ hoṛ do bae benao rakabokʼ kana.
Iń do ape jotoko khon bạ̃ṛti eṭakʼ eṭakʼ pạrsiteń roṛ daṛeakʼkante Isoriń gunmanao joharae kana.
Menkhan manḍer talare eṭakʼ eṭakʼ pạrsite hajar hajar kathań roṛ khon eṭakʼko cetʼako lạgitʼ bickom ińakʼ bud khon mõṛẽ goṭecʼ kathageń roṛa.
E boehako, bujre gidrạko leka do alope hoyokʼa. Ar bạṛicʼakʼre apeakʼ mon do bale gidrạko leka hoyokʼtape ma, menkhan bujre do sẽṛã hoṛ lekankoge hoyokʼpe.
Moseakʼ ạn-ạrire Probhui meneda, “Eṭakʼ pạrsiren hoṛko hotete ar eṭakʼkoakʼ mocate iń do noko jạtrenkoń galmarao akoa, menkhan enrehõ onko do ińakʼ katha bako ańjoma.”

Enḍekhan ńelokʼ kana, biswạsiko lạgitʼ eṭakʼ eṭakʼ pạrsite katha roṛ do jãhãn cinhạ baṅkana, bickom bin pạtiạuko lạgitʼ do cinhạ kana; menkhan bin pạtiạukʼko lạgitʼ nạbi lekate katha roṛ jãhãn cinhạ do baṅkana, bickom pạtiạu akanko lạgitʼge.

Manḍerren sanam hoṛ mitʼ ṭhen jarwakate jotoko eṭakʼ eṭakʼ pạrsite katha roroṛpe ehopʼlen khan ar manḍer bahreren hoṛko ar bin pạtiạuko bhitriteko bololen khan, enḍekhan onko do cetʼ pagla mente bako metapea?

Menkhan sanamko nạbi leka kathakope roṛ ar jãhãe bin pạtiạuicʼ se manḍer bahreren hoṛ bhitriteye bololen khan enḍekhan uni do joto hoṛakʼ kathate apnar kại reaṅ cehaonae ńama ar onako katha hotetege acʼakʼ ontorreye bicạrokʼa.
Onate acʼakʼ ontor reakʼ okoakʼko sodorokʼa, ar uni do otre ombakʼkate Isor sarhaoeteye mena, “Sạrige Isor do apere menaegea.”

E boehako, enḍekhan cetʼ iń mena? Manḍerre mitʼ ṭhenpe jarwakʼre ape modre okoe do sarhaoakʼ sereń menakʼtaea, okoe do cecetʼakʼ menakʼtaea, okoe do Isorakʼ sạritetʼ sodorakʼ menakʼtaea, okoe do eṭakʼ pạrsite cecetʼakʼ menakʼtaea; arhõ okoe do ona reakʼ bhede bhaṅgaoetʼa. Onate jãhãe jãhãnakʼgeye ceka kan, ona jotowakʼ do jemon manḍer benao rakapʼakʼ mente hoyokʼ.
Jãhãe eṭakʼ pạrsiteye roṛ khan bar hoṛ se ạḍi khan pe hoṛ pạri pạriteko roṛma, ar mitʼ hoṛ do onae torjomaema.
Menkhan torjomayicʼ bae tahẽlen khan uni hoṛ do manḍer jarwakʼre katha aloe roṛ ma, eken apnarre ar Isor tulucʼ kathae roṛma.
Okoe nạbi lekate kathako roṛ onko do bar hoṛ se pe hoṛko roṛma, ar eṭakʼko do onako tojbijtakoma.
Duṛupʼ akanicʼ ṭhen Isorakʼ sạriakʼtetʼ sodorlen khan, enḍekhan katha roroṛicʼ doe thirokʼma,
ente ape sanamkoge mimitʼ hoṛkate nạbi lekate kathape roṛ daṛeakʼa, jemon sanamkoge sikhạunako ńam ar sanamkogeko udgạu ocokʼ.
Nạbikoakʼ Jiu do ako apnarakʼ gobolrege tahena.
Isor do gulmalren Isor doe baṅkana, menkhan sulukren Isorge. Isorren hoṛko sanam manḍerkore cetʼ lekako tahenkan,
onakage maejiuko hõ manḍer jarwakʼre hapegeko tahenma, ente onko do katha roṛ reakʼ hukum baṅ emakatʼkoa. Moseakʼ ạn-ạrire cetʼ lekae menetʼ onkage jemon gobolreko tahen.
Ar jãhãnakʼ cetʼjoṅko menetʼ khan onko do oṛakʼre apan apin herel ṭhenko kulijoṅma, ente manḍer jarwakʼre maejiuko katha roṛ do lajao reakʼakʼ kana.
Isorakʼ katha do cetʼ ape ṭhen khonge oḍok hecʼlena se ona do eken ape eskar ṭhenge hecʼakana?
Jãhãege apnarte nạbi se Jiutenicʼ hoṛ kanae menteye bujhạukʼ khan enḍekhan uni doe aṅgocma, ape ṭhen okań olketʼ onako sanamakʼ do Probhuakʼ hukum kangea mente.
Menkhan jãhãe noae neṅghao khan acʼ hõe neṅghao ocokʼa.
Onate, E ińren boehako, ape do nạbi lekate katha roṛ lạgitʼ jidpe, ar eṭakʼ eṭakʼ pạrsite roroṛ alope manakoa.
Menkhan noako sanamakʼ do ṭhik leka ar napaetege baṛe hoyokʼma.
E boehako, ape oka bhage sombat iń porcaratʼpe tahẽkan, ona bhage sombat reakʼ kathageń disạ ocoyetʼpea. Ape do onape ataṅakada ar onarepe teṅgo ṭarhao akana.
