Okaṭakʼ kathań porcaratʼpe tahẽkan onage kajakte sapʼ akaepe tahen khan enḍekhan ona bhage sombat hotete kại khon bańcaope ńametʼa, khạjuk apeakʼ pạtiạu ạuṛiakʼ alo hoyokʼ.
Ente okaṭakʼ iń ńamakatʼ ona do sanam khon jạruṛanakʼ mente ape hõń emakatʼpea; ona do hoyokʼ kana sonot sostor reakʼ katha leka Mạsi do aboakʼ kại gunạkʼteye gocʼlena,
are topa ocolena, ar sonot sostor reakʼ katha leka pe mãhã hilokʼre gocʼko khone jiwetʼ beretʼ ocoyena,
uni do Patras ar tayomte acʼren apostolko ṭhene ńel ocoyena.
Ona tayom uni do mitʼ dhãote mõṛẽ sae khon hõ ḍher boehako ṭhene ńel ocolena. Onko modre adom doko gocʼ akanre hõ ḍher hoṛge ńitokʼ hõ jiwetʼ menakʼkoa.
Ona tayom uni do Jakob ar tayomte sanam apostolko ṭhene ńel ocoyena.
Ar sanamko tayom do iń lenda ṭũriạ ṭhen hõe ńel ocoyena.
Ente apostolko modre ińge sanamko khoniń nicạṛgea, ar apostol ńumugokʼ lek hõń baṅkana, ente Isorakʼ manḍerren koń khedletʼkoa.

Menkhan ńitokʼ okań hoeakan ona do Isorakʼ dayategeń hoeakana. Iń cetanre uniakʼ daya do baṅ ạuṛiakʼ akana; ar eṭakʼ sanam apostolko khon iń do ḍheriń khaṭao akana; ar eken ińiń khaṭao akan ona do baṅ bickom ińre Isorakʼ daya hõ tahẽkana.
Ona iạte ińge baṅ cetʼ ar onkoge baṅ cetʼ, ale do noa reaṅle porcareda ar ape do onagepe pạtiạuada.
Mạsi gocʼko khone jiwetʼ beretʼ ocoakan khan enḍekhan ape modren adomko do cekateko meneda gocʼkoakʼ jiwetʼ beredokʼ do bạnukʼ anaṅ?
Gocʼko bako jiwetʼ beredokʼ khan enḍekhan Mạsi hõ bae jiwetʼ beretʼ ocoakana;
ar Mạsi bae jiwetʼ beretʼ ocoakan khan aleakʼ porcar hõ ạuṛiakʼgea ar apeakʼ biswạs hõ ạuṛiakʼgea.

Ona chaḍa noa kathage sạbudokʼ kana je, Isor reaṅ abo do eṛe goha bon emeda, ente aboakʼ goha do noage je, Isor do Mạsi gocʼko khone jiwetʼ beretʼ akadea. Menkhan gocʼkoakʼ jiwetʼ beredokʼ bạnukʼ khan uni do Mạsi hõ bae jiwetʼ beretʼ akadea,
ente gocʼko bako jiwetʼ beretʼ ocoakan khan Mạsi hõ bae jiwetʼ beretʼ ocoakana.
Ar Mạsige bae beretʼ ocoakan khan enḍekhan apeakʼ biswạs hõ ạuṛiakʼgea ar ńit hạbicʼ hõ ape do kạirege menakʼpea.
Enḍekhan Mạsi sãote kolom mitʼkate okoeko gocʼakan onko hõko nosṭoyena.
Mạsire asjoṅakʼ do eken niạ jion bhorge hoelen khan enḍekhan sanam manwako modre aboge joto khon bạ̃ṛti mãyãwan lek kanabon.
Menkhan Mạsi do sạriakʼge gocʼko khone jiwetʼ beretʼ ocoakana; ar gocʼko modren unikangeae pạhilicʼ jo do.
Mitʼṭen manwa hotete moron hoyente ar mitʼṭen manwa hotete gocʼkoakʼ jiwetʼ beredokʼ hõ hoeakana.
Adam tulucʼ mitʼakante cetʼleka sanam manwageko gujukʼkan, onkage Mạsi tulucʼ mitʼakanko do jotogeko jiwetʼ beretʼ ocokʼa.
Menkhan ona modre pạli menakʼa; pạhilre do Mạsige, ar ona tayom do Mạsirenko. Ar onko do uniakʼ seṭerokʼreko jiwetʼ beretʼ ocokʼa.
Ona tayom Mạsi do sanam raj calao ar sanam ektiạri ar daṛeye maraote Isor Babawakʼ tire rajosṭiye jimạkakʼa ar unrege mucạdokʼa.
Isor do tin hạbicʼ Mạsiren sanam bạiriko uniakʼ jaṅga latarre bae dohoko un hạbicʼ Mạsi doe rajokʼa.
Ar sesicʼ bạiri moron, uni hõe marao ocokʼa.

Sostor reakʼ katha leka, “Uni do sanamakʼge acʼakʼ jaṅga latarreye dohokeda.” Ar jotowakʼge gobolre dohoakana mente menle khan pusṭạute bujhạukʼ kana okoe jotowakʼko Mạsiakʼ gobolreye dohoakatʼ uni Isor do acʼtetʼ ona khone chaḍaogea.
Tinre sanamakʼ do Mạsi gobolre dohokʼa, unre okoe Mạsi gobolre sanamakʼe doholetʼ uni Isorge jemon mạlike hoyokʼ onate Hopon do acʼ hõ Isorreye gobolokʼa.
Menkhan gocʼko iạte okoeko bạptisokʼkan, onkoakʼ do cetʼ hoyokʼtakoa? Ente gocʼko bako jiwetʼ beretʼ ocokʼkan khan onko do cedakʼ gocʼko iạteko bạptisokʼ kana?
Ar cedakʼ jao ghuṛi muhinre bon paṛaokʼkana?
E boehako, aboren Probhu Jisu Mạsire ape reaṅ okaṭakʼle suhukʼetʼkan ona suhukʼre iń do dinạm hilokʼgeń gujukʼ kana.

Ephesusre bir janwarko tulucʼ okań lạṛhạilen, ona judi manwako lekań onka lekhan enḍekhan cetʼ porho hoyokʼtińạ? Ar gocʼko bako jiwetʼ beredokʼ khan enḍekhan, “delabon jom ńũite okteko bon khemaoma; ente gapa dobon gujukʼa.”
“Alope bulạukʼa, bạricʼakʼko tulucʼ gatekʼte bhage cạl-colonko hõ bạṛijokʼa.”
Onate ape do apeakʼ monre cetaokʼpe ar alope kạiya. Ente ape modre adomko do Isor bako oromakadea; iń do lajao ocope lạgitʼge noa katha doń roṛeda.
Jãhãeko men botecʼkea, “gocʼko do cekateko jiwetʼ beretʼ ocokokʼa? Ar cetʼ lekan hoṛmowateko beredokʼa?”
E bebuj, oka itạm eretʼkan ona baṅ gocʼlen khan bacoṅ janam rakabokʼ.
Ar amem eretʼ itạ khon oka janamokʼ ona do bam ereda, menkhan guhum se jãhãnage eken mitʼṭen jaṅgem ereda.
Menkhan Isor do acʼakʼ monejoṅ leka ona itạre hoṛmoe emakʼ kana. Uni do acʼakʼ kusi lekage mimitʼ itạre hoṛmoe emakʼ kana.
Joto jel do baṅ mitʼ lekana. Manwakoakʼ mitʼ leka, janwarkoakʼ eṭakʼ leka, cẽṛẽkoakʼ eṭakʼ leka ar hakokoakʼ eṭakʼleka.
Sermare aema hoṛmoko menakʼa, ar dhạrtire hõ aema hoṛmoko menakʼa, menkhan sermare hoṛmoko reakʼ ṭhonok mitʼ leka ar dhạrtire hoṛmoko reakʼ ṭhonok do ar mitʼleka.
Siń cando reakʼ ṭhonok mitʼ leka, ńindạ cando reakʼ ṭhonok eṭakʼ leka ar ipilko reakʼ ṭhonok ar mitʼ leka; ente ipil ipilre ṭhonok do judạ judạgea.
Gocʼko reakʼ jiwetʼ beredokʼ hõ ṭhik onkage. Ente hoṛmo topale khan ona do seakʼa, menkhan ona hoṛmo do nonka lekae jiwetʼ beretʼ ocokʼa, one okaṭakʼ do ar tis hõ baṅ nosṭokʼ.
Ona do bemanot lekate hasare topa ocokʼa, menkhan ṭhonokre jiwetʼ beretʼ ocokʼa; nijorre erogokʼa ar jorre jiwetʼ beretʼ ocokʼa.
Jel reakʼ hoṛmo do hasare topa ocokʼa, menkhan jiu reakʼ hoṛmo do jiwetʼ beretʼ ocokʼa. Cetʼleka jel reakʼ hoṛmo menakʼa, onkage jiuteakʼ hoṛmo hõ menakʼgea.
Sostorre nonkage olakana, “Pạhil manwa Adam do jiwetʼ jiwiyanicʼe hoyena.” Ar sesicʼ Adam do jiwetʼ Jiugeye hoyena.
Menkhan oka jiuteakʼ kan ona do maraṅakʼ do baṅkana, bickom oka jiwiyanakʼ kan onage, ar ona tayom do jiuteakʼ. Pạhil manwa do ot khone hecʼlena ar hasa khongeye benaolena;
Menkhan dosaricʼ manwa do serma khone hecʼlena.
Dhạrtiren manwako do hasaren benao manwa leka, ar sermate calakʼko do sermaren manwa lekage.
Cetʼleka abon do hasaren manwa bon hoeakan onkage sermaren manwa leka hõ bon hoyokʼa.
E boehako, okań menetʼkan ona do noage, manwa do acʼakʼ jel ar mãyãmte Isorakʼ raj bae ạidạri daṛeakʼa; ar oka seakʼ ona do nonkanakʼ reakʼ ạidạri bae hoedaṛeakʼa one okaṭakʼ baṅ seakʼ.
Ańjompe, iń do mitʼṭen okoakʼ iń lạiape kana. Sanamkoge bon gujukʼa ona do baṅa, menkhan bon pheraokʼa;
ṭuṅ ghuṛite, mitʼ ripitʼrege, ses siṅgạ reakʼ saḍetege, ente siṅgạ saḍekʼa ar gocʼko do bin seageko jiwetʼ beretʼ ocokʼa ar abo do bon pheraokʼa.
Seakʼakʼ do bin seakʼakʼko horokʼ hoyokʼtaea jemon alo seakʼ. Gujukʼ do bin gujukʼakʼ horokʼ hoyokʼtaea jemon aloe gujukʼ.
Oka seakʼ ar okaṭakʼ gujukʼ, onako do onkage bodolokʼ khan sonot sostor reakʼ katha do purạukʼa je, gujukʼ do jitteye utʼ cabakeda.
“E gujukʼ okortam jit do? E gujukʼ okortam suṅgạ do?”
Gujukʼ reakʼ suṅgạ do kại kana, ar kại reakʼ daṛe do Moseakʼ ạnkoge.
Menkhan Isore sarhaokʼma, one uni jite emabon kan aboren Probhu Jisu Mạsi hotete.
Onate, E ińren boehako, kajakte teṅgo ṭak akae tahenpe; jemon okaṭakʼte hõ alope ocogokʼ; ar jaoge Probhuakʼ kạmire sareṛokʼpe, entepe baḍaegea, uniakʼ kạmire mehnot do baṅ ạuṛiagokʼ tapea.
Nitokʼ do Isorren hoṛko goṛowako lạgitʼ canda uṭhạu reaṅ iń metapekana. Galatiạ Paradesh reakʼ manḍerren hoṛko cetʼ lekań hukum akatʼko ape hõ onkaepe baṛe.
Ape mimitʼko apeakʼ daṛe leka thoṛa thoṛate doho jarwaepe hapta reakʼ pạhil dinre, jemon ińiń hecʼlenre canda uṭhạu alo lagaoape.
Ar ape ṭheniń hecʼlenre apeakʼ ona dan do Jerusalemte idi lạgitʼ okoe lek mentepe bujhạuko, onko ciṭhiń olakote Jerusalemteń kolkoa.
Ar iń hõ senokʼ reakʼ lekpe bujhạu liń khan enḍekhan onko do iń sãoteko sen daṛeakʼa.
Makedoniạ Prodes talateń sen paromokʼre iń do ape ṭheniń hijukʼa, ente iń do Makedoniạ talategeń parom calakʼa.
Menkhan ape ṭhen do thoṛa diniń tahena, ar rabaṅ din do ape ṭhenge pasecʼ iń khemaoa, jemon jãhã secʼgeń calakʼre unrepe bondobos daṛeạń.
Parom calakʼ horre ape tulucʼ ńapamokʼ do bạń menjoṅ kana; enteń asokʼ kana, Probhui aṛakʼạń khan ape tulucʼ ḍher diniń tahena.
Menkhan pentekosṭ hạbicʼ iń do Ephesusregeń tahena,
ente oka kạmire ḍher jo ńamokʼ onkan kạmi lạgitʼge mitʼṭen maraṅ bhạg reakʼ duạr iń lạgitʼ do jhicʼ akana; menkhan noare ḍher hoṛgeko tạkicʼ daram edeńkana.
Ńelpe, Timothiye hecʼlen khan apeko talare jemon bin botorteye tahẽ daṛeakʼ, ente cetʼleka Probhuakʼ iń kạmikan onkage uni hõe kạmikana.
Onate okoe hõ jemon aloko neṅghaoema. Menkhan sulukte kolgotʼkaepe, jemon uni do iń ṭhene hecʼ daṛeakʼ. Ente uni do boehako sãoteye hijukʼa menteń ńel horekana.
Ar boeha Apolloss reaṅ iń meneda. Iń do ạḍiń nehõrade tahẽkana jemon boehako sãote ape ṭhene calakʼ, menkhan ńitokʼ uni do calakʼ reakʼ mon bạnukʼtaea. Ar tayomteye opsorlen khan uni doe calakʼa.
Ape do jagwar tahenpe, biswạsre keṭecʼte teṅgo akan tahenpe, jhũkokʼpe ar daṛeanko hoyokʼpe.
Ar jãhãnakʼgepe cekae ona do dulạṛte onkaepe.
E boehako baḍaegeape, Stephan gharońjren hoṛkoge Akhaearen pạhil biswạsi kanako mente, ar Isorren hoṛko sapʼ dapʼako lạgitʼ onko do apnargeko jamaṛ akana.
Onate ape hõ nonkan hoṛko ṭhen gobolokʼ lạgitʼ iń nehõrape kana. Ar tinạkʼ do kạmireko gokʼṛokan, arko khaṭaokʼkan onko ṭhen hõ gobolokʼpe.
Stephanos ar Phortunatus ar Akhaeakustekoko hecʼ akanteń rạskạkʼ kana; ente apeakʼ khạli jaega do onkogeko purun akada.
Onko do ińakʼ ar apeakʼ jiuko khạtirketʼ tabona. Ape do nonkan hoṛge manotkope.
Ạsiạ reakʼ manḍerrkoren hoṛko do apeko joharape kana. Akuilạ, ar Priskilạ do Probhure ạḍikin joharapekana, ạkinakʼ oṛakʼre menakʼ manḍerrenko salakʼ.
Ar joto boehako hõ apeko joharape kana. Ape do sonot cokʼte jopoharpe.
Johartetʼ do iń Pạul nij titeń olape kana.
Jãhãe hoṛ Probhu bae dulạṛe khan sarapicʼe hoyokʼma. Maran atha [Probhui darae kana].
Probhu Jisu Mạsiakʼ daya ape sanamko tulucʼ baṛe tahenma.
Ape sanamko tulucʼ Mạsi Jisure ińakʼ dulạṛ tahenma. Amen.

Iń Pạul do Isorakʼ monejoṅ lekage Mạsi Jisuren mitʼṭen apostoliń hoeakana. Iń do aboren boeha Timothi ar Korinthi nagraha reakʼ Isorakʼ manḍer ar Akhaea Prodesre menakʼko Isorren sanam hoṛko ṭhen noa ciṭhiń oletʼkana.
Aboren Baba Isor ar aboren Probhu Jisu Mạsi ape sanamko suluk ar bhore dan ape ma.
Aboren Probhu Jisu Mạsiren Isor ar Babawakʼ sarhao hoyokʼtae ma. Uni kangeae mãyãwan Baba do; ar sanam jiwi raṛecʼren Isor hõ.
Aleakʼ joto duk ar haronre uni do jiwi raṛecʼe emalekana, jemon uni ṭhen khonle ńamakatʼ jiwi raṛecʼakʼ do eṭakʼkoakʼ duk ar santaorele emdaṛeako.
Mạsire cetʼleka ạḍi utạr dukle sahaoetʼkan onkage uni hotete ạḍi utạr jiwi raṛecʼhõle ńameda.

Ale okaṭakʼ dukle jometʼkan ona do apeakʼ jiwi raṛecʼ ar bańcaope lạgitʼgele onkayeda; ar oka jiwiraṛecʼle ńametʼkan ona do ape lạgitʼgele ńametʼ kana. Ale leka tinre ona dukpe joma unre niạ jiwi raṛecʼ do ona duk sahao lạgitʼe goṛowapea.
Apere purạ biswạs menakʼtalea, ente cetʼleka ape do aleakʼ duk sasetren bhạgiạdarpe hoyokʼkan onkage aleakʼ jiwi raṛecʼren bhạgiạdarko hõpe hoyokʼ kana.
Ạsiạ Prodesre ale do oka santaorele paṛaolen, asjoṅ kanale ape hõ ona jemonpe baḍae daṛeakʼ. Onḍe do sahao daṛeakʼ khon hõ bạ̃ṛti caprele paṛaolena, ar bańcaokʼ reakʼ asge baṅ tahẽkantalea.
Alele hudisetʼ tahẽkana, niạ dhao do khạṭigele gujukʼa. Menkhan ona dosa do noa lạgitʼge hoeatʼle tahẽkana jemon apnarre bhorsa baṅkate, okoe gocʼkoe jiwetʼ beretʼetʼko, uni Isorrele bhorsakʼ.
Uni do maraṅ gujukʼ khone rukhiyạketʼlea ar ńit hoe rukhiyạlea. Ale do unire noa asle dohoyeda je, uni do jao ghuṛigeye rukhiyạlea.
Ape hõ koejoṅre goṛowalepe. Enḍekhan ḍher hoṛakʼ koejoṅte oka bhorle ńam ona khạtirte ḍherkoge Isorko sarhaoea.

Ale oka lạgitʼle sarhaokʼkan ona do noage, aleakʼ bibek do noa gohae emeda je, Isor reakʼ sonot ar soṛatetʼ iạte ale do sanam manwako talare, bạ̃ṛtikaete ape talare jionle khemao akada. Ar ona jion do jel reakʼ akelte do baṅ bickom Isorakʼ daya reakʼ ạyurtele khemao akada.
Ar noa katha sạrikana mente baḍaekate iń do laharege ape ṭhen calakʼ lạgitʼ iń goṭaleda, jemon bar dhao bhorpe ńam daṛeakʼ.
Iń doń goṭa akatʼ tahẽkana, Makedoniạte calakʼ jokhecʼ ape sãoteń ńapam torakʼa ar Makedoniạ khon arhõ ape ṭheniń ruạṛ hijukʼa, jemon apege Jihudạte koleń reakʼpe bebostawạń.
Cetʼpe hudiseda iń do tamasate noań ṭhik akada? Hoṛko cetʼleka mitʼ ghuṛite “Hẽ” arko “Baṅ” onkage cetʼ jãhãnakʼ iń hõń goṭayeda?
Isor doe pạtiạrgea, noa katha cetʼleka sạrige onkage noa hõ sạrigea je, ape ṭhen ale do inạ mitʼ ghuṛire “Hẽ” ar “Baṅ” do bale roṛa.
Okoeakʼ katha Siluạnus, Timothi ar iń do ape ṭhenle porcar akatʼ uni Jisu Mạsi, Isorren Hopon do mitʼ ghuṛire “Hẽ” ar “Baṅ” doe baṅkana;
uni do jao ghuṛigeye “Hẽ” kana. Isorakʼ sanam gokʼakʼko do Mạsi hotete “Hẽ” hoeakana. Onate Isorakʼ ṭhonok lạgitʼ Mạsi hotete abo do “Amen” bon roṛeda.
Okoe do Mạsire ale ar apeye jopoṛaoketʼ bonteye teṅgo keṭecʼketʼ bon uni doe Isor kana. Unige ale doe bahal akatʼlea,
metakʼme uni do apnarakʼ dhon leka ale doe mohor chap akatʼlea; ar okaṭakʼe emale ona reakʼ pạhil hạṭiń lekate uni do aleakʼ ontorre sonot Jiue emakatʼlea.
Iń do Isorge apnar jiwite goha menteń ńumekana, sạjại khon bańcaope lạgitʼge iń do Korinthite bạń sen ruạṛ akana.
Mạlik leka apeakʼ biswạsrele tạkicʼ ocoyetʼpea ona do baṅ, bickompe rạskạkʼ onate apeko sãotele kạmikana, ente pạtiạure ape do khạṭikope hoeakana.
Onate iń do mon monteń goṭawana, arhõ duk ocope lạgitʼ ape ṭhen do bạń calakʼa,
ente apegeń duk ocolepe khan enḍekhan iń do okoeye rạskạ ocoyińạ? Ar okoekoń duk ocoko onko metakʼme ape chaḍa iń rạskạ ocoyiń leka do ar okoe menakʼkoa.
Ińiń calakʼre okoeko ṭhen rạskạ ńamokʼ reakʼ katha onko ṭhen khon jemon duk aloń ńam, onate noako kathań olleda. Apere noa pạtiạu menakʼtińa je, iń okaṭakʼte rạskạń ńam ape hõ onatege rạskạpe ńama.
Ạḍi duk ar mon reakʼ kosṭote mẽtʼ dakʼ joro joroteń olatʼpe tahẽkana. Ape duk ocope lạgitʼ do bạń oleda, bickom apere tinạkʼ khạndri dulạṛ menakʼtiń ona baḍae ocope lạgitʼgeń olletʼ tahẽkana.
Jãhãeye duk ocoakadiń khan ajhaṭte do baṅ menkhan noageń mena je, uni do eken iń eskar do bae duk ocoakadińạ, menkhan ape sanamko hõ thoṛagan doe duk ocoakatʼpegea.
Aperen ḍher hoṛko mitʼkate okaṭakʼ sạjạiko emakawade onage uni lạgitʼ do ḍhera.
Menkhan ńitokʼ do ikạkaepe ar jiwi raṛecʼ emaepe, jemon dukte aloe hadosokʼ.
Onate bạ̃ṛtikaeteń nehõrape kana, unipe dulạṛedekan khan ona baṛe sạbudtape.
Iń do ńeńel sanań kana sanamakʼre sạri se nase hukum bataoko kanape mente, ar ona iạtege ape ṭheniń olleda.
Ar jãhãnakʼ babotre judi jãhãeakʼgepe ikạitae enḍekhan iń hõ uniakʼ iń ikạitaea. Sạriakʼge iń do jãhãnakʼiń ikạ akatʼ khan enḍekhan Mạsi samaṅre ape lạgitʼgeń onka akada,
jemon Soetan do abo bulạu bon lạgitʼ jãhãn dão aloe ńam. Ar uniakʼ monsubạ dobon baḍaegea.
Iń do Troas nagrahare Mạsiakʼ bhage sombat porcar lạgitʼ senkateń ńelkeda, Probhu do onḍe kạmi lạgitʼ mitʼṭen ạte emakawạdińa.
Menkhan enrehõ monre suluk bạń ńamletʼa, ente ińren boeha Titus do onḍe bae tahẽkana. Ona iạte iń do Troasren hoṛko ṭhen khon bidạ hataokate Makedoniạteń calaoena.

Isoriń sarhaoede kana, Mạsi tulucʼ bon mitʼ akante ar Isor do acʼakʼ jitạuakʼre jaogeye ạyuretʼbon kana. Mạsi baḍaeye do mitʼṭen mahkaokʼ kan so leka. Isor do acʼakʼ jitạuwakʼre ona jut so ale hotete sanam jaegareye mahkao ocoyeda.
Bańcaokʼkanko ar nosṭokʼkanko ṭhen ale do Isor secʼ khon sạrige Mạsiren jut so kanale.

Menkhan okoeko nosṭokʼkan onko ṭhen aleakʼ so do moron leka; one ona reakʼ jo do jaejug moronkan; ar okoe bańcaoko ńametʼkan onko ṭhen do jion reakʼ jut so leka, one ona reakʼ jo do jaejug jionge. Noa kạmiren lekicʼ doe okoe kana?
Apnarakʼ lab lạgitʼ okoe Isorakʼ kathako bạnijetʼkan onko lekanko dole baṅkana; bickom Mạsi tulucʼle mitʼ akante ale do Isor samaṅre Isorren kol ocoakan hoṛko lekage sạri ontor khon kathale roṛeda.
Ale do noako kathate cetʼ arhõ apnarte sarhaokʼle ńamjoṅ kana? Adom adom hoṛko cetʼleka jạruṛakokan, onkage ale hõ cetʼ ape ṭhen khon sarhaokʼ reakʼ ciṭhi jạruṛale kana? Tis hõ baṅ.
Aleakʼ ontorre olakan ciṭhi ma apege coṅ. Ona ciṭhi reakʼ katha do sanamkogeko baḍaegea ar sanamkogeko paṛhao akada.

Apege Mạsiakʼ ciṭhi ar aleakʼ kạmiko reakʼ jo kanpe ona do pusṭạute ńelogokʼ kana. Noa ciṭhi kạlite olakʼ do baṅkana bickom jiwetʼ Isorren Jiu hotetege olakana. Noa do jãhãn dhiri paṭare baṅ olakana, menkhan manwa ontorrege olakana.
Mạsi hotete Isorre ale do nonkan khạṭi biswạsge menakʼtalea.
Menkhan apnarte jãhãnakʼ cekae reakʼ daṛe menakʼ talea mentele dạbi daṛeakʼa ona do baṅ, bickom ona lektetʼ do Isor ṭhen khonge hijukʼ kana.

Mitʼṭen nawa bondobos reakʼ katha baḍae ocole lạgitʼ uni doe lek ocoketʼlea. Noa bondobos do eken ạn-ạriko manao reaṅ do baṅ, menkhan sonot Jiuakʼ ạyurte ontorre gobolokʼ reaṅ kana; ente ạn-ạrite do gogocʼgea menkhan sonot Jiu do jione emokʼa.

Dhirire olakʼ oka bondobos hotete moron hijukʼkan ona bondobos emokʼ jokhecʼ Isorakʼ do ṭhonok sodorlena. Onate Moseakʼ mẽtãhã hõ Isorakʼ ṭhonokte perecʼlena. Ar ona ṭhonok do bại bạite kom idiyenre hõ Israelko do Moseakʼ mẽtʼãhã secʼ bako beṅgetʼ daṛeada.
Ona bondobos reakʼ jo nunạkʼ ṭhonokanakʼ hoedaṛeakʼ khan, enḍekhan sonot Jiuakʼ kạmi reakʼ jo do cetʼ artetʼ ṭhonokanakʼ baṅ hoyokʼa?
Oka bondobos hotete manwa dusi menteye ṭarhaokʼkan ar uniakʼ kạmiko ṭhonokte perecʼge khan, enḍekhan manwa dhorom menteye ataṅokʼre uniakʼ kạmiko do artetʼ ṭhonokte perejokʼtaea.
Sạrige, okaṭakʼ do lahare ṭhonokte perecʼ tahẽkan, ńitokʼ ona reakʼ jãhãn ṭhonok do bạnukʼa, ente ona khon ńitokʼakʼ bondobos reaṅ ṭhonok do artetʼ ḍhergea.
Ar caba hijukʼakʼ judi nunạkʼge ṭhonokte perecʼ tahẽkan khan enḍekhan okaṭakʼ jaejug hạbicʼ tahenkan ona do artetʼ ṭhonokte perecʼgea!
Ale do nonkanakʼ as menakʼtalete sodortele roṛetʼkana.
Ar Mose lekanko dole baṅkana, ente Mose do acʼakʼ mẽtʼãhãe betʼ esetʼetʼ tahẽkana, jemon acʼakʼ caba idikʼkan mẽtʼãhã reakʼ marsal Israelko aloko ńelńam.

Menkhan onko hoṛkoakʼ mon do keṭecʼlen takoa. Onate teheń hạbicʼ hõ ona mare bondobos reakʼ katha paṛhao jokhecʼ onkoakʼ ontorre inạ mitʼ lekanakʼ bedokʼakʼ orwal do tahenkangea, ente eken Mạsi tulucʼ mitʼlen khange ona orwal do ocogokʼa.
Menkhan teheń hạbicʼ Moseakʼ ạn-ạri puthiko paṛhao jokhecʼ Israelkoakʼ ontor do ona orwalte esetʼge tahenkana.
Onko modre jãhãege Probhu secʼ mon ạcurlentakore ona orwal do ocogokʼa.
Probhu kangeae sonot Jiu do; ar okare Probhuren Jiu onḍege sạdhintetʼ.

Onate okoe Mạsi tulucʼ bon mitʼ akan, abo sanamko do bin betʼ mẽtʼãhã ạrsire ńelokʼkan muṭhạn leka Probhuakʼ ṭhonok ńel ńelte apnar hõ ṭhonokte hara rakabokʼte uni lekage bon hoyokʼkana. Probhu, metakʼme sonot Jiu reaṅ daṛetege noa do hoyokʼ kana.
Noa bondobos reakʼ katha baḍae reakʼ bhar Isor do ale dayakateye emakatʼlete bale as chuṭạukʼ kana.

Ar hoṛko danaṅre oka lajao paṛaoakʼko kạmikan ona do ekaltege bale kạmikana. Ale do okaṭakʼ kạmirege bale eṛeya, ar Isorakʼ kathare jãhãnakʼ ạuṛiakʼ hõ bale mesaletʼ kana. Bickom Isorakʼ sạriakʼtetʼ sodorkate uni samaṅre sanam hoṛkoakʼ bibek ṭhen ataṅokʼ lek mente apnarle sodorokʼ kana.
Aleakʼ bhage sombat do danaṅ esetʼ akan khan enḍekhan nosṭokʼkanko lạgitʼge danaṅ esetʼ akana.

Bin pạtiạukʼ hoṛkoakʼ mon niạ jugren Deb doe kãṛã akatʼtakoa jemon onko do bhage sombat reakʼ marsal aloko ńelńam. Noa bhage sombatre do Mạsiakʼ ṭhonok bamberokʼ kana, ar nui Mạsi kangeae Isorakʼ muṭhạn reakʼ sodorokʼtetʼ.
Ale apnar reaṅ do bale porcareda, bickom Jisu Mạsi doe Probhu kana mentele porcarede kana ar Jisu lạgitʼge aperen golamle hoeakana.

Ale do noale porcaretʼ kana, ente okoeye menletʼ tahẽkan, “Ńut khon marsal hoyokʼ ma,” Uni Isorge aboakʼ ontorreye bamberena, jemon uniakʼ mạhima bujhạu lạgitʼ marsal sodorokʼ. Ar noa mạhimage Mạsiakʼ mẽtʼãhãre menakʼa.

Menkhan noa dhon do hasa bhajanre dohoakana, ar alege ona hasa reakʼ bhajan do. Hasa reakʼ bhajanre dohoakana jemon hoṛkoko bujhạu daṛeakʼ baṅma, noa asambheṛ daṛe do apnar khonakʼ do baṅ bickom Isor ṭhen khonge hecʼakana.
Ale do sanam secʼ khongele cipạ ocokʼkanre hõ bale mon duk akana; arle andmandao akanre hõ bale as chuṭạu akana;
khed ocokʼkan rehõle Isor do bae bạgi giḍiale kana; arle kaṛgo bindạṛ ocokʼkanre hõ bale marao akana.
Ale do siń sạṭupʼ Probhu Jisuakʼ gujukʼtetʼ aleakʼ hoṛmorele asen baṛayeda, jemon Jisuakʼ jion hõ aleakʼ hoṛmore sodorokʼ.
Ale jiwetʼle tahenkanko do siń sạṭupʼ Jisu khạtirte moron ṭhenle soprot ocokʼkana, jemon Jisuakʼ jion hõ aleakʼ gujukʼ hoṛmore sodorokʼ.
Onate alere do morone kạmikana menkhan apere do jionge.
Sonot sostorre ol menakʼa, “Ińiń pạtiạu akanteń roṛeda.” Ar inạ mitʼlekan biswạs menakʼtalete ale hõle pạtiạukʼkante kathale roṛeda,
ente alele baḍaea, Probhu Jisu okoeye jiwetʼkede uni do Jisu sãote ale hõe jiwetʼ beretʼlea ar ape sãote ale hõ acʼ samaṅreye teṅgolea.
Sanamakʼ do apeakʼ bhạlại lạgitʼge hoeakana, jemon Isorakʼ oka daya ḍher hoṛkore emakan ona daya iạte ḍher hoṛge arhõ bạ̃ṛti Isorko sarhaoedea ar nonkate Isorakʼ ṭhonok hoyokʼ kana.
Onate ale do bale as chuṭạukʼ kana. Ente aleakʼ bahre hoṛmo nasao idikʼkanre hõ bhitri hoṛmo do din dinte nawa idikʼ kantalea.
Ale do ńitokʼ mitʼ ghạṛi lạgitʼ okale dukokʼkan ona khạtirte jaejug ṭhonokle hameṭ joṅa. Noa ṭhonok do nunạkʼge ḍhera je, ona do ohoge soṅlena.

Oka ńelokʼkan ona secʼ do bale beṅgetʼeda, bickom oka baṅ ńelokʼkan ona secʼgele beṅgetʼeda. Ar oka ńelokʼkan ona do eken thoṛa din lạgitʼkana, menkhan oka baṅ ńelogokʼkan ona do jaejug hạbicʼakʼ kana.

Baḍaegeabon, noa dhạrtire oka kumbạ oṛakʼre bon tahenkan metakʼme, oka nijor hoṛmowante menakʼbon ona rạputʼlenre hõ aboakʼ do Isor emakʼ mitʼṭen oṛakʼ menakʼ tabona. Ona oṛakʼ do manwa tite benaoakʼ baṅkana, ona do jaejug khonge sermare menakʼa.
Niạ hoṛmore tahen jokhecʼ abo dobon sãhetʼeda ar goṭa monte bon khojkana jemon serma reakʼ ona nawa hoṛmote bon abhran ocokʼ;
ente noa katha do sạri kana je, ona hoṛmo bon ńamle khan laṅgaṭ do ar babon tahena.

Sạrige noa laṅga hoṛmore tahen jokhecʼ hamal bojha iạte lologe bon sahẽtʼeda; ar koṭokʼ do baṅ sanayetʼ bona bickom oyo ocokʼgebon khojkana jemon abonakʼ gujukʼakʼ hoṛmo do jaejug jiwetʼ hoṛmote pheraokʼ.
Ar noa lạgitʼge Isor doe sirjạu akatʼbona ar acʼakʼ pạhil hĩs lekate uni do acʼren sonot Jiu baena lekateye emakatʼbona.
Onate aboakʼ dil do tishõ baṅ ṭonṭakʼkan tabona, ar bon bujhạu daṛeakʼ kana, niạ hoṛmo kumbạ oṛakʼre tinạkʼ din bon tahen unạkʼ din Probhu khon sạṅgińre bon tahenkana.
Oka ńelokʼkan ona hotete do babon calakʼkana, bickom biswạs hotetebon dãṛãnkana.
Aboakʼ dil do menakʼgea ar hoṛmo oṛakʼ khon pharakokʼte Probhu ṭhen thamgạḍi akanbon kusiyakʼ kana.
Onate hoṛmo oṛakʼre bon tahen ar babon tahen, aboakʼ kurumuṭu do hoyokʼ kana Probhu kusi ocoyege.
Ente Mạsiakʼ bicạr duṛupʼakʼ samaṅre abo sanamkoakʼ jotowakʼ do sodorokʼa, jemon abo mimitʼko noa hoṛmore tahẽkate oka bon kạmiakatʼ, baṅ do boge ar baṅ do bạṛicʼ ona lekage kuṛạibon ńama.

Probhu bon botoraekante abo do apnar reaṅ manwakoakʼ monre biswạs janam ocoe lạgitʼ bon kurumuṭuyeda. Ar abo bon oka lekanko kan, ona do Probhu ṭhen sodorgea ar asiń dohoea apeakʼ bibek ṭhen hõ ona do pusṭạugea.
Niạte ape ṭhen arhõ lek mente apnar do bale sarhaokʼkana bickom ale ńutumte sarhaokʼ reakʼ dãole emapekana, okoe ontor baṅ ńelkate bahre reakʼ rup ńelteko sarhaokʼkan onko jemonpe roṛ ruạṛ daṛeako.
Alele pagla akan khan enḍekhan do Isor lạgitʼgele hoeakana, ar napae monankole hoeakan khan enḍekhan ape lạgitʼgele hoeakana.
Mạsiakʼ dulạṛge ale doe gobol akatʼlea, ente khạṭigele bujhạuakada je, sanamko lạgitʼ mitʼ hoṛe gocʼena, ar ona iạte sanamkogeko gocʼena.
Uni do sanamko ńutumteye gocʼlena jemon okoe jiwetʼ menakʼko onko do apnar lạgitʼ jiwetʼ aloko tahen, bickom okoe onko lạgitʼe gocʼlen are jiwetʼ beretʼen uni lạgitʼ jiwetʼko tahen.
Onate ńit khon manwawakʼ bahre secʼ ńelte do bale bicạra. Ale hõ Mạsi do pạhilte onkagele baḍaeledea, menkhan ńitokʼ onka do ar bale baḍaeyede kana.
Jãhãege Mạsi tulucʼe mitʼakan khan enḍekhan uni do nawateye sirjạukʼ kana. Ar mareakʼ sanamakʼko meṭao cabakʼkante jotowakʼ do nawa arokʼ kana.
Noako do Isor secʼ khonge hoeakana. Uni do Mạsi hotete apnar tulucʼe samgeketʼ bona, ar acʼ tulucʼ eṭakʼ sanamko lạgitʼ dạyike emakatʼbona.
Metakʼme, Isor do manwawakʼ ghạṭko bae lekhayetʼtakote Mạsi hotete acʼ tulucʼe samgeyetʼkoa, ar ona samge reakʼ kathako baḍae ocoko reakʼ dạyik do aleye emakatʼlea.
Onate Mạsi ńutumte paṭhaonako lekate ale do kathale roṛeda. Isor hõ acʼge ale hotete hoṛko ṭhene nehõrokʼ kana. Onate Mạsi ńutumte noale ajijokʼ kana, “Jemon Isor tulucʼ pe mitʼ ruạṛokʼ.”
Jisu Mạsire jãhãn kại do baṅ tahẽkana; menkhan Isor do aboakʼ kạiko unireye ladekeda ar unige kạiyicʼe hoe ocokedea, jemon Mạsi tulucʼ jopoṛao akan bon tahente Isorakʼ dhoromte dhorom bon hoyokʼ.
Isorren são kạmiyạko lekate noale nehõrapekana, Isorakʼ okaṭakʼ dayape ńamakatʼ ona do alope ạuṛiakʼ ocoea.

Isor do sonot sostorreye menakada, “Batar jokhecʼ iń do amakʼ kathań ańjomketʼtama ar kại khon bańcaokʼ reakʼ dinreń goṛo akatʼmea.” Ńelpe, oktetetʼ do ńitokʼkangea, ar teheńge bańcao ńam reakʼ din kana.
Mạsi lạgitʼ okaṭakʼle kạmikan ona jemon alo nisṛạu ocokʼ, onate nonkanakʼko bale kạmikana one okaṭakʼte jãhãeko tạkicʼ botecʼkokʼ.
Ona khon bickom jotowakʼre Isorren sapʼ dapʼko mente apnarle sạbudokʼ kana. Santaore, muskilre, joṅjalkore,
dal jomre, hajotkore, hulmalre, khaṭaokʼre, jagwarre ar upạsre.
Ona chaḍa aleakʼ khạṭi jion hotete, aleakʼ akelte, sahao daṛete, dayate, sonot Jiu hotete, khạṭi dulạṛte,
sạri porcarte ar Isorakʼ daṛe hotete ale dole sạbutetʼkana je, sapʼ dapʼko kanale mente. Arhõ banar tite sạriakʼ reakʼ khanḍa bhanḍa sapʼkatele sạbudetʼ kana ale do Isorren sapʼ dapʼko kanale.
Hoṛko manotle ar bako manotle, ale reaṅ mońjko roṛ ar bạṛicʼko roṛ, menkhan ale dole sạbud akada Isorren sapʼdapʼko kanale. Hoṛ do ṭhokko metalekana, menkhan ale do sạriakʼ horrele taṛameda.
Hoṛ do ale oromle bako monejoṅ kana, menkhan sanamkoge ale doko orom akatʼlea. Ale do gujukʼ barag lekale hoeakanre hõ jiwetʼ menakʼlea. Arle dal ocokʼkanre hõ bale gocʼ ocokʼ kana.

Ạḍi dukle ńametʼre hõ aleakʼ ontor do jao ghuṛi rạskạte perecʼgetalea. Ale do apnarle reṅgecʼgere hõ, ḍher hoṛkole kisạ̃ṛ ocoyetʼkoa. Cetʼge bạnukʼtalere hõ, jotowakʼren ạidạriko kanale. Ar nonkatele sodoretʼkana, ale do Isorren sapʼ dapʼko kanale.
E Korinthiren biswạsiko, ale do khulạsategele roṛ akada ar ape ṭhen aleakʼ ontor do purạtele khulạu akada.
Ale do ape lạgitʼ aleakʼ ontorle jhicʼ akada, menkhan ape do ale birudre apeakʼ ontorpe siń esetʼ akada.
Ińren hopon lekateń metapekana, cetʼleka ape lạgitʼ aleakʼ ontorle jhicʼ akatʼ, onkage ape hõ ale lạgitʼ apeakʼ ontor jhicʼ dohoepe.
Ape do bepạtiạuko sãote inạ mitʼ ãrãṛre alope joṛaokʼa. Dhorom tulucʼ bedhoromakʼ jopoṛao do okare? Marsal ar ńut talare cetʼ jopoṛao do menakʼgea?
Mạsi tulucʼ Beliạlakʼ, metakʼme Soetanakʼ aṛaṅ do cetʼ jurikʼ kangea? Isorren hoṛko lekate biswạsikoakʼ oka bakhra onare cetʼ bin biswạsikoakʼ bakhra menakʼgea?

Isorakʼ mundilre boṅga murtikoakʼ jaega do okare? Aboge coṅ jiwetʼ Isorakʼ tahen oṛakʼkan bon. Sonot sostore meneda, “Iń do ińren hoṛko talareń girobasokʼa, ar onko tulucʼ iń dãṛãna. Iń do onkoren Isorriń hoyokʼa, ar onko do ińren hoṛko hoyokʼa.”
Arhõe meneda, “Onate ape do be pạtiạuko tala khon oḍok hijukʼpe ar begarokʼpe. Ar jãhãn besaphawakʼko alope joṭeda, enḍekhan ińgeń ataṅ darampea.”
Ona chaḍa “Sanam daṛeanicʼ Probhui meneda, ińge aperen babań hoyokʼa, ar ape do ińren hopon ar hoponerakope hoyokʼtińạ.”
E dulạṛiạ gateko, abon lạgitʼ noako gokʼakʼ menakʼte delabon, jel ar jiu reakʼ joto chut khon apnar bon saphakʼ ma, ar Isor botorae tulucʼ sonot reakʼ hortebon laha idikʼma.
Apeakʼ monre jaega aṛakʼ alepe. Ale do okoe hõ bale behok akatʼkoa, okoeakʼ hõ bale loksan akatʼtakoa, ar okoe hõ bale eṛe lipukʼ akatʼkoa.
Bicạr dusipe lạgitʼ noa katha do bạń roṛeda. Pạhilregeń menakatʼpea, ape do aleren nunạkʼ dulạṛiạko kanape je, ape tulucʼ gujukʼ hõle rạjigea ar jiwetʼ tahen hõle rạjigea.
Apere ạḍi pạtiạu menakʼtińạ ar ape iạte ạḍitetʼ iń sarhaokʼ kana. Aleakʼ joto duk sasetre ińakʼ rạskạ do sareṛokʼ kana ar ạḍi jiwi raṛecʼ iń ńameda.
Makedoniạte seṭerkatere hõ hoṛmore jãhãn aosan bale ńamlakʼa; ale do joto secʼ khonge dukle ńametʼ tahẽkana; ar sanam secʼge gulmal ar ontorre botor tahẽkana.
Menkhan Isor, one okoe do dukokʼkanko jiwi raṛecʼe emakokan, uni do Titusakʼ hijukʼ hotete jiwi raṛecʼe ematʼtalea.

Eken ona do baṅ, Titus acʼge ape hotete jiwi raṛecʼe ńamakatʼte ale hõ jiwi raṛecʼle ńamakada. Apeakʼ gagoj ar duk reakʼ katha uni doe lại akatʼlea are baḍae ocoakatʼlea, ape do ạḍipe uihạredeń kana, onate iń do artetʼ rạskạń ạikạukeda.
Ińakʼ laha reakʼ ciṭhiteń mon duk ocoakatʼpere hõ iń do bạń kastaokʼkana. Enteń ńelkeda ona ciṭhite thoṛa ghạṛi lạgitʼpe mon duklena ar iń hõ thoṛa doń duklengea, menkhan ńitokʼ doń rạskạkʼ kana.
Dukpe ńamletʼte do bạń rạskạkʼ kana, bickom duk iạte kại khon monpe ạcurakatʼteń rạskạkʼ kana. Isorakʼ mone lekatege noa duk dope ńamleda, onate ale hotete apeakʼ jãhãn loksan do baṅ hoeakana.
Isor oka duke emokʼ onate do kại khon mon ạcur ruạṛokʼa ar bańcao ńamokʼa, ar dukokʼ reakʼ cetʼge baṅ tahena. Menkhan dhạrti reakʼ duk do manwakoakʼ morone ạguyeda.

Hudiskate ńelpe, Isor duke ematʼpe tahẽkanre ape do bape pạclena, ar bin dusạnko mente sạbudokʼ lạgitʼ tinạkʼ jid tahẽkantapea, kạipe hirkhạwatʼ tahẽkana, monre botor tahẽkantapea, tinạkʼpe gagojlena, tinạkʼpe hudisokʼkan tahekana ar kại reakʼ sạjại lạgitʼ tinạkʼpe jidlena. Nonkate joto secʼtegepe sạbudleda je, ape dope bin dusạnko kana mente.
Iń do ona ciṭhiń olletʼgea, menkhan okoeye behok ocoakan uni lạgitʼ do bạń olakada, bickom Isor samaṅre ape ṭhen sodorokʼma je, ape do sạrigepe dulạṛetʼlea.
Ar noa hotete ale do jiwi raṛecʼle ńamakada. Ona jiwi raṛecʼ sãote Titusakʼ rạskạ ńelte ale hõle rạskạkʼ kana, ente ape sanamko ṭhen khon uni do monre ạḍi suluke ńamakada.

Iń doń kusi akana, ente ape iạte uni ṭheniń sarhaolena, ar onate iń do bạń lajao ocolena. Ona bodolte ape ṭheniń lạiletʼ aleakʼ sanamakʼ katha cetʼleka sạri tahẽkan, onkage Titus ṭhen ape iạte aleakʼ sarhaokʼ hõ sạriakʼ mente sạbud akana.
Ape sanamko cetʼleka botor ar manot salakʼ unipe ataṅkedete gobolre menakʼpea mentepe udukʼatʼle tahẽkan, ona disạte ape lạgitʼ uniakʼ dulạṛ do arhõ bạ̃ṛtiyentaea.
Iń doń kusi akana, ente jotowakʼre ape cetanreń bhorsa daṛeakʼa.
E boehako, Makedoniạ reakʼ manḍerkore Isor ṭhen khon oka daya ńamakan ona reaṅle baḍae ocoyetʼpea.
Aema duk ar ạḍi okocʼ biḍạu talate ar reṅgecʼko tahẽkanre hõ onkoakʼ monre nunạkʼ rạskạ tahẽkana je, onko do asambheṛgeko danleda.
Iń do onko lạgitʼ noa gohań emeda je, onko do daṛeakʼ bhor, hẽ daṛeakʼ khon hõ bạ̃ṛtige apnar kusi lekako danletʼ tahẽkana.
Onko do ạḍi jid salakʼ ale ṭhenko nehõrlena jemon Isorren okoeko hoṛ reṅgecʼre menakʼko, onkoakʼ reṅgecʼ meṭaotako reakʼ kạmire jemon seledokʼ reakʼ ạtko ńam.
Alele aslen tahẽkan khonakʼ hõ bạ̃ṛtiko danleda; onko do pạhilre Probhu ṭhen apnarko em maṛaṅena ar ona tayom do Isorakʼ sanaleka ale ṭhenko emleda.
Noa ńelte ale do bạ̃ṛtikaete Titusle nehõrade tahẽkana, dan reaṅ oka kạmi ale talareye ehopʼletʼ tahẽkan ona jemon uni doe purạugotʼkakʼ.
Jotowakʼge, metakʼme biswạs, Isorakʼ katha, akel, jid ar alere cetʼ leka apeakʼ asambheṛ dulạṛ menakʼ onkage jemon dan reakʼ gun hõ sareṛokʼ tape.
Noań hukumape kana ona do baṅa, menkhan eṭakʼkoakʼ jid reakʼ katha baḍae ocopeteń biḍạu aṭkaretʼpe kana apeakʼ dulạṛ do tinạkʼgan khạṭi tapea mente.
Ape do aboren Probhu Jisu Mạsiakʼ daya dan reakʼ kathape baḍaegea, uni do apnartetʼe kisạ̃ṛgere hõ ape khạtirteye reṅgecʼena, jemon uniakʼ reṅgejokʼ hotete apepe kisạ̃ṛ daṛeakʼ.
Ape lạgitʼ okaṭakʼ bhageakʼkan ona reaṅ do ińiń bujhạuetʼkan lekageń baḍae ocoyetʼpea. Ar apege noa dan do calaoen bochor khon uṭhạupe ehopʼleda ar jid salakʼpe kạmileda.
Menkhan ńitokʼ do ona kạmi purạutape. Ar oka khaṛa monte kạmi sanaletʼpe inạ khaṛa montege daṛeakʼ bhor purạugotʼkakʼpe.
Jãhãeakʼ emokʼ reakʼ sana tahentae khan enḍekhan uni do oka menakʼtae ona lekage Isor uniakʼ dane ataṅtaea, ar oka bạnukʼtae ona do Isor bae khojkana.
Eṭakʼko do sukre ar ape do dukrepe tahen ona do bạń khojkana, bickom ińakʼ monejoṅakʼ do okoeakʼ hõ jemon ṭonṭa alo tahentape.
Ńitokʼ apeakʼ oka sareṛokʼakʼkan ona hotete onkoakʼ ṭonṭa do cabakʼtakoa, ar onkoakʼ sareṛokʼakʼre apeakʼ ṭonṭa hõ meṭaokʼtapea, nonkate sanamkoakʼ dosa do soman hoyokʼa.
Sonot sostorre olakana, “Okoe ḍherko halaṅketʼ onko do baṅ bạ̃ṛtilena, ar okoe thoṛako halaṅketʼ onkoakʼ hõ baṅ komaolena.”
Ape lạgitʼ ińakʼ ontorre oka jid menakʼ, Isor do Titusakʼ ontorre hõ ona jidgeye emakatʼte Isoriń sarhaoedekana.
Titus do aleakʼ nehõre dohoakada, menkhan ona khon maraṅ katha do noage, uni do acʼakʼ sanaleka ạḍi jidkate ape ṭhene calakʼ kana.
Ale do Titus sãote armitʼ boehale kolekana. Jisu Mạsi reaṅ bhage sombat porcar kạmire nui boeha do joto manḍerrenko sarhaoede kana.

Niạ manḍerrenko hõ eken uniko sarhao edekana ona do baṅ, ale sãote noa dan idi lạgitʼ hõ manḍerrenko do uniko bachao akadea. Probhu gunmanao joharae ar eṭakʼko goṛowako lạgitʼ khaṛa mon menakʼtaete ale do noa dan idi lạgitʼle goṭa akadea.
Noa maraṅ dan hạṭińako babotre okoe hõ jemon ale birudre jãhãnakʼ aloko bodnam daṛeakʼ onate nui boehale kolekana.
Ale do eken Probhuakʼ mẽtʼãhã samaṅre do baṅ, menkhan manwa samaṅre hõ dhoromte calakʼ reakʼle kurumuṭuyeda.
Ona chaḍa onko tulucʼ aleren armitʼ boeha hõle kolekana. Uni do calakʼ lạgitʼe khaṛagea, ente ạḍi dhaole biḍạu sạbud akadea; ar ape upạrte uniakʼ do ńitokʼ ạḍi pạtiạu hoeakante calakʼe khaṛagea.

Titus reaṅ okaṭakʼ memenakʼ menakʼtiń ona do noage, uni do ińren gate kanae ar iń tulucʼ ape lạgitʼe kạmiyeda. Ar eṭakʼ boehako reaṅ oka memenakʼ menakʼtiń ona do noage, manḍerrenko do unkin bachaokateko koletʼkinạ. Nukin boeha hotete Mạsiye ṭhonokokʼma.
Onateń mena, onko ṭhen apeakʼ dulạṛ do sodortege sạbud ocoetape ar udukʼakope cedakʼ ale do ape iạtele sarhaokʼkana, jemon manḍerrenko onako ńelńam.
Isorren hoṛko lạgitʼ dan emokʼ reakʼ okaṭakʼ kạmi calakʼ kan ona reaṅ olape reakʼ jãhãn jạruṛ do bạnukʼtińạ,

ente noa kạmire apeakʼ khaṛa moniń baḍaegea. Iń do ape iạte Makedoniạren hoṛko ṭhen noa menteń sarhaokʼ kana je, Akhaearen hoṛko do dinkalom khon, metakʼme noa dan lạgitʼ sapṛao menakʼpea. Apeakʼ noa khaṛa monge onkoren ḍher hoṛkoe udgạu akatʼkoa.
Iń do noko boehakoń koletʼkoa jemon noa babotre ape ńutumte okaṭakʼ sarhaokʼakʼ menakʼtale ona onko ṭhen sạriakʼ mente sạbudokʼ, ar cetʼ lekań menakatʼ onkage jemon ape do sạrige sapṛao akaepe tahen.
Ar baṅkhan Makedoniạren hoṛko iń sãoteko senlen khan ar begor sapṛao akanko ńellepe khan, enḍekhan apere aleakʼ nunạkʼ pạtiạu iạte ale do lajaorele paṛaokʼa; ar ape hõpe lajao ocokʼa.

Onate noko boehako lahare ape ṭhen calakʼ lạgitʼ nehõrako reakʼ jạruṛiń hudiskeda, jemon okaṭakʼ maraṅ dan emokʼ lạgitʼpe gokʼletʼ tahẽkan ona reakʼ onko do laharegeko sapṛao hataṛkakʼ. Ar ape ṭhen khon jormoṭte jãhãnakʼ do baṅ hataokʼa, bickom dan lekate okape emokʼ onage laha khon sapṛao dohokakʼpe.
Noa baḍaekakʼpe, okoe korocʼ moṭocʼkateye er, uni do korocʼ moṭocʼkatege ir hõe ira ar okoe ḍhere er uni do ḍhergeye ira.
Mimitʼ hoṛ monre okaṭakʼe goṭa akatʼ onae onkaema; okoe hõ mon dukkate aloe emokʼma, ente kharsala monte emokʼkạnicʼge Isor doe dulạṛea.
Isor do joto secʼte dayawape reakʼ daṛe menakʼtaea, jemon apeakʼ oka jạruṛ ona do jaoge tahentape; ar onate jemon joto lekan bhage kạmi lạgitʼ khulạsatepe dan daṛeakʼ.
Sonot sostorre olakana, chiṭiạukedae, reṅgecʼ orecʼkoe ematʼkoa; ar uniakʼ dhorom do jaejug hạbicʼ tahenkana.
Cacasicʼ lạgitʼ itạ ar jom lạgitʼ piṭhạ okoeye kulạu julạuetʼ, uni do erokʼ lạgitʼ itạ hõe kulạuapea are baḍhao ocoetapea; ar apeakʼ dhorom reakʼ phosole borket ocoetapea.
Ape do joto secʼtegepe kisạ̃ṛokʼa jemon soṛa montepe dan daṛeakʼ, ar onatege ale hotete Isor do gunmanao johare em ocokʼa.
Apeakʼ noa kạmi iạte eken Isorren hoṛkoakʼ ṭonṭa purunokʼtakoa ona do baṅ; Isor secʼ ạḍi utạr hoṛakʼ gunmanao johar hõ sareṛokʼa.

Ar apeakʼ noa dangeye sạbudetʼ kana je, ape do biswạsiko kanape mente, ar ona ńelte onko do Isorko sarhaoea, ente ape do Mạsi reaṅ bhage sombatrepe pạtiạu akante uni gobolrenpe hoeakana ar soṛa monte onko ar eṭakʼko jotope dan akatʼkoa.
Isor ṭhen khon okaṭakʼ asambheṛ dayape ńamakatʼ ona ńutumte onko do goṭa ontorteko koeapea.
Ar oka dan reakʼ katha baṅ lạiyạgokʼ ona dan ńutumte Isorakʼ sarhao hoyokʼtaema.
Mạsiakʼ mạ̃hir ar daya reakʼ katha disại tulucʼ iń Pạul do apeń nehõrape kana. Hoṛko mena, ape ṭhen tinreń tahen unre doń nindhạnokʼ kana, menkhan tinre bạń tahen unre do dilanicʼ iń hoyokʼ kana.
Jel lekatele coloneda mente okoeko hudisetʼkan, onko birudre tinạkʼ dil udukʼ jạruṛ, ińiń hecʼlenre unạkʼ dil jemon udukʼ baṅ lagaoạń.
Abo do jel ar mãyãmren hoṛ kanrehõ bon okaṭakʼ lạṛhại bon lạṛhạikan ona do jel ar mãyãm reakʼ do baṅkana.
Jel ar mãyãm reakʼ gobolte manwa do okako khanḍa bhanḍawanteko lạṛhạikan onate ale do bale lạṛhại kana, menkhan Isorakʼ daṛete aleakʼ khanḍa bhanḍa ar kajak gaṛko hõ dhaṅ dhaserokʼa.
Ale do manwawakʼ eṛeakʼle nosṭoyeda ar Isor baḍaeye horre tạkicʼakʼ leka oka hudis bundisko usulokʼe menjoṅ onale dhaṅ dhasereda; ar mon reakʼ mimitʼ hudis bundisko Mạsi ṭhenle gobol ocoyeda.
Ape do tinre purạtepe gobolokʼa unre okoe bin gobolreko tahen onko sạjạiko lạgitʼle sapṛao tearokʼa.
Ape do bahre reakʼ muṭhạngepe ńeleda. Ar jãhãege apnar do Mạsiren kanae menteye pạtiạukʼ khan, enḍekhan noa hõe hudisma, uni cetʼlekae Mạsirenkan onakage ale hõ Mạsiren kanale.

Probhu okaṭakʼ ạidạriye emakatʼle ona ạidạri reakʼ monsubạ do hoyokʼ kana apeko benao rakapʼpe, menkhan lokshanpe lạgitʼ do baṅ. Ente noa ạidạri iạte thoṛań sarhaokʼre hõ ona lạgitʼ do bạń lajaokʼ ocokʼa.
Ińakʼ noa katha iạte alope hudisa, ciṭhiteń botor ocoyetʼpea.
Adom adom hoṛko meneda, “Uniakʼ ciṭhiko do monre gaḍaokʼ leka keṭecʼ ar jor anakʼ kana,, menkhan sorreye tahẽlen khan doe nijorgea ar uniakʼ roṛ do cetat reakʼ hõ baṅkana.”
Ar onkan hoṛ doe bujhạuma, hạjir bạnukʼlere hõ aleakʼ ciṭhite oka kathale roṛetʼkan, onkage hạjirlenre hõle roṛa.

Ape modren adomko do apnarko sarhaokʼ kana. Onko dolre apnar lekha midokʼ se onko tulucʼ jurikʼ do bale dileda. Onko doko bebujgea, ente apnarte oka bhageko hudisetʼ ona tulucʼgeko jurikʼ kana arko bicạrokʼ kana.
Menkhan tinạkʼ sarhaokʼ lek kan ona bahre ale do bale sarhaokʼ kana, bickom Isor aleakʼ kạmi lạgitʼ okaṭakʼ simại ṭhik dohoakatʼ ona khongele sarhaokʼ kana; ar ape hõ ona simạ bhitrirege menakʼpea.

Onate apeakʼ katha iạtele sarhaokʼre simạ bahre cetʼ hõ bale roṛeda. Ar ape ṭhen bale senlen khan aleakʼ nonkan sarhaoakʼ do simạ bahre hoekokʼtalea. Menkhan ale do Mạsi reaṅ bhage sombat porcar porcarte ape ṭhen hõle senlena.

Ona chaḍa eṭakʼkoakʼ kạmi iạtehõ ale do bale sarhaokʼ kana, arle onka lekhan enḍekhan ona do simạ bahre hoekokʼtalea. Ale do noale asokʼ kana je, apeakʼ biswạs hara idikʼ são sãote ape talare arhõ bạ̃ṛtile kạmi daṛeakʼa.
Onate ape ṭhen khon senkate sạṅgiń jaegakore arhõ bhage sombatle porcar daṛeakʼa. Onate okoe hõ bako men daṛeakʼa, ale do eṭakʼ hoṛko kạmi akatʼ ṭhenakʼ iạtele sarhaokʼ kana.
Menkhan sostor reakʼ katha leka, “Sarhaokʼicʼ do Probhure baṛeye sarhaokʼma;”
ente apnarte sarhaokʼicʼ do okoe hõ bhage mente bae sạbudokʼa, bickom Probhu okoeye sarhaoe unige bhage menteye sạbudokʼa.
Ińakʼ kạticʼ talaṅ bebuj baṛe sahaokạtińpe. Hẽ sahao hõpe sahaoetʼkangea.

Iń do ape lạgitʼ ińakʼ ontorre Isor reakʼ khạndri ãṭteń ãṭokʼkana, ente iń do eken mitʼ goṭen jãwãe tulucʼ, metakʼme Mạsi tulucʼge apeakʼ bapla reaṅ iń ṭhik dohoakada, jemon niphuṭ kũạ̃ri kuṛi leka uni tireń jimạ daṛeape.
Menkhaniń botorokʼ kana, uni biń do acʼakʼ bạṛicʼ phorphundite cetʼleka Hawae bulạulede onkage Mạsire menakʼtape soṛatetʼ ar napaetetʼ khon apehõko bulạu botecʼpe.

Ente okoe Jisu reakʼ kathale porcar akatʼ, uni chaḍa jãhãe eṭakʼ Jisuakʼ kathae porcarape se okoe sonot Jiupe ńamakade uni chaḍa eṭakʼ lekan Jiupe ńame, se oka bhage sombatpe ataṅakatʼ ona khon eṭakʼ lekan bhage sombatpe ńametʼkanre ape do ạḍi rạskạ salakʼge onape ataṅetʼ kana.
Menkhan ińakʼ bujre onko “Soros utạr” apostolko khon do oka secʼte hõ bạń komaoa.
Iń do ạḍi bes okocʼte katha roṛ bạń daṛeakʼre hõ akel do menakʼgetińa ar ona do joto secʼte ar joto lekate ape ṭheniń sodorakada.
Isor emakʼ bhage sombat apeko ṭhen begor damteń porcar akatʼte apnariń copotʼ akana jemonpe usul ocokʼ. Noa iạte cetʼ iń doń kại akada?
Ape sapʼ sorape lạgitʼ iń do eṭakʼ eṭakʼ manḍer khon goṛoń hatao akada, men daṛekeape luṭ hõń luṭ akada.

Ape ṭhen tahẽkateń ṭonṭalenre okoe hõ bhar do bạń ladeatʼpe tahẽkana, ente Makedoniạ khon okoe boehako hecʼlen onkoge ińakʼ ṭonṭawakʼko purunletʼa. Ar okalekate hõ iń do aperen bojha bạń hoyokʼa ar bạń hoeakana.
Ińre Mạsiakʼ oka sạriakʼtetʼ menakʼ ona lekateń menkea, Akhaea disạm reakʼ oka jaegare hõ ińakʼ noa sarhao do okoe hõ bako bond daṛeakʼa.
Cetʼ iạteń meneda? Ape bạń dulạṛetʼpe iạte? Isor doe baḍaegea, apeń dulạṛetʼpea mente.
Okoe apnarko sarhaokʼre ale somanko udugokʼkan onko jemon ona ạt aloko ńam onate okań kạmikan onageń kạmi idiya.
Ente onkanko hoṛ do eṛe apostol ar phạsiara kạmiyạko kanako. Ar Mạsiren apostolko mente udugokʼ lạgitʼ onko do apnartetʼko bodolokʼ kana.
Noate hahaṛakʼ reakʼ cetʼge bạnukʼa, ente Soetan hõ marsalre do serma goḍet leka udugokʼ lạgitʼ apnartetʼe bodolokʼ kana.
Ar Soetanren sapʼ dapʼko hõ apnartetʼ bodolkate dhoromren sapʼdapʼ menteko udugokʼkan khan, enḍekhan hahaṛakʼ reaṅ cetʼ menakʼa? Onko do kạmi mucạtʼre oka kuṛại menakʼtako onageko ńama.
Iń do arhõń meneda, okoe hõ bebuj jemon aloko hudisiń. Ar onkagepe bujhạuedeń khan enḍekhan bebuj mentege ataṅińpe, jemon thoṛaganiń sarhao daṛeakʼ.
Ńitokʼ okań menetʼkan ona do Probhuakʼ hukum leka do bạń meneda, menkhan apnar reaṅakʼko sarhao iạte bebuj lekań roṛeda.
Manwa okaṭakʼteko sarhaokʼ, onate ḍherkogeko sarhaokʼkan khan enḍekhan iń do cedakʼ bạń sarhaokʼa?
Ape dope budanko kante bebujkoakʼ kusitepe sahaoetʼtakoa.
Ar eken ona do baṅ, jãhãege golame benaolepere, jãhãegeye jom reṅgecʼlepere, jãhãegeye sapʼlepere, jãhãege acʼteye maraṅlenre ar jãhãege mẽtʼãhareye thapalepere, ape do sanamakʼpe sahaoetʼtakoa.

Iń do lajaokʼ tulucʼ iń aṅgocetʼ kana, noako babotre ale do ape ṭhen nijorgele tahẽkana. Okaṭakʼte eṭakʼko sarhaokʼko diletʼkan onate iń hõ sarhaokʼ doń diletʼgea; ar noa katha do bebuj lekategeń roṛeda.
Okoeko sarhaokʼkan onko do cetʼ Ibri kanako? Iń hõ kangeạń. Onko do cetʼ Israel kanako? Iń hõ kạnạń. Onko do cetʼ Abrahamren bõs kanako? Iń hõ kạnạń.

Onko do cetʼ Mạsiren sapʼ dapʼko kanako? Iń do arhõ ḍhertetʼ kạnạń. Disạipe, iń do bạulạha hoṛ lekań roṛeda. Mạsiakʼ sapʼdapʼ kạmire iń do onko khon ḍheriń khaṭao akana, ar ạḍi dhaoiń hajot akana, arhõ ạḍi dhao daleń jomakada, ar ạḍi dhao gujukʼ dạkhilreń paṛaolena.
Jihudiko ṭhen mõṛẽ dhao mitʼṭen kom pongel iń cạbuk ocolena,
bẽtte pe dhaoiń dal ocolena. Dhirite mitʼ dhaoiń tiń ocolena; ar pe dhao ińakʼ jahaj unumlena. Mitʼ siń mitʼ ńindạ doreão reakʼ athantar dakʼreń tahẽkana.

Aema disạmiń dãṛã akada. Ḍubạ dakʼ, ḍạkuko hotete, apnar jạtren hoṛ ar boṅgan hoṛ jạtrenko hotete muhinreń paṛaolena. Ona chaḍa iń do nagrahakore, hahaṅkar jaegare, doreãore ar phạsiạra boehako talarehõ muhinreń paṛaolena.
Mạsiakʼ sapʼdapʼ kạmire kosṭoreń paṛaolenre hõ ạḍiń khaṭao akana. Aema ńindạ jagwariń tahẽkana, reṅgecʼ ar tetaṅreń paṛaolena begor jomteń tahẽkana, rabaṅ ar laṅgaṭteń kosṭolena.
Noako chaḍa dinạmge sanam manḍerrenkoakʼ dạndi do iń cetanre ladekʼkan tahẽkana.
Jãhãeye nijorlenre cetʼ uniakʼ nijortetʼre bạń bhạgiạdarokʼ kana? Jãhãeye kạireye ńurlenre cetʼ iń do jiwi baṅ lokʼkantińạ?
Iń do sarhaokʼ jạruṛgetiń khan enḍekhan ińakʼ nijortetʼ iạtegeń sarhaokʼ kana.
Isor, Probhu Jisu Mạsiren Baba, okoe do jaejug hạbicʼ ṭhonok ńam lek kane, uniye baḍaea iń do eṛe bạń roṛeda.
Damesekre Aretas rajren disạm cakʼlaoicʼ do sabeń lạgitʼ Damesekrenkoakʼ nagraha pahra reakʼe hukumleda.
Menkhan pạcrire oka jalna tahẽkan ona bhitrite mitʼṭen khạclạkʼte onko do bahreteko paromgotʼkạdińạ, ar nonkate iń do uniakʼ ti khoniń ńir bańcaolena.
Iń do arhõ thoṛań sarhaokʼ kana. Ente jãhãn lab bạnukʼtińre hõ okako dorson Probhui ńel ocoakadiń ar okako iń ṭhene sodorakatʼ ona reaṅ iń do ńitokʼiń lạiya.
Mạsire pạtiạuicʼ mitʼ hoṛiń baḍae akadea; uni do gelpon bochor lahare serma hạbicʼe rakapʼ ocolena. Unre uni do acʼakʼ hoṛmoreye tahẽkana se baṅ ona do bạń baḍaea, Isorgeye baḍaea.
Ińiń baḍaea, uni hoṛ do Paradesteye rakapʼ ocolena. Uni do nonkanakʼ kathae ańjomleda one oka do lạite baṅ sodorokʼ, ar manwawakʼ hõ lạlại do baṅ ganokʼa.
Unre uni do acʼakʼ hoṛmoreye tahẽkana se baṅ, ona do bạń baḍaea; Isorgeye baḍaea.
Nonkan hoṛ lạgitʼ doń sarhaokʼa, menkhan iń apnar lạgitʼ do baṅ, eken ińakʼ nijortetʼ reaṅ iń sarhaokʼa.

Menkhan ińiń sarhaokʼre bebuj do ohoń hoelena, ente iń do sạriakʼgeń roṛa. Enrehõ bạń sarhaokʼa, ente ińakʼ kạmi ńelte se ińakʼ katha ańjomte hoṛko okalekako bujhạuediń ona khon bạ̃ṛti jemon okoe hõ aloko bujhạuiń.
Iń ṭhen ạḍi lekanakʼko sodorakante alo jemoniń usulokʼ, onate kosṭo emạń lạgitʼ ińakʼ hoṛmore mitʼṭen jạnum, metakʼme Soetanren goḍete emadiń tahẽkana.
Probhu do pe dhaoiń nehõrade tahẽkana jemon iń ṭhen khon onae sahaṛkakʼ.
Menkhan uni doe metadińa, “Ińakʼ dayage am lạgitʼ ḍhera, ente nijorrege ińakʼ daṛe do sodorokʼa.” Onate ińakʼ nijorakʼko reaṅakʼre ạḍi kusikateń sarhaokʼa, jemon Mạsiakʼ daṛe ińre tahen.
Onate Mạsi iạte nijorakʼkore, bemanot ocokʼre, kucit ocokʼre, santao ar khed ocokʼre ar joṅjalkore iń doń rạskạkʼ kana, ente tinreń nijorokʼa, unrege daṛeanakʼiń hoyokʼa.
Iń do bebujgeń hoeakana, menkhan apegepe jormoṭkedińa; ente apege sarhaoiń reakʼ lek tahẽkantapea. Ar cele hõń baṅkanre hõ enhõ aperen onko “Soros utạr” apostolko khon cetʼte hõ bạń komaoa.
Ạḍi sombhuri salakʼ ape talare cinhạko ar hahaṛawakʼko ar daṛe kạmikote apostol kạnạń menteń sạbud akada.
Eṭakʼ eṭakʼ manḍerko khon ape do oka secʼte hõ bape huḍińa; eken mitʼṭecʼtepe huḍińgea, ona do noage, aperen bojha bạń hoeakana. Ar noa behok do ikạ kạtińpe baṛe.

Iń do ńitokʼ tesar dhao ape ṭhen calakʼ lạgitʼiń sapṛaogea. Ińakʼ bojha do apere bạń ladeapea, ente apeakʼ dhon do bạń khojkana, bickom apegeń khojetʼpea. Gidrạko do go-baba lạgitʼ ṭaka-poesa jarwae reakʼ dạyik kanako ona do baṅ, bickom gidrạko lạgitʼ jarwae do go-baba koakʼge lek kana.
Iń do ạḍi kusikatege oka menakʼtiń ona jotowakʼ ape lạgitʼiń khoroca ar apnartetʼ hõń emokʼa. Asambheṛeń dulạṛetʼpe khan cetʼ ape do komgepe dulạṛińạ?
Bogegea, aperen bojha do bạń hoeakana, menkhan jãhãeko men botecʼkea, iń do bondhekteń bulạu akatʼpea.
Okoe ape ṭheniń kolletʼko onko modren jãhãe hotete cetʼ iń ṭhoka tanakʼ akatʼpea?
Iń do Titus calakʼ lạgitʼ iń nehõrade tahẽkana, ar uni sãote uni boeha hõń kolledea. Titus do cetʼ apeye eṛe lipukʼ akatʼpea? Tishõ baṅ. Titus ar iń do mitʼ mon ar mitʼlekage cetʼ bạliń kạmi akada?
Cetʼpe hudiseda, noa ciṭhite ale do apnarakʼ kathale roṛeda? Ale do Mạsirele mitʼ akante Isor samaṅrele roṛeda. E dulạṛiạ gateko, ape benao rakapʼpe lạgitʼge noakole roṛeda.

Botorokʼ kạnạń, ape ṭheniń hijukʼre ińiń monejoṅ leka hoedaṛeakʼa bạń ńampea ar ape hõ cetʼleka ńeleńpe menjoṅkan onaka do bape ńameńa. Ente botorokʼ kạnạń, reṭha reṭhi, hiskạ, raṅgao, torpha-turphi, okta, cugli, phulạukʼ gulmalge pasecʼ apere ńamokʼ.

Iń doń botorokʼ kana, pase ape ṭhen arhõń senlenre ińren Isor do ape samaṅreye lajao ocoyiń, ar okoeko lahateko kạiletʼ tahẽkan onko do pase loṭghuṭi, lucạ lamoṭ bin napaeakʼ khon mon bako ạcurakatʼtako, ar onko ḍherko iạte iń do dukiń ńama.
Iń do nõkʼõe tesar dhao ape ṭheniń hijukʼ kana. Sostorre ol menakʼa “Barea se pea goha reakʼ mocate mimitʼ katha do ṭarhaokʼa.”

Dosar dhao ape ṭheniń tahẽkanre okoe lahateko kại akatʼ onko ar eṭakʼko joto doń sontor akatʼko tahẽkana. Ar ńitokʼ hạjir bạnuńre hõ arhõń sontoretʼpe kana, iń do arhoń hijukʼre okoe hõ bạń mãyãwakoa,
ente Mạsi iń hotete kathae roṛetʼkan ona reakʼ sạbudpe khojkana. Uni do apeakʼ babotre bae nijora, bickom uniakʼ daṛe do apereye udukʼeda.
Uni do nijorreye krus ocolena, menkhan Isorakʼ daṛete jiwetʼ menaea. Ale do uni sãote mitʼakantele nijorakana, menkhan ape lạgitʼ Isorakʼ daṛete uni tulucʼ jiwetʼle tahena.

Apnarge biḍạu aṭkarokʼpe, Mạsire sạri biswạs menakʼtapea se baṅ. Apnarge biḍạu sạbudokʼpe. Ape do cetʼ bape bujhạueda, Jisu Mạsi do apeakʼ ontorre menaea mente? Ar sạbudokʼre belek mente alope ṭarhaokʼa.
Menkhan ińiń asokʼ kana apepe baḍae daṛeakʼa je, belek mente ale do bale biḍạu ṭarhao akana.

Ale do Isor ṭhenle koejoṅ kana jemon bạṛicʼakʼ jãhãnakʼ alope kạmi. Eṭakʼko jemon khạṭi menteko bujhạule onate noale khojkana ona do baṅa. Aleakʼ monejoṅakʼ do noage, khạṭi mente bako bujhạulere hõ ape do jemon okaṭakʼ bhageakʼkan onape kạmi.
Sạriakʼtetʼ birudre jãhãn ektiạri do bạnukʼtalea menkhan sạriakʼtetʼ lạgitʼ do menakʼtalegea.
Ente alele nijorlenre ar ape do jorankope hoelenre unre ale dole rạskạkʼ kana. Arle koejoṅ kana jemon jotowakʼpe sudhrạute sạbit utạrokʼ secʼpe laha idikʼ.

Onate ape ṭhen bạnuńre hõ noakoń olapekana, jemon ape ṭheniń senlenre Probhu okaṭakʼ ektiạriye emakawạdiń ona ajhaṭte aloń beohar. Ona ektiạri reakʼ monsubạ do apeko benao rakapʼpe lạgitʼge, dhaṅ-dhaserpe lạgitʼ do baṅa.
E boehako, jotowakʼko sudhrạupe ar sạbitokʼpe. Ińakʼ katha luturakʼpe, ar mitʼ monokʼpe, ar sulukte tahenpe. Enḍekhan dulạṛren ar sulukren Isor do ape tulucʼe tahena.
Sonot cokʼte jopoharpe.
Isorren sanam hoṛ do apeko joharape kana.
Aboren Probhu Jisu Mạsiakʼ daya ar Isorakʼ dulạṛ ar sonot Jiu reakʼ helmel ape jotoko tulucʼ baṛe tahenma.

Iń Pạul do Mạsiren mitʼṭen apostol kạnạń. Noa apostol hudạ jãhãe manwa ṭhen khon se jãhãe manwa hotete do bạń ńamakada, bickom Jisu Mạsi ar Isor Baba, one okoe do Mạsi gocʼko khone jiwetʼ beretʼkede, uni hotetegeń ńamakada.
Iń ar iń soṅgete okoe biswạsi boehako menakʼko, ale sanamkoge Galatiạ manḍerrenko lạgitʼ ciṭhile oleda.
Isor Baba ar aboren Probhu Jisu Mạsi do daya ar suluke danape ma.
Aboren Isor Babawakʼ sanaleka Mạsi do aboakʼ kạiko iạte apnarakʼ jiwiye emkeda, jemon noa bạṛicʼ piṛhirenko khone rukhiyạ bon.
Jaejug hạbicʼ Isorakʼ ṭhonok baṛe hoyokʼma. Amen.
Mạsiakʼ dayate okoe do acʼren hoṛ hoyokʼ lạgitʼe hohowatʼpe tahẽkan, uni bạgikate usạra eṭakʼ lekan bhage sombat secʼpe ạwil akan ńelte iń doń hahaṛakʼ kana.
Ona do jãhãn bhage sombatge baṅkana. Enrehõ adom hoṛ menakʼkoa one okoe do sulukte bako tahẽ ocoape kan, ar Mạsi reaṅ bhage sombat bodolko monejoṅkan.
Menkhan oka bhage sombat apele jạhir akatʼpe ona khon judạ lekan bhage sombat ape ṭhen porcarlen khan, ona do alele jạhirape se jãhãe serma goḍetgeye jạhirape, enḍekhan unire sarap paṛaokʼma.
Iń do cetʼleka pạhilteń roṛakatʼ onkage ńitokʼ hõń roṛeda, ape oka bhage sombatpe ataṅakatʼ ona khon jãhãe judạ lekan bhage sombate porcar enḍekhan unire sarap paṛaokʼma.

Noate iń do okoeakʼ sarhao ńamjoṅ iń kurumuṭuyeda, manwa se Isorakʼ? Se manwa kusi ocoye reakʼ iń kurumuṭu kana? Ar ńit hạbicʼ manwa kusi ocoko lạgitʼ iń kurumuṭuyetʼ khan enḍekhan Mạsiren golam doń baṅkana.
E boehako, baḍae ocoyetʼpe kạnạń, oka bhage sombat iń jạhirakawatʼpe ona do jãhãe manwa hotete benaoakʼ katha do baṅkana.
Jãhãe hoṛ ṭhen khon ona do bạń ńamakada se okoe hõ ona do bako cetʼ akawadińa, bickom Jisu Mạsi acʼtetʼge iń ṭhene sodorakada.

Jihudi dhoromreń tahẽkanre cetʼ lekan jioniń khemaoetʼ tahẽkan ona dope ańjomakatʼgea. Ar noa hõpe ańjomakada, Isorakʼ manḍerrenko tinạkʼ bebạṛicʼ iń khedetʼkokan tahẽkana ar maraoko lạgitʼ iń kurumuṭuyetʼ tahẽkana mente.
Iń umerren aema Jihudiko khon hõ ona dhoromre iń do ạḍitetʼiń laha idilena. Ona chaḍa ińren hapṛamko ṭhen khon okako ạri-cạli hecʼ ạguakan ona reaṅ hõ ạḍi jidiń tahẽkana.
Menkhan Isor do janam khongeye bachao doho akadiń tahẽkana ar uniakʼ dayatege apostol hoyokʼ lạgitʼe hohoakadińạ.
Jemon boṅgan hoṛ jạtrenko ṭhen Mạsi reaṅ bhage sombatiń porcar, onate Isor do acʼakʼ monejoṅ leka acʼren Hopon iń ṭhene sodorkedere okoe tulucʼ hõ bạń solhawana.
Okoe iń lahate apostolko hoelen iń do Jerusalemre onko ṭhen hõ bạń senlena. Unre iń do Arob disạmteń senakan tahẽkana ar tayomte arhõ Damesek nagrahateń ruạṛ hecʼena.
Ado pe bochor tayom pạhil dhao Patras sãote ńapamokʼ lạgitʼ Jerusalemteń senlena, ar uni tulucʼ onḍe gel mõṛẽ din iń tahẽkana.
Unre Probhuren boeha Jakob chaḍa eṭakʼ jãhãe apostolko sãote ińakʼ ńapam do baṅ hoelena.
Isorge goha do, ape ṭhen okakoń oletʼkan ona reaṅ okaṭakʼ hõ eṛeakʼ do baṅkana.
Ona tayom iń do Suriạ ar Kilkiliạ reakʼ eṭakʼ eṭakʼ ṭoṭhakoteń senlena.
Jihudi reakʼ Isại manḍerrenko ṭhen iń do oprom bạń tahẽkana.
Onko do eken niạ kathako ańjomleda baṅma, “Okoe hoṛ aboe santaoetʼ bon tahẽkan uni do ńitokʼ Mạsire biswạsokʼ reakʼ kathae porcareda, menkhan lahate uni do marao lạgitʼe kurumuṭuleda.”
Ar iń iạte onko do Isorko mạhimawadea.
Gelpon bochor tayom iń do Barnabas sãote arhõ Jerusalemteń calaoena, ar Titus hõń soṅge torakedea.

Isorakʼ monejoṅakʼ sodoren khan iń do onḍeń rakapʼ calaoena. Ar oka bhage sombat boṅgan hoṛ jạtrenko ṭheniń porcaretʼ tahẽkan onań lạiatʼkoa. Manḍerren manotan hoṛko do oko okote ona jotoń lạiatʼkoa, enteń botorokʼkan tahẽkana, hoedaṛeakʼa iń do ạuṛiakʼ iń khaṭao akana.
Menkhan boṅgan jạtren hoṛkanre hõe iń soṅgetenicʼ Titus do khatnakʼ lạgitʼ bae jormoṭ ocolena.

Adom eṛe boehako oko okoteko bololente katha do rakapʼlena. Jisu Mạsire biswạsiko lekate aboakʼ oka sạdhintetʼ menakʼ ona sạdhintetʼ reakʼ dosko sapʼ lạgitʼ onko do oko okoteko bololena jemon golamko benao daṛeabon.
Menkhan bhage sombat reakʼ sạriạkʼtetʼ jemon ape lạgitʼle rukhiyạ daṛeakʼ onate mitʼ ghạṛi lạgitʼ hõ onkoakʼ katha do bale manaoleda.

Manḍerren manotanko bikạukʼkan hoṛko do bhage sombat reaṅ nawanakʼ cetʼge bako baḍae ocoakadińạ. Menkhan onko do jãhãekangeko onate ińakʼ do cetʼge baṅ cekakʼtińạ. Isor do hoṛakʼ mẽtʼãhã ńelte bae bicạra.
Bickom onkoko ńelkeda, Jihudiko ṭhen bhage sombat porcar reakʼ bhar cetʼleka Patras cetanre emlen, onkage Isor do boṅgan hoṛ jạtrenko ṭhen bhage sombat porcar reakʼ bhar ińreye emakada.
Ente Jihudiko ṭhen apostolokʼ lạgitʼ Patrase daṛe ocokedeicʼ do boṅgan hoṛ jạtrenko lạgitʼ iń hõe daṛe ocokedińa.

Onko manotan hoṛ, metakʼme Jakob, Kephas ar Johan do noako ńelteko bujhạu daṛeatʼ tahẽkana, Isor ṭhen khon dayań ńamakada mente. Onko ar ạliń talare oka helmel menakʼ ona udug lạgitʼ onko do Barnabas ar iń tulucʼ jojomtiko milạukeda. Arko rạjiyena, ạliń do boṅgan hoṛ jạtrenko ṭhenliń calakʼa ar onko do Jihudiko ṭhenge.
Onkoakʼ mitʼṭen nehõr tahẽkana, ạliń do jemon reṅgecʼ orecʼkoliń disạko; ar ińakʼ hõ ona lạgitʼ ạḍi khaṛa mon tahẽkana.
Patras do Siriạ Prodes reakʼ Antiokiạteye hecʼen khan, samaṅregeń roṛ daramkedea, ente uni doe behok akatʼ tahẽkana.

Jihudikoren biswạsi okoeko dol do be Jihudiko khatna ocoko cetanre jorko emetʼ tahekan, onkoren adom hoṛko Jakob ṭhen khon ạuriko hijukʼre Patras do be-Jihudiko tulucʼe jom-ńuiyetʼ tahẽkana. Menkhan tinre onko dolren hoṛko hecʼena unre uni do onko botorte be-Jihudiko sãote gatekʼe bạgiketʼte apnar do onko khone begarena.
Antiokiạren eṭakʼ biswạsi Jihudiko hõ Patras sãoteko phạsiara seletʼlena. Ar Barnabas sudhạ onkoakʼ phạsiaratetʼreye goḍoe torayena.

Menkhan iń do, bhage sombat reakʼ sạriakʼtetʼ tulucʼ onkoakʼ kạmi reakʼ jãhãn jurige bạń ńelletʼre sanamko samaṅre Kephas iń metadea, “Am do Jihudi hoekate boṅgan hoṛ jạtrenko lekam colonetʼkan khan cekate boṅgan hoṛ jạtrenko do Jihudiko leka colon lạgitʼem ajhãṭetʼkoa?
“Abo do jonomte Jihudi kana bon, ar boṅgan jạtren kạkạiko do bon baṅkana.

Menkhan enhõ noa bon baḍaegea, Isor do manwa ạn-ạriko manaote dhorom mente bae aṅgocea, bickom Jisu Mạsire pạtiạukʼ hotetegeye aṅgocea. Onate abo hõ Mạsire bon pạtiạu akana, jemon ạn-ạriko manaote do baṅ bickom Jisu Mạsire pạtiạukʼte dhorom mente bon aṅgocokʼ kana; ente ạn-ạriko manaote okoe hõ dhorom mente ohoko aṅgoclena.
“Mạsi hotete dhorom mente Isor ṭhen aṅgocokʼ lek hoyokʼ lạgitʼ bon kurumuṭuyetʼ khan, boṅgan hoṛ jạtrenko leka kạiyanko kana bon, enḍekhan cetʼ Mạsi do kạiren sapʼ dapʼicʼ kanae? Tishõ baṅa.
Ente okakoń rạputʼ giḍiakatʼ onage arhõń benao ruạr khan enḍekhan iń do apnartetʼge dusi menteń sạbudokʼ kana.
Ạn-ạriko hotete iń do ạn secʼteń gocʼena jemon Isor lạgitʼ jiwetʼ iń tahẽ daṛeakʼ.

Iń do Mạsi tulucʼ iń krus ocoakana. Onate jiwetʼ do bạnuńa, menkhan Mạsige ińre jiwetʼ menaea. Ar okaṭakʼ hoṛmote jioniń khemaokan ona do Isorren Hoponre pạtiạu hotetegeń khemaoeda. Uni do ińe dulạṛkedeńte acʼ apnartetʼe emena.
Isorakʼ noa daya do bạń ạuṛiakʼ ocoa, ente ạn-ạri manaote manwa do Isor ṭhen dhorome hoyokʼ khan enḍekhan Mạsi do ạuṛiakʼgeye gocʼlena.”
E bebuj Galatiko, okoeye ahaketʼpea? Ape ma coṅ pusṭạutegeń porcar akatʼpe, Jisu Mạsi doe krus ocolena mente.
Iń do eken ape ṭhen khon baḍae sanań kana, ạn-ạriko manaote cetʼ sonot Jiupe ńamledea, se bhage sombatre pạtiạu iạtepe ńamledea?
Ape do cetʼ nunạkʼgepe bebujgea? Sonot Jiu hotete nawa jion ehopʼkate ńitokʼ do cetʼ apnarakʼ kurumuṭute sạbit utạrokʼpe ńamjoṅkana?
Ape do cetʼ ạuṛiakʼge dukpe jomleda? Asiń dohoyeda apeakʼ duk jom do baṅ ạuṛiakʼ akantapea.
Isor do sonot Jiu cedakʼe emakatʼpea ar ape talare nunạkʼ hahaṛawakʼkoe kạmiyeda ona baṛe hudispe. Uni do cetʼ ạn-ạrikope manaoetʼkante noakoe kạmi kana, se bhage sombatrepe pạtiạu akanteye onkayeda?
Abraham disạyepe. Sonot sostorre olakana, “Abraham do Isorakʼ kathareye pạtiạuena ar Isor do dhorom menteye ataṅkedea.”
Onate noa katha baḍaejoṅpe, okoe Isorreko pạtiạukʼkan eken onko kangeako Abrahamren hoponko do.

Sonot sostorre laharege olakan tahẽkana, biswạs iạtege Isor do boṅgan hoṛ jạtrenko dhorom menteye aṅgockoa. Abraham do noa kathage bhage sombat menteye baḍae ocolen tahẽkana, “Am hotetege sanam jạtrenko do bhorko ńama.”
Onkate ńelokʼ kana, Abraham do Isorreye pạtiạuente cetʼleka bhore ńamletʼ onkage uni tayom khon okoe do Isorreko pạtiạukʼkan onko hõ inạ bhorgeko ńameda.
Sonot sostorre olakana, “Sarapanicʼ kanae uni do, one okoe ạn-ạri reakʼ mimitʼ hukumko leka bae senokʼkan.” Enḍekhan ńelokʼ kana, ạn-ạrire bhorsakʼkan sanamkorege noa sarap do menakʼa.

Ona chaḍa noa hõ pusṭạugea je, ạn-ạri manaote Isor do okoe hõ dhorom mente bae ataṅkoa, ente sonot sostor reakʼ katha leka, “Okoe dhorom menteye ataṅ ocoakan uni do biswạs hotetege jione ńama.” Ente pạtiạu tulucʼ ạn-ạri reakʼ jãhãn jopoṛao do bạnukʼ anaṅ.
Ạn-ạri doe meneda, “Okoe hoṛ ạn-ạrikoe manaoetʼkan uni do ona hotetege jiwetʼe tahena.”
Ar ạn bon bebataoetʼte okako sarap abore tahẽkan, ona do Mạsi acʼgeye ladeyana are chaḍaoketʼ bona. Sonot sostorre noa olakana, “Darere aka ocoakanicʼ mitʼke mitʼ hoṛ doe sarapanicʼ kana.”

Isor do Abraham oka bhore emade tahẽkan ona bhorge Jisu Mạsi hotete boṅgan hoṛ jạtrenko hõko ńam daṛeakʼa, ar abo hõ jemon biswạs hotete gokʼ akawatʼbon sonot Jiubon ńam daṛeae, onate Mạsi do ona sarap acʼreye ladeana.

E boehako, iń do ạdi alga kathate noa reaṅ iń bujhạuape kana. Mitʼ dhao manwa talare jãhãnakʼ bondobos doholenre ona bondobos do okoe hõ bako bạtil daṛeakʼa se ona tulucʼ jãhãnakʼ hõ bako juṭucʼ daṛeakʼa.

Abraham ar uniren bõsko ṭhen Isor doe gokʼleda. Sonot sostor do bae menakada, “Bõsko ṭhen,” Metakʼme ạḍi utạr bõsko ṭhen, bickome menakada, “Amren bõsko ṭhen” Metakʼme mitʼṭen bõs ṭhen, ar uni bõsren Hopon doe hoyokʼ kana Mạsige.

Ińakʼ katha reakʼ mane do noage, Isor do Abraham oktere mitʼṭen kajak bondobose dohoakatʼ tahẽkana. Ar pon sae pe gel bochor tayom ạn-ạrikoe emena, ar onate laha reakʼ bondobos do baṅ bạtil lena; menkhan uniakʼ gokʼakʼ do bahal tahẽyena.
Isorakʼ bhor ńamokʼ do ạn-ạrikore ṭehãḍokʼkan khan enḍekhan gokʼakʼre ona do baṅ ṭehãḍokʼ kana. Menkhan Isor do dayate mitʼṭecʼ gokʼakʼ hotete Abrahame bhorade tahẽkana.

Enḍekhan cetʼ lạgitʼ ạn do? Ona do manwae kạiyetʼkante Isorakʼ gokʼakʼ tulucʼ ạne em juṭucʼena. Ar okoe reaṅe gokʼ dohoakatʼ tahẽkan uni Abrahamren bõs ạuriye hijukʼ hạbicʼ bahal tahen lạgitʼge ạn-ạriko do emlena. Serma goḍetko hotete mitʼṭen dene banarrenicʼ hotete noa ạn do bahal tahẽkana.
Menkhan eken mitʼ hoṛe tahẽlen khan dene banarrenicʼakʼ jạruṛ do bạnukʼa; ar Isor doe mitʼgoṭengea.
Enḍekhan ạn do cetʼ Isorakʼ gokʼakʼko birud reakʼ kana? Khạṭige baṅa. Isor do jiwetʼ daṛe oco reakʼ mitʼṭen ạne emlen khan enḍekhan khạṭige manwa do dhorom menteye bikạu ocokokʼa.
Menkhan sonot sostor do sanamkoge kại iạte dusi menteye ṭarhao akatʼkoa, jemon Jisu Mạsire pạtiạukʼko do akoakʼ ona biswạs hotete gokʼ akawatʼko reakʼ bhorko ńam daṛeakʼa.
Biswạs ạuri hijukʼre abo do ạn-ạrite bon esetʼ ạcur akan tahẽkana ar biswạsiko mente ạuri bon sodorokʼ hạbicʼ bon bond esetʼ ocoakan tahẽkana.
Enḍekhan ńelokʼkana, Mạsi ṭhen seṭerokʼ lạgitʼ noa ạnge aboren ạyuricʼ do, jemon pạtiạu hotete dhorom mente bon ṭarhao ocokʼ.
Menkhan ńitokʼ do pạtiạu hecʼakante ạn-ạri gobolre ar bạnukʼ bona.
Mạsi Jisure biswạs hotete ape jotoge Isorren hoponkope hoeakana.
Ente tinạkʼ hoṛ Mạsirepe bạptis akan, ape do kicricʼ leka Mạsipe horokʼ akawana.
Jihudi ar boṅgan hoṛ jạtrenko talare, golam ar sạdhin hoṛko talare, maejiu ar herel talare jãhãn begar do bạnukʼa, ente Mạsi Jisu tulucʼpe joṛao mitʼ akante jotoko Mạsirepe mitʼgea.
Mạsirenpe hoeakante Abraham bõsren hoponko hõpe hoeakana. Isor do Abraham oka emae reakʼe gokʼade tahẽkan ape hõ ona sanamakʼren ạidạrikope hoeakana.
Ińakʼ katha reakʼ mane do noage, apatakʼ jotowakʼre hoponakʼ ạidạri menakʼtaere hõ tinạkʼ din gidrại tahen unạkʼ din uni ar golam talare jãhãn begar do bạnukʼa.
Apattetʼ oka okteye niṭae un hạbicʼ uni do calaoko ar lonbonko tabere tahen hoyokʼtaea.
Onka leka gidrạ bon tahẽkanre abo hõ dhạrti reakʼ ạḍi lekan ạri-cạliren golam bon tahẽkana.
Menkhan oktetetʼ purạuen khan Isor do acʼren Hopone kolkedea. Uni Hopon do maejiuakʼ kukhireye janamena ar ạn gobolreye harayena.
Jemon ạn gobolre tahenkan hoṛkoe kiriń chaḍaoko, ar Isorren hoponko menteye ataṅ bon.
Ape dope hoponko kante Isor do acʼren Hoponren Jiu aboakʼ ontorreye kolkedea. Ar uni Jiu Isor do Abba, metakʼme Baba menteye hohoae kana.
Onate ar golam dope baṅkana, menkhan hoponko kanape. Ar hoponkope hoeakan khan enḍekhan Isor oka emokʼ lạgitʼe gokʼakawatʼpe onaren ạidạriko kanape.
Pạhilre Isor bape baḍae akade tahẽkanre okoepe sewawako kan tahẽkan onko do cele debgeko baṅkana.

Menkhan ńitokʼ do Isorpe baḍae akadea; ar hẽ, Isorge apeye baḍaeketʼpea. Enḍekhan cekate arhõ dhạrti reakʼ ạḍi lekan nijor ar ạuṛiakʼ ạri-cạli secʼpe ạcur ruạṛokʼ kana? Ape do cetʼ arhõ onkoren golam hoyokʼpe menjoṅ kana?
Ape ma dinko, candoko, ar bochorkope manaoetʼkan.
Ape lạgitʼ noageń botorokʼ kana je, iń do ạuṛiakʼge ape lạgitʼ iń khaṭao akan coṅ cetʼ coṅ.
E boehako, nehõrape kạnạń, iń leka baṛe hoyokʼpe, ente ińhõ ape lekań hoeakana. Ape do ińre jãhãnakʼ bape behok akada.
Baḍaegeape, hoṛmo reakʼ nijor salakʼ pạhil dhao bhage sombatiń jạhiratʼpe tahẽkana.
Ińakʼ ruạ iạtepe duklenre hõ bape hirkhạwạdiń tahẽkana, bickom Isorren goḍet se Jisu Mạsi cetʼlekape ataṅ akade onkage iń hõpe ataṅ sãohãledińa.
Menkhan ńitokʼ apnarte bhạgankope ńumugokʼ reakʼ do okortape? Ape reaṅ noa gohań em daṛeakʼa je, hoedaṛeakʼ khan ape do unre apeakʼ mẽtʼ sudhạ hoṭor totʼkatepe emkińạ honaṅ.
Ar ńitokʼ do cetʼ sạri katha roṛte aperen bạiriń hoeakana?
Onko eṭakʼ hoṛ do ape lạgitʼko ãṭokʼkana, menkhan bhage monsubạ iạte do baṅ. Onko do iń khon ạcur ruạṛpeko khojkana, jemon onko lạgitʼpe ãṭokʼ.
Tobe bhageakʼ lạgitʼ ãṭokʼ do bogegea. Eken ape talare hạjiriń tahenre do baṅ, menkhan jaoge ãṭokʼ do bogegea.
E ińren gidrạko, Mạsi apere ạuriye muṭhạnokʼ hạbicʼ ape iạte arhõ bedonteń sasetokʼ kana.
Ińakʼ monejoṅakʼ do noage, niạ ciṭhi olape bodolte ńitge ape talareń hạjirokʼte ape tulucʼ iń galmaraoa, ente ape reaṅ do bạń bujhạu daṛeakʼ kana cetʼiń cekaea mente.
Ape okoe do ạn-tạrire tahen sanayetʼpe, mase lạiyạńpe, ạn-ạri okae menetʼ ona do cetʼ bape ańjom ńameda?
Sostorre olakana Abrahamren do barea hoponkin tahẽkantaea, unkin modre mitʼṭenren eṅgatetʼ do kạ̃ṛmĩ erae tahẽkana ar eṭagicʼren eṅgatetʼ do Abrahamren sạdhin erageye tahẽkana.
Uni kạ̃ṛmĩ era khonicʼ do jel lekateye janamena, menkhan sạdhin era khonicʼ do Isorakʼ gokʼakʼ hotetegeye janamlena.

Iń do phenkote noakoń roṛeda. Nukin maejiu do barea bondobos kanakin. Mitʼṭen bondobos do sinại buru khone hecʼakana ar acʼ gobolren manwa do golam hoyokʼ lạgitʼe idiyetʼkoa. Ar uni kạ̃ṛmĩ era doe hoyokʼ kana Hagar.
Hagar do Arob disạm reakʼ sinại buruye bujhạu ocoyeda. Hagar do nahakʼ reakʼ Jerusalem tulucʼ jurikʼkana, ente Jerusalem do acʼren gidrạko sãote kạ̃ṛmĩye khaṭaokʼ kana.
Menkhan okaṭakʼ Jerusalem do serma reakʼ kan, uni doe sạdhingea; ar unige aboren gogo do.

Sonot sostorre olakana, “Hulạsokʼme E bạńjhi maejiu, one tisge gidrạ bam janamakatʼko, ar tisge haso baṅ rakapʼ akatʼme, am do, sereń joṅme ar rạskạte andoṛme; ente herel menaetaicʼ khon bạgi giḍiyicʼren gidrạgeko saṅgegea.”
E boehako, ape do Isahak lekage Isorakʼ gokʼakʼren hoponko kanape.
Menkhan ona jokhecʼ jel lekate janamicʼ do sonot Jiu reakʼ daṛete janamlenicʼ upạrteye santaokan tahẽkana. Ar nahakʼ hõ onkage hoyokʼ kana.

Menkhan sonot sostorre cetʼe meneda? Sonot sostorreye meneda, kạ̃ṛmĩ era ar uniren hopon do jemonkin laga oḍok ocokʼ; ente kạ̃ṛmĩ eraren hopon do oka lekate hõ sạdhin eraren hopon tulucʼ baṅgeye ạidạri joṅa.
E boehako, enḍekhan ńelokʼ kana abo do kạ̃ṛmĩ eraren hoponko do bon baṅkana, menkhan sạdhin eraren gidrạko kana bon.
Mạsi do aboe sạdhinketʼ bona jemon sạdhin bon tahẽ daṛeakʼ. Onate teṅgo keṭecʼ akan tahenpe, jemon okoe hõ golam ar aloko benao daṛeape.
Ńelpe, iń Pạul do apeń metapekana, apepe khatnakʼ kan khan enḍekhan Mạsire jãhãn kuṛại do bạnukʼtapea.
Sanamko ṭhen arhõ noa gohań emeda, okoeye khatnakʼkan uni do sanam lekan ạn-ạriko purạu reakʼ dae paṛaoaea.
Ạn-ạriko pańjaete okoe do Isor ṭhen dhorom ocokʼpe menjoṅkan ape do Mạsi khonpe getʼ begar akana, ar Isorakʼ daya khonpe ocokʼ akana.
Ente abo do Jiu hotete biswạste dhorom reakʼ asokʼakʼ bon ńel horeda;
ente okoe doko Jisu Mạsirenkan, onko ṭhen khatna ar bin khatna reakʼ do cetʼ porhoge bạnukʼa, bickom oka biswạs do dulạṛ talateye kạmiyetʼkan ona biswạsge asolakʼ kana.
Ape ma besge coṅpe dạṛetʼ tahẽkan; enḍekhan sạriakʼre gobolokʼ lạgitʼ do okoeye tạkicʼketʼpea?
Okaṭakʼpe manao akatʼ, ar okoeye hohoakatʼpe uni Isor ṭhen khon ona do baṅ hecʼakana.
Kạṭicʼ talaṅ khạmi do sipiyakʼ joto holoṅgeye phulạu ocoea.
Ape reaṅ Probhure noa pạtiạu menakʼtińạ, ape do okaṭakʼ reakʼ hõ bape eṭakʼ monokʼa. Menkhan okoeye ạulạuetʼpe, uni doe jãhãe kange, uni do acʼakʼ kuṛạiye ńamgea.
E boehako, ńitokʼ hõ khatnakʼ reakʼ iń porcaretʼ khan, enḍekhan cedakʼ ńitokʼ hõń santao ocokʼkana? Krus cetanre Mạsiakʼ gujukʼ reakʼ tạkicʼakʼ ma coṅ maraoen.
Okoe apeko ạulạuetʼpe, onkore ińakʼ monejoṅ do noage, onko do apnarge jemonko getʼ begarokʼ.
E boehako, sạdhin ocokʼ lạgitʼge Isor doe hohoakatʼpea. Menkhan apeakʼ jel reakʼ sana purạu lạgitʼ noa sạdhintetʼ do alope laṛcaṛa. Ona khon bickom dulạṛte mitʼ hoṛ eṭakʼ hoṛe sapʼ soraema,
ente sanam ạn-ạriko do niạ mitʼ katharege guṭmitʼ akana, “Am aḍepaseren hoṛ apnar leka dulạṛem.”
Menkhan ape apepe jhogṛakʼ arpe hipiskạ khan men sontorokʼpe! Arpe nonkae khan ape do apetegepe maraokʼa.
Ińakʼ mone joṅ do noage, ape do sonot Jiu lekate colonpe. Arpe onkale khan jel reakʼ sana do bape purạutapea.
Jel reakʼ sana do sonot Jiu birud ar sonot Jiu reakʼ sana do jel birudgeye khoja. Jel reakʼ sana ar sonot Jiu do ạkin birudrekin meneda ape okape monejoṅkan ona do alope kạmiya.
Sonot Jiu hotetepe ạyur ocokʼkan khan enḍekhan ạn-tạriren dope baṅkana.
Jel reakʼ kạmiko do pusṭạutege ńel ńamokʼ kana. Onako do hoyokʼ kana, laṭghaṭ, bin napae, lucạ lamoṭ,
boṅga sewa, jạdu biddạ, bene bạiri, kạphạriạu mẽtʼ jolokʼ, raṅgao, torpha turphi,
bhinạ bhini, dola duli, hiskạ, ńu bulokʼ, rij roṅ, arhõ onkanakʼko. Iń do cetʼ leka noa lahareń sontorletʼpe ńitokʼ hõ onkageń metapekana, ar nonka kạmikanko do Isorakʼ raj baṅgeko ạidạri joṅa.
Menkhan sonot Jiu reakʼ jo do, dulạṛ, rạskạ, suluk, sobori, susṭob, bhạlại, pạtiạr,
mạ̃hir ar sambṛaokʼ. Ar nonkanakʼko birudre ạn do bạnukʼ anaṅ.
Okoe doko Jisu Mạsiren kan, onko do akoakʼ jel reakʼ sanako krus akatʼtakoa.
Abo do sonot Jiu hotete jiwetʼ menakʼ bon khan enḍekhan dela, sonot Jiu leka bon taṛamma.
Michạ man ńam baṛako leka do alo bon hoyokʼma, ar alo bon ạṛis ocokoma ar alo bon hipiskạma.

E boehako, ape modre jãhãe hoṛ jãhãn dosreye paṛaolenre, enḍekhan okoe sonot Jiu tabere menakʼpe ape do onkanicʼ jut ruạṛepe. Menkhan dulạṛ monte noa kạmipe ar apnartetʼ sontor tahenpe jemon ape hõ kạire alope ńurokʼ.
Bhạriạ gokʼ gopoṛope, ar nonkate ape do Mạsiakʼ ạnkope purạu daṛeakʼa.
Jãhãe jãhãnicʼe baṅkanre hõ apnartetʼ jãhãnicʼ menteye hudisokʼkan khan uni do apnartegeye bulạukʼ kana.
Mimitʼ hoṛ do akoakʼ kạmiko biḍạuma. Enḍekhan eṭakʼko sãote apnar aloko jurikʼma bickom acʼakʼ kạmi iạteye sarhaokʼma.
Ente mimitʼ hoṛ do apan ạpin bojha gogokʼ hoyokʼ takoa.
Okoe Isorakʼ kathae cetʼ ocokʼkan uni do acʼren cecetʼicʼ do acʼakʼ sanam bhageakʼ reakʼe hạṭińae.
Ape do alope bulạukʼa, Isor do ohoe siṛog ocolena; ente okoe okaṭakʼe era; uni do inạgeye ira.
Okoe acʼakʼ jel lạgitʼe era; uni do jel khonakʼ maraoakʼgeye irạ. Menkhan sonot Jiu lạgitʼe er khan uni do jaejug jiongeye ira.
Bhageakʼ kạmi kạmite alo bon mokońokʼma, ente babon loraolen khan okte nạpitre phosol bon ńama.
Ạt bon ńamle khan sanamko lạgitʼ bhageakʼ bon kạmima, bạ̃ṛtikaete Isorren gharońjren hoṛko bhạlạiko lạgitʼ jemon bon kạmi.
Ńelpe, ińakʼ tite tinạkʼ lạṭu lạṭu akhorkoteń olapekana.
Okoe hoṛmo bahre secʼ bhage udugokʼko menjoṅkan onkoge khatnakʼ lạgitʼko jormoṭetʼpea. Mạsiakʼ krus iạte jemon aloko khed ocokʼ onate onko do nonkako kạmiyeda.
Khatna ocoakanko hõ coṅ ạn ma bacoko manaoetʼkan. Onko do khatna ocope lạgitʼ sanayetʼkoa jemon noa iạteko sarhao daṛeakʼ baṅma, ape hõ onko dolrepe hecʼakana mente.
Probhu Jisu Mạsiakʼ krus chaḍa ar cetʼte hõ jemon aloń sarhaokʼ. Noa krus hotetege dhạrti do iń ṭhen gocʼgea ar iń hõ dhạrti ṭheniń gocʼgea.
Khatna ar bin khatna do cetʼ hõ baṅkana, menkhan maraṅ katha do hoyokʼ kana Mạsi hotete nawa sirjonge.
Okoe hoṛ noa ạn lekateko calakʼkan onkore, metakʼme Isorren sạri Israelko uni do suluk ar mãyãe dan akoma.
Mucạtʼreń menkea, okoe hõ aloko duk ocoyińma, ente Jisuakʼ ghạl dagko reakʼ cinhạkoge ińakʼ hoṛmoreń asen baṛayeda.
E boehako, aboren Probhu Jisu Mạsiakʼ daya apeakʼ ontorre tahẽ akan tahenma. Amen.
Iń Pạul do Isorakʼ sanate Mạsi Jisuren mitʼṭen apostoliń hoeakana. Ephesus nagrahare okoe doko Isorren hoṛkan ar okoe do Jisu Mạsireko pạtiạu akan onko ṭhen noa ciṭhiń oletʼkana.
Aboren Isor Baba ar Probhu Jisu Mạsi do suluk are bhor ape ma.
Aboren Probhu Jisu Mạsiren Baba ar Isorakʼ sarhao hoyokʼtae ma. Abo do Mạsi tulucʼ bon kolom mitʼ akante Isor do serma reakʼ mitʼke mitʼ jiuanakʼ bhore dan akatʼbona.
Uni doe nonkaleda jemon acʼren dulạṛiạ Hopon hotete begor damte oka mạhimate perecʼ dayae dan akatʼbon uniakʼ sarhao hoyokʼtae.
Isorakʼ bin mucạtʼ dayate Mạsi tulucʼ bon jopoṛao akante uniakʼ mãyãm hotete bon chaḍao ocoakana, metakʼme kại reakʼ ikạ bon ńam akada.
Isor do noa daya acʼakʼ maraṅ bud ar akel salakʼe dan akatʼ bona.
Uni do okalekae khojletʼ ar Mạsi hotete okaleka laha khongeye ṭhik doho akatʼ tahẽkan, onka lekage uni do acʼakʼ okoakʼ monsubạkoe baḍae ocoletʼ bon tahẽkana.
Uni doe niṭ akatʼ tahẽkana je, okte purạulen khan ona monsubạ purạu lạgitʼ serma ar dhạrti reakʼ jotowakʼ mitʼkate Mạsiakʼ ḍanṭao gobolreye ạguya.

Isor do acʼakʼ bud ar akelte apnarakʼ kusileka jotowakʼgeye kạmiyeda. Acʼakʼ monsubạ leka laha khon okaṭakʼe niṭ dohoakatʼ tahẽkan onkage Mạsi hotete acʼren hoṛko hoyokʼ lạgitʼ uni do aboe bachao dohoakatʼ bona.
Okoe laha khon Mạsirele asakan, ale hotetege jemon Isorakʼ mạhima sodorokʼ ona lạgitʼge uni doe bachao akatʼlea.

Ar apekohõ sạriakʼtetʼ reakʼ kathako kanape, metakʼme kại khon bańcao reakʼ bhage sombatpe ańjomketʼte Mạsirepe pạtiạu akana. Ar Mạsi tulucʼpe kolom mitʼakante Isor do acʼren gokʼicʼ sonot Jiu hoteteye mohor chap akatʼpea.

Okoe do Isorren sompottikanko onko do mitʼṭen ạidạri emako lạgitʼe gokʼ akawatʼkoa. Ar tin hạbicʼ purạte chaḍao ạuriko ńam unhạbicʼ ona ạidạriren pạhil hĩs lekate onko do sonot Jiuko em ocoakana. Ar noako hotetege Isorakʼ ṭhonok reakʼ sabasi do sodorokʼa.
Onate Probhu Jisure apeakʼ pạtiạu ar Isorren sanam hoṛkore apeakʼ dulạṛ reakʼ katha tinreń ańjomkeda,
un khon ape ńutumte gun manao johar do tishõ bạń thir akana.

Ar koejoṅ jokhecʼ apeakʼ katha do bạń hiṛińeda. Iń doń koejoṅ kana jemon aboren Probhu Jisu Mạsiren Isor, metakʼme uni ṭhonokren Baba do jiu reakʼ akel ar bujhạu lạgitʼ daṛeye danape, jemon uni do arhõ bạ̃ṛtipe baḍae daṛeae.
one okoe hotete uni do gocʼko khon Mạsiye jiwetʼ beretʼkede ar sermare acʼakʼ jojomsa aṛereye duṛupʼ akade.
Uni do serma reakʼakʼ sanam lekan ektiạri, daṛe ar mạlikiko Mạsi gobolreye dohokeda. Ar mitʼke mitʼ ńutum cetanre baṅ do nahakʼ jugre baṅ do darakan jugre, ona sanam cetanre Mạsiakʼ ńutume dohokeda.
Isor do sanamakʼge Mạsiakʼ jaṅga latarreye dohoakada ar jotowakʼre ektiạriye emakawadea, ar unige manḍerren matha menteye dohokedea.
Noa manḍer do Mạsiakʼ hoṛmo kana. Ar okoe sanam secʼ khon jotowakʼe perecʼetʼkan uni Mạsiakʼ perecʼtetʼge hoyokʼ kana noa manḍer do.
Bebatao ar kại iạte ape do gocʼgepe tahẽkana.

Dhạrti reakʼ cạli leka ape hõ pạhil do bebatao ar kạirepe dãṛãnkan tahẽkana. Ar okoe jiu do hoe reakʼ etkiạriren rajkan uni bạṛicʼ jiuge Isorren bebatao hoṛko talareye kạmikana, ar ape do uni jiugepe pańjayedekan tahẽkana.

Abo sanamkoge abo do aboakʼ jel reakʼ sana bon purạuetʼ tahẽkante onko hoṛko talare mitʼ okte jion bon khemaoetʼ tahẽkana. Ar jel khon okako sana ar hudisko rakabokʼ ona lekage bon kạmikan tahẽkana. Noa colon iạtege abo hõ eṭakʼko leka Isor ṭhen khon sạjại ńam lek hoṛ bon tahẽkana.
Menkhan Isor do mãyãteye perecʼgea; uni do ạḍiye dulạṛetʼ bona.
Ar bebatao iạte tinre gocʼge bon tahẽkana unre Mạsi sãote uni doe jiwetʼketʼ bona. Isorakʼ dayate ape do kại khon bańcaope ńamakada.
Abo do Jisu Mạsire bon kolom mitʼ akante Isor do Mạsi tulucʼe jiwetʼketʼbona ar Mạsi sãotege sermareye duṛupʼ akatʼbona.
Uni do noae kạmikeda jemon acʼakʼ bin mucạtʼ daya darakan jugkoreye udukʼ daṛeakʼ. Uni do Mạsi Jisu hotete aboreye dayayente okaṭakʼe kạmiakatʼ onatege uniakʼ noa daya do sodor akana.
Ente dayatepe bańcao akana biswạste. Ar ona do ape khonakʼ do baṅ, ona do Isorakʼ dan kana.
Noa do kạmiteakʼ jo lekate hõ baṅ emakana, jemon okoege aloko sarhaokʼ.

Abo do Isorakʼ tite bon benao akana. Isor do Jisu Mạsi sãoteye joṛaoketʼbonte nawateye sirjạuketʼbona jemon bhageakʼko bon kạmi. Uni do noa bhage kạmi laha khongeye ṭhik doho akatʼ tahẽkana, jemon ona kạmikote jion bon khemao.
Janam secʼ lekate ape do boṅgan hoṛ jạtrenko kanape. Ar okoe titeko khatna ocoakan, metakʼme apnarte khatna akan hoṛ menteko ńumogokʼkan onko do bin khatna hoṛ menteko metapekana.

Disạipe, lahate ape do Mạsi khon begargepe tahẽkana; jạt lekate Israelkoakʼ oka ạidạri menakʼ ona ạidạri khon bahrerepe tahẽkana; Isor do Israel jạtko lạgitʼ okae gokʼ dohoakatʼ tahẽkan ona sãote apeakʼ jãhãn bondobos baṅ tahẽkana; ar noa dhạrtire ape do Isor chaḍagepe tahẽkana.
Mitʼ jokhecʼ ape do sạṅgińrepe tahẽkana, menkhan Mạsi Jisurepe kolom mitʼakante ńitokʼ do uniakʼ mãyãm ṭhenpe ạgu ocoakana.

Uniakʼ monsubạ do tahẽkana jemon, acʼakʼ krusteakʼ gujukʼte ona banar mitʼkate Isor tulucʼ arhõe mitʼ ruạṛ daṛeakʼ, ente noa banar talare oka bạiri leka tahẽkan, ona do acʼakʼ krusteakʼ gujukʼ hoteteye maraokeda.
Ape okoe sạṅgińrepe tahẽkan ar onko okoe do sorreko tahẽkan, jotoko ṭhenge uni do hecʼkate suluk reakʼ bhage sombate porcarleda.
Uni hotete ini mitʼ sonot Jiure Baba ṭhen calakʼ reakʼ ạidạri do sanamkoakʼ menakʼ tabona.
Onate bin opromko dope baṅkana, ar bedisiạ hõpe baṅkana; menkhan Isorren hoṛkoakʼ oka ạidạri menakʼ ape hõ onko sãote ona ạidạripe ńam akada ar Isor gharońjrenpe hoeakana.
Apostol ar nạbiko do rehetʼ kanako, ar ona rehetʼren konac dhiri do Jisu acʼtetʼ kangeae. Ar ona rehetʼ cetanrege ape dope gathao ocoakana.
Mạsi tulucʼ kolom mitʼ akante dolan reakʼ goṭa hĩs do mitʼ sãote jopoṛao akante Probhuakʼ tahen lạgitʼ mitʼṭen sonot oṛakʼ benao rakabokʼ kana.
Ape do uni tulucʼgepe kolom mitʼakana ar onate ape hõ mitʼ sãotepe gathao rakapʼ ocokʼkana, jemon sonot Jiu hotete Isorakʼ mundilpe hoedaṛeakʼ.
Noa iạte iń Pạul do Isor ṭheniń koejoṅ kana. Ape okoe do boṅgan hoṛ jạtrenko kanpe ape lạgitʼge iń do Mạsi Jisuren kạidiń hoeakana.
Ape do khạṭigepe ańjomakada, Isor do acʼakʼ daya reakʼ bondobos baḍae ocope reakʼ bhar ińreye emakada mente.
Uniakʼ okoakʼ monsubạ do mitʼ sodorakʼ hoteteye baḍae ocoakadińạ, ar noa reaṅ iń do ape ṭhen thoṛa kathateń olkeda.
Ape do ona paṛhaokatepe bujhạu daṛeakʼa je, Mạsi reaṅ ona okoakʼ monsubạ bujhạu lạgitʼ ektiạri menakʼtińạ mente.
Ona okoakʼ monsubạ do sonot Jiu hotete cetʼleka ńitokʼ uniren sonot apostolko ar nạbiko ṭhen sodor akan, onka do eṭakʼ piṛhiren hoṛko ṭhen baṅ sodorlena.
Ar ona okoakʼ monsubạ do hoyokʼ kana, bhage sombat hotete boṅgan hoṛ jạtrenko Jisu Mạsi tulucʼko midokʼte Jihudiko sãote inạ mitʼ ạidạri, mitʼ hoṛmo hạṭińko, ar mitʼ gokʼakʼren bhạgiạdarkoko hoyokʼ.
Isor do acʼakʼ maraṅ daṛete okaṭakʼe daya akadiń ona daya reakʼ dan lekate uni do bhage sombat porcar lạgitʼ kạmiye emakawạdińa.

Isorren sanam hoṛko modre iń khon huḍińko ar bạnukʼkore hõ, enrehõ Mạsiakʼ okaṭakʼ dhon reakʼ katha purạpuri baṅ bujhạukʼ, ona dhon reakʼ bhage sombat boṅgan hoṛko baḍae ocoko reakʼ bhar Isor do dayate ińgeye emakadińạ.
Ona chaḍa uniakʼ okoakʼ monsubạ okalekate kạmire lagao hoyokʼa ona sodor reakʼ dạyik hõ ińe emakawạdińa. Sanamakʼren sisirjạuicʼ Isor do nunạkʼ din hạbicʼ acʼakʼ ona monsubại oko dohoakatʼ tahẽkana.
Uni doe onkaleda jemon Mạsiakʼ manḍer hotete sermaren sanam cakʼlaoko ar ektiạrianko ṭhen aema lekate sodor akan Isorakʼ akel ńitokʼ sodorokʼ.
Ar noage uniakʼ do jaejug reakʼ monsubạ tahẽkantaea, ar ona monsubạge aboren Probhu Jisu Mạsi hoteteye purạukeda.
Mạsi tulucʼ mitʼkate ar unire biswạs hotete abo do Isor samaṅre sohosate hạjirokʼ reakʼ ạidạri bon ńamakada.
Onateń nehõrokʼ kana, ape lạgitʼ duk ar sasetiń jometʼte dil alope ada, ente ona jotowakʼ do apeakʼ man lạgitʼ hoeakana.
Iń doń koejoṅ kana jemon Isorakʼ asambheṛ ṭhonok lekate uni do nonkan daṛeye emape, jemon sonot Jiu hotete apeakʼ ontor daṛeanakʼ hoyokʼ,
ar biswạs hotete Mạsi do apeakʼ monre purạte girobas akane tahen. Iń do arhoń koeyeda jemon Mạsiakʼ dulạṛre rehetʼ ar bạisạu akanpe tahen,
ar Isorren sanam hoṛko sãote ape hõpe bujhạu daṛeakʼ baṅma, Mạsiakʼ dulạṛ reakʼ jãhãn mucạtʼtetʼ, osartetʼ, jeleńtetʼ, usultetʼ, ar khạndritetʼ do bạnukʼa.
Mạsiakʼ dulạṛ do budte oho baḍaelena; enhõ iń doń koejoṅ kana jemon ona dulạṛpe bujhạu daṛeakʼ, ar Isorakʼ goṭa perecʼakʼtepe perejokʼ.
Aboakʼ ontorre Isorakʼ oka daṛeye kạmiyetʼkan ona daṛe lekate uni do aboakʼ koejoṅ ar hudis khon hõ ạḍi bạ̃ṛtiye kạmiyeda.
Jisu Mạsi hotete ar manḍer talate piṛhike piṛhi jaejug hạbicʼ Isorakʼ ṭhonok hoyokʼtae ma. Amen.
Onate Probhure kạidi akanicʼ iń nehõrape kana, Isor oka lạgitʼe hohoakawatʼpe ona reakʼ lek leka colonpe.
Apeakʼ colon do jemon purạte nindhạn ar mạ̃hir hoyokʼ. Sombhuripe ar dulạṛ monte mimitʼko tulucʼ sapahaokʼpe.
Ar okaṭakʼ suluke mitʼ ocoakatʼ bon ona suluk hotete sonot Jiu reakʼ midokʼ dohoe lạgitʼ kurumuṭuipe.
Isore hohoakatʼpe iạte apere eken mitʼṭen asge menakʼa, mitʼ hoṛmoge menakʼa ar mitʼ sonot Jiuge menaea,
mitʼṭen Probhuge menaea, mitʼ patiạuge menakʼa, ar mitʼ bạptismage menakʼa,
ar sanamkoren Isor Baba hõ onka leka mitʼ goṭenge menaea. Unige sanamko cetanre, sanamko talare ar sanamkoakʼ ontorre menaea.
Menkhan Mạsi cetʼlekae ṭhik dohoakatʼ ona soṅ hạṭiń lekage abo mimitʼko do daya dan bon ńamakada.
Onatege sonot sostorreye meneda, Uni do sermateye rakapʼenre, lạṛhại kạidikoe kạidi idiketʼkoa, ar manwako aema dane ematʼkoa.
“Uni doe beretʼena,” Noa katha khon cetʼ noage baṅ bujhạukʼ kana je, Mạsi do dhạrti reakʼ latar utạrakʼkore hõe pheḍlena mente?
Ar okoeye pheḍlen unige sanamakʼ purạu lạgitʼ arhõ sermako khon hõ cetanteye rakapʼena.
Unige adom do apostolko, adom do nạbiko, adom do bhage sombat porcarko ar adom do sapʼdapʼko ar cecetʼko menkateye bahalketʼkoa.
Uni do nokoye bahalketʼkoa jemon Isorren sanam hoṛko uniakʼ sapʼdapʼ lạgitʼko sapṛaokʼ ar nonkate Mạsiakʼ hoṛmo do benao rakabokʼa.

Noa reakʼ monsubạ do hoyokʼ kana, sanamkoge jemon Isorren Hoponre bon pạtiạukʼte mońjtebon baḍaeye ar mitʼakae bon hoyokʼ; ar Mạsi cetʼleka sanamakʼteye perecʼge, onkage jemon abo hõ sanamakʼte bon perejokʼma. Unre gidrạ leka do ar babon tahena.
Bạṛicʼ bulạuakʼte eṭakʼko bhul horte idiko lạgitʼ oka bhul sikhnạtko emakokan, ona bhul sikhnạt iạte abo do hoete sokojokʼkan ḍheoko leka hante nate alo bon sokojokʼma.
Bickom dulạṛ monte Mạsi reaṅ sạri kathako bon roṛma ar sanamakʼre hara burukʼte Mạsi leka bon hoyokʼma. Uni kangeae hoṛmo reakʼ matha do.
