Goṭa hoṛmo do nonka tolakana je, mimitʼ hạṭińko apan ạpin jaegare tahẽkate hoṛmo tulucʼ joṛao akana. Ar mimitʼ hạṭińko tinre ṭhikleka kạmikʼa unre goṭa hoṛmoge bohokʼ reakʼ ạyurte hara idikʼa ar dulạṛte apnarre benao rakabokʼa.
Onateń meneda, Probhu ńutumteń sikhạuetʼpe kana boṅgan hoṛ jạtrenko cetʼleka bạṛicʼ cintạ talate jionko khemaoetʼkan onka do alope khemaoa.
Onkoakʼ mon do ńutre menakʼtakoa. Ar ontor keṭecʼgetakote Isor reaṅ cetʼge bako baḍaekana, ar onate onko do Isorakʼ emakʼ jion khon ạḍi sạńgińre menakʼkoa.
Onkoakʼ bibek do goṛdho akantakoa, onate bin tirpitokʼ ahkao monte joto lekan bin napaeakʼ kạmi lạgitʼ onko do lucạ lamoṭreko capaoena.
Menkhan Mạsire nonkan sikhnạt ape do bape ńamakada.
Ape do uni reaṅpe ańjomleda, ar uni tulucʼ midokʼte unire oka sạritetʼ menakʼ ona lekagepe cetʼ ocoakana.
Ar noa sikhnạtpe ńamleda je, apeakʼ pạhil cạl-colon lekaten “Mare hoṛtetʼ ” kicricʼ leka totʼ giḍikaepe, ente lilkạr reakʼ lalocte uni “Mare hoṛtetʼ ” doe bạṛijokʼkana.
Ona bodolte Isorge apeakʼ mon nawate benao rakapʼ ocowaepe,
ar Isore emakan “Nawa hoṛtet’” do nawa kicricʼ leka horokʼjoṅpe, one uni do Isor leka sạriakʼtetʼ reakʼ dhorom ar sonotreye sirjạu akan.
Onate eṛeakʼ do bạgi giḍiyakʼpe ar ape apere sạri kathako roṛpe, ente jotokoge mimitʼko sãote bon jopoṛaogea.
Arpe edre emanlen khan ona edre iạte alope kạiya; apeakʼ edre do siń cando ạuriye hạsurokʼrege cabakʼtapema,
ar Soetan hõ jãhãn ạt alope aṛakʼaea.
Kombṛoicʼ do ar aloe kombṛoe ma, bickom acʼakʼ nij tite bhageakʼ kạmikoreye khaṭaokʼma jemon okulạnan hoṛko em hạṭińako lạgitʼ tahentae.
Apeakʼ moca khon bạṛicʼ roṛ do alo oḍokokʼma, bickom jạruṛakʼre eṭakʼko benao rakapʼko lạgitʼ okaṭakʼ bhageakʼkan ona kathage oḍokokʼma, jemon okoe onako ańjom onate onkoakʼ bhạlại hoyokʼtako.
Isorren sonot Jiu do alope mon duk ocoyea, one uni hotete Isor do chaḍaokʼ reakʼ din hạbicʼ apeye mohor chap doho akatʼpe.
Sanam lekan hewer haṛhatʼ, edre, raṅgao, kạumạu ar opoman, dusṭạmi, ar sanam lekan hiskạ ape khon sahaṛ akan tahenma.
Ape apere mãyãwanko baṛe hoyokʼpe, eṭakʼkoakʼ dukte dukokʼpe, cetʼleka Isor do Mạsi hoteteye ikạ akatʼpe onkage ape hõ ape apere ipikạkʼpe.
Isorren dulạṛiạ hoponko lekate ape do Isorakʼ lek leka hoyokʼpe.
Mạsi cetʼlekae dulạṛaketʼ bon ar abon lạgitʼ Isor ńutumte jut so lạgitʼ samaṅokʼakʼ lekate acʼtetʼgeye emen, ṭhik onkage ape hõ dulạṛ horte taṛampe.
Jãhãlekan loṭghuṭi, bin napaeakʼ se laloc reakʼ kathako ape talare jemon alo ańjomokʼ, ente noako katha do Isorren hoṛkoakʼ baṅ sajaokʼa.
Ar sanam lekan lajao paṛao colon se lelha roṛ ar bạṛicʼ umtạ umti katha hõ ape talare alo hoyokʼma, ente noako do baṅ sajaokʼa. Ona khon bickom ape do Isor sarhaoepe.
Khạṭigepe baḍaea, okoeko laṭghaṭetʼkan, okoeko bin napaege ar okoekoko lalociạkokan, metakʼme okoe do boṅga sewakoko ńumogokʼkan onko do Mạsi ar Isorakʼ rajre jãhãn ạidạri bạnukʼtakoa.
Ạuṛi sạuṛi kathate okoe hõ alo jemonko bulạupe, ar eṭakʼ horte aloko idipe, ente okoe bebatao iạte onakoko kạmi onkorege Isorakʼ sạjại do paṛaokʼa.
Ar nonkan hoṛko sãote do alogepe gatekʼa,
ente pạhil do ńutrepe tahẽkana menkhan ńitokʼ do Probhurepe mitʼ akante marsaltepe hecʼakana. Marsalte perecʼ hoṛkoakʼ cetʼleka calakʼ lek kan onkage ape hõ calakʼpe,
ente sanam lekan bhạlại ar dhorom ar sạriakʼ kangea marsal reakʼ jo do.
Onate biḍạu aṭkarpe okaṭakʼ kạmi do Probhui kusikʼa mente.
Ńut reakʼ bin joanakʼ kạmikore alope seledokʼa; bickom onako reakʼ dos udukʼakope,
ente manwakoakʼ oko danaṅre kạmi akatʼ reakʼ noako katha roroṛ hõ lajao paṛaoakʼ kana.
Marsal hotete jãhãn kạmi reakʼ dos udukʼlen khan ona do sodorokʼgea,
ente marsalge jotowakʼe sodoreda. Onate sonot sostorre olakana, “Ebhenokʼme E jạpitʼ akatʼicʼ, ar gocʼko khon beretʼme; khan Mạsiye marsalama.”
Ape cetʼlekape calakʼkan ona reaṅ mońjte hudiskate ńelpe. Bebuj hoṛko leka baṅ calaokate akelanko leka calakʼpe.
Apeakʼ tire bhage kạmi reakʼ okaṭakʼ ạt menakʼ ona do purạte kạmire lagaope, ente noa piṛhi do bạṛicʼgea.
Onateń meneda, ape do bebujko alope hoyokʼa, bickom Probhuakʼ sana cetʼ kana mente ona bujhạu joṅpe.
Alope ńu bulokʼa, onate bin sambṛaokʼkope hoyokʼa. Ona khon bickom sonot Jiu tabere tahenpe,
ape do sereńko reakʼ sereńte ar sarhao sereńkote ar Jiuteakʼ õṛhẽakʼkote ape apere gapal maraope; ar apeakʼ ontorte Probhu õṛhẽ sereńaepe.
Siń sạṭupʼ aboren Probhu Jisu Mạsi ńutumte Isor Baba gun manao joharaepe.
Mạsiakʼ dewa sewakore menakʼpete ape apere tabe akan tahenpe.
E maejiuko, Probhurepe tabe akante apan ạpin jãwãe tabere tahenpe,
ente Mạsi do cetʼleka manḍerren mathakane, metakʼme acʼakʼ hoṛmo reakʼ mathakane, onkage herel hõ maejiuren matha kanae. Ona chaḍa noa hoṛmoren babańcaoicʼ do Mạsige.
Cetʼleka manḍer do Mạsiakʼ tabere menakʼa onkage maejiuko hõ jotowakʼre apan ạpin herel tabere tahen lek kanako.
E jãwãeko, Mạsi cetʼ leka manḍere dulạṛletʼ ar ona lạgitʼ apnare emen ṭhik onkage ape hõ aperen bạhuko dulạṛkope.
Jãwãeko cetʼ leka apnarakʼ hoṛmoko dulạṛetʼkan ṭhik onkage apnarren bạhuko hõ dulạṛko lek kantakoa. Rinicʼtetʼe dulạṛedekan hoṛ do apnargeye dulạṛokʼ kana.
Okoe hõ apnarakʼ hoṛmo bae hirkhạwakʼa, bickom uni do acʼakʼ hoṛmoe ạsul are jotona. Onkage Mạsi hõ acʼakʼ manḍer do ạsul are jotoneda.
Ente abon do uniakʼ hoṛmo hạṭińko kana bon.
Sonot sostorre olakana, “Noa iạtege herel do eṅgat-apat bạgikate acʼren bạhu tulucʼ mitʼakane tahena ar unkin banar do mitʼ hoṛmokin hoyokʼa.”
Noa okoakʼ do maraṅgea, menkhan iń do Mạsi ar uniakʼ manḍer reaṅ kathań roṛeda.
Menkhan ona katha do tahẽocoakʼge. Ape mimitʼko aperen bạhuko apnarleka dulạṛkope ar bạhu hõ onka leka acʼren jãwãeye manotema.
E gidrạko, Probhu cetʼlekae khojkan onkage aperen gogo-babakoakʼ bataotakope, ente ona do lek kana.
Sonot sostorre pạhilre okaṭakʼ hukum sãote gokʼakʼ menakʼ ona do noage, “Eṅgam-ạpum ganaokinme,
jemon amakʼ bhage hoyokʼtam ar dhạrtire aema din jiwetʼem tahena.”
E babako, aperen gidrạko alope ạṛis ocokoa, bickom Probhuakʼ ḍanṭao ar sikhạunate hara burukope.
E golamko, ape do Mạsirepe gobol akante botor ar manot seletʼ ontor khon niạ dhạrtiren kisạ̃ṛkoakʼ batao takope.
Hoṛ kusi ocoko lạgitʼ aperen kisạ̃ṛkoakʼ mẽtʼãhã samaṅre alope gobolokʼa; ona khon bickom Mạsiren golam leka Isorakʼ monsubạ do mon ar ontorte manaote aperen kisạ̃ṛko ṭhen tabekʼpe.
Ente manwa ṭhen golam do bape khaṭaokʼ kana menkhan Probhu ṭhenge ar ona hudiskate rạskạ monte aperen kisạ̃ṛko ṭhen khaṭaokʼpe, entepe baḍaegea,
mimitʼ hoṛ jãhãnakʼ bogeye kạmi khan onage Probhu ṭhen khon kuṛạiye ńama, baṅ doe golam kan ar baṅ doe sạdhinicʼ kan.

E kisạ̃ṛko, aperen golamko sãote ape hõ ṭhik onkage beoharpe. Onko do botor alope udukʼakoa, entepe baḍaegea, onko ar aperen doe ini mitʼ Probhu kangeae ar uni do sermare menaea; uniakʼ mẽtʼãhã samaṅre do jotogeko somangea.
Sarecʼ katha do nõkʼõe, Probhu sãote mitʼakae tahẽkate uni emakʼ maraṅ daṛete daṛeanko hoyokʼpe.
Lạṛhại lạgitʼ Isorakʼ sanam saj-bajko horokʼ joṅpe, jemon Soetanakʼ joto lekan phor phundikorepe teṅgo daram daṛeakʼ.

Aboakʼ noa lạṛhại do jãhãe manwa birudre do baṅkana, bickom ona do ńut rajosṭi reakʼ joto lekan cakʼlaoko ar ektiạrianko birudre, ńut dhạrtiren daṛean jiuko birudre, ar coṭren joto bạṛicʼ jiuko birudre.
Onate ape do lạṛhại lạgitʼ Isore emakan sanam saj-bajko horokʼ joṅpe, jemon Soetane hạnlepere unipe teṅgo daram daṛeae arpe bhagaoete teṅgo ṭak akanpe tahen.
Onate sạriakʼte ḍanḍa paṭhe keṭejokʼte, koṛam rukhiyạ lạgitʼ dhorom jionte koṛam aḍkate,
suluk reakʼ bhage sombat porcar lạgitʼ jaṅga sapṛaokate teṅgo ṭak akan tahenpe.
Ona chaḍa pạtiạu reakʼ ḍhal hõ sapʼ joṅpe; ona ḍhalte Soetanakʼ joto lekan seṅgel sarkope ĩṛĩcʼ daṛeakʼa.
Ar bańcaokʼ lạgitʼ bohokʼ reakʼ aḍonakʼ hatao joṅpe ar sonot Jiu reakʼ tarwaṛege, metakʼme Isorakʼ katha ataṅ joṅpe.
Sonot Jiu hotete ạyur ocokʼte mon ar ontorte jao ghuṛi koejoṅpe. Onate jagwar akae tahente Isorren sanam hoṛko lạgitʼ mitʼ talao koejoṅre jamaṛ akae tahenpe.
Iń lạgitʼ hõ koejoṅpe jemon kathań roṛre Isor do nonkan pạrsiye emạń jemon dil salakʼ uniakʼ bhage sombat reakʼ sạri okoakʼkoń porcar daṛeakʼ.
Noa bhage sombat porcar lạgitʼ iń do sikṛi akan raj paṭhaona kạnạń. Koejoṅpe jemon hajotre tahen jokhecʼ cetʼleka bhage sombat porcar reakʼ lek kantiń onkage dil salakʼ onań porcar daṛeakʼ.
Cetʼleka minạńa ar ińakʼ dinko cetʼ leka paromokʼkan ona do dulạṛiạ boeha ar Probhure pạtiạu akan sapʼ dapʼicʼ Tukhikus ṭhenpe baḍae daṛeakʼa.
Ar ale reaṅ jemonpe baḍae daṛeakʼ ar uni jemon udgạue emape onate iń do ape ṭheniń kolkedea.
Isor Baba ar Probhu Jisu Mạsi do boehako suluk, pạtiạu, are dulạṛpema.
Aboren Probhu Jisu Mạsire okoekoakʼ bin mucạtʼ dulạṛ menakʼ onko sanamkore Isorakʼ daya baṛe tahenma.
Timothi ar iń Pạul do Jisu Mạsiren golam kanaliń. Ạliń do Jisu Mạsi tulucʼ kolom mitʼ akan Isorren okoeko hoṛ do Philipi nagrahare menakʼko onkoren gupiko ar sapʼdapʼko ṭhenliń oleda.
Aboren Isor Baba ar Probhu Jisu Mạsi do daya ar suluke dan apema.
Iń do tinạkʼ dhao apeakʼ kathań disại unạkʼ dhaoge ińren Isoriń sarhao edekana.
Ape lạgitʼ iń koejoṅre jao ghuṛi rạskạ salakʼ iń koejoṅ kana,
ente Jisu Mạsi reaṅ bhage sombat porcar kạmire ape do etohopʼ khon ńit hạbicʼpe goṛo ạguyạń kana.
Noa pạtiạu menakʼtińạ, apeakʼ ontorre okoe bhage kạmiye ehopʼakatʼ uni do Mạsi Jisuakʼ hijukʼ din hạbicʼ onae calao iditeye mucạda.

Ape sanamko lạgitʼ ińakʼ monejoṅakʼ do nonka leka hoyokʼge lek kana, ente ape do ińren dulạṛiạko kanape. Iń do hajotreń tahen se bhage sombatreń roṛ dogokʼre hõ ona reakʼ sạritetʼ iń gohayeda, ar onate ape sanamko iń tulucʼ Isorakʼ dayaren bhạgiạdarkope hoyokʼ kana.
Mạsi Jisuakʼ mãyã monte ape tinạkʼ iń dulạṛetʼpe ona reakʼ goha do Isorge.
Iń do noageń koejoṅ kana apeakʼ dulạṛ do jemon akel ar bud salakʼ hara idikʼtape.
E boehako, ińakʼ monejoṅakʼ do ape jemonpe baḍae daṛeakʼ, ińre oka hoeakan ona khạtirte bhage sombat porcar reakʼ kạmiko do arhõ laha idikʼkana.
Onate nonḍe raj dolanren palṭonko ar eṭakʼ sanamkoko baḍae daṛeada je, Mạsi iạte iń do hajotre minạńa.
Ona chaḍa noa hajotre minạń khạtirte ḍher boehakoge Probhure arhõ bạ̃ṛti ṭehãḍokʼko cetʼakada ar onate onko do begor botorokʼte Isorakʼ katha porcar lạgitʼ arhõ dilankoko hoeakana.
Onko modre adomko do hiskạ ar dola doli monte Mạsi reaṅko porcareda, menkhan eṭakʼko do bhage monsubạtegeko kạmikana.
Noko hoṛkoakʼ monre dulạṛ menakʼte Mạsi reaṅko porcareda, ente onkoko baḍaea, bhage sombat reakʼ katha lạlại lạgitʼge iń doń bachao ocoakana.
Menkhan onko pạhil dolren hoṛko do akoakʼ sartho lạgitʼ Mạsi reaṅko porcareda, jãhãn bhage monsubạ iạte do baṅ. Onko doko monejoṅ kana, ińakʼ bondi dosare onko do dukko emdaṛeạńạ mente.

Menkhan onate do cetʼ cekakʼa? Asol katha do hoyokʼ kana, jãhã baṅ jãhãlekatege Mạsi reaṅ porcarokʼ kan baṅ do eṛeakʼ lạgitʼ ar baṅ do sạriakʼ lạgitʼ; onatege ińakʼ rạskạ do. Ar ińakʼ noa rạskạ do tisge baṅ mucạdokʼa,
ente ińiń baḍaea, iń cetanre oka hoeakan ona reakʼ mucạtʼ jo do hoyokʼ kana bańcaokʼ; ar ona do apeakʼ koejoṅ hotete ar Jisu Mạsiren Jiu hotetege hoyokʼa.

Ińakʼ purạ biswạs menakʼtińạ je, okaṭakʼte hõ iń do bạń lajao ocokʼa, bickom dil menakʼtińạ, cetʼleka lahate iń hotete Mạsiakʼ ṭhonok sodorokʼkan tahẽkan onkage ńitokʼ hõ hoyokʼa baṅ doń gujukʼ ar baṅ doń jiwedokʼ;
ente iń lạgitʼ jion do hoyokʼ kana Mạsige ar moron do porhotetʼ.
Menkhan jiwetʼgeń tahen khan enḍekhan ona do nonkan mitʼṭen kạmi reakʼ ạte imạńa jemon bhage jo hoyokʼtiń. Ar okaṭakʼ iń bachao joṅa ona do bạń baḍaea.
Banarge iń doe oreń kana. Iń do gujukʼte Mạsi tulucʼ tahen sanań kana, ente ona do artetʼge bhagea.
Enhõ ape lạgitʼ bańcao tahen do arhõ bạ̃ṛti jạruṛtińa.
Khạṭigeń baḍaea iń do jiwetʼ iń tahena ar ape sanamko sãotegeń tahena, jemon apeakʼ biswạs harakʼtape ar onatepe rạskạkʼ.
Onate ape talare arhõń hijukʼte ape do Mạsi Jisu hotete iń khạtirte rạskạtepe perejokʼa.

Joto khon maraṅ katha do hoyokʼ kana, ape do nonka leka jion khemaope one okaṭakʼte Mạsi reaṅ bhage sombat reakʼ lek kan. Enḍekhan iń apnarte hecʼkateń ńelpe se sạṅgiń khon apeakʼ kathań ańjom, ar iń baḍae baṅma, ape do mitʼ Jiurepe teṅgo ṭak akana mente ar bhage sombat hotete okaṭakʼ biswạs hijukʼkan ona lạgitʼ mitʼtepe khaṭaokʼ kana.
Okoe ape birudre menakʼko onkoakʼ okaṭakʼtege ape do alope botorokʼa. Ar noatege sạbudokʼa, onko do nosṭokʼ secʼko calakʼ kana ar ape do bańcao secʼ; ar noa bańcao do Isor ṭhen khonge hijukʼ kana.
Ape do eken Mạsirepe biswạs akante dayape ńam akada ona do baṅ, menkhan ona lạgitʼ duk jojom reakʼ daya hõpe emocoakana.
Cetʼleka haron kosṭo sahaope ńṭoṭhadiń ar ńitokʼ hõ ona reaṅ okape ańjometʼkan, ape hõ inạ mitʼ lekan haron kosṭoregepe jopoṛao akana.

Enḍekhan Mạsi tulucʼpe kolom mitʼakan iạte uskur mon ńamokʼkan khan, ar Mạsiakʼ dulạṛ iạte jiwire juḍạsi ńamokʼkan khan, sonot Jiu ar ape talare helmel menakʼ khan, apeakʼ ontorre mãyã ar daya menakʼ khan,
enḍekhan nonkate ińakʼ rạskạ purạutińpe, ar ape sanamkoakʼ mon mitʼakae tahenma, ape mimitʼko dupulạṛpe ar mitʼ jiwi ar mitʼ monokʼpe.
Apnarakʼ porho lạgitʼ se michạ bạḍạite cetʼ hõ alope cekaya, bickom nindhạn monte eṭakʼko apnar khon soros mente bujhạukope.
Eken apnar eskar lạgitʼ do alo, bickom mimitʼ hoṛ etạkʼ hoṛko lạgitʼ hõ dạndikʼpe.
Jisu Mạsiakʼ oka monsubạ tahẽkan apeakʼ ontorre hõ ona jemon tahen.
Ente uni do Isor reakʼ rupane tahẽkanre Isor barabari tahen do luṭjoṅakʼ bae metatʼa.
Bickom uni do golam reakʼ rupe hatawante manwa lekate janamkate acʼ doe khạliyena.
Ona chaḍa manwa rup hataokate gujukʼ hạbicʼ, metakʼme krusre gujukʼ hạbicʼe bataoketʼte uni do nindhạngeye tahẽyena.
Ar onatege Isor do sanam khon cetanreye dohokedea ar nonkan mitʼṭen ńutume emadea one ona do joto ńutum khon maraṅge,
jemon sermarenko, dhạrtirenko ar ot latarreko tahenkan mitʼke mitʼkoakʼ gunṭhi do Jisu samaṅre ikhṛumokʼtako,
ar mitʼke mitʼ alaṅko aṅgocma je, Isor Babawakʼ ṭhonok lạgitʼ Jisu Mạsigeye Probhu kanae mente.

E ińren dulạṛiạ boehako, ape do jaogepe batao ạguakatʼa. Ar eken sãoreń tahẽkan oktere do baṅ, menkhan biseskaete ńit bạnuńre hõ botor ar thar tharaokʼ salakʼ apeakʼ kạmiko talate udugpe je, kại khon bańcaope ńamakada mente.
Isor do apeakʼ monre nonkae kạmikana one onate uniye kusikʼ onkan kạmi reakʼ monsubạ ar daṛe hecʼape.
Ape do begor karacʼ kurucʼ ar begor rapṭha rạpṭhite jotowakʼ kạmipe,
jemon bin dusạn ar khạṭipe hoedaṛeakʼ ar niạ peṛta piṛhiren bạṛicʼ hoṛko talare Isorren niphuṭ gidrạkope hoedaṛeakʼ.
Ape do onko hoṛko jion reakʼ kathape neakokante noa dhạrtire ipil lekape jolokʼkana. Onate Mạsiakʼ dinreń sarhao daṛeakʼa je, ińakʼ kurumuṭu ar mehnot do baṅ ạuṛiakʼ akana.
Oka biswạs reakʼ samaṅokʼakʼte Isorpe sewawaekan onare ińakʼ mãyãm do dãṛẽ mente coḍorlen khan hõń kusikokʼa ar ape tulucʼ iń rạskạkokʼa.
Onkage ape hõ iń tulucʼ kusi ar rạskạre seledokʼ lek kanape.
Asokʼ kạnạń, Probhu Jisuakʼ sana hoelen khan ạḍi usạrage ape ṭhen Timothiyiń kolea, jemon apeakʼ sombat ńamkate iń hõ monre uskuriń ńam.
Iń sãote nonkan ar okoe hõ bạnukʼkoa, one okoe do Timothi leka ape lạgitʼ sạrigeko dạndikokʼ.
Ente eṭakʼ sanamkoge Jisu Mạsi reakʼakʼko ńam baṅkate apnar reakʼakʼko ńam baṛakana.
Menkhan apepe baḍaegea, Timothi do acʼakʼ pạtiạrtetʼe sạbud akada, ente cetʼleka gidrạ do apat tulucʼe kạmiyetʼkan onkage uni do iń tulucʼ Jisu Mạsi reaṅ bhage sombat porcar kạmireye khaṭao akana.
Onate ińakʼ dosa cetʼ hoyokʼa mente baḍae torage uni kolkae iń asokʼkana.
Probhure noa pạtiạu menakʼtińạ je, iń apnar hõ usạrategeń hijukʼa.

Iń do Epaphraditus ape ṭhen kole lạgitʼ jạruṛiń bujhạukeda. Uni do ińren pạtiạricʼ boeha kanae. Ạliń do mitʼtege liń kạmikana ar Mạsi lạgitʼ liń lạṛhại kana. Ape do sapʼdapʼicʼ lekate ińakʼ jạruṛokʼakʼko meṭao lạgitʼ unige iń ṭhenpe kolledea.
Uni do sanamkoe uihạretʼpe kanteń kol ruạṛedekana. Ona chaḍa uniye ruạ kạhillen reakʼ kathape ańjomletʼ iạte uni do ạḍiye andesale akan tahẽkana.
Sạrige uni do gujukʼ dạkhilgeye ruạ kạhillena, menkhan Isor do uniye mãyã akawadea ar eken uni eskargeye daya akawadea ona do baṅ, uni do iń hõe daya akawạdińa jemon duk cetan duk aloń ńam.
Onate ạḍi jidkateń kolekana jemon unipe ńel ruạṛte arhõpe rạskạkʼ ar iń hõ aloń mon dukokʼ.
Ona iạte Probhuren hoṛ lekate ạḍi rạskạ salakʼ ataṅ daramepe, ar nonkan hoṛ do manotkope.
Mạsiakʼ kạmi lạgitʼ uni do gujukʼ dạkhille hoelena. Ar hạjir bape tahẽkante iń lạgitʼ oka bape ceka daṛeakatʼ tahẽkan ona lạgitʼ uni do acʼakʼ jiwi sudhạ emokʼ hõ rạjigeye tahẽkana.
E ińren boehako, mucạtʼreń meneda, Probhu tulucʼ jopoṛao menakʼpete rạskạkʼpe. Ape ṭhen inạ kathage olape do bạń ạṛisokʼ kana, ar sontorpe lạgitʼ ona do bhagegea.
Onko setako khon, metakʼme okoe bạṛicʼakʼko kạmikan ar khatna ocokʼ lạgitʼko ãṭokʼkan onko khon sontorokʼpe!
Abo kangeabon sạriakʼren khatna akan hoṛ do, ente abo do Isorren Jiu hotete uni bon sewawae kana ar Mạsi Jisu iạte bon sarhaokʼ kana ar apnarre do babon bhorsakʼ kana.
Iń do iạkhạ apnarreń bhorsa daṛekokʼgea. Menkhan jãhãe eṭakʼ hoṛ apnarre bhorsa menakʼtaea menteye hudisetʼ khan, uni doe baḍaema, iń do uni khon hõ bạ̃ṛti jạruṛ menakʼtińạ.
Irạl mãhã hilokʼre iń doń khatna ocolena; Israel bõsren Benjamin khũṭreń janamakana; iń do mitʼṭen khạṭi Ibri hoṛ kangeạń; ar Moseakʼ ạn-ạriko manaore do mitʼṭen Phạrusi hoṛge;
dhorom secʼte nonkan bạṛicʼ hoṛiń tahẽkana je, Mạsiakʼ manḍerrenkoń khedetʼkokan tahẽkana; ar Isor samaṅre dhoromicʼ hoyokʼ reakʼ aste Moseakʼ ạn-ạriko manaore okoe hõ bako dusiledińa.
Menkhan okako iń lạgitʼ lab tahẽkan onako do ńitokʼ Mạsi khạtirte lokshangeń bujhạueda.

Sạrige okoe lạgitʼ noako lokshaniń bujhạu akatʼ uni ińren Probhu Jisu Mạsi baḍaeyere oka asambheṛ bhor menakʼ, uni ńutumte jotowakʼge lokshan menteń hudiseda. Mạsi jemoniń lab daṛeae ar Mạsire jemoniń ńel ńamokʼ, onate onako do mạilạ lekań bujhạueda.
Ạn-ạrikoń manaoetʼte dhoromiń hoeakana ona do baṅ, menkhan Mạsire biswạs khạtirte Isor do dhorom menteye ataṅ akadińạ. Noa dhorom do Isor ṭhen khonge hecʼakana ar biswạsre ṭehãḍokʼ kana.

Iń do Mạsi baḍaeye sanań kana ar oka daṛe hotete gocʼko khone jiwetʼ beretʼ ocolen ona hõ baḍae sanań kana. Iń do uniakʼ duk sasetre bhạgiạdar hoyokʼ sanayediń kana. Ar oka monsubạteye gocʼlen iń hõ onkan monsubạge ńańam sanayediń kana.
Onate jãhãnakʼge hoyokʼ iń do khạṭige gocʼko khoniń jiwetʼ beretʼ ruạṛ ocokʼa.
Oka lạgitʼ iń kurumuṭukan ona do ńitgeń ńamakada se purạteń lab akada onka do baṅ. Menkhan oka lạgitʼ Jisu Mạsiye sapʼledeń ona sapʼ tiog lạgitʼge iń doń khudạu idikana.
Ona iạte dhorom secʼte okoe bon laha idikʼkan abo do inạ mitʼ monejoṅakʼge tahen lek tabona. Ar jãhãnakʼ reaṅ eṭakʼ lekape moneyetʼ khan Isor do ona hõe udukʼapea.
Metakʼme, abo do dhoromokʼ lạgitʼ tinạkʼ hạbicʼ bon laha idiakan inạ dharatege taṛam idi lek tabona.
E boehako, ape sanamko iń leka baṛe calakʼpe, ar okoe nonkako calakʼkan onko ńel oromkakope. Ar cetʼlekape calakʼa ona dole udukʼ akawatʼpea.
Iń do aema dhaoiń lại akawatʼpea ar ńitokʼ hõ mẽtʼdakʼ joro joroteń lạiape kana, nonkan aema hoṛ menakʼkoa one okoe do Mạsiakʼ krusren bạiri lekako colonetʼkan.
Onkoakʼ mucạtʼtetʼ do nosṭokʼge; lacʼgetako Isor do; ar oka do lajao paṛawakʼkan onatege onko doko sarhaokʼ kana; onko do eken dhạrti reakʼakʼkogeko moneakʼ kana.
Menkhan aboakʼ rajosṭi do sermare; one onḍe khon abo do aboren babańcaoicʼ Probhu Jisu Mạsiakʼ hijukʼ bon ńel hohorkan.
Uni do aboakʼ nijorte perecʼ hoṛmoe pherao tabona ar acʼakʼ ṭhonokanakʼ hoṛmo lekae hoe ocoea. Ar oka daṛete jotowakʼko acʼakʼ gobolreye ạguyetʼkan ona daṛetege uni do noae kạmiya.
E boehako, iń do apeń dulạṛetʼpea ariń uihạretʼpea. Apege ińakʼ rạskạ, ar apege ińakʼ jitạukʼ reakʼ mala. E dulạṛiạko ape do Probhure teṅgo ṭak akae tahenpe.
Euodiạ ar Suntukh, iń do biseskaete noań nehõraben kana, Probhu tulucʼ ben kolom mitʼ akante aben do mitʼ mon akae jemon ben tahen.

E sạri juri ãrãṛtiń am hõń nehõram kana, am do nukin maejiu goṛowạkinme. Unkin do Mạsi reaṅ bhage sombat iạte iń tulucʼ, ar Klement ar ińren eṭakʼ são kạmiyạko tulucʼ kosṭokin sahao akada. Nokoakʼ ńutum do jion reakʼ puthire olakana.
Probhurepe kolom mitʼakante ape do jaoge rạskạkʼpe. Arhõń mena, rạskạkʼpe baṛe.
Apeakʼ mạ̃hirtetʼ do sanamko ṭhen baḍaeokʼma. Probhu do usạrageye daraekana.
Jãhãnakʼ reakʼge alope dandokʼa, bickom apeakʼ joto arojko do koejoṅ ar nehõrate gunmanao johar salakʼ Isor baḍae ocoyepe.
Ona iạte, Isorakʼ okaṭakʼ suluk reakʼ katha manwa do hudiskate hõ bako bujhạu daṛeakʼkan, ona suluk do Mạsi Jisu hotete apeakʼ mon ar ontore rukhiyạitapea.

E boehako, mucạtʼre noageń mena, okaṭakʼ sạriakʼkan, okaṭakʼ do lek anakʼkan, okaṭakʼ do niphuṭ ar khạṭige, okaṭakʼ do mońjge, okaṭakʼ do manot ńam lek kan, metakʼme okaṭakʼ do bhageakʼkan ar sarhao ńamokʼ, onako secʼ moneakʼpe.
Ape do iń ṭhen khon okaṭakʼpe cetʼakatʼ ar bhage mentepe ataṅ akatʼ ar ińre okaṭakʼpe ńelakat̕, ar ińakʼ mocate okaṭakʼpe ańjomakatʼ, onkage kạmipe. Enḍekhan sulukren Isor do ape tulucʼe tahena.
Probhure ạḍitetʼgeń rạskạkʼ kana, ente ḍher din tayom ape do arhõpe disạ ruạṛkedińa. Sạrige ape do iń lạgitʼ jaogepe dạndikʼkan tahẽkana, menkhan ona ńel ocoetape lạgitʼ ạt do bape ńamleda.
Ińakʼ jãhãn ṭonṭa iạte noa kathań roṛeda ona do baṅ, ente jãhã dosaregeń tahen inạrege kusi tahen iń cetʼakawana.
Ṭonṭare ar sareṛokʼre hõ iń do sanamakʼren hitạu akan hoṛ kạnạń. Jombikʼre ar reṅgejokʼre, ar sareṛokʼre se ṭonṭakʼre hõ cetʼleka kusi tahen jạruṛa ona doń baḍaegea.
Ar okoe daṛeye imạńkan uni hotetege iń do jotowakʼiń kạmi daṛeakʼ kana.
Enhõ ape do ińakʼ duk sasetre bhạgiạdar hoeakantepe bhage akada.

E Philipi manḍerren hoṛko, ape hõpe baḍaegea, bhage sombat lại saḍe reakʼ etohopʼre Makedoniạ khoniń oḍok calaolenre, ape eskar chaḍakate oka manḍerrenko hõ emokʼ ar hatao babotre iń tulucʼ bako bhạgiạrilena.
Ar Thessalonikiạreń tahẽkanre hõ ape do mitʼ bar dhaope goṛowạdiń tahẽkante ińakʼ reṅgecʼpe purunletʼtińạ.
Jãhãn daniń khojokʼ kana ona do baṅ, menkhan nonkan jotetʼ geń asokʼ kana one oka do ape ńutumte doho jarwa idikʼ.

Ińakʼ jotogeń ńam caba akada. Ar ińakʼ oka jạruṛ ona khon hõ bạ̃ṛti menakʼtińạ. Ephaphroditus tite apeakʼ daniń ńamketʼte ińakʼ do ḍher hoeakantińạ. Noa danko do mońj so reakʼ mahkaokʼ ar samaṅoakʼge,
ar noate Isor doe kusikʼ kana. Ińren Isor do acʼakʼ ṭhonokte perecʼ dhon lekate Mạsi Jisu hotete apeakʼ joto ṭonṭae cabaetapea.
Aboren Baba ar Isorakʼge ṭhonok hoyokʼtae ma jug cetan jug hạbicʼ. Amen.
Mạsi Jisu tulucʼ jopoṛao menakʼko Isorren mimitʼ hoṛ ińakʼ johar emakope. Iń soṅgere okoe boehako menakʼko onko hõ apeko joharape kana.
Isorren sanam hoṛko okoe do nonḍe menakʼko, asokaete Kạisạr oṛakʼren hoṛko do apeko joharape kana.
Probhu Jisu Mạsiakʼ daya apeakʼ ontorre baṛe tahenma.

Sermare ape lạgitʼ okaṭakʼ jogao dohoakan ona ńam reakʼ as khonge ape talare noa pạtiạu ar dulạṛ do janamakana. Ar okaṭakʼ bhage sombat, metakʼme sạri katha ape ṭhen seṭer akan ona hotetege ape do noa as reakʼ kathape ańjom akada.

Noa bhage sombat do goṭa dhạrtire pasnaoente jokʼ kana ar dinke din baḍhao idikʼ kana. Ar oka hilokʼ noa bhage sombatpe ańjomketʼ ar Isorakʼ daya reakʼ katha sạri mentepe baḍaeketʼ enhilokʼ khon ṭhik onkage ona do ape talare hõ kạmikʼ kana.
Ona bhage sombat reakʼ katha do ạlińren dulạṛiạ Epaphrase ṭhenpe ańjomakada. Uni do ape lạgitʼ Mạsiren mitʼṭen pạtiạr sapʼdapʼicʼ kanae.
Sonot Jiu do dulạṛ reakʼ okaṭakʼ mone danakatʼpe ona reaṅ Epaphrase do ạlińe baḍae ocoakatʼlińa.
Onate ape reaṅ ańjom tayom khonge ạliń do jao ghuṛi ape lạgitʼ liń koejoṅ kana. Jiuteakʼ akel ar bud salakʼ Isorakʼ monejoṅakʼ jemon purạtepe bujhạu daṛeakʼ onate Isor ṭhenliń khojkana.
Onate boge kạmikote bhage jope jokʼte Isor do arhõ jemon mońjtepe baḍae daṛeae; ar nonkate jotowakʼre Probhupe kusi ocoyete unire lek lekape colon.
Ente uni do ńut reakʼ rajosṭi khone bańcaoketʼbonte acʼren dulạṛiạ Hoponakʼ rajosṭiteye ucạṛ ạguketʼbona.
Hopon tulucʼ bon kolom mitʼakante abo dobon chaḍao ocoakana, metakʼme kại ikạ bon ńam akada.
Nui Hopon kangea bin ńelokʼ kan Isorren muṭhạntetʼ do. Ar unige sanamakʼ ạuri sirjạureye tahẽkana ar sanam sirjon cetanre unigeye mạlik kana.

Ente sermare ar otre, oka ńelokʼkan ar oka baṅ ńelokʼ kan, jotowakʼge uni hotete sirjạu akana. Siṅghạsonkoge cetʼ, rajosṭikoge cetʼ, baṅ do rajkoge, baṅ do ektiạriankoge sanamakʼ do uni hotete uni lạgitʼge sirjạu akana.
Uni do sanamakʼko khon laharen kanae ar unirege jotowakʼ do ṭarhao mitʼakana.
Ona chaḍa unige acʼakʼ hoṛmoren, metakʼme manḍerren matha kanae. Unige pạhilicʼ ar unige pạhilre gocʼko khone jiwetʼ beretʼena, jemon unige jotowakʼren maraṅicʼe hoedaṛeakʼ.
Isor doe goṭaletʼa jemon acʼakʼ joto lekanakʼ perecʼtetʼ Mạsire tahen.

Ona chaḍa dhạrirege cetʼ ar sermarege cetʼ, Mạsi hotete jotowakʼge acʼ tulucʼ samge ocoye goṭaleda. Mạsi do krusre acʼakʼ mãyãme danketʼte suluke ạguketʼa ar onate Isor tulucʼ manwakoakʼ noa samge do hoeakana.
Sedae do Isor ṭhen khon pharakrepe tahẽkana ar uni birudre apeakʼ monre bạiripe tahẽkana. Apeakʼ bạṛicʼ kạmiko hotete ona do sodor akana.
Menkhan Mạsiakʼ gujukʼte uniakʼ hoṛmo hotete Isor do ńitokʼ acʼ tulucʼe mitʼ akatʼpea, jemon uni do sonot, niphuṭ ar bin dusạnko mente acʼ samaṅreye teṅgo ṭarhao ocope.

Onate Mạsi reaṅ bhage sombat khon oka sạri aspe ńamakatʼ ona khon alo pharakokʼte pạtiạure teṅgo ṭarhao akae tahenpe. Ona bhage sombat do goṭa dhạrtire lại jạhir akana ar ape do onape ańjom akada. Ar iń Pạul do noa bhage sombatren porcaricʼ iń hoeakana.
Ape lạgitʼ oka duk sasetiń jometʼkan onate iń doń rạskạkʼ kana. Mạsiakʼ hoṛmo reakʼ, metatʼme manḍerko lạgitʼ uniakʼ oka duk saset ńit hõ sarecʼ menakʼ ona do ińakʼ hoṛmoreń purạueda.
Isor do acʼakʼ katha ape ṭhen purạte porcar reakʼ bhar ińreye emakatʼte iń do manḍerren mitʼṭen sapʼdapʼicʼ iń hoeakana.
Isorakʼ kathare okaṭakʼ sạri okoakʼ sedaeren hoṛko ṭhen jug jug khon okoge tahẽkan, ńitokʼ acʼren hoṛko ṭhen ona do sodor akana.

Isor doe khojkana, boṅgan hoṛ jạtrenko talare hõ uniakʼ noa sạri okoakʼ reakʼ maraṅ ṭhonok cetʼkana mente, ona jemon acʼren sanam hoṛko baḍae daṛeakʼ. Ona sạriakʼ do noage, Mạsi do apeakʼ ontorre menaete uniakʼ ṭhonok ńam reakʼpe asakana.
Ale do uni Mạsi reaṅle porcareda, metakʼme Isorakʼ asambheṛ akel salakʼ mimitʼ hoṛle sontoretʼkoa arle cetʼako kana, jemon Mạsi hotetele purun daṛeako.
Ar noa monsubạge Isorakʼ oka maraṅ daṛe ińreye kạmikan ona daṛe lekate iń do ạḍitetʼiń khaṭaokʼ kana.
Iń doń menjoṅ kana jemonpe baḍae baṅma, iń do ape lạgitʼ ar Laodikiạ nagraha reakʼ manḍerren hoṛko lạgitʼ, ar okoe bako ńṭoṭhadiń onko sanamko lạgitʼ ạḍiń khaṭaokʼ kana mente.

Ińakʼ monejoṅakʼ do noage jemon onko do ontorre udgạuko ńamte dulạṛreko tol midokʼ, ar Mạsi reaṅko bujhạute oka khạṭitetʼ ńamokʼ ona reaṅ purạ khạṭitetʼ jemon asambheṛko lab joṅ. Ar ona khạtirte Isorakʼ sạri okoakʼko, metakʼme Mạsiko baḍae orom daṛeaea.
Mạsirege sanam lekan bud ar akelko oko menakʼa.
Iń do noa kathań metapekana jemon okoe hõ ạuṛiakʼ kathakote bhul horte aloko ạnḍicʼ idipe.
Iń do hoṛmo secʼte hạjir bạnuńre hõ Jiu secʼte doń hạjirgea ar apeakʼ bhage cạl-colon ar Mạsire apeakʼ kajaktetʼ ńeletʼteń rạskạkʼ kana.
Ape do cetʼleka Jisu Mạsi Probhu mentepe ataṅakade onkage uni tulucʼ mitʼ tahente jion khemaope.
Mạsire rehedokʼte unire benao rakabokʼpe. Ar cecetʼakʼ ńamkate okape pạtiạu akan onarege kajak akan tahenpe ar jao okte Isor gun manao joharaepe.

Sontor akae tahenpe, jemon okoe hõ hoṛakʼ bidiyạ ar ạuṛi lilkạrte aloe siboṛpema. Mạsi tulucʼ ona cecetʼakʼ reakʼ do jãhãn jurige bạnukʼa; manwakoakʼ ạri-cạli ar dhạrti reakʼ ạḍi lekan ạn-ạrirege ona do ṭehãḍokʼ kana.
Isorakʼ goṭa perecʼtetʼ do Mạsiakʼ hoṛmo rupteye girobasokʼ kana, ar Mạsi tulucʼpe kolom mitʼakante ape hõ ona perecʼtetʼpe ńamakada.
Uni do serma cetanren sanam cakʼlaoko ar ektiạrikoren matha kanae.

Ona chaḍa ape do Mạsi tulucʼpe kolom mitʼakante khatna hõpe khatna ocoakana. Jãhãe manwa tite do bape khatna ocoakana, Mạsi acʼgeye khatna akatʼpea; metakʼme hoṛmore jel reakʼ oka daṛe tahẽkan ona daṛe khon uni doe chaḍao akatʼpea.
Bạptisma hotete Mạsi tulucʼpe topa ocoakana; ona do baṅ, menkhan okoe gocʼko khon Mạsiye jiwetʼ beretʼkede uni Isorakʼ daṛere pạtiạu hotete ape hõ Mạsi tulucʼpe jiwetʼ ocoakana.
Kại ar bin khatna iạte ape do gocʼgepe tahẽkana, menkhan Isor do Mạsi sãoteye jiwetʼketʼpea. Uni do aboakʼ joto ghạṭkoe ikạketʼ tabona,
ar abo birudre oka dolel olakan tahẽkan ona reakʼ jotowakʼe meṭaokeda. Ona dolel do krusre khil jalatʼketʼteye bạtil giḍikada.
Uni do sanam bạṛicʼ rajosṭiko ar ektiạriankoakʼ daṛeye cabaketʼa. Nonkate uni do Mạsiakʼ krus hotete onko cetanreye jitạuena ar jotoko samaṅre onkoe bemanot ocoketʼkoa.
Onate jom-ńu se jãhãn dhorom porob babot reakʼ se ambas reakʼ se jirạukʼ mãhãko reakʼ okoe hõ aloko bicạrpe ma.
Onako do darakan dinkore oka hoyokʼ ona reakʼ umultetʼ kana, menkhan oka sạrikan ona do Mạsirege menakʼa.

Okoe apnarakʼ hoṛmore kosṭoko emetʼkan ar serma goḍet sewawako reakʼ jạruṛko bujhạuetʼkan onko do apeakʼ jit siropa ńamokʼ horre tạkicʼakʼ jemon aloko hoeocoe. Nonkan hoṛ do okako ńelakat̕ menteko hudisetʼkan ona reaṅ ạḍi maraṅ maraṅ kathako roṛa ar ạuṛi bạḍạiteko phulạukʼa, ente onkoakʼ mon do jel reakʼ sanare gobol akantakoa.
Onko do kajakte mathatetʼ, metakʼme Jisu Mạsi do bako sapʼ dohoyede kana, menkhan ona matha reakʼ ạyurte goṭa hoṛmo do jaṅ ar jel reakʼ tol midokʼkante Isorakʼ sana leka hara idikʼkana.
Mạsi tulucʼpe gocʼente ape do dhạrti reakʼ aema lekan ạri-cạli khonpe pharak akana, menkhan enrehõ dhạrtiren hoṛko leka cedakʼ arhõ dhạrti reakʼ ạri-cạlirepe gobolokʼ kana?

Ar noako ạri-cạli ńelokʼte do akelte perecʼakʼ lekage bujhạukʼa, ente cetʼ leka sewae hoyokʼa, cetʼleka apnarte huḍińokʼ hoyokʼa, cetʼleka apnarakʼ hoṛmo kosṭo emokʼ hoyokʼa, ona do noa ạri-cạlikoe baḍae ocokoa, menkhan jel reakʼ sana koboj lạgitʼ noako do oka kaj reakʼ hõ baṅkana.
Mạsi tulucʼ gocʼko khonpe jiwetʼ beretʼ ocoyen khan, enḍekhan Mạsi one sermare Isorakʼ jojomsa aṛereye duṛupʼ akan ona coṭ reakʼakʼko baṛe ńam baṛaepe.
Ot reakʼko do baṅ bickom coṭ reakʼakʼkoge moneakʼpe.
Ente ape dope gocʼena ar apeakʼ jion do Mạsi tulucʼ Isorre oko menakʼa.
Okoe doe aperen jion kan uni Mạsiye sodorlenre ape hõ uni tulucʼ uniakʼ ṭhonokren bhạgiạdarko mentepe sodorokʼa.
Onate apeakʼ jel reakʼ sana oka menakʼ ona marao giḍikakʼpe. Ente onare joto lekan loṭghuṭi, bin napaeakʼ, bạṛicʼ sana, bạṛicʼakʼ reakʼ laloc ar dhon reakʼ laloc menakʼa, one oka do boṅga sewakan.
Ar okoe doko bebataokokan onko do ona iạtege Isorakʼ sạjại hecʼ paṛao akokana.
Ape hõ pạhil do onkagepe colonetʼ tahẽkana,
menkhan ńitokʼ do edre, raṅgao, dusṭạmi, opoman, ar nilạjiạ roṛ ape khon baṛe sahaṛokʼma.

Nonkate boṅgan hoṛ jạtko talare se Jihudiko talare, khatna se bin khatna ocoakanko talare, osobbho, nicạṛ jạt, golam se sạdhinko talare jãhãn begar do bạnukʼa; onḍe do Mạsigeye asolicʼ kana ar uni do sanamko talare menaea.
Onate Isor okoekoe bachao akawan onko sonotko ar dulạṛiạko lekate mãyãkʼ mon, dulạṛ, mạ̃hir, nindhạn ar soborite apnar sajaokʼpe.
Ape apere sahaokʼpe ar jãhãe birudre apeakʼ jãhãn dos reakʼ menakʼtae khan uni do ikạkaepe. Probhu cetʼlekae ikạ akatʼpe onkage ape hõ eṭakʼko ikạkako lektapea.
Ar onako sanamakʼ cetanre dulạṛte sajaokʼpe. Ente dulạṛge sạbit utạrokʼ reakʼ tonol kana.
Mạsi okaṭakʼ suluke emokʼkan ona sulukge apeakʼ ontorre tahente ape mimitʼkoe ạyurpema. Sulukre tahen lạgitʼge coṅ sanamko mitʼ hoṛmorepe hoho ocoakana. Ar ape do gun manaoko baṛe hoyokʼpe.
Mạsiakʼ katha apeakʼ ontorre purạte girobas ocoakʼpe. Isorakʼ akelte lại cecetʼ ar sipikhạukʼpe, sereńko, sarhao sereńko ar Jiuteakʼ õṛhẽakʼkote apeakʼ ontorre Isor gun manao tulucʼ sereńaepe.
Jãhãnakʼgepe roṛ ar jãhãnakʼgepe cekae ona do Probhu Jisu ńutumte kạmipe ar uni hotete Isor Baba hõ gunmanao joharaepe.
E bạhuko aperen jãwãeko tabere tahenpe, ente Probhuren hoṛ lekate noa do lek kana.
E jãwãeko, apnar bạhuko dulạṛkope, ar alope haṛhatʼakoa.
E gidrạko, sanamakʼre aperen gogo-babawakʼ bataotakope, ente noa do Probhui kusiyakʼa.
E babako, aperen gidrạko alope edre ạṛis ocokoa. Jemon onko do aloko hulạs bhaṅgaokʼ.

E golamko ape do jotowakʼre noa dhạrtiren kisạ̃ṛko ṭhen tabe akan tahenpe. Eken mẽtʼ samaṅre golam khaṭaokʼte hoṛ khusi ocoko leka do alo, menkhan khạṭi monte Probhu botorae tulucʼ onkore tabe akan tahenpe.
Jãhãnakʼgepe cekae, manwako lạgitʼ do alo, bickom Probhu lạgitʼpe onkayetʼte mon ar ontorte kạmipe,
entepe baḍaegea, Probhu acʼren hoṛko lạgitʼ okae doho akatʼ onage kuṛại lekate uni ṭhen khonpe ńama. Ar ape okoe ṭhenpe khaṭaokʼ kan uni doe Probhu Jisu kana.
Ente behokicʼ do acʼe behokakatʼ reakʼe ńam ruạṛa; Probhu ṭhen mẽtʼãhã beṅgetʼakʼ do bạnukʼ anaṅ.
E kisạ̃ṛko, sermare aperen hõ mitʼṭen kisạ̃ṛ menaea ar ona baḍaekate aperen golamko sãote bhage ar hok reakʼ beoharpe.
Koejoṅre jamaṛakan ar gun manao johar salakʼ jagwar akae tahenpe;
Ona sãote ale lạgitʼ hõ koejoṅpe jemon Mạsi reaṅ sạri okoakʼ reakʼ katha porcar lạgitʼ Isor do ạte emabon. Ar ona sạri okoakʼ lạgitʼge iń doń bondi ocoakana.
Cetʼ leka pusṭạute noa reaṅ lại pasnao lek kan, koejoṅre disạyińpe jemon iń do onkageń roṛ daṛeakʼ.
Okoe Isorren hoṛko baṅkan onko tulucʼ do akel salakʼ colonpe ar Mạsi reaṅ goha em reakʼ ạtko kạmire lagaope.
Apeakʼ roṛ do siń sạṭupʼ dayateakʼ baṛe hoyokʼma, buluṅte adawakʼ leka, jemonpe baḍae daṛeakʼ okoe okaleka roṛ ruạṛako lektapea mente.
Aboren dulạṛiạ boeha ar pạtiạr sapʼ dapʼicʼ ar Probhuakʼ kạmire abo sãoten golam Tukhikus do ińakʼ sanamakʼe baḍae ocopea.
Ale reaṅakʼkope baḍaete uni do jemon udgạue emdaṛeape onate ape ṭheniń kolkedea.
Tukhikus sãote iń do aboren pạtiạricʼ ar dulạṛiạ boeha Onesimus hõń kolkedea. Uni do ape modrenge mitʼ hoṛ kanae. Unkin do nonḍenakʼ jotowakʼge apekin baḍae ocopea.

Iń soṅgete kạidi akan Aristarkhus ar Barnabasren mamo hatom boeha Mark hõ joharkin emapekana. Mark reaṅ ma laharege hukumpe ńamakatʼ baṅma, ape ṭhene senlenre dulạṛ salakʼ ataṅ daramete jemonpe sapʼsorae.
Ar Justusko metae Jisu hõ apeye joharape kana. Jihudiko mod khon eken noko pene hoṛge Isorakʼ rajosṭi lạgitʼ iń tulucʼko kạmi kana. Onko do monre ạḍi uskurko dan akawạdińa.

Epaphrase hõe joharape kana. Uni do aperen hoṛko modren mitʼ hoṛkanae ar uni do Jisu Mạsiren golamge. Uni do siń sạṭupʼ ape lạgitʼe koeyeda jemonpe sạbit utạrokʼ ar jotowakʼre Isorakʼ mone joṅakʼ baḍaekate khạṭi akanpe teṅgo ṭarhao daṛeakʼ.
Epaphrase reaṅ do noa gohań meneda, ape lạgitʼ ar okoe do Laodikiạ ar Hierapolis reakʼ nagrahare menakʼko onko lạgitʼ uni do ạḍiye khaṭao akana.
Ar dulạṛiạ raranicʼ Luk ar Demaskin hõ joharkin emapekana.
Laodikiạren biswạsi boehako ar Numphạ ar uniakʼ oṛakʼre menakʼ manḍerrenko hõ johar emakope.
Ape ṭhen noa ciṭhipe paṛhao sạt lekhan Laoidikiạ reakʼ manḍerre hõ noa ciṭhi paṛhao ocoakope, ar Laodikiạ manḍerre lạgitʼ okaṭakʼ ciṭhi kolokʼ ona hõ ape do paṛhao ańjompe.
Arkippus do noa katha lạiaepe, “Probhuakʼ sapʼ dapʼ reakʼ okaṭakʼ kạmi emakatʼme ona purạu lạgitʼ moneakʼme.”
Iń Pạul do ińakʼ tite noa johar kathań oleda. Disạipe iń doń kạidi kana. Isore dayawape ma.
Isor Baba ar Probhu Jisu Mạsi tulucʼ mitʼakan Thessaloniki manḍerrenko ṭhen, Siluạnus, Timothi, ar iń Pạul do noa ciṭhile oleda. Aboren Isor Baba ar Probhu Jisu Mạsi do daya ar suluke dan ape ma.
Koejoṅre sanamko siń sạṭupʼ disạpe tulucʼ ale do Isorle gun manao joharae kana.
Biswạs khạtirte okape kạmikan, dulạṛ khạtirte okape mehnotetʼkan ar aboren Probhu Jisu Mạsire as akan iạte okape sombhuriyetʼ, ona katha do jaoge aboren Isor Baba samaṅre koejoṅrele disạyeda.
Isorren dulạṛiạ boehakotiń, alele baḍaea, unige ape doe bachao akatʼpea,

ente alele porcar akatʼ bhage sombat do eken katha motote do baṅ seṭer akatʼpea, menkhan daṛete, sonot Jiute ar purạ khạṭi salakʼ hecʼatʼpe tahẽkana. Ape sãote tahẽkan jokhecʼ apeakʼ bhạlại lạgitʼ cetʼ lekale colonetʼkan tahẽkan ona mape baḍaege.
Ạḍi lekan santao talate hõ sonot Jiuakʼ rạskạ salakʼ ona bhage sombat ataṅkate ape do ale ar Probhurenko lekape coloneda.
Onate Makedoniạ ar Akhaea Prodesren sanam biswạsiko ṭhen ape do mitʼṭen nạmunape hoeakana.

Eken Makedoniạ ar Akhaea Prodes motorege ape ṭhen khon Probhuakʼ katha pasnao akana ona do baṅ, menkhan Isorre apeakʼ biswạs reakʼ katha hõ sanam jaegarege seṭer akana. Ar noa babotre aleakʼ do mementeakʼ cetʼge jạruṛ bạnukʼtalea,

ente cetʼ lekape ataṅ daram akatʼle ona do hoṛkoko baḍae ocoyetʼlea. Onko do arhõko baḍae ocoakatʼlea je, ape do boṅga buruko ṭhen khon ruạṛkate cetʼleka jiwetʼ ar sạri Isor ṭhenpe hecʼakana jemon unipe sewawaete,

serma khon uniren Hoponakʼ hijukʼpe ńel hor akae tahen. Uni Hopongeye hoyokʼ kana Jisu, one okoe do gocʼko khone jiwetʼ beretʼkede. Ar Isorakʼ oka sạjại pheḍ hijukʼkan ona sạjại khon uni Jisuge abo doe rukhiyạ bona.
E boehako, baḍaegeape, ape ṭhen aleakʼ calakʼ do ạuṛiakʼ baṅ hoeakantalea.

Ar noa katha hõpe baḍaegea, noa lahare ale do Philipi nagraharele khed ocolena ar bemanot hõle bemanot ocolena. Menkhan noa tạkicʼakʼko tahẽkanre hõ aboren Isor ṭhen khon dil ńamkate uniakʼ bhage sombat reakʼ katha ale do khulạsategele lạiyatʼpe tahẽkana.
Aleakʼ solha do bulạuteakʼ do baṅkana, ar bạṛicʼ monsubạ hõ baṅa, se phor phunditeakʼ jãhãn katha hõ bale roṛeda;

bickom lek kanale mente bhage sombat baḍae ocoko reakʼ bhar Isor do alereye emakatʼte ona lekatele roṛeda. Manwa kusi ocoko lạgitʼ do baṅ menkhan okoe aboakʼ ontore biḍạu aṭkaretʼ uni Isor kusi ocoye lạgitʼgele roṛeda.
Baḍaegepe heṛem heṛem kathako do tishõ bale roṛakada, ar lalocakʼko okokate bulạuakʼ jãhãn katha hõ bale roṛakada, Isorge onaren goha do.
Hoṛko ṭhen khon, metakʼme ape ṭhen se eṭakʼ jãhãeko ṭhen khon sarhao ńam reakʼ do bale kurumuṭu akada. Ale do Mạsiren apostolko lekate aleakʼ ạidạri ape cetanrele khaṭao daṛekea,
menkhan ona bodolte cetʼleka gogo do acʼren gidrạkoe jotonetʼko, onkage ale hõ apeko talare tahen jokhecʼ lạlu bạcule beoharleda.
Apere khạndri dulạṛ menakʼtalete eken Isorakʼ bhage sombat moto do bale emapekana, bickom ape lạgitʼ apnarakʼ jiwi sudhạ emokʼ lạgitʼ hõ rạjigele tahẽkana, ente aleren do ạḍi dulạṛiạko kanape.
E boehako, aleakʼ mehnot ar kosṭo reakʼ katha do khạṭigepe disạ akada. Ape ṭhen Isorakʼ bhage sombat porcar jokhecʼ ale do siń ńindạle mehnot akada, jemon ape okoeren bojha hõ alole hoyokʼ.
Ar okoekope pạtiạu akan, ape tulucʼ aleakʼ beohar do, sonot, dhorom ar niphuṭge tahẽkana, ar onaren gohako do Isor ar apege.

Ale do siń sạṭupʼ Isorle gun manao joharae kana, ente Isorakʼ katha ańjomkate tinrepe pạtiạulena unre manwawakʼ katha mente do baṅ, menkhan Isorakʼ katha mentegepe ataṅkeda. Ar sạrige ona do Isorakʼ katha kangea. Ape okoepe pạtiạu akan, apeakʼ ontorrege ona katha doe kạmiyeda.

E boehako, Jihudạ Prodesre Mạsi Jisure kolom mitʼakan Isorakʼ oka manḍerko menakʼ, onkage ape hõpe hoeakana. Jihudikoakʼ tite onko do oka duk ar kosṭoko jomakatʼ, onkage ape hõ apnar disạmren hoṛkoakʼ tite duk ar kosṭope jomakada.
Onko Jihudikoge Probhu Jisu ar nạbikoko gocʼ letʼkoa, ar ale hõko khedletʼlea. Onko do Isorko monduk ocoakadea, ar sanam manwako cetanre bạiri mon menakʼtakoa.

Onko do aleko tạkicʼ darametʼlea jemon boṅgan hoṛ jạtrenko kại khon bańcaoko lạgitʼ jãhãn kathako alole lại daṛeako. Nonkate onko Jihudiko do siń sạṭupʼ kại cetan kạiko bojha joṅkana, ar Isorakʼ edre do purạte onkore hecʼ paṛaokʼ kana.
Ado E boehako, mon secʼte baṅre hõ hoṛmo secʼte ape ṭhen khon thoṛa ghạṛicʼ lạgitʼle begar akana. Onate gagoc mon salakʼle kurumuṭuleda jemon arhõ ape tulucʼle ńepel ńapam daṛeakʼ.
Onate ale do, asokaete iń Pạul do ạḍi dhaoge ape ṭhen hijukʼiń menletʼ tahẽkana, menkhan Soetan do aleye tạkicʼ daramletʼlea.
Ente aboren Probhu Jisui hijukʼre apege cetʼ uni samaṅre aleakʼ as, rạskạ ar ṭhonok reakʼ mukuṭ dope baṅkana?
Sạrige, apege aleakʼ ṭhonok ar apege aleakʼ rạskạ do.
jemon noako duk ar sasetrepe paṛaolenre okoe hõ alope pạc ruạrokʼ. Ar ape hõpe baḍaegea, duk ar saset do abon lạgitʼ dohoakana.
Duk saset do abore hijukʼgea ona katha do ape tulucʼ tahẽkan jokhecʼre bar barteń lại akatʼpe tahẽkana, arpe baḍaegea, onkage hoeakana.

Onate iń do tinre bạń sahao daṛeada unre pạtiạu secʼte oka dosare menakʼpe ona baḍae lạgitʼge Timothiń kolledea. Iń doń botorokʼkan tahẽkana, hoedaṛeakʼa Soetan do laloce udukʼakatʼpea ar aleakʼ sanam mehnot do ạuṛiakʼ akantalea.

Ńitokʼ Timothi ape ṭhen khone ruạr hecʼen khan apeakʼ dulạṛ ar biswạs reaṅ bhage khoborgeye ematʼlea. Uni doe lạiyatʼlea jaoge ape do dulạṛ montepe disạyetʼlea, ar cetʼ lekale uihạretʼpe onkage ape hõpe uihạretʼlea.
Onate E boehako, Timothiakʼ moca khon apeakʼ pạtiạu reaṅ katha ańjomkate joto lekan haron ar kosṭorehõ ale do jiwi raṛecʼle ńam akada.
Probhure apeakʼ pạtiạu kajak akae tahen khan ale do bhạgankole hoyokʼa.
Ape khạtirte Isor samaṅre aleakʼ oka rạskạ, ona bodolte okalekate ape iạte unile sarhaoea ona do bale baḍaea.
Ale do siń ńindạ Isorle nehõrae kana, jemon ape tulucʼle ńepel ńapam daṛeakʼ ar apeakʼ biswạsre oka reṅgecʼ menakʼtape onale purun daṛeakʼ.
Ado aboren Isor Baba do acʼ ar aboren Probhu Jisu ape ṭhen calakʼ hor jemone sạriạuale.
Ale cetʼlekale dulạṛetʼpe ṭhik onkage Probhu hõ ape mimitʼkore jemon dulạṛe baḍhao ocoete sareṛokʼtape.
Enḍekhan uni do apeakʼ ontore kajak ocoetapea, jemon aboren Probhu Jisu do acʼren sanam hoṛko soṅgekateye hijukʼre aboren Isor ar Baba samaṅre niphuṭ ar sonotkope hoyokʼa.

Ado E boehako arhoń mena, Isor kusi ocoye lạgitʼ cetʼleka colon lek kan ona sikhạuna do ale ṭhen khonpe ńamakatʼgea, ar sạrige ape do onkagepe colonetʼ kana. Enhõ Probhu Jisu secʼte solha arle nehõrape kana jemon arhõ bạ̃ṛti onkalekape colon.
Probhu Jisu ṭhen khon ạidạri ńamkate okakole hukum akawatʼpe ona dope baḍaegea.
Isorakʼ monejoṅakʼ do noage, jemon sonotkope hoyokʼ, metakʼme sanam lekan loṭghuṭi khon sahaṛ akae tahenpe,
Noa babotre okoe hõ jemon jãhãe boeha behok lekate aloe ṭhokaye. Ale do laharegele lại akatʼpea arle sontorakatʼpea, noako behok iạtege Probhu doe sạjạipea,
ente Isor do be sapha lekate calakʼ lạgitʼ do baṅ, menkhan sonot lekate senokʼ lạgitʼgeye hohoakatʼ bona.
Onate okoe noa cecetʼakʼ bae hetawakʼ uni do manwa do baṅ, bickom okoe acʼren sonot Jiue dan akatʼpe uni Isorge bae hetawae kana.
Boeha dulạṛ reaṅ olape do jãhãn jạruṛ bạnukʼa, ente Isorge ape mimitʼko dupulạṛokʼe cetʼ akatʼpea.
Ape do sạrige Makedoniạ disạmren sanam boehakope dulạṛetʼkoa. Menkhan E boehako, ape ṭhen aleakʼ nehõr do noage, apeakʼ dulạṛ do arhõ sareṛokʼtape ma.
Okaṭakʼle hukum akawatʼpe onaka leka nindhạn jion khemao, ar apnarakʼ kạmire jamaṛ akae tahente apnar tite mehnot reakʼ ahkaokʼpe,
jemon apeakʼ noa bhage cạl-colon iạte bahreren hoṛko ṭhen manotpe ńam ar eṭakʼkore ṭehãḍokʼ reakʼ jạruṛ alo hoyokʼtape.
E boehako, gocʼ akankoakʼ cetʼ hoyokʼ takoa ona reaṅ bin baḍaepe tahen do bale menjoṅ kana, jemon as bạnukʼtako hoṛko leka dukte alope hadosokʼ.
Jisui gocʼlena are jiwetʼ beretʼena mente bon pạtiạukʼkanre abo do noa hõ bon pạtiạukʼ kana, okoe Jisu tulucʼ kolom mitʼkateko gocʼ akan Isor do onko hõ Jisu sãoteye idikoa.
Probhuakʼ cecetʼakʼ lekatege apele lạiape kana, okoe jiwetʼ menakʼ bon ar Probhuakʼ ruạṛ hijukʼ hạbicʼ jiwetʼ bon tahen, abo do oka lekate hõ onko gocʼ akanko lahare oho bon calaolena.

Ar ãṭ aṛaṅte hukum são sãote maraṅ utạricʼ goḍetakʼ hoho ar Isorakʼ siṅgạ reakʼ saḍe soṅgete Probhu do serma khone pheḍ hijukʼa. Ar okoe Mạsi tulucʼ mitʼkateko gocʼ akan onkoge pạhilreko jiwetʼ beredokʼa.
Ona tayom do okoeko jiwetʼ ar sarecʼ menakʼ bon, abo hõ sermare Probhu sãote ńapamokʼ lạgitʼ onko tulucʼ rimilre bon rakapʼ ocokʼa. Ar nonkate abo do jaejug hạbicʼ Probhu sãote bon tahena.
Ona iạte noako kathate ape apere jiwi raṛejtape.
Ar tinre hoṛko mena, “Suluk hoeakana, botor reakʼ do cetʼge bạnukʼa,” Unre bhạrti hoṛmo maejiuko acka bedon rakapʼako leka onko hoṛ doko ḍahao maraokʼa. Ar oka lekate hõ bako rukhiyạ daṛeakʼa.
Onate eṭakʼko leka alo bon jạpitʼ joṅma, bickom jagwar akae bon tahente apnar bon sambṛaokʼma.
Okoeko jạpid onko do ńindạgeko jạpida, ar okoeko bulokʼ onko do ńindạgeko bulokʼa.
Menkhan abo do sińren hoṛ kanabon; onate koṛam aḍ lạgitʼ pạtiạu ar dulạṛte koṛam aḍkate ar bohokʼ aḍ lạgitʼ bańcaokʼ reakʼ as bohokʼre horokʼkate delaṅ apnar bon sambṛaokʼma.
Sạjại ńam lạgitʼ do baṅ bickom aboren Probhu Jisu Mạsi hotete bańcao ńam lạgitʼge Isor doe ṭhik dohoakatʼ bona.
Mạsi do abo lạgitʼe gocʼlena, onate jiwetʼ bon tahen ar bon gujukʼ, abo do jemon uni tulucʼ jiwetʼ bon tahen.
Onate ńitokʼ okape cekayetʼkan onkage mimitʼko udgạu emakope ar ape mimitʼko benao rakabokʼpe.
E boehako, nehõrape kanale, okoe ape talareko mehnotetʼkan, ar Probhureko calaoetʼpe arko sikhạu paṛhaoetʼpe, onko baṛe manotkope.
Onko okako cekayetʼkan ona lạgitʼ dulạṛ monte manotkope. Ar ape apere sulukte tahenpe.
E boehako, ale do noale sikhạuetʼpe kana, okoeko kuṛhiạge onko sontorkope; ar okoeakʼ dil bạnukʼtako onko do dil emakope; okoeko nijorge onko goṛowakope ar sanamko secʼ sombhurikate sapahaope.
Ńelpe, okoe hõ bạṛicʼ bodol bạṛicʼ jãhãe aloe halawaema. Ape do jaoge eṭakʼ sanamko lạgitʼ bhạlại reakʼ kurumuṭuipe.
Jao okte rạskạkʼpe,
ar mitʼ talao koejoṅpe,
jotowakʼre Isor gunmanao joharaepe; ente Jisu Mạsi hotete ape lạgitʼ Isorakʼ monejoṅakʼ do noakangea.
Sonot Jiu do alope ĩṛĩjea.
Okoeko nạbi lekate Isorakʼ kathako lạiyetʼkan, onkoakʼ kathako alope nihạt giḍiya, bickom jotowakʼko biḍạu aṭkarpe.
Bhageakʼ sapʼ doho joṅpe,
ar joto lekan bạṛicʼakʼ khon sahaṛ akae tahenpe.
Sulukren Isor do acʼgeye sonot utạrpema, ar aboren Probhu Jisu Mạsiye hijukʼre apeakʼ hoṛmo, mon ar jiu purạ puri bin dusạn baṛe dohoetape.
Disạipe, okoeye hohoakawatʼpe uni doe pạtiạrgea; ar uni do khạṭigeye onkaea.
E boehako, ale lạgitʼ koejoṅpe.
Dulạṛ monte jotoko joharakope.
Iń do Probhu ńutumte noań hukumape kana, jemon noa ciṭhi sanam boehako ṭhen paṛhao ańjomokʼ.
Aboren Probhu Jisu Mạsiakʼ daya ape tulucʼ baṛe tahen ma.
Isor Baba ar Probhu Jisu Mạsire kolom mitʼakan Thessoloniki manḍerrenko ṭhen iń Pạul, Siluạnus ar Timothi do noa ciṭhile oleda.
Isor Baba ar Probhu Jisu Mạsi do daya ar suluke dan apema.

E boehako, ape ńutumte jao okte Isor gun manao johar emae lek kantalea. Apeakʼ pạtiạu do ạḍitetʼ baḍhao idikʼ kana ar ape mimitʼkoakʼ dulạṛ ape apere sarhe idikʼkante ale do sarhao emokʼ lek kantalea.
Ar onatege Isorakʼ manḍerkore ale do ape iạtele sarhaokʼkana, ente okako khed ar duk sasetpe sahaoetʼkan ona talare hõ apeakʼ sombhuri ar pạtiạu do ṭarhao menakʼa.
Ar noakoge Isorakʼ dhorom bicạr reakʼ mitʼṭen porman kana. Noa reakʼ monsubạ do hoyokʼ kana, jemon Isorakʼ rajosṭire lekmanko mentepe lekhakʼ. Ar ona iạtege ape do nunạkʼ dukpe sahao akada.
Isorakʼ dhorom bicạr do noage, okoe apeko duk ocoyetʼpe uni hõ onkoe duk ocokoa;

Onate ale do jaoge ape lạgitʼle koejoṅ kana jemon aboren Isor do hoho ocokʼ lek menteye bujhạupe, ar acʼakʼ daṛete apeakʼ sanam bhage kạmi reakʼ monejoṅakʼe purạutape ar biswạsi iạte okakope kạmikan onare jemone sạbit utạrpe.
Enḍekhan aboren Isor ar Probhu Jisu Mạsiakʼ dayate aboren Probhu Jisuakʼ ṭhonok do ape hotete sodorokʼa, ar apehõ uni hotetepe ṭhonok ocokʼa.
E boehako, aboren Probhu Jisu Mạsi doe hijukʼa ar mitʼ sãote jarwakate acʼ ṭhene idibona. Ar noa babotre ale do noale nehõrape kana,
“Probhuakʼ din do seṭer akana,” Noate nạbi lekate roṛakatʼ johar kathate se eṭakʼ jãhãeakʼ kathate se aleakʼ olakʼ menkate jãhãn ciṭhi iạte ape do usạrate alope bilbilạukʼa se alope botorokʼa.
Okoe hõ jemon aloko bulạupe, ente ona din hijukʼ lahare Isor birudre maraṅ bhiṅgṛạu hoyokʼa, ar uni nonosṭoren hopon, one okoe do maraokʼ reakʼ katha menakʼtae uniye sodorokʼa.
Isor mementeakʼ cetʼko menakʼ onako sanamakʼ birudre ar sewa ocokʼ jotowakʼ birudreye teṅgokʼte uni do apnarte maraṅe udugokʼa; ar Isorakʼ mundilre duṛupʼkate acʼge Isor menteye udugokʼa.
Iń do tinre ape ṭheniń tahẽkana unre noako kathageń lạiape kan tahẽkan, ona do cetʼ bape disạyeda?
Uni nonosṭoren hopon jemon okte lahare aloe sodorokʼ onate okaṭakʼte ńitokʼe akoṭ ocoakan ona mape baḍaege. Ape do noa hõpe baḍae akada je, nonosṭoren hoponakʼ okoakʼ kạmiko do ńithõ calakʼ kangea,
menkhan okoe uniye akoṭ dohoakade uni ạuriye ocogokʼ hạbicʼ akoṭetegeye tahena. Ar ona tayom do uni nonosṭoren hopone sodorokʼa.
Probhu Jisu do acʼakʼ moca reakʼ sãhetʼteye maraoe utạrea ar acʼakʼ ṭhonokteye sodorokʼte uniakʼ daṛeye cabaetaea.
Ar nonosṭoren hopone hijukʼre uni soṅgete Soetan reakʼ daṛe hõ tahena. Ona daṛe do joto lekan eṛe cinhạ ar hahaṛa ar daṛe kạmi hotete sodorokʼa.
Ar nosṭokʼkan horte laha akan hoṛko bulạuko reakʼ joto lekan bulạuakʼ hotete, noko hoṛ doko maraokʼa, ente kại khon bańcao ńam lạgitʼ sạriakʼtetʼ do bako dulạṛ akada ar ataṅ hõ bako ataṅ akada.
Onate Isor do onko ṭhen nonkan mitʼṭen daṛeye kola onate bhul horteye idikoa, jemon eṛeakʼreko pạtiạukʼ.
Ar okoe sạriakʼre pạtiạukʼ baṅkate behokakʼ kạmire rạskạko ńametʼkan onko sanamko uni doe bicạr dusikoa.

Probhure dulạṛiạ boehako, ape ńutumte jaoge Isor gun manao joharae lek kantalea, ente kại khon bańcao ńam lạgitʼ Isor do pạhil khongeye bachao doho akatʼpea. Sonot Jiu hotete Isor lạgitʼe begar doho akatʼpete ar bhage sombat reakʼ sạriakʼre apeakʼ biswạs hotete kại khon bańcaope ńamakada.
Ale oka bhage sombatle porcaretʼkan ona hotete bańcao ńam lạgitʼ uni doe hohoakatʼpea, jemon ape do aboren Probhu Jisu Mạsiakʼ ṭhonok reakʼ bhạgiạdarkope hoyokʼ.
Onate E boehako, teṅgo ṭak akae tahenpe, ar aleakʼ ciṭhite se kathate okaṭakʼle lại cetʼ akawatʼpe ona sapʼ doho akae tahenpe.
Aboren Probhu Jisu Mạsi ar Isor Baba do apeakʼ ontorreye udgạupema ar sanam bhage kạmi ar kathareye kajak ocopema.
Unigeye dulạṛketʼ bona are dayawatʼbonte asambheṛ udgạu ar purạ rạskạ reakʼ ase dan akatʼ bona.
E boehako mucạtʼ katha do noage, ale lạgitʼ koejoṅpe cetʼleka Probhuakʼ katha ape talare usạra pasnaolen onkage ona do pasnao idikʼte ṭhonokokʼtege tahena.
Arhõ koealepe jemon becol ar bạṛicʼ hoṛakʼ ti khon rukhiyạle ńam, ente sanamkoge biswạs menakʼtakoa ona do baṅa.
Menkhan Probhu doe pạtiạrgea; unige ape doe kajak ocopea ar Soetanakʼ ti khone rukhiyạpea.
Probhu tulucʼ jopoṛao menakʼpete ape reaṅ noa pạtiạu menakʼtalea je, ale okakole hukum akatʼpe ona lekagepe kạmi kana ar kạmi iditegepe tahena.
Probhu do apeakʼ ontor Isorakʼ dulạṛ horte ar Mạsiakʼ sombhuri horteye ạyur iditapema.

E boehako, aboren Probhu Jisu Mạsi ńutumte noale hukumape kana, judi jãhãe ḍhilisiliye colonetʼ khan ar ale ṭhen khon oka cecetʼakʼpe ńamakatʼ ona bae senakʼ kan khan, enḍekhan uni tulucʼ do alope helmelokʼa.
Baḍaegeape cetʼlekate ale leka colon lek tapea mente. Ape talarele tahẽkan jokhecʼ ale do ḍhilisili bale colonleda,
se begor damte okoeakʼ jomakʼ hõ bale jomleda. Ale do siń ńindạle mehnot akada arle kosṭo akana, jemon aperen bojhako alole hoyokʼ.
Ape ṭhen khon goṛo ńam reakʼ ạidạri bạnukʼtale ona do baṅa, menkhan jemon ale lekape colon onate nonka kạmikatele udukʼatʼpe tahẽkana.
Ape ṭhen tahẽkan jokhecʼgele hukumatʼpe tahẽkana, jãhãe kạmi baṅ sanayede khan uni do jom hõ aloe jomma.
Alele ańjomeda ape modre adomko do ḍhilisiliko coloneda, ar kạmige bako kạmikana, bickomko ajare baṛayeda.
Aboren Probhu Jisu Mạsi iạte nonkan hoṛkole hukumako kana arle sikhạuetʼko kana, jemon onko do nindhạn monte kạmikate akoakʼ jomakʼ apnarteko jogaṛ joṅ.
E boehako, bhageakʼ kạmi kạmite alope bhagaokʼa.
Noa ciṭhire olakʼ aleakʼ katha jãhãe bae batao khan, enḍekhan uni do ńel oromkaepe. Ar uni tulucʼ ape do gate hõ alope gatekʼa jemone lajaokʼ.
Menkhan uni do bạiri mente hõ alope hudisea, bickom boeha mente bujhạuaepe.
Sulukren Probhu do acʼge sanam okte jotowakʼre suluke dan ape ma. Probhu do ape sanamko tulucʼe tahenma.
Niạ johar katha do iń Pạulge apnarakʼ titeń oletʼkana. Ar noage ińakʼ mimitʼ ciṭhi reakʼ cinhạ do; ar nonkageń oletʼa.
Aboren Probhu Jisu Mạsiakʼ daya ape sanamko tulucʼ baṛe tahenma.
Iń pạul do aboren babańcaoicʼ Isor ar Jisu Mạsiakʼ hukumte apostoliń hoeakana. Ar aboakʼ sanam as do Mạsi Jisurege.
Biswạsi lekate sạri gidrạtiń Timothi ṭhen noa ciṭhiń oleda. Aboren Isor Baba ar Probhu Jisu Mạsi do daya, mãyã ar suluke dan am ma.

Makedoniạte calakʼ jokhecʼ cetʼ lekań galmaraoatʼme tahẽkan ńitokʼ hõ onkageń metam kana, am do Ephesus nagraharege tahẽ hataṛokʼme, jemon adom adom hoṛem hukumako onko do judạwakʼ alo jemonko lại cecetʼ.

Ar noa hõm hukumakoa jemon onko do kạhniko ar maraṅ maraṅ bõs budạkore mon aloko lagao. Noako do Isorakʼ kạmi baṅkate ạḍi lekan roṛ ropoṛe janam ocoya menkhan Isor cetʼlekate acʼakʼ kạmiye ạyura ona do biswạs hotetege baḍaeyokʼa.
Noa hukum reakʼ monsubạ do hoyokʼ kana dulạṛ udgạu ocoe. Noa dulạṛ do niphuṭ ontor, sapha bibek ar sạri biswạs khon hijukʼ kana.
Adom hoṛ do noako khon ocokʼkate ạuṛi sạuṛi roṛ baṛae secʼgeko ghańjeṛ akana.
Onko do nijạrakʼ kathage bako bujhạueda ar okaṭakʼ reaṅ murukteko roṛetʼkan ona do bako baḍaere hõ Moseakʼ ạn-ạriren guru hoyokʼko menjoṅkana.
Baḍaegea bon ạn do bhagegea, khạjuk jãhãe ṭhik leka kạmireye lagao.
Ar noa hõ bon baḍaea, jãhãe dhorom hoṛ lạgitʼ noa ạn do baṅ emakana; menkhan bemanotko, bebataoko, bebhoktiko, kại hoṛko, besonotko, bedhoromko, eṅgat-apat gogocʼko, khũniạhiko,
loṭghuṭiko, jojognako, hoṛ kiriń-ạkhrińko, eṛe katha roroṛko, eṛe goha emokʼko, sạri sikhnạt birudre eṭakʼ jãhãnakʼko kạmikan onkanko lạgitʼge noa do emakana.
Ṭhonokren Isorakʼ maraṅ bhage sombat lekate okaṭakʼ cecetʼakʼ menakʼ, onage hoyokʼ kana sạri cecetʼakʼ. Ar noa bhage sombat porcar reakʼ dạyik do iń cetanreye emakada.
Aboren Probhu Jisu Mạsi, okoe do daṛeye emakawạdiń, uniń gunmanao joharae kana, ente uni do pạtiạricʼe bujhạukedeńte acʼakʼ sapʼdapʼ kạmireye dhurạu akadińạ.
Lahate Mạsiyiń opomane kan ar khekhedicʼ ar ṭhok hoṛiń tahẽkanre hõ uni do noa kạmireye bahalkedińa. Uni do ińe daya akawạdińa, ente bepạtiạukʼ ar bin baḍae iạte iń do onakoń kạmikan tahẽkana.
Aboren Probhu do asambheṛe daya akawạdińa ar Jisu Mạsi tulucʼ iń kolom mitʼakante oka biswạs ar dulạṛ menakʼ onae dan akawạdińa.
Noa katha do sạrikana ar purạ puri ataṅ reakʼ hõ lek kana je, kại hoṛ bańcaoko lạgitʼge Jisu Mạsi do noa dhạrtiteye hecʼlena. Ar onko kạkạiko modre iń kangeạń maraṅ kạiyan hoṛ do.

Onate Isor do ińe mãyã akawạdińa, jemon iń maraṅ kạiyan hotete Jisu Mạsi do acʼakʼ asambheṛ soboriye udukʼ daṛeakʼ. Ar unire pạtiạukʼ hotete okoe jaejug jionko ńam onko jemon iń ńelteko cetʼ daṛeakʼ onate uni do ińreye nonka akada.
Okoe doe jaejugren rajkan, okoe doe bin maraokʼicʼkan ar one okoe do bae ńelokʼkan, uni mitʼ Isorakʼ man ar ṭhonokge jug cetan jug hoyokʼtae ma. Amen.
E bachatiń Timothi, am reaṅ eṭakʼko nạbi lekate oka kathako lạiletʼ ona katha lekage iń do noań hukumam kana. Ar noa katha disạ dohoe tulucʼ am do Mạsi khạtirte jiwi alaekate ma lạṛhạime.
Ona sãote biswạs ar bhage bibek dohojoṅme. Adom hoṛ do bibek reakʼ katha bako ańjometʼkante biswạsre tạkicʼakʼko janam ocoyeda.
Onko hoṛ modre Humenaeos ar Aleksander hõ menakʼkinạ. Onate unkin do Soetanakʼ tireń aṛakʼ akatʼkinạ, jemon noa sikhạunakin ńam baṅma, Isor opomane do baṅ ṭhika.
Pạhilregeń meneda, sanamko lạgitʼ nehõr, koe, aroj ar gun manao hoyokʼ ma.
Nonka leka rapajko ar napṛakʼ hudạwanko lạgitʼ hõ koejoṅ hoyokʼa, jemon Isor bhokti ar dhoromte man salakʼ khạtir ar sulukte din bon khemao daṛeakʼ.
Aboren babańcaoicʼ Isorakʼ mẽtʼãhã samaṅre ona do bhagegea ar onatege uni doe kusikʼa.
Uni doe menjoṅkana sanamkoge jemon kại khon bańcaoko ńam ar Mạsi reaṅ sạri khạndritetʼko baḍae daṛeakʼ.
Isor doe mitʼ goṭengea ar mitʼ goṭengeae Isor ar manwakoren dene banar renicʼ hõ. Uni doe hoyokʼ kana Jisu Mạsi.
Uni do sanam manwako chaḍaoko reakʼ dam lekate acʼakʼ jiwigeye emena. Isore ṭhik dohoakatʼ oktere ona reaṅ goha do em akana,
ar noa goha emokʼ lạgitʼ Isor do lại jạhiricʼ, apostol ar boṅgan hoṛ jạtrenko ṭhen biswạs ar sạriạkʼren cecetʼicʼe bahal akadińạ. Iń do sạriakʼgeń roṛeda, eṛe do baṅ.
Ińakʼ monejoṅakʼ do noage herel hopon do sanam jaegare edre se jhogṛa baṅkate sapha monte sonot ti tulkate jemonko koejoṅ.
Noa hõń khojkana maejiuko do mạ̃hir ar bhage bud akel salakʼ horokʼ bandere sambṛaokʼ ar lek lekako sajaokʼma. Onko do nana parkan galaṅ upʼ ar sona se mạnik se damanakʼ kicricʼkote aloko sajaokʼma.
Ona bodol bhage kạmikoteko sajaokʼma. Okoe maejiu apnar do Isor bhokti kanako menteko monejoṅkan onko maejiu lạgitʼ do onka hoyokʼge lek kana.
Maejiuko do hapegeko tahenma ar purạ puri tabere tahẽkateko cetʼ joṅma.
Lại cecetʼre ar herel cetanre mạliki calao do okoe maejiu hõ bạń aṛakʼako kana. Bickom onko do thirgeko tahenma.
Ente pạhilre Adamgeye gaṛhao maṛaṅlena; ar ona tayom do hawage.
Ona chaḍa Adam do bae bulạu maṛaṅ ocolena, menkhan maejiugeye bulạu ocolena ar Isorakʼ hukume bebataokeda.
Menkhan maejiuko do gidrạ janamko hoteteko bańcaokʼa; khạjuk sambṛao salakʼ biswạs ar dulạṛ ar sonotokʼreko tahẽ idikʼ.
Noa katha do sạrikangea je, jãhãe manḍerren ạyuricʼ hoyokʼe menjoṅkan khan uni do mitʼṭen bhage kạmi lạgitʼgeye gagojokʼ kana.

Onate manḍer ạyuricʼ do nonkanicʼ hoyokʼ jạruṛa jemon okoe hõ uni do aloko dusi daṛeae. Uniren do mitʼṭen erae tahentaema. Uni do sote ar apnarte sambṛaokʼicʼ ar bhage bud akel tahen jạruṛtaea. Uni do soṛa ar peṛayicʼ hoyokʼ jạruṛtaea. Ar eṭakʼko cetʼako reakʼ daṛe hõ tahen jạruṛtaea.
Uni do ńu bulokʼicʼ ar dadalicʼ aloe hoyokʼma, jhogṛayicʼ ar ṭaka-poesa lalocicʼ hõ alo, bickom mạ̃hiranicʼe hoyokʼma.
Uni do lek leka apnarakʼ gharońj reakʼ jotowakʼe ạyurma, uniren gidrạko do bataoko ar mạ̃hirankoko hoyokʼma.
Jãhãe apnarakʼ gharońj calao bae baḍae khan uni do cekate Isorakʼ manḍer doe jotona?
Manḍerren ạyuricʼ do nawa biswạsi hoṛ hõ alo jemone hoyokʼ, ente nawa biswạsicʼ do bạḍạiteye phulạukʼa ar Soetan reakʼ bicạrreye khańjo botecʼkokʼa.
Bahre hoṛko ṭhen uniakʼ do bhage goha tahen jạruṛtaea, jemon durnamre ar Soetanakʼ jhạlire aloe ńurokʼ.
Onkage sapʼdapʼko hõ manot ocokʼ lek jemonko hoyokʼ ar bar mocawanko leka do alo. Onko do ńu bulokʼko hõ jemon aloko hoyokʼma, ar laloc secʼ hõ alo jemonko ạwilokʼ.
Onko do sapha bibekte jemon Mạsiakʼ dhorom biswạs reakʼ sạri okoakʼko sapʼ doho daṛeakʼ.
Laharege biḍạu maṛaṅko hoyokʼa, ar inạ tayom bin dusạnko sạbudlen khan onko do sapʼ dapʼkoko hoedaṛeakʼa.
Onkage onkoren bạhuko hõ manot ocokʼ lekko hoyokʼma. Onko do eṭakʼkoakʼ aloko okta baṛaema ar apnar sambṛao akanko tahenma. Ar jotowakʼre jemon pạtiạrankoko hoyokʼ.
Sapʼdapʼicʼren hõ mitʼṭen bạhui tahentae ma. Uni do acʼren gidrạko ar acʼakʼ gharońj mońjteye calao ma.
Okoe sapʼdapʼicʼ bhageye kạmikan uni do manote ńama ar Jisu Mạsire pạtiạu iạte uniakʼ ontor do dilte perejokʼtaea.

Isor bhokti reakʼ sạri okoakʼ je maraṅge ona do jotokogeko aṅgoca. Ona sạritetʼ do noage, Uni do manwa lekateye sodorena; ar Jiureye dhorom ocoyena; serma goḍet do uniko ńelledea; sanam jạtko ṭhen uni reaṅ porcarlena; dhạrtiren hoṛko do unireko pạtiạuena; ar serma ṭhonokre uni doe rakapʼ ocoyena.
Sonot Jiu do pusṭạuteye menakada, darakan dinkore adom hoṛ do biswạs khonko bhingṛạukʼa ar bulạu jiuko ar bạṛicʼ jiukoakʼ bintiko moneakʼa.
Bibek goṛdho akan nonkan eṛe hoṛkoakʼ phạsiạrate nonka do hoyokʼa.

Noko do manwa baṅ baplakʼ lạgitʼko hukumako kana ar adom adom jomakʼ jojomko baron kana. Menkhan biswạsiko, okoe do Isorakʼ sạriakʼtetʼko baḍae akatʼ, onko do gun manao joharkateko jomma ar onatege Isor do noako jomakʼe sirjạu akada.
Isore sirjạu akatʼ sanamakʼge bhagegea, onate okaṭakʼ hõ bạṛicʼ hudiskate giḍikakʼ lek do baṅkana; menkhan ona do jemon gun manao joharkate ataṅokʼ,
ente Isorakʼ katha ar koete ona do sonot ocokʼ kana.
Am do noako reaṅ boehakom bujhạuako khan enḍekhan Mạsiakʼ dhorom biswạs reakʼ okaṭakʼ sạri ar bhageakʼ sikhnạtem manaoetʼkan, onate Mạsi Jisuren mitʼṭen bhage sapʼ dapʼicʼem hoyokʼa.
Bhõnḍ ar alatʼ bakatʼ kạhniko khon sahaṛ akae tahenme; ente onako do haṛam ar buḍhikoakʼ benaoakʼ kạhni kana. Ona khon bickom Isor bhokti lạgitʼ hewakʼme.
Hoṛmo bhańjaore thoṛa porho do ńamokʼgea, menkhan Isor bhokti do joto secʼ khon porhowanakʼ kana; onare do nahakʼ reakʼ ar darakan jion reakʼ as menakʼa.
Noa katha do sạrikangea ar sanam secʼte ataṅ reakʼ hõ lek kana.
Onate murukte bon mehnoteda arbon lạgiạ paṛao akana, ente abo do jiwetʼ Isorre bon as akana. Uni do sanam manwakoren babańcaoicʼ kanae, asokaete okoe unireko pạtiạu akan.
Ar noako babotre am do hukum emakom ar cetʼakome.
Amakʼ koṛa umer do okoe hõ aloko neṅghaotam ma. Menkhan pạtiạuko lạgitʼ nạmuna hoyokʼme, amakʼ kathare, amakʼ cạl-colonre, amakʼ dulạṛre, amakʼ biswạsre ar sonotre.
Ar iń ạuriń hijukʼ hạbicʼ am do biswạsikom sikhạu paṛhaokoa, sonot sostorkom paṛhao ańjomakoa, ar lại cecetʼakʼge moneakʼme.
Manḍerren murubiko capokateko koeyatʼme tahẽkanre nạbi lekate katha roroṛ hotete okaṭakʼ dan ematʼme tahẽkan, ona daya dan do alom ḍhilạua.
Noako kạmi idire mone lagaome; ar onakorege tahẽakan tahenme. Jemon sanamkoko ńelme, am dom laha idikʼkana mente.
Am apnar reaṅ ar amakʼ lại cecetʼre sontor akae tahenme. Ar onakore tahẽ akae tahenme, entem onka lekhan apnar hõm bańcaokʼa, ar okoeko ańjomtam onko hõm bańcaokoa.
Haṛam hoṛko dos udukʼakore ãṭ kathate alope metakoa; bickom baba leka ạjijakope. Ar juạnko do aperen boehako leka bujhạukope.
Buḍhi hoṛko do gogo leka, ar kom umerren maejiuko do miserako leka napaete bujhạukope.
Okoe rạnḍi maejiuren celege bạnukʼko onko tojbijkope.

Menkhan jãhãe rạnḍi maejiuren gidrạ se goṛom gidrạko tahen khan onko gidrạko se goṛom gidrạkoge pạhilte jemon apan apin gharońjre Isor bhoktiko udugma. Nonkate onko do eṅgat-apat se baba haṛamkoakʼ dulạṛ reakʼ rinko hala ruạṛ daṛeakʼa, ar noatege Isor doe kusikʼa.
Okoe rạnḍi maejiuren celege bạnukʼko uni do Isor ṭhen bhorsa akan ar siń sạṭupʼ koejoṅ ar nehõrakane tahenkana.
Menkhan okoe rạnḍi maejiu acʼakʼ kusi leka jione khemaoetʼkan uni do jiwetʼ menaere hõ gocʼicʼ lekae hoeakana.
Onko do noako babotre hukumakope jemon okoe hõ aloko dusi daṛeako.
Okoe acʼren peṛako, asokaete apnar gharońjrenko bae ńel jutko uni do biswạse baṅ akada; ar bepạtiạuicʼ khon hoe bạṛicʼgea.
Rạnḍi maejiu do pe isi bochore parom akatʼ khan ar mitʼ herelrege jãwãe akane tahẽkana mente baḍaelen khan enḍekhan uni do tạlikare ńutume ol caṛhao ocoetaema.

Ona chaḍa bhage kạmire uniakʼ ńutum do tahen hoyokʼtaea. Ona bhage kạmiko modre gidrạ ạsul harako, bidesiạko peṛa sãohãko, sonot hoṛkoakʼ jaṅga ạbuktako, dukokʼko sohotʼko ar sanam lekan bhage kạmire uni do lạgiạ paṛao akae jemone tahen.
Kom umerren rạnḍi maejiuko do alope ol caṛhaokoa, ente tinre hoṛmo reakʼ jala rakapʼakoa unre Mạsi bako botoraete, jãwãeyokʼgeko khoja.
Noate onko do lahateakʼ gokʼakʼ rạputʼkate akore sạjạiko ạgujoṅa.
Ona chaḍa onko do oṛakʼ oṛakʼko ajare baṛaete kuṛhnikʼko ceda. Eken kuṛhnikʼko ceda ona do baṅ, menkhan nilạjiạ katha ar eṭakʼkoakʼko oktawa ar baṅ ganoakʼ kathakoko roṛa.
Onate iń do noań hukumape kana, kom umerren rạnḍi maejiu doko baplakʼma, arko gidrạ eṅgatokʼma, apan ạpin gharońjko ńel todarotma ar teṅgo daramicʼe oktae reakʼ jãhãn dão aloko emaema.
Ente adom adom rạnḍi maejiuko do ńitrege Soetanakʼ hor secʼko ghańjeṛ akana.

Mạsire biswạs akan jãhãe maejiuakʼ oṛakʼre rạnḍi maejiuko tahen khan unige onko maejiukoe ńel todarotko ma. Noko rạnḍi maejiuakʼ dạyik do manḍerre alo paṛaokʼma, menkhan okoe rạnḍi maejiuren celege bạnukʼko manḍer do onkoe ńel todarotkoma.
Manḍerren maraṅ mukhiyạko okoe bes okocʼte manḍerko calaoetʼkan, ar okoe do Isorakʼ kathako porcaretʼkan ar lại cecetʼreko mehnotetʼkan, onko do dobṛa manot ocokʼ lek kanako.
Sonot sostore meneda, “Phosol enokʼ jokhecʼ ḍaṅgra do moca alom toltaea.” Arhõ olakana, “Kạmiyicʼ do acʼakʼ kuṛại ńam lek kanae.”
Bar se pe hoṛakʼ goha begorte manḍerren jãhãe mukhiyạ birudre jãhãn dos reakʼ katha alom luturakʼa.
Okoe mukhiyạko kạkạitegeko tahen onko do manḍerren sanam hoṛko samaṅre nisṛạukom jemon eṭakʼ mukhiyạko hõ botor tahentako.
Isor ar Jisu Mạsi ar bachao akan serma goḍetko samaṅreń kạjiạ̃uetʼme kana, okoe secʼ hõ baṅkate noako kạmime ar mẽtʼãhã beṅgetʼakʼte cetʼ hõ alom kạmiya.
Usạrate okoe cetanre hõ ti capokate jãhãn hudạre alom bahalea, ar eṭakʼkoakʼ kạikore hõ alom bhạgiạrikʼa, ar napaete tahenme.
Ghane ghanem nijorokʼkante hajam lạgitʼ thoṛa thoṛate darkha rasa ńũiyme, ar eken dakʼ do alom ńũiya.
Adom adom hoṛakʼ kại do nunạkʼ sodorgea je, ona reakʼ bicạr do laharege hoeakana. Arhõ adom adom hoṛ do kạiye pańja idiyetʼkoa.
Onkaleka bhage kạmiko do pusṭạute sodorgea; ar okako eṭakʼ lekateakʼ kan, onako hõ danaṅ do baṅ tahena.
Okoe golamiko khạṭaokʼkan onko sanamkoge akoren kisạ̃ṛko manot ocokʼlek menteko bujhạukoma, jemon okoe hõ Isorakʼ ńutum ar aboakʼ sikhạuna aloko nindạu daṛeakʼ.

Okoeṭakʼ golam Mạsire biswạs akan ar kisạ̃ṛakʼ gobolre menae uni do biswạsi boeha mente kisạ̃ṛ aloe nihạtema bickom artetʼ bes okocʼte uniakʼ golam reakʼe kạmima, ente uniakʼ kạmite okoeye upkạrokʼkan uni doe pạtiạrgea ar uniren do dulạṛiạ kanae. Ar am do noako katha cetʼakome ar sikhạu paṛhaokom.
Jãhãe hoṛ judạwakʼe lại cecetʼ khan ar sạriakʼ kathako, metakʼme aboren Probhu Jisu Mạsiakʼ kathako ar Isor bhokti sikhạunako bae aṅgoc enḍekhan uni do bạḍạiteye phulạu akana.
Uni do cetʼge bae baḍaere hõ jhogṛa ar katha rapṭa rạpṭire ạḍi bạ̃ṛtiye capao akana. Noako reakʼ jo do hiskạ, jhogṛa, nindạu, bạṛicʼ hudis,
ar mon baṅgla bhat akantako hoṛko talare mitʼ talao gulmal. Noko hoṛkore Isorakʼ sạritetʼ do bạnukʼa; Mạsiakʼ dhorom pạtiạu onko do dhạrti secʼte mitʼṭen lab reakʼ upại menteko bujhạueda.
Menkhan kusi monte Mạsiakʼ dhorom biswạs lekate colonle khan do maraṅ labjoṅakʼ kangea.
Dhạrtire abo do cetʼge babon ạgu dara akada ar dhạrti khon hõ cetʼge babo idi daṛeakʼa.
Onate jomakʼ ar horokʼ bandeakʼ tahen khan abo do dhirpur akae bon tahenma.
Menkhan okoe kisạ̃ṛokʼ hoyokʼ sanayetʼko onko do aema lekan biḍạu ar jhạlikoreko paṛaokʼa, ar nonkan bebuj ar laloc mon janamakoa, one onate maraokʼ ar nosṭokʼre hoṛkoe unumetʼko.
Ente sanam lekan bạṛicʼakʼ reakʼ rehetʼ do ṭaka-poesa bạ̃ṛti dulạṛ khonge. Ḍher hoṛge ona reakʼ lalocte Mạsiakʼ dhorom pạtiạu khonko ocokʼ akante apnarre ạḍi okocʼ dukteko sobokʼ tapʼakana.
Menkhan am do Isorren hoṛ kanam; noako khon men ńirjoṅme. Ar dhorom, Isor bhokti, biswạs, dulạṛ, sobori, ar mạ̃hir baṛe khudạu me.
Mạsire biswạs iạte bhage lạṛhại ma lạṛhạime. Oka jaejug jion lạgitʼ Isore hohoakatʼme ona sapʼakae tahenme. Am do ạḍi utạr hoṛko samaṅre amakʼ biswạs reakʼ goham emleda.
Isor, okoe do sanamakʼe jiwetʼ ocoyetʼ ar Mạsi Jisu, one uni do Pontus Pilạt ṭhen sạriakʼ reakʼ gohae emletʼ, uni Isor ar Jisu Mạsi samaṅre iń do noań hukumam kana,
aboren Probhu Jisu Mạsi ạuriye sodorokʼ hạbicʼ ińakʼ hukumko doho idime, jemon okoe hõ aloko neṅghao daṛeam.
Uni maraṅ bhạgan Isor, one uni eskar cakʼlaoicʼ ar rapajkoren raj ar Probhukoren Probhu kan, unige acʼakʼ okte nạpitre Mạsiye sodorea.

Isor do gujukʼ gobolren doe baṅkana. Uni do nonkan marsalreye tahenkana one okare okoe manwage bako sen daṛeakʼ. Ar okoe manwa hõ uni do tisge bako ńṭoṭhadea ar bako ńel daṛeaea; uniakʼge man ar jaejug daṛe do. Amen.

Noa puriren kisạ̃ṛko hukumakome jemon onko do aloko usul monokʼ ar nasaokʼ dhonre aloko bhorsakʼma, menkhan Isorrege bhorsa akaeko tahenma. Unige mạṅgnite jotowakʼe kulạu anṭao abon kana rạskạte beohar joṅ lạgitʼ.
Kisạ̃ṛko hukumakome onko do eṭakʼ hoṛ jemonko bhạlạiko, ar bhage kạmikoreko kisạ̃ṛokʼ, ar em hạṭińko ar mãyã monanko hoyokʼ.
Noate apnar lạgitʼ nonkan dhonko jogao joṅa one oka do darakan dinko lạgitʼ mitʼṭen keṭecʼ rehetʼ lekako hoyokʼte, sạriakʼ reakʼ jionko sapʼ dohojoṅ.
E Timothi, oka jogao doho lạgitʼ jimạ akawatʼme ona do bes okocʼte horho doho akae tahenme; ạuṛiakʼ akel reakʼ bebhokti roṛ ar eṛe cecetʼakʼ khon sahaṛ akae tahenme.
Adom adom hoṛ do nonkan akel reakʼ dạbikate Mạsiakʼ dhorom pạtiạu khonko ocokʼ akana. Isore dayawape ma.
Mạsi Jisu hotete jaejug jion reakʼ gokʼakʼ lekate Isorakʼ monejoṅ leka iń Pạul do Mạsi Jisuren mitʼṭen apostoliń hoeakana.
Noa ciṭhi iń do ińren dulạriạ hopon Timothi ṭheniń oleda. Isor Baba ar aboren Probhu Jisu Mạsi do daya bhor ar suluke danamma.
Ińren mare hapṛamko cetʼleka Isorko sewawaekan tahẽkan onkage ińhõ sapha bibekte Isoriń sewawae kana; ar am lạgitʼ siń sạṭupʼ koejoṅ jokhecʼ iń do uniń sarhaoede kana.
Ar amakʼ mẽtʼ dakʼ disạkate am tulucʼ ńapamokʼ iń cuṭ cuṭokʼ kana, jemon ińakʼ mon rạskạte perejokʼtiń.

Amakʼ ontorre menakʼ sạri biswạs reakʼ katha hõ disạ menakʼ getińa. Ar noa biswạs do amren goṛom ayo Loisre ar amren eṅgam Eunikere girobas akan tahẽkana, ar ińiń baḍaea, noa biswạs do amakʼ ontorre hõ menakʼgea.
Onate iń do arhõ noa kathań disạ ocoyetʼme kana, jemon ińakʼ tikin capote amre menakʼ Isorakʼ daya danem salgao aroe.
Ente Isor do ḍurukiạ jiu do bae emakatʼbona; bickom nonkan jiugeye emakana, one okaṭakʼre do daṛe, dulạṛ ar apnar sambṛaokʼ reakʼ ektiạri menakʼ.

Onate aboren Probhu reaṅ goha emokʼ do alom lajaokʼa, ar uni iạte hajotre minạń, onate hõ alom lajaokʼa. Ona bodolte Isor okaṭakʼ daṛeye emakatʼme ona daṛete uniakʼ bhage sombat porcar lạgitʼ iń tulucʼ duk jomme.

Isorge aboakʼ kại khone bańcao akatʼ bona ar sonot jion khemao lạgitʼe hohoakatʼbona. Aboakʼ jãhãn kạmiko lạgitʼ do baṅ, bickom uniakʼ monsubạ ar daya lạgitʼgeye kạmi akada. Dhạrti sirjạu laha khonge Mạsi Jisu hotete uni do acʼakʼ daya dane emakatʼ bona,
Menkhan ńitokʼ aboren babańcaoicʼ Jisu Mạsi do noa dhạrtiteye hecʼente ona dayaye sodorakada. Mạsi do morone bhagao akada ar bhage sombat hotete bin maraokʼ jion reakʼ kathae sodorakada.
Ar noa bhage sombat lạgitʼge uni do jạhiricʼ, apostol ar cecetʼicʼ menteye bahal akadińạ.

Ar ona iạte noako dukiń jomakada; ar enrehõ bạń lajaokʼ kana, enteń baḍaea okoereń bhorsa akana mente. Iń doń khạṭi akawana, uni ṭhen okań dohoakatʼ ona do Mạsiakʼ hijukʼ din hạbicʼ rukhiyạ lạgitʼ daṛe menakʼtaea mente.
Iń ṭhen khon okam ańjomakatʼ ona sạriakʼ reakʼ sikhnạt do nạmuna lekate sapʼ dohoeme; ar Mạsi Jisu tulucʼ jopoṛao iạte aboakʼ ontorre oka dulạṛ ar biswạs janamakan ona sapʼ dohojoṅme.
Isor okaṭakʼ rukhiyại lạgitʼe emakatʼme ona horho doho akae tahenme aboreye girobas akan sonot Jiu hotete.
Noa dom baḍaegea, Ạsiạ disạmren sanamkoge ińko dea giḍiakadińa. Onko modre Phugelus ar Hermogenes hõ menakʼkinạ.
Onesiphoros gharońjrenko Probhui mãyã akoma; uni do ạḍi dhaoye cerṭha ocoakadińa, ar ińakʼ hajot iạte bae lajaolena.
Romreye tahẽkanre uni do jidkateye sendra ńamledińạ.
Ephesusre okalekae sapʼ dapʼetʼ tahẽkan, ona do bes okocʼtem baḍaegea. Probhui danae ma, jemon Mạsiakʼ hijukʼ dinre Probhu ṭhen khon mãyãe ńam.
Ado E bachatiń, Mạsi Jisuakʼ dayate am do daṛeanicʼ hoyokʼme.
Aema gohako talare ińakʼ mocate okako cecetʼakʼem ańjomakatʼ ona sapʼ dohoe lạgitʼ am do nonkan hoṛko jimạwakome one okoe do eṭakʼko hõko cetʼ daṛeako.
Mạsi Jisuren mitʼṭen lek lekanicʼ sipạhi leka am do ale sãote duk sahaome.
Lạṛhại senkate okoe hõ gharońj reakʼ do bako dạndikʼa, jemon sipạhi lekate okoeye bhurtikede uniye kusi ocoye.
Onkage haparaokʼ enecʼre seletʼkate jãhãege niạm lekate bae enecʼ khan uni do jid ṭupri bae ńama.
Mehnotetʼkan casage pạhilre do phosol reakʼ bhag hatao lek kanae.
Iń okań menetʼkan ona do alom bhabnakʼa, ente Probhuge jotowakʼ reaṅ bujhạu lạgitʼ daṛeye emama.
Jisu Mạsi reaṅ noa katha disạ dohoeme, uni do gocʼko khone jiwetʼ beretʼ ocolena ar Dạud bõsren hoṛe tahẽkana. Okaṭakʼ bhage sombat iń porcaretʼkan onarege noa katha do ol menakʼa,
ar noa bhage sombat porcar iạte iń do duk sasetiń jomakada; ar dusiakatʼ hoṛ leka tol hõń tol ocolena. Menkhan Isorakʼ katha do baṅ tolakana.
Onate Isor okoeye bachao akatʼko onko lạgitʼ jotowakʼ iń sahao akada, jemon onko hõ Jisu Mạsi hotete kại khon bańcaoko ńam ar jaejug ṭhonokko hameṭ joṅ.
Noa katha do sạri kana je, Mạsi tulucʼ bon gocʼ akan khan, enḍekhan uni tulucʼ jiwetʼ hõ bon tahena.
Sombhuri katebon sahao daṛeakʼ khan, enḍekhan uni tulucʼ raj hõ bon calaoa. Ar uni bon baṅle khan, enḍekhan uni hõ aboe baṅbona.
Abo do bepạtiạrko bon hoelenre hõ uni do pạtiạricʼgeye tahena, ente acʼtetʼ do ohoe baṅ daṛelena.
Noako katha do hoṛko disạ ocokom. Ar Isor samaṅre sontorkom jemon ạuṛiakʼ kathakote aloko reṭepeṭekʼ. Noa reakʼ do cetʼ damge bạnukʼa, bickom okoe onako ańjom onko doko bangla bhaṭokʼa.

Okoe cetanre Isor doe dhirpurge, metakʼme, okoeakʼ do lajaokʼ reakʼ jãhãn karonge bạnukʼ onkan kạmiyạ hoṛ lekate ar sạriakʼ reakʼ katha ṭhikteye beoharetʼkan onkan hoṛ leka apnartetʼ Isor samaṅre teṅgokʼ lạgitʼ kurumuṭuime.
Isor be bhokti ar bạṛicʼ kathako khon sahaṛokʼme, ente nonkan katha iạte hoṛkoakʼ monre Isor bhokti do kom idikʼa.
Okoe nonkan kathako roṛ onkoakʼ cecetʼakʼ do sea buḍurokʼ ghao leka pasnao idikʼa. Ar nonkan hoṛko talarege Humenaeos ar Philetus hõ menakʼkinạ.
Nukin do Isorakʼ sạriakʼ khonkin sạṅgiń akana. Unkin dokin meneda, biswạsiko do gocʼko khon laharegeko beretʼakana. Nukin do adomkoakʼ biswạskin nosṭoyetʼtakoa.

Enrehõ Isorakʼ gathaoakʼ kajak rehetʼ do teṅgo akana, ar ona cetanre mohor chapakatʼ leka noa kathako ol menakʼa, “Probhu do acʼrenkoe baḍaeyetʼkoa, ar okoe do Mạsi Probhu menteko hohoaekan onko do sanam bedhorom kạmi khonko sahaṛokʼma.”
Eken napṛakʼ oṛakʼrege sona ar rupạ reakʼ bhajanko tahena ona do baṅ, menkhan kaṭ ar hasa reakʼ bhajan hõ tahengea. Onako modre adomakʼ do manot lạgitʼ ar adomakʼ do bemanot lạgitʼ beoharokʼa.

Okoe do noako nicạṛ kạmiyakʼ bhajan leka kanko, onko khon pharakokʼte jãhãe apnare saphakʼ enḍekhan uni do nonkanakʼ bhajan lekae hoyokʼa okaṭakʼ do manot lạgitʼ beoharokʼkan. Sonot lạgitʼge uni doe bachao doho ocokʼa, uni do Probhuakʼ kạmireye lagaokʼa ar sanam lekan bhage kạmi lạgitʼ tear akane tahena.
Juạn umer reakʼ bạṛicʼ sanako khon ńirjoṅme ar sapha ontorte Probhuko hohoaekan onko tulucʼ dhorom, pạtiạr, dulạṛ ar suluk baṛe khudạume.
Lelha, hohakʼ ar reṭe peṭekʼre alom seledokʼa, ente am dom baḍaegea onako do jhogṛae janam ocoea.
Okoe doe Probhuren gutikan, uni do jhogṛakʼ baṅ lektaea, bickom sanamkore daya tahentaema. Uni do eṭakʼko cetʼako reakʼ daṛe ar sahao gun tahen hoyokʼtaea.

Okoe uni birudreko teṅgokʼ onko do mạ̃hir salakʼe cetʼako ma. Ona cecetʼakʼ do noa asteye emakoma, Isor do mon ạcur reakʼ ạte emakote onko do Isorakʼ sạriakʼtetʼ reakʼ khạndritetʼ jemonko baḍae daṛeakʼ.
Onate onko do Soetanakʼ jhạli khonko ńir paskaokʼa, ente Soetan do acʼakʼ sana purạu lạgitʼge onkoe sapʼ dohoakatʼko tahẽkana.
Noa katha baḍaeme je, mucạtʼ dinkore ạḍi muhin reakʼ okteko hijukʼa.
Manwa do eken apnargeko dulạṛokʼa, onko do ṭaka-poesako dulạṛa, usul monan ar nindạukoko hoyokʼa, durnamko gahaoa, ar eṅga apa bebataokoko hoyokʼa. Onko do bebatao ar bebhoktikoko hoyokʼa,
onkore dulạṛ do baṅ tahena, onko doko jhogṛakʼa menkhan bako miṭmaṭa. Onko do eṭakʼko reakʼko oktawa, ar apnar do bako sambṛao daṛeakʼa, kurmutạhakoko hoyokʼa, ar bhageakʼ doko hirkhạwakʼa.
Onko do eṛe, ṭhok ar bạḍạite phulạu akanko hoyokʼa. Isor bạgikate rij-roṅge bạ̃ṛtiko dulạṛa.
Onkoakʼ bahretetʼem ńelle khan Isor bhokti menakʼtakoa mentem bujhạukea, menkhan Isor bhokti reakʼ daṛege onko doko baṅetʼkana. Nonkan hoṛko khon do pharak akae tahenme.
Nonkan hoṛko modre adomko do oṛakʼ oṛakʼ bolokate lilhi ạimạiko hatetʼkoa, one okoe do kại ghạṭiteko ten akan; onko do nana parkan bạṛicʼ sanateko ạyur ocokʼkana.
Onko do siń sạṭupʼ sikhnạt reakʼ kathako ańjomeda, menkhan tishõ Isorakʼ sạriakʼ reakʼ khạndritetʼ do bako bujhạu daṛeakʼ kana.

Cetʼleka Jannes ar Jambres do Mose birudrekin teṅgolen onkage noko hoṛko hõ ona sạriakʼ birudreko teṅgon kana. Nokoakʼ mon do bạricʼgetakoa ar Mạsiakʼ dhorom biswạs reakʼ jãhãn cinhạge onkore baṅ ńamokʼ kana.
Menkhan onko do ar bako laha daṛeakʼa, ente Jannes ar Jambresakʼ lelhatetʼ cetʼleka sanamko ṭhen pusṭạute sodorlen onkage onkoakʼ lelhatetʼ hõ sanamko ṭhen sodorokʼa.
Am do ińakʼ sikhnạt, cạl-colon, monsubạ, biswạs, sahao daṛe, sombhuri ar dulạṛ do bestegem nirik akada.
Ona chaḍa Antiokiạre, Ikoniumre ar Lustrạre paṛao ạdiń tahẽkan santaokoń sahao akatʼ reakʼ katha hõm baḍaegea, menkhan Probhu do onako khone rukhiyạ akadińạ.
Okoe Mạsi Jisu tulucʼ joṛao mitʼkate Isor bhoktite din khemaoko menjoṅkan onko do jotogeko khed ocokʼa.
Menkhan bạṛicʼko ar bhõnḍko do din din artetʼgeko bạṛicʼ idikʼa. Onko do eṭakʼko bhul horteko idikoa ar apnarhõ bhul horteko calakʼa.
Menkhan am do okaṭakʼem cetʼakatʼ ar khạṭi montem biswạs akan onare ṭarhao akae tahenme, ente okoeko ṭhen khonem cetʼakatʼ ona mam baḍaege.
Huḍiń tahen khonge am do sonot sostor khonem cetʼakawana. Ar noa sonot sostorge am do Jisu Mạsire biswạs iạte kại khon bańcao ńam reakʼ bude danama.
Sonot sostor reakʼ mitʼke mitʼ katha do Isor ṭhen khon hecʼakana ar ona do cecetʼakʼre, udgạure, sudhrạukʼre ar dhoromre etokʼ lạgitʼ jạruṛgea,
jemon Isorren hoṛ purạte lek leka hoekate bhage kạmi lạgitʼ sajakanicʼe hoedaṛeakʼ.
Mạsire ruạṛ hijukʼ ar uniakʼ raj reaṅ disạ dohoete Isor samaṅre, okoe do jiwetʼko ar gocʼkoe bicạrko uni Jisu Mạsi samaṅre iń do noań hukumam kana.
Isorakʼ katha lại jạhirme; batarre ar bin batarre, am do jao okte lại jạhir lạgitʼ sapṛao akae tahenme; ạḍi sobori salakʼ cetʼakote hoṛkoakʼ dosko udukʼakome, onko sontorkom ar sopolha emakom.
Nonkan okteko hijukʼa tinre hoṛko do sạriakʼ reakʼ sikhnạt bako sahaoa, bickom akoakʼ sana purạu lạgitʼ nonkan aema gurukoko ḍạṅjoṅa okoe do onko kusi ocoko leka sikhnạtko emokʼ.
Onko do Isorakʼ sạriakʼtetʼ reaṅ ańjom baṅkate kạhniko kusiyakʼa.
Menkhan am do sanamakʼre sambṛao akae tahenme, duk sahaome ar Mạsi reaṅ bhage sombat porcarme, ar Isor okako kạmiye emakatʼme ona purạume.
Ente iń do ńit hoń coḍor ocokʼ kana; ar ińakʼ gujukʼ somoe do seṭer akana.
Bhage lạṛhại iń lạṛhại kana, iń lạgitʼ ṭhik akatʼ horre mucạtʼ hạbicʼ iń ńir calao akana ar Mạsiakʼ dhorom biswạsiń sapʼ dohoakada.

Onate iń lạgitʼ dhorom reakʼ jit ṭupri dohoakana. Bicạr dinre dhorom bicạricʼ Probhu do ona kuṛại lekate jit reakʼ malae danạńạ. Ar eken iń eskargeye danạńạ ona do baṅ, menkhan okoe soborikate uniakʼ ruạṛ hijukʼ reakʼko koyokʼ horakatʼ onko sanamkoe danakoa.
Am do kurumuṭuime, jemon hakopako iń ṭhenem hecʼ daṛeakʼ,
ente Demas do nonḍenakʼ dhạrtiye dulạṛetʼkante iń bạgikate Thessolonikiteye calaoena. Ona chaḍa Kreskes do Galatiạteye calaoena ar Titus do Dalmatiạte;
Eken Luk eskarge iń soṅgere menaea. Am do Mark soṅgekate ạgu darayem, ente ińakʼ kạmi lạgitʼ uniakʼ do ạḍi jạruṛ menakʼa.
Tikhikus do Ephesusteń kolkedea.
Troasre Karpos ṭhen hoṛmo reakʼ okaṭakʼ kicricʼ iń hiṛiń oṭowatʼ tahẽkan, hijukʼ jokhecʼ ona baṛe ạgu daraeme. Ona chaḍa guṛhe dohoakan puthiko, biseskaete hartare olakʼ, onako soṅge daraeme.
Okoe Aleksander do tama reakʼe kạmikan uni do ińakʼ ạḍiye loksan akada. Uni okaṭakʼe ceka akatʼ ona do Probhugeye halawaea.
Am hõ uni khon sontorakae tahenme, ente uni do aleakʼ kathako ạḍiye tạkicʼ darametʼ tahẽkana.
Pạhil dhaoiń bicạr ocolenre okoe hõ bako goṛo ạdiń tahẽkana, bickom sanamkogeko bạgi giḍiwạdiń tahẽkana; ona do alo baṛe lekhakʼtako ma.

Menkhan Probhu do iń sãoteye tahẽkana ar daṛeye dan ạdiń tahẽkana. Onate iń do purạte bhage sombatiń porcar daṛeakʼ tahẽkana ar sanam boṅgan hoṛ jạtrenkoko ańjomleda. Isor do dhạcri kulakʼ moca khone rukhiyạledińạ.
Probhu do sanam bạṛicʼakʼ kạmi khone rukhiyạyińạ ar acʼakʼ serma rajreye idi seṭerińạ. Uniakʼge ṭhonok hoyokʼtaema jug cetan jug. Amen.
Priskạ ar Ạkuilạtekin ar Onesiphoros gharońjrenko ińakʼ johar emakom.
Erastus do Korinthreye tahẽyena, menkhan Trophimus do Miletusre ruạkʼgeń bạgi oṭoadea.
Am do kurumuṭuime rabaṅ din ạurire jemon nonḍem hecʼ daṛeakʼ. Eubulus ar Pudens ar Linus ar Klaudiạ ar joto boehakoko joharam kana.
Probhu do am tulucʼ baṛeye tahenma. Isorakʼ daya ape tulucʼ tahẽakan tahenma.

Iń Pạul do Isorren golam ar Jisu Mạsiren mitʼṭen apostoliń hoeakana, jemon Isorre bachao hoṛko biswạs reakʼ horteń ạgu daṛeako, ar Isor bhokti sãote oka sạriakʼtetʼ menakʼ ona baḍae lạgitʼ iń goṛo daṛeako.
Iń do jaejug jion ńam reakʼ aste Mạsiń sewawae kana. Dhạrti ạuri sirjạure bin eṛeyicʼ Isor do noa jion imạń reakʼe gokʼ akawạdińa.
Aboren babańcaoicʼ Isorakʼ hukum leka okań lại jạhiretʼkan ona hotete Isor do acʼakʼ katha ṭhik okteregeye sodor akada.
Mạsire biswạs iạte okoe iń tulucʼe mitʼakan, uni ińren sạriạkʼren hopon Titus ṭhen noa ciṭhiń oleda. Isor Baba ar aboren babańcaoicʼ Jisu Mạsi do daya ar suluke dan apema.
Kret dipre okaṭakʼ kạmi ńit hõ ạuri sạtokʼ ona sạt lạgitʼge iń do amiń doho oṭoakatʼmea. Ar ińiń hukum akatʼme leka mitʼke mitʼ nagraha reakʼ manḍerkore maraṅ mukhiyạko kạmire bahalkom.

Manḍerren maraṅ mukhiyạ do nonkanicʼ hoyokʼ jạruṛaea jemon uni do okoe hõ aloko dusi daṛeae. Uniren do eken mitʼṭen erae tahen ma. Uniren gidrạko do Mạsire biswạsiko hoyokʼ ma, onko do akoakʼ kusi sana leka aloko colon ma ar bebataoko aloko hoyokʼma.

Isor ṭhen khon dạyike ńamakatʼ manḍer ạyuricʼ lekate nonka hoyokʼ jạruṛtaea jemon uni do okoe hõ aloko neṅghaoe. Uni do ḍiṭhạ̃uicʼ do alo, edre godokʼicʼ hõ alo, ńu bulokʼicʼ hõ alo, dalalicʼ hõ alo, lalocikʼ hõ aloe hoyokʼma.
Menkhan uni do peṛayicʼ, bhageakʼ dulạṛicʼ, akelanicʼ, dhoromicʼ, sonoticʼ, ar sambṛaokʼicʼe hoyokʼma.
Isorakʼ pạtiạr katha, okaṭakʼ iń cetʼ akawade, ona do kajakte sapʼ dohoe jạruṛaea, jemon sạriakʼ sikhnạt reaṅe porcar daṛeakʼ ar okoe ona birudreko teṅgokʼ onko jemon bhulkoe udukʼ daṛeako.
