Nonkan ḍher hoṛ menakʼkoa okoe do bin gobol ar bokbokaokʼ arko bulạukokan. Okoe do khatnakʼre jorko emetʼkan, iń do nonkanko hoṛakʼ kathageń meneda.
Noko hoṛkoakʼ moca do tubetʼkatako jạruṛa, ente lab joṅ lạgitʼ baṅ ganokʼakʼko cetʼako kana; ar nonkate onko do gharońjkoko ạulạueda.
Onko modren mitʼṭen nạbi do noa kathae meneda, “Kret dipren hoṛko doko eṛegea, bir janwar lekanako, asaṅpoḍa arko lebṛagea.”
Ona goha do sạrigea. Onate ạḍi ajhaṭte onkoakʼ dosko udukʼakome jemon onko do dhorom biswạsre ṭhik lekako sapʼ doho akae tahen,
ar Jihudikoakʼ kạhniko ar sạriakʼko dea giḍiakatʼ hoṛkoakʼ hukum aloko hetawakʼ ma.
Okoeakʼ ontor napaege onko ṭhen do jotowakʼge napaegea, menkhan okoeakʼ ontor bạṛicʼ ar bepạtiạrge onko ṭhen cetʼge napaeakʼ do bạnukʼanaṅ, ente onkoakʼ mon ar bibek do mạilạgetakoa.
Onko do Isorko baḍaeyede kana menteko lạiyạgokʼ kana, menkhan akoakʼ kạmi hotete uni doko baṅekana. Onko do hirkhạ ocokʼko ar bebataoko kanako ar sanam bhage kạmi lạgitʼ doko okạjuạgea.
Am do nonka cetʼakome jemon amakʼ katha tulucʼ sạri cecetʼakʼ reakʼ juri tahen.
Haṛam hoṛ do jotowakʼre soteko tahen ma; ar manot ńam lekko hoyokʼma; onko do bhage akelanko, sạri pạtiạu, dulạṛ ar sombhuri mon tahentako.
Onkage buḍhikohõ Isor bhoktikoko hoyokʼma ar bhage sikhnạtkoko emokʼma. Ente eṭakʼko oktawako ar ńu bulokʼ do lek baṅkan takoa.
Enḍekhan juạn maejiukoko lại cetʼ daṛeakoa jemon onko do akoren jãwãetetʼ ar gidrạkoko dulạṛko,
ar apnartetʼko sambṛaokʼma, napaeko tahenma, gharońjko disạima, dayakʼkoko hoyokʼma ar jãwãe gobolreko tahenma, jemon okoe hõ Isorakʼ katha aloko bemanot.
Onkage juạnko hõ hukumakome jemon apnartetʼko sambṛaokʼ.
Sanamakʼrege am do onko ṭhen bhage kạmi reakʼ nạmuna hoyokʼme. Amakʼ cecetʼakʼre bạṛicʼ monsubạ ar baṅ moneakʼ mon jemon alo tahen.
Okoe hõ aloko dusạu daṛeam onate onkan sạri cecetʼakʼ emokʼme, jemon am birudren hoṛko do lajaoreko paṛaokʼ, ente abon reaṅ bạṛicʼ roṛ reakʼ do cetʼge baṅ tahentakoa.
Golamko sikhạu paṛhaokom jemon akoren nij kisạ̃ṛko ṭhen gobol akanko tahen, sanamakʼre kusi ocoko salakʼ, ar aloko ṭenḍosokʼma,
kisạ̃ṛkoakʼ jinisko aloko kombṛoema, bickom sanamakʼre pạtiạr kanako menteko sạbudokʼma, jemon aboren babańcaoicʼ Isorakʼ oka cecetʼakʼ menakʼ ona joto secʼ khon mońj okocʼteko benao rakabokʼ.
Isorakʼ oka daya hotete kại khon bańcao ńamokʼ ona do sanam manwako ṭhenge sodor akana.
Noa dayage aboye cetʼabon kana jemon Isor bebhokti ar dhạrti reakʼ lalockobon baṅakʼte nahakʼ jugre apnar bon sambṛaokʼte Isor bhokti salakʼ dhorom jion bon khemao,
ar aboren maraṅ Isor ar babańcaoicʼ Jisu Mạsiakʼ ṭhonok reakʼ sodorokʼ do rạskạte bon ńelhor akae tahen.
Jisu Mạsi do abo lạgitʼ acʼakʼ jiwiye emkeda, jemon sanam kạiko khone chaḍao bon ar onate nonkan mitʼṭen jạte saphakote eken acʼrengeko hoyokʼte eṭakʼko bhạlại lạgitʼko ahkaokʼ.
Onate am do purạ ektiạri salakʼ noako reaṅ sikhạu paṛhaokom, sopolha emakom ar dosko udukʼakome. Ar am do okoe hõ alo jemonko neṅghaome.
Isorren hoṛko disạ ocokom jemon onko do mạliki ar ektiạri menakʼtako hoṛ gobolreko tahente, onkoakʼ hukumko batao ar hoṛkoakʼ sanam lekan bhage kạmi lạgitʼ sapṛao akanko tahen.
Onko do okoeakʼ hõ jemon aloko nindạu se aloko jhogṛakoma, bickom soṛa monanko hoyokʼte sanamko tulucʼ mạ̃hir salakʼ jemonko beohar.

Abo hõ pạhil do bebujko, bebataoko, bulạu ocokʼko, ạḍi lekanakʼ bạṛicʼ sana ar hạ̃s rạskạre golam akanko bon tahẽkana. Abo do dusṭạmi ar hiskạte din bon khemoetʼ tahẽkana. Ar eṭakʼko bon hirkhạwako kan tahẽkana.
Menkhan aboren babańcaoicʼ Isorakʼ daya ar dulạṛ abore sodoren khan uni do kại khone bańcaoketʼ bona.

Jãhãn bhage kạmi lạgitʼ do bae bańcao akatʼ bona, menkhan dayategeye bańcaoaketʼ bona. Sonot Jiu hotete nawa janamte ar nawa arokʼte uni do aboakʼ ontore ạrupʼ saphakeda, ar nonkateye bańcaoketʼ bona.
Aboren babańcaoicʼ Jisu Mạsi hotete uni do sonot Jiue danatʼ bona.
Jemon jaejug jion reakʼ aste Isorakʼ sanamakʼren ạidạriko bon hoyokʼ. Noa do eken Isorakʼ dayate dhorom mentebon lekha ocoakana.

Noa do sạri katha kangea. Ińakʼ monejoṅakʼ do noage, am do noako babotre jor emakʼme, jemon Isorre okoeko biswạs akan onko do eṭakʼko bhạlạiko reakʼ kạmire lạgiạ paṛao akanko tahen. Noako do bhagegea ar hoṛko lạgitʼ porhoanakʼ kana.
Menkhan bebuj leka ṭheṭa baṛae, bõs budạ, jhogṛa-jhạṭi ar ạn-ạrikote reṭepeṭekʼ khon am do sạṅgińre tahenme, ente noakore jãhãn lab do bạnukʼa; ar noako do ạuṛiakʼgea.
Okoe hoṛ bhul cecetʼatʼte dola duliye hoeocoyetʼ uni do pạhilre mitʼ dhao, ar tayomte arhõ dosar dhao sontorkaeme. Ar noate kạmi baṅ hoelen khan uni tulucʼ do gate hõ alom gatekʼa.
Baḍaegeam, nonkan hoṛkoakʼ hudis cintạ do bạṛicʼgetakoa. Uni doe kạikại hoṛkana; ar acʼ apnartege dusi menteye sạbudokʼ kana.
Artemas se Tukhikus am ṭheniń kol lekinre am do Nikopoliste iń ṭhen hijukʼ lạgitʼ kurumuṭuime, ente Nikoposlirege rabaṅ din khemao doń goṭa akawana.
Ạn guru Senas ar Apolloss do calakʼ horre goṛowạkinme, jemon jãhãn ṭonṭa alo hoyokʼ tạkin.
Eṭakʼko bhạlạiko reakʼ kạmire lạgiạ paṛao akae tahen lạgitʼ aboren hoṛko cetʼako hoyokʼa, jemon onko do eṭakʼkoakʼ reṅgejokʼreko goṛo daṛeako. Arko nonka lekhan onko do jionreko jo bahakʼa.
Iń tulucʼ menakʼko jotoge am doko joharam kana. Mạsire biswạs iạte okoe aleko dulạṛetʼle onko do aleakʼ johar emakom. Ape sanamko tulucʼ Isorakʼ daya baṛe tahenma.
Iń Pạul do Mạsi Jisuren kạidiń hoeakana. Iń ar ạlińren pạtiạricʼ boeha Timothi do ạlińren dulạṛiạ gate ar são kạmiyicʼ Philemon ṭhen,
Ạlińren misera Apphia ṭhen, ạlińren são palṭon Arkippus ṭhen ar amakʼ oṛakʼre tinạkʼ do manḍerren lekateko jarwakʼkan onko ṭhen noa ciṭhi liń oleda.
Aboren Isor Baba ar Probhu Jisu Mạsi do daya ar suluke dan apema.
Iń do jaoge koejoṅreń disạyetʼmete Isoriń gun manao joharae kana,
Ente Probhu Jisure amakʼ biswạs ar Isorren hoṛko lạgitʼ amakʼ dulạṛ reakʼ kathań ańjomeda.

Iń do noań koejoṅ kana, amakʼ biswạs khạtirte ar amakʼ dan hotete Mạsi jemone sarhaokʼ. Ona chaḍa Mạsi tulucʼ bon kolom mitʼ akante oka bhorbon ńamakatʼ ona purạtem bujhạu daṛeakʼte dan lạgitʼ kạmi jemon arhõ ḍherokʼtam.
E boeha, amakʼ dulạṛ ńelte iń do ạḍiń rạskạkʼ kana ar udgạuiń ńamakada, ente am do Isorren hoṛkoakʼ ontorre nawate udgạu monem sagen ocoakada.
Onate Mạsi hotete amakʼ dạyikʼ babotre ạḍi dil salakʼ iń hukum daṛekema,
Mitʼ jokhecʼ am ṭhen uniakʼ jãhãn damge baṅ tahẽkana, menkhan ńitokʼ uni do bana hoṛ ṭhenge porhowanicʼ kanae.
Jaehok, am ṭheniń kolekana; uni do ińren dulạṛiạ gate kanae.
Ińakʼ kạmi lạgitʼge iń ṭhen dohokayiń menetʼ tahẽkana, jemon bhage sombat porcar khạtirte ińakʼ noa bondi dosare uni do am huyạte ińe sapʼsor daṛeạńa.
Menkhan amakʼ hukum begorte cetʼ cekaege bạń khojkana, jemon jormoṭte daya aloe ńam, bickom am apnar khonem dayawae.
Ar jaejug lạgitʼ jemonem ńam ruạṛe, hoedaṛeakʼa onatege uni do thoṛa ghuṛi lạgitʼ am khone begarlena.
Menkhan golam lekate do ar bam ńamea bickom golam khon hõ ḍher metakʼme, dulạṛiạ boeha lekatem ńamea. Ińren do ạḍi dulạṛiạ kanae, menkhan manwa ar biswạsi boeha lekate am ṭhen do artetʼge.
Onate inạ mitʼ biswạsi mentem hudis edeńkan khan enḍekhan iń cetʼlekam ataṅedeń onkage Onesimus hõ ataṅeme.
Ar amakʼ jãhãnakʼe lokshan akatʼtam khan se am ṭhen jãhãnakʼ babotre rin menakʼtae khan ona do ińakʼ rin kana mente bujhạume.
Iń Pạul do nij tite noa ciṭhiń oleda ar ona rin reakʼ iń hala ruạṛ katama. Hẽ noa katha do roroṛ reakʼ jạruṛ bạnukʼa je, Mạsire biswạs babotre amge iń ṭhenem rinigea mente.
E boeha, Probhuren bon hoeakante ińakʼ monejoṅakʼ do noage je, am do mitʼṭen upʼkạrińme. Biswạsi boeha lekate am do ińakʼ monre nawate udgạu ińme.
Am do ińakʼ katham senakʼa menteń baḍaete noa ciṭhiń olam kana. Menkhan ińiń baḍaea, iń okań lạiamkan ona khon hõ am do ḍhergem onkaea.
Ar mitʼṭen kathań metamkana, peṛakoakʼ kandha do iń lạgitʼ sapṛao dohokakʼme, ente asokʼ kạnạń, apeakʼ koejoṅte iń do ape ṭheniń kol ruạṛ ocokʼa.
Epaphrase hõe joharam kana; uni do Jisu Mạsi iạte iń tulucʼ hajotre menaea.
Ona chaḍa Mark, Aristarkhos, Demas ar Luk, ińren noko são kạmiyạko hõ amko joharam kana.
Aboren Probhu Jisu Mạsiakʼ daya apeakʼ jiu tulucʼ baṛe tahenma.
Ḍher din lahare nạbiko hotete Isor do aboren hapṛamko ṭhen ạḍi dhao ar ạḍi lekate thoṛa thoṛateye galmaraoatʼko tahẽkana.
Menkhan sesa sisi dinkore uni do acʼren Hopon hotete abokoe galmaraoatʼ bona. Isor do acʼren Hopon sanamakʼren ạidạri hoyokʼ lạgitʼe dohokedea. Ar Hopon hotetege uni do sanamakʼe sirjạukeda.

Isorakʼ sanam gun do uni Hopontetʼrege menakʼa; ar Hopontetʼ kangeae Isorren purạ nạmuna do. Hopon do acʼakʼ ektiạranakʼ kathate jotowakʼe calaoetʼ kana. Manwakoakʼ kại reakʼ puruchun meṭaokate Hopon do coṭ utạricʼren Isorakʼ jojomsa aṛereye duṛupʼena.
Uni do acʼ apat ṭhen khon okaṭakʼ ńutume ńamakatʼ ar cetʼleka ona do serma goḍetkoakʼ ńutum khon hõ maraṅge, onkage uni do acʼtetʼ hõ serma goḍetko khon maraṅe hoeakana.

Isor do jãhãtis cetʼ jãhãe serma goḍet noa kathae menakawadea, “Am do ińren hopon kanam, teheńge amren apatiń hoyena?” Arhõ uni do cetʼ noae menakada, “Iń do uniren apatiń hoyokʼa ar uni do ińren hopone hoyokʼa?”
Baṅ, ona do bae menakada. Isor do acʼren dulạṛiạ Hopon noa dhạrtite kole jokhecʼe menakada, “Isorren sanam goḍetko do uniko sewawae ma.”
Serma goḍetko reaṅ doe meneda, “Uni do hoe hõ acʼren goḍete hoe ocoyedea; ar jolokʼkan seṅgel do acʼren golame hoe ocoyedea.”
Menkhan Hopontetʼ reaṅ doe meneda, “E Isor, amakʼ siṅghạson do jug cetan jugge; ar amakʼ ḍanṭao do hok reakʼ ḍanṭaokangea.
Am do dhoromem dulạṛeda ar bedhorom dom kurudakʼ kana; onate Isor, amren Isor do, amren soṅgetenko khon hõ bạ̃ṛti hulạs sunum lekae ojokʼ akatʼmea.”
Isor do arhõe menakada, “E Probhu, am do etohopʼrege dhạrti reakʼ rehetʼem bạisạu akada; ar serma hõ amakʼ titegem benao akada.
Onako do dhaṅ dhaserokʼa, menkhan am do jaejug hạbicʼem tahena. Kicʼricʼ lekage onako do mare cabakʼa.
Oyonakʼlekage onako dom guṛhe dohokakʼa, ar kicricʼ leka onako do pherao ocokʼa. Menkhan am do enkagem tahena, ar amakʼ dinko do tishõ baṅ mucạdokʼa.”
Isor do tis baṅ jãhãe serma goḍet noa kathae menakawade, “Tin hạbicʼ amren bạiriko amakʼ jaṅga latarre bạń dohoko, unhạbicʼ am do ińakʼ jojomsa aṛere duṛupʼme?”
Serma goḍetko do cetʼ sanamkoge sapʼ sosor Jiuko doko baṅkana? Okoe kại khon bańcaoko ńam onko sapʼ sorako lạgitʼge coṅ onko mako kol ocoakan.
Onate akabon ańjomakatʼ ona manao lạgitʼ arhõ moneakʼ lek tabona, jemon ona khon alo bon pharakokʼ.
Serma goḍet hotete okaṭakʼ katha lại jạhirlen ona ma bacoṅ hante natelen; ona chaḍa jãhãege Isorakʼ hukume bebatao akatʼ ar uniakʼ katha bae ańjometʼkan uni do acʼakʼ hok reakʼ kuṛạiye ńamakada.

Enḍekhan kại khon bańcaokʼ lạgitʼ Isor okaṭakʼ maraṅ bondobose dohoakatʼ ar ona babon bạsutakʼ khan enḍekhan cekate bańcao bon ńama? Kại khon bańcao ńam reakʼ katha do pạhilre Probhu Jisugeye menleda ar okoe onako ańjomletʼ onko do ona bańcaokʼ reakʼ sạriạkʼtetʼ abo ṭhenko sạbud akada.
Ona salakʼ Isor hõ ạḍi utạr cinhạko ar hahaṛawakʼko ar daṛe kạmiko ar acʼakʼ monejoṅ leka sonot Jiuakʼ daya dankote ona reaṅ gohae emakada.
Darakan okaṭakʼ puri reakʼ kathale roṛetʼkan, Isor do ona serma goḍetkokoakʼ gobolre bae dohoakada.
Sonot sostorre mitʼ hoṛ do noa gohae emakada; Manwa doe celekante, uni reakʼem dạndikʼ kana? Ar manwa Hopon baṅe okoekante, uniakʼ kom moneakʼkana?
Manwa do serma goḍetko khon thoṛaganem huḍiń akadea. Ar uni do ṭhonok ar manot reakʼ mukuṭem horokʼ akawadea.

Sanamakʼkoge uni jaṅga latarrem gobol akada. Isor do sanamakʼge tinre manwa gobolreye dohokeda unre ona khon do cetʼge bae sarecʼlakʼa. Menkhan ńitokʼ sanamakʼge manwa gobolre bon ńeletʼ kana ona do baṅ,

menkhan abo do Jisu bon ńel ńame kana. Uni do serma goḍetko khon thoṛa ghạṛicʼe huḍiń ocolena, jemon Isorakʼ dayate mimitʼ manwako lạgitʼ jiwiye em daṛeakʼ. Uni do duk sahaokateye gocʼlente man ar ṭhonok reakʼ raj mukuṭe dan akawadea.
Sanamakʼ do Isor lạgitʼ kangea ar uni hotetege sanamakʼ do hoeakana. Onate ạḍi utạr hoponko acʼakʼ mạhimaren bhạgiạdarko hoeocoko lạgitʼ Jisu do duk jom talate sạbit ocoye reakʼ lek tahẽkantaea.
Ente sonot ocoicʼ hõ ar sonot ocokʼko hõ mitʼṭen khon kangeako. Onate Jisu do onko hoṛko boeha mente hohowako do bae lajaokʼ kana.
Sonot sostorre uni do Isore metaekana, “Boehako ṭhen iń do am reaṅ iń lại jạhira, ar kạlisiạre amiń gun manao joharama.”
Jisu do arhõe meneda, “Iń do Isor cetanre bhorsa akaniń tahena.” Ar mitʼ jaegare uni doe meneda, “Nokʼõe ńelme, iń ar onko hoponko one okoeko do Isore emakawạdiń.”
Onko gidrạko doko hoyokʼkana mãyãm ar jelren manwage. Onate Jisu acʼtetʼ hõ jel ar mãyãmren manwae hoyena, jemon gujukʼ reakʼ daṛe okoeakʼ tire menakʼ uni Soetan do acʼakʼ gujukʼ hoteteye bhagaoe.
Ar gujukʼ botorte okoe jiwetʼ jonom golamko tahẽkan onko jemone chaḍaoko.
Jisu do serma goḍetko bae goṛowakoa, menkhan Abraham bõsrenkoge uni doe goṛowakoa.

Onate Jisu do sanam secʼte acʼren boehako leka hoyokʼ hoelentaea, jemon uni do mãyãwan ar pạtiạranicʼ maraṅ naeke lekate Isorakʼkoe sapʼsor daṛeakʼ. Ar noa reakʼ monsubạ do hoyokʼ kana, jemon acʼakʼ gujukʼte manwakoakʼ kạiye ocogte Isore kusi ocoye.
Ar acʼge biḍạu sahaokate sasete jomletʼte uni do biḍạu ocokʼkankoe goṛo daṛeakoa.

Onate E sonot boehako, okoe do serma rajren ạidạriko hoyokʼ lạgitʼ uniakʼ hohoakʼren bakhradarkope hoeakan, ape do Jisu reaṅ moneakʼpe. Ente okoere bon pạtiạu akan uni kangeae Isor ṭhen khon kol ocoyicʼ do ar maraṅ naeke hõ unige.
Isorakʼ gharońjren hoṛko ńel todarotkore Mose cetʼleka pạtiạricʼe tahẽkan onkage Jisu okoeye bachao bahallede uni Isor ṭhen hõ uni do pạtiạrgeye tahẽkana.
Oṛakʼ benaokạnicʼ do cetʼleka ona oṛakʼ khon bạ̃ṛti manote ńametʼkan, onkaleka Isor do Mose khon hõ Jisuge bạ̃ṛti ṭhonok ńam lek kanae menteye hudiskedea.
Mitʼ ke mitʼ oṛakʼ do jãhãe baṅ jãhãe hotete benaokʼ kana, menkhan Isorge sanamakʼ doe benaoakada.
Sạrige Mose do Isorakʼ gharońjren sapʼdapʼicʼ lekate pạtiạricʼe tahẽkana, jemon uni do darakan dinkore okaṭakʼ roṛogokʼ ona reaṅ gohae emdaṛeakʼ.

Menkhan Mạsi do ona gharońj reakʼ dạyike ńamakatʼ Hopon lekate pạtiạricʼe tahẽkana. Aboakʼ sạri as iạte monre oka dil ar rạskạ hijukʼ, onare mucạtʼ hạbicʼ teṅgo ṭak akan bon tahen, enḍekhan aboge Isorakʼ gharońjren hoṛ bon hoyokʼa.
Ona iạte sonot Jiue menleda, “Teheń ape do uniakʼ aṛaṅpe ańjomle khan
uniye meneda, aperen hapṛamko leka apeakʼ ontor do alope keṭejtapea. Onko do hahaṅkarre iń birudreko teṅgolente ińko biḍạuledińa.
Aperen hapṛamko do onḍeko biḍạu aṭkarledińa, ar pongel serma hạbicʼ ona okteren hoṛko do ińakʼ kạmiko ńelleda.
Iń do onko cetanre ạṛislenteń menleda, ‘noko hoṛakʼ ontor do bạṛicʼ secʼ ạcur baṛaekantakoa; onko do ińakʼ hor bako baḍaelakʼa.’
Onate iń do edrete kiriyạyenteń menleda, ‘onko do ińakʼ jirạukʼ jaegare baṅgeko bolo ńama.’ ”
E boehako, sontor akae tahenpe! Ape modre okoeakʼ monrehõ bạṛicʼ ar bepạtiạu jemon alo tahen. Nonkan mon do jiwetʼ Isor khon pharakokʼa.
Ona khon tinạkʼ din sonot sostorre “Teheń” katha menogokʼkan, ona reakʼ din hilokʼge ape do apekore udgạu emokʼpe, jemon ape modre okoeakʼ mon hõ kại reakʼ lilkạrte alo keṭejokʼtape.
Ente pạhilre okaṭakʼ bhorsa tahẽkan, onare mucạtʼ hạbicʼ teṅgo ṭak akan bon tahẽlen khan, abo do Mạsi tulucʼ bakhradarko bon hoyokʼa.
Ente ńit hõ nonka roṛogokʼ kana, teheń uniakʼ aṛaṅpe ańjomle khan, uniye meneda, “Aperen hapṛamko leka apeakʼ ontor do alope keṭejtapea.”
Ar okoe baṅ Isorakʼ katha ańjomkate hõ uniko ạṛis ocolede? Onko do cetʼ noko hoṛ doko baṅkana one okoeko Mose do misor disạm khone oḍok ạguletʼko?
Okoe upạrte Isor do pongel bochor hạbicʼe ạṛislena? Onko do cetʼ noko hoṛ doko baṅkana one okoe doko kại akatʼ tahẽkan, ar okoe do hahaṅkarre mạ̃ṛĩ tahẽkantako?
Ar okoeko ṭhen baṅ Isor doe kiriyạlenteye metatʼko tahẽkan, onko do uniakʼ jirạukʼ joṅ jaegate bako bolo ńama? Onko do cetʼ nokoko hoṛ doko baṅkana one okoe do bako pạtiạuadeteko bemanotlede?
Arbon ńeleda, bepạtiạu iạte onko do Isorakʼ jirạukʼ jaegate bako bolo daṛeada.

Isorakʼ jirạu joṅ jaegate bolokʼ reakʼ oka gokʼakʼ tahẽkan ona gokʼakʼ do ńit hõ abo lạgitʼ menakʼgea. Onate abo do sontorakae tahen jạruṛ tabona, jemon okoe hõ ona gokʼakʼ reakʼ bhor khon bin lek mente aloe ńamokʼ.
Israelko ṭhen cetʼleka bhage sombat lại jạhirlen, onkage abo ṭhen hõ lại jạhir akana. Menkhan ona bhage sombatre Israelkoakʼ jãhãn porho do baṅ hoeakana, ente onko do ańjomkate onare bako pạtiạulena.

Menkhan abo do bon pạtiạu akana ar uniakʼ ona gokʼakʼ reakʼ jirạu joṅ jaegare bon bolo akana. Ar noa jirạu joṅ reaṅ do Isore menakada, “Onate iń do edrete kiriyạyenteń menleda, ‘onko do ińakʼ jirạukʼ joṅ jaegate ohoko bolo daṛelena.’ ” Menkhan noare jãhãn bhul bạnukʼa je, dhạrti sirjạu tayom Isorakʼ kạmi sạten khan jirạukʼ ehopʼena mente.
Sonot sostorre mitʼ jaegare eae mãhã hilokʼ reaṅ nonka olakana, “Isor do eae mãhã hilokʼre cetʼge bae kạmileda.”
Uni do arhõe menakada, “Onko do ińakʼ jirạukʼ joṅ jaegare baṅgeko bolo ńama.”

Nitokʼ noa katha do ṭhikgea je, adom hoṛ do uniakʼ jirạu joṅ jaegareko bolokʼa; Menkhan okoe Israelko ṭhen pạhilte bhage sombat lại jạhirlen, onko do bebatao iạte Isorakʼ jirạu joṅ jaegare bako sen daṛeatʼ tahẽkana.

Onate Isor do pạhilre Israelko ṭhen cetʼlekae menletʼ ṭhik onkage ḍher din tayom Dạud raj hotete arhõe menakada, teheń uniakʼ aṛaṅpe ańjomle khan, uniye meneda, “Apeakʼ ontor do alope keṭejtapea.” Noa kathate uniakʼ jirạu joṅ jaegare bolokʼ lạgitʼ Isor do ar mitʼṭen okteye niṭakatʼ tahẽkana ar ona reakʼ ńutume dohoakatʼ tahẽkana Teheń.
Ente Josuạ do ona jirạu joṅ jaegare Israelkoe idileko khan honaṅ Isor do tayomte ar mitʼṭen eṭakʼ din reakʼ katha ohoe roṛlea.
Enḍekhan ńelokʼkana, Isorren hoṛko lạgitʼ jirạukʼ reakʼ ạt do menakʼ hataṛgea,
ente Isor do cetʼleka acʼakʼ sirjạu reakʼ kạmi sạtkateye jirạulena onkage okoe Isorakʼ jirạu joṅ jaegareye calakʼ, uni hõ uniakʼ kạmi khon jirạue ńama.
Onate dela, ona jirạu ńam lạgitʼ bon ahkaokʼma. Okoe hõ jemon onko bebatao Israelko leka Isor bemanotete uniakʼ jirạu khon aloko eṛaṅokʼ.

Isorakʼ katha do jiwetʼgea ar jojaoakʼ kangea ar dene banar dharanakʼ tarwaṛe khon hõ bạ̃ṛti lasergea. Noa katha do manwa jiwi ar jiu, uṭi ar tumul hạṭiń begar hạbicʼ hõ sobokʼakʼ kana ar manwa ontor reakʼ sanam monejoṅakʼ ar hudisko biḍạu aṭkarakʼ kana.
Sirjon reakʼ okaṭakʼ hõ Isor ṭhen do okoanakʼ bạnukʼ anaṅ. Okoe ṭhen aboakʼ hisạb emokʼ hoyokʼ uni ṭhen do sanamakʼge oṭakʼgea ar sodorgea.
Onate dela, abon do hamesate Isorren Hopon Jisure aboakʼ pạtiạu bon aṅgoc ma, ente uni kangeae aboren maraṅ naeke, one okoe do sermare senkate ńit Isor samaṅre menae.
Aboren maraṅ naeke do nonkanicʼ doe baṅkana one okoe aboakʼ ńijortetʼre abo tulucʼ duk bae ńam, ente abo leka uni hõ joto secʼ khonge kại reakʼ biḍạu samaṅreye teṅgolena menkhan bae kạileda.
Onate dela, dil salakʼ Isorakʼ daya reakʼ siṅghạson ṭhen bon sen sorokʼma, jemon jạruṛa bon oktere onḍe khon uniakʼ daya ar goṛo bon ńam daṛeakʼ.
Hoṛko secʼ khon Isorakʼ sewae lạgitʼ mimitʼ maraṅ naeke do manwako mod khon bachaokateye bahalokʼ kana, jemon manwakoakʼ kại iạte janware dãṛẽye ar eṭakʼ danko hõe samaṅ.
Okoe begor baḍaeteko kạiyetʼkan ar bạṛicʼ horteko calakʼkan onko sãote uni do mạ̃hire beohara, ente unire hõ nijortetʼ do menakʼgea.
Uni do cetʼleka eṭakʼ hoṛkoakʼ kại lạgitʼ janware dãṛẽyedekan onkage acʼ apnartetʼ hõe nijorgete apnar lạgitʼ ona dãṛẽ samaṅ hoyokʼtaea.
Maraṅ naeke hoyokʼ reakʼ man do okoe hõ apnarte bae hatao daṛeakʼa, menkhan Isor okoeye hohoae unige ona reakʼ man doe ńama, cetʼleka Isor do Aron maraṅ naeke hoyokʼ lạgitʼe hohoade tahẽkan.

Katha do Mạsire hõ khaṭaokʼgea. Mạsi do apnarakʼ sanate maraṅ naeke hoyokʼ lạgitʼ apnarte do bae usullena, Isorge noa mente ona manote dan akawade tahẽkana. Am do ińren Hopon kanam, teheńge amren apatiń hoyena.
Onkage Isor do ar mitʼ jaegareye menakada, am do jaejug hạbicʼ naeke kanam, Melkisedek reakʼ dhara lekate.

Okoe gocʼko khone rukhiyạ daṛeae uni Isor ṭhen Jisu do noa dhạrtire tahen jokhecʼ ãṭ aṛaṅte rakʼateye nehõrade tahẽkana are koeleda. Ar bhokti sãote batao tahẽkantaete Isor do uniakʼ koejoṅe ańjomletʼtaea.
Menkhan Isorren Hopon hoekatere hõ uni do duk saset talate bataoe cetʼleda.
Nonkate tinreye sạbit ocoyena unre acʼakʼko bataotae sanamko lạgitʼ jaejug bańcaokʼ reakʼ hore hoyena.
Isor do Melkisedek leka maraṅ naeke menteye ńumkedea.
Noa reaṅ ạḍi utạr katha mementeakʼ menakʼ talea, menkhan ona reakʼ bhed bhaṅgao do muskilgea, ente Jiu reakʼ sạritetʼ ape do algate bape bujhạu daṛeakʼ kana.

Nunạkʼ dinte ape do guru hoyokʼ lek tahẽkantapea, menkhan ona bodolte Isorakʼ katha reakʼ arhõ gonḍa khon sikhnạt emape lạgitʼ cecetʼicʼakʼ jạruṛ paṛao akana. Keṭecʼ jomakʼ bodolte kạṭicʼ gidrạko leka arhõ ape do toa ńu reakʼ jạruṛ paṛao akatʼpea.
Okoe toa ńuteye ạsulokʼkan uni ma ńit hõe balege, ar dhorom jion reaṅ oka sikhnạt menakʼtae onate hõe balegea.
Okoekoakʼ umer hoeakan eken onkoge keṭecʼ jomakʼko jom daṛeakʼa, metakʼme Isorakʼ katha reakʼ keṭecʼ sikhnạtko bujhạu daṛeakʼa. Ar ạḍi dhao hewakʼte onko do bhage bạṛicʼko bichnạu daṛeakʼa.
Noa iạte etohopʼre Mạsi reaṅ oka cecetʼakʼ bon ńamakatʼ, ona bon parom idite sạbitokʼ secʼ bon laha idikʼma. Bin joanakʼ kạmiko khon mon ạcurkate, Isorre pạtiạukʼte,
eṭakʼakʼ bạptisma reaṅ cecetʼakʼ, capo reakʼ, gocʼko jiwetʼ beredokʼ ar jaejug reakʼ sạjại; noako etohopʼ reakʼ kathate arhõ nawate jemon rehetʼ alo bon bạisạu.
Menkhan Isore aṛakʼabo khan bon sạbit utạrokʼa;
ente mitʼ dhao marsal ńelakat̕ko do, serma dan reakʼ sebel ar sonot Jiuakʼ elaṅko ńamakada,
Isorakʼ mońj katha reakʼ sebelko ńamakada ar darakan jug reaṅ daṛe reakʼko baḍae akatʼa,
inạ tayom Mạsi ṭhen khon pạc ruạṛ akanko arhõ nawate mon ạcurtako do beleṭecʼakʼ kangea. Noa do baṅ hoedaṛeakʼa, ente onko do Isorren Hopon arhõko krus edekana ar jotoko samaṅreko bemanot edekana.
Okaṭakʼ ot do ạḍi dhao jạ̃ṛĩ dakʼ ańjetʼkate casakoakʼ jạruṛakʼ aṛakʼ sakame omon ocoyetʼ ona ot do Isorakʼ bhore ńameda.
Menkhan okaṭakʼ ot do jạnum ar rạṅgạinikoe omon ocoyetʼ ona ot do okoḍagea ar onare sarapokʼ reakʼ botor tahena. Ar mucạtʼre hoṛ do onako atar giḍikakʼa.
Dulạṛiạ gateko, ale do noako kathale menetʼrehõ enhõle pạtiạukʼ kana, apeakʼ dosa do onka baṅkana; kại khon bańcaokʼ reakʼ jo apeakʼ jionre ńelokʼ kangea.
Isor doe hok bicạricʼ kana; onate apeakʼ kạmi ar uniren hoṛko sapʼ sohotʼakote okaṭakʼ dulạṛpe udukʼ akawade arpe udukʼetʼkan, ona do bae hiṛińa.
Alele khojkana, ape mimitʼko jemon mucạtʼ hạbicʼ inạ jidge tahentape. Onate purạtepe khạṭi joṅa je, apeakʼ as do purạukʼtapea.
Kuṛhiạpe tahen do bale khojkana; alele khojkana, okoe pạtiạu ar soborite Isorakʼ gokʼakʼ reakʼ bhorko ạidạri joṅkan, ape hõ onko leka hoyokʼpe.
Isor do Abrahame gokʼade tahẽkanre acʼakʼ ńutumteye kiriyạlena, ente acʼ khon maraṅ okoe hõ bạnukʼkoa one uni ńutumteye kiriyạ daṛekokʼ.
Uni do noa menteye kiriyạlena, “Iń do khạṭigeń bhorama ar amakʼ bõskoń baḍhao ocoetama.”
Noa iạte Abraham doe sombhuriketʼ khan Isor oka emae lạgitʼe gokʼade tahẽkan onae ńamkeda.
Manwa do acʼ khon okoeye maraṅa uni ńutumtegeye kiriạkʼ kana. Onate ona kiriyạ do noa khạṭitetʼe kajakaea, oka roṛakan ona do sạrigea mente, ar nonkate joto gulmal do cabakʼa.

Isor oka emokʼ lạgitʼe gokʼletʼ, ar okoe onako ńam, onko do noa kiriyạ hotete ạḍi pusṭạute udukʼakoe menleda je, uni okaṭakʼe ṭhik akatʼ ona do ar baṅ bodolokʼa. Onate uni do kiriyạ hoteteye sạbudkeda okae ṭhikakatʼ ona do hoyokʼgea.

Isorakʼ gokʼakʼ ar kiriyạ do tis hõ baṅ bodolokʼa. Okoe secʼ hõ Isor do eṛe bae roṛa, uni do noa gokʼakʼreye kiriyạ akana, jemon abo samaṅre oka as menakʼ ona kajakte sapʼ dohoe lạgitʼ bạ̃ṛti udgạu bon ńam.
Noa as do aboakʼ jionre loṅgor leka khạṭi ar kajakgea, ar ona do sonot jaega reakʼ orwal tayomre, metakʼme Isor samaṅre seṭerokʼa.
Jisuge abo hũyạte abon lahate ona jaegateye calao akana. Uni do jaejug hạbicʼ Melkisedek leka maraṅ naekeye hoeakana.

Nui Melkisedek do Salemren raj ar maraṅ Isorren naekeye tahẽkana. Abraham do tinre rapajko bhagao kateye ruạṛ hijukʼkan tahẽkana unre nui Melkisedek tulucʼe ńapamlena. Ar Melkisedek do Abrahame bhorade tahẽkana,

ar Abraham do joto jinisko reakʼ gel hĩs reakʼ mitʼ hĩs uniye emade tahẽkana. Melkisedek reakʼ mane do hoyokʼkana dhoromren raj. Melkisedek do Salemren hõ raje tahẽkana, ar ona reakʼ mane do hoyokʼ kana sulukren raj.
Melkisedek do eṅgat-apat se jãhãn bõs budạge baṅ tahẽkantaea. Isorren Hopon leka uniakʼ jion reakʼ etohopʼ hõ baṅ tahẽkana, ar mucạtʼ hõ baṅ tahẽkana; uni do jaejug hạbicʼren naeke kanae.
Ado ma ńelpe, Melkisedek do tinạkʼe maraṅa; aboren ạgil hapṛam Abraham hõ sanamakʼ reakʼ gel hạṭiń reakʼ mitʼ hạṭiń uniye emade tahẽkana.

Lewi bõsko modre okoe do naekeko baṅkan, Israelko ṭhen khon, metakʼme onkoren boehako ṭhen khon ạn lekate gel hạṭiń reakʼ mitʼ hạṭiń hatao reakʼ hukum menakʼtakoa. Noko boehako do Abrahamren bõsko hoelenre hõ ona onkae hoyokʼtakoa.
Menkhan nui Melkisedek do Lewi bõsrene baṅkanre hõ Abraham ṭhen khon gel hạṭiń reakʼ mitʼ hạṭińe hataoetʼkan tahẽkana ar Isor okoe ṭhene gokʼletʼ tahẽkan uni Abraham hõe bhorade tahẽkana.
Noare jãhãn digdhạ bạnukʼa je, bhor ataṅicʼ khon bhor emokʼicʼgeye maraṅa mente.
Nonḍema gujukʼ gobolren Lewikoge gel hạṭiń reakʼ mitʼ hạṭińko hataoetʼkan; menkhan, okoe do jiwetʼge menaea mente goha emakan uni, metakʼme Melkisedekge gel hạṭiń reakʼ mitʼ hạṭińe hataoakada.

Okoe naeke reakʼko kạmikan tahẽkan onko Lewi bõsrenkoakʼ kạmi cetanrege Isor do Israelko acʼakʼ ạn-ạriye ematʼko tahẽkana. Ar Lewi bõsren naekekoakʼ kạmi hotete sạbit utạrlen khan, enḍekhan pạhil Lewi naeke Aron bodolte Melkisedek leka eṭakʼ ar mitʼṭen naeke hijukʼ reakʼ cetʼ jạruṛ tahẽkana?
Ar naeke giri pherao hoelen khan ạn-ạri hõ pherao reakʼ jạruṛ hoyokʼa.
Okoe reaṅ noako kathań roṛetʼkan Lewi bõs khon uni Jisu do bae hecʼlena, bickom eṭakʼ mitʼ bõs khone hecʼlena. Ona bõsren okoege tishõ naeke lekate pinḍre janwar dãṛẽ do bako samaṅ akatʼko tahẽkana.
Noa do pusṭạugea je, aboren Probhu do Jihudạ bõs khone hecʼlena. Ar noa bõs khon jãhãe mitʼ hoṛ naekeye hoyokʼa ona katha Mose do tishõ bae menletʼ tahẽkana.
Enḍekhan Melkisedek leka ar mitʼṭen naekeye teṅgo akanre abo okabon menakatʼ ona do arhõ pusṭạute bujhạukʼ kana.
Uniakʼ naeke hoyokʼ babotre bõs reaṅ do jãhãn ạnre baṅ ṭẽhaḍokʼ kana, ona do uniakʼ baṅ maraokʼ jion reakʼ daṛe cetanre ṭẽhaḍokʼkana.
Sonot sostorre noa gohae emeda, Am do jaejug hạbicʼ Melkisedek leka naeke kanam.
Jisuakʼ naeke hudạ do Isor kiriạkateye ṭhik dohoakatʼ tahẽkana. Lewi bõsrenko naeke hoyokʼ oktere Isor do jãhãnakʼ bae kiriyạlena,
menkhan Jisu maraṅ naekeye jokhecʼ doe kiriyạlena. Sonot sostorre noa reaṅ olakana, Probhui kiriyạyena, “Am do jaejug hạbicʼ naeke kanam.” Noa babotre uni do acʼakʼ mon bae pheraotaea.
Noa khon bon bujhạu daṛeakʼ kana je, Jisu do arhõ maraṅ mitʼṭen bondobosren jạmine hoeakana.
Lewiko modren ḍherkoge naekeko hoelena, ente gujukʼteko akoṭente okoe hõ jaejug hạbicʼ naeke giri do bako kạmi idi daṛeada.
Menkhan Jisu do jaejug jiwetʼ menaete uniakʼ naeke giri do tishõ baṅ pheraokʼtaea.
Onate okoe uni hotete Isor ṭhenko hijukʼkan onko do purạteye bańcao daṛeakoa, ente onko iạte nẽhorokʼ lạgitʼ uni do jaoge jiwetʼ menaea.
Nonkan mitʼṭen sonoticʼ, bin dusiyicʼ ar niphuṭ utạricʼ maraṅ naekege jạruṛ tahẽkan tabona. Uni do kại hoṛko khone begargea ar Isor do serma khon hõ bạ̃ṛti usule rakapʼ akadea.

Eṭakʼ maraṅ naekeko cetʼleka pạhilte apnar lạgitʼ ar tayomte eṭakʼkoakʼ kại lạgitʼ janwar dãṛẽko samaṅetʼkan tahẽkan, onka do nui naekeakʼ jạruṛ baṅ tahẽkana, ente uni do jaejug lạgitʼ mitʼ dhaoge acʼakʼ jiwiye emketʼte ona kạmiye purạukeda.
Ạn-ạri do nijor monan hoṛkoge maraṅ naeke hudạreye ojokʼetʼkoa; menkhan ạn-ạri tayom okaṭakʼ kiriyạ hoelen ona do Isorren Hopone bahalkedea, one uni do jaejug hạbicʼe sạbit utạrakan.
Abo oka bon menetʼkan ona reakʼ asol katha do noa kana je, aboren do nonkan mitʼṭen maraṅ naeke menaea one uni do sermare maraṅ Isorakʼ siṅghạson reakʼ jojomsa aṛereye duṛupʼakan.
Uni do maraṅ sonot jaegare, metakʼme asol sewa tạmbure Isore sewawae kana. Ona sewa tạmbu do manwa bako beretʼakada, Probhugeye beretʼakada.
Mimitʼ maraṅ naekeko do janwar dãṛẽ ar eṭakʼ eṭakʼ jinisko samaṅ lạgitʼko bahal ocokʼkana, onate nui maraṅ naekeakʼ hõ jãhãn dãṛẽ samaṅ reakʼ jạruṛ menakʼtaea.
Menkhan ńit noa dhạrtireye tahẽlen khan uni do maraṅ naeke ohoe hoedaṛelena, ente nonḍe do ạn-ạri lekate dãṛẽ samaṅ lạgitʼ naeke ma menakʼkoge.

Naeke lekate onkoakʼ noa kạmi do serma kạmi reakʼ mitʼṭen nạmuna ar umul leka. Onate Mose tinre sewa tạmbui benao lạgidokʼkan tahẽkana unre Isor do noa menteye sontorledea, “Sinại buru coṭre okaṭakʼ nạmunań udukʼatʼme tahẽkan ṭhik onkage jemon jotowakʼkom benao.”

Menkhan ńitokʼ bon ńeletʼkana, Jisu oka naeke reakʼ kạmiye ńamakatʼ ona do onko naekekoakʼ kạmi khon hõ bạ̃ṛti sorosgea, cetʼleka uni do bondoboste denebanar secʼe hoeakan ona bondobos do lahateakʼ khon hõ sorosgea, ente noa bondobos do arhõ bhage gokʼakʼkore ṭẽhaḍokʼ kana.
Pạhil teakʼ bondobos niphuṭge tahẽlen khan honaṅ dosar bondobos reakʼ jãhãn jạruṛge oho hoelena.
Menkhan Isor do acʼren hoṛkoakʼ dos udukʼako lạgitʼ sonot sostorreye menakada: Probhui meneda, “Okte hijukʼ kana, iń do Israel ar Jihudạ hoṛko lạgitʼ mitʼṭen nawa bondobosiń dohoea.

Misor disạm khon onkoren hapṛamko ti sapʼkateń oḍok ạguko jokhecʼ onko lạgitʼ oka bondobos iń doholetʼ tahẽkan, ona leka noa nawa bondobos do baṅ hoyokʼa. Ińakʼ ona bondobos leka bako calaolente onko secʼ do bạń beṅgetʼ ruạṛeda.” Probhu do noa kathae meneda.

Probhu do arhõe meneda, “Iń do Israelko lạgitʼ noa bondobos iń dohoea. Ona do hoyokʼ kana, ińakʼ ạn-ạriko onkoakʼ monreń rebetʼakoa ar onkoakʼ ontorre hõń ol dohoea. Iń do onkoren Isoriń hoyokʼa, ar onko do ińren hoṛgeko hoyokʼa.
Apnar ato oṛakʼrenko ar apnar boehako, okoe hõ noa menkate do ar tishõ bako cetʼakoa, ‘Probhu baḍaeyeme mente,’ ente sanamkoge iń doko oromińạ.
Onate iń do onkoakʼ kạiyiń ikại takoa, ar tishõ onkoakʼ kại do bạń disạ dohoetakoa.”
Isor do noa bondobos nawateye lại sodorketʼte lahateakʼ bondobos do mareakʼ menteye okoḍa ocokeda. Ar okaṭakʼ marege ar sedae reakʼ kana mente nosṭo cabakʼkan ona do usạrage danaṅokʼa.
Isorakʼ dewa sewae lạgitʼ pạhilakʼ bondobosre mitʼ bar goṭecʼ ạn-ạriko em hoelena, ar noa dhạrtire sewae lạgitʼ mitʼṭen jaega reakʼ katha hõ onare tahẽkana.
Ar ona lekatege mitʼṭen tạmbu do benao hoelena. Ona tạbmu reakʼ pạhil hạṭińre tahẽkana diuhe dohowakʼ ar mej ar samaṅakʼ piṭhạ. Noa pạhil hạṭiń reakʼ ńutum do tahẽkana sonot jaega.
Dosarakʼ orwal tayomre tạmbu reakʼ ar mitʼ hạṭiń tahẽkana; ona reakʼ ńutum do sonot utạrakʼ jaega.

Noa hạṭińre dhup jered lạgitʼ sona reakʼ pinḍ ar bondobos reakʼ sunduk tahẽkana. Ona sunduk do beṛhaete sonate tolakatʼ tahẽkana. Ar ona cetanre sona reakʼ bhajanre dohoakatʼ manna, ar Aronakʼ oka ṭheṅgare baha bhoṭokʼlen ona ṭheṅga, ar bondobos olakʼ dhiri reakʼ barea paṭa.

Ona sunduk cetanre Isorakʼ ṭhonokte perecʼ sonaren barea Kerubkin tahẽkana. Unkinakʼ phạ̃kṛạ̃kte ona sunduk reakʼ ḍhakonkin umulakatʼ tahẽkana. Noa ḍhakonre do kạiko hạrupʼkakʼkan tahẽkana. Menkhan noako reakʼ ńitokʼ do khode khod babo roṛ daṛeakʼkana.
Nonkate jotowakʼ benao sạtkate naekeko do jaoge tạmbu reakʼ pạhilakʼ jaegare bolokate Isorakʼko dewa sewayetʼkan tahẽkana.

Menkhan dosarakʼ jaegare, metakʼme sonot utạrakʼ ṭhạ̃ire do eken maraṅ naeke motogeye bolokʼkan tahẽkana. Uni do bochorre eken mitʼ dhaoge dãṛẽ samaṅ akan janwarakʼ mãyãmante onḍeye bolokʼkan tahẽkana. Uni do acʼakʼ kại lạgitʼ ar bin baḍaeteko kại akatʼ hoṛkoakʼ kại lạgitʼ noa mãyãme coḍoretʼ tahẽkana.
Noate sonot Jiue udukʼetʼkana je, tinạkʼ din noa sewa tạmbu tahen unạkʼ din ona sonot utạrakʼ ṭhạ̃ire bolokʼ reakʼ hor do jhicʼ baṅ tahena.
Nahakʼ jug lạgitʼ noa do mitʼṭen cinhạ kana one oka doe lại abonkan je, dãṛẽ samaṅ akade janwar ar eṭakʼ eṭakʼ jinisko do dewa sewakoakʼ bibek ohoe sạbit utạr daṛeletakoa.
Onako do eken hoṛmoteakʼ kana, metakʼme jom-ńũ ar dhorom reakʼ niạm lekate saphakʼ reaṅge. Onako do sanamakʼ jut aroe okte hạbicʼge kạmire lagaolena.

Menkhan Mạsi do darakan joto bhageakʼren maraṅ naeke lekategeye hecʼlena. Uni do artetʼ bhage ar artetʼ mońj sewa tạmbure Isorakʼ sewa lạgitʼgeye hecʼlena. Noa tạmbu do manwa tite benaowakʼ do baṅkana, metakʼme ona do dhạrti reakʼ jãhãn jinis hõ baṅkana.
Merom ar ḍaṅgrakoakʼ mãyãmte Mạsi do ona sonot utạrakʼ ṭhạ̃ire bae bololena. Uni do acʼakʼ mãyãmte mitʼ dhaoge onḍeye boloyena. Nonkate uni do jaejug lạgitʼ kại khon bańcaokʼ reakʼ hore tearkeda.
Okoeko bhõnḍ akan tahẽkan onko cetanre merom ar ḍaṅgrawakʼ mãyãm se pheṭãṛ rapakʼ akade torocʼko chiṭạu akokan tahẽkana; onate onkoakʼ do eken bahre hoṛmo saphakʼkan tahẽkana.

Menkhan okoe do jaejug sonot Jiu hotete Isor ṭhen acʼtetʼge niphuṭ dãṛẽ lekateye emen uni Jisuakʼ mãyãm do aboakʼ bibekre bin joanakʼ kạmi khon arhõ bạ̃ṛtiye sapha bona, jemon jiwetʼ Isor bon sewa daṛeae.

Isor do okoeko hohokate jaejug ạidạri emako lạgitʼe gokʼatʼko tahẽkan onko jemon onako ńam onate Mạsi do mitʼṭen nawa bondobos reakʼ dene banar secʼrene hoyena. Noa ạidạri ńam do manwa lạgitʼ leṭejokʼakʼ hoeakana, ente pạhil bondobos bahal tahẽkanre manwa okako kại akatʼ onako kại khon chaḍao reakʼ dam lekate Mạsi do jiwiye emleda.
Ạidạri oṭo akatʼ dolel kạmire lagao ocoe khan ạidạri dolel akatʼicʼakʼ gujukʼ reakʼ sạbudokʼ jạruṛa,
ente manwae gocʼlen anecʼ ạidạri dolel do kạmire lagaokʼa. Ar okoe ạidạri dolele dolel oṭoakatʼ uni jiwetʼe tahen hạbicʼ ona ạidạri dolel do kạmire baṅ jojaokʼa.
Ṭhik onkage pạhilakʼ bondobos hõ mãyãm chaḍakate kạmire oho lagaolena.

Joto hoṛko ṭhen ạn-ạriko reakʼ mimitʼ hukum lại saḍe tayom Mose do pheṭãṛ ar meromkoakʼ mãyãme hataokeda ar ona sãote dakʼ mesalkate jeṅgetʼ arakʼ bheḍawakʼ up̕ ar husopʼ dạrte ona ạn-ạriko reakʼ puthire ar hoṛko cetanre onaye chiṭạukeda.
Uni do ona onkae jokhecʼe menleda, “Noa do ona bondobos reakʼ mãyãm kana, one okaṭakʼ bondobos lekate kạmi lạgitʼ Isore hukumakatʼpe.”
Sewa tạmbu ar dewa sewa kạmire beohar lạgitʼ joto jinisko cetanre Mose do inạ mitʼ lekage mãyãme chiṭạuleda.
Moseakʼ ạn-ạri lekate sanam jiniskoge mãyãmte saphakʼ kana ar begor mãyãm jorote kại do oho ikạlena.
Okaṭakʼ do serma reakʼakʼko reakʼ nokolakʼkan onako do janwar dãṛẽ hotete saphakʼ reakʼ jạruṛ tahẽkana menkhan okaṭakʼ do asolrege serma reakʼakʼko kan onako saphakʼ lạgitʼ do arhõ maraṅ dãṛẽ jạruṛa.
Asolakʼ sonot jaega reakʼ nokolakʼ lekate manwa tite tearakʼ jãhãn sonot jaegare Mạsi do bae bololena, bickom ona bodolte uni do sermateye boloyena jemon abo iạte Isor samaṅre ńite hạjir daṛeakʼ.
Maraṅ naeke do janwarkoakʼ mãyãmate cetʼleka jao bochor sonot utạrakʼ jaegareye bolokʼkan tahẽkan, Mạsi acʼhõ onkaleka bar bar dãṛẽ samaṅokʼ lạgitʼ sermate do bae bolo akana.

Ar onkage hoyokʼ hoelentae khan enḍekhan dhạrti sirjạu khon ehopʼkate ạḍi dhaoge duk jomkate gujukʼ hoekokʼtaea; menkhan ńitokʼ sanam jugko reakʼ mucạtʼre uni do mitʼ dhaogeye sodorena jemon apnartetʼe dãṛẽkʼte kạikoe ocokʼ giḍikakʼ.
Isor doe ṭhik dohoakada je, manwako mitʼ dhaoko gujukʼa, ar ona tayom do bicạr hoyokʼtakoa.

Ṭhik onkage ạdi utạr hoṛakʼ kại reakʼ bojha gokʼ idi lạgitʼ Mạsi hõ mitʼ dhãogeye dãṛẽyena. Uni do dosar dhaoe hijukʼa, menkhan unre kại ńutumte gujukʼ lạgitʼ do baṅ, bickom acʼ ńel horekanko bańcaoko lạgitʼgeye hijukʼa.

Ạn-ạrikore menakʼakʼko do darakan sanam bhageakʼko reaṅ umulkana; onare sạriakʼ reakʼ maraṅteakʼko do bạnukʼa. Onate okoe Isor sewa lạgitʼko hijukʼkan onko do ạn-ạrikote tishõ bochor ke bochor mitʼ lekan janwar dãṛẽte ohoe sạbit oco daṛelekoa.
Ạn-ạriteko sạbit oco daṛelen khan, enḍekhan janwar dãṛẽge cabakokʼa honaṅ, ente dewa sewayetʼko do mitʼ dhaoregeko saphalen khan kại lạgitʼ apnar do dusi mente ohoko bujhạukokʼa.
Menkhan noa janwar dãṛẽ do jao bochorge akoakʼ kại reakʼ kathakoe disạ ocokoa.
Ente ḍaṅgra ar meromkoakʼ mãyãmte kại do tishõ baṅ meṭao daṛeakʼa.
Onate Mạsi noa dhạrtiteye hijukʼ jokhecʼ Isore metade tahẽkana, “Janwar ar eṭakʼ dãṛẽ do bam khojlakʼa, menkhan iń lạgitʼ mitʼṭen hoṛmom tearkeda.
Jeredokʼakʼ dãṛẽ ar kại lạgitʼ dãṛẽre am do bam kusilena.
Tayomte ińiń menkeda, ‘nõkʼõe, iń hecʼakana; sostorre ińakʼ hijukʼ reaṅ olakana. E Isor, iń do amakʼ sana purạutam lạgitʼgeń hecʼakana.’ ”

Cetan reakʼ kathakore pạhilte Mạsiye meneda, “Janwarko ar eṭakʼ dãṛẽko, jeredokʼakʼ dãṛẽko ar kại ńutumte dãṛẽko, am do bam khojlakʼa ar onare kusi hõ bam kusilena.” Noa dãṛẽko do ạn-ạri reakʼ hukum lekage hoyokʼkan tahẽkanre hõ uni do noa kathae roṛleda.
Ona tayom Mạsiye meneda, “Ńelme, iń do amakʼ sana purạutam lạgitʼgeń hecʼakana.” Dosarakʼ bondobos bahal idi lạgitʼ uni do lahateakʼ bondobose bạtilkeda.
Isorakʼ sana lekage Jisu Mạsiakʼ hoṛmo mitʼ dhao samaṅente abo dobon begar ocoakana.
Mimitʼ naekeko do dinạmge teṅgokate Isorko sewawae kana ar mitʼ talao inạ mitʼlekage dãṛẽko samaṅeda, menkhan nonkan dãṛẽte kại do tishõ ohoko ocokʼ daṛelea.
Menkhan Jisu do kại ńutumte jaejug lạgitʼ eken mitʼṭen dãṛẽye samaṅketʼe Isorakʼ jojomsa aṛereye duṛupʼena.
Ar tin hạbicʼ acʼren bạiriko acʼakʼ jaṅga latarre bae dohoko un hạbicʼe ńel hohorkana,
ente Isorakʼ monsubạ lekate okoeko begar ocoakan ona mitʼṭen dãṛẽ hotete uni do jaejug hạbicʼ onkoe sạbit ocoakatʼkoa.
Sonot Jiu hõ noa reaṅ gohae emabon kana. Pạhilre uniye menakada,
Probhui meneda, “Onko tulucʼ oka bondobos iń bandhaoa ona do noage, ińakʼ ạn-ạri do onkoakʼ ontoreń dohoea ar onkoakʼ monreń ol dohokakʼa.”
Ona tayom sonot Jiue meneda, “Iń do onkoakʼ kại ar bedhoromakʼko tishõ baṅgeń disạ dohoetakoa.”
Onate Isor do tinre kại ar bedhoromakʼkoe ikạya unre kại ńutumte dãṛẽ mente samaṅokʼ do ar cetʼge baṅ tahena.
Ado E boehako, Jisu Mạsiakʼ mãyãm gunạkʼte ona sonot utạrakʼ jaegare bolokʼ reakʼ dil do menakʼ getabona.
Mạsi do abo lạgitʼ mitʼṭen nawa ar jiwetʼ hore jhicʼ akada, jemon abo do orwal bhitrite, metakʼme uniakʼ hoṛmo talate Isor samaṅre bon seṭer daṛeakʼ.
Ona chaḍa aboren do mitʼṭen maraṅ naeke hõ menae tabona, one okoere Isorakʼ gharońjren hoṛkoakʼ dạyike emakan.

Onate pạtiạu talate oka khạṭitetʼ hijukʼkan, ona sạbit utạrakʼ khạṭi ontorte Isor samaṅre bon calakʼma; ente dusi bibek reakʼ ti khon aboakʼ ontor do mãyãm chiṭạukate sapha ocoakana ar phạriạ dakʼte hoṛmo do um sapha akan tabona.
Biswạs lekate aboakʼ oka as menakʼ, onate dela, kajakte uniakʼ katha bon aṅgoc ma, ente okoeye gokʼ akatʼ uni doe pạtiạrgea.
Dela, mimitʼko reaṅ bon dạndikʼma jemon dulạṛ ar bhage kạmi lạgitʼ mimitʼko uskur bon emako.
Adom adom hoṛakʼ mitʼ ṭhecʼ jarwakʼ reakʼ cetʼleka heowa menakʼtako, onka leka jarwakʼ do alo bon bạgi ma, bickom Mạsiakʼ hijukʼ din hạbicʼ mimitʼko jemon arhõ bon udgạuko.
Isorakʼ sạriakʼtetʼ baḍaekate hõ dikhitege bon kại khan, enḍekhan kại ńutumte ar jãhãn dãṛẽ do bạnukʼa;
bickom eken bicạr reakʼ botoranakʼ ghuṛi ar Isorren bạiriko lo torocʼko leka jolokʼkan edrege ńelhor akae tahen hoyokʼa.
Jãhãe Moseakʼ ạn-ạri bae aṅgoc khan uni do jãhãn daya baṅkate bar se pe hoṛakʼ goha iạteye gocʼ ocokʼa.

Enḍekhan Isorren Hopon okoeye kurud akawade, oka mãyãmte uniye sapha akan Isorakʼ ona bondobos reakʼ mãyãm okoe be sonotakʼ menteye bujhạuetʼ ar okoe dayae emokʼkan uni sonot Jiu okoeye bemanot akade, enḍekhan hudispe, uni do tinạkʼ artetʼ sạjạyokʼ lek kanae!

Ale do unile baḍae akadea one okoeye menetʼkan, “Hala hạli do ińakʼge, ińgeń hala ruạṛa; okoe okaṭakʼ ńam lek kane uni do onageń emaea.” Uni do arhõ mitʼ jaegareye meneda, “Probhuge acʼren hoṛko lạgitʼ hok reakʼe bicạrtakoa.”
Jiwetʼ Isorakʼ tire paṛaokʼ do ạḍi botoranakʼ kangea.
Laha dinko reakʼ katha disạipe. Unre marsal ńamkate ape do duk jom talate hõ teṅgo ṭak akaepe tahẽkana.
Oka oka okte do sanamko samaṅre tamasakope hoeocolente opoman ar santao sahaokate dukpe jomleda; ar okoeko cetanre onkan beohar hoelen onko tulucʼ hõ ape do dukpe sahaokeda;
ar okoeko hajot ocoakan tahẽkan onkoakʼ duktepe duklena. Apeakʼ jinisko luṭlenre rạskạ salakʼpe manaoleda, entepe baḍaekan tahẽkana, arhõ bhage ar jaejug dhon menakʼtapea mente.
Onate ape do dil alope aṛakʼ giḍitapea, ente noa reakʼ kuṛại do maraṅgea.
Ape do sombhuri reakʼ jạruṛ menakʼtapea, jemon Isorakʼ sana leka kạmi purạukate okae gokʼ akawatʼpe ona jemonpe ńam;
ente Isorakʼ katha leka, “Okoeakʼ hijukʼ reakʼ katha menakʼtae uni do ar thoṛa din khangeye hijukʼa, ar bae biloma.
Okoe hoṛ dhorom menteń ataṅ akade uni do pạtiạu hotetege jione ńama; menkhan jãhãegeye ruạṛ calakʼ khan unire do bạń kusikʼa.”
Okoe ruạṛ senkateko maraokʼkan onko dolren dobon baṅkana; menkhan pạtiạukʼte okoe bańcaoko ńam onko dolren kangea bon.

Okaṭakʼ ńama mentebon as akan ona dobon ńamgea ar ona reakʼ khạṭitetʼ do hoyokʼ kana pạtiạu. Ar ona pạtiạu hotete purạ puri bon bujhạu daṛeakʼa je, okaṭakʼ babon ńel ńametʼkan ona do sạrige menakʼgea mente.
Biswạs iạtege aboren hapṛamko do Isorakʼ sarhaoko ńamleda.

Ar biswạs hotetege bon bujhạu daṛeakʼ kana je, Isorakʼ moca reakʼ kathate noa dhạrti do sirjạulena. Onate bujhạukʼ kana, abo okaṭakʼ bon ńel ńametʼkan ona do jãhãn ńelakʼ jinis khon do baṅ sirjạu akana.

Biswạs iạtege Kạin khon Abelakʼ dãṛẽ do Isor samaṅre arhõ bhageakʼ tahẽkana. Biswạs iạtege Isor do uniakʼ dãṛẽ aṅgockate uni reaṅ noa gohae emleda je, uni doe dhoromgea mente. Abele gocʼakanre hõ enhõ uniakʼ biswạs hotetege uni do ńit hõ kathae roṛeda.
Biswạs iạtege Enok do bae gocʼlena; uni do sermateye rakapʼ ocoakana. Isor do uniye idiakade iạte bae sendra ńamlena. Enok idiye lahare Isor do noa gohae emleda je, Enok do uniye kusi ocoakadea.
Biswạs begorte Isor kusi ocoye do baṅ hoedaṛeakʼa, ente Isor ṭhen okoeye calakʼ, uni do biswạsokʼ hoyokʼtaea je, Isor menaea ar uniakʼ katha leka calakʼko do uniakʼ ti khon kuṛạiko ńama.

Okaṭakʼ do unrehõ baṅ ńṭoṭhan tahẽkan, ona reaṅ Isor do Noahae sontorledea. Noah do Isor bhokti hoṛe tahẽkante Isorakʼ kathare biswạskate mitʼṭen jahaje benaoleda, jemon acʼakʼ gharońjrenko rukhiyạko ńam. Noah do acʼakʼ biswạs hotetege dhạrtirenko dusi menteye sạbudletʼkoa ar Isor ṭhen dhorom mente ataṅokʼ reakʼ ạidạriye ńamleda, one oka do eken biswạs hotetege ńamokʼkan.

Isor do Abrahame hohoade tahẽkanre biswạs iạtege Isorakʼ kathareye gobolena ar ạidạṛi lekate okaṭakʼ jaega ńam reakʼ katha tahẽkantae ona jaegateye calaolena. Unre bae bujhạu akatʼ tahẽkana okateye calakʼkana mente ar enhõ uni doe monḍhalena.

Isor do okaṭakʼ disạm Abraham emae lạgitʼe gokʼade tahẽkana uni do biswạs iạtege bedisiạ hoṛ lekate onḍeye berelena. Ar uni sãote okoe do inạ mitʼ gokʼakʼren bhor reakʼ bhạgiạdarko tahẽkan Isạhak ar Jakob leka uni hõ tạmbukoreye ḍerakʼkan tahẽkana;
ente oka nagraha tahẽ utạrokʼ uni do ona nagraha reakʼ koyokʼ horreye tahẽkana. Ona nagraha reakʼ noksa ar gathao rakab reakʼ kạmi do Isorgeye kạmiakada.
Sara do gidrạ hoyokʼ reakʼ umer parom calaolentaere hõ biswạs iạtegeye bhạrti hoṛmolena, ente uni do biswạs tahẽkantaea, okoeye gokʼakawade uni doe pạtiạrgea mente.
Onate umer secʼte gocʼ barag hoṛmo hoekatere hõ Abraham do sermaren ipil leka ar jalapuri aṛe reakʼ gitil leka ạḍi utạr gidrạkoren apate hoelena.

Noko hoṛko do pạtiạu talate jion khemao kateko gocʼena. Isor okaṭakʼ emokʼ reakʼe gokʼatʼko tahẽkan ona do bako ńamleda, menkhan sạṅgiń khon onako ńelleda ar kusi hõko kusiyada. Noa dhạrtire bedisiạ ar upriạ lekako tahẽkan ona doko aṅgocletʼgea.
Okoe onako aṅgocketʼ onko do pusṭạuteko bujhạu ocoyeda je, onko do ako lạgitʼ mitʼṭen disạmko ńam baṛakana.
Ar oka disạm khonko oḍok hecʼlen ona disạmko uihạr ruạṛ lekhan, enḍekhan ona disạm ruạṛ calakʼ reakʼ joto ạtgeko ńamkea.

Menkhan onko do arhõ bhage mitʼṭen disạm reakʼ, metakʼme jion puri reakʼko ńam baṛayetʼkan tahẽkana. Ona iạte Isor acʼtetʼ do onkoren Isor mente ńumogokʼ bae lajaokʼ kana, ente uni do onko lạgitʼge mitʼṭen nagrahae tear akatʼ tahẽkana.
Abraham do biḍạu ocokʼ jokhecʼ Isorre pạtiạu iạtege Isahak doe samaṅledea. Okoe ṭhen Isore gokʼ akatʼ tahẽkan unige acʼren sadher hopon dãṛẽye lạgitʼe samaṅedekan tahẽkana.
Nuige uni hopon do one okoe reaṅ Isore menakatʼ, “Isạhakren bõsge amren bõs menteko lekhakʼa.”
Abraham do uni dãṛẽye lạgitʼe rạjiyena, ente uni doe pạtiạukʼkan tahẽkana Isor do gocʼko hõe jiwetʼ beretʼ daṛeakoa mente. Ar gujukʼ duạr khon Abraham do Isạhake ńam ruạṛkedea.
Biswạstege Isạhak do tayom daramakʼko reaṅ Jakob ar Esaue bhoratʼkin tahẽkana.
Biswạs iạtege Jakob do gujukʼ jokhecʼ Joshepren banar hopone bhoratʼkin tahẽkana ar ṭheṅgare tirupʼkate Isore sewawade tahẽkana.
Biswạs iạtege Jakob do gujukʼ jokhecʼ Misor disạm khon Israelko oḍok calakʼ reakʼ kathae metatʼko tahẽkana ar acʼakʼ mạ̃ṛĩ cekae hoyokʼa mente ona hõe lạiatʼko tahẽkana.
Moseakʼ janam tayom uniren eṅgat-apat do biswạs iạtege pe cando kin oko doholede tahẽkana, ente onkin dokin ńelkeda, gidrạ do ńelokʼteye mońjgea ar onate raj reakʼ hukum hõ bạkin botorada.
Biswạs iạtege Mose doe sẽṛãyen khan, Pharao hoponeratren hoponko hohoae do bae khojkan tahẽkana.
Uni do thoṛa din lạgitʼ kại reakʼ rạskạ bạgikate Isorren hoṛko sãote duk jojomgeye bachaoana.
Uni do Misor reakʼ dhon durib khon Mạsi ńutumteakʼ opomange ạḍi bạ̃ṛtiye moneada, ente uni do kuṛại secʼe beṅgetʼ akatʼ tahẽkana.
Isor cetanre biswạs iạtege uni do raj begor botoraete Misor disạme bạgiatʼ tahẽkana, ente baṅ ńelokʼicʼ ńelekan lekae sumbhrạukeda.
Uni do biswạs iạtege sen-parom porob ar mãyãm chiṭạu reakʼ niạme manaoleda, jemon nonosṭoyicʼ goḍet do pạhil janamkoe gocʼlekore Israelrenko jemon aloe joṭetʼko.
Biswạstege Israelko do rohoṛ ot leka Arakʼ jalapuriko taṛam paromleda menkhan Misriko do paromokʼ jokhecʼko unum gocʼena.
Biswạs iạtege Israelko do eae din hạbicʼ Jerikho nagraha reakʼ pạcri beṛhaeteko dãṛã ạcurketʼ khan ona do bhindạṛena.
Biswạs iạtege Rahab kusmbi do Jerikho nagrahareko tahẽkan bebatao hoṛko sãote bae nosṭolena, ente uni do unkin disạm ciyạkin peṛa lekae ataṅ aderletʼkinạ.
Noa khon bạ̃ṛti do ar cetʼ iń lạiya? Gideon, Barak, Samson, Jeptha, Dạud, Sạmuel ar nạbikoakʼ katha galmarao lạgitʼ ińakʼ somoe do bạnukʼa.
Biswạs hotetege onko do rajosṭiko jitạuleda, hok reakʼko bicạrleda, Isorakʼ gokʼakʼko ńamleda, dhạcri kulkoakʼ mocako bondletʼa,
ar jolokʼ seṅgel reakʼ daṛeko nimbhạuleda, tarwaṛe khonko rukhiyạlena, nijor khonko daṛe ocolena, lạṛhạire daṛeko udukʼleda ar bidisiạ palṭonkoko laga ńirletʼkoa.
Maejiuko do akoren gocʼ hoṛko arhõ jiwetʼgeko ńam ruạṛketʼkoa. Eṭakʼko do akotege hajot khon baṅ chaḍaokʼteko santao ocolena, jemon onko do gocʼko khon beretʼkate artetʼ mońj jionko ạidạri joṅ.
Arhõ eṭakʼko do cigạri arko dal ur ocoyena, hẽ biṛikoteko tol ocolena ar hajot hõko hajot ocolena.

Dhiriteko tiń ocoyena, ạriteko getʼ paṛakʼ ocoyena ar tarwaṛeteko gocʼ ocoyena. Onko doko santao ocolena ar bạṛicʼko beohar ocolena, ar akoṭreko paṛaoen khan bhiḍi ar meromakʼ harta horokʼkateko ạcur baṛaekan tahẽkana.
Onko do hahaṅkarkore, burukore, danderkore ar khorloṅkoreko ńir oko baṛaekan tahẽkana. Noko hoṛko jaega emako reakʼ lek noa dhạrti reakʼ do baṅ tahẽkana.
Biswạs iạtege onko sanamkogeko sarhao ocolena, menkhan Isor okaṭakʼ emako lạgitʼe gokʼletʼ tahẽkan ona do bako ńamlakʼa;
ente Isor do abon lạgitʼ arhõ mońjakʼe ṭhik dohoakatʼ tahẽkana. Uni doe ṭhik doholeda je, abo begorte onko do ohoko sạbit utạr ocolena.

Enḍekhan ńelokʼ kana, Isorre biswạs reakʼ goha lekate aema hoṛ do abo beṛhaeteko ṭhạurạ akana. Onate dela bon, mitʼke mitʼ tạkicʼakʼ ar oka kại abore laṭkao akan ona do sạṅgiń secʼ bon ṭhelao giḍikakʼte sombhuri salakʼ laha secʼ bon ńir calakʼma.

Delabon, Jisu secʼ beṅgetʼ akae bon tahenma, one okoe do biswạs reakʼ rehetʼ are sạbit utạricʼ kan. Uni samaṅre oka rạskạ dohoakan ona lạgitʼge uni do manot secʼ bae moneyatʼte krusre gujukʼe sahaokeda ar ńitokʼ do Isorakʼ siṅghạson reakʼ jojomsa aṛereye duṛupʼ akana.
Okoe do kại hoṛkoakʼ nunạkʼ maraṅ bạiriye sahaoketʼ, uni reaṅ hudisokʼpe, jemon apeakʼ mon alo nijorokʼ ar beasko alope hoyokʼ.
Kại birudre lạṛhại lạṛhạite mãyãm jorokʼ hạbicʼ okte do apere ńithõ baṅ hoeakana.
Isor do acʼren gidrạko lekae udgạu akatʼpete okae galmarao akatʼpe ona dope hiṛiń akada. Uni doe menakada, E beṭa, Probhuakʼ ḍanṭao do alom neṅghaoa, ar uniye egerlemre alom ạtruńokʼa;
Ente Probhu do okoeye dulạṛe, unigeye ḍanṭaoea, ar gidrạ mente okoekoe aṅgocko, onko mitʼke mitʼ doe sạjạikoa.
Ape do noako kosṭo ḍanṭao lekatepe jomakada. Isor do ape tulucʼ apat lekageye beohareda. Nonkan hopon jãhãe menakʼkoa one okoe do acʼren apat bae ḍanṭaoedekan?
Sanam hopongeko ḍanṭao ocokʼa. Ar bape ḍanṭao ocoakan khan enḍekhan ape do bidhuạ hoponko kanape, sạriakʼren hoponko dope baṅkana.

Ona chaḍa bon ńelakada, dhạrtiren babako do aboko ḍanṭaoetʼbon tahẽkana ar abo do onko bon manotetʼkokan tahẽkana. Enḍekhan okoe do sanam jiukoren Baba kane unire gobol tahen do cetʼ artetʼge lek baṅkan tabona, jemon jion bon ńam?

Aboren dhạrtiren babako okaṭakʼ bhageko bujhạuletʼ, ona lekageko ḍanṭao akatʼbona, ar ona do thoṛa din lạgitʼge; menkhan aboakʼ bhage lạgitʼge Isor do aboe ḍanṭaoetʼbona jemon uni leka sonot bon hoyokʼ.
Ḍanṭao do rạskạ reakʼ mente babon metakʼ kana, bickom duk reakʼ mentege bon bujhạueda; menkhan Isorakʼ ḍanṭao batao reakʼ jo do sulukte perecʼ dhorom jion kana.
Onate apeakʼ borocʼ ti ar nijor gunṭhiko do daṛe ocoetape.
Apeakʼ calakʼ hor sojhetape, jemon leḍha hoṛ do ar aloe mackaokʼ, bickome boge ruạṛokʼ.
Sanam hoṛko tulucʼ sulukte tahen ar sonot hoyokʼ lạgitʼ ahkaokʼpe. Sonot begor Probhu do okoe hõ bako ńelńamea.
Ńelpe, okoe hõ jemon Isorakʼ daya khon aloko eṛanokʼ. Ar hewer haṛhatʼ dare reakʼ rehetʼ leka omon rakabokʼte okoe hõ jemon duk janam ocoete ḍher hoṛ aloko bhõnḍko.
Ńelpe, okoe hõ jemon Esau leka bedhoromicʼ aloe hoyokʼ se Isor bebhoktiyicʼ aloe hoyokʼ ma. Esau do mitʼ sańj jomakʼ lạgitʼ pạhil janam hoke ạkhrińletʼtaea.
Baḍaegeape, tayomte rakʼ rakʼte ạsirbade koeletʼre hõ enhõ uni doe nihạt giḍi ocoyena, ente mon ạcur reakʼ ạt unre baṅ tahẽkana.
Okaṭakʼ jolokʼkan buru joṭetʼ daṛekokʼ ona lekan buru ṭhen do bape hecʼakana. Ape do kaṛaṅ kucạṅ ńut ar birbão se jãhãn sakwa reakʼ saḍe ar katha reakʼ aṛaṅ ṭhen hõ bape hecʼakana.
Okoe ona kathako ańjomletʼ tahẽkan onko do nehõrkateko menleda jemon onko ṭhen ar cetʼge alo roṛogokʼ,
ente onko do noa hukum bako sahao daṛeada, cedakʼ je, “Janwar hõ janwar ona burureye jakʼle khan, enḍekhan dhiriteye tiń ocokʼa.”
Okaṭakʼ ńellen tahẽkan ona do nunạkʼ botoranakʼ tahẽkana je, Moseye menleda, “Iń do botorteń thar tharaokʼ kana.”
Ape do Sion buru ar jiwetʼ Isorakʼ nagraha ṭhenpe hecʼakana. Ona nagraha do hoyokʼ kana serma reakʼ Jerusalem. Ar hajar hajar serma goḍetkoakʼ rạskạ porob ṭhenpe hecʼakana;

pạhil janam hopon reakʼ ạidạriko ńamakatʼ hoṛ lekate okoekoakʼ ńutum sermare ol akan, onko hotete benaoakʼ manḍer ṭhenpe hecʼakana; okoe doe sanamkoren bicạricʼkan uni Isor ṭhenpe hecʼakana; ar okoekoko sạbit ocoakan onko sanam dhorom hoṛkoakʼ jiu ṭhenpe hecʼakana;
Okoe doe nawa bondobosren dene banaricʼ kan uni Jisu ṭhenpe hecʼakana; ar Abelakʼ mãyãm khon okaṭakʼ mãyãm do artetʼ bhage kathae roṛ, ona chiṭạu akan mãyãm ṭhenpe hecʼakana.

Men sontorokʼpe, okoe kathae roroṛkan uniakʼ katha do alope phesṛaotaea. Mose do Isorakʼ sontor katha dhạrtirene baḍae ocoketʼko khan hoṛko do uniakʼ kathako phesṛaoletʼtaea ar rukhiyạ bako ńamleda, unre serma khon okoeye sontorakatʼ bon uniakʼ babon bataole khan cetʼtehõ rukhiyạ oho bon ńamlea.
Unre Isorakʼ moca kathatege dhạrti do dal dalaolena, menkhan ńitokʼ uni do noae gokʼakada, “Iń do eken armitʼ dhao dhạrtiń dal dalao ocoea ona do baṅ, menkhan serma hõń dal dalaoa.”
“Ar mitʼ dhao,” Noa banar kathate bujhạukʼ kana je, oka jinisko dal dalaokʼa, metakʼme oka sirjạu akan ona do pheraokʼa, jemon oka jinisko baṅ dal dalaokʼ onako do ṭarhao tahena.
Onate okaṭakʼ rajosṭi baṅ dal dalaokʼ, ona rajosṭi bon ńam joṅkante dela, Isor bon gun manao joharaema. Enḍekhan Isor okalekae kusiyakʼ ona leka bhokti ar botor salakʼ bon sewa daṛeaea.
Ente aboren Isor do ḍahao maraoakʼ seṅgel lekanae.
Ape mimitʼko boeha leka dupulạṛpe.
Ar peṛakʼ do alope hiṛińa; adom adomko do begor baḍaetege serma goḍetkoko peṛaletʼkoa.
Okoe hajotre menakʼko onko sãote ape hõpe kạidi oco akana, ar khed ocokʼkanko sãote ape hõpe khed ocokʼkana mente hudiskate onkoakʼ katha disạipe.
Sanamkoge bapla do manot salakʼko beṅgetʼakʼma. Jãwãe ar bạhu talare bapla tonol do sonot dohoe lek kana, ente jãhãlekan laṭghaṭge, ar jãhãe ona dusireko dusige khan Isor do onkoe sạjạikogea.
Ṭaka-poesa reakʼ laloc khon sahaṛakae tahenpe. Apeakʼ oka menakʼtape onatege dhirpur akae tahenpe. Isore meneda, “Iń do tishõ bạń alaomea ar tishõ bạń giḍimea.”
Onate abo do dilkate bon men daṛeakʼa, Probhu do ińren goṛoyicʼ, iń do bạń botorokʼa; manwa do cetʼko cekayińạ?
Okoe ape ṭhen Isorakʼ kathako lại jạhirletʼ tahẽkan, onko mukhiyạkoakʼ kathako disạipe. Onkoakʼ jion cạrit reakʼ mucạtʼ jo mońjte beṅgetʼakʼpe ar onko leka biswạs dohoepe.
Jisu Mạsi do hola cetʼlekae tahẽkan, teheń hõ onkage menaea ar jaejug hạbicʼ hõ onkageye tahena.

Aema lekan nawa nawa cecetʼakʼte bhul horte jemon aloko bulạu idipe. Aboakʼ mon do dãṛẽ samaṅ akatʼ jomakʼre tahẽ baṅkate Isorakʼ dayare jemon kajakte ṭarhao akae tahen. Okoe ona jomakʼreko ṭehãḍokʼkan tahẽkan, onko do ona jomakʼ khon jãhãn porho baṅ hoelentakoa.
Aboakʼ do mitʼṭen pinḍ menakʼa ar okoe Israelkoakʼ ona sewa tạmbureko kạmikan, onko do aboakʼ pinḍ cetanre samaṅ akatʼ jãhãnakʼge jojom reakʼ ạidạri bạnukʼtakoa.

Kại ńutumte dãṛẽ samaṅ akatʼ janwarakʼ mãyãmante Israelren maraṅ naeke do sonot utạrakʼ jaegateye calakʼkan tahẽkana, menkhan janwarkoakʼ hoṛmo do Israelkoakʼ tahen jaega khon bahrete idikateko rapakʼ giḍikakʼkan tahẽkana.
Onkage Jisu hõ Jerusalem nagraha bahrere duk jomkateye gocʼlena, jemon acʼakʼ mãyãm hotete manwako kại khone chaḍaoko.
Onate dela bon, uniakʼ opomanbon gogte nagraha bahre uni ṭhen bon calakʼma,
ente nonḍe do jaejug hạbicʼ jãhãn nagraha bạnukʼ tabona; menkhan okaṭakʼ nagraha daraekan ona lạgitʼ bon koyokʼ horakada.
Onate delabon, Mạsi hotete Isor ṭhen sarhao reakʼ samaṅokʼakʼ jaoge bon samaṅma, metakʼme Isorren hoṛ mente okoe apnarteko aṅgocetʼkan onko do akoakʼ mocate Isorko gun manao joharae ma.
Bhage kạmi lạgitʼ ar eṭakʼko reṅgejokʼre bhạlạiko reakʼ do alope hiṛińa, ente Isor do nonkan dãṛẽgeye kusiyakʼa.

Aperen ạyurkoakʼ katha bataope ar onko gobolre tahenpe, ente okoe Isor ṭhen lekha jokhako em, onkan hoṛ lekatege coṅ onko ma apeko ńel todarotetʼpe kan. Onko ṭhen gobolokʼpe jemon onko do akoakʼ kạmi rạskạ salakʼko kạmi daṛeakʼ, menkhan duk salakʼ do baṅ. Ar duk salakʼge ona onkae hoyokʼ khan, enḍekhan onate apeakʼ do cetʼ porho hõ baṅ hoyokʼtapea.
Ale lạgitʼ koejoṅpe. Sanamakʼkore dhorom lekate senokʼle menjoṅkan iạtele baḍaekana je, aleakʼ bibek do napaegetalea mente.
Menkhan iń do apeko artetʼ bạ̃ṛti koejoṅ lạgitʼ iń nehõrape kana, jemon usạrate arhõ ape sãoteń ńepel ńapam daṛeakʼ.
Oka mãyãmte sulukren Isorakʼ jaejug bondobos doho akan ona hotete Isor do aboren Probhu Jisu Mạsi, metakʼme bhiḍikoren maraṅ gupiyicʼ do gocʼko khone jiwetʼ beretʼkedea.

Okaṭakʼ bhageakʼ kan onate uni do acʼakʼ monejoṅ leka calakʼ lạgitʼ apeko purạteye sạbit utạrpe ma. Uniakʼ mẽtʼãhã samaṅre okaṭakʼ bhageakʼkan Jisu Mạsi hotete aboakʼ ontorre uni do onageye kạmi ma. Jaejug hạbicʼ Isorakʼ ṭhonokʼ hoyokʼtae ma. Amen.
E boehako, ape ṭhen ińakʼ bạ̃ṛti nehõr do noage je, ińakʼ noa sikhạuna kathako do bataotińpe. Ar ape ṭhen bạ̃ṛti katha do bạń oletʼkana.
Iń do baḍae ocope sanayediń kana je, aboren boeha Timothi do khalase ńamakada. Are hecʼlen khan iń do uni soṅgekateń hiripea.
Aperen sanam ạyurko ar Isorren sanam hoṛko aboakʼ johar emakope. Itạliạ disạmren Isorren hoṛko do apeko joharape kana.
Ape sanamko tulucʼ Isorakʼ daya baṛe tahenma.
Isor ar Probhu Jisu Mạsiren golam iń Jakob do dhạrti reakʼ sanam jaegareko chir chạtur akan Jihudikoren gel bar bõsrenko johariń emako kana.
E ińren boehako, ạḍi lekan biḍạurepe paṛaokʼlenre ona do rạskạ reakʼ kana mente alope hudisa,
entepe baḍaegea biswạs reakʼ biḍạuge apeakʼ soboriye baḍhao ocoyeda.
Ar ona soborige apeakʼ jionre purạte kạmire lagaope, jemon gạkhuṛ arpe niphuṭ utạr daṛeakʼ, metakʼme apeakʼ colonre okulạn alo tahen ma.
Apeko modre jãhãe akel reakʼ okulan menakʼtae khan uni do Isor ṭhene koejoṅma, ar Isor do onae emaea, ente uni do begor ạṛiste mimitʼko asambheṛe dan akoa.
Menkhan begor digdhạte pạtiạukʼ salakʼ koejoṅ hoyokʼtaea, ente okoeye digdhạkʼ uni do hoete sokojokʼkan jalapuri reakʼ ḍheo lekanae; hoege uni doe ṭhelao idiyea.
Nonkan hoṛ do Probhu ṭhen khon jãhãnakʼe ńama mente aloe asokʼma.
Uni doe bar monan hoṛ kana ar joto kạmirege bae ṭarhaokʼa.
Okoeṭakʼ biswạsi boeha doe nindhạnge, Isor do uniye usulkedete apnarte bhạganicʼe hudisokʼma.
Ar okoeye kisạ̃ṛge, Isor do uniye nindhạnkedete uni hõ apnarte bhạganicʼe bujhạukʼma, ente uni do ghãs reakʼ baha lekageye mosotʼ cabakʼa.
Siń cando jharla jhạrli setoṅanteye rakapʼlenre ghãsko do rohoṛokʼa ar ona reakʼ sajaotetʼ do nosṭo cabakʼa. Onkage kisạ̃ṛ hoṛ hõ acʼakʼ jion reakʼ horkoreye tolmocʼ cabakʼa.
Bhạgangeae uni do one okoe biḍạureye sombhuriyetʼkan, ente lek kanae menteye sạbudlen khan uni do jit reakʼ mala lekate jione ńama. Ar okoe Isorko dulạṛedekan onko do jion emako lạgitʼe gokʼakatʼkoa.
Jãhãege ontorre kại secʼe orokʼ kana menteye bujhạu khan aloe menma, “Isor do kại secʼe oreń kana.” Ente jãhãn bạṛicʼakʼge Isor do kại horte bae ididaṛeaea.
Ontor reakʼ bạṛicʼ sanage manwa do kại secʼe or idiyedea ar ghaḍlakʼreye giḍiyea.
Ona tayom bạṛicʼ sana purạulen khan kạiye janama, ar kại perecʼlen khan gujukʼe janam ocoea.
E ińren dulạṛiạ boehako, alope bhula.
Jion reakʼ mimitʼ bhage ar niphuṭ dan do serma khon pheḍ hijukʼ kana, ona do Isor ṭhen khonge hijukʼ kana, ar uni do sanam marsalkoren Baba kanae. Uni do parom calakʼkan umul leka bae pheraokʼa.
Acʼakʼ nij sanate sạriakʼ katha hotete uni do acʼren gidrạkoe hoe ocoketʼbona, jemon uniakʼ sirjonre pạhil utạrakʼ jo bon hoyokʼ.
Ińren dulạṛiạ boehako, ińakʼ noa katha hetawakʼpe, ape mimitʼko ańjom lạgitʼ gagojokʼpe, menkhan usạrate katha alope roṛgoda se alope raṅgao godokʼa;
ente abo ṭhen khon Isor oka dhorom jione asokʼkan ona do raṅgao talate oho hecʼlena.

Onate joto lekan bedhorom ar bạṛicʼakʼko ńit hõ apeakʼ jionre menakʼ khan ona do bạgiyakʼpe. Isorakʼ katha reakʼ itạ one oka do apeakʼ ontorre rohoe akan ona baṛe mạ̃hir salakʼ ataṅpe. Ar kại khon bańcaope reakʼ ektiạri do noa katharege menakʼa.
Eken Isorakʼ katha ańjomkate do baṅ hoyokʼa, onaleka kạmi hõ lagaokʼa. Eken Isorakʼ kathagepe ańjom ar ona leka bape kạmi enḍekhan ape do apnartegepe ṭhokakʼ kana.

Menkhan okaṭakʼ purạ ạn manwa do sạdhintetʼe danae ona secʼ okoe mońjteye beṅged are hetawakʼ, uni do ona ạn reakʼ katha ańjomkate bae hiṛińa bickom ona lekae kạmiya. Onate uni do acʼakʼ sanam kạmire bhore ńama.
Okoe apnarte dhorome hudisokʼkan menkhan acʼakʼ alaṅ bae sambṛao daṛeakʼ uni do apnargeye bulạukʼkana. Ar uniakʼ dhorom korom do ạuṛiakʼgetaea.
Rạnḍi maejiu ar tũạr amarko dukokʼre hiriko ar dhạrti reakʼ joto lekan bạṛicʼakʼ khon apnartetʼ sahaṛ akae tahenge hoyokʼ kana Isorakʼ mẽtʼre sạri dhorom ar khạṭitetʼ.
E ińren boehako, aboren ṭhonokte perecʼ Probhu Jisu Mạsirepe pạtiạu akan khan sanamko somante beṅgetʼ akope.
Mitʼṭen hoṛ do sona reakʼ mundạm ar mońj kicricʼ horokʼkate apeakʼ sunạgogteye hecʼena; onkage ar mitʼṭen reṅgecʼ hoṛ hõ mạilạ kiricʼ horokʼkateye hecʼena.
Unre ape do mońj kicricʼ horokʼ akatʼ hoṛ bạ̃ṛti manot emaetepe metae, “Am do noa bhage jaegare duṛupʼme,” ar uni reṅgecʼ hoṛ dope metae, “Onḍe teṅgo hataṛokʼme,” se “Nonḍe jaṅga pheḍre duṛupʼme,”
Enḍekhan apnar talare cetʼ kạṭicʼ ar lạṭu reakʼ bape sirjạueda ar bạṛicʼ monsubạte bape bicạreda?

E ińren dulạṛiạ boehako, ańjomtińpe. Dhạrti secʼte okoeko reṅgecʼge, onkoge cetʼ Isor do biswạsre kisạ̃ṛokʼ lạgitʼ bae bachao akatʼkoa? Okoe Isorko dulạṛedekan onko do uni okaṭakʼ rajosṭi udukʼako lạgitʼe gokʼatʼko tahẽkan ona rajosṭiren bhạgiạdarko hoyokʼ lạgitʼ cetʼ noko reṅgecʼ hoṛko bae bachao akatʼkoa?
Menkhan onko reṅgecʼ hoṛkoge ape dope bemanot akatʼkoa. Kĩsạ̃ṛ hoṛkoge cetʼ bako kosṭoyetʼpea ar adalotte bako or idiyetʼpea?
Okoeakʼ ńutum lekatepe hoho ocokʼkan kĩsạ̃ṛko do cetʼ ona manot ńutum bako opomanwakʼkana?
Sonot sostorre olakana, “Am aḍepaseren hoṛ apnar leka dulạṛem.” Ape do Mạsiakʼ rajosṭi reakʼ ạn sạṛigepe manaoetʼ khan enḍekhanpe bhageyetʼgea.
Menkhan jotoko somante bape beṅgetʼakokan khan enḍekhanpe kạiyeda. Ar noa ạnge unre ạn bebataoko menteye dusipea.
Okoe hoṛ ạn-ạri pańjakatere hõ eken mitʼṭen babotreye kại uni do joto ạn-ạrikogeye bebataoetʼ kana.
Okoeye menakatʼ, “Alom loṭghuṭia,” Unige arhõe meneda, “Alom khũna.” Enḍekhan ape do loṭghuṭi baṅkatepe khũn khan enḍekhan ạn bebataoko do cetʼ bape hoyokʼ kana?
Okaṭakʼ ạn do manwa sạdhine danako kan ar ona ạn hotete okoekoakʼ bicạr hoyokʼ, onko lekage katha roṛpe ar beoharpe;
ente okoe bae daya akan, bicạrre uni hõ daya do bae ńama. Bicạr cetanre daya doe jitạukʼa.
E ińren boehako, jãhãeye men uniakʼ do biswạs menakʼtaea menkhan kạmire ona bae udug enḍekhan ona reakʼ do cetʼ porho menakʼa? Ona biswạs do cetʼ kại khone bańcao daṛeaea?
Ape modre jãhãe boeha se miserawakʼ oṛakʼre jomakʼ, ar horokʼ lạgitʼ kicricʼ hõ bạnukʼtae,
ar jãhãe uniye metae, “Amakʼ bhage hoyokʼma, jom ńũkate mońjte tahenme,” Menkhan jạṛuṛakʼ jãhãnakʼge bape bebostawae enḍekhan onate uniakʼ do cetʼ jãhãn porho hoyokʼtaea?
Ṭhik onkage, okaṭakʼ biswạs sãote kạmi reakʼ jopoṛao bạnukʼ ona biswạs do gocʼgea.
Jãhãeko mendaṛekea, “Am do biswạs menakʼtama ar ińakʼ do kạmiko menakʼtińạ.” Kạmiko begorte amakʼ biswạs udukʼạńme ar iń do kạmi hotete ińakʼ biswạiń udukʼama.
Am do mitʼ Isorrem pạtiạu akana? Bhagegea! Menkhan bạṛicʼ jiuko hõ coṅ ona mako pạtiạukʼkan ar botorteko dhak dhakaokʼkan.
E lelha! Kạmi begor biswạs je gocʼge ona reakʼ cetʼ cinhạm khojkana?
Aboren hapṛam Abraham do acʼren hopon Isạhak pinḍreye dãṛẽyede tahẽkanre ona kạmi lạgitʼ cetʼ uni do dhorom mente bae aṅgoclena?
Am mam ńeletʼkangea je, biswạs ar kạmi unre uni do mitʼ dhaoteye kạmileda ar uniakʼ ona kạmige biswạsre perecʼtetʼe danadea.
Nonkate sonot sostor reakʼ katha do purạulena, “Abraham do Isorakʼ kathae biswạsada ar onate Isor do dhorom menteye aṅgockedea.” Onate uni do Isorren dulạṛiạ menteye hoho ocolena.
Enḍekhanpe ńeleda, eken biswạstege Isor do manwa dhorom menteye aṅgocea ona do baṅ, menkhan biswạs ar kạmi noa banar iạtege Isor do manwa dhorom menteye aṅgocedea.
Rahab kusmbi do cekate dhorom menteye lekha ocolena? Uni do Jihudiren paṭhaonakine okoketʼ kinạ ar eṭakʼ horteye kolgotʼkatʼkinạ, ar noa kạmi iạte dhorom menteye aṅgocena.
Jiwi begor hoṛmo cetʼleka gocʼge onkage kạmi begor biswạs hõ gocʼgea.
E boehako, ape modre sanamkoge guru do alope hoyokʼa, entepe baḍaegea, abo do guru iạte eṭakʼko khon arhõ kajak bicạr hoyokʼtabona.
Abo do sanamkoge ạḍi lekate bon behokeda. Jãhãe katha hotete bae behoketʼ khan enḍekhan uni doe dhoromgea; ar uni do goṭa hoṛmoe sambṛao daṛeakʼa.
Sadomkoakʼ mocare jhinbo lagaole khan, jãhãrege sana bon onḍege bon idi daṛeakoa.
Arhõ ńelpe, jahaj do maraṅgere hõ ar kajak hoete ṭhelao idikʼkanre hõ calaoicʼ do eken mitʼṭen huḍiń paṭwarte jãhãsecʼge monae ontegeye idi daṛeakʼ kana.
Alaṅ hõ onkage; hoṛmo reakʼ mitʼṭen huḍiń utạrakʼ hạṭińkanre hõ ona do ạḍi maraṅ maraṅ kathakoe roṛa. Arhõ huḍiń huḍiń seṅgelte mitʼṭen napṛakʼ bire ḍahao marao daṛeakʼa!

Onkage alaṅ hõ ṭhik seṅgel leka. Aboakʼ hoṛmore tinạkʼ hạṭińko menakʼ ona modre alaṅ do mitʼṭen bedhorom dhạrti lekana. Norok seṅgelre lokʼte ona do goṭa hoṛmoe nosṭoyeda ar jion reakʼ horre seṅgele salgaoeda.
Manwa do joto lekan janwarko, cẽṛẽko, leńokʼ ṭunḍạńko ar dakʼren jiwiyankoe koboj daṛeakoa arko kobojetʼkogea,
menkhan alaṅ do okoe hõ bae koboj daṛeakʼa. Ona do baṅ sambṛaokʼa, bạṛicʼ ar botor bisanakʼte perecʼgea.
Noa alaṅte aboren Probhu, metakʼme Isor Baba bon sarhaoede kana, arhõ noa alaṅte uniakʼ muṭhạnte benao akan hoṛ bon sarapako kana.
Aboakʼ inạ moca khonge sarhao ar sarap oḍokokʼ kana. E ińren boehako, nonka hoyokʼ do baṅ bhagea.
Inạ mitʼ jaega khon ạtu oḍok hijukʼkan dakʼre do cetʼ heṛem ar haṛhatʼ dakʼ tahena?
E boehako, loa darere jạitun jo do cetʼ jo daṛeakʼgea? Se darkha nạ̃ṛĩre cetʼ loa jo do jokʼgea? Onkage raham dakʼre heṛem dakʼ do baṅ ńamokʼa.
Ape modre akel ar budan hoṛ doe okoe kana? Uni do acʼakʼ bhage cạl-colonte akel khon oḍokokʼkan mạ̃hirtetʼ reakʼ kạmiye udugma.
Menkhan apeakʼ ontor do hiskạte haṛhatʼ ar dola duli menakʼ khan enḍekhan akel reakʼ do alope sarhaokʼa, ar sạriakʼ do alope ạuṛiaga.
Nonkan akel serma khon do baṅ pheḍ hijukʼa, bickom ona reakʼ jopoṛao do dhạrti reakʼ bạṛicʼ sana ar bạṛicʼ jiuko sãotege;
ente okare hiskạ ar dola duli tahen onḍege gulmal ar joto lekan bedhoromakʼko hõ tahena.

Menkhan oka akel serma khon hijukʼkan ona do pạhilre khạṭi, ar ona tayom do sulukte perecʼgea; onare sahao daṛe ar mạ̃hirtetʼ tahena; ona do daya ar bhage kạmire perecʼtetʼge, bin digdhạ ar bin phạsiarawakʼge.
Okoe sulukokʼ lạgitʼko kurumuṭukan onko do sulukte itạko ereda ar ona reakʼ jo do hoyokʼ kana dhorom jionge.
Ape talare lạṛhại ar jhogṛa do oka khon hijukʼ kana? Okako rij roṅ apeakʼ hoṛmoreye lạṛhạikan ona khonge cetʼ onako do baṅ oḍok hijukʼ kana?

Ape dope lalocakʼ kana menkhan bape ńameda. Ape dope khũneda arpe lalocetʼkana, menkhan okaṭakʼpe khojkan ona do bape ńameda. Ape do jhogṛa arpe lạṛhại kana, enhõ apeakʼ do cetʼge baṅ tahenkana, ente ape do Isor ṭhen bape khojeda.
Ape dope koeyetʼkanre hõ bape ńameda, ente bạṛicʼ monsubạ iạtepe koeyeda, jemon apeakʼ rij roṅ purạukʼtape.
E baṅ pạtiạukʼko, ape do cetʼ bape baḍaea, dhạrti tulucʼpe gatekʼ do Isorren bạiripe hoyokʼa mente? Onate jãhãe dhạrtiren gate hoyokʼe menjoṅkan khan uni do apnarte Isorren bạiriye hoyokʼkana.
Ape do cetʼpe hudiseda, sonot sostorre ạuṛiakʼge noa kathae meneda je, sonot Jiu, one Isor do aboakʼ ontorreye emakade, uni do aboakʼ bhokti ńam lạgitʼe koyokʼ horakada mente?
Menkhan Isorakʼ daya do arhõ ḍhergea. Onate sonot sostorre ol menakʼa, “Isor do phulạukʼkanko birudreye teṅgona, menkhan mạ̃hirko doe bhorakoa.”
Onate Isorakʼ gobolre tahenpe. Ar Soetan teṅgo daramepe, enḍekhan uni do ape ṭhen khone ńir pharakokʼa.
Isor ṭhen sorokʼpe, enḍekhan uni hõ ape ṭhene sorokʼa. E kạiyanko, ape do apnartege saphakʼpe. E bar monan hoṛko, apeakʼ ontor khạṭi dohoepe.
Dukre bhabnakʼpe ar hae haeyokʼre rakʼjoṅpe. Apeakʼ landa do hae haete sodorpe ar rạskạ bodol do dukokʼpe.
Probhu samaṅre nindhạnokʼpe, enḍekhan unigeye tul rakapʼpea.

E boehako alope oktawa. Okoe boeha birudre kathae roṛ se boehawakʼ doskoe ńam baṛae uni do ạn birudre kathae roṛa ar ạn-ạri reakʼ doskoe ḍunḍhạu baṛaea. Am do ạn-ạri reakʼ doskom ńam baṛae khan enḍekhan ona do bam manaoeda bickom ona reakʼem bicạreda.
Eken mitʼ hoṛge menaea okoe do ạn-ạrikoe emokʼkan are bicạrkan. Unigeye rukhiyạ daṛeakʼa are marao daṛeakʼa. Am dom okoe kante am aḍepaseren hoṛakʼ doskom ńam baṛayeda?
Ape modre adomkoko men botecʼkea, “Teheń baṅkhan gapa do phalna nagraha senkate mitʼ bochor bon khemaoa ar onḍe bạnij bepar katebon labjoṅa.”
Menkhan gapa cetʼ hoyokʼa ona do bape baḍaea. Apeakʼ jionge baṅ cetʼ kan? Kuṛhạkan cope, one oka do thoṛa ghạṛicʼ ńelokʼkan ar ona tayom do chanokʼkan.
Ona khon bickom apeakʼ do noa katha roṛ lek kana, “Probhui menle khan ale do jiwetʼle tahena ar noa se hanale kạmiya.”
Menkhan ape do phulạu ar usul montepe perecʼ akana. Ar nonkan joto phulạuakʼ do bạṛicʼgea.
Onate bhage kạmi baḍaekate hõ okoe bae kạmi uni doe kạiyeda.
E kisạ̃ṛko ańjompe. Apere okaṭakʼ kosṭo hijukʼkan ona lạgitʼ rakʼ homorpe ar hae haeyokʼpe.
Apeakʼ dhon-durib do sea akantapea ar apeakʼ kicricʼko doko jạrnḍi akada.
Apeakʼ sona ar rupạre joṅ dhorao akana, ar ona joṅ dhoraoge ape birudre gohae ema ar seṅgel leka apeakʼ jele jomtapea. Ape do sesa sisi dinkore dhon-duribpe sońj akawana.

Apeakʼ khetre okoe kạmiyạko phosolko samṭao akatʼtape onko do kuṛại bape emakatʼkoa; ar ńelpe, ona kuṛại do ńitokʼ ãṭ aṛaṅteye dusiyetʼpea. Sanam daṛean Probhuakʼ luturre onko kạmiyạkoakʼ rakʼ do seṭerakana.
Noa dhạrtire ạḍi nirạite dinpe ṭalaoeda ar bin sambṛaokʼtepe ten ocoakana. Gujukʼ din lạgitʼpe logno akana.
Ape do dhorom hoṛkope dusi akatʼkoa arpe gocʼ akatʼkoa, ar onko do bako tạkicʼ daramletʼpea.

Onate E boehako, tin hạbicʼ Probhu bae hijukʼ unhạbicʼ jiwi hataṛkate jotowakʼ sahaope. Cetʼleka casa do khet reakʼ damanakʼ phosol lạgitʼe ńel horetʼkan ar pạhil ar mucạtʼ dakʼ lạgitʼe sombhuriyetʼ, ona mape ńeletʼkange?
Ape hõ onkage sombhuripe ar ontorre teṅgo ṭak akae tahenpe, ente Probhu do ạḍi usạrageye hijukʼ kana.
E boehako, Isor jemon apeakʼ dosko aloe sabtape onate ape apere dos alope lade joṅa. Ńelpe, bicạricʼ do duạr sorreye hecʼakana.
E boehako, okoe nạbiko Probhu secʼ khon kathako roṛakatʼ, ar kosṭo oktere cetʼlekako sombhuri akatʼ tahẽkana ona katha do hudiskate ńelpe.

Okoe sombhurikateko sahao akatʼ onko do bhạgankole metako kana. Ape do Jobe sumbrạuletʼ reakʼ kathape ańjomakada ar Probhuakʼ kạmi reakʼ mucạtʼ jo do bhagegea mente ona hõpe ńelakada. Probhuakʼ daya ar mãyã reakʼ mucạtʼ do bạnukʼa.

E ińren boehako, iń do asokaete noa kathań metapekana, ape do serma, ar ot se eṭakʼ jãhãnakʼ ńutumte alope kiriạkʼa. Ona khon bickom, “Hẽ khan hẽ, ar baṅ khan baṅ,” hoyokʼtape ma, jemon bicạrre alope paṛaokʼ.
Ape modre cetʼ jãhãe duke jomeda? Uni doe koejoṅ ma. Jãhãe sukre menaea?
Uni doe sarhao sereń ma. Jãhãe ruạreye paṛao akana? Uni do manḍerren mukhiyạkoe hoho jarwakoma. Onko do Probhu ńutumte uniakʼ bohokʼre sunumko ojokʼaete uniko koeyae ma.
Ar pạtiạuteakʼ koejoṅ do uni ruạkʼkan hoṛe bogeyea; Probhuge uni doe bogeyea. Ar uniye kại akatʼ khan Isor do uniye ikạyea.
Onate ape apere kạiko aṅgocpe ar ape ape lạgitʼ koejoṅpe, jemonpe bogekʼ. Isorakʼ sana leka okoeye calakʼkan uni do koejoṅ reakʼ daṛe menakʼtaete onae hoe ocoea.
Eliạ do abo lekage mitʼṭen manwae tahẽkana. Ar nehõr salakʼe koekeda jemon dakʼ hõ alo dag, ar pe bochor tala disạmre bae dakʼleda.
Uni do arhõe koekeda; unre serma do dakʼe emena ar ot do phosole omon ocokeda.
E ińren boehako, ape modre jãhãe sạriakʼ khone chingạulen khan ar ape modren jãhãe uniye ạcur ruạṛle khan,
enḍekhan noa katha baḍaekakʼpe, jãhãe mitʼṭen kại hoṛ bhul hor khone ruạṛ ạguiye uni do gujukʼ khone bańcaoea ar ạḍi utạr kạiye dapaltaea.
Isorren bachao akan okoeko hoṛ do Pontus, Galatiạ, Kapadokiạ, Asiạ ar Bithuniạ Prodesre chir chạtur akan upriạ hoṛ lekako girạbasokʼkan, onko ṭhen iń Jisu Mạsiren apostol Patras do noa ciṭhiń oleda.

Isor Baba do acʼakʼ monsubạ lekage apeye bachao akatʼpea, ar acʼ lạgitʼge sonot Jiu do apeye begar dohoakatʼpea. Noa reakʼ monsubạ do hoyokʼ kana, jemon ape do Jisu Mạsirepe gobolokʼ ar uniakʼ mãyãm reakʼ chiṭiạu hotetepe sapha ocokʼ. Isor do aema daya ar suluke danape ma.

Aboren Probhu Jisu Mạsiren Isor ar Babawakʼ sarhao hoyokʼtae ma. Jisu Mạsi gocʼko khone jiwetʼ beretʼkedete Isor do acʼakʼ maraṅ dayate nawa janame dan akatʼbona. Ona iạte abo do mitʼṭen jiwetʼ as bon ńamakada,

metakʼme darakan dinkore nonkan mitʼṭen dhon ńam reakʼ as bon ńamakada one oka do tishõ baṅ nosṭokʼ, onare bạṛicʼakʼ cetʼge baṅ tahena, ona do jaejug hạbicʼ nawage tahena. Ar noa dhon do sermare ape lạgitʼ doho jogao akana.
Ar purạ puri bańcao ạuripe ńam hạbicʼ Isorakʼ daṛete biswạs hotete ape dope horho jaṅge ocoakana. Ar mucạtʼ oktere sodorokʼ lạgitʼ ona bańcaokʼ reakʼ do tear dohoakana.
Ape do thoṛa ghạṛicʼre hõ aema lekan biḍạu talate dukpe ńameda, ar enrehõ bańcao ńam reakʼ aste apeakʼ mon do rạskạte perejokʼ kana.

Noako biḍạu do hijukʼgea jemon apeakʼ biswạs khạṭi mente sạbudokʼtape, ar onate Jisu Mạsiye sodorokʼre ape do sarhao, ṭhonok ar manotpe ńama. Okaṭakʼ sona do heṛ idikʼ ona hõ seṅgelre khạṭi ocoe hoyokʼa; menkhan apeakʼ biswạs reakʼ dam do ona sona khon hõ artetʼ sorosgea.

Mạsi bape ńṭoṭhadere hõ enhõ ape do unipe dulạṛede kana; ar ńit bape ńel ńamekanre hõ unirepe pạtiạu akana, ar okaṭakʼ rạskạ lạite baṅ sodorokʼ ar okaṭakʼ do serma reakʼ ṭhonokte perecʼge, ona rạskạtepe rạskạkʼ kana;
Ente apeakʼ pạtiạu reakʼ jo dope ńam lạgidokʼ kana, ar ona mucạtʼ jo do apeakʼ purạ puri bańcaotetʼ kana.
Okaṭakʼ bhor ńam reakʼ katha, ona babotre okoe nạbiko sedaereko roṛletʼ tahẽkan, onko do noa bańcaokʼ reaṅ baḍae joṅ lạgitʼ ạḍi khoj tolasko hataoleda arko kulikan tahẽkana.

Onkoakʼ ontorre Mạsiren Jiu do laharege gohae emleda je, Mạsi do duk jojom hoyokʼtaea ar ona tayom do ṭhonoke ńama. Nạbiko baḍae sanaletʼkoa Mạsiren uni Jiu do oka okte ar oka dosa reakʼ kathae baḍae ocoyetʼkoa.

Menkhan Isor doe udukʼatʼko tahẽkana je, onko okako kathako menletʼ ona hotete apnar lạgitʼ sapʼsor baṅkate apegeko sapʼsoratʼpe tahẽkana. Serma khon kolocoyicʼ sonot Jiuakʼ ạyurte okoe ape ṭhen Mạsi reaṅ bhage sombatko porcarakatʼ onko do nạbikoakʼ kathage apeko baḍae ocoakatʼpea. Ar serma goḍetko hõ noako reaṅ baḍae joṅ lạgitʼgeko gagojlena.
Onate monre paṭhe keṭejokʼpe ar apnarte sambṛaokʼpe. Jisu Mạsiye sodorokʼre okaṭakʼ bhorpe ńam, ona lạgitʼ purạ puri as dohoete koyokʼ hor akae tahenpe.
Isorakʼ hukum batao gidrạko kantepe lahateakʼ bạṛicʼ sana leka apeakʼ jion do alope khemaoa; ente unre apema Isor bape baḍae orom akade tahẽkan.
Ona khon bickom okoeye hohoakatʼpe ar cetʼlekae sonotge, onkage ape hõ apeakʼ sanam cạl-colonte sonotko hoyokʼpe.
Sonot sostorre Isore menakada, “Ińiń sonotgete ape hõ sonotko hoyokʼpe.’’

Isor Baba do mimitʼ manwakoakʼ kạmi lekae bicạrkoa, uni do mẽtʼãhã ńelte bae bicạra. Onate Baba mente unipe hohoaekan khan, enḍekhan noa dhạrtire tinạkʼ din upriạ leka menakʼpe unạkʼ din uni botorae salakʼ din khemaope.
Baḍaegeape, jion horte calakʼ lạgitʼ aperen hapṛamko ṭhen khonpe ńamakatʼ bạṛicʼ colon khon sona se rupạ leka heṛokʼ jãhãn jiniste do bape kiriń chaḍao akana;
ape dope kiriń chaḍao akana niphuṭ ar bedag Bheḍa Hopon Jisu Mạsiakʼ mãyãmte.
Dhạrti ạuri sirjạurege Isor do noa lạgitʼe ṭhik doho akade tahẽkana, menkhan niạ mucạtʼ oktere uni do ape lạgitʼgeye sodorena.
Isor do gocʼko khon uniye jiwetʼ beretʼkedete ṭhonoke danadea ar uni hotete ape do Isorrepe biswạs akana; ar onatege apeakʼ biswạs ar as do Isor cetanre menakʼtapea.
Ńitokʼ do sạriạkʼtetʼpe manaoetʼte apeakʼ ontorpe sapha akada, ar onate biswạsi boehako do ape ṭhen dulạṛiạko kanako. Onateń meneda, ape mimitʼko khạndri ontorte dupulạṛpe.

Okaṭakʼ itạ nosṭokʼ, onkan itạ khon nãwãte do bape janamakana, bickom okaṭakʼ itạ tis hõ baṅ maraokʼ ona khongepe janamakana. Ar ona itạge hoyokʼ kana Isorakʼ jiwetʼ ar jaejug hạbicʼ tahẽkan katha do.
Sonot sostorre ol menakʼa, sanam manwa do ghãs leka kanako, ar ghãs reakʼ baha lekage onkoakʼ sanam ṭhonoktetʼ hõ; ghãs do rohoṛokʼa, ar baha hõ ńurokʼa,
Menkhan Probhuakʼ katha do jaejug hạbicʼ tahena. Ar noa kangea ona bhage sombat do, one okaṭakʼ do ape ṭhen porcar akan.
Onate eṭakʼkoakʼ lokshantako reakʼ joto lekan monejoṅakʼ, sanam lekan phorphundi, eṛeteakʼ, hiskạ ar sanam lekan nisṛạu kathako apeakʼ ontor khon oḍok giḍikakʼpe.
Nawa janam bale gidrạ leka apeakʼ jiure hara rakabokʼ lạgitʼ khạṭi toa ńam reakʼ gagojokʼpe, jemon onatepe hara rakabokʼte purạ puri bańcaokʼ secʼpe laha idikʼ.
Ar Probhuakʼ daya reakʼ sebeltetʼ mape cakha ạikạu akatʼge.
Nonkan mitʼṭen jiwetʼ dhiri menakʼa one okaṭakʼ do Isore bachao akawan ar okaṭakʼ do uniakʼ mẽtʼre ạḍi damanakʼkan, menkhan hoṛko do uniko neṅghao akadea. Mạsigeye hoyokʼ kana ona dhiri do;

ar uni ṭhenpe hecʼakante jiwetʼ dhiri leka ape hotete Isorakʼ tahen oṛakʼ do benaokʼ kana. Onate naeke lekate Isor lạgitʼpe begar ocoakana, jemon nonkan sanam jiuanakʼ dãṛẽpe samaṅ one okaṭakʼ do Jisu Mạsi hotete Isorre kusiyakʼ leka hoyokʼ.
Sonot sostorre ol menakʼa, Ńelpe, mitʼṭen damanakʼ dhiriń bachao doho akawana; ona do Sion reakʼ konac dhiri lekateń, bạisạu akada. Ar okoe unireye pạtiạukʼ uni do okalekate hõ bae lajao ocokʼa.

Onate apepe pạtiạu akante ape ṭhen ona dhiri do ạḍi damanakʼ kana; menkhan okoe bako pạtiạu akan onko lạgitʼ sostor reakʼ noa katha do ṭhikgea, Raj mistriko okaṭakʼ dhiriko nihạt giḍiletʼ, onage konac reakʼ asol dhiri hoyena.
Sostor reakʼ noa katha hõ ṭhikgea, Ona do nonkan dhiri kana, one okaṭakʼ do hoṛkoakʼ tohodokʼ reakʼ karon hoyokʼ. Hoṛko do Isorakʼ katha bebatao iạteko tohodokʼ kana, ar ona iạtegeko dohoakana.

Menkhan ape do “Bachao akan bõsko kanpe; ape hotete naekekoakʼ rajosṭi do benao akana; ape do Isorakʼ monsubạ lạgitʼ begar dohoakan jạt kanape ar uniren hoṛpe hoeakana,” Ńut khon acʼakʼ hahaṛa marsalte okoeye hoho ạguketʼpe unige jemonpe sarhao sereńae.
Mitʼ jokhecʼ Isorren hoṛ do bape tahẽkana, menkhan ńitokʼ dope hoeakana; mitʼ jokhecʼ ape do daya bape ńamakatʼ tahẽkana, menkhan ńitokʼ dope ńamakada.
E gateko, noa dhạrtire ape do upriạko kanape ar eṭakʼ disạmre thoṛa dinpe tahẽnkante iń do asokaeteń nehõrape kana, jel reakʼ sana khon sahaṛ akan tahenpe,

ente onako do aperen Jiu birudreye lạṛhại kana. Okoe Isor bako baḍae akade onko talare ape do dhoromte colonpe jemon bedhoromko menteko dusạulepere hõ apeakʼ bhage kạmi ńelte ar bicạr dinre apeakʼ ona kạmiko iạte Isorko sarhaoe.
Ape do Probhure gobol akae tahente disạm cakʼlaoko tabere tahen aṅgocpe. Ar maharaj do jotoko khone maraṅgete uni tabere hõ tahenpe;
behok kạmikanko sạjạiko lạgitʼ ar okoe bhageko kạmikan onko sarhaoko lạgitʼ maharaj do okoe disạm cakʼlaokoe koletʼko onko tabere hõ tahenpe.
Isorakʼ sana do noage, ape do bhage kạmite lelha hoṛkoakʼ bebuj kathako jemonpe cabaetako.
Sạdhin hoṛko leka jion khemaope, menkhan dusṭạmi dapal lạgitʼ ona sạdhintetʼ do alope beohara. Ona bodolte Isorren golamko leka jion khemaope.
Joto hoṛge manotkope, aperen biswạsi boehako dulạṛkope, Isor botoraepe, ar maharaj manotepe.

Oṛakʼren guti ar kạ̃ṛmĩko, ape do aperen kisạ̃ṛko manotkope ar onko tabere tahenpe. Okoe kisạ̃ṛkoko bhagege arko dayakʼkokan eken onko taberepe tahen ona do baṅ, menkhan okoeko ajhaṭkokan onko tabere hõ tahenpe.
Jãhãe behok lekate duke jometʼ khan ar Isore disạye tulucʼ onae sahaoetʼ khan, enḍekhan uni do Isorakʼ mẽtʼãhã samaṅre sarhaoanicʼe hoyokʼa.

Behok kạmiko iạte dal jomkatepe sahaoetʼ khan, enḍekhan onate sarhaokʼ reakʼ cetʼ menakʼtapea? Menkhan bhage kạmi iạte duk jomkatepe sahaoetʼ khan, enḍekhan onage Isorakʼ mẽtʼãhã samaṅre sarhaoanakʼ hoyokʼa.
Isor do noa lạgitʼgeye hohoakatʼpea, ente Mạsi hõ ape iạte duk jomkate ape lạgitʼ nạmunae doho oṭoakada, jemon uni lekape colon,
Uni do bae kại akada uniakʼ mocare jãhãn phor phundi baṅ tahẽkana.
Hoṛko tinre uniko bemanotkedea unre uni do onko bae bemanotletʼkoa, ar duk jom jokhecʼ hala ruạṛako lạgitʼ botor hõ bae udukʼatʼkoa, bickom acʼ do dhorom bicạricʼ ṭhene jimạyena.

Krus cetanre acʼakʼ hoṛmore uni do aboakʼ kạiko reakʼ bojhae ladeana, jemon kạiko secʼ gocʼ kate Isorakʼ monejoṅ leka senakʼ lạgitʼbon bańcao tahen. Ente acʼakʼ hoṛmo reakʼ ghạlkote uni do aboe boge akatʼbona.
Bhiḍiko lekape chingạu adokʼkan tahẽkana, menkhan ńitokʼ do okoe apeakʼ jiwikoe ńeletʼkan uni gupiyicʼ ṭhenpe ạcur ruạṛakana.

Onkage E maejiuko, ape do aperen jãwãe ṭhen gobol akan tahenpe, jemon jãhãe hoṛ Isorakʼ kathare bako pạtiạulenre hõ apeakʼ colonte onko do Mạsi secʼko ạwilokʼ. Onate ape do mitʼṭen katha hõ roroṛ baṅ lagaoapea,
ente onko do akotege apeakʼ sonot jion ar Isor secʼ bhoktiko ńel ńama.
Nana parkan upʼ reakʼ paṭetʼ galaṅokʼ, sona abhranko se mońj mońj sapapʼte apnar sajaokʼ do alope monejoṅa,
bickom okaṭakʼ reakʼ cehratetʼ baṅ maraokʼ, ona mạ̃hir ar nindhạn colonte apeakʼ ontor sajaotape. Isorakʼ mẽtʼãhã samaṅre onage bạ̃ṛti damanakʼ kana.
Sedaeren Isor bhokti maejiuko hõ Isorre bhorsa akanko tahẽkana ar apan apin jãwãe tabere tahẽkate nonkageko sajaokʼkan tahẽkana;

cetʼ leka Sara do Abraham gobolreye tahẽkana ar uni do mạlik menteye hohoaekan tahẽkana. Okaṭakʼ bhageakʼkan ona do bin botortepe kạmi idile khan, enḍekhan noage sạbudokʼa je, ape do Sararen hoponerako kanape mente.

Onkage ape hõ E jãwãeko, ape do buj sujte bạhuko tulucʼ tahenpe. Onko do aperen nijor soṅgeten kanako, ar onko hõ ape tulucʼ Isorakʼ daya reakʼ dan lekate jionko ńama. Onate onko manotkope jemon apeakʼ koejoṅ alo akoṭokʼtape.
Mucạtʼre katha do nõkʼõe, ape sanamkoakʼ mon jemon mitʼ lekage hoyokʼ. Ape do mimitʼkoakʼ dukre dukokʼpe, boeha leka dupulạṛpe, daya ar nindhạnko hoyokʼpe.
Bạṛicʼ bodol okoe hõ bạṛicʼ alope hala ruạṛakoa se jãhãeko egerlepere alope eger ruạṛkoa, bickom bhorakope; ente bhor ńam lạgitʼge Isor doe hohoakatʼpea.
Sonot sostorre olakana, Okoe sukte jion khemaoe menjoṅkan ar bhage din ńeljoṅ lạgitʼe asokʼkan, uni do bạṛicʼ kathako khon acʼakʼ alaṅ, ar eṛeakʼ kathako khon acʼakʼ luṭiye sambṛaotaema.
Uni do bạṛicʼ kạmi khone sahaṛokʼ ma, ar bhageakʼe kạmima; suluk ńam lạgitʼe kurumuṭuima. Ar ona do aloe bạgiyakʼ ma.
Okoe dhorom horteko calakʼkan Probhuakʼ mẽtʼ do onkore menakʼa, ar onkoakʼ koejoṅ ańjom lạgitʼ uniakʼ lutur do jhicʼge menakʼtaea; menkhan okoe bạṛicʼko kạmikan, Probhu do onko birudreye teṅgona.
Bhage kạmi lạgitʼpe ahkaokʼkan khan, enḍekhan okoeye hạnkepea?
Isorakʼ sana leka calakʼre dukpe jomle khan, enḍekhan ape dope bhạgangea. Okoe duk ar kosṭoko emapekan onko do alope botorakoa se duk sasetre alope torasokʼa,
