bickom Mạsi do apeakʼ ontorre Probhu mente jaega emaepe. Apeakʼ as ar bhorsa reaṅ jãhãeko kulipe khan, enḍekhan roṛ ruạṛako lạgitʼ jaoge sapṛao akae tahenpe, menkhan ona reakʼ roṛ ruạṛ do mạ̃hir ar bhodro salakʼ emakope.
Apeakʼ bibek sapha dohoetape, jemon Mạsiren hoṛ lekate apeakʼ bhage colon iạte okoeko oktawape onko do lajaoreko paṛaokʼ.
Bạṛicʼ kạmikate kosṭo ńam khon bickom Isorakʼ sanate bhageakʼ kạmikate kosṭo ńamge bhagea.

Sedaere Noah do jahaje benaokan tahẽkanre Isor do sombhurikate tinreye ńel hohorkan tahẽkana unre okoeko bebataoletʼ noko jiuko do onkoren kangeako. Ar ona jahajreko decʼen eken thoṛa hoṛge, metakʼme eken irạl hoṛge ona dakʼ khon rukhiyạko ńamleda.

Noa do hoyokʼ kana bạptisma reakʼ mitʼṭen nạmuna one okaṭakʼte ńitokʼe bańcaope. Bạptismate apeakʼ hoṛmo khon mạilạye ocokʼ giḍi daṛeakʼa ona do baṅ; Isor ṭhen noa do mitʼṭen bhage bibek reakʼ hohokana. Ape do Jisu Mạsiakʼ gujukʼ ar jiwetʼ beredokʼ hotetepe bańcao ocoakana.
Jisu do sermateye calao akana ar ńitokʼ Isorakʼ jojomsa aṛere menaea, ar sermaren goḍetko, ar ektiạrianko ar daṛeanko do uniakʼ gobolre menakʼkoa.
Onate Mạsi do hoṛmore duke sahaoletʼte ape hõ apnarakʼ ontorre inạ mitʼ monsubạge benao rakabtape, ente hoṛmore okoe duke jom akatʼ uni do kại reakʼ heowa khone thir akana.
Onate noa dhạrti reakʼ sarecʼakʼ jion uni do dhạrti reakʼ rij roṅte bae khemaoa, bickom Isorakʼ monejoṅakʼ lekageye khemaoa.
Okoe Isor bako baḍae akade onko leka ape hõ lahate umtạ umti, bạṛicʼ sana, ńu bhuteṛokʼ, rij roṅ, matalokʼ, ar hirkhạwakʼ boṅga sewarepe taṛametʼ tahẽkana.
Menkhan ńitokʼ do onko hoṛge ape ńelteko hahaṛakʼ kana, ape do onkoakʼ bạṛicʼ lucạ lamoṭkore ar bape seledokʼkana, onate onko do apeko dusạuetʼpea.
Menkhan okoe jiwetʼ ar gocʼko bicạrko lạgitʼe sapṛao tearakan, onko do uni ṭhen hisạb emokʼ hoyokʼtakoa.
Gocʼko ṭhen hõ coṅ ona iạte Mạsi reaṅ bhage sombat porcarlen, jemon hoṛmo secʼte manwa leka bicạr hoelentakore hõ Jiu secʼte onko do Isor leka jiwetʼko tahẽdaṛeakʼa.
Nitokʼ do sanamakʼ reakʼ mucạtʼ okte seṭerakana. Onate apeakʼ mon do kajak akae dohoepe ar apnarte sambṛaokʼpe jemonpe koejoṅ.
Sanam khon maraṅ katha do hoyokʼ kana, ape apere khạndri dupulạṛ tahentape ma, ente dupulạṛ do ạḍi utạr kạiye dapala.
Begor karacʼ kurujokʼte ape apere peṛakʼpe.

Ar ạḍi lekate sodorokʼkan Isorakʼ daya ńamkate okoe hoṛ do pạtiạr salakʼ kạmire onae lagaoetʼkan, onkan hoṛ lekate ape do Isor ṭhen khon okalekan danpe ńamakatʼ ona baṛe ape apere sapʼ sopohotʼ lạgitʼ beoharpe.

Jãhãeye porcar khan, enḍekhan nonka lekae porcar ma jemon uni do Isorakʼ moca reakʼ kathae roṛeda mente. Ar jãhãye sapʼ sopohotʼ khan enḍekhan Isor emakʼ daṛete uni doe sapʼ sopohotʼma, jemon Jisu Mạsi hotete jotowakʼre Isorge ṭhonoke ńam. Ente daṛe ar ṭhonok do jaejug hạbicʼ uniakʼge. Amen.
E gateko, ńitokʼ biḍạu seṅgel talate calakʼ hoyokʼ kantapete hahaṛakʼ tulucʼ alope hudisa je, apere ạnạṛi jãhãnakʼ hoyokʼ kana mente.
Ona khon bickom Mạsiakʼ duk jom reakʼ bhạgiạdarkope hoeakante rạskạkʼpe, jemon uniakʼ mạhima sodorokʼre ape do rạskạtepe perejokʼ.
Mạsi iạtepe opoman ocokʼkan khan enḍekhan ape dope bhạgangea, ente Isorakʼ mạhimate perecʼ akan Jiu do apere menaea.
Ape modre okoe hõ khũniạhi, kombṛo, bạṛicʼ kạmiyicʼ se eṭakʼkoakʼ babotre duk aloe jomma.
Menkhan Khristan lekate jãhãe duke jomlere aloe lajaokʼma, bickom uniakʼ do ona ńutum menakʼtaete Isore sarhaoema.

Bicạr reakʼ okte do hoeakana ar ona do Isorakʼ gharońjren hoṛko khonge ehobokʼa. Ar ona bicạr do abo khonge ehopʼlen khan, enḍekhan okoe Isorakʼ bhage sombat bako manao akatʼ onko do cetʼ dosa hoyokʼtakoa?
Sostorre menakʼa, Isor bhokti hoṛkoakʼ bańcao ńam nunạkʼge keṭecʼge khan, kạkạiko ar Isor bebhoktiko do cetʼ dosa hoyokʼtakoa?
Enḍekhan Isorakʼ monejoṅ lekate okoe dukko sahaoetʼkan, onko do akoren pạtiạricʼ sisirjạuicʼakʼ tire apnartetʼko jimạkʼma ar bhage kạmiko kạmi idima.

Iń do Mạsiakʼ duk sasetren goha kạnạń ar Mạsiakʼ oka ṭhonok sodorokʼ onaren hõ bhạgiạdar kạnạń. Onate ape modre okoe doko manḍerren maraṅ mukhiyạkan iń do onkoren ar mitʼṭen maraṅ mukhiyạ lekate noa sikhạunań emako kana.

Ape talare menakʼ Isorakʼ palren gupiko hoyokʼpe. Ńel todarotkope hoyokʼkante onkope ńelkoa ona do baṅ, bickom apnarakʼ monejoṅ lekatege gupikope, ente Isor do ape ṭhen onageye khojkana. Porho ńam lạgitʼ do alope kạmiya, menkhan gagoj monte kạmipe;
ape tabere okoe menakʼko onko cetanre mạliki alope calaoa, bickom nonkanko hoyokʼpe jemon ape ńelteko cetʼ daṛeakʼ.
Enḍekhan maraṅ gupiyicʼe ńel ocokʼre ape do jit reakʼ mala lekate uniakʼ ṭhonokren bhạgiạdarkope hoyokʼa, ar ona do tis hõ baṅ mosodokʼtapea.

Onkage E juạnko, ape do aperen murubiko tabere tahenpe. Ar jotokoge nindhạn tahente mitʼke mitʼ sapʼ sopohotʼpe, ente sonot sostor reakʼ katha leka, “Isor do phulạukʼkankoe teṅgo darametʼkoa, menkhan nindhạnko doe dayawako kana.”
Onate Isorakʼ ektiạri samaṅre apnartetʼ copodokʼpe, jemon ṭhik oktere uni doe usulpe.
Apeakʼ sanam dạndi unire lade giḍikakʼpe, ente uni do ape reaṅe dạndikʼ kana.
Apnar sambṛaokʼpe ar sontorakae tahenpe, ente aperen bạiri Soetan do hạnḍrạukʼkan dhạcri kul lekae dhãoṛa dhạ̃uṛi baṛaekana jãhãegeye utʼgotʼkaea mente.
Pạtiạure jamaṛ akae tahente Soetan teṅgo daramepe, entepe baḍaegea, goṭa dhạrtire aperen biswạsi boehako do inạ mitʼ lekan duk sasetgeko jomeda.

Joto secʼteye dayawape kan Isor do acʼakʼ jaejug ṭhonokren bhạgiạdarko hoyokʼ lạgitʼe hohoakatʼpea, ente ape do Mạsi tulucʼpe kolom mitʼ akana. Ar thoṛa din dukpe jomle anecʼ Isor do acʼgeye sạbit utạrpea are kajak ocopea, daṛeye emapea ar keṭecʼ rehetʼ cetanreye teṅgopea.
Uniakʼ ektiạri do jaejug habicʼ tahẽakae tahen ma. Amen.

Siluạnus, okoe do ińren pạtiạrạnicʼ boehań metaekan, uni hotete noa ciṭhi do thoṛa kathate ape ṭheniń olkeda, jemon iń do apeń udgạu daṛeape ar Isorakʼ sạriạkʼ reakʼ dayaren gohań em daṛeakʼ. Ape do Isorakʼ noa dayare ṭarhao akan tahenpe.
Isor do ape sãote okoekoe bachao akatʼko Babel reakʼ ona manḍerren hoṛko do joharko emape kana, ar ińren hopon Mark hõe joharape kana.
Dulạṛ reakʼ cokʼte jopoharpe. Ar okoe do Mạsirenpe hoeakan, ape jotoko tulucʼ suluk tahen ma.

Iń Simon Patras do Jisu Mạsiren mitʼṭen golam ar apostolge. Aboren Isor ar babańcaoicʼ Jisu Mạsi doe dhoromgea, ar ona iạte ape hõ ale leka inạ bin mucạtʼ damrepe biswạs akana. Ar noa iạte ape ṭhen niạ ciṭhiń oleda.
Isor ar aboren Probhu Jisu do khạndri ontor khon baḍaeyete apere asambheṛ daya ar suluk baṛe tahenma.
Okoe acʼakʼ ṭhonok ar soros gunteye hoho akawatʼ bon, uniakʼ khạndriakʼko baḍae hotete acʼakʼ Isor daṛete nonkanakʼkoe dan akatʼbona, one ona hotete abo do Isor botoraete jion bon khemao daṛeakʼ.

Uni do acʼakʼ ṭhonok ar soros gunte abo ṭhen ạḍi damanakʼ ar maraṅakʼe gokʼakada. Noa reakʼ monsubạ do hoyokʼ kana, manwakoakʼ bạṛicʼ sana khạtirte dhạrtire okako bạṛicʼakʼ perecʼ akan ona khonpe ńir pharakokʼte Isorakʼ boge colonren bhạgiạdarpe hoyokʼ.
Onate ạḍi jidkate apeakʼ biswạsre bhage gun, ar bhage gunre do akel,
ar akel tulucʼ apnar sambṛaokʼ ar sobori, Isor bhokti,
ar bhokti tulucʼ boeha dulạṛ ar ona dulạṛ sãote arhõ khạndri dulạṛ mon juṭucʼakʼpe.
Apeakʼ noako gun tahentape khan ar onako baḍhao idikʼkan khan, enḍekhan aboren Probhu Jisu Mạsi do khạndri ontor khon baḍaeyere okaj ar bin joanko do bape hoyokʼa.
Okoe hoṛre noako gun bạnukʼ, uni do ḍher sạṅgiń bae ńel ńameda, ente uni doe kãṛãgea. Ar acʼakʼ lahateakʼ kại khone sapha ocoakan ona doe hiṛiń akada.
Onate E boehako, sạrige Isor do apeye hohoakatʼpe are bachao akatʼpe ona khạṭi ocoe lạgitʼ arhõ bạ̃ṛti jid monanko hoyokʼpe. Ar noakope nonka lekhan tis hõ ohope tohotʼlena.
Noa iạte aboren Probhu ar babańcaoicʼ Jisu Mạsiakʼ jaejug rajosṭire jid salakʼpe ataṅ ocokʼa.
Onate noako reaṅ iń do jaogeń disạ ocoyetʼpea. Menkhan ape do noakope baḍaegea ar oka sạritetʼ apeakʼ ontorre menakʼ onarehõ kajak menakʼpea.
Menkhan ińakʼ hudisre, tinạkʼ din noa kumbạ leka bin ṭikạukʼ hoṛmore jiwetʼiń tahen unạkʼ din noako reaṅiń disạite jagwar dohope do lek kantińạ;
ente ḍher din noa hoṛmo kumbạre bạń tahena ona do aboren Probhu Jisu Mạsi pusṭạuteye baḍae ocoakadińạ.
Ińakʼ gujukʼ tayom hõ jemon noako reaṅ jaogepe disạ dohoe, onate iń do ona bondobos lạgitʼ ạḍiń kurumuṭuya.
Aboren Probhu Jisuakʼ daṛe ar uniakʼ hijukʼ reaṅ baḍae ocopere benaoakʼ jãhãn golpo do bale lại akada; ale do uniakʼ ṭhonok nij mẽtʼtele ńelakada.
“Nuige ińren dulạṛiạ Hopon, one unireń kusi akan,” Serma khon roṛlen noa kathate Mạsi do Isor Baba ṭhen khon man ar ṭhonoke ńamleda.
Ale do uni tulucʼ ona sonot bururele tahẽkanre serma khon roṛlen noako kathale ańjomleda.

Sostorre nạbiko okakoko menakatʼ ona do ale ṭhen sạrikana mente sạbud akana. Ńutre apeakʼ mẽtʼ do cetʼleka diuhe secʼ tahenkan onkage, tin hạbicʼ baṅ setagokʼ ar apeakʼ ontorre bhurkạ ipil bae rakabokʼ, un hạbicʼ nạbikoakʼ kathape luturakʼ khan ape dope bhagekea.
Enḍekhan jotowakʼ cetanre noa katha disạ dohoepe, sostor reakʼ okaṭakʼ kathage nạbikoakʼ benaoakʼ katha do baṅkana,
ente nạbiko do akoakʼ sana leka jãhãn katha bako roṛakada; onko do sonot Jiu reakʼ ạyurtege Isorakʼ kathako roṛakada.

Menkhan Israelko talare cetʼleka eṛe nạbikoko tahẽkan, onkage apeko talarehõ eṛe cecetʼkoko tahena. Onko do hape hapete nonkan bhul cecetʼakʼko ạguya one okaṭakʼte manwako nosṭokʼ; ar okoeye kiriń chaḍao akatʼko uni Probhu hõ bako aṅgocea. Nonkate onko do ạḍi usạra apnarte nosṭokʼko ạgujoṅa.
Ar ḍher hoṛge onko ńelte lucạ lamoṭkoko hoyokʼa. Onko iạtege sạriakʼ reakʼ hor do nindạu ocokʼa.
Lalocte eṛeteakʼ katha menkate akoakʼ porho lạgitʼ onko do kạmireko lagaopea. Onkoakʼ sạjại do ḍher din khonge jhulạu akana, ar onkoakʼ nosṭokʼ do bae duṛupʼ thirakana.
Serma goḍetkoko kạiletʼre Isor do onko bae aṛakʼ giḍiletʼkoa, bickom norok reakʼ ńut ghaḍlakʼreye giḍiletʼkote bicạrko lạgitʼe dohoakatʼkoa.
Uni do mare dhạrtirenko hõ bae aṛakʼletʼkoa, bickom Isor bin bhokti hoṛkore ḍubạ dakʼe hoe ocoleda; menkhan Noah ar eṭakʼ eae hoṛe bańcaoletʼkoa. Ar nui Noahge Isor bhokti reaṅe porcarleda.
Sodom ar Gomora nagraha seṅgelte ḍahao maraokate Isor do ona nagraharen hoṛkoe sạjạiletʼkoa ar nonkate uni doe udukʼatʼkoa, okoe Isor bako bhoktiae onko do cetʼ dosa hoyokʼ takoa mente;
Menkhan uni do Loṭe rukhiyạledea. Loṭ do Isor bhokti hoṛe tahẽkana. Uni do onḍenko ạn-ạri bebataoetʼkan hoṛkoakʼ lucạ lamoṭ iạte duke ńametʼ tahẽkana.

Uni Isor bhoktiaekan hoṛ do onko talare tahẽkate dinke din onkoakʼ kạmiye ńeletʼkan tahẽkana ar onkoakʼ kathae ańjometʼ tahẽkana, ar ạn-ạri birudre onkoakʼ kạmi ńelte acʼakʼ dhorom jiwire ạḍi duke ńametʼ tahẽkana.
Noako khon ńelokʼ kana, okoe Probhuko bhoktiaekan onko do biḍạu khon bańcaoko doe baḍaegea.

Ona chaḍa okoe Isor bhoktikoko baṅkan, asokaete okoe do akoakʼ sanalekako calakʼkan ar ḍanṭao bako moneakʼkan, onko sạjạiko lạgitʼ uni do bicạr din hạbicʼ dohoko hõe baḍaegea. Noko eṛe cecetʼko do ạḍi dilanko kanako. Onko do akoakʼ kusi sana lekako calakʼa ar ṭhonokanko birudre bemanot katha roroṛ hõ bako botorokʼa.
Menkhan serma goḍetko do daṛe ar ektiạriteko maraṅgere hõ Probhu ṭhen onko reaṅ nonkan jãhãnakʼ bako lạlisa one onare nindạu reakʼ katha menakʼ.

Menkhan bin buj janwarko leka one onko do sobhabtege sapʼ ocokʼ ar gocʼ ocokʼ lạgitʼko janamakan, noko eṛe cecetʼko hõ onko lekage. Onko do okaṭakʼ bako bujhạu akatʼ ona reaṅ bạṛicʼ kathako roṛa. Ar akoakʼ bạṛicʼakʼrege onko doko ḍahao maraokʼa.

Onkoakʼ bạṛicʼ kạmi reakʼ kuṛại lekate onko do kosṭoko joma. Noko hoṛ do siń marsalre bhojkore haha hihi ar ńũ bulokʼko kusiyakʼa. Ar ape tulucʼ jojomko duṛupʼlenre onko do umtạ umtikʼte bubulakʼko ńũńũte akoakʼ rij roṅte lajaokʼ ar bemanotko ạguya.

Onkoakʼ mẽtʼ do loṭghuṭite perecʼgea ar tisge kạkại do bako bạgiya. Onko do dhoromre nijor monanko lalocko udukʼakote bhul horteko idikoa. Onkoakʼ ontor do eken lalocgeye cetʼakada. Onkore sarap menakʼa. Onko do sojhe hor bạgikate bhul hor secʼko ghańjeṛ akana.
Onko do Beor hopon Balamakʼ hor secʼko mohnḍa akana. Balam do bạṛicʼ kạmi reakʼ kuṛại ńame menleda,
menkhan acʼakʼ bạṛicʼ kạmi iạte uni do mitʼṭen abola gadha ṭhene dhomkao ocolena. Uni gadha do manwa leka kathae roṛketʼte uniakʼ koṅkatetʼe akoṭletʼtaea.
Noko hoṛ do rohoṛokʼkan jharna ar hoete oṭanokʼkan kuṛhạ lekanako. Noko lạgitʼ do kaṛaṅ kucạṅ ńut dohoakana.

Onko do ạuṛi sạuṛi ar lạṭu lạtu kathako roṛa ar manwakoakʼ jel reakʼ bạṛicʼ sanako rakapʼ ocoyetʼtakote onko do nonkan hoṛko bhul horteko idiyetʼkoa, okoe do bạṛicʼko talare menakʼko khonko oḍok hijukʼkan.
Onko eṛe cecetʼko do onko hoṛko sạdhinokʼ reakʼko gokʼako kangea, menkhan ako do bạṛicʼ kạmire golam akanko tahenkana; ente jãhãe jãhãnakʼreye bhagao ocolen khan uni do onaren golame hoyokʼa.

Aboren Probhu ar babańcaoicʼ Jisu Mạsi reaṅ baḍae khạtirte dhạrti reakʼ bạṛicʼakʼ khonko ńir pharakokʼkanre hõ onko do inạ bạṛicʼakʼregeko jhạlikʼkante arhõko bhagao ocokʼkana, ar onkoakʼ mucạtʼ dosa do pạhilakʼ khon artetʼ bạṛicʼ hoeakana.
Onko do dhorom jion reakʼ horko baḍaekan tahẽkanre hõ okaṭakʼ sonot hukum ematʼko tahẽkan ona doko bebataoleda. Noa dosare onko lạgitʼ ṭhik hor baṅ baḍaege bickom bhage tahẽkana.
Onko babotre noa katha do sạrige hoeakana, “Seta do acʼakʼ uchlạwakʼ secʼe ạcurokʼa,” ar “Sukri do ạrupʼ saphayere hõ leḍreye jobekʼa.”
E dulạṛiạ boehako, ape ṭhen noa do ińakʼ dosar ciṭhi kana. Banar ciṭhirege iń do adomakʼko babotreń disạ ocoyetʼpete apeakʼ soṛa mon udgạu reakʼ iń kurumuṭuyeda.
Sonot nạbiko okako katha lahateko menakatʼ onako ar aperen apostolko hotete aboren Probhu ar babańcaoicʼ okaṭakʼ hukume emakatʼ, ińakʼ monejonakʼ do jemon onape disạ dohoe.
Pạhilre noa katha disạ dohoepe, bhageakʼko reaṅ okoe do nisṛạu reakʼ sobhabtako onko do sesa sisi dinrehõko nisṛạugea. Onko do akoakʼ bạṛicʼ sana lekako colona,

arko mena, “Uniakʼ hijukʼ reakʼ oka gokʼakʼ tahẽkan ona reakʼ do cetʼ hoyena? Dhạrti sirjạu khon cetʼleka calao hijukʼkan tahẽkan ṭhik onkage aboren hapṛamko gocʼ tayom khon jotowakʼge coṅ inạ mitʼlekage calakʼkan.”
Noko hoṛ do dhikhitegeko hiṛińeda je, sedaere Isorakʼ kathate serma do sirjạulena ar dakʼte ar dakʼ khonge dhạrti hõ sirjạulena mente.
Un reakʼ ona dhạrti do ḍubạ dakʼte ḍahao maraolena.
Ar Isorakʼ inạ mitʼ kathatege ńitokʼakʼ serma ar dhạrti do seṅgelte ḍahao maraokʼ lạgitʼ dohoakana; Isor bebhokti hoṛkoakʼ bicạr ar ḍahao marao din hạbicʼ ona do jogao dohoakana.
Menkhan E dulạṛiạ boehako, noa katha do alope hiṛińa, Probhu ṭhen mitʼ din do hajar bochor somangea ar hajar bochor do mitʼ din somangea mente.

Adom hoṛko hudiseda Probhu do acʼakʼ gokʼakʼ purạu lạgitʼe bilomeda, menkhan ona do baṅ. Asokaete uni do ape lạgitʼe soboriyeda, ente jãhãegeye nosṭokʼ do bae khoja, bickom sanamkoge jemon kại khon monko ạcurtako noageye khojkana.

Menkhan Probhuakʼ din do kombṛo leka hijukʼa. Ona dinre serma do sãe sãe saḍete parom calakʼa ar siń cando, ńindạ cando, ipilko sanamge atarokʼa arko le cabakʼa. Dhạrti ar onare menakʼ sanamakʼge ḍahao maraokʼa.
Sanamakʼge nonka marao lạgidokʼkan khan enḍekhan cetʼ lekanko hoyokʼ lektapea? Ape do gagojokʼ tulucʼ Isorakʼ din koyokʼ horre tahente sonot ar Isor bhoktite jion khemao lektapea.
Unre serma do lokʼte ḍahao maraokʼa ar siń cando, ńindạ cando ar ipilko hõko atarokʼa arko galao cabakʼa.
Menkhan abo do Isorakʼ gokʼakʼ lekate nawa serma ar nawa dhạrti lạgitʼ bon koyokʼ horeda. Onḍe do sanamakʼge Isorakʼ monejoṅakʼ leka hoyokʼa.
E dulạṛiạ boehako, ape do ńitokʼ noako lạgitʼpe koyokʼ horetʼkante murukte kurumuṭuipe jemon uni do niphuṭ ar dhoromre sulukte tahẽakane hecʼńampe.
Disạipe, manwako kại khon bańcaoko ńam lạgitʼ aboren Probhu doe sombhuriyeda. Ar inạ mitʼ kathage aboren dulạṛiạ boeha Pạul hõ Isore emakade akelte apeye olatʼpea.

Uniakʼ joto ciṭhirege noako reaṅ inạ mitʼ kathageye oletʼkana. Onako modre adomakʼko babotre menakʼakʼ as bujhạu do muskilgea. Onate baṅ cetʼakatʼ ar baṅ kajak hoṛko do eṭakʼ eṭakʼ sostorko leka noako reakʼ mane hõko pẽṛtayetʼte nijạte nosṭokʼko ạgujoṅ kana.
E dulạṛiạ boehako, ape do noa katha laharegepe baḍae akatʼte sontor akae tahenpe, jemon noko bạṛicʼ hoṛkoakʼ bhul horte aloko bulạu idipe, ar apeakʼ kajak mon khon alope ńurokʼ.
Ape do aboren Probhu ar babańcaoicʼ Jisu Mạsiakʼ daya ar uni reaṅ akelte hara rakabokʼpe. Ńit ar jaejug hạbicʼ uniakʼge ṭhonok hoyokʼtae ma. Amen.

Okoe pạhil khongeye tahẽkan, ar okoeakʼ moca reakʼ kathale ańjom akatʼ, okoe nij mẽtʼtele ńṭoṭhade, okoe do mońjtele ạri bạndhi akade, okoe do nij titele joṭetʼ akade, ona jion reakʼ kathage nonḍele oleda.
Ona jion doe sodorlena. Ale do unile ńṭoṭhadea ar uni reaṅ gohale emeda. Okoe do Baba ṭhene tahẽkan ar ale ṭhene sodorlen ona jaejug jion reakʼ kathage apele baḍae ocoyetʼpea.

Okoe alele ńṭoṭhade ar okoeakʼ moca reakʼ kathale ańjomakatʼ uni reaṅgele baḍae ocoyetʼpea. Ale do onale baḍae ocoyetʼpea jemon ape ar ale talare mitʼṭen helmel benao rakabokʼ. Noa do hoyokʼ kana Baba ar uniren Hopon Jisu Mạsi ar abo tala reakʼ helmel.
Aleakʼ rạskạ jemon perejokʼ onate ale do noakole oleda.
Okaṭakʼ katha Jisu Mạsi ṭhen khon ańjomkate apele baḍae ocoyetʼpe ona do noage, Isor doe marsal kana; ar unire ńut do bạnukʼanaṅ.
Isor ar abo talare helmel menakʼa mentebo menetʼ khan ar ńutre bon taṛametʼ khan enḍekhan eṛe katha bon roṛeda, ar sạriakʼ horte do babon taṛameda.
Menkhan Isor do cetʼleka marsalre menae ar onkage abo hõ marsalre bon taṛametʼkan khan enḍekhan abo talare helmel menakʼtabona ar uniren Hopon Jisuakʼ mãyãm do sanam kại khone sapha bona.
Ar abore kại bạnukʼa mentebon menle khan enḍekhan abo do apnarge bon bulạukʼ kana. Onate noage bujhạukʼ kana je, aboakʼ ontorre Isorakʼ sạritetʼ do bạnukʼa.
Abo do aboakʼ kạiko bon aṅgocle khan, enḍekhan uni do unrege kạikoe ikại tabona ar sanam bedhorom khone sapha bona, ente uni doe pạtiạrgea ar tis hõ bae bedhoroma.
Ar babon kại akada mentebon menle khan, enḍekhan unige eṛeyicʼ bon benaoede kana, ar uniakʼ katha aboakʼ ontore do bạnukʼanaṅ.

E ińren dulạṛiạ gidrạko, jemon alope kại, onate ape ṭhen noako kathań olede. Ar jãhãegeye kại eman akatʼ khan enḍekhan Baba ṭhen roṛ goṛo abon lạgitʼ mitʼ hoṛ menaea; uni do Jisu Mạsige, one uni doe dhoromicʼkan.
Aboakʼ kạiko ocokʼgiḍiy tabon lạgitʼ Mạsi do acʼakʼ jiwi alaekate Isore kusi ocokedea. Eken aboakʼ kại iạte do baṅ, menkhan sanam manwakoakʼ kại ńutumte uni doe onkakeda.
Uniakʼ sanam hukumko leka bon senlen khan, enḍekhan khạṭige bon bujhạua, abo do uni bon baḍae akadea.
Ar okoeye menetʼkan, “Iń do uniń baḍae akadea,” Menkhan uniakʼ hukumko bae batao enḍekhan uni doe eṛeyicʼ kana; unire sạriakʼ do bạnukʼanaṅ.
Menkhan okoe uniakʼ kathae manaoetʼkan uni do sạrige Isorakʼ dulạṛreye sạbitʼ akana. Ar jãhãye men acʼ do unire menaea, enḍekhan uni cetʼ lekae colonetʼ tahẽkan onkage acʼ hõ colon lektaea.
Noa hotetege bon baḍae daṛeakʼa, abo do uni tulucʼ jopoṛao menakʼ bona mente.

E dulạṛiạ gidrạkotiń, ape ṭhen jãhãn nawa hukum reakʼ katha do bạń oleda, bickom pạhil khonge okaṭakʼ hukum tahẽkan ona mare hukum reakʼ kathageń oleda. Ar okaṭakʼ katha lahatepe ańjomakatʼ ona kangea ona mareakʼ hukum do.

Menkhan nõkʼõe okaṭakʼ hukum reakʼ katha ape ṭhen ńitokʼ iń oletʼkan ona do maregere hõ nawagea. Noa hukum reakʼ sạritetʼ do Jisu Mạsire ar apeakʼ jionre ńel akana, ente ńut do cabakʼ kana ar ona sạri marsal do ńitokʼ jolokʼ kana.
Okoe hoṛ marsalre menaea menteye menetʼkan, ar acʼren boehae kurudaekan uni do ńit hõ ńutrege menaea.
Okoe acʼren boehae dulạṛedekan uni do marsalreye tahenkana ar unire jãhãn tạkicʼakʼ do bạnukʼanaṅ.
Menkhan okoe acʼren boehae kurudaekan uni do ńutre menaea ar ńutregeye dãṛãn kana. Uni do bae baḍaea okateye calakʼ kana mente, ente ńut do uniakʼ mẽtʼe kãṛã akatʼtaea.
E gidrạko, Mạsi iạte apeakʼ kại ikạ akante ape ṭheniń oleda.
E babako, ape do pạhil khonge okoe menae unipe baḍae akadeteń olapekana. E juạnko, Soetanpe bhagao akade iạteń olape kana.

E gidrạko, apeń olapekana, ente ape do Isor Babape baḍae akadea. E babako, iń do apeń ol ape kana, ente okoe pạhil khon menae unipe baḍae akadea. E juạnko, apeń ol ape kana, ente ape dope daṛeanko kana ar Isorakʼ katha apeakʼ ontorre menakʼa, ar ape do Soetanpe bhagao akadea.
Ape do dhạrti ar dhạrti reakʼ jãhãnakʼge alope dulạṛa. Ar jãhãe dhạrtiye dulạṛ khan, enḍekhan uni do Baba bae dulạṛede kana,
ente dhạrtire menakʼakʼko do, hoṛmo reakʼ sana, mẽtʼ reakʼ laloc ar gharońj reaṅ bạḍại kana, noako reakʼ okaṭakʼ hõ Baba ṭhen khonakʼ do baṅ hijukʼ kana, menkhan dhạri khonakʼge hijukʼ kana.
Dhạrti ar dhạrti reakʼ rij roṅ do caba hijukʼ kana, menkhan Isorakʼ sana leka okoeye senokʼkan uni do jaejug hạbicʼe tahena.

E gidrạko, noa kangea mucạtʼ okte do. Apepe ańjom akada je, Mạsiren bạiriye hijukʼ kana mente, menkhan ńitrege uniren do arhõ aema bạiriko hecʼakana. Onate bon bujhạu daṛeakʼ kana, noa kangea mucạtʼ okte do.

Mạsiren noko bạiriko do abo tala khonko oḍok akana. Menkhan onko do aboren hoṛ bako tahẽkana. Ente aborengeko tahẽlen khan, enḍekhan abo sãotegeko tahẽkokʼa honaṅ, menkhan onko doko oḍok sen akante bujhạukʼ kana okoe hõ aboren doko baṅkana.
Menkhan ape do uni sonoticʼ ṭhen khonpe ojokʼ ocoakana, metakʼme sonot jiupe ńam akadea ar jotoge sạriakʼpe baḍae akada.
Sạriakʼ bape baḍae akatʼte apeń ol ape kana ona do baṅ, menkhan ape do noa hõpe baḍaea, sạriakʼ khon eṛeakʼ do baṅ hijukʼa; ar ona iạtegeń olatʼpea.
Okoeye menetʼkan, Jisu do Mạsiye baṅkana, uni doe eṛeyicʼ kana? Okoe Baba ar Hopon bae aṅgockin uni do Mạsiren bạiri kanae.
Okoe Hopon bae aṅgoce uni tulucʼ Babawakʼ do jãhãn jopoṛao bạnukʼtaea, menkhan Hopon okoeye aṅgoce uni tulucʼ do Babawakʼ hõ jopoṛao menakʼtaea.
Pạhil khon okaṭakʼpe ańjom ạguakatʼ ona apeakʼ ontore tahen khan, enḍekhan ape do Hopon ar Baba tulucʼ jopoṛao akanpe tahena.
Noa kangea jaejug jion, one okaṭakʼ Mạsi do abo emabon lạgitʼe gokʼakatʼ.
Okoe bạṛicʼ horte idipe lạgitʼko kurumuṭuyetʼkan, onko reaṅ iń do noakoń olatʼpea.

Menkhan ape do Mạsi ṭhen khonpe ojokʼ ocoakana, metakʼme sonot Jiupe ńam akadea. Uni do apeakʼ ontoreye tahena. Onate eṭakʼ okoeakʼ hõ cecetʼakʼ do baṅ jạruṛapea. Sanamakʼ reaṅ sonot Jiugeye cetʼapea. Uni doe sạriyicʼ kana, ar bae eṛea. Onate cetʼleka Mạsire tahene cetʼape onkage Mạsire tahenpe.
E gidrạko, onateń metapekana, ape do Mạsirege tahenpe jemon uniye sodorokʼre dil akae bon tahen are hijukʼre uni samaṅre lajaore alo bon paṛaokʼ.
Baḍaegeape, uni doe dhoromgea, ar noa hõ baḍae dohokakʼpe, okoe dhorom kạmire apnarte lạgiạ paṛao akanko tahen, onko do Isor khongeko janamakana.

Ma ńeltabonpe, Isor Baba do tinạkʼe dulạṛetʼ bon kana, uni do acʼren gidrạko menteye hohowabon kana, ar sạrige bon onka kangea. Onate dhạrti do bae baḍae akatʼ bona, ente dhạrti do Isor hõ bae baḍae akadea.

E dulạṛiạ gidrạko, ńitokʼ do Isorren gidrạko kana bon, menkhan tayomte cetʼ hoyokʼa ona do ńit hõ baṅ sodor akana. Menkhan bon baḍaea, Mạsiye sodorokʼre abo do uni lekage bon hoyokʼa, ente uni doe okalekanicʼ kana, ona muṭhạntege bon ńelea.
Okoe Mạsire noa ase dohoe uni do apnare khạṭikʼ kana cetʼleka Mạsiye khạṭige.
Okoeko kạiyetʼkan onko do Isorakʼ katha bako bataoeda. Ar Isorakʼ katha bebataoge hoyokʼ kana kại do.
Baḍaegeape, aboakʼ kạiko meṭao giḍikakʼ lạgitʼge Mạsi doe sodorlena. Mạsire do jãhãn kại bạnukʼ anaṅ. Okoe Mạsireko tahenkan onko do kạire bako tahenkana.
Okoe kạireko jobe akan onko do Mạsi bako ńṭoṭhadea ar baḍae hõ bako baḍae akadea.
E gidrạko, okoe hõ bạricʼ horte aloko bulạu idipe ma. Mạsi do bae bedhoroma, ar jãhãe bhageakʼe kạmiyetʼ khan uni hõ bae bedhoroma.
Okoeye kại idiyetʼkan uni doe Soetanren kana, ente Soetan do etohopʼ khongeye kạiyeda. Ar Soetan kạmi marao giḍikakʼ lạgitʼge Isorren Hopon doe sodor akana.
Isor khon janamicʼ do kạire bae tahena, ente Isorakʼ gun do unire tahenkana. Isor khone janamakante uni do kạire bae jobe tahẽ daṛeakʼa.
Okoe bhage kạmire apnar bako lạgiạ paṛao akan tahen ar boeha bako dulạṛetʼko, onko do Isorren doko baṅkana. Ar noatege sodorokʼ kana okoe doko Isorren Hopon kana ar okoe doko Soetanren hopon kana.
Okaṭakʼ katha pạhil khonpe ańjom ạguakatʼ ona do noage, abo mimitʼko jemon bon dupulạṛ.

Onateń meneda, Kạin leka jemon alo bon hoyokʼ ma. Kạin do Soetanren hoṛe tahẽkana uni do acʼren boehae khũnledea. Menkhan cedakʼe khũn ledea? Ente uni do bạṛicʼakʼkoe kạmiyetʼkan tahẽkana, ar uniren boeha do dhorome kạmikan tahẽkana.
E boehako, dhạrtiren hoṛko kurudapere ape do alope hahaṛakʼa.
Abo do boehako bon dulạṛetʼkote, moron khon jionte parom hecʼakana mente bon bujhạu daṛeakʼ kana. Ar okoe bako dulạṛkan onko do gocʼko talareko tahenkana.
Okoe boehae kurudaekan uni doe khũniạhi kana. Ar cele khũniạhire hõ jaejug jion baṅ tahen ona dope baḍaegea.
Mạsi do abon lạgitʼ acʼakʼ jiwiye emena, onate dulạṛ do cetʼkana mente bon baḍae oromakada. Enḍekhan boeha lạgitʼ apnar jiwi emokʼ aboakʼ hõ lek kan tabona.
Noa dhạrtire jiwetʼ tahen lạgitʼ okoeakʼ ạsulokʼakʼko menakʼtae, ar acʼren boehawakʼ reṅgecʼ ńelkate hõ bae beṅgetʼae enḍekhan cekate uniakʼ ontorre Isorakʼ dulạṛ do tahẽ daṛekokʼa?
E gidrạko, abo do eken moca kathate dulạṛ baṅ udukʼkate kạmi hotete sạriakʼ reakʼ dulạṛ bon udugma.
Dulạṛiạ gidrạko, aboakʼ ontor bae dusile bon khan, enḍekhan Isor samaṅre aboakʼ dil do tahengea.
Onate okaṭakʼ bon khojokʼ uni ṭhen khon ona dobon ńamgea, ente uni okakoe hukum akatʼ onako bon manao ar okako kạmiye kusiakʼ onako bon kạmi.
Uniakʼ hukum do naoge, jemon uniren Hopon Jisu Mạsire bon pạtiạukʼ ar abo abore bon dupulạṛ. Ar noa hukumge uni doe emoṭoakatʼ bona.

Okoe uniakʼ hukume bataoetʼkan uni do unireye tahenkana ar acʼ hõ unireye tahenkana. Ar okoeṭakʼ sonot Jiue emakatʼ bon uni sonot Jiu hotete bon bujhạu daṛeakʼa, uni do aboakʼ ontorreye tahenkana mente.
E dulạṛiạ gidrạkotiń, joto Jiu do alope pạtiạu akoa, bickom biḍạu aṭkarkope onko do Isor khonko hecʼakana se baṅ, ente dhạrtire aema eṛe nạbikoko oḍok akana.
Isorren Jiu do nonkatepe orom daṛeakoa, okoe Jiu do Jisu Mạsi manwa lekateye hecʼlena menteye aṅgoce uni Jiuge Isor khon hecʼ akanicʼ do;

Menkhan okoe Jiu Jisu bae aṅgoce uni Jiu do Isor khonicʼ doe baṅkana. Nui jiu do uni Mạsiren bạiri kanae. Ar okoeṭakʼ Jiue hijukʼkan, ona mape ańjomakatʼge, ar sạrige uni Jiu do ńit hõ dhạrtirege menaea.
Menkhan E gidrạko, ape do Isorren kanape. Ape do onko eṛeko cetanrepe jitạu akana, ente noa dhạrtire okoe menae, uni khon apeakʼ ontorre menayicʼ doe maraṅgea.
Onko eṛeko do noa dhạrtiren kanako; onate onko do noa dhạrti reakʼ kathako roṛa ar dhạrti do onkoakʼ kathae ańjoma.

Abo do Isorren kana bon; okoe Isore baḍae akade uni do aboakʼ kathae ańjoma, menkhan okoe Isorrene baṅkan uni do aboakʼ katha bae ańjoma. Ar noatege abo do sạriakʼren Jiu ar bulạuren jiu bon orom daṛeaea.
Dulạṛiạ gidrạko, abo mimitʼko jemon bon dupulạṛ, ente dulạṛ do Isor ṭhen khonge hijukʼ kana. Okoeakʼ ontorre dulạṛ menakʼtako, onko do Isor khongeko janamakana ar Isorko baḍae akadea.
Okoeakʼ ontorre dulạṛ bạnukʼ, onko do Isor bako baḍae akadea, ente dulạṛ do Isor acʼtetʼ kangeae.
Abo lạgitʼ Isorakʼ dulạṛ do nonkate sodor akana, uni do acʼren eskar janam Hopon noa dhạrtiteye kolkedea jemon uni hotete jion bon ńam.
Isor do aboge bon dulạṛ akadea ona do baṅ, menkhan unigeye dulạṛketʼ bonte acʼren Hopone kolkedea, jemon Hopon do acʼakʼ jiwiye alaete aboakʼ kạiko meṭaokate Isore kusi ocoye. Ar noa kangea dulạṛ do.
E dulạṛiạ gidrạko, Isor do nonkae dulạṛetʼ bon khan eḍekhan abo hõ mimitʼko dulạṛ lek kan tabona.
Isor do okoege tishõ bako ńṭoṭhadea. Ar abo mimitʼko bon dupulạṛ khan, enḍekhan bon bujhạu daṛeakʼa, Isor do aboakʼ ontorre menaea ar uniakʼ dulạṛ do aboakʼ ontorre purạteye kạmiyeda.
Uni do acʼren Jiue dan akatʼ bona, ar noatege bon baḍae daṛeakʼa je, abo do unire menakʼ bona ar uni hõ aboakʼ ontorre menaea mente.
Alele ńṭoṭhadea ar gohale emetʼkana, Baba do manwakoren babańcaoicʼ mente Hopone kolkedea.
Ar jãhãege Jisu do Isorren Hopon kanae menteye aṅgoce, Isor do unireye tahena ar uni hõ Isorreye tahenkana.

Baḍaegea bon Isor do aboe dulạṛetʼ bona, ar uniakʼ dulạṛre aboakʼ biswạs menakʼ tabona mente. Isor do acʼtetʼgeye dulạṛ kana. Ar dulạṛre okoeye tahen kan, uni do Isorregeye tahenkana ar Isor do unireye tahenkana.
Nonkatege dulạṛ do aboakʼ ontorre purạte hoeakana jemon bicạr hilokʼ dil bon ńam, ente noa dhạrtire aboakʼ jion do uniakʼ jion lekagea.
Noa dulạṛre do botor bạnukʼa, bickom purạ dulạṛ do botore oḍok giḍiya, ente botorre do sạjại menakʼa. Okoeye botorokʼ kan uni do dulạṛre purạte bae sạbit utạr akana.
Uni do pạhilre aboe dulạṛ maṛaṅketʼ bontege abo bon dulạṛede kana.
Okoe Isore dulạṛede kana menteye menetʼkan, menkhan acʼren boehae kurudae kan uni doe eṛeyicʼ kana; ente mẽtʼte ńṭoṭhade boeha okoe bae dulạṛedekan uni do cekate baṅ ńṭoṭhade Isor doe dulạṛ daṛekea?
Uni ṭhen khon noa hukum bon ńam akada, okoe Isorko dulạṛedekan onko do boehako hõ jemonko dulạṛko.
Jisu do Mạsi kanae mente okoeko pạtiạukʼkan, onko do Isor khonko janamakana. Ar okoe Babako dulạṛedekan onko do uniren Hopon hõko dulạṛede kana.
Abo do tinre Isor bon dulạṛede kana ar uniakʼ hukumko bon bataoetʼtaea unre bon baḍae kana je, Isorren gidrạko hõ bon dulạṛetʼkoa.
Isorakʼ hukumko dohoege hoyokʼ kana Isor dulạṛ do. Uniakʼ hukum do hamal bojha leka do baṅkana,
ente Isorren mitʼke mitʼ gidrạ do dhạrtiko bhagaoeda. Dhạrtire okaṭakʼe jitạu akan ona do aboakʼ pạtiạu.
Okoeko pạtiạukʼkan Jisu do Isorren Hopon kanae mente, eken onkoge dhạrtiko bhagaoa.

Nuikangeae Jisu Mạsi, one okoe do dakʼ ar mãyãm hoteteye hecʼlen. Eken dakʼ hotete do baṅ, bickom dakʼ ar mãyãm hoteteye hecʼlena. Sonot Jiu do noa reaṅ gohae emeda, ente uni do acʼgeye sạriakʼtetʼ kana.
Abo do manwawakʼ goha bon ataṅetʼ kana, menkhan Isorakʼ goha do ona khon hõ maraṅgea; uni do acʼren Hopon reaṅ gohae emakada.

Isorren Hopon cetanre okoeye pạtiạukʼkan uniakʼ ontorre ona goha do menakʼa. Ar Isorre okoe bako pạtiạukʼkan onko do eṛeyicʼko benao akadea, ente Isor acʼren Hopon reaṅ oka gohae emakatʼ onare onko do bako pạtiạu akana.
Ona goha do noage, Isor do jaejug jione emakatʼ bona ar ona jion do acʼren Hoponre menakʼa.
Isorren Hopon okoeye ńamakade uni do jion hõe ńamakada; menkhan Isorren Hopon okoe bae ńamakade uni do ona jion hõ bae ńamakada.
Ape okoeko Isorren Hoponrepe biswạs akan, ape ṭhen iń do noakoń olkeda jemonpe baḍae daṛeakʼ, ape do jaejug jionpe ńam akada mente.
Isorre aboakʼ khạṭitetʼ do noage, uniakʼ monejoṅakʼ leka jãhãnakʼ bon koe lekhan, enḍekhan uni do aboakʼ kathae ańjoma.
Baḍaegea bon, jãhãnakʼge bon koeye, uni do onae ańjoma, ar noa hõ bon baḍaegea, uni ṭhen okabon koeakatʼ ona do bon ńamakatʼgea.

Jãhãege acʼren boeha nonka kạkạikane ńel lekhan one okaṭakʼ do gujukʼ senakʼ baṅkan, enḍekhan uni do Isor ṭhene koejoṅma ar onate uni do jiwetʼe dohoyea. Iń do nonḍe onkoakʼ kathageń roṛeda one okoe doko kạiyetʼkan, menkhan onkoakʼ kại do gujukʼ senakʼ do baṅkan. Menkhan gujukʼ senakʼ kại hõ menakʼgea. Ona reaṅ nehõrape reakʼ katha do bạń metapekana.
Joto lekan bedhoromakʼge kại kana, menkhan joto kại do gujukʼ senakʼ do baṅkana.
Baḍaeabon, Isor khon janamicʼ do kạire bae tahena. Ar okoe Isor khone janamakan unige uni doe rukhiạyea, ar Soetan do bae joṭetʼ daṛeaea.
Baḍaeabon abo do Isorren kana bon, ar goṭa dhạrti do Soetanakʼ ektiạri latarre menakʼa.

Arhõ bon baḍaea, Isorren Hopone hecʼente bujhạu reakʼ daṛeye emakatʼ bona jemon sạri Isor bon baḍae orom daṛeae. Okoe doe sạri Isor kan abo do uni tulucʼ bon kolom mitʼ akana, metakʼme uniren Hopon Jisu Mạsi tulucʼ menakʼ bona. Unige sạri Isor ar unige jaejug jion do.
E bachakotiń, boṅgako tulucʼ apeakʼ do jãhãn jopoṛao alo tahen ma.

Isor okoeye bachao akade uni maejiu ar uniren hoponko ṭhen iń murubi do noa ciṭhiń oletʼkana. Isorakʼ sạriạkʼtetʼ iạte iń do ape sanamkoń dulạṛetʼpea. Eken ińiń dulạṛetʼpea ona do baṅ, menkhan okoe Isorakʼ sạriakʼtetʼko baḍae oromakatʼ onko sanamkoge apeko dulạṛetʼpea.
Oka sạriakʼtetʼ aboakʼ ontorre menakʼ ar jaejug hạbicʼ abo tulucʼ tahenkan ona sạriakʼtetʼ iạtege ale do apele dulạṛetʼpea.
Isor Baba ar uniren Hopon Jisu Mạsi ṭhen khon sạriakʼ ar dulạṛte daya, mãyã ar sulukge abo tulucʼ tahenma.
Baba okaṭakʼe hukumakatʼ bon ona lekage amren adom gidrạko do Isorakʼ sạri horte calakʼiń ńeletʼkote ạḍiń rạskạkʼ kana.
Abo mimitʼko jemon bon dupulạṛ, noage am ṭhen ińakʼ nehõr do. E dulạṛiạ miserań, okań oletʼkan ona do jãhãn nawa hukum do baṅkana, bickom noa hukum do pạhil khonge bon ńam akada.
Dulạṛ do hoyokʼ kana Isorakʼ hukum leka calakʼ. Pạhil khon okaṭakʼ hukum reakʼ kathape ańjom ạguakatʼ onkage ape do dulạṛ horte taṛam idipe.
Dhạrtire nonkan aema hoṛko oḍok akana okoe doko bulạuko kan. Ente Jisu Mạsi manwa lekateye hecʼlen ona do bako aṅgoceda. Ar nonkan bulạukan hoṛge Mạsiren do bạiri kanako.
Ape do sontor akae tahenpe, jemon apepe kạmiakatʼ reakʼ kuṛại purạtepe ńam daṛeakʼ.

Okoe Mạsiakʼ sikhnạtko taṛam parom ar ona sikhnạtre ṭarhao akae bako tahen, onkoakʼ ontorre Isor do bạnugicʼan. Menkhan okoe ona sikhnạtre ṭarhao akane tahenkan uniakʼ ontorre do Baba ar Hopon bana hoṛge menakʼkinạ.
Ar jãhãe hoṛ ape ṭhen hecʼkate ona sikhnạt bae emokʼ enḍekhan apeakʼ oṛakʼre uni do alope ataṅ daramea ar johar hõ alope joharaea.
Okoe uniye joharae uni do uniakʼ bạṛicʼ kạmi reakʼ hõ bhạgiạdare hoyokʼa.
Ape olape lạgitʼ ińakʼ aema katha menakʼre hõ enhõ kagoc ar kạlite olape do bạń menjoṅ kana. Ona khon bickom ape ṭhen senkate mocate galmarao reakʼ iń asokʼ kana, jemon aboakʼ rạskạ do purạukʼ tabon.
Isorren bachao akan miseramren gidrạko do amko joharam kana.
Isorakʼ sạriakʼtetʼ iạte okoeyiń dulạṛedekan, ińren uni dulạṛiạ gate Gạius ṭhen iń murubi do noa ciṭhiń oleda.
Dulạṛiạ gate, koejoṅreń disạyetʼmea jemon amakʼ jotowakʼge mońjte calakʼ ar Jiu secʼ lekate cetʼlekam calakʼkan onkage jemon amakʼ hoṛmo hõ mońj tahentam.
Iń do ạḍitetʼiń rạskạyena ente adom biswạsi boehako hecʼkate am reaṅ noa gohako emkeda je, am do Isorakʼ sạriakʼre pạtiạr menama ar ona lekam taṛameda.
Ińren gidrạko je Isorakʼ sạriakʼ horteko taṛametʼkan, noa khon bạ̃ṛti maraṅ rạskạ do ińre ar bạnukʼanaṅ.
Dulạṛiạ gate, am do begor oromte hõ biswạsi boehako lạgitʼ okaṭakʼem cekayetʼ ona do pạtiạrtegem onkayeda.
Onko do manḍerre sanamko samaṅre amakʼ dulạṛ reakʼ kathako roṛeda. Ar Isor jemone kusikʼ onkaleka onko calakʼ reaṅem bebosta ako khan boge hoekokʼa.
Onko do Mạsi lạgitʼgeko oḍok hecʼakana ar bepạtiạuko ṭhen khon cetʼge bako hatao akada.
Onate nonkan hoṛ goṛowako do lek tabona, jemon Isorakʼ sạriakʼ lạgitʼ abo hõ onkoakʼ kạmire são kạmiyạko bon hoyokʼ.
Iń do manḍerrenko ṭhen mitʼṭen ciṭhiń olleda, menkhan Diotrephes do manḍerren mukhiyạ hoyokʼe menetʼte aleakʼ katha do bae moneakʼ kana.

Onate uni okaṭakʼe cekayetʼ ona do iń hecʼ tayom sanamkoń baḍae ocokoa. Uni do ale birudre hiskạte aema eṛe kathae roṛakada. Onate hõ bae suklente boehako hõ bae ataṅetʼkoa ar okoe onkoko ataṅetʼko onko hõe tạkicʼ darametʼkoa ar manḍer khone oḍoketʼkoa.
Dulạṛiạ gate, bạṛicʼakʼko pańja baṅkate bickom bhageakʼ pańjaepe. Okoe bhageakʼe kạmikan uni doe Isorren hoṛ kana, ar okoe bạṛicʼakʼe kạmikan uni do Isor bae ńṭoṭhadea.
Sanamkoge Demetriusko sarhaoede kana, ar Isorakʼ sạriakʼtetʼ hõe onkawae kana. Ale hõ unile sarhaoede kana. Am dom baḍaegea ale okaṭakʼle lại ona do sạrigea mente.
Aema katha olam reakʼ menakʼtińạ, menkhan kạli ar kolomte ona olam do bạń monejoṅ kana.
Asokʼ kạnạń usạrageń ńapam mea, ar unre samna sạmni laṅ galmaraoa.
Suluk am ma. Amren gatekoko joharam kana. Onḍenko gateko do aleakʼ judạ judạ johar baṛe emakom.
Iń do Jisu Mạsiren golam ar Jakobren boeha Jihudạ kạnạń. Isor Baba okoekoe hoho are dulạṛakatʼko ar Jisu Mạsi okoekoe rukhiyạ akatʼko onko ṭhen noa ciṭhiń oleda.
Isor do daya, suluk ar dulạṛe dan ape ma.

E dulạṛiạ gateko, kại khon sanamko oka bańcao bon ńamakatʼ ona bańcao reaṅ olape lạgitʼ ạḍi gagoj mon tahẽkantińạ. Menkhan enhõ Mạsi dhorom biswạsre, one okaṭakʼ Isor do acʼren hoṛko jaejug lạgitʼe emakatʼko, ona lạgitʼ mon murukte jemonpe lạṛhại ar ona udgạupe lạgitʼge noa ciṭhi olokʼ reakʼ jạruṛiń bujhạukeda.

Noa do jạruṛgea, ente sedaere okoe hoṛkoakʼ sạjại reaṅ katha sostorre olakan onko do ape talare hape hapeteko bolo akana. Noko hoṛkore Isor bhokti do bạnukʼanaṅ; ar aboren Isorakʼ daya do lucạ lamoṭ menteko ạnḍuṅeda ar okoe aboren mitʼ goṭen mạlik are Probhu kan uni Jisu Mạsi do bako aṅgoc edekana.
Ape do noako reaṅ bestegepe baḍaegea; enrehõ iń do noako kathań disạ ocoyetʼpe kana je, Misor disạm khon Israelko bańcaokate ạguko tayom okoe bako pạtiạulen Probhu do onkoe ḍahao maraoletʼkoa.
Ona chaḍa okoe serma goḍetko do akoakʼ ạidạri rukhiyạ baṅkate apnarakʼ jaega bạgikateko calaolen onkoakʼ katha disạipe. Ona maraṅ din reakʼ bicạr lạgitʼ Isor do onko jaejug ńutreye tol doho akatʼkoa.
Sodom, Gomora ar onakin beṛhaeteakʼ joto nagrahakoren hoṛko hõ ṭhik onko lekageko laṭghaṭetʼ tahẽkana. Okoe jaejug seṅgelre khadlekʼ reakʼ kuṛạiko ńam noko do onkoakʼ nạmunạgeko hoeakana.
Enrehõ noko eṛe cecetʼko do onkage bạṛicʼ kukmukote apnarakʼ hoṛmoko bhõnḍetʼtakoa, serma goḍetkoakʼ ḍanṭaoko bebataoeda ar onko sarhaokʼ kanko birudre bemanot kathako roṛeda.

Menkhan mukhiyạ serma goḍet Mikạyel do Moseakʼ hoṛmo iạte Soetan sãoteye reṭe peṭekʼkan tahẽkanre uni birudre jãhãn bemanot katha menkate dusiye do bae dilleda. Bickom uni doe menleda, “Probhui dhomkaome ma.”
Menkhan noko bhõnḍ cecetʼko do oka bako bujhạu akatʼ ona reaṅ bạṛicʼ kathako roṛa ar bebuj janwarko leka akote okaṭakʼko bujhạuakatʼ onategeko marao utạrokʼa.
Hae onko hoṛ do! Onko do Kạin reakʼ horteko calao akana, ar lab lạgitʼ Balamakʼ bulạureko khadle akana ar Korah reakʼ ṭhokteko nosṭoyena.

Noko hoṛ do dilkate apeakʼ helmel bhojkoreko seletʼ emanlen khan ona bhojre mạilạ lekako hoyokʼa. Noko do eken ako reaṅakʼgeko dạndikʼa. Noko do hoete oṭaṅ calakʼkan bin dakʼan rimil leka kanako. Jo tiokʼ jokhecʼ bin joanakʼ dare kante rehetʼ sudhạ pạṭupʼ giḍi akatʼ leka noko do banar secʼ tegeko gocʼgea.

Noko do birbão talare jalapuri reakʼ ḍheoko leka kanako; ar jalapuri reakʼ photo leka nokoakʼ lajao paṛao kạmiko do capekʼ kana. Noko do ạcur baṛaekan ipil lekanako; jaejug lạgitʼ kaṛaṅ kucạṅ ńutge noko lạgitʼ do jogao dohoakana.
Adam bõsren eaeyicʼ metakʼme Enok hõ noko hoṛko reaṅ nạbiletʼteye menleda, “Ńelepe, Probhu do acʼren hajar hajar sonot goḍetkoante sanamko bicạrko lạgitʼe hijukʼ kana,
ar bebhokti hoṛko do bebhokti lekate okako bạṛicʼ kạmiko kạmiakatʼ ar onko bebhokti kạiyan hoṛko Probhu birudre oka bạṛicʼ kathako roṛakatʼ, onate onko bicạr dusiko lạgitʼ uni doe hijukʼ kana.”
Noko hoṛ do jaogeko karacʼ kurujokʼa, ar akoakʼ bhạgko dusiya ar ontor reakʼ bạṛicʼ sana lekako calakʼa. Onko do akoteko sarhaokʼa ar lab joṅ lạgitʼ hoṛko heṛemakoa.
Menkhan E dulạṛiạ gateko, okako katha aboren Probhu Jisu Mạsiren apostolko lahareko lạiyakatʼ ona baṛe disạipe.
Onko do noa kathako lạiape kan tahẽkana, “Okoe doko siṛog baṛayetʼ tahẽkan onko do mucạtʼ dinreko hijukʼa ar Isor bebhokti ar bạṛicʼ sanako senakʼa.”
Noko hoṛ do dola duliko hoeocoya ar akoakʼ sana lekako calakʼa. Onkoakʼ ontorre sonot Jiu do bạnugicʼan.
Menkhan E dulạṛiạ boehako, ape do apeakʼ sonot utạr biswạsre apete benao rakabokʼpe ar sonot Jiu reakʼ ạyurte koejoṅpe.
Aboren Probhu Jisu Mạsiakʼ mãyã do jemon jaejug jion secʼe idipe ona ńel hor lạgitʼge ape do Isorakʼ dulạṛre tahenpe.
Ape talare okoekoakʼ pạtiạu nijorgetako onko dayawakope.
Ar adomko do seṅgel khon ạtkir oḍokkate bańcaokope. Jel reakʼ sanate okoeakʼ jion mạilạ akan onkoakʼ besapha kicricʼko hõ hirkhạwakʼpe ar apnar sontor akae tahente onko mãyãwakope.

Noa puthire okako olakan ona do Jisu Mạsigeye sodor akada. Noako reaṅ Isor do Mạsi ṭhene sodorleda, jemon thoṛa ghạṛicʼ khange hoyokʼ lạgidokʼkan ghoṭnako acʼren golamkoe baḍae ocoko. Mạsi do acʼren goḍete kolkedete acʼren golam Johan do noa reaṅakʼkoe baḍae ocoledea.
Isorakʼ katha ar Jisu Mạsiakʼ goha reaṅ Johan okae ńelletʼ tahẽkan, onako reaṅ uni do nonḍe gohae emakada.
Ar Isorakʼ okaṭakʼ katha nonḍe olakan, ar okoe noae paṛhao uni doe bhạgangea ar okoe onako ańjom arko manao onko hõko bhạgangea, ente okte do hecʼ seṭer akana.

Iń Johan do Ạsiạ reakʼ eae goṭen manḍerko ṭheniń oleda. Okoe menae, okoeye tahẽkan ar okoeye hijukʼkan uni ar uniakʼ siṅghạson samaṅre okoe eae goṭen Jiuko tahenkan, onko ar Jisu Mạsi do daya ar sulukko dan apema.
Jisu kangeae pạtiạricʼ goha do ar gocʼko khon unige pạhil dhaoe jiwetʼ beretʼlena, ar dhạrtiren rapajkoren raj doe uni kangea. Uni do aboe dulạṛetʼbona ar acʼakʼ mãyãmte kại khone chaḍaoketʼbona.

Uni do aboko hotete mitʼṭen rajosṭiye benao rakapʼakada ar acʼren Baba ar Isorakʼ sewa lạgitʼ naekeye hoe ocoakatʼbona. Jaejug hạbicʼ Jisu Mạsiakʼge ṭhonok hoyokʼtaema ar jaejug hạbicʼ uniakʼ daṛe do tahẽ akae tahenma. Amen.
Ńelpe, uni do rimilteye hijukʼkana. Ar mitʼke mitʼ mẽtʼ do uniko ńelea; ar okoeko sobokʼ bhugạkʼlede onko hõ uniko ńelea ar dhạrtiren sanam jạtko uni iạte koṛamko ceṭagokʼa. Onage hoyokʼ ma, Amen.
Probhu Isore meneda, “Ińge Alpha ar Omega, one okoe do menae, are tahẽkan are hijukʼkan. Ar iń kangeạń sanam daṛeyicʼ do.

Iń aperen boeha Johan do Jisu tulucʼ iń kolom mitʼ akante ape tulucʼ inạ duk, inạ rajosṭi ar inạ soboriren bhạgiạdariń hoeakana. Iń do Isorakʼ katha ar Jisuakʼ gohań porcarletʼte Patmosko metakʼ dipreń doho ocolena.
Probhuakʼ dinre iń do Jiureń tahẽkana. Ar un jokhecʼ iń tayomre siṅgạ saḍe leka mitʼ hoṛakʼ aṛaṅiń ańjomkeda.
Uni doe metadińạ, “Okaṭakʼem ńel ona do mitʼṭen puthire olme, ar Ephesus, Smurnạ, Pergamom, Thuạtirạ, Sạrdis, Philạdelphiạ, ar Laodhar, noa eae goṭen nagraha reakʼ eae goṭen manḍer ṭhen kolme.”
Okoe kathae roroṛkan tahẽkan uni ńele lạgitʼ iń ạcuren khan sona reakʼ eae goṭecʼ diuhe dohowakʼ iń ńelkeda.
Ona diuhe dohowakʼko talare manwa Hopon leka okoe coṅ mitʼ hoṛe tahẽkana. Uni do jaṅga hạbicʼ jeleń aṅgrop horokʼ akatʼ ar koṛam do sona reakʼ pạṭkạte tol ạcurakatʼ tahẽkantaea.
Uniakʼ bohokʼ ar upʼ do ponḍge tahẽkana, ponḍ bhiḍi upʼ leka ar him lekage ar mẽtʼ do seṅgel lepʼ leka tahẽkana.
Ar uniakʼ jaṅga do seṅgelre jhalkao akatʼ pitạl leka jhak jhak, ar aṛaṅ do aema dakʼko ạtukʼ reakʼ saḍe leka tahẽkana.

Uni do acʼakʼ jojom tite eae goṭecʼ ipile sapʼakatʼko tahẽkana ar moca khon do banarsa dharanakʼ mitʼṭen laser tarwaṛe oḍokokʼkantae tahẽkana. Uniakʼ mẽtãhã do tạpiste jolokʼkan siń cando leka jhak jhakaokʼkan tahẽkana.
Uni ńelte iń do gocʼicʼ leka uniakʼ jaṅga ṭheniń bhindạṛena. Unre uni do acʼakʼ jojomtite joṭetʼkedeńteye metadińạ, “Alom botorokʼa. Ińge pạhilicʼ ar mucạtʼicʼ,
ar ińkangeạń jaejug jiwetʼicʼ. Iń doń gocʼlena, ar ńelme, jug cetan jug hạbicʼ jiwetʼ minạńa. Iń ṭhen do moron ar patal puri reakʼ choṛan menakʼa.
Onate okam ńelketʼ, okaṭakʼ ńit hoyokʼkan ar noako tayom okaṭakʼ hoyokʼ onako ol dohokakʼme.

Ar oka eae goṭecʼ sona reakʼ diuhe dohowakʼ ar ińakʼ jojomtire eae goṭecʼ ipilem ńelketʼko ona reakʼ bhed do noage, onko eae goṭecʼ ipil do, eae goṭecʼ manḍerren eae goṭen goḍet kanako ar eae goṭecʼ diuhe dohowakʼ do ona eae goṭen manḍer kana.
“Ephesus nagraha reakʼ manḍerren goḍet ṭhen noa katha do olme: ‘‘Okoe acʼakʼ jojomtire eae goṭen ipil sapʼkate sona reakʼ eae goṭecʼ diuhe dohowakʼ talareye ạcur baṛaekan uni do noae meneda.

Iń do amakʼ kạmi, mehnot ar sobori doń baḍaegea. Baḍaegeạń am do bạṛicʼ hoṛko bam ńel sahao daṛeakoa, ar okoe do apostolko baṅkanre hõ apnarte apostolko ńumugokʼkan onko dom biḍạu aṭkar akatʼkoa ar phạsiạra kanako mente hõm sạbud akatʼkoa.
Amakʼ do sobori menakʼtamgea ar iń lạgitʼ hõ ạḍi kosṭom sahao akada, ar bam laṅga akana.
Enrehõ am birudre noa katha roṛ reakʼ menakʼtińạ, ente lahate iń lạgitʼ cetʼ leka dulạṛ tahẽkantam ona dom atʼakada.

Hudiskate ńelme, am do tinạkʼ usul khon tinạkʼ latartem pheḍakana. Noa khon mon ạcurtam ar lahate okakom kạmikan tahẽkan onare ruạṛme. Ar mon bam ạcurletam khan enḍekhan am ṭhen hecʼkate amakʼ diuhe dohowakʼ do ona jaega khoniń ocoga.
Menkhan mitʼṭen gun menakʼtama ona do, Nikolạitiko okaṭakʼko cekayetʼkan ona dom hirkhạwakʼ kana, ar iń hõń hirkhạwakʼ kana.
‘‘Ańjom lạgitʼ lutur menakʼtayicʼ doe ańjomma, sonot Jiu manḍerrenko cetʼe metako kana mente! Jitạukʼicʼ do Isorakʼ Parades reakʼ jion dare reakʼ joń jom ocoyea.
‘‘Smurnạ naṅgrha reakʼ manḍerren goḍet ṭhen noa katha olme: ‘‘Okoe doe etohopʼ are mucạtʼicʼkan, ar okoe doe gocʼlen are jiwetʼ beretʼen, uni do noa kathae meneda.

Amakʼ kosṭo ar reṅgecʼ reakʼ kathań baḍaegea, menkhan enhõ am dom kisạ̃ṛgea. Apnarte Jihudiko ńumugokʼkanre hõ okoe do Jihudiko baṅkan, bickom Soetan dolren kanko, onko do am birudre okako roṛetʼkan ona doń baḍaegea.

Am do okako dukem jom lạgidokʼkan onate thoṛa hõ alom botorokʼa. Ańjomme, Soetan do ape modren adomko biḍạupe lạgitʼ hajotreye bhoraopea, ar gel din hạbicʼ ape do kosṭope joma. Am do gujukʼ hạbicʼ pạtiạr akae tahenme, enḍekhan jitạukʼ reakʼ mala leka jioniń emama.
Ańjom lạgitʼ lutur menakʼtae hoṛ doe ańjomma, sonot Jiu manḍerrenko cetʼe metako kana mente. ‘‘Jitạukʼicʼ do dosar gujukʼte ohogeye hạnlena.
“Pergamom nagraha reakʼ manḍerren goḍet ṭhen noa katha olme. Okaṭakʼ laser tarwaṛe banar secʼ dhar menakʼ ona ạidạrige noa kathae meneda:

Am do okarem tahenkan ona doń baḍaegea; onḍe do Soetanakʼ siṅghạson menakʼa. Enhõ am do ińre pạtiạr menama ar iń cetanre amakʼ pạtiạu do bam baṅ akada. Okare Soetane tahenkan onḍe ińren pạtiạricʼ goha Antipas do ape samaṅreye khũn ocolenre hõ am do amakʼ pạtiạu bam baṅlakʼa.

Menkhan enhõ am birudre ińakʼ roṛ reakʼ thoṛa menakʼtińạ. Onḍe am ṭhen nonkan hoṛko menakʼkoa okoe do Balamakʼ sikhnạt lekateko calakʼkan. Balak raj do Balame cetʼade tahẽkana jemon uni do boṅga samaṅakʼkoe jom ocoko ar laṭghaṭ kạmikote Israelko kại secʼe idiko.
Ona chaḍa Nikoliạtikoakʼ cecetʼakʼ lekako calakʼkan nonkan adom adomko hõ am ṭhen menakʼkoa.
Onate noa khon mon ạcurtam. Ar mon bam ạcurtam khan enḍekhan iń do usạrage am ṭheniń hijukʼkana ar ińakʼ moca reakʼ tarwaṛete onko birudreń lạṛhạiya.

Ańjom lạgitʼ lutur menakʼtae hoṛ doe ańjomma, sonot Jiu do manḍerrenko cetʼe metako kana. Ar okoeye jitạukʼ uni do okoakatʼ manna khon thoṛa manna ar mitʼṭen ponḍ dhiriń emaea. Ona dhiri cetanre mitʼṭen nawa ńutum ol tahena one okoehõ ona do bako baḍaekan, eken okoe onae ńam unigeye baḍaea.
“Thuạtirạ nagraha reakʼ manḍerren goḍet ṭhen noa katha olme, Isorren Hopon, one okoeakʼ mẽtʼ do seṅgel lepʼ leka ar jaṅga do jhak jhakaokʼkan pitạl leka uni do noa kathae meneda:
Iń do amakʼ kạmi, amakʼ dulạṛ, amakʼ biswạs, amakʼ sapʼ dapʼ ar amakʼ sobori reakʼ kathań baḍaegea. Am do lahate okakom kạmikan tahẽkan, ona khon hõ ńitokʼ do arhõ bạ̃ṛtim kạmikan ona hõń baḍaegea.

Enhõ am birudre ińakʼ noa katha roṛ reakʼ menakʼtińạ. Am do Jesebel ńutuman uni maejiuakʼ bedhoromem sahao akatʼa. Nui Jesebel do acʼte nạbiye ńumogokʼ kana. Ar acʼakʼ cecetʼakʼte uni do ińren gutikoe bulạuetʼkoa, jemon onko do laṭghaṭko kạmi ar boṅga ṭhen samaṅakʼko jom.
Loṭghuṭi khon mon ạcurtae lạgitʼ iń do ạtiń emade tahẽkana, menkhan uni do mon bae ạcurletʼtaea.
Onate iń do aṭetʼreń jaṛao ocoyea, ar okoe uni tulucʼko loṭghuṭiyetʼkan onko hõ loṭghuṭi khon mon bako ạcurletako khan enḍekhan ạḍi bạṛicʼ sasetreń khadlekoa.
Ar uniren gidrạko hõń gocʼ giḍikakoa. Onate sanam manḍerrenko baḍae daṛeakʼa je, ińkangeạń manwakoakʼ mon ar ontor ḍunḍhạuicʼ do. Ar apeakʼ kạmiko leka mitʼke mitʼ hoṛ do joń emapea.
E Thuạtirạren sarecʼ hoṛko, okoe ona sikhnạt leka bape calakʼkan ar Soetanakʼ oka khạnḍri cecetʼakʼko metakʼkan ona bape baḍae akatʼ, apeń metapekana: Ape cetanre ar eṭakʼ bojha do bạń ladeapea.
Eken apeakʼ okaṭakʼ menakʼ, ona do iń ạuriń hijukʼ hạbicʼ kajakte sapʼ dohokakʼpe.
Baba cetʼleka sanam jạtko cetanre ektiạriye emakawạdiń, onkage okoeye jitạukʼ ar mucạtʼ hạbicʼ ińakʼ sana lekae kạmi idi uni hõ ona ektiạriń emaea.
Uni do mẽṛhẽtʼ ṭheṅgate onkoe ḍanṭaokoa ar hasa reakʼ bhajan lekae rạputʼgiḍikoa.
Ar okoeye jitạukʼa unige iń do bhurkạ ipil hõń emaea.
Ańjom lạgitʼ lutur menakʼtae hoṛ doe ańjomma, sonot Jiu do manḍerrenko cetʼe metakokana mente.

“Sạrdis nagraha reakʼ manḍerren goḍet ṭhen noa katha olme, Isorren eae goṭen Jiu ar eae goṭecʼ ipilko okoeye sapʼ akatʼko uni do noa kathae meneda: iń do amakʼ kạmi reakʼ kathań baḍaegea. Ar jiwetʼ menamte am do ạḍi namḍak menakʼtama, menkhan am dom gocʼgea.
Am do jagwar tahenme ar sarecʼakʼ okako gocʼakan leka menakʼ ona do daṛeanakʼ hoe ocoeme, ente ińren Isor samaṅre amakʼ jãhãn kạmige mucạdokʼ do bạń ńelakada.
Onate okam ńamakatʼ arem ańjomakatʼ ona disạime ar manaome, ar ona khon mon ạcurtam. Ar jagwar bam tahen khan iń do kombṛo lekań hijukʼa, ar tinreń hijukʼa ona do baḍaege bam baḍae daṛeakʼa.

Menkhan Sạrdisre thoṛa nonkan hoṛ menakʼkotama one okoe do akoakʼ kicʼricʼ khạnḍwạkʼ, metakʼme cạl-colon bako mạilạ akatʼtako. Onko doko lekman hoṛ kante ponḍ kicʼricʼ horokʼkate iń sãoteko dãṛãbaṛaea.
Okoeye jitạukʼa uni do nonkan ponḍ kicricʼe horoga. Ar iń do jion reakʼ puthi khon uniakʼ ńutum tishõ bạń meṭaotaea, bickom ińren Baba ar uniren goḍetko samaṅreń aṅgocea.
Ańjom lạgitʼ lutur menakʼtae hoṛ doe ańjomma, sonot Jiu do manḍerrenko cetʼe metakokana mente.

“Philạḍelphiạ nagraha reakʼ manḍerren goḍet ṭhen noa katha olme: Okoe do sonot are sạriyicʼkan, ar okoe ṭhen Dạudakʼ choṛan menakʼ, one uniye jhicʼlere okoege bako siń daṛeakʼ are sińlere okoe hõ bako jhicʼ daṛeakʼ,

uni do noa kathae meneda; iń do amakʼ kạmi reakʼ kathań baḍaea. Ńelme, iń do am lạgitʼ jhicʼ akatʼ mitʼṭen duạriń dohoakada, one oka siń reakʼ ektiạri do okoeakʼ hõ bạnukʼtako. Ińiń baḍaea amakʼ daṛe do thoṛagetama, menkhan enhõ am do ińakʼ katham dohoakada ar bam baṅ akadińạ.
Okoe apnarte Jihudiko ńumugokʼkan, menkhan Jihudiko baṅkan, onko Soetanakʼ dolren eṛe hoṛko am ṭheniń ạgukoa ar amakʼ jaṅga ṭheniń sewa ocokoa, ariń baḍae ocokoa, iń do amiń dulạṛetʼmea.

Sobori reakʼ okań hukumatʼme tahẽkan ona dom dohoakada; onate dhạrtire oka duk reakʼ ghuṛi daraekan ona khon iń doń rukhiyạmea. Ar okoe doko noa dhạrtirenkan onko biḍạuko lạgitʼge noa duk reakʼ okte do hijukʼa.
Iń do ạḍi usạrageń darae kana. Amakʼ oka menakʼtam ona do sapʼ uricʼ akae tahenme, okoe hõ amakʼ jitạukʼ reakʼ kuṛại alo jemonko recʼme.

Ar okoeye jitạukʼa unige ińren Isorakʼ oṛakʼ reakʼ mitʼṭen khũnṭiń teṅgoyea; uni do tisge bahrete bae calakʼa. Iń do unire ińren Isorakʼ ńutum ar ińren Isorakʼ nagraha reakʼ ńutumiń ola. Ona nagraha do nawa Jerusalemge. Serma khon ińren Isor ṭhen khon noa nagraha do pheḍ hijukʼa. Ar okoeye jitạukʼa, iń do unire ińakʼ ńutumiń ola.
Ańjom lạgitʼ lutur menakʼtae hoṛ doe ańjomma, sonot Jiu do manḍerrenko cetʼe metako kana!

‘‘Laodikiạ nagraha reakʼ manḍerren goḍet ṭhen noa ciṭhi do olme, ‘‘Okoe do Amen, ar okoe do pạtiạricʼ are sạri gohakan, ar okoe do Isorakʼ sirjonren etohopʼ, uni do noa kathae meneda: iń do amakʼ kạmiko reakʼ iń baḍaea.
Am do reaṛ hõ bam reaṛa ar lolo hõ bam loloa. Am do reaṛ se lolom hoelen khan honaṅ boge hoekokʼa!
Menkhan am do reaṛ hõ bam reaṛa ar lolo hõ bam loloa, onate iń do moca khoniń thoyetʼkan lekań phurgiḍikama!
Am dom meneda, kisạ̃ṛgeạń; ar maraṅ hoṛiń hoeakana, onate ińakʼ do cetʼ reakʼ reṅgecʼ hõ bạnukʼtińạ. Bogegea, menkhan bam baḍaea je, am dom reṅgecʼgea, kãṛãgea arem laṅgaṭgea mente.

Onate noa solhań emam kana, am do iń ṭhen khon seṅgelre rapakʼakʼ khạṭi sona kirińjoṅme, jemonem kisạ̃ṛ daṛeakʼ. Iń ṭhen khon ponḍ kicricʼ kirińkate horogme jemon onem uluṅ akan reakʼ lajaotetʼ alo ńelokʼtam. Iń ṭhen khon mẽtʼre lagao lạgitʼ aenom kirińjoṅme, jemonem ńeńel.
Okoeyiń dulạṛetʼko, onkoge doskoń udukʼakoa ariń ḍanṭaokoa. Onate noa khon mon ạcur lạgitʼ ahkaokʼme.
Ńelme, iń do duạrre teṅgokate silpińiń ṭhopʼ ṭhopʼetʼ kana. Jãhãege ińakʼ aṛaṅ ańjomkate silpińe jhicʼạń, enḍekhan bhitrite uni ṭheniń bolokʼa ar uni tulucʼiń jom ńũiya, ar uni hõ iń tulucʼe joma.
“Jitạukʼkate cetʼleka iń do ińren Baba tulucʼ uniakʼ siṅghạsonreń duṛupʼ akan, onkage okoeye jitạukʼa, uni do iń tulucʼ ińakʼ siṅghạsonre duṛupʼ reakʼ ạidạriń emaea.
Ańjom lạgitʼ lutur menakʼtae hoṛ doe ańjomma, sonot Jiu do manḍerrenko cetʼe metako kana.”

Noa tayom iń do serma reakʼ mitʼṭen duạr jhicʼ akatʼiń ńelkeda. Ar siṅgạ reakʼ saḍe leka okoeakʼ aṛaṅiń ańjomletʼ uni doe metadińạ, “Am do nonḍe rakapʼ hijukʼme. Ar noako tayom oka hoyokʼ lạgidokʼkan onań udukʼama.”
Iń do unrege sonot Jiuteń perecʼente sermare mitʼṭen siṅghạsoniń ńel ńamkeda. Ona siṅghạsonre mitʼ hoṛ duṛupʼ akaniń ńelkedea.
Uniakʼ rup do surjokanto ar lalkanto mạnik dhiri leka. Ar siṅghạson reakʼ beṛhaete mitʼṭen liṭạ akʼ tahẽkana; ona do ńelokʼte morokotʼ mạnik dhiri leka.

Ona siṅghạson reakʼ beṛhaete arhõ bargel pon siṅghạson tahẽkana, ar ona siṅghạsonkore do bargel pon murubiko duṛupʼakan tahẽkana. Onkoakʼ kicricʼko do ponḍge tahẽkana ar bohokʼre do sona reakʼ mukuṭ tahẽkantakoa.
Ona singhạson khon do bijliko, ar botoranakʼ aṛaṅ ar huḍur reakʼ saḍe oḍokokʼkan tahẽkana. Ar siṅghạson samaṅre eae goṭecʼ diuhe jolokʼkan tahẽkana. Ona diuheko do Isorren eae goṭen Jiu kanako.

Ona siṅghạson samaṅre dhiri hisir leka kãc reakʼ jalapuri tahẽkana. Ona siṅghạsonko reakʼ talare menakʼ siṅghạson reakʼ beṛhaete ponea jiwiyanko tahẽkana. Onkoakʼ do samaṅ secʼ ar tayom secʼ mẽtʼkote perecʼ tahẽkana.
Pạhil jiwiyanicʼakʼ rup do dhạcri kul leka, dosaricʼ do bạchur leka, tesaricʼ do manwa leka ar ponicʼ do uḍạukʼkan pajhaṛ cẽṛẽ leka.

Noko ponea jiwiyanko do hoṛo hoṛo turui goṭecʼkate phạ̃kṛạ̃kʼ ar sanam jaegakore mẽtʼkote perecʼ tahẽkantakoa. Onko do siń ńindạ mitʼ kathageko menetʼ tahẽkana, “Sanam daṛeanicʼ Probhu Isor, okoe doe tahẽkan, okoe do menaege, okoe doe hijukʼkan uni doe sonot, sonot, sonotgea.”
Onko jiwiyanko do siṅghạsonre duṛupʼakanicʼ one uni jug cetan jug jiwetʼe tahenkan ṭhonok ar man ar gun manao joharko emae jokhecʼ,

onko bargel pon murubiko do siṅghạsonren ạidạriyicʼ, metakʼme okoe do jaejug hạbicʼ jiwetʼ menae uni do ombakʼkateko sewawae kana. Noko murubiko do ona siṅghạson samaṅre akoakʼ mukuṭ bocʼ dohokateko meneda,
“E aleren Probhu ar Isor, amge man ar ṭhonok ar daṛe ńam lek kanam, ente jotowakʼgem sirjạu akada; ar amakʼ monelekage onako do sirjạu akana ar ṭikạu menakʼa.”
Okoe ona siṅghạson cetanreye duṛupʼ akan tahẽkan uniakʼ jojomtire mitʼṭen puthiń ńelkeda. Puthi reakʼ bahre ar bhitrire do ol tahẽkana ar eae goṭecʼ mohorte chapakatʼ tahẽkana.
Tayomte mitʼṭen daṛeanicʼ serma goḍet do ạ̃ṭ aṛaṅte noa katha roroṛkaniń ańjomkedea, “Noa mohor chapko raṛakate puthi oṭag lạgitʼ lekmanicʼ doe okoe kana?”
Menkhan sermare se dhạrtire se ot latarren okoege noa puthi do bako oṭakʼ daṛeada, ar bhitri hõ bako ńel daṛeada.
Unre iń do ạḍi ãṭ iń rakʼkeda, ente nonkan okoege bako ńamlena okoe do ona puthi oṭag se ńel lạgitʼko lek kan.

Tayomte murubiko modren mitʼ hoṛe metadińạ, “Alom raga. Jihudạ bõsren dhạcri kul, one okoe doe Dạud bõsren kan, uni doe jitạu akana. Unige ona eae goṭecʼ mohor chapko raṛakate puthiye oṭakʼ daṛeakʼa.”

Ponea jiwiyanko ar murubiko talare okaṭakʼ siṅghạson tahẽkan, ona cetanre mitʼṭen Bheḍa Hopon teṅgo akaniń ńelkedea. Ińiń hudisetʼ tahẽkana pasecʼ uni Bheḍa Hopon doe gocʼ ocolen tahẽkana. Uni Bheḍa Hoponakʼ do eae goṭecʼ dereń ar eae goṭecʼ mẽtʼ tahẽkana. Ar Isorren eae goṭen Jiu okoe do dhạrti reakʼ sanam jaegateko kol ocokʼkan ona mẽtʼko do onko eae goṭen Jiu kanako.
Tayomte uni Bheḍa Hopon do hecʼkate siṅghạsonre okoeye duṛupʼ akan tahẽkan uniakʼ jojomti khon puthiye hataokeda.

Ar puthiye hataoketʼ khan onko ponea jiwiyanko ar bargel pon murubiko do Bheḍa Hopon samaṅreko ombakʼena. Onko mimitʼkoakʼ tire do mimitʼ goṭecʼ peṛesaṅ ar mimitʼ goṭecʼ dhupte perecʼ sona reakʼ bạṭi tahẽkana. Ona dhupte perecʼ bạṭiko do Isorren hoṛkoakʼ koejoṅ kana.

Onko do noa nawa sereńko sereńetʼkan tahẽkana: “Amge ona puthi hataokate mohor chapako raṛae reakʼ lek kanam, ente am dom gocʼ ocolena. Amge amakʼ mãyãmte mimitʼ bõsko, pạrsiko, disạmrenko ar jạtko mod khon Isor lạgitʼ hoṛkom kiriń akatʼkoa.
Am do onko hotete mitʼṭen rajosṭim benao akada ar aboren Isorakʼ sewae lạgitʼ naekekom hoe ocoketʼkoa. Dhạrtire onkoge rajosṭiko calaoa.”
Tayomteń ńelkeda; ona singhạson ar jiwiyanko ar murubiko beṛhaete aema serma goḍetkoakʼ aṛaṅ iń ańjomkeda. Onko serma goḍetko do lekhare hajar hajar, ar ojut ojutko tahẽkana.
Onko do ãṭ aṛaṅte noa kathako menetʼkan tahẽkana: “Okoeṭakʼ Bheḍa Hopone gocʼ ocolen, unige ektiạri, dhon, akel, daṛe, manot, ṭhonok ar sarhao ńam lek kanae.”

Ona tayom sermare, dhạrtire, ot latarre ar jalapurire tinạkʼ jiwiyan menakʼko, ar onare jãhãnakʼge menakʼ jotokoge noa katha roroṛkaniń ańjomketʼkoa: “Singhạsonre okoeye duṛupʼ akan Uniakʼ ar uni Bheḍa Hoponakʼ sarhao man ar ṭhonok ar daṛe do jaejug hạbicʼ tahenma.”
Onko ponea jiwiyankoko menkeda, “Amen.” Ona tayom onko murubiko do ombakʼkateko sewakeda.

Bheḍa Hopon do ona eae goṭecʼ mohor chapko reakʼ pạhilakʼe raṛaketʼ khan iń ńelkeda; onko ponea jiwiyanko modren mitʼṭen do huḍur reakʼ aṛaṅ leka roroṛkaniń ańjomkedea, “Dela hijukʼme.” Unre mitʼṭen ponḍ sadomiń ńel ńamkedea.
Ar okoe unireye decʼ akan tahẽkan uniakʼ tire do mitʼṭen akʼ tahẽkana. Uni do mitʼṭen mukuṭko emadea ar jitạuicʼ lekae oḍok calaoena are jitạu idikeda.
Bheḍa Hopon do dosarakʼ mohor chape raṛayetʼ tahẽkanre iń do dosaricʼ jiwiyanicʼ roroṛkaniń ańjomkedea, “Dela hijukʼme.”

Unre seṅgel leka eṭakʼ mitʼṭen arakʼ sadome oḍok hecʼena. Okoe uni sadomreye decʼ akan tahẽkan uni do dhạrti khon suluk ocog lạgitʼ ektiạriye em ocoyena, jemon hoṛko do ako akoko gopocʼ. Uni do mitʼṭen maraṅ okocʼ tarwaṛe hõe emocoyena.

Bheḍa Hopon do tesarakʼ mohor chape raṛayetʼ tahẽkanre tesaricʼ jiwiyanicʼ roroṛkaniń ańjomkedea, “Dela hijukʼme.” Ona tayom iń do mitʼṭen hende sadomiń ńel ńamkedea. Ar okoe uni sadomreye decʼakan tahẽkan uniakʼ tire do mitʼṭen tulạ tahẽkana.
Onko ponea jiwiyanko talare okoe coṅ roroṛkaniń ańjomkedea, “Mitʼṭen din ṭalaoicʼakʼ mitʼ din reakʼ kuṛại do eken mitʼ ser guhum se pe ser jao. Sunum ar darkha rasa do alom nosṭoea.”
Bheḍa Hopon do ponakʼ mohor chape raṛaketʼ khan ponicʼ jiwiyanicʼ roroṛkaniń ańjomkedea, “Dela hijukʼme.”

Unre iń do mitʼṭen polso sasaṅ roṅan sadomiń ńel ńamkedea. Ar okoe uni sadomreye decʼakan tahẽkan uniakʼ ńutum do moron; ar patal puri do uni tayom tayomteye calakʼkan tahẽkana. Dhạrti reakʼ pon hạṭiń reakʼ mitʼ hạṭiń cetanre unkin do ektiạriko ematʼkinạ, jemon unkin do tarwaṛete, akalte, maha mạrite, ar dhạrtiren bir janwarko hotete hoṛkokin gocʼko.
Ar mõṛẽakʼ mohor chape raṛayetʼ tahẽkanre iń do pinḍ latarre nonkan hoṛkoakʼ jiwikoń ńelkeda, one okoe do Isorakʼ katha ar goha iạteko gocʼ ocolen tahẽkan.
Onko do ãṭ aṛaṅteko menkeda, “E sonoticʼ ar sạriyicʼ Probhu, okoe doko noa dhạrtirenkan, onko bicạrko lạgitʼ ar aleakʼ mãyãm reakʼ hala ruạṛako lạgitʼ ar tinạkʼem biloma?

Unre onko mimitʼ hoṛ mitʼṭenkate ponḍ oyon kicricʼko ematʼkoa arko metatʼkoa, onkoren são gutiko ar boehako, okoe do ako lekako gocʼ ocokʼ onkoakʼ lekha ạuri purạukʼ hạbicʼ jemon arhõ thoṛa ghạṛicʼko ńel hor.
Ona tayom iń ńelkeda, uni do turuiyakʼ mohor chape raṛaketʼ khan ạḍi ãṭ dhạrti laṛaoena. Siń cando do ekalteye hende cabayena ar ńindạ cando do mãyãm lekae arakʼena.
Ar kajak hoete cetʼleka loa dare khon berel loa ńurokʼ, onkage sermaren ipilko hõ dhạrtireko ńurena.
Guṛhạ dohoakan kagoc lekage serma do guṛhạyena; ar buru ar dipko do apan ạpin jaega khon ocokʼena.
Dhạrtiren sanam rapajko, napṛakʼko, maraṅ subedarko, kisạ̃ṛko ar daṛean hoṛko, mitʼke mitʼ golam ar sạdhin hoṛko do danderkore ar buru reakʼ huṭupʼ dhirikoreko okoeyena.
Onko do buruko ar dhirikoko metatʼa, “De ale cetanre bhindạṛokʼpe ar ona siṅghasonreye duṛupʼakan, uniakʼ mẽtʼãhã samaṅ khon ar Bheḍa Hoponakʼ edre khon oko dohokalepe,
ente unkinakʼ edre sodor reakʼ ona maraṅ din do seṭerakana, ar uni samaṅre do okoeye teṅgo ṭarhao daṛekokʼa?”

Niạ tayom iń do ponea serma goḍetko dhạrti reakʼ ponon konḍre teṅgo akaniń ńelketʼkoa. Onko do dhạrti ponon kona reakʼ hoeko esetʼ dohoakatʼ tahẽkana, jemon dhạrtire, jalapurire se jãhãn dare cetanre hoe hõ aloe hoe.

Ona tayom mitʼṭen serma goḍet do purub secʼ khon rakapʼ hijukʼiń ńelkedea. Uni ṭhen do jiwetʼ Isorakʼ mohor chap tahẽkana. Ar okoe serma goḍetko do dhạrti ar jalapuri hạn reakʼ ektiạriko emoco akan onko ponea serma goḍetko ãṭ aṛaṅteye metatʼkoa,
“Aboren Isorren golamkoakʼ moloṅre mohor chap ạuri emako hạbicʼ dhạrti, jalapuri ar dareko do alope hạna.”
Ona tayom onko mohor chap akan hoṛkoakʼ lekhań ańjomkeda. Israelren sanam bõsko mod khon jotote mitʼ sae pongel pon hajar hoṛko mohor chap ocoakana:
Jihudạ bõsko khon gelbar hajar. Ruben bõsko khon gelbar hajar. Gadren bõsko khon gelbar hajar.
Aserren bõsko khon gelbar hajar. Naphtali bõsko khon gelbar hajar. Manasi bõsko khon gelbar hajar.
Simeon bõsko khon gelbar hajar. Liwiren bõsko khon gelbar hajar. Isạkạrren bõsko khon gelbar hajar.
Sạbulonren bõsko khon gelbar hajar. Josephren bõsko khon gelbar hajar. Benjaminren bõsko khon gelbar hajar.

Inạ tayom sanam jạtko, bõsko, disạm ar pạrsiren modko khon nunạkʼ gadel hoṛkoń ńelketʼkoa je, onko do okoege bako lekha daṛeatʼkoa. Onko do ponḍ kicricʼ horokʼkate ona siṅghạson ar Bheḍa Hopon samaṅre khijur sakam sapʼkateko teṅgo akan tahẽkana.
Ar ãṭ aṛaṅte hohokateko menetʼkan tahẽkana: “Okoe siṅghạsonreye duṛupʼ akan, aboren Isor ar Bheḍa Hopon titege kại khon bańcao do hoeakana.”
Ona tayom sermaren goḍetko do sanamkoge ona siṅghạsonren, mukhiyạko ar ponea jiwiyanko beṛhaeteko teṅgoyena. Onko do siṅghạson samaṅre ombakʼkate Isor sewawadeteko menkeda,
“Amen. Sarhao, ṭhonok, akel, gunmanao johar, man, ektiạri ar daṛe do jaejug hạbicʼ aboren Isorakʼge hoyokʼtaema. Amen.”
Unre mitʼṭen murubi doe metadińạ, “Ponḍ kicricʼ horokʼakatʼ noko hoṛ doko okoe kana? Ar oka khonko hecʼakana?”
Adoń metadea, “Ńelme, ona do amgem baḍaea.” Uni doe metadińạ, “Ona maraṅ saset khon okoeko hecʼakan onko doko noko kangea. Onko do akoakʼ kicricʼko Bheḍa Hoponakʼ mãyãmte ạrupʼkateko ponḍ akatʼtakoa.
Onate noko do Isorakʼ siṅghạson samaṅre menakʼkoa ar serma reakʼ mundilre siń ńindạ uniko sewawae kana. Okoe siṅghạsonreye duṛupʼ akan unige noko cetanreye chạunikʼa.
Noko do ar baṅ reṅgecʼkoa, baṅ tetaṅkoa; siń cando reakʼ dãk hõ hoṛmore baṅ paṛao akoa, ar bebạṛicʼ lolo hõ bako ạikạua,
ente Bheḍa Hopon okoe do siṅghạsonre menae unige onkoren gupiyicʼe hoyokʼa. Ar jiwetʼ dakʼ reakʼ jharna ṭhene idikoa, ar Isor do onkoakʼ mẽtʼdakʼe jodtakoa.”
Ona tayom Bheḍa Hopon do eaeakʼ mohor chape raṛaketʼ khan sermare adha ghonṭa gan jãhãn saḍege baṅ ańjomlena.
Ar okoe eae goṭen serma goḍetko Isor samaṅreko teṅgo akan tahenkan onkoń ńelketʼkoa. Onko do tire eae goṭecʼ siṅgạko ematʼkoa.

Inạ tayom ar mitʼṭen serma goḍet hecʼkate pinḍ samaṅreye teṅgoyena. Uniakʼ tire do sona reakʼ mitʼṭen dhup dani tahẽkana. Uni do ạḍi utạr dhupko emadea jemon siṅghạson samaṅre sona reakʼ pinḍre Isorren sanam hoṛkoakʼ koejoṅ sãote ona dhup jeretʼkateye samaṅ daṛeakʼ.
Ar uni serma goḍetakʼ ti khon dhup reakʼ dhũạ do Isorren hoṛkoakʼ koejoṅ sãote coṭte Isor samaṅre rakapʼena.
Unre serma goḍet do pinḍ khon seṅgel hataokate ona dhup daniye perecʼkeda ar dhạrtiteye lebda giḍikada. Onate huḍur ar eṭakʼakʼ botoranakʼ saḍe leka saḍeyena, ar bijli malkaoena ar dhạrti laṛaoena.
Eae goṭen serma goḍetko ṭhen okaṭakʼ eae goṭecʼ siṅgạ tahẽkan, onko do ona oroṅ lạgitʼko sapṛaoena.

Ar pạhilicʼ serma goḍet do acʼakʼ siṅgại oroṅketʼ khan mãyãm mesalakatʼ arel ar seṅgel do dhạrtirte lebda giḍiyena. Onate pe hạṭiń reakʼ mitʼ hạṭiń dhạrti, ar pe hạṭiń reakʼ mitʼ hạṭiń dareko ar sanam hạriạṛ ghãsko lo roṅgoyena.

Inạ tayom dosaricʼ serma goḍet acʼakʼ siṅgại oroṅkeda. Unre maraṅ jolokʼkan buru leka mitʼṭen jinis do jalapurire khadle ocoyena. Onate jalapuri reakʼ pe hạṭiń reakʼ mitʼ hạṭiń dakʼ do mãyãm cabayena,
ar jalapuriren pe hạṭiń reakʼ mitʼ hạṭiń jiwiyanko doko gocʼena, ar pe hạṭiń reakʼ mitʼ hạṭiń jahajko do bhaṅla bhaṭ cabayena.
Tayomte tesaricʼ serma goḍet hõ siṅgại oroṅkeda. Unre maraṅ okocʼ mitʼṭen ipil do diuhe leka jolokʼte serma khone ńurhạyena.

Uni ipilakʼ ńutum do Nagodana tahẽkana. Uni ipil do pe hạṭiń reakʼ mitʼ hạṭiń gaḍa ar dakʼ jharnakoreye ńurhạyena. Onate pe hạṭiń reakʼ mitʼ hạṭiń dakʼ do haṛhatʼena ar haṛhatʼ dakʼ iạte ạḍi utạr hoṛ doko gocʼena.

Inạ tayom ponicʼ serma goḍet hõ acʼakʼ siṅgại oroṅkeda. Onate siń cando reakʼ pe hạṭiń reakʼ mitʼ hạṭiń, ńindạ cando reakʼ pe hạṭiń reakʼ mitʼ hạṭiń ar ipilko reakʼ pe hạṭiń reakʼ mitʼ hạṭiń do ńutena. Ar din reakʼ pe hạṭiń reakʼ mitʼ hạṭiń ar ńindạ reakʼ pe hạṭiń reakʼ mitʼ hạṭiń do jãhãn marsalge baṅ tahẽlena.

Tayomte sermare mitʼṭen pajhaṛ cẽṛẽ ạḍi coṭte uḍạukʼkaniń ńelkedea, uni pajhaṛ do ãṭ aṛaṅte roroṛkaniń ańjomkedea, “Eṭakʼ okoe pea serma goḍet siṅgạko oroṅ lạgidokʼkan tahẽkan, onkoakʼ siṅgạ saḍelen khange dhạrtire tahenkanko lạgitʼ do hae hae.”
Ona tayom mõṛẽyicʼ serma goḍet siṅgại oroṅkeda, ar unre mitʼṭen ipiliń ńel ńamkedea. Uni do serma khon dhạrtiteye ńurhạ akan tahẽkana. Ar uni ipil do athan kunḍ reakʼ choṛane emocoyena.
Khan uni ipil do ona athan kunḍe jhicʼkeda; ar maraṅ okocʼ culhạ khon dhũạ oḍokokʼ leka, ona kunḍ khon dhũạ oḍokokʼ ehopʼena. Ona kunḍ reakʼ dhũạte siń cando ar serma do ńutena,
ar ona dhũạ khon ạḍi utạr pohoko dhạrtiteko oḍok hecʼena. Onko do dhạrtiren kidiń kaṭkom leka ektiạriko emocoyena.
Arko menocoyena dhạrti reakʼ ghãs se hạriạṛ jãhãnakʼ se jãhãn dareko alo jemonko nosṭoe; eken okoe hoṛkoakʼ moloṅre Isorakʼ mohor chap bạnukʼtako onkoko hạnko.
Noko hoṛko gocʼko reakʼ jãhãn ektiạri do bako emocolena, menkhan mõṛẽ cando hạbicʼ saset emako reakʼ ektiạriko emocoyena. Kidiń kaṭkomkoko totoṛre cetʼleka hasoa, onkage noko pohoko hõko haso ocoa.
Unre hoṛko do gujukʼko ńam baṛaea, menkhan okalekatege bako ńama; onko do gujukʼko khoja, menkhan gujukʼ do onko khone ńir pharakokʼa.
Onko pohoko do ńelokʼte lạṛhại sapṛao akatʼko sadom leka. Onkoakʼ bohokʼre sona reakʼ mukuṭ lekanakʼ jinis tahẽkana, ar onkoakʼ mẽtʼãhã reakʼ rup do manwa leka tahẽkana.
Onkoakʼ upʼ do maejiukoakʼ upʼ leka ar ḍaṭa do dhạcri kulakʼ ḍaṭa leka.
Onkoakʼ koṛamre mẽṛhẽtʼ reakʼ aḍonakʼ leka kicricʼ tahẽkana. Ar ạḍi utạr sadomko lạṛhại gạḍiko kamsao idiyetʼ reakʼ sabad leka, onkoakʼ phạ̃kṛạ̃kʼ reakʼ sabad hõ tahẽkana.
Onkoakʼ canḍbol ar suṅgạ do kidiń kaṭkomakʼ canḍbol ar suṅgạ leka tahẽkana. Mõṛẽ cando hạbicʼ hoṛko hạnko reakʼ ektiạri onkoakʼ canḍbolre tahẽkana.
Ar athan kunḍren goḍetge noko pohokoren raje tahẽkana. Ibri pạrsite uni goḍetakʼ ńutum do tahẽkana Abaddon, ar Greek pạrsite do Appoluon, metakʼme ḍahao maraoicʼ.
Pạhilakʼ muskilakʼ do parom calaoena. Ar ńelme, noa tayom do arhõ barea muskilakʼ hijukʼkana.

Ona tayom turuyicʼ serma goḍet do acʼakʼ siṅgại oroṅkeda. Ar Isor samaṅre okaṭakʼ sona reakʼ pinḍ menakʼ ona pinḍ reakʼ ponea dereń khon mitʼṭen hoṛ do katha roroṛiń ańjomkedea. Okoe ṭhen siṅgạ tahẽkan, uni turuyicʼ serma goḍete metadea,
“Okoe ponea goḍet maraṅ gaḍa Phurạt ṭhenko tolakan onko raṛakakome.”
Unre onko ponea goḍet doko raṛa ocoyena. Niạ bochor reakʼ niạ cando, niạ din ar niạ ghonṭa lạgitʼ onko goḍet doko sapṛao doho ocoakan tahẽkana jemon onko do pe hạṭiń reakʼ mitʼ hạṭiń manwako gocʼko.
Ar tayomteń ańjomkeda, sadomre decʼakan palṭonko do lekhare gel hajar gun gel hajar reakʼ dobṛa tahẽkana.

Dorsonte sadomko ar onko cetanre decʼakanko onkoakʼ koṛam reakʼ aḍonakʼ do seṅgel leka arakʼ, lil ar gondhok leka sasaṅ iń ńelketʼtakoa. Sadomkoakʼ bohokʼ do dhạcri kulakʼ bohokʼ leka ar onkoakʼ moca khon do seṅgel, dhũạ ar gondhok oḍokokʼkan tahẽkana.
Seṅgel, dhũạ ar gondhok, noa pea dukte manwa do pe hạṭiń reakʼ mitʼ hạṭińko gocʼ ocoyena.
Onko sadomkoakʼ do moca ar canḍbolrege daṛe tahẽkana, ente onkoakʼ canḍbol do biń leka tahẽkana. Onko do canḍbolko reakʼ agalte manwakoko hạnetʼko kan tahẽkana.

Menkhan noako duk tayom hõ okoeko manwa jiwetʼko tahẽyen, onko do apnar tite benao muṭhạnko khon mon bako ạcurletʼtakoa. Onko do bạṛicʼ jiuko ar baṅ ńeńelko, baṅ ańjomko, baṅ taṛam daṛeakʼ sona, rupạ, pitạl, dhiri ar kaṭren muṭhạnko benaokateko sewawakokan tahẽkana.
Ona chaḍa khũn, jạdu, laṭghaṭ ar kombṛo, noako khon hõ mon bako ạcurleda.

Ona tayom ar mitʼṭen daṛeanicʼ serma goḍet serma khon pheḍ hijukʼ kaniń ńelkedea. Uni do rimilte oyo akan, ar bohokʼre do liṭạ akʼ tahẽkantaea. Uniakʼ mẽtʼãhã do siń cando leka ar jaṅga do seṅgel reakʼ khũnṭi leka tahẽkana.
Ar eae goṭecʼ huḍur saḍeyen khan iń do olokʼ lạgitʼ iń sapṛaoena. Menkhan serma khon noa kathań men ocoyena, “Eae goṭecʼ huḍur oka kathae menketʼ ona do okoge dohokakʼme, alom ola.”
Okoeṭakʼ serma goḍet do jalapuri ar otre teṅgo akaniń ńellede uni do acʼakʼ jojomti serma secʼe tulkeda.
Ar jaejug hạbicʼ jiwetʼ menae serma, ot, jalapuri ar onakore menakʼ sanamakʼe sirjạuakatʼ, uniakʼ ńutumte kiriyạkate uni serma goḍet doe menkeda, “Ar baṅ bilomokʼa.
Menkhan eaeyicʼ serma goḍetakʼ siṅgạ oroṅ dinkore Isorakʼ okoakʼ monsubạko do purạukʼa. Ar Isor do acʼren gutiko ṭhen, metakʼme nạbiko ṭhen okae baḍae ocoletʼ ṭhik onkage hoyokʼa.”
Okoe serma khon katha roroṛiń ańjomlede, uni do arhõe metadińạ, “Okoeṭakʼ serma goḍet jalapuri ar otreye teṅgo akan, uni ṭhen senkate uniakʼ ti khon oṭakʼ akatʼ puthi hataome.”

Unre iń do serma goḍet ṭhen senkate ona puthi imạń lạgitʼ iń metadea. Uni doe metadińạ, “Noa hataokate jom gotʼkakʼme. Noa do amakʼ lacʼe haṛhatʼ ocoetama, menkhan amakʼ mocare do dumur rasa leka heṛemem ạikạua.”
Unre serma goḍetakʼ ti khon ona huḍiń puthi hataokateń jom gotʼkada. Ar mocare do dumur rasa lekań ạikạukeda, menkhaniń jomketʼ khan lacʼ do haṛhatʼentińạ.
Ona tayom noa kathań menocoyena, “Am do arhõ ạḍi utạr disạmko, jạtko, pạrsiko ar rajko reaṅ nạbi kathako roroṛ hoyokʼtama.”
Ona tayom sosoṅ ṭheṅga lekanakʼ mitʼṭen chuchi ṭheṅga em ocokateń men ocoyena, “Mundil ar pinḍ soṅme ar okoeko onḍe Isorko sewawaekan onko hõ lekhakom.
Menkhan mundil bahrere okaṭakʼ raca menakʼ ona do badkakʼme, alom soṅa, ente ona do boṅgan hoṛ jạtrenkoko em ocoakana. Onko do pongel bar cando hạbicʼ sonot nagrahako lebetʼ gańjaoa.
Menkhan ińren banar gohakin nonkan ektiạriń emakinạ onate unkin do gõṛẽ kicricʼ horokʼkate mitʼ hajar bar sae turui gel din hạbicʼ kin nạbiya.”
Unkin gohakin dokin hoyokʼ kana barea jạitun dare ar barea diuhe dohowakʼ, one okoe do dhạrtiren Probhu samaṅrekin teṅgo akan.
Jãhãe unkin hạnkinko menkhan, enḍekhan unkinakʼ moca khon seṅgel oḍokokʼte bạirikin atar giḍikoa. Okoe unkin hạnkine men uni do onkage gujukʼ hoyokʼtaea.

Nukin hoṛ tinạkʼ din kin nạbiya unạkʼ din jemon aloe dag onate serma siń lạgitʼ ektiạri tahen tạkina. Ar dakʼ mãyãm ocoe ar tinạkʼ dhao sanakin unạkʼ dhao jãhãn dukte dhạrti hạn reakʼ ektiạri hõ tahen tạkina.
Unkinakʼ goha emokʼ sạtlen khan ona athan kunḍ khon mitʼṭen janwar do rakapʼ hecʼkate unkin tulucʼe lạṛhạiya ar unkine bhagaokinteye gocʼkinạ.

Unkinren Probhu oka nagrahareye krus ocolen ona maraṅ nagraha reakʼ horre unkinakʼ mạ̃ṛĩ do giḍi akan tahena. Ona nagraha reakʼ asol ńutum do Sodom ar Misor baṅkanre hõ, enhõ mitʼ lekangete ona nagraha do Sodom ar Misorko metakʼa.
Unre sanam disạmren, jạt jạtren, khuṭren ar pạrsiren hoṛko do pe din tala hạbicʼ unkinakʼ mạ̃ṛĩko beṅgetʼakʼa.

Onko do unkinakʼ mạ̃ṛĩ bako topa ocowakʼa. Ar unkin kin gocʼ akante noa dhạrtirenko doko kusikʼa arko rạskạkʼa. Hoṛko do sandesko kopola, ente okoe doko noa dhạrtiren kan onko do nukin barea nạbi iạte ạḍi ãṭ kosṭoko ńamleda.
Menkhan noa pe din tala tayom Isor emakʼ jion reakʼ sahetʼ do unkinre boloyena. Onate unkin do ạkinakʼ jaṅgatekin teṅgoyena. Unre okoe unkinko ńelketʼkin onko do ạḍiko botorena.
Tayomte unkin gohakin do serma khon ãṭ aṛaṅte noa kathakin ańjomkeda, “Nonḍe rakapʼ hijukʼ ben.” Unre unkin do ạkinren bạirikoakʼ mẽtʼãhã samaṅrege mitʼṭen rimilte sermatekin rakapʼ calaoena.

Unre ạḍi botor dhạrti laṛaoena ar ona nagraha reakʼ gel hạṭiń reakʼ mitʼ hạṭiń do rạputʼ ńurena. Ar ona dhạrti laṛaore eae hajar hoṛko gocʼena. Onate sarecʼko sanamge botor caṛhaoatʼkote sermaren Isorko sarhaokedea.
Nonkate dosarakʼ muhin do cabayena. Ar ńelpe, tesarakʼ muhin do usạrage darae kana.
Tayomte eaeyicʼ serma goḍet do acʼakʼ siṅgại oroṅkeda. Unre sermare ãṭ aṛaṅte roṛena, “Dhạrti reakʼ rajosṭi do ńitokʼ aboren Probhu ar uniren Mạsiakʼ hoyena.
Uni do jaejug hạbicʼe rajokʼa.” Ar okoe bargel pon mukhiyạko Isor samaṅre akoakʼ siṅghạsonreko duṛupʼ akan tahẽkan, onko do ombakʼente Isor sewawadeteko menkeda,
“Sanam daṛeanicʼ Probhu Isor, am do menama arem tahẽkana. Ale do amle sarhaoetʼme kana, ente am do amakʼ maraṅ ektiạrianakʼ tite rajokʼem ehopʼkeda.

Joto jạtkoko raṅgao akana, ar amakʼ edre sodorokʼ reakʼ ghuṛi hõ seṭer akana, ar amren golamko, metakʼme nạbiko ar amren hoṛko ar kạṭicʼ lạṭu jotokoge okoe amko bhoktiamkan onko kuṛại emako reakʼ okte hõ seṭer akana. Ona chaḍa okoe dhạrtiko hạn akatʼ, onko ḍahao maraoko reakʼ okte hõ seṭer akana.”
Ona tayom serma reakʼ mundil do jhicʼena ar onḍe Isorakʼ bondobos reakʼ sunduk ńel ńamena. Unre bijli malkaokʼ ar botor saḍe ar huḍur ar dhạrti laṛao ar ạḍi bạṛicʼ arel ńurokʼ ehopʼena.

Tayomte sermare mitʼṭen maraṅ cinhạ ńelena; mitʼṭen maejiu, one okoe do siń candoteye oyo akan ar uniakʼ jaṅga latare do ńindạ candoe tahẽkan. Uniakʼ bohokʼre do gelbar goṭecʼ ipilte gathao akatʼ mitʼṭen mukuṭ tahẽkana.
Uni do bhạrti hoṛmoe tahẽkana ar hasoteye kikiạukʼkan tahẽkana.
Ona tayom sermare armitʼṭen cinhạ ńelena; seṅgel leka maraṅ okocʼ mitʼṭen arakʼ bińge. Uniakʼ do eae goṭecʼ bohokʼ ar gel goṭecʼ dereń ar bohokʼre eae goṭecʼ mukuṭ tahẽkana.

Uni do acʼakʼ canḍbolte sermaren pe hạṭiń reakʼ mitʼ hạṭiń ipilkoe or ạguketʼkote dhạrtiteye lebda giḍikatʼkoa. Ar okoe maejiuren gidrại hoy lạgidokʼkan tahẽkan uni samaṅre biń doe teṅgoyena jemom gidrại janam lekhangeye utʼgotʼkae.
Ar maejiuren do mitʼṭen koṛa gidrại hoyena. Uni gidrạge mẽṛhẽtʼ reakʼ ṭheṅgate sanam jạtrenkoe ḍanṭaokoa. Uni Hopon do Isor ar uniakʼ siṅghạson ṭhene rakapʼ idi ocoyena,
uni maejiu do hahaṅkarteye dạṛkeda. Isor do ona hahaṅkar jaegare uni lạgitʼ mitʼṭen jaegae ṭhik dohoakatʼ tahẽkana, jemon mitʼ hajar barsae turui gel din onḍeye ạsul ocokʼ.
Ona tayom sermare lạṛhại hoyena. Mikạel ar uniren goḍetko do uni biń tulucʼko lạṛhạiyena ar uni bińren goḍetko hõ.
Biń do bae daṛelena ar sermare onko do ar bako tahẽ ocowatʼkoa.

Unre uni maraṅ okocʼ biń ar uniren soṅgeten goḍetko do dhạrtiteko lebda ńur ocoyena. Nui biń doe hoyokʼ kana uni mare bińge okoe do Diabol Soetanko metaekan. Uni do dhạrtiren sanam hoṛko bhul horteye idiyetʼkoa.

Ona tayom iń do serma khon ãṭ aṛaṅte mitʼ hoṛ roroṛkaniń ańjomkedea, “Ńitokʼ do babańcao, daṛe ar aboren Isorakʼ rajosṭi ar uniren ojokʼicʼakʼ ektiạri hoeakana, ente okoe aboren boehakoe dusiyetʼko tahẽkan uni do serma khone lebda ńur ocoakana. Aboren Isor samaṅre siń ńindạ uni do onkoakʼ doskoe udukʼetʼ tahẽkana.
Bheḍa Hoponakʼ mãyãm ar apnarakʼ gohate onko do uniko bhagao akadea. Onko do apnar dulạṛ baṅkate akoakʼ jiwi emokʼge rạjiko tahẽkana.

“Onate E serma, hulạsokʼme; ar ape okoe do onḍepe tahenkan, hulạsokʼpe. Menkhan dhạrti ar jalapuri abenre do hae hae, ente Soetan do aben cetanreye pheḍ hecʼakana. Soetan do raṅgaoteye phulạu akana, enteye baḍaea uniakʼ do ḍher somoe bạnukʼtaea.”
Ado uni biń tinreye ńelkeda je, acʼ do dhạrtiteye lebda ńur ocoakana unre okoe maejiuren koṛa gidrại hoelentae uni tayomreye lagaoena.

Unre uni maejiu do maraṅ okocʼ mitʼṭen pajhaṛakʼ barea phạ̃krạ̃kʼe emocoyena jemon hahaṅkarte acʼakʼ jaegateye uḍạu calao daṛeakʼ. Ar onḍe uni do bińakʼ mẽtʼãhã samaṅ khon danaṅre pe bochor tala hạbicʼe ạsul ocokʼa.
Unre uni biń do maejiue ạtu gotʼkae lạgitʼ acʼakʼ moca khon gaḍa dakʼ leka dakʼe ạtu oḍok ocokeda,
menkhan dhạrti do uni maejiue goṛowadea. Ar uni biń do moca khon oka dakʼe oḍok ocoketʼ ona do dhạrti acʼakʼ mocae jhicʼketʼteye ańjetʼgotʼkada.

Noa tayom iń do mitʼṭen janwar jalapuri khon rakapʼ hijukʼ kaniń ńelkedea. Uniakʼ do gel goṭecʼ dereń ar eae goṭecʼ bohokʼ tahẽkantaea. Ona dereńko cetanre gel goṭecʼ mukuṭ tahẽkana ar bohokʼko cetanre Isor bemanote reakʼ aema ńutum ol tahẽkana.
Uni janwar do ńelokʼte citạ tạrupʼ lekae tahẽkana ar jaṅgako do banawakʼ leka ar moca do dhạcri kulakʼ moca leka tahẽkantaea. Ar biń do acʼakʼ daṛe, siṅghạson ar maraṅ ektiạri uni janware emadea.
Uniakʼ bohokʼko modre mitʼ goṭen do gujukʼ dạkhil ghạl akantae tahẽkana, menkhan ona ghạl do bogeyentaea. Onate dhạrtiren sanam hoṛko hahaṛakʼ tulucʼ uni janwarko pańja idikedea.
Biń do uni janwar ektiạriye emade tahẽkante hoṛko do uni biń Isor lekako sewawadea ar janwar hõ onkage sewawadeteko menkeda, “Nũi janwar leka cele menakʼkoa? Ar okoe baṅ uni sãoteye lạṛhại daṛeke?”
Uni janwar do sarhaokʼ lạgitʼ ar Isor bemanote lạgitʼ daṛeye emocoyena. Ar pongel bar cando hạbicʼ acʼakʼ ektiạri jemone khaṭao daṛeakʼ ona lạgitʼ hukume em ocoyena.
Unre uni janwar do Isor birudre, uniakʼ ńutum reakʼ ar uniakʼ tahen jaega birudre ar sermare tahenkanko birudre ạḍi bemanot kathako roroṛe ehopʼena.
Isorren hoṛko lạṛhạikate bhagaoko reakʼ ektiạriye emocoyena ar mitʼke mitʼ bõsren, disạmren, pạrsiren ar jạtren hoṛko cetanre hõ ektiạriye emocoyena.
Okoe doko noa dhạrtirenkan, metakʼme dhạrti rehetʼ khon gocʼ ocolen Bheḍa Hoponakʼ jion puthire okoekoakʼ ńutum ol bạnukʼtako onko sanamko do Isor leka uniko sewawaea.
Ańjom lạgitʼ lutur menakʼtayicʼ do sostor reakʼ noako kathae ańjomma.
Okoe kạidi hoyokʼ reakʼ katha menakʼtae uni do kạidiye hoyokʼa. Okoe tarwaṛeteye gogocʼ uni do tarwaṛetegeye khũn ocokʼa. Onate Isorren hoṛko do sombhuri ar pạtiạu reakʼ jạruṛ menakʼtakoa.
Noa tayom iń do ot khon ar mitʼṭen janwar rakapʼ hijukʼkaniń ńelkedea. Uniakʼ do bheḍa leka barea dereń tahẽkantaea, menkhan uni do biń leka kathae roṛetʼkan tahẽkana.
Nui janwar do pạhilicʼ janwar reakʼ joto ektiạri calaoe ehopʼena; ar okoe doko noa dhạrtiren kan onko hotete uni pạhilicʼ janwar, metakʼme okoeakʼ ghạl boge akantae uni do Isor menteko sewawadea.
Uni do maraṅ maraṅ hahaṛa kạmikoe ehopʼkeda, ar hoṛko samaṅre serma khon dhạrtite seṅgele pheḍ ạgukeda.

Ar okako hahaṛa kạmi lạgitʼ ektiạriye emocolen onako kạmikate hoṛko bhul horte idikoe ehopʼkeda. Ar Pạhilicʼ janwar okoe do tarwaṛeteye ghạl ocolenre hõ jiwetʼe tahẽkan, uni dosaricʼ janwar do hoṛkoe metatʼkoa jemon onko do uniakʼ muṭhạnko benaotae.
Ar uni do ona muṭhạnre jiwi emokʼ reakʼ daṛe hõe emocoyena, jemon muṭhạn do kathae roṛ daṛeakʼ ar okoe ona muṭhạn bako sewawakʼ onko doko gocʼ ocokʼa.
Uni do kạṭicʼ lạṭu, reṅgecʼ kisạ̃ṛ, sạdhinko ar golamko, sanamko jojom tire baṅkhan moloṅre mitʼṭen cinhại hatao ocoketʼkoa.
Onate ona cinhạ metakʼme uniakʼ ńutum se cinhạ chaḍa okoe hõ cetʼge bako kiriń ạkriń daṛeada. Ona cinhạ do hoyokʼ kana uni janwarakʼ ńutum se uniakʼ ńutum reakʼ lekha.

Noako bujhạu do bud reakʼ jạruṛ menakʼa. Okoeakʼ bud menakʼ uni do janwarakʼ lekhae hisạbma, ente ona do mitʼṭen manwawakʼ ńutum reakʼ lekha kana. Ar ona lekha do hoyokʼ kana turui sae turui gel turui.
Ona tayom iń ńelkeda, Bheḍa Hopon do Sion buru coṭreye teṅgo akana. Uni soṅgere mitʼ sae pongel pon hajar hoṛ menakʼkoa. Onkoakʼ cạndire do Bheḍa Hoponakʼ ar uniren Babawakʼ ńutum ol menakʼa.
Ona tayom serma khon had had ạtu calakʼkan ar huḍur reakʼ sạḍeń ańjomkeda. Ar okaṭakʼ saḍeń ańjomketʼ ona do peṛesaṅ banamko phetʼetʼkan lekań ańjomkeda.

Ona siṅghạson ar onko ponea jiwiyanko ar onko mukhiyạko samaṅre onko do mitʼṭen nawa sereńko sereńkeda. Menkhan okoe hõ ona sereń do bako cetʼdaṛeada; eken onko mitʼ sae pongel pon hajar hoṛko cetʼdaṛeada okoe do dhạrtiren hoṛko khonko kiriń ocolen.

Noko do onko hoṛ kanako, one okoe do maejiuko tulucʼ bako laṭghaṭ akatʼte saphage menakʼko. Ar jãhã secʼge Bheḍa Hopone calakʼ onko hõ uni tayomteko calakʼa. Isor ar Bheḍa Hopon ṭhen pạhil jo lekate dãṛẽ lạgitʼ hoṛko mod khon onko doko kiriń akan tahẽkana.
Onko do tis hõ eṛe katha do bako roṛ akada, ar onko modre jãhãn dosge baṅ ńam akana.

Ona tayom iń do arhõ mitʼṭen serma goḍet coṭ sermare uḍạukʼkaniń ńelkedea. Dhạrtiren tahenkan hoṛko ṭhen metakʼme mimitʼ jạtren, bõsren, pạrsiren, ar disạmren hoṛko ṭhen porcar lạgitʼ uni ṭhen jaejug hạbicʼ reakʼ bhage sombat tahẽkana.

Uni do ãṭ aṛaṅte noa kathae menetʼ tahẽkana, “Isor botoraepe ar uni sarhaoepe, ente bicạr reakʼ okte do seṭer akana. Okoe dhạrti, serma, jalapuri, doreão ar jharna dakʼkoe sirjạu akatʼ uni sewawaepe.”

Tayomte dosaricʼ ar mitʼṭen serma goḍet do uni tayom tayomte hecʼkateye menkeda, “Ona Babel nagraha do ḍahao maraoena. Okaṭakʼ nagraha do acʼakʼ loṭghuṭi reakʼ botoranakʼ bubulakʼ sanam jạtkoe ńu ocoletʼko ona naṅgrha do ḍahao marao akana.”
Inạ tayom tesaricʼ ar mitʼṭen serma goḍet do onko tayom tayomte hecʼkate ãṭ aṛaṅteye menkeda, “Jãhãege uni janwar ar uniakʼ muṭhạne sewawakʼ ar uniakʼ cinhạ cạndire se tireye hatao,

enḍekhan uni do Isorakʼ edre reakʼ bubulakʼ ńũńũi hoyokʼtaea. Ar noa bubulakʼ sãote dakʼ baṅ mesal akatʼ Isorakʼ edre reakʼ bạṭire dul akana. Sonot sermaren goḍetko ar Bheḍa Hopon samaṅre seṅgel ar gondhokte uni hoṛ doe saset ocokʼa.

Okaṭakʼ seṅgel noko hoṛkoe sasetko ona seṅgel reakʼ dhũạ do jaejug hạbicʼ rakabokʼtege tahena. Okoe hoṛ uni janwar ar uniakʼ muṭhạne sewawakʼ ar uniakʼ ńutum reakʼ cinhại dohojoṅ uni do sińke ńindạ tishõ jirạu bae ńama.”
