Okoe Isorakʼ hukumko manaoetʼ ar Jisure pạtiạrko tahenkan Isorren onko hoṛge noa halotre sombhuri tahen jạruṛtakoa.

Ona tayom iń do serma khon mitʼ hoṛ roroṛkaniń ańjomkedea, “Noa katha olme; ńit khon okoe do Probhu tulucʼ kolom mitʼkateko gujukʼkan onko do bhạganko kanako.” Sonot Jiu do noa kathae meneda, “Hẽ, onko doko bhạgangea. Onkoakʼ mehnot khon onko do jirạuko ńama, ente onkoakʼ kạmi reakʼ kuṛại do ako soṅgere tahena.”
Tayomte iń do mitʼṭen ponḍ rimiliń ńelkeda, ar ona rimilre manwa Hopon leka mitʼ hoṛe duṛupʼ akan tahẽkana. Uniakʼ bohokʼre do jitạukʼ reakʼ sona mukuṭ ar tire do laser datrom tahẽkana.

Ona tayom mitʼṭen serma goḍet mundil oṛakʼ khone oḍok hecʼena ar okoe ona rimilreye duṛupʼ akan tahẽkan uni ãṭ aṛaṅteye metadea, “Amakʼ datrom calaotam, phosol gedme, ente phosol samṭao reakʼ okte do hoeakana; ar dhạrti reakʼ phosol do purạte bele akana.”
Unre okoe ona rimilreye duṛupʼ akan tahẽkan uni do dhạrtire acʼakʼ datrome calaokeda ar dhạrti reakʼ phosol do getʼ hoyena.
Tayomte serma reakʼ mundil khon ar mitʼṭen serma goḍete oḍok hecʼena. Ar uniakʼ tire hõ mitʼṭen laser datrom tahẽkana.

Ona tayom pinḍ khon ar mitʼṭen serma goḍete oḍok hecʼena. Uni do seṅgel cetanre ektiạri tahẽkantaea. Ar okoe serma goḍet ṭhen laser datrom tahẽkan uni serma goḍet do ãṭ aṛaṅte hohoadeteye metadea, “Amakʼ laser datrom calaotam ar dhạrti reakʼ darkha nạ̃ṛĩ khon darkha thoka gedme, ente darkha jo do bele akana.”

Unre uni serma goḍet do dhạrtire acʼakʼ datrome calaokeda ar dhạti reakʼ darkha nạ̃ṛĩ khon joto darkha jo getʼkateye jarwakeda. Ar tayomte onako do darkha lelen kunḍreye bhoraokeda. Noa darkha jo roḍocʼ reakʼ kunḍ do Isorakʼ botoranakʼ edre kana.
Ado nagraha bahrere darkha lelen kunḍre darkha jo len hoyen khan ona khon mãyãm oḍokena ar sadomkoakʼ jhin hạbicʼ rakapʼena. Onate pe sae mail hạbicʼ mãyãm do ạtu oḍokena.

Tayomte iń do sermare ar mitʼṭen maraṅ ar hahaṛa cinhạń ńelkeda. Ona do eae goṭen serma goḍet ar onkoakʼ tire mucạtʼ eae goṭecʼ sạjại kana. Noako do mucạtʼ sạjại ńumogokʼ kana, ente noakote Isorakʼ edre do cabakʼa.

Ona tayom iń do seṅgel mesal akatʼ mitʼṭen kãc reakʼ jalapuri lekań ńelkeda. Okoe uni janwar ar uniakʼ muṭhạn ar uniakʼ ńutum reakʼ lekha cetanreko jitạu akan onko hõń ńelketʼkoa. Isorakʼ peṛesaṅ tire sepeńkate onko do ona kãc reakʼ jalapuri aṛereko teṅgo akan tahẽkana.

Onko do Isorren golam Mose ar uni Bheḍa Hoponakʼ noa sereńko sereńetʼ tahẽkana: “Sanam daṛean Probhu Isor, tinạkʼ maraṅ ar hahaṛagea amakʼ kạmiko do! E sanam jạtren raj, tinạkʼ dhorom ar sạriakʼgea amakʼ horko do!

E Probhu okoe baṅ am do bae botoram? Ar okoe baṅ amakʼ ńutum bae sarhaotam? Eken amge coṅ sonoticʼ ma. Sanam jạtrenko do am ṭhenko hijukʼa, ar jotoge amko sewawama; ente amakʼ dhorom bicạr do sodor akana.”
Noa tayom iń doń ńelkeda, serma reakʼ ona mundil, metakʼme goha tạmbu do jhicʼena.
Unre onko eae goṭen serma goḍet do eae goṭecʼ sạjạiante mundil khonko oḍok hecʼena. Onko do sapha jhak jhak kicricʼko horokʼ akatʼ tahẽkana ar koṛam do sona reakʼ pạṭkạteko tol ạcurakan tahẽkana.
Onko ponea jiwiyankoren mitʼṭen do onko eae goṭen serma goḍetko eae goṭecʼ bạṭiye ematʼkoa. Ar Isor, okoe do jug jug khon jaejug hạbicʼ jiwetʼ menae, uniakʼ edrete onako bạṭi do perecʼ akan tahẽkana.

Isorakʼ mạhima ar daṛe khon okaṭakʼ dhũạ oḍokokʼkan tahẽkan ona dhũạte mundil oṛakʼ do perecʼena. Onko eae goṭen serma goḍetkoakʼ eae goṭecʼ sạjại ạuri cabakʼ hạbicʼ okoe hõ ona mundilre do bako bolo daṛeada.
Inạ tayom iń doń ańjomkeda, ona mundil khon onko eae goṭen serma goḍetko do mitʼ hoṛ ãṭ aṛaṅteye metako kana, “Ape do senkate Isorakʼ edrete perecʼ eae goṭecʼ bạṭi dhạrtire dulpe.”

Unre pạhilicʼ serma goḍet do senkate acʼakʼ bạṭi dhạrtireye dulkeda. Onate okoere uni janwarakʼ cinhạ tahẽkan ar okoe do uniakʼ muṭhạnko sewawakʼkan tahẽkan onkoakʼ hoṛmore ạḍi bạṛicʼ ar dạrun ghao ńamketʼkoa.
Dosaricʼ serma goḍet do acʼakʼ bạṭi jalapurireye dulkeda. Unre jalapuri reakʼ dakʼ do gocʼ hoṛkoakʼ mãyãm leka hoyena ar jalapuriren sanam jiwiyanko doko gocʼena.
Tayomte tesaricʼ serma goḍet do gaḍa dakʼ ar jharna dakʼ kore acʼakʼ bạṭiye dulkeda. Onate onako do mãyãm reakʼ gaḍa ar dakʼ jharnako hoyena.
Ar dakʼ cetanre okoeṭakʼ serma goḍetakʼ ektiạri tahẽkantae uni do noa katha roroṛiń ańjomkedea: “E sonoticʼ, am do menamgea arem tahẽkana. Am dom dhoromgea, ente am do noako sạjạiyem emakana.
Noko hoṛko do Isorren hoṛko ar nạbikoko khũnakatʼkoa. Onate am do onko noa mãyãm ńũi lạgitʼem emakatʼkoa ar noage onko lạgitʼ do lek kana.”
Iń do pinḍ khon mitʼ hoṛ noa katha roroṛiń ańjomkedea: “Sanam daṛeạnicʼ Probhu Isor, amakʼ sanam bicạrko do sạrigea ar dhoromte perecʼgea.”
Ponicʼ serma goḍet do siń cando cetanre acʼakʼ bạṭiye dulkeda. Onate siń cando do hoṛko seṅgelte jhạusạuko lạgitʼ ektiạriye emocoyena.
Unre ãṭ elaṅte hoṛko loyena, ar noako sạjại cetanre okoeakʼ ektiạri menakʼtako onko do uni Isorko henostawadea. Menkhan onko do enrehõ mon bako ạcurleda ar Isor bako sabasiwadea.
Ona tayom turuyicʼ serma goḍet do maraṅ gaḍa Phurạtre acʼakʼ bạṭi reakʼe dulkeda. Onate purub disạmren rapajkoakʼ calakʼ hor tearokʼ lạgitʼ ona gaḍa reakʼ dakʼ do ańjetʼena.
Unre iń do roṭe lekan pea bạṛicʼ jiu iń ńelketʼkoa. Onko do uni biń, uni janwar ar uni eṛe nạbiakʼ moca khonko oḍok hijukʼkan tahẽkana.
Onko bạṛicʼ jiu do hahaṛa kạmiko kạmikan tahẽkana. Ar sanam daṛean Isorakʼ ona maraṅ dinre lạṛhại lạgitʼ onko do goṭa dhạrtiren rapajko mitʼ ṭhenko jarwaketʼkoa.

Jisui meneda, “Ńelme, iń do kombṛo lekań hijukʼa. Bhạgangeae uni hoṛ, one okoe do jagware tahenkan ar acʼakʼ kicricʼkoe jogao dohoyetʼ, jemon laṅgaṭ alaoe dãṛãn ar hoṛko hõ uniakʼ lajaotetʼ aloko ńeltae.”
Ibri pạrsite oka jaega reakʼ ńutum do Harmagedonko metakʼkan, bạṛicʼ jiuko do onko rapajko onḍeko jarwaketʼkoa.
Ar eaeyicʼ goḍet do acʼakʼ bạṭi reakʼ hoe secʼe dulkeda. Unre mundil reakʼ siṅghạson khon ãṭ aṛaṅte noa katha roṛena, “Oka hoyokʼ reakʼ ona do hoyena.”
Unre bijli malkaokʼ lagaoena, ạḍi botor saḍe ar huḍurko hoyena, ar ạḍi ãṭ dhạrti laṛaoena, one dhạrtire manwa sirjạu tayom ar tisge baṅ hoeakan. Ar ona dhạrti laṛao do ạḍi botorge tahẽkana.

Ar ona maraṅ nagraha do pe hạṭińte hạṭińena ar jạt jạtrenkoakʼ nagrahako do lạnduṛena. Tayomte ona maraṅ nagraha Babel reakʼ katha Isor do disạ hecʼadea, uni do acʼakʼ edre reakʼ botoranakʼ bubulakʼte perecʼ bạṭi reakʼ ńũi lạgitʼ Babele emadea.
Unre mitʼke mitʼ dip do ńir pharakena ar buruko do ar baṅ ńel ńamlena.

Serma khon lạṭu lạtu dhiri lekan arel manwako cetanre ńurokʼ ehopʼena. Ona mitʼke mitʼ reakʼ hamal do mitʼ mongan tahẽkana. Noa arel reakʼ sạjạite hoṛko do Isorko henostawadea, ente ona arel reakʼ sạjại do ạḍi botorge tahẽkana.
Okoe eae goṭen serma goḍetkoakʼ tire eae goṭecʼ bạṭi tahẽkan onko modren mitʼ hoṛ do hecʼkateye metadińạ, “Dela hijukʼme, aema dakʼ cetanre okoe kusmbiye duṛupʼakan uniakʼ sạjạiyiń udukʼama.
Dhạrtiren rapajko do uni tulucʼko loṭghuṭileda, ar okoe doko noa dhạrtirenkan onko do uniakʼ loṭghuṭi reakʼ darkha rasateko ńũ bulakan tahẽkana.”

Ona tayom uni serma goḍet do hahaṅkar jaegateye idikedeńạ. Unre iń do sonot Jiuakʼ ạyurreń tahẽkana. Onḍe mitʼṭen maejiu do mitʼṭen jeṅgetʼ arakʼ janwarre duṛupʼ akaniń ńelkedea. Ar Isor nindạwae reakʼ ạḍi utạr ńutum uni janwarre ol tahẽkana. Uniakʼ do eae goṭecʼ bohokʼ ar gel goṭecʼ dereń tahẽkantaea.

Uni maejiu do beguni roṅakʼ kicricʼe horokʼ akatʼ tahẽkana ar hoṛmore do sona ar damanakʼ dhiri ar muti mạnikte abhran tahẽkantaea. Uniakʼ tire do hirkhạwakʼte perecʼ ar acʼakʼ loṭghuṭi ar besaphate perecʼ sona reakʼ bạṭi tahẽkana.
Uniakʼ moloṅre nonkan ńutum ol tahẽkana one ona reaṅ mitʼṭen okoakʼ menakʼ. Ona ńutum do kana, “Maraṅ Babel, kusmbiko ar dhạrti reakʼ joto hirkhạwakʼkoren eṅgat.”
Ariń ńelkedea, uni maejiu do Isorren hoṛkoakʼ mãyãm ar okoe do Jisu reaṅ gohako emakatʼ onkoakʼ mãyãm ńũteye bul akana.

Uni ńelte iń do ạḍi ãṭiń hahaṛayena. Unre uni serma goḍet doe metadińạ, “Am do cedakʼem hahaṛakʼ kana? Maejiuakʼ ar okoe do uniye asen baṛayede kan uni janwarakʼ okoakʼ reakʼ bhediń bujhạuam kana. Nui doe uni janwar kana one okoeakʼ do eae goṭecʼ bohokʼ ar gel goṭecʼ dereń tahẽkantae.

Ar okoe janwarem ńellede uni do lahateye tahẽkana, menkhan ńitokʼ do bạnuya. Tayomte ona athan kunḍ khon rakapʼ hecʼkate uni do jaejug hạbicʼ sạjạiye joma. Unre okoe doko noa dhạrtirenkan, metakʼme dhạrti sirjạu jokhecʼ khon okoekoakʼ ńutum do jion reakʼ puthire ol bạnukʼtako onko do uni janwar ńelteko hahaṛakʼa; ente janwar do pạhile tahẽkana, ńitokʼ do bạnuya, menkhan arhõe ńel ocokʼa.

“Ńitokʼ oka lạiyạgokʼ ona bujhạu lạgitʼ do buj jạruṛa. Ona eae goṭen bohokʼ do hoyokʼ kana, eae goṭecʼ buru one onakore uni maejiu doe duṛupʼ akan. Ona eae goṭen bohokʼko do arhõ eae goṭen rapaj hõ kanako.
Onko rapajko modre mõṛẽ goṭen do laharegeko ńur akana, ar mitʼ hoṛ do ńit hõ menaegea ar eṭakʼicʼ do ńit hõ bae hecʼakana. Ar uni raje hecʼlen khan uni do thoṛa din hạbicʼ tahentege hoyokʼtaea.
Okoeṭakʼ janwar do pạhilreye tahẽkan, menkhan ńitokʼ bạnui uni do onko eae goṭen modrenkanre hõe uni doe irạlicʼ raj kana; ar jaejug hạbicʼ sạjạiye joma.
“Oka gel goṭen bohokʼem ńelakat̕ onako do gel goṭen rapajko kanako. Onko do ńit hõ rajosṭi bako ńam akada, menkhan onko do uni janwar tulucʼ mitʼ ghuṛi lạgitʼ rapajko lekate ektiạriko ńama.
Noko rajkoakʼ monsubạ do mitʼgea, ar onko do jotoge akoakʼ daṛe ar ektiạri uni janwarko emaea.

Onko do Bheḍa Hopon birudreko lạṛhạiya ar Bheḍa Hopon do onkoe bhagaokoa, ente uni do Probhukoren Probhu ar raj koren raj kanae. Ar okoeko hoho ocoakan arko bachao ocoakan ar okoe doko pạtiạrkokan onkoge uni tulucʼko tahena.”
Ona tayom uni serma goḍete metadińạ, “Am do oka dakʼem ńelketʼ, okare uni kusmbiye duṛupʼakan, ona do ạḍi utạr disạm kana, ạḍi utạr hoṛ kanako, ạḍi utạr jạt ar ạḍi utạr pạrsiko kana.
Ar oka gel goṭen dereńem ńelketʼ onako ar uni janwar do uni kusmbiko hirkhạwaea. Onko do uniko maraoe giḍiyea arko uluṅea ar uniakʼ jelko joma; ona tayom uni do seṅgelreko rapakʼ giḍikaea.

Noa reakʼ karon do kana, Isor do onkoakʼ monre nonkan monejoṅakʼe emakatʼkoa jemon uniakʼ katha purạukʼtae. Onate onko do mitʼ monte uni janwar ṭhen akoakʼ sanam daṛeko danaea, jemon Isorakʼ katha ạuri purạukʼ hạbicʼ uni doe raj daṛeakʼ.
Ar okoeṭakʼ maejiuem ńellede uni doe hoyokʼ kana ona maraṅ nagraha, one okoe do dhạrtiren sanam rapajko cetanre rajosṭiye calaoetʼkan.”
Inạ tayom ar mitʼṭen goḍet serma khon pheḍ hijukʼ kaniń ńelkedea. Uni do maraṅ ektiạri tahẽkantaea ar dhạrti do uniakʼ ṭhonokte marsalena.

Uni do ãṭ aṛaṅte hohowateye menkeda, “Lạnduṛena, ona maraṅ nagraha Babel do lạnduṛena, ona do ńitokʼ bạṛicʼ jiukoakʼ tahen reakʼ jaega hoeakana ar mitʼke mitʼ bạṛicʼ jiuakʼ dander ar beshapha ar hirkhạwan cẽṛẽkoakʼ khańca hoeakana,

ente uni do acʼakʼ loṭghuṭi reakʼ botoranakʼ bubulakʼ sanam jạtrenkoe ńũ ocoakatʼkoa. Dhạrtiren rapajko do uni tulucʼko loṭghuṭi akada, ar dhạrtiren bạnij bepariko hõ uniakʼ bin sambṛaokʼ reakʼ iricʼ cikijokʼ daṛeteko kisạ̃ṛ akana.”

Ona tayom iń do serma khon ar mitʼ hoṛ roroṛ kaniń ańjomkedea, “E ińren hoṛko, ape do Babel khon oḍok hijukʼpe jemon uniakʼ kại reakʼ bhạgiạdarko alope hoyokʼ, ar okako sạjại unire ńurokʼ ona okaṭakʼge jemon alo paṛaoape.
Uniakʼ kại do serma hạbicʼ usul akana ar uniakʼ bạṛicʼ kạmiko reakʼ katha do Isore disạ akatʼtaea.

Ar eṭakʼko tulucʼ cetʼ lekae beoharakatʼ onkage acʼ sãote hõ beoharpe; uniakʼ kạmiko leka purạ puri kuṛại emaepe. Okaṭakʼ bạṭire uni do eṭakʼko lạgitʼ bạṛicʼakʼe mesaletʼ tahẽkan, onare uniakʼ purạ sạjại mesalkate jom ocoyepe.

Uni do acʼakʼ reaṅ tinạkʼ bạ̃ṛtiye sabasilen, ar tinạkʼ bạ̃ṛtiye umtạ umtilen, ṭhik unạkʼge saset ar duk emaepe, ente monreye hudiseda, iń ma rạniń hoeakan, ar rạnḍi doń baṅkana; ar oka lekatege bạń dukokʼa.
Onate unire joto sạjại mitʼ dintege paṛaokʼa; onako do hoyokʼ kana moron, duk ar mohamạri. Seṅgelte uni doe rapakʼ giḍi ocokʼa, ente okoe uniakʼe bicạrtae uni Probhu Isor doe daṛeanicʼ kana.”
Ar dhạrtiren okoeko raj uni tulucʼko loṭghuṭi akatʼ arko umtạ umtilen onko do uni rapage jokhecʼ dhũạ ńelteko raga ar uni lạgitʼko dukokʼa.
Onko do uniakʼ saset ńelte botorte sạṅgińre teṅgokateko mena, “Hae Babel, hae! Ona maraṅ nagraha, ar daṛeanakʼ nagraha do, ente mitʼ ghạṛite amakʼ sạjại do seṭerena!”
Dhạrtiren bạnij bepariko hõ uni lạgitʼko raga arko dukokʼa, ente onkoakʼ jinisko do ar okoege bako hataoa.

Onkoakʼ onako jinis modre sona, rupạ, damanakʼ dhiri ar muti mạnik, mĩhĩ musnạ kicricʼ, kurse baha roṅakʼ kicricʼ, lumạṅ kicricʼ ar jeṅgetʼ arakʼ kicʼricʼ; aema lekan mońj so kaṭko ar hạti ḍaṭate tearakʼ aema jinisko; damanakʼ kaṭ reakʼ tearakʼ jinisko, pitạl, mẽṛhẽtʼ ar mormor dhirite tear jinisko;
darcini jut so mosola, dhup, mahkaokʼ sunum, kunduru, darkha rasa, jạitun reakʼ sunum, holoṅ ar guhum; ḍaṅgrako, bhiḍiko, sadomko ar gạḍiko ar golamkoge.
Onko bạnij beparikoko mena, “Okaṭakʼ jo am do lab joṅem menletʼ tahẽkan ona do am ṭhen khon sạṅgiń akana; amakʼ joto dhon-durib ar sajaotetʼ do nosṭo akana. Ar hoṛko do tisge ona bako ńama.”
Okoe noako jinis bạnij beparkateko kisạ̃ṛlen onko bepariko do uniakʼ saset ńelte botorte sạṅgińreko teṅgo tahena.
Onko do bhabna ar rakʼ rakʼateko mena, “Hae, hae! Mĩhĩ musnạ kicricʼ ar beguni roṅakʼ ar jeṅgetʼ arakʼ kicricʼte bande akan ar sona, damanakʼ dhiri ar mạnikte abhran akan ona maraṅ nagraha do!

Ente mitʼ ghạṛitege amakʼ joto dhon-durib do nosṭo cabayena!” Ar mitʼke mitʼ jahaj calaoko, ar jahajte dãṛãn hoṛko, ar lạuṛiạko, ar jalapurire okoe doko bạnij beparetʼkan onko sanamko do sạṅgińreko teṅgo tahẽyena.
Ar uni rapage reakʼ dhũạ ńelte onko do ãṭ aṛaṅteko menkeda, “Okaṭakʼ nagraha do noa maraṅ nagraha lekana?”

Onko do akoakʼ bohokʼre dhuṛiko er joṅa ar rakʼ rakʼteko mena, “Hae, hae, ona maraṅ nagraha do! Ar jalapurire okoekoakʼ jahaj menakʼtako onko do uniakʼ dhon-duribtegeko kisạ̃ṛlena; ar ńelpe mitʼ ghuṛitege ona do ḍahao maraoena!”

Unre uni serma goḍet doe menkeda, “E serma, ona nagraha ḍahao maraoen iạte rạskạkʼme. E Isorren hoṛko, apostolko ar nạbiko hulạsokʼpe. Ape birudre uni okae cekaletʼ ona lạgitʼ Isor do uniye bicạr akadea.”

Tayomte mitʼṭen daṛeanicʼ serma goḍet do maraṅ jante dhiri lekanakʼ mitʼṭen dhiri jalapurire lebda giḍikateye menkeda, “Nonkage ona maraṅ nagraha Babel do lebda giḍi ocokʼa. Ona do ar tishõ baṅ ńamokʼa.

Okoe peṛesaṅko banam, arko sereń ar tiriạ ar siṅgạko oroṅ onkoakʼ saḍe do ar tishõ amre baṅ ańjomokʼa. Amre tishõ gạkhuṛ kạrigol do ar bako ńamokʼa. Ar amre jante reakʼ saḍe do ar tisge baṅ ańjomokʼa.

Amre diuhe reakʼ marsal do tishõ baṅ jolokʼa. Jãwãe beṭa ar bạhu kuṛiyakʼ aṛaṅ amre ar tishõ baṅ ańjomokʼa. Amren bạnij bepariko do dhạrtire joto khon napṛakʼko tahẽkana, ar sanam jạtrenko do amakʼ jạduteko bulạulena.
Nạbiko, Isorren hoṛko ar okoeko hoṛ do noa dhạrtireko gocʼ ocolen onkoakʼ mãyãm do noa Babelrege ńamakana.”
Noa tayom iń do sermare ạḍi utạr hoṛkoakʼ sabad lekań ańjomkeda. Onko doko menetʼ tahẽkana, “Halleluyah! Bańcao, ṭhonok ar daṛe, jotoge aboren Isorakʼ kana,
ente uniakʼ bicạr do sạri ar dhoromgea. Okoe acʼakʼ loṭghuṭite goṭa dhạrtiye bhõnḍ akatʼ tahẽkan uni maraṅ kusmbi do Isor sạjạiye emadea ar acʼren golamkoakʼ mãyãm reakʼ unireye halakeda.”
Onko do dosar dhaoko menkeda, “Halleluyah! Ar uni khon dhũạ do jaejug hạbicʼ oḍokokʼtege tahena.”
Isor, okoe do siṅghạsonreye duṛupʼ akan uni do onko pongel pon mukhiyạ ar onko ponea jiwiyanko ombakʼkate sewawadeteko menkeda, “Amen. Halleluyah!”
Unre siṅghạson khon mitʼ hoṛe menkeda, “E Isorren golamko ar okoe do Isorpe sewawaekan, lạṭu ar kạṭicʼko ape jotoko aboren Isor sarhaoepe.”

Ona tayom iń do ạḍi utạr hoṛkoakʼ sabad leka, ar had had ạtukʼ dakʼ reakʼ saḍe ar kajak huḍuretʼkan saḍe leka noa kathań ańjomkeda, “Halleluyah! Aboren sanam daṛeyicʼ Probhu Isor do rajokʼe ehopʼakada.
Ar dela, kusite bon rạskạkʼma ar uni bon sarhaoea, ente Bheḍa Hoponakʼ baplakʼ reakʼ ghuṛi do seṭerena ar uniren bạhu doe sapṛao akana.
Uni do jhalkaokʼkan, sapha ar mĩhĩ musnạ kicricʼ bandekʼ lạgitʼ emakawadea. Ona kicricʼ do Isorren hoṛkoakʼ dhorom kạmiko kana.”

Ona tayom uni serma goḍet doe metadińạ, “Noa katha olme, Bheḍa Hoponakʼ bapla bhojre okoekoko neota ocoakan onko doko bhạgangea.” Uni do noa katha hõe menkeda, “Noako do Isorakʼ katha kana, ar ona do sạrigea.”

Unre iń do uni serma goḍetakʼ jaṅga ṭhen ombakʼenteń sewawadea. Menkhan uni doe metadińạ, “Noa do cetʼem cekayeda? Iń do amren são kạmiyạicʼ kạnạń. Isorge sewawaeme. Amren biswạsi boehako, okoe do Jisuakʼ cecetʼakʼko sapʼ dohoakatʼ, iń do onko modren mitʼ hoṛ kạnạń. Jisuakʼ cecetʼakʼge tahẽkana nạbikoakʼ asol katha do.”
Tayomte iń do serma jhicʼ akan, ar onḍe mitʼṭen ponḍ sadomiń ńelkedea. Ar okoe uni sadomreye decʼakan tahẽkan uniakʼ ńutum do pạtiạr ar sạriyicʼ. Uni do dhoromteye bicạreda are lạṛhại kana.
Uniakʼ mẽtʼ do jolokʼkan seṅgel leka ar uniakʼ bohokʼre do ạḍi utạr mukuṭ tahẽkana. Uniakʼ hoṛmore nonkan mitʼṭen ńutum ol tahẽkana, one okaṭakʼ ńutum do acʼ chaḍa ar okoe hõ bako baḍae.
Uni do mãyãmre topoakatʼ kicricʼe oyo akatʼ tahẽkana, ar uniakʼ ńutum do Isorakʼ katha kana.
Sermaren palṭonko do ponḍ sapha musnạ kicricʼ horokʼkate ar ponḍ sadomre decʼkate uni tayom tayomteko calakʼkan tahẽkana.

Sanam jạtko jemone ḍanṭao daṛeako ona lạgitʼ uniakʼ moca khon mitʼṭen laser tarwaṛe oḍokokʼkan tahẽkana. Uni do mẽṛhẽtʼ reakʼ ṭheṅgate sanam jạtkoe ḍanṭaokoa ar darkha jo do lelen kunḍre jaṅgateye lena. Noa darkha lelen kunḍ do hoyokʼ kana sanam daṛeyicʼ Isorakʼ botoranakʼ edre.
Ar uniakʼ kicricʼre ar bulure noa ńutum ol menakʼa, “Rajkoren raj, ar Probhukoren Probhu.”

Tayomte mitʼṭen serma goḍet siń cando talare teṅgo akaniń ńelkedea. Ar okoeko cẽṛẽ sermareko uḍạukʼkan tahẽkan onko sanamko ãṭ aṛaṅte hohoateye metatʼkoa, “Dela, Isorakʼ maraṅ bhoj jom lạgitʼ hecʼ jarwakʼpe!
Jemon rapajko reakʼ, subedarkoakʼ, daṛean hoṛkoakʼ, sadomko ar sadomre decʼakan hoṛkoakʼ, sạdhinko ar golamko ar kạṭicʼ lạṭu sanam manwakoakʼ jelpe jom daṛeakʼ.’’
Ona tayomiń ńelkeda, okoe uni sadomreye decʼakan tahẽkan uni ar uniren palṭonko birudre lạṛhại lạgitʼ uni janwar ar dhạrtiren rapajko do akoren palṭonkowante mitʼ ṭhenko jarwayena.

Ar uni janwar doe sapʼ ocoyena ar okoeṭakʼ bhonḍ nạbi uni ńutumte hahaṛa kạmikoe kạmiyetʼkan tahẽkan uni hõe sapʼ ocoyena. Ar okoe uni janwarakʼ cinhạko hatao akatʼ tahẽkan ar uniakʼ muṭhạnko sewawakʼkan tahẽkan, uni eṛe nạbi do hahaṛa kạmikote onkoe bulạu akatʼko tahẽkana. Unkin do jolokʼkan gondhokʼ seṅgel reakʼ doreãore jiwetʼtekin khadle ocoyena.
Ar okoe uni ponḍ sadomreye decʼakan tahẽkan, ar uniakʼ moca khon okaṭakʼ tarwaṛe oḍokokʼkan tahẽkan onate unkinren eṭakʼ sanam soṅgetenkoko gocʼ ocoyena. Onate cẽṛẽko do onkoakʼ jel jomteko biyena.
Inạ tayom mitʼṭen goḍet do serma khon pheḍ hijukʼ kaniń ńelkedea. Uniakʼ tire do ona athan kunḍ reakʼ choṛan ar mitʼṭen maraṅ okocʼ sikṛi tahẽkana.
Uni do uni biń, metakʼme okoe do mare biń Diabol Soetanko metaekan uni sapʼkate mitʼ hajar bochor hạbicʼe tolkedea ar ona athan kunḍreye khadlekadea.
Tayomte kulup oṭokate ona cetanreye chapada, jemon ona mitʼ hajar bochor ạuri mucạdokʼ hạbicʼ dhạrtire jạt jạtrenko eṭakʼ bhul horte bae idi daṛeako; ona tayom thoṛa din lạgitʼ uni doe aṛakʼ ocokʼa.

Ona tayom adomakʼ siṅghạsonkoń ńelkeda, ar okoe onareko duṛupʼ akan tahẽkan onko do bicạr reakʼ ektiạriko em ocoakan tahẽkana. Isorakʼ katha ar Jisu reakʼ cecetʼakʼ lekate calakʼ iạte okoe do bohokʼko makʼ ńur ocoakan tahẽkan, onko hoṛakʼ jiwikoń ńelkeda. Onko do uni janwar ar uniakʼ muṭhạn hõ bako sewawakʼkan tahẽkana ar moloṅre se tire cinhạ hõ bako hataoleda. Onko doko jiwetʼente mitʼ hajar bochor hạbicʼ Mạsi tulucʼ rajosṭiko calaokeda.

Noa do hoyokʼ kana pạhil dhao gocʼko khon jiwetʼ ruạṛokʼ ar niạ dhao okoeko jiwetʼ beretʼen onko doko bhạgangea arko sonotgea. Pạhil dhao okoeko jiwetʼ beretʼlen onko hoṛkore dosar gujukʼ reakʼ jãhãn daṛe do bạnukʼa, bickom onko do Isorren ar Mạsiren naekeko hoyokʼa ar hajar bochor hạbicʼ Mạsi tulucʼko rajokʼa.
Menkhan ona hajar bochor ạuri purạukʼ hạbicʼ sarecʼ akan gocʼ hoṛko do bako jiwetʼlena.
Ona hajar bochor purạulen khan Soetan do acʼakʼ hajot oṛakʼ khone raṛa ocokʼa.
Unre uni do goṭa dhạrtire senkate jạt jạtrenko, metakʼme Gog ar Magoge bulạukinạ ar onko do lạṛhại lạgitʼe jarwakoa. Noko do lekhare jalapuri reakʼ gitil lekako hoyokʼa.
Unreń ńelkeda, onko do samaṅ secʼ senkate Isorren hoṛkoakʼ tahen jaega ar uniakʼ ona dulạṛiạ nagrahako esetʼ ạcurkeda. Menkhan serma khon seṅgel pheḍ hecʼente onko doe rapakʼ maraoketʼkoa.

Ar okoe onko eṭakʼ horteye bulạu idiletʼko tahẽkan uni Soetan do jolokʼkan gondhok reakʼ doreãoreye khadle ocoyena. Uni janwar ar eṛe nạbi do laharege onḍekin khadle ocoakan tahẽkana. Onko do onḍe jaejug hạbicʼko sasetokʼa.
Ona tayom mitʼṭen maraṅ okocʼ ponḍ siṅghạson ar onare duṛupʼ akan mitʼ hoṛiń ńelkedea. Uni samaṅ khon dhạrti ar serma do ńir pharakena, ar onkinakʼ jaega do okarehõ baṅ ńamlena.

Ona tayom iń do, kạṭicʼ lạṭu joto gocʼ hoṛko ona siṅghạson samaṅre teṅgo akaniń ńelketʼkoa. Inạ tayom do puthiko oṭakʼ ocoyena. Ona tayom ar mitʼṭen puthi oṭakʼ ocoyena. Ona do jion reakʼ puthi tahẽkana. Ar ona puthire noko gocʼ hoṛkoakʼ kạmi reaṅ cetʼleka ol akan tahẽkan ona lekage onkoakʼ bicạr do hoyena.

Ar okoe gocʼ hoṛko do jalapurireko tahẽkan, onko do jalapuriye idiketʼkoa. Ona chaḍa moron ar patalpurire okoe gocʼakan hoṛko tahẽkan, onko dokin em ruạṛkatʼkoa. Ar mimitʼko do akoakʼ kạmi lekako bicạr ocoyena.
Ona tayom iń do mitʼṭen nawa serma ar mitʼṭen nawa dhạrtiń ńelkeda. Pạhilakʼ serma ar pạhilakʼ dhạrti do parom calaoena ar jalapuri hõ ar baṅ tahẽlena.
Ar ona sonot nagraha, metakʼme nawa Jerusalem do serma khon ar Isor ṭhen khon pheḍ hijukʼ kaniń ńelkeda. Cetʼleka bạhu do acʼren jãwãe lạgitʼe sajaoakan, onkage noa nagraha hõ sajao ocoakan tahẽkana.

Ona tayom mitʼ hoṛ do ona siṅghạson khon ãṭ aṛaṅate noa katha roroṛ kaniń ańjomkedea, “Nitokʼ do manwako talare Isorakʼ tahen jaega hoeakana. Uni do manwako sãoteye tahena ar onko do uniren hoṛko hoyokʼa. Uni do acʼge manwako sãoteye tahena ar onkoren Isore hoyokʼa.
Uni do onkoakʼ mẽtʼ dakʼe jodtakoa. Moron do ar baṅ hoyokʼa; duk, haso ar rakʼ joṅ do ar baṅ tahena, ente pạhilakʼ joto do parom calao akana.”
Okoe ona siṅghạsonreye duṛupʼ akan tahẽkan uni doe menkeda, “Ńelme, iń do jotowakʼge nawateń benao aroyeda.” Uni do arhõe menkeda, “Noa katha olme, ente noa kathako do pạtiạr ar sạrigea.”
Uni do arhõe metadińạ, “Hoyena. Ińge Alpha ar Omega, etohopʼ ar mucạtʼ. Okoe tetaṅedekan uni do jiwetʼ dakʼ reakʼ jharna khon begor damteń ńu ocoyea.
Ar okoeye jitạukʼa uni do noakoe ạidạri joṅa. Ińge uniren Isoriń hoyokʼa ar uni do ińren gidrại hoyokʼa.

Menkhan botorokʼko, bepạtiạrko, hirkhạwakoko, gogocʼko, loṭghuṭiko, jạdu udukʼko, boṅga muṭhạn sewako ar joto lekan eṛekoakʼ mucạtʼ dosa do seṅgel ar gondhok reakʼ dõreaorege.” Ar noa kangea dosar gujukʼ do.”

Ar okoe eae goṭecʼ serma goḍetkoakʼ tire mucạtʼ eae goṭecʼ dukte perecʼ bạṭi tahẽkan onko modren mitʼ hoṛ do iń ṭhen hecʼkateye menkeda, “Dela hijukʼme, bạhu kuṛiń udukʼama, metakʼme Bheḍa Hoponren bạhuń udukʼama.”

Tayomte uni serma goḍet do mitʼṭen maraṅ ar usul buruteye idikedeńa. Unre iń do sonot Jiu reakʼ uskurreń tahẽkana. Ar Isorakʼ ṭhonokte jhalkaokʼkan ona sonot nagraha Jerusalem serma khon ar Isor ṭhen khon pheḍ hijukʼkane udukʼạdińa.
Ona nagraha reakʼ marsal do ạḍi damanakʼ dhiri reakʼ marsal leka, ar surjokanto mạnik dhiri lekage.

Ona nagraha reakʼ mitʼṭen maraṅ ar usul pạcri tahẽkana ar onare gelbar goṭecʼ duạr tahẽkana, ona duạrkore do gelbar goṭen serma goḍetko tahẽkana. Ar Israel jạtren gelbar bõsrenkoakʼ ńutum do ona duạrre ol tahẽkana.
Duạrko modre pea do purub secʼre, pea do utạr secʼre, pea do dạkhin secʼre ar pea do pạchim secʼre tahẽkana.
Ona nagraha reakʼ pạcrire gelbar goṭecʼ rehetʼ tahẽkana ar onako cetanre Bheḍa Hoponren gelbar goṭen apostolkoakʼ gelbar goṭecʼ ńutum tahẽkana.
Ar okoe iń tulucʼ kathae roroṛkan tahẽkan uniakʼ tire do mitʼṭen sona reakʼ jokhawakʼ chuci tahẽkana, jemon uni do ona nagraha reakʼ duạrko ar ona reakʼ pạcriye jokha daṛeakʼ.
Ar nagraha do ponon konḍge jeleń ar osarte somangea. Tayomte uni do ona jokhawakʼte nagrahae jokhaketʼ khan, ona do jeleńte, osarte ar usulte bar hajar ponsae kilomitar hoyena.
Tayomte uni do pạcriye jokhaketʼa ar ona reakʼ usultetʼ do mitʼ sae pongel pon moka hoyena. Manwa cetʼlekako jokhae onkage uni serma goḍet hõe jokhakeda.
Ona pạcri do surjokanto mạnik dhirite gathao akan tahẽkana ar nagraha do nirola kãc lekanakʼ khạṭi sonate benao tahẽkana.
Ona nagraha reakʼ pạcri reakʼ rehetʼko do joto lekanakʼ damanakʼ dhirikote sajao tahẽkana. Pạhilakʼ rehetʼtetʼ do surjokanto, dosarakʼ do nilkanto, tesarakʼ do tamro, ponakʼ do morokot,
mõṛẽakʼ do boidurjo, turuiyakʼ do lalkanto, eaeakʼ do sornokanto, irạlakʼ do gomedok, areakʼ do podmorag, gelakʼ dolosunio, gelmitʼakʼ do peroj, ar gelbarakʼ do koṭahelage.
Ona gelbar duạrre gelbar muti tahẽkana. Mimitʼ duạr do mimitʼ goṭecʼ mutite tear akan tahẽkana. Ar nagraha reakʼ kulhi do sapha kãc leka khạṭi sonate tear tahẽkana.
Ona nagrahare jãhãn mundilge bạń ńel ńamleda, ente sanam daṛeanicʼ Probhu Isor ar Bheḍa Hoponge ona nagraharen mundil do.
Ona nagrahare marsalokʼ lạgitʼ siń cando se ńindạ cando reakʼ jạruṛ do bạnukʼa, ente Isorakʼ ṭhonokge onḍe doe marsala ar Bheḍa Hopon kangeae onḍenicʼ diuhe do;
sanam jạtrenko ona marsalreko dãṛãna. Dhạrtiren rapajko do akoakʼ ṭhonokante ona nagrahateko hijukʼa.
Din bhor nagraha reakʼ duạrko do tis hõ siń baṅ tahena ar onḍe do ńindạ hõ baṅ ńindạkʼa.
Onḍe do sanam jạtkoakʼ man ar ṭhonok ạgukʼa.
Besapha jãhãnakʼ se hirkhạwakʼ kạmiko se eṛe roroṛko nonkan okoe hoṛge onḍe do bako bolo daṛeakʼa; ar okoeakʼ ńutum Bheḍa Hoponakʼ jion reakʼ puthire ol menakʼ, eken onkoge onḍeko bolo daṛeakʼa.
Isor ar Bheḍa Hoponakʼ siṅghạson do ona nagrahare tahena ar uniren golamko do uniko sewawaea.
Onko do uniakʼ mẽtʼãhãko ńeltaea ar uniakʼ ńutum do onkoakʼ moloṅre ol tahena.
Ńindạ do ar baṅ tahena ar onko do diuhe reakʼ marsal se siń cando reakʼ marsal hõ baṅ jạruṛakoa, ente Probhu Isor do acʼge onkoren marsale hoyokʼa. Ar jaejug hạbicʼ onko do rajko calaoa.

Tayomte uni serma goḍet doe metadińạ, “Noako katha do pạtiạr ar sạrigea. Probhu Isor, one okoe do nạbiko hoteteye roṛletʼ tahẽkan, uni do acʼren goḍete kolakadea, jemon thoṛa ghạṛicʼ khange okaṭakʼ hoy lạgidokʼkan, ona do acʼren golamkoe udukʼ daṛeako.”
Jisui meneda, “Ńelpe, iń do ạḍi usạrageń hijukʼ kana. Noa puthi reakʼ sanam katha, metakʼme Isorakʼ kathako okoeye manao uni doe bhạgangea.”
Iń Johan do noakoń ańjom akada ariń ńel akada. Ar jotowakʼ ańjom ar ńel tayom, okoeṭakʼ serma goḍet noakoe udukʼ ạdiń, uni sewawae lạgitʼ uniakʼ jaṅga ṭheniń ombakʼena.
Menkhan uni doe metadińạ, “Men, alo; iń do am ar amren biswạsi boehako, metakʼme nạbiko ar okoe do noa puthi reakʼ sanamakʼ kathako manaoetʼkan onkoren são golam kạnạń. Isorge baṛe sewawae me.”
Ona tayom uni doe metadińạ, “Noa puthi reakʼ sanamakʼ kathako, metakʼme Isorakʼ katha am do alom oko dohokakʼa, ente oktetetʼ do sor akana. Bedhoromicʼ do, bedhoromtegeye tahenma,
ar okoe mạilạyicʼ uni do mạilạ iditegeye tahenma. Dhoromicʼ do dhorom iditegeye tahenma ar okoe doe sonotge uni do sonot iditegeye tahenma.”
Jisui meneda, “Ńelme, hako pakogeń hijukʼkana ar mimitʼko akoakʼ kạmiko reakʼ kuṛại do iń soṅgerege menakʼa.
Ińge Alpha ar Omega, pạhilicʼ ar sesicʼ, etohopʼ ar mucạtʼicʼ do.
“Bhạgangeako onko do, one okoe do akoakʼ kicricʼko ạrupʼetʼkan jemon jion dare reakʼ jo jom reakʼ ạidạriko ńam ar duạr secʼte nagrahateko bolo daṛeakʼ.
Setako lekan bạṛicʼ hoṛko, jạdu udukʼko, laṭghaṭko, khũniạhiko, murhutʼ sewako, eṛeakʼ dulạṛko ar eṛeakʼ kạmiko, onko sanamkoge bahrereko tahena.
“Iń Jisuge ińren goḍet iń kolakadea, jemon uni do ape ṭhen manḍerko lạgitʼ noako reaṅ gohae em daṛeakʼ. Ińge Dạud reakʼ rehetʼ ar bõs, ar ḍag ḍagaokʼkan bhurkạ ipil do.”

Sonot Jiu ar bạhu kuṛi dokin meneda, “Dela hijukʼme,” Ar okoe noa kathae ańjometʼ uni hõe menma, “Dela hijukʼme.” Okoe tetaṅede kan uni doe hijukʼma ar okoe dakʼ ńũi menetʼkan uni do begor damte jion dakʼe ńũ idi joṅma.

Okoe hoṛ noa puthi reakʼ sanam katha, metakʼme Isorakʼ kathakoe ańjometʼkan, iń do uni ṭhen noa gohań emeda je, jãhãege noare jãhãnakʼe juṭicʼakʼ, enḍekhan Isor hõ noa puthire olakan sanam dukko uniakʼ jionreye juṭicʼaea.
Ar noa puthi reakʼ sanam katha, metakʼme Isorakʼ katha khon jãhãege thoṛagane kaṭao enḍekhan Isor hõ noa puthire olakan jion dare ar ona sonot nagraha reakʼ ạidạri uniakʼ jion khone kaṭaoa.
Okoe noako reaṅe gohayetʼkan uniye meneda, “Sạrige iń do hako pakogeń hijukʼkana.” Amen. Probhu Jisu, dela hijukʼme.
Probhu Jisuakʼ bhor Isorren sanam hoṛko lạgitʼ tahenma. Amen.
